source: But Ananias said, Lord, I have had accounts of this man from a number of people, how much evil he has done to your saints at Jerusalem:
target: Tin, Anania chuan, Lalpa, chu mi chu Jerusalem khuaa i mi thianghlimte chunga a tihsual tamzia thu mi tam tak kaah ka hria a ni!

source: Let Aaron come into the holy place in this way: with an ox for a sin-offering and a male sheep for a burned offering.
target: Hetiang hian Arona chu hmun thianghlimah a kal tur a ni: sual thawi nan bawng tuai, halral thilhlanah berampa nen.

source: We took a shower together.
target: Kan inbual dun a.

source: Why then do you give me comfort with words in which there is no profit, when you see that there is nothing in your answers but deceit?
target: Tichuan, engtin nge thu engmah lo tak meuhva mi thlamuan dawn? In chhannaah hian dawt mai lo chu engmah a awm lo.

source: Then they said these words to them: What are the names of the men who are at work on this building?
target: Tin, hetiang hian an hnênah, He mi in sa tute hming hi tute nge ni? kan ti a.

source: And a number of Jews had come to Martha and Mary to give them comfort about their brother.
target: tichuan an nuta thih chunga tithlamuang turin Judateho tam tak Marthi leh Mari hnenah an lo kal a.

source: I promise to call
target: Call ka tiam a ni

source: He sends down ice like raindrops: water is made hard by his cold.
target: A tui khal chu chhâng them nawi angin a paih chhuak thin a: Ama vawhna hmaah chuan tunge ding thei ang?

source: What is this?
target: Hei hi eng nge?

source: For I had great joy and comfort in your love, because the hearts of the saints have been made strong again through you, brother.
target: Unaupa, nangma zara mi thianghlimte thinlung a lo harh tak avangin i hmangaihnaah chuan ka hlimin ka thlamuang em em thin asin.

source: For this cause give a parting offering to Moresheth-gath: the daughter of Achzib will be a deceit to the king of Israel.
target: Aw Maresa mi, nangmah neitu tûr i hnênah ka la rawn hruai ang: Israel ropuina chuan Adullam a va thleng ang.

source: Bring it here
target: Hetah lo la rawh

source: Who will you believe
target: Tu nge i rin ang

source: So they became unclean through their works, going after their evil desires.
target: Chutiang chuan an hnathawhtea tihbawrhbanin an awm a, An thiltihahte chuan an lo uire ta a.

source: They promised paradise
target: Paradis an tiam a

source: Be certain to do this with all care: do not let trouble be increased to the king's damage.
target: Muang hauh suh u: engah tehlul nge lalte tana chhiatna thil pawi tak a lo zualkai ang? a ti a.

source: On the third day Eliab, the son of Helon, chief of the children of Zebulun:
target: Ni thum ni chuan Zebuluna thlahte puipa Helona fapa Eliaba huan a hlan a:

source: Grab that.
target: Kha kha vuan la.

source: The twenty-second Giddalti, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi sawmhnih leh vawi hnihna chu Gidaltia chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: I had fun
target: Ka hlim e

source: And Abraham said to God, If only Ishmael's life might be your care!
target: Tin, Abrahama vêk chuan Pathian hnênah, Ismaela hi i hmaah awm thei sela aw! a ti a.

source: I was forty years old when Moses, the servant of the Lord, sent me from Kadesh-barnea to make a search through the land; and the account which I gave him was in keeping with his desire.
target: LALPA chhiahhlawh Mosian Kades-barnea hmun atanga ram va en thla tura mi tirh lai khan kum sawmli mi ka ni tawh a; tin, ka rilrua awm ang chiah chu a hnenah ka thlen leh a. a.

source: If your children have done evil against him, then their punishment is from his hand.
target: I fate a chungah an sual a nih chuan An bawhchhiatna kutah a mantir a:

source: We have an altar from which those priests who are servants in the Tent may not take food.
target: Keini zawngin maicham kan nei a, chu mi-ah chuan biak buk rawngbawltute chuan an ei tur a ni lo.

source: For he took away the altars of strange gods and the high places, and had the upright stones broken and the wood pillars cut down;
target: ram dang pathian maichâmte leh hmun sângte a thehthang bo va, lungphunte a tichim a, Aseri-te a kit a:

source: And all the meeting sent to the men of Benjamin who were in the rock of Rimmon, offering them peace.
target: Tin, inkhawmho zawng zawngte chuan mi an tir a, Rimon lungpuia awm Benjamin-ho an va bia a, an hnênah inrem thu an puang a.

source: And they came to some good fertile grass-land, in a wide quiet country of peace-loving people; for the people who were living there before were of the offspring of Ham.
target: Tin, ran tlatna hnim tui tak tak leh tha tak tak an hmu a, a ram chu a zauvin a reh a, ralmuanawm tak a ni; a hmaa lo awmte chu Hama thalhte an ni a.

source: Ruling over Judah in Hebron for seven years and six months, and in Jerusalem, over all Israel and Judah, for thirty-three years.
target: Hebron-ah chuan Judate chungah kum sarih leh thla ruk a lal a; tin, Jerusalem-ah Israelte leh Judate zawng zawg chungah kum sâwmthum leh km thum a lal a.

source: Now when Solomon's prayers were ended, fire came down from heaven, burning up all the offerings; and the house was full of the glory of the Lord.
target: Tin, Solomonan a han tawngtai zaw chuan vân atangin mei a lo chuk a, hâlral thilhlan leh inthawinate chu a rawn kangral a a; tin, LALPA ropuinain in chu a lo khat ta a.

source: In the eighteenth year of the rule of King Josiah this Passover was kept to the Lord in Jerusalem.
target: lal Josia lal kum sâwm leh kum riat kuma chuan chu Kalhlen Kût chu Jerusalem khuaah LALPA tan an nei ta chauh a ni.

source: Peace be to the brothers, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
target: Pa, Pathian leh Lalpa Isua Krista hnen ata remna leh rinna tel hmangaihna unaute hnenah khan awm rawh se.

source: I am eating
target: Ka ei mek

source: Were you frightened
target: I hlau em ni

source: She wanted to go out
target: Chhuah a duh a

source: And he made a request to his disciples to have a little boat ready for him, so that he might not be crushed by the people;
target: Tin, mipui avang chuan a tan lawngleng lo ruatsak turin a zirtirte a hrilh a, Chutilochuan mi nek huai huai dah ang e, a ti a.

source: I will put right their errors; freely will my love be given to them, for my wrath is turned away from him.
target: An hnungtawlhna hi ka tidam ang a, An lak ațanga ka thin rimna chu a kian tâk avângin, Anni chu ka hmangaih hrim hrim dawn a ni.

source: Now there was talk among the chief priests of putting Lazarus to death;
target: Tin, puithiam lalte chu Lazara pawh tihlum turin an inrawn a;

source: Have you not seen this which is in the Writings: The stone which the builders put on one side, the same was made the chief stone of the building:
target: He Pathian Lehkha thu hi in chhiar lawm ni?‘In satute lung duh loh kha, ‘Chu ngei chu a kila lung tangkai ber a lo ni ta.

source: Don't look away from me
target: Min hawisan suh

source: And when the disciples came to the other side they had not taken thought to get bread.
target: Tin, zirtirte chu ral leh lam an thlen chuan chhang an lo ken theihnghilh a.

source: The end of a thing is better than its start, and a gentle spirit is better than pride.
target: Thil tawpna chu a tha zawk thin, a tanna aiin, Rilrua chhel hi a tha zawk, rilrua chapo aiin.

source: How he was taken up into Paradise, and words came to his ears which may not be said, and which man is not able to say.
target: Paradis-a lak chhohva a awm leh thu sawi hleih theih loh, mihring sawi thian lohte chu a hria tih ka hria.

source: Why me?
target: Eng vangin kei kher?

source: And from day to day more supporters came to David, till he had a great army like the army of God.
target: Ni tin, Davida lama tang tûrin an lo kal an lo kal a, Pathian sipaiho ang maia sipai pâwl ropui tak an lo ni ta a.

source: And he put out Zedekiah's eyes; and the king of Babylon, chaining him in iron bands, took him to Babylon, and put him in prison till the day of his death.
target: Tin, Zedekia mit a kher chhuahsak a, Babulon lal chuan kawl a buntir a, Babulon-ah a kalpui ta a; athih ni thlengin tan inah a dah a.

source: Adam had been living for a hundred and thirty years when he had a son like himself, after his image, and gave him the name of Seth:
target: Tin, Adama chuan kum 130 a nihin amah ang tak, ama anpui ngei fapa a nei a; a hmingah Setha a sa a:

source: I love them
target: Anmahni ka hmangaih

source: The game started OK.
target: Inkhelh tan a OK.

source: She walks
target: A pen mêk

source: I smiled
target: Ka nuih tawh

source: It was competitive
target: Inelna a ni

source: It is by your mouth, even yours, that you are judged to be in the wrong, and not by me; and your lips give witness against you.
target: Kei ni lovin, nangma tawngkam ngeiin a thiam lo che a, A ni, i hmui ngeiin a hek che a ni.

source: I'm tipsy.
target: Ka rui a.

source: He deserves punishment
target: Hremna a phu a ni

source: Don't touch anything
target: Engmah khawih suh

source: And again he said with an oath, I have no knowledge of the man.
target: Tin, Chu mihring chu ka hre lo, tiin chhechhamin a pha leh a.

source: And as a saviour he will come to Zion, turning away sin from Jacob, says the Lord.
target: Tin, Zion-ah chuan tlantu a lo kal ang a, Jakob-ho zinga bawhchhiatna hawisantute hnênah pawh a lo kal ang, LALPAN a ti:

source: In the past you were not a people, but now you are the people of God; then there was no mercy for you, but now mercy has been given to you.
target: hman lai khan mi reng in ni lo va, tunah erwh chuan Pathian mi in ni ta a; hman lai khan zahngaihna in hmu lo va,tunah erawh chuan zahngaihna in hmu ta a.

source: See, I have made your face hard against their faces, and your brow hard against their brows.
target: Tûnah hian luhlul tak leh dehkhirh takin anmahni ang maiin ka siam ang che,

source: But after these things, I will let the fate of the children of Ammon be changed, says the Lord.
target: Chumi hnuah erawh chuan Amon fate awm dan ka lamlettir ang, tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: I do not see your son.
target: I fapa ka hmu lo.

source: But Peter gave them an account of it all in order, saying to them,
target: Nimahsela Petera chuan a bul atangin indawt ziahin an hnenah a hrilhfiah a:

source: Truly, God will not give up him who is without sin, and will not take evil-doers by the hand.
target: Ngai teh, pathianin mi tha apaih bo lo vang a, Thil sual titu a tungding hek lo vang.

source: I could be helpful
target: Ka tanpui thei a ni

source: And Joseph gave orders to his servants who had the necessary knowledge, to make his father's body ready, folding it in linen with spices, and they did so.
target: Tin, Josefan a chhiahhlawh damdawi thiamhote chu a pa ruang tawih thei lova siam tûrin thu a pe a: tichuan damdawi thiamhote chuan Israela ruang chu tawih thei lovin an siam ta a.

source: And he made them all be seated in groups on the green grass.
target: Tin, ani chuan an vaiin hlobet hring chungah chuan apawl zelin thuttir turin an hnenah thu a pe a.

source: For it is a delight to keep them in your heart, to have them ready on your lips.
target: I thinlung chhûnga i vawn a, I kaa i tihngheh bawk chuan thil duhawm tak a ni.

source: Who appointed them
target: Tuin nge an ruat

source: Go from here in the direction of the east, and keep yourself in a secret place by the stream Cherith, east of Jordan.
target: Heta ta hi chhuak la, khawchhak lam panin kal la, Jordan bula awm Kerith luiah han biru rawh

source: For God did not give us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of self-control.
target: Pathianin hlauhna thlarau min pe lo va, thiltihtheihna leh hmangaihna leh rilru fel tak neihna thlarau min pe zawk si a.

source: We'll starve to death!
target: Kan riltam ang!

source: We tried to defend ourselves.
target: Inven kan tum a.

source: By your breath the waves were massed together, the flowing waters were lifted up like a pillar; the deep waters became solid in the heart of the sea.
target: I hnâra thawin tuite chu a lo in tiang a, Tuite chu ênglo dah khâwm thûr angin a ding luah a: Tuifinriat chhûng daiha tui thuk takte chu a lo khal zo ta a,

source: Give me everything
target: Engkim min pe rawh

source: But we give the good news of Christ on the cross, a hard thing to the Jews, and a foolish thing to the Gentiles;
target: keini erawh chuan Krista khenbeh thu kan hril thin a nih hi; chu chu Judate tan chuan tlukna, Jentailte tan thu atthlak a ni a;

source: Hold on to me.
target: Ka hnênah awm rawh.

source: Or your father's wife's daughter, the child of your father, for she is your sister.
target: I pa nupuia fanu, i pa hrin saruakna chu, i farnu a ni a, a saruakna i hlim tur a ni lo.

source: Then the man will have to give the virgin's father fifty shekels of silver and make her his wife, because he has put shame on her; he may never put her away all his life.
target: a mutpuitu mipa chuan nula pa chu tangka sekel sawmnag a pe tur ani a, tin, ani chu a nupui a ni ang, a tihhminghliau tawh avangin; a dam chhûngin a then thei lovang.

source: See, I come quickly. A blessing on him who keeps the words of this book of the prophet.
target: Tin, ngai teh, ka lo kal thuai dawn e. He lehkhabu hrilh lawkna thu pawm apiang an eng a thawl e, a ti a.

source: And cedar-trees without number, for the Zidonians and the men of Tyre came with a great amount of cedar-trees for David.
target: sidar thin gchiar sen loh nen; Zidon mi leh tûra miten Davida hnênah chuan sidar thing tam tak an rawn la a ni.

source: Are not sparrows two a farthing? and not one of them comes to an end without your Father:
target: Chawngzawng pahnih dar tangka pakhatah an hralh thin lo vem ni? Nimahsela, an zinga pakhat mah in Pa lovin leiah a tla lo vang.

source: Stop! Don't come in!
target: Tawp! Lo lut suh!

source: But now I go to Jerusalem, taking help for the saints.
target: Tunah erawh chuan mi thianghlimho rawngbawl turin Jerusalem khuaah chuan ka kal rih dawn a ni.

source: He has seen no evil in Jacob or wrongdoing in Israel: the Lord his God is with him, and the glad cry of a king is among them.
target: Jakoba-ho khawlohna reng a hmu lo va, Israel-hovah chhiatna reng ka hmu hek lo. LALPA an Pathian chuan a awmpui a, An lal aan an hmang a ni.

source: Be full of desire for the true milk of the word, as babies at their mothers' breasts, so that you may go on to salvation;
target: nausen piang tharte angin thlarau lam hnute, engmah pawlh loh chu chak rawh u, chu miah chuan chhandamna tling khawpa in than len theih nan;

source: I may win
target: Ka hlawhtling maithei

source: I won't negotiate
target: Ka inrem dâwn lo

source: We're done talking
target: Kan sawi zo tawh

source: They're not afraid of me.
target: Min hlau hauh lo.

source: I have seen servants on horses, and rulers walking on the earth as servants.
target: Chhiahhlawh ka hmu, sakawr chungah, Hotu a kal kein, chhiahhlawh angin.

source: The God of our fathers gave Jesus back to life, whom you had put to death, hanging him on a tree.
target: Nangnin Isua thingah khai kangin in tihhlum kha, min thlahtute Pathianin a kai tho leh ta a ni.

source: And I will give grass in your fields for your cattle, so that you may have food in full measure.
target: In rante tan pawh in ramah hlobet te ka awmtir bawk ang a, nangni pawhin in ei ang a, in tlai ang.

source: And all lands sent to Egypt, to Joseph, to get grain, for the need was great over all the earth.
target: Tin, lei chung zawng zawngah tâm chu a tlâk nasat avângin ram tina mite chu buh lei tûrin Aigupta ramah Josefa hnênah chuan an lo kal thîn a.

source: And on the limit of Zebulun, from the east side to the west side: Gad one part.
target: Zebulunho chan nên a inriin chhak leh thlang zawngin chan khat Gadho chan a ni a.

source: Who made him angry when his voice came to them? was it not all those who came out of Egypt with Moses?
target: A nih leh tute nge ni, hre reng sia tivui kha? Aigupta ram atanga Mosia hruaia chhuak zawng zawng kha an ni lo vem ni?

source: They left together
target: An chhuak dun ta a

source: And at his words the spirit came into me and put me on my feet; and his voice came to my ears.
target: Tin, ka hnêna a thusawi lai chuan thlarau chu keimahah a lo lut a, ka ke in mi dintîr a; tin, mi betu chu ka ngaithla ta a.

source: You need to be there.
target: I awm a ngai a ni.

source: And has taken us out of the hands of our haters: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.
target: Min dotute lakah min chhanhim a: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: I fooled Tom.
target: Toma ka bum.

source: They held each other tight
target: An in chelh tlat a

source: You never call me.
target: Min ko ngai lo.

source: His strength is made feeble for need of food, and destruction is waiting for his falling footstep.
target: A chakna atamchhawl ang a, A kiangah chhiatna a inpeih reng.

source: For where two or three are come together in my name, there am I among them.
target: Mi pahnih emaw pathum emaw ka hminga an inkhawmna apiangah chuan an zingah ka awm si thin a, a ti a.

source: And he did the same sins which his father had done before him: his heart was not completely true to the Lord his God, like the heart of David his father.
target: A hmaa a pain thil sual a tih zawng zawngte kha a ti ve a: a pu Davida thinlung angin a thinlung chu LALPA a Pathian lamah a tha famkim ve lo va.

source: And he put the chief wine-servant back in his old place; and he gave the cup into Pharaoh's hand.
target: Josefan anmahni a hrilhfiah ang takin, uain petuah a tantîr leh a; tichuan no chu Pharaoa kutah chuan a pe ta a:

source: There were too many of them
target: An tam lutuk

source: Then do not go after false gods, as some of them did; as it is said in the holy Writings, After resting and feasting, the people got up to take their pleasure.
target: An zinga thenkhat milem betu an ni ang khan milem betu ni suh u, Mipui chu ei leh in turin an thu hlawm a, infiam turin an tho leh a, tih ziak ang kha.

source: You're hard-headed
target: Lu khauh tak i ni

source: I belong here
target: Hetah ka cheng

source: I don't lie
target: Ka daw lo

source: Are you sure you saw it?
target: I hmu chiang em?

source: Then they sent up their cry to the Lord in their sorrow, and he gave them salvation out of all their troubles;
target: Chu veleh an buainaah chuan LALPA chu an au va, Ani chuan an manganna atate chu a chhanhim a.

source: The sons of Benjamin: Bela and Becher and Jediael, three.
target: Benjamina fapate chu Bela te, Bekera te, Jediaela te an ni a, pathum an ni.

source: A wise man goes up into the town of the strong ones, and overcomes its strength in which they put their faith.
target: Mi fing chu mi chak khawpuiah a lo awm a, Chu mia na rinpui ber chakna chu a lak thlâksak thin.

source: It's a pretty house.
target: In mawi tak a ni.

source: There go the ships; there is that great beast, which you have made as a plaything.
target: Sawta saw lawngpuite a kal saw; Sawtah sawn Liviathan a awm, a chhûnga inkhel tûra i siamna chu.

source: And they made designs together to take Jesus by some trick, and put him to death.
target: Isua chu ngamthlema man a, an tihhlum theihna turin an inrawn a.

source: And he sent for lights and came rushing in and, shaking with fear, went down on his face before Paul and Silas,
target: Tin, a vengtu chuan khawnvarte a lam a, a zuang lut a, hlauva khur chungin Paula leh Sila hmaah a bawkkhup a;

source: Weren't you crying
target: I tap lo em ni

source: So six hundred men of the Danites from Zorah and Eshtaol went out armed with instruments of war.
target: Tichuan Zora leh Estaola khua tang chuan Dan hnamte chu indona thuam inbelin mi zaruk an chhuak ta a.

source: Is it new?
target: A thar em?

source: The king's request is a very hard one, and there is no other who is able to make it clear to the king, but the gods, whose living-place is not with flesh.
target: Tin, lal thil phût hi thil khirh tak a ni a, tîsaa khawsa lo pathiante tih chauh lo chu entîr thei tûr tumah an awm lo ve,’’ an ti a.

source: Who have said, Let us take for our heritage the resting-place of God.
target: Chu mite chuan, Pathian awmnate chu luahsak ang u, an tih kha.

source: If any man's work comes through the test, he will have a reward.
target: Tu hnathawh pawh a chunga a sak chu a awm reng chuan chu mi chuan lawmman a hmu ang.

source: To give his chiefs teaching at his pleasure, and so that his law-givers might get wisdom from him.
target: A mi liante chu a duh duha phur tûr leh, A upaho tifing tûrin.

source: Then again lifting up my eyes I saw a roll in flight through the air.
target: Tah chuan ka mit ka han len chho leh a, ka han en a, lehkhabu zial thlâwk duai duai hi ka hmu a.

source: And David took the strong tower for his living-place, so it was named the town of David.
target: Tin, Davida chu kulhah a awm ta a; chuvangin Davida khawpui an ti a ni.

source: As for their beautiful ornament, they had put it on high, and had made the images of their disgusting and hated things in it: for this cause I have made it an unclean thing to them.
target: An cheina mawina chuh an chapopui a, an tenawmna milemah leh an bawlhhlawhna thilah an chantîr chauh zawk a ni; chumi avâng chuan an tan thil tenawmah ka lo siam ta a ni.

source: But in all your towns I have kept food from your teeth, and in all your places there has been need of bread: and still you have not come back to me, says the Lord.
target: Tin, kei pawhin in khawpui zawng zawngahte țamna leh in hmun zawng zawngahte tlâkchhamna ka pe che u a: chuti pawhin ka hnênah in lo kîr lo va, LALPA thu chhuak chuan a ti.

source: I am off now.
target: Ka kal mai e aw.

source: I'm hiding
target: Ka biru mêk

source: Do you plan on going again?
target: Kal leh i tum em?

source: Keep looking
target: En zel rawh

source: They will give fruit even when they are old; they will be fertile and full of growth;
target: Tar hnuah pawh an la rah fo vang a; Tui pai teuhvin an hring hluah hluah ang:

source: Would you give up?
target: I beidawng ang em?

source: I will have your Asherahs pulled up from among you: and I will send destruction on your images.
target: Tin, thu ngaithla lo hnamte chungah chuan thinurna leh thinrimnain phuba lakna ka ti puitling ang.

source: Then the king sent and got together all the responsible men of Judah and of Jerusalem.
target: Tin, lal chuan mite a tir a, Judai ram leh Jerusalem khawpuia upa zawng zawng a hnênah an ko khâwm chiam a.

source: You aren't bruised
target: I hliam lo

source: He whose eyes are shut is a man of twisted purposes, and he who keeps his lips shut tight makes evil come about.
target: A mit maimitchhing chuan thil tha lo suangtuah nân a ti a ni a, A heh pettu chuan thil tha lo a thlen thin.

source: And when they had done this, they got such a great number of fish that it seemed as if their nets would be broken;
target: Tin, an han den chuan sangha tam tak an khuh a, an lente chu a chat pheuh pheuh va.

source: I'll do this.
target: Hei hi ka ti ang.

source: And the disciples, everyone as he was able, made a decision to send help to the brothers living in Judaea:
target: Tichuan zirtirteho chuan an theih tawk theuhvin, Judai rama unau awmte hnenah chuan chhawmdawlna tur thawn a tum a;

source: We don't like you.
target: Kan duh lo che.

source: Then Jesus said to Peter, Put back your sword: am I not to take the cup which my Father has given to me?
target: Tichuan Isuan Petera hnenah, Khandaih kha a paiah khung rawh; Pain no kei mi pek hi ka in lo vang em ni? a ti a.

source: I gave up on them
target: Anmahni chu ka bânsan ta a

source: Sami is not moving
target: Sami a che lo

source: That's wet
target: A huh

source: If anyone puts a curse on his father or his mother, his light will be put out in the blackest night.
target: A nu emaw, a pa emaw ânchhe lawhtu chu, Thimtham lai berah a khawnvar tihmihsak a ni ang.

source: Christmas with you.
target: Krismas nang nen.

source: But as for such as are turned out of the straight way, the Lord will take them away with the workers of evil. Let peace be on Israel.
target: An kawng kawitea pengho erawh hi zawng LALPA chuan thil tisualtute nên a hruai chhuak ang. Israel-ho chungah chuan thlamuanna awm rawh se.

source: By that pleasure we have been made holy, by the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once and for ever.
target: Chu mi duhzawng chuan Isua Krista taksa vawi khata hlan nghal vang khan tihthianghlimin kan awm ta.

source: It's extremely rare.
target: A rare hle mai.

source: I'm not accusing anyone.
target: Tumah ka puh lo.

source: Be still
target: Che suh

source: But there is no need for me to say anything in my letter about the giving to the saints:
target: Mi thianghlimte rawngbawl thu zawng in hnena ka ziak a ngai lo ve;

source: They moved in together
target: An insawn dun em

source: For Jesus had said to him, Come out of the man, you unclean spirit.
target: Isua chuan a hnenah Nang, ramhuai bawlhhlawhpa, mihring chhung ata hi chhuak rawh, a lo ti tawh si a.

source: I did nothing
target: Engmah ka tilo

source: Because he is a servant he has no interest in the sheep.
target: inhlawhfa a ni a, beramte a ngaihsak loh avangin a tlan bo thin a ni.

source: Then certain of the responsible men of Israel came to me and took their seats before me.
target: Tichuan Israel upa țhenkhatte chu ka hnênah an lo kal a, ka hmaah an țhu a.

source: Hey, it's me
target: Hei, keimah ka nia

source: Without a thought that they may be crushed by the foot, and broken by the beasts of the field?
target: Miin a rap keh thei a, Ramsaten an chil keh thei tih a hre leh tawh lo.

source: And he went up into the mountain, and sent for those whom it was his pleasure to have with him: and they went to him.
target: Tin, tlangah chuan a han kal a, amahin a duhzawng apiangte chu a ko va; tin, anni chu a hnenah an han kal a.

source: I was strong
target: Ka chak lutuk

source: For this cause it was necessary to make the copies of the things in heaven clean with these offerings; but the things themselves are made clean with better offerings than these.
target: Chutichuan, vana thil awm angte chu chung chuan tihthianghlimin a awm tur reng a ni, van thil taktakte erawh chu chung aia inthawina tha zawktein tihthianghlimin a awm tur a ni.

source: Let all the nations whom you have made come and give worship to you, O Lord, giving glory to your name.
target: Aw Lalpa, i siam hnam tinrengte chu an lo kal ang a, i hmaah an lo kun ang a; I hming chu an rawn chawimawi ang.

source: It's a trick
target: Inbumna a ni

source: If he has a son who is a thief, a taker of life, who does any of these things,
target: Mahse fapa rukhmang a hrina, thisen chhuahtu a niha, hetiang rêng rêng hi a tiha,

source: Didn't you feel like going?
target: Kal duh lo em ni?

source: So the armed men, as they were ordered, took Paul and came by night to Antipatris.
target: Chutichuan sipaite chuan a thupek ang chuan Paula chu azan azanin an hruai a, Antipatri khua an thlenpui a.

source: He is afraid of dogs
target: Ui a hlau a ni

source: How he had done his signs in Egypt, and his wonders in the field of Zoan;
target: Khatia Aigupta rama a chinchhiahnate a dah a, Zoan phulah a thilmakte a dah bawk a;

source: I'm going running
target: Ka tlan ta a

source: And how I kept back nothing which might be of profit to you, teaching you publicly and privately,
target: khati khan a sawt tur thu in hnenah engmah hrilh ka tim lo va, vantlang zingah te, in tinah te ka zirtir thin che u a,

source: We're back
target: Kan lo let ta e

source: Sami called them
target: Sami chuan a ko a

source: I wasn't talking
target: Ka sawi lo a ni

source: I've already chosen
target: Ka thlang tawh

source: It will be hard for women who are with child, and for her with a baby at the breast, in those days. For great trouble will come on the land, and wrath on this people.
target: Chung ni chuan raite leh nauno pawmte chung a pik ang, khawvelah hian hrehawm nasa tak a thlen dawn avang leh he chite chungah hian thinurna a thlen dawn avangin.

source: Say aah
target: Aah tirawh

source: I dream in French.
target: French tawngin ka mumang a ni.

source: Oh, I got it.
target: Oh, ka hria e.

source: I ran away
target: Ka tlanbo

source: And thirty-two thousand persons, that is, women who had never had sex relations with a man.
target: mihring chu hmeichhia, mipa la pâwl ngai loh 32,000 an ni a.

source: And Pilate again said in answer to them, What then am I to do to him to whom you give the name of the King of the Jews?
target: Pilata chuan an hnenah, Judate lal in tiha hi engtin nge ka tih tak ang le? tiin a chhang leh a.

source: I like eggs
target: Artui ka duh

source: Do we have the money
target: Pawisa kan nei em

source: They smiled at each other
target: An nui dun a

source: And the four kings took all the goods and food from Sodom and Gomorrah and went on their way.
target: Tichuan Sodom leh Gomorra mite sum zawng zawng leh an ei tûr zawng zawng an la a, an haw ta a.

source: And now, see, the Lord has put a spirit of deceit in the mouth of these prophets of yours; and the Lord has said evil against you.
target: Chutichuan ngai teh, LALPA chuan heng i zâwlneite kaah hian thlarau dawthei a dah a; i chungchâng thu LALPAN a tha lo lamin a sawi ta a ni, a ti a.

source: But Paul and Barnabas kept on in Antioch, teaching and preaching the word of God, with a number of others.
target: Paula leh Barnaba erawh chu Antiokei khuaah chuan Lalpa thu zirtir leh hrilin an awm reng a, mi dang tam takte nen.

source: You don't drink enough water.
target: Tui i in tawk lo.

source: So faith comes by hearing, and hearing by the word of Christ.
target: Chutichuan rinna chu hriatna avangin a lo awm thin a, tin, hriatna chu Krista thu avangin a lo awm.

source: That which has birth from the flesh is flesh, and that which has birth from the Spirit is spirit.
target: Tisaa piang apiang tisa a ni; Thlarauva piang apiang thlarau a ni.

source: So the Jews said among themselves, To what place is he going where we will not see him? will he go to the Jews living among the Greeks and become the teacher of the Greeks?
target: Tin, Judate an inbia a, Kan hmuh loh turin he mi hi khawiah nge a kal dawn? Grikte zinga Pem darhho hnena kalin Grikte chu a zirtir dawn em ni ang?

source: We're not surprised
target: Mak kan ti lo

source: I keep company with all your worshippers, and those who have your orders in their memory.
target: Nangmah tihtu zawng zawng leh, I thununna thute zawmtute thian ka ni.

source: I slept a lot.
target: Ka mu nasa ṭhin.

source: For this cause nets are round your feet, and you are overcome with sudden fear.
target: Chuvang chuan i velin thang a awm a, Hlauhna chuan a tibuai ta thut che a ni.

source: And put to death the Lord of life; whom God gave back from the dead; of which fact we are witnesses.
target: Nunna Siamtu chu in that a; nimahsela Pathianin ani chu mitthi zing ata a kai tho leh a; chu chu a hretute kan ni e.

source: Make clear the wonder of your mercy, O saviour of those who put their faith in your right hand, from those who come out against them.
target: Aw, nangmaha rina nghat apiang anmahni beitute laka i kut ding lama chhandam thintu, I ngilneihzia mak tak chu lantir ang che.

source: It's his.
target: Ama ta a nia.

source: And Jesus was increasing in wisdom and in years, and in grace before God and men.
target: Tin, Isua chu a fing deuh deuh va, a lo lian telh telh a, Pathian leh mihring duhsakin a awm deuh deuh va.

source: Let's go and sit down.
target: Kan va ṭhu ang u.

source: Tom doesn't speak
target: Tom a tawng lo

source: It has come up as a witness against me, and the wasting of my flesh makes answer to my face.
target: Nangin mi chelh bet a, chu chu ka chunga hretu a ni a, Ka cherna hian mi hek a. Chu chu ka hmai chhana hriattirtu a ni.

source: Surgical glove
target: Inzaina kutkawr

source: Bear with me
target: Min hrethiam rawh

source: That man, among the sons of Aaron, by whom the blood of the peace-offering and the fat are offered, is to have the right leg for his part.
target: Arona fapate zinga remna thilhlan thisen leh thau hlantu apiang chuan a chanvo atan a bawp ding lam a nei tur a ni.

source: So he went in, and shutting the door on the two of them, made prayer to the Lord.
target: chutichuan a va lût a, an pahnih chuan kawng a khar hnan a, LALPA hnênah a tawngtai a.

source: Replace it
target: Thlakthleng rawh

source: And from all over the earth they came to see Solomon and to give ear to his wisdom, which God had put in his heart.
target: Pathianin a thinlunga finna thu a dahsak chu ngaithla tûrin khawvela mi zawng zawngte chuan Solomona chu an rawn pan huai huai thin a.

source: Benjamin is a wolf, searching for meat: in the morning he takes his food, and in the evening he makes division of what he has taken.
target: Benjamina hi chinghne koham a ni: zîngah chuan a sa she chu a ei a ng a, Tlai lamah chuan a râllâk chu a sem ang, a ti a.

source: Now the scribes and Pharisees came, with a woman who had been taken in the act of sinning against the married relation;
target: Tin, lehkhaziaktute leh Pharisaiten hmeichhe pakhat a uire lai an man an rawn hruai a; tin, a laiah an dintir a,

source: He's tall.
target: A sang.

source: I didn't say I was scared.
target: Ka hlau ka ti lo.

source: I'm here now
target: Hetah ka awm tawh

source: Your haters will be clothed with shame, and the tent of the sinner will not be seen again.
target: A hawtu che chu zahnaa tuam an ni ang a, Mi suaksual puan in pawh a awm tawh lawng.

source: I have a cold
target: Khuh ka nei

source: And make a room ready for me; for I am hoping that through your prayers I will be given to you.
target: Engpawh ni sela, chu chang ti lovin, thlenna tur mi lo buatsaihsak bawk ang che; in tawngtainate avangin in hnenah pek ka ni dawn tih ka inring si a.

source: And about this thing I made request to the Lord three times that it might be taken away from me.
target: Chu mi chungchang thu-ah chuan mi kiansan theih nan Lalpa chu vawi thum ka dil a.

source: She gave me something.
target: Thil min pe a.

source: I left early
target: Ka chhuahsan hma

source: We were prisoners
target: Tâng kan ni a

source: Others go about without clothing, and though they have no food, they get in the grain from the fields.
target: Silhfen lovin saruakin an vakvai a, Rilram chungin buhphalte an pu a;

source: And they came near the town to which they were going, and he seemed as if he was going on;
target: Tin, an kalna tur khua chu an thleng dawn ta a; tin, ani chu hla deuhva kal tum angin a awm a.

source: Did you give the order?
target: Order i pe em?

source: Are you making a scene?
target: Scene i siam em?

source: They're not going to stop
target: An tawp dawn lo

source: Then they readily took him into the boat: and straight away the boat was at the land to which they were going.
target: Chutichuan lawngah chuan chuantir an duh ta a; tin, chawplehchilhin lawng chuan an pan khawmual chu an thleng ta nghal a.

source: And my House will be over them; and I will be to them a God, and they will be to me a people.
target: Ka bâwkte pawh an hnênah a awm ang a, an Pathian ka ni ang a, anni chu ka mite an ni ang.

source: Are you happy?
target: I lawm em?

source: But someone will say, How do the dead come back? and with what sort of body do they come?
target: Nimahsela tuin emaw, Mitthite chu engtin nge kaihthawhin an awm dawn? Taksa eng ang puin nge an lo kal dawn? a ti a ni ang e.

source: It wasn't worth the wait.
target: Nghah a phu lo.

source: I'm good
target: Ka lawm

source: I didn't enjoy it very much.
target: Ka hlim vak lo.

source: Falling on one another, as before the sword, when no one comes after them; you will give way before your haters.
target: Tuma um hleih lovin khandaiha um ang maiin an inpal tlu rem rum ang: inhmelmate lo dang turin chakna reng reng in nei lo vang.

source: You shot yourself in the foot!
target: I keah i kap a!

source: My soul is crushed down in me, so I will keep you in mind; from the land of Jordan and of the Hermons, from the hill Mizar.
target: Aw ka Pathian, ka nunna ka chhûngah hian a kun reng a: Chuvangin Jordan leh Hermon ram atang te, Mizar tlâng atangte hian ka hre reng che a ni,

source: But when Jesus had made one offering for sins for ever, he took his place at the right hand of God;
target: ani erawh hi chu chatuan atan sualte tana inthawina pakhat chauh a hlan hnuin, Pathian ding lamah a han thu ta zawk a;

source: Now while he was in Jerusalem at the feast of the Passover, a great number of people came to have faith in his name, after seeing the signs which he did.
target: Tin, Kalhlen Kuta Jerusalem khuaa a awm lai chuan a thilmak tithe an hmu a, mi tam takin a hming an ring ta a.

source: And between the altar and the Tent of meeting he put the vessel with water in it for washing.
target: Tin, maihun chu inbiakna puan in leh maicham inkarah chuan a chhung a, insilna turin tui a chhûng a.

source: My haters say evil against me, When will he be dead, and his name come to an end?
target: Mi dotute chuan, engtikah nge a thih ang a, a hming a bo vang? tiin, Mi sawichhe thin a.

source: I ate apples
target: Apples ka ei tawh

source: It's not working
target: A thawk tak tak lo

source: He cannot be saved
target: Chhandam theih a ni lo

source: The evil-doers are strange from the first; from the hour of their birth they go out of the true way, saying false words.
target: Mi suaksualte chu an nu pum chhûng atang renga Pathian laka thenin an awm a: An pian veleh dawt thu sawiin an vâk bo thin.

source: For we go through all things on account of you, because the greater the number to whom the grace is given, the greater is the praise to the glory of God.
target: Engkim nangmahni thatna tur a ni si a, khawngaihna chu mi tam zawk zara tihpuna awmin, Pathian ropuina turin lawmthu nasa tak a sawitir theih nan.

source: And let this offering, which your servant gives to my lord, be given to the young men who are with my lord.
target: Tin, hei ka pu tana i chiahhlawhin lawmman ka rawn ken hi ka pu rawn zuitu tlangvâlte hi pêk ni raw se.

source: The birds of the air have their resting-places by them, and make their song among the branches.
target: A kamahte chuan chungleng savante awmna an nei thin a. Thing buk zingahte chuan an hram thin.

source: I ran home
target: Inah ka tlan

source: Here's a copy
target: Hetah a anpui dang

source: I need my bag.
target: Ka bag ka mamawh.

source: They mean trouble.
target: Buaina tihna a ni.

source: The Lord gives me the reward of my righteousness, because my hands are clean before him.
target: LALPA chuan ka felzia ang ngeiin ka chungah a ti a; Ka kutte a thianghlimzia ang ngeiin mi rul a ni.

source: Our heritage is given up to men of strange lands, our houses to those who are not our countrymen.
target: Kan roluahte chu hnamdang mite hnêna pk a ni zo ta a, Kan inte chu hmêlrhiatloh mite hnênah.

source: No, they aren't
target: Ni lo, an ṭha lo

source: But I am hoping in the Lord Jesus to send Timothy to you before long, so that I may be comforted when I have news of you.
target: Nimahsela, in chanchin ka hriat a, ka thlamuan ve theihna turin, rei lo te chinah Timothea hi in hnena rawn tirh Lalpa Isuaah chuan ka beisei a ni.

source: And Saul and all Israel, hearing those words of the Philistine, were troubled and full of fear.
target: Tin, Saula leh Israel-ho zawng awngin chu Philistia mi thusawite chu an han hriat chuan, an zam a, an hlau ta êm êm mai a.

source: There were compromises
target: Inremna a awm a

source: They began to move
target: An che tan ta a

source: Give wise directions, make a decision; let your shade be as night in full day: keep safe those who are in flight; do not give up the wandering ones.
target: rem min ruatsak la, ro min relsak rawh; i hlim chu chhun laiah zan angin siam la: hnawh chhuahte chu bihruktir rawh; tlan bo chu mantir suh.

source: He makes his prayer to God, and he has mercy on him; he sees God's face with cries of joy; he gives news of his righteousness to men;
target: Chu mi chu pathian hnênah a tawngtai a, Ani chuan a lo pawm a. A hmêl chu hlim takin a hmu ang a, Anin a hnênah felna chu a pe leh ang.

source: The father is there.
target: Pa chu a awm a.

source: And so the two daughters of Lot were with child by their father.
target: Chutiang chuan Lota fanute pahnih chuan an pa lakah chuan nau an lo pai ta ve ve a.

source: But still he did the same sins which Jeroboam, the son of Nebat, did and made Israel do; he went on in them.
target: Nimahsela Israel-hote thil tihsualtir a a tih Nebata fapa Jeroboama sualnaahte chuan a bet tlat a; a kalsan leh tawh lo.

source: You will die
target: I thi dawn

source: So the Lord sent Hadad the Edomite to make trouble for Solomon: he was of the king's seed in Edom.
target: Tin, LALPAN Edom mi, Hadada chu Solomona hmêlmaah a rawn din chhuak ta a: amah chu Edom rama lal thlah a ni.

source: But your sins have come between you and your God, and by your evil doings his face has been veiled from you, so that he will give you no answer.
target: in khawlohnate chu nangni leh in Pathian kara tlain a tithen zawk che u a ni a, benga a hriat duh lohna tûrin in sualnate chu a hmai chu a hliahsak bawk che u a ni.

source: Did you want to see me
target: Min hmu duh em

source: So now, have no fear: for I will take care of you and your little ones. So he gave them comfort with kind words.
target: Chutichuan hlau suh u: nangmahni leh in fanau tê tête nên ka chawm zêl ang che u, a ti a. Chutichuan a thlamuan a, tawngkam tha takin a be hlawm a.

source: I'm ashamed of myself.
target: Ka zak a ni.

source: Any four-footed beast which goes on the ball of its foot, is unclean to you: anyone touching the dead body of one of these will be unclean till evening.
target: Tin, fuliafa zawng zawng zinga ke bawra kal apiangte chu in tan thil bawlhhlawh a ni a; an ruang khawih apiang chu tlai lam thlengin an bawlhhlawh ang.

source: He drives a truck.
target: Truck a khalh a.

source: Who is like the wise man? and to whom is the sense of anything clear? A man's wisdom makes his face shining, and his hard face will be changed.
target: Mi fing ang hi tunge awm? Thil hrilhfiahna pawh tunge hria? Finna chuan a hmêl a tiêng a, A hmêl pum chhuak pawh a dang ta.

source: Toma'n a ti em ni?
target: Did Tom do it?

source: I am delighted by your saying, like a man who makes discovery of great wealth.
target: I thu-ah hian ka hlim a ni. Thil ropui tak râllâka hmutu angin.

source: You go ahead
target: Kal zel rawh

source: It will be okay
target: A ṭha leh vek mai ang

source: He's a DJ
target: DJ a nia

source: We can leave
target: Kan haw thei

source: I kept quiet
target: Ka ngawi reng

source: You have a future
target: Hmalam hun i nei a

source: Lead the way
target: Hmâ hruai rawh

source: She bought chicken
target: Vawk a lei a

source: See, I am sending you Elijah the prophet before the day of the Lord comes, that great day, greatly to be feared.
target: Ngai teh u, LALPA ni ropui leh râpthlâk tak a lo thlen hmâin Zâwlnei Elija chu ka rawn tirh ang che u.

source: But Abraham said, They have Moses and the prophets; let them give ear to what they say.
target: Abrahama erawh chuan, ‘Mosia leh zawlneite an nei alawm; chu mite thu chu ngai rawh se,’ a ti a.

source: How many people
target: Mi engzah tân nge

source: Let your wrath be overflowing; let your eyes see all the sons of pride, and make them low.
target: I thinrimna khat liam chu leih chhuak la, Mi chapo apiang chu en bikin titlâwm teh khai.

source: Yes, let all kings go down before him; let all nations be his servants.
target: A ni, lal zawng zawng chu a hmaah an bawkkhup ang a: Hnam tinrengin a rawn an bawl ang.

source: Am I sick, Doctor?
target: Ka damlo em, Doctor?

source: You son of a bitch!
target: Nang fapa a ni!

source: Did you get a receipt?
target: Receipt i hmu em?

source: Will they not give you teaching, and say words of wisdom to you?
target: Chung chuan an zirtirin an hrilh chein An hriatna thate chu an sawi chhuak dawn lawm ni?

source: We were outnumbered
target: Kan tam zawk a ni

source: I know that the Lord is great, and that our Lord is greater than all other gods.
target: LALPA chu ropui tak ani tih leh, Kan LALPA chu Pathian zawng zawng aiin a chungnung a ni tih, ka hre si a.

source: Then trouble and shock came on the earth; and the bases of the mountains were moved and shaking, because he was angry.
target: Chu veleh lei hi a nghing a, a khur ta a, A thinur avângin tlangte pawh chu A nghahchante lamin a khurin a nghing ta a.

source: It's so easy
target: A awlsam lutuk

source: It's good
target: A tha

source: The wrongdoing of your people had forgiveness; all their sin had been covered. (Selah.
target: I mite khawlohnanate i ngaidam a, An sualna zawng zawng i khuh zo ta a.

source: I was outnumbered
target: Ka tam zawk a ni

source: It's too hot to sleep.
target: Mut a vawt lutuk.

source: Crime is down
target: Sualna a tlêm zêl

source: And inside the second veil was the place which is named the Holy of holies;
target: Tin, puanzar pahnihna piahah chuan biak buk, hmun Thianghlim Ber an tih chu a awm a;

source: These rules are to be your guide in judging through all your generations wherever you may be living.
target: Heng thil hi in thlahte thlenga in awmna apiang in rorel dan tur ani ang.

source: Let me get water for washing your feet, and take your rest under the tree:
target: tui tlêm tal rawn la sela, in kete sil ula, thing hnuaiah hian châwl teh rih u:

source: The Lord God has taken an oath by his holy name, that the days are coming when they will take you away with hooks, and the rest of you with fish-hooks.
target: Lalpa PATHIAN chuan ama thianghlimna chhâlin chhia a chham a: Ngai teh u,. thîr kawmin a lâk bo che u a, in zînga awm chhun nghakuaiin a lâk bo ni che u a lo thleng ang.

source: Just hold it
target: Vuan mai rawh

source: It's already 400!
target: Dar 400 a ni tawh!

source: And the Horites in their mountain Seir, driving them as far as El-paran, which is near the waste land.
target: an awmna Seir tlângah, El-paran thlengin Hor-hote an that a, El-paran chu thlalêr depa awm a ni.

source: I bit my lip.
target: Ka hneh ka seh.

source: We were neighbors
target: Ṭhenawm kan ni

source: I feel sorry
target: A pawi ka ti

source: Give blessing and not curses to those who are cruel to you.
target: A tiduhdahtu che u chu malsawmsak ula; malsawm ula, anchhia chu lawh suh u.

source: In all the signs and wonders which the Lord sent him to do in the land of Egypt, to Pharaoh and to all his servants and all his land;
target: chhinchhiahnate zawng zawng leh thilmal zawng zawngte, Pharaoa leh a chhiahhlawh zawng zawng hnen leh Aigupta ram zawng zawng a entir a.

source: Then let us come near to the seat of grace without fear, so that mercy may be given to us, and we may get grace for our help in time of need.
target: Chutichuan, zahngaihna kan hmuh theihna tur leh, puih kan ngaih huna tanpuina khawngaihna kan hmuh theihna turin, khawngaihna lalthutphah chu huai takin i hnaih ang u.

source: We're greedy
target: Kan duhâm

source: Do they have money
target: Sum an nei em

source: I'll stay
target: Ka cham ang

source: For our knowledge is only in part, and the prophet's word gives only a part of what is true:
target: A kim lovin kan hria a, a kim lovin thu kan hril bawk thin a ni.

source: Recess ended
target: Chawlh a tâwp ta

source: It's been a really good year.
target: Kum tha tak a ni.

source: Do you travel a lot?
target: I zin tam em?

source: This is my grandmother
target: Hei hi ka pi a ni

source: Gentle behaviour, control over desires: against such there is no law.
target: thuhnuairawlhna te, insumtheihna te a ni zawk e; chutiang kalhzawngin Dan thupek reng a awm lo ve.

source: The upright man will be glad when he sees their punishment; his feet will be washed in the blood of the evil-doer.
target: Mi fel chuan phuba lakna chu a hmuhin a lawm ang a: Mi suaksual thisenah chuan a ke chu a sil ang.

source: And all the guests of Adonijah got up in fear and went away, every man to his place.
target: Tin, Adonija mi sawmte zawng zawng chuan an hlau ta a, an tho va, mahni kawng kawngah an kal ta vek a.

source: For they were haters of knowledge, and did not give their hearts to the fear of the Lord:
target: hriatna chu an huat a, LALPA tihna chu an thlan loh avângin:

source: We didn't sing together.
target: Kan zai dun lo.

source: And one came to David and said, The hearts of the men of Israel have gone after Absalom.
target: Tin, Davida hnênah chuan, Israel mite rilru chu Absaloma lamah a thle hle mai, tiin mi a lo kal a.

source: He needs you
target: A mamawh che

source: And the Zidonians and Amalek and Midian crushing you down, and in answer to your cry did I not give you salvation from their hands?
target: Zidon-hote Amalek-ho te, Maon-hote pawhin an hnehchhiah che u a; tin, mi au va, tichuan an kut ata chu ka chhan chhuak che u a.

source: I'm sleeping
target: Ka muhil mêk

source: The rods he made of the same hard wood, plating them with gold.
target: Tin, thingri thing zawnfungte a siam a, rangkachak tiin a luan a.

source: He bag hi a te lo.
target: This bag is not small.

source: Do they really exist
target: An awm tak tak em

source: And Israel saw the great work which the Lord had done against the Egyptians, and the fear of the Lord came on the people and they had faith in the Lord and in his servant Moses.
target: Tin, Israel-hote chuan LALPAN Aigupta mite chunga thil ropui tak a tih chu an hmu a, tin, mipuite chuan LALPA chu an tih a: tichuan LALPA leh a chhiahhlawh Mosia chu an ring ta a.

source: If I make sharp my shining sword, and my hand is outstretched for judging, I will give punishment to those who are against me, and their right reward to my haters.
target: Ka khandaih tle ka tahhriam a, Ka kutin rorêlna a vawn chuan Ka hmêlmate chungah phuba ka la ang a, Mi hawtute chu ka thungrul ang.

source: You did it
target: I ti zo e

source: Say, you whose desire it is to be under the law, do you not give ear to the law?
target: Dan hnuaia awm duhte u, mi hrilh rawh u,Dan thu chu in ngaithla thin lawm ni?

source: You're not leaving
target: I chhuak dawn lo

source: And he made his holy place like the high heaven, like the earth which is fixed by him for ever.
target: A in thianghlim chu van sângte ang khian a sa a, Kumkhua atâna a tihngheh leilung ang hian.

source: I can't sing
target: Ka zaithiam lo

source: There they are crying out because of the pride of the evil-doers, but he gives them no answer.
target: Tah chuan an rum a, tuman an chhâng lo, Mi sualte chapona avângin.

source: He was lucky
target: A vannei

source: They were together
target: An awm dun a

source: But when Cephas came to Antioch, I made a protest against him to his face, because he was clearly in the wrong.
target: Tin, Kipha chu Antiokei khuaa a lo kal laiin demawm taka a awm avangin a hmaichhan ngeiah ka dodal a.

source: And you had the houses of Jerusalem numbered, pulling down the houses to make the wall stronger.
target: Tin Jerusalem inte in chhiar a, kulhpui bang siam țhat nân inte chu in thiat a.

source: So go now and give orders to the people that every man and every woman is to get from his or her neighbour ornaments of silver and of gold.
target: Chutichuan mipuite bengah hian thu va sawi rawh, mipa leh hmeichhe tinin an vêngte chu tangkaraw incheina leh rangkachak incheinate chu dîl rawh se, a ti a.

source: We were undefeated
target: Hneh loh kan ni

source: Let's pray
target: Tawngtai ila

source: Be troubled, O earth, before the Lord, before the God of Jacob;
target: Nang leilung, LALPA hmaah khur rawh, Jakob-ho Pathian hmaah chuan;

source: I want cold water.
target: Tui lum ka duh.

source: Make a hole in the wall, before their eyes, and go out through it.
target: An mithmuh ngeiah kulh bang chu tipawp la, tah chuan la chhuak rawh.

source: Watch me
target: Mi en rawh

source: And God said, This is the sign of the agreement which I make between me and you and every living thing with you, for all future generations:
target: tin, Pathian vêkin, Hei hi kei leh nangni leh in hnêna thil nung tinrêng awmte kâra chhuan tâwp nei lova awm zêlte tân, ka thuthlung chhinchhiahna chu a ni ang.

source: So the Levites took their places with David's instruments, and the priests with their horns.
target: Tin, Levi-ho chu Davida sima thil tumrik mi nen an ding a, puithiamte chu tawtawrâwt nen.

source: And they came across Adoni-zedek, and made war on him; and they overcame the Canaanites and the Perizzites.
target: Tin, Bezek khuaah chuan Adoni-zedeka-bezeka an han hmu a: tin, an bei a, Kanaanhote leh Periz-hote chu an that chiam a.

source: My days are wasted like smoke, and my bones are burned up as in a fire.
target: Ka dam chhûng nite hi meikhu angin a zam ral a, Ka ruhte hi thingthu angin a sa a.

source: But only a great fear of being judged, and of the fire of wrath which will be the destruction of the haters of God.
target: rorelna hlauhawm tak lo thleng tur leh dotute kang ral tur thinurna mei kan hmabak a ni mai.

source: Do not let my haters be glad over me falsely; let not those who are against me without cause make sport of me.
target: Ka hmêlmate chuan dik o takah mi diriam suh se: Enga khawlawi lova mi hawtute chu an mitin inbe hek suh se.

source: Shut up!
target: Tawng tawh suh!

source: I'm honest
target: Ka dik a nia

source: Let's take them with us.
target: Kan hruai ang u.

source: And they put a purple robe on him, and twisting a crown of thorns, they put it on him;
target: Tichuan puan sen duk an sintir a, hling lukhum an phiar a, an khumtir a.

source: This is to be the work of the Gershonites, the things they are to do and take up.
target: Gersona thlahho chanpual chu rawngbawl lam le phurh lam a ni:

source: Now the winged ones were stationed on the right side of the house when the man went in; and the inner square was full of the cloud.
target: Tin, mi a luh lai khan, cherub-ho chu in pui dinglam pangah an ding a; tin, hung chhûngnung chu chhûmin a khat ta a.

source: For Heshbon was the town of Sihon, king of the Amorites, who had made war against an earlier king of Moab and taken from him all his land as far as the Arnon.
target: Hesbon khua chu Amor-ho lal Sihona khua a ni a, ani chu chu mi hmaa Moab lal lo beia a kut ata a ram zawng zawng, Arnon thlenga laksaktu a ni.

source: It's stuck
target: A tang

source: In the tents of those hating authority there is error, but in the house of the upright man there is grace.
target: Mi âte chuan thiam loh channa hi an ngai lelo va, Mi dik zingah erawh chuan duhsakna tha a awm,

source: But having no root in himself, he goes on for a time; and when trouble comes or pain, because of the word, he quickly becomes full of doubts.
target: nimahsela amahah chuan zung a awm lo va, rei lote chauh a awm a; tin, thu avang chuan hrehawmna emaw, tihduhdahna emaw a lo awm veleh a tlu nghal mai thin.

source: And the floor of the house was covered with gold, inside and out.
target: Tin, a in chhuat chu chhûng lam leh pawn lamah rangkachak tiin a luan a.

source: And while he did so, some seeds were dropped by the wayside, and the birds came and took them for food:
target: tin, a theh laiin a then kawng dungah a tla a, savaten an rawn tlan zo ta a.

source: Can we be friends
target: Thian kan ni thei ang em

source: We're hungry
target: Kan rilṭam

source: Don't commit yourself.
target: Inpekna nei suh.

source: Let's sit together.
target: I ṭhu dun ang u.

source: A sharp man keeps back his knowledge; but the heart of foolish men makes clear their foolish thoughts.
target: Mi fing chuan fina a thup a. Mi â thinlung erawh chuan âtna a puang.

source: They don't want to grow old
target: An tar duh lo

source: I agree
target: Ka pawm e

source: He gave the increase of their fields to worms, the fruits of their industry to the locusts.
target: An thil tote pawh chu pangang a pe a, An thawh rim tah chu khaukhuap a pe bawk a.

source: If the foot says, Because I am not the hand, I am not a part of the body; it is no less a part of the body.
target: Kephah hian, Kut ka nih loh avangin taksaa tel ka ni lo ve, ti sela, chu mi avang chuan taksaa tel lo a ni chuang lo ve.

source: They're all pretty tired
target: An chau vek tawh

source: This is free
target: Hei hi a thlâwn

source: Are you selling your car?
target: I car i hralh em?

source: I cried.
target: Ka tap.

source: For you are to be worshippers of no other god: for the Lord is a God who will not give his honour to another.
target: Pathian dang reng reng chu i be tur a ni si lo va: LALPA chu a hming reng pawh thîkthuchhiaa a ni a, Pathian thîkthuchhia a ni si a:

source: Is it through your knowledge that the hawk takes his flight, stretching out his wings to the south?
target: I finna avângin mu chu a thlawk chhovin Chhim lamah thla a zar êm ni?

source: For this cause her young men will be falling in her streets, and all her men of war will be cut off in that day, says the Lord.
target: Chuvangin a tlangvâlte chu a khawlaiahte an tlu ang a, ral tu mi zawng zawng chu chumi niah chuan an boral ang tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: But we made our prayer to God, and had men on watch against them day and night because of them.
target: Nimahsela anmahni avângin kan Pathian hnênah kan tawngtai a, chhun leh zan an laka vengtu kan dah reng a.

source: They created a government.
target: Sorkar an siam a.

source: Because if it is God's purpose for you to undergo pain, it is better to do so for well-doing than for evil-doing.
target: Thil sual tih vanga tuar ai chuan Pathian remtihzawng a nih chuan thil tha tih vanga tuar hi a tha zawk si a.

source: And Eglon got together the people of Ammon and Amalek, and they went and overcame Israel and took the town of palm-trees.
target: Tin, ani chu Amona thlahte leh Amalek-hote a pun khawm a; tin, Israel-hote chu a va bei a, tum khawpui chu a luah ta a.

source: And they gave that place the name of Bochim, and made offerings there to the Lord.
target: Tin, chu mi hmun hmingah chuan Bokim an vuah a: tin, chutah chuan LALPA hnênah an inthawi ta a.

source: They will send up to me a cry for help: We, Israel, have knowledge of you, O God of Israel.
target: Ka pathian, keini Israel ho chuan ka hria a che, Tiin ka hnênah an au vang.

source: Have you already been there?
target: I kal tawh em?

source: Let's take a quick break.
target: Chawlh vat ila.

source: They started shooting
target: An kap tan ta a

source: Sami is not in trouble.
target: Sami a buai lo.

source: I'll sign it.
target: Ka sign dawn.

source: And he has seen a man named Ananias coming in and putting his hands on him, so that he may be able to see.
target: a hming Anania mi pakhat luta a mit tivar turin a chungah kut nghatin a hmu tawh e, a ti a.

source: I got thirsty
target: Ka tuihal

source: This is life!
target: Hei hi nun a ni

source: You don't know the truth.
target: Thudik i hre lo.

source: Do that later
target: Kha kha nakinah ti rawh

source: He shall go to the bank.
target: Bank-ah a kal ang.

source: He has braces
target: Ha siamna a vuah

source: Tom insisted
target: Tom-a'n a duh lo

source: It is to have two bands stitched to it at the top of the arms, joining it together.
target: Tin, chu mi kawr hmawr hmalam leh hnung lama thui belhbawm, dârbak pahnih neihtìr tur a ni; a in zawm tlat theih na turin.

source: That was yesterday
target: Chu chu nizan a ni

source: The angel of the Lord is ever watching over those who have fear of him, to keep them safe.
target: Amah tihtute chu, an vêlah LALPA vântirhkoh chuan a awm chilh a, A chhanhim thin.

source: The game is not over.
target: Inkhel a tawp lo.

source: I like to run.
target: Tlan hi ka ngaina.

source: They have gone across the mountain; Geba will be our resting-place tonight, they say: Ramah is shaking with fear; Gibeah of Saul has gone in flight.
target: kawnah an liam ta; Geba khuaah an riak ta: Ramah khawho chu an khur an khur ta; Saula Gibeah khawho chu an tlan bo ta.

source: For though I am not present in the flesh, still I am with you in the spirit, seeing with joy your order, and your unchanging faith in Christ.
target: Tisain in hnenah awm mah suh ila, lawm taka awmin, in felzia leh Krista in rin nghehzia enin, thlarauvah chuan in hnenah ka awm si a.

source: And the nations will go in its light: and the kings of the earth will take their glory into it.
target: Tin, hnam tin a engah chuan an awm ang a; leia lalte chuan an ropuina an la lut ang.

source: You too
target: Nang pawh le

source: Do it gently
target: Zawitein ti rawh

source: I did them a favor
target: An chungah thil tha ka ti a

source: Now the ark of the Lord was in the country of the Philistines for seven months.
target: Tin, LALPA bâwm chu Philistia mite ramah chuan thla sarih a awm a.

source: Let's see it
target: Lo en ang

source: And have given their gods to the fire; for they were no gods, but wood and stone, the work of men's hands; so they have given them to destruction.
target: an pathiante chu meiah an paih bawk thin a: chungte chu pathian an ni lo reng a, mihring kuta siam, thing leh lung an ni zâwk a ni: chuvângin an tiboral a ni.

source: He spoke
target: A sawi tawh

source: And of Jezebel the Lord said, Jezebel will become food for dogs in the heritage of Jezreel.
target: Tin, Jezebeli chungchâng thu pawh LALPAN a sawi a, Jezreel khaw kulh bula uiin Jezebeli h a la ei ang.

source: Who will give you strength to the end, to be free from all sin in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ.
target: ani chuan kan Lalpa Isua Krista ni-ah chuan sawiselbova in awm nan a tawp thlengin a tinghet bawk ang che u.

source: And Judah said to his brothers, What profit is there in putting our brother to death and covering up his blood?
target: Tin, Juda chuan a unaute hnênah, Kan nau kan thah a, a thisen chhuak kan zêp chuan engnge hnênhnânna awm ang?

source: So you are to do to all the towns far away, which are not the towns of these nations.
target: Heng hnamho khuate ni lo, in awmna ațanga khaw hla zawng zawngte chu chutiang chuan in ti zel tur a ni.

source: Then the other disciple who came there first went in; and he saw and belief came to him.
target: Chutichuan zirtir dang thlan thleng hmasaa pawh chu a lut ve a, a hmu a, a awih a.

source: Wise design and good sense are mine; reason and strength are mine.
target: Remruat leh hriatna dik hi ka ta ani a; Hriat thiamna ka ni a, chak tak ka ni.

source: The troubler of his house will have the wind for his heritage, and the foolish will be servant to the wise-hearted.
target: Mahni chhûngkua tibuaitu chuan thli a rochung ang a, Mi â chu mi thinlung fing chhiahhlawhah a awm ang.

source: I know Tom.
target: Tom-a ka hria.

source: Did you salt this?
target: Hei hi i salt em?

source: And everyone who has this hope in him makes himself holy, even as he is holy.
target: Tupawh ama chunga chu mi beiseina chu nei apiangin amah a thianghlim angin a intithianghlim thin.

source: Do it Monday
target: Thawhṭanniah tirawh

source: So that their rivers were turned to blood, and they were not able to get drink from their streams.
target: An luipuite chu thisenah a chantir a, An luite chu thisenah a chantir bawk kha, tichuan an in thei ta lo va.

source: Then in the waste land there will be an upright rule, and righteousness will have its place in the fertile field.
target: rorêl felna chu thlalêrah chuan a cheng ang a, felna chu lei țha tak hmunah chuan a awm ang.

source: The river is long
target: Lui chu a sei a

source: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lights.
target: a fingte erawh chuan an khawnvarte an keng a, an umte chuan a tui an keng tel bawk a.

source: That we, being made free from the fear of those who are against us, might give him worship,
target: Kan dote lakah kan him a,Kan dam chhung zawng a mithmuha thianghlim leh fel taka awm a,Hlau lova a rawng min bawltir tur thu kha.

source: You're supposed to say yes.
target: I ti tur a ni.

source: I ask her a question
target: Zawhna ka zawt a

source: They're all right
target: An ṭha vek tawh

source: So that men may see your way on the earth, and your salvation among all nations.
target: I kawng chu lei chunga mi hriat a nih theih a, I chhandamna chu hnam tinreng zingah hriat a nih theih nân.

source: He had a fight with the angel and overcame him; he made request for grace to him with weeping; he came face to face with him in Beth-el and there his words came to him;
target: A ni, vântirhkoh a bei a, a hneh ta a: A țap a duhsakna a ngen a: Bethel hmunah chuan amah a hmu ta a, Tah chuan ka hnênah thu a sawi a;

source: Are you willing to learn?
target: Zir i peih em?

source: Then Abraham made prayer to God, and God made Abimelech well again, and his wife and his women-servants, so that they had children.
target: Tichuan Abrahama chuan Pathian hnênah a tawngtai a: tin, Pathianin Abimeleka leh a nupui leh a bâwihnute chu a tidam leh a; tichuan fate an hring leh ta a.

source: And when he had made an agreement with the workmen for a penny a day, he sent them into his vine-garden.
target: Tin, ani chuan hnathawktute nen chuan ni khata duli hlawha an inrem veleh a grep huanah chuan a tir ta hlawm a.

source: I didn't want this.
target: Hei hi ka duh lo.

source: They were jealous
target: An inthîk a

source: These were the acts of Benaiah, the son of Jehoiada, who had a great name among the thirty men of war.
target: Jehoiada fapa Benaia chuan chutiang thil chu a tih avângin sipai huaisen pathumte zingah chuan hmingthat a hlawh a.

source: It's Tom, isn't it?
target: Tom a ni lawm ni?

source: I have a job
target: Hna ka nei

source: Don't be embarrassed, Tom.
target: Mualpho suh, Tom.

source: My little children, let no man take you out of the true way: he who does righteousness is upright, even as he is upright;
target: Naute u, tuma bumin awm suh u; felna titu chu a fel a ni, amah a fel ang bawkin.

source: I'm not surprised
target: Mak ka ti lo

source: Drink it down.
target: In zo vek rawh.

source: They couldn't talk
target: An inbe thei lo

source: But still I am ever with you; you have taken me by my right hand.
target: Nimahsela i hnênah ka awm fo va: Ka kut ding lam hi i lo chelh thin a.

source: I love kids
target: Naupangte ka ngaina

source: I'm an art student
target: Art zirlai ka ni a

source: I'm so sorry
target: Ka thiam loh a ni

source: At the death of Jobab, Husham, from the land of the Temanites, became king in his place.
target: Tin, Jobaba chu a thi a, Teman-ho rama mi Husama a aiah a lal ta a.

source: I was unfair
target: Ka dik vak lo

source: Trust Tom.
target: Tom-a ring rawh.

source: And some of your sons I made prophets, and some of your young men I made separate for myself. Is it not even so, O children of Israel? says the Lord.
target: Tin, zâwlnei ni tûrin in fapate zînga mi leh Nazirit mi ni tûrin tlangvâlte ka siam a. Aw, Israel fate u, chutiangin a ni lo vem ni? LALPA thu chhuak chuan a ti.

source: I am forever busy.
target: Chatuan atan ka buai reng a ni.

source: But if there is no one to give the sense, let him keep quiet in the church; and let his words be to himself and to God.
target: hrilhfiahtu an awm loh erawh chuan kohhranho inkhawmnaah chuan ngawi rengin awm sela, mahni leh Pathian hnenah sawi rawh se.

source: Don't jump!
target: Zuang suh.

source: I didn't catch their names
target: An hming ka man lo

source: Follow Tom.
target: Tom-a zui rawh.

source: We were cold
target: Kan nêlawm loh

source: And this lifted offering is to be put to your credit as if it was grain from the grain-floor and wine from the vines.
target: Tichuan in then thilhlan chu hruiha buh leh uain haw hmasa bera ngaih a ni ang.

source: At that time I said to you, I am not able to undertake the care of you by myself;
target: Tin, chu m lai chuan in hnenah, 'Keimah ngawt chuan ka zo lo che u a;

source: We haven't said yes yet.
target: Kan la ti lo.

source: The seventeenth Joshbekashah, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi sâwm leh vawi sarihna chu Josbekasa chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: A heart full of evil designs, feet which are quick in running after sin;
target: Thil tha lo suangtuah thin thunlung te, Pawi khawih tûra ngalchak te;

source: I'm standing
target: Ka ding mek

source: I drink a tea.
target: Thingpui ka in.

source: Then Solomon said, O Lord, to the sun you have given the heaven for a living-place, but your living-place was not seen by men;
target: Chutichuan Solomonan thu a sawi ta a: LALPAN, 'Thim chhah mupah chuan ka awm ang,' a ti reng a.

source: Then take a sharp-pointed instrument, driving it through his ear into the door, and he will be your servant for ever. And you may do the same for your servant-girl.
target: thir zum in la ang a, kawngkhar chhanah an beng in vit ang a, tichuan kumkhuain in bawih an ni ang. Tin, in bawihnu pawh chutiang bawk chuan in ti tur a ni.

source: Did you really like it?
target: I duh tak tak em?

source: They're very fond of him
target: An duh em em a ni

source: By him my ways have been turned on one side and I have been pulled in bits; he has made me waste.
target: Ka kawngte mi hruai kawisak a, mi pawt sawm a, khawhar takin mi siam a.

source: Are you getting enough sleep?
target: I mut tawk em?

source: Can you sing
target: I zaithiam em

source: I'm untidy
target: Ka felfai lo

source: For these men are not overcome with wine, as it seems to you, for it is only the third hour of the day;
target: Hengho hi in rin angin an rui lo ve, fehrehsan lai chauh a nih hi.

source: Only those trees which you are certain are not used for food may be cut down and put to destruction: and you are to make walls of attack against the town till it is taken.
target: A rah ei loh mi thing ani tih inhriatte erawh zawng zawng in tichiain in kit ang a, dotu che u khua chu a chhiat hma loh chuan kulhin in hung hnan tur a ni.

source: Can you ski
target: Kan tleng thei em

source: The chiefs of Edom were troubled in heart; the strong men of Moab were in the grip of fear: all the people of Canaan became like water.
target: Tichuan Edom rama hotute chuan mak an ti hle a; Moab mi chakte chu khurhnain a rawn man a: Kanaan rama awm zawng zawngte chu an tui zo ta a.

source: He's a job creator.

target: Ka tum ngei ang.

source: Though his hate is covered with deceit, his sin will be seen openly before the meeting of the people.
target: A huatna chu bumnain thup mah sela, A suahsualna chu tlâng hriatah tihlan a ni ang.

source: I'm famous
target: Ka lar a nia

source: Near them, the Tekoites were at work; but their chiefs did not put their necks to the work of their Lord.
target: Tin, anni dawt Teko-hovin an siam tha a; nimahsela an mi liante chuan an hotu hnaah chuan an ring an rawlh ve duh lo.

source: And he has made my mouth like a sharp sword, in the shade of his hand he has kept me; and he has made me like a polished arrow, keeping me in his secret place;
target: ka ka hi khandaih hriam tak angin a siam a, a kutah chuan mi thukru a; thla nawhtlet varah mi siam a, a thal bâwmah chuan mi khung tlat a:

source: Only in the land of Goshen, where the children of Israel were, there was no ice-storm.
target: Gosen ram, Israela thlahte awmnaah chauh chuan rial a tla ve lo va.

source: He is ruling in power for ever; his eyes are watching the nations: may his haters have no strength against him. (Selah.
target: A thiltihtheihan chuan kumkhuain ro a rel a; A mitin hnam tin a en thin: Helhmangte chu inchawimawi suh se. Selah

source: Masses on masses in the valley of decision! for the day of the Lord is near in the valley of decision.
target: Mi sâng tam takte chu Jehosaphat ruamah an awm khâwm ta; chutah chuan a ni LALPA ni a lo thlen dawn.

source: May trouble be theirs! for they have gone far away from me; and destruction, for they have been sinning against me; I was ready to be their saviour, but they said false words against me.
target: An chung a pik e! ka hnên ata an kal bo ta si a, Boralna an chungah a thleng e! ka chungah an hel ta si a, Anni erawh chuan dâwt mi sawi khum a.

source: You're so stubborn.
target: I rilru na lutuk.

source: They're going to be OK
target: An OK dawn a ni

source: And they put fifty twists of cord on the edge of the outside curtain of the first group, and fifty twists on the edge of the outside curtain of the second group,
target: Tin, puanzar zawm khat hmawrtawng ber tlângah chuan beng sawmnga a siam a, tin, puanzar zawm lehlam tlângah chuan beng sawmnga a siam bawk a.

source: Don't be evil
target: Misual ni suh

source: And David said, Is there still anyone of Saul's family living, so that I may be a friend to him, because of Jonathan?
target: Tin, Davida chuan, Jonathana avânga khawngaihna ka tihlan theihna tûrin Saula chhûngte zinga mi awm an la awm em aw? a ti a.

source: And suddenly looking round about, they saw no one any longer, but Jesus only with themselves.
target: Tin, an han en vel thuai a, anmahni hnena Isua chauh lo chu tumah an hmu ta lo va.

source: So he took as his wife Gomer, the daughter of Diblaim, and she gave birth to a son.
target: Tichuan a kal a Diblaima fanu Gomeri chu a nei ta a; tin, nau a pai a, fapa a hrinsak ta a.

source: Give ear now to the words of the Lord: Up! put forward your cause before the mountains, let your voice be sounding among the hills.
target: LALPA thu sawi chu tûnah ngaithla rawh u: tho la tlâng lian hmâahte chuan khing la, tlâng tête chuan i aw ngaithla rawh se.

source: Truly my desire is to be present with you now, using a changed voice; for I am troubled about you.
target: A ni, tun lai hian in hnena awma ka aw tihdanglam ka chak theihzia mai chu; in chungthu-ah ka mangang si a.

source: What a fool I was!
target: Ka va â em!

source: You've betrayed me
target: Mi phatsan a ni

source: They tried
target: An tichhin tawh

source: I'm reformed
target: Siamthar ka ni

source: But as for you and your servants, I am certain that even now the fear of the Lord God will not be in your hearts.
target: Nimahsela nâng leh i chhiahhlawhteho hi zawngin LALPA Pathian hi in la tih chuang lo tih ka hria a ni, a ti a.

source: The king made answer and said, Is this not great Babylon, which I have made for the living-place of kings, by the strength of my power and for the glory of my honour?
target: Lal chuan, He Babulon ropui hi keima chakna ngeia lal chênna hmun atân leh ka ropuina maawina tûra ka siam chu a ni lo vem ni? tiin a sawi a.

source: So everything was made ready and the priests took their places with the Levites in their divisions, as the king had said.
target: Tichuan rawngbawlna chu an buatsaih a, lal thupêk angin puithiamte chu an hmunah an ding a, Levi-hote chu an pâwl dan ang zelin.

source: You're smart
target: I nalh

source: These are the laws and the orders which the Lord gave to the children of Israel by Moses, in the lowlands of Moab by Jordan at Jericho.
target: Heng hi LALPAN Mosia hmanga Jeriko zawn Jordan rala Moab phaia Israela thlahte a pêk, thupêkte leh rorel dante chu a ni.

source: It happens
target: A thleng chawk a nia

source: We'll be forgiven
target: Kan ngaidam ang

source: I am in Paris
target: Paris-ah ka awm

source: You deserved that
target: Chu chu i phu a ni

source: What sounds of pain come from the beasts! the herds of cattle are at a loss because there is no grass for them; even the flocks of sheep are no longer to be seen.
target: Rante chu an va rûm nasa êm! Bawng rualte chu an mangang a, hlobet hring hmun an neih loh avângin; a ni, berâm rualte chu an țiau va.

source: I'll do it in the morning.
target: Zingah ka ti ang.

source: Say to Archippus, See that you do the work which the Lord has given you to do.
target: Tin, Arkippa hnenah khan, Rawngbawlna Lalpaa i hmuh kha hlen turin fimkhur rawh, ti ang che u.

source: But to the tribe of Levi Moses gave no heritage: the Lord, the God of Israel, is their heritage, as he said to them.
target: Levi chite erawh chu Mosian rochan tur a pe ve lo: an hnena a lo sawi tawh ang khan LALPA, Israelte Pathian chu an rochan a ni zawk.

source: Zion gave ear and was glad; and the daughters of Judah were full of joy, because of your decisions, O Lord.
target: Zion tlâng chuan a hria a, lawm takin a awm a, Juda fanute chu hlim takin an awm bawk a;

source: I am okay.
target: Ka tha e.

source: I'm not switching
target: Ka switch lo a ni

source: In the inmost room he made two winged beings of olive-wood, ten cubits high;
target: Tin, biakna hmunah chuan tawng sawm ve vea sâng, cherub pahnih olive thingin a siam a.

source: Now the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah while he was shut up in the place of the armed watchmen, saying,
target: Tin, LALPA thu chu, vengtu hung chhûnga khar khipa a awm lai chuan Jeremia hnênah a lo thleng a,

source: For if I give you sorrow, who then will make me glad, but he who is made sad by me?
target: Keiin ka tihlungngaih si che u chuan, ka tihlungngaiha vek lo chuan tunge mi tilawmtu ni ang le?

source: For the hand of the Lord was against them, working their destruction, till all were dead.
target: Mipui zing ata an boral der hma loh chuan anmahni tiboral turin LALPA kutin a tai reng bawk a.

source: But your servants will go over, every man armed for war, before the Lord to the fight, as my lord says.
target: amaherawhchu i chhiahhlawh, indo tura râlthuam zang zawngte chuan kan pu sawi ang chuan LALPA hmaah kan va kal ang e, tiin an sawi a.

source: There's no giving up
target: Beidawng a awm lo

source: Tom wasn't tired
target: Tom chu a chau lo

source: Tom did that
target: Tom tih a nih kha

source: Yes, sir
target: Aw, ka pu

source: Which is not another sort: only there are some who give you trouble, desiring to make changes in the good news of Christ.
target: chu chu Chanchin Tha a ni ve si lo; nangmahni tibuaiin, Krista Chanchin Tha tihdanglam duh tute emaw an awm mai a ni a.

source: Tom shivered
target: Tom a khur

source: Being conscious that our old man was put to death on the cross with him, so that the body of sin might be put away, and we might no longer be servants to sin.
target: Heng hi hria ila: kan mihring hlui chu a hnenah khenbehin a awm ve ta, sual pu taksa chu tihborala a awm theih nan, tun achinah sual bawiha kan awm lohna turin.

source: Make me go in the way of your teachings; for they are my delight.
target: I thupêk kawngah mi kaltir ang che; Chu mi-ah chuan ka lawm si a.

source: But as for you who have the name of Jew, and are resting on the law, and take pride in God,
target: Nimahsela nang Juda hming pu i ni si a, Dan chu i rin chhan a, Pathian i chhuan a,

source: Do you know this man
target: He pa hi i hria em

source: Let's travel together.
target: I zin dun ang u.

source: I'm not able to skate.
target: Ka skate thei lo.

source: Give you comfort and strength in every good work and word.
target: in thinlungte chu tithlamuangin, thil tihthat leh thusawi that tinrengah tinghet rawh se.

source: Be quiet.
target: Ngawi rawh.

source: No, you don't have to.
target: Ni lo, a ngai lo.

source: You mistreated her.
target: I tiduhdah a ni.

source: Give me that
target: Kha kha mi pe rawh

source: And kept safe Lot, the upright man, who was deeply troubled by the unclean life of the evil-doers
target: tin, Lota, mi fel, mi sualte awm dan hur tak avanga lungngai em ema chu a chhandam ta a;

source: It was a dream job.
target: Mumang hna a ni.

source: But the Pharisees and the teachers of the law were against the purpose of God for themselves, not having had his baptism.
