target: Pharisaite leh dan hretute erawh chu a hnenah baptisma lo chang tawh an ni ve lo va, anmahni tan Pathianin rem a ruatsak kha an duh lo.

source: Put an end to your wrath and be no longer bitter; do not give way to angry feeling which is a cause of sin.
target: Thinur hi bansan la, thnrim hi sim rawh. Intilungngai duh suh - thil tihsualah a lo tlak mai thin a ni.

source: And now, it seems, you are going because your heart's desire is for your father's house; but why have you taken my gods?
target: Tin, i pa in i ngaih êm êm avângin kal châk hle mah la, eng vangin nge ka Pathiante mi rûksak ni? a ti a.

source: I want to get down here.
target: Ka chhuk duh e.

source: And looking round at those who were seated about him, he said, See, my mother and my brothers!
target: Tin, a kiang vela thute chu a han en vel a, En teh u, ka nu leh ka unaute hi!

source: It's sand
target: Tiauvut a nia

source: Your eyes will see the king in his glory: they will be looking on a far-stretching land.
target: I mite chuan lal chu a mawinaah chuan an la hmu ang a, ram parh zau tak an la thlir ang.

source: Who is she
target: Khanu kha tunge

source: She's my daughter
target: Ka fanu a ni

source: Both sat down
target: An pahnihin an?hu

source: Who was there Nobody
target: Tu nge awm Tumah

source: They are holding it
target: An chelh mek a ni

source: And now, Lord, let your words about your servant and about his family be made certain for ever, and do as you have said.
target: Tichuan aw LALPA, i chhiahhlawh chunghang htu leh a chhûngte chungchâng thu i sawi chu kumkhua atân tinghet la, i sawi tawh ang khan ti ang che.

source: The evening isn't over.
target: Zan pawh a zo lo.

source: And they are able to say, if they would give witness, that I was living as a Pharisee, in that division of our religion which is most regular in the keeping of the law.
target: atir ata ka chanchin an hria e, khatia kan sakhaw pawl khermei ber dan pangngaia Pharisaia ka awm kha, an duh chuanin mi sawipui thei a ni.

source: He was giving a speech.
target: Thusawi a pe a.

source: I don't intend to dance
target: Zai ka tum lo

source: You were overdoing it.
target: I ti lutuk a ni.

source: I failed
target: Ka tlinglo

source: I ran away
target: Ka tlanbo

source: I cleaned my room
target: Ka room chu ka tifai a

source: It is God who has taken them out of Egypt; his horns are like those of the mountain ox.
target: Aigupta ațangin Pathianin a hruai chhuak hlawm Sele țha ang mai an pu a,

source: He shall die
target: A thi tur a ni

source: She's not perfect
target: A famkim lo

source: Are you hiding something?
target: Thil i thup em?

source: But still my eye had pity on them and I kept them from destruction and did not put an end to them completely in the waste land.
target: Mahse tiboral lo tûrin ka mitin a hmuh hmaih ta a, thlalêrah pawh khan ka tiboral vek ta lo mai a ni.

source: But I have made prayer for you, that your faith may not go from you: and when you are turned again, make your brothers strong.
target: nimahsela i rin a bo loh nan ka tawngtaisak che a ni; i hawi kir leh hunah nangin i unaute tinghet ang che, a ti a.

source: She wears it every day.
target: Nitin a ha thin.

source: And now the sense of the letter which you sent to us has been made clear to me,
target: Kan hnêna in lehkha rawn tawn kha ka hmaah fiah takin an chhiar a.

source: I'm not ṭhin
target: Ka cher lo

source: Or anyone using secret force on people, or putting questions to a spirit, or having secret knowledge, or going to the dead for directions.
target: dawi ât te ramhuai zawl rawih te, dawithiam te, mitthi biak ching mite in zinga anaw awm tur a ni lo.

source: What country are you a citizen of?
target: Eng ram nge i nih?

source: Is it possible for me to let wrong scales and the bag of false weights go without punishment?
target: Chuta mi hausate chu pâwngnêknain an khat si a, chuta chêngte chuan dâwt an sawi a, an ka chhûnga an lei chu bum hmang a ni.

source: He has guts
target: Thahrui a nei zek

source: All the kings of the earth will give you praise, O Lord, when the words of your mouth come to their ears.
target: Aw LALPA, leia lal zawng zawng chuan lawm thu an hrilh ang che, I kaa thu chhuakte chu an hre si a.

source: And the men of Benjamin came together after Abner in one band, and took their places on the top of a hill.
target: Tin, Benjamina thlahte chu Abnera hnênah an pung khawm a, pawl khatah an insiam a, tlâng chhipah an va ding t .

source: They will keep you from the evil woman, from the smooth tongue of the strange woman.
target: Hmeichhe khawlo lakah leh Hmeichhe sual kam thlum lakah veng tûr chein

source: I sometimes skate.
target: Ka skate fo thin.

source: And the people of the land are to give worship at the door of that doorway before the Lord on the Sabbaths and at the new moons.
target: Tin, vantlang erawh chuan chawlni leh thlatharahte chuan chu kawngka in luhna bulah te chuan LALPA hmaah Pathian chibai an buk ang.

source: He who gets mixed up in a fight which is not his business, is like one who takes a dog by the ears while it is going by.
target: A inrawlh vena tûr pawh awm hauh si lova kal paha mi sual mai chu Ui kal lai a benga lo mantu ang a ni.

source: And six boards for the back of the House on the west,
target: Tin, biak bûk kawmchar khawtlâng chhawng lam atân chuan ban rem khâwm paruk i siam tur a ni.

source: Have no fear, O land; be glad with great joy; for the Lord has done great things.
target: Aw, ram, hlau suh la hlimin lawm rawh; LALPA chuan thil ropui takte a ti ta si a.

source: We are cruelly attacked, but not without hope; we are made low, but we are not without help;
target: tihduhdahin kan awm a, nimahsela kalsanin kan awm si lo; vuak thlukin kan awm a, nimahsela tihboralin kan awm si lo;

source: They teased each other
target: An in nuihzat a

source: For fear that you may give your honour to others, and your wealth to strange men:
target: Chutilochuan i ropuina chu mi dang a pe ang a, I kumte chu mi nun chhia i pe dah ang a,

source: Is Tom happy?
target: Tom a lâwm em?

source: I can jump
target: Ka zuang thei

source: And the goat which is marked out for the Lord, let Aaron give for a sin-offering.
target: tin, Arona chuan LALPA puala tlu kel chu a la ang a, sual thawi nan a hlan ang a.

source: Even if an army came against me with its tents, my heart would have no fear: if war was made on me, my faith would not be moved.
target: Sipai pawlhovin mi bei tumin mi ep reng mah sela, Ka thinlung hian a hlau lovang: Ka chungah indona lo chhuak mah sela, Chuti pawhin ka ring tlat ang.

source: They didn't catch the bus.
target: Bus chu an man lo.

source: And Moses said to all the meeting of the children of Israel, This is the order which the Lord has given:
target: Tin, Mosian Israela thlahte pung khawmho zawng zawng hnenah chuan, Hei hi a ni hi LALPAN thu apêk che u chu,

source: But he puts the poor man on high from his troubles, and gives him families like a flock.
target: Nimahsela retheite chu hrehawmna atangin hmun sângah a hlang thin a, Ran rual angin chhûngte a siamsak thin.

source: And your limit on the north will be the line from the Great Sea to Mount Hor:
target: Tin, hei hi hmar lama in ramri a ni ang: tuifinriat zau ațangin Hor tlâng huamin i siam ang a;

source: Your face is a delight with rings of hair, your neck with chains of jewels.
target: A nalh mang e, i biang, bahsam phiar mawi nên, I nghawnga lunghlu hruite nên chuan.

source: I'm not going to make it.
target: Ka siam dawn lo.

source: They laughed again
target: An nui leh a

source: Your time is over.
target: I hun a liam ta.

source: Just keep it
target: Dah mai rawh

source: They couldn't judge me.
target: Min rel thei lo.

source: You're not hungry
target: I ril a tam lo

source: And they took his body on horseback and put it into the earth with his fathers in the town of David.
target: Tin, a ruang chu sakawrin an phur a, a pi leh pute hnênah Juda khawpuiah an phûm ta a.

source: I'm famished
target: Ka lar e

source: Are you tall?
target: I sang em?

source: And he saw that it was, and said, It is my son's coat; an evil beast has put him to death; without doubt Joseph has come to a cruel end.
target: Tin, ani chuan a lo hre mai a, Ka fapaa kawrfual a nih hi; sakawlhin a seh ta zuk nia le; Josefa chu matheilovin pawh sawm vekin a awm a ni ngei ang, a ti a.

source: I improvised
target: Ka phuahchawp vek

source: What are you guys looking at
target: Eng nge in en a

source: Mikloth was the father of Shimeam. They were living with their brothers in Jerusalem opposite their brothers.
target: Tin, Miklothan Simeama a hring a. Anniho pawh chu Jerusalem-ah an unauzain an unaute depah an awm a.

source: The young lions have made an outcry against him with a loud voice: they have made his land waste; his towns are burned up, with no one living in them.
target: Sakeibaknei vânglaite chuan rûm khumin, A chungah aw an chhuah a, A ram chu an tițiau zo ta, A khawpuite pawh luahtu nei lovin a kâng fai ta

source: Because of this the Lord has given me the reward of my righteousness, because my hands are clean in his eyes.
target: Chuvangin LALPA chuan ka felzia ang zelin mi lo rul ta a, Ka kutte a mithmuha a thianghlimzia ang zelin.

source: And then he will send out the angels, and will get together his saints from the four winds, from the farthest part of the earth to the farthest part of heaven.
target: Chu mi hunah chuan vantirhkohte chu a tir chhuak ang a, a thlante chu kawl kil li ata – lei tawp atanga van tawp thlengin – a lawr khawm ang.

source: Who has knowledge of the power of your wrath, or who takes note of the weight of your passion?
target: Tuing nge i thinurna thiltihtheihzia hria a, Nangmah tih tûrzia ang i thinrimna chu hria le?

source: And Moses did this; as the Lord gave him orders, so he did.
target: Chutiang chan Mosian a ti a: LALPAN tih tura thu a pêk ang zawng zawng chuan a ti vek a.

source: Why, then, did you not put my money in the bank, and at my coming I would have got back what is mine with interest?
target: Chuti a nih ahnu, ka tangka chu sumdawngtute hnenah lo dah tawh tur i ni, chutichuan, ka lo haw hian ka ta hi a pung nen ka hmu leh tur a ni.

source: You didn't put anything.
target: Engmah i dah lo.

source: Don't throw stones
target: Lung paih suh

source: He looked to the heavens.
target: Van lam a en a.

source: Then a number of the Jews who had come to Mary and had seen the things which Jesus did had belief in him.
target: Chuvang chuan Mari lenpuitu, Isua thiltih hmu Judate chuan a then tam takin Isua an ring ta a.

source: I didn't make anything.
target: Engmah ka siam lo.

source: Before destruction the heart of man is full of pride, and before honour goes a gentle spirit.
target: Mihring rilru chapona chu boralna hmaah a kal a, Inngaihtlâwmna chu chawimawina hmaah.

source: He owes me a favor
target: Khawngaihna min bat a ni

source: Tom is a bonehead
target: Tom hi ruhro a ni

source: Truly, if the river is overflowing, it gives him no cause for fear; he has no sense of danger, even if Jordan is rushing against his mouth.
target: Ngai rawh, tui a lo len buan buan pawhin a hlau ngai lo: A ka thleng pawhin Jordan lian mah se, a zuam zel..

source: He was bored the whole day.
target: Nilengin a bo a.

source: He mocked me.
target: Mi chhiat khum.

source: And the land is shaking and in pain: for the purposes of the Lord are fixed, to make the land of Babylon an unpeopled waste.
target: Chu ram chu na tuarin a khur a, Babulon ram, chengtu awm lova ti tiau tûrin, Babulon chunga LALPA thil tum chu a ding reng a ni.

source: Loosen up.
target: Tithawl rawh.

source: And they are not across the sea, for you to say, Who will go over the sea for us and give us news of them so that we may do them?
target: Kan hriata kan zawm theihna turin tuifinriat ralah tunge min kalsak ang a, min rawn laksak ang?' ti turin tuifinriat rala mi ani hek lo.

source: Hum baby to sleep.
target: Hum naute chu mu turin.

source: Do you have children already?
target: Fa i nei tawh em?

source: I do not feel like walking.
target: Ka kal duh lo.

source: You have made my steps wide under me, so that my feet make no slip.
target: Ka hnuaia ke ke penna chu i tizau va, Tichuan kekete hi a tleng lo.

source: And Adonijah himself was full of fear because of Solomon; and he got up and went to the altar, and put his hands on its horns.
target: Tin, Adonija chuan Solomona chu a hlau ta a; a tho va, maichâm ki a va vuan ta a.

source: It bothers me too
target: Min tibuai ve bawk

source: Let's walk
target: Kal zel ang

source: He who keeps back his rod is unkind to his son: the loving father gives punishment with care.
target: Tiang hmang duh lo chuan a fa a hua a ni, A hmangaihtu erawh chuan a thunun chawt thin.

source: They will ask Tom.
target: Tom an zawt ang.

source: Let me pray
target: Ka'n tawngtai ang e

source: For I am the least of the Apostles, having no right to be named an Apostle, because of my cruel attacks on the church of God.
target: Kei zawng tirhkoh zinga te ber, Pathian kohhranho ka tihduhdah avanga tirhkohva vuah tlak loh ka ni si a.

source: Now from the sixth hour it was dark over all the land till the ninth hour.
target: Tin, chawfak hun achin behliang mun hun thlengin khawvel a lo thim ta vek a.

source: I didn't expect you.
target: Ka beisei lo che.

source: All your walled places will be like fig-trees and your people like the first figs, falling at a shake into the mouth which is open for them.
target: I kulh zawng zawngte chu theipui kûng, rah hmin hmasa pu ang an ni ang a: an nghîn phawtchuan eitu kâah an tla lût țhin.

source: Now in Iconium they went together to the Synagogue of the Jews and gave such teaching that a great number of Jews and Greeks had faith.
target: Tin, Ikonion khuaah chuan Judate inkhawmna inah an lut dun a, thu an sawi thin a, chutichuan Juda leh Grik tam tak pawhin an ring ta hial a.

source: Wait a while
target: Nghâk deuh rawh

source: As far as the east is from the west, so far has he put our sins from us.
target: Chhak leh thlang a inhlat ang hian, Kan bawhchhiatnate ch kan hnên ata a dah sanw ta diah a.

source: For the upright there is a light shining in the dark; he is full of grace and pity.
target: Mi dik tan chuan thimah chuan eng alo chhuak thin a: Ani chu mi khawngaih thei tak, lainatnaa khat, fel ta a ni.

source: The sea was getting rough because of a strong wind which was blowing.
target: Thlipui nasa tak a tleh avangin tui a fawn sang telh telh si a.

source: I could try
target: Ka tichhin thei

source: I've met Tom.
target: Tom-a ka hmu.

source: I didn't steal it.
target: Ka ru lo a ni.

source: It's your special day.
target: I ni bik a ni.

source: It could get tense.
target: A tense thei hle.

source: Be in debt for nothing, but to have love for one another: for he who has love for his neighbour has kept all the law.
target: Inhmangaih tawnna ngawt lo chu tuma engmah ba suh u; mahni mihringpui hmangaihtu chuan dan chu a zawh famkim tawh si a.

source: And the sons of Jonathan: Peleth and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
target: Tin, Jonathana fapate chu Peletha leh Zaza an ni. Chungte chu Jerameela thlahte an ni.

source: He advises us
target: Mi rawn hrilhfiah

source: He whose ears are stopped at the cry of the poor, will himself get no answer to his cry for help.
target: Mi rethei au thawma beng chhu ngawng chu, Ani pawh a au vang a, nimahsela ngaihthlâksak a ni bik lo vang.

source: We don't talk a lot.
target: Kan sawi tam lo.

source: We saw Tom.
target: Toma kan hmu.

source: Why is your clothing red, and why are your robes like those of one who is crushing the grapes?
target: Eng vangin nge i puan sin kha a sen a, i silhfente pawh kha grêp sawrna khura rap sawrtu silhfen anga a awm ni?

source: She called for help.
target: Ṭanpuina a ko a.

source: And the Lord gave the people grace in the eyes of the Egyptians. For the man Moses was highly honoured in the land of Egypt, by Pharaoh's servants and the people.
target: Tin, LALPAN mite chu Aigupta mite a khawngaihtîr ta a. Chu chang a ni lo va, Mosia chu Aigupta ramah chuan Pharaoa chhiahhlawhteho ngaihah leh mipuite ngaihah chuan mi ropui tak a ni a.

source: And the second is for a burned offering, in agreement with the law; and the priest will take away his sin and he will have forgiveness.
target: Tin, a pa khata chu dan angin halral thilhlanaah a hlan ang a: tin, puithiamin a thil tihsual tak chungchang thuah inremna a siamsak ang a, ngaihdam a ni ang.

source: My tongue will be talking of your righteousness all the day; for those whose purpose is to do me evil have been crushed and put to shame.
target: Ka lei pawh hian nilengin i felna thu a sawi ang: Ka chhiatna tûr chu an mualphovin an zak ta si a.

source: And as they gave orders to let the broken end and the roots of the tree be, so your kingdom will be safe for you after it is clear to you that the heavens are ruling.
target: Tin, a bulbâwr zuah tûra thu an lo pêk ang khân, vânin thu a nei tih i hriat hnuah chuan i ram chu i ta a ni tlat ang.

source: Here he is.
target: Heta hi a awm e.

source: O my strength, I will put my hope in you; because God is my strong tower.
target: Aw mi tichaktu, ka nghak reng ang che, Pathian chu ka kulhbingsâng ani si a.

source: Go back home
target: Inah let rawh

source: I always believe you.
target: Ka ring reng che.

source: I'm addicted
target: Ka zawngchhang

source: Do you want to sleep
target: Mut i duh em

source: Because if the priests are changed, it is necessary to make a change in the law.
target: Puithiam nihna chu a lo danglam tak avangin Dan thu chu tihdanglam ve a lo ngai reng a ni.

source: We have time
target: Hun kan nei

source: To the zoo
target: Sahuan lamah

source: See, hate is dropping from their lips; curses are on their tongues: they say, Who gives attention to it?
target: Ngai teh, an kain an irhc hhuak a; An hmuiah chuan khandaihte a awm a: Tunge hria awm ni? an ti mai a.

source: Don't mess everything up!
target: Engkim tibuai suh!

source: Fill it up
target: Hnawh khat rawh

source: Your wise sayings are only dust, and your strong places are only earth.
target: In upa thute chu thufing vaivut mai ani a, In invennate chu invenna hlum mai a ni.

source: For the women to go year by year sorrowing for the daughter of Jephthah the Gileadite, four days in every year.
target: Chutichuan Israel-hote zingah chuan Israela fanuten Gilead mi Jephtha fanu chu kum tin ni li sun danah an lo nei ta a,

source: This is necessary
target: Hei hi a tul a ni

source: Don't leave, Tom.
target: Kalsan suh, Tom.

source: They have become false, they are not his children, the mark of sin is on them; they are an evil and hard-hearted generation.
target: Tha lo takin a chungah an ti a, a fate an ni lo, an sawisel kaina a ni, Chhuan bengtlalo leh tihmawh an ni.

source: Do I need surgery?
target: Surgery ka mamawh em?

source: You will have the fruit of the work of your hands: happy will you be, and all will be well for you.
target: I kut thawhrim rah chu i ei dawn si a: lawm takin i awm ang a, thawvengin i awm bawk ang.

source: It's sweet
target: A thlum

source: Let's go eat
target: Kal ila va ei ang

source: So Isaac went away from there, and put up his tents in the valley of Gerar, making his living-place there.
target: Tichuan Isaaka chu chuta ta chu a chhuak a, Gerar ruamah chuan a puan in a zâr a, chutah chuan awm hmun a khuar ta a.

source: He doesn't altogether trust me.
target: Min ring tlat lo.

source: It is almost three.
target: Pathum a ni tawh.

source: Are you still worried?
target: I la lungkham em?

source: Men of Crete and Arabia, to all of us they are talking in our different languages, of the great works of God.
target: thenkhat Krit thliarkara mi leh Arab rama mi kan ni si a; nimahsela Pathian thiltih ropuite an sawi, mahni tawng theuhvin kan hriat si hi! an ti a.

source: Because the daughters of Manasseh had a heritage among his sons, and the land of Gilead was the property of the other sons of Manasseh.
target: Manasea fanute chuan a fapate zingah chanpual an neih ve avang a ni: tin, Gilead ram chu Manasea fapa dange chuan an chang a.

source: In the first year of his rule, in the first month, opening the doors of the Lord's house, he made them strong.
target: Ani chuan a lal tan kum thla khatnaah LALPA in kawngkhârte chu a hawng a, a chei tha a.

source: Let everything which has breath give praise to the Lord. Let the Lord be praised.
target: Engkim, thaw thei tawh phawt chuan LALPA chu fak rawh se. LALPA chu fak rawh u.

source: And to the first he gave the name Manasseh, for he said, God has taken away from me all memory of my hard life and of my father's house.
target: Tin, Josefan a fa tîr hmingah chuan Manasea a sa a: Pathianin ka thawh rimna zawng zawng leh ka pa chhûngte zawng zawng chu mi theihnghilhtîr ta si a, a ti a.

source: Then the cloud came down covering the Tent of meeting, and the House was full of the glory of the Lord;
target: Tichuan inbiakna puan in chu chhumin a rawn tuam ta mup a, biak bûk chu LALPA ropuinain a lo khat ta a.

source: I sneezed.
target: Ka hnar a za.

source: I fully agree.
target: Ka pawm vek e.

source: And the Pharisees said to him, Why are they doing what it is not right to do on the Sabbath?
target: Tin, Pharisaite chuan a hnenah, en the, engati nge Chawlhnia tihthiang lo chu an tih ni? an ti a.

source: All things came into existence through him, and without him nothing was.
target: Engkim azain ama siam a ni;thilsiam zawng zawng hi ama siam loh engmah a awm lo.

source: Being certain that you will do my desire, I am writing to you, in the knowledge that you will do even more than I say.
target: Ka sawi aia nasa zawk mahin i ti ang tih ka hriat avangin, i awih ringin i hnenah ka ziak a nih hi.

source: And I made attacks on this Way, even to death, taking men and women and putting them in prison.
target: Tin, he Kawnga mite hi tihlum hial khawpin ka tiduhdah thin a, ahmei apain ka phuar a, tan inah ka khungtir thin a.

source: I did a cartwheel
target: Cartwheel ka ti a

source: And the things desired by them are the first places at feasts, and the chief seats in the Synagogues,
target: ruaithehnaah hmun tha ber te, inkhawmna inah thutphah tha ber te,

source: I'd accept
target: Ka pawm ang

source: Why then have you not kept the oath of the Lord and the order which I gave you?
target: Eng vanga LALPA chhechham leh thu ka pêk che kha hlen lo nge i nih? a ti a.

source: And everyone to whom my words come and who does them not, will be like a foolish man who made his house on sand;
target: Tin, mi tin, heng ka thu hi hriaa zawm lo apiang chu, mi a tiauvut chung maia in satu nen tehkhin tur a ni.

source: And I have knowledge that his order is eternal life: so that the things which I say, I say them even as the Father says them to me.
target: Ama thupek chu chatuana nunna a ni tih ka hria; chuvang chuan thu ka sawi hi, Pa mi hrilh ang zelin ka sawi a ni, a ti a.

source: It's so expensive!
target: A man a to lûtuk!

source: Then I was lifted up by the wind, and at my back the sound of a great rushing came to my ears when the glory of the Lord was lifted up from his place.
target: Tichuan thlarauvin mi chawi kang ta a, ka hnung lamah chuan thawm ri sung sung hi ka hria a, A hmun ațang hian LALPA ropuina chu malsawmin awm rawh se, tiin.

source: I have eyes
target: Mitte ka nei

source: And his lord was pleased with the false servant, because he had been wise; for the sons of this world are wiser in relation to their generation than the sons of light.
target: Tin, a pu chuan sum enkawltu fel lo chu a rem hriat avangin a fak ta a; eng fate aiin he khawvel fate hi an tun lai kawngah chuan an fing zawk a ni.

source: Count me out
target: Mi ring thei ang

source: I did it all
target: Keima tih vek

source: You watch me
target: Mi lo en rawh

source: I didn't hear you say it.
target: I sawi ka hre lo.

source: You're sitting on chairs.
target: Chair-ah i thu a.

source: So Jesus said to the twelve, Have you a desire to go away?
target: Chutichuan Isuan sawm leh pahnihte hnenah chuan, Nangni pawhin kal bo in duh ve em? a ti a.

source: And for a number of days he was seen by those who came with him from Galilee to Jerusalem, who are now his witnesses before the people.
target: tin, Galili ram ata Jerusalem khuaa ama ruala chho vete hnenah chuan ni rei tak chhungin a inlar thin a; chung mite chu tunah hian mi hnenah a thuhretute an ni e.

source: Let's work together.
target: I thawk ho ang u.

source: If now you take this one from me, and some evil comes to him, you will make my grey head go down in sorrow to the underworld.
target: tichuan he mi pawh hi ka hnên ata in hruai bo va, tawh sual a zuk tawh chuan ka lu țuak hi lungngaihnain thlânah in liamtîr dâwn a ni,' a ti a.

source: If they give ear to his voice, and do his word, then he gives them long life, and years full of pleasure.
target: An pawisaka a rawng an bâwl chuan, An nite chu hmuingil takin an hmang ral ang a, An kumte chu nuam takin.

source: It's done!
target: A zo!

source: But my suggestion is that all Israel, from Dan as far as Beer-sheba, comes together to you, a great army like the sands of the sea in number; and that you yourself go out among them.
target: Keia remruat ve dan chu, Israel mite zawng zawng chu Dan atangin Beer-seba thleng rawkin tuifinriata tiau zat zetin i hnênah ko khâwm vek ila, tin, indonaah chuan nangmah meuh kal ve la.

source: And the king of Babylon put them to death at Riblah in the land of Hamath. So Judah was taken prisoner away from his land.
target: Tin, Babulon lal chuan Hamath rama Riblah-ah chuan anmahni a nghaisa a, a tihlum ta hlawm a. Chutichuan Juda hnam chu an ram ata sala hruai bovin an awm ta a.

source: Let's do something about it.
target: Eng emaw ti ila.

source: And Peter had come after him at a distance, even into the house of the high priest; and he was seated with the captains, warming himself in the light of the fire.
target: Tin, Peteran hla tak atangin amah chu a zui a, Puithiam Lalber in hual chhung kawtlai thlengin; tin, chhiahhlawhte zingah mei lum aiin a thu ve a.

source: The sun is shining hot.
target: Ni chu a vawt a.

source: It's about five miles.
target: Mel nga vel a ni.

source: Art for art's sake
target: Art atan art a ni

source: The two winged ones were ten cubits high, of the same size and form.
target: Cherub pakhat pawh chu tawng sawm a ni a: Cherubte chu intiat chiah leh pian dan inang ve ve chiah a ni.

source: They will be wasting away, they will come out of their secret places shaking with fear.
target: Mikhualte chu an zam ang a, An kulhbing atate chu khru chungin an lo chhuak ang.

source: She has a fake tan.
target: Fake tan a nei a.

source: I don't feel too warm.
target: Ka lum lutuk lo.

source: Don't drop it
target: Thlauh suh

source: For truly I was taken by force from the land of the Hebrews; and I have done nothing for which I might be put in prison.
target: Hebrai-ho ram ata min rûka mi rûk bo ka ni a: he ramah pawh hian rip chhûnga mi khûngna khawp engmah ka tisual hek lo, a ti a.

source: Now Ephron was seated among the children of Heth: and Ephron the Hittite gave Abraham his answer in the hearing of the children of Heth, and of all those who came into his town, saying,
target: Tin, Ephrona chu Hetha thlahte zîngah chuan a thu ve reng a: tichuan Hit mi Ephrona chu Hetha thlahte hriatah, a khaw kulh kawngkaa lût apiang hriat ngeiah chuan,

source: I don't wait for anybody
target: Tumah ka nghak lo

source: I'm very fat
target: Ka thau lutuk

source: That's my CD
target: Ka CD a nih kha

source: I wasn't good enough.
target: Ka tha tawk lo.

source: Do not have the thought that I have come to send peace on the earth; I came not to send peace but a sword.
target: Khawvelah hian rem lentir tura lo kal emaw mi ti suh u; rem lentir tura lo kal ka ni lo va, khandaih lentir tura lo kal ka ni zawk.

source: I'm grilling fish.
target: Nga ka grill a.

source: I'm cured
target: Tihdam ka ni

source: Every way of a man seems right to himself, but the Lord is the tester of hearts.
target: Mi tin an awm dan hi mahni mitah chuan dik tih a ni a; Nimahsela LALPAN thinlung a buk thin.

source: What the eyes see is better than the wandering of desire. This is to no purpose and a desire for wind.
target: Chakna chavai mai mai ai chuan mita hmuh sa ngei chu a tha zawk: hei pawh hi engmah lo leh thil lo thlawn mai a lo ni.

source: Let them give praise to your name, for it is great and to be feared; holy is he.
target: Anni chuan i hming ropui tak hlauhawm tak chu fak rawh se; Amah chu a thianghlim a ni.

source: And the chief things of the oldest mountains, and the good things of the eternal hills,
target: Hmasang tlâng tea thil duhawm ber tein, Chatuan tlânga thil hlutein,

source: You can't threaten me.
target: Min vau thei lo.

source: It is an honour for a man to keep from fighting, but the foolish are ever at war.
target: Intihbuaina ata lo inthiarfihlim hi thil duhawm a ni a, Mi â apiangte chu an insual thin.

source: And they were saying among themselves, Who will get the stone rolled away from the door for us?
target: Tin, Thlan kawngka ata lung chu tuin nge min lum sawnsak ang aw? an intih lai mekin,

source: She washed a carpet
target: Carpet a silfai a

source: What were you celebrating
target: Eng nge i lawm a

source: Let's vote
target: Thlang ang

source: I didn't hit you.
target: Ka vuak lo che.

source: Don't drink to excess.
target: In tam lutuk suh.

source: I hardly ever watched TV.
target: TV ka en ngai lo.

source: Don't try to get up yet.
target: Thawh tum suh.

source: And they came to Samaria, and put the king's body to rest in Samaria.
target: Chutichuan lal chu a thi ta a, Samari khuaah an luhpui a; tichuan Samari khuaah lal chu an phûm ta a.

source: We're all OK
target: Kan ṭha vek

source: Let no wrong decisions be given in the poor man's cause.
target: I mi rethei chu a thubuaiah dik lo takin I rêlsak tûr a ni lo.

source: She is not afraid to die.
target: Thih a hlau lo.

source: Who is he
target: Hepa hi tunge

source: And give a thought to the Levite who is living among you, for he has no part or heritage in the land.
target: Levi-ho in awmnaa awmte chu thlauthla hauh suh ang che u; in zingah chanvo pawh, rochan pawh an nei ve si lo va.

source: In whom you, with the rest, are united together as a living-place of God in the Spirit.
target: nangni pawh amahah chuan Thlarauva, Pathian awmna tura rem khawm in ni.

source: And the children of Ammon went over Jordan, to make war against Judah and Benjamin and the house of Ephraim; and Israel was in great trouble.
target: Tin, Amona thlahte chu Juda-ho te, Benjamin-ho te, Ephraima thlahte bei tûrin Jorda ral an kai a; chutichuan Israel-hote chu mangan namenin an mangang ta lo va.

source: What song is she playing?
target: Eng hla nge a tum?

source: My soul still keeps the memory of them; and is bent down in me.
target: Ka nunna hian chûng angte chu a hre reng zel a, ka chhûngah hian a kun reng a ni.

source: Its rooms, its uprights, and its covered way had the same measures, and its covered way had windows all round: it was fifty cubits long and twenty-five cubits wide.
target: a vênna pindante, a bangpêngte, a sumhnunte; chutah chuan a vêlin tukverhte a awm a: a dunglam tawng sawmnga a ni a, a vânglam tawng sawmhnih leh panga.

source: Did you find any problems?
target: Harsatna i hmu em?

source: And anyone who has been sleeping in the house will have to have his clothing washed; and anyone who takes food in that house will have to have his clothing washed.
target: Tin, tupawh chu mi ina mu apiangte chuan an puante an su ang a. Tin, tupawh chu ina chaw ei apiangte chuan an puante an su tur a ni.

source: And in the evening, at sundown, they took to him all who were diseased, and those who had evil spirits.
target: Tin, tlai lamah ni a tlak hnu chuan, damlo zawng zawng leh ramhuai mante a hnenah an rawn hruai a.

source: I'll die.
target: Ka thi dawn.

source: Don't give it away
target: Pek suh

source: It's Tom's
target: Tom ta a nia

source: Who pays you?
target: Tu pek nge i nih?

source: They say to him, Why then did Moses give orders that a husband might give her a statement in writing and be free from her?
target: Anni chuan a hnenah, A nih leh, engati nge Mosian inmakna lehkha peka mak tur thu a pek si? an ti a.

source: She's a valley girl.
target: Valley nula a ni.

source: He came to himself
target: Amah ah a rawn kal a

source: Did you sleep all right?
target: I muhil tha em?

source: The sons of Ezer: Bilhan and Zaavan, Jaakan. The sons of Dishan: Uz and Aran.
target: Ezera fapate chu Bilhana te, Zaavana te, Jaakana te an ni. Disana fapate chu Uza leh Arana an ni.

source: And on the pillar, four cups like almond flowers, every one with its bud and its flower:
target: tin, khâwnvâr dahna ngulah chuan no pali, vai umkhal kuhmûm anga siam, a pârfung leh a pârte a awm tûr a ni;

source: I don't own a violin.
target: Violin ka nei lo.

source: Tom hit me.
target: Tom-an mi vua.

source: He tells a story.
target: Thu a sawi a.

source: Happy is the nation whose God is the Lord; and the people whom he has taken for his heritage.
target: LALPA Pathian a nei hnam chu an eng a thawl e; Ama rochana a thlan mite chu.

source: The Lord will be a high tower for those who are crushed down, a high tower in times of trouble;
target: Chutichuan LALPA chu hnehchhiahna tuarte tan chuan kulhbing sâng a lo ni ang a, Mangan hunahte chuan kulhbingsâng a lo ni ang.

source: The house of the sinner will be overturned, but the tent of the upright man will do well.
target: Mi suaksual in chu tihchhiat a ni ang a, Mi dik puan in erawh chu a vul ang.

source: It's not anyone's fault.
target: Tu mawh a ni lo.

source: And the saying was pleasing to Absalom and to the responsible men of Israel.
target: Tichuan chu mi thu chuan Absaloma leh Israel upaho zawng zawngte chu a tilawm ta hle a.

source: But a common destruction will overtake sinners and evil-doers together, and those who have gone away from the Lord will be cut off.
target: Nimahsela, bawhchhetute leh mi sualte tihchhiatna chu a awm rual ang a, LALPA kalsantute pawh tihboralin an awm ang.

source: We got dead drunk.
target: Kan rui thi ta a.

source: You are lazy!
target: I thatchhia

source: Are they brothers
target: Unau an ni em

source: I will say to God, Do not put me down as a sinner; make clear to me what you have against me.
target: Pathian hnênah heti hian ka ti dawn: Mi thiam lo suh, i mi demna mi entir zawk rawh.

source: Hurry up.
target: Hmanhmawh rawh.

source: I've done it
target: Ka ti tawh

source: She refused to notice me.
target: Min hre duh lo.

source: The trees of the Lord are full of growth, the cedars of Lebanon of his planting;
target: LALPA thingte chu a tlai thin; Lebanon tlânga sidar thing a phunnate chu.

source: I was fine
target: Ka tha e

source: He touched me
target: Khapa khân mi khawih a

source: In order that it might make wrath come up to give punishment, she has put her blood on the open rock, so that it may not be covered.
target: Phuba la tûra thinurna a lo thawh theih nân vur lo vin a thisen chhuah chu lungpui ro chungah ka leih a ni.

source: Who came?
target: Tunge lo kal?

source: Let's play tennis!
target: Tennis khel ila!

source: Now while he was talking to me, I went into a deep sleep with my face to the earth: but touching me, he put me on my feet where I had been.
target: Ani chuan, Ngai rawh, thinurna hunhnuhnûng lama thil lo awm tûr chu ka ti hria ang che: tâwpna hun ruata mi a ni si a.

source: We need rest
target: Kan chawlh a ngai

source: But Ehud had got away while they were waiting and had gone past the stone images and got away to Seirah.
target: Tin, Ehuda lah chu khatia an nghah reng chhûng khan a lo tlan bo tawh a, lung chherna hmun kha a pel a,

source: So when Jesus had taken the wine he said, All is done. And with his head bent he gave up his spirit.
target: Tin, Isuan uain thur chu a lo in zawh chuan A kin ta a ti a. Tin, a lu a kun a, a thlarau a thlah ta a.

source: And the Lord came to Sarah as he had said and did to her as he had undertaken.
target: Tin, LALPA chuan a sawi tawh angin Sari chu a zuk kan a, LALPA chuan a sawi tawh angin Sari chungah a tihsak ta bawk a.

source: For the glory of the first no longer seems to be glory, because of the greater glory of that which comes after.
target: Tihropuia awm tawha chuan he mi lamah zawng ropuina reng a nei ta si lo, ropuina nasa zawk chuan a khum avangin.

source: Let it then be your desire to be like God, as well-loved children;
target: Chutichuan, a fa duh takte angin Pathian awm dan latute ni rawh u.

source: The wood is rotten.
target: Thing chu a ro a.

source: He, having knowledge of the future, was talking of the coming again of Christ from the dead, that he was not kept in hell and his body did not see destruction.
target: tichuan chung chu a lo hriat lawk reng avangin Krista thawh leh tur thu a sawi a ni, ‘Mitthi khuaa hnutchhiahin a awm hek lo, a ruang pawh a tawih hek lo,’ tiin.

source: Take a break
target: Chawl rawh

source: But we are not of those who go back to destruction; but of those who have faith even to the salvation of the soul.
target: Nimahsela, keini zawng boral tura hnungtawlh pawla mi kan ni lo va; nunna humhim tura rinna nei pawla mi kan ni zawk.

source: She stood up
target: A ding chhuak

source: The Lord is ready to take up his cause against his people, and is about to come forward as their judge.
target: LALPA chu sawipui tûrin a lo ding chhuak a, mite ro rêl tûrin a lo ding ta a.

source: And as for me, my eye will not have mercy, and I will have no pity, but I will send the punishment of their ways on their heads.
target: Keipawh hian ka hmu hmaih lo vang a, ka khawngaih hek lo vang; an sual mawh chu a bûrin ka khumtîr ang, a ti a.

source: Don't you like us?
target: Min duh lo em ni?

source: I felt guilty
target: Ka inthiam lo

source: Then he said to me, You will see even more disgusting things which they do.
target: An thiltih tenawm nasa leh zual dang pawh i la hmu leh ang, ka hnênah chuan a ti bawk a.

source: I wasn't penalized
target: Ka hrem lo

source: So he came to Simon Peter. Peter said, Lord, are my feet to be washed by you?
target: Chutichuan Simon Petera hnenah a lo kal a. Ani chuan, Lalpa, nang emin ka ke i sil dawn em ni? a ti a.

source: Sami is not back yet.
target: Sami a la kir lo.

source: Is she afraid of death
target: Thihna a hlau em

source: And I will put clean water on you so that you may be clean: from all your unclean ways and from all your images I will make you clean.
target: Tin, in chungah tuifîm ka theh ang a, in lo thianghlim ang a, in bawlhhlawhna zawng zawng leh in milimte lak ata ka tlengfai ang che u.

source: And I will have mercy through a thousand generations on those who have love for me and keep my laws.
target: mi hmangaiha ka thupêkte pawmtu sang tam takte chunga khawngaihna lantir țhin ka nih hi.

source: And he gave it the name of Shibah: so the name of that town is Beer-sheba to this day.
target: Tichuan chu tuichhunchhuah chu Siba a vuah a; chuvangin chu mi khaw hming chu tun thlengin Beer-seba a la ni a.

source: Is not this the cup from which my lord takes wine and by which he gets knowledge of the future? Truly, you have done evil.
target: Kha kha ka pu uain inna leh aienna ngei a ni lo vem ni? Hetiang in tih hi in tisual a ni,' ti rawh, a ti a.

source: Now all the tax-farmers and sinners came near to give ear to him.
target: Tin, chhiahkhawntute leh mi sualte zawng zawngin a thu hre turin a kiang an rawn pan a.

source: Jump down.
target: Zuang thla.

source: Examine them
target: Enfiah rawh

source: He is just my age.
target: Ka kum a ni mai.

source: I will let myself loose.
target: Ka in thlah ang.

source: God sends his arrows against him without mercy; he goes in flight before his hand.
target: Zahngai lovin a nuai ang a, A thiltihtheihna hmaah chuan a kat rawk rawk ang.

source: I ate a hamburger.
target: Hamburger ka ei a.

source: Let not your decisions be based on what you see, but on righteousness.
target: A lan angin ngaihtuah suh ula, fel takin ngaihtuah zawk rawh u, a ti a.

source: You are harassing me.
target: Min tibuai a ni.

source: And driving him out of the garden they put him to death. Now what will the lord do to these workmen?
target: Tichuan grep huan ata chu an theh chhuak a, an tihlum ta a. Chutichuan grep huan neitupa chuan an chungah engtin nge a rawn tih ang?

source: These two have I seen in my life which is to no purpose: a good man coming to his end in his righteousness, and an evil man whose days are long in his evil-doing.
target: Ka nun engmah lovah hian engkim ka lo hmu ta a: mi fel a fel chunga borala awma, mi suaksual thil tha lo ti chunga dam rei phian si angte hi.

source: But when the disciples saw it they were angry, saying, To what purpose is this waste?
target: Nimahsela, zirtirte chuan chu chu an hmuhin an thinur a, Eng atan nge hetia a tihboral mai mai ni?

source: Where is your king, that he may be your saviour? and all your rulers, that they may take up your cause? of whom you said, Give me a king and rulers.
target: I khawpui zawng zawnga chhanhim thei tu tr che I lal chu tunah khawiah nge a awm le? Lal leh hotute mi pe rawh, i tihate I rorêl tûrte chu khawiah nge?

source: I envy Tom.
target: Tom-a ka thik.

source: Again, I give you a new law, which is true in him and in you; for the night is near its end and the true light is even now shining out.
target: Nimahsela, thupek thar ziak ka ni bawk ang chu, chu chu amahah leh nangmahniah a lang a ni, thim chu a bo mek avang leh eng taktak chu tunah a lo en tak avang hian.

source: And crying out when they saw the smoke of her burning, saying, What town is like the great town?
target: a kang khu chu thlir chungin, ‘He khaw ropui tluk hi khawii khua nge awm ang?’ tiin an au va.

source: Do you agree?
target: I pawm em?

source: Then his hair is to be cut off, but not on the diseased place, and he is to be shut up for seven days more:
target: meh tur a ni a, pupangliah lai erawh chu a met tur a ni lo; tin, puithiamin pupangliaha chu ni sarih dang a khung hrang leh ang a:

source: I don't fear them
target: Anmahni hi ka hlau lo

source: I'm tired.
target: Ka hah.

source: I didn't move
target: Ka chesawn lo

source: She gave birth to twins.
target: Twins a hring a.

source: He was not wearing a warm coat.
target: Kawr lum a ha lo.

source: They went away with the goods they had taken, man and beast.
target: Tin, mihring leh ran, sal leh rallak sum zawng zawng an kalpui vek a.

source: Sami isn't worth it.
target: Sami hi a hlu lo.

source: Wash up.
target: Phihfai rawh.

source: And Meonothai was the father of Ophrah; and Seraiah was the father of Joab, the father of Ge-harashim; they were expert workmen.
target: Tin, Meonothaian Ophra a hring a; tin, Seraian Geharasim-ho thlahtu Joaba a hring a: chu mite chu kut themthiam mi an ni.

source: And in the lowlands of Moab by Jordan at Jericho, the Lord said to Moses,
target: Tin, Jeriko zawn, Jordan kam Moab phaiah chuan LALPAN Mosia a bia a,

source: And Ophir and Havilah and Jobab; all these were the sons of Joktan.
target: Ophira te, Havila te, Jobaba te a nei a: chûng zawng zawng chu Joktana fapate an ni.

source: Lifting up a horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David,
target: A chhiahhlawh Davida chhungte zingah chuan Chhandamna ropui tak min siamsak a;

source: You have put our evil doings before you, our secret sins in the light of your face.
target: Kan khawlohnate chu i hmaah i dah a, Kan sual zep rukte chu i hmêl engah i dah ta a.

source: But if you have not that punishment of which we all have our part, then you are not true sons, but children of shame.
target: Fa zawng zawng hlawh thin thununna chu hlawh lova in awm erawh chuan fa tak ni lovin, sawn in ni a ni ang asin.

source: And Edom will become a cause of wonder: everyone who goes by will be overcome with wonder, and make sounds of fear at all her punishments.
target: Tin, Edom chu mak tih huai huai a lo ni ang a, mi veivak apiangin mak an ti ang a, a chhiat nasat vang chuan an chek khum ang.

source: And Aaron did so; he put the lights in their places so that they gave light in front of the support, as the Lord gave orders to Moses.
target: Tin, Arona chuan chutiang chuan a ti a; LALPAN Mosia thu apêk ang chuan khawnvardahna hma lamah chuan khawnvarte chu a chhi a.

source: Don't be careless
target: Fimkhur lo mai suh

source: What are you guys looking for?
target: Eng nge in zawn?

source: A time for undoing and a time for stitching; a time for keeping quiet and a time for talk;
target: Tihthlêr hun a awm a, thui hun a awm; Ngawih hun a awm a, tawng hun a awm;

source: And every soul who does not give attention to that prophet, will be cut off from among the people.
target: tin, mi tupawh, chu zawlnei thu chu ngaihthlaksak lo apiang mi zing ata tihboral daih an ni ang,’ a tih kha.

source: And there went out to him all the people of Judaea, and all those of Jerusalem, and they were given baptism by him in the river Jordan, saying that they were sinners.
target: Tin, Judai rama mi zawng zawng leh Jerusalem khuaa mi zawng zawngte an chhuak a, a hnen lamah an kal a, an sualte thupha chawiin Jordan luiah chuan a hnenah baptisma an chang ta hlawm a.

source: And it came about in those days, that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee, and was given baptism by John in the Jordan.
target: Tin, chung niahte chuan heti hi a lo ni a, Isua chu Galili rama nazaret khua atangin a lo kal a, Jordan luiah chuan johana hnenah baptisma a chang ta a.

source: We are men
target: Mipa kan ni

source: They have already begun
target: An tan tawh a ni

source: They swam.
target: An hleuh.

source: You're fired
target: Ban i ni

source: Hello again
target: Chibai nawn leh

source: So we went on with the work: and half of them had spears in their hands from the dawn of the morning till the stars were seen.
target: Chutiang chuan hna chu kan thawk a; tin, a zatve chuan khawring chah atnaign arsi lan thlengin feite chu an kawl reng a.

source: Let your mouth be open, judging rightly, and give right decisions in the cause of the poor and those in need.
target: I ka ang la, fel takin ro rel la, Mi rethei leh renchhamte chungah ro rel rawh.

source: Out of its place comes the storm-wind, and the cold out of its store-houses.
target: Chhim lam pindan ata thli chhia a lo thawk a, hmâr lam ata khaw vawt.

source: But every year you make a request to me to let a prisoner go free at the Passover. Is it your desire that I let the King of the Jews go free?
target: Nimahsela Kalhlen Kutah mi pakhat ka chhuahsak tur che u dan in nei; chutichuan Judate lal hi chhuahsak che u ila in duh em? a ti a.

source: King Solomon made an offering of twenty-two thousand oxen, and a hundred and twenty thousand sheep. So the king and all the people kept the feast of the opening of the house of God.
target: Lal Solomona chuan inthawina bâwngpa singhnih leh sânghnih leh berâm nuaikhat leh singhnih a hlân a. Chutiang chuan lal leh mipuite chuan Pathian in chu an hlân a.

source: And he made three hundred smaller body-covers of hammered gold, with three pounds of gold in every cover: and the king put them in the house of the Woods of Lebanon.
target: Tin, rangkachak den phekin phaw zathum a siam a; phaw pakhatah rangkachak maneh thum a duh a: chung chu lal chuan Lebanon ngawpui inah a dah a.

source: Did you get tickets?
target: Ticket i hmu em?

source: And someone said to him, Your mother and your brothers are outside desiring to see you.
target: Tin, I nu leh i unaute nangmah hmuh tumin pawnah sawn an ding reng e, tiin an hrilh a.

source: But when his heart was lifted up and his spirit became hard with pride, he was put down from his place as king, and they took his glory from him:
target: Mahse a thinlung a lo dâk sâng a, a rilru a lo sak a, chapo takin a che ta a; a lal țhutthleng ata tihtlâwm a ni a, a ropuina chu an lâksak ta a;

source: Now when Jesus had come into the parts of Caesarea Philippi, he said, questioning his disciples, Who do men say that the Son of man is?
target: Tin, Isua chu Philipa Kaisari bial chu a lo thlen chuan a zirtirte hnenah Miten Mihring Fapa hi tunge a ni an tih? tiin a zawt a.

source: The father of the upright man will be glad, and he who has a wise child will have joy because of him.
target: Mi fel pa chu nasa takin a hlim ang a. Fa fing hringtu chuan a chungah lawmna a nei ang.

source: By the orders of the Lord they gave him the town for which he made request, Timnath-serah in the hill-country of Ephraim: there, after building the town, he made his living-place.
target: LALPA thupêk angin Ephraim tlâng rama a khawpui dil Timnath-sera khua ngei chu an pe a: tin, khawpui chu a siam a, chutah chuan a awm ta a.

source: I've paid already.
target: Ka pe tawh a.

source: Are you still married
target: Nupui i la nei em

source: So there went after Abishai, Joab and the Cherethites and the Pelethites and all the fighting-men; they went out of Jerusalem to overtake Sheba, the son of Bichri.
target: Tichuan Joaba-ho te, Keret mi te, Pelet mite leh an mi chak zawng zawngte chuan amah an zui chhuak ta a: Jerusalem atang chuan Bikria fapa Seba um tûr chuan anchuak ta a.

source: Be kind to one another with a brother's love, putting others before yourselves in honour;
target: Unaute hmangaih kawngah chuan hmangaih takin inlainat tawn theuh rawh u; chawimawi kawngah chuan induhsak tawn theuh ula;

source: Forgive Tom
target: Tom ngaidam rawh

source: Now the first agreement had its rules of worship, and a holy order.
target: Tin, thuthlung hmasa pawh khan Pathian rawngbawl dante leh a hmun thianghlim, he khawvela hmun thianghlim chu a nei a.

source: I succeeded
target: Ka hlawhtling ta

source: Get to bed
target: Khumah kal rawh

source: Is not life more than food, and the body than its clothing?
target: Ei tur aiin nunna a thupui zawk a ni, silhfen ai pawhin taksa a thupui zawk a ni.

source: Give ear, you who are far off, to what I have done: see my power, you who are near.
target: Hla taka awmte u, ka thiltih hi bengin lo hre rawh u, hnaitea awmte u, ka thiltihtheihzia hi hre rawh u.

source: But Absalom said nothing to his brother Amnon, good or bad: for he was full of hate for him, because he had taken his sister Tamar by force.
target: Tin, Absaloma chuan Amnona hnênah a chhia a tha, a engmah a sawi duh lo va; Absaloma chuan a farnu Tamari a tihluih avângin Amnona chu a haw hle a ni.

source: Get a job
target: Hna zawng rawh

source: So, brothers, we are not children of the servant-woman, but of the free woman.
target: Chutichuan, unaute u, bawihnu laka fate kan ni lo va, bawih lonu laka fate kan ni zawk.

source: All the flocks of Kedar will come together to you, the sheep of Nebaioth will be ready for your need; they will be pleasing offerings on my altar, and my house of prayer will be beautiful.
target: Kedar-ho ran rual zawng i hnênah an lo kal khâwm ang a, Nebai-otha-ho berâmpate chuan i rawng an bâwl ang: ka maichâmah chuan lawmin an chho vang a, ka ropuinain chu ka chawimawi ang.

source: Because they went against the words of God, and gave no thought to the laws of the Most High:
target: Pathian thu chungahte an hel a, Chungnungbera remruat chu an ngaihnepa vnagin:

source: Are you angry
target: I thinrim em

source: The Lord is your keeper; the Lord is your shade on your right hand.
target: LALPA chu nangmah vengtu ani a: LALPA chu i ding lama hliahtu che a ni.

source: I'm not in a good mood.
target: Ka mood a tha lo.

source: I promise I will.
target: Ka tiam a ni.

source: Here's the form.
target: Heta hi form chu.

source: The cords of evil-doers are round me; but I have kept in mind your law.
target: Mi suaksualho hruaihrualte chuan mi zem hlawm reng a; Nimahsela i dan chu ka theihnghilh lo.

source: The only effect of pride is fighting; but wisdom is with the quiet in spirit.
target: Chapona chuan inhauna mai a tichhuak a, Thununna tha mi hnênah erawh chuan fina a awm.

source: Hey, relax
target: Hei, hahdam rawh

source: Tom isn't in
target: Tom a lo lût lo

source: You made valleys for fountains and springs; you made the ever-flowing rivers dry.
target: Nang chuantuihna leh tui lian chu i sah huk a: Nang chuan lui lian tak takte i tikang a.

source: My soul has kept your unchanging word; great is my love for it.
target: Ka nunna hian i thuhriattirte chu a zawm thin a; Ka ngaina êm êm a ni.

source: We might die.
target: Kan thi ngei tur.

source: If to others I am not an Apostle, at least I am one to you: for the fact that you are Christians is the sign that I am an Apostle.
target: Mi dangte tan tirhkoh ni mah suh ila, nangni tan tal zawng ka ni; Lalpaa ka tirhkoh nih chhinchhiahna chu nangmahni hi in ni asin.

source: Truly you are great, O Lord God: there is no one like you and no other God but you, as is clear from everything which has come to our ears.
target: Chuvang chuan aw LALPA Pathian, nang chu i ropui a ni; kan benga kan hriat danin nangmah ang rêng rêng an awm lo va, nangmah lo chu Pathian rêng rêng an awm hek lo.

source: And we came to Jerusalem and were there for three days.
target: Tin, Jerusalem chu kan han thleng a, chuah chuan ni thum kan hahchawl a.

source: Is that real?
target: A tak tak a ni em?

source: Salma, the father of Beth-lehem, Hareph, the father of Beth-gader.
target: tin, Beth-lehem-ho thlahtu Salma, tin, Beth-gader-ho thlahtu Harepha te hi.

source: Let's play
target: Infiam ila

source: The Lord puts the upright and the sinner to the test, but he has hate in his soul for the lover of violent acts.
target: LALPA chuan mi fel chu a fiah thin a: Mi suaksual leh nunrawnna ngaina erawh chu a nunnain a haw thin.

source: And sheepskins coloured red, and leather, and hard wood;
target: tin, berâmpa vun chhum sen te, savun tha chi vun te, thingri thing te;

source: Still the priests of the high places never came up to the altar of the Lord in Jerusalem; but they took their food of unleavened bread among their brothers.
target: Hmun sâng puithiamte chu Jerusalem-a LALPA maichâmah an han chho ve lo na a, an unaute zingah chhang dawidim telh loh erawh chu an ei ve thin.

source: For all this they went on sinning even more, and had no faith in his great wonders.
target: Chuti chung pawhin a chungah thil an lo tisual ta cheu va, A thilmak tihte chu an ring chang lo.

source: They already got married
target: An innei tawh a

source: Rivers of water are flowing from my eyes, because men do not keep your law.
target: Ka mittui hi lui tui angin a luang thla a, I dan an zamw loh avângin. TZADE

source: By a soft answer wrath is turned away, but a bitter word is a cause of angry feelings.
target: Chhânna nemin thinur a tikiang thin a, Tawng huatthlala erawh chuan thinur a chawk tho thin.

source: A day of sounding the horn and the war-cry against the walled towns and the high towers.
target: Kulha hung khawpuite chungah leh khaw kil kulh sângte chungah chuan tawtawrâwt leh ralbei thâwm rîkna nî a ni a.

source: I can't watch
target: Ka en thei lo

source: But you are holy, O you who are seated among the praises of Israel.
target: Nimahsela, aw nang Israel-ho faknaa cheng htin, Nang zang i thianghlim a ni.

source: We're models
target: Entawn tur kan ni

source: Whoever does not take up his cross and come after me may not be my disciple.
target: Tupawh mahni kraws pua mi zui lo apiang chu ka zirtir a ni thei lo vang.

source: And news of them came to the ears of the church at Jerusalem: and they sent Barnabas as far as Antioch:
target: Tin, an chanchin thu chu Jerusalem khuaa kohhran awmte bengah chuan a lo lut ta a: chutichuan Antiokei khaw thleng chuan Barnaba chu a tir chhuak ta a.

source: Do you like China
target: China hi i duh em

source: And all the kings of Zimri, and all the kings of Elam, and all the kings of the Medes;
target: Zimri lal zawng zawng te; Elam lal zawng zawng te; Media lal zawng zawng te;

source: Are you sure, Tom?
target: I chiang em, Tom?

source: We weren't hungry
target: Kan ril a tam lo

source: I'm very hot
target: Ka sa lûtuk

source: Yes, I'm sure.
target: Aw, ti tak tak.

source: I will give an offering of praise to you, and make my prayer in the name of the Lord.
target: Lawmthu sawi inthawinate chu ka hlan ang chia, LALPA hming chu ka lam ang.

source: They gave help everyone to his neighbour; and everyone said to his brother, Take heart!
target: Mi tinin mahni thiante an țanpui a; mi tinin an unaute hnênah, Thlamuang takin rawm rawh, an ti țheuh va.

source: Do your own thing.
target: Mahni tih tur ti rawh.

source: As the apple-tree among the trees of the wood, so is my loved one among the sons. I took my rest under his shade with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste.
target: Ngaw hnuai thing zingaapple thing ang Ka duhtak chu a ni, tlangvâlte zingah. A hlimah chuan ka thu, nuam takin, A rah chu ka tan a thlum ngei e.

source: And they said, Have the words of the Lord been given to Moses only? have they not come to us? And the Lord took note of it.
target: Anni chuan, Mosia hnenah chauh hian em ni LALPAN thu a sawi bik: Keini hnenah pawh hian a sawi ve lo em ni? an ti a. Chu chu LALPAN a lo hria a.

source: My flesh was made by you, and my parts joined together in my mother's body.
target: Nangmah ngeiin ka rilru i nei a: Ka nu pum chhûngah mi khuh a.

source: I like clocks
target: Sana ka duh

source: We love it
target: Kan hmangaih e

source: I'll pay anything.
target: Engpawh ka pe ang.

source: And looking in, he saw the linen bands on the earth; but he did not go in,
target: Tin, a kun a, a bih a, puan zai sinte chu awm rengin a hmu a; nimahsela a chhungah a lut lo.

source: And for the house he made windows, with network across.
target: Tin, in atân chuan tukverh zimte thil kawkalh awmin a siam a.

source: I'm eating fruit
target: Thlai ka ei a ni

source: I am being guided.
target: Ka kaihhruai mek a ni.

source: And Hiram made the pots and spades and the basins. So Hiram came to the end of all the work he did for King Solomon in the house of the Lord:
target: Tin, Hirama chu insilna bel te, vut lawhna te, maihûnte a siam a. Chutichuan Hirama chuan LALPA in atân Solomona a siamsak zawng zawng chu a peih ta vek a:

source: For in him all the wealth of God's being has a living form,
target: Amahah chuan Pathian famkimna tinreng chu taksa neiin a awm reng si a.

source: Cyrus he sends for.
target: Kura a tir a.

source: You didn't feel dizzy.
target: I lu a na lo.

source: But now his position as priest is higher. because through him God has made a better agreement with man, based on the giving of better things.
target: Tunah erawh chuan thuthlung tha lehzual palai a nih angzia zelin rawngbawl hna tha zawk a lo chang ta, chu thuthlung chu thutiam tha zawk chungahte siam a ni.

source: And Heman and Jeduthun had horns and brass instruments sounding loudly, and instruments of music for the songs of God; and the sons of Jeduthun were to be at the door.
target: Hemana leh Jeduthuna te chu tawtawrâwt te, darbenthek te leh thil tum chi dangte ruala tum tûr kawltu an ni a. Jeduthuan leh a fate chu kawngkhâr vêngtu tûr an ni.

source: I've eaten
target: Ka ei tawh

source: And keep in that same house, taking what food and drink they give you: for the worker has a right to his reward. Do not go from house to house.
target: Chu mi in hlirah chuan awm reng ula, an pek apiang che u eiin bar ang che u; hnathawktu chu hlawh hmu tlak a ni a. In tinah kal lawr suh ang che u.

source: Then at the end of forty days and forty nights the Lord gave me those stones, the stones of the agreement.
target: Tin, ni sawmli leh zan sawmli hnuah chuan heti hi a ni a, lungphêk pahnih, thuthlunna lungphêk chu mi pe a.

source: You're cooperating
target: I thawhpui a ni

source: Let it be far from me! I will certainly not say that you are right! I will come to death before I give up my righteousness.
target: Thiam ka chantir dawn teuh lo mei che u, Ka thih thlengin ka dikna ka dah bo lo vang.

source: She tried a coat on
target: Coat a ha a tum a

source: See, I will have your arm cut off, and will put waste on your faces, even the waste from your feasts; and you will be taken away with it.
target: Ngai teh u, nangmahni vângin in chite chu ka zilhhau va, In hmaiahte chuan êk ka tât pherh ang. In kûtna êk ngei chu; Chu mi nên chuan lâk bo in ni ang.

source: So the traders in all sorts of goods took their night's rest outside Jerusalem once or twice.
target: Chutichuan sumdawng mite leh bungraw tinreng zuar mite chu vawi khat emaw, vawi hnih emaw chu Jerusalem pawn lamah an riak a.

source: They love us
target: Min hmangaih vek

source: He was honoured over the thirty, but he was not equal to the first three: and David put him over his servants.
target: Ngai teh u, mi sawmthumte ai chuan chawimawi tlak a ni a, pathum hmasate zingah erawh chuan a tel lo; tin, Davida chuan a vengtu pâwl hotuah a dah a.

source: Would you care to try?
target: I tum dawn em ni?

source: We're poor
target: Kan rethei

source: You can stop.
target: I tâwp thei ang.

source: For Israel is uncontrolled, like a cow which may not be controlled; now will the Lord give them food like a lamb in a wide place.
target: Bâwngla luhlul ang maiin Israel ho an luhlul a; Tûnah chuan LALPAN berâm no angin phûlah ka châwm thei ang em?

source: By faith he was a wanderer in the land of the agreement, as in a strange land, living in tents with Isaac and Jacob, who had a part with him in the same heritage:
target: Rinnain ram tiamah khan mi rama cham ang maiin a lo cham ta reng a, thutiam hmuhkhat a rochunpui tur Isaaka leh Jakobate nen chuan puan inahte an awm a;

source: We're not against it.
target: Kan dodal lo.

source: And four rings for the four angles of this network, to take the rods.
target: Tin, zawnfungte rawlh nan dar len hungna kil lia vuah tur khang pali a chhûng a.

source: And if you will not let them go, see, I will send frogs into every part of your land:
target: Tin, i chhuahtîr phal loh zawngin, ngai teh, i ram chin zawng zawng hi chunguin ka hrem ang:

source: He who goes after righteousness and mercy will get life, righteousness, and honour.
target: Felna leh zahngaihna zuitute chuan Nuna te, felna te, chawimawinate an hmu ang.

source: I smelled it
target: Ka hnim fuh

source: I doubt it.
target: Ka ringhlel.

source: You are shining and full of glory, more than the eternal mountains.
target: Nang chu i ropuiin i va nasa êm, râllâk sum dah khawmna tlângah chuan.

source: And they are to take the cow into a valley where there is flowing water, and which is not ploughed or planted, and there the neck of the cow is to be broken:
target: tin, chu khaw upate chuan bawng la chu tui luanna, lei la leh loh leh engmah la chin lohna ruamahan kai chhuk ang a, ruamah chuan bawng la ring chu an tan ang a;

source: Let his heart be changed from that of a man, and the heart of a beast be given to him; and let seven times go by him.
target: a rilru chu mihring rilru ațanga tihdanglam nise, a hnênah ramsa rilru pêk ni rawh se: a chungah hun sarih ral rawh se.

source: And news of these things went through Pharaoh's house, and it was said that Joseph's brothers were come; and it seemed good to Pharaoh and his servants.
target: Tin, Josefa unaute an lo kal, tih thu thang chu Pharaoa inah chuan an lo hre ta a: chu chuan Pharaoa leh a chhiahhlawhte chu a tilâwm hle a.

source: But you have put the poor man to shame. Are not the men of wealth rulers over you? do they not take you by force before their judges?
target: Nangni zawngin mi rethei chu in timualpho ta zawk a ni. Mi hausate chu a tiduhdahtu che u leh rorelna ina hnuk lut thintu che u chu an ni lawm ni?

source: Don't drink anything else.
target: Thil dang in suh.

source: Or are you not conscious that your body is a house for the Holy Spirit which is in you, and which has been given to you by God? and you are not the owners of yourselves;
target: A nih leh, in taksa chu,in chhunga awm Pathian hnen atanga in hmuh Thlarau Thianghlim in a ni tih in hre lo em ni le? Mahni ta pawh in ni lo va,

source: The arrow is not able to put him to flight: stones are no more to him than dry stems.
target: Thalin a titlânchhe lo va, A lakah chuan virvawmte chu pâwl bul ang lek a ni.

source: Happy are they whose decisions are upright, and he who does righteousness at all times.
target: rorêlna vawng thate chu an eng a thawl e, Englai pawha fel taka titu nên.

source: And Moses took off Aaron's robes, and put them on Eleazar, his son; and there on the top of the mountain death came to Aaron: then Moses and Eleazar came down from the mountain.
target: Tichuan Mosia chuan Arona chu a silhfente a hlihsak a, Eleazara a bel a: tin, Arona chu tlâng chhipah chuan a thi ta a; tin, Mosia leh Eleazara chu tlâng ata chu an chhuk a.

source: We're not worried.
target: Kan buai lo.

source: Then all the tribes of Israel came to David in Hebron and said, Truly, we are your bone and your flesh.
target: Chutichuan Israel chi zawng zawng chu Hebron-a Davida hnênah an lo kal a, Ngai teh, i thisen zawmpui kan ni a,

source: You are rude
target: I hawihhawmlo

source: And Gideon went up by the way used by the people living in tents on the east of Nobah and Jogbehah, and made an attack on the army when they had no thought of danger.
target: Tin, Gideona chu Noba leh Jogbeha chhak lama puan ina chenghote kawngah a han chho va, sipaihote chu a han bei a; sipaihote chu ralmuang takin an lo awm si a.

source: I serious lo a ni
target: You aren't serious

source: Then the high priest, violently parting his robes, said, He has said evil against God: what more need have we of witnesses? for now his words against God have come to your ears:
target: Tin, Puithiam Lalber chuan a silhfente a pawt thler a, Pathian a sawichhe ta; hretu dang engah nge kan ngaih tawh ang? Ngai teh u, Pathian a sawichhiatzia chu tunah in hre tawh e.

source: He made walled towns in Judah, for the land was quiet and there were no wars in those years, because the Lord had given him rest.
target: Tin, Judai rama chuan kulh nei khuate a siam a; ram chu ralmuangin a awm a, LALPAN ralmuanna a pêk avângin chung kum chuan tumah do a nei lo.

source: How delicious!
target: A va han tui hmêl!

source: He cheated me at cards
target: Card-ah min bum a

source: And with reason; for we have the right reward of our acts, but this man has done nothing wrong.
target: Keini zawng hremzia reng kan ni; kan thiltih man chauh hmu kan nih hi; he mi hi zawngin engmah a tisual si lo, a ti a.

source: The grass becomes dry, the flower is dead; because the breath of the Lord goes over it: truly the people is grass.
target: LALPA thaw chuan a chhem avângin hlobet chu a vuai a, a pâr chu a chuai țhin: mite chu hlobet ang an ni ngei mai a.

source: Give me a gun
target: Silai mi pe rawh

source: He took them and sent them over the stream with all he had.
target: Tichuan anni chu a hruai a, lui chu a kaitîr a, a neih zawng zawng pawh a kaitîr bawk a.

source: I felt cold
target: Vawt ka ti

source: And there was in their Synagogue a man with an unclean spirit; and he gave a cry,
target: Tin, an inkhawmna inah chuan ramhuai bawlhhlawh pai mi pakhat a lo awm a;

source: Was I supposed to sing?
target: Ka zai tur em ni?

source: Did you see this man?
target: He pa hi i hmu em?

source: It was just an observation.
target: Enfiahna mai a ni.

source: With his lips the hater makes things seem what they are not, but deceit is stored up inside him;
target: Mi huat hmang a kain a thup a, A thinlungah erawh chuan bumna a vawng thin;

source: It's amazing
target: A ropui e

source: They missed a lot
target: An miss nasa hle

source: Take twelve men from the people, a man for every tribe,
target: Mipuite zinga mi hi mi sâwm leh pahnih, hnam tina mi pakhat zel thlang chhuak langin

source: The crowns on the tops of the pillars were ornamented with a design of flowers, and were four cubits across.
target: Tin, hulhliap chhipa bawkah chuan lili lem hi a chuang a, tawng li.

source: He who makes use of tongues may do good to himself; but he who gives the prophet's word does good to the church.
target: Tawng hriat lohva thusawi chuan mahni chauh a insiam tha thin, thu hriltu erawh chuan kohhranho a siam tha zawk thin.

source: Sami was fucking
target: Sami chu a fuh a

source: At that time David had taken cover in the strong place, and an armed force of the Philistines was in Beth-lehem.
target: Chutih lai chuan Davida chu kulhbingah a awm a, tin, Philistia sipaiho chu Bethlehem-ah an awm a.

source: He is foolish
target: Khapa kha a mâwl

source: I like fruit
target: Thei ka duh

source: Let the high praises of God be in their mouths, and a two-edged sword in their hands;
target: Pathian chawimawia fakna chu an kaah awm sela, Khandaih hriam tawn an kutah awm bawk rawh se;

source: I took it
target: Ka la e

source: I'm very sad
target: Ka lungngai lutuk

source: He who makes a hole in the earth will himself go falling into it: and on him by whom a stone is rolled the stone will come back again.
target: Khuarkhurum lai apiang chu, a chhûngah chuan an tla ang a, Tupawh lung lum chu ama chungah a lo lum let leh ang.

source: Oh please!
target: Awi khawngaihin!

source: He shall be fired
target: Amah chu ban a ni ang

source: OK, enough already!
target: OK, a tawk tawh!

source: Still, to go on in the flesh is more necessary because of you.
target: Nimahsela, nangmahni avangin tisaa awm reng hi a tul zawk a ni.

source: Who built it?
target: Tu siam nge?

source: And from there they went by ship to Antioch, where they had been handed over to the grace of God for the work which they had not done.
target: chuta tang chuan lawngin an chhuak a, Antiokei khua chu an lo thleng leh ta a, chu chu an thil tih zawh tak chu ti tura unauten Pathian khawngaihna kawltira an chhuahna kha a ni.

source: And all flesh will see that I the Lord have taken my sword out of its cover: and it will never go back.
target: Tin, mi zawng zawngin, kei LALPA hian ka khandaih a pai ata ka phawi a ni tih an hria ang a, a inkhung leh tawh ngai lo vang.

source: For he of whom these things are said comes of another tribe, of which no man has ever made offerings at the altar.
target: Heng a thu an sawia hi hnam hrang mi a ni si a, chu mi hnam zinga mi chu tumah maichamah chuan an che ngai lo.

source: They aren't doctors
target: Doctor an ni lo

source: The second day they went all round the town once, and then went back to their tents: and so they did for six days.
target: Tin, a ni hnih ni chuan khawpui chu vawi khat an han vel chhuak elh a, riahhmunah chuan an kir leh a: chutiang chuan ni ruk an ti a.

source: From the Market
target: Bazar atangin

source: What bit you
target: Eng in nge seh che

source: I respect you.
target: Ka zah che.

source: From Aroer on the edge of the valley of the Arnon as far as Mount Sion, which is Hermon,
target: Arnon ruam fema Aroer ațanga Sion tlâng Hermon an ti bawk thleng leh

source: The eyes of all men are waiting for you; and you give them their food in its time.
target: I thil siam zawng zawng mitte chuan an nghak thin che a ni; Nangin a hun takah an chaw i pe thin.

source: I'm truthful
target: Ka dik hle

source: I help him
target: Amah ka ṭanpui

source: Are you insulting me?
target: Min hmusit em ni?

source: He is a man of the world.
target: Khawvel mi a ni.

source: O come, let us make songs to the Lord; sending up glad voices to the Rock of our salvation.
target: Aw lo kal rawh u, LALPA chawimawiin hlim takin i zai ang u: Kan inchhandamna lungpui chawimawiin hlim takin i au ang u.

source: No problem!
target: Buaina awm lo!

source: Hanging our instruments of music on the trees by the waterside.
target: Lui laia tuipuisuthlahahte chuan Kan tingtangte chu kan bâng thin a.

source: It's not up to us
target: Keimahni thu a ni lo

source: A quiet mind is the life of the body, but envy is a disease in the bones.
target: Rilru dam chu tisa nuna a ni a, Itsikna erawh chu ruh mawihna a ni.

source: Go ahead and start
target: Hma la la tan rawh

source: I'll be late
target: Ka rawn tlai ang

source: And putting over it the leather cover and over that a blue cloth; and putting its rods in place.
target: chu chu savun tha miin an khuh ang a, chu chu puan dum pâwlin an khuh ang a, a zawnfung an vuah tur a ni.

source: Let the hand of death come on them suddenly, and let them go down living into the underworld; because evil is in their houses and in their hearts.
target: Thihna an chungah lo thleng thut sela, Khuarkhurumah chuan a nung chungin chhuk rawh se: Suahsualnate chu an awmnaah leh an kawchhûngahte a awm si a.

source: But in the first year of Cyrus, king of Babylon, Cyrus the king gave an order for the building of this house of God;
target: Nimahsela Babulon lal Kura lal tirh kumin, lal Kura chuan he mi Pathian in hi sak that leh thu a pe a.

source: For the Lord is a lover of righteousness, and takes care of his saints; they will be kept safe for ever; but the seed of the evil-doers will be cut off.
target: LALPA chuan rorêlna fel a ngaina si a, A mi thianghlimte chu a kalsan ngai lo; Kumkhua atân vawn thatin an awm a: Mi suaksual thlahte erawh chu tihboralin an awm ang.

source: And Solomon said to God, Great was your mercy to David my father, and you have made me king in his place.
target: Tin, Solomona Pathian hnênah, Ka pa Davida hnênah khan khawngaihna nasa tak i lantir a, a aiawhin lalah mi lo siam ta a.

source: The Lord kept faith with the house of Israel about all the good which he said he would do for them, and all his words came true.
target: LALPAN Israela chhûngte hnena a tha lam thu a lo sawi zawng zawng kha thlawn reng reng a awm lo va, a lo thleng vek a ni.

source: Tom rested
target: Tom a chawl

source: He is poor.
target: A rethei.

source: See, the people who are in you are women; the doorways of your land are wide open to your attackers: the locks of your doors have been burned away in the fire.
target: Ngai teh,i chhûnga i mipuite chu hmeichhia an ni a; i hmêlma te tân i ram kawngka chu a in hawng huai a: i in kalhna thîr tlâwnte chu meiin a kâng ral a ni.

source: It's new.
target: A thar a nia.

source: Stop lying
target: Dawt sawi suh

source: We met on Monday.
target: Monday khan kan inhmu a.

source: For him in whose heart is the fear of the Lord there is strong hope: and his children will have a safe place.
target: LALPA tihnaah chuan rina chak tak a awm a, A fate chuan inhumhimna hmun an nei ang.

source: As well as Hamath, which is by its limit, and Tyre and Zidon, because they are very wise.
target: Chumi rîtu Hamah khaw chungah pawh; Tuira leh sidon pawh, an fin êm avângin.

source: I am self-catering
target: Ka self-catering a ni

source: I am hungry
target: Ka ril a ṭam a ni

source: But even to this day the Lord has not given you a mind open to knowledge, or seeing eyes or hearing ears.
target: nimahsela LALPAN vawiin thleng hian hriat thiamna thinlung te, hmuh theihna mit te, hriat theihna bengte a la pe lo che u a ni.

source: When I made the cloud its robe, and put thick clouds as bands round it,
target: A silhfen atân chhum ka siam a, A tuam puanah thim chhah tak;

source: Let go of me!
target: Ka hnên aṭangin kalbo rawh!

source: They'll bring her
target: An rawn hruai ang

source: Take your servant's interests into your keeping; let me not be crushed by the men of pride.
target: I chhiahhlawh chungchang thu-ah, a thatna tûrin a bul tum la: Chapoten mi hnehchhiah suh se.

source: Do you plan on moving?
target: Insawn i tum em?

source: A man may be acting as if he had wealth, but have nothing; another may seem poor, but have great wealth.
target: Hausaa ingnai engmah nei lo an awm a, Retheia inngai hausa hle si an awm.

source: What did you like about it
target: Eng nge i duh ber

source: But truly, as I am living, and as all the earth will be full of the glory of the Lord;
target: amaherawhchu ka nunna leh LALPA ropuina tihkhah leilung chhâlin ka sawi e,

source: Start here
target: Hetah tan rawh

source: Did you want something
target: Thil i duh em

source: You are the sons of the prophets, and of the agreement which God made with your fathers, saying to Abraham, Through your seed a blessing will come on all the families of the earth.
target: Nangni hi zawlneite leh thuthlung fate in ni asin; Pathianin Abrahama hnenah, ‘I thlah avangin khawvela hnam tin an thawveng ang,’ tiin in thlahtute hnenah a tiam kha.

source: No, it's good.
target: Chhe lo ve, a ṭha.

source: I don't think so.
target: Ka ngai lo.

source: Strength is in his neck, and fear goes dancing before him.
target: A nghawngah chakna a awm a, A hmaah tihbaiawmna a tualchai reng a.

source: He took the wrong bus
target: Bus dik lo a la a

source: I haven't attempted it yet.
target: Ka la tum lo.

source: And over the tribes of Israel: the ruler of the Reubenites was Eliezer, the son of Zichri; of the Simeonites, Shephatiah, the son of Maacah;
target: Chung lo pawhchu, Israel hnamo chunga Reuben-hote zingah chuan Zikria fapa Eliezera rorêltu a ni a; Simeon-ho zingah Maaka fapa Sephatia;

source: She's your friend.
target: I ṭhian a ni.

source: I will not keep quiet about the parts of his body, or about his power, and the strength of his frame.
target: A fuke thu-ah ka ngawi reng lo vang a, A thahrui chakzia leh a taksa inphur tawkziaahte pawh.

source: I needed rest
target: Ka chawlh a ngai

source: And that will be my salvation, for an evil-doer would not come before him,
target: Hei hi ka chhandamna ani a, A hmaah Pathian hre lo mi an lo kal dawn loh hi.

source: What smells funky?
target: Eng nge funky rim?

source: Or does it seem to you that it is for nothing that the holy Writings say, The spirit which God put into our hearts has a strong desire for us?
target: A nih loh leh, Thlarau keimahnia a chentir chuan thik khawp hialin min duh a ni, tih hi, Pathian Lehkha Thuin engmah lovin sawiin in ring em ni?

source: She will be punished.
target: Hrem a ni ang.

source: And David went on fighting them from evening till the evening of the day after; and not one of them got away but only four hundred young men who went in flight on camels.
target: Tichuan Davida chuan ni tlak atanga a tuk tlai lam thlengin a bei ta a, tlangvâl zali sanghawngsei chunga chuanga tlanchehote chau lo chu tumah dama chhuak rêng rêng an awm lo va.

source: Then the Jews put this question to him: What sign of authority have you to give us, seeing that you do these things?
target: Chutichuan Judaten a hnenah, Heng thil i tih hi chhinchhiahna engnge min hmuhtir theih? an ti a, an chhang a.

source: We all went to sleep.
target: Kan mu vek a.

source: Not all of them are present
target: An awm vek lo

source: His children are hoping that the poor will be kind to them, and his hands give back his wealth.
target: A faten mi hretheite khawngaihna an dil ang a, A kutin a sum leh pai chu a theh kir ang.

source: Do you eat a lot of fish?
target: Nga i ei tam em?

source: If his children are increased, it is for the sword; and his offspring have not enough bread.
target: A fate an pun chuan khandaih tuar tûr fang an ni; A rila rahten chaw kham khawp pawh an nei lo vang.

source: They never get old
target: An tar ngai lo

source: How long, O Lord, will your ears be shut to my voice? I make an outcry to you about violent behaviour, but you do not send salvation.
target: Aw LALPA, eng chen nge ka au vang a, Min ngaihthlâk loh vang? Inpâwngnêkna thu I hnênah ka au chhuahpui a, Nangin i chhanhim si lo va.

source: Tom is unconvinced
target: Tom chu a ring lo
