source: Let all my heart be given to your orders, so that I may not be put to shame.
target: Ka mualpho lohna tûrin Ka thinlung hi i thuruatahte chuan tha famkimin awm rawh se. KAPH

source: Does he drink coffee?
target: Coffee a in em?

source: And it was now about the sixth hour; and all the land was dark till the ninth hour;
target: Tin, chawfak hun lai a lo ni a, chumi achin behliang mun hun thlengin khawvel a lo thim ta vek a,

source: For the rod of sinners will not be resting on the heritage of the upright; so that the upright may not put out their hands to evil.
target: Suahsualna laltiang chu mi fel ram chan chhûngah chuan a innghat dawn si lo; Mi felte chuan an kuttea khawlohna an ban loh nân.

source: It's so loud
target: A ring lûtuk

source: He let me go.
target: Mi kaltir alawm.

source: They won't take it away
target: An la bo dawn lo

source: And at Mount Hor, at the edge of the land of Edom, the Lord said to Moses and Aaron,
target: Tin, LALPAN Mosia leh Arona chu, Edom ram dep Hor tlângah chuan abia a,

source: But I undergo all things for the saints, so that they may have salvation in Christ Jesus with eternal glory.
target: Chuvangin, Krista Isuaa awm chhandamna chu chatuana ropuina nen an hmuh ve theihna turin, Thlante avang chuan engkim ka tuar thin.

source: Then Hezekiah put questions to the priests and Levites about the store of goods.
target: Chutichuan Hezekian an thil dah khâwm chungchang thu chu puithiamho leh Levi-hote chu a zâwt a.

source: Does it contain sugar?
target: Sugar a pai em?

source: Why do you keep far away, O Lord? why are you not to be seen in times of trouble?
target: Aw LALPA, engati nge hla taka i din thin le: Engati nge mangan laitea i inthup thin le?

source: We were so afraid
target: Kan hlau lutuk

source: I admire Tom
target: Tom ka lawm

source: And they put the ark of the Lord on the cart and the chest with the gold images.
target: Tin, LALPA bâwm chu tawlailirah chuan an dah a, rangkachak chaichim lem leh ngawt lem dahna thingrem nen.

source: And Saul, desiring directions from God, said, Am I to go down after the Philistines? will you give them up into the hands of Israel? But he gave him no answer that day.
target: Tin, Saula chuan Pathian a rawn a, Philistia mite chu ka zuk bei ang em? Israel-ho kutah i pe ang em? a tia . Nimahsela chu mi ni chuan a chhang lo va.

source: You didn't call me.
target: Min rawn call lo.

source: How suddenly are they wasted! fears are the cause of their destruction.
target: Engtizia nge mitkhapkar chauhva an tiau tak ni aw! Thil rapthlak taktea tihboral daihin an awm ta a nih hi.

source: So Obadiah went to Ahab and gave him the news; and Ahab went to see Elijah.
target: Chutichuan Obadia chu Ahaba be tûrin a kal a, a va hrilh ta a: tin, Ahaba chu Elija hmuh tumin a kal ta a.

source: But you are turned out of the way; you have made the law hard for numbers of people; you have made the agreement of Levi of no value, says the Lord of armies.
target: Nangni erawh zawng kawng ata chu in lo pêng ta a; Dânah chuan mi tam tak in petektîr a; Levia thuthlung chu in tichhia a ni, Sipaihote LALPA chuan a ti.

source: And he is cutting down the thick places of the wood with an axe, and Lebanon with its tall trees is coming down.
target: Thirin ramhnuai thing bik takte chu a kit ang a, Lebanin sidar thingte chu mi ropi kihin a tlu dur dur ang.

source: I prepaid
target: Ka pelawk

source: Was it difficult to make?
target: Siam a harsa em?

source: I made that
target: Ka siam a nih kha

source: And even now the axe is put to the root of the trees; every tree then which does not give good fruit is cut down, and put into the fire.
target: Tun apangin thing bul tinah hreipui an dah tah; chutichuan thing tin rah thaa rah lo aiang an kit a, meiah an paih thin.

source: I might win.
target: Ka chak mai thei.

source: Did you eat too much?
target: I ei tam em ni?

source: And if they have been prisoned in chains, and taken in cords of trouble,
target: Kawl bun an lo nih a, Hnehchhiahna hruia phuar an lo nih chuan,

source: Having put an end to the handwriting of the law which was against us, taking it out of the way by nailing it to his cross;
target: batna lehkha thupeka ziak, kan chunga awm, min dodal thina chu a thai bo tawh si a: chu ngei chu kraws-a khengbetin a la kiang ta a,

source: Because the knowledge of God may be seen in them, God having made it clear to them.
target: Pathianin a hriattir tawh avangin Pathian chanchin hriat tur mi chu an rilruah hriattirin a awm si a.

source: I'm in pain every day.
target: Nitin ka na a.

source: For your servants take pleasure in her stones, looking with love on her dust.
target: I chhiahhlawhte chuan a lungte chu an ngainain, A vaivut pawh an khawngaih si a.

source: Oh I'm very sorry
target: Aw a va pawi m

source: I cheated.
target: Ka bum.

source: Can I keep it?
target: Ka nei thei ang em?

source: Sing with us
target: Min zaipui rawh u

source: Ice was rained down on their cattle; thunderstorms sent destruction among the flocks.
target: An rante pawh chu rial a pe a, An ran rualte chu tek sa tak a pe bawk a.

source: You don't follow the rules.
target: Dan i zawm lo.

source: All the sons of Perez living in Jerusalem were four hundred and sixty-eight men of good position.
target: Pereza thlah, Jerusalem-a awm zawng zawngte chu mi huaisen 468 an ni.

source: For you have taken these men, who are not doing damage to the holy place or talking against our goddess.
target: Heng mi, heta in rawn hruaite hi, biak in suamhmangte an ni hek lo, kan pathiannu sawichhetu lah an ni hek lo.

source: You have made the people see hard times; you have given us the wine of shaking for our drink.
target: I mite hi thil khirh takte i tawhtir a: Paina uain chu min intir ta a.

source: I am married
target: Pawmlai nei ka nia

source: As is the sin-offering, so is the offering for wrongdoing; there is one law for them: the priest who makes the offering to take away sin, he is to have it.
target: Bawhchhiat thawina chu sual thawina ang bawk a ni a, dan khat a ni: chu mia inremna siamtu puithiam chuan, chu chu a nei tur a ni.

source: She doesn't like to work.
target: Hnathawh a duh lo.

source: The prince who has no sense is a cruel ruler; but he who has no desire to get profit for himself will have long life.
target: Thil ngaih dan thiam lo hotu chu mi hnechhiahtu a ni thin a, Awhna hawtu erawh chuan a dam chhûng a tisei ang.

source: civil war
target: tualchhung indona

source: Now the spirit of the Lord had gone from Saul, and an evil spirit from the Lord was troubling him.
target: Tin, LALPA thlarau chuan Saula chu a chhuahsan a, LALPA tirh ramhuaiin amah a tibuai a.

source: You are rich
target: I hausa

source: And on the servants and the servant-girls in those days I will send my spirit.
target: chung niahte chuan ka bawihpate, ka bawihnute chungah pawh ka thlarau ka leih ang a.

source: Keep this in mind, O Lord, that your haters have said cruel things, and that your name has been looked down on by a people of evil behaviour.
target: Aw LALPA, hei hi hre reng ang che, dotu chuan a sawichhiat chia, Hnam â tak chuan i hming a sawichhiat kha.

source: How long are you staying
target: Eng chen nge i awm

source: At the people's request he sent birds, and gave them the bread of heaven for food.
target: An dil a, tichuan vahmim a rawn hruai a, Van chawin anmahni a titlai ta a.

source: Nothing was taken
target: Engmah lak a ni lo

source: Is it a deer
target: Sakhi a ni em

source: The lion, which is strongest among beasts, not turning from his way for any;
target: Sakeibaknei chu ram sa zingah a chak ber a, Engmahin a tilet zo lo va.

source: They stared at each other
target: An in en reng a

source: And as I had not enough knowledge for the discussion of these things, I made the suggestion to him to go to Jerusalem and be judged there.
target: Tin, keiin chung thute chu ngaihtuah ngaihna reng ka hre lo va, Jerusalem khuaa kala khita a chung thu chu relsak a duh leh duh loh ka zawt a.

source: Are they busy?
target: An buai em?

source: Who's he?
target: Amah hi tunge?

source: But now it has come on you and it is a weariness to you; you are touched by it and your mind is troubled.
target: Tunah i chungah a lo thleng ve ta a, i chau va, A han khawih chia, i buai ta a ni.

source: His haters were turned back by his blows and shamed for ever.
target: Amah dotute chu a vaw kir a, Kumkhaw hming chhiatna a hlawhtir ta a.

source: Are there not enough unbalanced men about me, that you have let this person come and do such tricks before me? is such a man to come into my house?
target: Mi â ka tlakchham vangin em ni he mi hi a âtzia tilang tûra ka hmaa in rawn hruai ni? He mi hi ka inah a lo lut tehlul ang maw? a ti a.

source: For Job has said, I am upright, and it is God who has taken away my right;
target: Joba, 'Fel zawng ka fel a ni, Pathianin ka thiamna mi hnawlsakin,

source: Egypt is a fair young cow; but a biting insect has come on her out of the north.
target: Aigupta chu bawgla nalh tak a ni, Mahse hmâr ata ei chhetu tûr lo thawkin a lo kal e.

source: You understand me
target: Min hrethiam a ni

source: Tom was mentioned
target: Tom-a sawi a ni

source: I'll give them a hand.
target: Kut ka pe ang.

source: She is upset
target: A lungawi lo

source: And when a man or a woman has a disease on the head, or in the hair of the chin,
target: Tin, hmeichhia emaw, mipa emawin a luah emaw, a khabe hmul laiah emaw hri a vei chuan

source: For first of all, it has come to my ears that when you come together in the church, there are divisions among you, and I take the statement to be true in part.
target: A hmasa berin, kohhranhova in inkhawmin in zingah inthenna a awm thin tih mi sawi ka hre si a; rin pawh ka ring deuh bawk a ni.

source: There is no need to talk about it.
target: Sawi a ngai lo.

source: They have said in their hearts, Let us put an end to them all together; they have given over to the fire all God's places of worship in the land.
target: An rilruah chuan, I tichhe vek hlawm ang u, an ti a: He rama Pathian inkhawmna in zawng zawng hi an hal chhe zo ta a.

source: I'm sad.
target: Ka lungngai.

source: We're home
target: Inah kan awm

source: It was worse
target: A chhe zawk

source: I'm not asking for much.
target: Ka dil tam lo.

source: He who is holy will see that you are holy; but to the man whose way is not straight you will be a hard judge.
target: Mi thianghlim lakah chuan thianghlimin i intilang ang a; Tin, mi luhlul lakah chuan luhlulin i intilang ang.

source: For I have a very great care for you: because you have been married by me to one husband, and it is my desire to give you completely holy to Christ.
target: Pathian thiknain asin ka thik che u ni; Krista hnenah chuan nula thianghlim angin ka pek theihna tur che uin, pasal pakhat ka hualsak si che u a.

source: And whoever makes himself high will be made low, and whoever makes himself low will be made high.
target: Tupawh inngaihlu apiang an tlawm ang a, tupawh inngaitlawm apiang chawimawiin an awm ang.

source: And while he was in the waste land of Paran, his mother got him a wife from the land of Egypt.
target: Paran thlalêrah chuan a awm a; tin, a nu chuan Aigupta ram ata nupui a neihsak a.

source: The Lord will not let the upright be in need of food, but he puts far from him the desire of the evil-doers.
target: LALPA chuan mi fel nunna chu riltam a phal lo vang a, Mi suaksualte duhthusam erawh chu a paih bosak thin a.

source: That's not enough
target: Chu chu a tâwk lo

source: I'm not ugly
target: Ka hmêlchhe lo

source: Is it time?
target: A hun tawh em?

source: But give thought to the days after you had seen the light, when you went through a great war of troubles;
target: Nimahsela, hmana tihena in awm hnua tuarna buai nasa tak in tuar lai nite kha hre leh rawh u;

source: And all their wealth and all their little ones and their wives; everything in their houses they took and made them waste.
target: an sum zawng zawng leh an fanau tê tête leh an nupuite zawng zawng in chhûnga awm apiangte chu an man a, an rawk bawk a.

source: Here you all are, you children of Israel; give now your suggestions about what is to be done.
target: Nangni Israel thlahte u, in vai hian ngai teh u, in ngaihdan leh in remtih dan chu sawi rawh u khai, a ti a.

source: What is the Ruler of all, that we may give him worship? and what profit is it to us to make prayer to him?
target: Engkimtitheia chu eng nge a nih, a rawng kan bawlna tûr chu, A hnênah kan tawngtaiin hlawkna eng nge kan hmuh ang? an ti a.

source: But he took his people out like sheep, guiding them in the waste land like a flock.
target: Nimahsela ama mite chu berâm angin a hruai chhuak a, Ran rual angin thlalêrah khan a hruai a.

source: Do you want water?
target: Tui i duh em?

source: And having done so, she said, I will get water for your camels till they have had enough.
target: Tin, a intîr hnuin, I sanghâwngseite tân pawh an in kham hma loh chun ka chawi zêl ang e, a ti a.

source: Don't close me off.
target: Min khar suh.

source: And your hearts are turned again to the Lord your God, and you give ear to his word which I give you today, you and your children, with all your heart and with all your soul:
target: LALPA in Pathian lam in hawi leh a, tuna thu ke pêk che u ang hian nangni leh in fate nen in thinlung zawng zawng leh in rilru zawng zawnga a awka in zawm hunah chuan,

source: And Israel and the Philistines had put their forces in position, army against army.
target: Tin, Israel-ho leh Philistia mite chu inbei tûrin an lo inzar a, sipai leh sipai chu an lo inep a.

source: So Ahab sent for all the children of Israel, and got the prophets together at Mount Carmel.
target: Chutichuan Ahaban Israel thlahteho zawng zawng hnênah mi a tir a, zâwlneihote chu Karmel tlânga chuan a ko khâwm a.

source: We're shaken
target: Tihnghîn kan ni

source: If I did wrong in the cause of my man-servant, or my woman-servant, when they went to law with me;
target: Ka chhiahhlawhnu emaw, ka chhiahhlawhpa emaw, Ka chunga an vuivaina thu thlen ka ngaihsak loh luih chuan,

source: Did they all eat the same thing
target: An ei vek em ni

source: And Abiathar, one of the sons of Ahimelech, the son of Ahitub, got away and went in flight after David;
target: Tin, Ahituba fapa Ahimeleka fapate zinga pakhat, a hming Abiathara chu a tlan chhuak a, Davida hnênah a tlan a.

source: I still have time.
target: Hun ka la nei.

source: If I say, My foot is slipping; your mercy, O Lord, is my support.
target: Ka ke a tleu ve, ka tih kha, Aw LALPA, i ngilneihna chuan mi kai a.

source: I hated it.
target: Ka hua.

source: Have all the workers of evil no knowledge? they take my people for food as they would take bread; they make no prayer to the Lord.
target: Thil tisualtute zawng zawng chuan hriatna rêng rêng an ei lo vem ni? Chhâng an ei angin ka mite an ei zo vek thin a, LALPA lah an ko ngai hek lo.

source: Just ask Tom.
target: Tom-a zawt rawh.

source: I remembered Mary
target: Mary ka hrechhuak leh ta

source: I don't want you to enjoy it.
target: I hlim ka duh lo.

source: Men do not have a low opinion of a thief who takes food when he is in need of it:
target: Miin a riltam tihreh nana ruk a ruk chuan an hmusit thin lo va;

source: You decorated the hall.
target: Hall chu i chei a.

source: I'm wise.
target: Ka fing.

source: So I made an ark of hard wood, and had two stones cut like the others, and went up the mountain with the stones in my hands.
target: Tichuan thingri thingin bawm ka siam a, hmana mi ang lungphêk pahnih ka chher a, lungphêk pahnih chu kengin tlângah chuan ka chho va.

source: Eight cubits; and its uprights, two cubits; the covered way of the doorway was inside.
target: A bangpêngte chu tawnghnih țheuh a ni a, kawngka sumhmun chu inpui lamah a ni.

source: I have been a hater of the band of wrongdoers, and I will not be seated among sinners.
target: Thil tha lo titute inkhâwmho chu ka hua a, Mi sualsuakte hnênah ka thu lo vang.

source: By you my sorrow is turned into dancing; you have taken away my clothing of grief, and given me robes of joy;
target: Ka mitthi ngaihna chu ka tan lamnaah i chantir a; Ka saiip puan chu mi hlihsak a, hlimnain ka taiah mi hreng ta a:

source: They say that you are wise.
target: I fing an ti a.

source: Will you even make my right of no value? will you say that I am wrong in order to make clear that you are right?
target: Ka thurelte mi sutsak dawn êm ni? Thiam i chan theih nân, Thiam loh mi chantir dawn êm ni?

source: Who wants to party?
target: Tu nge party duh?

source: This again I have seen under the sun as wisdom and it seemed great to me.
target: Ni hnuaiah chuan hetiang fina hi ka hmu bawk a, ka tan ropui hlein a lang.

source: And in this way, doing evil to the brothers, and causing trouble to those whose faith is feeble, you are sinning against Christ.
target: Unaute chunga chutiang thil in tihsual a, an chhia leh tha hriatna chu a chak loh nak alaia in hliam hlauh hian, Krista chungah thil tisual in ni.

source: I'm your girlfriend
target: I bialnu ka ni

source: And Zacharias was troubled when he saw him, and fear came on him.
target: Tin, Zakarian a hmuh veleh a mangang a, hlauh pawh a hlau va.

source: Will you be looking for him to come back, and get in your seed to the crushing-floor?
target: I buhte i hruih zawla rawn dah khâwm tûrin I ring mai thei êm ni?

source: Here is my Father's glory, in that you give much fruit and so are my true disciples.
target: He mi avangin ka Pa chu chawimawiin a awm thin, tam taka in rah hian; chutichuan ka zirtirte in ni ang.

source: For Mordecai was great in the king's house, and word of him went out through every part of the kingdom: for the man Mordecai became greater and greater.
target: Mordekaia chu lal ina mi ropui tak a ni a, a hming chu an ram then zawng zawngah a thang ta bawk a; Mordekaia chu a ropui ta deuh deuh a ni.

source: You can sing a song.
target: Hla i sa thei ang.

source: Let there be a place outside the tent-circle to which you may go;
target: Tin, riahhmun pawn lama hmun in ruat ang a, chutah chuan in kal thin tur a ni;

source: How have the great ones been made low in the fight! Jonathan is dead on your high places.
target: Indo lai taka mi liante an lo tluk tak mai chu! In hmun sângahte Jonathana an that ta.

source: All the nails used for the House and the open space round it were of brass.
target: Tin, biak bûk leh a kawtlai chhung chung kilhbehna zawng zawngte chu dar vek a ni.

source: The Lord will do to them as he did to Sihon and to Og, the kings of the Amorites, and to their land, whom he put to destruction.
target: Tin, LALPAN Amor-ho lal te, Sihona leh Oga leh an ram chunga a tih ang khan an chungah a ti ang; anni chu a tiboral a nih kha.

source: And no property will be handed from one tribe to another, but every tribe of the children of Israel will keep its heritage.
target: Chutichuan ram chu hnam dang dang hnenah sawn sawn a ni dawn lo nia. Israelathlahte chuan anmahni ram țheuh chu an chang reng tur nai si a, tiin.

source: And God, looking on the light, saw that it was good: and God made a division between the light and the dark,
target: Tin, Pathianin êng chu a en a, tha a ti hle a: tichuan Pathianin êng leh thim chu a then ta a.

source: Did you learn anything
target: Thil i zir ve em

source: Show me a sample
target: A entirna min hmuh tir rawh

source: For I gave to you first of all what was handed down to me, how Christ underwent death for our sins, as it says in the Writings;
target: A hmasa berin ka hmuh ve bawk chu ka hrilh chhawn che u kha; khatia, Krista chu Pathian Lehkha thu ang zela kan sualte avanga a thih a,

source: I was always a loner.
target: Ka loner fo thin.

source: I've never fainted before.
target: Ka faint ngai lo.

source: But if the disease in his skin becomes worse after he has been made clean,
target: Amaherawhchu pupangliah chu a inthenfai hnua vuna a tai darh zau chuan,

source: Then Judah took Gaza and its limit, and Ashkelon and its limit, and Ekron and its limit.
target: Tin, Juda chuan Gaza khua a ram chin nen, Askelon khua a ram chin nen, Ekron khua a ram chin nen a la bawk a.

source: We don't trust you.
target: Kan ring lo che.

source: They're quite sharp
target: An sharp khawp mai

source: The Lord your God has given you increase, and now you are like the stars of heaven in number.
target: LALPA in Pathian chuan a tipung che u a, ngai teh u, tunah hian in tam lam chu vana arsi zat zet in lo ni ta a.

source: I don't get sick very often.
target: Ka damlo vak lo.

source: We ate
target: Kan ei tawh

source: You have sent my friends far away from me; you have made me a disgusting thing in their eyes: I am shut up, and not able to come out.
target: Ka hmêlhriatte chu mi hlatah i awmtir a; An tana tenawm takah mi siam ta a: Kharkhipin ka awm a, ka chhuak thei lo a ni.

source: For I have become like a wine-skin black with smoke; but I still keep the memory of your rules.
target: Meikhu ur savun peng ang chu ka lo ni ta si a; Nimahsela i thuruatte chu ka theihnghilh lo ve.

source: I started talking
target: Ka sawi tan a

source: I come quickly: keep that which you have, so that no one may take your crown.
target: Ka lo kal thuai dawn e; tuman i lallukhum chu an laksak loh nan che i thil neih sa kha vawng tlat rawh.

source: Are you bored?
target: I ning em?

source: This doesn't sound right.
target: Hei hi a dik lo.

source: I'm hopping a ride.
target: Ride ka hop a.

source: He hit me by mistake.
target: Min vuak palh a.

source: They should be scared
target: An hlau tur a ni

source: The family of Levi by themselves, and their wives by themselves; the family of Shimei by themselves, and their wives by themselves;
target: Levia thlah chhûngkua ahrangin, an nupuite ahrangin; Simeia chhûngte a hrangin, an nupuite ahrangin;

source: Not that anyone has ever seen the Father; only he who is from God, he has seen the Father.
target: Tumahin Pa an hmu ngai ka ti lo, Pathian hnena lo chhuaka chauh lo chuan; ani chuan Pa chu a hmu.

source: Drinking wine in basins, rubbing themselves with the best oils; but they have no grief for the destruction of Joseph.
target: berhbu liana uain in a, hriak tha bera in hnawihte chu; nimahsela Josefho hreawmna avângin an lungngai lo.

source: You may not take an oath by your head, because you are not able to make one hair white or black.
target: I lu chhalin i chham tur a ni hek lo, pakhat pawh i tivarin, i tidum thei si lo va.

source: I will not be played.
target: Ka khel dawn lo.

source: But they have not all given ear to the good news. For Isaiah says, Lord, who has had faith in our word?
target: Nimahsela Chanchin Tha chu an za chuan an awih vek lo. Isaian, Lalpa, kan thusawi tuin nge ring? a ti si a.

source: They had seven hundred and thirty-six horses, two hundred and forty-five transport beasts;
target: An sakawr chu 736 a ni a; an sabengtung lian chi chu 245 ani a;

source: I'm pregnant
target: Ka râi mêk

source: But for all this, her false sister Judah has not come back to me with all her heart, but with deceit, says the Lord.
target: Chuti chung pawhin a laizawnnu, bumhmang Juda chu thinlung taka lo kir lovin a der maiin a lo kir a, tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: O Lord, quickly be my saviour; so we will make my songs to corded instruments all the days of our lives in the house of the Lord.
target: LALPA chu mi chhandam tûrin a peih reng a ni. Chuvangin ka dam chhûng zawng zawngin, LALPA inah chuan, Ka hlate hi tintangte nên ka sa ang.

source: Let it be enough for such a man to have undergone the punishment which the church put on him;
target: Chutiang mi tan chuan mi tam takin an hrem chu a tawk tawh a ni.

source: Get married already!
target: Innei tawh rawh!

source: I'm a hard worker.
target: Taima tak ka ni.

source: He lives in the town
target: Khawpuiah a awm a

source: Is there anything to drink
target: In tur a awm em

source: Do not say evil of a servant to his master, or he will put a curse on you, and you will get into trouble.
target: Chhiahhlawh chu a pu hnênah rel suh, Anchia a lawh ang chia, Thiam loh i hlawh dah ang e.

source: The weight of all these vessels was not measured, because there was such a number of them; it was not possible to get the weight of the brass.
target: Tin, Solomona chuan chung bungbêl zawng zawngte chu a tam êm êm avângin buk chhuah lohvin a dah mai a: dar buk zat chu hriat chhuah rual a ni lo.

source: Elam the fifth, Jehohanan the sixth, Eliehoenai the seventh.
target: a dawt lehtu chu Elama, a dawt lehtu chu Jehohanana, a dawt lehtu chu Eliehoenaia a ni.

source: My behaviour was as if it had been my friend or my brother: I was bent low in grief like one whose mother is dead.
target: Unau tan emaw thian tan emaw ni awm takin: Lusun ang maia kunin ka vei ka vei a, Mahni nu sun ang maiin.

source: I didn't sign anything.
target: Engmah ka sign lo.

source: We don't want to tip them off.
target: Kan tip duh lo.

source: And his disciples said in answer, How will it be possible to get enough bread for these men here in a waste place?
target: Tin, a zirtirte chuan, Miin heta thlalerah hian khawia chhangin nge hengho hi an tihtlai theih ang? tiin amah an chhang a.

source: I could not finish it.
target: Ka zo thei lo.

source: Then he said to Balak, Take your place here by your burned offering, while I go over there to the Lord.
target: Tin, Balaka hnenah chuan, Saw laia LALPA ka va biak hlanin i halral thilhlan bulah hian lo ding reng rawh, a ti a.

source: But every man's servant, whom he has got for money, may take of it, when he has had circumcision.
target: amaherawhchu miin a chhiahhlawh, tangkaa a lei tawhate chu a serh i tansak tawh phawt chuan a ei ve thei ang.

source: So he gave that place the name Beer-sheba, because there the two of them had given their oaths.
target: Chu mi avâng chuan chu mi hmun chu Beer-seba a vuah a; chutah chuan an pahniha chhia an chham dun avângin.

source: I'm not ashamed of that.
target: Chu chu ka zak lo.

source: For they go against you with evil designs, and your haters make sport of your name.
target: Anni chuan sual takin an sawichhe si chia, Nangmah dotute chuan i hming chu an sawi nawmnah thin.

source: By his side was Jedaiah, the son of Harumaph, opposite his house. And by him was Hattush, the son of Hashabneiah.
target: Tin, anni dawt chu Harumapha fapa Jedaian a in zawn a siam tha a. Tin, a dawt chu Hasabneia fapa Hatusan a siam tha a.

source: We're about to start.
target: Kan tan dawn ta.

source: I want a fan
target: Hmaizap ka duh

source: I am such an idiot
target: Chutiang idiot chu ka ni

source: They huddled together
target: An inhmukhawm a

source: And he was preaching in the Synagogue without fear. But Priscilla and Aquila, hearing his words, took him in, and gave him fuller teaching about the way of God.
target: Tin, inkhawmna inah huai takin thu a sawi tan ta a. Chutichuan Priskili leh Akuila chuan a thusawi an hriatin an inah an hruai a, a hnenah Pathian Kawng thu fel lehzualin an hrilhfiah ta a.

source: We heard Tom
target: Tom kan hria

source: This is the rule for the Levites: those of twenty-five years old and over are to go in and do the work of the Tent of meeting;
target: Levi-hote chanpual chu heng hi a ni: kum sawmhnih leh kum nga chin hung lam chuan inbiakna puan ina rawngbawl hna an bei ang a:

source: Go in flight, get away with your lives, and let your faces be turned to Aroer in the Arabah.
target: Tlan bo ula, in nun humhim rawh u, Thlalêr ram sabengtung angin awm rawh u.

source: Let not your face be veiled from me in the day of my trouble; give ear to me, and let my cry be answered quickly.
target: Ka mangan niah ka lakah hian i hmai thup suh la: Ka lamah hian i beng rawn dawh la; Ka koh hun che chuan mi chhâng thuai ang che.

source: They considered it
target: An ngaihtuah a

source: I am conscious that you are Abraham's seed; but you have a desire to put me to death because my word has no place in you.
target: Abrahama thlahte in ni tih ka hria e; ni mah ula, mi thah in tum si, ka thuin in rilrua awmna a neih loh avangin.

source: Let not the foot of pride come against me, or the hand of the evil-doers put me out of my place.
target: Chapo ke chu mi bei tûrin ka lamah pen suh sela. Mi suaksual kut pawhin mi hnawt bo suh se.

source: And King Solomon sent Benaiah, the son of Jehoiada, and he made an attack on him and put him to death.
target: Chutichuan lal Solomona chuan Jehoiada fapa Benaia chu a tir a ani chuan a va bei a, a that ta a.

source: Then Annas sent him chained to Caiaphas, the high priest.
target: Tin, Ana chuan phuar chungin Puithiam Lalber Kaiapha hnenah a tir a.

source: She bade farewell to me.
target: Min thlah a.

source: Tom lost.
target: Tom-a a bo.

source: They won't let her in
target: An luh tir dawn lo

source: I didn't feel like calling you.
target: Ka ko duh lo che.

source: By me the heavens are clothed with black, and I make haircloth their robe.
target: van khi thimin ka tuam țhin a, saiip puan a khuhna tûrin ka siam țhin, tiin.

source: And there came before them Elijah with Moses, and they were talking with Jesus.
target: Tin, Elija leh Mosia chu an hnenah an rawn inlar a, Isua nen an inbe ho va.

source: Where am I to get flesh to give to all this people? For they are weeping to me and saying, Give us flesh for our food.
target: Heng mipui zawng zawng pêk tur hi khawia ta nge sa ka neih ang? Kan ei atana sa mi pe tawh, tia rapin mi bei sei a.

source: See, even the moon is not bright, and the stars are not clean in his eyes:
target: Ngai teh, thla meuh pawh khian enna a nei nem, Arsite pawh a mithmuhah chuan a thianghlim lo.

source: It was now two days before the feast of the Passover and the unleavened bread: and the chief priests and the scribes made designs how they might take him by deceit and put him to death:
target: Tin, ni hnih chinah chuan Kalhlen Kut leh Chhang Dawidim telh loh Kut a awm dawn a; puithiam lalte leh lehkhaziaktute chuan amah chu ngamthlema man a, an tihhlum theihna turzia an zawng an zawng a;

source: Tom enlisted
target: Tom a tel

source: He kept me waiting
target: Min nghak reng a

source: We'll attend
target: Kan tel ang

source: It amazed me
target: Mak mi tih tîr

source: Let us in
target: Kan lo lut

source: At that time Deborah and Barak, the son of Abinoam, made this song, saying:
target: Chutichuan Debori leh Abinoama fapa Baraka chuan chu mi ni chuan,

source: And if word comes to you, in one of the towns which the Lord your God is giving you for your resting-place,
target: LALPA in Pathianin in awmna tura a pêk che u in khaw pakhatah chuan

source: The cat is drinking
target: Ui chu a in a

source: Where were you when I put the earth on its base? Say, if you have knowledge.
target: Leilung nghahchhan ka phûm lai khan khawiah nge i awm? I hriat thiam chuan sawi rawh.

source: He is just an amateur
target: Amateur mai a ni

source: It is good for me to have been through trouble; so that I might come to the knowledge of your rules.
target: I thuruatte chu ka zir theih nana Tihhreawma ka lo awm kha ka tan a tha a ni.

source: Have met Sangi
target: Sangi chu i hmu tawh reng em

source: And by some, that Elijah had come; and by others, that one of the old prophets had come back to life.
target: thenkhatin, Elija a lo inlar ta a nih hi, an tih avangin a mangang ta a.

source: How much are you looking for?
target: Engzat nge i zawn?

source: We're not burning anything.
target: Engmah kan hal lo.

source: You're intelligent
target: I fing a ni

source: I've hired a lawyer.
target: Lawyer ka la a.

source: It is open
target: A inhawng a ni

source: We are free to do all things, but there are things which it is not wise to do. We are free to do all things, but not all things are for the common good.
target: Thil engkim tih a thiang a, nimahsela thil engkim tih a tha kher lo. Thil engkim tih a thiang a, nimahsela thil engkim tihin mi a siam tha lo.

source: I'm picking apples.
target: Apple ka pickup a.

source: The seventh Jesharelah, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi sarihna chu Jasarela chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: Let not their wrongdoing be covered or their sin washed away from before you: for they have made you angry before the builders.
target: an bawhchhiatna chu khuh suh la, an sualnate chu i hma ata thaibovin awmtir suh ang che; kulh siamtute hmaah an tihthinur che hi.

source: I haven't changed
target: Ka la danglam lo

source: I looked down
target: Ka hmusit

source: Don't push me.
target: Mi nek suh aw.

source: But the people of the land put to death all those who had taken part in the design against the king, and made Josiah his son king in his place.
target: Nimahsela chu mi rama mite chuan lal Amona phira rutu zawng zawngte chu an tihlum ta vek a; tichuan chu mi rama mite chuan a fapa Josia chu a aiawhin lalah an siam ta a,

source: For every boot of the man of war with his sounding step, and the clothing rolled in blood, will be for burning, food for the fire.
target: Indona hmuna mi râlthuama an inthuamna zawng zawngte leh an silhfen thisen kai hniang hnuangte chu hala tuah ral a la ni ang.

source: But if, while we were desiring to get righteousness through Christ, we ourselves were seen to be sinners, is Christ a servant of sin? In no way!
target: Kristaah thiam changa awm kan tum chung khan keini ngei pawh mi sual kan lo nih hlauh si chuan Krista chu sual rawngbawltu a lo ni em ni? Hnai lo ve.

source: I hate them
target: Khamite kha ka hua

source: It was funny
target: A nuihzatthlak e

source: Because of my brothers and friends, I will now say, Let peace be with you.
target: Ka unaute leh ka thiante avângin I chhûngah thlamuanna awm rawh se, ka ti ang.

source: Don't leave!
target: Kalsan suh!

source: Their bitter words have come to your ears, O Lord, and all their designs against me;
target: Aw LALPA, an mi sawichhiatna leh mi phiarna zawng zawngte chu i hria e.

source: Take care, then, to do whatever the Lord your God has given you orders to do; let there be no turning away to the right hand or to the left.
target: chuvangin LALPA in Pathianin thu a pêk che u anga ti turin fimkhur rawh u; dinglamah emaw, vei lamah emaw in peng tur a ni lo.

source: Do you want to go for a walk?
target: Kea kal i duh em?

source: Then they took the body of Jesus, folding linen about it with the spices, as is the way of the Jews when they put the dead to rest.
target: Tin, Isua ruang chu an la a, Judate inphum dan angin englo rimtuite nen chuan puan zai sinin an tuam a.

source: We put our lives in danger to get our bread, because of the sword of the waste land.
target: Nun chân hlauhawm khawpin kan chaw kan ei țhîn; Thlalêra khandaih avâng chuan.

source: She was busy
target: Khanu kha a buai

source: And the fireplace is four cubits high: and coming up from the fireplace are the horns, a cubit high.
target: A maichâm chung zawl chu tawng lia sâng a ni leh a, maichâm chung zawl ațang chuan ki pali a ding a.

source: I ate my sandwich.
target: Ka sandwich chu ka ei a.

source: My son, take honey, for it is good; and the flowing honey, which is sweet to your taste:
target: Ka fapa, khawizu in rawh, a tha si a, Khawithlâr i kaa tui tak chu.

source: I suddenly felt tired.
target: Ka chau thut mai.

source: He doesn't want to get married.
target: Inneih a duh lo.

source: He reeked of liquor.
target: Zu a rim a nam a.

source: And his head and his hair were white like wool, as white as snow; and his eyes were as a flame of fire;
target: Tin, a lu leh a sam chu beram hmul angin a var a, vur ang maiin; a mitte chu meialh ang a ni a;

source: And whoever gives honour to one such little child in my name, gives honour to me:
target: Tin, tupawh ka hming avanga hetiang naupang te pakhat lawm apiang chu keimah mi lawm an ni ang.

source: I miss you
target: Ka ngai che

source: And from the evil-doers their light is kept back, and the arm of pride is broken.
target: Mi suaksualte eng chu chhuhsak ani a, An ban lek san chu tihtliah a ni.

source: You've always hated me.
target: Min huat fo thin.

source: Mercy and good faith keep the king safe, and the seat of his power is based on upright acts.
target: Zahngaihna leh thutakin lal a vawng tha a, A thutthleng chu zahngaihnaa tundinin a awm.

source: Don't ask me for money.
target: Sum min dil suh.

source: You will be covered by his feathers; under his wings you will be safe: his good faith will be your salvation.
target: A thlain a khuh ang chia, A thla hnuaiah chuan i tlu lut ang; A thutak chu phawte leh phaw lian a ni.

source: You made a promise.
target: Thutiam i siam a.

source: My way is walled up by him so that I may not go by: he has made my roads dark.
target: Ka kawng dai atheu hnan a, ka pel thei lo, Ka kawngte chu thimin a khuh a ni.

source: You're drunk
target: I rui a nih kha

source: No exchange of land may be for ever, for the land is mine, and you are as my guests, living with me for a time.
target: Kumkhua atan chuan ram chu hralh hlen tur a ni lo, ram chu ka ta a ni si a: mikhual, ka hnena khawsa mai in ni si a.

source: So he took them into his house and gave the asses food; and after washing their feet they took food and drink.
target: Chutichuan a inah a hruai lut a, sabengtungte chu chaw ape a: tin, an kete an sil a, an eiin an in ta a.

source: Now the sons of the prophets said to Elisha, There is not room enough for us in the place where we are living under your care;
target: Tin, zâwlneiho fapae chuan Elisa heah, En teh hei, i bula kan thut khawmna hi kan tan a chep lutuk a.

source: Now, while they were on their way, he came to a certain town; and a woman named Martha took him into her house.
target: Tin, an zin pahin khaw engah emaw a lut a; tin, hmeichhe pakhat a hming Marthiin a lo thleng a.

source: I came out from the Father and have come into the world: again, I go away from the world and go to the Father.
target: Kei, Pa hnen ata lo chhuaka khawvela lo kal ka ni; khawvel kalsana Pa hnena hawng leh ur ka ni, a ti a.

source: It was night
target: Zân a nia

source: They were buying time.
target: Hun an lei a.

source: They didn't give up
target: An beidawng lo

source: Truly, I will not come into my house, or go to my bed,
target: Ka awmna inah ka lût hauh lo vang a, Ka khumah ka kai hek lo vang;

source: For the prophet as well as the priest is unclean; even in my house I have seen their evil-doing, says the Lord.
target: ka ruh zawng zawngte chu a khur a, Zu rui ang mai ka ni, Zuin a fan hneh mi ang mai hian, LALPA vang leh a thu thianghlim avângin.

source: Every winged thing which goes flat on the earth is unclean to you and may not be used as food.
target: Thla nei kea kal chi zawng zawng te chu in tan thil bawlhhlawh a ni a,

source: You'll make a mistake.
target: I tisual ang.

source: I do believe that.
target: Chu chu ka ring ve tho.

source: Don't say anymore!
target: Sawi tawh suh!

source: On him who has mercy you will have mercy; to the upright you will be upright;
target: Mi khawngaih thei tak lakah chuan khawngaih thei takin i intilang ang a; Mi tha famkim lakah chuan tha famkimin i intilang ang a;

source: I like tulips
target: Keptum ka ngaina

source: For it is God who is the cause of your desires and of your acts, for his good pleasure.
target: ama lawmzawng atana tih tum tur leh bei tura nangmahnia thawktu chu Pathian a ni si a.

source: I can't fly
target: Ka thlâwk thei lo

source: Don't be afraid to sing.
target: Hla sak hlau suh.

source: They never showed up
target: An inlan ngai lo

source: For they have been given to me from among the children of Israel; in place of every mother's first son, the first to come to birth in Israel, I have taken them for myself.
target: Israela thlahte zing ata ka puala ruat an ni si a; chhul keu zawng zawng Israela thlahte fa tir zawng zawng aiah ka pualah ka nei tawh a ni.

source: How have you given help to him who has no power! how have you been the salvation of the arm which has no strength!
target: Chakna nei lo mi chu i va han pui ve le! Thahrui nei lo ban chu i va han chhan ve le!

source: And the tongue is a fire; it is the power of evil placed in our bodies, making all the body unclean, putting the wheel of life on fire, and getting its fire from hell.
target: Tin, lei hi mei a ni; kan taksa pengte zinga khawlohna hlawm chu lei hi a ni; chu chuan taksa apumin a tibawlhhlawh a, pianpui tawlailir chu a tikang a, amah chu hremhmun tihkan a ni.

source: Look at that
target: Khami kha en teh

source: Those times when men had no knowledge were overlooked by God; but now he gives orders to all men in every place to undergo a change of heart:
target: Chutichuan Pathianin kan hriat loh laite a haider thin a; nimahsela tunah hian ram tina mi zawng zawng sim tur thu a pe ta a ni, ni a tiam avangin;

source: Then let them take a young ox and its meal offering, crushed grain mixed with oil, and take another ox for a sin-offering.
target: Tin, bawngpa tuai pakhat leh chhangphut thilhlan hriaka pâwlh chhangphut dip tak nen laktir la, tin, sual thawi nan bawngpa tuai pakhat dang i kai bawk tur a ni.

source: From everything given to you, let the best of it, the holy part of it, be offered as a lifted offering to the Lord.
target: In thil dawn zawng zawnga mi chu a țha ber, a thianghlim ber zel LALPA then thilhlanah in hlan tur a ni.

source: Whoever keeps a fig-tree will have its fruit; and the servant waiting on his master will be honoured.
target: Tupawh theipi kung nei chuan a rah a ei ang a, Tupawh a pu rawng bâwl chu chawimawi a ni ang.

source: Are you on a diet?
target: Diet i nei em?

source: By whom this poor body of ours will be changed into the image of the body of his glory, in the measure of the working by which he is able to put all things under himself.
target: Ani chuan a thawhin, engkim pawh ama thu thuin a awmtir thei, chu mi thawhzia ang zelin kan tlawm lai taksa hi, ama taksa ropui anga awm turin a siam tha leh ang.

source: I'm a waiter
target: A nghâktu ka nia

source: Skip it.
target: Kalkal rawh.

source: So they will put my name on the children of Israel, and I will give them my blessing.
target: chutianga ti chuan Israel thlahahte ka hming chuantir a ni ang a, tin, keiin anni chu mal ka sawm ang, tiin.

source: And they were all weeping, falling on Paul's neck and kissing him,
target: Tin, an za chuan an tap zawih zawih a, Paula chu pawmin an fawp ngawih ngawih a,

source: Ah, here's my room
target: A, hei le ka room

source: Come on home
target: Lo haw rawh

source: I didn't ask for you.
target: Ka dil lo che.

source: Are you a Christian
target: Kristian i ni em

source: The secret things are the Lord our God's: but the things which have been made clear are ours and our children's for ever, so that we may do all the words of this law.
target: Thil inthupte chu LALPA kan Pathian ta a ni a, thil tihlante erawh chu he dan thu zawng zawng hi kan zawm theih nan keini leh kan thlahte ta kumkhua tur a ni.

source: And there was a roof over the doorway and as far as the inner house, and to the outside and on the wall all round, inside and outside.
target: Kawngka lu chungte, pindan serh ber te leh pawnlam nên, bang zawng zawng chu a chhûng lam leh a pawnlam teh vekin.

source: Let's stay together.
target: I awm dun ang u.

source: I broke it.
target: Ka tikeh.

source: For as the heaven is high over the earth, so great is his mercy to his worshippers.
target: Van khi lei chung sâng taka awm angin, Amah tihtue chnga a ngilneihna chu a nasa a ni.

source: So that I may come to you in joy by the good pleasure of God, and have rest with you.
target: Pathian remtih anga hlim taka in hnena ka lo kal a, kan harh tlan theihna turin.

source: Again at Taberah and at Massah and at Kibroth-hattaavah you made the Lord angry.
target: Tin, Tabera-ah te, Masa-ah te, Kibrot-hatava-ahte pawh LALPA chu in tithinur a.

source: They want me
target: Min duh a ni

source: I like salmon.
target: Salmon ka ngaina.

source: But it is good to have an interest in a good cause at all times, and not only when I am present with you.
target: Thu tha lamah erawh chuan eng lai pawhin thahnemngai taka zawna awm fo hi a tha a ni, in hnena ka awm lai chauh ni lovin.

source: You can go
target: I kal thei

source: Say sharp words to the beast among the water-plants, the band of strong ones, with the lords of the peoples, put an end to the people whose delight is in war.
target: Sakawlh phairuang zinga cheng chu zilh la, Hnamdang, bawngchal leh bawng no rualte chu zilh la, Kuna an tangkate i hmaa na hlan hma chu; Indo chak mite chu tidarh rawh.

source: He was brave
target: A huaisen hle

source: Give me life in your mercy; so that I may be ruled by the unchanging word of your mouth.
target: I ngilneihna ang zelin mi tiharh ang che; Chutichuan i kaa thuhriattir chu ka zawm dawn nia. LAMED

source: Then let the ox be taken in front of the Tent of meeting: and let Aaron and his sons put their hands on its head.
target: Tin, in biakna puanin bulah bâwngpa i rawn la tur a ni: Arona leh a fapate chuan bawngpa luchuah chuan an kut lo nghat rawh se.

source: I'd rather go home.
target: Ka haw duh zawk.

source: You've been wonderful.
target: I ropui hle mai.

source: On the day of our king, the rulers made him ill with the heat of wine; his hand was stretched out with the men of pride.
target: Kan lalber nîah chuan mi liante chu uain rû takin an intirûi a; Ani chuan hmusittute rualin a kut a phar a.

source: He is drunk
target: Zu a rui

source: So that they all may be judged, who had no faith in what is true, but took pleasure in evil.
target: thutak awih lova fel lohnaa lawm zawkte chuan thiam loh an chan vek theih nan.

source: Did I do that?
target: Kha kha ka ti em ni?

source: They've already eaten
target: An ei tawh a

source: And you are to be holy to me; for I the Lord am holy and have made you separate from the nations, so that you may be my people.
target: Ka tana mi thianghlim in ni tur a ni; Kei LALPA hi ka thianghlim si a, ka ta in nihna turin hnam dangte lakah ka tihrang che u a ni.

source: Give me some more
target: Min pe leh teh

source: Is it money you want?
target: Pawisa i duh em?

source: They're also big.
target: An lian bawk a.

source: The eleventh Azarel, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi sâwm leh vawi khatna chu Azarela chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: No, those parts which seem to be feeble are the more necessary;
target: A ni, chutih ahnekin taksa peng chak awm lo zawnga langte hi an pawimawh zawk em em a ni;

source: But when the green stem came up and gave fruit, the evil plants were seen at the same time.
target: Tin, buh chu a lo to va, a lo vuih chuan, buh lem chu a lo lang ve ta a.

source: I'm not your type.
target: I type ka ni lo.

source: A cloud was stretched over them for a cover; and he sent fire to give light in the night.
target: Ani chuan hliahtu atân chhum a zamtir a, Zana en tûrin mei a pe bawk a.

source: It is almost 12 o'clock.
target: Dar 12 a ri tawh.

source: He is here!
target: Hetah a awm!

source: No doubt the story has come to your ears of what the kings of Assyria have done to all lands, putting them to the curse; and will you be kept safe?
target: Ngai teh, Assuria lalten ram zawng zawng tiche vekaa chunga an thiltihte kha i hria a; nang hi chhanhim i ni dâwn bik êm ni?

source: Jesus said these words in the place where the offerings were stored, while he was teaching in the Temple: but no man took him because his time was still to come.
target: Chung thu chu Pathian biak inah a zirtir pahin, thawhlawm dahna hmunah a sawi a; tuman amah an man si lo, a hun a la thlen loh avangin.

source: Do you need to go?
target: Kal a ngai em?

source: Hope put off is a weariness to the heart; but when what is desired comes, it is a tree of life.
target: Beiseina tihkhawtlai hian thinlung a tina a, Duhthusam lo thleng erawh chu nuna thing a ni.

source: If anyone comes to you not having this teaching, do not take him into your house or give him words of love:
target: Tupawh chu mi zirtirna thu chu rawn keng lovin, in hnenah lo kal sela, in inah thlentir suh ula, tawngkam tha pawhin thlah suh u;

source: He is not a virtuoso.
target: Virtuoso a ni lo.

source: A woman of Samaria came to get water, and Jesus said to her, Give me some water.
target: Tin, Samari hmeichhe pakhat tui chawiin a lo kal a. Isuan a hnenah, In tur mi pe rawh, a ti a.

source: So they went, and made safe the place where his body was, putting a stamp on the stone, and the watchmen were with them.
target: Chutichuan vengtu sipaite nen an va kal a, thlan chu an ven thattir a, lung chu an chhinchhiah a.

source: It's not fair to you.
target: I tan a fair lo.

source: The words of a wise man's mouth are sweet to all, but the lips of a foolish man are his destruction.
target: Mi fing kamchhuak thu zawng a hlu. Mi â hmui erawh chuan mahni a indawlh zo vang.

source: You made him a little lower than the angels; you gave him a crown of glory and honour, and made him ruler over all the works of your hands:
target: Ani chu vantirhkohte aia hnuaiin i siam rih a; Ropuina leh chawimawina i khumtir a, I kut chhuak chungahte chuan hotuah i siam bawk a;

source: Who having no more power of feeling, have given themselves up to evil passions, to do all unclean things with overmuch desire.
target: Chungte chuan inhriat chhuah theihna reng reng an neih tawh loh avangin, thil bawlhhlawh tinreng duham taka ti turin hurnaah an inpumpek ta a.

source: You look old
target: I upat hmêl

source: You're sharp
target: I thiam hle

source: The law of your mouth is better to me than thousands of gold and silver.
target: Rangkachak leh tangka sâng tam tak ai chuan I kaa dan chhuak chu ka tan a tha zawk e. JOD

source: Why do you go about so much for the purpose of changing your way? you will be shamed on account of Egypt, as you were shamed on account of Assyria.
target: I awm dân thlâk zung zungin, Engah nge i vahvêl țhin? Assuria i zahpui ang bawk khân, Aigupta pawh i la zahpui ang.

source: And he will give to the woman the bitter water for drink; and the bitter water causing the curse will go into her.
target: tin, hmeichhia chu anchhe thlentirtu tui kha chu aintir tur ani: tichuananchhe thlentirtu tui chu a kawchhûnga a lut ang a, a lo kha ang.

source: Who are these coming like a cloud, like a flight of doves to their windows?
target: Chhum anga thlawkte leh, thuro anmahni tukverh pana thlawk noh noh anga thlawkte saw tute nge ni?

source: It was funny
target: A nuihzatthlâk e

source: You're stuck
target: I tang

source: Ask them
target: Anmahni zawt rawh

source: You were supposed to wait.
target: I nghah tur a ni.

source: A thick stick is no better than a leaf of grass, and he makes sport of the onrush of the spear.
target: Talhtumte chu pâwl bul anga ngaih a ni a, Feitam vungte chu a nuihsan mai a ni.

source: As for you, O King, the thoughts which came to you on your bed were of what will come about after this: and the unveiler of secrets has made clear to you what is to come.
target: Aw lalber, nang chuan i khum laizâwlah chuan tûn hnua thil lo awm tûrte i ngaihtuah a, thil inthupte puang țhintu chuan tûn hnûa thil lo la awm tûrte chu a hriattîr che a ni a.

source: O make prayers for the peace of Jerusalem; may they whose love is given to you do well.
target: Jerusalem thlamuanna tûr dilsak rawh u: Nang ngainatute chu an thawveng ang.

source: The name of the first is Pishon, which goes round about all the land of Havilah where there is gold.
target: A pakhatna hming chu Pison a ni a: chu chu Havila ram zawng zawng hualtu chu a ni a, chutah chuan rangkachak a awm a;

source: I do not fear death
target: Thihna ka hlau lo

source: My soul is dry for need of God, the living God; when may I come and see the face of God?
target: Ka nunna hi pathian chakin, Pathian nung chakin, a tuihal a ni: Engtikah nge Pathian hma ka thlen ang a, ka inlan ang aw?

source: So at that time the children of Israel were overcome, and the children of Judah got the better of them, because they put their faith in the Lord, the God of their fathers.
target: Chu mi tuma Israela thlahte tlâwm dan chu chutiang chu a ni, Juda thlahte chuan LALPA an pi leh pute Pathian an rin avângin an ngam ta a.

source: I had much to say to you, but it is not my purpose to put it all down with ink and pen:
target: I hnenah thu tam tak ziak tur ka nei a, nimahsela lehkhatui leh lehkhaziaknain i hnena ziak ka duh lova;

source: Because you have kept my word in quiet strength, I will keep you from the hour of testing which is coming on all the world, to put to the test those who are on earth.
target: Ka chhelna thu i pawm avang khan leia awmte fiah tura khawvel zawng zawng chunga fiahna hun lo thleng tur lakah chuan kei pawhin ka humhim ang che.

source: If seven lives are to be taken as punishment for Cain's death, seventy-seven will be taken for Lamech's.
target: Kaina phuba mah aleh sariha an lak dâwn chuan Lameka phuba chu aleh sawmsarih leh pasarihin an la ngei ngei ang, a ti a.

source: I'm concentrating
target: Ka insawrbing mêk

source: And when the evil man, turning away from his evil-doing, does what is ordered and right, he will get life by it.
target: Tin, mi sualin a sualna a hawisana, a thiang leh a dik chu a tih chuan chumi azârah chuan a nung ang.

source: Whatever it takes.
target: Eng pawh ni se.

source: For a land, drinking in the frequent rain and producing good plants for those for whom it is worked, has a blessing from God:
target: Lei, a chunga ruahtui tla thin lo dawng tawh a, thawhsakate tana thlai ei tlak chhuahtu chu Pathianin mal a sawm thin.

source: Son of man, take your food with shaking fear, and your water with trouble and care;
target: Mihring fapa, i chaw chu khûr hlawk hlawk chungin ei la, i tui chu manganga khûr chungin in rawh;

source: For they will quickly be cut down like grass, and become dry like the green plants.
target: Hlobet angin ah thlukin an awm thuai ang a, Hnim hring angin an la vuai dawn si a.

source: Then the priest will go out of the door of the house, and keep the house shut up for seven days:
target: puithiam chu in ata kawngkaah a chhuak ang a, in chu ni sarih a khar ang:

source: You're very angry
target: I thinrim hle mai

source: But his disciples took him by night and let him down from the wall in a basket.
target: Nimahsela a zirtirten ani chu an hruai a, zanah kulh tukverhah bawmin an thlak thla ta a.

source: For see, at the order of the Lord the great house will be full of cracks and the little house will be broken.
target: Ngai teh u, LALPA chuan thu a pe si a; tin, in lian chu a chim rem rum ang a, in te pawh chu a khi chat rel rul ang a.

source: I caught up with you.
target: Ka man ta che a.

source: In that day your towns will be like the waste places of the Hivites and the Amorites which the children of Israel took for a heritage, and they will come to destruction.
target: Chu mi niah chuan an khaw nghet takte chu ngawbing leh tlâng chipa hmun tlansan hnu, Israela thlahte hmaa an tlansan hnu ang kha, a ni ang: tichuan hmun tihtiau ani tah ang.

source: Truly, no man may get back his soul for a price, or give to God the payment for himself;
target: Tuman an unau pawh an tlan thei tawp lo vang a, Pathian hnênah tlanna an peksak thei hek lo vang:

source: I forgot.
target: Ka theihnghilh.

source: Do not let the work of God come to nothing on account of food. All things are certainly clean; but it is evil for that man who by taking food makes it hard for another.
target: I englo ei vangin Pathian hnathawh tichhe suh. Thil zawng zawng a thianghlim ngei mai, nimahsela a englo eiin mi a tihtluk chuan a eitu tan sualna a ni.

source: But you will come down to the underworld, even to its inmost parts.
target: Nimahsela Seol-ah, klhuarkhurum tawp retahte chuan, hruai thlakin i awm dawn si.

source: My thoughts will be of the honour and glory of your rule, and of the wonder of your works.
target: Nangmah chawimawina ropui tak leh, I thimak tihte chu ka ngaihtuah ang.

source: How long will sinners, O Lord, how long will sinners have joy over us?
target: LALPA, mi suaksualte chuan eng chen nge, Mi suaksualte chuan eng chen nge an ngam dawn le?

source: And he put them all on the hands of Aaron and on the hands of his sons, waving them for a wave offering before the Lord.
target: tin, a vai chuan Arona kutphah chungah leh a fapate kutphah chungah chuan a dah a, LALPA hmaa then thilhlanah a then a.

source: Do you disobey me?
target: Ka thu i awih lo em ni?

source: I think there are enough
target: An awm tawk ka ti

source: My teaching is dropping like rain, coming down like dew on the fields; like rain on the young grass and showers on the garden plants:
target: Ruahtui angin ka thu chu a sur ang, Dai angin ka thusawi chu a far ang; Hlobet no dep chunga ruah ang leh Hnim hnah chunga ruah angin

source: My glory will be ever new, and my bow will be readily bent in my hand.
target: Ka rouina hi keimahah a thar reng ang a, Ka kutah ka thalngul pawh a thar reng, ka ti rilru a.

source: Did you want to come in
target: I rawn lut duh em

source: So Judah and Israel were living safely, every man under his vine and his fig-tree, from Dan as far as Beer-sheba, all the days of Solomon.
target: Tin, Solomona dam chhûng zawng chuan Judaho leh Israel-ho chu Dan atanga Beer seba khaw thlengii mi tin, mahni grêp hrui bulah leh mahni theipui bulah hchuan thlamuang takin an awm theuh va.

source: I struck out
target: Ka kheng thla

source: Have you watched it?
target: I en tawh em?

source: For the grace of God has come, giving salvation to all men,
target: Mi zawng zawng hnenah chhandamna rawn thlenin Pathian khawngaihna a lo lang ta si a;

source: Truly, these are the houses of the sinner, and this is the place of him who has no knowledge of God.
target: Mi fel lo chenna zawng chutiang hchu a ni ngei a, Chu chu Pathian hre lotu hmun a ni e.

source: But if he has a desire to get it back for himself, let him give a fifth more than your value.
target: Amaherawhchu a tlan leh tak tak dawn chuan I ruat zat hmun ngaa thena hmun khat a belh tur a ni.

source: We're not ready to go yet.
target: Kan la inpeih lo.

source: I have taken as much delight in the way of your unchanging word, as in all wealth.
target: I thuhriattir kawngah chuan ka hlim a, Hausakna zawng zawnga ka hlim ang maiin.

source: They also saw him
target: An hmu ve bawk a

source: I have a maid
target: Awmpui ka nei

source: You weren't there
target: I awm lo a ni

source: Make a guess
target: Ngaihdan aiam rawh

source: And Abraham was the father of Isaac. The sons of Isaac: Esau and Israel.
target: Abrahaman Isaaka a hring a. Isaaka fapate chu Esauva leh Israela an ni.

source: I argued with her
target: Ka inhnial a

source: Zedekiah was twenty-one years old when he became king; he was ruling in Jerusalem for eleven years.
target: Zedekia chu a lal tantirhin kum sâwmhnih leh kum khat a ni a, Jerusalem-ah kum sâwm leh kum khat a lal a:

source: And so great was Ish-bosheth's fear of Abner that he was not able to say a word in answer.
target: Tichuan Abnera chu a hlauh avângin a chhan rêng rêng a chhâng ngam ta lo va.

source: I drank milk
target: Hnute ka in tawh

source: I'm greedy
target: Ka duham a nia

source: She bade me good-by.
target: Min rawn thlah a.

source: And at the memory of your evil ways and your wrongdoings, you will have bitter hate for yourselves because of your evil-doings and your disgusting ways, O children of Israel.
target: Tichuan in dan sualte, in thiltih țha lote chu in lo hre tawh țhin ang a, in tenawmna leh in khawlohna avâng chuan nangmahni mithmuh ngeiah in ten tawh ang.

source: He is like a vine whose grapes do not come to full growth, or an olive-tree dropping its flowers.
target: Grêp hrui angin a rah hel a sawi til ang a, Olive thing angin a par a thing thla ang.

source: He asked for their advice
target: An thurawn a dil a

source: Joy will be on my lips when I make melody to you; and in my soul, to which you have given salvation.
target: Nangmah faka ka zai hunin ka hmui hi a hlim êm êm ang a; Ka nunna i tlan pawh hi a hlim êm êm ang.

source: I didn't want to wait.
target: Ka nghak duh lo.

source: You got shot, Tom.
target: Ka kap a ni, Tom.

source: I repeated myself.
target: Ka ti nawn leh a.

source: I'm not concerned
target: Ka ngaihtuah lo

source: It was just water.
target: Tui mai a ni.

source: Let those who say to me, Aha, aha! be surprised because of their shame.
target: Chei! Chei! mi tutute chu An mualpho avângin mangang takin awm rawh se.

source: And from Miletus he sent to Ephesus for the rulers of the church.
target: Tin, Meliti khua atang chuan Ephesi khuaah mi a tir a, kohhran upahote a hnenah a kohtir a.

source: Kings will give you offerings, they will come out of Egypt; from Pathros will come offerings of silver; Ethiopia will be stretching out her hands to God.
target: Aigupta ram atangin mi liante an lo chhuak ang a; Ethiopia-ho chu an kut Pathian lama phar tûrin an hmanhmawh ang.

source: And he saw an angel of the Lord in his place on the right side of the altar.
target: Tin, Lalpa vantirhkoh pakhat englo rimtui halna maicham ding lama dingin a hnenah a inlar a.

source: For he was numbered among us, and had his part in our work.
target: Ani chu kan zinga chhiar tel a ni a, heng rawngbawlah hian chan pawh a nei ve si a.

source: And the man and his wife were without clothing, and they had no sense of shame.
target: Tin, Adama leh a nupui chu an pahnihin saruakin an awm a, an zak lêm lo va.

source: So when the people came to him they made request to him to be among them for a time, and he was there two days.
target: Chutichuan Samari mite chu Isua hnenah an lo kal a, an hnena awmah an ngen chiam a; tichuan chutah chuan ni hnih a cham a.

source: Put out your bread on the face of the waters; for after a long time it will come back to you again.
target: I chhâng paih la tui chungah chuan, I hmu leh dawn si, nei rei hnuah.

source: Meat ball
target: Sa hrual mum

source: And let seven Sabbaths of years be numbered to you, seven times seven years; even the days of seven Sabbaths of years, that is forty-nine years;
target: Tin, chawlh kum kum sarih chu I hhiar ang a, kum sarih hmun sarih a ni ang a; chawlh kum kum sarih chhûng chu kum sawli leh kum kua a ni ang a.

source: He who has no belief in the Son has not the Father: he who makes clear his belief in the Son has the Father.
target: Tupawh Fapa awih lo chuan Pa pawh a pawm chuang lo; Fapa awihtu erawh chuan Pa pawh a pawm a ni.

source: I got pregnant accidentally.
target: Ka rai palh a.

source: And for the unclean, they are to take the dust of the burning of the sin-offering, and put flowing water on it in a vessel:
target: Tin, a thianghlim lote pualah sual thawina vap chu an la ang a, belah tui khur tui nen an chhûng ang.

source: And of the rest of the sons of Levi: of the sons of Amram, Shubael; of the sons of Shubael, Jehdeiah.
target: Tin, Levia thlah dangte zinga mi chu: Amrama fate zingah chuan Subaela a ni; Subaela fate zingah Jedeia.

source: O Lord, our God, other lords than you have had rule over us; but in you only is our salvation, and no other name will we take on our lips.
target: Aw LALPA kan Pathian, nangmah chang ni lovin lal dangte pawhin kan chungah thu an nei tawh țhin a, nimahsela nangma țanpui ngeiin i hming hi kan lam tawh ang.

source: Whoever takes away the dead body of one of them is to have his clothing washed, and will be unclean till evening.
target: tin, tupawh heng ruang latu apiangte hian an puante an su tur a ni a, tlai lam thlengin an bawlhhlawh ang,

source: For I have been armed by you with strength for the fight: you have made low under me those who come out against me.
target: Nangin inbeihna atân chuan chaknain ka taiah mi hreng si a: Mi rawn beitute chu ka hnuaiah i tudawl ta a.

source: And there was the glory of the God of Israel coming from the way of the east: and his voice was like the sound of great waters, and the earth was shining with his glory.
target: Tin, ngai teh, Israel pathian ropuina chu chhak lam ațangin a lo thleng a: a thâwm chu tui tamtak ri ang a ni a, lei chu a ropuina in a ên vek a.

source: I can drive
target: Ka khalh thei

source: You will not let me be clear of sin! why then do I take trouble for nothing?
target: Thiam loh chang tûr ka ni a, Eng nge sawt lo tûra ka tan teh chiam ang?

source: May it not be that he will again let his purpose be changed and let a blessing come after him, even a meal offering and a drink offering for the Lord your God?
target: LALPA in pathian hnênah chhangphut hlan leh in tûr hlanahte pawh chuan, a kirin, rilru lamletin, malsawmna hnutchhiahin a awm lo vang tih tuin nge hria?

source: And on the west side, hangings fifty cubits long, on ten pillars in ten bases, with silver bands.
target: Tin, thlang lampanga puanzar bante chu sawm a ni a, a nghahchhan kerkuak chu sawm a ni.

source: Do not make unclean the land where you are living and in which is my House: for I the Lord am present among the children of Israel.
target: In awmna ram, ka awmna hi in tibawlhlawh tur ani lo, kei LALPA chu Israela thlahte zingah ka awm si a,' ti rawh tiin.

source: I'm hot
target: Ka sa phat

source: But I am a worm and not a man; cursed by men, and looked down on by the people.
target: Kei erawh chu mihring rêng rêng ka ni lo va, changpat mai ka ni a; Mihringte sawichhiat leh mite hmusit ka ni.

source: And David was living in the land of the Philistines for the space of a year and four months.
target: Tin, Philistia rama Davida a awm chhûng chu kum khat pumhlum le thla li a ni.

source: Then in place of grain let thorns come up, and in place of barley evil-smelling plants.
target: Buh aiah hling to zawk sela, Tai aiah hlo har to rawh se, Joba thu chu a tawp ta.

source: That's all
target: Khati zâwng kha

source: Take a bus
target: Bus-ah chuan rawh

source: But having faith in his word, we are looking for a new heaven and a new earth, which will be the resting-place of righteousness.
target: Nimahsela, a thuthiam ang chuan van tharte leh lei thar, a chhunga felna awmte chu kan beisei a ni.

source: It will be the lowest of the kingdoms, and never again will it be lifted up over the nations: I will make them small, so that they may not have rule over the nations.
target: Lalna ram tlâwm ber a ni ang, hnamte zîngah a intilal tawh hek lo vang; hnamdang chunga thu a neih tawh loh nân anmahni ka ti te dawn a ni.

source: It's the beginning.
target: A bul tanna a ni.

source: So that you became an example to all those who have faith in Christ in Macedonia and Achaia.
target: Chutichuan, Makedonia leh Akaia rama ringtu zawng zawngte tan entawn in lo nih kha.

source: The sun is shining
target: Ni a êng a

source: I wouldn't have done it.
target: Ka ti lo ang.

source: For all the tables are covered with coughed-up food, so that there is not a clean place.
target: Hmun fai rêng rêng awm lo khawpin dawhkan zawng zawng chu lauk leh thil bawlhhlawhin a khat a ni.

source: He dozed off
target: A tlanbo

source: So they and their sons had the care of the doors of the house of the Lord, the house of the Tent, as watchers.
target: Chutichuan anmahni leh an fate chuan LALPA in kawngkhâr, biakbuk in kawngkhârte chu enkawlin, vengtu chan an chang thin a ni.

source: My pleasure
target: A nuam ka ti

source: My loved one, it is my prayer that you may do well in all things, and be healthy in body, even as your soul does well.
target: Duh tak, i thlarau chuan malsawmna a hmuh angin, engkimah malsawmna i hmuh leh i dam theih nan ka tawngtai thin a ni.

source: Then the eyes of the disciples were turned on one another, in doubt as to whom he had in mind.
target: Tin, zirtirte chuan a tih bik an hre lo va, an inen hlawm a.

source: Then the mother of the sons of Zebedee came to him with her sons, giving him worship and making a request of him.
target: Chu mi lai chuan Zebedaia fapate nu chu a fapate hruaiin, a hnenah a lo kal a, chibai a buk a, thil eng emaw a dil a.

source: You did not even let me give a kiss to my sons and my daughters. This was a foolish thing to do.
target: ka tute leh ka fanute ka fawh i phal loh ni? Atthlâk takin a ni, thil i tih ni.

source: He is young
target: A naupang

source: I've made it worse.
target: Ka ti na zual ta.

source: He is cranky
target: Mi khirh tak a ni

source: Be my saviour from the lion's mouth; let me go free from the horns of the cruel oxen.
target: Sakeibaknei kaa mi chu mi chhandam ang che; A ni, selepa kia mi chu nangin mi chhâng ta,

source: It is rather revolting.
target: A hel zawk a ni.

source: You look hot
target: I ṭhinrim hmêl

source: Just throw it away.
target: Paih mai rawh.

source: Are you short?
target: I tawi em?

source: If, then, you are not able to do even that which is least, why are you troubled about the rest?
target: He mi te mah ti thei lo che u a, engati nge thil dang in lungkham thin?

source: I have seen that nothing on earth is complete; but your teaching is very wide.
target: That famkimna zawng zawng tawp chu ka hmu ta a, I thupêk erawh chu a zau khawp mai a ni. MEM

source: I've got sore eyes.
target: Mit a na tawh a.

source: I checked the date.
target: Date ka check a.

source: I've won.
target: Ka chak tawh.

source: The produce of his house is taken away into another country, like things given into the hands of others in the day of wrath.
target: A ina thil pungte chu an bo vang a, A thinur niah chuan a bungruate an luang ral ang.

source: Do you need oil
target: Têl i mamawh em

source: Take the bus
target: Bus-ah chuang rawh

source: I do my own thing.
target: Keimah ngeiin ka ti thin.

source: By the wounds of the rod evil is taken away, and blows make clean the deepest parts of the body.
target: Pem khawpa vuakna chuan thil tha lo a tleng fai a, Vuakna chuan pumpui chhûngril lamte pawh a fan.

source: When the upright have power, the people are glad; when an evil man is ruler, grief comes on the people.
target: Mi fel an lo pun hian mite an lawm thin a, Mi sualin rorêlna an chanin mite an rum thin.

source: I called Tom
target: Tom ka ko tawh

source: I contributed
target: Ka thawh ve

source: I question myself
target: Ka inzawt a

source: Because of my name I will put away my wrath, and for my praise I will keep myself from cutting you off.
target: Ka tihboral lohna tûr che uin ka hming avângin ka thinur chu ka kher rih ang a, fak ka hlawh nân in chungah ka insum ang.

source: There are sixty queens, and eighty servant-wives, and young girls without number.
target: Lalnu sawmruk leh hmei sawmriat an awm a, Nula chhiar sen lohte nên.

source: And in Egypt the men of Midian gave him for a price to Potiphar, a captain of high position in Pharaoh's house.
target: Tin, Midian-ho chuan Josefa chu Aigupta ramah an luhpui a, Pharaoa hnuaia hotu pakhat, vêngtu pâwl hotu Potiphara hnênah chuan an hralh a.

source: And King Solomon gave the queen of Sheba all her desire, whatever she made request for, in addition to what she had taken to the king. So she went back to her country with her servants.
target: Tin, Seba lalnuin thil a pêk tiam lovin lal Solomona chuan a duh apiang a pe bawk a. Chutichuan a ram lama a hote nen an haw leh ta a.

source: Is anyone else excited
target: Midang an phur em

source: I have a feast of peace-offerings, for today my oaths have been effected.
target: Remna thilhlana inthawinate ka hlan tûr a ni a, Vawiinah ka thutiam ka hlen ta a.

source: And this you are to do on the seventh day of the month for everyone who is in error and for the feeble-minded: you are to make the house free from sin.
target: Tin, chumi thla ni sari nîah chuan tihpalh emaw hriatloh na avâng emawa thil tisualtute tan pawh chutiang bawk chuan i ti ang a, chutiang chuan in pui thenna i siam tûr a ni.

source: But be holy in every detail of your lives, as he, whose servants you are, is holy;
target: a kotu che u a thianghlim angin nangni pawh in chetzia zawng zawngah lo thianghlim zawk rawh u;

source: Tom is the only one there
target: Tom chauh a awm a

source: The cry of Heshbon comes even to Elealeh; to Jahaz their voice is sounding; from Zoar even to Horonaim and to Eglath-shelishiyah: for the waters of Nimrim will become dry.
target: Hesbon leh Elealeh-ah an au va, Jahaz thleng thlengin aw an chhuah a, Zaor ațanga Horonaim thleng, Elath-selis thleng pawhin. Nimrim tuikhurte a țhing țhup ang.

source: I'm okay
target: Ka tha e

source: I have food
target: Chaw ka nei

source: Praise to the glory of his noble name for ever; let all the earth be full of his glory. So be it, So be it.
target: A hming ropui tak hi kumkhuain fakin awm bawk sela; Lei pum pui pawh hi a ropuinaa tihkhahin awm rawh se. Amen, Amen.

source: And they are not able to give facts in support of the things which they say against me now.
target: tunah pawh an mi hekna thu hi i hriatah a bul an chhui chhuak thei hek lo vang.

source: Tom could be bored
target: Tom chu a bo thei

source: For he is our God; and we are the people to whom he gives food, and the sheep of his flock. Today, if you would only give ear to his voice!
target: Ani chu kan Pathian ani a, Keini hi a ran tlatna hmuna m leh, a kuta berâmhote kan ni si a. Vawiin hian a aw chu lo hre teh ula aw!

source: I am still single.
target: Ka la single a ni.

source: And King Solomon was greater than all the kings of the earth in wealth and in wisdom.
target: Chutichuan lal Solomona chuan khawvel lal zawng zawngte chu hausakah leh finah a khum vek a ni.

source: And he did evil in the eyes of the Lord, as the family of Ahab did; for after the death of his father they were his guides to his destruction.
target: Ahana chhûngkuate tih ang bawkin LALPA mithmuhah thil tha lo a ti a: a pa thih hnuin a chiatna tûra kaihhruaitu an ni.

source: Of the sons of Pahath-moab, Eliehoenai, the son of Zerahiah; and with him two hundred males.
target: Pahathmoaba thlahte zingah Zerahua fa, Eliehoenaia; mipa zahnih nên.

source: I let Tom win.
target: Tom ka chak tir.

source: Up, then! go back to your house; and in the hour when your feet go into the town, the death of the child will take place.
target: Chutichuan tho la, i in lamah haw leh mai tawh: khawpui chhûng i rah veleh naupang chu a hti dawn a ni.

source: And my soul will have joy in the Lord; it will be glad in his salvation.
target: Tichuan ka nunna hi lalpaah chuan a hlim ang a: A chhandamnaah chuan a lawm ang.

source: She took an umbrella.
target: Umbrella a la a.

source: He dug a hole
target: A kua a lai tawh

source: Are you a Canadian
target: Canada mi i ni em

source: I'm hurt.
target: Mi tina a ni.

source: Let's go find something to eat.
target: Ei tur zawng ila.

source: And this is the law of the offering for wrongdoing: it is most holy.
target: Tin, hei hi bawhchhiat thawina dan tur chu a ni: thil thianghlim tak a ni.

source: He has forgiveness for all your sins; he takes away all your diseases;
target: Ani chuan i khawlohna zawng zawng a ngaidam thin a; I natna zawng zawng a tidam thin a;

source: Don't talk back to me.
target: Min biak let suh.

source: It's early
target: A hma lûtuk

source: He who has an unwise son gets sorrow for himself, and the father of a foolish son has no joy.
target: Mi â hringtu chuan ama lungngaihna a thlen thin a, Mi â pa chuan lawmna a nei lo.

source: I'm too late
target: Ka tlâi lûtuk

source: Is it nearby?
target: A hnai em?

source: I'm not afraid of Tom
target: Tom hi ka hlau lo

source: What's new?
target: Eng thil thar nge?

source: We are getting married
target: Kan innei dawn ta

source: Who made the world a waste, overturning its towns; who did not let his prisoners loose from the prison-house.
target: khawvel thlalêr anga siama, a khaw awmte tiboral a, a salte an in lama kal tûra chhuah ngai lova chu?' tiin, i chanchin an la chhut ang.

source: I don't touch them
target: Ka khawih ngai lo

source: My brothers, let every man keep in that condition which is the purpose of God for him.
target: Unaute u, mi tin kohva in awm laia in chan pangngaiah chuan Pathian hnenah awm reng rawh u.

source: Aren't you prepared
target: I inpeih lo em ni

source: I goofed
target: Ka tisual e

source: Hers is heavy
target: A tâ chu a rit

source: I'm drinking juice.
target: Juice ka in a.

source: Then I will give no answer to their cries; searching for me early, they will not see me:
target: Chutichuan min ko vang a, nimahsela ka chhâng lo vang: Zing takah min zawng ang a, nimahsela min hmu lo vang;

source: And he made Judah go after the Lord, the God of their fathers, and keep his laws and his orders.
target: Juda-hote chu LALPA an pi leh pute Pathian zawng tûr leh a dan leh a thupêk zawm tûrin thu a pe a.

source: And so, when he had been waiting calmly for a long time, God's word to him was put into effect.
target: Chutichuan, chhel taka a tuar chhuah hnuin thil tiam chu a hmu ta ngei a.

source: So the workmen did their work, making good what was damaged and building up the house of God till it was strong and beautiful again.
target: Tichuanthawktute chuan an bei a, an thawk tha hle mai a, Pathian in chu a ngai chiahin an siam tha a, an din nghet le ta a.

source: I didn't want to get married.
target: Inneih ka duh lo.

source: And Moses gave the Lord's part, lifted up as an offering, to Eleazar the priest, as the Lord had given orders to Moses.
target: Tin, LALPAN Mosia thu apêk angin chhiah, LALPA then thilhlan chu Mosian puithiam Eleazara a pe a.

source: And when I came to you, my brothers, I did not come with wise words of knowledge, putting before you the secret of God.
target: Tin, unaute u, kei zawng Pathian thuruk hrilh che uin in hnena ka lo kal lai khan, thusawi ropui leh finna ropui nena lo kal ka ni lo.

source: His voice will go out to the heavens and to the earth, for the judging of his people:
target: A mite ro a rel theihna tûrin Chung lam vante leh lei hi a ko vang,

source: There's a car coming
target: Car a rawn kal a

source: He violated a law.
target: Dan pakhat a bawhchhia a ni.

source: Again in Horeb you made the Lord angry, and in his wrath he would have put an end to you.
target: Horeb-ah pawh khan LALPA thin in tiur a, tioral hial tur che uin LALPA a thinrim a.

source: And the blind and the broken in body came to him in the Temple, and he made them well.
target: Tin, Pathian biak inah chuan mitdelte leh kebaite a hnenah an lo kal a; anmahni a tidam a.

source: At this, awaking from my sleep, I saw; and my sleep was sweet to me.
target: Tichuan ka han harh a, ka han hawi vêl a, mang tha tak chu a lo ni e.

source: I didn't like it much.
target: Ka duh vak lo.

source: I'll take it into consideration.
target: Ka ngaihtuah ang.

source: And how the chief priests and our rulers gave him up to be put to death on the cross.
target: puithiam lalte leh kan hotuten thah thu pek turin an hruai a, kraws-a an khenbehzia thute pawh kha.

source: As for me, they make sport of me; shaking their heads when they see me.
target: Anmahni sawichhiat ka lo ni ta a: Mi hmuh veleh an lu an thing thin.

source: And you will go on crying to me and making prayer to me, and I will give ear to you.
target: Tin, mi lam ang a, ka hnênah in rawn țawngțai ang a, ka ngaithla ang che u.

source: Wise purposes will be watching over you, and knowledge will keep you;
target: Remhriatnain a veng ang chia, Hriatthiamnain a enkawl ang che;

source: Give ear, O our God, for we are looked down on: let their words of shame be turned back on themselves, and let them be given up to wasting in a land where they are prisoners:
