target: Aw kan Pathian ngai teh, hmusitin kan awm hi: an mi sawichhiatna chu anmahni lu chungah lentir la, anni pawh khawii ramah emaw mualpho takin tantir reng ang che;

source: I lost it
target: Ka tibo e

source: And I give them eternal life; they will never come to destruction, and no one will ever take them out of my hand.
target: an hnenah chatuana nunna ka pe a; kumkhuain an boral lo vang a, tuman ka kut ata mi chhuhsak hek lo vang.

source: I'll go get it for you.
target: Ka va la ang che.

source: When the upright do well, there is great glory; but when evil-doers are lifted up, men do not let themselves be seen.
target: Mi fel hlawhtlinnaah chuan ropuina nasa tak a awm a; Mi sual an dinchan erawh chuan mite an biru thin.

source: Then God went up from him in the place where he had been talking with him.
target: Tin, Pathianin a mah a biakna hmun atang chuan Jakoba chu a chhosan ta a.

source: What is your nationality
target: Eng hnam nge i nih

source: And so, as the Holy Spirit says, Today if you let his voice come to your ears,
target: Chutichuan, Thlarau Thianghlim sawi ang bawkin: Vawiin hian a aw in hriat chuan,

source: You're telling me.
target: Min hrilh a ni.

source: I went out for a walk
target: Ka vak chhuak a

source: Would you like to hang out?
target: I inhmu duh em?

source: For because of him a great number of the Jews went away and had belief in Jesus.
target: amah avanga Judate tam takin an pakaisan a, Isua an rin thin avangin.

source: Too late.
target: Tom-a a tlai.

source: And Moses made the people come out of their tents and take their places before God; and they came to the foot of the mountain,
target: Tichuan Mosian mipuiho chu Pathian han be tûrin riahhmun ata chu a hruai chhuak hlawm a; tlâng bulah chuan an ding a.

source: They believed you
target: An ring che a

source: He's a prude
target: Mi zahawm a nia

source: They're cool
target: An nel awm

source: But the men put out their hands and took Lot into the house to them, shutting the door again.
target: Nimahsela mite chuan an kut an zen chhuak a, Lota chu an hnênah in chhûngah chuan an hnûk lût a, kawng an khâr ta tlat a.

source: I saw that
target: Ka hmu alawm

source: The stone pillars were broken to bits and the wood pillars cut down, and the places where they had been were made full of the bones of the dead.
target: Tin, lungphunte chu a tikeh sawm vek a, Aseri-te chu a kit thlu a chung hmuanhte chuan miring ruh a dah ta a.

source: For which cause my desire is that you will make your love to him clear by your acts.
target: Chu mi avang chuan ama lama in hmangaihna chu tinghet turin ka ngen a che u.

source: So they and all theirs went down living into the underworld, and the earth was shut over them, and they were cut off from among the meeting of the people.
target: Chutichuan anmahni leh an ta zawng zawng chu Seol-ah chuan a nung chungin an pil ta vek a, lei chuan a ka a chip hnan a, pungkhawm zing ata chu an boral ta a.

source: We belong together
target: Kan ta dun a ni

source: Take my offering then, with my blessing; for God has been very good to me and I have enough: so at his strong request, he took it.
target: Pathianin min khawngaih avâng leh, ka ngah avâng hian khawngaih takin ka thil rawn pêk che kha pawm rawh, a a ti a. Tichuan a thlêm a thlêm a, a pawm ta a.

source: But be on the watch for him, for he was violent in his attacks on our teaching.
target: a lakah khan nang pawh fimkhur rawh, kan thu a dodal nasa em si a.

source: There is wrong on wrong, deceit on deceit; they have given up the knowledge of me, says the Lord.
target: Bumhmang zîngah i cheng a, An bumna avângin kei mi hre duh lo, Tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: I didn't know
target: Ka hre lo

source: Does he like Japan?
target: Japan a duh em?

source: You're never late
target: I tlai ngai lo

source: The Lord our God said to us in Horeb, You have been long enough in this mountain:
target: LALPA kan Pathian chuan Horeb tlângah min bia a, 'He tlângah hian in awm rei tawh tawh e:

source: They are not coming
target: An lo kal dawn lo

source: The room is empty
target: Room chu a ruak a

source: But if they say, Come up to us; then we will go up, for the Lord has given them into our hands: and this will be the sign to us.
target: Kan hnên lamah hian lo chho rawh u,' an tih erawh chuan kan chho vang a: LALPAN kan kutah min pe tawh ani tih kan tan chhinchhiahna ani ang, a ti a.

source: Tom hired me.
target: Tom-a'n mi hruai.

source: So that they may give you worship, walking in your ways, as long as they are living in the land which you gave to our fathers.
target: kan pi leh pute i pêk rama an awm chung zawnga i kawng zawh theihna tûra an tihna tûr chein.

source: But to this day, at the reading of the law of Moses, a veil is over their heart.
target: Nimahsela, vawiin thleng hian Mosia Lehkhabu an chhiar apiangin an thinlungah chuan khuhna a awm thin.

source: By their violent acts the evil-doers will be pulled away, because they have no desire to do what is right.
target: Mi suaksualte nunrawnna chuan anmahni a hnawl bo vang. Rorêlna fel an duh loh avângin.

source: The upright man is taken out of trouble, and in his place comes the sinner.
target: Mi fel chu manganna ata chhuakin a awm a, Mi suaksualin a hmun chu a luah thung a.

source: There is no more drinking of wine with a song; strong drink will be bitter to those who take it.
target: Hla sa chungin uain an in lo vang; zu chu a intute tan kha tak a ni ang.

source: The verdict is in.
target: Thutlukna chu in.

source: I will give my answer; I will put forward my knowledge:
target: Keima pualin ka chang ang a, Ka ngaih dan ka han sawi teh ang.

source: And God sent an evil spirit between Abimelech and the townsmen of Shechem; and the townsmen of Shechem were false to Abimelech;
target: Tin, Pathianin Abimeleka leh Sekem khuaa mite karha chuan rilru sual a awmtir a, tichuan Sekem khuaa mite chuan Abimeleka chungah vervek takin an ti ta a:

source: I cringed
target: Ka tawlh let

source: Give me an orange.
target: Orange pakhat min pe rawh.

source: I'm in bed.
target: Khumah ka awm.

source: And Noah went out with his sons and his wife and his sons' wives;
target: Tichuan Nova chu a chhuak a, a fapate leh a nupui leh a fapate nupuite pawh a hnênah an chhuak ve a:

source: But it was for our sins he was wounded, and for our evil doings he was crushed: he took the punishment by which we have peace, and by his wounds we are made well.
target: Nimahsela ani chu kan bawhchhiatnate avângin hliamin a awm a, kan khawlohnate avângin vuak thitlinin a awm a:kan thlamuanna tûr thununna chu a chungah a tla a; a vuakna vualtea tihdamin kan awm ta.

source: And of the tribe of the children of Zebulun, a chief, Elizaphan, the son of Parnach.
target: Tin, Zebuluna thlahte hnam zinga puipa Parnaka fapa Elizaphana,

source: For it is not possible for us to keep from saying what we have seen and have knowledge of.
target: Keini zawng thil kan hmuh leh kan hriatte kha sawi lovin kan awm thei lo, an ti a.

source: Be content.
target: Insawrbing rawh.

source: Happy are your wives and happy these your servants whose place is ever before you, hearing your words of wisdom.
target: I mite chu an va nihlawhin, heng i chiahhlawh i bula awm fova i finna thu ngaithla fo thinte hi an va nihlawh êm!

source: There are words without number for increasing what is to no purpose, but what is man profited by them?
target: Thu a tam poh leh engmah lo a tam mai a ni a, mihring tan eng nge a thatna?

source: For their wings were outstretched over the place where the ark was, covering the ark and its rods.
target: Cherub-te chuan bâwm awmna chung zawnah chuan an thla an zar reng a, cherub-te chuan bâwm leh a zawnfungte chu an khuh vek a.

source: O false ones! the face of the earth and the heaven is clear to you; how is it that the signs of these times are not as clear to you?
target: Nangni vervekte u, khawvel leh van awmzia pawh in hre fiah thiam si a, engati nge tun lai thil hi in hriat fiah thiam loh ni?

source: And this was the answer of Jesus: I have not an evil spirit; but I give honour to my Father and you do not give honour to me.
target: Isuan, Ramhuai zawl ka ni lo ve; ka Pa ka chawimawi a ni zawk e, nangnin ka hming in tihchhiat hi.

source: For the Lord has sent out from before you nations great and strong: and they have all given way before you till this day.
target: LALPAN in hmaah chi ropui tak leh chak takte chu a hnawhchhuah tak vek hi: nangni hmaah zawng vawiin thlengin tumah tang thei reng reng an awm loh hi.

source: These have one mind, and they give their power and authority to the beast.
target: Chung chuan thu khat vuain an thiltihtheihna leh thuneihna chu sakawlh an pe ang.

source: But still death had power from Adam till Moses, even over those who had not done wrong like Adam, who is a picture of him who was to come.
target: nimahsela Adama awm achin Mosia awm thlengin, Adama bawhchhiatna anga thil tisual lote chungah pawh thihna chuan ro a rel thin. Adama chu lo la kal tura nen tehkhinna a ni.

source: The eleventh captain for the eleventh month was Benaiah the Pirathonite, of the sons of Ephraim; and in his division were twenty-four thousand.
target: Thla sawm leh thla khatnaa sipai hotu chu Ephraima thlah Pirathon mi Benaia a ni a; tin, a pâwlah chuan singhnih leh sângli an awm.

source: Don't call anyone
target: Tumah ko suh

source: For his God is his teacher, giving him the knowledge of these things.
target: A Pathian chuan ani chu fel takin a thununin a zirtir țhin si a.

source: Don't lower your eyes.
target: Mit hniam suh.

source: So that you will be shamed and made low because of all you have done, when I have mercy on you.
target: an tan thlamuanna i lo nih țhinnaa i thiltih tâk zawng zawng avânga i zah theih nân.

source: They deceived all
target: An bum vek a ni

source: And Saul put up an altar to the Lord: this was the first altar which he put up to the Lord.
target: Tin, Saula chuan LALPA tan maichâm a siam a: chu chu LALPA tana a maichâm siam hmasak ber a ni.

source: And they went up and put up their tents in Kiriath-jearim in Judah: so that place is named Mahaneh-dan to this day. It is to the west of Kiriath-jearim.
target: Tin, an han chho va, Judai ram Kiriath-jearim khuaah awmhmun an han inkhuar a: chuvangin chu mi hmun chu tun thlengin Mahane-dan an la ti a ni: ngai teh, Kiriath-jearim thlang lama awm a ni.

source: A time for birth and a time for death; a time for planting and a time for uprooting;
target: Pian hun a awm a, thih hun a awm: Phun hun a awm a, thil phun phawi hun a awm;

source: It's nothing to be afraid of.
target: Hlauh tur a ni lo.

source: The heavens gave out the news of his righteousness, and all the people saw his glory.
target: Vante khian a felna chu atlangaupui thin a, Mi tinreng chuan a ropuizia an hmu ta a.

source: The wise-hearted man will let himself be ruled, but the man whose talk is foolish will have a fall.
target: Mi fing chuan thinlungin thupêkte a dawng thin a, Mi â kamtam erawh chu a tlu ang.

source: And the space in front of the rooms, a cubit on this side and a cubit on that side; and the rooms six cubits on this side and six cubits on that.
target: Tin, vênna pindan hmâah chuan daidanna leh lam lehlamah tawngkhata chhah ve ve a awm a; tichuan vênna pindante chu lehlam lehlamah tawngruk ve ve a ni.

source: While the Egyptians were placing in the earth the bodies of their sons on whom the Lord had sent destruction: and their gods had been judged by him.
target: an fa tir zawng zawng LALPAN a tihhlumsak an phum laiin Israela thlahte chu muk takin an chhuak a: LALPAN an pathiante pawh a hrem a.

source: We're not asking for anything.
target: Engmah kan dil lo.

source: She waited for the bus
target: Bus chu a nghak a

source: Tom paused
target: Tom-a a chawl

source: When his light was shining over my head, and when I went through the dark by his light.
target: A khawnvar ka lu chungah a eng thin a, Thimah pawh a eng ringin ka kal tlâng a,

source: Don't be fooled again
target: Bum nawn tawh suh

source: Did you call a doctor?
target: Doctor i ko em?

source: For an upright man, after falling seven times, will get up again: but trouble is the downfall of the evil.
target: Mi fel chu vawi sarih tlu mah sela, a tho leh zel thin; A awmna chu tihchhiatsak suh.

source: But if it is a question of words or names or of your law, see to it yourselves; I will not be a judge of such things.
target: nimahsela thute, hmingte, in dan chung thute mai a nih chuan nangmahnin rel zawk rawh u; kei zawngin chutiang thu chu ngaihtuah ka duh lo ve, a ti a.

source: You still haven't answered me.
target: Min la chhang lo.

source: Speak up!
target: Sawi rawh!

source: He sends it out through all the heaven, and his thunder-flame to the ends of the earth.
target: Van pum pui hnuaiah a tir chhuak a, A kawlphe chu lei tawp thleng thlegin.

source: And Abner, the son of Ner, with the servants of Saul's son Ish-bosheth, went out from Mahanaim to Gibeon.
target: Tin, Nera fapa Abnera leh Saula fapa Is-bosetha chhiahhlawhte hchu Mahanaim ata an chuak a, Gibeo-ah an kal a.

source: So that the priests were not able to keep their places to do their work because of the cloud; for the house of God was full of the glory of the Lord.
target: tichuan chhum avâng haun puithiamte chuan rawng pawh an bâwl thei ta lo hial a; LALPA ropuinain Pathian in chu a khat ta vek si a.

source: This he did, hoping that the face of this business might be changed: and my lord is wise, with the wisdom of the angel of God, having knowledge of everything on earth.
target: thil awmdan tidanglam tûrinheng thil hi i chhiahlawhJoaban chuan a tih a ni: tin, ka pu chu khawvela thil awm zawng zawng hre theiin Pathian vântirhkoh ang maiin a fing a ni, a ti a.

source: I'm upset.
target: Ka lungawilo.

source: See, the men of war are sorrowing outside the town: those who came looking for peace are weeping bitterly.
target: Ngai teh, an pasalthate chu pawn lamah an au va; remna palaite chu an țap zawih zawih a.

source: I'm sick of white.
target: Var ka na a ni.

source: Get up, now!
target: Tho rawh, tunah!

source: Is that wise?
target: A finthlak em?

source: Two hundred years?
target: Kum zahnih?

source: You're getting the hang of it.
target: I hang a ni.

source: Who are glad with great joy, and full of delight when they come to their last resting-place;
target: Thlan an hmuha lawm a, nasa taka hlim êm êm tûr hnênah chuan?

source: The hours ticked by.
target: Darkar a liam ta.

source: And David gave his parcels into the hands of the keeper of the army stores, and went running to the army and came to his brothers to get knowledge about them.
target: Tin, Davida chuan a bungrua chu bungraw enkawltu hnênah chuan a dah a, sipai hnên lamah chuan a va tlan a, a ute chu chibai a va buk a.

source: And his forces will be completely taken away from before him and broken; and even the ruler of the agreement will have the same fate.
target: Tin, a hmâa mi chu tui lian chaknaa hrût bovin an awm ang a, keh sawm in an awm ang: a ni thuthlung hotu chenin.

source: I fainted
target: Ka thidang

source: Who said to God, Go away from us; and, What is the Ruler of all able to do to us?
target: Pathian hnea Min kiansan rawh, Engkimtitheia chuan eng nge min tih theih? Titute chu,

source: A false tongue has hate for those who have clean hearts, and a smooth mouth is a cause of falling.
target: Lei dawthei chuan ama hliamte chu a haw thin a, Fak derna ka chuan thil a tichhe thin,

source: And hearing these things the people and the rulers of the town were troubled.
target: Tin, mipui leh khaw hotute chuan chung thu chu an han hriat chuan an buai ta a;

source: If you had knowledge of me, you would have knowledge of my Father: you have knowledge of him now and have seen him.
target: Kei mi hria ni ula, ka Pa pawh in hre tawh tur; tun achinah amah in hria e, amah in hmu tawh bawk, a ti a.

source: For this cause my people are taken away as prisoners into strange countries for need of knowledge: and their rulers are wasted for need of food, and their loud-voiced feasters are dry for need of water.
target: Chuvângin ka mite chu, hriatna an neih loh avângin, sala hruaiin an awm ta a: an mi zahawmte chu an ril a tam a, an mipuite chu tuihalin an dangro zo ta a.

source: Day after day it sends out its word, and night after night it gives knowledge.
target: Chhun hian chhun hnêna thu a sawi chhawng zel a, Zan hian zan hnênah hriatna a lan chhawntir zel a,

source: I'm thirteen
target: Sawmpathumna ka ni

source: Be upright in judging the cause of the man from a strange country and of him who has no father; do not take a widow's clothing on account of a debt:
target: Ram dang mite leh pa nei lote ro chu dik lo takin in relsak tur a ni lo va, hmeithai puan chu hrengah in laksak tur ani hek lo;

source: Now get lost
target: Tunah kal bo rawh

source: But I kept my ears shut like a man without hearing; like a man without a voice, never opening his mouth.
target: Nimahsela kei chu mi bengngawng angin hre lovin ka awm a; Țawng thei lo mi ka âng ngai lo angin ka awm.

source: Through me kings have their power, and rulers give right decisions.
target: Kei mi hmnagin lalin ro a rel a, Hotuten rorêlna felin thu an titlu thin a.

source: By your wisdom and deep knowledge you have got power for yourself, and put silver and gold in your store-houses:
target: i fin leh i remhriatnain i lo intihausa a, i ro bâwmah tangka leh rangkachak i khung a,

source: O give praise to the Lord; give honour to his name, talking of his doings among the peoples.
target: Aw LALPA hnênah lawm thi hril ula, a hming lam rawh u; Mi tin, zingah chuan a thiltihte chu hriattir rawh u.

source: They are jealous of us.
target: Min thîk a.

source: Now Sarai, Abram's wife, had given him no children; and she had a servant, a woman of Egypt whose name was Hagar.
target: Tin, Abrama nupui Saraii chuan fa rêng rêng a hrinsak lo va: tin, Saraii chuan Aigupta mi bâwihnu pakhat a nei a, chu mi hming chu Hagari a ni a.

source: Because of the mountain of Zion which is a waste; jackals go over it.
target: Zion tlâng chu a țiau tâk avângin, Sihalte a chhûngah an lêng.

source: It was alive
target: A la nung a ni

source: Now the first name to come out was that of Jehoiarib; the second Jedaiah,
target: Tichuan thumvâwr vawi khatna chu Jehoiariba chungah a tlu a, vawi hnihna chu Jedaia chungah;

source: I love trains
target: Rel ka ngaina

source: They will carry you
target: An phur ang che

source: All those from thirty to fifty years old who are able to do the work of the Tent of meeting.
target: kum sawmthum achin chung lam, kum sawmnga thlengin rawngbawlna hna, inbiakna puan ina thawk tur zawng zawng zat chu chhiar vek rawh u.

source: He is afraid of being cheated
target: Bum a hlau a ni

source: We are picking flowers.
target: Pangpar kan la a.

source: They need me
target: Min mamawh

source: I'll protect them.
target: Ka venghim ang.

source: They contradict themselves all the time
target: An inhnial fo thin

source: Hey here's an idea
target: Hei hetah hian idea pakhat a awm

source: Go sit down.
target: Kal la thu rawh.

source: I haven't been invited yet.
target: Ka la sawm lo.

source: And the mountains will be turned to water under him, and the deep valleys will be broken open, like wax before the fire, like waters flowing down a slope.
target: Mei bula khawihnûn ang leh hmun âwiha tuikhawhthla ang mai in, tlângte chu a hnuaiah chuan an tui ang a, kawrte chu a khi chat ang.

source: Tom was assaulted
target: Tom chu an bei a

source: You called the police
target: Police i ko a

source: Polar bear
target: Vuram savawm

source: So that a hard death seems better to my soul than my pains.
target: Ka nun hian rehhlum a thlang hial ta zawk a, He ka taksa chen reng ai hian.

source: And the sons of Kenaz: Othniel and Seraiah; and the sons of Othniel: Hathath.
target: Tin, Kenaza fapate chu Othniela leh Seraia an ni a: tin, Othniela fapa chu Hathatha a ni.

source: She wants justice
target: Dikna a duh a ni

source: Call the FBI
target: FBI ko rawh

source: Sami was in trouble
target: Sami chu a buai a

source: I'll read it
target: Ka chhiar dawn

source: Break it up!
target: Bansan rawh

source: I like grapes
target: Grapes ka ngaina

source: I owe her nothing
target: Engmah ka bat lo

source: And he got together all the chiefs of Israel, with the priests and the Levites.
target: Tin, Israel-ho puipa zawng zawngte chu puithiamte leh Levi-hote nen a ko khâwm a.

source: The egg is not done
target: Artui hi a hmin lo

source: Make songs to the Lord, O you saints of his, and give praise to his holy name.
target: Aw, a mi thianghlimte u, LALPA fakin zai ula, A hming thianghlim chu fak rawh u.

source: But it was you, my equal, my guide, my well-loved friend.
target: Nimahsela nang, ka mi anpui, Ka thian, ka thian kawm ngeih i ni miau si a.

source: What were you eating
target: Eng nge i ei a

source: They haven't arrived yet
target: An la thleng lo

source: This is her fault
target: Hei hi a sual a ni

source: It was worse
target: A chhe zâwk

source: Let his creditor take all his goods; and let others have the profit of his work.
target: A pung uma tangka puktirtu chuan a neih zawng zawng chu laksak vek sela; Mikhualte chuan a thawhrim rah chu rawk rawh se.

source: For how may this servant of my lord have talk with my lord? for, as for me, straight away my strength went from me and there was no breath in my body.
target: He ka lalpa chhiahhlawh hian he ka lalpa hi engtin nge a biak theih ang? kei lah chuan thahrui rêng ka nei si lo, thâwk pawh ka la thei hek lo, ka ti a.

source: Nahor’s Sons
target: Nahora thlahte

source: Tom was surrounded
target: Tom chu a hual a

source: O Jah, if you took note of every sin, who would go free?
target: LALPA, nangin khawlohnate i chhinchhiah chuan, Aw LALPA, tunge ding ang le?

source: Let your designs be formed, and they will come to nothing; give your orders, and they will not be effected: for God is with us.
target: Inrawn khâwm rawh u, engmah a ni hlei lo vang e; thu sawi rawh u, a puitling thei lo vang e: Pathian kan hnênah a awm si a, tiin.

source: Let's get started!
target: I ṭan ang u!

source: I'll come.
target: Ka rawn kal ang.

source: And you have those who keep the teaching of the Nicolaitans.
target: Nang pawhin Nikola ho zirtirna thu chutiang bawka pawm tute emaw i awmpui bawk a ni.

source: We saw them leave
target: An kal lai kan hmu a

source: And looking up, they saw that the stone was rolled back; and it was of great size.
target: an han dak a, lung chu lum sawn sain an hmu ta a, a lian hle si a.

source: And every tenth part of the land, of the seed planted, or of the fruit of trees, is holy to the Lord.
target: Ram chhûnga mi, sawma pakhat zawng zawng lova thil hawngte pawh thei rahte pawh LALPA pual ani a, LALPA tana thianghlim a ni.

source: And with great power the Apostles gave witness of the coming back of the Lord Jesus from the dead; and grace was on them all.
target: Tin, tirhkohte chuan awihawm takin Lal Isua thawh leh thu an hriattir thin a; an zaa chungah khawngaihna nasa tak a awm a.

source: Take away from me the noise of your songs; my ears are shut to the melody of your instruments.
target: I țingțang rimawi chu ka ngaithla lo vang; chuvângin ka lakah i hla beng chheng chu la bo rawh.

source: Did you win?
target: I chak ta em?

source: Aren't you jealous
target: I thik lo em ni

source: They're not home yet
target: An la haw lo

source: They gave it back
target: An pe let leh a

source: And the chief priest is to take some of its blood and take it to the Tent of meeting;
target: Tin, hriak thih puithiam chuan bawng thisen engemawzat chu a la ang a, inbiakna puan inah chuan a rawn keng ang a:

source: Do you translate songs?
target: Hla i letling em?

source: I will make clear the Lord's decision: he has said to me, You are my son, this day have I given you being.
target: Thuruat chu ka hril dawn: LALPAN ka hnênah, Nang zawng ka fapa i ni e; Vawiin hian ka hring che a ni.

source: Take your medicine
target: I damdawi ei rawh

source: I apologized
target: Thupha ka chawi e

source: I am in a hard position between the two, having a desire to go away and be with Christ, which is very much better:
target: A lai laklawhah hian a ngaihna hre lovin ka awm mai a ni, kal chhuaha Krista hnena awm chakna ka neih avangin, chu chu a tha zawk em em si a.

source: Where will i sit
target: Khawiah nge ka thut ang

source: I'm faithful
target: Ka rinawm

source: I will have the towns of your land cut off and all your strong places pulled down:
target: kut ata dawithiamnate ka tiboral ang a; aienthiamte i nei tawh lo vang:

source: And Joiada was the father of Jonathan, and Jonathan was the father of Jaddua.
target: Joiada chuan Jonathana a hring a. Jonathana chuan Jadua a hring a.

source: He gives me chills
target: Chills min pe thin

source: You may look
target: I enthei ang

source: You're hurting me
target: Mi ti na a ni

source: I think they'll all be fine
target: An dam vek ka ring

source: And while we were waiting there for some days, a certain prophet, named Agabus, came down from Judaea.
target: Tin, chutah chuan ni tam tak kan cham a, chu mi lai chuan Judai ram ata a hming Agaba zawlnei pakhat a lo chhuk a.

source: Is Tom big?
target: Tom a lian em?

source: He would not let anyone do them wrong; he even kept back kings because of them,
target: Tuma hnehchhiah a phal lo va: A ni, anmahni avângin lalte pawh a zilhhau va;

source: If the order of these things before me is ever broken, says the Lord, then will the seed of Israel come to an end as a nation before me for ever.
target: Heng dan ruatte hi ka hma ata a bo chauhvin Israel thlahte chu ka hma ata hnam nih an bang hlen ve ang, tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: I still don't feel very well.
target: Ka la dam vak lo.

source: Asa did what was right in the eyes of the Lord, as David his father did.
target: Tin, Asa chuan apu Davida ang bawkin LALPA mithmuha thil tha a ti thin a.

source: Be punctual
target: A hunah thleng rawh

source: They still haven't woken up
target: An la harh rih lo

source: Fire burns.
target: Mei a kang.

source: Why do you make me see evil-doing, and why are my eyes fixed on wrong? for wasting and violent acts are before me: and there is fighting and bitter argument.
target: Engatinge khawlohna te min entîr a, thiltih dik lo tak te hi I en reng? Inrawkna leh Inpâwngnêkna te Ka hmâah an awm reng si a: Inhauhna leh innghirnghona te a lo chhuah a ni.

source: Let this be the reward given to my haters from the Lord, and to those who say evil of my soul.
target: Chung chu mi dotute leh ka nunna sawichhetute LALPAN a thungrulhna a ni.

source: And the Lord will send you wandering among the peoples; only a small band of you will be kept from death among the nations where the Lord will send you.
target: LALPA chuan hnam tin, zingah a tidarh ang che u a, LALPAN a kalbotirna che u hnamte zingah chuan tlêmte chauhin in awm ang.

source: They're terrified of you
target: An hlau lutuk che

source: And Moses made clear to the children of Israel the orders about the fixed feasts of the Lord.
target: Tichuan Mosian LALPA kut hunbi siamte chu Israela thlahte hnenah a puang ta a.

source: In the same way, there are good works which are clearly seen; and those which are not so, may not be kept secret.
target: Chutiang bawkin thil tha tih lang nghal a awm a, lang nghal rih lo mah se thup hlen theih a ni lo.

source: Are you loyal?
target: I rinawm em?

source: Because of the crushing of the poor and the weeping of those in need, now will I come to his help, says the Lord; I will give him the salvation which he is desiring.
target: LALPA chuan, Retheite an hnehchhiah avâng leh, pachhiate rum avângin. Ka tho nghal mai ang a; An nuihsanna chu him takin ka awmtir teh ang, a ti a.

source: Who wants to bet against?
target: Tu nge bet duh?

source: Of the tribe of Asher twelve thousand: of the tribe of Naphtali twelve thousand: of the tribe of Manasseh twelve thousand:
target: Asera hnama mi 12,000 Naphtalia hnama mi 12,000 Manasea hnama mi 12,000 Manasea hnama mi 12000

source: And the sister of Tahpenes had a son by him, Genubath, whom Tahpenes took care of in Pharaoh's house; and Genubath was living in Pharaoh's house among Pharaoh's sons.
target: Tin, Tahpenesi laizawn chuan fapa Genubatha a hrinsak a, Tahpenesiin Pharaoa inah a hnute hnek banna a siamsak a: tin, Genubatha chu Pharaoa inah Pharaoa fate zingah chuan a awm ta a.

source: Sinners have put a net to take me; but I was true to your orders.
target: Mi suaksualte chuan ka awh nân thang an kam a; Nimahsela i thununa thute chu ka vah bosan lo ve.

source: He saved a sailor.
target: Lawng khalhtu pakhat a chhanchhuak a.

source: They were to go with common shoes on their feet, and not to take two coats.
target: pheikhawk erawh chu bun tur a ti a; Kawr pahnih ha suh u, a ti bawk a.

source: Giving praise to God, and having the approval of all the people; and every day the number of those who had salvation was increased by the Lord.
target: Pathian an fak a, mi zawng zawng lawmzawngin an awm thin. Tin, a chhandam mek apiangte chu Lalpain ni tin an hnenah a teltir zel thin.

source: That's worth a lot.
target: Chu chu a hlu hle.

source: As for me, my agreement is made with you, and you will be the father of nations without end.
target: Ngai teh, kei zawngin, ka thuthlung chu i hnênah a ni ka thlun ni, tichuan chi hrang hrang tam tak thlahtu i ni tawh ang.

source: I'm not touching you.
target: Ka khawih lo che.

source: Did Tom die?
target: Tom a thi ta em?

source: Take up your spear and keep back my attackers; say to my soul, I am your salvation.
target: Fei pawh phawi la, mi umtute kawng lo dang la: Ka nunna hnênah hian, I chhandamtu ka ni e, ti ang che.

source: And they will go down with him to the underworld, to those who have been put to the sword; even those who were his helpers, living under his shade among the nations
target: Khandaiha thahte hnênah chuan Seolah an chhuk ta bawk a; ani hnamte zînga a hlim hnuaia chêng țhin, a kut ke te ngei pawh chu.

source: You only of all the families of the earth have I taken care of: for this reason I will send punishment on you for all your sins.
target: Nangni chauh hi khawvêla chhûngkua zawng zawnga ka hriat in ni a: chuvângin in khawlohna zawng zawngahte chuan ka hrem ang che u, tiin.

source: Who took the fat of their offerings, and the wine of their drink offering? Let them now come to your help, let them be your salvation.
target: An inthawina thau eitu, An in tur thilhlan uain intute chu? Lo thovin rawn pui che u sela, Nangmahni humtu ni rawh se.

source: He has a potbelly.
target: Potbelly a nei a.

source: And they were broken by divisions, nation against nation and town against town, because God sent all sorts of trouble on them.
target: Hnam leh hnam, khua leh khua an intichhe rem rum a; Pathianinhreawm tinrengin a timangang anih kha.

source: There isn't a guard.
target: Vengtu a awm lo.

source: I'm fair.
target: Ka dik.

source: Touch it
target: Khawih rawh

source: The hater of work seems to himself wiser than seven men who are able to give an answer with good sense.
target: Mi pasarih thil chhût thiam ai pawhin Mi thatchhia chu ama ngaihin a fing zawk.

source: And had made the women and all who were there, small and great, prisoners: they had not put any of them to death, but had taken them all away.
target: hmeichhiate chu chu mi khuaa awm apiangte chu a lian atein salah an man a; tumah that lovin an hruai a, an hawnpui tawh a.

source: I got scared
target: Ka hlau

source: They don't exist any longer
target: An awm tawh lo

source: Only the tribe of Levi is not to be numbered among the children of Israel,
target: Levi chi zawng i chhiar ve tur a ni lo va, Israel mite zingah i chhiar tel tur a ni hek lo;

source: Tom isn't awake yet.
target: Tom a la harh lo.

source: They're carnations
target: Carnation an ni

source: And the worshippers of the army of heaven on the house-tops, and the Lord's worshippers who take oaths by Milcom,
target: In chung chhîpa vân lam thilho hnêna kûn țhînte, LALPA hnêna chhehhama Malkama chhâla chham bawka kûn țhînte,

source: Keep out!
target: Dahbo rawh!

source: I won't swim
target: Ka hleuh lovang

source: May I try it?
target: Ka tichhin duh ang em?

source: And he put up altars in the house of the Lord, of which the Lord had said, In Jerusalem will I put my name.
target: LALPAN, Jerusalem-a ka hming ka awmtir ang, a tihna LALPA inah chuan maichâmte a siam a.

source: The man who first puts his cause before the judge seems to be in the right; but then his neighbour comes and puts his cause in its true light.
target: A thiamna thu sawi hmasatu chu felin a lang thin a, Mahse a thenawmte an lo kal a, an rawn tilang thin.

source: I am lost
target: Ka bo

source: I brought a salad.
target: Salad ka rawn keng a.

source: So take twelve men out of the tribes of Israel, a man from every tribe.
target: Chutichuan Israel hnamte zinga mi hi sâwm leh pahnih hnam tin, aiah mi pakhat zel thlang chhuak ang che u.

source: Do you still work out?
target: I la work out em?

source: And when news of Jesus came to his ears, he sent to him rulers of the Jews, requesting that he would come and make his servant well.
target: Tichuan, Isua chanchin a hriat veleh a bawih rawn tidam tura ngen chiam turin a hnenah Judaho upate a tir a.

source: Say please
target: Khawngaihin ti rawh

source: She wants answers
target: Chhanna a duh a ni

source: I couldn't resist
target: Ka do thei lo

source: I'm happy
target: Ka lawm

source: Do you have a raincoat
target: Raincoat i nei em

source: I'm your boyfriend
target: I bialpa ka ni

source: But wisdom is judged to be right by all her children.
target: Nimahsela Finna chu a rah atangin a dikzia a lang a ni a ti a.

source: Tom is up.
target: Tom-a a zo.

source: With long life will he be rewarded; and I will let him see my salvation.
target: Dam reinain ka tilungawi ang a, Ka chhandamna chu ka hmuhtir bawk ang.

source: The great tests which your eyes saw, and the signs and wonders:
target: fiahna nasa tka te, chhinchhiahna te, thil mak te in mit ngeia in hmuh kha:

source: So I say, Give ear to me, and I will put forward my knowledge.
target: Chuvang chuan mi ngaithla ula, Ka ngaih dan ka han sawi teh ang, ka ti a ni.

source: Be certain, then, that those who are of faith, the same are sons of Abraham.
target: Chutichuan, hre rawh u, rinnaa awmte, chung nge chu Abrahama fate an ni.

source: Do you see the garden
target: Huan chu i hmu em

source: He who so takes his witness has made clear his faith that God is true.
target: A thu hriattir awih chuanin, ‘Pathian chu mi dik tak a ni,’ tiin a hming nemin a ziak.

source: We will catch you.
target: Kan man ang che.

source: I had a tooth pulled.
target: Ha ka hrual a.

source: There's still time.
target: Hun a la awm.

source: How much better it is to get wisdom than gold! and to get knowledge is more to be desired than silver.
target: Rangkachak ai chuan finna neih hi a va tha nasa zawk êm! A ni, tangka ai chuan hriat thiamna chu thlan zawk tûr a ni.

source: But if the evil-doer, turning away from all the sins which he has done, keeps my rules and does what is ordered and right, life will certainly be his; death will not be his fate.
target: Amaherawhchu mi sual chuan a thil sual tih zawng zawngte a hawisana, ka dan siamte a vawn a, dan chu zawma thil fel a tih chuan a nung ngei ang, a thi lo vang.

source: I am a boy.
target: Mipa naupang ka ni.

source: Give ear, for my words are true, and my lips are open to give out what is upright.
target: Ngaithla rawh u, thil tha tak mai ka sawi dawn a ni, Ka thil sawite chu thil dik hlir a ni ang.

source: Are you lucky?
target: I vannei em?

source: Then, after some days, the Jews made an agreement together to put him to death:
target: Tin, ni rei tak hnuah chuan Saula tihlum turin Judate chu an inrawn a;

source: Then there came to Jesus from Jerusalem Pharisees and scribes, saying,
target: Chu mi lai chuan, Jerusalem khua atangin Pharisaite leh lehkhaziaktute Isua hnenah an lo kal a,

source: I've injured myself.
target: Ka inhliam tawh.

source: Even when his wealth is great, he is full of care, for the hand of everyone who is in trouble is turned against him.
target: A hausak vanglai tak chu a chep hun ani ang a, Tlachhamte chuan a chungah kut an len huai huai ang.

source: So we went without food, requesting our God for this: and his ear was open to our prayer.
target: Chutichuan chaw kan nghei a, chu mi chu kan Pathian kan dil chiam a; kan dilna chu min ngaihthlâksak a.

source: Your desire is for what is true in the inner parts: in the secrets of my soul you will give me knowledge of wisdom.
target: Ngai teh, chhûngril lamahte hian takina i duh thin a: Tichuan lang lo lamah hian finna mi hriattir ang.

source: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God our Father who had love for us and has given us eternal comfort and good hope through grace,
target: Tichuan, kan Lalpa Isua Krista ngei leh Pathian kan Pa, min hmangaihtu leh khawngaihna avanga chatuana thlamuanna leh beiseina tha min petu chuan,

source: And he made a network of brass for the altar, under the frame round it, stretching half-way up;
target: Tin, maicham atan chuan dar len, meicham dawhzawl hnuai lam vel chuan a chanve thlengin a siam a.

source: What's the dealio
target: Eng nge dealio chu

source: The troubles of my heart are increased: O take me out of my sorrows.
target: Ka thinlung buainate hi a lo nasa ta a; Aw, ka manganna atate hi mi hruai chhuak ang che.

source: Now Philip's town was Beth-saida, where Andrew and Peter came from.
target: Philipa chu Bethsaida khuaa mi a ni, chu chu Andria leh Petera awmna khua bawk a ni.

source: Are you about ready
target: I inpeih tawh em

source: Fold it
target: Thlep rawh

source: For I have given new strength to the tired soul and to every sorrowing soul in full measure.
target: Mi chaute chu ka titlai ta a, mi lungngai apiangte pawh ka tiharh tawh si a.

source: I have failed
target: Ka hlawhchham der

source: But you are nothing, and your work is of no value: foolish is he who takes you for his gods.
target: Ngai teh u, engmah in lo nih loh hi, in thiltih pawh engmah a ni hek lo: nangmahni thlangtute chu mi tenawm tak an ni.

source: The way of the foolish man seems right to him? but the wise man gives ear to suggestions.
target: Mi â kawng chu ama mitah chuan a dik a, Mi fing erawh chuan rorêl an ngaichang thin.

source: She's busy
target: Henu a buai

source: The baptism of John, was it from heaven or from men? give me an answer.
target: Johana baptisma kha vana mi thu nge, mihring thu? mi chhang rawh u, a ti a.

source: I keep a dog.
target: Ui pakhat ka dah.

source: And two chains of the best gold, twisted like cords; and have the chains fixed on to the frames.
target: rangkachak hlîr hlak khaidiat pahnih nên; hruihrual anga herhin i siam tur a ni: tin, chu mi khaidiat herhte chu phiarah chuan i zawm tur ni.

source: I like wine
target: Zu ka duh

source: He sat on a chair
target: Chair pakhatah chuan a thu a

source: She likes secrets
target: Thuruk a duh hle

source: Sit down!
target: Thu rawh.

source: She clothed herself in a new suit.
target: Suit thar a ha a.

source: They're dead
target: Mitthi ang an ni

source: And they gave the king's orders to the king's captains and the rulers across the river, and they gave the people and the house of God the help which was needed.
target: Tin, lal thuruatte chu lal upate leh lui ral ram awptute chu an hrilh a; tin, anni chuan mipuie chu tanpuiin Pathian in sak chu an chhunzawmpui ta a.

source: I do worry.
target: Lungngai suh.

source: But the people were moved by the chief priests to make him let Barabbas go free.
target: Nimahsela puithiam lalte chuan mipuiho chu Barabba chhuahsak zawk dil turin an fuih pawrh a.

source: And the Philistines came up again, and went in every direction in the valley of Rephaim.
target: Tin, Philistia mite chu an cho leh , Rephaim ruamah an inzar leh a.

source: Then the Philistines went and put up their tents in Judah, all round Lehi.
target: Chutichuan Philistia-ho chu an han chho va, Judai ramah chuan an han inkulh a. Lehi hmunah an inzar chiam a.

source: And when he had come, he went straight to him and said, Master; and gave him a kiss.
target: Tichuan a thlen veleh amah a va pan ta nghal a, Rabbi! tiin a fawp ta ngawih ngawih a.

source: Everything went black
target: Engkim a dum vek a

source: And from Azmon it will go round to the stream of Egypt as far as the sea.
target: tin, ramri chu Azmon ațangin Aigupta lui thlengin a kawi ang a, a chhuahna chu tuifinriatah a ni ang.

source: Do you work together?
target: In thawk ho em?

source: And these are the children of Zibeon: Aiah and Anah; that same Anah who made the discovery of the water-springs in the waste land, when he was looking after the asses of his father Zibeon.
target: Tin, hêng hi Zibeona fate chu an ni; Aia leh Ana hi: he Ana hi a ni, a pa Zibeona sabengtungte a thlah laia thlalêra tuilumkhurte hmu chhuaktu kha ni.

source: He will be great, and will be named the Son of the Most High: and the Lord God will give him the kingdom of David, his father:
target: Ani chu mi lian a la ni ang a, Chungnungbera Fapa an ti ang; Lal Pathianin a hnenah a thlahtu Davida thutphah chu a pe ang a;

source: They cried out together
target: An au dun a

source: And the watchman gave a loud cry, O my lord, I am on the watchtower all day, and am placed in my watch every night:
target: Tin, ani chu sakeibaknei angina au va; Aw LALPA, chhunah chuan ralven bûk chungah hian ka ding fo va, zankhua khuain ka vennaah hian mi awmtir fo va:

source: I'm hiding
target: Ka biru mek

source: Say to Rehoboam, the son of Solomon, king of Judah, and to all the men of Judah and Benjamin and the rest of the people:
target: Judai ram lal Solomona fapa Rehoboama hnênah leh Juda leh Benjamina chhûngte zawng zawng hnênah leh mipui dangte hnênah chuan,

source: Every one of them went straight forward; wherever the spirit was to go they went; they went on without turning.
target: Thilnungte chuan khawilam pawh an hawisa vek a ni, in her lovin thlarauvin a duhna lam apiangah an kalho thei.

source: I got up too early.
target: Ka tho hma lutuk.

source: Even the foolish man, when he keeps quiet, is taken to be wise: when his lips are shut he is credited with good sense.
target: Mi â pawh hi a ngawih reng chuan mi finga chhiar a ni a, A hmui a chip chuan mi remhriaa ngaih a ni.

source: I lost face
target: Tihmualpho ka ni

source: They don't engage with it.
target: An engage ngai lo.

source: She pushed the car.
target: Car chu a nawr a.

source: It may not be valued with the gold of Ophir, with the onyx of great price, or the sapphire.
target: Ophir rangkachakin a tluk thei lo va, Oniks lunghlu emaw, saphir emaw pawhin a ltuk thei hek lo.

source: Freely will I make my offerings to you; I will give praise to your name, O Lord, for it is good.
target: Mahni duh thua thilhlanin i hnênah ka inthawi ang a; Aw LALPA, i hming ch ka fang ang, a tha si a.

source: Tom's amazed
target: Tom-a'n mak a ti

source: I am sick
target: Ka damlo

source: I am a nurse
target: Nurse ka nia

source: You will be held accountable.
target: I inchhir ang.

source: The wisdom of the man of good sense makes his way clear; but the unwise behaviour of the foolish is deceit.
target: Remhre finna chu mahni awm dan hriat hi a ni a, Mi âte âtna erawh chu bumna a ni.

source: He who gets wisdom has love for his soul: he who keeps good sense will get what is truly good.
target: Fina dawngtu chuan ama nunna a hmangaih thin a, Hriatna vawngtu chuan thil tha a hmu ang.

source: Let there be no hate in your heart for your brother; but you may make a protest to your neighbour, so that he may be stopped from doing evil.
target: I rilruin i unau i haw tur a ni lo: I thenawm chu i zilhhau ngei tur a ni, a sualnaa i hul nan.

source: Gomer and all her forces; the people of Togarmah in the inmost parts of the north, with all his forces: a great number of peoples with you.
target: Gomer leh a sipai rual zawng zawngte; Togarma chhûngte, hmâr tawpa mi leh a sipai rual zawng zawngte; i hnên a mi tam tak te nên pawh.

source: But if you truly give ear to his voice, and do whatever I say, then I will be against those who are against you, fighting those who are fighting you.
target: Amaherawhchu a thusawi I pawmsak tak meuhva, ka sawi apiang I tih zêl chuan I hmêlmate hmêlma chu ka ni ve, ang a, I dote dova chu ka ni ve ang.

source: So righteousness gives life; but he who goes after evil gets death for himself.
target: Felna nghet taka ding mi chuan nunna a chang ang a, Thil sual umtu chuan ama thihna.

source: For the king will give ear, and take his servant out of the power of the man whose purpose is the destruction of me and my son together from the heritage of God.
target: Lal chuan kei leh ka fapa hi Pathian roluah lo tûra tihboral tumtu laka i bawihnu hi chan chuak tûrin a lo ngaihthlâksak ang chu ka ti a.

source: You're going to eat it.
target: I ei dawn nia.

source: Then their father said to them, Which way did he go? Now his sons had seen which way the man of God who came from Judah had gone.
target: Tin, an pa chuan an hnênah, Khawi lam kawngah nge a kal tak? a ti a. A fapate chuan Judai ram atanga lo kal Pathian mi haw lehna kawng chu a kawhhmuh a.

source: And let them make no more offerings to evil spirits, after which they have gone, turning away from the Lord. Let this be a law to them for ever, through all their generations.
target: An uire thinna kelpa hnenah chuan an inthawi tawh tur a ni lo,’ tih hi. Hei hi an thlahte zei chena an kumkhaw dan tur a ni, tiin.

source: He will put down the peoples under us, and the nations under our feet.
target: Ani chuan mi tin, chu kan hnuaiah a tudawl ang a, Hnam tin chu kan ke hnuaiah a tudawl bawk ang.

source: Am I approved?
target: Pawmsak ka ni em?

source: It was incomplete
target: A kim lo hle mai

source: Do not be cruel to your neighbour or take what is his; do not keep back a servant's payment from him all night till the morning.
target: Thenawmte i bum tur a ni lo va, i ruksak tur a ni hek lo. Inhlawhfa hlawh chu zankhua khuain a tuk thlengin i kawl tur a ni lo.

source: Who spoke?
target: Tunge sawi tawh?

source: Iron makes iron sharp; so a man makes sharp his friend.
target: Thirin thir a tihriam a, Chutiang bawkin miin a thian hmêl a tihriam.

source: For if you have love for those who have love for you, what credit is it to you? do not the tax-farmers the same?
target: In hmangaitute chauh in hmangaih hian lawmman engnge in hmuh ang? chhiahkhawntute pawhin chutiangin an ti ve lawm ni?

source: And her daughters in the open country will be put to the sword: and they will be certain that I am the Lord.
target: Tin, a fanu rama awmte chu khandaiha tihhlum an ni ang a, tichuan LALPA chu ka ni tih an hria ang.

source: But you who kept faith with the Lord are living, every one of you, today.
target: LALPA in Pathian vuantu apiangte erawh chu tun thleng hian nungdamin in la awm țheuh va.

source: All these wonders Moses and Aaron did before Pharaoh: but the Lord made Pharaoh's heart hard, and he did not let the children of Israel go out of his land.
target: Tin, Mosia leh Arona chuan Pharaoa hmaah chuan chûng thilmak zawng zawngte chu an ti a: tin, LALPAN Pharaoa thinlung chu a tihkhauhsak a, tichuan Israela thlahte chu a ram ata a chhuahtîr phal lo va.

source: How far is it?
target: Engtia hla nge?

source: What is to be done by law to Vashti the queen, because she has not done what King Ahasuerus, by his servants, gave her orders to do?
target: Pindan vengtuten an hriattir si, lal Ahasueran a tih anga a tih loh avângin lalnu Vasti chungah chuan dan anga ti tûrin engtin nge kan tih ang? a ti a.

source: Now when Israel was living in Shittim the people became false to the Lord, doing evil with the daughters of Moab:
target: Tichuan Israel-ho chu Sittim-ah an awm a, tin, Moab-ho fanute chu an pâwl ta hlawm a:

source: And Mikloth was the father of Shimeah. And they were living with their brothers in Jerusalem opposite their brothers.
target: Tin, Miklothan Simea a hring a. Tin, anni pawh chu Jerusalem-ah an unaute zingah, anunaute depah an awm a.

source: I like garlic
target: Purunvar ka ngaina

source: Then Jonah made prayer to the Lord his God from the inside of the fish, and said,
target: Tin, Jona chu, sângha kawchhûng ațang chuan, LALPA a pathian hnênah a țawngțai a.

source: Hold on tight
target: Lo nghâk zel

source: I'm so alone
target: Ka mal lutuk

source: I cut classes
target: Zirlai ka titawi

source: Plug up that leak
target: Chu leak chu plug up rawh

source: Tom is big
target: Tom a lian

source: He asked for my resignation.
target: Ka ban a dil a.

source: You can't sell it.
target: I hralh thei lo.

source: I feel lost
target: Ka boin ka hria

source: Your first father was a sinner, and your guides have gone against my word.
target: In pu hmasa ber khan thil a tisual a, in palaite pawhin ka lakah an bawhchhia a.

source: You may give them as an offering of first-fruits to the Lord, but they are not to go up as a sweet smell on the altar.
target: Siam hmasak ber thilhlan ang zawngin LALPA hnenah in hlan ang a; nimahsela rimtui atana maichâmah chuan dah tur a ni lo.

source: For a sign that the Lord is upright; he is my Rock, there is no deceit in him.
target: LALPA chu mi dik tak ani tih lantirna tûrin; Ani chu ka lungpui ani a, amahah chuan fel lohna rêng rêng a awm lo.

source: They're all normal
target: An normal vek tawh

source: Are they satisfied?
target: An lungawi em?

source: And the rules and the orders and the law which he put in writing for you, you are to keep and do for ever; you are to have no other gods.
target: tichuan thuruat te, rorêl te, dan te; thupêkte a lo ziaksak tak che u kha kumkhuain in pawm reng tûr a nia; pathian dangte chu in tih tûr a ni lo;

source: In all the years nobody has ever before seen the eyes of a man blind from birth made open.
target: Khawvel awm tirh ata tuman mitdel saa piang mit an tivar leh tih an hre ngai lo.

source: What else
target: Thildang eng nge

source: They already know it
target: An hre tawh a ni

source: I hate flying
target: Thlawh hi ka hua

source: Because in Christ Jesus, having circumcision or not having circumcision are equally of no profit; but only faith working through love.
target: Krista Isuaah chuan serh tan engmah a sawt lo, serh tanloh pawh engmah a sawt hek lo; rinna, hmangaihnaa thawh erawh chu a sawt a ni.

source: I'm not satisfied yet
target: Ka la lungawi lo

source: For whoever gets me gets life, and grace from the Lord will come to him.
target: Mi hmu apiang chuan nunna a hmu a ni si a, LALPA duhsakna a dawng ang a.

source: Then Israel made an oath to the Lord, and said, If you will give up this people into my hands, then I will send complete destruction on all their towns.
target: Tin, Israel mite chuan LALPA hnenah thu an tiam a, Heng mite hi kan kuta min pêk chuan an khuate hi kan tiboral hlauh ang e, an ti a.

source: It isn't your problem
target: I buaina a ni lo

source: And let us not get tired of well-doing; for at the right time we will get in the grain, if we do not give way to weariness.
target: Tichuan thil tha tih i ning suh ang u; kan inthlahdah loh zawngin a hun takah chuan kan seng dawn si a.

source: By the blessing of the upright man the town is made great, but it is overturned by the mouth of the evil-doer.
target: Mi felte malsawmnain khua chawimawiin a awm a, Mi suaksualte ka erawh chuan a tichhia.

source: I stylish hle mai
target: You're very stylish

source: I'm not completely in accord.
target: Ka inrem kim lo.

source: For God makes low those whose hearts are lifted up, but he is a saviour to the poor in spirit.
target: An paih thlak che pawhin, Din chhuahna a awm, i ti ang a, Mi inngaitlâwm chu a chhandam ang.

source: And Moses gave their heritage to the tribe of Reuben by their families.
target: Tin, Rebena thlahte hnam chu an chhûngkaw zir zelin Mosian ram a lo pe tawh a.

source: Don't look.
target: En suh.

source: If their tent-cord is pulled up, do they not come to an end, and without wisdom?
target: An chhûnga puan in thlunna hrui pawhchah a nihin, An thi mai a ni lâwm ni? finna nei lovin?

source: So Hathach went out and saw Mordecai in the open square of the town before the king's doorway.
target: Chutichuan, Hathaka chu lal kawt hung kawngka zawna mual zau laiah, Mordekaia hnênah chuan a va kal a.

source: Do you want a hot dog?
target: Hot dog i duh em?

source: And Abraham answering said, Truly, I who am only dust, have undertaken to put my thoughts before the Lord:
target: Tin, Abrahama chuan, Ngai teh, kei vaivut leh meivâp mai hian Lalpa chu ka be pawp ta sa che:

source: Is it on the map?
target: Map-ah a awm em?

source: For to everyone who makes a request, it will be given; and he who is searching will get his desire; and to him who gives the sign, the door will be open.
target: Tupawh a dil apiang chuan an hmu thin a, tupawh a zawng chuan an hmu thin a, tupawh a kik chu an hawnsak dawn a ni.

source: Truly, the hope of his attacker is false; he is overcome even on seeing him!
target: Ngai rawh, mihring beiseina chu a thlawna ni: A hmuh mai pawhin a beidawng nghal a ni.

source: I'm athletic
target: Infiammi ka nia

source: They're still going at it
target: An la kal zel a ni

source: I second that.
target: Ka rawn thlâwp e.

source: I'm not bald
target: Lukawlh ka ni lo

source: They're not back yet
target: An la kir leh lo

source: You're choking me.
target: Min chok a ni.

source: Who is there?
target: Khatah tunge awm?

source: When a loud note is sounded, the tents placed on the east side are to go forward.
target: Tin, râlkhel hama in ham chuan chak lampanga awmhote an chuak tur a ni ang.

source: And when this sound came to their ears, they all came together, and were greatly surprised because every man was hearing the words of the disciples in his special language.
target: Tin, chu ri chu an hriat veleh mipui an rawn inkhawm a, mi tinin an tawng chu mahni tawng theuhvin an lo hriat avangin an rilruin an lo buai a.

source: And in their mouth there was no false word, for they are untouched by evil.
target: An kaah dawt a chhuah reng miin an hre ngai lo; sawiselbo an ni si a.

source: You're very pretty
target: I hmelṭha hle mai

source: So they went on increasing the power of the kingdom of Judah, and made Rehoboam, the son of Solomon, strong for three years; and for three years they went in the ways of David and Solomon.
target: Chutichuan Judai ram chu an tinghet a, kum thuum chung chu Solomona fapa Rehoboama chu an tinghet a: kum thum chhûng chu Davida leh Solomona kawng chu an zawh a ni.

source: I'm very tired.
target: Ka hahta hle mai.

source: I got scammed
target: Bumin ka awm

source: To have respect for the person of the evil-doer is not good, or to give a wrong decision against the upright.
target: Mi suaksual duhsak chu a tha lo va, Rorêlnaa mi fel hnawl chu a tha bawk hek lo.

source: The word of a king has authority; and who may say to him, What is this you are doing?
target: Lal thu chu thu tawp anih avângi tunge a hnênah, Eng nge i tih ni? ti thei ang?

source: I hate bugs
target: Chukchu ka hua

source: Don't be sad
target: Lungngai suh

source: Be still.
target: Che suh.

source: So Moses made a snake of brass and put it on a rod; and anyone who had a snakebite, after looking on the snake of brass, was made well.
target: Chutichuan Mosian dar rul a siam a, banah a khai a; tin, heti hi a ni a, rul chuk apiangin dar rul chu an enin an dam zel a.

source: Then when he gives his property to his sons for their heritage, he is not to put the son of his loved one in the place of the first son, the son of the hated wife:
target: a ro neih chu a fapate a khawmtir huna chuan a duh taka fapa chu a fapa upa, a huata fa aia ûah a siam tur a ni lo va,

source: Now fourteen thousand, seven hundred deaths were caused by that disease, in addition to those who came to their end because of what Korah had done.
target: Tichuan Kora chungchang thua thite tiam lovin hri-a thi zawng zawng chu singkhat leh sangli leh zasarih an ni.

source: You learn quickly.
target: I zir vat a.

source: Trained in the cutting of stones and the ornamenting of wood and in every sort of handwork.
target: lunghlute zeh tura phel thiamna te, thing zai mawi dan thiamna te, kawng tinrenga themthiamna te nei turin.

source: Give my love to Herodion, my relation. Say a kind word to those of the house of Narcissus, who are in the Lord.
target: Ka chipui, Herodiona kha chibai mi buksak ang che u. Narkissa chhungte zinga mi, Lalpaa awmte kha chibai mi buksak ang che u.

source: And it is our desire that you may all keep the same high purpose in certain hope to the end:
target: Nimahsela, tawp thlenga beiseina famkim hmu turin in taihmak pangngai ang khan taihmak chhuah theuh fo ula kan ti em em mai;

source: They were thrashed
target: An thrash ta a

source: I'm not playing a game.
target: Game ka khel lo.

source: I was beaten
target: Vuak ka ni

source: I say to you, O daughters of Jerusalem, if you see my loved one, what will you say to him? That I am overcome with love.
target: Ka ngen tlat che u, aw Jerusalem fanute, Ka duhtak chu in hmuh chuanin Hmangaihnaah ka uai zo tih rawn hrilh r'u.

source: Then will the upright be shining as the sun in the kingdom of their Father. He who has ears, let him give ear.
target: Chu mi hunah chuan mi felte chu an Pa ramah chuan ni angin an eng tawh ang. Beng nei chuan hre rawh se.

source: Guests came to us.
target: Khualzinte kan hnenah an rawn kal a.

source: There is one glory of the sun, and another glory of the moon, and another glory of the stars; for the glory of one star is different from that of another.
target: Ni ropuina chu a dang a, thla ropuina chu a dang a, arsite ropuina chu a dang a; arsi leh arsi pawh ropuinaah chuan a inang si lo.

source: The Lord is King for ever and ever; the nations are gone from his land.
target: LALPA chu kumkhaw tlaitluan atâna Lalber a ni a: Hnam tin chu ama ram ata an boral ta.

source: Dance with me.
target: Min lampui rawh.

source: Go and say to Hananiah, This is what the Lord has said: Yokes of wood have been broken by you, but in their place I will make yokes of iron.
target: Kal la Heti hian LALPA chuan a ti. Thing nghawngkawl chu i titliak a, a aiah thir nghawngkawl i siamsak zawk a nih hi.

source: He was dressed in black.
target: Dum a inthuam a.

source: Put away fear and let your heart be strong, all you whose hope is in the Lord.
target: LALPA beisei zawng zawngte u, Chak takin awm ula, in thunlung chu intihuai rawh se.

source: And being feeble, he has to make sin-offerings for himself as well as for the people.
target: Tin, chu mi avang chuan mite tan an hlansak angin anmahni tan ngei pawh sualte avangin hlan ve lo thei an ni lo.

source: Then after that time he said to his disciples, Let us go into Judaea again.
target: Tin, chu mi hnuah chuan a zirtirte hnenah, Judai ramah i kal leh ang u, a ti a.

source: On Making of excuses
target: Chhuan lam siam

source: Are you still uplifted in pride against my people so that you will not let them go?
target: Ka mite lâkah hian i la induh cheuvin, i la chhuahtîr lo vâng maw?

source: For they say that they are of the holy town, and put their faith in the God of Israel: the Lord of armies is his name.
target: khawpui thianghlima mi an inti si țhin a, Israel-ho Pathian chungah rinna an nghat abwk a ni; a hming chu sipaihote LALPA a ni.

source: And Ram was the father of Amminadab; and Amminadab was the father of Nahshon, chief of the children of Judah;
target: Tin, Raman Aminadaba ahring a; tin, Aminadaban Juda thlah mi lian Nasona a hring a;

source: Let not the old landmark be moved which your fathers have put in place.
target: In pi leh puten hma khawsânga Ramri an lo kham chu sawn suh u.

source: For their vine is the vine of Sodom, from the fields of Gomorrah: their grapes are the grapes of evil, and the berries are bitter:
target: An grêp hrui chu Sodom grêp hrui, Gomora rama mi a ni: A grêpte chu mit grêp a ni, A bawrte chu a kha

source: But those will be making sounds of joy; they will be crying loudly from the sea for the glory of the Lord.
target: chungte chuan an aw an chhuah ang a, an au vang; LALPA ropuina avângin tuifinriat ațangin ring takin an au ve.

source: Or take their daughters for your sons; for when their daughters give worship before their gods, they will make your sons take part with them.
target: tin, i fapate tan an fanute i nei ang a, an fanute chu an pathiante lakah an uire ang a, i fapate pawh an pathiante lakah an uiretir dah ang a.

source: Now the Philistines got their armies together for war, and came together at Socoh in the land of Judah, and took up their position between Socoh and Azekah in Ephes-dammim.
target: Tin, Philistia mite chuan indo tûrin an sipaite an khawm chiam mai a. Judai ram chhûng Soko khuaah an pung khawm a, Ephes-damim hmunah Soko khua leh Azeka khaw inkarah tanhmun an khuar a.

source: But he did not send for Nathan the prophet and Benaiah and the other men of war and Solomon his brother.
target: Zâwlnei Nathana te, mi huaisenhote leh a unaupa solomona erawh chu a sawm ve lo.

source: Come look at this.
target: Hei hi lo en teh.

source: Don't buy it
target: Lei miah suh

source: Fadil was intoxicated
target: Fadil chu a rui a

source: I forbid that.
target: Kha kha ka phal lo.

source: Try to ignore him
target: Amah ngaihsak lo tum ang che

source: For the waves of death came round me, and the seas of evil put me in fear;
target: Thihna fawn chuan min hual vêl a, Pathian ngaihsak lohna tui lian chuan mitihlau va.

source: Because even those who undergo circumcision do not themselves keep the law; but they would have you undergo circumcision, so that they may have glory in your flesh.
target: Serhtante meuh pawh chuan Dan thu an zawm chuang si lo va, in taksaah chhuan tur an neih theih nan serh tantir che u an duh mai a ni.

source: Seated at the door of her house, in the high places of the town,
target: A kawngkaah a thu thin a, Khua hmun sângtea thutphahah chuan,

source: I cheered
target: Ka nui

source: It's the Union Jack!
target: Union Jack a ni!

source: I never cheat
target: Ka bum ve ngai lo

source: They play the piano.
target: Piano an tum a.

source: Are you stalking me?
target: Min stalk em ni?

source: I ditched Tom.
target: Tom-a ka khei.

source: And you, in addition, will give witness because you have been with me from the first.
target: nangni pawhin in hriattir bawk ang, atir ata ka hnena in awm avangin.

source: I've fully recovered.
target: Ka dam kim tawh.

source: For which reason, because we have righteousness through faith, let us be at peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ;
target: Chuvangin rinna avanga thiam changa awmin, kan Lalpa Isua Krista avangin Pathian nen inremin i awm ang u;

source: Put away all your evil-doing in which you have done sin; and make for yourselves a new heart and a new spirit: why are you desiring death, O children of Israel?
target: In bawhchhiatna zawng zawng, in lo bawhchhiat tawhte chu paih bo vek ula, thinlung thar leh rilru thar insiam rawh u: Engah nge in thih ang le, aw Israel chhûngte u?

source: That now you are turned back from the Lord? and, because you are false to him today, tomorrow his wrath will be let loose on all the people of Israel.
target: vawiinah hian LALPA chu hawisan in tum chu le? Tichuan vawiina LALPA chunga in lo hel ta mai hi naktukah zawng Israel mipuiho zawng zawng chungah a thinrim ngei dawn mai.

source: And from the copy King Ahaz sent from Damascus, Urijah made an altar and had it ready by the time King Ahaz came back from Damascus.
target: Tin, puithiam Urija chuan mâicham a han siam a; lal Ahazan Damaska puithiam Urija chuan Damaska khua tanga lal Ahazia lo haw leh hmain a lo siam hman diam a.

source: Shaking with fear like a bird, they will come out of Egypt, like a dove out of the land of Assyria: and I will give them rest in their houses, says the Lord.
target: Aigupta ațang chuan chawngzawng angin, Assuria ațang chuan chawngzawng angin thla zap siau siauvin an lo kal ang: Tin, an in lum ka luahtîr ang, tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: And my hand will again be on you, washing away what is unclean as with soap, and taking away all your false metal;
target: tin, i chungah ka kut ka thlak leh ang a, i ekchhia chu fai takin ka tibo vang a, i suan zawng zawng chu ka la bo vek ang:

source: I'd rather go to sleep.
target: Mut ka duh zawk.

source: I'll vote for you.
target: Ka vote ang che.

source: How long is my soul to be in doubt, with sorrow in my heart all the day? how long will he who is against me be given power over me?
target: Nilengin ka thinlunga lungngaihna neiin, Eng chen nge ka rilruah rem ka ruat ka ruat dawn? Eng chen nge ka hmêlma chu ka chungah chawimawia a awm dawn?

source: The night goes on!
target: Zan chu a reh ta!

source: For this reason we make it our purpose, in the body or away from it, to be well-pleasing to him.
target: Chuvangin, awm ila, awm suh ila, ama lawmzawng mi nih kan tum tlat thin a ni.

source: And all the people put their clothing down in the way; and others got branches from the trees, and put them down in the way.
target: Tin, mipui zinga a tam zawkin kalkawngah chuan an puante an phah a; mi dangin thinga mi chhawl an sat a, kalkawngah an phah bawk a.

source: Then King Nebuchadnezzar, falling down on his face, gave worship to Daniel, and gave orders for an offering and spices to be given to him;
target: Tichuan, lal Nebukadnezzara chu a bawkkhupa, Daniela chu chibai a bûk a, a hnênah chuan thilhlan leh rimtuite rawn hlân tûrin thu a pe a.

source: Take care that you do not say, Wisdom is here; God may overcome him, but not man.
target: Fimkhur rawh u; 'Fing tak kan tawk a lo ni a, Mihring ni lovin, Pathian chauhvin a hneh thei ang,' In ti rawk ang e.

source: How good is your loving mercy, O God! the children of men take cover under the shade of your wings.
target: Aw Pathian, i ngilneihna chu a va hlu êm! Mihring fate chuan i thla hnuai an chuh thin.

source: For God is the King of all the earth; make songs of praise with knowledge.
target: Pathian chu khawvel zawng zawng Lal a ni si a: Hre thiama fakin zai rawh u.

source: The meeting of the nations will be round you; take your seat, then, over them, on high.
target: Tichuan mi tin inkhawmho chuan hual vêl che rawh se. Tin, nang chu an chungah chung lamah chuan kir leh ang che.

source: But a man may not give by oath to the Lord the first-fruits of cattle which are offered to the Lord: if it is an ox or a sheep it is the Lord's.
target: Amaherawhchu ran zinga piang hmasa ber, a pian hmasak ber avanga LALPA pual atana ruat tawh phawt chu tuman an hlan tur a ni lo: sebawngpa pawh beram pawh ni sela, LALPA pual a ni.

source: I have a book
target: Lehkhabu ka nei

source: Are they poisonous
target: An rimchhia em ni

source: Then all Israel came together to David at Hebron, and said, Truly, we are your bone and your flesh.
target: Chutichuan Israel-ho zawng zawng chu Hebron-a Davida hnênah an kal khâwm a, Ngai teh, i thisen zawmpui kan ni a.,

source: I protested
target: Ka dodal tawh

source: Things can get hairy.
target: Thil a vun thei.

source: It's up to you.
target: I tih dan dan a ni mai.

source: God is true, through whom you have been given a part with his Son, Jesus Christ our Lord.
target: Pathian, a Fapa Isua Krista kan Lalpa pawlnaa ko luttu che u kha a rinawm a ni.

source: He is not your father.
target: I pa a ni lo.

source: Don't sit on the floor.
target: Khuaah thu suh.

source: And in every town of Judah he made high places where perfumes were burned to other gods, awaking the wrath of the Lord, the God of his fathers.
target: Tin, Juda khaw tam takah chuan Pathian dangte tan rimtui hal nân hmun sângte a siam a, LALPA a pi leh pute Pathian a tithinur a.

source: And a man of Benjamin went running from the fight and came to Shiloh the same day with his clothing out of order and earth on his head.
target: Sipai zinga Benjamina thlah mi pakhat a tlan a, a puante tet phung leh a lua lei kai luamin chu mi ni la la chuan Silo a va thleng a.

source: It's important to be accurate.
target: A dik a pawimawh.

source: Don't try to speak.
target: Thu sawi tum suh.

source: Adina, the son of Shiza the Reubenite, a chief of the Reubenites, and thirty with him;
target: Reuben m Siza fapa Adina, Reuben mite zinga hotu, a hnêna mi sawmthumte nên;

source: I cried again
target: Ka ṭap nawn leh

source: For he takes up the drops from the sea; he sends them through his mist as rain,
target: Tui mal far te te chu a hip chho va, Tui hua intifimin ruahah a chang a,

source: Isaac was forty years old when he took Rebekah, the daughter of Bethuel the Aramaean of Paddan-aram, and the sister of Laban the Aramaean, to be his wife.
target: Isaakan Paddanaram rama Suri mi Bethuela fanu, Suri mi, Labana farnu Rebeki chu a nupuia a neih lai chuan kum 40 mi a ni a.

source: She always believes in me.
target: Min ring fo thin.

source: I got a little sunburned.
target: Ni a kang deuh a.

source: That you take note of my sin, searching after my wrongdoing,
target: Ka khawlohnte i chhui teh chiam a, Ka sualna pawh i zawn teh chiam ni?

source: It's not on the wall.
target: Wall-ah a awm lo.

source: So the chief captain let the young man go, saying to him, Do not say to anyone that you have given me word of these things.
target: Tin, sipai hotu lal ber chuan tlangval chu a kaltir a, Heng thu hi mi lo hriattir tawh tih tumah hrilh suh ang che, a ti tlat a.

source: If she is a wall, we will make on her a strong base of silver; and if she is a door, we will let her be shut up with cedar-wood.
target: Amah chu kulh bang lo ni se, Tangkaraw kulhbing kan siamsak ang: Amah chu kawngka lo ni sela, Sidar thing phelin kan tuam leh ang.

source: Then Phinehas got up, and made prayer for them; and the disease went no farther.
target: Chu mi lai chuan Phinehasa chu a ding a, ro a rel a: Tichuan hri chu tihrehin a awm ta a.

source: Tom-a a tlan.
target: Tom ran.

source: Truly, he will put an end to me; I have no hope; but I will not give way in argument before him;
target: Mi tihlum hila mah sela, amah chu ka nghak cheu vang: Mahse, a hmaah ka kawng chu ka tan ang.

source: Take silver, take gold; for there is no end to the store; take for yourselves a weight of things to be desired.
target: Tangkaraw sumte chu lâksak ula, rangkachak sumte chu laksk rawh u: thil chhêk khâwm leh bungraw țha zawng zawng ropuizia chuan tâwp in tai a nei si lo.

source: They talk all the time
target: An inbe fo thin

source: But Paul said to the captain and his men, If you do not keep these men in the ship, you will not be safe.
target: chu mi laiin Paula chuan sipai za hotu leh sipaite hnenah chuan, Hengho hi lawnga an awm reng loh chuan in him thei lo vang, a ti a.

source: And when the fourth stamp was undone, the voice of the fourth beast came to my ears, saying, Come and see.
target: Tin, chhinchhiahna palina chu a han phelh veleh Thilnung palina aw chuan, Lo kal rawh, a tih ka hria.

source: I like pizza
target: Pizza ka duh

source: I don't dance
target: Ka lâm thei lo

source: They're pretty sick
target: An damlo khawp mai

source: Now may our God and Father himself and our Lord Jesus make a way for us to come to you;
target: Tichuan, kan Pathian, kan pa ngei chuan kan Lalpa Isua pawhin in hnen lamah min hruai rawh se.

source: There's the problem
target: Buaina chu a awm

source: I stood by
target: A bulah ka ding

source: I went there
target: Kha tah ka kal

source: He painted a picture of a dog.
target: Ui lem a ziak a.

source: Then the high priests and the Pharisees had a meeting and said, What are we doing? This man is doing a number of signs.
target: Chutichuan puithiam lalte leh Pharisaite chuan roreltuho an ko khawm a, Engtin nge kan tih ang? He mi hian thilmak tam tak a ti si a.

source: We're not finished yet.
target: Kan la zo lo.

source: It's nothing new
target: Thil thar a ni lo

source: I wallet ka ru a.
target: I stole your wallet.

source: I didn't lose them
target: Ka hloh lo

source: Cover for me
target: Mi lo vêng rawh

source: It's a very gloomy day.
target: Ni thim tak a ni.

source: I wasn't flirting
target: Ka flirt lo a ni

source: I shoved Tom.
target: Toma ka nem.

source: Their produce is taken by him who has no food, and their grain goes to the poor, and he who is in need of water gets it from their spring.
target: A buh thar tûr riltamten an ei zo va, Hling kar ata pawh an la a, A neih zawng zawng chu tuihalten an hap zo va.

source: So I will have your skirts uncovered before your face, in order that your shame may be seen.
target: Tichuan keimah ngeiin i fenfual chu I hmai khuh hialin ka hlimsak ang chia, I zahmawh a lang ang.

source: Put all your hope in God, not looking to your reason for support.
target: I thinlung zawng zawngin LALPA ring la, Nangma hriatnaah innghat suh;

source: And he came into all the country round about Jordan, preaching baptism as a sign of forgiveness of sin for those whose hearts were changed.
target: Tin, ani chu Jordan lui kam vel ram tinah a kal a, thil tihsual ngaihdam nan simna baptisma thu a hril zel a;

source: Have no envy of sinners in your heart, but keep in the fear of the Lord all through the day;
target: I thinlungin mi sual awt suh se; Nilengin LALPA tihin awm zawk rawh.

source: It's just a theory.
target: Theory mai a ni.

source: Tom is the one laughing
target: Tom chu a nui a

source: They don't want it
target: An duh lo

source: For now my steps are numbered by you, and my sin is not overlooked.
target: Mahse, nangin ka pente i chhia a, Ka sual i enthla lo vem ni?

source: For he sees that wise men come to their end, and foolish persons of low behaviour come to destruction together, letting their wealth go to others.
target: Mi finge pawh an thi a, Mi a leh mi mawlte pawh an boral ve ve a, An sum mi dangte an hnutchhiah thinte chu a hre si a.

source: There was a storm
target: Thlipui a tleh a

source: I am suffering from diarrhoea.
target: Ka kua a ṭha lo.

source: I went down to the bases of the mountains; as for the earth, her walls were about me for ever: but you have taken up my life from the underworld, O Lord my God.
target: Tlâng bul tâwp rêtahte chuan ka kal chhuk a; Lei chuan kumkhua atân a kalhnate chuan mi khâr khum a: Amaherawhchu nangin, Aw LALPA ka Pathian, khuarkhurum ata chu ka nunna i la chhuak a ni.

source: Take not away your gentle mercies from me, O Lord; let your mercy and your faith keep me safe for ever.
target: Aw LALPA, i lainatnate chu ka lakah ui suh la: I ngilneihna leh i takina chuan mi humhim fo rawh se.

source: But a certain one of those who were near took out his sword, and gave the servant of the high priest a blow, cutting off his ear.
target: Tin, a kianga dingte zinga mi tuin emaw a khandaih a phawi a, Puithiam Lalber bawi chu a sat a, a beng a sah thlaksak a.

source: Are you on vacation?
target: Chawlh i nei em?

source: Do you have your keys on you?
target: I chabi i nei em?

source: Who put to death the Lord Jesus and the prophets, violently driving us out; who are unpleasing to God and against all men;
target: Chung Judate chuan Lalpa Isua leh zawlneite pawh an that a, keini pawh min hnawt chhuak a, Pathian an tilawm lo va, mi zawng zawng an kalh thin;

source: Or do you not see that he who is joined to a loose woman is one body with her? for God has said, The two of them will become one flesh.
target: A nih leh, nawhchizuar zawm chu amah nen pumkhat an ni tih in hre lo em ni le? An pahnihin tisa pumkhat an lo ni tawh ang, a ti si a.

source: And all the mixed people and all the kings of the land of Uz, and all the kings of the land of the Philistines, and Ashkelon and Gaza and Ekron and the rest of Ashdod;
target: hnam dang pawlhtu zawng zawng te; Uz rama lal zawng te; Philistia rama lal zawng zawng, Askelon leh Gaza leh Ekron leh Asdoda la awm chhun lalte chu;

source: Don't get married
target: Innei suh

source: There will be blood
target: Thisen a awm ang

source: And with every living thing with you, all birds and cattle and every beast of the earth which comes out of the ark with you.
target: in hnêna thil nung tinrêng awm, in awmpui sava te, ran te, ram sa tinrêng hnênah lam chuan.

source: Who ran?
target: Tunge tlan?

source: We stared at them
target: Anmahni chu kan en reng a

source: You started crying.
target: I tap tan ta a.

source: What is it?
target: Eng nge ni?

source: Keep away
target: Dah bo rawh

source: Tom paid.
target: Tom-an a pe.

source: I'm buying
target: Ka lei mek

source: Your words have been strong against me, says the Lord. And still you say, What have we said against you?
target: Ka chunga in thute chu a paukhauh hle, LALPA chuan a ti. Nangni erawh chuan, engah khân nge i chungah chutiang thu kan sawi? In ti a.

source: But heaven and earth will come to an end before the smallest letter of the law may be dropped out.
target: Nimahsela Dan thu chhun han te tak te bo ai pawhin van leh khawvel boral a awl zawk e.

source: I own a yacht.
target: Nuam tâwl lawng ka nei.

source: So it was clear to Israel and to all the people on that day that the king was not responsible for the death of Abner, the son of Ner.
target: Chutichuan mipui zawng zawng leh Israel mi zawng zawng chuan chu mi ni chuan Nera fapa Abnera thah chu lal thu ani lo tih an lo hre ta a.

source: And he sent destruction on those towns, with all the lowland and all the people of those towns and every green thing in the land.
target: tichuan chûng khuate leh Phaizâwl zawng zawng leh khuaa mi zawng zawngte leh leia thil tote chu a tiboral ta vek a.

source: I didn't need you.
target: Ka mamawh lo che.

source: And I made the discovery that the law whose purpose was to give life had become a cause of death:
target: Tin, nunna tura thupek chu thihna tur a lo ni tih ka lo hre ta a;

source: I won.
target: Ka chak.

source: Let it be an order for ever, through all your generations, in all your houses, that you are not to take fat or blood for food.
target: Thau emaw thisen emaw ei loh tur tih hi in thlahte zel tan pawh in awmna apiangah zawm tura thupêk ding reng a ni ang, tiin.

source: Help us
target: Min pui ru

source: I turned her down
target: Ka hnawl a

source: Mary explained it
target: Mari chuan a hrilhfiah a

source: For tomorrow morning.
target: Naktûk zing atân.

source: For the upright will be living in the land, and the good will have it for their heritage.
target: Mi tluangte chu leilungah hian an cheng ang a, Tha famkimte chu chutah chuan an awm reng a;

source: I'm turning the light off.
target: Ka light off a.

source: And when the priest sees the diseased flesh he will say that he is unclean; the diseased flesh is unclean, he is a leper.
target: Puithiam chuan a tisa lawng chu a lo en ang a, a bawlhhlawh tih a puang tur a ni: tisa lawng chu a bawlhhlawh a ni; phâr a ni.

source: She doesn't care
target: A ngaihsak lo

source: How beautiful are your feet in their shoes, O king's daughter! The curves of your legs are like jewels, the work of the hands of a good workman:
target: Pheikhawk bun chunga i pen mawizia; Aw mi ropui fanu! I mal mumin lunghlu iang e, Thawktu themthiam tak kut chhuak hnu chu.

source: If you make any request to me in my name, I will do it.
target: Nangnin ka hmingin engpawh mi dil chuan chu chu ka ti zel ang.
