source: I'm hopeless
target: Beiseibo ka ni

source: Truly, I say to you, We say that of which we have knowledge; we give witness of what we have seen; and you do not take our witness to be true.
target: Tih tak meuhvin, tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che, keinin kan hriat chu kan sawi thin, kan hmuh chu kan hriattir thin; nimahsela kan thu hriattir in awih si thin lo.

source: Mary is a retiree
target: Mary hi pension tawh a ni

source: I have given thought to your name in the night, O Lord, and have kept your law.
target: Aw LALPA, zanah chuan i hming ka hre reng thin a, I dan pawh ka zawm thin.

source: I feel stupid
target: Ka â ka in ti

source: Sleep tight, Sean.
target: Muhil rawh, Sean.

source: And on Kerioth, and on Bozrah, and on all the towns of the land of Moab, far and near.
target: leh Kerioth-ah te, Bozrah-ah te, Moab rama khua zawng zawng, a hle leh a hnaiah te pawh.

source: But if at some time after hearing of them, he makes them without force, then he is responsible for her wrongdoing.
target: A hriat veleh a thiat a, a tihbosak erawhchuan a mawh chu maman a phur tur a ni.

source: He will have no respect for the gods of his fathers or for the god desired by women; he will have no respect for any god: for he will put himself on high over all.
target: A thlah tute pathiante chu a pawisa lo vang a, hmeichhiate ngainat pathian leh pathian dang rêng rêng pawh a pawisa hek lo vang: mi zawng zawng chungah a in tilian dawn si a.

source: For the word of the Lord is upright, and all his works are certain.
target: LALPA thu chu a dik a; A thiltih zawng zawng chu rinawm taka tih a ni si thin a.

source: You got undressed.
target: I inbel ta a ni.

source: She does not want to go to bed.
target: Mut a duh lo.

source: I'm still talking
target: Ka la sawi reng a

source: Do you want money
target: Sum i duh em

source: And sent out his servants to get in the guests to the feast: and they would not come.
target: Tin, lawi chaw eia a sawmte chu ko turin a bawite a tir a, nimahsela an lo kal duh lo va.

source: I have a wife
target: Nupui ka nei

source: Then Hananiah the prophet took the yoke from the neck of the prophet Jeremiah and it was broken by his hands.
target: Tin, zâwlnei Hanania chuan nghawngkawl, zâwlnei Jeremian a bah chu a la a, a titliak a.

source: It isn't the Olympics.
target: Olympics a ni lo.

source: I may be late.
target: Ka lo tlai mai thei.

source: Because God's selection and his mercies may not be changed.
target: Pathianin a thilthlawnpekah leh a kohnaah chuan a rilru a lamlet ngai si lo va.

source: She's your daughter, too.
target: I fanu a ni bawk.

source: Don't rush.
target: Hmanhmawh suh.

source: So Joseph came to his death, being a hundred and ten years old: and they made his body ready, and he was put in a chest in Egypt.
target: Chutichuan Josefa chu kum 110 mi a nihin a thi a: tin, a ruang chu tawih thei lovin an siam a, Aigupta ramah kuangah an dah ta a.

source: You're going to have fun.
target: I hlim dawn a ni.

source: Is he drinking coffee
target: Coffee a in em ni

source: And he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord, walking in the ways of his father David, without turning to the right hand or to the left.
target: Tin, LALPA mithmuhah thil tha a ti thin a, a pu Davida kawngte a zawh a, ding lamah emaw vei lamah emaw a pensan lo va.

source: I'm concerned about it
target: Ka ngaihtuah a ni

source: Now have fun
target: Tunah infiam rawh

source: I hate coffee
target: Coffee ka duh lo

source: Who gave witness of the word of God, and of the witness of Jesus Christ, even of all the things which he saw.
target: chu Johana chuan Pathian thu leh Isua Krista hriattirna thu, a thil hmuh zawng zawngte thu chu a hriattir a.

source: He has made ready for him the instruments of death; he makes his arrows flames of fire.
target: Thihna hriamhreite chu amah thah nân a siam ta diam bawk a; A thalte chu alh theiin a siam a.

source: But Sisera went in flight on foot to the tent of Jael, the wife of Heber the Kenite; for there was peace between Jabin, king of Hazor, and the family of Heber the Kenite.
target: Sisera erawh chu Ken mi Hebera nupui Jaeli puan inah kein a tlan lût a: hazor lal Jabina leh Ken mi Hebera chhûngte chu inrem reng an ni a.

source: But when the servants gave her the king's order, Vashti the queen said she would not come: then the king was very angry, and his heart was burning with wrath.
target: Nimahsela lalnu Vasti chuan pindan vengtuten kal tûra lal thupêk an hrilh chu a hnial a; chuvangin lal chu a thinrim ta hle mai a, a thinrim a alh ta a.

source: All the Nethinim, and the children of Solomon's servants, were three hundred and ninety-two.
target: Nethin mi zawng zawng leh Solomona chhiahhlawhho thlahte chu 392 an ni.

source: You've seen enough.
target: I hmu tawk tawh.

source: We have food
target: Chaw kan ei tawh

source: And these are the sons of Shuthelah: of Eran, the family of the Eranites:
target: Tin, heng hi Suthela thlahte an ni. Erana thlahte Eran-ho an ni.

source: This price is reasonable.
target: He man hi a tlawm.

source: Then the Philistines and the Arabians, who are by Ethiopia, were moved by the Lord to make war on Jehoram;
target: Chutichuan Ethipia mite kiang vela mi Philistia-ho leh Arabia-ho rilru chu Jehorama bei tûrin LALPAN a chawk tho va:

source: You will send destruction on those whose words are false; the cruel man and the man of deceit are hated by the Lord.
target: Dawt thu sawi hmangte chu i tiboral ang a: LALPAN thisen chhuah hmang leh bum hmang mi chu a ten riau thin.

source: I can't place him.
target: Ka dah thei lo.

source: And the wealth of Chaldaea will come into the hands of her attackers: all those who take her wealth will have enough, says the Lord.
target: Tin, Kaldai chu rawk a ni ang a, a rawktute chu an tlai êm êm ang, tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: You will put your foot on the lion and the snake; the young lion and the great snake will be crushed under your feet.
target: Sakeibaknei leh rulrial chu i rap ang a: Sakeibaknei vanglai leh rulpui chu i chil nek ang.

source: They know me
target: Min hria

source: So after searching through all the land of Israel for a fair young girl, they saw Abishag the Shunammite, and took her to the king.
target: Chutichuan Israel ram zawng zawngah chuan nula hmêltha an zawng a, Sunam mi Abisagi an va hmu a, lal hnênah chuan an hruai ta a.

source: At whose look the earth is shaking; at whose touch the mountains send out smoke.
target: Ani chuan lei hi a en a, a khur thin a; Tlangte chu a khawih a, a khu chhuak thin.

source: Sami was coughing
target: Sami chu a khuh a

source: Did you write it down?
target: I ziak chhuak em?

source: You're always making mistakes.
target: I tisual fo thin.

source: The thing feared by the evil-doer will come to him, but the upright man will get his desire.
target: Mi suaksual chu, a hlauh ang ngeiin a chungah a lo thleng ang: Mi fel duhthusam chu pêk a ni ang.

source: You're not doing your share.
target: I chanvo i ti lo.

source: They found each other
target: An inhmu ta a

source: Take learning in your hands, do not let her go: keep her, for she is your life.
target: Zirtirna chu vuan tlat la, chhuah suh; Vawng tlat rawh, i nunna a ni si a.

source: Like acid drink to the teeth and as smoke to the eyes, so is the hater of work to those who send him.
target: Ha tan uain thur leh mit tan meikhu angin Mi thatchhia chu a tirtu tan a ni ang.

source: And self-control to knowledge, and a quiet mind to self-control, and fear of God to a quiet mind,
target: in hriatnaah chuan insumna telh ula, in insumnaah chuan chhelna telh ula, in chhelnaah chuan Pathian ngaihsakna telh ula,

source: She's very polite.
target: A polite hle mai.

source: But one of his disciples, Judas Iscariot (who was to give him up, said,
target: Nimahsela Iskariot Juda, a zirtir pakhat, a mantirtu tur chuan,

source: This is your doing
target: Hei hi i tih a ni

source: For the day is near, the day of the Lord is near, a day of cloud; it will be the time of the nations.
target: Nî a hnai e, LALPA nî chu a hnai e, Chhûm zîn nî, awze mite chhiatna tûr.

source: While the Ruler of all was still with me, and my children were round me;
target: Engkimtitheia ka hnêna a awm thin laia, Ka fate ka vêla an awm lai khan,

source: For you have made a town a waste place: a strong town a mass of broken walls; the tower of the men of pride has come to an end; it will never be put up again.
target: Khawpui pawh lei pawngah i chantir a; khua kulhpui nei pawh khaw chhiaah i chantir a; ramdang mite lal in pawh khua lovah i chantir si a. Engtikah mah sakin a awm leh tawh lo vang.

source: I was stupid
target: Ka lo â lûtuk

target: A vâwt a ni

source: I will go quickly in the way of your teaching, because you have given me a free heart.
target: I thupêk kawngah chuan ka tlân ang. Ka thinlung hi i tihzau hunah chuan. HE

source: Your holy towns have become a waste, Zion has become a waste, Jerusalem is a mass of broken walls.
target: I khawpui thianghlimte chu thlalêrah a lo chan a, Zion chu thlalêrah a lo chan a, Jerusalem chu hmun tihțiauvah a lo chan tak hi.

source: Search me
target: Mi dap rawh

source: He could die
target: A thi thei ang

source: So will Beth-el do to you because of your evil-doing; at dawn will the king of Israel be cut off completely.
target: Nangni Bethel mite u, In sual nasa tak avângin Chûng thil chu in chungah a lo thleng dâwn, Israel lal pawh khawfîng chah hmâin a boral ang.

source: Marry me
target: Mi nei rawh

source: And there was a day when the sons of the gods came together before the Lord, and the Satan came with them.
target: Pathian fapate LALPA hmaa na inlan ni a lo awm leh a, Setana pawh LALPA hmaa inlan tûrin an zingah a l kal ve a.

source: And those of the rulers who are sent by him for the punishment of evil-doers and for the praise of those who do well.
target: thiltisualtute chunga phuba la tur leh, thil tithatute fak tura ama tirh chhawn Ram Awptu hnenah pawh.

source: Be thorough
target: Sawizau deuh rawh

source: You're quiet
target: I ngawi chawi

source: For he had great wealth of flocks and herds and great numbers of servants; so that the Philistines were full of envy.
target: berâm rualte leh bâwng rualte a nei a, chhungte tam tak a nei bawk a: tichuan Philistin-ho chuan an îtsîk ta a.

source: You're smirking again.
target: I nui suk leh a.

source: I'm being punished
target: Ka hrem mek a ni

source: You have made me see the ways of life; I will be full of joy when I see your face.
target: Nangin nunna kawngte mi hriattir a Nangin i hmelin lawmin mi tikhat ang,’ tiin.

source: He had no need for any witness about man; for he himself had knowledge of what was in man.
target: mihring thu tumaha hrilhfiah a ngaih loh avangin; amahin mihring chhunga awm apiang chu a hre si a.

source: I'm at a complete loss!
target: Ka hloh vek tawh!

source: We're really good
target: Kan ṭha takzet

source: I'm filthy
target: Ka bal hle

source: Their young men were burned in the fire; and their virgins were not praised in the bride-song.
target: Meiin an tlangvâlte chu a kangral a, An nulate chuan inneihna hla rêng rêng an nei ta lo.

source: Are you stupid or what?
target: I â nge eng nge?

source: I didn't stand there long.
target: Ka ding rei lo.

source: I nodded back
target: Ka bu lêt ve

source: I'm already confused
target: Ka buai tawh

source: I envy him
target: Hepa ka thik

source: Then the fear of the Lord will be clear to you, and knowledge of God will be yours.
target: LALPA tih nanchang i lo hria ang a, Pathian hriatna chu i chhar chhuak ang.

source: Like a ring of gold in the nose of a pig, is a beautiful woman who has no sense.
target: Hmeichhe hmêl tha ngaihruat thiamna nei lo chu Vawk hnara rangkachak khang vuah ang a ni.

source: For these things I am weeping; my eye is streaming with water; because the comforter who might give me new life is far from me: my children are made waste, because the hater is strong.
target: Hêng vang hian ka țap a, ka chhingmit tui ang luang e: Thlamuantu, min tiharhtu tûr awmna kar hlat vângin; Ka hraichawite awmkhua a har ngei, hmêlmain a hneh vângin.

source: I'm loyal.
target: Ka rinawm.

source: For my love they give me back hate; but I have given myself to prayer.
target: Ka hmangaih avângin mi dotute an lo ni ta a: Nimahsela kei chu tawngtai tûrin ka inpe tlat a.

source: You have been fearing the sword, and I will send the sword on you, says the Lord.
target: Khandaih chu in hlau va, in chungah khandaih ka rawn thlen ang, LALPA PATHIAN chuan a ti a ni:

source: You gave me your word.
target: I thu min pe a.

source: She makes linen robes and gets a price for them, and traders take her cloth bands for a price.
target: Lazai sin silhfen a sia a, a zuar thin a, Sumdawngte hnênah kawnghrente a thawn thin.

source: We haven't eaten yet.
target: Chaw kan la ei lo.

source: Is it nice?
target: A tha em?

source: I hate rap.
target: Hla thu chham ka hua.

source: Everyone who is numbered, from twenty years old and over, is to give an offering to the Lord.
target: Chhiar tawhte zînga tel tura kal apiang, kum sawmhnih a chin chulam zawng chuan LALPA puala thilhlan chu an pe tur a ni.

source: For the Lord God is my helper; I will not be put to shame: so I have made my face like a rock, and I am certain that he will give me my right.
target: Lalpa PATHIAN chuan mi țanpui dawn si a; chuvangin ka zak ngai lo va: chuvangin meilung ang tlatin ka hawi țhin a, ka mualpho lo vang tih ka hria.

source: I have given up my house, I have let my heritage go; I have given the loved one of my soul into the hands of her haters.
target: Ka in-lo kalsanin ka roluah tûr ka paih bo ta; Ka nunnain a ngaih taki chu, A hmêlma hnênah ka pe ta.

source: They launched a rocket.
target: Rocket an kap a.

source: I will go
target: Ka kal dawn

source: Again they put God to the test, and gave pain to the Holy One of Israel.
target: An hawi kir lehin Pathian an fiah a, Israel-ho Mi Thianghlim chu an ti vui thin.

source: And this is the certain faith which we have in God through Christ:
target: Tin, Pathian lamah chutiang rinna chu Krista zara kan neih a ni;

source: We have been waiting for you, O Lord; the desire of our soul is for the memory of your name.
target: A ni aw LALPA, i rorêlna kawngah chuan kan nghak reng chia; kan nunna duhzawng chu i hming lam leh nangmah hriat rengna lam hi a ni.

source: I'm not home yet.
target: Ka la haw lo.

source: The first sign of wisdom is to get wisdom; go, give all you have to get true knowledge.
target: Finna hi thupui ber a ni a; chuvangin fina hi nei rawh; A ni, i thil neih zawng zawng chan pawhin finna hi nei rawh.

source: You will surely get over it!
target: I hneh ngei ang!

source: And the men of Zion will not say, I am ill: for its people will have forgiveness for their sin.
target: chu mi khuaa awm chuan, Ka dam lo ve, a ti lovang a, a chhûnga mi awmte chu sual ngaihdamin an awm ang.

source: In no way.
target: Hnai lo ve.

source: We made it
target: Kan siam e

source: I am podding peas.
target: Ka podding peas a ni.

source: Those who make them are like them; and so is everyone who puts his hope in them.
target: Chung siamtute chu chungte ang chuan an awm ang; A ni, chung ringtu apiangte chu.

source: For God has let them all go against his orders, so that he might have mercy on them all.
target: Pathianin a khawngaih vek theih nan mi zawng zawng awih lohnaah a khung ta vek si a.

source: From year to year he went in turn to Beth-el and Gilgal and Mizpah, judging Israel in all those places.
target: Tin, kum tinin Bethel leh Gilgal leh Mizpe hi a kan vel thin a; chung hnuahte chuan Israel mite ro a rêl thin a.

source: Who is false to the husband of her early years, and does not keep the agreement of her God in mind:
target: A tleirawl lai thian kalsan a, A Pathian thuthlung theihnghilhtu lak ata chu.

source: Then the king sent for Ziba, Saul's servant, and said to him, All the property of Saul and of his family I have given to your master's son.
target: Chutichuan lal chuan Saual chhiahhlawh Ziba chu a ko va, a hnênah, Saula thil zawng zawngte leh a chhûngte zawng zawngte thilte chu i pu fapa hi ka pe vek a ni.

source: If you keep my laws, you will be ever in my love, even as I have kept my Father's laws, and am ever in his love.
target: Nangnin ka thupekte in zawm chuan ka hmangaihin in awm reng ang; keiin ka Pa thupekte ka zawm a, a hmangaihin ka awm reng ang bawk hian.

source: Have you ever cheated on me?
target: Min bum tawh em?

source: Who was with the ruler, Sergius Paulus, an able man. This man sent for Barnabas and Saul, desiring to have knowledge of the word of God.
target: Chu mi chu lal aiawhtu, Serjia-Paula, mi fing tak hnena awm a ni a. Chu lal aiawhtu chuan Barnaba leh Saula chu a ko va, Pathian thu hriat a tum a.

source: And there were about four thousand people: and he sent them away.
target: Anni chu sangli lai an ni a; tin, ani chuan anni chu a tintir ta a.

source: See Israel after the flesh: do not those who take as food the offerings of the altar take a part in the altar?
target: Tisa lama Israelho chu en teh u; inthawina sa eitute chuan maicham chu an tawmpui lo vem ni?

source: And Pharaoh gave Joseph the name of Zaphnath-paaneah; and he gave him Asenath, the daughter of Poti-phera, the priest of On, to be his wife. So Joseph went through all the land of Egypt.
target: Tin, Pharaoan Josefa hmingah chuan Zephenathpaneha a vuah a: On khaw puithiam Potiphara fanu Asenathi nupuiah a neihtîr bawk a. tin, Josefa chu a chhuak a, Aigupta ram chu a fang ta a.

source: You're really quite stupid.
target: I â tak zet a ni.

source: I'll be next
target: A dawt ka ni dawn

source: For truly the Son of man did not come to have servants, but to be a servant, and to give his life for the salvation of men.
target: Mihring Fapa meuh pawh rawngbawlsaka awm turin a lo kal lo va, rawngbawl tur leh mi tam tak tlan nana a nun pe zawk turin a lo kal a ni si, a ti a.

source: Man puts an end to the dark, searching out to the farthest limit the stones of the deep places of the dark.
target: Miten thim an titawp a, Hmun hla berte pawh an zawng chhuak a, Thim chhah tak leh thihna daihlima lungte pawh chu.

source: Did I make a profit out of you by any of those whom I sent to you?
target: In hnena ka tirhte zingah khan tu emaw tal hmangin ka hlawk phah che u em ni?

source: Do you go to school
target: Sikul i kal em

source: I coughed.
target: Ka khuh.

source: And I am not saying this so that others may get off free, while the weight comes on you:
target: Mi dang an rim loh va, nangni in rimna turin ka ti a ni lo va,

source: Now the end has come on you, and I will send my wrath on you, judging you for your ways, I will send punishment on you for all your disgusting acts.
target: Tûn hi i tân tâwpna a ni, i chungah ka thinurna ka rawn thlen ang a, i awmdan ang zelin ro ka rel ang chia, i tenawmna zawng zawng chu i chungah ka rawn thlen ang.

source: He's a ghostwriter
target: Ghostwriter a ni a

source: And if this comes to the ruler's ears, we will see that he does not make you responsible.
target: Tin, Ram Awptu in chu chu a lo hriat chuan amah chu kan thlem ang a, lungkham lovin kan siam ang che u, an ti a.

source: Are you tired
target: I hah em

source: A servant when he becomes a king; a man without sense when his wealth is increased;
target: Chhiahhlawh chu lal a lo nih a, Mi â chu buh leh saa a lo tlai a;

source: We're always learning
target: Kan zir zel a ni

source: Tom is my grandfather
target: Tom hi ka pu a ni

source: There are few spectators.
target: Entu an tlem hle.

source: Not so; but let your males go and give worship to the Lord, as your desire is. This he said, driving them out from before him.
target: Hnai lo ve! nângi mipaho erawh chu kal ula, LALPA rawng chu bâwl rawh u' chu chu alâwm in duh, a ti a. Tin, Pharaoa hnên ata chu an hnawt chhuak ta a.

source: And he himself, going before them, went down on his face to the earth seven times till he came near his brother.
target: Tin, amah chu an hmaah chuan a kal a, a u bul a thlen hma chuan vawi sarih lei siin chibai a bûk a.

source: I have been true to your unchanging word; O Lord, do not put me to shame.
target: I thuhriattirahte hian ka bet tlat a: Aw LALPA, mi timualpho suh ang che.

source: It is uprooted by the pigs from the woods, the beasts of the field get their food from it.
target: Ramhnuaia sânghal chuan a tichhia a, Ram sate pawhin an tlan thin.

source: And the king said that this was to be done, and the order was given out in Shushan, and the hanging of Haman's ten sons was effected.
target: Tin, lal chuan chutianga ti tûr chuan thu a pe a; Susanah thupêk chu an puang a. Hamana fapa sawmte chu an khai kang a.

source: His sons regularly went to one another's houses, and every one on his day gave a feast: and at these times they sent for their three sisters to take part in their feasts with them.
target: Tin, a fapate chuan an inah an hun zelah ruai intheh chhawkin an kal khâwm thin a, an farnu pathumte chu an hnêna ei leh in tûrin an sawm thin a.

source: I looked at the trap.
target: Trap chu ka en a.

source: Is he asleep?
target: A mut a chhuak em?

source: And they will come there, and take away all the hated and disgusting things from it.
target: Tin, chutah chuan an lo kal ang a, thil bawlhhlawh zawng zawng leh thil tenawm zawng zawngte chuta ta chu an la bo vang.

source: And David was the youngest: and the three oldest were with Saul's army.
target: Tin, Davida chu a naupangber a ni a; tin, a upate pathum chuan Saula an zui a.

source: For who will have pity on you, O Jerusalem? and who will have sorrow for you? or who will go out of his way to see how you are?
target: Tuin nge khawngaih ang che, aw Jerusalem? Tuin nge lungngaihpui ang che? I awm dan zawt tûrin tunge lo peng ang le?

source: From there he is watching for food; his eye sees it far off.
target: chuta tang chuan ei tûr a bihthla a, A mit chuan hla tak a hmu.

source: The ark with its cover and its rods and the veil hanging before it;
target: bawm leh a zawnfung te, zahngaihna thutphah te, a daidanna tur puanzar nen;

source: The watchmen who go about the town came by me; to them I said, Have you seen him who is my heart's desire?
target: Khawpui venga kal hualtuten min hmu a; Ka hmangaih chu in hmu emaw? Ka ti a.

source: We'll try it
target: Kan tichhin ang

source: Do you want to drink wine?
target: Uain in i duh em?

source: All these were the children of Rachel whom Jacob had by her, fourteen persons.
target: Chûngho chu Rakili fapa Jakoba a hrinsakte chu an ni: an za chuan sâwm leh pali an ni.

source: And the Lord made the heart of Pharaoh hard, and he went after the children of Israel: for the children of Israel had gone out without fear.
target: Tin, LALPAN Aigupta ram lal Pharaoa thînlung chu a tihkhauhsak a, tin, Israela thlahte chu a ûm ta a: Israel thlahte lah chu induh takin an chhuak a ni si a.

source: Then Jacob took young branches of trees, cutting off the skin so that the white wood was seen in bands.
target: Tin, Jakoban hriang leh vai umkhal leh thingse tiang a la a, a pil a khawk var thliah a, tiangahte chuan a var chi a tilang a.

source: About the family of the king of Judah. Give ear to the word of the Lord;
target: Juda lal chhûngte chungchang thuah chuan; LALPA thu hi ngaithla rawh u,

source: At the voice of your wrath, O God of Jacob, deep sleep has overcome carriage and horse.
target: Aw Jakoba Pathian, i zilhhauva avângin Tawlailir leh sakawr pawh muthilhtir derin an awm ve ve a.

source: Grace be with all those who have true love for our Lord Jesus Christ.
target: Kan Lalpa Isua Krista chuai lova hmangaihtute zawng zawng hnenah khawngaihna awm rawh se.

source: But you are happy if you undergo pain because of righteousness; have no part in their fear and do not be troubled;
target: Nimahsela, felna avanga lo tuar ta ang in nih chuan in eng a thawl ang. An hlauhawmna chu hlau suh ula, mangang hek suh u;

source: Why have you taken the Lord's people into this waste, for death to come to us and to our cattle there?
target: Engati nge LALPA mipuihote hi thi tura thlalerah hian i hruai luh ni, keimahni leh kan rante nen?

source: And let this feast be kept before the Lord for seven days in the year: it is a rule for ever from generation to generation; in the seventh month let it be kept.
target: He kut hi LALPA tan kum tin, ni sarih in awhtir tur a ni: hei hi in thlahte zel thlenga kumkhaw dan tur a ni: thla sarihnaah in nei thin ang.

source: Are you crazy?
target: I mâwl a mi?

source: I hiccup leh ta.
target: You're hiccupping again.

source: To whom will he give knowledge? and to whom will he make clear the word? Will it be to those who have newly given up milk, and who have only now been taken from the breast?
target: Hriatna lam chu tu hi nge a zirtir dawn tehchai: Thuchah chu tu hi nge a hriattir dawn tehchai: Hnute hnek bang hlimte leh hnute hnektir tawh lohte hi êm ni?

source: Hey wait up
target: Heu lo nghak rawh

source: And I have given you more than your brothers, even Shechem as your heritage, which I took from the Amorites with my sword and my bow.
target: Chu mi lo pawh chu, i unaute chanvo aiin chan khatin ka pe chuang a che, ka khandaih leh ka thalngula Amor-ho kut ata ka lâksaka kha, a ti a.

source: But as for you, go back, journeying into the waste land by the way of the Red Sea.
target: Nangni erawh chu insuan ula, Tuifinriat Sen lamah thlalerah kal rawh u,' tiin.

source: She doesn't have any siblings.
target: Unau a nei lo.

source: Would you like a little
target: Tlem tal i duh em

source: She doesn't deserve him
target: Amah hi a phu lo

source: Yes, I will take you, breathing on you the fire of my wrath, and you will become soft in it.
target: A ni, ka khâwm ang che u a, in chungah chuan ka thinurna mei ka chhem ang a, a laiah chuan in lo tui zo vang.

source: All those who have done wrong without the law will get destruction without the law: and those who have done wrong under the law will have their punishment by the law;
target: Tupawh Dan nei lova thil tisual chu, Dan lo bawkin a boral ang; tin, tupawh Dan neia thil tisual chu, Dana rorelin a awm ang.

source: And the sons of Samuel: the oldest Joel, and the second Abiah.
target: Tin, Samuela fapate chu a upa zawk chu Joela a nia , a dawttu chu Abija a ni.

source: So they took two horsemen; and the king sent them after the army of the Aramaeans, saying, Go and see.
target: Chutichuan tawlailir hnuktu sakawr pahnih an hruai a; tin, lal chuan, Va en teh ta u, tiin Suria sipaihote um tûrin a tir a.

source: Come, let us go down and take away the sense of their language, so that they will not be able to make themselves clear to one another.
target: Hawh u, i zuk kal ang u khai, tawng an inhriat tawn theih loh nan khutah khuan an tawng i zuk tihhransak ang u, a ti a.

source: Up! O God, be the judge of your cause; keep in mind the bitter things which the man of evil behaviour says against you every day.
target: Aw Pathian, tho la, nangma thu chu insawi chawp la. Mi â chuan nilengin a sawichhiatzia che chu hre reng ang che.

source: This Jesus God has given back to life, of which we all are witnesses.
target: Chu Isua chu Pathianin a kai tho leh ta reng a ni, chu chu a hretu kan zain kan ni e.

source: For he has not been unmoved by the pain of him who is troubled; or kept his face covered from him; but he has given an answer to his cry.
target: Ani chuan hreawm tuartu hreawmzia chu ahmusit si lo va, a ten hek lo; A hmai chu alakah a thup hek lo; Amah a auhin a NGAITHLA ZAWK A.

source: Evils have overcome us: but as for our sins, you will take them away.
target: Khawlohnate chuan mi hneh thin na a: Kan bawhchhiatnate chuan mi hneh thin na a:

source: Let me out
target: Ka chhuak ang

source: For two full years Absalom was living in Jerusalem without ever seeing the face of the king.
target: Chutichuan Absaloma chu kum hnih pumhlum Jerusalem-ah a awm a, nimahsela lal hmêl rêng rêng chu ahmu lo va.

source: So will my Father in heaven do to you, if you do not everyone, from your hearts, give forgiveness to his brother.
target: Mi tinin thinlung taka in unaute inngaihdam loh chuan ka Pa vana mi pawhin chutiang bawkin in chungah a ti ve ang, a ti a.

source: They are talking with each other
target: An inbia a

source: So the servants of the chiefs of the divisions of the land went out of the town, with the army coming after them.
target: Tichuan chungho, ram thentea hotute tlangvâlho leh a rawnzuitu sipaihote chu khua ata an chhuak a.

source: Now Hiram, king of Tyre, hearing that Solomon had been made king in place of his father, sent his servants to him; for Hiram had ever been a friend to David.
target: Tin, tûra lal Hiraman Solomona hnênah a mite a tir a; a pa aiah lal atân hriak an thih tih a lo hre ta si a: Hirama chu Davida ngaina thintu a ni fo reng a.

source: Don't risk anything!
target: Engmah risk suh!

source: I don't feel like going for a walk.
target: Ka kal ka duh lo.

source: It was a very beautiful time.
target: Hun mawi tak a ni.

source: Now the king was seated in the winter house, and a fire was burning in the fireplace in front of him.
target: Thla kuana a ni a, lal chu a thlasik inah chuan a țhu a, a hmâah chuan meihawl thuka vâm a awm a.

source: And on the east side the space is to be fifty cubits wide.
target: Tin, khawchhak lam chhawng, chhak lampang hung chhûng kawtlai vânglam chu tawng sawmngaa sei tur a ni.

source: I left the radio on
target: Radio chu ka on a

source: You're too small
target: I tê lûtuk

source: It's a red herring.
target: Herring sen a ni.

source: Ladies first
target: Nulate hmasa

source: Let him not put his hope in what is false, falling into error: for he will get deceit as his reward.
target: Mahni inhumin engmah lovah innghat suh se, A hmuh tûr chu engmah lo ani dawn si a.

source: The meat is cooked
target: Sa chu a lum a

source: I've been suspended
target: Ka suspend tawh

source: And keep watch over your heart with all care; so you will have life.
target: Thil dang bera aiin i thinlung veng tha rawh, Nuna lo chhuahna ani si a.

source: I say again, Let me not seem foolish to anyone; but if I do, put up with me as such, so that I may take a little glory to myself.
target: Ka sawi leh ang, tuman mi aah mi ruat suh se; nimahsela mi ruat vek chuan, kei pawhin tlem tala ka chhuan ve theih nan mi a angin mi dawh rawh u.

source: He will be like a tree planted by the rivers of water, which gives its fruit at the right time, whose leaves will ever be green; and he will do well in all his undertakings.
target: Ani chu tuiluang kianga thingphun A huntea rah thin. A rah pawh uai ngai lo ang hi a ni a; A thiltih apiang chu a hmuingil zel ang.

source: For I have not kept back from you anything of the purpose of God.
target: Pathian rel zawng zawng azain in hnenah hrilh ka tim loh kha.

source: It's the day of the Lord.
target: Lalpa ni a ni.

source: Our name is a word of shame among the nations, a sign for the shaking of heads among the peoples.
target: Nangin hnam tin zingah a chhe lam tehkhinnaah min awmtir a, Mi tin, zinga mite lu thinsanin min awmtir bawk a.

source: You decide
target: I thutlûk tawh

source: She is of more value than jewels, and nothing for which you may have a desire is fair in comparison with her.
target: Lunghlu sen mi aiin a hlu a; Thil i duhthusam theih ang zawng zawngin a hen lo.

source: What will you do on the day of worship, and on the day of the feast of the Lord?
target: Khâwmpui urhsun nîah leh LALPA kût nîah chuan Eng nge in tih tâk ang le?

source: It isn't from me.
target: Ka hnen atangin a ni lo.

source: I got them some water.
target: Tui ka pe a.

source: Who give help to a man in a wrong cause, and who put a net for the feet of him who gives decisions in the public place, taking away a man's right without cause.
target: chungte chuan mi chu thupawi thu-ah thiltisualtuah an sia țhin a, kulh kawngkaa ziltu awh nân thang an kam țhin a, mi fel chu thil engmah lo maiin an pumpelhtir țhin.

source: Who voted for him?
target: Tuin nge a vote?

source: He is the stone which you builders had no use for, but which has been made the chief stone of the building.
target: Nangni in satute u, in lung paih, a kila lung tangkai ber lo ni ta kha amah hi a ni e.

source: And I like that.
target: Tin, chu chu ka duh khawp mai.

source: They burned themselves
target: Anmahni an hal a

source: He struck a match
target: Match pakhat a struck a ni

source: In the great house the king's daughter is all shining: her clothing is worked with gold.
target: Lal in chhûnga lal fanu chu a ropui vêl vek a: A silhfen chu rangkachaka zeh mawi a ni.

source: Is it cancer?
target: Cancer a ni em?

source: In the year when the Tartan came to Ashdod, sent by Sargon, king of Assyria, and made war against it and took it;
target: Assuria lal Sargona tithin Tartana Asdod khuaa a lo kal a, Asdod khua a bei a, a lâk kum khan;

source: It's not a weapon.
target: Hriamhrei a ni lo.

source: O how deep is the wealth of the wisdom and knowledge of God! no one is able to make discovery of his decisions, and his ways may not be searched out.
target: Pathian finna leh hriatna ngahzia chu a va thuk em! A rorelnate chu hriat theih rual leh, a kawngte chu chhui theih rual a va ni lo em!

source: And he is the head of the body, the church: the starting point of all things, the first to come again from the dead; so that in all things he might have the chief place.
target: Ani chu taksa chu chu kohhranho lu a ni a; engkimah chungnung ber a lo nih theih nan, a bulpui, mitthi zing ata piang hmasa bera chu a ni.

source: But they put shame on the servants of God, making sport of his words and laughing at his prophets, till the wrath of God was moved against his people, till there was no help.
target: nimahsela Pathian mi tirhte chu an hmusit a, a thute chu an ngainep a,a mite chunga LALPA thinurna chu a lo thawh a, tihlungawi lehna reng awm lo khawp hialin a zâwlneite chu an tinawmnah a.

source: You're old
target: I upa

source: Do you have a gun
target: Silai i nei em

source: Then the king put out the rod of gold to Esther, and she got up before the king.
target: Tin, lal chuan rangkachak tiang chu Estheri lamah chuan a han lek phei a. Chutichuan Estheri chu a tho va, lal hmaah chuan a ding a,

source: And Lebanon is not enough to make a fire with, or all its cattle enough for a burned offering.
target: Lebanon meuh pawh tuah tham a ni lo va, a rama rante pawh hâlrala inthawina tham an ni hek lo.

source: Tom stood.
target: Tom-a a ding.

source: He likes to talk
target: Thusawi a ngaina hle

source: And the king was very sad; but because of his oaths, and those who were with him at table, he would not say 'No' to her.
target: Tin, lal chu a lungngai ta em em mai a, nimahsela a chhechhamte leh a chaw kilpuite avang chuan a lo hnial duh lo va.

source: We will not give glory to ourselves in over-great measure, but after the measure of the rule which God has given us, a measure which comes even to you.
target: Keini erawh zawng kan tehna tawk aliamah chuan kan uang lo vang a, Pathianin bial min chantir a, chu tehna ang zel chuan kan uang zawk ang, nangmahni pawh bial hial tura tehna chu.

source: It's nice
target: A nalh e

source: Are you accusing us
target: Min puh em ni

source: Morning by morning will I put to death all the sinners in the land, so that all evil-doers may be cut off from Jerusalem.
target: Tuk tin, he rama mi suaksualte zawng zawng hi ka tiboral ang; LALPA khawpui ata hi thil tisualtute zawng zawng tiboral tûrin.

source: He is not much of an artist
target: Artist a ni vak lo

source: For God is true, and will not put away from him the memory of your work and of your love for his name, in the help which you gave and still give to the saints.
target: In hnathawh leh a hming chunga hmangaihna in lantir, mi thianghlimte rawng in lo bawl, tun thleng pawha in la bawl cheu chu theihnghilh turin Pathian chu mi fel lo a ni si lo va.

source: And by knowledge its rooms are full of all dear and pleasing things.
target: Tin, hriatna avângi pindan chu Sum hlu tak leh duhawm taka tihkhahin a awm.

source: The more so, because you are expert in all questions to do with the Jews and their ways: so I make my request to you to give me a hearing to the end.
target: hei hi ka lawmna ber a ni, Judate zingah dan leh thubuai zawng zawng kawnga I fin ngawt avangin: chuvangin muang taka mi ngaihthlaksak turin ka ngen a che.

source: But they would not have him there, because he was clearly going to Jerusalem.
target: Tin, a mitmei chu Jerusalem khaw lam pana a lan avangin amah an lo lawm lo.

source: Had your food
target: Chaw i ei tawh em

source: These are the things which you are to do: Let every man say what is true to his neighbour; and let your judging give peace in your towns.
target: Heng hi in thil tih tûr chu a ni ang: Mi tinin mahni țhenawm hnênah thudik tak sawi țheuh ula, In kawngka bulah thudik leh remna ro rêl rawh u.

source: OK, listen up
target: Awle, ngaithla ru

source: Let my hater be like the evil man, and let him who comes against me be as the sinner.
target: Ka hmêlma chu mi suaksual ni sela, Mi beitu chu mi fel lo ni teh se.

source: Where the roads go into the town her cry goes out, at the doorways her voice is loud:
target: Khaw tawntirh kawngkaah, Khaw luhna kawngka bulahte ring takin a au va.

source: They should be ashamed
target: An zak tur a ni

source: Then his heart went out in love to Dinah, the daughter of Jacob, and he said comforting words to her.
target: Tin, a rilru chu Jakoba fanu Dinaii chungah chuan a awm tlat a, chu nula chu a hmangaih a, ani chu tawngkam tha takin a bia a.

source: Mountains and all hills; fruit-trees and all trees of the mountains:
target: Tlâng lian leh tlâng te zawng zawngte u; Thing rah duhte leh sidar thing zawng zawngte u:

source: Tom's dead
target: Toma a thi

source: I am okay
target: Ka tha e

source: How gallant are you!
target: I va huaisen em!

source: And Esau was hated, and I sent destruction on his mountains, and gave his heritage to the beasts of the waste land.
target: Esauva erawh chu ka hua a, a tlângte chu hmun țiauvah ka siam a, a rochan chu thlalêr sihalte ka pe a.

source: He makes a fertile country into a salt waste, because of the sins of those who are living there.
target: Ram tha chu ram ro alah a chantir thin, A chhûnga awmho suahsual avangin.

source: I'm not stupid, am I?
target: Ka â lo a ni maw?

source: Keep in mind that you were a servant in the land of Egypt: for this is why I give you orders to do this.
target: Tin, Aigupta ramah khan bawih in ni tawh tih in hre reng tur a ni; chuvang chuan a ni, heng thl hi ti tura thu ka pêk che u ni.

source: Help yourself
target: Nangmahin tirawh

source: To him who goes or the clouds of heaven, the heaven which was from earliest times; he sends out his voice of power.
target: Vante van hmasânga awmte chunga chuanga chu; Ngai teh, a aw a chhuah e, aw nasa tak mai chu.

source: This is mine
target: Hei hi ka tâ a ni

source: Of laughing I said, It is foolish; and of joy--What use is it?
target: Nuih hi a âtthlâkzia ka chhar chhuak a, hlimhlawp lah eng ruai a ni lo.

source: And all the people whom Ishmael had taken away prisoners from Mizpah, turning round, came back and went to Johanan, the son of Kareah.
target: Tichuan Ismaelan Mizpah khua ațanga sala a hruai zawng zawng chu an hawi a, an kal ta dua a,

source: And the sons of Israel came with all the others to get grain: for they were very short of food in the land of Canaan.
target: Tichuan Israela fapate chu mi kalho zîngah chuan buh lei tûrin an kal ve a: Kanaan ramah pawh tâm a tla ve si a.

source: I reserved a seat
target: Seat ka reserve a

source: You prefer to go to bed.
target: Mut i duh zawk.

source: And the Lord made ready a great fish to take Jonah into its mouth; and Jonah was inside the fish for three days and three nights.
target: Tin, LALPA chuan Jona lem tûrin sângha lian tak a lo ruat tawh a; chu sângha kawchhûngah chuan Jona chu ni thum leh zan thum a awm a.

source: Was Tom hurt?
target: Tom a nâ em?

source: Then I sent to him, saying, No such things as you say are being done, they are only a fiction you have made up yourself.
target: Chutichuan a hnênah, I sawi ang rêng rêng hian engmah tih a awm lo, i phuahchawp mai a ni, tiin a hnênah mi a tir a.

source: For the mind of the flesh is death, but the mind of the Spirit is life and peace:
target: Nimahsela Pathian thu chu engmah lo anga awm ta a ni lo ve. Israela thlahte chu Israel mi an ni vek lo ve;

source: Thank you, Mother.
target: Ka lâwm e, Nu.

source: They don't understand us.
target: Min hrethiam lo.

source: I fear no one
target: Tumah ka hlau lo

source: They didn't give us their reasons
target: An chhan min pe lo

source: You're up early.
target: I va tho hmâ ve.

source: You do not look well.
target: I hmel a tha lo.

source: I swam today
target: Vawiinah ka hleuh

source: How while they were undergoing every sort of trouble, and were in the greatest need, they took all the greater joy in being able to give freely to the needs of others.
target: khatia hrehawma fiahna nasa tak chunga an hlimna liam leh nasa taka an retheihna chu a liam a, an thilphalna nasa taka a chan takzia kha.

source: And his father and mother were full of wonder at the things which were said about him.
target: Tin, nausen thu a sawi chu a nu leh a pa chuan mak an ti hle a.

source: Now Sheshan had no sons, but only daughters. And Sheshan had an Egyptian servant, whose name was Jarha.
target: Sesana chuan fanute tih loh chu fa a nei lo va. Tin, Sesana chuan Aigupta mi chhiahhlawh anei a, a hming chu Jara a ni.

source: Even if those who have been forced out are living in the farthest part of heaven, the Lord your God will go in search of you, and take you back;
target: In zinga mi van tap thlenga hnawhchuah an awm chuan, LALPA in Pathian inchuta ta chu a hruai khawm ang che u a, chuta ta chu a hruai chhuak ang che u;

source: We don't keep them all.
target: Kan vawng vek lo.

source: This one or that one?
target: Hemi nge chu chu?

source: I finished writing.
target: Ka ziak zo ta a.

source: It's sunny
target: Ni a sa

source: I didn't demand anything.
target: Engmah ka phut lo.

source: And the families of Judah will say in their hearts, The people of Jerusalem have their strength in the Lord of armies, their God.
target: Tin, Juda hotute chuan, Jerusalem luahtute chu Sipaihote LALPA an pathian ah chuan Ka chakna an ni, an ti rilru ang.

source: Let its morning stars be dark; let it be looking for light, but may it not have any; let it not see the eyes of the dawn.
target: A vartian arsi chu thim sela, Eng lo nghak se, hmu si lo sela. Zing khawfingchat pawh hmu hek suh se:

source: A man will be praised in the measure of his wisdom, but a wrong-minded man will be looked down on.
target: Mi â fin dan ang zela fakin a awm ang a, Mi luhlul erawh chu hmuhsit a ni ang.

source: Let's switch
target: Thlâkthleng ang

source: And Saul said to Ahijah, Let the ephod come here. For he went before Israel with the ephod at that time.
target: Tin, Saula chuan Ahija hnênah chuan, Pathian bâwm chu han la rawh khai, a ti a. Chumi lai chuan Pathian bâwm chu Israela thlahte hnêna awm ani a.

source: If you get a Hebrew servant for money, he is to be your servant for six years, and in the seventh year you are to let him go free without payment.
target: Hebrai mi, chhiahhlawhah lo lei ang la, kum ruk rawng a bâwl ang a: tin, a kum sarih kum chuan intlan lo pawhin a chhuak mai thei ang.

source: He who keeps the law keeps his soul; but death will be the fate of him who takes no note of the word.
target: Thupêk vawng tha chuan a nunna a vawng tah a ni a, A awm dana fimkhur lo erawh chu a thi ang.

source: Then Moses went down from the mountain to the people, and made the people holy; and their clothing was washed.
target: Chutichuan Mosia chu tlâng ata mipuiho zîngah chuan a lo chhuk a, mipuite chu a tithianghlim a; tin, an puante an su fai a.

source: And the servants of Saul gave him an account of what David had said.
target: Tin, Saula chhiahhlawhte chuan, Davida chuan chutiangin a ti a ni, tiin an hrilh a.

source: And on that day you will put no questions to me. Truly I say to you, Whatever request you make to the Father, he will give it to you in my name.
target: Chu mi niah chuan nangnin engmah kei mi zawt lo vang. Tih tak meuhvin, tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, Pa hnenah engpawh in dil chuan, keima hmingin a pe ang che u.

source: Those who do business among the peoples make sounds of surprise at you; you have become a thing of fear, you have come to an end for ever.
target: Mite zînga sumdawngtuten an chek khum che, Mi tân țihkhaiah i lo chang ta, 'I lang leh tawh ngai lo vang le!,' tiin an țah khum che.

source: He made it
target: A thleng e

source: For I give witness of them that they have a strong desire for God, but not with knowledge.
target: Pathian lamah thahnem an ngai tih ka hriatpui a ni, hre famkim ang erawh chuan an ngai lo.

source: Are they in the gym?
target: Gym ah an awm em?

source: Take on yourselves one another's troubles, and so keep the law of Christ.
target: In ritphurhte chu inchhawk tawn rawh u, chutichuan Krista dan thu chu in zawm a ni ang.

source: They've forgiven me.
target: Min ngaidam tawh.

source: Let's start working.
target: Hnathawh tan ila.

source: He will be laughed at by the Lord, who sees that his day is coming.
target: Lalpa chuan ani chu anuihsan ang: A ni alo thleng dawn tih a hriat avângin.

source: And keep my rules and do them: I am the Lord, who make you holy.
target: Ka thupêkte chu in pawmin in zawmtur a ni; Kei hi LALPA a tithianghlimtu che u ka ni.

source: Then Joshua said, Take away the stones from the mouth of the hole in the rock, and make those five kings come out to me.
target: Chutichuan Josuan,'Pûk kawngka kha han hawng tawh ula, lal pangate kha pûk ata ka hnenah han hruai rawh u, a ti a.

source: You didn't buy bread.
target: Chhang i lei lo.

source: The bus is coming
target: Bus chu a lo kal a

source: If among the prisoners you see a beautiful woman and it is your desire to make her your wife;
target: sal zinga hmeichhe hmel tha tak, in mi duhzawng tak in hmuh chuan,

source: There Abraham and Sarah his wife were put to rest, and there they put Isaac and Rebekah his wife, and there I put Leah to rest.
target: chutah chuan Abrahama leh a nupui Sari chu an phûm a; chutah chuan Isaaka leh a nupui Rebeki chu an phûm a; chutah bawk chuan Leaii ka phûm a:

source: So Esau made his living-place in the hill-country of Seir (Esau is Edom.
target: Tichuan Esauva chu Seir tlângah chuan awm ta a: Esauva chu Edoma a ni a.

source: He twisted my arm.
target: Ka kut a rawn beng a.

source: And a number of them said, He has an evil spirit and is out of his mind; why do you give ear to him?
target: A then tam takin Ramhuai a zawl a, a a a nih hi; engati nge a thu in ngaihthlak? an ti a.

source: But I say to the unmarried and to the widows, It is good for them to be even as I am.
target: Nimahsela lengtulte leh hmeithaite hnenah chuan heti hian ka ti a ni : Keimah ang tak hian awm sela an tan a tha ang.

source: And he will go back to his land with great wealth; and his heart will be against the holy agreement; and he will do his pleasure and go back to his land.
target: Tichuan, sum tam tak nên ama ramah a kîr leh ang a, a thinlung chu thuthlung thianghlim dovin a awm ang: chutiangin a ti ang a, ama ram ngeiah a kîr leh ang.

source: There is no searching out of the Ruler of all: his strength and his judging are great; he is full of righteousness, doing no wrong.
target: Engkimtitheia chu kan hmu chhuak thei lo va, Thiltihtheihna leh diknaah a ropui a, Felna a ngah a, a hnehchhiah lo vang.

source: Yes, I know
target: Aw, ka hria

source: This is our house
target: Hei hi kan in a ni

source: I miss Boston
target: Boston ka ngai

source: But solid food is for men of full growth, even for those whose senses are trained by use to see what is good and what is evil.
target: Chaw rum erawh chu puitlingte tan a ni, chungte chuan an hman fo avangin, chhia leh tha fiah turin an hriat theihnate chu an sawizawi tawh.

source: Layla chuan chutiang chuan a ti em?
target: Did Layla do that?

source: That biteth the horse heels
target: Kalkawnga rûlrial

source: He tricked me
target: Khapa khân mi bum a

source: And later, all the children of Israel came near, and he gave them all the orders which the Lord had given him on Mount Sinai.
target: Chumi hnuah chuan Israela thlahte zawng zawng chuan an rawn hnaih a: tichuan Sinai tlânga LALPA nena an inbiakna zawng zawngte chu thu pein a lo hrilh chhawng a.

source: Make my soul safe from the sword, my life from the power of the dog.
target: Ka nunna hi khandaih lakah chuan chhanhim la; Ka neih chhun tak hi ui thiltihtheihna lakah chuan chhanhim ang che.

source: But they said, Were we to let him make use of our sister as a loose woman?
target: Tin, anni chuan, Kan farnu hi nawhchizuar tih angin a ti tûr em ni ang? an ti a.

source: Lie still.
target: Che lovin mu rawh.

source: And the Pharisees went out, and straight away made designs with the Herodians about how they might put him to death.
target: Tin, Pharisaite chu an chhuak a, amah an tihhlum theihnazia tur ngaihtuahin Heroda pawla mite nen chuan an inrawn ta nghal a.

source: The Lord gives decisions in righteousness for all who are in trouble.
target: LALPA chuan, hnehchhiahna tuar zawng zawngte tan, Thil felte tihsakin, rote a relsak thin.

source: But sinners will be cut off from the land, and those whose acts are false will be uprooted.
target: Mi suaksualte erawh chu leilung ata tihboral an ni ang a Vervek taka titute chu tihboral phiar an ni ang.

source: We care about people
target: Mi kan ngaihsak a

source: When he says fair words, have no belief in him; for in his heart are seven evils:
target: Tha taka thu a sawi pawhin ring suh, A thinlungah thil tenawm pasarih a pai si a;

source: And after these things I saw, and the house of the Tent of witness in heaven was open:
target: Chung hnuah chuan ka han en a, tin, vana hriattirna biak buk pindan chhungnung chu an hawng a,

source: And after it has been seen by the priest, the thing which is so marked is to be shut up for seven days:
target: Tin, puithiamin hri chu a lo en ang a, hri kaina chu ni sarih a khung hrang ang a;

source: It's a cargo ship
target: Cargo lawng a ni

source: But those things which were profit to me, I gave up for Christ.
target: Nimahsela, ka tana hlawkna tur apiangte chu chung chu Krista avangin channaah ka ruat ta a ni.

source: Let's not sing any more.
target: Zai tawh lo ila.

source: Let's rest
target: Chawl ang

source: He consumes an enormous amount of liquor.
target: Zu a in nasa hle.

source: I meant to tell you.
target: Ka sawi tum a ni.

source: au revoir
target: dam takin

source: And you will be searching for me and I will be there, when you have gone after me with all your heart.
target: Tin, mi zawng ang a, in thinlung zawng zawnga mi zanw hunah chuan mi hmu ang.

source: I saw it.
target: Ka hmu kha.

source: I'm fearless
target: Hlauh ka nei lo

source: Jehoshaphat became greater and greater, and made strong towers and store-towns in Judah.
target: Tichuan Jehosaphat achu alo ropi ta hle mai a, Judai ramah kulhte leh thil dah khawmna khuate a siam a,

source: Are you afraid of that
target: Chu chu i hlau em

source: In the same way with your oxen and your sheep: for seven days let the young one be with its mother; on the eighth day give it to me.
target: Chutiang bawkin i sebâwngpate leh i berâmte pawh chu i ti tûr a ni: ni sarih chu a pui hnênah a awm ang a, a ni riat nî chuan mi pe tûr a ni.

source: Then the Evil One took him to the holy town; and he put him on the highest point of the Temple and said to him,
target: Chu mi zawhah chuan diabolan khaw thianghlimah chuan a hruai lut a, Pathian biak in chhip zumah chuan a dah a,

source: Is it an elk
target: Sazuk lian chi a ni em

source: My throat is dry like a broken vessel; my tongue is fixed to the roof of my mouth, and the dust of death is on my lips.
target: Ka tha hi lampei angin a ro zo va; Ka lei pawh hi ka dangah a bet ta tlat a; Nangin thihna vaivutah hian mi hruai lut ta ani hi.

source: I didn't call you.
target: Ka call lo che.

source: So the Pharisees said to him, The witness you give is about yourself: your witness is not true.
target: Chutichuan Pharisaiten a hnenah, Mahni thu hriattir i ni; i thu hriattir a dik lo ve an ti a.

source: Not giving up our meetings, as is the way of some, but keeping one another strong in faith; and all the more because you see the day coming near.
target: thenkhat tih dan anga kan inkhawmte bansan lovin, infuih tawn zawk ang u; ni chu lo hnai telh telha in hriatin infuih tawn nasa lehzual sauh rawh u.

source: They are numbered among the Rephaim, like the Anakim; but are named Emim by the Moabites.
target: chungho pawh chu Anak-ho ang bawka Repha-ho tih an ni a; nimahsela Moab-ho chuan Em-ho an ti țhin a ni.

source: For six days let your food be unleavened bread; and on the seventh day there is to be a holy meeting to the Lord your God; no work is to be done.
target: Ni ruk chhûng chu chhang dawidim telh loh in ei tur a ni; tin, a ni sarih ni chu LALPA in Pathian tan inkhawmpui thianghlim ani ang a, hna in thawk tur a ni lo.

source: A good name is more to be desired than great wealth, and to be respected is better than silver and gold.
target: Sum tak tak aiin hming tha hi thlan zawk tûr a ni a, Tangka leh rangkachak aiin duhsakna a ngainatawm.

source: And we had a dream on the same night, the two of us, and the dreams had a special sense.
target: tin, kei leh ani chuan zan khatah mumang kan nei a, mumang awmze hrang ve ve a ni kan neih ni.

source: They're Christians
target: Kristian an ni

source: And David, clothed in a linen ephod, was dancing before the Lord with all his strength.
target: Tin, Davida chu a theihtawpin LALPA hmaa a lam a, Davida chuan puan zai sin puithiam kawr a ha a.

source: And as the church is under Christ's authority, so let wives be under the rule of their husbands in all things.
target: Chutichuan, kohhranho Krista hnena an intulut ang bawk hian nupuite chu engkimah an pasalte hnenah intulut rawh se.

source: And the cloth, which had been round his head, not with the linen bands but rolled up in a place by itself.
target: a lua inhrukna puan awm chu, puan zai sinte zinga awm lovin, zial sain hmun hranga awm a hmu a.

source: She threatened Mary
target: Mari chu a vau a

source: Your country has become waste; your towns are burned with fire; as for your land, it is overturned before your eyes, made waste and overcome by men from strange lands.
target: In ram chu a tiau zo va; in khuate chu meiin a kang zo va: in ram chu ram dang miten in mithmuhah an ei zo va, ram dang mite tihchhiat angin a chhe zo ta.

source: That's me
target: Kha kha keimah

source: For wealth is not for ever, and money does not go on for all generations.
target: Sum leh paite chu chatuan atân a ni lo va; Lallukhum chuan chhuan zawng zawng a daih a em ni?

source: This is true
target: Hei hina dik

source: Then the king made answer and said, Give her the child, and do not put it to death; she is the mother of it.
target: Tichuan lal chuan a chhâng a, Naute dama kha pe rawh u, that hlek suh u: amah ngei kha anu a nih kha, a ti a.

source: I'm not dumb
target: Mi mâwl ka ni lo

source: Don't fall asleep
target: Muhil suh

source: And because I was unable to see because of the glory of that light, those who were with me took me by the hand, and so I came to Damascus.
target: Tin, chu eng ropui avang chuan khua ka hmu thei ta lo va, ka thianten kutin min kai a, Damaska khuaah ka lut ta a.

source: Even there will I be guided by your hand, and your right hand will keep me.
target: Chutah pawh chuan i kutin mi hruai ang a, I kut ding lamin mi chelh dawn si a.

source: I'm new here
target: A thar ka nia

source: I lost.
target: Ka bo.

source: For I will make clear to him what troubles he will have to undergo for me.
target: ka hming avangin hrehawm engtia nasa nge a tuar tur amah ka la hriattir dawn a ni, a ti a.

source: I got changed
target: Ka danglam tawh

source: Then the high priest put questions to Jesus about his disciples and his teaching.
target: Tin, Puithiam Lalber chuan Isua chu a zirtirte chanchin leh a zirtirzia thu a zawt a.

source: You have said sharp words to the nations, you have sent destruction on the sinners, you have put an end to their name for ever and ever.
target: Hnam tin i zilhhau va, mi suaksualte i tiboral a, An hming hchu kumkhaw tlaitluan atân i thai bo ta a.

source: My eyes are wasting away with trouble; they are becoming old because of all those who are against me.
target: Hmuh pawh ka hmu thei ta lo: Hmêlma avângin ka tap a, ka mit pawh a thim zo ta.

source: You may not make cuts in your flesh in respect for the dead, or have marks printed on your bodies: I am the Lord.
target: Mitthi avangin in taksa in zai tur a ni lo va, in intial tur a ni hek lo: Kei hi LALPA chu ka ni.

source: For the Lord's wealth is his people; Jacob is the land of his heritage.
target: LALPA chanvo chu a mite an ni a; Jakob-ho chu a rochan an ni.

source: And put noble kings to death: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:
target: Lal hmingthang tak tak: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: But God has made clear his love to us, in that, when we were still sinners, Christ gave his life for us.
target: Nimahsela Pathian chuan a mi hmangaihna chu fak tlakin a lantir a, mi sualte kan la nih laia Krista kan aia a thih avng khan.

source: What are you doing up?
target: Eng nge i tih up?

source: Troubles are round us on every side, but we are not shut in; things are hard for us, but we see a way out of them;
target: Lehlam lehlama neksawrin kan awm a, nimahsela kan thaw a ipik si lo; mangangin kan awm a, nimahsela kan bei a dawng si lo;

source: I chew gum
target: Thelret ka thial

source: A talent of the best gold was used for the making of it and its vessels.
target: Chu mi khawnvar dahna leh a hmanrua tur zawng zawng siam nan chuan rangkachak hlir hlak talent khat a hmang a.

source: And straight away he got up before them, and took up his bed and went away to his house giving praise to God.
target: Tichuan an mithmuhah a tho ta nghal a, a mutna chu a la a, Pathian fak chung zelin a inah a haw ta a.

source: There were seven brothers: and the first took a wife, and at his death there were no offspring;
target: Aw le, sal sarih an awm a; a upa berin nupui a nei a, chi thlah lovin a thi a.

source: We are watering the garden.
target: Huan tui kan pe a.

source: There is no one to give a decision between us, who might have control over us.
target: Kan chunga kut nghat ve ve tûr, Kan kara thu titlutu reng an awm o.

source: And for sixty years old and over, for a male the value will be fifteen shekels, and for a female, ten.
target: Tin, kum sawmruk atanga a chung lam a nih chuan, I ruat dan tur chu mipa chu sekel sâwm leh panga, hmeichhia chu chu sekel sawm a ni ang.

source: What is the number of my evil-doings and my sins? give me knowledge of them.
target: Ka khawlohna leh sualnate engtia tam nge ni?ê Ka bawhchiatna leh ka sualna mi hriattir rawh.

source: In that day a man's heart will be turned to his Maker, and his eyes to the Holy One of Israel.
target: Chu mi niah chuan miin an siamtu lam an en tawh ang a, an mitte chu Israel-ho Mi Thianghlim chuan a thlir tawh ang.

source: They're running late
target: An tlan tlai tawh

source: Let Tom in
target: Toma lo luh tir rawh

source: Cool off!
target: Inbengdai rawh!

source: Because they were turned away from my orders, and were not guided by my rules, and had no respect for my Sabbaths: for their hearts went after their images.
target: Ka thurêlte an paih thla a, ka dan siamte an zawh lo va, ka chawlhnite an bawhchhiat avângin: an thinlung chuan an milimte a awn tlat si a.

source: Have you no memory of what I said when I was with you, giving you word of these things?
target: In hnena ka lo awm lai khan chung thu chu ka hrilh thin che u tih in hre reng lo vem ni?

source: Feed the bird
target: Sava chaw pe rawh

source: I'm Skip Wallace.
target: Skip Wallace ka nia.

source: No one is talking
target: Tumah an sawi lo

source: Then all the people got up as one man and said, Not one of us will go to his tent or go back to his house:
target: Tichuan mipuiho zawng zawng chu thukhat vuain an thu tho thup a, Tumah mahni puan in lamah kan haw hauh lo vang a, tumah mahni inah kan lût hek lo vang.

source: Tom can come
target: Tom a lo kal thei

source: You haven't changed
target: I la danglam lo

source: But I have no need of a man's witness: I only say these things so that you may have salvation.
target: Thu hriattir ka pawm erawh chu mihring thu a ni lo, nimahsela in damna turin heng thu hi ka sawi a nih hi.

source: For thirty days the children of Israel were weeping for Moses in the table-lands of Moab, till the days of weeping and sorrow for Moses were ended.
target: Tin, Israela thlahte chuan Mosia chu Moab phaiah ni sawmthum an tah a; chutichuan Mosia suna tah nite chu a lo tawp ta a.

source: Tom is going inside
target: Tom chu a lut a

source: I will make them go down to death like lambs, like he-goats together.
target: Ka hruai thla ang, berâm no talh tûr angin, berâmpate, kelpate ang maiin.

source: But you are laughing at them, O Lord; you will make sport of all the nations.
target: Niamhsela aw LALPA, nangin anni chu i nuihsan zawk ang a; Hnam tinreng chu i nuihzabur ang.

source: You baked nothing.
target: Engmah i bak lo.

source: They'll try again
target: An tum leh ang

source: I'll go to bed early.
target: Ka mu hma ang.

source: And strange men may be full of your wealth, and the fruit of your work go to the house of others;
target: Ram dang mite chu i thahruiin i titlai ang a, I thawhrimna chu hmêl hriat loh inah a awm dah ang e.

source: He's under treatment.
target: Enkawl mek a ni.

source: For it says in the law of Moses, It is not right to keep the ox from taking the grain when he is crushing it. Is it for the oxen that God is giving orders?
target: Mosia Dan Lehkhabuah chuan, Sebawngpain buh a chil laiin a hmui phuar suh ang che, tih ziak a ni si a. Pathianin sebawngpa tan mai em ni a ngaihtuahsak ni?

source: You were an animal.
target: Rannung i ni a.

source: They got Tom.
target: Tom-a an man.

source: See it up there?
target: Chuta chung lamah chuan i hmu em?

source: For forty years I have been your guide through the waste land: your clothing has not become old on your backs, or your shoes on your feet.
target: Thlalerah kum sawmli ka hruai ta che u a; in filhfente chu in sin chul lo va, in pheikhawk bunte chu in bun chul lo bawk a.

source: Wherever there is property in land, the owner is to have the right of getting it back.
target: In ram luah zawng zawng chu a nei tur hmasain a tlan let thei tur a ni.

source: Then you will get up from your secret position and take the town, for the Lord your God will give it up into your hands.
target: tin, chan rukna ata in lo chhuak ang a, khawpui chu in la dawn nia: LALPA in Pathianin in kutah a pe dawn e.

source: It hurts
target: Mi tina

source: And they had taken no thought to get bread; and they had only one cake of bread with them in the boat.
target: Tin, a zirtirte chuan chhang an ken theihnghilh a, chhang tlang khat chauh lo chu lawngah chuan chhang dang reng an nei si lo va.

source: I'm watching them
target: Ka en reng a

source: You can't have wanted it.
target: I duh lo thei lo.

source: And be kind to one another, full of pity, having forgiveness for one another, even as God in Christ had forgiveness for you.
target: Tin, inkhawngaih tawna lainatna neiin awm ula, Pathianin Kristaa a ngaidam che u ang bawkin inngaidam tawn rawh u.

source: Put yourself now in a right relation with him and be at peace: so will you do well in your undertakings.
target: Nangmah ngeiin amah tlawn la, remna siam rawh, Richuan, i tan thil tha alo chhuak ang.

source: For your sorrow will go from your memory, like waters flowing away:
target: I hreawm i theihnghilh ang a, Tui luang bo tawh angin i hre reng ang:

source: And he took of the wine of it and was overcome by drink; and he was uncovered in his tent.
target: uain chu a in a, a rui a; tichuan a puan inah chuan a mu sual ta a.

source: Yes, pretty good.
target: Aw, ṭha tak an ni.

source: I keep in mind the early days of the past, giving thought to all your acts, even to the work of your hands.
target: Hmasâng nite chu ka hre reng thin a; I thiltih zawng zawngte chu ka ngaihtuah thin a: I kut hnathawhte chu ka chhut thin.

source: God was looking down from heaven on the children of men, to see if there were any who had wisdom, searching after God.
target: Hre thiama Pathian zawng rêng rêng an awm emaw tih hre tûrin Pathianin van atnagin mihring fate hi a zuk en a.

source: And she will be made waste among the countries which have been made waste, and her towns will be among the towns which are unpeopled.
target: Ram tihțiau tawhte zînga pakhat a ni ang a, a khawpuite pawh chu khawpui ram tawhte zînga mi an ni mai ang.

source: Let your words and your acts be those of men who are to be judged by the law which makes free.
target: Chuvangin,zalenna dana rorelsak turate angin thu sawi ula, thil ti bawk rawh u.

source: And this land which we took at that time, from Aroer by the valley of the Arnon, and half the hill-country of Gilead with its towns, I gave to the Reubenites and the Gadites.
target: chu mi tum chuan chu mi ram chu kan luah a; Arnon ruam kanga Arorer ațangin Gilead tlâng ram zatve thlengin chuta khaw awmte nen Reuben-ho leh Gad-ho ka pe a;

source: So Solomon was put on the seat of the Lord as king in place of his father David, and everything went well for him; and all Israel was under his authority.
target: Chutichuan Soilomona chu LALPA lalthutthlenga chuan a pa Davida aiah lalan a thu ta a, hmuingil takin a awm a; tin, Israel-ho zawng zawngin a thu an zawm a.

source: See that you let the mother bird go, but the young ones you may take; so it will be well for you and your life will be long.
target: a pui chu chhuah ngei ngei tur ani a, a no eawh chu in la thei ang: chutichuan in tan a tha ang a, in dam rei dawn nia.

source: Answer me
target: Mi chhang la

source: Then Jesus took the cakes and having given praise to God, he gave them to the people who were seated, and the fishes in the same way, as much as they had need of.
target: Tin, Isuan chhangperte chu a la a, lawmthu a sawi zawhin a thuhote hnenah chuan a sem a, chutiang bawkin sanghate pawh chu an duh tawkin a sem bawk a.

source: Be judges yourselves of the question: does it seem right for a woman to take part in prayer unveiled?
target: Nangmahni inngaihtuah rawh u, hmeichhiain lukhum khum lova Pathian hnena tawngtai hi a mawi em ni?

source: I know them
target: Anmahni ka hria

source: But his purpose is fixed and there is no changing it; and he gives effect to the desire of his soul.
target: Mi nghet a ni a, tunge khawih ber thei ang? A duhzawng chu a ti mai a ni.

source: And for about forty years he put up with their ways in the waste land.
target: Tin, kum sawmli lai thlalerah khan an thiltihte chu a en thei reng a.

source: No one's watching us.
target: Tuman min en lo.

source: For the Lord is good, and his mercy is never-ending; his faith is unchanging through all generations.
target: LALPA chu a tha si a; angilneihna chu kumkhuain a awm ang a; A rinawmna chu chhuan zawng zawng thlengin a awm ang.

source: I came to know him
target: Amah chu ka hre ta a

source: Because, till the law came, sin was in existence, but sin is not put to the account of anyone when there is no law to be broken.
target: Dan awm hmain khawvelah sual a awm tawh si a; dan a awm si loh chuan sual chu suala ngaih a ni lo;

source: Sami is not dead
target: Sami a thi lo

source: On the west side will be the flag of the children of Ephraim, with Elishama, the son of Ammihud, as their chief.
target: An chhûngkaw chhinchhiahna tarin a thlang lampangah chuan Ephraim-ho an awm ang a: Ephraima thlahte puipa tur chu Amihuda fapaElisama a ni ang.

source: You are my King and my God; ordering salvation for Jacob.
target: Aw Pathian, nang chu ka Lal i ni: Jakoba chhanhim nân tu pe ang che.

source: I may sing
target: Ka zai maithei

source: Yes, happier than the dead or the living seemed he who has not ever been, who has not seen the evil which is done under the sun.
target: tin, anmahni ve ve ai pawhin lo la piang lo, ni hnuaia thiltih tha lo la hmu lo nih chu a tha zawk.

source: There is no god like you, O Lord; there are no works like your works.
target: Aw LALPA, pathiante zingah nang ang rêng rêng an awm lo va, I thiltihte ang hi thiltih rêng rêng a awm hek lo.

source: And you will come before rulers and kings because of me, for a witness to them and to the Gentiles.
target: a ni, keimah avangin hotute leh lalte hmaah, anmahni leh Jentailte hriattirna turin, an la hruai ang che u.

source: Let's run away together.
target: I tlan bo ang u.

source: Let them be like the grass on the house-tops, which is dry before it comes to full growth.
target: A than san hmaa vuai mai thin, In chunga hlobet angin awm rawh se:

source: But you have knowledge that with a feeble body I was preaching the good news to you the first time;
target: Chanchin Tha in hnena ka hril hmasak tum kha ka tisa chak lohna avang a ni tih in hre si a.

source: It's bulky
target: A lian hle

source: Then I was by his side, as a master workman: and I was his delight from day to day, playing before him at all times;
target: Chutih lai chuan mi themthiam angin a kiangah ka awm a Ni tin, a lawmna ka ni a. A bulah ka hlim êm êm bawk thin.

source: But I have knowledge of your getting up and your resting, of your going out and your coming in.
target: Kei erawh chuan i thut te, i chhuah te, i luh te, ka chunga i thinurziate hi ka hria asin.

source: Make wide the place of your tent, and let the curtains of your house be stretched out without limit: make your cords long, and your tent-pins strong.
target: I puan in hmun chu zauh rawh, i awmnate puan in chung chu kai pharh rawh se: ren suh: i hruite chu tisei la, i kaihmârna khente chu tinghet rawh.

source: And moving on from there, they put up their tents in the valley of Zered.
target: Chuta tang chuan an kal leh a, Zered ruamah awmhmun an khuar a.

source: Your purposes will come about, and light will be shining on your ways.
target: Thil i ruat ang a, i tan a ding nghet ang a; Tin, i kawngte chu engin a chhun fo vang.

source: We're married to each other.
target: Kan innei tawh a.

source: The purposes of upright men are right, but the designs of evil-doers are deceit.
target: Mi fel ngaihtuahnate chu a fel a, Misuaksualte remruat erawh chu bumna a ni.

source: To get the sense of wise sayings and secrets, and of the words of the wise and their dark sayings.
target: Thufing leh a hrilhfiana te, mi fing thu leh an thuril sawite hriatthiamnâte chu.

source: But after I have come back from the dead, I will go before you into Galilee.
target: Nimahsela ka thawhleh hnuin Galili ramah in hmaah ka kal ang, a ti a.

source: I'm done.
target: Ka tlin tawh lo.

source: I chartered a jet.
target: Jet ka charter a.

source: They should have done it
target: An ti tur a ni

source: It was said to her, The older will be the servant of the younger.
target: Tun laia tuarnate hi nakina kan chunga ropuina tihlan tur nen chuan tehkhin thamah ka ruat si lo.

source: I am a man.
target: Mipa puitling ka ni.

source: Who has made open the doors of his face? Fear is round about his teeth.
target: Tuin nge a hmêl kawngkapui chu hawng thei ang? A ha kual vêl chu tihbaiawm taka ni.

source: Did you wait long?
target: I nghah rei em?

source: Why did the knees take me, or why the breasts that they might give me milk?
target: Engah nge mal chunga mi lo chawi? Engah nge ka hnek tûr hnutein mi lo hmuah?

source: By the opening of your hand, every living thing has its desire in full measure.
target: I kut i phar a, Thil nung zawng zawng chakna chu i tihrehsak thin.

source: The deep is boiling like a pot of spices, and the sea like a perfume-vessel.
target: Tui thuk tak chu bel angin a tiso buah buah a, Tuipui chu hlo bur ang lekah a siam a.

source: Salvation from those who are against us, and from the hands of those who have hate for us;
target: Kan dote lakah leh min hawtute zawng zawng laka chhandamna chu;

source: In all hard work there is profit, but talk only makes a man poor.
target: Thawhrimna zawng zawngah hia hlawkna a awm a, Ka sawi mai mai erawh chuan tlakranna mai a thlen a ni.

source: You will catch cold
target: I vawt ang

source: Men will be talking of the power and fear of your acts; I will give word of your glory.
target: Miten i thiltih rapthlak takte chakzia chu an sawi ang a; Kei pawhin i ropuizia ka hriattir bawk ang.

source: I have orders
target: Thupekte ka nei

source: So Naaman, with all his horses and his carriages, came to the door of Elisha's house.
target: Chutichuan Naamana chu a sakawrte nen, a tawlailirte nen chuan a va kal a, Elisa in kawngka bulah chuan a va ding a.

source: Did not Moses give you the law? Even so, not one of you keeps the law. Why have you a desire to put me to death?
target: Mosian Dan chu in hnenah a pe lo che u em ni? Nimahsela in zingah tumahin Dan chu in zawh si lo. Nangnin engati nge mi tihhlum in tum? a ti a.

source: Be vigilant
target: Fimkhur rawh

source: I got myself something to eat.
target: Ei tur ka nei a.

source: But let him who gets teaching in the word give a part in all good things to his teacher.
target: Tin, thu zirtir dawngtu chuan thil tha zawng zawng zirtirtu hnenah pe ve rawh se.

source: You're naive
target: I mawl lutuk

source: I shaved
target: Ka ziat fai

source: For you yourselves, brothers, are conscious that our coming among you was not without effect:
target: Unaute u, kan rawn tlawh che u kha a lo thlawn lo tih nangmahni ngeiin in hre si a;

source: Tom saw Mary too
target: Tom pawhin Mary chu a hmu ve bawk

source: I'm peeling apples.
target: Apple ka peel a.

source: And Saul's son Jonathan went to David in Horesh, and made his hands strong in God;
target: Tin, Saula fapa Jonathana chu a tho va, ramhnuaiah Davida hnênah chuan a kal a, Pathianah a kut a tihchaksak a.

source: Your wisdom will be my guide, and later you will put me in a place of honour.
target: Nangin i remruatnain mi hruai ang a, Chu mi hnuah chuan ropuinaah khian mi lawm ang.

source: He gives witness of what he has seen and of what has come to his ears; and no man takes his witness as true.
target: A hmuh leh ahriat apiang a hriattir thin a ni; tuman a thu hriattir an awih lo.

source: And from among yourselves will come men who will give wrong teaching, turning away the disciples after them.
target: In zinga mi ngei pawh hi, zirtirhote in hnena pakaitir turin thu hran sawi in lo la awm ang.

source: Don't mock me
target: Mi nuihsawh suh

source: Do you not see what they are doing in the towns of Judah and in the streets of Jerusalem?
target: Juda khawpuiahte leh Jerusalem kawtlaiahte an thiltih chu i hmu lo vem ni?

source: They have said, With our tongues will we overcome; our lips are ours: who is lord over us?
target: Anni chuan, Kan lei hian kan hneh ang a; Kan hmuite hi keimahni ta ngei alawm, tunge kan chungah lal awm ni? an ti thin.

source: Now this was the third time that Jesus let himself be seen by the disciples after he had come back from the dead.
target: Chu chu Isua mitthi zinga ata a thawhleh hnua a zirtirte hnena a inlar a vawi thumna a ni.

source: And for every man to take food and drink, and have joy in all his work, is a reward from God.
target: Tichuan, mi tin, ei leh in leh an thawhrimna zawng zawnga hlim taka an awm chu Pathian thilpek a ni.

source: I wasn't enjoying myself very much.
target: Ka hlim lutuk lo.

source: But evil acts of the flesh and all unclean things, or desire for others' property, let it not even be named among you, as is right for saints;
target: Nimahsela, mi thianghlimte tiha mawi awm rengin, inngaih leh bawlhhlawh zawng zawng, duhamna nen in zingah lam pawh lamin awm suh se;

source: He solicited our votes.
target: Kan vote a dil a.

source: You haven't trusted me.
target: Min la ring lo.

source: Violent behaviour has been lifted up into a rod of evil; it will not be slow in coming, it will not keep back.
target: Pâwngnêkna chu suahsualna tiangah a chang ta a ni; tu-amah an awm tawh lo vang a, an thâwm emaw an hausakna emaw pawh: tumahin an ui hek lo vang.

source: He's crying
target: A tap mek

source: And the priest who is making him clean will put the man who is being made clean, together with these things, before the door of the Tent of meeting.
target: Tin, a thiantu puithiam chuan inthlan tura leh chung thil chu inbiakna puan in kawngka bulah LALPA hmaah a dah ang a:

source: When you go into your neighbour's vine-garden, you may take of his grapes at your pleasure, but you may not take them away in your vessel.
target: In țhenawm grêp huana in kalin in duh tawkin in ei thei a, amaherawhchu in emah in khung tur a ni lo.

source: And those whom he sent went away, and it was as he said.
target: Tin, a tirhte chu an kal ta a, an hnena a sawi ang ngeiin an va hmu a.

source: And coming out of their resting-places, after he had come again from the dead, they went into the holy town and were seen by a number of people.
target: chungte chu a thawhleh hnuah chuan thlan ata lo chhuakin khaw thianghlimah chuan an lut a, mi tam tak hnenah an inlar ta a.

source: I know they were there
target: An awm tih ka hria

source: As then the evil plants are got together and burned with fire, so will it be in the end of the world.
target: Chutichuan, buh lemte chu an la khawm a, meiin an hal ang hian khawvel tawpnaah chuan a la awm ang.

source: If however it will not make peace with you, but war, then let it be shut in on all sides:
target: Tin, an lo remduh loh che u a, an lo do dawn che u chuan in hual ang a;

source: For at the shaking of my hand over them, their goods will be taken by those who were their servants: and you will see that the Lord of armies has sent me.
target: Ngai rawh u, ka kut ka thin khum dâwn si a, Anmahni rawngbawltute râllâk an ni mai ang: Tichuan, Sipaihote LALPA chuan mi tir ani tih in la hre dâwn a ni.

source: I'm sorry.
target: Ka tihsual.

source: And he had in his right hand seven stars: and out of his mouth came a sharp two-edged sword: and his face was like the sun shining in its strength.
target: Tin, a kut dinglam chuan arsi pasarih a keng a; a ka atang chuan khandaih hriam tawn hriam tak a chhuak a; a hmel chu ni sat vang lai tak ang a ni.

source: You will make a division of the land among you, tribe by tribe.
target: Chutichuan he ram hi Israel hnam athuin in zingah in sem ang.

source: For the Edomites had come again, attacking Judah and taking away prisoners.
target: Edom-ho chuan Juda-ho chu an han bei a, salah te an rawn man leh avângin.

source: Be my friend.
target: Ka thian lo ni ang che.

source: The evil-doers have taken out their swords, their bows are bent; for crushing the poor, and to put to death those who are upright in their ways.
target: Rethei leh pachhiate tithlu tûr leh Awm dan dikte tihlum tûrin. Mi suaksualte chuan khandaih an phawi a, an thal ngul an kuai bawk a.
