source: The carriage in which are the black horses goes in the direction of the north country; the white go to the west; and those of mixed colour go in the direction of the south country.
target: Sakawr dum awmna tawlailir chu hmâr lamah a kal chhuak a, a var awmna chuan a dawt a, tin, a hmârsai awmna chu chhim ram lamah a kal chhuak a.

source: It is through the Lord's love that we have not come to destruction, because his mercies have no limit.
target: Tihborala ka awm lo hi LALPA zahngaihna a lo ni, a lainatnate chu a kang ngai loh avângin.

source: We've come to a standstill.
target: Kan ding ta a ni.

source: Were you spying on us?
target: Min spy em ni?

source: He will take a tenth of your sheep: and you will be his servants.
target: In berâmruala mi sâwma pakat a laksak ang che u a; tin, a chhiahhlawhte in ni ang.

source: Is it bad?
target: A tha lo em?

source: But when that which is complete is come, then that which is in part will be no longer necessary.
target: A famkim a lo thlen hunah erawh chuan a kim lo hi tihban a ni tawh ang.

source: He did a cartwheel
target: Cartwheel a ti a

source: Do you watch a lot of TV?
target: TV i en nasa em?

source: Let them be fixed as a sign on your hand, and marked on your brow;
target: Tin, chinchhiahna atan in bana in zem ang a, in mit leh mit inkâra chalhrenna atan a awm bawk tur a ni.

source: He always puts his arm around me.
target: Min kuah reng a.

source: I am coming
target: Ka lo kal

source: It's ready
target: Hman a ni tawh

source: And they took to him little children, so that he might put his hands on them: and the disciples said sharp words to them.
target: Tin, a deh atan a hnenah naupang tete an rawn hruai a; tin, zirtirte chuan an lo hau va.

source: And has been guided by my rules and has kept my laws and done them: he is upright, life will certainly be his, says the Lord.
target: ka dan siamte zawh a, dik taka tia, ka rorêlnate a vawn chuan mi fel a ni a, a nung ngei ang tih hi LALPA PATHIAN thu chhuak a ni.

source: I may quit
target: Ka bang maithei

source: Dubai-ah ka awm a.
target: I was in Dubai.

source: Look at us.
target: Min en rawh.

source: But Paul's sister's son had word of their design, and he came into the army building and gave news of it to Paul.
target: Nimahsela Paula farnua fapain an chan thu chu a lo hria a, kulhbingah chuan a va lut a, Paula chu a va hrilh a.

source: I am tired with walking.
target: Kal ka chau a ni.

source: I'm so mad
target: Ka a lutuk

source: Is Tom there too
target: Tom pawh a awm em

source: And I saw that the Levites had not been given what was needed for their support; so that the Levites and the music-makers, who did the work, had gone away, everyone to his field.
target: Tin, Levi-hote leh hla satute chu an chan ai pêk an nih loh avângin mahni lo lam theuhvah an tlan darh vek a ni tih ka hre leh ta bawk a.

source: John said to him, Master, we saw one driving out evil spirits in your name: and we said that he might not, because he is not one of us.
target: Johana chuan a hnenah, Zirtirtu, tu emaw i hminga ramhuaite hnawt chhuak kan hmu a; min zui ve loh avangin kan khap ta asin le, a ti a.

source: Then the Evil One went away from him, and angels came and took care of him.
target: Chu mi hnuah chuan diabola chuan a kalsan ta a. Tin, ngai teh, vantirhkohten a rawng an rawn bawlsak ta a.

source: I will go down now, and see if their acts are as bad as they seem from the outcry which has come to me; and if they are not, I will see.
target: tunah ka zuk kal ang a, an au thâwm ka hnêna lo thleng ang ngei hian an ti nge ti lo ka en ang a; an tih loh chuan ka hre mai ang, a ti a.

source: So the king said to Shimei, You will not be put to death. And the king gave him his oath.
target: Tin lal chuan Simeia hnênah chuan, I thi tawp lo vang, a ti a. Lal chuan a hnênah chhia a chham a.

source: Look it up
target: Enchho rawh

source: They recognized him
target: An hrechiang ta a

source: And Judah, turning their faces, saw that they were being attacked in front and at the back; and they gave a cry for help to the Lord, while the priests were sounding their horns.
target: Tin, Judate chu an han lehhawi chuan râl chu an hnung lam leh an hma lamah an lo awm a, LALPA chu an au ta a, puithiamte chuan tawtawrâwt an ham a.

source: Be my guide and teacher in the true way; for you are the God of my salvation; I am waiting for your word all the day.
target: I thutakah chuan mi hruai la, mi zirtir ang che. Nang hchu mi chhandamtu Pathian i ni si a; Nilenga ka nghah reng che hi.

source: Don't yell at Tom.
target: Tom-a chu au suh.

source: I can't surf
target: Ka tleu thei lo

source: And Adah gave birth to Jabal: he was the father of such as are living in tents and keep cattle.
target: Tin, Adaii chuan Jabal a hring a: ani chu puan ina awm ran vulhtuho thlahtu a ni.

source: In his days Judah will have salvation and Israel will be living without fear: and this is the name by which he will be named, The Lord is our righteousness.
target: A hun chhûngin Juda chu chhandam a ni ang a, Israel chu hi takin a awm ang. Tin, hei hi a hming an la vuah tûr chu a ni,'LALPA chu kan felna a ni' tih hi.

source: Now the young Samuel was the servant of the Lord before Eli. In those days the Lord kept his word secret from men; there was no open vision.
target: Tin, naupang Samuela chuan Elia hmaa uan LALPA rawng a bâwl a, chung lai chuan LALPA thu chu a hlu hle mai a; a langa inlârnate a awm lo va,

source: Well, let's get started.
target: Awle, i tan ang u.

source: I am a trifle sad.
target: Trifle lungngai tak ka ni.

source: And Elnathan and Delaiah and Gemariah had made a strong request to the king not to let the book be burned, but he would not give ear to them.
target: Chu chang ni lovin Elnathana leh Delaia leh Gemaria te chuan lehkhabu zial chu hâl lo tûrin lal hnênah an ngen a: mahse a ngai thla duh lo.

source: It was Hezekiah who had the higher spring of the water of Gihon stopped, and the water taken down on the west side of the town of David. In everything he undertook, Hezekiah did well.
target: Hezekia bawk hian Gihon lui tui chhakta zâwk a tiping a, Davida khaw thlang lampanga a luan thlaktir bawk a. Tichuan Jezekia chu a thiltih zawng zawngah chuan a hmuingil zel a.

source: I just might cry.
target: Ka tap mai thei.

source: They were singing the national anthem.
target: Hnam hla an sa a.

source: But all other winged four-footed things which go on the earth are disgusting to you.
target: Amaherawhchu thla nei, ke pali nei, a kala kal chi zawng zawng chu in tan thil tenawm a ni vek ang.

source: Shimei the Ramathite was responsible for the vine-gardens; Zabdi the Shiphmite was responsible for the produce of the vine-gardens and for all the stores of wine;
target: tin, grêp huan enkawtu chu Ramat mi Simeia a ni a; tin, grêp huan a mi uain sawr da khawmna enkawltu chu Siphmot mi Zabdia a ni a;

source: His words against God have come to your ears: what is your opinion? And they all said it was right for him to be put to death.
target: Pathian a sawichhiat zia in hre tawh a; engtin nge in ngaih? a ti a. Tin, an zain ani chu thi tlakah an ruat hlawm a.

source: He bought flowers
target: Pangpar a lei a

source: They're not ready
target: An inpeih lo

source: I am sleeping
target: Ka muhil

source: They gave me poison for my food; and bitter wine for my drink.
target: Ka chaw atân englo kha mi pe leh nghal a; Ka tuihal lahin uain thur inah mi pe a.

source: Is Tom there
target: Toma a awm em

source: Have I any pleasure in the death of the evil-doer? says the Lord: am I not pleased if he is turned from his way so that he may have life?
target: Misual thihnaah hian lawmna reng ka nei êm ni? A kawngte chu a hawisana, a nunna zawk lo chu? Tih chi LALPA PATHIAN tu chhuak a ni.

source: Material comfort is not good for the foolish; much less for a servant to be put over rulers.
target: Nunkhaw nawm chu mi â nên a inhmeh lo va, Chhiahhlawhin lal fate chunga rorêl chu a inhmeh lo lehzual.

source: My mind is wandering, fear has overcome me: the evening of my desire has been turned into shaking for me.
target: ka thinlung hi a thaw hlawp hlawp a, thil rapthlâk takin mi tihlau va: tlai nem ka nghahhlelh thin kha ka tan khurhnaah a chang ta.

source: And Jacob came to Luz in the land of Canaan (which is the same as Beth-el, he and all his people.
target: Chutichuan Jakoba chuan Kanaan rama Luz khua chu a thleng a, amah leh a hnêna awm zawng zawngte nên Luz chu Bethel a ni a.

source: I'm a coward
target: Mi dawih ka nia

source: Desiring the broken bits of food which came from the table of the man of wealth; and even the dogs came and put their tongues on his wounds.
target: mi hausa dawhkana ei nawi tla chu ei a duh a; uite lah chuan a pante an lo liahsak thin a.

source: He who has, to him will be given: and he who has not, from him will be taken even that which he has.
target: Tupawh a nei chu an pe belhchhah ang a; tupawh a nei lo chu a neih chhun pawh an laksak ang, a ti a.

source: For this cause a number of you are feeble and ill, and a number are dead.
target: Chuvangin, in zinga mi tam tak in chak lovin in bawrhsawm a ni, duai pawh in muhil lo ve.

source: Don't respond
target: Chhâng suh

source: They have one too
target: An nei ve bawk

source: I don't have a lot of time.
target: Hun ka nei tam lo.

source: I have been wounded with sharp words because of you; my face has been covered with shame.
target: Nangmah avânga sawi chiat ka tuar avângin, Zahnain ka hmai a khuh zo ta.

source: And when he was getting into the boat, the man in whom had been the evil spirits had a great desire to come with him.
target: Tin, lawnga a chuan dawn lai takin ramhuai man hnua khan Isua hnena awm reng a ngen a.

source: Are they pacifists
target: Pacifist an ni em

source: He seems sick
target: A damloh hmel

source: The stone is heavy.
target: Lung chu a rit a.

source: The poor will see it and be glad: you who are lovers of God, let your hearts have life.
target: Thuhnuairawlhte chuan chu chu an hmu a, an lawm a: Nangni Pathian zawngte u, in thinlung chu nungin awm rawh se.

source: May there be wide-stretching fields of grain in the land, shaking on the top of the mountains, full of fruit like Lebanon: may its stems be unnumbered like the grass of the earth.
target: Leiah, tlâng chungahte hian, buh tam tak a awm ang a; A vui chu Lebanon angin a nghing suau suau ang a, Khuaa mite chu lei hlobet angin an duah hluah hluah ang.

source: When he said this a number came to have faith in him.
target: Tin, chung thu chu a sawi laiin mi tam takin amah chu an ring ta a.

source: So I gave them up to the desires of their hearts; that they might go after their evil purposes.
target: An thinlung sak vangin ka thlahthlam a, An duh ang anga awm tûrin.

source: She's a bus driver.
target: Bus khalhtu a ni.

source: They can't kill us.
target: Min that thei lo.

source: You're sort of rude.
target: I rude deuh a ni.

source: One generation goes and another comes; but the earth is for ever.
target: Chhuan khat an liam a, chhuan dang an lo chhuak a, Lei hi erawh chu a awm reng mai.

source: Was anybody else there
target: Midang an awm em

source: Who gave himself for our sins, so that he might make us free from this present evil world, after the purpose of our God and Father:
target: ani chuan kan Pathian leh kan Pa remtihzawngin tun lai khawvel sual tak lakah hian min chhan chhuah theih nan kan sualte aiah amah a inpe ta;

source: Where there is no vision, the people are uncontrolled; but he who keeps the law will be happy.
target: Inlârna a awm loh chuan mipuite an tladah thin a, Dan zawmtu erawh chu a nihlawh thin.

source: Then Laban said to Jacob, Because you are my brother are you to be my servant for nothing? say now, what is your payment to be?
target: Tin, Labana chuan Jakoba hnênah, Ka tupa i nih avângin a thlâwnin ka rawng i bâwl tûr em ni? Engnge i hlawh ang? Mi hrilh teh khai, a ti a.

source: Don't underestimate us
target: Min ngaihthah suh

source: I have a boat
target: Lawng ka nei

source: But these birds you may not take: the eagle and the gier-eagle and the ospray;
target: Hengte erawh hi chu in ei tur a ni lo: mipui te, lungdup te, muarla te,

source: Let your father and your mother be glad, let her who gave you birth have joy.
target: I nu leh pa chu hlim takin awm sela, A hringtu che chu hlim takin awm rawh se.

source: Food enough for his young and for his she-lions was pulled down by the lion; his hole was full of flesh and his resting-place stored with meat.
target: Sakeibakneipa chuan a note khamkhawp a pawtsawm a, sakeibakneipuite tân a seh hlum a, a pûkte chu sa sehin a tikhat a, a buzâwlte chu saruang pawh samin.

source: Please sit
target: Khawngaihin ṭhu rawh

source: I wasn't involved
target: Ka inrawlh lo

source: He resigned
target: A bang

source: They'll negotiate
target: An inrem ang

source: Tom was cold
target: Tom a khua a sik

source: I talk a lot
target: Ka sawi nasa

source: It wasn't helping
target: A ṭangkai lo

source: I have made the earth, forming man on it: by my hands the heavens have been stretched out, and all the stars put in their ordered places.
target: Lei hi ka siam a, a chunga mihring awm hi ka siam bawk a: keimah ka kut ngei hian, van ka kai pharh a, a sipaihote chu thu ka pe bawk a ni.

source: For Israel has not been given up, or Judah, by his God, by the Lord of armies; for their land is full of sin against the Holy One of Israel.
target: Israel leh Juda chu an Pathian Sipaihote LALPA chuan A hnuchhawn si lo va, An ram chu Israel Mi Thianghlim chungah Sualin a khat na a.

source: Why are the nations so violently moved, and why are the thoughts of the people so foolish?
target: Hnam tin chu engati nge an thinur a, Mi tinin engati nge thil sâwt lo an ngaihtuah?

source: But he does not see that the dead are there, that her guests are in the deep places of the underworld.
target: Nimahsela chutah chuan mitthi an awm tih leh A mi sawmte chu Seol rila awm an nih a hre lo.

source: Let him go on living among you in whatever place is most pleasing to him: do not be hard on him.
target: in awmnaa an du ber an thlan apianga chuanin zingah an awm ve mai tur a ni; in hnehchhiah turani lo

source: He looks after us.
target: Min enkawl a ni.

source: He is my strength, and my Rock; my high tower, and my saviour; my keeper and my hope: he gives me authority over my people.
target: Ka ngilneihna leh ka kulhpui, Ka kulhbing sâng leh mi chhanhimtu, Ka pawh leh ka rinna nghahna, Ka hnuaia ka mite tudawl thintu chu a ni.

source: Do not give the blood of my offering with leavened bread; and do not let the fat of my feast be kept all night till the morning.
target: Ka tân inthawina sa thisen chu chhang dawidim telh nên chuan I rawn hlân tûr ani lo; ka tân kûtna sathau chu zankhuain atûk thlengin awmtîr reng tûr a ni hek lo.

source: I hugged Tom.
target: Toma ka kuah.

source: So then, let us not take our rest as the others do, but let us be self-controlled and awake.
target: Chuvangin, mi dangte angin i muhil suh ang u khai, i mengin i ngaihven zawk ang u.

source: Let's ask.
target: Va zawt ang.

source: I'll pay the bill
target: Bill chu ka pe ang

source: Not as lords over God's heritage, but making yourselves examples to the flock.
target: in chante chungah intilal hek lovin, pawlho entawnan insiam zawkin ho rawh u.

source: My eyes will be on those of good faith in the land, so that they may be living in my house; he who is walking in the right way will be my servant.
target: He rama mirinawmte chunga hian ka mit a fu ang, ka hnêna an awm theih nân. Kawng tha famkim zawhtu chu, chu mihuan ka a rawng a bâwl ang.

source: The Lord is God, and he has given us light; let the holy dance be ordered with branches, even up to the horns of the altar.
target: LALPA chu Pathian a ni, ani chuan eng min ep a: Inthawina tûr ch hruihrualin thlung rawh u; maichâm ki ngeiahte chuan.

source: So the Lord our God gave up Og, king of Bashan, and all his people into our hands; and we overcame him so completely that all his people came to their end in the fight.
target: chutichuan LALPA kan Pathian chuan Basan lal Oga pawh a mite zawng zawng nen kan kutah a pe a: tichuan pakhat te mah zuahsak lovin kan that vek a.

source: He sent ice for the destruction of their vines; their trees were damaged by the bitter cold.
target: An grêp hruite chu rialin a tithi a, An theipui kungte pawh chu vurin a tithi bawk a.

source: Don't do something stupid.
target: Thil â lo ti suh.

source: And he did not have to make an offering of himself again and again, as the high priest goes into the holy place every year with blood which is not his;
target: nimahsela Puithiam Lalber chu kum tinin mahni thisen lo, thisen keng chunga Hmun Thianghlima a lut thin angin,ani chu mahni inhlan fo turin a lut hek lo;

source: Then Moses, with the responsible men of Israel, went back to the tent-circle.
target: Tichuan Mosia chu bukah chuan a lut leh a, amah leh Israel-ho upate nen.

source: Then falling down on their faces they said, O God, the God of the spirits of all flesh, because of one man's sin will your wrath be moved against all the people?
target: Tichuan anni chu an bawkkhawp a, Aw Pathian nunna zawng zawng hnar i ni, mi pakhat sual avangin mpui zawng zawng chungah i thinur dawn em ni? an ti a.

source: He didn't name names.
target: Hming a sawi lo.

source: I'm beginning to enjoy myself.
target: Ka hlim tan ta.

source: Sami was walking
target: Sami chu a kal a

source: And do no wrong, one to another, but let the fear of your God be before you; for I am the Lord your God.
target: In inbum tur a ni lo va, i Pathian chu i tih tur a ni. Kei hi LALPA in Pathian chu ka ni si a.

source: I feel bad.
target: Tha lo ka ti.

source: Any man who gets another into his power in order to get a price for him is to be put to death, if you take him in the act.
target: Tupawh mihring ru-a zuar emaw, a la kawl lai ngei emaw an hmuh chuan, chu mi chu tihhlum ngei tûr a ni.

source: Is this the town which was full of joy, whose start goes back to times long past, whose wanderings took her into far-off countries?
target: Hei hi maw in khaw hlim tak, a hlunzia murakeka mi tawh, a kein hla taka awm tûra a hruai thina chu?

source: And the thieves who were on the crosses said evil words to him.
target: Suamhmang an khenbeh vete pawh chuan chutiang bawkin an tiel a.

source: I got a job offer.
target: Hna tur ka hmu a.

source: Their saviour is strong; the Lord of armies is his name: he will certainly take up their cause, so that he may give rest to the earth and trouble to the people of Babylon.
target: An tlantu erawh chu a chak a ni; a hming chu Sipaihote LALPA a ni. Ani chu an lamah a tang ang a, Babulona chengte chu tibuaiin, khawvêlah muanna a thlen theih nân.

source: We're scared
target: Tih hlauh kan ni

source: That's not appropriate
target: Chu chu a rem lo

source: Keep writing
target: Ziak zêl rawh

source: Get your own
target: Nangma tâ la rawh

source: You don't make it easy.
target: I siam awlsam lo.

source: But Jesus gave no more answers, so that Pilate was full of wonder.
target: Isua erawh chuan engmahin a chhang ta lo va; chutichuan Pilatan mak a ti hle a.

source: He gives snow like wool; he sends out ice-drops like dust.
target: Vûr sur chu berâm hmul angin a pe a; Vûr tla chu vut angin a theh darh thin.

source: O my soul, you have said to the Lord, You are my Lord: I have no good but you.
target: LALPA hnênah chuan, Nang chu ka LALPA ini a: Nangmah lo chu thatna rêng rêng ka nei lo ve.

source: Did you find them or not?
target: I hmu em ni?

source: Then he made pillars of olive-wood for the way into the Temple; the pillars were square:
target: Tin, biak in luhna atân a bang hmun lia thena hmun khat tiatin oliv thing kawngka ban a siam bawk a:

source: You have problems
target: Harsatna i nei a

source: It's an ice cream.
target: Ice cream a ni.

source: For they are your people and your heritage, which you took out of Egypt, out of the iron fireplace;
target: I mi i rochan, Aigupta ram ata, thir rawhtuina chhûng ata i hruai chhuahte an ni si a:

source: And this is why.
target: Tin, hei hi a ni.

source: And the sea gave up the dead which were in it; and death and Hell gave up the dead which were in them; and they were judged every man by his works.
target: Tuifinriat chuan a chhunga mitthi awmte chu a chhuahtir a, Thihna leh Mitthi khua chuan an chhunga mitthi awmte chu an chhuahtir bawk a; tin, mi tin an thiltih ang zela relsakin an awm ta a.

source: At that time, King Jehoram went out from Samaria and got all Israel together in fighting order.
target: Tin, chutih lai chuan lal Jehorama chu Samari khua ata a chhuak a, Israel-ho zawng zawng ch a khâwm vek a,

source: Though the sons of Jonadab the son of Rechab have done the orders of their father which he gave them, this people has not given ear to me:
target: Rekaba fapa Jonadaba thlate chuan an thlahtu thupêk an zawm a, he mite erawh hi chuan mi ngai thla si lo va;

source: I will put my teaching into a story; I will make my dark sayings clear with music.
target: Tehkhin thu-ah ka beng ka chhi ang a: Ka thu ril sawi chu tingtangin ka hrilhfiah ang.

source: His wrath is burning against me, and I am to him as one of his haters.
target: A thinurna ka chungah a mut kai a, A hmêlma angah mi chhiar a.

source: Is that a leopard
target: Chu chu sakeibaknei a ni em

source: Tom, I'm pregnant.
target: Tom, ka rai a ni.

source: Did you call an ambulance
target: Ambulance i ko em

source: Further, there have been great kings in Jerusalem, ruling over all the country across the river, to whom they gave taxes and payments in goods and forced payments.
target: Jerusalem-ah khan lal thiltithei tak pawh an lo awm tawh a; chhiah te, thil neih man te, leiman te an la thin a.

source: Her husband is a man of note in the public place, when he takes his seat among the responsible men of the land.
target: Kulh kawngkaa an ram upate nên an thuthovin A pasal chu a hriat a ni.

source: I didn't win
target: Ka hlawhtling lo

source: Thlalak ka enclose a.
target: I enclose a photo.

source: I have the hang of it.
target: Ka hang a ni.

source: Turn it up
target: Tiring rawh

source: But of the fruit of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil you may not take; for on the day when you take of it, death will certainly come to you.
target: a chhia leh a tha hriatna thing rah erawh hi chu i ei tûr a ni lo: i ei chuan i ei nî la lain i thi ngei tûr a ni, tiin thu a pe a.

source: Of Dan, Azarel, the son of Jeroham. These were the captains of the tribes of Israel.
target: Dan-ho zingah Jerohama fapa Azarela. Chungte chu Israel hnam hotute an ni.

source: How they said to you, In the last days there will be men who, guided by their evil desires, will make sport of holy things.
target: Hun hnuhnungah chuan Pathian ngaihsak lo lam anmahni chakna ang zela awmin, nuihsantute an la lo awm ang, tih in hnena an sawiziate kha.

source: Mama cried
target: Mama a tap

source: For to everyone who has will be given, and he will have more: but from him who has not, even what he has will be taken away.
target: Tupawh a nei apiang an pe belhchhah ang a, a lo ngah ang; tupawh a nei lo apiang erawh chu a neih chhun pawh an laksak ang.

source: For it was not clear to them about the bread; but their hearts were hard.
target: chhang thu chu a ngaihna an hre thiam si lo va, an thinlung a sak si a.

source: And in the same place he says again, They will not come into my rest.
target: Tin, he hmunah hian, Ka chawlhnaah chuan an lut lo vang, a ti leh a.

source: She runs.
target: A tlanchhia.

source: Don't drink this water.
target: He tui hi in suh.

source: She had a Big Mac
target: Big Mac a nei a

source: Do you wear a uniform?
target: Uniform i ha em?

source: Who says of the Lord, He is my safe place and my tower of strength: he is my God, in whom is my hope.
target: LALPA chung thu-ah chuan, Ani chu ka inhumhimna leh ka kulhpui; Ka Pathian, ka rina chu a ni, ka ti ang.

source: Then Gideon, the son of Joash, went back from the fight:
target: Tin, Joasa fapa Gideona chu Heres chho atangin indona ata chu a lo kir leh ta a.

source: I watched TV.
target: TV ka en.

source: Are we sure of it?
target: Kan chiang em?

source: He takes them all up with his hook, he takes them in his net, getting them together in his fishing-net: for which cause he is glad and full of joy.
target: Nghakuaiin a khai chhuak vek a, a lênin a man hlawm a, a lênkhang chuan a fûn khâwm a: Chuvângin a hlimin a lâwm a ni.

source: And not only so, but we have joy in God through our Lord Jesus Christ, through whom we are now at peace with God.
target: Chuti chauh pawh a ni lo va, inremna tuna min hmuhtirtu kan Lalpa Isua Krista avang chuan Pathianah kan lawm bawk a ni.

source: But the law is holy, and its orders are holy, upright, and good.
target: Chutichuan Dan chu a thianghlim a ni, thupek pawh chu a thianghlim a, a fel a, a tha a ni.

source: David was thirty years old when he became king, and he was king for forty years,
target: Davida chu a lal tirh lai chuan kum sâwmthum mi a ni a, kum sâwmli a lal a.

source: Hold it, Tom
target: Nghâk rawh, Tom

source: Did you talk to anyone else?
target: Midang i biak em?

source: Go far from me, you evil-doers; so that I may keep the teachings of my God.
target: Nangni thil tha lo titute u, mi kalsan rawh u; Ka Pathian thilpekte ka vawn that theih nân.

source: Keep focused
target: En uluk rawh

source: They're very busy
target: An buai hle mai

source: It will be farmed by workers of the town from all the tribes of Israel.
target: Tin, khawpuia hnathawktu Israel nam zawng zawnga mite chuan a lei an let ang.

source: And let us get back for ourselves the ark of our God: for in the days of Saul we did not go to it for directions.
target: Tin, kan Pathian bâwm hi i la leh teh ang u Sauala lal lai chan kan ngaihven hau lo mai a, a ti a.

source: It's what I'm used to.
target: Ka hman dan a ni.

source: Has any people ever gone on living after hearing the voice of God out of the heart of the fire as you did?
target: Mei ațanga thu rawn sawi in hriata in la nun cheu sina pathian aw miin an hre ngaiin,

source: My soul, put all your faith in God; for from him comes my hope.
target: Ka nunna, Pathian chauh nghak rawh; Ka beiseina hi ama hnên atanga chhuak ani si a.

source: They sent him a letter saying, To Darius the king, all peace:
target: hetiang hian an ziak a : - Lal Daria hnêna thlamuanna kim awm rawh se:

source: Do not keep in mind my sins when I was young, or my wrongdoing: let your memory of me be full of mercy, O Lord, because of your righteousness.
target: Ka tleirawl lai sualnate leh ka bawhchhiatnate chu hre reng suh ang che; Aw LALPA, i thatna avângin, I ngilneihan avângin mi hre reng ang che.

source: Then they are glad, because the sea is quiet, and he takes them to the harbour of their desire.
target: Tin, a reh tak avângin an lawm thin a; Ani chuan an ngaih tak thli upah chuan a hruai thleng thin.

source: Don't bother yourself
target: Mahni inbuai suh

source: He was stoned
target: Khapa kha

source: And crying to the Lord he said, O Lord my God, have you sent evil even on the widow whose guest I am, by causing her son's death?
target: Tin, LALPA a au va, Aw LALPA ka Pathian, ka chenna hmeithainu chungah pawhhian a fapa tihlumsakin thil tha lo i rawn thlentir ta em ni le? a ti a.

source: It isn't voluntary
target: Voluntary a ni lo

source: Her hands are stretched out to the poor; yes, she is open-handed to those who are in need.
target: A kut mi rethei lamah a phar a, A ni, renchhamte thlengin a ban phak a.

source: The churches of Asia send their love to you. So do Aquila and Prisca, with the church which is in their house.
target: Asia ram kohhranho pawlte hian chibai an buk a che u. Akuila leh Priskilli, an ina kohhran inkhawmho nen hian Lalpaah chuan chibai tam takin an buk a che u.

source: Truly, those who make sport of me are round about me, and my eyes become dark because of their bitter laughing.
target: Nuihsantute ka hnênah an awm zawng a nih hi, An thu thin tiurah huan ka mit a fu a.

source: And the five lords of the Philistines, having seen it, went back to Ekron the same day.
target: Tin, chu chu Philistia lal pangate chuan an en zawh hnuin, chu mi ni la la chuan Ekron khaw lamah an haw leh ta a.

source: And Keilah, and Achzib, and Mareshah; nine towns with their unwalled places.
target: Keila te, Akzib te, Maresa te; khawpuite chu a khawperte nen khaw kua a ni.

source: When the Lord has put up the walls of Zion, and has been been in his glory;
target: LALPA chuan Zion khua chu a din leh ta si a, A ropuinaa intuamin alang ta a;

source: Then Sanballat sent his servant to me a fifth time with an open letter in his hand;
target: chutichuan Sanbalata chuan chutiang bawkin a vawi nganaah chuan a chhiahhlawh lehkha char loh kengin ka hnênah a rawn tir a;

source: Do you still want to come?
target: I la kal duh em?

source: I told Tom.
target: Tom-a ka hrilh.

source: I'm very sad
target: Ka lungngai lûtuk

source: He made me eat it.
target: Min ei tir a.

source: And he will put an end to the glory of his woods and of his planted fields, soul and body together; and it will be as when a man is wasted by disease.
target: A ram ngaw leh a lei tha hmun ropuina pawh chu, thlarau leh taksa lamin, a tioboral ang: tichuan, chhinchhiahna kengtu a chauh hun lai ang a ni ang.

source: So that day he gave him the name of Jerubbaal, saying, Let Baal take up his cause against him because his altar has been broken down.
target: Chutichuan, A maichâm tihchim avangin Baalan amah khing rawh se,: tiin, chu mi ni chuan Jerubaala a vuah ta a.

source: So that same day Moses made this song, teaching it to the children of Israel.
target: Chutichuan Mosian chu hla chu, chu mi ni la la chuan a phuah a, Israela thlahte a zirtir a.

source: I want tacos
target: Takaws ka duh

source: They've gone
target: An kalbo tawh

source: I will send disease on them for their destruction, and take away their heritage, and I will make of you a nation greater and stronger than they.
target: Hriin ka hrem ang a, ka rimang ang a, nangmahah hian an aia ropui leh thil tithei zawk hnam ka din teh zawk ang, a ti a.

source: Go to bed.
target: Khumah kal rawh.

source: Their line has gone out through all the earth, and their words to the end of the world. In them has he put a tent for the sun,
target: An tehna hrui chu leilung luah zawng zawngah zam chhuahin a awm a; An thu chu kawlkil thelngin a thang chhuak ta a. Chungahte chuan ni tan khian puan in a zar a,

source: We're deluding ourselves.
target: Kan inbum a ni.

source: And they put up for themselves the image which Micah had made, and it was there all the time that the house of God was in Shiloh.
target: Chuti chuan Mika siam milem siam chawp chu Silo khuaa Pathian in a awm chhûng zawng chuan an din ta.

source: That's sad
target: A lungngaihthlak

source: Do you snore?
target: I hnar ring em?

source: The voice of your watchmen! their voices are loud in song together; for they will see him, eye to eye, when the Lord comes back to Zion.
target: Chu! I ral vengtute aw chu! Aw an chhuah a, hlim takin an zaiho chu: LALPA chu Zion-a a lo kir leh hunah chuan inhmatawnin an hmu dan si a.

source: Good bye
target: Dam takin le

source: And have taken your people Israel out of the land of Egypt with signs and with wonders and with a strong hand and an outstretched arm, causing great fear;
target: I mi Israelte Aigupta ram ata chhinchhiahna te, thilmak te, kut chak leh ban phar leh thil rapthlâk nasa taka hruai chhuaktu,

source: And Abraham went on living in the land of the Philistines as in a strange country.
target: Tichuan Abrahama chu Philistin-ho ramah chuan rei tak a awm a.

source: And you will do as I have done, not covering your lips or taking the food of those in grief.
target: Ka tih ang chiah hian in ti ve dawn a ni; in hmui in hup lo vang a, mite chaw in ei hek lo vang.

source: Be patient
target: Nunnem rawh

source: Don't mess around!
target: Mi ti buai suh!

source: And the amount of Solomon's food for one day was thirty measures of crushed grain and sixty measures of meal;
target: Solomona ni khat ei tawk chu chhngphut dip tak tehkhawng sawmthum leh chhangphut tehkhawng sawmruk ani a;

source: I will not do it in your life-time, because of your father David, but I will take it from your son.
target: Amaherawhchu i pa Davida avângin i dam chhûng em chuan ka ti rih lo vang a: nimahsela i fapa zawng ka chhuhsak dawn a ni.

source: I undertook great works, building myself houses and planting vine-gardens.
target: Hna nasa tak ka thawk a; inte ka insak a, grêp huante ka insiam a,

source: And the servant came running to her and said, Give me a little water from your vessel.
target: Tin, chhiahhlawh chu a tâwk tûrin a tlân a, Khawngaih takin i tui bêla tui kha tlêm tê mi intîr teh khai, a ti a.

source: A poor thing, a poor thing, says he who is giving money for goods: but when he has gone on his way, then he makes clear his pride in what he has got.
target: Engmah a nih loh hi, engmah a nih loh hi, thil leitu chuan a ti thin a, A kal hnu chuan a chhuang leh viau si thin.

source: We will be glad in your salvation, and in the name of our God we will put up our flags: may the Lord give you all your requests.
target: I chhandamnaah chuan hlimin ka zai ang a, Kan Pathian hmingin kan puanzarte hi kan la zar ang: LALPA chuan i dilna zawng zawng chu hlawhtlntir rawh se.

source: And he will not be guided in his judging by what he sees, or give decisions by the hearing of his ears:
target: tichuan a lawmna chu LALPA tihnaah a ni ang: a mita a hmuh angin ro a rêl lo vang a, a benga a hriat angin a zilhau hek lo vag:

source: He who keeps a sin covered is looking for love; but he who keeps on talking of a thing makes division between friends.
target: Bawhchhiatna thuptu chuan inhmangaihna a zawng a, Thil sawi sawi hmang chuan thian bulte a tithen thin.

source: They masturbated each other
target: An inhnim pil a

source: The smallest of their families will become a thousand, and a small one a strong nation: I, the Lord, will make it come quickly in its time.
target: In zinga hnam te ber pawh hnam ropui tak an ni ang a, hnam tlemte pawh hnam chak tak an ni ang: kei LALPA hian a hun hunah chuan ka thlentir thuai ang.

source: I'm relieved
target: Ka bânsan mek

source: Because of your passion and your wrath, for I have been lifted up and then made low by you.
target: I lungnih loh êm êm leh i thinur avângin: Nangin mi la kang a, mi paih bo ta si a.

source: Who is able to give an account of the great acts of the Lord, or to make clear all his praise?
target: Tunge LALPA thiltih ropui takte chu sawi thei a, A fakna zawng zawng hriattir vek thei le?

source: And the king put Benaiah, the son of Jehoiada, in his place over the army; and Zadok the priest he put in the place of Abiathar.
target: Tin, lalin Jehoiada fapa Benaia chu sipaihote chungah a ai a awhtir a: tin, puithiam Zadoka chu lalin Abiathara ai a awhtir a.

source: I wasn't far behind.
target: Ka hnufual lo va.

source: I'm taking my time.
target: Ka hun ka la a.

source: You've had enough.
target: I nei tling tawh.

source: But because you were uncontrolled, the first place will not be yours; for you went up to your father's bed, even his bride-bed, and made it unclean.
target: Nimahsela tui anga nghet lo i ni, chungnun berna chu i nei lo vang; i pa khumpui i kai avângin

source: The simple man has faith in every word, but the man of good sense gives thought to his footsteps.
target: Mi mâwl chuan thu tin a ring a, Mi remhria erawh chuan a kalna a en tha thin.

source: Oil and perfume make glad the heart, and the wise suggestion of a friend is sweet to the soul.
target: Hriak leh rimtuiin rilru a tihlim tin, angin, Thinlung tak atanga lo chuak thian remhriatpuina chuan a tihlim thin a ni.

source: He has gone up from Pene-Rimmon, he has come to Aiath; he has gone past Migron, at Michmash he puts his forces in order.
target: Aiath khua a thleng ta, Migron khua a kal tlâng ta; Mimkas khuaah a bungrua a dah ta;

source: Is Tom fat?
target: Tom a thau em?

source: There's no waste.
target: Waste a awm lo.

source: Make the way of your orders clear to me; then my thoughts will be ever on your wonders.
target: I thununna kawng chu mi hriat thiamtir ang che: Chutichuan i thilmak tih thute chu ka ngaihtuah ang.

source: And the man Micah had a house of gods; and he made an ephod and family gods and put one of his sons in the position of priest.
target: Tin, chu Mika chuan pathiante in a nei a, ephod leh milemte a siam a, a fapa pakhat chu a puithiam atân a tihrang ta a.

source: Get ready.
target: Inpeih rawh.

source: I will be glad and have delight in your mercy; because you have seen my trouble; you have had pity on my soul in its sorrows;
target: I ngilneihna avâng hian ka hlimin ka lawm ang: Ka manganna hi i hmu si thin a; Ka nunna hi a hrehawm laite pawhin i hre thin.

source: You are beautiful
target: I mawi a ni

source: But my horn is lifted up like the horn of the ox: the best oil is flowing on my head.
target: Nimahsela ka ki hi selepa ki angin i chawimawi a: Hriak thara thih ka ni ta.

source: It's a pipe dream.
target: Pipe mumang a ni.

source: And for the land of my people, where thorns will come up; even for all the houses of joy in the glad town.
target: Ka mite ramah hian hnimhlingneite leh buarte chu a tla ang: a ni, khawpui hlimawm taka hlimna in zawng zawng chungahte chuan,

source: For if a man has an idea that he is something when he is nothing, he is tricked by himself.
target: Mi, engmah ni si lovin, mi lian deuhva a inruat chuan a inbum chawp mai a ni si.

source: The earth opening put an end to Dathan, covering up Abiram and his band.
target: Lei chu a ang a, Dathana chu a lem a, Abirama pawlte chu a khuh zo ta a.

source: And the gold body-covers of the servants of Hadadezer, David took to Jerusalem.
target: Tin, Davida chuan Hadarezera-hote rangkachak phawte a laksak a, Jerusalemah a hawn a.

source: They never spoke to us.
target: Min bia ngai lo.

source: You're too big
target: I lian lûtuk

source: The hearts of the wise are in the house of weeping; but the hearts of the foolish are in the house of joy.
target: Mi fingte thinlung a cham reng - lusun inah, Mi âte thinlung erawh hlimhlawp ina'n.

source: The secret which has been kept from all times and generations, but has now been made clear to his saints,
target: Mi zawng zawng laka a lo thup kumkhua thin, ama mite hnena a puan tak thuruk kha, tunah erawh chuan a mi thianghlimte hnenah lantirin a awm ta.

source: Things have changed
target: Thil a danglam ta

source: You are cursed with a curse; for you have kept back from me what is mine, even all this nation.
target: Anchhia lawh in ni ta; nangni he hnam pumpui hian Kei hi min rûksak si țhin a.

source: And Balaam, the son of Beor, the prophet, the children of Israel put to death with the sword.
target: Beora fapa Balaama, aienthiam pawh Israela thlahten mi dang an thlahte zingah chuan khandaihin an that zel a.

source: Don't be coy
target: Zak duh miah suh

source: And we are conscious that God is a true judge against those who do such things.
target: Chutiang thil ti thintute chungah chuan Pathianin a sawiselna chu thu dik tak lam zel a ni tih kan hre si a.

source: Can I take it?
target: Ka la thei ang em?

source: He took me to the house of wine, and his flag over me was love.
target: Ruai theh inah chuan kei mi hruai a, Ka chungah a puanzar chu hmangaihna.

source: I actually cried
target: Ka ṭap tak tak a

source: Till I put all those who are against you under your feet.
target: I hmelmate i kephah nghahchhana Ka siam hma loh zawng,’ a ti e, a ti zawk a nih kha.

source: But others, making sport of them, said, They are full of new wine.
target: Thenkhatin an nuihsan a, Uain thar an rui a nih hi, an ti a.

source: And he took them out till they were near Bethany, and lifting up his hands, he gave them a blessing.
target: Tin, Bethani dai kiang thlengin anni chu a hruai chhuak a; tin, a ban a phar a, mal a sawmsak a.

source: And round the skirts of it put fruits in blue and purple and red, with bells of gold between;
target: Tin, a fêmah te chuan pawmgranet lem - a dum pawl te, a sen duk te, a senlârtein- afêm vêlin i siam tur a ni:

source: It's a shame
target: A zahthlâk

source: I'm not begging you.
target: Ka ngen lo che.

source: But I said, No, Lord; for nothing common or unclean has ever come into my mouth.
target: Nimahsela keiin, ‘Lalpa, ni lo ve; thiang lo leh bawlhhlawh engmah reng ka kaah a lut ngai lo,’ ka ti a.

source: Who has gone into heaven, and is at the right hand of God, angels and authorities and powers having been put under his rule.
target: Isua Krista chu vanah kalin Pathian ding lamah a awm a; vantirhkohho te, thuneihna te, thiltihtheihna te ama thu thua awmtirin an awm a.

source: Our eyes met.
target: Kan mit an inhmu.

source: And at these words, Ananias went down on the earth, and his life went from him: and great fear came on all who were present.
target: Tin, Anania chuan chung thu chu a hriat veleh a tlu a, a thi ta a; tin a hria apiangin an hlau ta em em a.

source: When this came to God's ears he was very angry, and gave up Israel completely;
target: Pathian chu chu a lo hriatin a thin a rim a, Israel-ho chu a ten ta êm êm a:

source: She lied.
target: Dawt a sawi.

source: We love it
target: Kan hmangaih e

source: I am busy
target: Ka buai

source: And I sent Moses and Aaron, troubling Egypt by all the signs I did among them: and after that I took you out.
target: Tin, Mosia lehArona ka tir a, Aigupta ram chu an zingah thilmak tiin ka hrem a; tin, chu mi zawhah chuan ka hruai chhuak che u a.

source: But Jesus, who had knowledge of their thoughts, said to them, Why are you reasoning in your hearts?
target: Chutichuan Isuan an ngaihtuah chu a hria a, an hnenah chuan, In thinlungah engnge in ngaihtuah?

source: Put the two gold chains on the two rings at the ends of the bag;
target: Tin, rangkachak khaidiat herh pahnih chu âwmbel tlâng hmâwr vê vêa khâng pahnihah chuan i thlung tur a ni.

source: They laughed
target: An nui nasa

source: I am crying out to you, O men; my voice comes to the sons of men.
target: Aw nangni mihringte u, Ka auh che u hi, Ka aw chu mihring fate tan a ni.

source: And three sodas
target: Soda pathum nên

source: And the men who were with him were not able to say anything; hearing the voice, but seeing no one.
target: Tin, a hnena kal vete chu dang rengin an ding a, aw zawng an hre na a, nimahsela tumah an hmu si lo va.

source: And now a number of nations have come together against you, and they say, Let her be made unclean and let our eyes see the fate of Zion.
target: Tûnah hnam tam tak nangmah dovin an inkhâwm a, Tihbawrhbân in awm sela, kan mit hian zion chunga a châk zâwng chu hmu rawh se, an ti a.

source: It's really true
target: A dik tak zet a ni

source: And a great number put down their clothing in the way; and others put down branches which they had taken from the fields.
target: Tin, mi tam takin kalkawngah chuan an puan an phah a; mi dangin lova mi chhawl satin an phah bawk a.

source: I got all excited.
target: Ka phur vek tawh.

source: The clock is wrong.
target: Darkar a dik lo.

source: I help Tom.
target: Tom-a ka tanpui.

source: Then Absalom sent for Joab to send him to the king, but he would not come to him: and he sent again a second time, but he would not come.
target: Chutichuan Absaloma chuan lal hnêna tirh atân Joaba chu a chah a; nimahsela a kal duh lo va; tin, a chah nawn leh a, nimahsela a kal duh chuang lo va.

source: From his house he keeps watch on all who are living on the earth;
target: Leia awm zawng zawng hi A awmna hmun atang khian a rawn thlir thin;

source: You're silly
target: I nuihzatthlak

source: That isn't available
target: Chu chu a awm lo

source: They're yours, Tom.
target: I ta an ni, Tom.

source: Whoever makes any like it, or puts it on one who is not a priest, will be cut off from his people.
target: Tupawhin a anpui siam sela emaw, chu mi chu a chipuite zînga ata tihboral a ni ang,’’ tiin sawi ang che,’’ tiin a sawi leh a.

source: Let my prayer come before you; take me out of trouble, as you have said.
target: Khawngaih ka dilna hi i hmaah thleng rawh se: I thu ang zelin mi chhanhim ang che.

source: After these things Jesus let himself be seen again by the disciples at the sea of Tiberias; and it came about in this way.
target: Chu mi hnuah chuan Tiberia dilah Isua a zirtirte hnenah a inlar leh a; heti hian a inlar:

source: If then you have done what is true and upright to Jerubbaal and his family this day, may you have joy in Abimelech, and may he have joy in you;
target: vawiinah hian Jerubaala leh a chhûnge chunga tih takzet leh fel taka ti in ni phawt zawngin le, Abimeleka chungah hian lawm rawh u, tin, ani pawh in chungah hian lawm rawh se:

source: David then gives him the name of Lord, so how is it possible for him to be his son?
target: Chutichuan Davidan ani chu, ‘Lalpa’ a ti si a, engtin nge a fapa a nih theih le? a ti a.

source: Is that a no
target: Aih i tihna em ni

source: Unequal weights and unequal measures, they are all disgusting to the Lord.
target: Bukna dang dang te, tehna dang dangte hi LALPA mithmuhah angkhat rengin thil tenawm a ni ve ve.

source: May your family be like the family of Perez, the son whom Tamar gave to Judah, from the offspring which the Lord may give you by this young woman.
target: tin, LALPAN he nula laka thlah a la siamsak tûr che avâng hian i chhûngkua chu Tamarin Juda a hrinsak Pereza chhûngkua ang lo ni rawh se, an ti a.

source: Smooth lips and an evil heart are like a vessel of earth plated with silver waste.
target: Thu sawi tlawr hmui leh thinlung sual chu Hlumbel tangkaraw tuieka luan ang a ni.

source: They were upright in the eyes of God, keeping all the rules and orders of God, and doing no wrong.
target: An pahnihin Pathian mithmuhin fel takin an awm a, sawiselbovin Lalpa thupek leh a dan zawng zawng zawmin an awm thin.

source: Did you help?
target: Amah I pui em?

source: For he will give you into the care of his angels to keep you wherever you go.
target: I kawng tinrenga humhim tûr chein, I chung thu-ah zawng vântirhkohte chu thu a pe dawn si a.

source: And Elimelech, Naomi's husband, came to his end; and only her two sons were with her.
target: Tin, Elimeleka, Naomi pasal chu a thi a, ama leh a fapate pahnih chauh an ni ta a.

source: But now you have a desire to put me to death, a man who has said to you what is true, as I had it from God: Abraham did not do that.
target: Nimahsela tunah mi thah in tum si. Pathian hnena thutak ka hriat hrilhtu che u ka ni asin; Abrahama zawngin hetiangin a ti lo ve.

source: The waters are joined together, hard as a stone, and the face of the deep is covered.
target: Tuite pawh lung ang maiin a sak a, Tuipui thuk chungte a khal a.

source: And then their eyes were open, and they had knowledge of him, but he went from their view.
target: Tin, an mit a lo var a, a hmel an lo hre ta a; tin, ani chu a ral ta mai a.

source: Give ear, my son, and be wise, guiding your heart in the right way.
target: Ka fapa, ngaithla la, fing la, Kawngah chuan i thinlung hruai rawh.

source: He has a robotic voice.
target: Robot aw a nei a.

source: The people said in answer, You have an evil spirit: who has any desire to put you to death?
target: Tin, mipui chuan, Ramhuai zawl i nih hi; tuin nge tihhlum tum che? an ti a, an chhang a.

source: And with this I have given you what you made no request for: wealth and honour, so that no king was ever your equal.
target: Tin, i dil loh, hausakna leh ropuina pawh ka pe bawk ang che; tichuan i dam chhûngin lal zingah chuan nangmah ang rêng rêng an awm lo vang.

source: Don't stare at people.
target: Mi en reng suh.

source: Not by all the people, but by witnesses marked out before by God, even by us, who took food and drink with him after he came back from the dead.
target: amaherawhchu mi zawng zawng hnenah a ni lo, Pathianin hretua a ruat lawkate hnenah chauh a ni, - keimahni, mitthi zing ata a thawh leh hnua a hnena eia barte hnenah hian.

source: Be merciful
target: Khawngaihna ngah rawh

source: They stopped
target: An tawp tawp

source: You're starting to bore me.
target: Min bore tan ta.

source: Great have been my troubles from the time when I was young, but my troubles have not overcome me.
target: Ka naupan tet ata miten vawi tam tak mi timangang a, Nimahsela mi hneh si lo.

source: psychological disorder
target: rilru a

source: Don't expect too much.
target: Beisei lutuk suh.

source: Don't kid me!
target: Mi fiam suh!

source: Don't come
target: Lo kal suh

source: It isn't a good time
target: Hun tha a ni lo

source: And you may not take as wife a woman and at the same time her sister, to be in competition with her in her life-time.
target: I nupuia laizawn chu a saruakna hlim turin i nupui la dam chhûng chuan i nei kawp tur a ni lo.

source: We're not kidding
target: Kan nuihzat lo

source: The top and the sides and the horns were all plated with the best gold; and he put an edge of gold all round it.
target: Tin, a chung te, a pang velte le a kite chu rangkachak hli hlak tiin a luan a; tin, rangkachakin a tlâng a kawm a.

source: They rented a house.
target: In an rent a.

source: Does he give praise to the servant because he did what was ordered?
target: In thu ang a a tih avangin in bawih hnenah lawmthu in hrilh ngai em ni?

source: Get a move on.
target: Hma sâwn zêl rawh.

source: A word at the right time is like apples of gold in a network of silver.
target: A awm tak thu sawi hi Tangkaraw bâwma rangkachak apple ang a ni.

source: All this have I seen, and have given my heart to all the work which is done under the sun: there is a time when man has power over man for his destruction.
target: Ni hnuaia thiltih zawng zawng kim takin ka ngaihtuah a, hei zawng hi ka chhinchhiah a ni; mi, mi dang chungah pawi khawpin a intilal thin a.

source: He sees no company
target: Company a hmu lo

source: For when we gave you news of the power and the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, our teaching was not based on stories put together by art, but we were eye-witnesses of his glory.
target: Kan Lalpa Isua Krista thiltihtheihzia leh a lo kal lehna thu chu ka hriattir lai che u khan, thawnthu fing taka ngaihtuah chhuah maite zawm kan ni lo va, a ropuina hmutute kan ni zawk asin.

source: I've got a little work to do.
target: Hna tlem ka nei a.

source: I will give you praise, O Lord, among the peoples; I will make songs to you among the nations.
target: Aw LALPA, mi tin, zingahte lawm thu ka hrilh ang che: Hnam tin zingah nangmah fakin ka zai ang.

source: All these towns were given to the children of Merari by their families, that is, the rest of the families of the Levites; and their heritage was twelve towns.
target: Chung zawng zawng chu Levi ho chhûngkaw dangte Meraria thlahteho an chhûngkaw zir zela a ni khawpuite chu a ni; tichuan an chanpual chu khawpui sâwm leh pahnih a ni.

source: I drink wine
target: Zu ka in

source: This comes from the Lord of armies, purposing wonders, and wise in all his acts.
target: Chung pawh chu sipaihote LALPA, inrawnna kawnga mi mak tak leh, finna kawnga mi țha tak lakah chuan a chhuak a ni.

source: Be certain then that the Lord your God is not giving you this good land as a reward for your righteousness; for you are a stiff-necked people.
target: chuvangin he ram țha tak hi in fel avang lua turin LALPAN a pe che u ani lo tih hre rawh u; hnam luhlul tak in ni si a.

source: In this Jesus was teaching them in the form of a story: but what he said was not clear to them.
target: Chu tehkhin thu chu Isuan an hnenah a sawi a; nimahsela eng thu nge an hnenah a sawi tih an hre si lo.

source: Now why are you crying so loudly? is there no king in you? has destruction come on your wise helper? so that pains have taken you like the pains of a woman in childbirth:
target: Engatinge i țah vak vak ni? I chhûngah lalber a awm lo vem ni, i remruattu a boral ta em ni, hmeichhe nau vei anga natnain a man tâk che?

source: But the children of your people say, The way of the Lord is not equal: when it is they whose way is not equal.
target: Mahse i hnam fate chuan,' LALPA thil tih dan hi a rual lo ve,' an tihin anmahni tih dân a fel lo zawk a ni si a.

source: You are to make the altar of the Lord your God of uncut stones; offering on it burned offerings to the Lord your God:
target: LALPA in Pathian maicham chu lung chher lovin insiam tur ani a; chu miah chuan LALPA in Pathian tan halral thilhlante in hlan ang a;

source: Then Jesus, having knowledge of everything which was coming on him, went forward and said to them, Who are you looking for?
target: Isuan a chunga thil thleng tur zawng zawng chu a hre reng a, a va chhuak a, an hnenah, Tunge in zawn? a ti a.

source: Because of this my spirit is overcome; and my heart is full of fear.
target: Chuvangin ka thlarau hi ka kawchhûngah a chau va; Ka thinlung hi ka kawchhûngah a mangang ta a.

source: You were going on well; who was the cause of your not giving ear to what is true?
target: Tha takin in tlan thin kha le; thutak chu in zawm loh nan tuin nge dal ta che u?

source: Sami Who's asking
target: Sami Tunge zawt a

source: You had no desire for offerings of beasts or fruits of the earth; ears you made for me: for burned offerings and sin offerings you made no request.
target: Inthawina leh thilhlan chungah hain lawmna reng i nei lo va; Ka bengte hi mi tihawngsak ta a: hâlral thilhlan leh sual tana thilhlan chu i phut lo.

source: I've lived a long time.
target: Ka dam rei tawh.

source: He held a session
target: Session a nei a

source: Whoever makes an offering of praise gives glory to me; and to him who is upright in his ways I will make clear the salvation of God.
target: Tu pawh lawm thu sawi inthawina hlan apiang chuan mi chawimawi thin a; Tin, a awm dan vawng uptu hnênah chuan Pathian chhandamna ka entir ang, a ti a.

source: They are of the world, so their talk is the world's talk, and the world gives ear to them.
target: Anni chu khawvela mi an ni a; chuvangin khawvela mi angin an tawng a, khawvelin an thu an ngaithla thin a ni.

source: Have a talk with your neighbour himself about your cause, but do not give away the secret of another:
target: I thubuai chu i thenawmpa nên sawi dun ula, Mi dang thuruk chu puang suh,

source: He did not like children
target: Naupang a duh lo

source: They have made ready a net for my steps; my soul is bent down; they have made a great hole before me, and have gone down into it themselves. (Selah.
target: Ka ke awh nân len an phah a; Ka nunna hi a kun ngawih ngawih a: Ka hmaah khuarkhurum an lai a; Anmahni ngei a lai takah an tla ta a.Selah

source: We seldom do that
target: Chutiang chu kan ti tlem hle

source: Then Rachel and Leah said to him in answer, What part or heritage is there for us in our father's house?
target: Tin, Rakili leh Leaii chuan an chhâng a, a hnênah, Kan pa inah chuan kan tân chanvo leh ro khâwm tûr rêng a la awm cheu em ni?

source: They refused
target: An pawmlo

source: He has let my request come before him, and I will make my prayer to him all my days.
target: Ka lama a beng a rawn dawh avângin Ka dam chhûng zawngin amah chu ka ko vang.

source: Are you enjoying yourselves
target: In hlim em

source: I'm free.
target: Ka hman a nia.

source: But Elijah was not sent to one of them, but only to Zarephath, in the land of Sidon, to a woman who was a widow.
target: nimahsela an zingah tuma hnenah Elija tirh a ni lo va, Sidon ram lama Sarepta khuaa hmeichhe pakhat hmeithai hnenah chauh tirh a ni zawk kha.

source: We should be fine
target: Kan tha tur a ni

source: For if I make use of tongues in my prayers, my spirit makes the prayer, but not my mind.
target: Tawng hriat lohva ka tawngtai chuanka thlarau zawngin a tawngtai ngei a, ka hriatna erawh chu a hlawk chuang lo.

source: They're rich
target: An hausa

source: Let him do with the ox as he did with the ox of the sin-offering; and the priest will take away their sin and they will have forgiveness.
target: Chutiang chuan bawng chu a ti ang a; sual thawina bawng a tih ang chiahin hei pawh hi a ti tur a ni: tin, puithiamin inremna a siamsang ang a, ngaihdam an ni ang.

source: And he had talk with Joab, the son of Zeruiah, and with Abiathar the priest; and they were on his side and gave him their support.
target: Ani chuan Zeruii fapa Joaba leh, puithiam Abiathara chu a rawn a: anni chu Adonija lamah an tang a, an tanpui thin a.

source: And that the world which then was came to an end through the overflowing of the waters.
target: chungah chuan chu mi laia khawvel awm chu tuiin a chim a, a boral ta, tih hi;

source: So that servant went down on his face, requesting him and saying, Give me time and I will make payment to you.
target: Chutichuan a bawipui chu a bawkkhup a, ‘Ka chungah zahngai rih la, ka la pe ang che,’ tiin a ngen chiam a.

source: God does not exist.
target: Pathian a awm lo.

source: Now will I come forward, says the Lord; now will I be lifted up; now will my power be seen.
target: LALPA chuan, Tunah chuan ka tho vang a, tunah chuan chawisanin ka awm tawh ang.

source: Let me guess
target: Ka lo ring chhin ang

source: Now after these things the chief servant who had the care of the wine, and the chief bread-maker in Pharaoh's house, did something against Pharaoh's orders;
target: Tin, chûng thil hnuah chuan heti hi a ni a, Aigupta lal uain petu leh a chhang siamtu te chuan an pu Aigupta lal chu an tivui a.

source: Up! let your face be bright, for your light has come, and the glory of the Lord is shining on you.
target: Tho la, eng rawh; i eng chu a lo thleng a, LALPA ni ropuina chu i chunga lo chhuah tak hi.

source: But I will make an offering to you with the voice of praise; I will give effect to my oaths. Salvation is the Lord's.
target: Kei erawh chuan lâwm thu sawina aw nên i hnênah in thawina ka hlân ang a; Thu ka tiam tawh chu ka hlen ang. Chhandamna chu LALPA ta a ni, tiin.

source: But the heart of this people is uncontrolled and turned away from me; they are broken loose and gone.
target: Mahse he mite hian thinlung luhlul leh helhmang an pu a, An hel a, an tlan bo ta a.

source: Their job is done
target: An hna chu a zo ta

source: I didn't try to respond
target: Chhan ka tum lo

source: And having come across one jewel of great price, he went and gave all he had in exchange for it.
target: tin, ani chuan tuikeplung hlu tak pakhat a hmu a, a neih zawng zawng chu a va hralh a, a lei ta a.

source: But God said to him, You foolish one, tonight I will take your soul from you, and who then will be the owner of all the things which you have got together?
target: Nimahsela Pathianin a hnenah, ‘Mi a, zaninah hian i thlarau an laksak dawn che a ni; i thil dehchhuahte kha tu ta nge ni ta ang le?’ a ti a.

source: But Jesus, seeing it, said to them, Why are you troubling the woman? she has done a kind act to me.
target: Isua erawh chuan chu chu a hriatin an hnenah, Hmeichhia hi engah nge in tihbuai ni? ka chungah hian thil tha tak a ti a ni.

source: It was the sea.
target: Tuipui a ni.

source: Love's ways are ever fair, it takes no thought for itself; it is not quickly made angry, it takes no account of evil;
target: a che mawi lo lo va, mahni hma a sial lo va, a thinur duh lo va, sual lamah a ngaihtuah lo va;

source: Tom was warm
target: Tom kha a sa phat

source: The property of a man of wealth is his strong town, and it is as a high wall in the thoughts of his heart.
target: Mi hausa chuan a sum chu a kulhpui a ni a, A suangtuah danah chuan kulh sâng tak a ni.

source: That I may give out the voice of praise, and make public all the wonders which you have done.
target: Lawm thu sawina ka tihrik theih a, I thilmak tih zawng zawng thute chu ka hrilh theih nân.

source: But we have this wealth in vessels of earth, so that it may be seen that the power comes not from us but from God;
target: Nimahsela, thiltihtheihna nasatzia chu keimahni hnena mi ni lovin, Pathian ta a nih theih zawkna turin chu ro chu hlum belahte kan vawng a ni.

source: Eyes of pride, a false tongue, hands which take life without cause;
target: Mit chapo te, lei daw thei te, Pawi khawih lo thisen chhuahna kut te,

source: And Mordecai gave him an account of what had taken place, and of the amount of money which Haman had said he would put into the king's store for the destruction of the Jews.
target: Tin, Mordekaia chuan a chunga thil lo thleng zawng zawng leh Judate tihhlumna tûra lal sum zinga dah tûra Hamanan tangka pêk a tiam zat chiahte a lo hrilh a.

source: And he took him in to his mother, and she took him on her knees and kept him there till the middle of the day, when his life went from him.
target: Tin, a hruai a, a nu hnên a thlen chuan a mal chungah chuan tlai thlengin a thu a, tichuan a thi ta a.

source: Then came the feast of the opening of the Temple in Jerusalem: it was winter;
target: Tin, Jerusalem khuaa Inpumpek Kut lai a ni a, chu chu thlasik lai a ni.

source: I like them
target: Anmahni ka duh

source: But God gave him back to life, having made him free from the pains of death because it was not possible for him to be overcome by it.
target: Kha mi kha, Pathianin thihna phuarnate chu a phelhsak a, a kai tho ta a; amah chu thihna chelh hlen rual a nih loh avangin.

source: Do you love each other very much?
target: In inhmangaih em?

source: So that day God overcame Jabin, king of Canaan, before the children of Israel.
target: chutichuan Pathian chu mi ni chuan Israela thlahte hmaah Kanaan ram lal Jabina chu a titlâwm ta a.

source: Did not God make him as well as me? did he not give us life in our mothers' bodies?
target: Pum chhûnga kei mi siamtu khan a ni pawh a siam lo vem ni? Pum chhûnga mi dintu chu thuhmun a ni lâwm ni?

source: His strength is in his body, and his force in the muscles of his stomach.
target: Ngai teh mah, a chakna chu a kawngah a awm a, A thahrui chu a udl thuara awm a ni.

source: Mental disease
target: Rilru na

source: He liked that
target: Khapa khân kha kha a duh

source: And you are complete in him, who is the head of all rule and authority:
target: Amahah chuan in famkim ta bawk a; ani chu lalna leh thuneihna zawng zawng lu a ni.

source: And news was given to Solomon that Shimei had gone from Jerusalem to Gath and had come back again.
target: Tin, Simeia chu Jerusalem khua ata a chhuak a, gath khuaah a va kal a, a lo haw leh tih Solomona chu an hrilh a.

source: There are three witnesses, the Spirit, the water, and the blood: and all three are in agreement.
target: Hriattirtu chu pathum an awm, Thlarau leh tui leh thisente chu; chung pathum chu an inthurual a ni.

source: We are threshing wheat.
target: Buhfai kan buh a.

source: The spirit of a man will be his support when he is ill; but how may a broken spirit be lifted up?
target: Mi rilru nei chuan a chak lohna chu a tuar zo ang a, Mahse rilru hliam chu tunge tuar thei ang?

source: Are you funny?
target: Fiamthu i duh em?

source: I helped Tom.
target: Toma ka ṭanpui e.

source: And the Lord God made man from the dust of the earth, breathing into him the breath of life: and man became a living soul.
target: Tin, LALPA Pathianin leia vaivutin mihring a siam a, a hnârah chuan nunna thaw chu a thaw lût a: tichuan mihring chu mi nung a lo ni ta a.

source: But if you are guided by the Spirit, you are not under the law.
target: Nimahsela, Thlarau hruaia in awm chuan Dan hnuaiah chuan in awm lo ve.

source: For he saw that the chief priests had given him up through envy.
target: Puithiam lalten itsikna avangin an rawn hruai tih a hre si a

source: Don't hit me
target: Min vaw suh

source: She isn't eating
target: Chaw a ei lo

source: And they will not take from you a stone for the angle of a wall or the base of a building; but you will be a waste place for ever, says the Lord.
target: I hnên ata kil lung tûr leh lungphûm tûr Lak chhuah a ni tawh lo vang; Kumkhuain i tiau zawk ang, Tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni:

source: But they went on crying out loudly, Let him be put to death on the cross. And they had their way.
target: Anni erawh chuan aw ring takin kraws-a khengbet turin an ngen lui hram a. Tin, an aw chuan a vaudai ta a.

source: We laughed at him
target: Amah chu kan nui a

source: Those who do work on the land are in fear, for there has been no rain on the land, and the farmers are shamed, covering their heads.
target: Lei lah a khi, ram puma ruah tui awm loh vangin. Leilettute chu an zam a, an lu an khuh a.

source: Sit still
target: Thu zêl rawh

source: Call a doctor
target: Daktawr ko rawh

source: He does not come out of the dark; his branches are burned by the flame, and the wind takes away his bud.
target: Thim ata a chhuak lo vang a, Meialhin a zarte a hliau lo vang a, A kaa a thawah a kal bo vang.

source: To every one of them he gave three changes of clothing; but to Benjamin he gave three hundred bits of silver and five changes of clothing.
target: An zaa hnênah silhfên inthlakna te a pe țheuh va; Benjamina hnênah phei chuan tangka zathum leh silhfên inthlâkna panga a pe a.

source: I don't steal
target: Ka ru ngai lo

source: And Moses came and sent for the chiefs of the people and put before them all these words which the Lord had given him orders to say.
target: Tin, Mosian mipui zînga upahote chu a rawn ko khâwm a, LALPA thupêk zawng zawngte chu a hrilh vek a.

source: You're dirty
target: I bal

source: Be discreet
target: Ti neuh neuh rawh

source: And I myself will be fighting against you with an outstretched hand and with a strong arm, even with angry feeling and passion and in great wrath.
target: Keimah ngei pawhin thinrim leh lungni lo tak leh thinur takin bân pharin bân tha chak hmangin ka do ang che.

source: Fears have come on me; my hope is gone like the wind, and my well-being like a cloud.
target: Tihbaiawm ka chungah athleng a, Ka roupna thli angin an um bo va, Ka mithatna chhum angin a riral ta.

source: Send them to destruction, O Lord; let their evil designs be the cause of their fall; let them be forced out by all their sins; because they have gone against your authority.
target: Aw Pathian, anniho hi thiam loh chantir ang che; Anmahni remruat ngeite chu tluk phah nân hmang rawh se. An bawhchhiatna tam tak avâng chuan nam chhuak ang che; I chungah an hel si a.

source: Of the sons of Hebron: Eliel the chief, and his brothers, eighty;
target: Hebrona thlahte zinga mi, puipa ber Eliela, a unaute nen sawmriat;

source: The ninth Mattaniah, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi kuana chu Matânia chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: Yes, they can
target: Aw, an thei

source: I waited up.
target: Ka nghak reng tawh che.

source: Tom walks.
target: Tom-a a pen mek.

source: It helped me out tremendously.
target: Min pui nasa hle.

source: air force
target: thlawhna sipai

source: Because punishment for an evil work comes not quickly, the minds of the sons of men are fully given to doing evil.
target: Thiltih sual chungah hremna hlen nghal mai a nih thin loh avângin, mihring fate thinlung chu thil sual ti tûrin a lo ngampa tawh thin a ni.

source: We are burned up by the heat of your passion, and troubled by your wrath.
target: I thinurnaa tihboralin kan awm a, I thinrimnaa tihmanganin kan awm bawk si a.

source: To him who took his people through the waste land: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.
target: A mite thlalêra hruaitu hnênah chuan: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: Manasseh was twelve years old when he became king; for fifty-five years he was ruling in Jerusalem; and his mother's name was Hephzi-bah.
target: Manasea chu a lal tantirhin kum sâwm leh kum hnih mi a ni a; Jerusalem ah kum sâwmnga leh kum nga a lal a: a nu hming chu Jephzibi a ni.

source: Are you a teacher
target: Zirtirtu i ni em

source: And one of the four beasts gave to the seven angels seven gold vessels full of the wrath of God, who is living for ever and ever.
target: Tin, Thilnung pali zinga pakhat chuan, vantirhkoh pasarihte hnenah chuan, Pathian chatuana nung renga thinurnaa khat rangkachak berhbu pasarih a pe a.

source: I am not giving you an order, but using the ready mind of others as a test of the quality of your love.
target: Thu pe lamin ka sawi lo va, mi dang thahnemngaihnain in hmangaihna takzia pawh chu fiah turin ka sawi zawk a ni.

source: She tried
target: A tichhin tawh

source: I'm not sick
target: Ka damlo lo

source: All the earth is at rest and is quiet: they are bursting into song.
target: Leilung pum pui hi a chawl a, a reh rawih rawih a: hla an sa chhuak phut a.

source: The outer cover of sheepskins coloured red, and the cover of leather, and the veil for the doorway;
target: Berampa vun chhum sena siam a khuhna te, savun tha mia siam a khuhna te, a daidanna tur puanzar te nen,

source: And he put his hands on him and gave him his orders, as the Lord had said by Moses.
target: tin, a chungah a kut a nghat a, Mosia hmanga LALPAN a sawi ang khan thuneihna a pe ta a.

source: I tripped
target: Ka zin tawh

source: You couldn't help it.
target: I ti thei lo.

source: Let us pray.
target: I lo tawngtai ang u.

source: And I will make prayer to the Father and he will give you another Helper to be with you for ever,
target: Tin, Pa ka dil ang a, ani chuan Thlamuantu dang a pe ang che u, chatuana in hnena awm turin;

source: Do you ever get scared?
target: I hlau ngai em?

source: And when I come, I will send the men of your selection with letters to take the money you have got together to Jerusalem.
target: Tin, in khawngaih thilpek chu Jerusalem khuaa kalpui turin ka lo thlen hunin tupawh tha in tih apiang lehkhate kengin ka tir ang.

source: Sami was vomiting
target: Sami chu a luak a

source: He showed it to me
target: Min hmuhtir a

source: And he went with him; and a great number of people went after him, and came round him.
target: Tichuan Isua a hnenah a va kal a; tin mipui tam takin an zui a, an nek huai huai a.

source: Let the streams make sounds of joy with their hands; let the mountains be glad together,
target: Luipuite chuan an kut beng sela; Tlangte chu hlimin zaiho rawh se,

source: Now let all your fighting-men make a circle round the town, going all round it once. Do this for six days.
target: Tin, râl kap mi zawng zawngte hian khawpui hi velin vawi khat chu in han vel chhuak pawht ang a. chutiang chuan ni ruk in ti tur a ni.

source: Tom ate it.
target: Toman a ei tawh.

source: We never met
target: Kan inhmu ngailo

source: And Jesus did such a number of other things that, if every one was recorded, it is my opinion that even the world itself is not great enough for the books there would be.
target: Tin, heng lo hi Isua thiltih a dang tam tak a la awm, chung chu ziak fai vek ni dawn sela, lehkhabu ziak tur zawng zawng chu khawvelah pawh hian lengin ka ring lo.

source: And the war-carriage was washed by the pool of Samaria, which was the bathing-place of the loose women, and the dogs were drinking his blood there, as the Lord had said.
target: Tin, Samari khaw dil kama tawlailir chu an sil a; tin, LALPA thu sawi ang ngei khan uiin a thite chu an liak ta a; chutah chuan nawhchizuarhote chu an insil thin.

source: We're OK.
target: Kan tha vek e.

source: I'm up
target: Ka zo e

source: You have given them the bread of weeping for food; for their drink you have given them sorrow in great measure.
target: Anni chu mittui chhângin i chawm a, Mittui hi in tûrintehna lian takin i pe thin.

source: I still don't like you.
target: Ka la duh lo che.

source: Not now
target: Tunah ni lo

source: Their arrows give certain death, they are all men of war.
target: An thal bâwm chu thlan inhawng a ni a, An zain mi chak tak an ni vek a.

source: It's not disrespect
target: Zah lohna a ni lo

source: I'm fit.
target: Ka inthazo.

source: I hate golf
target: Bawlvuak ka hua

source: For you go before him with the blessings of good things: you put a crown of fair gold on his head.
target: Țhatnaa malsawmnate in i hmuak si a: Rangkachak thinghlim lallukhum i khumtir a.

source: Tom seems OK
target: Tom a ṭhat hmêl

source: I want it
target: Ka duh e

source: And a son of an Israelite woman, whose father was an Egyptian, went out among the children of Israel and had a fight with a man of Israel by the tents;
target: Israel hmeichhe fapa, a pa Aigupta mi, mi pakhat chu Israela thlahte zingah a va kal a: chu Israel hmeichhe fapa leh Israel mi, mi pakhat chu riah hmunah an insual a;

source: By faith Jacob gave a blessing to the two sons of Joseph, when he was near to death; and gave God worship, supported by his stick.
target: Rinnain Jakoba chuan a thih dawn lai khan Josefa fate chu mal a sawm ve ve a; a tiang hmawr rinchhanin Pathian a be bawk a.

source: They're all dying
target: An thi vek tawh

source: For this cause be ruled by God; but make war on the Evil One and he will be put to flight before you.
target: Chutichuan, Pathian thu thuin awm rawh u; amaherawhchu Diabola dodal rawh u, tichuan a tlan bosan ang che u.

source: They are feeling it
target: An hre mek a ni

source: Let's move
target: Kal ila

source: In the steps of an evil man there is a net for him, but the upright man gets away quickly and is glad.
target: Mi tha lote bawhchhiatnaah chuan thang a awm a, Mi fel erawh chu a zai a, a hlim.

source: Will he make prayers to you, or say soft words to you?
target: I hnênah dilna tam tak a siam ang êm ni? I hnênah thu nemin a sawi ang maw?

source: Seeing that there are those who take credit to themselves after the flesh, I will do the same.
target: Mi tam takin tisa anga an chhuan avangin kei pawhin ka chhuang ve the ang.

source: Jesus, being conscious that the Father had put everything into his hands, and that he came from God and was going to God,
target: Isuan, - Pain a kutah thil engkim a vawntir te, Pathian hnena lo chhuak a nih te, Pathian hnena a kal dawn te hre reng chungin –

source: I say it's OK
target: A ṭha e ka tih chu

source: And the oxen and the young asses which are used for ploughing, will have salted grain which has been made free from the waste with fork and basket.
target: bâwngpa leh sabengtung no lei letutte chuan chaw leh sabengtung no lei lettute chuan chaw al, suahdur leh sisepa tihfai sa, an ei bawk ang.

source: For see! those who make war on you are out of control; your haters are lifting up their heads.
target: Ngai teh, nangmah dotute chu an sa mur mur a: Nangmah hawtute chu an dak hraw harw a.

source: I'll have them look at it.
target: Ka en tir ang.

source: Hate is a cause of violent acts, but all errors are covered up by love.
target: Huâtnain inhauna ahchawk chhuak a, Hmangaihna erawh chuan bawhchhiatna zawng zawng a khuh thin.

source: She is nobody's fool.
target: Tumah â a ni lo.

source: Bless you
target: Malsawmna dawng ru

source: The period is missing.
target: Period a awm lo.

source: Then they made another water-hole, and there was a fight about that, so he gave it the name of Sitnah.
target: Tin, tuichhunchhuah dang an lai leh a, chu mi pawh chu chuh tumin an inhnial leh a: tichuan a hmingah chuan Sina a vuah leh a.

source: Am I too late?
target: Ka tlâi lutuk em?

source: All hands will be feeble and all knees without strength, like water.
target: Kut zawng zawngte chu a zawi ang a, khup zawng zawngte chu tui angin a nêm ang.

source: A sword is on the men of pride, and they will become foolish: a sword is on her men of war, and they will be broken.
target: Mi dawhtheite chungah khandaih, Mi â an lo chang ang! A ral tu mi chungah khandaih, An zam lo vang.

source: He is the Rock, complete is his work; for all his ways are righteousness: a God without evil who keeps faith, true and upright is he.
target: Lungpuia chu, a thiltih a fel famkim; A awm dan zawng zawng chu dana ni: Pathian rinawm, khawlohna nei lo, Fel leh tha a ni.

source: We're behind schedule.
target: Kan hnufual tawh.

source: Because this is the word which was given to you from the first, that we are to have love for one another;
target: Hei hi atir ata thuchah in hriat kha a ni si a, kan inhmangaih tawn theuh tur a ni, tih hi;

source: I refuse
target: Ka duhlo

source: Who did no evil, and there was no deceit in his mouth:
target: Ani chuan thil reng a tisual lo va, a kaah ngamthlemna a awm hek lo;

source: Then Joseph took them from between his knees, and went down on his face to the earth.
target: Tin, Josefa chuan anni chu a pa kapkâr ata chu a kai chhuak a, a hmaia lei siin chibai a bûk a.

source: And Aaron is to give the ox of the sin-offering for himself, to make himself and his house free from sin.
target: Tin, Arona chuan ama puala sual thawina bawngpa chu a hian ang a, amah leh a chhûngte tan inremna a siam ang.

source: Feel this.
target: Hei hi hre rawh.

source: Keep talking
target: Ṭawng zêl rawh

source: We'll help
target: Kan tanpui ang

source: Any appetizer?
target: Ei tuina awm em?

source: How wonderful!
target: Engtia ropui nge!

source: Tom's fat
target: Tom a thau

source: Now a man of the house of Levi took as his wife a daughter of Levi.
target: Tin, mi pakhat, Levia chhûngte zînga mi a va chhuak a, Levia fanu nupuiah a va nei a.

source: Whom are you looking for?
target: Tu nge i zawn?

source: And the sin of these young men was very great before the Lord; for they gave no honour to the Lord's offerings.
target: Tichuan tlangvâlte sualna chu LALPA mithmuin a lo nasa ta êm êm mai a: mite chuan LALPA hnêna inthawina hlante chu an ngaihnêp phah ta si a.

source: Everyone says false words to his neighbour: their tongues are smooth in their talk, and their hearts are full of deceit.
target: Mi tinin an vengte hnênah thu engmah lo mai mai an sawi thin a: Mi fak derna hmui leh bumna thinlung puin thu an sawi thin.

source: Make your way clear to me, O Lord; I will go on my way in your faith: let my heart be glad in the fear of your name.
target: Aw LALPA, i kawng chu mi entir ang che; i thutakah ka awm ang: I hming tih tûrin thinlung sakhat mi puttir ang che.

source: Are you doing well?
target: I ti tha em?

source: Tom wants it
target: Toma'n a duh

source: You're a prisoner
target: Tâng i ni a

source: They are threatening me.
target: Min vau a ni.

source: We are about your age.
target: I kum vel kan ni.

source: Only put your hand on him, and see what a fight you will have; you will not do it again!
target: A chungah kut han thlah teh, In inbeih edan tûr chu ngaihtuah rawh, I ti leh tawh ngai lo vang!

source: There an upright man might put his cause before him; and I would be free for ever from my judge.
target: Tichuan, mi fel chuan a hnênah a ngen ang a, Mi ngaihtuahtu hnên ata chu ka chhuak vang vang ang.

source: I changed.
target: Ka thlak.

source: I have not kissed her yet.
target: Ka la fawp lo.

source: Hurry up
target: Hmanhmawh rawh

source: I can try it.
target: Ka lo tichhin thei.

source: My knees are feeble for need of food; there is no fat on my bones.
target: Ka khupte hi chaw nghei avângin a chak ta lo va; Ka tisa hian thau reng a pu ta lo.

source: They abandoned you
target: An kalsan che a ni

source: And God made man in his image, in the image of God he made him: male and female he made them.
target: Tichuan Pathianin ama anpuiin mihring a siam a, Pathian anpui ngeiin a ni a siam ni; mipaah leh hmeichhiaah a siam a ni.

source: Don't let them run away
target: An tlanbo tir suh
