source: Then Jacob went on from Beer-sheba; and the sons of Jacob took their father and their little ones and their wives in the carts which Pharaoh had sent for them.
target: Tichuan Jakoba chu Beer-seba ațang chuan a chhuak a: Israela fapate chuan an pa Jakoba leh an fanau tê tête leh a nupuite chu a chuan nana Pharaoa tawlailîr thawnahte khân an chuantîr a.

source: Don't cheat
target: Bum suh

source: Let my voice come to you, in your mercy; O Lord, by your decisions give me life.
target: I ngilneihna ang zelin ka aw hi ngaithla la: Aw LALPA, i rorêlnate ang zelin mi tiharh ang che.

source: But Jehu did not take care to keep the law of the Lord with all his heart: he did not keep himself from the sin which Jeroboam did and made Israel do.
target: Nimahsela Jehua chuan LALPA, Israelte Pathian dan chu athinlung awng zawngin a pawm lo va; Jeroboaman Israel-hote thil tihsualtira a tihsual kha aban chuang lo va.

source: As the spring keeps its waters cold, so she keeps her evil in her: the sound of cruel and violent behaviour is in her; before me at all times are disease and wounds.
target: Tuichhunchhuahin tui a tichhuak ang maiin A suahsualna chu a tichhuak țhin, A chhûngah chuan pawngnekna leh inrawkna a awm tih hriat a ni a, Ka hmaah chuan natna leh inhliamnate a awm reng.

source: I was defenseless
target: Ka inveng thei lo

source: For I have no man of like mind who will truly have care for you.
target: Hetiang rilru pu, in awmzia tih tak zeta ngaihtuahsaktu tur che u tumah ka nei si lo.

source: And he who made his offering on the first day was Nahshon, the son of Amminadab, of the tribe of Judah:
target: Ni khat nia a thilhlan hlantu tur chu Juda chi Aminadaba fapa Nasona a ni a:

source: Then the king made a great ivory seat, plated with the best gold.
target: Tin, lal chuan saingho lalthutthleng ropui tak a siam bawk a, chu chu rangkachak tha ber tiin a luan a.

source: And he will take you up to a great room with a table and seats: there make ready.
target: Tichuan ani chuan pindan chungnung zau tak, bungraw awm sa, a entir ang che u; chutah chuan buatsaih ang che u, a ti a.

source: It's free.
target: A zalen.

source: You will make sport of destruction and need, and will have no fear of the beasts of the earth.
target: Chhiatna leh tam chu i nuihsan ang a, leia sakawlhte i hlau hek lo vang.

source: They gave orders for a day of public sorrow, and put Naboth at the head of the people.
target: Chaw nghei thu an puang a, mipui zingah Nabotha chu an hmatawntir a.

source: Wait'll you see this.
target: Hei hi nghak rawh.

source: I'm not miserable
target: Ka vanduai lo

source: Be in fear of the sword, for the sword is the punishment for such things, so that you may be certain that there is a judge.
target: Khandaih chu hlau rawh u, Thinurna chuan khandaih hremna a thlen si a, Rorêlna a awm tih in hriat theih nân.

source: And the king and his people came tired to Jordan, and took their rest there.
target: Tin, lal leh a hnêna mi awm zawng zawngte chuan Aiphim an thleng a; tichuan chutah chuan a chawl hahdam a.

source: Let's just go to sleep.
target: Mut mai mai ila.

source: Let's leave early
target: I chhuak hma ang u

source: Your feasts are disgusting to me, I will have nothing to do with them; I will take no delight in your holy meetings.
target: In kutte ka huain ka hmusit a, in inkhâwmpui urhsûnahte chuan ka lâwm hek lo vang a.

source: But your eyes have seen all the great works of the Lord which he has done.
target: in mit ngeia lalapan thilropui tak a tih zawng zawng hmututt hnenah ani zawk e.

source: And the second heritage came out for the tribe of Simeon by their families; and their heritage was in the middle of the heritage of the children of Judah.
target: Tin, thumvawr vawi hnihna chu Silmeona chungah, Simeona thlahte hnam chungah an chhungkaw zir zelin a tlu leh ta a: an chanpual chu Juda thlahte chanpual zingah a tel ve a ni.

source: What's the latest
target: Eng nge a thar ber

source: We then, working together with God, make our request to you not to take the grace of God to no purpose.
target: Tin, Pathian khawngaihna chu sawtpui lova in hmuh lohna turin, amah thawhpuiin ka ngen chiam a che u.

source: To the saints and true brothers in Christ at Colossae: Grace to you and peace from God our Father.
target: Kolossa khuaa Kristaa mi thianghlimte leh unau rinawmte hnenah chuan Pathian kan Pa hnen ata khawngaihna leh remna in hnenah awm rawh se.

source: Call security
target: Vênghimtu ko la

source: He was that angry.
target: Chutiang chuan a thinrim a ni.

source: Do you have mittens
target: Mittens i nei em

source: We aren't prepared
target: Kan inpeih lo

source: I'm thin
target: Ka cher

source: He was ready
target: A hman tawh e

source: Do you work?
target: I thawk ngai em?

source: My brothers, however, who went up with me, made the heart of the people like water: but I was true to the Lord with all my heart.
target: Amaherawhchu ka unau ka hnena kal vete khan mipuite thinlung an tihtuisak a: kei erawh chuan LALPA ka Pathian chu ka pawm tlat a.

source: She gave him hell.
target: Hremhmun a pe a.

source: Don't speak to Tom.
target: Tom chu biak suh.

source: Tom danced
target: Toma a lam

source: Keep down
target: Dah thla rawh

source: Let every man keep the position in which he has been placed by God.
target: Mi tin kohva an awm laia an chan pangngaiah chuan awm reng theuh rawh se.

source: Take over
target: Va chuhsak rawh

source: All your trees and the fruit of your land will be the locust's.
target: In thei kung zawng zawng leh in lei rah chu khau chan a ni ang.

source: She doesn't trust anyone.
target: Tumah a ring lo.

source: We'll mail it to you.
target: Kan mail ang che.

source: Who kept us in mind when we were in trouble: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.
target: Ani chuan kan hnam tlâwm lai khan min hre reng a: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: Be fighting the good fight of the faith; take for yourself the life eternal, for which you were marked out, and of which you gave witness in the eyes of all.
target: Rinna intihsiakna tha chu bei la, chatuan nunna chu vuan rawh; chu mi chang turin koh i ni a; hretu tam takte mithmuhah tanna tha chu i tan tawh kha.

source: As for that night, let it have no fruit; let no voice of joy be sounded in it;
target: Chu zan chu zan khawhar lo ni se, tah chuan hlim thawm leng suh se.

source: They give me back evil for good; they are my haters because I go after the thing which is right.
target: thil tha thil Saula rul thintute hi thil tha ka um avângin mi dotute an ni a.

source: She's Argentinian
target: Argentina mi a ni

source: Nothing is to be done to the virgin, because there is no cause of death in her: it is the same as if a man made an attack on his neighbour and put him to death:
target: a nula chu engmah in tih tur a ni lo, nula chungah chuan thihna khawp sual a awm lo; heitang hi chu, mi ațhenawm beia that ang a ni a;

source: For, starting his journey from Babylon on the first day of the first month, he came to Jerusalem on the first day of the fifth month, by the good help of his God.
target: Thla khatna, ni khat nin Babulon atangin a chhuak a, a. Pathianin amah chu veng zelin thla ngana, ni khat niin Jerusalem a thleng a ni.

source: And turning his eyes to his disciples he said, Happy are you who are poor: for the kingdom of God is yours.
target: Tin, a dak chhuak a, a zirtirte chu a en a. Nangni rethei te u, in eng a thawl e; Pathian ram in ta a ni si a.

source: You must run
target: I tlan tur a ni

source: There are friends who may be a man's destruction, but there is a lover who keeps nearer than a brother.
target: Thian tam tak siam chuan mahni intihchhiatna a siam a ni a, Amaherawhchu unau aia nghet zawk thian an awm thin.

source: You're the best
target: I ṭha ber

source: If I go up to heaven, you are there: or if I make my bed in the underworld, you are there.
target: Vanah han lawn ila, chutah chuan i awm si a: Seol-ah mutna siam ila, ngai teh, chutah chuan i awm bawk si a.

source: Now to give me back payment of the same sort (I am talking as to my children, let your hearts be wide open to me.
target: Tichuan, in chunga kan tih ang bawk khan nangni pawh kan lakah inhawng ve turin fate ngenin kan ngen a che u.

source: I have not taken my seat with foolish persons, and I do not go with false men.
target: Mi engmah lo mai maite hnênah ka thu ngai lo va; Vervekte hnênah pawh ka lût hek l vang.

source: I can't tell.
target: Ka sawi thei lo.

source: Then Samuel sent for the people to come together before the Lord at Mizpah;
target: Chutichuan Samuela chuan mipuite chu Mizpe-ah LALPA hnênah a ko khawm a;

source: Now they were Mary Magdalene, and Joanna, and Mary, the mother of James: and the other women with them said these things to the Apostles.
target: Chung hmeichhiate chu Magdalini Mari te, Joani te, Jakoba nu Mari te an ni a; an hnena hmeichhe dangte pawhin tirhkohte hnenah chuan chung thu chu an hrilh bawk a.

source: You've already given yourself away.
target: I inpe tawh a ni.

source: Let us take care of you.
target: I enkawl ang u.

source: They're pretty good at it
target: An thiam khawp mai

source: As the north wind gives birth to rain, so is an angry face caused by a tongue saying evil secretly.
target: hmâr thliin ruah a rawn thlen a, Chutiang bawkin mi rel hmang leiin thinur hmêl.

source: My soul is broken with desire for your decisions at all times.
target: Ka nunna hi keh sawmin a awm a, Englai pawha i rorêlnate a ngaih avângin.

source: We weren't very good.
target: Kan tha vak lo.

source: Do you still eat meat?
target: Sa i la ei em?

source: In the twentieth year that Jeroboam was king of Israel, Asa became king over Judah.
target: Israel lal Jeroboama kum sâwmhnih a lal kum chuan Asa chu Juda-hote chungah a lal tan a.

source: Nobody helped her
target: Tuman an pui lo

source: Tell me
target: Min hrilh rawh

source: And Othniel, the son of Kenaz, Caleb's younger brother, took it; so he gave him his daughter Achsah for his wife.
target: Tin, Kaleba nau Kenaza fapa Othnielan a la a: tichuan a fanu Aksai chu nupuiah a neihtir ta a.

source: One basket had very good figs, like the figs which first come to growth: and the other basket had very bad figs, so bad that they were of no use for food.
target: bâwm khatah chuan theipui tha tak, theipui hmin hmasa ang mai, a awm a: bâwm dangah erawh chuan theipui chhe tak, ei tlak loh khawpa chhia a awm a.

source: Take a look at this.
target: Hei hi han en teh.

source: I started driving
target: Ka khalh tâna

source: I'm bald.
target: Lukawlh ka ni.

source: So he made an oath against them, to put an end to them in the waste land:
target: Chuvangin an lamah chuan a kut a phar a, Anniho chu thlaleraa tihtlukna tûr leh,

source: Do it anyway
target: Ti ngei ngei rawh

source: Give thought to what I say; for the Lord will give you wisdom in all things.
target: Ka thusawi hi ngaihtuah rawh; Lalpa chuan kawng engkimah hriat theihna a pe dawn si chia.

source: Does she like orange
target: Orange a duh em

source: Sami is not going
target: Sami a kal lo

source: Jesus said to them, My time is still to come, but any time is good for you.
target: Tin, Isuan an hnenah, Ka hun a la thleng lo; nangni hun erawh chu kumkhuain a thleng reng a ni.

source: And Cush was the father of Nimrod: he was the first to be a great man in the earth.
target: Tin, Kusan Nimroda a hring a; a ni chu leia mi chak huaisen lo awm tanna a ni.

source: The writing was seen by a number of the Jews, for the place where Jesus was put to death on the cross was near the town; and the writing was in Hebrew and Latin and Greek.
target: Tin, chu lehkha chu Judate a then tam takin an chhiar a; Isua kraws-a an khenbehna hmun chu khawpui kiang a ni a; Hebrai tawng te, Rom tawng te, Grik tawngtein ziak a ni si a.

source: I will make rivers on the dry mountain-tops, and fountains in the valleys: I will make the waste land a pool of water, and the dry land springs of water.
target: Tlâng sâng kawlh vêl vulah chuan luite ka luan chhuahtir ang a, ruam laiahte chuan tuihnate ka chhuahtir bawk ang: thlalêr chu dilah ka siam ang a, ram ro chu tuihnaah ka siam bawk ang.

source: But Paul said in a loud voice, Do yourself no damage, for we are all here.
target: Nimahsela Paula chu aw ring takin a au va, Engmah intih suh; kan zain hetah kan la awm vek alawm, a ti a.

source: Then the people of the land took Jehoahaz, the son of Josiah, and made him king in Jerusalem in place of his father.
target: Tichuan chu mi rama mite chuan Josia fapa Jehoahaza chu an hruai a, Jerusalem-ah a pa aiah lalah an siam ta a.

source: We text each other all the time.
target: Kan text fo thin.

source: I mean what I say.
target: Ka sawi tum chu.

source: But being a prophet, and having in mind the oath which God had given to him, that of the fruit of his body one would take his place as a king,
target: Ani chu zawlnei a ni a, Pathianin a thalbea mi tu emaw a thutphah chungah a thuttir dawn tih chhechhamin a sawi tih a hria a;

source: And so to Ephraim I am like a wasting insect, and a destruction to the children of Judah.
target: Chuvâng in Ephraim tân chuan sûlrûl ang ka ni a, Juda chhûngkaw tân chuan mawihna ang ka ni.

source: Who's here
target: Tunge hetah awm

source: She will pay for this.
target: Hei hi a pe ang.

source: So I made them clean from all strange people, and had regular watches fixed for the priests and for the Levites, everyone in his work;
target: Chutiang chuan ram dang mite lakah ka tithianghlim a, puithiam te, Levi-hote tan an hnathawhna theuhva an rawngbawl dan tûr ka ruatsak a;

source: We're not on a date.
target: Date kan nei lo.

source: Now when Jesus saw a great mass of people about him, he gave an order to go to the other side.
target: Tin, Isuan mipui tam tak a vela a hmuhin, ral lehlama kal turin thu a pe a.

source: And turning to see the voice which said these words to me, I saw seven gold vessels with lights burning in them;
target: Tin, mi biakna aw chu hmuh tumin ka han lehhawi ta a. Tin, ka han lehhawi chuan rangkachak khawnvar dahna pasarih ka hmu a;

source: He's not worthy of you.
target: I tan a tling lo.

source: He who gives blessing will be made fat, but the curser will himself be cursed.
target: Mi thilphal nunna chu tihthauvin a awm a, Tui leih thintu chuan mahni pawh a inleih a ni.

source: This is sick
target: Hei hi a hrisel lo

source: Whenever they went into the Tent of meeting, and when they came near the altar, as the Lord had given orders to Moses.
target: inbiakna puan ina an luh dawn leh, maicham bula an kal dawnin an insil a ni: LALPAN Mosia thu a pêk ang khan

source: Hello, Sir.
target: Ka Pu, Chibai

source: May he come down like rain on the cut grass; like showers watering the earth.
target: Ani chu hlobet rawt chunga ruah angin a tla ang a: Lei chawmtu ruahtui ang maiin.

source: I have a son who disappeared.
target: Fapa bo ka nei a.

source: And David's name was honoured in all lands; and the Lord put the fear of him on all nations.
target: Tichuan ram tinah Davida hming chu a lo thang ta a; LALPAN hnam tin, mah a tihtir ta a.

source: We learned by doing.
target: Tiin kan zir a.

source: He knows no English.
target: English a hre lo.

source: Kiriath-baal (which is Kiriath-jearim, and Rabbah; two towns with their unwalled places.
target: Kiriath-baal te chu chu Kiriath-jearim a ni, Raba te; khawpuite chu a khawperte nen khaw hnih a ni.

source: You're bad
target: I ṭha lo

source: I never went to sleep.
target: Ka muhil ngai lo.

source: Does she know that
target: Chu chu a hria em

source: You can tell them.
target: I hrilh thei ang.

source: Keep it.
target: Dah rawh.

source: For its men of wealth are cruel, and its people have said what is not true, and their tongue is false in their mouth.
target: Chuvângin kei pawhin na taka hliamin ka vaw ta che a; i sualnate avângin ka tițiau ta che a ni.

source: Then the children of Israel, journeying on, put up their tents in the lowlands of Moab, on the other side of Jordan at Jericho.
target: Tin, Israel thlahte chu an kal zel a, Jeriko zawn Jordan rala Moab phaiahte awmhmun an khuar a.

source: I have done no wrong; I give no thought to what becomes of me; I have no desire for life.
target: Demawm lo ka ni, ka inngai sâng lo; Ka nun hi ka hmusit a ni.

source: And he came even before the king's doorway; for no one might come inside the king's door clothed in haircloth.
target: lal kawt hung kawngka bul thlnegin a kal a; tumah saiip puan sina lal kawt hung chhûng luh chu phal a ni si lo va.

source: These are the families of the Zebulunites as they were numbered, sixty thousand, five hundred.
target: Heng hi an chhiar dan anga Zebulun-ho thlahte chu an ni a, 60,500 an ni.

source: And Pharaoh will say of the children of Israel, They are wandering without direction, they are shut in by the waste land.
target: Tichuan Pharaoan Israela thlahte chungchâng thu-ah, 'Ram lakah an mangang ta zet le, thlalêrah an tâng ta,' a ti ang a.

source: When Israel came out of Egypt, the children of Jacob from a people whose language was strange to them;
target: Israel-ho chu Aigupta ram ata a chhuak a, Jakob-a chhûngte ngei chu awze mi szing ata an chhuah lai khan,

source: And hearing of this, David sent Joab and all the army and the best fighting-men.
target: Tin, Davidan chu chu a hriatin Joaba leh sipai huaisen zawng zawngte a tir a.

source: It's raining
target: Ruah a sur mêk

source: To him who overcomes I will give a place with me on my high seat, even as I overcame, and am seated with my Father on his high seat.
target: A hnehtu apiang ka lalthutphahah ka hnenah ka thuttir ang, kei pawhin ka hneh a, ka Pa hnenah a lalthutphaha ka thu ang khan.

source: I'll take anything
target: Engpawh ka la ang

source: It's not evening yet.
target: Tlai a la ni lo.

source: He only is my Rock and my salvation; he is my high tower; I will not be greatly moved.
target: Amah chauh chu ka lungpui leh mi chhandamtu a ni: Ka kulhbing sâng ani a; nasa tak chuan ka nghing lo vang.

source: You're dependable
target: I rintlâk a ni

source: I fixed it
target: Ka siamṭha tawh

source: And so Israel was living among the Egyptians in the land of Goshen; and they got property there, and became very great in numbers and in wealth.
target: Tin, Israel-ho chuan Aigupta rama Gosen ramah chuan awm hmun an khuar ta a; chutah chuan an intimuk a, chi tam tak an thlah a, nasa takin an pung ta a.

source: It's quiet
target: A reh

source: For all who do such things, and all whose ways are not upright, are disgusting to the Lord your God.
target: Chutiang thil titu, fel lo taka titu zawng zawngte chu LALPA in Pathian ngaihin tenawm an ni.

source: You're ready
target: I hman tawh

source: And his ears became open, and the band of his tongue was made loose, and his words became clear.
target: Tichuan a bengte chu a lo inhawng a, a lei phuarna pawh chu a lo inphelh a, fiah takin a tawng thei ta a.

source: Great is our Lord, and great his power; there is no limit to his wisdom.
target: Kan Lalpa chu a ropui a, thiltihtheih lamah pawh chak tak ani a; A finna chuan tawpintai a nei lo.

source: You made a fool of yourself.
target: Mi â i siam a.

source: I was playing the violin.
target: Violin ka tum a.

source: Be lifted up, O Lord, in your strength; so will we make songs in praise of your power.
target: Aw LALPA, i chaknaah chuan chawimawiin lo awm ang che: Chutichuan i thiltihtheihna fakin hla kan sa ang.

source: It was convenient
target: A remchang hle mai

source: I have no greater joy than to have news that my children are walking in the true way.
target: Ka fate thutakah an awm tih ka hriat aliama lawmna nasa zawk reng ka nei lo ve.

source: Who has wisdom and good sense among you? let him make his works clear by a life of gentle wisdom.
target: In zingah tunge finga thu hre thei awm? Thuhnuairawlh tak leh fing takin a thiltihte awm dan thatin entir rawh se.

source: And word was given to Sisera that Barak, the son of Abinoam, had gone up to Mount Tabor.
target: Tin, Abinoama fapa Baraka chu Tabor tlângah a chho tih Sisera an hrilh a.

source: I'm not cold anymore.
target: Ka vawt tawh lo.

source: Then Moses sent for Dathan and Abiram, the sons of Eliab: and they said, We will not come up:
target: Tin, Mosia chuan Eliaba fapa Dathana leh Abirama a kohtir a: anni chuan, Kan lo chho vang;

source: Is there a division in Christ? was Paul nailed to the cross for you? or were you given baptism in the name of Paul?
target: Krista chu thenin a awm em ni? Paula in aia khenbehin a awm em ni? A nih loh leh, Paula hminga baptis-in in awm em ni?

source: And the meal offering is to be an ephah for the sheep, and for the lambs whatever he is able to give, and a hin of oil to an ephah.
target: tin,berampa pakhat zelah chhang hlan epha khat, beram noteah chuan a pek theih ang ang, leh epha khatah hriak hin khat zel a ni ang.

source: We will not come back to our houses till every one of the children of Israel has come into his heritage.
target: Israel thlah mi tinin an hmun luah tur an luah țheuh hma loh chuan kan in lamah kan haw lo vang.

source: You look different
target: I hmel a danglam

source: I can replace it.
target: Ka thlak thei a ni.

source: They all went to bed
target: An mutpui vek a

source: They're not stupid
target: An â lo va

source: It is he who takes away the mountains without their knowledge, overturning them in his wrath:
target: Tlangte a sawn a, an hre lo va, A thinrima a tihdanglam lai khan.

source: You have put my heart to the test, searching me in the night; you have put me to the test and seen no evil purpose in me; I will keep my mouth from sin.
target: Ka thinlung hi i fiah a; zanah mi tlawh a; Mi fiah tawh a, engmah i hmu si lo va; Ka kain a sawi sual lo vang ka ti tlat a ni.

source: Through which some, who gave their minds to it, have been turned away from the faith. Grace be with you.
target: Chu chu thenkhatten nei emaw intiin rinna kawng chu an kal kawisan ta a. Khawngaihna i hnenah awm rawh se.

source: Who were you expecting
target: Tu nge i beisei

source: Now a new king came to power in Egypt, who had no knowledge of Joseph.
target: Tin, Aigupta ramah chuan Josefa hre lo, lal thar a lo awm ta a.

source: And taking the men of his family with him, he went after him for seven days and overtook him in the hill-country of Gilead.
target: Tichuan a unaute a hruai a, ni sarih kal a um a; Gilead tlangah chuan a umpha ta a.

source: I do not want anybody else.
target: Midang ka duh lo.

source: And the six hundred armed men of the Danites took their places by the doorway.
target: Tin, Dana thlah, mi zaruk indona thuam inbelte chu kulh kawngka bulah an ding a.

source: He's doing better
target: A ti ṭha zâwk a ni

source: Were you watching?
target: I en em ni?

source: Don't move
target: Che suh

source: For we through the Spirit by faith are waiting for the hope of righteousness.
target: Keini zawngin Thlarau zarah rinnain felna beiseina kannghak si a.

source: Evil-doing is disgusting to kings: for the seat of the ruler is based on righteousness.
target: Suahsualna thilti hi lalte tan tenawm ani a, Lalthutthleng chu felnaa tihngheh a ni si a.

source: He's not an idiot.
target: Mi â a ni lo.

source: But he would not give attention to what she said: but being stronger than she, he took her by force, and had connection with her.
target: Nimahsela a thu chu a pawm lo va, amah aiin a chak zawk si a, a tilui a, a mutpui ta a.

source: And Gaal, the son of Ebed, went out, and took his place at the doorway into the town; then Abimelech and his people got up from the place where they had been waiting.
target: Tin, Ebeda fapa Gaala chu a va chhuak a, khawpui luhna kawngkaah chuan a va ding a: tin, Abimeleka chu ahote nen chuan an chan rukna hmun ata chu an lo thawk ta a.

source: Don't make trouble.
target: Buaina siam suh.

source: I've been running
target: Ka tlan chak tawh

source: They let his works go out of their memory, and the wonders which he had made them see.
target: A thiltihte chu an theihnghilh a, A thilmak tih a hmuhtirte nên khan.

source: There are no trails.
target: Trail a awm lo.

source: So that every one of you may keep his body holy and in honour;
target: Pathian hre lo Jentailhote anga hur kawng chak lovin, thianghlim leh chawimawiin mahni bel vawng thiam theuh ula;

source: Since when?
target: Engtik aṭang khan?

source: Do you have a headache
target: Lu na i nei em

source: It's too bright
target: A lar lutuk em mai

source: They barely spoke
target: An tawng thei lo

source: It's huge
target: A lian turu

source: I know everything
target: Engkim ka hre vek

source: A little time longer, and the world will see me no more; but you will see me; and you will be living because I am living.
target: Rei lo deuh chinah khawvelin mi hmu leh tawh lo vang; nimahsela nangni zawngin mi hmu ang; keimah ka nun avangin nangni pawh in nung ve ang.

source: He was so happy.
target: A hlim em em a.

source: Hold me Tom
target: Mi vuan rawh Tom

source: We're not yet there.
target: Kan la awm lo.

source: Things have calmed down
target: Thil a reh tawh

source: What is your loved one more than another, O fairest among women? What is your loved one more than another, that you say this to us?
target: Mi aiin i duhtak chu eng nge a nih bik le? Aw hmeichhia alaia mawi ber, Mi aiin i duhtak chu eng nge a nih bik, Chuti ema min ngen le?

source: They believed them
target: An ring a

source: Have they seen us
target: Min hmu tawh em

source: They are so skinny
target: An skinny lutuk

source: I bounce leh ang.
target: You'll bounce back.

source: Out of heaven itself his voice came to you, teaching you; and on earth he let you see his great fire; and his words came to your ears out of the heart of the fire.
target: A zirtir theih nan che u van ațangin a aw a rawn hriattir che u a, lei chungah hian a meipui chu a hmuhtir che u a: mei ațanga a thu chu in lo hria a.

source: The pillar of cloud went ever before them by day, and the pillar of fire by night.
target: chhûna chhum ding leh zâna meialh ding chuan mipui chu a kalsan ngai hauh lo a ni.

source: We're human beings.
target: Mihring kan ni.

source: Who's being punished?
target: Tu nge hrem mek?

source: I enjoy life
target: Nun ka chen

source: For God sees that on the day when you take of its fruit, your eyes will be open, and you will be as gods, having knowledge of good and evil.
target: in ei nî apang chuan in mit a lo vâr ang a, a chhia leh tha hriain Pathian ang in lo ni dâwn tih Pathianin a hre reng a nih chu, a ti a.

source: The Lord was looking down from heaven on the children of men, to see if there were any who had wisdom, searching after God.
target: Hre thiama, Pathian zawng rêng rêng An awm emaw, tiin, LALPA chuan van atangin mihring fate hi a zuk en a.

source: Who talked?
target: Tunge tawng?

source: For men at all times make their oaths by what is greater; and any argument is ended by the decision of the oath.
target: Mihringte hian an aia ropui zawk chhalin chhia an chham thin a ni; an inhnialna tinrengah pawh tihnghehna turin chhechham hi tihtawpna a ni thin.

source: If only I might have an answer to my prayer, and God would give me my desire!
target: Aw, ka dil chu hmu thei teh uila! Pathianin ka thil chak chu mi te peh se!

source: For, truly, when the sound of your voice came to my ears, the baby in my body made a sudden move for joy.
target: Ngai teh, i chibai buk thawm ka benga a luh veleh, a lawm avangin naute ka pum chhungah a che a ni.

source: And Shimei had sixteen sons and six daughters, but his brothers had only a small number of children, and their family was not as fertile as the children of Judah.
target: Tin, Simeia chuan fapa sâwm leh paruk leh fanu paruk a nei a; a unaute erawh chuan fa an ngah ve lo va, Juda thlahte angin an thlahte pawh an pung ve lo.

source: The Levites: the children of Jeshua, of Kadmiel, of the children of Hodevah, seventy-four.
target: Levi-hote : - Hodeva thlaha mi Jesua leh Kadmiela thlahte 74.

source: The law is the same for him who is an Israelite by birth and for the man from a strange country who is living with you.
target: Chu mi rama piang leh, hnam dang in zînga awmte tan hian dan angkhat a awm tûr a ni, a ti a.

source: I flinched
target: Ka tim lutuk

source: See, I am driving the Medes against them, who put no value on silver and have no pleasure in gold.
target: Ngai teh, Media-ho anmahni bei tûrin ka chawk tho vang a, chungho chuan tangka an ngaihsak lo vang a, rangkachak ah pawh an lawm lo vang.

source: We beat them
target: Kan vaw vek

source: Say this openly in Jacob and give it out in Judah, saying,
target: Jakoba chhûngte zingah hei hi sawi chhuak ula, Judai ramah puang rawh u.

source: They kept silence
target: An ngawi reng a

source: He let his signs be seen among the people, and his wonders in the land of Ham.
target: Anni chuan a chhinchhiahnate chu an zingah an entir a, Hama ramah chuan thilmakte an entir a.

source: We are like brothers.
target: Unau ang kan ni.

source: The haters of the Lord would be broken, and their destruction would be eternal.
target: LALPA hawtute chu a hmaah khurin an kun ang a, Kumkhuain hrem an tuar ang.

source: They're here
target: Hetah an awm

source: I'm the last
target: A tâwp ber ka nia

source: I got stabbed
target: Vihin ka awm

source: And the man became well straight away, and took up his bed and went. Now that day was the Sabbath.
target: Tin, thawklehkhatan chu mi chu a dam ta nghal a,a awngphah chu a la a,a kal ta a. Chu mi ni chu Chawlhni a ni a.

source: When your right hand was stretched out, the mouth of the earth was open for them.
target: Nangin i kut ding lam i han phar a, Leiin anmahni chu a lem zo ta a.

source: Hearing what he said, the two disciples went after Jesus.
target: Tin, a zirtirte pahnih chuan a thusawi chu an hria a, Isua an zui ta a.

source: I had a job
target: Hna ka nei

source: She looked at him
target: Amah chu a en a

source: And a certain captain had a servant who was very dear to him; this servant was ill and near to death.
target: Tin, sipai za hotu tu emaw a bawih duh tak a dam lo va, a thi lek lek a.

source: The brass which was given was seventy talents, two thousand four hundred shekels;
target: Tin, an dar hlante chu talent sawmsarih leh sekel sanghnih leh zali a ni.

source: I am able to see all my bones; their looks are fixed on me:
target: Ka ruh zang zang hi ka chhiar thei a; Anni lah chuan mi enin mi melh reng a:

source: It is burned with fire; it is cut down: they are made waste by the wrath of your face.
target: Meiah a kang ta, kihin a awm ta: I hmêla zilhhauhna avângin an boral thin.

source: I immediately started crying.
target: Ka tap nghal a.

source: I have been hurt too much.
target: Ka na lutuk tawh.

source: We kissed each other.
target: Kan infawp a.

source: They called each other names.
target: Hming an inko a.

source: I love soccer
target: Ball pêt ka ngaina

source: He makes a waste land into a place of water, and a dry land into water-springs.
target: Thlalêr chu dilah a chantir thin a, Ram ro chu tuihnaahte a chantir bawk thin.

source: A man who takes part with a thief has hate for his soul; he is put under oath, but says nothing.
target: Rukru kawppuitu chuan ama nunna a hua a ni; Chhechham ri a hria a, engmah a sawi si lo.

source: Am I late?
target: Ka tlai em?

source: I'll bite your head off!
target: I lu ka seh ang!

source: I have done it already.
target: Ka ti tawh a ni.

source: Happy is the man whose strength is in you; in whose heart are the highways to Zion.
target: Nangmahah chakna nei mi chu a eng a thawl e; A thinlung Zion panna lamliante awma chu.

source: This tastes bitter
target: Hei hi a thlum hle

source: Where they put him on the cross with two others, one on this side and one on that, and Jesus in the middle.
target: chutah chuan kraws-ah an khengbet a, mi dang pahnih nen, a sir tuakah pakhat ve vein, a laiah Isua.

source: Is there not a division in your minds? have you not become judges with evil thoughts?
target: in rilruah thlei bik neiin ngaihtuahna sual pua sawiseltute in lo ni dawn lawm ni?

source: I have a son
target: Fapa ka nei

source: Are you fast enough?
target: I chak tawk em?

source: I already got thirsty.
target: Ka tuihal tawh.

source: And there will come a rod out of the broken tree of Jesse, and a branch out of his roots will give fruit.
target: Jesaia bul ațangi chawrno a lo chhuak ang a, a zung ațangtea puak chhuak chu a rah ang:

source: We had loving talk together, and went to the house of God in company.
target: Kam thlum taka kan inbiakrawn thin a, Mipui zinga Pathian biak ina kan len thin kha.

source: But if anyone has been a cause of sorrow, he has been so, not to me only, but in some measure to all of you (I say this that I may not be over-hard on you.
target: Nimahsela, tupawhin mite a tihlungngaih chuan keimah chauh mi tilungngai a ni lo va, ka tih luattuk lohna turin in zain a tilungngai hlek theuh zawk che u a ni.

source: And when the day came for Elkanah to make his offering, he gave to Peninnah his wife, and to all her sons and daughters, their part of the feast:
target: Tin, Elkana inthawi ni a lo thlen chuan, a nupui Penini leh a fapate leh a fanute zawng zawng chu chanvo a siam a;

source: You should've kissed him.
target: I fawp tur a ni.

source: Son of man, put down in writing this very day: The king of Babylon let loose the weight of his attack against Jerusalem on this very day.
target: Mihring fapa, ni hming, vawiin ni hming ngei hi ziak rawh; hemi ni ngei hian Babulon lal chuan Jeruslem a rawn bei țan a.

source: And you have knowledge that he came to take away sin: and in him there is no sin.
target: Amah chu sualte la bo turin a lo lang tawh tih in hria e; amahah chuan sual engmah a awm si lo va.

source: It's so beautiful
target: A mawi êm êm a ni

source: For it is the Jubilee, and it is holy to you; your food will be the natural increase of the field.
target: Jubili a ni si a; in lawm tur a ni; chu in lova thil hawng chu in ei tur a ni.

source: Then the people in answer said, Never will we give up the Lord to be the servants of other gods;
target: Tin, mipuite chuan, LALPA Pathian chu kalsanin pathian dangte rawng chu kan bawl loh turzia mai chu;

source: Did you order this?
target: Hei hi i order em?

source: On the eighth day let there be a holy meeting: you may do no field-work;
target: Tin, a ni riat ni chuan inkhawmpui ropui tak in nei ang a: eng hna mah in thawk tur ani lo:

source: You have given your decision against the upright man and have put him to death. He puts up no fight against you.
target: Mi fel chu thiam loh in chantir a,in that ta a; ani chuan a dodal lo a che u.

source: For it is not my desire to see you now, on my way; because it is my hope to be with you for some time, if that is the Lord's pleasure.
target: Tuna kal pah maia hmuh che u ka duh lo va, Lalpan rem a tih chuan in hnenah rei deuh cham ka beisei si a.

source: He had six sons in Hebron; he was ruling there for seven years and six months, and in Jerusalem for thirty-three years.
target: Hebron khuaah chuan paruk ahring a; chutah chuan kum sarih leh thla ruk a lal a: tin, Jerusalem khuaah kum sâwmthum leh kum thum a lal a.

source: You aren't fooling me.
target: Min bum lo a ni.

source: Is your voice sent up to the cloud, so that you may be covered by the weight of waters?
target: A nan tûr chein chhum ata Ruahpi vanawn i au thla thei êm ni?

source: He didn't see anybody.
target: Tumah a hmu lo.

source: Truly, God gives up the hard-hearted, and will not give life to the sinner.
target: Ngai rawh, Pathian chu chak tak a ni a, Tumah a hmusit mai lo;

source: Now Isaac had come through the waste land to Beer-lahai-roi; for he was living in the South.
target: Tin, Isaaka chu Beer-lahai-roi lam atang chuan a lo kal a, chhim rama awm a ni si a.

source: Truly, every man goes on his way like an image; he is troubled for no purpose: he makes a great store of wealth, and has no knowledge of who will get it.
target: Mi tin, hi hlim angin an leng tak meuh va: Selah An buai thlawn tak meuh thin a ni.Ro a khawl khâwm thin a, a khawmtu tûr a hre si lo.

source: But truly it is the spirit in man, even the breath of the Ruler of all, which gives them knowledge.
target: Mahse, mi thil hriat thiamtirtu chu Mihringa thlarau awm, Engkimtitheia thaw chu a ni.

source: We eat early.
target: Kan ei hma ziah.

source: The full man has no use for honey, but to the man in need of food every bitter thing is sweet.
target: Mi puar tan chuan khawithlar pawh a tenawm a, Mi riltam tan erawh chuan thil kha zawng zawng pawh a tui a ni.

source: Shove over
target: Nawr kai rawh

source: I asked you first.
target: Ka zawt hmasa a.

source: It wasn't too bad
target: A chhe lutuk lo ve

source: They relaxed
target: An hahdam

source: I haven't decided on it yet.
target: Ka la rel lo.

source: Take care!
target: Inenkawl tha rawh

source: Answer me
target: Mi chhang la

source: You've given me a headache.
target: Lu na min pe a.

source: But year by year you and all your house are to take a meal of it before the Lord, in the place of his selection.
target: LALPA in Pathian hmaah kum tinin LALPAN hmun a la ruat turah chuan in ei tur a ni, nangni leh inchhûngte nen.

source: Exactly! Well done.
target: Chiah! I ti tha e.

source: He is not Japanese.
target: Japan mi a ni lo.

source: And he gave it to Jacob for a law, and to Israel for an eternal agreement;
target: Chu vek chu thuriat atân Jakoba hnênah a tinghet a, Israela hnêna kumkhaw thungthlung atân:

source: Do it later
target: Nakinah ti rawh

source: Nice shot!
target: I titha takzet!

source: Going through the valley of balsam-trees, they make it a place of springs; it is clothed with blessings by the early rain.
target: Tahna ruam chu an zawhin tuihna awmnate an siam thin a, A ni, ruahtui tla hmasa chuan malsawmnain a khuh thin.

source: She's busy
target: A buai

source: It's very similar
target: A inang hle mai

source: And he came to the two-horned sheep which I saw before the stream, rushing at him in the heat of his power.
target: Tin, berâmpa ki pahnih nei, lei bula ding ka hmuh kha a rawn pan a, a chak theihtâwpin a zuan a.

source: I'm a father
target: Pa ka nia

source: And he let it come down into their resting-place, round about their tents.
target: An riahhmun laiah a tlaktir a, An awmna buk kiiang vêlahte chuan.

source: In the year of King Uzziah's death I saw the Lord seated in his place, high and lifted up, and the Temple was full of the wide skirts of his robe.
target: Lal Uzia a thih ikum khan LALPA chu lalthuphah sâng ak chawisana t hu ka hmu a, a silhfen hmawr fual chuan biak in chu a tikhat a vek a.

source: Everything is bad
target: Engkim a chhe vek

source: We recognized him
target: Amah chu kan hre chiang ta

source: I moved
target: Ka chesawn

source: I am tired
target: Ka hah e

source: He agreed with me.
target: Ka thusawi chu a remti a.

source: They had almost put an end to me on earth; but I did not give up your orders.
target: Anni chuan leiah hian mi tiboral thelh thelh a; Nimahsela i thununna thute chu ka hawisan si lo va.

source: So the men of Kiriath-jearim came and took the ark of the Lord to the house of Abinadab in Gibeah, and they made his son Eleazar holy and put the ark in his care.
target: Tichuan Kiriath-jearim khuaa mite chu an zu kal a, LALPA bâwm chu an la chho va, tlânga Abinadaba ina chuan a la lût a, a fapa Elazara chu LALPA bâwm enkawltu atân an tihrang a.

source: It looks like snow
target: Snow ang mai a ni

source: It's scary
target: A hlauhawm

source: I said to my heart, See, I have become great and am increased in wisdom more than any who were before me in Jerusalem--yes, my heart has seen much wisdom and knowledge.
target: Ka hmaa Jerusalema awmte zawng anwg aia nasain finna ka nei alawm maw! Ka rilru pawhin fina leh hriatna a nei nasa reng a ni, ka inti a.

source: So that, having been given righteousness through grace, we might have a part in the heritage, the hope of eternal life.
target: Chutichuan, a khawngaihnaa thiam chantira lo awmin, chatuana nun beiseina ang zela roluahtu tura siamin kan awm thei ang.

source: They didn't find the bomb
target: Bomb chu an hmu lo

source: For I have a strong desire to see you, and to give you some grace of the spirit, so that you may be made strong;
target: In nghehna tura thlarau lam thilpek eng emaw ka pek theihna tur che uin hmuh ka chak hle si che u a;

source: I have toothache
target: Ha na ka nei a

source: They had us surrounded.
target: Min hual tir a.

source: Joining the other ends of the chains to the gold frames and putting them on the front of the ephod, at the top of the arms.
target: Tin, khaidiat herh hmâwr lehlam pahnihte chu rangkachak zai phiar pahnih ah chuan i zawm tur a ni a, chu chu puithiam kawr hmalama dârbakah chuan i thlung tur a ni.

source: For your giving of the blessing is certainly well done, but of no profit to the man without knowledge.
target: Nang zawngin lawmthu i sawi tha zet tak a, mi dang erawh chu a siam tha chuang si lo.

source: Now when they had gone through Amphipolis and Apollonia they came to Thessalonica, where there was a Synagogue of the Jews:
target: Tin, Amphipoli khua leh Apollonia khua an kal pel a, Thessalonika khua an thleng ta a, chutah chuan Judate inkhawmna in a awm a;

source: You're harsh
target: I khirh mah mah

source: They call them Greeks.
target: Grik an ti a.

source: She's nice
target: A hawihhawm

source: After Ahithophel was Jehoiada, the son of Benaiah, and Abiathar; and the captain of the king's army was Joab.
target: tin, Ahithophela dawtah chuan Benaia fapa Jehoiada leh Abiathara an ni a; tin, lal sipaio hotu ch Joaba a ni.

source: I understand
target: Ka hrethiam

source: You are to make judges and overseers in all your towns which the Lord your God gives you, for every tribe: and they are to be upright men, judging the people in righteousness.
target: LALPA in Pathianin a pêk che u in kulh kawngka zawng zawngah inhnam ang zelin rorêltute leh hotute in insiam theuh vang a, mipute ro fel takin an rel sak tur a ni.

source: Here is wisdom. He who has knowledge let him get the number of the beast; because it is the number of a man: and his number is Six hundred and sixty-six.
target: Hetah hian fin a tulzia a lang. Chhut thiam chuan Sakawlh nambar chu chhut rawh se; mihring nambar a ni si a; a zat chu 666 a ni.

source: You will make me greater than before, and give me comfort on every side.
target: Nangin ka ropuina mi tihpunsak la, Lo hawi lehin mi thlamuan ang che,

source: Am I slipping?
target: Ka tawlh zêl em?

source: But do you, everyone, have love for his wife, even as for himself; and let the wife see that she has respect for her husband.
target: Engpawh ni se, tupawhin mahni a inhmangaih angin mahni nupui hmangaih theuh sela, nupui pawhin a pasal hlau thiam rawh se.

source: Let their eyes be blind so that they may not see; let their bodies for ever be shaking.
target: An mitte chu, an hmuh theih loh nân, tihthimin awm rawh se; An kawngte chu tikhur fo vang che.

source: I don't drive
target: Ka khalh ngai lo

source: Nothing was wrong
target: Engmah a dik lo lo

source: Tom got up.
target: Tom-a a tho.

source: I fell to the ground.
target: Leiah ka tlu a.

source: Don't be rash
target: Sual lutuk suh

source: Keep in mind my trouble and my wandering, the bitter root and the poison.
target: Ka tuarna leh ka vahvaihna, sai leh mît khâ te chu hre reng ang che.

source: Do you have a pair of tweezers?
target: Tweezer i nei em?

source: I gloated
target: Ka sun e

source: Did you want to speak with me
target: Min biak duh em

source: They played games.
target: Game an khel a.

source: It's an anachronism
target: Anachronism a ni

source: How weird!
target: Dangdai hle mai!

source: You did good
target: I tiha lutuk e

source: Ephraim will become a waste in the day of punishment; I have given knowledge among the tribes of Israel of what is certain.
target: Ephraim chu hremna niah chuan tihțiau a ni ang: Thil lo ni ngei tûr chu Israel chite zîngah ka hraittîr tawh a ni.

source: I've had a look around.
target: Ka en kual vel a.

source: Give one another a holy kiss. All the churches of Christ send their love to you.
target: Fawh thianghlimin chibai inbuk rawh u. Krista kohhranho pawl zawng zawngin chibai an buk hlawm a che u.

source: I saw one.
target: Pakhat ka hmu.

source: Now to such we give orders and make request in the Lord Jesus, that, working quietly, they get their living.
target: Tichuan, chung angte chu, ngawi renga thawk tur leh, anmahni chhang ei turin Lalpa Isua Kristaah chuan thu pein kan fuih a ni.

source: And their strength will be in the Lord; and their pride will be in his name, says the Lord.
target: Tin, LALPA ah chuan anmahni ka tichak ang a, ama hmingin an chhukin an chho vang, Tih chu LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: My words may seem wrong to you, but the words of him who has no hope are for the wind.
target: Tawng mai mai hi zilh in tum êm ni? Mi mangang tawng hi thli ang mai a ni.

source: But the Asherites went on living among the Canaanites, the people of the land, without driving them out.
target: Asera thlahte chu chu mi rama awm Kanaan-hote zingah chuan an cheng ve ta zawk a ni: anni chuan an hnawt chhuak lo a ni.

source: Look at it
target: En rawh

source: I was pretty excited about it.
target: Ka phur hle mai.

source: He comes out like a flower, and is cut down: he goes in flight like a shade, and is never seen again.
target: Pangpar angin a lo chhuak a, a vuai leh a, Hlimthla angin a thlawk bo va, a awm hlen lo.

source: You haven't eaten anything.
target: Engmah i la ei lo.

source: He is the father of the bride.
target: Nula pa a ni.

source: The thick cloud is weighted with thunder-flame, and the cloud sends out its light;
target: A ni, chhum chhah puite chu hnawngin a tikhat a, Chhumah chuan kawlphe a tidarh a.

source: Why would you take from the children of Israel the desire to go over into the land which the Lord has given them?
target: Engati nge LALPAN a pêk rama lut lo tura Israel thlahte rilru in tihzam dawn?

source: I'm not able to have children.
target: Fa ka nei thei lo.

source: From the first sons of Israel he took it, a thousand, three hundred and sixty-five shekels, by the scale of the holy place;
target: Israela thlahte fa tir lak ațangin sum chu a la a; hmun thianghlim sekel angin 1,365 a la a.

source: Are you busy, Tom?
target: I buai em em, Tom?

source: Where did you weigh them
target: Khawiah nge i teh

source: I am human
target: Mihring ka ni

source: I read a lot.
target: Tam tâwk ka mamawh.

source: If they keep his agreement, and have his laws in mind to do them.
target: A thuthlun zawm apiangte leh, A thuhrilhte awih tuma hre reng apiangte chungah chuan.

source: Do you not keep the lands of those whom Chemosh your god sends out from before you? So we will keep all the lands of those whom the Lord our God sends out from before us.
target: I pathian Kemosan i puala a lo ruatsak che chu i nei dawn a ni lâwm ni? Chutichuan LALPA kan Pathianin kan hmaa a chhuhsakte chu kan nei ang.

source: And straight away, in the Synagogues, he was preaching Jesus as the Son of God.
target: Inkhawmna inahte chuan Isua chu Pathian Fapa a nihzia thu a tlangaupui ta nghal a.

source: I didn't rip you off.
target: Ka rip lo che a.

source: Whenever they come through they will overtake you; for they will come through morning after morning, by day and by night: and the news will be nothing but fear.
target: A luan tlâng apiangin a la zel ang che u; atuk atuk tin, achhun achhunzanin, a luang tlâng dawn si a: thuchah awmze hriat chu thil rapthlâk hlir a ni ang, tiin.

source: Who told Tom?
target: Tunge Tom hrilh?

source: The earth is round.
target: Lei hi a round a.

source: I rarely ever laugh.
target: Ka nui ngai lo.

source: Don't hurt anyone
target: Tumah tihnat suh

source: The Lord has given ear to my request; the Lord has let my prayer come before him.
target: LALPAN khawngaih ka dilna chu a ngaithla tawh a; LALPAN ka tawngtaina chu a lawm ang.

source: With his mouth the evil man sends destruction on his neighbour; but through knowledge the upright are taken out of trouble.
target: Pathian ngaihsak lo mi chuan a kain a thenawmte a tiboral a, Mi fel erawh chu hriatna avângin chhan chhuahin a awm ang.

source: Pull it in
target: Pawt lut rawh

source: They had their arms around each other
target: An inkuah a

source: And the table with its vessels, and the holy light-support with all its vessels, and the altar for the burning of spices,
target: tin, dawhkân leh a hmanrua te, rangkachak hlîr hlaka siam khâwnvâr dahna a hmanrua zawng zawng te nên, rimtui hâlna maichâm te;

source: Then they took the he-goats for the sin-offering, placing them before the king and the meeting of the people, and they put their hands on them:
target: Tin, kelpate chu sual thawi nân lal leh mipuiho kiangah chuan an rawn kai hnai a, an chungah chuan an kut an nghat a;

source: I felt fine
target: A fuh ka ti

source: In earlier times the name of Hebron had been Kiriath-arba, named after Arba, the greatest of the Anakim. And the land had rest from war.
target: Tin, Hebron khaw hming chu a hma chuan Kiriath-arba a ni; Arba chu Anakim-ho szinga mi lian ber a ni. Tichuan ram chu râlmuangin a awm ta rih a.

source: It was small
target: A tê a nia

source: She came.
target: A lo kal.

source: Let the work of this house of God go on; let the ruler of the Jews and their responsible men put up this house of God in its place.
target: he Pathian biak in an sa leh hi engmah tih suh u; Judate awptu leh Juda upate chuan he Pathian in hi a hmun ngaiah sa rawh se.

source: But all the chiefs said to the people, We have taken an oath to them by the Lord, the God of Israel, and so we may not put our hands on them.
target: Nimahsela mi lianho zawng zawngte chuan pungkhawmho zawng zawngte hnenah chuan, LALPA, Israelte Pathian chhalin an hnenah chhia kan lo chham awh si a: chuvangin anmahni chu kan dek thiang lo a ni.

source: They made him angry with their high places; moving him to wrath with their images.
target: An hmun sângtein amah chu an tithinur si a, An milem siamtein an thiktir bawk a.

source: And they will see his face; and his name will be on their brows.
target: a hmel an hmu ang a, a hming chu an chalah a chuang bawk ang.

source: I met a girl.
target: Nula pakhat ka tâwk.

source: So the servants with the offerings went on in front, and he himself took his rest that night in the tents with his people.
target: Chutichuan lâwmman chu a hmaah chuan a kal kai ta a; ani erawh chu, chu mi zân chuan a pâwl zîngah chuan a riak ta a.

source: You'll see
target: I hmu mai ang

source: The house is small
target: In chu a te a

source: You should change
target: I danglam tur a ni

source: They don't hate you
target: An huat lo che

source: Let's walk together.
target: I kal dun ang u.

source: Let seven weeks be numbered from the first day when the grain is cut.
target: chawlhkar sarih inchhut ang a; in u seng tan ni ațangin chawlhkar sarih chu in chhut tur a ni.

source: For when she had made an offering of her children to her images, she came into my holy place to make it unclean; see, this is what she has done inside my house.
target: An milimte tana an fate an thah hnuah, anni vek chuan ka hmun thianghlim tibawlhhlawh tûrin an lût si țhin a; tin, ngai rawh hetiang hian ka in chhûng ngeiah an ti țhin a ni.

source: He makes them go jumping about like a young ox; Lebanon and Sirion like a young mountain ox.
target: Bawng no tualchai angin a chettir thin a; Lebanon leh Sirion tlange chu sele no ang maiin.

source: Because you are still in the flesh: for when there is envy and division among you, are you not still walking after the way of the flesh, even as natural men?
target: tisa mi in la nih fo avangin. In zingah itsikna leh inhnialna a awm thin avang hian tisa mi la niin mihring angin inla awm a ni lo vem ni?

source: And the priests' way with the people was this: when any man made an offering, the priest's servant came while the flesh was being cooked, having in his hand a meat-hook with three teeth;
target: Tin, mipuitelaka puithiamte tih dan chu, mi in inthawina an rawnhlan hian, sa chhum lai takin puithiam chiahlaw hi sa thurn thirkut zum thumei mi kengin a lo kal thin a;

source: To him all the prophets give witness, that through his name everyone who has faith in him will have forgiveness of sins.
target: Tupawh amah chu ring apiang a hming avangin sualte ngaihhnathiamin an awm ang tih, heng a chanchin hi zawlnei zawng zawngin an hriattir thin kha, a ti a.

source: He goes to rest full of wealth, but does so for the last time: on opening his eyes, he sees it there no longer.
target: Hausain a mu a, mahse, a tho tawh lawng; A mit a han meng a, a awm tawh lo.

source: They always reply.
target: An chhang fo thin.

source: That is not beautiful
target: Chu chu a mawi lo

source: Dan wasn't even hurt.
target: Dan pawh a na lo.

source: But we will go three days' journey into the waste land and make an offering to the Lord our God as he may give us orders.
target: thlalêr ni thum kalah chuan kan va kal ang a, LALPA kan Pathianin tih tûra min pêk ang angin a hnênah kan va inthawi ang e, a ti a.

source: If we take the witness of men to be true, the witness of God is greater: because this is the witness which God has given about his Son.
target: Mihring hriattirna mah kan pawm chuan Pathian hriattirna chu a ropui zawk si a; Pathian hriattirna chu hei hi a ni, Ka Fapa chanchin ka hriattir tawh, tih hi a ni si a.

source: Are you seeing someone?
target: Mi i hmu em?

source: The Lord is in his holy Temple, the Lord's seat is in heaven; his eyes are watching and testing the children of men.
target: LALPA chu a biak in thianghlimah a awm a, LALPA chu, a lalthutphah zawng vanah a awm; Mihring fate hi amitin a en a, an thiltihte a hmu.

source: It'll be alright
target: A ṭha vek ang

source: I'll see Tom.
target: Toma ka hmu dawn.

source: I did it
target: Ka ti tawh

source: And some of the disciples from Caesarea went with us, taking a certain Mnason of Cyprus, one of the early disciples, in whose house we were to be living.
target: Kaisari khuaa mi zirtirho tute emaw kan hnenah an kal ve a, anni chuan a hming Mnasona, zirtir hmasa pawl, Kupra thliarkara mi pakhat kan thlen in pa tur chu an hruai ve a.

source: They haven't called
target: An la call lo

source: I will make your towers of rubies, and your doors of carbuncles, and the wall round you will be of all sorts of beautiful stones.
target: I chhip zumte ch rubi lungin, i kawngkhârte chu karbankul lungin, i kulh zawng zawng chu lungmawitein ka siam ang.

source: I'm bit lazy
target: Ka thatchhe deuh

source: As the fowl-house is full of birds, so are their houses full of deceit: for this reason they have become great and have got wealth.
target: bâwm savaa khat ang maiin, An inte chu bumnain a khat a, Chuvangin an lo lian a, an hausak phah ta a.

source: Then Jacob said to all his people, Put away the strange gods which are among you, and make yourselves clean, and put on a change of clothing:
target: Tichuan Jakoban a chhûngte leh a hnêna awm zawng zawngte hnênah chuan, In zinga mi dang Pathian awmte chu dah bo daih ula, intithianghlimin in silhfênte thlâk rawh u:

source: Because we, being a number of persons, are one bread, we are one body: for we all take part in the one bread.
target: Keini mi tam tak hi chhang tlang khat, taksa pumkhat kan nih hi; kan zain chhang tlang khata mi kan chang theuh si.

source: I don't understand
target: Ka hrethiam lo

source: The Lord will give strength to his people; the Lord will give his people the blessing of peace.
target: LALPA chuan a mite hnênah chakna a pe ang a, LALPA chuan a mite chu thlamuannain mal a sawm ang.

source: He makes the mists go up from the ends of the earth; he makes thunder-flames for the rain; he sends out the winds from his store-houses.
target: Ani chuan chhumte kawlkil atangte chuan a chhohtir thin a; Kawlphete ruah atân a siam thin a; A sum in atangte chuan thli ala chhuak thin.

source: They're not talking
target: An inbia lo

source: When your fear comes on you like a storm, and your trouble like a rushing wind; when pain and sorrow come on you.
target: In hlauhna thlipui anga a lo thlen a, In vanduaina thawngaleivir anga a lo t hlen a, Hrehawmna leh manganna in chunga a lo thlen hunin.

source: We tried
target: Kan tichhin tawh

source: He loves us
target: Aman min hmangaih

source: Placing one at one end and one at the other; the winged ones were part of the cover.
target: a hmawr leh lamah cherub pakhat, a hmawr lehlamah cherub pakhat: zahngaihna thutphah nena inbelhbawm hlawm vekina hmawr ve vea cherub-te chu a siam a.

source: We talk all the time.
target: Kan inbe fo thin.

source: Don't praise yourself!
target: Mahni infak suh!

source: Don't spoil the mood.
target: Mood tichhe suh.

source: Humor me.
target: Mi fiam harh rawh.

source: She will come back home
target: A lo haw thuai ang

source: You're the sweetest
target: I duhawm ber

source: When Jesus became conscious that his disciples were protesting about what he said, he said to them, Does this give you trouble?
target: Chutichuan chu mi thu-ah chuan a zirtirte an phunnawi tih Isuan a rilruin a hria a, an hnenah, He thu hian a tilungni lo che u elo?

source: Then Jehoshaphat said to the king of Israel, Let us now get directions from the Lord.
target: Tin, Jehosaphata chuan Israel lal hnênah chuan, LALPA thu ngaichang rih phawt la maw le, a ti a.

source: It was crazy
target: A mak e

source: The Lord is far from sinners, but his ear is open to the prayer of the upright.
target: LALPA chu mi suaksual lakah chuan a hla a, Mi fel tawngtai erawh chu a ngaithla thin.

source: And the son of Hezekiah was Manasseh; and the son of Manasseh was Amon; and the son of Amon was Josiah;
target: Hezekian Manasea a hring a; Manasean Amona a hring a; Amonan Josia a hring a;

source: We have room
target: Pindan kan nei

source: We misjudged them
target: Kan rorel dik lo a ni

source: And Eliphaz, the son of Esau, had connection with a woman named Timna, who gave birth to Amalek: all these were the children of Esau's wife Adah.
target: Tin, Timnaii chu Esauva fapa Eliphaza hmei a ni a: ani chuan Eliphaza chu Amaleka a hrinsak a: chûng chu Esauva nupui Adai thlahte chu an ni.

source: And so whoever is not ready to give up all he has may not be my disciple.
target: Chutiang bawkin nangni zingah hian tupawh a neih zawng zawng kalsan lo apiang chu ka zirtir a ni thei lo vang.

source: I'm baking!
target: Chhang ka siam mêk

source: Come to our help, Lord: let the king give ear to our cry.
target: LALPA, chhandam rawh: Kan koh hun chuan Lalberin min chhâng rawh se.

source: Don't embarrass me.
target: Min mualpho suh.

source: There are three things, the wonder of which overcomes me, even four things outside my knowledge:
target: Thil pathum ka tana mak lutuk a awm a, E, thil pali a ni ka hriat loh chu.

source: We have the funds available.
target: Sum kan nei a.

source: And David made all Israel come together at Jerusalem, to take the ark of the Lord to its place, which he had got ready for it.
target: Tin, Davidan LALPA bâwm a dahna tûr hmun a buatsaihnaa zawn chho tûrin Jerusalem-ah Israel-ho zawng zawng chu a khâwm a.

source: So that we made a request to Titus that, as he had made a start before, so he might make this grace complete in you.
target: Chutichuan, hmana a lo tih tan tawh avang khan he khawngaihna pawh hi nangmahnia ti zo nghal turin Tita chu kan ngen ta hial a.

source: Then having taken off his linen robes and put on other clothing, he is to take it away into a clean place, outside the tent-circle.
target: Tin, a silhfen chu a hlip ang a, silhfen dang a inbel ang a, a vapte chu daipawn lam hmun faiah a kalpui tur a ni.

source: And the cubit which is over of the ten curtains at the sides will be hanging over the two sides of the House as a cover.
target: Tin, puan in puanzâr a dung lam hmâwr tuak ve vea tawng khat ve ve la chuanga chu biak bûk bang lehlam lehlam khuh nân a uai thla tur a ni.

source: And Absalom said, Is this your love for your friend? why did you not go with your friend?
target: Tin, Absaloma chuan Husaia hnênah, Hetiang hi ani maw i thian i khawngaihna dan chu? Engati nge i thian hnêna i kal loh? a ti a.

source: You'll do it.
target: I ti dawn.

source: Have you been waited on?
target: I nghah tawh em?

source: They put up pillars of stone and wood on every high hill and under every green tree:
target: Tlâng sâng tinah leh thin ghring tin, hnuaia hian lungphunte phunin, Aseri te an siam a;

source: Then Laban and Bethuel said in answer, This is the Lord's doing: it is not for us to say Yes or No to you.
target: Tin, Labana leh Bethuela chuan an chhâng a, He thil hi LALPA hnên atanga chhuak a nih hi: a chhia a tha pawh i hnênah kan sawi thei lo ve.

source: Don't make me beg for it.
target: Min dil tir suh.

source: With great force he takes a grip of my clothing, pulling me by the neck of my coat.
target: Ka na hian ka silhfente a tikhawlo ve, Ka kawrnghawng angin mi rek a.

source: Preaching the kingdom of God and teaching about the Lord Jesus Christ without fear, and no orders were given that he was not to do so.
target: Pathian ram thu a hrilh a, Lal Isua Krista thu pawh huai takin a zirtir thin a, tumahin amah an khap si lo va.

source: Then two thieves were put on crosses with him, one on the right and one on the left.
target: Tin, ama rual chuan suamhmang pahnih an khengbet ve a, a ding lamah pakhat, a vei lamah pakhat.

source: And I put a ring in your nose and ear-rings in your ears and a beautiful crown on your head.
target: i hnarah hnar vuah te, i bengah bengbehte, i lu-ah lallukhum mawi tak tein ka chei chia.

source: Tom saw Mary fall
target: Tom chuan Mary tlu chu a hmu a

source: Will you make sport with him, as with a bird? or put him in chains for your young women?
target: Sava ang lekin i khal thei dawn êm ni? I hmeichhiate kaih atân i hling thei ang maw?

source: When these words came to their ears, some of the people said, This is certainly the prophet.
target: Chutichuan mipui zinga thenkhatin chung thu chu an hriatin, Hei hi zawlnei chu a nih tak hi, an ti a.

source: He is not in
target: A lut lo

source: Let the house of Aaron now say, that his mercy is unchanging for ever.
target: A ngilneihna chu kumkhuain a awm ang tih, Aron chhûngte chuan sawi rawh se.

source: We who are strong have to be a support to the feeble, and not give pleasure to ourselves.
target: Chutichuan keini mi chakte hian mahni lawmna zawng lovin, mi chak lote chak lohnate chu kan tuarpui zawk tur a ni.

source: Do you think you can get it working?
target: I ti thei ang em?

source: Hand over the map!
target: Map chu pe rawh!

source: Do you hear something
target: Thil i hre ve em

source: When he has got them all out, he goes before them, and the sheep go after him, for they have knowledge of his voice.
target: A ta zawng zawng a chhuahtir veleh, an hma a hruai a, beramte chuan amah an zui thin a, a aw an hre si a.

source: I'm tall.
target: Ka sang.

source: They have all gone out of the way, there is no profit in any of them; there is not one who does good, not so much as one:
target: A ni lo lamah an peng ta vek a; Engmaha tlaktlai lovin an lo awm ta vek a, Tumah thil tha ti reng an awm lo, Pakhat te mah an awm hauh lo.

source: The flowers are come on the earth; the time of cutting the vines is come, and the voice of the dove is sounding in our land;
target: Leian pangpârte an lo lang a, Sirva zai vawr hun a lo thleng a, thuva awrawl hriat a ni ta, kan ramah hian;

source: You put unclean bread on my altar. And you say, How have we made it unclean? By your saying, The table of the Lord is of no value.
target: Ka maichâmah chuan chhang bawlhhlawh in hlân a lawm. Nangnin, engah khân nge kan tihbawlhhlawh che? in ti a LALPA dawhkân hi hmuhsitawm a ni, in tih țhin ah hian a ni.

source: I'm right
target: Ka dik zawk

source: The Lord your God who goes before you will be fighting for you, and will do such wonders as he did for you in Egypt before your eyes;
target: LALPA in Pathian in hmahruaitu chuan in mithmuha Aigupta rama a tihsak tak che u zawng zawng ang khan a beihpui ang che u a,

source: And a great storm of wind came up, and the waves came into the boat, so that the boat was now becoming full.
target: Tin, thlipui nasa tak a lo tleh a, tuifawnte chu lawngah chuan a lo fawn lut hlawp hlawp a, chutichuan lawng chu a lo khat dawn ta mai a.

source: But if the bright mark keeps in the same place and gets no greater, it is the mark of the old wound, and the priest will say that he is clean.
target: Amaherawhchu a bawl var chu a awmna ngaia a awm a, a tai darh loh chuan khawihii ser mat a ni a; puithiamin a thianghlim tih a puang tur a ni.

source: Our soul has gone free like a bird out of the net of those who would take her: the net is broken, and we are free.
target: Thangkamtute thang ata sava a chhuak angin kan nunna hi a chuak ta: Thang chu a chhe ta a, keini hi kan chhuak ta hlauh a ni.

source: I'm watching
target: Ka en mêk e

source: Being of good behaviour among the Gentiles; so that though they say now that you are evil-doers, they may see your good works and give glory to God when he comes to be their judge.
target: Jentailte zinga in chetzia chu mawi tak ni rawh se,chutichuan thil tisualtute anga an sawichhiat che u kawngah chuan in thil tihthat an hmuhte avangin fanin an awm hunah chuan Pathian an chawimawi thei ang.

source: Then, after prayer and going without food they put their hands on them, and sent them away.
target: Chutichuan chaw an ngheia an tawngtai zawh chuan an chungah kut an nghat a, an kaltir ta a.

source: Only that the Holy Spirit makes clear to me in every town that prison and pains are waiting for me.
target: Thlarau Thianghlimin, ‘Phuarna leh hrehawmnain a hmuak a che,’ tiin khaw tinah mi hriattir thin, chung chauh chu ka hria a ni.

source: And anyone wounding a beast and causing its death, will have to make payment for it: a life for a life.
target: thi khawpa ran chunga kut thlak apiang chuan a rul tur a ni: nun aiah nun.

source: Which tooth hurts?
target: Eng ha nge na?

source: I took the day off.
target: Ni chu ka la a.

source: And the forms of the locusts were like horses made ready for war; and on their heads they had crowns like gold, and their faces were as the faces of men.
target: Tin, khaute pianzia chu sakawr indo na tura peih sa ang an ni; lallukhum ang mai rangkachak ang an khum a, an hmai pawh mihring hmai ang a ni.

source: For God gives his word in one way, even in two, and man is not conscious of it:
target: Pathianin kawng khatin thu a sawi thin a, A ni, kawng hnih pawhin, pawisak loh pawh ni se.

source: So Ahab, hearing that Naboth was dead, went down to the vine-garden of Naboth the Jezreelite to take it as his heritage.
target: Tin, Ahaban Nabotha a thi ta tih a hriatin heti hi a ni a, Jezreel mi Nabotha grêp huan nei tûra thawk thla tûrin Ahaba chu a tho ta a.

source: They may not take as wife a loose or common woman, or one who has been put away by her husband: for the priest is holy to his God.
target: Hmeichhia, nawhchizuar emaw, hming hliau emaw, a pasal mak hnu emaw an nei tur a ni lo: an Pathian tan mi thianghlim an ni si a.

source: It's hard.
target: A har.

source: He looked furious
target: A thinrim hmel hle

source: In your mercy you went before the people whom you have made yours; guiding them in your strength to your holy place.
target: Nangin i khawngaihnain mipui i tlante kha i hruai a: I chênna thianghlimah chuan i chaknain i hruai ta a.

source: Whom I have sent to you for this very purpose, so that you may have knowledge of our position, and that he may give comfort to your hearts.
target: he mi avng tak hian amah chu in hnenah ka rawn tir a ni, ka chanchin in hriat theihna tur leh, ani hian in thinlung a tihthlamuan theihna turin.

source: The gap has closed.
target: Gap chu a khar ta.

source: See, they may be moved to war, but not by my authority: all those who come together to make an attack on you, will be broken against you.
target: Ngai teh, bei tûr chein an la pung khâwm a ni thei a, neimahsela ka thu a ni lo vang: angmah bei tûra pung apiangte chu nangmah avângin an tlu ang.

source: To everyone, then, who gives witness to me before men, I will give witness before my Father in heaven.
target: Chutichuan, mite hmaa mi tan apiang, ka Pa vana mi hmaah ka tan ve ang.

source: And there were four angle-plates at the four angles of every base, forming part of the structure of the base.
target: Tin, hunchhan kil li theuhvah chuan innghahna pali a awm a: chu mi innghahnate chu hunchhan nen pumkhat vek a ni.

source: So that your foot may be red with blood, and the tongues of your dogs with the same.
target: I ke chu thisena i hnim theih a, I ui leite chuan i dote laka chan a neih theih nân, a ti a.

source: Then the wise men, who were doing all the work of the holy place, came from their work;
target: Tin, mi themthiamho zawng zawng, hmun thianghlim atana hna tinreng thawkte chuan an hnathawh lai chu antlansan theuh va,

source: I still haven't paid you.
target: Ka la pe lo che.

source: Tom chuckled
target: Tom a nui

source: What should be done?
target: Eng nge tih tur?

source: I led the way
target: Hma ka hruai

source: And I have sent him to you for this very purpose, so that you may have news of how we are, and so that he may give your hearts comfort;
target: He mi avang ngei hian ani chu in hnenah ka rawn tir a ni, ka chanchin in hriat theihna tur leh in thinlung a tihthlamuan theihna turin;

source: For him who is joined to all the living there is hope; a living dog is better than a dead lion.
target: Mi nungdamte zinga la telte tan chuan beiseina a la awm a: sakeibaknei thi ai chuan ui nung takngial pawh a tha zawk si.

source: They don't sow
target: Buh an tuh lova

source: I am a Toki Ponan.
target: Toki Ponan ka ni a.

source: I am small and of no account; but I keep your orders in mind.
target: Mi te leh mi hmusit ka ni a: Nimahsela i thununna thute chu ka theihnghilh ngai lo ve.

source: Let your servant see the shining of your face; give me knowledge of your rules.
target: I hmêlin i chhiahhlawh chhun eng la; I thuruatte chu mi zirtir ang che.

source: And it was broken on that day: and the sheep-traders, who were watching me, were certain that it was the word of the Lord.
target: Tin, chumi nîah chuan phelhin a awm ta a, ran rual zînga a rethei, mi pawisatute chuan LALPA thu a ni tih an hre ta a.

source: I caused this.
target: Ka thlen a ni.

source: Let our fate be changed, O Lord, like the streams in the South.
target: Aw LALPA, sala kan tang hi min hruai kir leh ang che, Chhim rama luite angin.

source: With him are strength and wise designs; he who is guided into error, together with his guide, are in his hands;
target: A hnênah chakna leh finna a awm a, Bum leh bumtu a ta nân ni.

source: But with everyone who is here with us today before the Lord our God, as well as with those who are not here:
target: vawiina LALPA kan Pathian hmaa dingte leh tuna kan hnena awm ve lote hnênah pawh hian a ni;

source: But be increased in grace and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ. May he have glory now and for ever. So be it.
target: Amaherawhchu, kan Lalpa leh Chhandamtu Isua Krista khawngaihna leh hriatnaah chuan lo thang lian rawh u. Tunah leh chatuan thlengin ama hnenah chuan ropuina awm rawh se. Amen.

source: Come back in
target: Lo lêt rawh

source: What subject?
target: Eng subject nge?

source: I didn't see their faces
target: An hmel ka hmu lo

source: I can't feel it.
target: Ka ngaihtuah thei lo.

source: Give life to my soul so that it may give you praise; and let your decisions be my support.
target: Ka nuna hi nung rawh se, tichuan a fak dawn che nia. I rorêlnate pawhin mi tanpui rawh se.

source: Have you done well?
target: I ti ṭha em?

source: Every builder was working with his sword at his side. And by my side was a man for sounding the horn.
target: a siamtute chuan an khandaih an pai theuh va, chutiang chung chuan an siam a ni. Tin, tawtawrâwt hamtu chu ka kiangah a awm a.

source: Destroy it
target: Tichhe rawh

source: And Miriam, the woman prophet, the sister of Aaron, took an instrument of music in her hand; and all the women went after her with music and dances.
target: Tin, zawlnei Miriami, Arona farnuin khuangtê a keng a; tin, hmeichhia zawng zawngin khuangtê kenga lâmin an zui chhuak ve ta hlawm a.

source: We love them
target: Kan hmangaih

source: Go home
target: Inah haw rawh

source: Who were violently taken away before their time, who were overcome by the rush of waters:
target: Anni chu an hun hmaa lak bovin an awm a, An innghahna chu lui len bovin a awm a;

source: How romantic!
target: A zunngaih awm hle

source: I like ham
target: Vawksa ka ngaina

source: You will be better soon.
target: I dam thuai ang.

source: My children, of whom I am again in birth-pains till Christ is formed in you,
target: Ka naute u, Krista chu nangmahniah siam puitlina a awm hma loh chuan nau veiin ka vei leh che u hi.

source: And when he saw them he said, This is the army of God: so he gave that place the name of Mahanaim.
target: Tin, Jakoban anni chu a hmuh chuan, Hêng hi Pathian pâwlho an ni, a ti a: tichuan chu mi hmun hmingah chuan Mahanaim a vuah a.

source: Give now a cry for help; is there anyone who will give you an answer? and to which of the holy ones will you make your prayer?
target: Han ko teh, chhâng tûr che an awm teh reng emaw? Mi thianghlim tu lam ber nge i hawi dawn?

source: And take salvation for your head-dress and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:
target: Tin, chhandamna lukhum leh Thlarau ngunhnam Pathian Thu chu la ula,

source: And when he had said this, there was an argument between the Pharisees and the Sadducees, and a division in the meeting.
target: Tin, chu chu a sawi zawh chuan Pharisaite leh Saddukaite an lo inhnial a, roreltute chu an inkhing ta a.

source: You get it every time.
target: I hmu fo thin.

source: And see what the land is like; and if the people living in it are strong or feeble, small or great in number;
target: ram chu eng ang nge tih te, chunga cheng mipuite chu an chak nge chak lo tih te, an tlem leh an tam te,

source: And Ephraim did not make the Canaanites who were living in Gezer go out; but the Canaanites went on living in Gezer among them.
target: Tin, Ephraima chuan Gezer khua Kanaan-ho awmte chu a hnawtchhuak lo; Kanaan- ho chu Gezer khuaah chuan an zingah an cheng ve ta zawk a ni.

source: Because by his power he has given us everything necessary for life and righteousness, through the knowledge of him who has been our guide by his glory and virtue;
target: Ama ropuina leh thatna zara min kotu, a chanchin hriat avangin a Pathian thiltihtheihnain nunna leh Pathian ngaihsakna lam kawngah chuan thil zawng zawng min pe si a.

source: By them they were crushed, and made low under their hands.
target: Anmahni dotuten an hnehchhiah a, An kut hnuaiah chuan tihtlâwmin an awm ta a.

source: We're not friends
target: Thian kan ni lo

source: These are fountains without water, and mists before a driving storm; for whom the eternal night is kept in store.
target: Chung chu tuikhur tui awm lo leh chhum thlipui chhem len an ni; chungte tan chuan thim chhah mup chu ruat a ni tawh.

source: And the town has no need of the sun, or of the moon, to give it light: for the glory of God did make it light, and the light of it is the Lamb.
target: Tin, chu khua chuan a en turin ni a ngai lo va, thla pawh a ngai hek lo; Pathian ropuina chuan a en a, an khawnvar chu Beram No a ni si a.

source: He let us go.
target: Min kaltir a lâwm.

source: She doesn't wish to be disturbed.
target: Tibuai a duh lo.

source: And I gave her time for a change of heart, but she has no mind to give up her unclean ways.
target: Tin, simna turin a hnenah hun bi ka tuk a, nimahsela mi ngaih a chin chu a sim duh lo.

source: Go on home.
target: Inah haw rawh.

source: May the Lord be praised, because he has made clear to me the wonder of his grace in a strong town.
target: LALPA chu fakin awm rawh se: A ngilneihzia mak tak chu khawpui nghet takah mi hmuhtir si a.

source: We're not smiling
target: Kan nui lo

source: And he made two winged ones, hammered out of one bit of gold, for the two ends of the cover;
target: Tin, cherub pahni rangkachakin a siam a, zahngaihna thutphah hmawr ve vea mi ch a chherin a chher a;

source: For Hannah's prayer came from her heart, and though her lips were moving she made no sound: so it seemed to Eli that she was overcome with wine.
target: Hani chuan a rilruina sawi a, a hmui chau a phu a, a awm chu hriat a ni lo va: chuvangin Elia chuan zua rui niin a ring a.

source: You're unfriendly
target: Kawm I nuam lo

source: If you played an E.
target: I khelh chuan E.

source: Wait outside
target: Pawnah nghâk rawh

source: I got my eyes tested.
target: Ka mit ka test a.

source: Let married life be honoured among all of you and not made unclean; for men untrue in married life will be judged by God.
target: Mi zawng zawng zingah inneih hi chawimawiin awm sela, khum pawh tihbawlhhlawh lovin awm rawh se; inngaite leh uirete chu Pathian in a ngaihtuah dawn si a.

source: And I said Oh
target: Tin kei chuan Aw

source: Saul and Jonathan were loved and pleasing; in their lives and in their death they were not parted; they went more quickly than eagles, they were stronger than lions.
target: Saula leh Jonathana nun dan chu a duhawmin a mawi a, An thih pawhin an inthen lo, Mupuite aiin an chak zawk a, Sakeibakneite aiin an chak zawk.

source: May the mountains give peace to the people, and the hills righteousness.
target: Tlâng lian leh tlâng tete hian felnain Mite hnênah thlamuanna an rawn thlen ang.

source: I'm not ready for it yet.
target: Ka la inpeih lo.

source: Let the field be glad, and everything which is in it; yes, let all the trees of the wood be sounding with joy,
target: Lo leh a chhûnga awm zawng anwg hi lawm takin awm rawh se: Chutih hunah chuan ramhnuaia thing zawng anwg hi hlimin an zai ang,

source: I love tea
target: Thingpui ka ngaina

source: They probably know
target: An hre ngei ang

source: Watch us
target: Min en ru

source: He had forty sons and thirty sons' sons who went on seventy young asses; and he was judge of Israel for eight years.
target: Chu mi chuan fapa sawmli leh tupa sawmthum sabengtung no sawmsarih chunga chuang thin mi a nei a: ani chuan Israel-ho chungah kum riat ro a rêl a.

source: It was a true story.
target: Thudik tak a ni.

source: I'm a hero
target: A changtupa ka nia

source: Our sons are like tall young plants; and our daughters like the shining stones of a king's house;
target: Thlai thang duang ang mai, Kan fapate thang duang sela; Kan fanute pawh lal in kil Lung chher mawi ang lo ni se;

source: And the Lord God sent a deep sleep on the man, and took one of the bones from his side while he was sleeping, joining up the flesh again in its place:
target: Tichuan LALPA Pathian chuan Adama chu tui takin a muthilhtîr a, tichuan a muhîl ta a; tin, a nâkruh pakhat a la a, chu mi ai chu tisain a awh phuitîr ta a;

source: Yes, it's very red.
target: Aw, a sen hle mai.

source: You should have known it.
target: I hriat tur a ni.

source: Medical store
target: Damdawi zawrhna

source: So among the last acts of David was the numbering of the sons of Levi, from twenty years old and over.
