target: Davida thupêk hnuhnugn avângin Levi-hote hchu kum sâwm hnih achin chunglam thlengin chhiar an ni si a.

source: I see that you are able to do every thing, and to give effect to all your designs.
target: Engkim i ti thei tih ka hria e, I tum dal rual engmah a awm lo.

source: Those who are of the earth are like the man who was from the earth: and those who are of heaven are like the one from heaven.
target: Leia siam mi ang kha leia siam mite pawh hi an ni a; vana mi ang kha, vana mite pawh chu an ni.

source: I'm a cowboy
target: Kaubawi ka nia

source: For the Holy Spirit will make clear to you in that very hour what to say.
target: chutih hun takah chuan engnge in sawi tur rem, Thlarau Thianghlimin a hrilh ang che u, a ti a.

source: I'm last.
target: A tawp ber ka nia.

source: For everyone who takes milk is without experience of the word of righteousness: he is a child.
target: Hnute ring apiang chuan felna thu-ah hian hriatna an nei si lo, nausen an nih avangin.

source: And through him great numbers of the children of Israel will be turned to the Lord their God.
target: Israela thlahte tam tak Lalpa an Pathian hnen lamah a hawitir leh ang.

source: I give up
target: Ka bânsan e

source: For the power of the horses is in their mouths and in their tails: because their tails are like snakes, and have heads, and with them they give wounds.
target: Sakawrte thiltihtheihna chu an kaah leh an meiah a ni a awm nian meite chu rul ang a ni si a, lute a nei bawk a; chu chuan a ni mi an tihnat thin ni.

source: I came near to one of those who were waiting there, questioning him about what all this was. And he said to me that he would make clear to me the sense of these things.
target: A lo dingte zínga pakhat chu ka han hnaih a, hêng zawng zawng chungchânga thutak chu ka zâwt a. Chitichuan min hrilh a, a thil hrilhfiahnate pawh chu mi hriattîr ta a.

source: And those of Judah who are still living will again take root in the earth, and give fruit.
target: Tin, Juda chhûngte zinga la dam chhunte chu a chhukzawnga zung kaia, a chho zawnga rahin a awm leh ang.

source: And to take with you the silver and gold freely offered by the king and his wise men to the God of Israel, whose Temple is in Jerusalem,
target: Jerusalem-a awm Israelte Pathian mahni duh thua lal leh a rorêltuten an pêk tangka leh rangkachak keng tûra lal leh a rorêltu pasarihinan tirh che i ni a,

source: And they went and were living in the resting-place of Chimham, which is near Beth-lehem on the way into Egypt,
target: Tin, an chhuak a, Kaldaiho avânga Agupta ramah tlan luh tumin Bethlehem khaw bula Geruth Chimham-ah chuan an chawl a.

source: Have no more to do with man, whose life is only a breath, for he is of no value.
target: An hnar chauhva thaw awm mihring rin hi bansan tawh rawh uL eng kawngah nge rin tlâk an nih tehlul ni?

source: I am just dreaming
target: Ka mumang mai mai a ni

source: In the town all is waste, and in the public place is destruction.
target: Khawpuiah chuan tiauna hnutchhiahin a awm a, a kulh kawngkhâr chu vuak chhiatin a awm ta.

source: The fire was burning brightly.
target: Mei chu a kang a.

source: I didn't wait
target: Ka nghâk lo

source: Now Simon's wife's mother was ill, with a burning heat; and they gave him word of her:
target: Tin, Simona nupuia nu chu khawsikin a na a, a lo mu a; tichuan a chanchin chu Isua an hrilh ta nghal a;

source: No trouble will come to upright men, but sinners will be full of evil.
target: Mi felte chungah chuan pawi khawihna a thleng lo vang a, Mi suaksualte erawh chu thl tha lovin an khat ang.

source: For Moses says that the man who does the righteousness which is of the law will get life by it.
target: Mosia chuan, Dana felna zawm chu, chu felna avang chuan a nung ang, tiin a ziak a.

source: And the priests and the Levites will never be without a man to come before me, offering burned offerings and perfumes and meal offerings and offerings of beasts at all times.
target: Puithiam, Levia chite pawhin ka hmaa hâlral inthawi hlan tûr leh buhbal thil hlan tûr leh inthawi zel tûrin mi an hmai hek lo vang.

source: It was bad
target: A tha lo

source: But if your eye is evil, all your body will be dark. If then the light which is in you is dark, how dark it will be!
target: I mit a chhiat erawh chuan I taksa apumin a thim zo vek ang. Chutichuan, I chhunga eng chu thim ni sela, thim chu a va nasa dawn em!

source: On the third day two people were going to be married at Cana in Galilee. The mother of Jesus was there:
target: Tin, ni thum niah, Galili rama Kana khuaah lawi chaw a awm a, chutah chuan Isua nu a awm.

source: Did you call?
target: I bia em?

source: How long will it be before your eyes are turned away from me, so that I may have a minute's breathing-space?
target: Eng chen nge khaw dang hawisan lovin i awm ang a, Ka chil ka lem chhûngte pawh mi hlamchhiah lova i awm dawn?

source: We are about to land.
target: Kan tlai dawn ta.

source: I'm not optimistic
target: Ka beisei phak lo

source: And because by God's law death comes to men once, and after that they are judged;
target: Tin, mihring tan vawi khat thih ruat a ni chu mi hnuah chuan rorelna a awm ang;

source: They aren't waiting for the bus
target: Bus an nghak lo

source: And Jesus himself was weeping.
target: Isua a ṭap ta a.

source: For when we were still without strength, at the right time Christ gave his life for evil-doers.
target: Kan la chak loh lai khan, a hun tein Krista chu mi sualte ai chuan a lo thi ta si.

source: He takes down wealth as food, and sends it up again; it is forced out of his stomach by God.
target: Hausaknate ch a lem a, a law chhuak leh a, pathianin a pum ata a paihchhuak a,

source: We're late I know
target: Kan tlai tawh Ka hria

source: I must fix it.
target: Ka siamtha ngei tur a ni.

source: You're a spy
target: Enthlatu i ni

source: I like salami
target: Salami ka ngaina

source: We look after him
target: Amah kan enkawl a

source: Where, then, are your wise men? let them make clear to you, let them give you knowledge of the purpose of the Lord of armies for Egypt.
target: Khawiah nge i mi fingte chu le? Anni chuan hrilh nghal che rawh se; Aigupta ram chung thil thleng tûr sipaihote LALPA ruatte chu, hre rawh se.

source: A brother wounded is like a strong town, and violent acts are like a locked tower.
target: I unau pui la, kulhpui angin a hum ang che; In inhau erawh chuan, a inkhar hnan ang che.

source: Circumcision is nothing, and its opposite is nothing, but only doing the orders of God is of value.
target: Pathian thupekte pawm chauh lo chu serh tan hi engmah a ni lo va, serh tan loh pawh hi engmah a ni hek lo.

source: Excuse me a minute
target: Minute khat tal min ngaidam rawh

source: And from there, David went up and took cover in the safe place of En-gedi.
target: Tin, Davida chu chuta ta chu a chho va, Engedi kulhbingah te chuan a awm ta a.

source: And in the hearing of the priests and the prophets and all the people, Jeremiah said these words in the house of the Lord.
target: Tin, puithiam te, zâwlneite leh mipui zawng zawngte chuan LALPA ina Jeremian heng thu a sawi hi an ngaithla a.

source: Then Moses put up an altar and gave it the name of Yahweh-nissi:
target: Tin, Mosian maichâm a siam a, a hmingah chuan Jehova-nissi a vuah a:

source: And their fear was great, and they said one to another, Who then is this, that even the wind and the sea do his orders?
target: Tin, hlauh namenin an hlau ta lo va, He mi hi tunge ni le, thli leh dil lam pawhin a thu an awi hi? an inti hlawm a.

source: I'm a wimp.
target: Ka chau a ni.

source: I say this by way of shaming ourselves, as if we had been feeble. But if anyone puts himself forward (I am talking like a foolish person, I will do the same.
target: Kan lo chak ta lo angin insitin ka sawi a ni. Nimahsela, tupawhin eng kawngah pawh an ngam apiang a takin han sawi ta ila kei pawhin ka ngam.

source: But every woman who does so with her head unveiled, puts shame on her head: for it is the same as if her hair was cut off.
target: Amaherawhchu, hmeichhia lukhum khum lova tawngtai emaw, thu hril emaw apiangin an lu an timualpho a ni; ziah kawn nen thuhmun reng a ni si a.

source: Keep watch over yourselves, so that you do not make our work of no effect, but may get your full reward.
target: Kan thawh chhuah sate kha in hloh loh va, a man chu a kima in hmuh theih zawk nan inveng tha rawh u.

source: And my people will be living in peace, in houses where there is no fear, and in quiet resting-places.
target: Tichuan ka mite chu ralmuanga awmnaah leh a nghet takahte leh chawlhna hmun muanawm takahte chuan an awm tawh ang.

source: I needed time
target: Hun ka mamawh

source: We've got it
target: Kan hria e

source: Children, do what is ordered by your fathers and mothers in the Lord: for this is right.
target: Naupangte u, Lalpaah chuan in nu leh in pate thu zawm rawh u; chu chu thil dik a ni si a.

source: It'll be bad
target: A ṭha dâwn lo

source: They may be wrong
target: An dik lo mai thei

source: At the voice of the Lord there is a shaking in the waste land, even a shaking in the waste land of Kadesh.
target: LALPA aw chuan thlalêr a nghawr nghing a; LALPA chuan Kadesh thlalêr chu a tinghing thin.

source: But if they go on in faith and love and holy self-control, she will be kept safe at the time of childbirth.
target: Nimahsela, rinna leh hmangaihna leh thianghlimna neiin, rilru fel tak nena an awm fo chuan fa hrin avangin chhandamin an awm ang.

source: And he made chains, like neck ornaments, and put them on the tops of the pillars, and a hundred apples on the chains.
target: Chu mi hmunah chuan khaidait a siam a, ban chipte chu a zem a; tin, pawmgranet za a siam a, khaidiatah chuan a khai a.

source: The heat of your wrath has gone over me; I am broken by your cruel punishments.
target: I thinrim nasa tak chuan mi vur pil a; I thil rapthlak takte chuan mi tiboral ta a.

source: As at the downfall of Sodom and Gomorrah and their neighbouring towns, says the Lord, no man will be living in it, no son of man will have a resting-place there.
target: Sodom leh Gomora leh a vêla khawpuit4e tihchhiata a awm ang bawkin, tumah an cheng tawh lo vang a, mihring fa tumah chutah chuan an awm ngai tawh lo vang, LALPAN a ti.

source: And he had no connection with her till she had given birth to a son; and he gave him the name Jesus.
target: nimahsela, fapa a hrin hma loh zawng a pawl lo; tin, a hmingah ISUA a sa ta a.

source: And he made altars in the house of the Lord, of which the Lord had said, In Jerusalem will my name be for ever.
target: Tin, Jerusalem-ah kumkhuain ka hming a awm ang, LALPAN a tihna LALPA ina chuan maichâmte a siam a.

source: This wasn't intended
target: Hei hi tum a ni lo

source: Wrath is cruel, and angry feeling an overflowing stream; but who does not give way before envy?
target: Thinurna chu a râwng a, thinrimna chu a so va; Mahse itsikna chu tunge tuar zo awm?

source: You had me completely fooled.
target: Min bum vek tawh.

source: We're all frightened
target: Kan hlau vek tawh

source: May a man be upright before God? or a man be clean before his Maker?
target: Pathian hmaah mihring thi thei a fel tawk êm ni? A siamtu hmaah mihring a thianghlim tawk êm ni?

source: God's wrath may not be turned back; the helpers of Rahab were bent down under him.
target: Pathianin a thinrimna a sun lo vang a, Rahab puitute a hnuaiah an kun a.

source: Fathers are not to be put to death for their children or children for their fathers: every man is to be put to death for the sin which he himself has done.
target: Fate avangin pate tihhlum tur a ni lo va, pate avangin fate tihhlum tur a ni hek lo; mi tin, mahni sual avang theuhva tihhlum tur a ni.

source: And Ashan with its outskirts, and Beth-shemesh with its outskirts;
target: tin, Asan khuakhua a daivêlte nên, tin, Beth-semes khuakhua a daivêlte nên;

source: But to him who without working has faith in him who gives righteousness to the evil-doer, his faith is put to his account as righteousness.
target: Amaherawhchu hna thawk lova, Pathian ngaihsak lo, thiam chantirtu ring zawka rinna chu, ama felnaa ruat a ni.

source: Doing the Lord's work without pride, through all the sorrow and troubles which came on me because of the evil designs of the Jews:
target: thuhnuairawlh ber chung leh, Judaten mi phiar avanga mittui tla leh, thil hrehawm ka chunga tlate tuar chungin, Lalpa rawng ka bawl thin kha;

source: And the Lord sent great troubles on Pharaoh's house because of Sarai, Abram's wife.
target: Tin, LALPA chuan Abrama nupui Saraii avângin Pharaoa leh a chhûngte chu sawisakna namênin a sawisa ta lo va.

source: I was here
target: Hetah ka kal tawh

source: Tom will win.
target: Tom-a a chak ang.

source: Try again
target: Bei nawn rawh

source: For the king has faith in the Lord, and through the mercy of the Most High he will not be moved.
target: Lal chuan LALPA chu a ring si a, Chungnungbera ngilneihna avnaign a nghing lo vang.

source: Truly, blessing and mercy will be with me all the days of my life; and I will have a place in the house of the Lord all my days.
target: Matheilovin thatna leh ngilneihnain ka dam chhûng zawng hian mi zui zel ang a: Tichuan LALPA inah kumkhuain ka awm reng ang.

source: This was difficult
target: Hei hi a harsa hle

source: You have no part in this business, because your heart is not right before God.
target: Heng thu-ah hian i tel ve lo ve, chan pawh i nei hek lo; i rilru Pathian ngaihin a fel lo ve.

source: What are you asking us?
target: Eng nge min zawh?

source: Give your servant, then, a wise heart for judging your people, able to see what is good and what evil; for who is able to be the judge of this great people?
target: Chutichuan i mite rorêlsakna tûrin i chhiahhlawh hi hriatna thinlung pe ang che, a chhia leh a tha ka thliar theih nan; i mi heti zozai hi tuin nge rorêlsak thei ang le? a ti a.

source: I was amazed
target: Mak ka ti a nia

source: See, I have been testing you for myself like silver; I have put you through the fire of trouble.
target: Ngai teh u, ka tithianghlim che u a ni, nimahsela tangka tithianghlim angin a ni lo; hrehawmna rawhtuina meiah chuan ka fiah che u a ni.

source: They're not tired
target: An hah lêm lo

source: I put all my sorrows before him; and made clear to him all my trouble.
target: A hmaah ka mangan thu ka sawi a; A hmaah ka buaina ka hriattir thin.

source: And further, I gave them rules which were not good and orders in which there was no life for them;
target: Chu lo pawh, dan siam tha lo chu ka pe a, an nun lohna tûra thurêlte nên;

source: And you will put to flight those who are against you, and they will be put to death by your swords.
target: In hmêlmate chu in um ang a, in hmaah khandaiha thahin an awm ang.

source: I kept silent
target: Ka ngawi reng

source: You won't beat me.
target: Min hneh lo vang.

source: And the four beasts said, So be it. And the rulers went down on their faces and gave worship.
target: Tin, Thilnung palite chuan, Amen, an ti a. Upate pawh chuan bawkkhupin chibai an buk ta a.

source: And when did we see you wandering, and take you in? or without clothing, and give it to you?
target: Engtikah nge mikhuala kan hmuh chia kan thlen che? Saruaka kan hmuh chia puan kan sintir che?

source: And that you may take pride in being quiet and doing your business, working with your hands as we gave you orders;
target: Kan hrilh ang ngei che u khan phili ruai lovin mahni hna theuh nei tlatin mahni kut ngei hmangin hna thawk rawh u;

source: You're right
target: I dik e

source: Stand up straight
target: Ding nghil rawh

source: I want one
target: Pakhat ka duh

source: Take note and give ear to my words; and I will say what I have seen:
target: Mi ngaithla la, ka entir ang che, Ka hmuh chu ka puang dawn e:

source: Then they said, Do get directions from God for us, to see if the journey on which we are going will have a good outcome.
target: Tin, anni chuan a hnênah, Kan kalna tûrah hian kan hmuingil dawn nge dawn lo tih kan hriat theih nan Pathian min rawnsak teha ng che, an ti a.

source: As well as the Arabah, with the river Jordan as their limit, from Chinnereth to the Salt Sea, under the slopes of Pisgah to the east.
target: tin, Araba leh Jordan pawh ramri atan Kineret ațanga Pisga chhak lam pangper hnuaia Tuifinriat Al, Araba tuifinriat thlengin.

source: Mary convinced me
target: Mary chuan min tichiang a

source: Then the two men came down from the hill-country and went over and came back to Joshua, the son of Nun; and they gave him a complete account of what had taken place.
target: Chutichuan mi pahnihte chu an kir leh a, tlang ata chu an chhuk a, an kan a, Nuna fapa Josua hnen chu an va thleng a; an chunga thil thleng zawng zawng chu an hrilh a.

source: That the pride of the sinner is short, and the joy of the evil-doer but for a minute?
target: Mi suaksual hlimna chu a tawi a, Pathian hre lo mi lawmna chu Mit khap kar chauh a ni, tih hi?

source: I love movies
target: Ennâwm ka ngaina

source: Sami was looking
target: Sami chuan a en a

source: I drive.
target: Ka khalh.

source: And so it is said, The first man Adam was a living soul. The last Adam is a life-giving spirit.
target: Chutiang bawkin, Mihring hmasa ber Adama chu mi nung a lo ni, tih ziak a ni; Adama hnuhnung zawk chu nunna petu thlarau a lo ni a.

source: So the Jews said to the man who had been made well, It is the Sabbath; and it is against the law for you to take up your bed.
target: Chutichuan Judaten a dam taa hnenah chuan, Chawlhni a nih hi, i awngphah i lak a thiang lo ve, an ti a.

source: For it is kept secret from the eyes of all living, unseen by the birds of the air.
target: Thinlung zawng zawng mit lakah thup a ni a, Chungleng savate lakah khar tlat a ni.

source: And the Jew is not different from the Greek: for there is the same Lord of all, who is good to all who have hope in his name:
target: Juda leh Grik mite chu engah mah an danglam chuang si lo va, Lalpa pakhat an zaa chunga Lalpa a ni a, a lamtu apiangte chungah chuan thatna a ngah si thin a.

source: Draw a circle
target: Rinbial ziak rawh

source: Has he by whom your ears were planted no hearing? or is he blind by whom your eyes were formed?
target: Beng vuahtu chuan a hre lo vang êm ni? Mit siamtu chuan a hmu lo vang êm ni?

source: I overslept
target: Ka mu rei lûtuk

source: But so that you may see that the Son of man has authority for the forgiveness of sins on earth, (he said to the man,
target: Engpawh ni sela, khawvelah Mihring Fapain sual ngaihdam theihna a nei tih in hriat nan,’ zeng hnenah chuan

source: I saw him.
target: Amah ka hmu.

source: He who goes about talking of the business of others gives away secrets: so have nothing to do with him whose lips are open wide.
target: Mi kamtam tei vêl ruai chuan thurukte a tilang thin a; Chuvangin a ka zau taka ang chu pâwl suh.

source: I don't want a wife.
target: Nupui ka duh lo.

source: I am a nurse.
target: Nurse ka nia.

source: You have been helped
target: Ṭanpui i ni tawh

source: So have you now become to me; you see my sad condition and are in fear.
target: Ka chungah chutiang chauh chu in ni, Ka chhiat tawh in hmu a, in hlau va.

source: No one will make a feast for them in sorrow, to give them comfort for the dead, or put to their lips the cup of comfort on account of their father or their mother.
target: Lusunte chu an mitthi ngai thlamuan tûrin tuman ei tûr an hlui lo vang a, an nu emaw an pa emaw avâng pawhin hnemna no in tûr tuman an hun lo vang.

source: And there came a poor widow, and she put in two little bits of money, which make a farthing.
target: Tin, hmeithai rethei te a lo kal a, dar tangka dere pahnih a thlak a chu chu pawisa pakhat hu a ni.

source: Did you want to drive?
target: I khalh duh em?

source: I heard from them
target: An hnen atangin ka hria a

source: Evil men have no knowledge of what is right; but those who go after the Lord have knowledge of all things.
target: Mi tha lo chuan rorêl an hre thiam thin lo va; LALPA zawngtute erawh chuan engkim an hre thiam thin.

source: But no one is able to go into the house of the strong man and take his goods, without first putting cords round the strong man, and then he will take his goods.
target: Tuman mi chak ina lutin a sum chu an laksak thei thin lo, mi chak chu an phuar hmasak zet loh chuan; chu mi hnuah erawh chuan a in chu an ramsak mai ang.

source: Who's hungry
target: Tunge ril ṭam

source: It's been fun to watch.
target: En nuam tak a ni.

source: He is telling a lie.
target: Dawt a sawi a ni.

source: After these things, when the king's feelings were calmer, the thought of Vashti and what she had done and the order he had made against her, came back to his mind.
target: Chung thil hnuah lal Ahasuera thinrim chu a la daih hnu chuan Vasti leh a thiltih leh a chungchanga thupêk chu a hre chhuak a.

source: Who stood?
target: Tunge ding?

source: Man's breath goes out, he is turned back again to dust; in that day all his purposes come to an end.
target: A thawin a chuahsan a, ani chu a leilungah a kir leh a; Chu mi ni ngei chuan a ngaihtuahnate chu a bo nghal a ni.

source: Are we in trouble?
target: Harsatna kan tawk em?

source: I'm early.
target: Ka hma lutuk.

source: You don't have the time.
target: Hun i nei lo.

source: Little is needed, or even one thing only: for Mary has taken that good part, which will not be taken away from her.
target: thil pakhat chauh a pawimawh e; Marin chan tha chu a thlang a, chu chu laksak tur a ni lo ve, a ti a, a chhang a.

source: So that he is fully able to be the saviour of all who come to God through him, because he is ever living to make prayer to God for them.
target: Chutichuan, amaha Pathian hnena lo kalte chu a tawpkhawk thlengin a chhandam thei bawk a ni, anmahni tawngtaisak turin chatuana a nun reng avangin.

source: I am a city mouse.
target: Khawpui mouse ka ni.

source: I hate sushi
target: Sushi ka hua

source: I agree
target: Ka pawm chiah mai

source: Cedar-trees are the pillars of our house; and our boards are made of fir-trees.
target: Kan in khanchhukte chu sidar thing, Kan inchhunte fâr thing lo ni e.

source: And let him be turned from evil and do good; searching for peace and going after it with all his heart.
target: Sual hawisanin Thil tha ti rawh se; Remna zawngin Um zel rawh se.

source: For as in Adam death comes to all, so in Christ will all come back to life.
target: Adama-ah chuan mi zawng zawng an thi thin ang hian Krista-ah chuan mi zawng zawng tihnunin an awm bawk ang.

source: Help him
target: Amah ṭanpui rawh

source: Take your seat
target: Lo thu rawh

source: So the kingdom of Jehoshaphat was quiet, for the Lord gave him rest on every side.
target: Tichuan Jehosaphata ram chu ralmuangin a awm ta a; a Pathianin an vela mite laka ralmuanna a pêk avângin.

source: And your children will be wanderers in the waste land for forty years, undergoing punishment for your false ways, till your bodies become dust in the waste land.
target: In fate chu thlalerah kum sawmli an tei an tei ang a, thlalera in ruangte a riral hma loh chuan in nawhchizawrhna chu an tuar ang.

source: My cry has gone up to you; take me out of trouble, and I will be guided by your unchanging word.
target: Ka ko thin chia; mi chhandam ang che. Tichuan i thuhriattirte chu ka zawm dawn nia.

source: And if I go and make ready a place for you, I will come back again and will take you to be with me, so that you may be where I am.
target: Tin, in tanhmunka han siam chuan ka lo kir leh ang a, ka hnenah ka la ang che u; ka awmnaah nangni pawh in awm theih nan.

source: He has salvation stored up for the upright, he is a breastplate to those in whom there is no evil;
target: Mi tluangte tan finna dik a chhek khâwm thin a, Rinawm taka awm thinte tan phaw a ni;

source: I broke that
target: Ka tikeh a

source: Do you have an opinion
target: Ngaihdan i nei em

source: I know Boston
target: Boston ka hria

source: Give praise to him, all you his angels: give praise to him, all his armies.
target: A vântirhkoh zawng zawngte u, amah chu fak ula: A sipaiho zawng zawngte u, amah chu fak rawh u.

source: The Lord has made an oath, and will not take it back. You are a priest for ever, after the order of Melchizedek.
target: LALPAN chhia a hcham a, a lamlet tawh lo vang, Nang zawng Melkisedeka awm dang anga Chatuan Puithiam i ni e, tiin.

source: Men whose ideas are all false, who say that the coming back from the dead has even now taken place, overturning the faith of some.
target: chung mite chuan, Thawhlehna chu tunah pawh a ni tawh daih, tiin thutak kawng chu an kal kawisan a, mi thenkhatte rinna an tibo thin a.

source: If only God would give ear to me, and the Ruler of all would give me an answer! or if what he has against me had been put in writing!
target: Aw, mi bengkhawntu nei teh ula aw! En teh u, hei ka chhinchhiahna ka dah e, Engkimtitheian mi chhâng teh se Ka khingpuipan mi hekna a ziak chu nei teh ila aw!

source: Servants, take orders from your masters with all respect; not only if they are good and gentle, but even if they are bad-humoured.
target: Chhiahhlawhte u, ti dek hlirin in hotute thu thuin awm rawh u; mi tha leh mi nunnemte lakah chauh ni lovin, mi nunrawngte lakah pawh.

source: And when we came into Rome, they let Paul have a house for himself and the armed man who kept watch over him.
target: Tin, Rom khuaa kan luh chuan Paula chu a vengtu sipai hnenah amah chauhva awm an phal a.

source: O God, be lifted up higher than the heavens; let your glory be over all the earth.
target: Aw Pathian, nang hchu van khum daih khian chawimawiin lo awm ang che; I ropuina chu leilung zawng zawng chungah hian lo awm rawh se.

source: He likes my jokes.
target: Ka fiamthu te hi a duh khawp mai.

source: But as for me, my feet had almost gone from under me; I was near to slipping;
target: Nimahsela kei zawngin ka rap pelh thelh thelh a; Ka ke pente hi a tlei lek lek a ni.

source: Foot odour
target: Ke uih

source: Then the king of Babylon put the sons of Zedekiah to death before his eyes in Riblah: and the king of Babylon put to death all the great men of Judah.
target: Tin, Babulon lal chuan Riblah khuaah chuan ama mithmuh ngeiah chuan Zedekia fapate chu a that a, Babulon lal chuan Juda mi tha zawng zawng a that bawk a.

source: I was mugged
target: Min bei nasa

source: In the sin of the lips is a net which takes the sinner, but the upright man will come out of trouble.
target: Mi sual chu ama hmuia chhuak ngeiin a awk thin a, Mi felte erawh chuan buaina an pumpelh.

source: He has put down kings from their seats, lifting up on high the men of low degree.
target: An thutphaha lal thute chu a hnuk thla a. Hnam tlawmte chu a chawimawi ta a.

source: Grab him
target: Man rawh

source: I'm going to give them to you.
target: Ka pe dawn nia.

source: So that fountain was named, Fountain of Life and Vision: it is between Kadesh and Bered.
target: Chu mi avângin tuichhunchhuah chu Beer-lahai-roi vuah a ni ta a; Ngai teh, Kades leh Bered khaw inkârah a awm.

source: Keep in mind what the Lord your God did to Miriam on the way, when you came out of Egypt.
target: Aigupta ram ata in lo chhuahna kawnga LALPA in Pathianin Miriami chunga a tih dan kha hre reng rawh u.

source: But be you strong and let not your hands be feeble, for your work will be rewarded.
target: Nimahsela nangni zawng chak takin awm ula, inthlahdah su u, in thiltih man chu in hmu dâwn a ni, a ti a.

source: This was my condition, wasted by heat in the day and by the bitter cold at night; and sleep went from my eyes.
target: Hetiangin ka awm thîn; chhûna ni sâ leh zâna khaw vâwtin mi tihreawm êm êm thîn a; mut pawh ka hmu ngai thîn lo va.

source: It is true that circumcision is of use if you keep the law, but if you go against the law it is as if you had it not.
target: Dan zawmtu i nih chuan serhtan chu a sawt tak zet a ni; Dan bawhchhetu i nih erawh chuan i serhtan chu tan loh ang mai a lo ni tawh.

source: I bribed them
target: Ka tham a

source: And with a blow I will send your bow out of your left hand and your arrows falling from your right hand.
target: i kut veilam ata i thalngul chu ka titliak ang a, i kut ding lam ata i thalte chu ka tithla ang.

source: My heritage has become like a lion in the woodland to me; her voice has been loud against me; so I have hate for her.
target: Ka roluah tûr chu ramhnuai sakeibaknei ang a lo ni ta, Ka lakah a râwl a chhuah a, Chuvangin ka hua a ni.

source: I don't expect a lot.
target: Ka beisei tam lo.

source: Every male among the priests may take it for his food: it is most holy.
target: Puithiam chhûngkuaa mipa tawh phawt chuan chu mi chu an ei thei ang. Chu chu thil thinghlim tak a ni.

source: I'm not asleep, meh.
target: Ka muhil lo, meh.

source: All the ten bases were made in this way, after the same design, of the same size and form.
target: Chutiang vek chuan hunchhan sawmte chu a siam a: a vai chuan pumkhata chhun a ni theuh va, intiat thiau, siam dan inang chiah vek a ni.

source: I said maybe
target: Maithei ka ti

source: He failed to take the exam.
target: Exam a la zo lo.

source: And their land is full of silver and gold, and there is no end to their stores; their land is full of horses, and there is no end to their carriages.
target: An ram chu tangka leh rangkachakin a khat a, an sumte chu chhiar sen rual a ni hek lo; an ram chu sakawrin a khat a, an tawlailirte chu chhiar sen rual a ni hek lo.

source: One generation after another will give praise to your great acts, and make clear the operation of your strength.
target: Chhuan khatin chhuan dang hnênah i thiltihte chu an fak chhawng zel ang a. I thiltih ropi takte chu an hriattir ang.

source: Do you have any others
target: Midang i nei em

source: Because of my envy of the men of pride, when I saw the well-being of the wrongdoers.
target: Mi suaksuate vanneihzia ka hmuhin, Mi uangthuangte chu ka awt si a.

source: You are like your father.
target: I pa ang i ni.

source: Will the river-plant come up in its pride without wet earth? will the grass get tall without water?
target: Dum lovah pumphir a to thei êm ni? Tui lovah phairuang a tha thei êm ni?

source: But be good to the sons of Barzillai the Gileadite, and let them be guests at your table; for so they came to me when I went in flight from Absalom your brother.
target: Gilead mi Barzilaia fate chungah erawh chhuan khawngaihna lantir langin, i dawhkana chaw kiltuah teltir ve ang che: i unau Absaloma laka ka tlanbo lai khan ka hnênah an lo kal si a.

source: They're not moving
target: An che thei lo

source: You, O Lord God of armies, are the God of Israel; come now and give punishment to the nations; have no mercy on any workers of deceit. (Selah.
target: Aw LALPA, sipaihote Pathian, Israelho Pathian, Nangmah ngei chu hnam tinreng talwh tûrin tho lo: Mi vervek sual takte rêng rêng chu khawngaih suh ang che. Selah

source: You've got me curious.
target: Mi i tih hrechak.

source: For he was a good man and full of the Holy Spirit and of faith: and a great number were joined to the Lord.
target: Barnaba chu mi tha tak a ni a, Thlarau Thianghlim leh rinnaa khat a ni. Tin, mi tam takin Lalpa hnenah an tel belhchhah ta a.

source: So the Lord sent against them the captains of the army of Assyria, who made Manasseh a prisoner and took him away in chains to Babylon.
target: Chuvang chuan LALPAN Asuria sipai hotute a tir a, Manasea chu khaidiatin an hling a, kawl an buntir a, Babulonah an kalpui ta a.

source: It's not Tom
target: Tom a ni lo

source: Now it is true that I am a near relation: but there is a relation nearer than I.
target: Tin, laichin inhnai kan ni ngei mai a, amaherawhchu keimah aia hnai zawk a awm a.

source: Let's try it
target: Tichhin ang

source: They'll be afraid
target: An hlau ang

source: You already know too much.
target: I hre tawh lutuk.

source: Will you, with him, make the skies smooth, and strong as a polished looking-glass?
target: Ani chu van i kaih pharhpui thei êm ni? Darthlalang chhun khal ang maia khauh chu?

source: For a great and important door there is open to me, and there are a number of people against me.
target: kawngka zau tak leh sawt tak ka tan a inhawng si a,dotute tam tak an awm bawk.

source: And you say, What knowledge has God? is he able to give decisions through the deep dark?
target: Pathianin eng nge a hriat? Thim chhah danah a rel thei êm ni?

source: Here is the end of the account. As for me, Daniel, I was greatly troubled by my thoughts, and the colour went from my face: but I kept the thing in my heart.
target: Hei hi thil tâwpna chu a ni. Kei Daniela hi ka ngaihtuahna te chuan mi tibuai a,ka hmêl a dâng a; mahse ka rilruin thu chu ka vawng reng a.

source: In the same way the second and the third, up to the seventh.
target: chutiang bawkin pahnihna chuan a ti a, pathumna chuan a ti bawk a, pasarihna thlengin an ti theuh va.

source: I like girls
target: Nulate ka duh

source: At his death, Jobab, the son of Zerah of Bozrah, became king in his place.
target: Tin, Bela chu a thi a, Bozra khuaa mi Zera fapa Jobaba a aiah a lal ta a.

source: Tell them to stop
target: Titawp turin hrilh rawh

source: Get me my glasses.
target: Ka glasses chu min rawn pe rawh.

source: An angry man is the cause of fighting, and a man given to wrath does much wrong.
target: Mi thinurin insualna a chawk chhuak a, Mi thinrimin bawhchhiatna a ngah thin.

source: For we are glad when we are feeble and you are strong: and this is our prayer, even that you may be made complete.
target: Keini kan chak loh lai pawha nangni in chak hian kan lawm thin asin; hei hi kan dil bawk thin, nangmahni that famkimna tur hi.

source: He has cedars cut down for himself, he takes an oak and lets it get strong among the trees of the wood; he has an ash-tree planted, and the rain gives it growth.
target: Sidar thingte a tan a kit a, țhil leh sasua a la a, ngaw thing zinga mi pakhat chu a puala awm tûrin a tinghet a: fâr kung a phun a, ruahin a chawm țhin.

source: Lord, by your grace you have kept my mountain strong: when your face was turned from me I was troubled.
target: LALPA, nangin i duhskna avângin ka tlâng chu i lo din nghehtir tawh a: Nimahsela i hmai i thup a, ka lo mangan tak kha.

source: You offspring of snakes, how are you, being evil, able to say good things? because out of the heart's store come the words of the mouth.
target: Rul thlahte u, nangnin, sual reng chungin, engtin nge thu tha in sawi theih ang? Thinlunga khat liam chu kain a sawi thin asin.

source: They were so heavy
target: An rit em em a

source: He is your God, the God of your praise, your God who has done for you all these works of power which your eyes have seen.
target: Amah chu in fak tura chu a ni, heng in mita inhmuh tak thil ropui takk leh râpthlâk takte tihsaktu che u in Pathian a ni.

source: So Ahab was put to rest with his fathers; and Ahaziah his son became king in his place.
target: Chutichuan Ahaba chu a pute hnêna chuan a muhil ta a; tin, a fapa Ahazia chu a aiawhin a lal ta a.

source: And Laban said, If you will let me say so, do not go away; for I have seen by the signs that the Lord has been good to me because of you.
target: Tin, Labana chuan a hnênah, Mi khawngaih tehih chuan la awm ta rih che: LALPA chuan nangma zâran mal mi sâwm tih aienin ka hria asin, a ti a.

source: I will make her happy.
target: Ka ti hlim ang.

source: That's it
target: Khati zawng kha

source: She cried.
target: A tap.

source: And the yellow one?
target: Tin, a sen kha?

source: If two men are fighting, and the wife of one of them, coming to the help of her husband, takes the other by the private parts;
target: Mi insual sela, a pakhat zawka nupui cuan a sualpui lak aa a pasal chhanchhuak turin a zahmawhah pawhsak sela,

source: I didn't go in right away.
target: Ka lut nghal lo.

source: He put on cursing like a robe, and it has come into his body like water, and into his bones like oil.
target: Kawrfuala inthuam angin ânchhe lawhnain a inthuam a, Chu chu a kawchhûngahte chuan tui angin a lut a, A ruhahte chuan hriak angin a lût bawk a.

source: I didn't run away
target: Ka tlanbo lo

source: These people give me honour with their lips, but their heart is far from me.
target: He miteho hian an kain mi chawimawi a, An thinlung erawh chuan mi hlat si a.

source: And will have him cut in two, and will give him a part in the fate of the false ones: there will be weeping and cries of sorrow.
target: bung hnihah a rawn chhuah ang a, mi vervekte chan ang a chantir ang; chutah chuan tah leh ha thial chu a awm ang.

source: And Korah made all the people come together against them to the door of the Tent of meeting: and the glory of the Lord was seen by all the people.
target: Tin, Kora chuan mipui zawng zawng chu anmahni dodalin inbiakna Puan In kawngkaah chuan a awmkhawmtir a: tin, mipui zawng zawng chungah chuan LALPA ropuina a lo lang a.

source: Now it was not clear to anyone at table why he said this to him.
target: Tin, dawhkan sira mite chuan tuman engtiziaa ti nge a nih an hre lo.

source: I drive
target: Ka khalh

source: And Hamor and his son they put to death with the sword, and they took Dinah from Shechem's house and went away.
target: Tichuan Hamora leh a fapa Sekema chu khandaih hriamin an that a, Sekema in ata Dinaii chu an hruai chhuak ta a.

source: And the fourth let what was in his vessel come out on the sun; and power was given to it that men might be burned with fire.
target: Tin, a palina chuan a berhbu chu niah a leih bua a; tichuan, ni chu meia mihring em ut turin thiltihtheihna an pe a.

source: I'm homesick
target: Inah ka dam lo

source: Ask an expert
target: Mithiam rawn rawh

source: I love Boston
target: Boston ka ngai

source: It is better to have faith in the Lord than to put one's hope in rulers.
target: Mi liante rin ai chuan LALPA-a rinna nghah hi a tha zawk a ni.

source: Let the fear of the Lord your God be in your hearts, and be his servants, taking your oaths by his name.
target: LALPA in Pathian chu in tih ang a, ama rawng chu in bawl ang a, a hming chhalin chia in chham tur a ni.

source: When I put on the clothing of grief, they said evil of me.
target: Ka silhfena saiip ka hman leh, An tan chhe lama tehkhinna ka lo ni zel a.

source: And in the fourth generation they will come back here; for at present the sin of the Amorite is not full.
target: Tin, chhuan linaah chuan hetah hian an lo kal leh ang; Amor-ho sualnate hi a la kim rih si lo, a ti a.

source: I must hide
target: Ka thuhruk a ngai

source: The God by whose strength the mountains are fixed; who is robed with power:
target: Thiltihtheihnaa taia inhrenga, Mahni chaknaa tlangte tinghet thintu chu i ni;

source: But on the first day of the week, at dawn, they came to the place where his body had been put, taking the spices which they had got ready.
target: Tin, Chawlhni chuan thupek angin an chawl ta a; ni sarih ni hmasa berah erawh chuan vartianah, englo rimtui an siamte chu kengin thlanah chuan an va kal a.

source: If men came to get your grapes, would they not let some be uncut on the vines? if thieves came by night, would they not make waste till they had enough?
target: Grêp lotute chu i hnênah an lo kalin, hmaih an nei dawn lawm ni? Zana rûkrute chuan an duh tawk ngah hma chu An rawk zel dawn lo vem ni?

source: We wouldn't risk it.
target: Kan risk lo ang.

source: And the poor man's head is bent, and the great man goes down on his face: for this cause there will be no forgiveness for their sin.
target: Mi tete chu tihhniamin an awm a, mi liante chu tihlawmin an awm bawk a: chuvângin anni chu ngaidam suh ang che.

source: The eighteenth Hanani, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi sâwm leh vawi riatna chu Hanana chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: And I will send to all my mountains for a sword against him, says the Lord: every man's sword will be against his brother.
target: Ka tlâng zawng zawngahte amah beina tûrin khandaih ka lam ang, mitin khandaih chuan a unaupa a do vang, tih hi LALPA PATHIAN thu chhuak a ni.

source: I wasn't finished
target: Ka zo lo

source: Not that I am looking for an offering, but for fruit which may be put to your credit.
target: Thilpek chu zawng ka ni lo va; rah, nangmahni lama pung tur chu zawng ka ni zawk e.

source: And then I left.
target: Tin, chutah chuan ka chhuak ta a.

source: Looking at the earth, I saw that it was waste and without form; and to the heavens, that they had no light.
target: Leilung chu ka han en a, ngai teh, Țiau leh ruakin a awm: Vante pawhin eng an nei lo.

source: They're your competition.
target: I inelna an ni.

source: I am a damage doer
target: Damage titu ka ni

source: Make yourself free, like the roe from the hand of the archer, and the bird from him who puts a net for her.
target: Sa peltu laka sakhi a tlan chhuak ang leh Sava vehtu laka sava a thlawk chhuak angin intichhuak rawh.

source: Though a sinner does evil a hundred times and his life is long, I am certain that it will be well for those who go in fear of God and are in fear before him.
target: Mi sual chuan vawi za pawh thil sual tiin dam rei bawk mah sela, Pathian tihtuten, amah ngei an tih avângin a tha tho vang tih ka hria:

source: Fight the illness
target: Natna chu do rawh

source: But he said with passion, If I have to be put to death with you, I will not be false to you. And they all said the same.
target: Ani erawh chuan nasa takin, I thihnaah chuan thi ve dawn mah ila ka phat tawp lo vang che, a ti chiam a. Tin, chutiang bawk chuan an ti ta theuh va.

source: She knit him a sweater.
target: Sweater a knit a.

source: It wouldn't happen.
target: A thleng lo vang.

source: These King David made holy to the Lord, together with the silver and gold which he had taken from the nations he had overcome--
target: chung chu ram dang a ngam zawng zawnga mi tangkarua leh rangkachak a hlante nen chuan lal Davidan LALPA hnênah a hlan bawk a:

source: They were sleeping
target: An muhil a

source: So he made the ark of the Lord go all round the town once: then they went back to the tents for the night.
target: Chutichuan LALPA bâwm chu khawpui vawikhat velin a han vel chhuahtir a; tin, riahhmunah chuan an kal a, riahhmunah chuan an riak leh ta a.

source: Then I took my other rod, the one named Bands, cutting it in two, so that the relation of brothers between Judah and Israel might be broken.
target: Chutichuan, Juda leh Israelte inkâra inunauna chu ka tihchah theih nân ka tiang dang pumkhatna ngei chu ka la a, ka tan chhum ta a.

source: You were eavesdropping
target: I ngaithla a ni

source: So Moses took the money, the price of those whose place had not been taken by the Levites;
target: Tin, Mosia chuan Levi-hovin an tlan baka an lanna sum chu a la a;

source: They are to put to death the offering for wrongdoing in the same place as the burned offering; and the priest is to put the blood on and round the altar.
target: Halral thilhlan an talh thinnaah bawh chhiat thawina pawh chu an talh tur ni: tin, a thisen chuan maichâm chu a theh vel tur a ni.

source: Do you like pizza
target: Pizza hi i duh em

source: Then Elkanah went to Ramah to his house. And the child became the servant of the Lord under the direction of Eli the priest.
target: Chutichuan Elkana chu Rama kuaah a inah chuan a haw ta a. Tin, naupang chuan puithiam Elia hmaan LALPA rawng chu a bawl ta a.

source: It's a Greek word.
target: Greek tawng a ni.

source: The rods are to be kept in the rings, and never taken out.
target: Chu bâwma khângah chuan zâwnfungte chu a invuah reng tûr a ni: phawi chhuah hlek tûr a ni lo ve.

source: But David took the strong place of Zion, which is the town of David.
target: Nimahela Davida chuan Zion kulh chu a la ta mial a, chu chu Davida khua a ni.

source: Please hurry!
target: Khawngaihin hmanhmawh rawh!

source: Everything was there
target: Engkim a awm vek a

source: And there were a number of lights in the room where we had come together.
target: Tin, pindan chungnung kan awm khawmnaah chuan khawnvar tam tak a awm a.

source: If there is division in a kingdom, that kingdom will come to destruction;
target: Ram pawh mahni a indo chuan, chu mi ram chu a ding chhuak thei lo vang.

source: Are you feeling nauseated
target: Nausen i nei em

source: I'm constantly studying.
target: Ka zir zel a.

source: He's a mixologist
target: Mixologist a ni a

source: His going out is from the end of the heaven, and his circle to the ends of it; there is nothing which is not open to his heat.
target: A chhuahna chu kawl kil tawp atangin a ni a, A tlan kualna chu a tawp lehlam thlengin a ni a, A lum hre lova thuhruk rêng rêng a awm lo.

source: They travel a lot
target: An zin nasa hle

source: Your silver is no longer true metal, your wine is mixed with water.
target: I tangka chu a ekchhiaah a lo chang ta a, i uain chu tui nen pawlh a lo ni ta.

source: And Moses said to God, Who am I to go to Pharaoh and take the children of Israel out of Egypt?
target: Tin, Mosia chuan Pathian hnênah, Kei Pharaoa hnêna kala, Israela thlahte Aigupta ram ata zuk hruai chhuaktu atân chuan tunge maw ka nih le? a ti a.

source: He loved to win.
target: Hneh a ngaina hle.

source: I had taken food.
target: Chaw ka ei tawh e.

source: And all his helpers round about him and all his armies I will send in flight to every wind; and I will let loose a sword after them.
target: Amah pui tûra a kianga awm țhinte leh a vêngtute zawng zawng ram tinah ka tidarh ang a, khandaih phawiin ka ûm ang.

source: Jesus said to her, Did I not say to you that if you had faith you would see the glory of God?
target: Isuan a hnenah, I rin chuan Pathian ropuizia i hmu ang, ka ti lo che em ni? a ti a.

source: I was disappointed
target: Ka beidawng a

source: He is not altogether a fool.
target: Mi â a ni vek lo.

source: And while Peter was down in the open square of the building, one of the servant-girls of the high priest came;
target: Tin, Petera chu hnuai lama in hual chhung kawtlaiah chuan a awm laiin Puithiam Lalber rawngbawltu nula zinga pakhat a lo kal a;

source: Let them be ever before the eyes of the Lord, so that the memory of them may be cut off from the earth.
target: Chungte chu LALPA hmaah awm fo rawh se. Ani chuan anmahni hriat rengna chu lei ata a tihboral theih nân.

source: I was paraphrasing
target: Ka paraphrase a

source: What're you hunting
target: Eng nge i man a

source: I am new here.
target: Hetah mi thar ka nia.

source: Be serious and keep watch; the Evil One, who is against you, goes about like a lion with open mouth in search of food;
target: Ngaihven ula, fimkhur rawh u; in khingpui Diabola chu sakeibaknei rum thin angin a ei theih tur zawngin a phi ruai thin;

source: So he put it before them, and they had a meal and there was more than enough, as the Lord had said.
target: Chutichuan a han hlui a, an ei a, LALPA tih ang ngeiin an ei bang bawk a.

source: And put oil on it and perfume: it is a meal offering.
target: Tin, hriak i leih ang a, a chhûnga beraw i dah tur a ni; chu chu chhangphut thilhlan a ni.

source: Dan will be the judge of his people, as one of the tribes of Israel.
target: Dana hian a mite chu, Israel hnam zînga hnam pakhat ni vein, ro a rêlsak ang.

source: They won't help you
target: An pui dawn lo che

source: When the sin which they have done comes to light, then let all the people give an ox for a sin-offering, and take it before the Tent of meeting.
target: chu thil tihsual chu hriat chhuah a nih veleh mipuiin sual thawi nan bawng tuai an hlan ang a, inbiakna puan in kawtah an rawn kai tur a ni.

source: Take this.
target: Hei hi la rawh.

source: Let's get started, OK?
target: I tan ang u, OK?

source: But let no man take of the bread and the cup without testing himself.
target: Chutichuan, mi mahni infiah chawp zawk rawh se, chutiangin chhang chu eiin no chu in rawh se.

source: Let's try to sleep.
target: Mut tum ila.

source: Then Moses and the responsible men of Israel gave the people these orders: Keep all the orders which I have given you this day;
target: Tin, Mosia leh Israel upate cuan mipuite chu, thupêk zawng zawng vawiina ka pêk che u hi pawm raw u.

source: Come now, you men of wealth, give yourselves to weeping and crying because of the bitter troubles which are coming to you.
target: Mi hausate u, ngai teh u khai! In chunga hrehawm lo thleng dawn mek avang chuan tap ula, chiau vak vak rawh u.

source: He's broke.
target: Pawisa a nei lo.

source: Identify Tom
target: Tom zawng rawh

source: Now on the day after the getting ready of the Passover, the chief priests and Pharisees came together to Pilate,
target: Tin, atukah chuan chu chu Inrinni zawh tuk a ni puithiam lalte leh Pharisaite chu Pilata hnenah an awm khawm huai a.

source: I didn't look up.
target: Ka hawi chho lo.

source: And the heaven over your heads will be brass, and the earth under you hard as iron.
target: In chung lama in van chu dar a ni ang a, in hnuai lama lei chu thir a ni ang.

source: I dug a pit.
target: Khur ka lai.

source: Do not be a hard master to him, but have the fear of God before you.
target: Rura takina lakah I awm tur a ni lo va, I Pathian hu I tih tur a n zawk.

source: And journeying on again from Oboth, they put up their tents in Iye-abarim, in the waste land before Moab looking east.
target: Tin, Oboth ațang chuan an kal leh a, ni chhuahna lam Moab thlaler bul Ieyabarim-ah awmhmun an khuar a.

source: Ghosts exist
target: Ramhuai an awm

source: Lord, where are your earlier mercies? where is the oath which you made to David in unchanging faith?
target: Lalpa, i hman lai khawngaihna i rinawmnaa Davida hnêna chhechhama i tiamte kha, Khawiahnge a awm tak?

source: I prayed
target: Ka tawngtai

source: And Zebah and Zalmunna went in flight; and he went after them, and took the two kings of Midian, Zebah and Zalmunna, and put all the army to the curse.
target: Tin, Zeba leh Zalmuna chu an tlânchhe ta a; tin, ani chuan a um a; tichuan Midian-ho lal pahnih Zeba leh Zalmuna chu a man a, sipaiho zawng zawngte chu a tibuai ta nuai nuai a.

source: Everything's better
target: Engkim a ṭha zâwk

source: He provided them with food.
target: Chaw a pe a.

source: I am full
target: Ka ei kham e

source: Kidney stone
target: Kal lungte awm

source: I work.
target: Ka thawk.

source: Then Tiglath-pileser, king of Assyria, came to him, but was a cause of trouble and not of strength to him.
target: Tin, Suria lal Tilgath-pilnesera a hnênah a kal a, tihchak ahnekin a timangang zawi a.

source: Among those who have been put to the sword: they will give a resting-place with them to all their people.
target: Khandaiha thah tawhte zîngah chuan an tlû ang a, khandaih hnênah pêk an ni tawh a, amah leh a mi zawng zawngte chu hnûk bo rawh u.

source: I can guess it.
target: Ka ring thiam mai e.

source: He took his people out with silver and gold: there was not one feeble person among them.
target: Tichuan, tangka leh rangkachak nên a hruai chhuak ta a: Anma hnamte zingah chuan mi chak lo pakhat mah an awm lo.

source: Be merciless
target: Khawngaihna lantir suh

source: I wasn't trying to show off.
target: Inlan ka tum lo.

source: The seven fat cows are seven years, and the seven good heads of grain are seven years: the two have the same sense.
target: Bâwng pasarih tha tak takte chu kum sarih an ni a; vui sarih tha tak takte chu kum sarih an ni bawk: mumang chu hmun khat a ni.

source: I didn't get much sleep.
target: Ka muhil tam lo.

source: Your worshippers will see me and be glad; because my hope has been in your word.
target: Nangmah tihtute chuan mi hmu ang a, an lawm ang; I thu chu ka beisei thin avângin.

source: I don't swim
target: Ka hleuh lo

source: Then Joshua got up early in the morning, and, moving on from Shittim, he and all the children of Israel came to Jordan and were there for the night before going over.
target: Tin, Josua chu zing takah a tho va, Israel thlahte zawng zawng nen chuan Sitim hmun ata chu an insuan a, Jordan lui an va thleng a: an kai hmain chutah chuan an riak a.

source: You take the money
target: Pawisa chu i la a

source: You are not logged in.
target: I lo lut lo a ni.

source: It's so nice
target: A ṭha lûtuk

source: Everything's great
target: Engkim a ropui vek

source: Then I came to those who had been taken away as prisoners, who were at Telabib by the river Chebar, and I was seated among them full of wonder for seven days.
target: Tichuan Telabiba sal tângho, Kebar luia chengte hnen chu ka thleng a, an țhutnaah chuan ka țhu a; mak ti takin tah chuan ni sarih ka țhu ta a.

source: They are all heated like an oven, and they put an end to their judges; all their kings have been made low; not one among them makes prayer to me.
target: Thuk ang maiin an sa vek a, an rorêltute an tiboral a; An lalber apiangte chu an tlu a, An zîngah tumah mi au an awm lo.

source: Tom isn't there yet.
target: Tom a la awm lo.

source: And Moses put the rods before the Lord in the Tent of witness.
target: Tichuan Mosian thuhriattirnaa puan inah LALPA hmaah tiangte chu a dah a.

source: I have a kid
target: Naute ka nei

source: Keep still
target: Ding rawh

source: And at Achmetha, in the great house of the king in the land of Media, they came across a roll, in which this statement was put on record:
target: Tichuan Medai rama Akametha khuaa lal inah lehkhabu zial an hmu a, chutah chuan vawn that atân hetianga ziak hi a awm a:

source: Make prayer to the Lord; for there has been enough of these thunderings of God and this ice-storm; and I will let you go and will keep you no longer.
target: LALPA hnênah ngên rawh u; hêng khawpui ri dur durte leh rialte hi a tawk tawh e; tichuan ka chhuahtîr ang che u a, in awm tawh lo vâng e, a ti a.

source: They are sent out from among their townsmen, men are crying after them as thieves
target: Mihring zing ata hnawh bovin an awm a, Rukru angin an au zui a.

source: Which is a clear sign of the decision which God in his righteousness has made; to give you a part in his kingdom, for which you have undergone this pain;
target: chung chu Pathian rama mi ni tlaka ruat in ni thei dawn tih, Pathian rorel fel tak chhinchhiahna fiah tak a ni, chu mi ram avanga tuar in nih hi;

source: Wisdom has her resting-place in the mind of the wise, but she is not seen among the foolish.
target: Ngaihthiamna nei mi thinlungah chuan finna a cheng thin a. Mi â chhûng lama awm erawh chu alang sa reng.

source: Salt is good; but if the taste goes from it, how will you make it salt again? Have salt in yourselves, and be at peace one with another.
target: Chi hi a tha e; nimahsela, chi pawh hi a dak tawh chuan engin nge an tihal leh ang? Nangmahni ngeiah chi nei ula, inngeih rawh u, a ti a.

source: I paused
target: Ka chawl lawk

source: Let a man give attention not only to what is good for himself, but equally to his neighbour's good.
target: Tupawhin mahni thatna tur zawng lovin mi dang thatna tur zawng zawk rawh se.

source: Why are you looking with envy, you high hills, on the hill desired by God as his resting-place? truly, God will make it his house for ever.
target: Tlâng sâng takte u, Pathianin a awmna tûra a tlâng duh chu Engah nge itsika in melh ni? A ni, LALPA chu chutah chuan kumkhuain a awm reng dawn asin.

source: I don't cry
target: Ka ṭap lo

source: From his store-house the Lord has taken the instruments of his wrath: for the Lord, the Lord of armies, has a work to do in the land of the Chaldaeans.
target: LALPA chuan a râlthuam bâwm a hawng ta, A thinurna hriamhreite chu a la chhuak ta, LALPA, Sipaihote LALPA chuan Kaldaite ramah tih tûr a nei.

source: And again he went out from Tyre, and came through Sidon to the sea of Galilee, through the country of Decapolis.
target: Tin, Tura ram atangin a chhuak leh a, Sidon khua tlawhin Dekapoli ram kal tlang zelin Galili dil chu a thleng ta a.

source: And make holy robes for Aaron your brother, so that he may be clothed with glory and honour.
target: Tin, i u Arona tân silhfen thianghlim, tiropuitu a tân leh timâwitu a tân i siam tur a ni.

source: All my haters are talking secretly together against me; they are designing my downfall.
target: Mi hawtute zawng zawng chuan mi hekna thu sesein an la a: Mi tihchhiatna tûr an suangtuah thin.

source: It's warm.
target: A lum.

source: Then Benjamin came back; and they gave them the women whom they had kept from death among the women of Jabesh-gilead: but still there were not enough for them.
target: Tin, chu veleh chuan Benjamin-ho chu an kir ta a; tin, Jabes-gilead rama hmeichheho an zuahte chu an pe a: chuti chung pawhin an la indaih ta l va.

source: From there he went up against the people of Debir: (now the name of Debir before that was Kiriath-sepher.
target: Tin, chu tang chuan Debir khuaa mite a han run a; a hma chuan Debir khaw hming chu Kiriath-sepher a ni.

source: She is incapable of deceit
target: Bumna thei lo a ni

source: There's no secret about it.
target: Thuruk a awm lo.

source: Now do not be troubled or angry with yourselves for sending me away, because God sent me before you to be the saviour of your lives.
target: Nimahsela heta kal tûra mi hralh avâng hian lungngai suh ula, mahni inhaw duh hek suh u: mite nunna chhandam tûrin Pathianin in hmaah mi lo tîr hmasa a nih hi.

source: I'm skinny
target: Ka cher a

source: I still swim.
target: Ka la hleuh ṭhin.

source: What a man you are!
target: Mipa i va ni em!

source: Is it hard to fool you
target: Bum che a harsa em

source: You let men go driving over our heads; we went through fire and through water; but you took us out into a wide place.
target: Mihringte, tawlailir chunga chuangin, kan lu chungah i kaltir a; Mei leh tui kan kal tlâng a; Nimahsela hmun chenghnawng taka lût tûrin min hruai chhuak a.

source: I remember very well.
target: Ka hre lutuk e.

source: Who is there
target: Khatah tunge awm

source: Don't procrastinate
target: Tikhawtlai suh

source: I am for my loved one, and my loved one is for me; he takes food among the lilies.
target: Ka duhtak ta chu ka ni a, ka duh tak chu ka ta a ni: A ran rual tlattir thin kha, lili pâr zingah.

source: I can't ski
target: Ka thleng thei lo

source: But on hearing this he said, Those who are well have no need of a medical man, but those who are ill.
target: Nimahsela, Isuan chu chu a hriat veleh, Mi chakte chuan daktawr an ngai lo va, mi bawrhsawmte zawkin an ngai a ni.

source: I didn't back off
target: Ka hnungtawlh lo

source: Then there was a great outcry from the people and their wives against their countrymen the Jews.
target: Chutichuan mipuite leh an nupuite chu an unau Judate chunga phunnawiin an au ta mur mur mai a.

source: I love garlic
target: Purunvar ka duh

source: It was a crazy game.
target: Game â tak a ni.

source: For this reason I put things into the form of stories; because they see without seeing, and give ear without hearing, and the sense is not clear to them.
target: Chutih avang chuan tehkhin thuin an hnenah ka sawi a ni; hmu mah sela an hmuh thin loh va, bengin hre mah sela an hriat thin loh va, a ngaihna pawh an hriat thin loh avangin.

source: Great are the troubles of the upright: but the Lord takes him safely out of them all.
target: Mi fel hreawmnate chu a tam a, Nimahsela LALPAN chung zawng zawngah chuan a chhan chhuak thin a.

source: Be pleased, O Lord, to take me out of danger; O Lord, come quickly and give me help.
target: Aw LALPA, khawngaih takin mi chhanhim la: Aw LALPA, mi tanpui tûrin hmanhmawh ang che.

source: I don't think it will be.
target: A nih ka ring lo.

source: Among the children of Israel I will make my living-place, and I will be their God.
target: Tichuan Israela thlahte zîngah chuan ka chêng ang a, tin, an PATHIAN ka ni ang.

source: The bar is closed.
target: Bar chu a khar a.

source: Did Tom know?
target: Tom'an a hria em?

source: You yourselves are our letter, whose writing is in our heart, open for every man's reading and knowledge;
target: Nangni hi kan lehkha, kan thinlunga ziak, mi zawng zawng hriat leh chhiar chu in ni e:

source: I have become the sport of all the peoples; I am their song all the day.
target: Ka mite zawng zawng tan nuihzabûr ka lo ni ta, nilenga an hla nên.

source: You may say, My way is clean, and I am free from sin in your eyes.
target: Ka rin dan hi a dik a, I mithmuhah ka thiang a sin,' i ti si a.

source: Do they know about each other
target: An inhriat tawn em

source: And took them out and said, Sirs, what have I to do to get salvation?
target: tin, anni chu a hruai chhuak a, Pute u, chhandama awm turin engnge ka tih tur? a ti a.

source: For I have come down from heaven, not to do my pleasure, but the pleasure of him who sent me.
target: Mahni duhzawng ti turin van atanga lo chhuk ka ni lo va, mi tirtu duhzawng ti tura lo chhuk ka ni zawk e.

source: So death came to Moses, the servant of the Lord, there in the land of Moab, as the Lord had said.
target: Chutichuan LALPA chhiahhlawh Mosia chu a LALPA thu angin Moab ramah chuan a thi ta a.

source: A disciple is not greater than his master, or a servant than his lord.
target: Zirtir a zirtirtu chungah a awm lo; bawi pawh a pu chungah a awm hek lo.

source: I am living in a strange land: do not let your teachings be kept secret from me.
target: Leiah hian mikhual ka ni a: I thupêkte chu ka lakah zep suh ang che.

source: Let their table before them be for their destruction; let their feasts become a net to take them.
target: An hmaa an dawhkan chu thang lo ni sela; Thlamuang taka an awm laiin fal lo ni rawh se.

source: I left a note.
target: Thuziak them ka hnutchhiah.

source: When you were still small in number, and strange in the land;
target: Mi tlemte chauh in nih a,A ni, tlem te, khuazin ang mai in nih lai kha;

source: The prophets, who were before me and before you, from early times gave word to a number of countries and great kingdoms about war and destruction and disease.
target: Keimah leh nangma hmaah hmasâng zâwlneite chuan ram tam takte chungah leh lalna ram ropui takte chungah indona te, thil țha lo te, leh hripui thute an sawi țhin a.

source: They never existed
target: An awm ngai lo

source: It's so rare
target: A vang lûtuk

source: Good afternoon, Sir.
target: Ka Pu, chibai.

source: I'm feeling a little woozy.
target: Ka woozy deuh a.

source: You do. I do.
target: I ti ve tho. Ka ti e.

source: And the good things of the fruits of the sun, and the good things of the growth of the moons,
target: Ni rah chhuah thil hlu tein, Thlaten thil hlu a chhuah tein,

source: Symeon has given an account of how God was first pleased to take from among the Gentiles a people for himself.
target: Pathianin ama hming pu atan an zing ata mite la chhuak turin Jentailte a kan tan tirh dan thu chu Sumeona hian a sawi ta a.

source: I don't burn them.
target: Ka hal ngai lo.

source: Turn it over
target: Keu rawh

source: Saying, Put not your hand on those who have been marked with my holy oil, and do my prophets no wrong.
target: Ka hriak thihate chu tawk suh ula, Ka zâwlneite pawi rêng rêng pawh khawih suh u, tiin.

source: Have you finished yet?
target: I la zo tawh em?

source: Though I had them planted among the peoples, they will keep me in mind in far countries: and they will take care of their children and will come back.
target: Ram dang dangah ka phun darh a, Ram hla takah pawh min hre reng ang; Tin, an fate nên an awm ang a, an lo kîr leh ang.

source: Do not take only water as your drink, but take a little wine for the good of your stomach, and because you are frequently ill.
target: Tui chauh in mi ni tawh suh la, i pum avang leh i dam loh fo avangin uain tlem te hmang thin ang che.

source: You were so sweet.
target: I thlum em em a.

source: I saw it
target: Ka hmu kha

source: The Lord will keep all his worshippers from danger; but he will send destruction on all sinners.
target: LALPA chuan amah hmangaihtute zawng zawng chu a vawng tha thin a; Mi suaksual erawh chu a tiboral vek ang;

source: I obeyed
target: Ka thuawi

source: You are good, O Lord, and full of forgiveness; your mercy is great to all who make their cry to you.
target: LALPA, nang chu i tha a, ngaihdam i peih a, A kotu apiang che chungah ngilneihna i ngah si thin a.

source: Are they criminals
target: Misual an ni em

source: He is thick-headed
target: Lu thuk tak a ni

source: And they gave attention to him, because for a long time his wonder-working powers had kept them under his control.
target: A dawi hmangin rei tak mak ti taka a siam thin avangin a thu an ngaihsak thin a ni.

source: Off with their heads
target: An lu nen off

source: I doubt that
target: Ka ringhlel deuh

source: Catch your breath.
target: I thawk la rawh.

source: Darius was pleased to put over the kingdom a hundred and twenty captains, who were to be all through the kingdom;
target: Daria chuan ram awp tûra thuneitu za leh sawmhnih, ram pumpuia dah darh chu țha a ti a;

source: Did you record it?
target: I record tawh em?

source: She had a facelift.
target: Facelift a nei a.

source: There were no fatalities
target: Thihna an awm lo

source: I designed it.
target: Ka siam a nia.

source: And there they will put all the army of Gog in the earth. So they will make the land clean.
target: Tin, Hamon-ah chu khawpui hming a ni ang. Chutiang chuan ram an thian fai ang.

source: They're getting away with it
target: An tlanbo mek a ni

source: We're doing it together.
target: Kan ti dun a ni.

source: And put your gold in the dust, even your gold of Ophir among the rocks of the valleys;
target: I rote chu vaivutah dah la, Ophir rangkachakte chu luite lung zingah dah rawh.

source: Make me full of joy and rapture; so that the bones which have been broken may be glad.
target: Hlimna leh lawmna chu bengin mi hriattir ang che; I ruh tihtliahte hi a hlim theih nân.

source: Brace yourselves
target: Inbuatsaih rawh u

source: Let's talk outside
target: Pawnah sawi ila

source: Then the secret was made clear to Daniel in a vision of the night. And Daniel gave blessing to the God of heaven.
target: Tin, chu thi inthup chu zân inlârnaah Daniela hnênaah a lang ta a. Tin, Daniela chuan vân pathian chu a fak a.

source: And Nebuchadnezzar took away some of the vessels of the Lord's house, and put them in the house of his god in Babylon.
target: Nebukadnezara chuan LALPA in bungbêlte pawh Babulon-ah a la a, Babulon-a a pathian biak inah a dah a.

source: The fourteenth Mattithiah, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi sâwm leh vawi lina chu Matithia chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: I'm powerful
target: Thil ka tithei

source: Give me a hug
target: Mi rawn kuah rawh

source: I'm beginning to hate her.
target: Ka huat tan ta.

source: Stop whining
target: Rum tawh suh

source: Put the question now to the past generations, and give attention to what has been searched out by their fathers:
target: Hman lai hun kha zawt chhuak teh aw, An pi pute hmuh chhuah kha ngaihtuah teh,

source: I canceled it
target: Ka ti tâwp

source: What do you want?
target: Engnge I duh?

source: Now the Lord, seeing that Leah was not loved, gave her a child; while Rachel had no children.
target: Tin, LALPA chuan Leaii chu huatin a awm tih a hria a, tichuan a chhûl a hawnsak a: Rakili erawh chu a ching a.

source: Ahishar was controller of the king's house; Adoniram, the son of Abda, was overseer of the forced work.
target: Ahisara chu in chhûng lam hotu ani a; Abda fapa Adonirama chu hnathawka rawih luihte hotu a ni.

source: I'm not going to be there.
target: Ka awm dawn lo.

source: We're waiting, Tom.
target: Kan nghak a, Tom.

source: I was waiting for your words, I was giving ear to your wise sayings; while you were searching out what to say,
target: Ngai teh u, in thu ka nghak reng a, Sawi tûr in dap thleng khan, In tan danah beng ka lo chhi reng a.

source: You're vague
target: I lem êm mai

source: The Lord is my great helper: I will see my desire against my haters.
target: LALPA chu ka lama tang, mi tanpuitute zinga mi a ni: Chuvangin mi hawtute chungah ka thu duhsam chu ka hmu ang.

source: The way in which his hand came to be lifted up against the king was this: Solomon was building the Millo and making good the damaged parts of the town of his father David;
target: Lal chunga akut a rawn lek chhan chu hetiang hi a ni: Solomonan Milo a siam a, a pa Davida khua chu a chhe lai te a siam tha a.

source: Him then I am hoping to send as quickly as possible, when I am able to see how things will go for me:
target: Chutichuan,ka chanchin tur ka hriat veleh ani hi rawn tir nghal ila ka ti a ni.

source: You're bored, aren't you?
target: I bo a ni lawm ni?

source: They obeyed orders.
target: Thupek an zawm a.

source: And while they were looking up to heaven with great attention, two men came to them, in white clothing,
target: Tin, a chhoh laia van lam an en reng laiin mi pahnih, puan var sinin, an kiangah an lo ding a;

source: We lost.
target: Kan tibo.

source: The wise workman makes selection of the mulberry-tree of the offering, a wood which will not become soft; so that the image may be fixed to it and not be moved.
target: Chutiang thilpek pe zo lo ve rethei lutuk chuan thing mawih lo tûr a thlang țhin; milem siam chawp, nghing lo tûr, atâna dinsaktu tûr themthiam mi â zawngt țhin.

source: By faith Moses was kept secretly by his father and mother for three months after his birth, because they saw that he was a fair child; and they had no fear of the king's orders.
target: Rinnain Mosia a pian lai khan, nausen hmel tha tak a ni an tih avangin, thla thum chhung a nu leh a pa thurukin a awm a; lal thupek pawh an hlau lo.

source: You will not be ready.
target: I inpeih lo vang.

source: Are you sure
target: I chiang em

source: She's eating him.
target: A ei a ni.

source: I shivered
target: Ka khur der der

source: Do you take trips often?
target: Trip i nei fo em?

source: And if you say, Good day, to your brothers only, what do you do more than others? do not even the Gentiles the same?
target: Tin, in unaute chauh chibai in buk hian engnge in tih hnem chuan bik? Jentailte pawhin chutiangin an ti ve lawm ni?

source: Up to now you have made no request in my name: do so, and it will be answered, so that your hearts may be full of joy.
target: Tun thlengin ka hmingin engmah in la dil lo; dil rawh u, tichuan in hmu ang, in lawm a kimna turin.

source: The evil-doers are not so; but are like the dust from the grain, which the wind takes away.
target: Mi suaksualte erawh chu chutiang an ni lo va; Buhsi thliin a lenbo ang hi an ni zawk.

source: Because the Lord was not able to take this people into the land which he made an oath to give them, he sent destruction on them in the waste land.
target: LALPA chuan heng mipuite hi chhechhma a tiam ramah chuan a hruai theih loh vangin thlalerah a tihlum ni,' tiin an sawi dah ang e,

source: I feel young
target: Ka naupan hmel

source: I improvised
target: Ka phuahchawp vek

source: By whom he went to the spirits in prison, preaching to those
target: chu chuan tan ina thlarau awmte hnenah chuan thu a zuk tlangaupui a,

source: Then his face will be turned to the strong places of his land: but his way will be stopped, causing his downfall, and he will not be seen again.
target: Tichuan, ama ram ngei kulhte lam chu a hawi leh ang a, mahse a petek in a tlu ang a, hmuh zawh a ni tawh lo vang.

source: But the word is very near you, in your mouth and in your heart, so that you may do it.
target: In zawm theih nan thu chuan a hnaih hle che u a, in kaah leh in thinlungah a awm a ni.

source: A curse on the day of my birth: let there be no blessing on the day when my mother had me.
target: Ka pian chhuah nî chu ânchhe dawngin awm rawh se. Ka nuin mi hrin nî chu malsawmin awm suh se.

source: Have sorrow for the fields, the pleasing fields, the fertile vine;
target: Lo duhawmte avâng leh grêp hrui rah duh mi avâng chuan an awm an chum an chum ang.

source: If her father, hearing of her oath or the undertaking she has given, says nothing to her, then all her oaths and every undertaking she has given will have force.
target: a pain a thutiam emaw a intiamkamna emaw chu ahriat a, a ngawihsan mai chuan a thutiam emaw, a intiamkamna emaw chu a ti ngei tur a ni.

source: Do you go out a lot?
target: I chhuak nasa em?

source: And the work of righteousness will be peace; and the effect of an upright rule will be to take away fear for ever.
target: Tin, felna hnathawh chu remna a ni ang a, felnaa thil chhuak chu kumkhuaa muang taka awmna leh ring tlata awmna a ni ang.

source: Then Elijah said to Ahab, Up! take food and drink, for there is a sound of much rain.
target: Tichuan Elijan Ahaba hnênah, Han cho ta langin, eiin han in tawh rawh; ruahpui sur tûr thâwm a awm a nia, a ti a.

source: Is that it?
target: Kha kha a ni em?

source: They don't despise you
target: An hmusit lo che

source: And they will be building houses and living in them; planting vine-gardens and getting the fruit of them.
target: Tin, inte an sa ang a, chungah chuan an awm reng bawk ang; grêp huante an siam ang a, a rah an ei bawk ang.

source: And all the doors and windows had square frames, with the windows facing one another in three lines.
target: Tin, kawngkhâr leh ban zawng zawngte chu thingphelin kil lia siam a ni a: eng leh engte chu tlar thumin a inep vek a.

source: We're lost
target: Kan bo

source: He will be an upright guide to the poor in spirit: he will make his way clear to them.
target: Thuhnuairawlhte chu rorêlna felah a hruai ang a: Thuhnuairawlhte chu ama kawng chanchin a zirtir bawk ang.

source: He grows rice.
target: Buh a ching.

source: Are you a believer
target: Ringtu i ni em

source: And let them make division of it into seven parts: let Judah keep inside his limit on the south, and let the children of Joseph keep inside their limit on the north.
target: Tin, hmun sarihah an then phawt ang a: Juda-ho chu chhim lamah an chanpualah an awm ang a, tin, Josefa chhûngte chu hmar lamah an chanpualah an awm ang.

source: Whoever takes a man's life, by man will his life be taken; because God made man in his image.
target: Tupawh mihring thisen chhuahtu chu mihring vêkin ama thisen chu an chhuah ve tûr a ni: Pathian anpuiin mihring a siam si a.

source: He was of the sons of Perez, and the chief of all the captains of the army for the first month.
target: Ani chuan Pereza thlaha mi, thlakhatnaa sipai hotu zawng zawng hotu ber a ni.

source: At the cry, Babylon is taken! the earth is shaking, and the cry comes to the ears of the nations.
target: Babulon lak thawmah lei a nghing a, a țap thawm chu hnamte zingah hriat a ni ang.

source: I love hockey
target: Hockey ka ngaina

source: It was disturbing
target: A tibuai hle mai

source: They surrounded Tom
target: Tom chu an hual a

source: And he who takes an oath by the Temple, takes it by the Temple and by him whose house it is.
target: Tupawh Pathian biak in chhala chhechham apiang chuan, Pathian biak in leh a chhunga cheng chu chhalin chhia a chham thin.

source: He went to school
target: Sikul a kal a

source: Would you like to dance
target: Zai i duh em

source: They drank way too much
target: An in nasa lutuk

source: It's a masterwork
target: Masterwork a ni

source: For the Lord is our judge, the Lord is our law-giver, the Lord is our king; he will be our saviour.
target: LALPA chu kan rorêltu a ni a, LALPA chu dan min petu a ni a, LALPA chu kan lal a ni; ani chuan min chhandam ang.

source: Now the number of those who took up the water with their tongues was three hundred; all the rest of the people went down on their knees to the water.
target: Tin, an kut phaha mi a liaha liakte chu mi zthum an ni a, mi dang zawng zawngte chu kuna thingthia tui dawt vek an ni.

source: But when these words came to their ears, they were cut to the heart, and had a mind to put them to death.
target: Tin, anni chuan chung thu chu an hriatin an thin a khei ta em em a, tihhlum an tum ta a.

source: You're needy
target: I mamawh hmêl

source: Do you want it or not?
target: I duh nge duh lo?

source: It's not very polite.
target: A polite vak lo.

source: Get him some water.
target: Tui rawn pe rawh.

source: I love sports
target: Inkhelh ka ngaina

source: I'm not blaming you.
target: Ka dem lo che.

source: That good thing which was given to you keep safe, through the Holy Spirit which is in us.
target: Thil tha i hnena kawltira awm kha, kan chhunga Thlarau Thianghlim awm hianin vawng tha rawh.

source: And you will say, How was teaching hated by me, and my heart put no value on training;
target: Engtiziaa zirtirna chu ka lo huat a, Ka thinlungin zilhhauna chu lo ngainep nge maw ni aw?

source: Am I fat?
target: Ka thau em?

source: You're tidy
target: I felfai hle mai

source: I'm not asking for the moon.
target: Thla ka dil lo.

source: I am in Paris.
target: Paris-ah ka awm.

source: Look there
target: Khatah en rawh

source: Great peace have lovers of your law; they have no cause for falling.
target: I dan ngainatute chuan thlamuanna nasa tak an nei a, Tlukna rêng rêng an nei lo.

source: Let me out!
target: Ka chhuak duh!

source: Then Jacob took Rachel as his wife, and his love for her was greater than his love for Leah; and he went on working for Laban for another seven years.
target: Tin, Rakili chu a pâwl bawk a, Leaii ai chuan Rakili chu a hmangaih zâwk bawk a, Labana rawng chu kum sarih dang a bâwl leh ta a.

source: Still, I will be glad in the Lord, my joy will be in the God of my salvation.
target: Kalawm zel ang, LALPA-ah chuan, ka chhandamna pathianah chuan ka lâwm cheu dawn.

source: And the Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him who gives ear, say, Come. And let him who is in need come; and let everyone desiring it take of the water of life freely.
target: Thlarau leh mo chuan, Lo kal rawh, an ti a. A hria apiangin Lo kal rawh, ti rawh se. Tuihal apiang lo kal rawh se; a duh apiangin nunna tui hi athlawnin la rawh se.

source: I do think so.
target: Khatiang kha ka ring reng a.

source: And now your two sons who came to birth in Egypt before I came to you here, are mine; Ephraim and Manasseh will be mine, in the same way as Reuben and Simeon are.
target: Tin, i fapate pahnih, Aigupta rama i hnêna ka lo kal hmaa Aigupta rama i neihte hi ka ta an ni; Ephraima leh Mansea hi, Reubena leh Simeona ang bawkin ka ta an ni ang.

source: Am I welcome here?
target: Hetah hian ka lawm em?

source: Against whom have you said evil and bitter things? and against whom has your voice been loud and your eyes lifted up? even against the Holy One of Israel.
target: Tunge i tihhmingchhiata i sawichhiat ni? Tu chungah nge i aw i tihpawra i mit i tihsan? Israel ho Mi Thianghlim chung ngeiah.

source: I'll explain
target: Ka sawifiah ang

source: Then with the ox give a meal offering of three tenth parts of a measure of the best meal mixed with half a hin of oil.
target: bawngpa hlan rual chuan chhangphut thilhlan chhangphut dip mi epha hmun sawma țhena hmun thum, hriak hin chanvea hmeh in hlan tur a ni.

source: And after him, Ibzan of Beth-lehem was judge of Israel.
target: Tin, a hnuah chuan Beth-lehem khuaa mi Ibzanan Israel-ho chungah ro a rêl a.

source: They're still out there
target: An la chhuak zel a

source: Then he made a feast for them, and they all had food and drink.
target: Tin, ani chuan an tan ruai a thehsak a, tichuan an eiin an in ta a.

source: Let no evil talk come out of your mouth, but only what is good for giving necessary teaching, and for grace to those who give ear.
target: Thu tha lo reng in kaan chhuak suh se, a tulzia ang zela siam tha turin thu tha apiang chhuak zawk rawh se, a ngaithlatute tan khawngaihna a lo nih theih nan.
