source: And he has put all things under his feet, and has made him to be head over all things to the church,
target: Tin, thil engkim a ke hnuaiah a dah a, amah chu engkim zawng zawng chungah lu atan kohhranho hnenah chuan a pe a,

source: I can remember it.
target: Ka hre reng thei.

source: And David gave Saul his oath. And Saul went back to his house; but David and his men went up to their safe place.
target: chutichuan Davida chuan Saula hnênah chhia a chham ta a. Tin, Saula chu a haw ta a; Davida leh a mite erawh chu kulh bingah chuan an chho ta a.

source: We're not quite finished.
target: Kan zo chiah lo.

source: Anyone who goes on and does not keep to the teaching of Christ, has not God: he who keeps to the teaching has the Father and the Son.
target: Tupawh Krista zirtirna thua awm reng lova khum chuan Pathian a nei lo ve. Chu mi zirtirna thua awm reng erawh chuan chu mi ngei chuan Pa leh Fapa a nei kawp a ni.

source: Then I went down to the potter's house, and he was doing his work on the stones.
target: Tichuan belvawtu inah chuan ka zuk kal ta a, a bel siamna khawlah chuan a lo thawk a.

source: If only they were wise, if only this was clear to them, and they would give thought to their future!
target: Aw, fing sela chuan heng hi an hre thiam ang a, An tun hnu lam thu an ngaihtuah tur!

source: He is at home.
target: Inah a awm.

source: Say, I am your sign: as I have done, so will it be done to them: they will go away as prisoners.
target: In tân entîr lâwkna ka nih hi, ka tih ang tak hian an chungah tih a ni ang; thawn bovin, saltâng tûrin an kal ang, ti rawh.

source: Even as Abraham had faith in God, and it was put to his account as righteousness.
target: Abrahaman Pathian a ring a, tin,chu rinna chu a felnaa ruat a ni ang khan.

source: It's pretty heavy
target: A rit khawp mai

source: You aren't replaceable
target: I thlak theih loh

source: We smiled at each other.
target: Kan in nui dun a.

source: I outsmarted them
target: Anmahni chu ka outsmart ta a ni

source: Then they took Joseph's coat, and put on it some of the blood from a young goat which they had put to death,
target: Tin, Josefa kawrfual chu an la a, kêlpa an talh a, a thi-ah chuan kawrfual chu an hnim a:

source: Now in the eighteenth year of king Jeroboam, the son of Nebat, Abijam became king over Judah.
target: Nebata fapa lal Jeroboama kum sâwm leh kum riat a lal kum chuan Juda hote chungah Abijama chu a lal tan a.

source: His seed will not come to an end for ever; the seat of his kingdom will be like the sun before me.
target: A chi thlahte chu kumkhuain an awm ang a, A lalthutphah chu ka hmaah ni angin a awm bawk ang.

source: God has taken his place in her; she will not be moved: he will come to her help at the dawn of morning.
target: Pathian chu a lai takah a awm a; a nghing lo vang a: Pathianin khawfing chah hunah chuan a tanpui ang.

source: Go on to Calneh and see; and from there go to Hamath the great; then go down to Gath of the Philistines: are you better than these kingdoms? or is your land wider than theirs?
target: Kalneh khuaah kal ula, en rawh u; tin, chuta țangin Hamath khaw ropuiah chuan kal ula: tin, Philistia ram Gath khuaah chuan kal chhuak ula: hêng ramte ai hian an tha zâwk em?

source: See the size of the handwriting which I myself have made use of in writing to you.
target: Keima kut ngeiin in hnenah lehkha hraw pui puia ka ziak hi en rawh u.

source: The light is hated by everyone whose acts are evil and he does not come to the light for fear that his acts will be seen.
target: Tupawh thil tisual apiangin eng an haw thin, engah pawh an lo kal lo, chutilochuan an thiltihte a lang ang.

source: Then says Jesus to him, Put up your sword again into its place: for all those who take the sword will come to death by the sword.
target: Tin, Isuan a hnenah, I khandaih kha a dahnaah dah leh rawh, khandaih ruaitute zawng zawng chu khandaih vekah an thi dawn si a.

source: And then they will see the Son of man coming in clouds with great power and glory.
target: chutih hunah chuan Mihring Fapa hi thiltihtheihna nasa tak leh ropuina nasa tak nen chum zinga lo kal an hmu ang.

source: You're getting worse.
target: I na zual zel a.

source: Hi I'm Tom
target: Hei Toma ka nia

source: It was a collaborative effort.
target: Thawhhona a ni.

source: Did you find anything
target: Eng emaw i hmu em

source: I've been selected
target: Ka thlan tawh

source: If a man seems to have religion and has no control over his tongue but lets himself be tricked by what is false, this man's religion is of no value.
target: Tupawh sakhaw ngaihsak nia inringa a lei veng tha si lo va, mahni thinlung inbum zawk chu, chu mi sakhaw biak dan chu engmah a ni lo ve.

source: For then you will have delight in the Ruler of all, and your face will be lifted up to God.
target: Tin, Engkimtitheiaah chuan i lawm tawh ang a, Pathian lam chu i hawi tawh ang.

source: Am I mistaken?
target: Hai palh ka ni em?

source: It came to the ears of Jesus that they had put him out, and meeting him he said, Have you faith in the Son of man?
target: Tin, an hnawt chhuak tih Isuan a lo hria a; tin, a zawng chhuak a, Pathian Fapa i ring em? a ti a.

source: These are the boards needed for the house; twenty boards for the south side,
target: Tin, biak bûk atân ban rem khâwm chhim chhawng chhim lampang atân chuan ban rem khâwm sawmhnih i siam tur a ni.

source: Dental extraction
target: Ha phawi

source: And she gave him the name Joseph, saying, May the Lord give me another son.
target: tin, Lalpa chuan fapa dang mi pêk belhchhah leh rawh se, tiin a hmingah chuan Josefa a sa a.

source: Better a bit of dry bread in peace, than a house full of feasting and violent behaviour.
target: Insual bur bura ruaithehna in ai chuan Inrem taka chaw thing bâr khat eina a tha zawk.

source: I'm not convinced of this.
target: Hei hi ka ring lo.

source: And all the glory of his father's family will be hanging on him, all their offspring, every small vessel, even the cups and the basins.
target: Tin, amahah chuan a pa chhûngte ropuina zawng zawng chu an la bang vek ang, a fate leh a thlahte bungbêlte tinreng, berhbu bungbêl ațanga tui dahna bungbêl zawng zawng thlengin.

source: I'm weak.
target: Ka chau.

source: We won that match
target: Chu match chu kan chak ta a ni

source: Children's children are the crown of old men, and the glory of children is their fathers.
target: Tu leh fate hi upate lallukhum an ni a, Fanaute ropuina chu an pate hi an ni.

source: I have already finished the job.
target: Hna ka zo tawh a.

source: So that we came back from death with him, and are seated with him in the heavens, in Christ Jesus;
target: Krista Isuaah chuan ama rual veka min kai thovin, van hmunahte ama hnenah min thuttir ta a:

source: I am afraid to go.
target: Ka kal ka hlau a ni.

source: Be then complete in righteousness, even as your Father in heaven is complete.
target: Chutichuan, in Pa vana mi a tha famkim angin in tha famkim tur a ni.

source: We forgot.
target: Kan theihnghilh.

source: So it is with him who goes in to his neighbour's wife; he who has anything to do with her will not go free from punishment.
target: Chutichuan mi a thenawm nupui hnêna kal a, Tupawh amah va khawih chu hrem lohvin a chhuak lo vang.

source: I jumped
target: Ka zuang tawh

source: Now a certain man of the servants of Saul was there that day, kept back before the Lord; his name was Doeg, an Edomite, the strongest of Saul's runners.
target: Tin, chu mi ni chuan Saula chhiahhlawh zinga mi pakhat LALPA hmaa hren a awm a; a hming chu Doega ani a, Edom mi, Saula ran vengtu zinga hotu ber ani a.

source: And having made Jason and the others give an undertaking to keep the peace, they let them go.
target: tin, Jasona leh mi dangte hnen ata chu an aia hren tur englo an la a, an chhuah ta a.

source: Whom we are preaching; guiding and teaching every man in all wisdom, so that every man may be complete in Christ;
target: mi tin Kristaah chuan thafamkima kan dintir theihna turin, mi tin zilhin, mi tin finna tinrenga zirtirin a chanchin kan hrilh thin hi;

source: She saw everything.
target: Engkim a hmu vek.

source: My blessing will be on her food; and her poor will be full of bread.
target: A ei tûr chu mal ka sawm rei rui ang a: A mi retheite chu chhângin ka titlai ang.

source: Do not take interest from an Israelite on anything, money or food or any other goods, which you let him have:
target: A pung umin in unaute inpûktir tur a ni lo; tangka lama pung emaw, ei tur lama pung emaw, engpawh a pung uma pûktir reng reng chu:

source: I'm taking a vacation.
target: Vacation ka la a.

source: The word about the waste land. As storm-winds in the South go rushing through, it comes from the waste land, from the land greatly to be feared.
target: Tuipui thlalêr phur rit chu. Chhim rama țhawngaleivir a kal tlâng angin thlalêr ațangin, ram hlauhawm tak ațang chuan, a lo kal e.

source: The risk is small.
target: Risk a tlem hle.

source: All these they are to put in a leather cover, and put it on the frame.
target: chu mi leh ahmanrua zawng zawng chu a khuna savun tha mia khuhin a zawnnaah an dah tur a ni.

source: This fruit is sour.
target: He thei hi a thur.

source: For I have no pleasure in the death of him on whom death comes, says the Lord: be turned back then, and have life.
target: Mithihnaah chuan lawmna ka nei hauh silo va, tih hi LALPA PATHIAN thu chhuak a ni: chuvangin in lamlet ula, nung rawh u.

source: I do my work well.
target: Ka hna hi tha takin ka thawk thin.

source: We stared at each other.
target: Kan in en reng a.

source: And when they were going out from Jericho, a great number went after him.
target: Tin, Jeriko khua ata an chhuah laiin, mipui tam takin amah chu an zui a.

source: They are more intelligent
target: An fing zawk a ni

source: Seeing that the Jews make request for signs, and the Greeks are looking for knowledge:
target: Judate chuan chhinchhiahnate an phut thin a, Grikte chuan finna an zawng bawk thin a;

source: He has given you a false account of me: but my lord the king is like the angel of God: do then whatever seems good to you.
target: Tin, lalpa ka pu hnênah chuan i chiahhlawh hi ahek a; nimahsela lalpa ka pu chu Pathian vantirhko ang a ni a: chuvangin tha i tih ang angin ti ang che.

source: And David took their gold body-covers from the servants of Hadadezer and took them to Jerusalem.
target: Tin, Davida chuan Hadadezera hote rangkachak phawte a laksak a, Jerusalemah a hawn a.

source: She bore him four children.
target: Fa pali a nei a.

source: For we are conscious that the law is of the spirit; but I am of the flesh, given into the power of sin.
target: Dan chu thlarau lam thil a ni tih kan hre si a; kei erawh chu tisa lama mi, sual bawiha hralh tawh ka ni.

source: They released him
target: An thlah ta a

source: And when Judas took the bread Satan went into him. Then Jesus said to him, Do quickly what you have to do.
target: Tin, chhang them chu a pek hnu chuan Setana a chhungah a lut ta nghal a. Chutichuan Isuan a hnenah, I tih tur chu ti thuai rawh, a ti a.

source: But now Christ has truly come back from the dead, the first-fruits of those who are sleeping.
target: Nimahsela Krista chu mitthi zing ata kaihthawhin a awm tak zet a ni, muhilte thawh hmahruaitu a lo ni ta.

source: Help me, Tom
target: Tom mi pui rawh

source: We traveled on foot.
target: Kein kan zin a.

source: I can do it today.
target: Vawiin hian ka ti thei a ni.

source: I don't watch a lot of TV.
target: TV ka en tam lo.

source: I am young
target: Ka naupang e

source: If I kept my evil doings covered, and my sin in the secret of my breast,
target: Mite tih dang anga ka bawhchhiatna zep a, Mahni awm chhûnga khawlohna thukruin

source: Have no fear, little flock, for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.
target: Pawl tlemte u, hlau suh u; ram pek che u hi in Pa lawmzawng tak a ni.

source: If these men have the common death of men, or if the natural fate of all men overtakes them, then the Lord has not sent me.
target: Heng mite hi mi zawng zawng thih dan ang mai bawka an thih a, mi zawng zawngte hrem ang bawka hrem an nih chuan Pathianin mi tir lo a ni ang a.

source: See, I will have them moved from the place where you have sent them, and will let what you have done come back on your head;
target: Ngai teh u, in hralhna hmun ațang khân chawk thovin ka chhuahtîr ang a, in thungrulhna chu in lu chung ngeiah ka thungrûl ve ang;

source: It wasn't planned
target: Ruahman a ni lo

source: au revoir
target: kan intawh leh hma chu

source: Come, let us take our pleasure in love till the morning, having joy in love's delights.
target: Hawh teh, zankhuain hmangaihna duhtawkin i chen ang khai, Hmangaihnain inhnem ang.

source: Like the cracking of thorns under a pot, so is the laugh of a foolish man; and this again is to no purpose.
target: Bel chhuan hnuaia hling alh ri ang Mi a ui ri chu a ni si: Hei pawh hi engmah lo mai a lo ni.

source: I fell.
target: Ka hrethei.

source: Ka tâ chu heta hi
target: Mine's here

source: And he was angry with his three friends, because they had been unable to give him an answer, and had not made Job's sin clear.
target: Joba thian pathumte chungah pawh chuan a thinrim bawk a, Joba chu thiam lo an ti chunga chhan ngaihna an hriat loh avângiin.

source: Are we having fun yet?
target: Kan la hlim em?

source: I cannot lift him.
target: Ka chawi kang thei lo.

source: You can't mistake it.
target: I tisual thei lo.

source: If, when he sees the sword coming on the land, by sounding the horn he gives the people news of their danger;
target: anin ram chunga khandaih lo thleng a hmuh chuan tawtawrâwt a ham ang a, mipuite chu a in ralrintîr ang;

source: If it is the king's pleasure, let a statement ordering their destruction be put in writing: and I will give to those responsible for the king's business, ten thousand talents of silver for the king's store-house.
target: Lalin rem a tih chuan tihlum vek tûr ani tih ziak tlat ni se;a lal sum ina dah tûrin lal sum enkawltute kutah tangkaraw talent sângsawm ka pe ang e, a ti a.

source: When my soul in me was overcome, I kept the memory of the Lord: and my prayer came in to you, into your holy Temple.
target: Ka nunna ka kawchhûng a chauh lai chuan, LALPA chu ka hre reng a: Ka țawngțaina chu i biakin thianghlimah i hnên a lo thleng a ni.

source: It was scary
target: A hlauhawm a nia

source: But Jesus said, Let the little ones come to me, and do not keep them away: for of such is the kingdom of heaven.
target: Isua erawh chuan, Naupang tete ka hnenah han kaltir ula, hnar suh u; van ram chu hetiang mite ta a ni si a, a ti a.

source: Do you fly frequently?
target: I thlawk fo em?

source: And our hope for you is certain; in the knowledge that as you take part in the troubles, so you will take part in the comfort.
target: Tin, hrehawmna chang vete in nih ang hian, thlamuanna chang vete in ni bawk tih kan hriatin kan beiseisakna che u hi a nghet a ni.

source: It's blank
target: Engmah awmlo a ni

source: And when she was going to get it, he said to her, And get me with it a small bit of bread.
target: Tin, la tûra a kal chu a han au va, Chhang tlemte paw mi han ken te ang che, a ti a.

source: You are the moon of my life.
target: Ka nun thla i ni.

source: You're getting older
target: I upa chho zel a

source: Like keepers of a field they are against her on every side; because she has been fighting against me, says the Lord.
target: Thlawhhma vengtute ang maiin a velin an hual a, Ka chunga a hel avângin, Tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: Then take her back to your house; and let her hair and her nails be cut;
target: in inah in hruai hawng ang a, an lu an met ang a, an tin, an zai ang a;

source: And all these kings came together, and put their forces in position at the waters of Merom, to make war on Israel.
target: Chung lalho zawng zawngte chu an intawk khawm a, Israel-hote chu beih tumin Meron tuiahte chuan an riak khawm a.

source: After this, being conscious that all things had now been done so that the Writings might come true, Jesus said, Give me water.
target: Chu mi hnuah chuan Isuan thil engkim tunah a kim tawh tih a hria a, Pathian Lehkha Thu kha a thlen nan, Ka tui a hal e, a ti a.

source: Mary is a singer
target: Mary hi zaithiam a ni

source: So why have you made no protest against Jeremiah of Anathoth, who is acting as a prophet to you?
target: Tichuan engah nge Anathoth khua ami Jeremia, i hnêna zâwlnei inti chu in zilh loh?

source: Because he did not put me to death before my birth took place: so my mother's body would have been my last resting-place, and she would have been with child for ever.
target: Chhûl chhûnga mi tihhlum loh avâng khan; Chu ti nise, ka nu chu ka thlan ni mai tûr a, A chhûl chuan mi pai kum khua mai tûr .

source: Do the dishes
target: Thleng sil rawh

source: What is it you do again
target: Eng nge i tih leh

source: Our help is in the name of the Lord, the maker of heaven and earth.
target: Min tanpuina tûr chu. LALPA, lei leh van siamtu hmingah a awm, tiin.

source: And the people went up, requesting him to do as he had done for them in other years.
target: Tin, mipuiho an han chho va, an tan a tihsak thin anga ti turin an ngen ta a.

source: Philip went and gave word of it to Andrew; and Andrew went with Philip to Jesus.
target: Philipa chuan Andria a rawn hrilh a; tin, Andria leh Philipa chuan Isua an rawn hrilh a.

source: Let there be no turning to the right or to the left, keep your feet from evil.
target: Ding lam emaw, vei lamah emaw peng suh; Sual ata i ke sawn rawh.

source: Keep me from the net which they have put down for me, and from the designs of the workers of evil.
target: Ka awh nana thang an kam lekah chuan mi humhim ang che, Thil tisualtute thang lakahte nên.

source: And in the third, white horses; and in the fourth, horses of mixed colour.
target: tawlailir pathumnaa mi chu sakawr var an ni a, talailir palinaa mi chu sakawr hmârsai, chak tak si hi an ni a.

source: It's not my style.
target: Ka style a ni lo.

source: And I became great; increasing more than all who had been before me in Jerusalem, and my wisdom was still with me.
target: Chutichuan, ka lo ropui a, ka hmaa Jerusalema awmte zawng anwg chu ka khum a: ka finna pawh a ngai reng a ni.

source: In those days the Lord was angry first with Israel; and Hazael made attacks on all the land of Israel,
target: Chung lai chuan LALPAN Israelte chu a thlauhthla tan ta a; tichuan Hazaelan Israel ram zawng zawnga chuan a hneh zel a;

source: Let not mercy and good faith go from you; let them be hanging round your neck, recorded on your heart;
target: Khawngaihna leh thu tak chuan hnuchhawn che suh se, I nghawngah zem tlat la, I thinlung phêkah ziak rawh.

source: For that would be a crime; it would be an act for which punishment would be measured out by the judges:
target: Chu chu sual huatthlala tak, Khawlohna, rorêltuten an hrem ngei tûr chu a ni si a.

source: Will be five shekels for every one, by the scale of the holy place (the shekel is twenty gerahs;
target: mi pakhat tan sekel 5 țheuh i la tur ani; hmun thianghlima sekel hma tur a ni, sekel chu gerah 20 a ni

source: He's skinny
target: A cher lutuk

source: He makes my feet like roes' feet, and puts me on high places.
target: Ani chuan ka ke hi zukpui ke angin a siam a, Ka hmun sâng takahte mi awmtir thin a.

source: And this will be only a small thing to the Lord: in addition he will give the Moabites into your hands.
target: Chuchu LALPA ngaih chuan thil te tham mai a ni a; Moab-ho hi in kutah a pe bawk dâwn a ni.

source: He bought a Honda
target: Honda pakhat a lei a

source: I'm stubborn
target: Mi mâwl ka nia

source: I feel better
target: Ka ṭha deuh tawh

source: I'm educated
target: Lehkhathiam ka nia

source: Give teaching to a wise man, and he will become wiser; give training to an upright man, and his learning will be increased.
target: Mi fing zilh la, a fing lehzual sauh dawn nia; Mi fel zirtir la, thiamnaah a lo pung dawn nia.

source: All the towns of the table-land and all Gilead and Bashan as far as Salecah and Edrei, towns of the kingdom of Og in Bashan.
target: phai ram khua zawng zawng leh Gilead ram zawng zawng leh Basan ram zawng zawng nen, Basan rama Oga ram khua, Saleka leh Edrei thlengin.

source: Operation Theatre
target: Inzaina pindan

source: Have you returned?
target: I lo haw tawh em?

source: Is it a wolf?
target: Sihal a ni em?

source: He ignored me
target: Mi haider tlat

source: Why is your heart uncontrolled, and why are your eyes lifted up;
target: Engah nge i thinlungin a hruai bo che? Eng tizia nge i men tal tawp tawp ni?

source: All the nations are as nothing before him; even less than nothing, a thing of no value.
target: Hnam tinrengte chu a hmaah chuan engmah lo ang an ni a ani ngaih chuan engmah lo aia tlem zawk, boruak mai an ni a.

source: I didn't vote
target: Ka vâwt lo

source: Go not up, for the Lord is not with you, and you will be overcome by those who are fighting against you.
target: In zingah LALPA a awm si lo va, hmêlmate lo tihhlum mi turin chho suh u.

source: But your father has not kept faith with me, and ten times he has made changes in my payment; but God has kept him from doing me damage.
target: Nimahsela in pa chuan mi bum a, ka hlawh hi vawi sâwm lai mi tihdanglamsak tawh a; nimahsela Pathianin ka pawi a khawih a phal lo a ni.

source: He who gives you the Spirit, and does works of power among you, is it by the works of law, or by the hearing of faith?
target: Tin, in hnena Thlarau petu che u leh in zinga thilmak titu chuan Dan thiltihte avangin nge a tih, in ngaihthlaka in rin avangin?

source: And when he had sent the people away, he got into the boat, and came into the country of Magadan.
target: Tin, mipuite chu a tintir hnuin lawngah a chuang a, Magadan ram a lo thleng a.

source: I used to be tired all the time.
target: Ka chau fo thin.

source: And my prayer is that you may be increased more and more in knowledge and experience;
target: Tin, in hmangaihnain hriat famkimna leh bengvarna tinreng a ngah lehzual nan ka tawngtai thin;

source: I'm normal
target: Ka pangngai lûtuk

source: Lifting up our hearts with our hands to God in the heavens.
target: Kan thinlung chu kan kutte nên vana Pathian lamah chuan i chawikâng ang u.

source: But you make it unholy by saying, The Lord's table has become unclean, and his food is of no value.
target: Nangni erawh chu, LALPA dawhkan chu a bawlhhlawh a ni, a rah a chaw ngei chu a hmuhsitawm, in tih-ah khan a ni A tibawrhbângtu in nih ni.

source: An angry man makes men come to blows, but he who is slow to get angry puts an end to fighting.
target: Mi thinchhia chuan inhauna a chawk tho va, Mi thluak nem erawh chuan inhauna a tireh.

source: And he was ruler over all the kings from the River to the land of the Philistines, as far as the limit of Egypt.
target: Tin, Lui atanga Philistia ram leh Aigupta ram thlenga lal zawng zawng chungah a lal a.

source: We'll take a vote.
target: Vote kan la ang.

source: For this work of giving not only takes care of the needs of the saints, but is the cause of much praise to God;
target: He chhawmdawlna rawngbawlna hian mi thianghlimte tlakchhamnate chu a phuhruksak chauh pawh a ni si lo va, Pathian hnena lawmthu sawina tam taka changing a luang liam bawk a ni;

source: And this was John's answer: A man is unable to have anything if it is not given to him from heaven.
target: Johanan a chhang a, Mihringin engmah an nei thei lo, vana mi pek a nih loh chuan.

source: Let there be joy in the mountain of Zion, and let the daughters of Judah be glad, because of your wise decisions.
target: I rorêlnate avângin Zion tlâng chu lawm takin awm sela, Juda fanute chu hlim takin awm rawh se.

source: Because John had said to him, It is not right for you to have her.
target: Johana chuan a hnenah, Ani i neih hi a thiang lo ve, a tihsak avangin.

source: O God, men of pride have come up against me, and the army of violent men would take my life; they have not put you before them.
target: Aw Pathian, mi chapote chuan mi bei a, Mi nunrawng awm khawmte chuan ka nunna hi tihbo tumin an zawng a, nang chu an hmaah an dah thin lo che.

source: I like bread
target: Chhang ka duh

source: Have a snack
target: Eitheih ei rawh

source: The wanderer from the way of knowledge will have his resting-place among the shades.
target: Hriatna kawng ata kal bo chu Mitthi awm khâwm zingah a chawl ang.

source: I will say to God my Rock, Why have you let me go from your memory? why do I go in sorrow because of the attacks of my haters?
target: Pathian ka lungpui hnênah chuann, Engah nge mi theihnghilh le? Engah nge dotu hnehchhiahna avânga lungngaia ka van ruai thin le? ka ti ang.

source: No one's buying it.
target: Tuman an lei lo.

source: I won't lose!
target: Ka hlah lovang

source: I put on righteousness as my clothing, and was full of it; right decisions were to me a robe and a head-dress.
target: Felna chu ka inbel a, mi tuam vêl a, Ka tihdik thinzia hi kawrfual leh lukhum ang a ni.

source: He, then, who takes an oath by the altar, takes it by the altar and by all things on it.
target: Chutichuan, tupawh maicham chhala chhechham apiang chuan maicham leh a chunga awm zawng zawng chhalin chhia a chham thin.

source: And he had the tower of Penuel broken down and the men of the town put to death.
target: Tin, Penuel khaw kulh chu a tichim a, khuaa mite pawh chu a that a.

source: I don't beat them.
target: Ka vuak lo.

source: I'm not dead
target: Ka thi lo

source: You have put to shame the thoughts of the poor, but the Lord is his support.
target: Mi rethei remruat chu in mualphosak thin, LALPA chu a inhumhimna a nih avângin.

source: Every first male child is mine; the first male birth of your cattle, the first male of every ox and sheep.
target: Chhul keu hmasa ber apiang chu ka ta a ni; tin, i ran pa zawng zawng sebawngpa leh berampa piang thla hmasa berte pawh.

source: They are banded together against the soul of the upright, to give decisions against those who have done no wrong.
target: Mi fel nunna bei tumin an pung khâwm hlawm thin a, Thisen sawiselbo chu thiam loh an chantir bawk thin.

source: I've been married
target: Nupui ka nei tawh

source: Our attackers are on our necks: overcome with weariness, we have no rest.
target: Nghâwnga manin kan awm a; kan chau va chawlh rêng kan nei lo.

source: Then what?
target: Tichuan eng nge?

source: For this cause I give witness that what I said is false, and in sorrow I take my seat in the dust.
target: Chuvang tak chuan ka inten a, Vut leh vaivuta thuin ka sim ta e, tiin.

source: I hit rock bottom
target: Rock bottom ka hit a

source: Foolish ways are deep-seated in the heart of a child, but the rod of punishment will send them far from him.
target: Naupang thinlungah chuan âtna a bet tlat a, Mahse thununna tiangin hla takah a hnawt kiang ang.

source: I myself had no knowledge of him, but I came giving baptism with water so that he might be seen openly by Israel.
target: Amah chu ka lo hre si lo; nimahsela Israelten amah an hriat theih nan, tuia baptis-in ka lo kal a ni, a ti a.

source: And Jesus said, Were there not ten men who were made clean? where are the nine?
target: Tichuan Isuan a chhang a, Mi sawm kha in lo thiang ta a ni lawm ni? Pakuate kha khawiah nge?

source: And Satan came into Judas Iscariot, who was one of the twelve.
target: Tin, sawm leh pahnihte zinga tel, Juda Iskariota an tiha chhungah chuan Setana a lut a.

source: For here we have no fixed resting-place, but our search is for the one which is to come.
target: Hetah hian khaw hmun nghet kan nei si lo va, khaw lo la awm tur chu kan zawng zawk a ni.

source: He tries
target: A tichhin mek

source: He's not the only one
target: Amah chauh a ni lo

source: Then I made my prayer to the Lord, saying, O Lord, take my soul out of trouble.
target: Chu veleh chuan LALPA hming chu ka lam a; Aw LALPA, khawngaih takin ka nunna hi chhanhim ang che, tiin.

source: I feel lucky
target: Vannei ka inti

source: The sea saw it, and went in flight; Jordan was turned back.
target: Tuifinriat chuan chu chu a hmu a, a tlan bo va; Jordan lui chu tihkirin a awm ta a.

source: The news isn't good
target: Chanchin a tha lo

source: This is the house
target: Hei hi in chu a ni

source: Are you already married?
target: Innei tawh em?

source: I'm a fan
target: Ngaihsangtu ka nia

source: I hope so.
target: A nih ka beisei.

source: I will give them wounds, so that they are not able to get up: they are stretched under my feet.
target: An thawh leh theih lohna tûrin ka sat chhawk ang a: Ka ke hnuaiah hian an tlu hlawm ang.

source: When they were moving, they went on their four sides without turning; they went after the head in the direction in which it was looking; they went without turning.
target: An kal chuan sîr liah an kal thei a, An kal pawhin an her ngai lo; amaherawhchu a hmasa hawi lam apiang an zui a ni, an kalin an her chuang lo.

source: Give the story of it to your children, and let them give it to their children, and their children to another generation.
target: Chu chu in fate hrilh ula, in fate chuan an fate hrilh sela, an fa lehte chuan chhuan dang hrilh zêl rawh se.

source: Don't screw it up!
target: Screw up suh!

source: Which one do you like
target: Eng ber nge i duh

source: Let it go
target: Kal tir rawh

source: But the tongue may not be controlled by man; it is an unresting evil, it is full of the poison of death.
target: amaherawhchu lei hi tumahin an khawi ngam thei lo a ni; thihna hlova khat, sual awmhle hle thei lo a ni.

source: I tried hard
target: Ka bei nasa

source: Did you call the police?
target: Police i ko em?

source: From which some have been turned away, giving themselves to foolish talking;
target: Mi thenkhatte an kal kawi avangin chu chu an pensan a, thu lawi lo sawina lamah an kal ta a;

source: The wall supporting the side-rooms on the outside was five cubits thick: and there was a free space of five cubits between the side-rooms of the house.
target: Sîr pindan pâwn bang chu tawng ngaa chhah a ni a; sîr pindan pawn bang bâkah chuan tawng nga a la âwl a.

source: And they took the things ordered by Moses, before the Tent of meeting, and all the people came near, waiting before the Lord.
target: Tin, Mosian thu a pêk ang chuan inbiakna puan in kawtah an rawn kai a; tin, mi zawng zawng chuan an va hnaih a, LALPA hmaah chuan an va ding a.

source: You are good
target: I ṭha a ni

source: Tough thing to do
target: Thil harsa tak tih tur a ni

source: They don't reap
target: An seng hek lo

source: You aren't welcome
target: I lo lawm a ni lo

source: It's close
target: Khar a ni

source: O God, in whose hands is punishment, O God of punishment, let your shining face be seen.
target: Aw LALPA, nang phuba lakna thu neitu Pathian, Nang phuba lakna thu neitu Pathian, eng chhuak ang che.

source: I will make my hands clean from sin; so will I go round your altar, O Lord;
target: Ka kutte hi sawiselbonain ka sil ang a, Chutiangin, aw LALPA, i maichâm chu ka kal hual ang;

source: Burn the body
target: A taksa hal rawh

source: And it was clear to Saul that the Lord was with David; and he was loved by all Israel.
target: Tin, Saula chuan Davida hnênah chuan Pathian a awm tih a hre chiang ta a; tin, Saula fanu Mikali chuan ani chu ahmangiah a.

source: And they do not say to themselves that I keep in mind all their sin; now their evil acts come round them on every side; they are before my face.
target: An suahsualna zawng zawng ka hre reng tih An thinlungin an ngaihtuah lo: Tûnah chuan an thiltihte ngeiin a chîm vêl tlat tawh a. Ka hmai hmâah an awm a ni.

source: Don't get up
target: Tho chhuak suh

source: He's really angry
target: A thinrim takzet

source: And now I say to you, Do nothing to these men, but let them be: for if this teaching or this work is of men, it will come to nothing:
target: Chuvangin tunah ka ti a che u, heng mite hi tawk suh ula, awm mai rawh se; heng an thiltih tum leh an thiltih hi mihring tihchhuah mai a nih chuan a boral ang;

source: I mean that.
target: Kha kha a lâwm ka sawi tum.

source: Putting one's faith in a false man in time of trouble is like a broken tooth and a shaking foot.
target: Mangan laia mi rinawm lo rin chu Ha bal leh ke ruh pelh ang a ni.

source: Masters, give your servants what is right and equal, conscious that you have a Master in heaven.
target: Hotute u, nangni pawhin vanah Hotu in nei tih hriain, in bawihte chungah a fel leh a mawi tawk chu ti rawh u.

source: I am shut in by you on every side, and you have put your hand on me.
target: Nangin ka hnung lam leh ka hma lamah min hual a, Ka chungah i kut i nghat bawk a.

source: Even if he has a fall he will not be without help: for the hand of the Lord is supporting him.
target: Tlu mah sela, an tlu hlen lo vang: LALPAN a kutin a chelh reng si a.

source: I don't need an SUV.
target: SUV ka mamawh lo.

source: And now, Lord, what am I waiting for? my hope is in you.
target: Tin, LALPA, tunah eng nge ka nghah le? Nangmahah a ni, ka beiseina a awm ni.

source: The little which the good man has is better than the wealth of evil-doers.
target: Mi fel thil tlemte neih chu Mi suaksual tam tak thil neih rei rui te ai chuan a tha zawk a ni.

source: I'm lucky.
target: Ka vannei.

source: Your evil-doing may have an effect on a man like yourself, or your righteousness on a son of man.
target: I suahsualna chuan nang ang mihring chauh a khawih a, I felna chuan mihring fa chauh a khawih thei a ni.

source: I am curious
target: Ka beng a verh

source: Tom's groggy
target: Tom chu a rui pai

source: They're free
target: An hman lûtuk

source: That's my father
target: Chu chu ka pa a ni

source: Who through him have faith in God who took him up again from the dead into glory; so that your faith and hope might be in God.
target: amah avangin mitthi zing ata a kai thotu leh a ropuina petu Pathian ringtute in ni a, in rinna leh in beiseina chu Pathianah a awm theih nan.

source: Do that right now.
target: Chu chu tunah hian ti rawh.

source: I am lo a mi?
target: Are you sick?

source: I always walk
target: Ka kal ziah

source: From every tribe of Israel send a thousand to the war.
target: Israeel hnam zawng zawng zinga hnam tina mi sangkhat zel indonaah in kaltir tur a ni. tiin.

source: Tom will be late
target: Tom a tlai dawn a ni

source: He abstains from alcohol.
target: Zu a insum thin.

source: This I saw myself and my witness is that he is the Son of God.
target: Chu chu ka hmu tawh a, he mi hi Pathian Fapa a ni tih ka hriattir tawh,a ti a.

source: Now news came to the haters of Judah and Benjamin that the people who had come back were building a Temple to the Lord, the God of Israel;
target: Juda mi leh Benjamina mite hmêlma te chuan sal chhuakovin LALPA, Israelte Pathian biak in an saksak tih an lo hriat chuan,

source: Tom's hurt
target: Tom an tina

source: They set off fireworks.
target: Meipui an puak a.

source: To him who overcame great kings: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:
target: Lal ropui tak takte tihlum a: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: They're pretty much in agreement
target: An inrem hle mai

source: Have you found a job?
target: Hna i hmu tawh em?

source: She wears an eyepatch.
target: Eyepatch a vuah a.

source: Tom isn't in trouble.
target: Tom hi a buai lo.

source: Be a man
target: Pa takin awm rawh

source: They all turned their backs on him
target: An hawisan vek a

source: Let's pay him a visit.
target: Tlawhna pe ila.

source: He got caught.
target: Man a tawk.

source: For he has made low those who are lifted up, all the people of the town of pride: he makes it low, crushing it down to the earth; he makes it low in the dust.
target: Ani chuan sâng taka awmte chu a titlâwm ta si a, khawpui sâng ak chu chu chu dah hniam a, lei thleng rawkin a dah hniam a vaivut thleng zawkin a titlu a.

source: So that all the peoples of the earth may see that the hand of the Lord is strong; and that they may go in fear of the Lord your God for ever.
target: leilunga hnam tinrengin LALPA kut hi a lo chak ani tih an hriat theih a, LALPA in Pathian chu kumkhuaa an tih theih nan, tiin a sawi a.

source: Who put the earth into his care, or made him responsible for the world?
target: Tunge lei hi amah awptir a, Khawvel pum pui hi a hnêna kawltir ni?

source: We're back together.
target: Kan inhmu leh ta.

source: If this man did not come from God he would be unable to do anything.
target: He mi hi Pathian hnena chhuak a nih loh chuan engmah a ti thei lo vang, a ti a, a chhang a.

source: And he said, That which comes out of the man, that makes the man unclean.
target: Tin, amah vekin, Mihring kawchhung ata lo chhuak chuan, chu ngei chuan mihring a tibawlhhlawh thin a ni.

source: You're too nervous
target: I hlau lutuk

source: Those who have a desire to take my life put nets for me; those who are designing my destruction say evil things against me, all the day their minds are full of deceit.
target: Ka nunna tihbo tuma zawngtute chuan min awh nân thangte an kam thin a; Ka chhiatna tûr zawngtue pawh chuan thu tha lo takte an sawi a, Nilengin bumna thute an ngaihtuah thin.

source: How heavy you are!
target: I va rit em!

source: Joseph and the Famine
target: Ṭâm a nasa zual

source: Time is valuable
target: Hun hi a hlu a ni

source: Let your mouth be open for those who have no voice, in the cause of those who are ready for death.
target: Tawng thei lote tan i ka ang la, Hnuchhawnho zawng zawngte chungchang thu-ah te.

source: Even the ox has knowledge of its owner, and the ass of the place where its master puts its food: but Israel has no knowledge, my people give no thought to me.
target: Bâwngpain a neitu a hria a, sabengtung pawhin a pu chaw pekna a hre bawk a: Israelho erawh chuan an hre si lo va, ka mite chuan an ngaihtuah lo ve, tiin.

source: We are not speaking.
target: Kan sawi lo.

source: There is an old saying, From the evil-doer comes evil: but my hand will never be lifted up against you.
target: Hman lai thufingin, 'Mi sual atangin sual a lo chhuak thin a,' a ti a; nimahsela i chungah kut ka thlak lo vang.

source: What profit is it to you to be cruel, to give up the work of your hands, looking kindly on the design of evil-doers?
target: Mi hnehchhiah a, i kut hnathawk hmusit a, Mi sualsual remruat tih-en hi tha i ti êm ni?

source: The sons of Salma: Beth-lehem and the Netophathites, Atroth-beth-Joab and half of the Manahathites, the Zorites.
target: Salma thlahte chu Beth-lehem-ho te, Netophat-ho zatve te, Zor-ho te an ni.

source: Are you still together
target: In la awm dun em

source: Is it good?
target: A tha em?

source: I have doubts
target: Buaina ka nei

source: I was sleepy
target: Ka mut a chhuak a

source: You're very, very lucky.
target: I vannei hle mai.

source: Where were you stationed
target: Khawiah nge i awm

source: Then they had a desire to take him: but no man put hands on him because his hour was still to come.
target: Chutichuan ani chu man an tum a, nimahsela a hun a la thlen loh avangin tuman an khawih si lo.

source: Or as a child dead at birth I might never have come into existence; like young children who have not seen the light.
target: A nih loh leh, a hun lova piang thup bo ang ka ni tawh tûr, Nausen eng hmu ngai lote ang mai hian.

source: See my servant, whom I am supporting, my loved one, in whom I take delight: I have put my spirit on him; he will give the knowledge of the true God to the nations.
target: Ka chhiahhlawh, ka chelh reng, ka thlan, ka rilruin a lawm êm ema hi en teh u: a chungah ka thlaru ka dah ta; Jentailte hnêna pêk tûrin rorêlna thu a la chhuak ang.

source: The owner of the hole is responsible; he will have to make payment to their owner, but the dead beast will be his.
target: chu khuakhurum neitu chuan a rûl tûr a ni: ani chuan chûng ran neitu chu tangka a pe ang a, tichuan anin ran thi chu a ruang a hlâwm ang.

source: By mercy and good faith evil-doing is taken away: and by the fear of the Lord men are turned away from evil.
target: Zahngaihna leh thutakin khawlohna chu tlenfai a ni a, LALPA tihnain miin sual a kalsan thin.

source: Do not say, I will give punishment for evil: go on waiting for the Lord, and he will be your saviour.
target: Sual chu ka thungrul teh mai ang, ti suh la, LALPA ngaichang rih la, ani chuan a chhanhim ang che.

source: Take these with you.
target: Hengte hi keng la.

source: I grow rice
target: Buh ka ching

source: Let's not blow it.
target: I puak suh ang u.

source: If a child is trained up in the right way, even when he is old he will not be turned away from it.
target: Naupang chu a kalna awm kawngah chuan zirtir ula, A upa hun pawhin a thlah lo vang.

source: But if what he has said is true, and she is seen to be not a virgin,
target: Amaherawhchu chu mi thu chu a lo dik a, nula chu nula thianghlim a nihna a lo lan loh chuan

source: And the woman of Midian who was put to death was Cozbi, the daughter of Zur; he was the head of a family in Midian.
target: Tin, Midia hmeichia an thah taka hming chu Kozbi, Zura fanu a ni: ani chu Midia ho chhûngkaw zinga an hotu a ni.

source: You are judging from what you see; I am judging no man.
target: Nangnin tisa angin in sawisel thin; kei zawngin tumah ka sawisel lo.

source: Give him praise for his acts of power: give him praise in the measure of his great strength.
target: A thiltihtheihna boruak zau takah khian amah chu fak rawh u. A thiltih ropui takte avângin amah chu fak ula:

source: It is a small dog
target: Ui te tak te a ni

source: For honour does not come from the east, or from the west, or uplifting from the south;
target: Tihsanna chu chhak lam ata a ni hek lo, thlang lam ata a ni hek lo, Chhim lam ata lah a ni hek lo.

source: Through your evil-doing these things have been turned away, and your sins have kept back good from you.
target: Heng thilte hi in khawlohnate chuan a tibo va, In sualnate chuan thi tha a chantir che u a ni.

source: You are a bit fat.
target: I thau deuh a ni.

source: Take this from their part and give it to Eleazar the priest as an offering to be lifted up to the Lord.
target: Chung chu la ula, LALPA tana then t hilhlanah puithiam Eleazara pe rawh u.

source: Whose clock is it?
target: Tu ta nge ni?

source: Will he be angry for ever? will he keep his wrath to the end? These things you have said, and have done evil and have had your way.
target: A thin a ur kumkhua dawn êm ni? A tawp thlengin êm ni a ur dawn? Ngai rawh, chutiang chuan i țawng ngei a, Mahse a sual thei ang berin thil i ti a.

source: I like dogs
target: Uite ka duh

source: If we say openly that we have done wrong, he is upright and true to his word, giving us forgiveness of sins and making us clean from all evil.
target: Kan sualte thupha kan chawi chuan kan sualte ngaidam tur leh kan fel lohna zawng zawng tlengfai turin amah chu a rinawmin a fel a ni.

source: Then they said to Jeremiah, May the Lord be a true witness against us in good faith, if we do not do everything which the Lord your God sends you to say to us.
target: Tin, anni chuan Jeremia hnênah, LALPA i Pathianin kan hnêna a tirhna che thu zawng zawng ang zela kan tih loh chuan kan lakah LALPA chu thu hretu dik leh rinawm ni rawh se.

source: So that men will say, Truly there is a reward for righteousness; truly there is a God who is judge on the earth.
target: Chutichuan miten, Mi fel tan chuan lawmman a lo awm tak tak a: Leiah hian rorêltu Pathian a lo awm tak tak a nih hi, an ti ang.

source: It's lost
target: A bo tawh

source: And they said evil things against the God of heaven because of their pain and their wounds; and they were not turned from their evil works.
target: an nate leh an pante avangin van Pathian chu an sawichhia a; an thiltihte chu an sim chuang lo.

source: Did you let him know yet?
target: I la hriattir em?

source: Yes, you will be like him who takes his rest on the sea, or on the top of a sail-support.
target: A ni, mi tuifinriat lai taka mu ang emaw, Lawng puanzarna chhipa mu ang emaw i ni ang.

source: When I made a division of the five cakes of bread among the five thousand, what number of baskets full of broken bits did you take up? They said to him, Twelve.
target: Sangnga zinga chhangper panga ka phel lai khan a nawi kha bawmrang engzat nge in ruh khah? a ti a. Tin, anni chuan a hnenah, Sawm leh pahnih, an ti a.

source: And this good news of the kingdom will be given through all the world for a witness to all nations; and then the end will come.
target: Tin, he ram Chanchin Tha hi hnam zawng zawng hriattirna turin khawvel zawng zawngah hrilhin a awm ang; chu mi zawhah chuan tawpna chu a lo thleng ang.

source: For every tree is judged by its fruit. Men do not get figs from thorns, or grapes from blackberry plants.
target: Thing tin anmahni rah theuhvah a hriat a ni. Miin hruihlingnei kungah theipui an lo ngai lo, nghardai kungah grep rah an lo ngai bawk hek lo.

source: And so a hollow-minded man will get wisdom, when a young ass of the field gets teaching.
target: Ram sabengtung no mihringa a pian hunah Mi lawilo chuan hriatna a nei chauh vang.

source: Tom isn't talented
target: Tom hi a thiam lo

source: Fair looks are a deceit, and a beautiful form is of no value; but a woman who has the fear of the Lord is to be praised.
target: Duhsakna hi bumna a ni a, hmêl thâtna chu engmah lo a ni. LALPA tihtu hmeichhia erawh chu fak a ni ang.

source: Who gave them to you?
target: Tuin nge pe che?

source: Who, when they had put questions to me, were ready to let me go free, because there was no cause of death in me.
target: Tin, anni chuan mi chhuahchhal zawhin thihna khawp meuh ka chungah engmah a awm loh avangin thlah mi tum a.

source: I knew Tom
target: Tom ka hrechiang

source: Don't ask me.
target: Min zâwt suh.

source: And from before the opening of the doorway to before the inner covered way of the doorway was fifty cubits.
target: Tin, kawngka in pawn ta ber ațanga kawngka in sumhmun chhûngril ber thleng chuan tawng sawmnga a ni.

source: You've lost weight.
target: I thau tawh a ni.

source: They've already won
target: An chak tawh a ni

source: It's so loud
target: A ring lutuk

source: She has done what she was able: she has put oil on my body to make it ready for its last resting-place.
target: A tih theih tawk a ti a ni; ka taksa hi phum turin a lo hnawih lawk a nih hi.

source: Aren't you excited
target: I phur lo em ni

source: That you made for yourself an arched room in every open place.
target: hmun langsarte i in siam a, kawtthlêr tinah hmun sângte chu i tan i sa a.

source: Then loudly the feet of the horses were sounding with the stamping, the stamping of their war-horses.
target: Tichuan sakawrte chu an per ta tlut tlut a, Sakawr chakte chu an zuan an zuan avângin.

source: But the Lord has taken you out of the flaming fire, out of Egypt, to be to him the people of his heritage, as you are today.
target: LALPA chuan a mite, a ro ni turin thir rawhtuina ata, Aigupta ram ata chu a hruai chhuak zawk che u a ni, tuna in nih ang hi.

source: Every tree which does not give good fruit is cut down and put in the fire.
target: Thing tin rah tha lo apiang chu an kit a, meiah an paih thin.

source: Talking against him secretly in their tents, they did not give ear to the voice of the Lord.
target: An puan inahte chuan an phunnawi ta zawk a, LALPA aw chu an ngaithla duh lo va.

source: So Eleazar and Moses did as the Lord had given orders to Moses.
target: Tichuan LALPAN Mosia thu a pêk ang chuan Mosia leh puithiam Eleazara chuan an ti a.

source: In the future life, when they come back from the dead, whose wife will she be? for the seven had her for a wife.
target: Thawhleh hunah chuan a tu bera nupui nge ni ang? an pasarih chuan nupuiah an nei theuh si a, tiin an zawt a.

source: Making signs with his eyes, rubbing with his feet, and giving news with his fingers;
target: A mit a siai a, a kein thu a sawi a, A kut zungtangin a zaizir thin.

source: Is there any zakuska?
target: Zakuska a awm em?

source: I told her straight.
target: Ka hrilh nghal a.

source: So Jehoiakim went to rest with his fathers; and Jehoiachin his son became king in his place.
target: Chutichuan Jeoiakima chu a i leh pute hnênah a muhil a; tin, a fapa Jeoiakina chu a aiawhin a lal ta a.

source: And the hare, because the horn of its foot is not parted in two, is unclean to you.
target: Tin, zupui, thialret chu a thial naa, mahse a tin a kak loh avangin; in tan a bawlhhlawh a ni.

source: You'll be surprised.
target: Mak i ti hle ang.

source: For your mercy is higher than the heavens: and your unchanging faith than the clouds.
target: I ngilneihna chu van khum khawpin a nasa si a, I thutak chuan van dumte khi a tawng hial bawk a.

source: You're really nice
target: I fel takzet a ni

source: Where there is much talk there will be no end to sin, but he who keeps his mouth shut does wisely.
target: Thu tam takah chuan a bawhchhiatna a awm thin a, A ka sum thei mi erawh chuan fing takin a ti thin.

source: Had authority over the transport workers, giving directions to all who were doing any sort of work; and among the Levites there were scribes and overseers and door-keepers.
target: A phurha phur mite hotu pawh an ni a, hna tinreng thawktute thawh tûr relbawltu an ni: lehkhaziaktute, hotu te, kawngkhâr vêngtute chu Levi mite zinga mi an ni.

source: Do you still have a headache
target: Lu na i la nei em

source: They've fired him
target: An ban tawh a ni

source: They don't have a shed.
target: Chhuk an nei lo.

source: But Peter said, May your money come to destruction with you, because you had the idea that what is freely given by God may be got for a price.
target: Nimahsela Peteran a hnenah, I tangka hi i boral rualin boral ve rawh se, Pathian thilpek tangka suma lei i tum avangin.

source: The memory of my song comes back to me in the night; my thoughts are moving in my heart; my spirit is searching with care.
target: Zanah ka ngaihtuah neuh neuh a, Ka dawn vêl a, ka inzawt thin a; Ka thlarau pawhin thahnemngai takin a zawng a.

source: And the time Solomon was king in Jerusalem over all Israel was forty years.
target: Solomonan Israel-ho zawng zawng chunga Jerusalem khuaa ro a rel chhûng chu kum sâwmli a ni.

source: For then I might have gone to my rest in quiet, and in sleep have been in peace,
target: Chutin ka mu ang a, ka reh riai tawh tûr; Ka muhiil ang a, ka chawl tawh tûr:

source: Does it work?
target: A theih em?

source: Be brave
target: Huai rawh

source: Because, she said to herself, if I may but put my hand on his robe, I will be made well.
target: A puan hmawr chauh pawh dek ila, tidamin ka awm mai ang, tih a rilruk a ni.

source: I ran
target: Ka tlan tawh

source: Under him are sharp edges of broken pots: as if he was pulling a grain-crushing instrument over the wet earth.
target: A hnuai lampangte pawh lampei hriam tak ang a ni a; Diakahte chuan buhchil khawl ang maiin a bawk a.

source: Let's sing
target: Hla sa ang

source: Kain, Gibeah, and Timnah; ten towns with their unwalled places.
target: kain te, Gibea te, Timna te; khawpuite chu khawperte nen khaw sawm a ni.

source: They're Canadians
target: Canada mi an ni

source: They defended themselves
target: An inveng a

source: I didn't pass the test.
target: Test ka pass lo.

source: It's very personal
target: Mimal tak a ni

source: I'm over you.
target: I chungah ka awm.

source: But hearing these words the young man went away sorrowing: for he had much property.
target: Tlangval erawh chuan chu thu chu a hriatin lungngai takin a kal bo ta a, sum tam tak nei mi a nih avangin.

source: And took away all the stored wealth from the house of the Lord, and from the king's house, and all the gold body-covers which Solomon had made.
target: LALPA ina rote leh lal ina rote chu a la a, a vai chuan a la ta vek a: tin, Solomona rangkachak phaw siam zawng awngte chu ala tel vek a.

source: The wrath of God came on them, and put to death the fattest of them, and put an end to the young men of Israel.
target: Chu mi lai tak chuan Pathian thinurna chu an chungah a chho va, An mi nalh nalhte thenkhat a that a, Israel tlangvâlte chu an vawthlu hlawm a.

source: Who went with him when he was in Galilee and took care of him; and a number of other women who came up with him to Jerusalem.
target: chung chu Galili rama a awm lai a, amah zuia a rawng bawlsak thinte chu an ni, hmeichhe dang tam tak, Jerusalem khuaa ama ruala chho vete chu an tel bawk a.

source: They will assist us.
target: Min pui ang.

source: Is this a cat or a dog?
target: Hei hi ui nge ui?

source: I sent you to get in grain which you had no hand in planting: other men did that work, and you take the reward.
target: In thawhrim loh at turin ka tirh che u kha; mi dangin an thawk a, nangnin an thawhsa chu in chhunzawm a ni, a ti a.

source: We won.
target: Kan chak.

source: And Jephthah took an oath to the Lord, and said, If you will give the children of Ammon into my hands,
target: Tin, Jephthan LALPA hnênah chhia a chham a, Amona thlahte hi ka kuta mi pêk takmeuh chuan,

source: Give me teaching and I will be quiet; and make me see my error.
target: Mi zirtir ula, ka ngawi ang e; Ka bona lai mi hriattir rawh u.

source: They did not believe me.
target: Min ring lo.

source: I'm loaded
target: Peih ka ni ta

source: I caught it
target: Ka man e

source: And four times they sent to me in this way, and I sent them the same answer.
target: Tin, chutiang hlir chuan vawi li thu min rawn thawn a; chutiang hlir chuan ka chhâng bawk a.

source: Foolish men, because of their sins, and because of their wrongdoing, are troubled;
target: Mi âte chu an bawhchhiatna avâng leh, An khawlohnate avângin an intihreawm thin a.

source: I shouted
target: Ka au a

source: We have water enough
target: Tui kan nei tawk

source: Who is like a newly married man coming from his bride-tent, and is glad like a strong runner starting on his way.
target: Chu ni chu mo neitu tûr a pindan ata chhuak ang chu a ni a, Mi chak tak angin a tlanna kawng a tlan tûr chu a hlim thin.

source: I don't swear
target: Ka tiam lo che

source: You're a reporter
target: Reporter i ni a

source: See, in every common saying about you it will be said, As the mother is, so is her daughter.
target: Ngai rawh, thufing tawi hmang apiangin he thufing tawi hi an hmang ang,'A fanuin a nu a chhun' tih hi.

source: All this, said David, the design for all these things, has been made dear to me in writing by the hand of the Lord.
target: Davida chuan, Hengte hi tih dan tûr rem a ruat sa tichiang tûra LALPAN ama kut ngeia a ziak ang kha a ni, a ti a.

source: You didn't show up.
target: I inlan lo.

source: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the harmony of the Holy Spirit, be with you all.
target: Lalpa Isua Krista khawngaihna te, Pathian hmangaihna te, Thlarau Thianghlim pawlna te chu in zaa hnenah awm rawh se.

source: You're not Tom, are you?
target: Tom i ni lo maw?

source: Let them be: they are blind guides. And if a blind man is guiding a blind man, the two will go falling into a hole together.
target: Anni chu pawisa suh u; hruaitu mitdel an ni. Tichuan, mitdelin mitdel vek a hruai chuan khuarkhurumah an tla dun ang, a ti a, a chhang a.

source: We do not accept tips.
target: Tips kan pawm lo.

source: He's loaded
target: A khat liam hlê

source: For I have come to put a man against his father, and the daughter against her mother, and the daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law:
target: Mi, a pa dotir turin, fanu a nu dotir turin, mo a pi dotir turin lo kal ka ni asin.

source: Let all my wrongdoing be washed away, and make me clean from evil.
target: Ka khawlohnate hi mi silfaisak var la, Ka sual hi mi thlenfaisâng ang che.

source: And when Hezekiah saw that Sennacherib had come for the purpose of fighting against Jerusalem,
target: Tin, Senakeriba a lo thawk a, Jerusalem rawn bei a tum tih Jezekian a hriat chuan,

source: Keep in mind those who were over you, and who gave you the word of God; seeing the outcome of their way of life, let your faith be like theirs.
target: In hotu, Pathian thu lo hrilhtute che u chu hre reng ula, an awm dana thil chhuak chu ngaihtuahin an rin dan zir rawh u.

source: For in the days of David and Asaph in the past, there was a master of the music, and songs of blessing and praise to God.
target: Hman laia Davida leh Asapha dam lai chuan hla sa pâwl hotu an awm thin a, Pathian fakna leh lawmna hlate an sa thin a ni.

source: What is he learning
target: Eng nge a zir

source: And after burning all their towns and all their tent-circles,
target: An awmna khua zawng zawng te, an riahhmun zawng zawngte an hal vek a.

source: Then Zedekiah said to Jeremiah, Let no man have knowledge of these words, and you will not be put to death.
target: Tin, Zedemia chuan Jeremia hnênah, Heng thute hi tuman hre suh se, tichuan i thi lo vang.

source: Every oath, and every undertaking which she gives, to keep herself from pleasure, may be supported or broken by her husband.
target: Thutiam emaw, intiamkamna emaw reng reng a pasalin a remtihpuiin a țhiatsak thei bawk a ni.

source: And the open spaces of the town will be full of boys and girls playing in its open spaces.
target: Tin, kawtthlêra infiamin khawpui kawtthlêrte chu Hmeiche naupang leh mipa naupangin An la khat nuai nuai ang.

source: I loved them both
target: An pahnih hian ka hmangaih em em a

source: And, after preaching the word in Perga, they went down to Attalia;
target: Tin, Perga khuaa thu an hril zawhin Attalia khuaah an zuk kal a;

source: When the evil-doer comes, a low opinion comes with him, and with the loss of honour comes shame.
target: Suahsualna a lo awmin hmustina pawh a lo awm thin, Mualphona a lo awin zilhhauna.

source: Then he took his place in front of the altar of the Lord, all the men of Israel being present,
target: Tin, LALPA maichâm bulah Israel pungkhawm zawng awng hmuhah chuan a ding a, a ban a phar a,

source: The silver is mine and the gold is mine, says the Lord of armies.
target: Tangkarua hi ka ta a ni a, rangkachak hi ka ta a ni, tih hi sipaihote LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: God has not put away the people of his selection. Or have you no knowledge of what is said about Elijah in the holy Writings? how he says words to God against Israel,
target: Pathianin a mi hriat lawkte chu a paih thla lo ve. Pathian Lehkha Thuin Elija thu a sawi hi in hre lo vem ni? Ani chuan Israel mite chung thu Pathian hnenah a thlen a,

source: I am getting weak!
target: Ka chak lo chho zel a!

source: And death came to Haran when he was with his father Terah in the land of his birth, Ur of the Chaldees.
target: Tin, Harana chu a pianna rama, Kaldai-ho khua Ur-ah, a pa Tera hmaah chuan a thi a.

source: They are curious.
target: An hriat duh hle.

source: They go rushing on like reed-boats, like an eagle dropping suddenly on its food.
target: An kal liam a, lawng chak tak angin, Muipui tum nei bir angin.,

source: It's complex
target: A khirhkhân a ni

source: And this is the witness of John when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to him with the question, Who are you?
target: Tin, Judaten, Tunge i nih?tia zawt tura Jerusalem khua ata a hnena puithiamte leh Levia chia mite an tirh lai khan heng hi Johana thu lo hriattir chu a ni:

source: So put yourselves under the authority, not for fear of wrath, but because you have the knowledge of what is right.
target: Chuvangin thinur hlauh vang chauh ni lovin, i chhia leh tha hriatna avang pawhin roreltu thu thuin i awm tur reng a ni.

source: He's a nerd
target: Mimawl a ni

source: The word about Arabia. In the thick woods of Arabia will be your night's resting-place, O travelling bands of Dedanites!
target: Arabia ram chunga phur rit chu. Aw Dedan-ho khualzin pâwl tinte u, Arabia rama ramhnuaiah in riak ang.

source: They don't trust you
target: An ring lo che

source: The sons of God saw that the daughters of men were fair; and they took wives for themselves from those who were pleasing to them.
target: Pathian fapate chuan mihring fanute chu hmêl tha takin an hmu a; tichuan an duhzâwng apiangte chu nupuiahte an lo nei ta thîn a.

source: Birds sing
target: Savate an hram

source: You burnt nothing.
target: Engmah i hal lo.

source: And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha, his servant, as a wife; and she had Attai by him.
target: Tin, Sesana chuan a fanu chu a chhiahhlawh Jara chu nupuiah a neihtir a; tin, Ataia a hrinsak a.

source: But the women had the fear of God, and did not do as the king of Egypt said, but let the male children go on living.
target: Nimahsela nau chhar mite chuan Pathian an tih a, tichuan Aigupta lal thupêk ang chuan an ti duh lo va, mipa fate chu an humhim ta zêl zâwk a.

source: So I have made an oath to the family of Eli that no offering of meat or of meal which they may make will ever take away the sin of his family.
target: Chuvangin Elia chhûngkaw hnênah chuan Elia chhûngte bawhchhiatna chu inthawinain emaw, thilhlanin emaw, engtikahmah tihkian theih ani lo vang tiin chhia ka cham tawh a ni, a ti a.

source: I see a lion
target: Sakei ka hmu

source: I'm a businessman
target: Sumdawng ka ni a

source: And Shema was the father of Raham, the father of Jorkeam, and Rekem was the father of Shammai.
target: Tin, Semann Jorkeama pa Rahama a hring a; tin, Rekeman Samaia a hring a.

source: Then the Hebrews who had been with the Philistines for some time, and had gone up with them to their tents, turning round were joined to those who were with Saul and Jonathan.
target: Chutichuan chung lai ram vela mi riahhmuna han kal ve, tun hma lama Philistia-ho ama tang Hebrai mite pawh chu Suala leh Jonathana hnêna awm Israel mite lamah chuan an lo pakai leh ta a.

source: And put them all on the hands of Aaron and of his sons, to be waved for a wave offering before the Lord.
target: tin, chûng chu Arona kut le a fapate kut ah chuan i dah vek tur a ni a, LALPA hmaa thên thil hlan a tân i thên tur a ni.

source: I don't laugh very often.
target: Ka nui vak lo.

source: Were you in the military?
target: Sipaiah i awm em?

source: I called a friend.
target: Ka thianpa pakhat ka call a.

source: And at the door of the House of the Tent of meeting, he put the altar of burned offerings, offering on it the burned offering and the meal offering, as the Lord had given him orders.
target: Tin, inbiakna puan in biak bûk kawngka bulah chuan halrala thilhlanna maicham a chhung a, a chhûngah chuan halral thilhlan leh ei tur thilhlan a hlan a; LALPAN Mosia thu a pêk ang khan.

source: How, when anyone came to a store of twenty measures, there were only ten: when anyone went to the wine-store to get fifty vessels full, there were only twenty.
target: khâng hun lai zawng zawng khân buh tehkhâwng sawmhnih tling âwm tak chhûn khâwmnaa mi a lo kalin sawmhnih chauh a lo tling țhîn.

source: Let your ear be bent down for hearing my words, and let your heart give thought to knowledge.
target: I beng chhi la, mi fing thu ngaithla rawh; Tin, i thinlung chu ka finna dâwn nân hmang rawh.

source: She doesn't want to have children.
target: Fa neih a duh lo.

source: Don't come near the light!
target: Eng hnaih suh!

source: Against the wall
target: Bang chungah chuan

source: You are wandering
target: I vakvai a ni

source: You're a competitor
target: Inelna neitu i ni

source: Let your land be worked with the plough, O daughter of Tarshish; there is no longer any harbour.
target: Aw Tarsis fanu, Nile lui angin i ramah chuan luang liam rawh; i kawnghrenna rêng rêng a tawm tawh loh hi.

source: Are we lost?
target: Kan bo em?

source: There were ninety-six apples on the outside; the number of apples all round the network was a hundred.
target: Tin, a pangah chuan pawmgranet sawmkua leh paruk a awm a, a vêla a cheimawina pawmgranet zawng zawng chu zakhat a ni.

source: Don't cry, she said.
target: Tap suh, a ti a.

source: With your arm you have made your people free, the sons of Jacob and Joseph. (Selah.
target: I banin i mite chhan chhuak a, Jakobha leh Josefa fate chu. Selah

source: We'll scream
target: Kan au vak ang

source: Don't peek
target: Melh suh

source: They haven't come back yet
target: An la rawn haw lo

source: For their thoughts were bitter against you: they had an evil design in their minds, which they were not able to put into effect.
target: I chungah khan thil sual tih an tum si a; Thil sual an ngaihtuah chhuak a, an hlen thei si lo.

source: Give water to him who is in need of water; give bread, O men of the land of Tema, to those in flight.
target: Tuihal hnênah chuan tui an rawn la a, tema rama awmte chuan an chawin tlan bote chu an hmuak a.

source: He is the master of this house.
target: He in luahtu a ni.

source: We got a little bored with each other.
target: Kan in bo deuh a.

source: Then all the king's wise men came in: but they were not able to make out the writing or give the sense of it to the king.
target: Tichuan lal mifingte zawng zawng chuan lo lût a; mahse ziak chu an chhiar thei lo va, a hrilhfiahna lah lal an hriattîr thei hek lo.

source: So do not give up your hope which will be greatly rewarded.
target: Chutichuan, in rinna lawmman chu paih bo suh u, lawmman ropui tak a nei dawn si a.

source: I have a safe resting-place for my feet; I will give praise to the Lord in the meetings of the people.
target: Ka ke hi hmun zawl takah a ding a; Inkhawmnaahte chuan LALPA chu ka fak ang.

source: Am I interrupting
target: Ka titawp em

source: But the noble-hearted man has noble purposes, and by these he will be guided.
target: Mi țha erawh chuan dik takin thil a ti a, thu dik a tan tlat țhin.

source: It's a really cool car
target: Car cool tak a ni

source: And the time when David was king in Hebron over the people of Judah was seven years and six months.
target: Davidan Hebron-a Juda chite chunga ro a lo rêlna chu kum sarih le thla ruk ani tawh a.

source: I'll take it
target: Ka la dawn

source: And I saw how that horn made war on the saints and overcame them,
target: Tin, ka en reng a, chu ki ngei chuan mi thianghlimte chu a do va, a hneh a;

source: I'm starting to go bald.
target: Ka bald tan ta.

source: Their throat is like an open place of death; with their tongues they have said what is not true: the poison of snakes is under their lips:
target: An hrawk chu thlan inhawng a ni a; An leiin bumna thu an sawi a An kam chhungah rul tur a awm a.

source: So Joshua made stone knives and gave the children of Israel circumcision at Gibeath-ha-araloth.
target: Tin, Josuan meilung chemte chu a siam a, Israel thlahte chu vun hmawr tlângah serh a tansak a.

source: And Stephen, full of grace and power, did great wonders and signs among the people.
target: Tin, Stephana chu ngilneihna leh thiltihtheihnain a khat a, mi zingah thilmak leh chhinchhiahna ropui tak a ti thin a.

source: A servant who does wisely will have rule over a son causing shame, and will have his part in the heritage among brothers.
target: Chhiahhlawh fing taka che chuan fapa, mualphona thlentu chungah chuan ro a rêl ang a, Unau ro zingah chanvo a nei ang.

source: For he is the Yes to all the undertakings of God: and by him all the words of God are made certain and put into effect, to the glory of God through us.
target: Pathian thutiamte chu engzat pawh ni se, amahah chuan A ni tih chu a awm si a; chutichuan amah avang pawhin Amen tih chu a awm a ni, keimahni avanga Pathian ropuina turin.

source: You seem mad
target: I ât hmêl

source: I have eaten enough
target: Ka ei tling tawh

source: They are not in heaven, for you to say, Who will go up to heaven for us and give us knowledge of them so that we may do them?
target: 'Kan hriata kan zawm theihna turin tunge vanah min kalsak ang a, min han laksak ang?' tih turin vana mi an ni lo va,

source: I was extremely tired.
target: Ka chau hle mai.

source: And the sea-force of Hiram, in addition to gold from Ophir, came back with much sandal-wood and jewels.
target: Tin, Hirama lawngrual, Ophir atanga rangkachak va phurte pawh chuan Ophir atangin almug thing tam tak leh lunghlute an rawn phur a.

source: For the Lord made Judah low, because of Ahaz, king of Israel; for he had given up all self-control in Judah, sinning greatly against the Lord.
target: Juda lal Ahaza khan Judate dik lo takin a timualpho fo va, LALPA chungah thil sual nasa tak a tih avâng khan LALPAN Judate chu a tilawm a ni.

source: Are you calling it a night?
target: Zan i ti em ni?

source: When she had news of the things which Jesus did, went among the people coming after him, and put her hand on his robe.
target: chu mi chuan Isua chanchin thute chu a lo hria a, a hnunga mipui zingah chuan a lo kal a, a puan chu a dek a.

source: Did you sing?
target: I zai thiam kha?

source: Their face is blacker than night; in the streets no one has knowledge of them: their skin is hanging on their bones, they are dry, they have become like wood.
target: An landan lungalhthei aiin a dum zawk a, kawtthlêahte chuan hriat an ni lo; An vun chu an ruhahte a bet a, hmawlh angin a ro va.

source: You are rude
target: I hawihhâwmlo

source: Among all my troubled thoughts, your comforts are the delight of my soul.
target: Ka rilrua ngaihtuah tam tak ka neih lai chuan I thlamuannate chuan ka nunna hi a tihlium thin.

source: He was alone
target: Amah chuah a ni

source: His memory is gone from the earth, and in the open country there is no knowledge of his name.
target: Lei ata a hriat rengna a boral ang a, Kawtthlêrah hming a nei tahw lo vang.

source: And these are the generations of Esau, the father of the Edomites in the hill-country of Seir:
target: Tin, hêng hi Seir tlânga Edom-ho thlahtu Esauva thlahte chu an ni:

source: And your strength will be used up without profit; for your land will not give her increase and the trees of the field will not give their fruit.
target: tin, in tha in seng thlawn mai mai a ni ang: in ram chuan thil a hawntir lo vang a, rama thingte chuan rah an chuah hek lo vang.

source: Let's join hand in hand.
target: Kut inkawp ila.

source: And he did evil because his heart was not true to the Lord.
target: LALPA zawn nân a rilru a hman loh avângin thil tha lo a ti a.

source: It'll happen
target: A lo thleng dâwn

source: Then Jonathan and David made an agreement together, because of Jonathan's love for David.
target: Chutichuan Jonathana leh Davida chuan thu an thlung a, ama nunna ang chiaha a hmangaih avângin.

source: Great salvation does he give to his king; he has mercy on the king of his selection, David, and on his seed for ever.
target: Ani chuan chhandamna ropui tak a lal siam hnênah a pe thin a; A hriak thiha chungah, Davida leh a thlahte chun gngeiah chuan, Kumkhuain a ngilneihzia a lantir ang.

source: And I saw a round cover of lead lifted up; and a woman was seated in the middle of the ephah.
target: Suan talent khata rit a chhin chu a hawng a, bâwm chhûngah hmeiche pakhat a țhu a.

source: It stinks.
target: A rimchhia.

source: And the Lord said, Take off the shoes from your feet, for the place where you are is holy.
target: Tin, Lalpa chuan a hnenah, ‘I kephah ata i pheikhawk kha phelh rawh; i dinna hmun kha lei thianghlim a ni e.

source: Let Deacons be husbands of one wife, ruling their children and their houses well.
target: Kohhranho rawngbawltute chu an fate leh anmahni in chhung khawsak rel felin nupui pakhat nei ni rawh se.

source: You could've been happy.
target: I hlim thei ang.

source: I don't choose you.
target: Ka thlang lo che.

source: It was exhausting
target: A hahthlak hle mai

source: Let him not see the rivers of oil, the streams of honey and milk.
target: Luipuite chu a thlir lo vang a, Khawizu leh bawnghnute khala luang luite chu,

source: And the churches of Judaea which were in Christ still had no knowledge of my face or person:
target: Nimahsela,Judai ram kohhranho Kristaa awmte hmelhriat ka la ni lo ta fo va.

source: Hey, wake up!
target: Hei, harh rawh

source: And when he had seen the vision, straight away we made the decision to go into Macedonia, for it seemed certain to us that God had sent us to give the good news to them.
target: Tin, chu mang chu a man zawh veleh Makedonia ramah chuan kal kan tum ta nghal a, an hnena Chanchin Tha hrilah Pathianin min ko tih kan hria a.

source: kidney disorder
target: Kal thalo

source: The disciple is not greater than his master, but everyone whose learning is complete will be like his master.
target: Zirtir chu a zirtirtu chungah a awm lo; nimahsela mi tin an zir zawhin an zirtirtu angin an awm ang.

source: Unleavened cakes are to be your food through all the seven days; let no leavened bread be seen among you, or any leaven, in any part of your land.
target: Ni sarih chhûng chuan chhang dawidim telh rêng rêng chu a awmin awm hlek suh se, in awmna hmunah rêng rêng dawidim pawh a awmin awm hlek suh se.

source: Ah Lord God! see, you have made the heaven and the earth by your great power and by your outstretched arm, and there is nothing you are not able to do:
target: Aw LALPA pathian, ngai rawh, i thiltihtheihna nasa leh i kut pharin lei leh van i siam ta a; i tan thiltih harsa lûtuk a awm rêng rêng lo va:

source: They are round me all the day like water; they have made a circle about me.
target: Chung chuang nilengin tui angin mi vêl a; Mi hual vêl hlawm a.

source: For the Lord says, As for the unsexed who keep my Sabbaths, and give their hearts to pleasing me, and keep their agreement with me:
target: Ka chawlhnite serha, ka lawmzawng thilte thlanga, ka thuthlung pawm tlattu mi tilrehte chungchang thu-ah chuan LALPAN heti hian a ti si a:

source: It was superficial
target: A chunglam a ni

source: He who made them go through the deep waters, like a horse in the waste land?
target: An inchhuih lohna tûra tui thuk taka, thlalêra sakawr hruai anga anmahniho hruaia kaitu kha khawiah nge?

source: And Ahaz was the father of Jehoaddah; and Jehoaddah was the father of Alemeth and Azmaveth and Zimri; and Zimri was the father of Moza;
target: Tin, Ahazan Jehoada a hring a; tin, Jehoadan Alemetha leh Azmavetha leh Zimriaahring a; tin, Zimrian Moza a hring a;

source: For this reason pride is round them like a chain; they are clothed with violent behaviour as with a robe.
target: Chuvangin chapona chuan khaidiat angin an nghawng a vêl a; Nunrawnna chuan silhfen angin a tuam a.

source: He bought a Wii U.
target: Wii U a lei a.

source: For truly my words are not false; one who has all knowledge is talking with you.
target: Ka thu a daw hauh lo ve, Hriatna famkim nei chu i kiangah a awm hi.

source: And David was angry because of the Lord's outburst of wrath against Uzzah: and he gave that place the name Perez-uzzah, which is its name to this day.
target: Tin, LALPA chu Uza chnga a tuan tak avângin Davida chu a thinur a, chu mi hmun chu Perez-uza a vuah a, tun thleng hian a la ni ta reng a.

source: Do you guys need anything?
target: In mamawh em?

source: We can say that.
target: Chutiang chu kan sawi thei a ni.

source: Carry this.
target: Hei hi pai rawh.

source: But if you go into a town where they will not have you, go out into the streets of it and say,
target: Khua in luhna apiangah an lawm loh che u erawh chuan, an kawtthlerah kal chhuak ula,

source: I don't snore
target: Ka hnar ngai lo

source: I can take it.
target: Ka la thei e.

source: If he puts out his hand to take, by whom may it be turned back? who may say to him, What are you doing?
target: Ngai teh, a la mai a, tunge khap thei? Eng nge i tih, tunge ti ang le?

source: Don't try to deny it.
target: Hnial tum suh.

source: We don't get on well with each other.
target: Kan inrem tha lo.

source: Stay there
target: Khatah awm rawh

source: Tom will pay
target: Toma'n a pe dawn

source: We're not taking questions.
target: Zawhna kan la lo.

source: And he came and was living in a town named Nazareth: so that the word of the prophets might come true, He will be named a Nazarene.
target: khaw pakhat Nazaret an tihah chuan a va awm ta a: Ani chu ‘Nazaret mi’ an ti ang, tia, zawlneite kaa an sawi kha a lo thlen theih nan.

source: And Edom said, You are not to go through my land, for if you do I will come out against you with the sword.
target: Tin, Edoma chuan a hnenah Mi pal tlâng tur ani lo, mi pal chuan abei tur chein khandaih nen ka lo thawk ang, a ti a.

source: For his heart was fixed on the Lord, not turning from his ways, and he did his orders which the Lord gave to Moses.
target: LALPA chu a vuan tlat a, amah a zui ch a bang du lo va, a thupêk LALPAN Mosia a pêkte chu a zawm a.

source: In those days I, Daniel, gave myself up to grief for three full weeks.
target: Chûng nîte chuan, kei Daniela chu hapta thum pumhlûm lusûn angin ka awm a.

source: For you have said, The Lord has given us prophets in Babylon.
target: LALPA chuan Babulon ramah pawh hian zâwlnei min dinsak a, in ti si a.

source: Let's get it open.
target: I hawng ang u.

source: The stone which the builders put on one side has become the chief stone of the building.
target: In satute lung duh loh kha A kila lung tangkai ber alo ni ta.

source: We're still eating
target: Kan la ei reng a

source: Let us out
target: Kan lo chhuak

source: And a great number went after him; and he made them well there.
target: tin, mipui tam takin an zui a; chutah chuan anmahni chu a tidam ta a.

source: All these came together in the valley of Siddim (which is the Salt Sea.
target: Chûngho zawng zawng chu Siddim ruamah chuan an tang tlâng a chu mi ruam chu Tuifinriat Al a ni ta

source: We didn't go downstairs.
target: Kan chhuk lo.

source: Tom promised
target: Tom a intiam

source: No one is to take, on account of a debt, the stones with which grain is crushed: for in doing so he takes a man's living.
target: Buh rawtsawmna emaw, a chung lam lung emaw tumah in hrensak tur ani lo, mi nunna hrensk a ni dawn si a.

source: I hear Tom's voice.
target: Tom-a aw ka hria.

source: I'm a dancer
target: Lam thiam ka nia

source: See now, I have put my cause in order, and I am certain that I will be seen to be right.
target: Ngai teh u, ka thu ka rem fel tawh a, Thiam ka chang ang tih ka hria.

source: Lal a ni em? Pathian a ni em?
target: A king? A god?

source: Then take a look at our faces and the faces of the young men who have food from the king's table; and, having seen them, do to your servants as it seems right to you.
target: Tin i hmâa kan lan dânte leh lal châw tuihmêl ei tleirâwlte landan chu tehkhin nisela, tin, i hmuh dan angin i chhiahhlawhte chungah hian ti ang che,’’ a it a.

source: And Midian was stronger than Israel; and because of the Midianites, the children of Israel made holes for themselves in the mountains, and hollows in the rocks, and strong places.
target: Tin, Midian-hote chuan Israel-hote chu an lo hmin ta a: tichuan Midian-hote avâng chuan Israela thlahte tlângah khur te, puk te, kulh te an siam a.

source: Make melody to the Lord with instruments of music; with a corded instrument and the voice of song.
target: tingtang nên LALPA fakin zai rawh u; tingtang leh fakna hla thawm nên.

source: He put up the higher doorway of the house of the Lord, and did much building on the wall of the Ophel.
target: LALPA ina kawngkhâr chhakta zâwk a siam a, tin, Ophel kulh chungah chuan in tam tak a sa bawk a.

source: Man took part in the food of strong ones; he sent them meat in full measure.
target: Mihringten mi chake chhâng chu an ei a: Puarna khawpin chaw a rawn pe a.

source: Children, do the orders of your fathers and mothers in all things, for this is pleasing to the Lord.
