target: Naupangte u, engkimah in nu leh in pate thu zawm rawh u, chu chu Lalpaah chuan a lawmam si a.

source: Up, let us be going: see, he who gives me up is near.
target: Tho ula, i kal ang u; en teh u, mi mantirtu tur chu a lo hnaih tak hi, a ti a.

source: It's day already.
target: Ni a ni tawh.

source: And without loss of time the young man did as they said, because he had delight in Jacob's daughter, and he was the noblest of his father's house.
target: Tichuan tlangval chuan Jakoba fanu chu a duh hle avângin, chu thil chu rei rial lovin a ti ta mai a: ani chu a pa chhûngte zawng zawng zînga mite zah ber a ni a.

source: A wise son is a lover of teaching, but the ears of the haters of authority are shut to sharp words.
target: Fapa fing chuan a pa thununna a pawisa thin a, Hmusit ching mi erawh chuan zilhhauna a ngaithla duh thin lo.

source: But go to my father's house and to my relations for a wife for my son.
target: ka pa in lamah, ka laichînte hnêna kalin ka fapa tân nupui i neihsak zâwk tûr a ni,' tiin chhia mi chhamtîr a.

source: Tom yelled
target: Tom a au vak

source: Solomon had a vine-garden at Baal-hamon; he let out the vine-garden to keepers; every one had to give a thousand bits of silver for its fruit.
target: Solomona'n a nei grêp huan, Baal-hamon-ah, Huanpute hnênah chuan a kawltir; Mi tinin an rawn lak tûr, thei man cheng sângkhat.

source: When he makes search for blood, he has them in his memory: he is not without thought for the cry of the poor.
target: Thisen chhuah chhuahchhal thintu chuan anni chu a hre reng si thin a: Miretheite au thawm a theihnghilh ngai lo.

source: Men of blood are haters of the good man, and evil-doers go after his soul.
target: Thisen chhuah chak mite chuan mi tha famkim an hua a, Mi dik takte erawh chuan a nunna humhim an tum thin.

source: They accepted each other
target: An in pawm ve ta a

source: Don't give in to the wall.
target: Wall-ah inpe suh.

source: The high places, however, were not taken away: but still the heart of Asa was true to the Lord all his life.
target: Hmun sângte erawh chu a thehthang bo lo va: nimahsela Asa thinlung chu a dam chhûng zawng LALPA lamah a tha famkim a ni.

source: I cannot abide him
target: Amah chu ka tuar thei lo

source: Stretching from the wall of the towns a distance of a thousand cubits all round.
target: Tin, daikiang Levi-ho in pêk tur chu khaw kulh ațanga tawng 1,000-a thui ani tur a ni.

source: I am a lonely man.
target: Mi pakhat chauh ka ni.

source: How long will I go on seeing the flag and hearing the sound of the war-horn?
target: Eng chen nge indona puanzar ka hmuh ang a, Tawtawrâwt ri ka hriat ang?

source: Then, opening his mouth, and cursing the day of his birth,
target: Hetih hnu hian Joda chuan a kâ a ang a, a pianna ni chu ânchhia a lawh ta a.

source: Have glory in his holy name; let the hearts of those who are searching after the Lord be glad.
target: A hming thianghlim chu chhuang rawh u;LALPA zawngtute thinlung chu hlim rawh se.

source: I like rice
target: Chaw ka duh

source: When the man of pride undergoes punishment, the simple man gets wisdom; and by watching the wise he gets knowledge.
target: Hmusit ching mite hrema an awmin mi mawlte chuan an fin phah a; Tin, mi fing chu zirtira a awmin hriatna a dawng thin.

source: So the daughters of Zelophehad did as the Lord gave orders to Moses:
target: Tin, LALPAN Mosia thu a pêk ang chiahin Zelophehada fanute chuan an ti a.

source: And I tested them.
target: Tin, ka fiah bawk a.

source: They wouldn't follow us.
target: Min zui lo ang.

source: I'm American
target: America mi ka nia

source: Thirteen towns with their grass-lands were given to the children of Aaron, the priests.
target: Arona thlah, puithiamho khawpui zawng zawng chu khawpui sâwm leh pathum a ni, a daivelte nen.

source: You're dying
target: I thi mêk

source: Don't go in
target: Lut suh

source: Then Jesus went up the mountain and was seated there with his disciples.
target: Tin, Isua chu tlangah chuan a kal chho va, chutah chuan a zirtirte hnenah a thu a.

source: He makes the grass come up for the cattle, and plants for the use of man; so that bread may come out of the earth;
target: Hlobet chu rante tan a totir thin a, Thlai chu mihring hmanah a totir bawk thin; Lei atangin ei tûr a chhuahtir theih nân:

source: Truly, God does not do evil, and the Ruler of all is not a false judge.
target: A ni, Pathian chuan suaksual takin a ti lul lo vang a Engkimtitheia chuan a rel khawlo hek lo vang.

source: It isn't surprising
target: Mak a ti lo

source: I'm not paying for this.
target: Hei hi ka pe lo.

source: And one of them, when he saw that he was clean, turning back, gave praise to God in a loud voice;
target: Tin, an zinga pakhatin a dam ta tih a inhriat veleh, aw ring taka Pathian fak chungin a kir leh ta a;

source: Leave a blank space.
target: Hmun ruak dah la.

source: He denied it
target: A pawm lo

source: Tom's fast
target: Tom a chak

source: I'm too late
target: Ka tlai lutuk

source: Tom doesn't drink
target: Tom a in ngai lo

source: I love games
target: Infiamnate ka duh

source: Who was pleasing to God; and he had a desire to make a holy tent for the God of Jacob.
target: Chu Davida chu Pathian mithmuhin duhsak tlakin a awm a, Jakoba Pathian tan awmna siamsak a dil a.

source: Who is false but he who says that Jesus is not the Christ? He is the Antichrist who has no belief in the Father or the Son.
target: sua chu Krista a ni tih awih lotu aliama dawthei tunge awm? Krista dodaltu chu Pa leh Fapa awih lotu hi a ni.

source: So David said to the Gibeonites, What may I do for you? how am I to make up to you for your wrongs, so that you may give a blessing to the heritage of the Lord?
target: Davida chuan Gibeon mite hnênah chuan, Engnge ka tihsakang che u? LALPA ro chu mal in sawm theih nân eng anga inremna nge ka siam ang? a ti a.

source: Then the chief wine-servant gave Joseph an account of his dream, and said, In my dream I saw a vine before me;
target: Tichuan uain pe hotu ber chuan a mumang chu Josefa a hrilh a, a hnênah, Ka mumangah chuan ngai teh, ka hmaah hian grêp hrui a lo awm a;

source: Tom is wet
target: Toma a huh

source: Grab a spoon.
target: Fian va la the.

source: They make it beautiful with silver and gold; they make it strong with nails and hammers, so that it may not be moved.
target: Tangkarua leh rangkachakin an chei a, A chet loh nân thirkilhna leh tubohvin an kilh a.

source: Mary decorated it
target: Mari chuan a chei a

source: And the instruments and trays for use with it are all to be of the best gold.
target: Tin, chu mi atâna hman tûr chaichehte leh meivap dahnate chu rangkachak hlîr hlak a ni tûr a ni.

source: In whose mouths are false words, and whose right hand is a right hand of deceit.
target: An ka chuan dawt a sawi a, Chhechham chung pawhin dawt an sawi.

source: Only he did not take the land of the priests, for the priests had their food given them by Pharaoh, and having what Pharaoh gave them, they had no need to give up their land.
target: Puithiamho ram chauh a lei lo va: puithiamhote chuan Pharaoa lakah chanvo an nei a, Pharaoan an chanvo a pêk chu an ei țhîn a ni; chuvângin an ram chu an hralh ve lo va.

source: And even with these words, it was hard for them to keep the people from making an offering to them.
target: Tin, chung thu chuan mipuiten anmahni biak nana ran an talh tur chu an khap zo ta hram hram a.

source: They aren't dating
target: An inngaizawng lo

source: And Absalom and the men of Israel came to Jerusalem, and Ahithophel was with him.
target: Tin, Absaloma lehmipui zawng zawng Israel mite chu Jerusalem-ah an kal a, tin, a hnênah Ahothophela pawha tel a.

source: I'm not famous yet.
target: Ka la lar lo.

source: The sun is starting to go down.
target: Ni a tla tan ta.

source: Of oak-trees from Bashan they have made your driving blades; they have made your floors of ivory and boxwood from the sea-lands of Kittim.
target: Basan sasua i vai chaah an siam e, Saingho chhûngphûm i lawng chhuatah Tufar thing, Tuipui ram kittim ata chu.

source: I am short of money.
target: Sum ka tlachham.

source: They've suffered enough
target: An tuar tawk tawh

source: Make no addition to his words, or he will make clear your error, and you will be seen to be false.
target: A thute chu belhchhah suh, Chutilo chuan alai lang ang chia, Dawthei i lo ni dah ang e.

source: He's not writing a letter.
target: Lehkha a ziak lo.

source: But my people did not give ear to my voice; Israel would have nothing to do with me.
target: Nimahsela ka mite chuan ka awm an ngaithla si lo va; Israel-ho chuan min duh loh kha.

source: I'm a singer
target: Zaithiam ka nia

source: She is hard at work.
target: Hnathawh tak a ni.

source: They're cops
target: Sipai an nia

source: And their brothers the Levites were responsible for all the work of the Tent of the house of God.
target: Tin, an unau Levi-hote chu Pathian biakbuka rawngbawl hna zawng zawng thawk tûra ruat an ni.

source: I got injured
target: Hliam ka tuar

source: Unnumbered are those who say of my soul, There is no help for him in God. (Selah.
target: Ka chungchang thu an sawi a, Pathianin a pui lo vang an ti a. Selah

source: Tom's filthy
target: Tom a phakar

source: I do that.
target: Ka tih a nih kha.

source: Don't underestimate it
target: Ngaihsit suh

source: I want grandchildren
target: Fate ka duh a ni

source: And they kept the saying, questioning among themselves what the coming back from the dead might be.
target: Tichuan, chu thu chu an vawng reng a, Mitthi zing ata thawhleh chu eng tihna nge ni ang? tiin an inzawt thin a.

source: See now, how as our reward they have come to send us out of your land which you have given us as our heritage.
target: kan luah atân i ram min pêk atân hnawchuaha mi rawn thungrulh an tum dan hi lo hre teh.

source: I'll risk it
target: Ka enchhin dawn

source: We got lucky
target: Kan vannei

source: Ask them
target: Anmahni zâwt rawh

source: I slapped him.
target: Khapa kha ka beng tawh.

source: He's so cute
target: A duhawm hle

source: She has yellow hair.
target: Sam sen a nei a.

source: They made a young ox in Horeb, and gave worship to an image of gold.
target: Horeb tlângah chuan bawng no lem an sima a, A lem chhun chu an be ta a.

source: I hear you got fired
target: I ban tih ka hria

source: I like ponies
target: Sabengtung ka ngaina

source: So then, keep my rules and my decisions and do them, so that the land which I am giving you as your resting-place may not violently send you out again.
target: Chutichuan ka thupêk zawng zawng te, ka rorêl zawng zawngte in pawm ang a, in zawm tur a ni: tichuan awm tura ka hruaina che u ram chuan a luak chhuak dawn lo che u nia.

source: But it is not as if the word of God was without effect. For they are not all Israel, who are of Israel:
target: Chuvangin unaute u, bat kan nei; tisa dana awm turin tisa lakah erawh chuan a ni lo.

source: And they got false witnesses who said, This man is for ever saying things against this holy place and against the law:
target: tin, hretu derte an siam a, chu mite chuan, He mi hian he in Thianghlim leh Dan hi a sawichhe fo thin a;

source: Do you accept Visa
target: Visa i pawm em

source: I can accept that.
target: Chu chu ka pawm thei a ni.

source: I can't sit still.
target: Ka thu thei lo.

source: They're back
target: An lo lêt e

source: And Samuel said to him, The Lord has taken away the kingdom of Israel from you this day by force, and has given it to a neighbour of yours who is better than you.
target: Tin, Samuela chuan a hnênah, Vawiin atang hian LALPAN Israel ram hi a chhuhsak ta chia, i aia tha zawk i thenzawm a pe ta a ni.

source: So I was like a man whose ears are shut, and in whose mouth there are no sharp words.
target: A ni, mi tawng hre thei lo, A kaa zilhhauna reng chhuak ngai lo angin ka awm.

source: Tom is lying
target: Tom chu a mu mêk

source: Of course
target: A nih lohin

source: I'm not sure I get it.
target: Ka hmu thei lo.

source: And he put the tent of Joseph on one side, and took not the tribe of Ephraim;
target: Chu lo pawh chu Josefa puan in chu a duh lo va, Ephraim hnam chu a thlang lo bawk a;

source: Now on the second day after he had put Gedaliah to death, when no one had knowledge of it,
target: Tin, Gedalia a thah hnu ni hnihnaah chuan heti hi a lo n a, tumah an hriat hmain,

source: Don't feel too bad.
target: Hrehawm lutuk suh.

source: If I have taken its produce without payment, causing the death of its owners;
target: Man pe lova a rha chhuahte ei ka lo nih a, A neitute nun hlohtir emaw ka lo nih chuan,

source: And they took the boy in, living, and were greatly comforted.
target: Tin, rawlthar chu damin an hruai a, thlamuan namenin an thlamuang ta lo va.

source: He who has a poor opinion of his neighbour has no sense, but a wise man keeps quiet.
target: A thenawm hmusittu chua fina a nei lo va, hriatna nei mi erawh chu a ngawi thin.

source: Their houses are free from fear, and the rod of God does not come on them.
target: An in lote chu hlauhawm lakah a him a, Pathian tiang chu an chungah a tla hek lo.

source: And the high looks of man will be put to shame, and the pride of men will be made low: and only the Lord will be lifted up in that day.
target: Mihring induhnate chu tihhniamin a awm ang a, mite chapona chu tihlawmin a awm ang: chu mi niah chuan LALPA chauh chu chawisanin a awm ang.

source: Because in much wisdom is much grief, and increase of knowledge is increase of sorrow.
target: Finna a nasat poh leh buaina a tam a, Hriatna a pun poh leh manganna a pung.

source: So then, brothers, be strong in purpose, and keep the teaching which has been given to you by word or by letter from us.
target: Chutichuan, unaute u, ding nghet ula, thurochhiahte chu thusawiin emaw kan lehkha thawnin emaw kan zirtir che u kha pawm tlat rawh u.

source: Then said Isaiah to Hezekiah, Give ear to the word of the Lord of armies:
target: Tichuan Isaian Hezekia hnênah chuan, Sipaihote LALPA thu hi hre rawh.

source: I still don't eat meat.
target: Sa ka la ei lo.

source: Don't go in
target: Lût suh

source: Tom hit Mary
target: Toma'n Mary a vua

source: What did she say to you
target: Eng nge a sawi che

source: Fine, thank you
target: Dam e a, ka lawm e

source: While their hearts go out to you in love and in prayer for you, because of the great grace of God which is in you.
target: anmahni ngei pawhin in chunga Pathian khawngaihna nasa em em avangin, in tan tawngtaisak chungin an ngai hle che u a ni.

source: I dug a hole
target: Kua ka lai

source: As for Samaria, her king is cut off, like mist on the water.
target: Samari ram lah chu, tui chunga thingtang nawi ang mai hian A lal chu tihboral a ni a.

source: I am busy now.
target: Tunah ka buai.

source: Take a man's clothing if he makes himself responsible for a strange man, and get an undertaking from him who gives his word for strange men.
target: Hnam dang tan mawhphurtûra inpe silhfen chu la la, Ram dang hmeichhe tana mawhphurtua inpe chu hrengah hmang rawh.

source: Turn right
target: Dinglam kual rawh

source: The others, in fear, kept back from joining them: but the people made much of them;
target: Mi dang erawh chu tumah an zingah an tel ve ngam ta lo va; nimahsela miin anniho chu an fak si thin.

source: We agreed
target: Kan pawm e

source: Let them quickly make cries of sorrow for us, so that drops may be flowing from our eyes till they are streaming with water.
target: Lo hmanhmawh sela, min rawn tah khum teh se. Ka mittui a luan a, kan mitahte tui a puh theih nân.

source: Then Saul said, Come here and give me the burned offering and the peace-offerings. And he made a burned offering to the Lord.
target: Tin, Saula chuan, hâlral thilhlan tûr leh remna thilhlan tûrte chu hetah ka hnênah han la rawh u, a ti a. Chutichuan hâlral thilhlan chu a hlan a.

source: I'll walk.
target: Ka kal ang.

source: I feel hungry
target: Ka ril a ṭam

source: I, the Lord, am watching it; I will give it water at all times: I will keep it night and day, for fear that any damage comes to it.
target: Kei LALPA hi a vengtu ka ni; mitkhapkar tinin tui ka leih ang a, tuman an khawih loh nân achhun azanin ka veng ang.

source: Did you buy anything
target: Eng emaw i lei em

source: If they do not get the thief, let the master of the house come before the judges and take an oath that he has not put his hand on his neighbour's goods.
target: Rûkru chu an man si loh chuan, chu mi in neitupa chu Pathian kiangah va kal sela, a thenawmpa bungrua chu aman a lo lâk a nih leh nih loh va fiah rawh se.

source: I'm starting to relax.
target: Ka hahdam tan ta.

source: I'm just surprised
target: Mak ka ti mai mai

source: In Israel I have seen a very evil thing; there false ways are seen in Ephraim, Israel is unclean;
target: Israel chhûngkuaah chuan thil rapthlâk tak ka hmu, Ephraim-ah chuan nawhchizawrhna a awm a, Israel chu a bawrhbâng a ni.

source: Who vanished?
target: Tunge bo daih?

source: I would quickly overcome their haters: my hand would be turned against those who make war on them.
target: An hmêlmate chu ka tilawm thuaiin, Anmahni dotute chungah chuan ka kut ka lek tûr.

source: The pain has gone
target: Natna chu a bo ta

source: As it is not possible for the army of heaven to be numbered, or the sand of the sea measured, so will I make the seed of my servant David, and the Levites my servants.
target: Vana awmho chhiarsen loh leh tuipuia tiau chhiarsen loh ang maiin ka rawngbawltu Davida thlah leh Levia ka rawngbawltu David thlah leh Levia chi rawng mi bawlsaktute ka tipung ang.

source: Only to the tribe of Levi he gave no heritage; the offerings of the Lord, the God of Israel, made by fire are his heritage, as he said to him.
target: Levi hnamte chauh a ni rochan tur a pêk ve loh ni: a hnena a lo sawi tawh ang khan LALPA, Israelte Pathian tana meia thilhlante chu an rochan a ni zawk si a.

source: You were guiding your people like a flock, by the hand of Moses and Aaron.
target: Mosia leh Arona kutin I mite chu berâm rual angin i hruai thin a.

source: Will he live?
target: A la dam ang em?

source: And he said, Who gave you the knowledge that you were without clothing? Have you taken of the fruit of the tree which I said you were not to take?
target: Tin, a ni chuan, Saruak i nih tuin nge hrilh che? Thing rah ei loh tûr ka tih tlat che kha i ei ta a ni maw? a ti a.

source: That doesn't suffice
target: Chu chu a tawk lo

source: Be thorough
target: Sawizau deuh rawh

source: We were different
target: Kan danglam a

source: And I will be waiting for the Lord, whose face is veiled from the house of Jacob, and I will be looking for him.
target: Tin, kei chuan Jakona chhûngte laka a hmai thuptu LALPA chu ka nghak ang a, amah chu ka thlir reng ang.

source: My sheep give ear to my voice, and I have knowledge of them, and they come after me:
target: Ka beramten ka aw an hre thin, kei pawhin anni chu ka hria, anni chuan mi zui thin;

source: All who are with me send you their love. Give our love to our friends in the faith. Grace be with you all.
target: Ka hnena awm zawng zawngte hian chibai an buk a che. Rinnaa min hmangaihtute kha chibai min buksak ang che. In zaa hnenah khawngaihna awm rawh se.

source: You ain't seen nothin' yet.
target: I la hmu lo.

source: For I, says the Lord, will be a wall of fire round about her, and I will be the glory inside her.
target: Kei hi a vêlah mei kulh ka ni ang a, A laia ropui chu ka ni dâwn bawk si a, Tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: I'm following him
target: Ka zui zêl a

source: I give up
target: Ka bansan e

source: You are not to do things then in the way in which we now do them here, every man as it seems right to him:
target: Mi tinin mahni țha tihzawng ang maia tuna kan tih ang hian in ti tur a ni lo.

source: No fire is to be lighted in any of your houses on the Sabbath day.
target: Chawlhni chuan in chenna hmun reng rengahte chuan mei in chhem tur a ni lo, a ti a.

source: Did you get a haircut
target: Sam i tan em ni

source: Sending out their voices like lions among your worshippers; they have put up their signs to be seen.
target: Nangmah dotute i mite inkhawmho zingah an haw haw dur dur a; An chhinchhiahnate chu chhinchhiahna tûrin an tar ta aê

source: But whoever says evil things against the Holy Spirit will never have forgiveness, but the evil he has done will be with him for ever:
target: tupawh Thlarau Thianghlim meuh sawichhia erawh chuan engtikah mah ngaihdamna a hmu lo vang a, chatuan sualna kawngah chuan thiam lohvin a lo awm zawk ang, a ti a.

source: I'm a DJ.
target: DJ ka ni.

source: For death has come up into our windows, forcing its way into our great houses; cutting off the children in the streets and the young men in the wide places.
target: Kan tukverhahte thihna lawn lutin Kan lal inahte a lût tawh si a; Pawn ațangin naupang tibo tûr leh, Khawlai ata tlangvâl tibo tûrin.

source: Is there a shop there
target: Dawr a awm em

source: For as the woman is from the man, so the man is through the woman; but all things are from God.
target: Hmeichhia hi mipa atanga chhuak a ni ang bawkin,mipa pawh hi hmeichhe laka piang a ni si a; amaherawhchu engkim hi Pathian atanga chhuak vek a ni.

source: If he said they were gods, to whom the word of God came (and the Writings may not be broken,
target: Pathian thu thlennate mah pathianho an tih chuan, Pathian Lehkha Thu ban theih a ni si lo va,

source: If a ruler gives attention to false words, all his servants are evil-doers.
target: Rorêltuin dawt thu a ngaihsan chuan A chhiahhlawhte zawng zawng an sual thin,

source: No one has seen us
target: Tuman min hmu lo

source: And with him we have sent a brother whose praise in the good news has gone through all the churches;
target: Tin, a hnenah unaupa kan tir ve dawn a, ani chu Chanchin Tha kawnga an fak thu kohhranho pawl zawng zawngah a thang chhuak a;

source: We cultivate rice.
target: Buh kan chin ṭhin.

source: I like you better.
target: Ka duh zawk che.

source: Let all flesh be quiet and make no sound before the Lord: for he is awake and has come from his holy resting-place.
target: Mi zawng zawngte u, LALPA hmaah chuan ngawi țhiap rawh u: Ani chu a hmun thianghlim ata a lo tho tawh si a, Tiin va sawi rawh, a ti a.

source: He may get them ready, but the upright will put them on, and he who is free from sin will take the silver for a heritage.
target: Tiang khâwm mah se, mi fel chuan a sinsak ang a, Pawikhawih lote chuan tangkarua chu an insem ang.

source: I'll be back
target: Ka lo kîr leh ang

source: And the flesh of the praise-offering is to be taken as food on the day when it is offered; no part of it may be kept till the morning.
target: Tin, lawmthu sawi nana a remna thilhlan inthawiaa sa chu thilhlan a hlan ni la lain ei zawh tur a ni a; a tuk thlengin engmah a khek tur a ni lo.

source: With your storm-flames send them in flight: send out your arrows for their destruction.
target: Kawl phettir la, anniho chu tidam ang che; I thalte chu kap chhuak la, tibuai nuai ang che.

source: But God will get back my soul; for he will take me from the power of death. (Selah.
target: Ka nunna erawh chu Pathianin Seol kut ata a tlan chuak ang; Ani chuan mi lawm dawn si a. Selah

source: This isn't finished
target: Hei hi a la zo lo

source: It's hers.
target: Henu ta a nia.

source: I'll wait and see.
target: Ka nghak leh ang.

source: How may he have knowledge of my desire for talk with him? or did any man ever say, May destruction come on me?
target: Ka sawi dawn tih amah hrilh tûr êm ni? Mahni intihboral miin a chak ngai êm ni?

source: This I didn't say.
target: Hei hi ka sawi lo.

source: I'm pregnant
target: Ka rai mek

source: Don't follow fashion.
target: Fashion zawm suh.

source: So, a year later, Ben-hadad got the Aramaeans together and went up to Aphek to make war on Israel.
target: Tin, a kum lehah chuan heti hia ni a, Benhadadan Suria-ho chu a khâwm a, Israel-hote bei tûrin Aphek khuaah a han cho va.

source: They'll all be fine
target: An tha vek ang

source: They are teachers
target: Zirtirtu an ni a

source: His hands are as rings of gold ornamented with beryl-stones; his body is as a smooth plate of ivory covered with sapphires.
target: A kutzungte rangkachak tlawn, topaz lung phûm thiau ang, A sakruak chu saingho, sapphir-a chei ang a ni.

source: We saw it
target: Kan hmu e

source: Bela, son of Beor, was king in Edom, and the name of his chief town was Dinhabah.
target: Tin, Beora fapa Bela chuan Edom ramah ro a rêl a; a khawpui hming chu Dinhaba a ni.

source: I protested
target: Ka dodal tawh

source: I'll wait for her
target: Ka lo nghak ang

source: But to the sons of Kohath he gave nothing; because they had the care of the holy place, taking it about on their backs.
target: Kohatha fapate erawh chu an pe ve lo; hmun thianghlim hna chu an pual a ni a, a zawna zawn țhin an ni.

source: For if I had put the full weight of my hand on you and your people, you would have been cut off from the earth:
target: Chuti ni suh sela, ka kut ka thawh ang a, nâng leh i mite hi hriin ka hrem ang a, khawvêl ata hi ka tiboral daih tawh tûr che a ni:

source: We're not going to make it.
target: Kan siam dawn lo.

source: He does not like being punished.
target: Hrem a duh lo.

source: At that time we took their land from the two kings of the Amorites on the far side of Jordan, from the valley of the Arnon to Mount Hermon;
target: chumi tum chuan Jordan rala awm Amor ho lal pahnih kut ata chu Arnon ruam ațanga Hermon tlâng thlenga ram chu kan la a;

source: Hello, Tom.
target: Chibai, Tom-a.

source: And I saw a great white seat, and him who was seated on it, before whose face the earth and the heaven went in flight; and there was no place for them.
target: Tin, lalthutphah lianpui var tak leh a chunga thu chu ka hmu a, a hma ata chu lei leh van an tlan bo va, an tan hmun reng a awm ta lo va.

source: When they are sounded, all the people are to come together to you at the door of the Tent of meeting.
target: Chu chu a ham kawp chuan mipi zawng zawng chu i hnenah inbiakna puan in kawngka bulah an rawn inkhawm vek tur a ni.

source: Dogs are permitted
target: Ui pawh phal a ni

source: I say to you, Among all the sons of women, not one is greater than John: but he who is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he.
target: Hmeichhe hrin zingah Johana aia ropui zawk an awm lo; nimahsela Pathian rama mi te deuh pawh ani ai chuan an ropui zawk, ka ti a che u, a ti a.

source: I left her behind
target: Ka kalsan a

source: And if I had falsely put him to death (and nothing may be kept secret from the king, you would have had nothing to do with me.
target: Rinawm loh thlak takin lo that ta ringawt mai ang ila, lal lakah chuan engmah thup theih ani awm si lo va nân gchu i inthiarfihlim leh mai awm si a, a ti a.

source: I exaggerated
target: Ka sawi uar

source: I swim
target: Ka hleuh

source: The sun comes up and the sun goes down, and goes quickly back to the place where he came up.
target: Ni pawh chu a lo chhuak a, tin, a tla leh a, A chhuahna tûr lam panin a hmanhmawh thin.

source: So far from doing this, you yourselves do wrong and take your brothers' property.
target: A ni, nangmahni ngeiin in unaute chungh pawh in tidik lo va, in tidawng zawk thin.

source: So I got her for myself for fifteen shekels of silver and a homer and a half of barley;
target: Chutichuan tangka sâwm leh panga leh barli homer khat leh homer chanvein amah chu ka lei a:

source: See, he is stretching out his mist, covering the tops of the mountains with it.
target: Ngai teh, a vêlah a eng a theh darh a, Tuifinriat mawngte a khuh a.

source: And to whom did he make an oath that they might not come into his rest? was it not to those who went against his orders?
target: Tin, thu awih lote hnenah chauh lo chuan tu hnenah nge a chawlhnaa lut lo tura chhechhama a tiam ni?

source: I'd leave
target: Ka kalsan ang

source: Then Joshua let the people go away, every man to his heritage.
target: chutichuan Josuan mipuite chu anmahni chanpual ram theuhvah a hawntir ta a.

source: He needs it
target: A mamawh a nia

source: It is to be eighteen thousand all round: and the name of the town from that day will be, The Lord is there.
target: A velin tawng singkhat leh sângriat a ni ang a, chumi nî ațang chuan khawpui hming chu LALPA awmna hmun tih a ni tûr a ni.

source: Let's work
target: Thawk zêl ang

source: He runs
target: A tlan mek

source: She's watching us.
target: Min en reng a ni.

source: And how will there be preachers if they are not sent? As it is said, How beautiful are the feet of those who give the glad news of good things.
target: Tirh an nih loh chuan engtin nge thu an hril ang? Thil tha chanchin lawmawm thlentute ke chu a va mawi em! tih ziak ang khan.

source: The river is wide.
target: Lui chu a zau a.

source: Who was he
target: Tunge khapa kha

source: I drove
target: Ka khalh tawh

source: My fruit is better than gold, even than the best gold; and my increase is more to be desired than silver.
target: Ka rah chhuah chu rangkachak aiin a tha zakw a, a ni, rangkachak tha mi ai pawhin; Ka lak luh chu tangkaraw tha mi aiin.

source: But God sends out an arrow against them; suddenly they are wounded.
target: Nimahsela Pathianin anmahni a kap ang a: Vawilehkhatah thlaa hliamin an awm angê

source: Bring a date
target: A ni tur sawi rawh

source: But keep watch at all times with prayer, that you may be strong enough to come through all these things and take your place before the Son of man.
target: Chutichuan chung thil lo thleng tur zawng zawng chu pumpelh tlakah leh Mihring Fapa hmaa ding tlaka ruat in nih theihna turin, eng lai pawhin tawngtai chungin ngaihven rawh u, a ti a.

source: See, a day of the Lord is coming when they will make division of your goods taken by force before your eyes.
target: Ngai teh, LALPA ni a lo thleng dawn e, Chutah chuan in râllâkte in zîng ngeiah semdarh a ni ang.

source: Is she making a doll?
target: Doll a siam em ni?

source: I didn't buy them.
target: Ka lei lo.

source: So David went away from there and took cover in a strong place at Adullam; and his brothers and all his father's people, hearing of it, went down to him there.
target: Chutichuan Davida chu chuta ta chu a chhuak a, Adullam pukah chuan a tlan ta a: tin, a unaute leh a pate chhûngkua zawng zawngin an lo hriat chuan chutah chuan ahnênah an zuk kal a,

source: And the west side will be the Great Sea, from the limit on the south to a point opposite the way into Hamath. This is the west side.
target: Thlang lam ah chuan Tuipui lian in a ri ang a, chhim lam ram ri ațangin Hamath luhna ruam zawn thlengin. Hei hi thlang lam ramri a ni tûr a ni

source: And Peter went down to the men, and said, I am the man you are looking for: why have you come?
target: Chutichuan Petera chu, chu mite hnenah chuan a chhuk a, an hnenah, In zawn hi ka ni e; engnge in rawn kal chhan? a ti a.

source: See, I and the children whom the Lord has given me, are for signs and for wonders in Israel from the Lord of armies, whose resting-place is in Mount Zion.
target: ngai teh, kei leh LALPA mi pêk naupangte hi, Israel-ho zingah hhian sipaihote LALPA Zion tlânga awm laka chhinchhiahna atânte leh thilmak atânte kan ni a.

source: His mind is ever designing evil: he lets loose violent acts.
target: A thinlungah luhlulna a awm a, thil sual a suangtuah reng a, Inrem lohna a tuh thin.

source: Do you want to sit
target: Thut i duh em

source: Would he make use of his great power to overcome me? No, but he would give attention to me.
target: A thiltihtheihna ropui chuan mi khing dawn êm ni? Hnai lo ve, mi bengkhawn zawk ang.

source: And at the start, one came to him who was in his debt for ten thousand talents.
target: Tin, a han tihfel tan chuan mi pakhat talent singkhat ba, a hnenah an rwn hruai a.

source: And you, child, will be named the prophet of the Most High: you will go before the face of the Lord, to make ready his ways;
target: A ni, Taite, nang hi Chungnungbera zawlnei an ti ang che; A kawngte siam turin Lalpa hmaah i kal dawn si a;

source: We need them
target: Anmahni kja kam

source: When goods are increased, the number of those who take of them is increased; and what profit has the owner but to see them?
target: Sum leh pai a lo pun chuan eitute pawh an pung a, a neitu tan a mita hmuh mai loh chu eng eng a sawtna?

source: I was a father to the poor, searching out the cause of him who was strange to me.
target: Tlachham tan pa ka ni a, Ka hmêl hriat lohte pawh an thu ka buapui a.

source: Having become by so much better than the angels, as the name which is his heritage is more noble than theirs.
target: vantirhkohte aia hming tha zawk a rochun ang ngeiin an aia ropui zawk a lo ni tawh si a.

source: Then take the other sheep; and after Aaron and his sons have put their hands on its head,
target: Tin, berâmpa pakhat i rawn kâi leh tur a ni; Arona leh a fapaten chu berâmpa luchuah chuan an kut lo nghat rawh se.

source: But every man is tested when he is turned out of the right way by the attraction of his desire.
target: Mi tin mahni chaknaa hruai bo leh hipa an awm chuan thlemna an tawk a ni zawk e.

source: They all looked happy
target: An hlim hmel vek a

source: And a river went out of Eden giving water to the garden; and from there it was parted and became four streams.
target: Tin, Eden atangin huan tihnâwng turin lui a luang chhuak a; chuta tang chuan a peng darh a, peng li a lo ni ta a.

source: He was imprisoned
target: Tângin a tang a

source: They say, He has an evil disease, which will not let him go: and now that he is down he will not get up again.
target: Natna tha lo takin a tlakbuak ta a: Tuna a mu hi a tho leh tawh lo vang, an ti a.

source: He's my age
target: Ka kum zât a ni

source: We're biased
target: Ṭan zawng kan nei

source: And I took him to your disciples, and they were not able to make him well.
target: Tin, i zirtirte hnenah ka rawn hruai a, an tidam thei si lo va, a ti a.

source: The rain already stopped
target: Ruah a sur tawh a

source: It's a superstorm
target: Superstorm a ni

source: So they gave loud cries, cutting themselves with knives and swords, as was their way, till the blood came streaming out all over them.
target: Tin, ring takin an au va, an tih thin danin chemte leh feitein thi chuak zawih zawih khawpin an inzaiin an invit a.

source: What I am now saying is not by the order of the Lord, but as a foolish person, taking credit to myself, as it seems.
target: Ka sawi hi Lalpa thu angin ka sawi lo va, ka chhuan rinna hian a ang takin ka sawi zawk a ni.

source: And Mary, hearing this, got up quickly and went to him.
target: Tin, ani chuan chu chu a hriat veleh a tho thuai a, a hnenah a va kal a.

source: O Lord, what am I to say now that Israel have given way before their attackers?
target: Aw Lalpa, hetia hmêlmate uma Israel-ho an tlanchhe ta mai hi engtin nge ka tih tak ang le?

source: I keep telling you!
target: Ka hrilh zel che!

source: Are they American?
target: American an ni em?

source: Making ready for themselves a safe place for the time to come, so that the true life may be theirs.
target: nunna, nunna taktak chu an vawn theih nan, hun lo thleng tur atan chuan lungphum tha tak an tana khawl khawm turin fuih rawh.

source: Keep in mind the voice of your haters; the outcry of those who come against you goes up every day.
target: Nangmah dotute thawm chu theihnghilh suh ang che: A beituho che sa mur mur chu a chho fo thin a ni.

source: So Moab was broken that day under the hand of Israel. And for eighty years the land had peace.
target: Chutichuan chu mi ni chuan Moab-hote chu Israel hote lakah an lo tawm ta a. Tin, ram chu kum sâwmriat chhûng ralmuangin a awm a.

source: Do not insult him
target: Amah hmusit suh

source: There is no need for him to give honour to his father. And you have made the word of God without effect because of your teaching.
target: a nu leh a pa a chawimawi tur a ni lo ve,' in ti thin a. Tichuan, in thurochhiah avangin Pathian thu chu in bawh bo ta a nih hi.

source: They convinced me.
target: Min tichiang a.

source: And before him all the nations will come together; and they will be parted one from another, as the sheep are parted from the goats by the keeper.
target: a hmaah chuan hnam tin an inkhawm ang a: beram vengtuin kel zing ata a beramte a hlir angin anniho chu a hlir ang a;

source: You don't get to quit.
target: I bânsan thei lo.

source: And so comforting them with these and other words, he gave the good news to the people;
target: Tin, fuihna thu dang tam takin mite hnenah Chanchin Tha a hril thin a.

source: But my faith and my mercy will be with him; and in my name will his horn be lifted up.
target: Ani hnênah erawh chuan ka rinawmna leh ka ngilneihna chu a awm ang a; Ka hming avângin a ki chu chawimawiin a awm bawk ang.

source: And the stars will be falling from heaven, and the powers which are in the heavens will be moved.
target: van atangin arsite an lo tla ang a, vana thiltihtheihna awmte chu tihnghin a ni ang.

source: She is about your age.
target: I kum vel a ni.

source: Your fathers went down into Egypt with seventy persons; and now the Lord your God has made you like the stars of heaven in number.
target: In pi leh pute chu Aigupta ramah sawmsarih an chhuk a; tunah chuan tam lama vana arsi zatin LALPA in Pathianin a titam a che u a ni.

source: Then the part of the hand was sent out from before him, and this writing was recorded.
target: tichuan, a hnên ațangin kut tumbung chu tirh a ni ta a, he ziak hi a lo in ziak ta a nih hi.

source: And the wrath of the Lord, burning against Uzzah, sent destruction on him because he had put his hand on the ark, and death came to him there by the ark of God.
target: Tin, LALPA thin chu Uza chungah chuan a ur ta thut a, a thiltih dik loh avâng chuan Pathianin chutah chuan a tihlum a, Pathian bâwm kiangah chuan a thi ta a.

source: Then make two gold rings and put them on the lower ends of the bag, at the edge of it on the inner side nearest to the ephod.
target: Tin, rangkachak khâng pahnih i siam tur a ni a, chûng chu âwmbel kil pahnih, puithiam kawrdep chhûng lampangah chuan i vuah tur a ni.

source: Be reasonable
target: Âwm ang deuhin awm rawh

source: For even if you are washed with soda and take much soap, still your evil-doing is marked before me, says the Lord God.
target: Chingalin insilin sabawn tam tak hmang mah la, I khawlohna chu ka mithmuhah a lang tho a ni, Tih i Lalpa PATHIAN thu chhuak a ni.

source: Is it right for us to make payment of taxes to Caesar or not?
target: Kaisara hnena chhiah kan chawi a thiang nge thiang lo? tiin an zawt a.

source: And on the seventeenth day of the seventh month the ark came to rest on the mountains of Ararat.
target: Tichuan lawng chu thla sarihna ni sâwm leh ni sarih niah chuan Ararat tlângah chuan a lo innghat ta a.

source: Being named by God a high priest of the order of Melchizedek.
target: Melkisedeka awm dan anga Puithiam Lalberah Pathianin a vuah a.

source: You didn't tell a joke.
target: Fiamthu i sawi lo.

source: You were supposed to be there.
target: I awm tur a ni.

source: Now Joab was over all the army; and Benaiah, the son of Jehoiada, was at the head of the Cherethites and the Pelethites;
target: Joaba chu Israel sipai zawng zawng hotu a ni a; tin, Jeoada fapa Benaia chu Keret mi leh Pelet mite hotu a ni a:

source: And he said, Come after me: and they went away from their father Zebedee, who was in the boat with the servants, and came after him.
target: Tin, ani chuan anni chu a ko ta nghal a; tichuan an pa Zebedaia chu inhlawhfa an rawihte hnenah chuan lawngah an kalsan a, an zui ta a.

source: I didn't ask them
target: Anmahni chu ka zawt lo

source: For the wrong-hearted man is hated by the Lord, but he is a friend to the upright.
target: Mi kawhmawh chu LALPA ngaihin tenawm a ni si a; Mi tha famkim erawh chu a thian an ni.

source: His nose bled
target: Khapa hnar a thi

source: I thought I was safe.
target: Ka him ka ti a.

source: And their wings were stretched out over the cover; the faces of the winged ones were opposite one another and facing the cover.
target: Tin, cherub te chu inhmatawna, zahngaihna thutphah chu an thlaa hliapin, an thlate chu an zar duai a; zahngaihna thutphah lam chu cherub-te chuan an hawi ve ve a.

source: We traveled together
target: Kan zin dun a

source: Saying, God has given him up; go after him and take him, for he has no helper.
target: Pathianin a kalsan ta: Um ula, man rawh u; chhanhimtu tûr reng an awm si lo, tiin.

source: I live here
target: Hetah ka cheng

source: The sixth captain for the sixth month was Ira, the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite; and in his division were twenty-four thousand.
target: Thla riatnaa sipai hotu chu Zera thlah, Husat mi Sibekaia a ni a; tin, a pâwlah chuan singhnih leh sângli an awm..

source: I'll be with them
target: An bulah ka awm ve dawn nia

source: How do you feel
target: Engtin nge i awm a

source: I don't have any children yet.
target: Fa ka la nei lo.

source: Give them the keys.
target: Chabi chu pe rawh.

source: Keep a watch on your behaviour; let all your ways be rightly ordered.
target: I ke atân kawng tirualrem la, I kawng zawng zawng tihngheh ni rawh se.

source: They call us Russians.
target: Russian min ti a.

source: And truly if they had kept in mind the country from which they went out, they would have had chances of turning back.
target: Tin, an chhuahna ram chu lungkham sela chuan hawnna remchang an hmu tawh ngei tur a ni.

source: He's tripping balls.
target: Ball a trip a ni.

source: And the floors will be full of grain, and the crushing-places overflowing with wine and oil.
target: Hruite chu buhin a khat ang a, uain leh hriak khute chu a khat liam ang a.

source: And every nation made gods for themselves, and put them in the houses of the high places which the Samaritans had made, every nation in the towns where they were living.
target: Nimahsela hnam tin chuan mahni pathian thian an siam theuh va, Samari miten hmun sâng an lo siam inahte chuan hnam tinin mahni awmna khua theuhvah an dah a.

source: He's Austrian
target: Austria mi a nia

source: He is merely a child.
target: Naupang mai a ni.

source: For you have put me down into the deep, into the heart of the sea; and the river was round about me; all your waves and your rolling waters went over me.
target: Thûk takah, tuifinriat chhûngrilah chuan nangin mi paih lût a, Tui tamtak chu ka vêlin a awm a; I tuifâwn leh i tui in chhawk zawng zawngte chuan mi vûr zêl a.

source: And why are you troubled about clothing? See the flowers of the field, how they come up; they do no work, they make no thread:
target: Tin, silhfen thu engahnge in lungkham ni? Ram tuktinpar thanzia hi tha takin ngaihtuah rawh u; hna an thawk lo, la pawh an kai hek lo;

source: I was sympathetic
target: Ka lainat hle

source: And oil for the lights, and spices for the holy oil and for the sweet perfumes for burning.
target: tin, khawnvar atan hriak te, hriak thih mi atan leh hal tur rimtui tak atan englo rimtui nen;

source: I am tall
target: Ka sang

source: It may be used for food in your houses: the unclean and the clean may take of it, as of the gazelle and the roe.
target: Nangmahni awmhmunah in ei tur a ni; thianghlim lote leh thianghlimte pawhin heng sangai te, sakhi te ang hi chu in ei thei ang.

source: Don't bother getting up.
target: Thawh buai suh.

source: And let them all be burned on the altar as a burned offering to the Lord: a sweet smell, an offering made by fire to the Lord.
target: Tin, berâmpa chu a pumin maichâmah chuan i hâl tur a ni: chu chu LALPA tâna hâlral thilhlan a ni a: LALPA tâna meihlan rimtui chu a ni e.

source: And that I do.
target: Tin, chu chu ka ti bawk.

source: He doesn't even have a car.
target: Car pawh a nei lo.

source: And he was unable to do any work of power there, but only to put his hands on one or two persons who were ill, and make them well.
target: Tin, mi damlo tlemte chunga kut nghata a tihdam chauh lo chu, chutah chuan thil mak reng a ti thei lo va.

source: Would you like to eat something?
target: Thil ei i duh em?

source: Only Luke is with me. Get Mark and take him with you; for he is of use to me in the work.
target: Luka chauh ka hnenah a awm ta a. Marka kha sawm la, han hruai ve rawh, ani chu rawngbawl lamah ka tan a tangkai si a.

source: I certainly will miss it
target: Ka ngai ngei ang

source: Don't admit anything.
target: Engmah pawm suh.

source: We've already begun
target: Kan tan tawh a

source: Son of man, what is this saying which you have about the land of Israel, The time is long and every vision comes to nothing?
target: Mihring fapa, Israel rama he thufing tawi in neih hi eng tih na nge ni?'Nî khua a lo reiin inlârna apiang a thlâwn leh mai țhin' in tih hi.

source: You aren't finished
target: I zo lo a ni

source: If only a clean thing might come out of an unclean! But it is not possible.
target: Tunge thianghlim lo ata Thianghlim la chhuak thei le? Tumahin.

source: After him Binnui, the son of Henadad, was working on another part, from the house of Azariah as far as the turning of the wall and the angle.
target: A dawt chu Henadada fapa Binuian hmun dang, Azaria in atanga kulh kawi tanna, a kil thlengin a siam tha a.

source: So is the end of all who do not keep God in mind; and the hope of the evil-doer comes to nothing:
target: Pathian theihnghilhtu kawng chu chutiang a ni, Pathian ngaihsak lo mi beiseina chu a bo vang.

source: Let your curse come on them; let the heat of your wrath overtake them.
target: I lungnih loh êm emna chu an chungah leihbua la, I thinur thinrimna chuan anni chu man rawh se.

source: And Sarah said, God has given me cause for laughing, and everyone who has news of it will be laughing with me.
target: Tin, Sari chuan, Pathianin mi tinui ta; mi tin a hria apiangin mi nuihpui ang, a ti a.

source: Who kept faith with God who gave him his place, even as Moses did in all his house.
target: Pathian chhungte zawng zawng zingah Mosia a rinawm ang bawk khan, ani chu ruattu lakah chuan a rinawm a ni.

source: I got carded
target: Card ka hmu

source: For God will be the saviour of Zion, and the builder of the towns of Judah; so that it may be their resting-place and heritage.
target: Pathianin Zion chu chhan chhuakin, Juda khuate ch a din dawn si a; Tichuan chutah chuan an awm ang a, an nei nghal ang.

source: Who does he look like?
target: Tu ang nge a nih?

source: Sami is traveling.
target: Sami chu a zin a.

source: And now the light is not seen, for it is dark because of the clouds; but a wind comes, clearing them away.
target: Tunah, thli a lo thawh a, a chhem kianin Van zawla eng ropui chu miin an en ngam lo.

source: He set us by the ears.
target: Beng min nghat a.

source: In your walking, it will be your guide; when you are sleeping, it will keep watch over you; when you are awake, it will have talk with you.
target: I vah velin a hruai ang chia, I mut hunin a veng ang chia I thawh hunin a bia ang che.

source: You made a limit over which they might not go, so that the earth would never again be covered by them.
target: A pelh loh tûrin ri i kham a; Lei chim pil tûra alet leh tawh lohna tûrin.

source: And Pilate was surprised that he was dead; and, sending for the captain, he put a question to see if he had been dead for long.
target: Tichuan Pilatan chutia a thi ta thuai chu mak a ti hle a, tichuan sipai za hotu chu kovin, a thihna a rei tawh emaw tih a zawt a.

source: You weren't very nice.
target: I hlim vak lo.

source: Who has it?
target: Tunge nei?

source: I am injured
target: Ka inhliam

source: He works under me.
target: Ka hnuaiah hna a thawk thin.

source: I needed it
target: Ka mamawh takzet

source: Then Jesus said to him, You will not have faith if you do not see signs and wonders.
target: Tin, Isuan a hnenah, Chhinchhiahnate leh thilmakte in hmuh loh chuan in ring tawp lo vang, a ti a.

source: Will you put sharp-pointed irons into his skin, or fish-spears into his head?
target: A vun khatin thir hling te, A luah nghafeite i riah thei êm ni?

source: Tom wept.
target: Tom-a a inhnit.

source: And John was clothed in camel's hair, with a leather band about him; and his food was locusts and honey.
target: Tin, Johana chu sanghawngsei hmul puanin a inthuam a, a kawng savun kawnghrenin a hreng a, a chaw chu khaukhuap leh ram khawizu a ni.

source: The way of the Lord is a strong tower for the upright man, but destruction to the workers of evil.
target: Mi dak tak tan LALPA kawng chu kulhbing a ni ang a, Thil tha lo titu tan erawh chuan boralna a ni ang.

source: For this reason Jesus was put to death outside the walls, so that he might make the people holy by his blood.
target: Chutichuan, Isua pawhin, ama thisen ngeia mite chu a tihthianghlim theihna turin kulh kawngkhar pawn lamah chuan a lo tuar ta a.

source: Then Israel, looking at Joseph's sons, said, Who are these?
target: Tin, Israelan Josefa fapate chu a en a, Hêng hi tute nge ni? a ti a.

source: The dog is happy
target: Ui chu a hlim a

source: What are you supposed to do
target: Eng nge i tih tur

source: And put away foolish and uncontrolled questionings, seeing that they are a cause of trouble.
target: Amaherawhchu, indonate a hring thin tih hriain, inhnialna atthlak leh fing lovahte chuan tel duh suh.

source: Because, like sheep, you had gone out of the way; but now you have come back to him who keeps watch over your souls.
target: Beram bo anga in bo kha, tunah erawh chuan in thlarau vengtu leh Hotu hnenah chuan in kir leh tak hi.

source: I am giving my bike away.
target: Ka bike ka pe a.

source: It's strange
target: A mak lûtuk

source: Follow me
target: Mi zui rawh

source: But he went away by himself to a waste place for prayer.
target: Nimahsela ani chu thlalerahte a kal hrang a, a tawngtai thin a.

source: They'll understand us.
target: Min hrethiam ang.

source: There is one less
target: Pakhat tlem a awm

source: They're a little tight.
target: An tight deuh a.

source: And the Lord has taken men far away, and there are wide waste places in the land.
target: LALPAN mite chu hla taka a sawn a, ram chhûngah hmun kalsan hnu tam tak a awm hma loh chuan.

source: You are surrounded
target: I hual vel a ni

source: And the name of the third river is Tigris, which goes to the east of Assyria. And the fourth river is Euphrates.
target: Tin, lui pathumna hming chu Hiddekel a ni a: chu chu Assuria ram chhak lama luang chu a ni. Tin, lui palina chu Euphrates a ni.

source: And he will put the sheep on his right, but the goats on the left.
target: beramte chu a ding lamah a dah ang a, kelte erawh chu a vei lamah a dah ang.

source: Let him in
target: Khapa kha lo luh tir rawh

source: I ought to go.
target: Ka va haw châk tawh.

source: From looking after the sheep which were giving milk, he took him to give food to Jacob his people, and to Israel his heritage.
target: berâmpui no hruaite zuite atangin a hruai chhuak a, A mite Jakob-ho leh a rochan Israel-ho chawm tûrin.

source: Are you feeling tired?
target: I chau hle em?

source: Give my love to Rufus, one of the Lord's selection, and to his mother and mine.
target: Lalpaa thlan Rufa leh a nu, ka nu ve bawk kha chibai mi buksak ang che u.

source: They couldn't keep from crying
target: An tap lo thei lo

source: And they had no care till the waters came and took them all away; so will be the coming of the Son of man.
target: tui a lo let a, an zaa a lak bo vek hma loh chuan engmah an hre lo va; Mihring Fapa lo kal lehna chu chutiang bawk a ni ang.

source: Do not give back to his master a servant who has gone in flight from his master and come to you:
target: chhiahhlawh, in hnena an pu rawn tlan chhuahsan chu in pe let leh tur a ni lo:

source: They had no desire for my teaching, and my words of protest were as nothing to them.
target: Ka remruat pakhat te mah an duh lo va, Ka zilhna zawng zawngte chu an ngainep a.
Dar 3:30 a ni.

source: He doesn't love me
target: Min hmangaih lo

source: I married foreigners
target: Hnam dang ka nei a

source: I will not put forward words like these, or make use of your sayings in answer to him.
target: A thuin kei mi la vawm ve lo va, In tih dan ang maiin ka chhâng dawn hek lo.

source: Then God gave thought to Rachel, and hearing her prayer he made her fertile.
target: Tin, Pathianin Rakili chu a hre reng a, tichuan Pathianin a tawngtaina a ngaithla a, a chhûl a hawnsak ta a.

source: Please eat
target: Khawngaihin ei rawh

source: These, with their families and their languages and their lands and their nations, are the offspring of Shem.
target: Chûnghote chu Sema thlahte chu an ni, anmahni hnamte ang zêl leh anmahni tawngte ang zêlin, anmahni ram ramahte, anmahni chite ang zêl chuan.

source: He lost face
target: A zahawmna a hlauh

source: Against her the bow of the archer is bent, and he puts on his coat of metal: have no mercy on her young men, give all her army up to the curse.
target: Thal ngul hmangtuin thalk ngul kuai lovin, Thir kawr hain din pawh ding suh se, A tlangvâl rual pakhat pawh zuah lovin, A sipai zawng zawng nuai bo rawh u.

source: The Lord will give what is good; and our land will give its increase.
target: A ni, LALPA chuan thil tha a pe ang a; Kan ram hian a thil to chu a pe bawk ang.

source: The sinner will see it with grief; he will be wasted away with envy; the desire of the evil-doers will come to nothing.
target: Mi suaksual chuan chu chu a hmu ang a, a thinur ang a; A ha a thial ang a, a tuiral ang: Mi suaksualte duhzawng chu a boral ang.

source: Be fair
target: Dik takin

source: I like golf
target: Bawlvawm ka duh

source: He was talking of Judas, the son of Simon Iscariot. It was he who was to be false to Jesus--one of the twelve.
target: Iskariot Simona fapa Juda, sawm leh pahnihte zinga tel vea thu kha a sawi a ni,ani chu a mantirtu tur a ni si a.

source: A friend is loving at all times, and becomes a brother in times of trouble.
target: thian chuan englai pawhin a hmangaih reng a, Mangan ni atâna unauva piang a ni.

source: A foolish man puts no value on his father's training; but he who has respect for teaching has good sense.
target: Mi â chuan a pa thununa a ngainep thin a, Zilhhauna ngaisâng chuan hmang hre takin a ti thin.

source: Let's study together.
target: I zir dun ang u.

source: Well I don't know.
target: Awle ka hre lo.

source: And the men were full of wonder, saying, What sort of man is this, that even the winds and the sea do his orders?
target: Tin, mite chuan mak an ti hle a, He mi hi mi engnge a nih, thli leh dil lam pawhin a thu an awi hi? an ti a.

source: It's called subtext.
target: Subtext an ti a.

source: Now the woman was a Greek, a Syro-phoenician by birth: and she made a request to him that he would send the evil spirit out of her daughter.
target: Hmeichhia chu Grik mi a ni a, pianna lamah chuan Suro-Phoiniki mi a ni a. Ani chuan a fanu kawchhung ata ramhuai hnawt chhuak turin a ngen a.

source: But you, go on your way and take your rest: for you will be in your place at the end of the days.
target: Mahse nang chu tâwpna thleng chuan kal rawh: nite tâwpnaah chuan i châwl ang a, i chan tâwkah chuan i awm ang, a ti a.

source: Even the beasts of the waste land have full breasts, they give milk to their young ones: the daughter of my people has become cruel like the ostriches in the waste land.
target: Sihalte mahin an notê an hnute an pe, an hnektîr a; Ka mipui fanu erawh chu a nun a lo chhia, thlalêra, vanghawngsei ang maiin.

source: And Jesus was walking in the Temple, in Solomon's covered way.
target: Tin, Isua Pathian biak inah, Solomona hulhliapah a vei a vei a.

source: And he went into a house. And the people came together again, so that they were not even able to take bread.
target: Tin, inah a va lut a. Tin, mipui chu an lo kal khawm leh a, chutichuan chhang takngial pawh an ei thei ta lo va.

source: No one threatened us.
target: Tuman min vau lo.

source: What are you planning on doing
target: Eng nge tih i tum

source: Make no attack on them, for I will not give you any of their land, not even space enough for a man's foot: because I have given Mount Seir to Esau for his heritage.
target: bei suh ang che u ; an ram chu a khawii lai mah, kephah rah khawp lek pawh ka pe dawn hauh lo a che u; Seir tlâng chu apualah Esauva ka pe tawh a ni.

source: She fascinated me
target: Min ti hip a

source: It's my book
target: Ka lehkhabu a nia

source: I have a gum
target: Pawisa ka nei

source: Truly, my face will be turned away from them in that day, because of all the evil they have done in going after other gods.
target: Pathian dangte lam hawia thi țha lo an la tih tur zawng zawng avang chuan an lakah chu mi hun chuan ka inthup ngei ngei dawn a ni.

source: Stop talking
target: Ṭawng tawh suh

source: Is it big?
target: A lian em?

source: They would have nothing to do with the Lord, saying, He will do nothing, and no evil will come to us; we will not see the sword or be short of food:
target: LALPA chu dawhtheia ngaiin Engmah a tithei hlei lawng e, Chhiatna kan chungah a lo thleng lo vang, Tam emaw khandaih emaw kan tuar lo vang.

source: They were injured
target: Hliam an tuar a ni

source: O give worship to the Lord in holy robes; be in fear before him, all the earth.
target: Aw, thianghlim mawina inbelin LALPA chu chibai bûk ula: Leilung luah zawng zawngte u, a hmaah khur rawh u.

source: And Asa did what was good and right in the eyes of the Lord his God;
target: Asa chuan LALPA a Pathian mithmuhah thil tha leh dik a ti thin a:

source: Give praise to the Lord, O sons of Levi: let all the worshippers of the Lord give him praise.
target: Aw Levia chhûngte u, LALPA chu fak rawh u: LALPA tihtute u, LALPA chu fak rawh u.

source: The doors of his house have been shut and the lights put out; no perfumes have been burned or offerings made to the God of Israel in his holy place.
target: Hulhliap kawngkhârte chu an khar a, khawnvarte chu an timit a, Israelte Pathian hmun thianghlima chuan rimtuite lo hal lova, hâlral thilhlante an hlân lo bawk a.

source: You're gross!
target: I tenawm tawp!

source: They've all gone back home
target: An haw vek tawh

source: Take away evil-doers from before the king, and the seat of his power will be made strong in righteousness.
target: Lal hmaa mi suaksual chu sanw bo ula, A lalthutthleng chu felnaa tihngheh a ni ang.

source: And he took them to the king of Moab and they went on living with him while David was in his safe place.
target: Tin, Moab lal hmaah chuan a hruai a: tichuan Davida chu kulhbingah a awm chhûng zang chuan a hnênah an awm a.

source: Should I ask them
target: Anmahni hi ka zawt tur em ni

source: From him will come the keystone, from him the nail, from him the bow of war, from him will come every ruler;
target: A lak ata kil lung te, kilhna thir te, indona thal ngûlte, Rorêl tute an lo chhuakho dâwn a ni.

source: So is it with the coming back from the dead. It is planted in death; it comes again in life:
target: Mitthi thawhlehna pawh hi chutiang bawk a ni. Tawih theia tuhin a awm a; tawih thei lova kaihthawhin a awm;

source: He tries
target: A tichhin mêk

source: I don't believe him any longer.
target: Ka ring tawh lo.

source: I did not decline.
target: Ka decline lo.

source: They were screaming
target: An au vak vak a

source: Is the ploughman for ever ploughing? does he not get the earth ready and broken up for the seed?
target: Leilettu chuan chi theh nân lei a let reng ngai êm ni? A lei tlangte chua tikehin a tisawm reng ngai êm ni?

source: For there are sinners among my people: they keep watch, like men watching for birds; they put a net and take men in it.
target: Ka mite zingah mi suaksual an awm si a, Sava vehtuin a chan angin an chang reng a, Thang an kam a, mite an âwk a.

source: So we, when we were young, were kept under the first rules of the world;
target: Chutiangin keini pawh naupang kan nih lai khan, khawvel zirtirna dik lo hnuaiah bawihah kan awm;

source: Who are you pointing at
target: Tu nge i kawhhmuh

source: Don't go for a walk naked!
target: Saruaka kal suh!

source: I want a job
target: Hna ka duh

source: I didn't vote
target: Ka vawt lo

source: I felt weak
target: A chauhthlâk ka ti

source: She's the new intern.
target: Intern thar a ni.

source: So with joy will you get water out of the springs of salvation.
target: Chuvangin chhandamna tuikhur atate chu hlim takin tui in la chawi ang.

source: It wasn't our fault.
target: Kan sual a ni lo.

source: And the land of Judah will become a cause of great fear to Egypt; whenever its name comes to mind, Egypt will be in fear before the Lord of armies because of his purpose against it.
target: Juda rama awmho chu Aigupta-ho tan chuan rapthlâk tak an lo ni tawh ang a, an hming an lamna apiangte chuan an hlau vang, an chunga thleng tûr sipaihote LALPA thu ruat avâng chuan.

source: They won't intervene
target: An inrawlh dawn lo

source: Because it is in the Writings, that Abraham had two sons, one by the servant-woman, and one by the free woman.
target: Heti hian ziak a ni si a: Abrahaman fapa pahnih a nei a, pakhat chu bawihnu lakah, pakhat chu bawih lonu lakah.

source: And twelve lions were placed on the one side and on the other side on the six steps: there was nothing like it in any kingdom.
target: Tin, rahka parukah chuan, a sik tuakah sakeibaknei sâwm leh pahnih a ding a; chutiang chu khawi ramah mah an siam ngai lo.

source: For from the least of them even to the greatest, everyone is given up to getting money; from the prophet even to the priest, everyone is working deceit.
target: A te ber ațangin a lian ber thleng pawhin Mi tin, duhamnain an khat si a; zâwlneite leh puithiamte meuh pawh, Mi tin, hlemhle takin an che a ni.

source: Do not give me into their hands, because false witnesses have come out against me, and men breathing destruction.
target: Mi dotute duh duha tihah mi pe lul suh ang che: Hretu derten mi bei a, nunchhiat thu chhak chhuak thintute chuan.

source: By the breath of God ice is made, and the wide waters are shut in.
target: Pathian thaw vangin tuikhal a lo awm a, Tui zau tak pawh a khal zo va,

source: I give praise to my God for you at all times, because of the grace of God which has been given to you in Christ Jesus;
target: Krista Isuaa Pathian khawngaihna in hnena pek avang khan in chung thu-ah Pathian hnenah lawmthu ka hril fo thin;

source: And Eber had two sons: the name of the one was Peleg, because in his time the peoples of the earth became separate; and his brother's name was Joktan.
target: Tin, Ebera chuan fapa pahnih a nei a: pakhat hming chu Pelaga a ni a, a dam lai chuan lei hi thenin a awm ta si a; a nau hming chu Joktana a ni a.

source: Are you crying?
target: I tap e law?

source: He will give us our heritage, the glory of Jacob who is dear to him. (Selah.
target: Ani chuan kan roluah tûr chu min thlansak ang, A hmangaih Jakoba chhuan ber ram chu. Selah

source: I'm mad.
target: Ka a.

source: Get dressed quickly.
target: Inchei vat rawh.

source: I didn't fall down.
target: Ka tlu lo.

source: We looked at each other.
target: Kan in en a.

source: Are they looking at us?
target: Min en em ni?

source: And I will do even worse than this, and make myself even lower in your eyes: but the servant-girls of whom you were talking will give me honour.
target: Hêng ai mah hian ka la zahpuiawm ang, keimah pawh ka la insit cheu ang; amaherwhchu chug chhiahhlaw nula i sawite chawimawiin ka awm ang, a ti a.

source: Tom cheats
target: Tom'an a bum

source: Let's not get carried away.
target: I phur lo ang u.

source: Purposing destruction, using deceit; your tongue is like a sharp blade.
target: I leiin thil sual tak tih a suangtuah thin; Bakmeh chem hriam tak bumhmang ang hian.

source: So when the news came to him that Lazarus was ill, he did not go from the place where he was for two days.
target: Chuvangin a dam lo tih a hriatin a awmna ngaiah ni hnih a la awm ta cheu va.

source: Are you travelling together?
target: In zin dun em?

source: So they had food and were full; for he gave them their desire;
target: Chutichuan an ei a, an puar hle a; An chaka chu a pe ta a ni.

source: So your store-houses will be full of grain, and your vessels overflowing with new wine.
target: Tichuan i buh in chu a lo khat liam ang a, I sawrkhur uain tharin a luang liam ang.

source: And from Heshbon to Ramath-mizpeh, and Betonim; and from Mahanaim to the edge of Debir;
target: Hesbon atanga Ramathmizpe leh Betonim thlengin; Mahanaim atanga Debir ramri thlengin;

source: I asked him for advice.
target: Thurawn ka dil a.

source: You have seen my shame, how I was laughed at and made low; my haters are all before you.
target: Nangin mi mi sawichhiatna te, ka mualphona te, ka zahnate hi i hria e: Mi dotute chu i hmaah an awm vek a ni.

source: Does she have rice?
target: Buhfai a nei em?

source: I prepaid
target: Ka pelawk

source: Which cap is yours?
target: Eng cap nge i ta?

source: For as the earth puts out buds, and as the garden gives growth to the seeds which are planted in it, so the Lord will make righteousness and praise to be flowering before all the nations.
target: Leilung hian a thil chawr chu a chhuahtir ang leh, huan hian a chhûnga thil chinte chu a chawrtir ang hian, Lalpa Pathian chuan felna leh rfakna hnam tinreng hmaah chuan a chawrtir dawn si a.

source: I guess I will.
target: Ka mu ngei ang ka ring.

source: For your mouth is guided by your sin, and you have taken the tongue of the false for yourself.
target: I khawlohna chuan i ka a thunun a, Fin vervek tawng i thlang a nih hi,

source: Pride goes before destruction, and a stiff spirit before a fall.
target: Chapona chu boralna hmaah a kal a, Rilru intivei chu tlukna hmaah.

source: Now the Lord had given Solomon wisdom, as he had said to him; and there was peace between Hiram and Solomon, and they made an agreement together.
target: Tin, LALPAN a tiam ang ngeiin Solomona chu finna a pe a; tin, Hirama leh Solomona karah chuan inremna a awm a; an pahnih chuan thu an thlung dun ta a.

source: When the morning stars made songs together, and all the sons of the gods gave cries of joy?
target: Varparh arsite an zai khâwm a, Pathian fate zawng zawng an au lai khan?

source: It's your birthday
target: I piancham a ni

source: You are being a kook.
target: I kok a ni.

source: We did it already
target: Kan ti tawh a

source: You can still do it.
target: I la ti thei tho.

source: As for the saints who are in the earth, they are the noble in whom is all my delight.
target: Leia mi thianghlim awmte zawng, Anni chu mi tha, ka lawmna zawng anwg awmna chu an ni, ka ti a ni.

source: But he will be troubled by news from the east and from the north; and he will go out in great wrath, to send destruction on, and put an end to, great numbers.
target: Mahse, chhak lam leh hmâr lam ațanga thu thangin amah a tibuai ang: tichuan mi tamtak tiboral tûr leh timang tûrin thinur takin a chhuak ang.

source: The Upright One, looking on the house of the evil-doer, lets sinners be overturned to their destruction.
target: Mi fel chuan mi suaksual chhûngkuate a ngaihtuah thin a, Mi suaksualte an chhiatna tûra thehthang bo an nihzia te.

source: Are you ever wrong?
target: I tisual ngai em?

source: They can't get out
target: An chhuak thei lo

source: Come on, Tom.
target: Tom, lo kal rawh.

source: Don't be surprised
target: Mak ti suh

source: And the pillars of the open space round it, with their bases and nails and cords.
target: a kawt hung velna ban te, a nghahchhan kerkuak te, a kilhbehna leh a hruite nen.

source: And now let Pharaoh make search for a man of wisdom and good sense, and put him in authority over the land of Egypt.
target: Chutichuan tûnah hian Pharaoa chuam mi pakhat bengvâr tak fing tak mai zawng chhuak sela, Aigupta ram chungah hian hotuah awmtîr rawh se.

source: I'm ill.
target: Ka damlo.

source: I will make the offerings of my oath, even before all his people;
target: Ka thutiam chu LALPA lakah ka hlen ang. A ni, a mite zawng zawng hmaah chuan;

source: The land of Goshen will be your living-place, and you will be near me; you and your children and your children's children, and your flocks and herds and all you have:
target: tichuan Gosen ramah i awm ang a, ka kiang ngeiah hian i awm dâwn nia, nang leh i fate leh i tute leh i berâm rualte leh i bâwng rualte leh i neih zawng zawng nên:

source: And when they had given them a great number of blows, they put them in prison, giving orders to the keeper of the prison to keep them safely:
target: Tin, vawi tam tak an vuak zawhin tan inah an khung a, a vengtu hnenah him taka ven tur an ti tlat a;

source: How frequently did they go against him in the waste land, and give him cause for grief in the dry places!
target: Thlalêrah khana chungah an va hei zingin, Ram rovah khan amah chu an va tilungngai zing êm!

source: I lost
target: Ka bo

source: I have made an oath once by my holy name, that I will not be false to David.
target: Vawi khat ka thianghlimna chhalin chhia ka chham a; Davida hnênah dawt ka saiw lo vang;

source: And Lot went out to them in the doorway, shutting the door after him.
target: Tin, Lota chu kawngka bulah chuan an hnênah a va chhuak a, kawng a khâr leh a.

source: The heart of the wise man is the teacher of his mouth, and gives increased learning to his lips.
target: Mi fing thinlung chuan a ka a zirtir thin a, A hmuiah thiamna a belhchhah thin.

source: This is his house
target: Hei hi a in a ni

source: I'll rip your head off!
target: I lu ka rip ang!

source: He gives us money
target: Pawisa min pe a

source: Our pride is in God at all times, to his name we give praise for ever. (Selah.
target: Nilengin Pathian kan chhuang a, I hming chu kumkhuain kan fak bawk ang. Selah

source: She didn't deserve to die.
target: Thih a phu lo.

source: This is the right thing to do.
target: Hei hi a dik a ni.

source: I'm artistic
target: Lemziak mi ka nia

source: Do not say wait
target: Ngawi rawh ti suh

source: I like pepper
target: Hmarchapui ka duh

source: Being greatly troubled because they were teaching the people and preaching Jesus as an example of the coming back from the dead.
target: mi an zirtir leh Isua avnga mitthi zing ata thawhleh thu an hrilh avngin an lungni lo em em a.

source: But she who gives herself to pleasure is dead while she is living.
target: Amaherawhchu,hmeithai mahni nawmna ngawta inpe chu a dam lai pawhin a thi a ni.

source: I wasn't celebrating
target: Ka lawm lo a ni

source: You are ugly
target: I hmêlchia

source: I went by the field of the hater of work, and by the vine-garden of the man without sense;
target: Mi thatchhe lovah ka kal a, Hriatna nei lo mi grêp huanah nên;

source: I just moved
target: Ka insawn tawh

source: These things said he: and after that he said to them, Lazarus our friend is at rest; but I go so that I may make him come out of his sleep.
target: Chung thu chu a sawi a; tin, chu mi hnuah chuan an hnenah, Kan thian Lazara chu a muhil ta a; a muhil kai harh turin ka kal dawn a ni, a ti a.

source: For the children of Naphtali the sixth heritage came out, for the children of Naphtali by their families;
target: Tin, thumvawr vawi rukna chu Napthtalia thlahe chngah an chhûngkaw zir zel bawkin Naphtalia thlahte chungah a tlu leh ta a.

source: And in Jerusalem there were living some of the sons of Judah, and of Benjamin, and of Ephraim and Manasseh;
target: Tin, Jerusalem-ah chuan Juda thlah te, Benjamina thlah te, Ephraima leh Manasea thlahte an awm a;

source: I don't bite
target: Ka seh lo

source: I don't often laugh
target: Ka nuih fo lo

source: Who broke it
target: Tu tih keh nge

source: Happy is the land whose ruler is of noble birth, and whose chiefs take food at the right time, for strength and not for feasting.
target: I nihlawh e, nang ram, lal chu lal chi fapa leh Hotute ruih nân ni lo, chakna tûra hun dik taka ei thin neitu!

source: I understand that
target: Chu chu ka hrethiam

source: So he came to a town of Samaria which was named Sychar, near to the bit of land which Jacob gave to his son Joseph:
target: Chutichuan Samari ram khaw pakhat Sukar an tih chu a lo thleng a, Jakoban a fa Josefa hnena hmun a pek kiang kha;

source: But I will make them responsible for the care of the house and all its work and everything which is done in it.
target: A inpui enkawltuahte ka siam ang a, rawngbawlna zawng zawng leh tih tûr awm apiangte ti tûr in

source: This, the first of his signs, Jesus did at Cana in Galilee and let his glory be seen openly; and his disciples put their faith in him.
target: Isuan he a chhinchhiahna tih tantirhna hi Galili ram Kana khuaah chuan a ti a, a ropuizia a lantir ta a; tin, a zirtirte chuan ani chu an ring a.

source: For long enough have men of pride made sport of our soul.
target: Mi nuamsate deuna leh Chapote hmusitnain Kan nunna hi a khat nasa hle.

source: You're not very good at it.
target: I thiam vak lo.

source: We're inviting you.
target: Kan sawm a che u.

source: There are traitors
target: Phatsantu an awm

source: Are you religious
target: Sakhaw mi i ni em

source: You'll be confused
target: I buai mai ang

source: This is a copy of the letter which they sent to Artaxerxes the king: Your servants living across the river send these words:
target: Lal Artezerzia chu hetiangin lehkha an thawn a: Lalber Artezerzia chi i chiahhlawh Euphrates lui khawthlang lam ram miten chibai kan bûk e.

source: Who shot Tom?
target: Tom hi tunge kap?

source: Do you want pizza or not?
target: Pizza i duh em?

source: They have put on me evil for good; hate in exchange for my love.
target: Anni chuan thil tha hchu thil sualin mi rul a, Ka hmangaihna chu huatnain mi rul bawk a.

source: You fixed it
target: Siamṭha rawh

source: Then Joseph made a law which is in force to this day, that Pharaoh was to have the fifth part; only the land of the priests did not become his.
target: Tichuan Josefan Pharaoa hmun ngaa hmun khat a hmuh zêl tûr thu hi Aigupta ram atân tûn thlengin dânah a siam ta: puithiamho ram chauh chu a ni, Pharaoa ta ni lo chu.

source: Are you all right
target: I dam tha em

source: They're so adorable
target: An adorable lutuk

source: And having come to Mysia, they made an attempt to go into Bithynia, but the Spirit of Jesus did not let them;
target: tin, Musia ram kiang an thlenin Bethunia rama luh an tum a, nimahsela Isua thlarauvin a phal si lo va.

source: He made me shiver.
target: Min tiharh tir a.

source: And of the Shilonites: Asaiah the oldest, and his sons.
target: Tin, Silon-ho thlahte chu Asaia chu an zinga upa ber a ni a, a fate nên.

source: There were five thousand, four hundred gold and silver vessels. All these were taken back by Sheshbazzar, when those who had been taken prisoner went up from Babylon to Jerusalem.
target: Rangkachak leh tangkaraw bungbêl zawng zawng chu sângnga leh zali a ni. Salte chu Babulon ata Jerusalem-a an hruai chhoh lai khan Sesbazaran heng zawng zawng hi a keng chho va.

source: And Jehoshaphat took his place in the meeting of Judah and Jerusalem, in the house of the Lord in front of the new open space,
target: Tin, Jehosaphata chu LALPA inah, kawt hung chung thar bulah Juda-ho leh Jerusalem-ho pungkhawm zingah chuan a ding a;

source: Of the tribe of Judah were marked twelve thousand: of the tribe of Reuben twelve thousand: of the tribe of Gad twelve thousand:
target: Juda hnama mi 12,000 Reubena hnama mi 12,000 Gada hnama mi 12,000 Gada hnama mi 12000

source: So that he went away from the holy place in Shiloh, the tent which he had put among men;
target: Chutichu a Silo biak buk, Mihring zinga a puan in dah chu, a kalsan a;

source: And the blood was put on the Tent and all the holy vessels in the same way.
target: Chu lo pawh chu, biak buk leh rawngbawlna hmanrua zawng zawng chu chutiang bawkin thisen chuain a theh ta bawk a.

source: Tom is your father
target: Tom hi i pa a ni

source: And Judah went up; and the Lord gave the Canaanites and the Perizzites into their hands; and they overcame ten thousand of them in Bezek.
target: Tin, Juda chu a han kal a; tichuan Kanaan-hote leh Periz-hote chu LALPAN an kutah a pe ta a: tin, Bezek khuaah mi singkhat an that a.

source: So he went back with him, and had a meal in his house and a drink of water.
target: Chutichuan a hnênah chuan a kir leh ve a, a inah chuan chhangte a eiin tui te a in ta a.

source: Did you help?
target: I ṭanpui em?

source: He felled a tree.
target: Thing pakhat a tikeh a.

source: Now in the fifth year of King Rehoboam, Shishak, king of Egypt, came up against Jerusalem;
target: Tin, lal Rehoboama lal kum nga kum chuan heti hi a ni a, Aigupta lal Sisakan Jerusalem khua chu a han bei a:

source: Just jump in
target: Lo zuang lût rawh

source: And this was done three times: and then the vessel was taken back into heaven.
target: Chutiang hlirin vawi thum a lo awm a: tin, bawm chu vana khai chhohvin a awm leh ta nghal a.

source: The matter is closed
target: Thu chu khar a ni

source: And he put the meal offering before the Lord, and taking some of it in his hand he had it burned on the altar, separately from the burned offering of the morning.
target: Tin, chhangphut thilhlan chu a hlan a, chuta mi chu a vei khatin a la a, zing lam halral thilhlan tih loh pawh chu maichâmah huan a hal bawk a.

source: Up! O God, come as judge of the earth; for all the nations are your heritage.
target: Aw Pathian, tho la, lei ro hi rel ang che: Hnam tinreng hi i rochung dawn si a.

source: I'm direct
target: Kawh hmuh ka ni

source: Hey, relax
target: Hei, hahdam rawh

source: Then Moses and Aaron, Nadab, and Abihu, and seventy of the chiefs of Israel went up:
target: Chutichuan Mosia leh Arona leh Nadaba leh Abihua leh Israel upa sawmsarihte chu an han chho va:

source: And the priest will be like the people; I will give them punishment for their evil ways, and the reward of their acts.
target: A mipui a puithiamin ang khata hrem an ni ang a, An kawngte avâng chuan anmahni ka hrem ang a, An thiltihte ka thungrûl ang.

source: Then Joshua and all Israel, acting as if they were overcome before them, went in flight by way of the waste land.
target: Tin, Josua leh Israel-ho zawng zawngte chu dawl ta ni awm takin an awm a, thlaler lam kawngah an tlan chiam a.

source: We're shy.
target: Kan zak a.

source: And the daughters of Tyre will be there with an offering; those who have wealth among the people will be looking for your approval.
target: Tura fanu chu thilpek kengin chutah chuan a awm ang a; Mi zinga hausate ngei chuan i khawngaihna an ngen ang.

source: Don't you dare leave.
target: I chhuak ngam suh.

source: Those who were numbered of them, the males of a month old and over, were six thousand, two hundred.
target: Mipa zawng zawng thla khat achin chung lam an chhiar dan ang chuan 6,200 an ni.

source: He is not married
target: Nupui nei lo a ni

source: Give us help in our trouble; for there is no help in man.
target: Dotute bei tûrin min tanpui ang che: Mihring tanpuina chu engmah lo mai mai a ni si a.

source: I want eggs
target: Artui ka duh

source: Do you promise Yes
target: I tiam em Awle

source: Now she who is truly a widow and without family puts her hope in God, giving herself to prayer day and night.
target: Hmeithai taktak mahni chauhva awm chuan Pathian chungah beiseina a nei tlat a, achhun azanin dil leh tawngtaiin a awm fo thin a.

source: And the resting-places of the dead came open; and the bodies of a number of sleeping saints came to life;
target: thlante a lo inhawng a; mi thianghlim muhil tawhte taksa tam tak pawh kaihthawhin an awm ta a;
