source: A separate tenth part for every one of the seven lambs;
target: beram no pasarih, beram no pakhat țheuhvah hmun sawma țhena hmun khat:

source: They wouldn't stop
target: An titawp lovang

source: Open up.
target: Hawng rawh.

source: And say a prayer that your flight may not be in the winter, or on a Sabbath.
target: Tin, in tlan bo hun tur chu thlasikah emaw, Chawlhniah emaw a lo thlen loh nan tawngtai rawh u;

source: You never paid me.
target: Min pe ngai lo.

source: You're witty
target: I fing reuh

source: Keep your eyes from looking on the wine when it is red, when its colour is bright in the cup, when it goes smoothly down:
target: Uain a sen kak laiin en suh, Nova a zia a lan lai te, A luan thlâk zaih zaih lai tein;

source: And he made places for worship at the high places, and made priests, who were not Levites, from among all the people.
target: Tin, hmun sâng inte a san a, Levia fate ni lo, vantlang zinga mi puithiamahte a siam a.

source: I came to like him
target: Amah chu ka duh ve ta a ni

source: I will make clear what your righteousness is like and your works; you will have no profit in them.
target: I felna thu hi ka sawi ang a; i thitihte zawng i tan engmah a hnemhnang lo vang.

source: You're not my type.
target: Ka type i ni lo.

source: So they put away the strange gods from among them, and became the Lord's servants; and his soul was angry because of the sorrows of Israel.
target: Tichuan an zinga hnam dang pathiante chu an dah bo vek a, LALPA rawng chu an bawl ta a: tin, Israel-hote manganna avâng chuan a rilru a lungngai ta êm êm a.

source: This is the same Benaiah who was the great man of the thirty, chief of the thirty; and in his division was Ammizabad his son.
target: Thla nganaa sipai hotu chu Izra mi Samhutha a ni a; tin, apawlah chuan singhnih leh sângli an awm.

source: Come back to your rest, O my soul; for the Lord has given you your reward.
target: Aw ka nunna, i chawlhnaah chuan kir leh rawh; LALPA chuan i chungah tha takin a ti ta si a.

source: They were wandering in the waste places; they saw no way to a resting-place.
target: Thlalêra ram ro kawngah chuan an vâk an vâk a; Mihring awmna khua rêng rêng an hmu lo va.

source: Tom is alive
target: Tom chu a dam e

source: A life for a life.
target: Nunna atan nunna.

source: I will shoot
target: Ka kap dawn

source: They didn't like you
target: An duh lo che a ni

source: She who is in Babylon, who has a part with you in the purpose of God, sends you her love; and so does my son Mark.
target: Babulon khuaa awm nangmahni anga thlan nu hian chibai a buk a che u; chutiang bawkin ka fapa Marka pawhin chibai a buk a che u.

source: Aren't you pleased
target: I lawm lo em ni

source: Because this people will have nothing to do with the softly-flowing waters of Shiloah, and have fear of Rezin and Remaliah's son;
target: Heng chite hian Silova tui dam taka luang del delte chu an duh loh avâng leh, Rezina leh Remalia fapa chunga an lawm avângin,

source: And put on the new man, to which God has given life, in righteousness and a true and holy way of living.
target: mihring thar, thutak felna leh thianghlimnaa Pathian anga siam khan inthuam bawk ula, tih thu hi.

source: But if we say, Of men; we will be stoned by the people, for they are certain that John was a prophet.
target: Tin, ‘Mihring thu,’ kan tih chuan mi zawng zawngin lungin min deng ang; Johana chu zawlnei a nih an ring si a, an ti a.

source: I might sing
target: Ka zai maithei

source: And God gave the dry land the name of Earth; and the waters together in their place were named Seas: and God saw that it was good.
target: Tin, Pathianin khawmual chu Lei a vuah a; tui awm khâwmte chu Tuifinriatte a vuah a: tin, Pathianin chu chu a en a, tha a ti hle a.

source: I was framed
target: Thlêm ka ni

source: I didn't lie
target: Dâwt ka sawi lo

source: What is that
target: Saw saw engnge ni

source: I stood.
target: Ka ding.

source: For if you have these things in good measure, they will make you fertile and full of fruit in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ.
target: Chung chu in ta a nih a, a pun zel si chuan kan Lalpa Isua Krista hriatna kawngah hian thatchhe lo leh rah lo lovin a siam thin che u a ni.

source: I don't miss much.
target: Ka tlai tam lo.

source: This is extremely ingenious
target: Hei hi a fing hle

source: With whom the kings of the earth made themselves unclean, and those who are on the earth were full of the wine of her evil desires.
target: leia lalte chuan ani chu an ngai thin a, leia awmte pawh chu a mi ngaih chinna uain chuan hrai ruihin an awm thin, a ti a.

source: Be happy
target: Lo hlim ang che

source: You don't have to hide it.
target: I thup a ngai lo.

source: This'll do
target: Hei hi a ṭha ang

source: And those who were seated at table with him said to themselves, Who is this who even gives forgiveness of sins?
target: Tin, a chaw kilpuiten, Sualte pawh ngaidam hi tunge maw ni le? an inti a.

source: I dislike Tom
target: Tom ka duh lo

source: And every meal offering, mixed with oil or dry, is for all the sons of Aaron in equal measure.
target: Chhangphut thilhlan zawng zawng chu hriaka hmeh pawh, a ro pawh a dang ang bawkin Arona fapate zawng zawngin an insem tlang tur a ni.

source: Tom stinks
target: Tom a rimchhia

source: And your life will be brighter than day; though it is dark, it will become like the morning.
target: I nun chhun chang aiin a en ang. Thim pawh awm se, zing ang a ni ang.

source: I'm your roommate.
target: I roommate ka ni.

source: I have given my mind to do your pleasure with all my heart; have mercy on me, as you have said.
target: Ka thinlung zawng zawngin i khawngaihna ka ngen a: I thu ang zelin mi khawngaih ang che.

source: Are you writing a letter
target: Lehkha i ziak em

source: I'm wrong.
target: Ka diklo.

source: And over it were the winged ones of glory with their wings covering the mercy-seat; about which it is not possible now to say anything in detail.
target: a chung lamah zahngaihna thutphah hliahin, ropuina Cherubte an awm bawk a; chung thute chu tunah zawng akip akawiin kan sawi thei lo vang.

source: Ask her for advice
target: Thurawn dil rawh

source: Be my judge, O God, supporting my cause against a nation without religion; O keep me from the false and evil man.
target: Aw Pathian, ro mi rel la, Pathian ngaihsak lo hnam chungah hian ka thu mi sawipui ang che: Aw, mi bumhmang mi dik lo lakah hian mi chhanhim ang che.

source: Be sensible
target: Awmzia nei rawh

source: My son, give attention to my wisdom; let your ear be turned to my teaching:
target: Ka fapa, ka finna ngaithla la, Ka hriatnaah i beng dawh rawh,

source: So his brothers said to him, Go away from here into Judaea so that your disciples may see the works which you do.
target: Chutichuan a unauten a hnenah, Heta tangin Judai ramah va kal rawh, i zirtirte pawhin i thiltih hi an hmuh theih nan.

source: Then looking at it, I gave thought: I saw, and I got teaching from it.
target: Tichuan ka en reng a, ngun takin ka ngaihtuah ta a, A mi zirtir chu ka hmu a, ka pawm ta a.

source: Rods are being made ready for the man of pride, and blows for the back of the foolish.
target: Rorêlna chu hmusit chingtute tana buatsaih a ni a, Vuakna chu mi â hnungzang atân.

source: Take away the waste from silver, and a vessel will come out for the silver-worker.
target: Tangkaraw ekchhiah paih la, A chhertuin thil mawi a chher thei ang.

source: But one of the men made a wound in his side with a spear, and straight away there came out blood and water.
target: nimahsela sipaite zinga mi pakhatin a nakah feiin a chhun a, tichuan thisen leh tui a chhuak ta nghal a.

source: False statements against me have come to my ears; fear was on every side: they were talking together against me, designing to take away my life.
target: Mi tam tak mi hekna ka hre si a, Ka vêla hlauhawm vawm chu; Mi phair ho lai khan. Ka nun mi laksak an tum a.

source: And when Jacob had come to the end of these words to his sons, stretching himself on his bed, he gave up his spirit, and went the way of his people.
target: Tin, Jakoba chuan a fapate hnêna thuro a chhiah zawh chuan a kete chu khumah a hlâng kai a, a thlarau a thlah a, a chipuite hnênah chuan hruaiin a awm ve ta a.

source: Don't feel shy.
target: Inthlahrung suh.

source: It was wet
target: A huh a

source: And Baasha went to rest with his fathers, and was put into the earth at Tirzah; and Elah his son became king in his place.
target: Tin, Baasa chu a pute hnênah chuan a muhil a, Tirza khuaah an phûm ta a; tin, a fapa Ela chu a aiawhin a lal ta a.

source: I disagree vehemently.
target: Ka pawm lo hle.

source: And the servants of Huram and the servants of Solomon, in addition to gold from Ophir, came back with sandal-wood and jewels.
target: Tin, Solomona chhiahhlawhte leh Hurama chhiahhlawh te, Ophir atanga rangkachak va phurte pawh chuan algum thing leh lunghlute an rawn phur a.

source: This has been fun
target: Hei hi a nuam hle

source: I can't paint
target: Ka hnawih thei lo

source: By faith the walls of Jericho came down, after they had been circled for seven days.
target: Rinnain Jeriko khaw kulh kha ni sarih an hual hnuin a chim ta a.

source: Preaching in the name of the Lord without fear; and he had discussions with the Greek Jews; but they were working for his death.
target: Lalpa hmingin huai takin thu a hril thin a. Tin, Grik Judate hnenah thu a sawi a, a hnial a; anni erawh chuan ani chu tihhlum an tum a.

source: You make me sick, Tom.
target: Min ti na a, Tom.

source: And said to him, Your servants have taken note of the number of all the fighting-men under our orders, and every one is present;
target: Mosia hnenah, I chhiahhlawhte hian kan kuta awm indo mite chu kan chhiar a, tumah kim lo kan awm lo va.

source: I am Japanese
target: Japan mi ka nia

source: We've found something.
target: Thil kan hmu ta.

source: I'm not impersonating you.
target: Ka insiam lem lo.

source: In a few minutes.
target: Minute rei lo têah.

source: For as Jonah was three days and three nights in the stomach of the great fish, so will the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth.
target: Jona chu ni thum leh zan thum nghapui kawchhunga a awm ang khan, Mihring Fapa hi ni thum leh zan thum lei kawchhungah a awm bawk dawn a ni.

source: The Lord is high over all nations, and his glory is higher than the heavens.
target: LALPA chu hnam tinrengte chungah chuan chungnung daih a ni a, A ropuina chuan vante khi a khum daih a ni.

source: I wasn't expecting to win.
target: Chak ka beisei lo.

source: He kicked it
target: A pet chiah

source: I'm not setting anything on fire.
target: Engmah ka hal lo.

source: So Amaziah, separating the armed band which had come to him from Ephraim, sent them back again; which made them very angry with Judah, and they went back burning with wrath.
target: Tichuan Amazia chuan Ephraim rama atanga sipai lo kalte chu haw leh tûrin a tihrang a; chuvang chuan Judate chungah chuan an thin a rim hle mai a, thimrim engphiarin an haw leh ta a.

source: I made up with her.
target: Ka make up a.

source: Are you planning on buying a house?
target: In lei i tum em?

source: There will be goats' milk enough for your food, and for the support of your servant-girls.
target: Khawpkham tûr kel hnute chu a awm ang a, In chhûngkuaa ei atân, in nulate chawmnate nên.

source: I gave word in the past of the things which came about; they came from my mouth, and I made them clear: suddenly I did them, and they came about.
target: Tun hma thilte chu hmasâng ațangin ka sawi a; a ni, ka ka ațangin a chhuak a, ka hriattir a: vawilehkhatah ka hlen thut a, a lo thleng a.

source: He dared to propose to her.
target: A propose ngam a.

source: You won't enjoy it.
target: I hlim dawn lo.

source: And in the time of his trouble, this same King Ahaz did even more evil against the Lord.
target: A mangan lai takte pawh chuan he lal Ahaza hian LALPA chungah thil a la tisual deuh deuh ta mai a.

source: You will have sons and daughters, but they will not be yours; for they will go away prisoners into a strange land.
target: Fanu fapa in hring ang a, nimahsela in ta an ni lo vang, salah an la hruai dawn a ni.

source: Whom did you meet?
target: Tu nge in inhmu?

source: How curious!
target: A dîl chhût!

source: In the light of the king's face there is life; and his approval is like a cloud of spring rain.
target: Lal hmêl êngah chuan nuna a awm a, A duhsakna chu ruahtui tla hnuhnung chhum ang a ni.

source: This man went in to Pilate, and made a request for the body of Jesus. Then Pilate gave orders for it to be given to him.
target: chu mi chu Pilata hnenah a va kal a, Isua ruang chu a dil a. Tin, Pilatan pe turin thu a pe a.

source: I didn't swim
target: Ka hleuh lo

source: They weren't busy
target: An buai lo hle mai

source: No cash was taken
target: Cash lak a ni lo

source: Are your words of pride to make men keep quiet? and are you to make sport, with no one to put you to shame?
target: I uan thu hian mi a tingawi ang êm ni? Tham lo taka i tawng hian tuman an tizak lo vang che maw?

source: And the king of the south will be strong, but one of his captains will be stronger than he and will be ruler; and his rule will be a great rule.
target: Tichuan, chhimlam lal chu chak a ang a; a hotute zînga pakhat erawh chu amah aiin a chak zâwk ang a, thuneihna anei ang a, a thuneihna chu thuneihna ropui tak a ni ang.

source: Before ever the silver cord is cut, or the vessel of gold is broken, or the pot is broken at the fountain, or the wheel broken at the water-hole;
target: Tangkaraw zai chu a chah a, Rangkachak berhbu chu a keh a, Hlumbêl chu tuikhurah a keh a, Tawlailir chu tuikhuah bulah a tliah hma hian

source: And for its drink offering take the fourth part of a hin for one lamb: in the holy place let the wine be drained out for a drink offering for the Lord.
target: Tin, beram no pakhat hlannaa in tur thilhlan chu, hin hmun lia țhena hmun khat a ni tur a ni: LALPA tana uain i bun chhuak tur a ni.

source: Why are you sleeping, O Lord? awake! and come to our help, do not give us up for ever.
target: Aw LALPA, harh ta che, engah nge i muthilh ni? Meng la, kumkhua chuan min thlauhthla suh ang che.

source: And Abigail was the mother of Amasa; and the father of Amasa was Jether the Ishmaelite.
target: Tin, Abigailin Amasa a hring a: tin, Amasa pa chu Ismael mi Jethera a ni.

source: And because of all this we are making an agreement in good faith, and putting it in writing; and our rulers, our Levites, and our priests are putting their names to it.
target: Chung zawng zawng avâng chuan thu nghet tak kan thlung a, kan ziak a; kan mi lian te, kan Levi-hote leh kan puithiamten min nemnghehpui a.

source: She was wearing pumps.
target: Pump a bun a.

source: Who will pay?
target: Tunge pê dâwn?

source: For divisions are necessary among you, in order that those who have God's approval may be clearly seen among you.
target: In zinga a taktakte chu an lan theih nan, in zingah rin hranna pawh a awm bawk tur reng a ni.

source: You've done enough.
target: I ti tawk tawh.

source: For there is not a word on my tongue which is not clear to you, O Lord.
target: Ngai teh, aw LALPA, nangin i hriat fai vek loh chu, Ka leiah hian thu rêng rêng a awm lo.

source: But if only God would take up the word, opening his lips in argument with you;
target: Mahse, aw, Pathian chu han tawng teh se, I chungah a ka han ang teh se;

source: This town will not be your cooking-pot, and you will not be the flesh inside it; I will be your judge at the limit of the land of Israel;
target: He khawpui hi in saso bel a ni lo vang a, nangni lah a chhûnga sa in ni hek lo vang; Israel ramri lamah chuan in chungthu ka rêl ang a,

source: Did you approve of this?
target: Hei hi i pawm em?

source: Because we are able to do nothing against what is true, but only for it.
target: Thutak tan tur lo chuan thutak do turin engmah kan ti thei lo a ni.

source: Cars are necessary
target: Car a ngai a ni

source: You're looking chipper
target: Chipper i en a ni

source: I didn't see any tigers.
target: Sakei ka hmu lo.

source: Who has put wisdom in the high clouds, or given knowledge to the lights of the north?
target: Tunge chhum dumahte khian finna dah a, Tunge arsi thlawkte hriat thiamna pe?

source: It's cold.
target: A vawt.

source: My mother is sick.
target: Ka nu a damlo.

source: Even so let your light be shining before men, so that they may see your good works and give glory to your Father in heaven.
target: Chutiang bawkin in eng chu mi mit hmuhin eng rawh se, chutichuan in thil tih thatte an hmu ang a, in Pa vana mi an chawimawi thei ang.

source: It was something new.
target: Thil thar a ni.

source: In my case, yes.
target: Ka dinhmunah chuan, a ni.

source: Jotham was twenty-five years old when he became king; and he was ruling in Jerusalem for sixteen years; and his mother's name was Jerushah, the daughter of Zadok.
target: Jothama chu a lal tantirhin kum sâwmhnih leh kum nga mia ni a, Jerusalem-ah kum sâwm leh kum ruk a lal a: a nu hming chu Jerusai, Zadoka fanu a ni.

source: They made God angry again at the waters of Meribah, so that Moses was troubled because of them;
target: Meriba tuiahte pawh chuan ani chu an tithinur a, Chutichuan anmahni avângin Mosia chungah thil tha lo a thleng ta hial a:

source: We'll swim
target: Kan hleuh ang

source: Did you see a doctor?
target: Doctor i hmu em?

source: I am injured
target: Ka inhliam

source: There were questions
target: Zawhna a awm a

source: Come back to us, O God of our salvation, and be angry with us no longer.
target: Aw min chhandamtu Pathian, min hawi kirtir la, Kan chunga i thinurna chu tibâng ang che,

source: And ten parts were given to Manasseh, in addition to the land of Gilead and Bashan, which is on the other side of Jordan;
target: Tin, Jordan rala mi Gilead leh Basan ram tiam lovin, Manasea chanpualah hmun sawm a tlu a;

source: They left him behind
target: An kalsan ta a

source: Be uncovered and go away, you who are living in Shaphir: the one living in Zaanan has not come out of her town; Beth-ezel is taken away from its base, even from its resting-place.
target: Maroth mi chuan chan țha chan a nghâkhlel hliah hliah mai, LALPA hnên ațangin thil țha lo chu Jerusalem kawngka bul thlenga a lo thlen thlâk avângin.

source: And when the day of Pentecost was come, they were all together in one place.
target: Tin, Pentikost ni a lo thlenin, an zain hmun khatah an awm khawm vek a.

source: I love coffee
target: Coffe ka duh

source: Have no fear when wealth comes to a man, and the glory of his house is increased;
target: Mi tihhausaka a lo awm a, A chhûngkaw ropuina chu a lo nasat tulh tulh pawhin, hlau suh ang che;

source: We lost it.
target: Kan tibo e.

source: But we were gentle among you, like a woman caring for her little ones:
target: Nu, nau pawmin ama fate a duat angin in zingah nunnem takin kan awm zawk kha.

source: May he send you help from the holy place, and give you strength from Zion;
target: Hmun thianghlim atang chuan tanpuina tirhsak che sela, Zion atang chuan tichak che rawh se;

source: I'm not going to use it.
target: Ka hmang dawn lo.

source: And put the gold altar for burning perfumes in front of the ark of the law, hanging the curtain over the doorway of the House.
target: Tin, hal tur rimtui halna rangkachak maicham kha thuhriattirna bawm hmaa dahin, bia bûk kawngka puanzar kha i zar tur a ni.

source: My wrongdoing is corded up in a bag, and my sin is shut up safe.
target: Ipah ka bawhchhiatna chilh ani a, ka khawlohna i thui khâwm a.

source: How horrible!
target: A rapthlâk hle mai

source: I haven't done enough yet
target: Ka la ti tawk lo

source: Are they talking to one another?
target: An inbiak tawn em?

source: I need a lamp
target: Khawnvar ka mamawh

source: In the same way, when you see these things taking place you may be certain that the kingdom of God is near.
target: Chutiang bawkin nangni pawhin chung chu a lo thleng in hmuh hun chuan Pathian ram a lo hnai tawh tih hria ang che u.

source: Show me
target: Mi hmuh rawh

source: The clouds sent out water; the skies gave out a sound; truly, your arrows went far and wide.
target: Chhumte khian tui an leihbua a; Vante khian aw an chhuah a: I thalte pawh a phe zawk zawk a,

source: And Joshua gave him his blessing; and he gave Hebron to Caleb, the son of Jephunneh, for his heritage.
target: Chutichuan Josua chuan mal a sawm a; tin Jephunia fapa Kaleba chu a rochan atan Hebron kua chu a pe ta a.

source: I corrected myself.
target: Ka insiamthat a.

source: I never did it.
target: Ka ti ngai lo.

source: I'm angry.
target: Ka thinrim.

source: It's four o'clock.
target: Dar li a ri tawh.

source: For we came into the world with nothing, and we are not able to take anything out;
target: Khawvelah hian engmah kan luhpui si lo va, engmah kan chhuahpui thei bawk hek lo.

source: You have a message
target: Thuchah i nei a

source: So that we ourselves take pride in you in the churches of God for your untroubled mind and your faith in all the troubles and sorrows which you are going through;
target: chutichuan mi tihduhdahna che u zawng zawngah leh hrehawm in tuarnaahte chuan in chhelzia leh in rinzia avangin Pathian kohhran pawlte zingah chuan keinin kan chhuang thin che u a ni;

source: For you, O my God, have let your servant see that you will make him head of a line of kings; and so it has come into your servant's heart to make his prayer to you.
target: Aw nang ka Pathian, i chhiahhlawh hnênah chhûngkua i dinsak ang tih i lo puang tawh si a; chuvângin i chhiahhlawh hian i hnênah ka la tawngtai ngam ta a ni.

source: Now there are different qualities given to men, but the same Spirit.
target: Tin, thilpek hrang hrang a awm a, Thlarau erawh chu hmunkhat a ni.

source: Chhar rawh
target: Pick it up

source: And in no other is there salvation: for there is no other name under heaven, given among men, through which we may have salvation.
target: Mi dang tuma hnenah chhandamna a awm lo; van hnuaia mihring sak zingah, min chhandam tur hming dang reng a awm lo, a ti a.

source: Do not evil and good come from the mouth of the Most High?
target: Thil țha leh țha lo hi chungnungbera kâ ațanga chhuak a ni lo vem ni?

source: But you will say to me, Why does he still make us responsible? who is able to go against his purpose?
target: Kan hmuh loh chu kan beisei erawh chuan kan nghak fan fan thin a ni.

source: We are all one man's sons, we are true men; we have not come with any secret purpose.
target: Mi pakhat fa vek kan ni; mi dik tak kan ni a, i chhiahhlawhte hi enthlatute kan ni awzâwng lo ve, an ti a.

source: Of these were the divisions of the door-keepers, men of authority, having responsible positions like their brothers to be servants in the house of the Lord.
target: Chung puipaho zinga mi chu an unaute anga LALPA ina rawngbawl hmaa chanvo neia kawngkhâr vêngtu pâwla an thente chu an ni.

source: You will have greater blessings than any other people: no male or female among you or among your cattle will be without offspring.
target: Hnam dang zawng zawnga malsawmna dawng nasa ber in ni ang a; in zingah a hmei apa ching reng reng an awm lovang, in ran zingah pawh.

source: He has a house of his own.
target: Mahni in a nei a.

source: They happened to walk side by side
target: An kal dun palh a

source: I haven't paid the bill yet
target: Bill ka la pe lo

source: You could've called.
target: I call thei ang.

source: And we were, in the ship, two hundred and seventy-six persons.
target: Tin, lawnga mi chu kan zain zahnih leh sawmsarih leh paruk kan ni a.

source: I haven't got a clue
target: Clue ka la nei lo

source: I didn't disagree
target: Ka remti lo

source: There is a great evil which I have seen under the sun--wealth kept by the owner to be his downfall.
target: Ni hnuaia thil pawi tak ka hmuh chu, mahni tana sum khawl a,

source: Then let the loud horn be sounded far and wide on the tenth day of the seventh month; on the day of taking away sin let the horn be sounded through all your land.
target: Chumi hnu thla sarihna ni sawm ni chuan tawtawrâwt ring taka chu i ham veltir ang a; inremna niah chuan in ram zawng zawngah tawtawrâwt in ham vel tir tur a ni.

source: Are you seeing anybody
target: Tu emaw i hmu em

source: And the priest offering any man's burned offering for him, may have the skin of the burned offering which is offered by him.
target: Puithiam, mi tupawh halral thilhlan hlansaktu puithiam ngei chuan halral thilhlana a hlan vun chu a pumbil tur a ni.

source: Who is it?
target: Tunge ni?

source: Don't give in
target: Bânsan mai suh

source: I'm creative
target: Ka themthiam

source: We can pay
target: Aman kan pe thei

source: And at Beth-marcaboth, and at Hazarsusim, and at Beth-biri, and at Shaaraim. These were their towns till David became king.
target: Bethmârkaboth-ah te, Hazar-susim-ah te, Beth-biri-ah te, Saraim-ah te pawh. Chungte chu Davida lal thlenga an khawpuite chu a ni.

source: Do not be a violent witness against your neighbour, or let your lips say what is false.
target: Avâng awm lovin i thenawmte chungchang thu-ah hretu ni suh la, I kain bum bawk suh.

source: And his soul comes near to the underworld, and his life to the angels of death.
target: A ni chuan thihna kotlang a hnaih a, A nun chuan tiboraltute a hnaih tawh a ni.

source: And Jehu said, Let there be a special holy meeting for the worship of Baal. So a public statement was made.
target: Tin, Jehua chuan, Baala hmingin kutpui siam rawh u, a ti a. Tichuan chu chu an than vêl ta a.

source: I got burned
target: Ka kang palh

source: While it is day we have to do the works of him who sent me: the night comes when no work may be done.
target: Chhun a nih laiin mi tirtu hna kan thawk tur a ni; zan a nih dawn tak hi, chu mi hunah chuan tuman hna an thawk thei lo vang.

source: I have made my cry to you, O Lord; I have said, You are my safe place, and my heritage in the land of the living.
target: Aw LALPA, ka au chia; Nang chu ka inhumhimna, Mi nung rama ka chanvo i ni, ka ti a.

source: But if you say to the upright man that he is not to do evil, he will certainly keep his life because he took note of your word; and your life will be safe.
target: Nimahsela mi fel chu sual lo tura i vaukhanna a sual loh chuan vauna a pawisak avângin a nung ang; nang pawhin i nun i hum him ang, a ti a.

source: Go to bed and sleep.
target: Mut la, mu rawh.

source: So Absalom went in flight and came to Talmai, the son of Ammihud, the king of Geshur, where he was for three years.
target: Absaloma erawh chu a tlan bo va, Gesur lal Amihura fpa Talmaia hnênah a kal a. Tin, Davida chuan ni tin, a fapa chu a sun a.

source: Fire and rain of ice, snow and mists; storm-wind, doing his word:
target: Mei leh rial te, vur sur leh chhumte u; A thu zawm thin thlipuite u:

source: For he said, The Lord has taken his oath that there will be war with Amalek from generation to generation.
target: LALPAN chhia a chham ta; LALPAN chhuan awm chhûng zawng zawng chuan Amalek-ho chu a do vang, a ti a.

source: You're unbelievable
target: Rin phakbak i ni

source: I have a hundred pesos.
target: Peso za ka nei a.

source: And he said to her, You have forgiveness for your sins.
target: Tin, hmeichhe hnenah chuan, I sualte ngaihdam a ni ta, a ti a.

source: But the Nethinim were living in the Ophel; and Ziha and Gishpa were over the Nethinim.
target: Nethinho erawh chu Ophel-ah an awm a: Ziha leh Gispa chu Nethin-ho hotu an ni a.

source: Give blessing to those who give you curses, say prayers for those who are cruel to you.
target: anchhe lawhtu che u chu malsawmsak ula, a sawisatu che u chu tawngtaisak rawh u.

source: Then take care that you keep your hearts true to the Lord, who took you out of the land of Egypt, out of the prison-house.
target: fimkhur hle ang che u, chutilochuan Aigupta ram ata, bawih aa hruai chhuaktu che u LALPA chu in theinghlh mai dah ang e.

source: I go after my haters and overtake them; not turning back till they are all overcome.
target: Mi dotute ka um ang a, ka um phak mai ang: Tihborala an awm hma lo chuan ka hawi kri tawh hek lo vang.

source: It's the front gate.
target: Hma lam gate a ni.

source: All the families of the Shuhamites, as they were numbered, were sixty-four thousand, four hundred.
target: Suham-ho thlahte zawng zawng an chhiar dan ang chuan 64,400 an ni.

source: Was not the righteousness of Abraham our father judged by his works, when he made an offering of Isaac his son on the altar?
target: Min thlahtu Abrahama chuan a fapa Isaaka maicham chunga a hlan lai khan thiltih avangin thiam a chang a ni lawm ni?

source: Yes, it saw not the sun, and it had no knowledge; it is better with this than with the other.
target: chu lovah pawh ni a hmu lo va, a hre hek lo; a dang ai khan a nihlawh zawk a ni.

source: Please sit
target: Khawngaihin thu rawh

source: Isn't it possible?
target: A theih loh em ni?

source: How dear are your thoughts to me, O God! how great is the number of them!
target: Aw Pathian, i ngaihtuahnate chu k tan a va hlu êm! A infin khâwm chu a va nasa êm!

source: My keys are missing.
target: Ka chabi a bo a.

source: We must talk
target: Kan sawi ngei tur

source: Now Abraham was old and far on in years: and the Lord had given him everything in full measure.
target: Tin, Abrahama chu a lo upa a, a lo tar ta hle a: tin, LALPA chuan Abrahama chu thil engkimah mal a sâwmsak tawh a.

source: But they gave no attention, but went on in their old way.
target: Engti pawhin an pawm duh chuang lo va, tun hma lama an tih dan angin an la ti reng a.

source: And a great sign was seen in heaven: a A woman clothed with the sun, and with the moon under her feet, and on her head a crown of twelve stars.
target: Tin, thilmak ropui tak vanah a lo lang ta a; hmeichhia nia inthum, a ke hnuaia thla awm, arsi sawm leh pahniha siam lallukhum khum a lo awm a;

source: The man went away and said to the Jews that it was Jesus who had made him well.
target: Tin, chu mi chu a va kal a, Judate hnenah chuan a tidamtu chu Isua a ni tih a hrilh a.

source: And the people kept their places far off, but Moses went near to the dark cloud where God was.
target: Tin, mipuite chu hla takah an la ding rêng a, Mosia chuan Pathian awmna thim chhah mup kiang chu a va pan a.

source: And Jesus said to his disciples, Truly I say to you, It is hard for a man with much money to go into the kingdom of heaven.
target: Tin, Isuan a zirtirte hnenah chuan, Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che u, mi hausa tan van rama luh chu harsa tak a ni.

source: I played golf
target: Golf ka khel

source: Then your south quarter will be from the waste land of Zin by the side of Edom, and your limit on the south will be from the east end of the Salt Sea,
target: chhim lama in luah tur chin chu Zin thlaler ațanga Edom ram hrul zel a ni ang a, chhim lam ramri chu Tuifinriat Al tawp ațanga chhak lampang a ni ang:

source: We apologize
target: Kan thiamlo a ni

source: You talk too much.
target: I sawi tam lutuk.

source: The hand of the ready worker will have authority, but he who is slow in his work will be put to forced work.
target: Mi taima kut chuan rorêlna a keng ang a, Mi thatchhia erawh chu hna rim tak thawk tûra tih a ni ang.

source: We're ruined
target: Tihchhiat kan ni

source: And straight away his mouth was open and his tongue was free and he gave praise to God.
target: Tin, chawplehchilhin a ka leh a lei chu a lo inphelh a, Pathian fakin a lo tawng chhuak ta nghal a.

source: Their thoughts are deep with evil designs; their talk from their seats of power is of cruel acts.
target: An nuihsan a, sual takin hnehchhiahna thu an sawi a: Chapo takin an tawng thin a.

source: OK, I'll allow it.
target: OK, ka phal ang.

source: Then Jacob, giving signs of grief, put on haircloth, and went on weeping for his son day after day.
target: Tichuan Jakoba chuan a silhfênte a pawt thlêr a, saiip puan a fêng a, ni rei tâk a fapa chu a sûn a.

source: This is he who came by water and by blood, Jesus Christ; not by water only but by water and by blood.
target: He mi hi a ni, tui leh thisena lo kala chu, Isua Krista hi; tui chauhvah ni lovin, tuiah leh thisenah a ni zawk e.

source: Do you have any brothers or sisters?
target: Unau in nei em?

source: I liked it pretty well.
target: Ka duh khawp mai.

source: And they made two bands for joining its edges together at the top of the arms.
target: A dar bak thui belhbawmin an siam a: a hmawr ve vea thui belhbawm a ni.

source: Is it secure?
target: A him em?

source: And I gave orders for all the wise men of Babylon to come in before me so that they might make clear to me the sense of my dream.
target: Chuvâng chuan Babulon mifing zawng zawngte chu ka mumang hrilhfiahna mi hriattîr theih nân ka hmaâ rawn hruai tûrin thu ka pe a.

source: I can be nice
target: Ka hawihawm thei

source: And a man came to Job, and said, The oxen were ploughing, and the asses were taking their food by their side:
target: Joba hnênah chuan zualko a lo tlan a, bâwngpate chuan lei an hrut laia sabengtungte an kianga an tlat lain,

source: Don't hurt the dog.
target: Ui chu ti na suh.

source: I love candy
target: Chini thlum ka duh

source: Stop yelling!
target: Bengchheng suh!

source: Wealth which comes from sin is of no profit, but righteousness gives salvation from death.
target: Suahsualna ro chuan hlawkna a nei lo va, Felna erawh chuan thina ata a chhan c hhuak.

source: They took their men and went out to make war on Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, and they came face to face with him by the great waters in Gibeon.
target: mi zawng awng an hruai chhuak a, Nerthania fapa Ismaela bei tûrin an kal a, tui tam tak awmna hmun Gibeon-ah chuan an va hmu.

source: I didn't make a fool of myself.
target: Mi â ka siam lo.

source: For the Jews who were in Shushan came together again on the fourteenth day of the month Adar and put to death three hundred men in Shushan; but they put not a hand on their goods.
target: Tin, Susan-a Judate chu Adar thla, ni sâwm leh ni li ni pawhin an pung khâwm a, Susan-ah mi zathum an that a; nimahsela râllâk sum chu an khawih lo.

source: I made a bet
target: Inchawinaah ka tel

source: I know them
target: Anmahni ka hria

source: I'm neat
target: Ka felfai

source: Did I win?
target: Ka chak em?

source: I can't wait
target: Ka nghâk thei lo

source: Don't stand
target: Ding suh

source: I'll fail
target: Ka tlin lovang

source: So she said to Abraham, Send away that woman and her son: for the son of that woman is not to have a part in the heritage with my son Isaac.
target: Chu mi avângin Abrahama hnênah chuan He bâwihnu leh a fapa hi hnawt chhuak rawh: he bâwihnu fapa hi ka fapa Isaaka ro luahpuitu tûr a ni thei lo vang, a ti a.

source: Sorrow! how are the keepers of your flock sleeping, O king of Assyria! your strong men are at rest; your people are wandering on the mountains, and there is no one to get them together.
target: Aw Assuria lal, i berâm vêngtute chu an muthlu e: i miliante chu an châwl a: i mipuite chu tlângahte an darh zo va, hruai khâwmtu tumah an awm lo.

source: Is this required
target: Hei hi a ngai em

source: Let your mind be turned to your Maker in the days of your strength, while the evil days come not, and the years are far away when you will say, I have no pleasure in them;
target: Tin, i vanglai hian i siamtu hre reng rawh - Ni tha lote a lo thlen hma leh Lawmna rêng rêng ka nei lo ve, I tihna tûr kumte a lo hnaih hma hian;

source: I'm sleeping
target: Ka muhil mek

source: Then let him who is making his offering, give to the Lord a meal offering of a tenth part of a measure of the best meal mixed with a fourth part of a hin of oil:
target: LALPA hnena a thilhlan hlantu apiangin chhangphut thilhlan, chhangphut dip mi epha hmun sawma țhena hmun khat, hriak hin hmun lia țhena hmun khata hmeh a hlan tur a ni;

source: He's strong
target: A chak lûtuk

source: And the people made an outcry to Moses, and Moses made prayer to the Lord, and the fire was stopped.
target: Chutichuan mipuite chuan Mosia an au va; tin, Mosia chuan LALPA hnenah a țawngțai a, mei chu a rem ta a.

source: Till the spirit comes on us from on high, and the waste land becomes a fertile field, and the fertile field is changed into a wood.
target: chunglam ațangin a thlarau a rawn pe leh ang a, thlalêr chu lei tha tak hmunah a chang ang a, lei țha tak hmun chu ram ngawa ngaiha a awm hun chuan.

source: Your way was in the sea, and your road in the great waters; there was no knowledge of your footsteps.
target: I kawng chu tuifinriatah a awm a, I kalkawngte chu tui zau takah a awm a, I hniakte pawh hmuh theih ani lo.

source: And on all the ships of Tarshish, and on all the fair boats.
target: Tarsish lawng lian zawng zawng chungah te, thil lem duhawm zawng zawng chungah te pawh a la awm ang.

source: It's a compliment
target: Compliment a ni

source: And Micah gave the position to the Levite, and the young man became his priest, and was in the house of Micah.
target: Tin, Mika chuan Levi chi chu a tihrang ta a, tichuan tlangvâl chu a puithiamah a lo awm a, Mika inah chuan a awm ta a.

source: Sami hasn't finished.
target: Sami a la zo lo.

source: As for me, Daniel, my spirit was pained because of this, and the visions of my head were troubling me.
target: Kei Daniela hi, ka taksa chhûngah hian ka rilru a lungngai a, ka lu-a inlârnate chuan mi tibuai a ni.

source: Just cook it
target: Chhum tawp rawh

source: Are you chapulling
target: I chapulling em ni

source: What the hell are you looking at
target: Eng thil nge i en

source: Stop smoking
target: Mei zu tawh suh

source: We all went wandering like sheep; going every one of us after his desire; and the Lord put on him the punishment of us all.
target: kan za hian berâm angin kan vâk bo va; mahni kawng kawngah kan peng țheuh va; Lalpa chuan ani chuungah chuan kan za khawlohna chu a nghat ta a.

source: Sami was not injured
target: Sami a hliam lo

source: For I have kept the ways of the Lord; I have not been turned away in sin from my God.
target: LALPA kawngte chu ka zawh a, Ka Pathian hnên ata chu sual takin ka kal bo ngai si lo va.

source: Is that a cat or a dog?
target: Chu chu ui nge ui?

source: A king on the seat of judging puts to flight all evil with his eyes.
target: Rorêlnaa lal thu chuan A mitin thil tha lo zawng anwg a tibo thin.

source: We can do this
target: Hei hi kan ti thei a ni

source: Is it still raining
target: Ruah a la sur em

source: How beautiful we are!
target: Kan va mawi em!

source: It's called an allele.
target: Allele an ti a.

source: You're making a fool of yourself.
target: Mi â i siam a ni.

source: For a day in your house is better than a thousand. It is better to be a door-keeper in the house of my God, than to be living in the tents of sin.
target: I biak in hung chhûng kawtlaia ni khat awm hi, ni sângkhat aiin a tha zawk si a. Suahsualna puan intea awm ai chuan, Kan Pathian ina kawngkhâr vengtu nih pawh ka duh zawk a ni.

source: I'm obese.
target: Ka atchilh.

source: Did you know this
target: Hei hi i hria em

source: And with whom was he angry for forty years? was it not with those who did evil, who came to their deaths in the waste land?
target: Tin, tute chungah nge ni, kum sawmli chhunga a lungnih loh kha? Tisualtu, an ruang thlalera tlu tate chungah khan a ni lo vem ni?

source: Let me eat first.
target: Ka ei hmasa phawt teh ang.

source: You, to whom the law was given as it was ordered by angels, and who have not kept it.
target: Dan, vantirhkohte pek chhawn kha, hmu zeta zawm si lote u! a ti a.

source: You're crazy, aren't you?
target: I â a ni lawm ni?

source: She gave him something to drink.
target: In tur a pe a.

source: Stay at home
target: Inah awm rawh

source: Hop in
target: Lo lut rawh

source: We got ready
target: Kan hman e

source: We are conscious that the law is good, if a man makes a right use of it,
target: Dan chu a tha a ni tih kan hre si, miin a hman that phawt chuan.

source: Is it broken?
target: A keh em?

source: But when Hiram came from Tyre to see the towns which Solomon had given him, he was not pleased with them.
target: Tin, Hirama chu tûra khua atangin Solomonan khua apekte chu en tûrin a chhuak a; a duhzawng a ni lo hle a.

source: The faith which you have, have it to yourself before God. Happy is the man who is not judged by that to which he gives approval.
target: Rinna i neih chu Pathian hmaah nangmah chauhva hriatin nei mai rawh. Mahni tha tih kawnga thiam loh inchantir lo chu a eng a thawl e.

source: You are the God of my strength; why have you put me from you? why do I go in sorrow because of the attacks of my haters?
target: Nang hchu ka chakna Pathian i ni si a; engah nge mi thlauhthlak le? Engah nge dotu hnehchhiahna avânga lungngaia ka van ruai thin le?

source: Let me alone
target: Keimahin awm ka duh

source: Which he gave us freely through Jesus Christ our Saviour;
target: Chu Thlarau Thianghlim chu Isua Krista min Chhandamtu zarah chuan nasa taka kan chunga a leih kha.

source: I was asleep
target: Ka lo muhil a

source: Their outstretched wings were twenty cubits across; they were placed upright on their feet, facing the inner part of the house.
target: Chung an thla an cherub-te chuan tawng sawmhnih awhin an thla an zâr a, an ding a, in chung lam hawiin an ding a.

source: He makes deep ways, cut through the rock, and his eye sees everything of value.
target: Lungpuite a verh tlâng seng sung a, Thil hlu tinreng a mitin a hmu.

source: Anyone causing the upright to go wandering in an evil way, will himself go down into the hole he has made; but the upright will have good things for their heritage.
target: Mi tha, kawng tha lova kal botirtu chu Ama hum laiah ngei a tla ang a, Mi tha famkimte erawh chuan thil tha an rochung ang.

source: We'll attack
target: Ka bei ang

source: What are you designing against the Lord? he will put an end to it: his haters will not come up again a second time.
target: An uain in chuan chiah huh hnêp mah sela hlîng bâwm ang leh buhpâwl ro ang maia tihboral vek an ni ang.

source: And the waters were over the earth a hundred and fifty days.
target: Tin, tui chu ni za leh ni sawmnga chhûng zawng chuan leiah hian a awm ta pûng mai a.

source: Works of wonder in the land of Ham, and things of fear by the Red Sea.
target: Hana ramah thilmak takte, Tuifinriat Sen kamah thil rapthlâk takte titu chu.

source: It's a shame
target: A zahthlak

source: And Jesus said, Are you able to make the friends of the newly-married man go without food when he is with them?
target: Isuan an hnenah, Mo hruaitute hnena a pasal tur chu a awm chhung zawng mo hruaitute chu in ngheitir thei thin em ni?

source: I have knowledge of his wrath, says the Lord, that it is nothing; his high-sounding words have done nothing.
target: A thinurna chu engmah a ni lo tih ka hria; A unanthuannate chuan engmah a thawk kaw lo, Tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: Help me.
target: Min pui rawh.

source: Now one day, when he had gone there, he went into the little room and took his rest there.
target: Tin, ni khat chu a va kal leh a, chu mi in chhawngah chuan a va lût a,a mu a.

source: It is to be your food, for you and your families in every place: it is your reward for your work in the Tent of meeting.
target: Khawiah pawh in ei thei ang, nangni leh in chhûngte pawhin; inbiakna puan ina in rawngbawl man a ni si a.

source: Who are you staring at?
target: Tu nge i en reng?

source: I almost died
target: Ka thi epa ni

source: I can stay.
target: Ka la cham thei.

source: He didn't confirm
target: A nemnghet lo

source: They'll get married
target: An innei dawn a ni

source: She bought him a vest.
target: Vest a lei sak a.

source: Let the waste land and its flocks be glad, the tent-circles of Kedar; let the people of the rock give a glad cry, from the top of the mountains let them make a sound of joy.
target: Thlalêr leh a khawpuite chuan an aw chhuah rawh se, Kedar-ho awmna khuate chuan; Sela khuaa awmte chu hlim takin zai sela, tlâng chhip ațangte chuan au rawh se.

source: And the sons of Nadab: Seled and Appaim; but Seled came to his end without sons.
target: Tin, Nadaba fapate chu Seleda leh Apaima an ni; Seleda erawh chu fa nei lovin a thi a.

source: The children of Solomon's servants: the children of Sotai, the children of Sophereth, the children of Perida,
target: Solomona chhiahhlawhte thlah: Sotaia thlahte, Sopheretha thlahte, Perida thlah te;

source: This is a great secret: but my words are about Christ and the church.
target: Hei hi thu ril thuk tak a ni; Krista leh a kohhran thu kei chuan a sawina niin ka hria.

source: Running against him like a man of war, covered by his thick breastplate; even like a king ready for the fight,
target: Luhlul takin ama chungah a tlan a, A phaw lai pjnawg chhah pui nên chuan;

source: Do you want to go or not?
target: I kal duh em ni?

source: Hold the line
target: Lo nghak lawk

source: They're taking too long
target: An la rei lutuk

source: He wrote her a message.
target: Message a ziak a.

source: Is that OK?
target: A tha em?

source: So that the rest of men may make search for the Lord, and all the Gentiles on whom my name is named,
target: Mi dang, Jentail zawng zawng ka hming mi tawmhote chuan, Lalpa an zawn nan Chu bawkte chu ka tungding ang’ tiin.

source: We walked.
target: Kan kal tawh.

source: Let Israel have joy in his maker; let the children of Zion be glad in their King.
target: Israel-ho chu an siamtu chungah chuan lawm sela: Zion fate chu an Lalber chungah chuan hlim rawh se.

source: So that place was named Taberah, because of the fire of the Lord which had been burning among them.
target: Chu m hmun hming chu Tabera an ti a. LALPA mei chu an zinga a lo thawh avang chuan.

source: And all your builders will be made wise by the Lord; and great will be the peace of your children.
target: Tin, i fate zawng zawng chu LALPA zirtirin an awm ang a, i fate thlamuanan chu nasa tak a ni ang.

source: Don't stop.
target: Ding suh.

source: Be angry without doing wrong; let not the sun go down on your wrath;
target: Thinrim ula, sual erawh chu sual suh u; in thinur chu niin tlakpui suh se;

source: I love myself
target: Keimah ka inhmangaih

source: Don't give in
target: Bansan mai suh

source: If anyone gives back evil for good, evil will never go away from his house.
target: thâtna suala thungrultu chu Thil tha lovin a in a chhuahsan lo vang.

source: Everyone falling on that stone will be broken, but the man on whom the stone comes down will be crushed to dust.
target: Tupawh chu mi lung chunga tlu apiang an keh sawm ang; a delh lek phei chu a rawt dip ang, a ti a.

source: Are not five sparrows given in exchange for two farthings? and God has every one of them in mind.
target: Chawngzawng panga dar tangka pahnihah an hralh thin lo vem ni? nimahsela an zinga pakhat mah Pathianin a hmaih ngai si lo.

source: We're short on time.
target: Hun kan tlem tawh.

source: And Saul sent for all the people to come to the fight, and go down to Keilah to make an attack on David and his men.
target: Tin, Saula chuan mi zawng zawng chu indo tûrin keila khua zuk beia Davida leh amite zuk hual tûrin a ko khawm a.

source: She refused to help me.
target: Min puih duh lo.

source: He was mashing potatoes
target: Alu chu a mash a

source: It is bound to happen.
target: A thleng ngei ang.

source: So that the sons of men may have knowledge of his acts of power, and of the great glory of his kingdom.
target: Mihring fate hnanah a thiltih ropui takte leh, A ram mawina ropuizia hriattir tûrin.

source: I can feel it
target: Hriatna ka nei

source: And Abraham got up and gave honour to the children of Heth, the people of that land.
target: Tichuan Abrahama chu a tho va, chu mi rama mi, Hetha thlahte chu chibai a bûk a.

source: Tom isn't wealthy
target: Tom hi a hausa lo

source: A man's good sense makes him slow to wrath, and the overlooking of wrongdoing is his glory.
target: A ngaihruat thiamnain mi â thin a tihnelsak thin a, Bawhchhiatna haider chu a ropuina a ni.

source: They have made all your boards of fir-trees from Senir: they have taken cedars from Lebanon to make the supports for your sails.
target: I thing hmanrua Senir fârin an siam e, I lawng ngulah, an la, Lebanon thingril.

source: Now, at these words, the captain of the Temple and the chief priests were greatly troubled about what might be the end of this business.
target: Tin, Pathian biak in hotu leh puithiam lalten, chung thu chu an hriatin, Heng hi eng ti takin puang ang maw? tiin an thu-ah chuan an mangang ta em em a.

source: But he who is in doubt is judged if he takes food, because he does it not in faith; and whatever is not of faith is sin.
target: Amaherawhchu ringhleltuin a ei chuan rinnain a ei loh avangin thiam loh a chang a ni; engpawh rinna lova tih chu sual a ni si a.

source: May the Lord, who made heaven and earth, send you blessing out of Zion,
target: LALPAN Zion atangin malsawm che rawh se; Lei leh van siamtu ngei chuan.

source: And when it had been broken with an act of praise, he said, This is my body which is for you: do this in memory of me.
target: lawmthu a sawi zawha a phel a, Hei hi ka taksa in aia pek tura chu a ni, mi hriat reng nan hei hi ti thin rawh u, a tih kha.

source: I'm about your size.
target: I size vel ka ni.

source: It's so dark
target: A thim lutuk

source: A crusher has come up before your face: keep a good look-out, let the way be watched, make yourself strong, let your power be greatly increased.
target: Tikeh sawmtu chu i hmai hmaah a lo chhuak e: kulhbîng chu enkawl la, kawng chu vêng rawh; i kawng tikhauh la, i thiltihtheihna chu chak takin siam țha rawh.

source: I asked questions
target: Zawhna ka zâwt a

source: They turned a TV set on.
target: TV set an on a.

source: He knows whatever
target: Eng pawh a hre vek

source: My bones are joined to my skin, and I have got away with my flesh in my teeth.
target: Ka vun leh ka tisa hi ka ruhah a bet a, Ka ha vun chu ka la chang a.

source: It's very obvious
target: A chiang hle mai

source: For you yourselves have the knowledge that the day of the Lord will come like a thief in the night.
target: Lalpa Ni chu zanah rukru angin a lo thleng dawn tih nangmahni ngeiin chiang takin in hre si a.

source: Hey, you're not Tom.
target: Hei, Tom i ni lo.

source: So he went with them. And when they came to Jordan, they got to work cutting down trees.
target: Chutichuan an hnênah a kal ve ta a. Tin, Jordan lui an thlen chuan thing chu an han kt a.

source: I remained standing.
target: Ka ding reng a.

source: So let this order be kept, at the right time, from year to year.
target: Chutichuan he thuruat hi kum tin a hun takah chuan in rawn zawm thîn tûr a ni.

source: I love trains
target: Rêl ka ngaina

source: O Lord, take me out of the hands of sinners; keep me safe from the violent man: for they are designing my downfall.
target: Aw LALPA, mi suaksual kut lakah chuan mi vawng tha la; Mi nunrawng lakah chuan mi humhim ang che: Anni chuan ka ke pente hi nam kawi an tum a.

source: Who then seems to you to be my equal? says the Holy One.
target: Tu nên nge mi tehkhin a, tu tluk lekah nge mi ruat dan? Mi Thianghlim chuan a ti.

source: Then Ahaziah, the son of Ahab, said to Jehoshaphat, Let my men go with yours in the ships. But Jehoshaphat would not let them.
target: Tichuan Ahaba fapa Ahazian Jehosaphata hnênah, Ka mite hi i mite nen lawngahte kal za ang hmiang, a ti a. Nimahsela Jehosaphata chuan a remti lo.

source: It's me!
target: Keimah ka nia

source: Then let us all, who have come to full growth, be of this mind: and if in anything you are of a different mind, even this will God make clear to you:
target: Chutichuan, puitling apiang chutiang rilru puin i awm ang u; tin, eng kawngah pawh rilru danglam pu in lo nih chuan, chu pawh chu Pathianin a la hriattir ang che u.

source: Give no thought to the things which are past; let the early times go out of your minds.
target: Tun hma thilte chu hre reng suh ula, hmasâng thilte chu ngaihtuah hek suh u.

source: And what great nation has laws and decisions so right as all this law which I put before you today?
target: Heti taka fel, dante leh rorêlte, tuna in hmaa ka zam zawng zawng ang dan nei hi hnam ropui dang tunge awm ve?

source: Come quick!
target: Lo kal vat rawh.

source: And if Christ is in you, the body is dead because of sin, but the Spirit is life because of righteousness.
target: Chu chang a ni lo ve, Rebeki pawhin mi pakhat kan pu Isaaka laka phir a pai lai khan –

source: We were learning English.
target: English kan zir a.

source: For the children of Judah have done what is evil in my eyes, says the Lord: they have put their disgusting images in the house which is named by my name, making it unclean.
target: Juda fae chuan ka mithmuhah thil sual an ti si a, tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni: ka hming vuah inah chuan tibawlhhlawh tûrin an thil tenawmte chu an tdah ta.

source: You've paid already.
target: I pe tawh a ni.

source: They didn't find us.
target: Min hmu lo.

source: Tom said I had to speak French.
target: Ka sawi duh lo.

source: Even as you gave him authority over all flesh, to give eternal life to all those whom you have given to him.
target: khatia mi zawng zawng chunga thuneia i siam khan, a hnena i pek apiangte chu chatuana nunna a pek theih nan.

source: How late is late
target: Engtiang chiahin nge a tlai

source: I have sinned
target: Ka sual tawh

source: Nobody helped us
target: Tuman min pui lo

source: I'm your neighbor
target: I ṭhenawm ka ni

source: He is in hospital
target: Damdawi inah a awm mek a ni

source: And Saul and the men of Israel came together and took up their position in the valley of Elah, and put their forces in order against the Philistines.
target: Tin, Saula leh Israel mite chu an pung khawm a, Ela ruamah tanhmun an khuar a, Philistia mite lo dang tûrin an inzar darh a.

source: I love soup
target: Satui ka duh

source: He knows who I am.
target: Tu nge ka nih a hre chiang khawp mai.

source: Have you been there yet?
target: I la kal tawh em?

source: They'll call
target: Min be mai ang

source: Say no more words of pride; let not uncontrolled sayings come out of your mouths: for the Lord is a God of knowledge, by him acts are judged.
target: Chuti taka chapovin thu sawi tawh suh ula: In ka atangin tawng chaltlai rêng rêng chhuak suh se: LALPA chu finna Pathian a ni si a,Amain thiltihte a buk fel thin.

source: I felt fear
target: Ka hlauthawng

source: But Joab and Abishai went after Abner: and the sun went down when they came to the hill of Ammah, which is to the east of the road through the waste land of Geba.
target: Mahse Joaba leh Abisaia chuan Abnera chu an ûm zel a; tin, Gibeon thlaler kawnga Gia dep Ama tlâng an thlen dawn chuan ni a tla a.

source: Happy is the man in whom the Lord sees no evil, and in whose spirit there is no deceit.
target: Mi, LALPAN khawlohna neia a ruat lohva, A thlarauva tihderna rêng rêng awm lova chu, a eng a thawl e.

source: Sit down!
target: Thu rawh

source: I made it
target: Ka tithei e

source: Well, modern-day life.
target: Awle, tunlai nun.

source: She's a bit naive.
target: A naive deuh a ni.

source: Then let his long hair, the sign of his oath, be cut off at the door of the Tent of meeting, and let him put it on the fire on which the peace-offerings are burning.
target: Nazirit mi chuan inbiakna puan in kawngkaa a intihhranna lu chu amet ang a, intihhranna sam chu ala ang a, remna inthawi thilhlan hnuaia meiah chuan a rawh tur a ni.

source: The light of the sun went out, and the curtain in the Temple was parted in two.
target: ni eng a reh ta a; tin, Pathian biak in puan zar chu a laiah a lo thler ta a.

source: Anyone causing the death of another is himself to be put to death on the word of witnesses: but the word of one witness is not enough.
target: Tupawhin mi a thah chuan tualthhattu chu hretute ka ațanga thu chhuakin tihhlum tur a ni: amaherawhchu hretu pakhat chu mi tihhlumna tur chuan a tak lo.

source: Whose thoughts are dark, to whom the life of God is strange because they are without knowledge, and their hearts have been made hard;
target: hriat lohna anmahniah a awm, chu mi hriat lohna avang chuan Pathian nunna lakah thena lo awmin, an hriatnaah chuan an lo thim a ni, an thinlung a chawlawl avangin.

source: You're not entirely wrong.
target: I dik lo vek lo.

source: And his brother's name was Jubal: he was the father of all players on instruments of music.
target: A nau hming chu Jubala a ni a: ani chu tingtang leh phênglawng tumtuho zawng zawng thlahtu a ni.

source: Just go away
target: Kalbo mai rawh

source: We're always busy
target: Kan buai fo ṭhin

source: He sells cars
target: Car a zuar

source: The rulers of Judah are like those who take away a landmark; I will let loose my wrath on them like flowing water.
target: Juda milian te chu ramri sawntute ang an ni a: An chungah ka thinurna chu tui angin ka leihbua ang.

source: Their eyes are bursting with fat; they have more than their heart's desire.
target: Thau avângin an mit a pawng a: Thinlunga thu duhsam aia nasa an nei a.

source: Sour fruit
target: Thei thur

source: I noticed
target: Ka lo hria

source: See, the eyes of Israel's keeper will not be shut in sleep.
target: Ngai teh, Israel-ho vengtu chu A muthluin, a muhil hek lo vang.

source: What're you doing?
target: Eng nge i tih?

source: The underworld is uncovered before him, and Destruction has no veil.
target: A hmaah chuan Seol chu saruak ani a, Abadon chuan khuhna anei lo.

source: Then Jehoshaphat went down with his face to the earth, and all Judah and the people of Jerusalem gave worship to the Lord, falling down before him.
target: Chutichuan Jehosaphata chu a hmaia lei siin a kuna; tin, Juda mite zawng zawng leh Jerusalem mi zawng zawng chu LALPA chibai bûkin LALPA hmaah an kun a.

source: And by a prophet the Lord made Israel come up out of Egypt, and by a prophet he was kept safe.
target: zâwlneite hmangin Israela chu Aigupta ram ațangin LALPAN hruai chhuak a, zâwlnei vek hmang chuan a humhim bawk a.

source: And for your cattle and the beasts on the land; all the natural increase of the land will be for food.
target: I bawng rual tan te, I rama ran tan te, chuta a hawng zawg zawng chu ei chawp atan a ni ang.

source: We don't have any sugar
target: Sugar kan nei lo

source: You have put your spears through his head, his horsemen were sent in flight like dry stems; they had joy in driving away the poor, in making a meal of them secretly.
target: Arûktea rethei eirala lâwm tute, =hawngaleivir ang lo thawk e, mi tidarh nân; An tiang ngeiin i chhun ta a, a in do thiamte lu-ah chuan.

source: We give money for a drink of water, we get our wood for a price.
target: Kan tuisikte man neiin kan in ta a, Kan thingtuahte pawh kan hnênah hralh a ni ta.

source: It's summer already.
target: Summer a ni tawh.

source: Now at that time Samuel had no knowledge of the Lord, and the revelation of the word of the Lord had not come to him.
target: Chung lai chuan Samuela chuan LALPA chu a hre lo va, LALPA thu a hnêna puan a la ni bawk lova.

source: Your eyes will see strange things, and you will say twisted things.
target: I mitin thil mak takte a hmu ang a, I thinlungin thu chaltlai takte a chhahchhuak ang a.

source: And a strong king will come to power, ruling with great authority and doing whatever is his pleasure.
target: Tin, lal chak tak, thuneihna ropui taka rorêl tûr chu a lo chhuak ang a, a thu thuin a ti ang.

source: There the passions of the evil are over, and those whose strength has come to an end have rest.
target: Tah chuan mi suaksualten chawhbuai an bang a, Tah chuan mi chaute pawh an chawl a.

source: Tom got away
target: Tom a tlanchhuak

source: Now truly, your eyes see, and the eyes of my brother Benjamin see, that it is my mouth which says these things to you.
target: Tin, ngai teh u, nangmahni mit ngei leh ka nau Benjamina mit ngeiin keima kâ ngeiin a sawi lai in hmu reng a ni.

source: They will discuss it
target: An sawiho ang

source: What part with you has the seat of sin, which makes evil into a law?
target: Suahsualna lalthutphah, dana thil tihsualna siam thina chuan Pawlna che a nei dawn êm ni?

source: He has made strong the iron bands of your doors; he has sent blessings on your children inside your walls.
target: Ani chuan i kulh kawngkhârte kalhna thing tlawnte a tikhauh va; I chhûnga i fanau awmte chu mal a sawm si a.

source: And they went to the opening into Gedor, as far as the east side of the valley, in search of grass-land for their flocks.
target: Tin, Gedor luhnaah, ruam chhak lampang thlengin an ran rualte tlatna tûr zawngin an kal a.

source: Are you having any fun?
target: Hlimna i nei em?

source: I'm not tempting you.
target: Ka thlem lo che.

source: I need a hug
target: Pawm ka mamawh

source: Cursed are those who seem wise to themselves, and who take pride in their knowledge!
target: Mahni ngaiha fingte leh mahni mithmuha bengvarte chu an chung a pik e!

source: Make melody to the Lord, give praise to the Lord: for he has made the soul of the poor man free from the hands of the evil-doers.
target: LALPA hnênah chuan hla sa ula, LALPA chu fak rawh u; Thilsual titute kut ata țanpui ngaite nunna chu a hum si a.

source: But the holy things which you have, and the offerings of your oaths, you are to take to the place which will be marked out by the Lord:
target: In thil thianghlimte leh in thutiama mite chauh keng ula, LALPAN hmun a la ruat turah chuan kal ang che u:

source: And Pilate said in answer to them, Is it your desire that I let the King of the Jews go free?
target: Tin, Pilatan a chhang a, an hnenah, Judate lal hi chhuahsak che u ila in duh em? a ti a.

source: It was the cat's fault.
target: Ui sual a ni.

source: Let the doors be open, so that the upright nation which keeps faith may come in.
target: Hnam fel thutak zawmtu chu a luh theihna tûrin kulh kawngkhârte chu hawng rawh u.

source: So Jacob came safely from Paddan-aram to the town of Shechem in the land of Canaan, and put up his tents near the town.
target: Tin, Jakoba chu Paddan-aram ram ata a lo kal chu thlamuang takin Sekem khua, Kanaan rama awm chu a thleng a, daikiangah chuan a puan in chu a zâr ta a.

source: Let the cry of the prisoner come before you; with your strong arm make free the children of death;
target: Mi tang rum chu i hmaah thleng rawh se; I thiltihtheihna nasat avângin thi tûra ruatte chu humhim la;

source: Don't leave me
target: Min kalsan suh

source: Then says Pilate to him, Do you give no attention to what their witnesses say against you?
target: Tichuan Pilatan a hnenah, An hekna zozai che hi i hre lo em ni? a ti a.

source: I'm beginning to not like you.
target: Ka duh lo tan ta.

source: For who is there in the heavens in comparison with the Lord? who is like the Lord among the sons of the gods?
target: Van dumahte khian LALPA nena tehkhin theih tunge awm ni? Mi thiltithei tak fate zingah khian LALPA ang,

source: I'm not stopping you.
target: Ka titawp lo che.

source: And he said, Are you, like them, still without wisdom?
target: Tin, ani chuan, Tun thlengin nangni pawh hriatna nei lovin in la awm cheu maw?

source: I'll talk
target: Ka tawng ang

source: I've known it all along.
target: Ka hre vek tawh.

source: The servants made answer, No man ever said things like this man.
target: Tiangkengtute chuan, Sawtiang rengin miin thu an sawi ngai lo, an ti a, an chhang a.

source: I'm not good at math.
target: Math ka thiam lo.

source: I'll swim
target: Ka hleuh ang

source: So Samson went and got three hundred foxes and some sticks of fire-wood; and he put the foxes tail to tail with a stick between every two tails;
target: Chutichuan Samsona chuan sihal zathum a va man a, meicher a la a, an mei leh mei chu a zawm a, an mei inkar theuhvah chuan meichher chu a dah theuh va.

source: Are you taking pictures
target: Thlalak i la em

source: And, while I was talking to them, the Holy Spirit came on them, as on us at first.
target: Tin, thu ka sawi tirhin, Thlarau Thianghlim kan chunga a lo thlen tirh lai ang bawk khan an chungah a lo thleng ta a.

source: Happy is the man who takes your little ones, crushing them against the rocks.
target: I fanau te tete chhuhsaka, lungpui vuak nana hmangtu tûr chu Lawm takin a awm ang.

source: But truly I say to you, Some of those who are here now will have no taste of death till they see the kingdom of God.
target: Dik takin ka hrilh a che u, heta dingho a thente hi, Pathian ram an hmuh hma loh chuan thihna tem tawp lo tur an awm, a ti a.

source: I had jet lag.
target: Ka chau lûtuk.

source: But the ark of God had been moved by David from Kiriath-jearim to the place which he had made ready for it, for he had put up a tent for it at Jerusalem.
target: Pathian bâwm erawh chu Davidan a lo buatsaih tawhna hmunah Kiriath-jearim atangin Davida chuan a lo la chho tawh a; Jerusalem-ah a dahna tûr puan in a lo zar sa taw reng a.

source: To put their kings in chains, and their rulers in bands of iron;
target: An lalte chu khaidiata phuar a, An mi thate chu thir kawlte buntir tûr leh,

source: The Lord of armies, the God of Israel, says, Let your ways and your doings be changed for the better and I will let you go on living in this place.
target: Sipaihote LALPA chuan heti hian a ti: In awm dan leh in thiltihte chu siam tha ula, he hmunah hian ka chentir ang che u.

source: And Segub was the father of Jair, who had twenty-three towns in the land of Gilead.
target: Tin, Seguba chuan Jaira a hring a, ani chuan Gilead ramah khawpui sawmhnih leh pathum a nei a.

source: Only, as far as we have got, let us be guided by the same rule.
target: Engpawh ni sela, kan thlen chin atang khan hma i sawn zel ang u.

source: Do you travel often?
target: I zin fo thin em?

source: And Solomon, in his love for the Lord, kept the laws of David his father; but he made offerings and let them go up in smoke on the high places.
target: Solomona chuan LALPA chu a hmangaih a, a pa Davida thuruatte chu a zawm thin a: hmun sângahte a inthawi a, rimtuite a hal mai thin pawh a.

source: Our God is for us a God of salvation; his are the ways out of death.
target: Pathian chu kan tan chhanhimtu Pathian a ni; Thihna ata chhuahnate chu Lalpa JEHOVA ta a ni bawk.

source: Ask anyone.
target: Tupawh zawt rawh.

source: I feel funny
target: Nuihzatthlak ka ti

source: We're normal
target: Kan pangai reng

source: Keep dancing
target: Lam zêl rawh

source: And when Saul saw the Philistine army he was troubled, and his heart was moved with fear.
target: Tin, Saulan Philistia sipaihote a hmu chuan a hlau a, a rilru a khur zawih zawih mai a.

source: You bought a new house.
target: In thar i lei a.

source: At their coming the people are bent with pain: all faces become red together.
target: An hmâah mipuite chu an thlaphang a: an hmêlte chu a lo dâng vek a.

source: You ticked them off.
target: I tick off a.

source: I saw one
target: Pakhat ka hmu

source: You're a pushover
target: Pushover tak i ni

source: Hello, how are you?
target: Chibai, i dam em?

source: He laughed
target: A nui nasa

source: I don't cry
target: Ka tap lo

source: They all did well
target: An ti tha vek a ni

source: It wasn't us.
target: Keimahni kan ni lo.

source: And Saul said, Come near, all you chiefs of the people, and let us get word from God and see in whom is this sin today.
target: Tin, Saula chuan Nangni mipui hotu zawng zawngte chu lo hnai teh u khai: vawiinah hian a eng berah nge kan tihsual hriat chhuah tum teh u.

source: Isn't she your grandmother?
target: I pi a ni lo maw?

source: Be washed, make yourselves clean; put away the evil of your doings from before my eyes; let there be an end of sinning;
target: Insil ula, intifai rawh u; ka mithmuh phak lovah in thiltihte hi a sualna chu dah bo rawh u; sual tih hi bang tawh ula:

source: For Christ did not give pleasure to himself, but, as it is said, The bitter words of those who were angry with you came on me.
target: Krista pawh chuan mahni lawmna a zawng si lo; Nangmah hautute hauna chu keima chungah a tla ta a, tih ziak ang khan a ni zawk.

source: She boiled the eggs.
target: Egg chu a boil a.

source: I didn't vote for you.
target: Ka vote lo che.

source: The cup of blessing which we take, does it not give us a part in the blood of Christ? and is not the broken bread a taking part in the body of Christ?
target: Malsawmna no mal kan sawmsak thin hi Krista thisen tawmpuina a ni lo vem ni? Chhang kan phel thin hi, Krista Taksa tawmpuina a ni lo vem ni?

source: And Amram took Jochebed, his father's sister, as wife; and she gave birth to Aaron and Moses: and the years of Amram's life were a hundred and thirty-seven.
target: Tin, Amrama chuan a pa farnu Jokebedi nupuiah a nei a; tin, Arona leh Mosia a hrinsak a: tin, Amrama dam chhûng kum chu kum 137 a ni.

source: In no way. How may we, who are dead to sin, be living in it any longer?
target: Hnai lo ve. Keini sual kawnga thi tawh sualin engtin nge kan la nun theih cheu vang?

source: And this is the number of them: there were thirty gold plates, a thousand silver plates, twenty-nine knives,
target: Tin, heng hi a zat chin chu a ni: rangkachak maihûn sawmthum, tangkaraw maihûn sâng, chemte sawmhnih leh pakua;

source: But he took the tribe of Judah for himself, and the mountain of Zion, in which he had pleasure.
target: Juda hnam chu a thlang ta zawk a, A hmangaih Zion tlâng chu.

source: I've been so scared.
target: Ka hlau lutuk.

source: Don't waste your time.
target: Hun khawhral suh.

source: We give you word, that if the building of this town and its walls is made complete, there will be an end of your power in the country across the river.
target: He mi khua hi an din a, a kulhte an peih vek chuan lui râl lama rêng rêng chuan chan i neih loh phah ang tih lal kan hriattir a ni, an ti a.

source: The earliest produce from their land which they take to the Lord is to be yours; everyone in your house who is clean may have it for his food.
target: An lova rah hmin hmasa ber LALPA tana an rawn lak chu i ta ani ang a: i ina mi thianghlim zawng zawngin an ei thei ang a.

source: And Saul, with Jonathan his son and the people who were with them, was waiting in Geba in the land of Benjamin: but the tents of the Philistines were in Michmash.
target: Tin, Saula leh a fapa Jonathana leh an hnêna mi awmte chu Benjamin rama Geba khuaah chuan an awm a; nimahsela Philistia mite chuan Mikmas-ah chuan tanhmun an khuar a.

source: But David was loved by all Israel and Judah, for he went out and came in before them.
target: Nimahsela Israel-ho leh Juda-ho zawng zawngte chuan Davida chu an ngaina êm êm a; an zinga lûta chhuak thin a ni si a.

source: Whoever gets a wife gets a good thing, and has the approval of the Lord.
target: Nupui hmu chuan thil tha a hmu a ni, LALPA duhsakna a chang thin.

source: His branches will be stretched out, he will be beautiful as the olive-tree and sweet-smelling as Lebanon.
target: A zârte chu a țâwi luih ang a, A mawizia chu olive thing ang mai a ni ang a, Lebanon tlang angin a rimtui ang.

source: I am weak
target: Ka chaklo

source: They started running
target: An tlan tan ta a

source: They're late
target: An rawn tlai

source: How dare you!
target: Engtin nge i ngam!

source: Tom isn't finished
target: Tom a zo lo

source: I will do wisely in the way of righteousness: O when will you come to me? I will be walking in my house with a true heart.
target: Kawng tha famkimah chuan fing takin ka awm ang a: Aw engtikah nge ka hnênah i lo kal ang? Ka in chhûngah thinlung tha famkim puin ka awm ang.

source: Tom may sing
target: Tom a zâi ang

source: For they have gone up to Assyria like an ass going by himself; Ephraim has given money to get lovers.
target: Ram sabengtung mal tla angin Assuria ramah an chho si a, Ephraim chuan ngaihzawngte a tlawn e,

source: He is full of strength before the sun, and his branches go out over his garden.
target: Ni chhuah hma chuan a hring a, A chawrte chuan ahuan a hliap a,

source: Who puts himself against all authority, lifting himself up over all which is named God or is given worship; so that he takes his seat in the Temple of God, putting himself forward as God.
target: Ani chuan Pathiana an vuah apiang leh, sakhua zawng zawng dovin, an chunga awm tumin a inchawimawi ang: chutichuan Pathian biak ina thuin Pathian ang hialin a intar chhuak ang.

source: Are they dead?
target: An thi em?

source: By this you may have knowledge of the Spirit of God: every spirit which says that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is of God:
target: He miah hian Pathian Thlarau chu in hria ang: thlarau engpawh Isua Krista tisaah a lo chang tih tan chu Pathian laka mi a ni;

source: On the second day Nethanel, the son of Zuar, chief of Issachar, made his offering:
target: Ni hnih ni huan Isakar-ho puipa Zuara fapa Nethanela chuan a hlan a:

source: He gives meat to the dog.
target: Ui chu sa a pe a.

source: And he took him to Jesus. Looking at him fixedly Jesus said, You are Simon, the son of John; your name will be Cephas (which is to say, Peter.
target: Tichuan Isua hnenah a rawn hruai a. Isuan ani chu a lo en a, Johana fapa Simona i ni, Kiphaa an vuah ang che, a ti a chu chu Petera tihna a ni.

source: For, if God did not have mercy on the natural branches, he will not have mercy on you.
target: Pathianin zar takte chu a zuah si loh chuan nang pawh a zuah bik lo vang che.

source: There is only one judge and law-giver, even he who has the power of salvation and of destruction; but who are you to be your neighbour's judge?
target: Dan petu leh roreltu pakhat chauh a awm, chhandam theia tiboral theia chu; nang thenawmte sawiseltu chu tunge maw i nih le?

source: They gave him wine mixed with bitter drink: and after tasting it, he took no more.
target: uain thur, englo kha nena pawlh, a in turin an pe a; nimahsela a tem veleh a in duh ta lo va.

source: And Laban said, It is better for you to have her than another man: go on living here with me.
target: Tin, Labana chuan, Ani chu mi dang ka pêk ai chuan ka pêk che a tha zâwk ang chu: ka hnênah awm reng mai rawh, a ti a.

source: For John came, taking no food or drink, and they say, He has an evil spirit.
target: Johana chu a lo kal a, a eiin a in lo va, 'Ramhuai a zawl a nih hi,' an ti a.

source: Be certain that it is God who has done me wrong, and has taken me in his net.
target: Hre ta che u, Pathianin mi paih thla a, A lenin mi tuam a nih hi.

source: And the Lord made Pharaoh's heart hard, and he would not give ear to them, as the Lord had said.
target: Tin, LALPAN Pharaoa thinlulng chu a tihkhauhsak a; tichuan an thu chu a ngaithla duh ta lo va; LALPAN Mosia hnêna a sawi tawh ang khân.

source: How long do you want it for
target: Eng chen nge i duh

source: And journeying by ship from Tyre we came to Ptolemais; and there we had talk with the brothers and were with them for one day.
target: Tin, Turi khua ata lawnga kan kal zawh chuan Ptolemai khua kan thleng a,unaute chibai kan buk a, an hnenah ni khat kan cham a.

source: Keep digging
target: Lai zêl rawh

source: The words of sinners are destruction for the upright; but the mouth of upright men is their salvation.
target: Misuaksual tawngkam chu thisen chhuah tûra channa a ni a, Mi dik tak ka erawh chuan anmahni a chhan chhuak ang.

source: And they took up twelve baskets full of the broken bits and of the fishes.
target: Tin, chhang nawi leh sangha nawite chu bawmrang sawm leh pahnih an rut khat a.

source: And at the two ends of the cover you are to make two winged ones of hammered gold,
target: Tin, cherub pahnih rangkachakin I siam tûr a ni; zahngaihna thutphah hmâwr ve vea mi chu a chherin I chher tûr a ni.

source: And the light of God was still burning, while Samuel was sleeping in the Temple of the Lord where the ark of God was,
target: Pathian khawnvar pawh a la mit hmain, Pathian bâwm awmna Lalpa biak inah chuan Samuela chu a han mu a;

source: There is no TP left.
target: TP a awm tawh lo.

source: Call them off
target: Ko kir rawh

source: There are so many
target: An tam em em a ni

source: Let's schedule a time.
target: Hun i ruat ang u.

source: These, whose names are given, were chiefs in their families, and their families became very great in number.
target: Chung an hming an lamte chu an chhûngkaw puipate an ni a; an chhûngkua chu nasa takin an lo pung ta a.

source: Then from the Red Sea they went on and put up their tents in the waste land of Sin.
target: Tin, Tuifinriat Sen ațang chuan an chhuak a, Sin thlalerah awmhmun an khuar a.

source: You will make clear to me the way of life; where you are joy is complete; in your right hand there are pleasures for ever and ever.
target: Nangin nunna kawng chu mi hriattir ang a: I hmaah chuan hlima khah liamna a awm a; I kut dinglamah chuan kumkhaw lawmna tûr a awm a.

source: Are we worth the cost?
target: A man kan phu em?

source: Say to wisdom, You are my sister; let knowledge be named your special friend:
target: Finna hnênah chuan, Ka farnu i ni, ti la, hriatna chu i laichinnu vuah rawh.

source: And the Chaldaeans will come back again and make war against this town and they will take it and put it on fire.
target: Kaldaite erawh chu an lo kal qang a, he khawpui hi an bei ang a, an la ang a, meiin an hal ang.

source: The offering of the evil-doer is disgusting to the Lord, but the prayer of the upright man is his delight.
target: Mi suaksual inthawina chu LALPA tana tenawm a ni; Mi tah tawngtaina erawh chu a lawmzawng a ni.

source: Let the evil works of my haters come back on them again; let them be cut off by your good faith.
target: Ani chuan sualna chu ka hmêlmate chungah a thungrul ang: Nangin anni chu i thutakina avâng chuan tiboral ang che.

source: Would you like anything to eat?
target: Ei tur i duh em?

source: And Solomon gave Hiram twenty thousand measures of grain, as food for his people, and twenty measures of clear oil; this he did every year.
target: Tin, Solomonan Hirama chu a chhûngkuate ei atân buh tehkhawng sawmhnih a pe a: chu chu Solomonan kum tina Hirama a pêk thin dan chu a ni.

source: Cool it down
target: Tidai rawh

source: My eyes itch.
target: Ka mit a thak.

source: They were dreaming
target: Mumang an nei a

source: And the second let what was in his vessel come out into the sea; and it became blood as of a dead man; and every living thing in the sea came to an end.
target: Tin, a pahnihna chuan a berhbu chu tuifinriatah a leih bua a; tichuan, mitthi thisen angin thisenah a chang ta a; chutichuan thil nung tinreng tuifinriata awmte chu an thi ta vek a.

source: Now there was war between Asa and Baasha, king of Israel, all their days.
target: Tin, Asa leh Israel leh Baasa chu an lal chhûng zawng an indo reng thin a.

source: Now when he came back from the dead early on the first day of the week, he went first to Mary Magdalene, from whom he had sent out seven evil spirits.
target: Tin, ni sarih ni hmasa ber zinga a thawhleh chuan Mari Magdalini, a kawchhung ata ramhuai pasarih a hnawh chhuaha hnenah khan a inlar hmasa ber a.

source: And old stores long kept will be your food, and you will take out the old because of the new;
target: Tin, rei tak in vawn a hluite chu in ei ang a, a thar dah nan a hluite chu in la chhuak ang.

source: The chances of my life are in your hand; take me out of the hands of my haters, and of those who go after me.
target: Ka hunte chu i kutah a awm a: Mi dotute kut ata leh, mi tiduhdahtute lakah hian mi chhanhim ang che.

source: Don't be an idiot.
target: Idiot ni suh.
