source: Or let these men here present say what wrongdoing was seen in me when I was before the Sanhedrin,
target: A nih loh leh, heng mite ngei hian roreltute hmaa ka din lai khan, ka tihsual engnge an hmuh sawi rawh se,

source: Let's listen
target: Lo ngaihthla ang

source: Word of you had come to my ears, but now my eye has seen you.
target: Benga hriatna mai zawngin ka hre tawh chia, Mahse, tunah zawng ka hmu ta che;

source: If any man is ready to do God's pleasure he will have knowledge of the teaching and of where it comes from--from God or from myself.
target: Tupawh ama duhzawng tih duh chuan, ka thu zirtir hi Pathian tihchhuah nge keima phuahchawpa ka sawi a hria ang.

source: And Mephibosheth had a young son named Mica. And all the people living in the house of Ziba were servants to Mephibosheth.
target: Mephibosetha chuan fapa, naupang anei a, a hming chu Mika a ni. Tin anwg chu Mephibostha chhiahhlawh an ni a.

source: A secret feeling of worship came into my heart, and my hand gave kisses from my mouth;
target: Ka thinlung hi a ruk tea hip bo a nih a, Ka kut pawhin ka ka a hup chuan,

source: And they will give the walls of Tyre to destruction and have its towers broken: and I will take even her dust away from her, and make her an uncovered rock
target: Tin, tûra kulhte chu an tichhia ang a, kulh bingsângte chu an tichim ang; an lak ata lei zawng zawng ka ziat fai leng ang a, lungpui ro maiah ka siam ang.

source: He's busy
target: A buai a

source: I am about your age.
target: I kum vel ka ni.

source: And Joshua made the distribution for them in Shiloh by the decision of the Lord, marking out the land for the children of Israel by their divisions.
target: Tin, Josuan Silo-ah chuan LALPA hmaan thum a lo vawrsak a: chutah chuan Josuan Israela thlahte chu an inthen dan ang zel chuan ram chu a sem ta a.

source: But the tall trees will come down with a great fall, and the town will be low in a low place.
target: Nimahsela ram ngaw chu tithlu tûrin rial a tla dur dur ang a; khawpui chu tihtlâwm derin a awm ang.

source: You wouldn't believe it.
target: I ring lo ang.

source: That day--let it be dark; let not God take note of it from on high, and let not the light be shining on it;
target: Chu ni chu thim lo ni se, Chung lam atangin Pathianin ngaihsak lo se; Engpawh chu a chungah eng suh se;

source: Ezer their chief, Obadiah the second, Eliab the third,
target: a pakhatna chu Ezera a ni a, a dawttu chu Obadia, a dawt lehtu chu Eliaba,

source: Am I talented?
target: Thiam thil ka ngah em?

source: You are to be responsible for the holy place and the altar, so that wrath may never again come on the children of Israel.
target: Tin, nangin hmun thianghlim hna leh maichâm hna chu i chang ang, Israela thlahte chunga thinurna a awm tawh loh nan

source: This is the third time that I am coming to you. From the mouth of two or three witnesses will every word be made certain.
target: Hei hi in hnena ka lo kal a vawi thumna tur a ni. Hretute pahnih emaw pathum emaw kaah chuan thu tinreng tihnghehin a awm ang.

source: So I have pride in Christ Jesus in the things which are God's.
target: Chutichuan Pathian lam kawngah Krista Isuaah chuan chhuan tur ka nei a ni.

source: And the priests were not able to go into the house of the Lord, for the Lord's house was full of the glory of the Lord.
target: LALPA ropuinain LALPA in chu a tihkhah avângin LALPA inah chuan puithiamte chu an lût thei ta lo va.

source: It may break
target: Ka tikeh maithei

source: He came in person
target: Amah ngeiin a rawn kal a

source: Let us wait and see.
target: I nghak ang u.

source: That's all
target: Khati zawng kha

source: Sami didn't laugh
target: Sami chu a nui lo

source: Everything was stolen
target: Engkim a ruk vek a

source: So they, having given their witness and made clear the word of the Lord, went back to Jerusalem, giving the good news on their way in a number of the small towns of Samaria.
target: Chutichuan anni chuan Lalpa thu chu an hriattira an sawi zawhin, Jerusalem khuaah an haw leh a; Samari rama mite khaw tam tak hnenah Chanchin Tha chu an hril zel a.

source: Do you care
target: I ngaihsak em

source: Do I look OK?
target: Ka nalh em?

source: And in all the acts of power and fear which Moses did before the eyes of all Israel.
target: Kut chak tak leh hlauhawm tak tak tea Israel mi zawng zawngte mithmuha Mosian a tih ang ti vete.

source: And I saw him saying to me, Go out of Jerusalem straight away because they will not give hearing to your witness about me.
target: tin, ‘Hmanhmawh la, Jerusalem khua ata chhuak rawh; ka chanchin i hrilh tur chu an pawm dawh loh hi,’ a mi tih lai ka hmu a.

source: And a number of women were there, watching from a distance, who had come with Jesus from Galilee, waiting on his needs.
target: Tin, chutah chuan hmeichhe tam tak, a rawngbawlsak chung zela Galili ram atanga Isua rawn zuitute chu an awm a, hla takah an thlir a;

source: Be not given overmuch to righteousness and be not over-wise. Why let destruction come on you?
target: Kherkhiap lutuk suh la, intifing lutuk hek suh: engah nge mahni i intih chhiat ang?

source: But if we were true judges of ourselves, punishment would not come on us.
target: Amaherawhchu, khun takin mahni inngaihtuah thin ila chuan rorelsakin kan awm thin lo tur.

source: You're not penniless
target: Penniless i ni lo

source: And let them be for lights in the arch of heaven to give light on the earth: and it was so.
target: lei chung ên turin vân boruak zau takah chuan êntute awm bawk rawh se, a ti a: tichuan chutiang chu a ni ta a.

source: And the word of God was increasing in power; and the number of the disciples in Jerusalem became very great, and a great number of priests were in agreement with the faith.
target: Tin, Pathian thu chu a lo darh a; Jerusalem khuaah zirtirteho an pung ta em em a; puithiamte zingah pawh mi tam takin rinna chu an awih ta a.

source: You'll be very sorry.
target: I pawi hle ang.

source: Are you bored yet?
target: I la bo tawh em?

source: There is nothing outside the man which, going into him, is able to make him unclean: but the things which come out of the man are those which make the man unclean.
target: mihring pawn lam ata a kawchhunga luta amah tibawlhhlawh thei engmah a awm lo; mihring kawchhung ata lo chhuakte chu mihring tibawlhhlawhtu a ni zawk e, a ti a.

source: A man will get good from the fruit of his lips, but the desire of the false is for violent acts.
target: Mi tha chuan a kaa thu chhuak rah a dawng a, Bum hmangte duhzawng erawh chu tharum thawh a ni.

source: Chuck me the ball
target: Chuck min ball chu

source: Tom is smart
target: Toma hi a fing

source: She had no objection.
target: Dodalna a nei lo.

source: And all those to whose ears it came were full of wonder at the things said by the keepers of the sheep.
target: Tin, a hria apiang chuan beram vengtute thusawi chu mak an ti hle a.

source: In your name will they have joy all the day: in your righteousness will they be lifted up.
target: I hming avângin nilengin an hlim thin a: I felna avângin chawimawiin an awm thin

source: Deal with it
target: Ngaihsak rawh

source: Let all who are servants under the yoke give all honour to their masters, so that no evil may be said against the name of God and his teaching.
target: Pathian hming leh a zirtirna thu sawichhiata a awm loh nan, bawih nghawngkawl bat apiangte chuan anmahni pute engkimah chawimawi tlakah ngai rawh se.

source: Then let Aaron and his sons come to the door of the Tent of meeting; and after washing them with water,
target: Tin, Arona leh a fapate chu inbiakna puan in kawngka bula rawn hruaiin tuiin i sil tur a ni.

source: I am unenlightened
target: Eng ka ni lo

source: You're not fooling anybody.
target: Tumah i bum lo.

source: On the first day there will be a holy meeting: do no field-work.
target: A ni khatna chu inkhawmpui thianghlim a ni ang a, hna reng reng in thawk tur a ni lo.

source: She can't drink alcohol.
target: Zu a in thei lo.

source: So will it be in the end of the world: the angels will come and take out the bad from the good,
target: Khawvel tawp hunah chuan chutiang bawkin a awm ang; vantirhkohte chu an lo chhuak ang a, mi fel zing ata mi sualte chu an hlir ang a,

source: Are you overweight
target: I thau lutuk em

source: They were put to shame because of their hope; they came and their hope was gone.
target: An beisei tak a, an hlawhchham a, An va kal a, an hrilhhai a.

source: You bought nothing.
target: Engmah i lei lo.

source: Peter said to him, See, we have given up everything, and come after you.
target: Peteran a hnenah, Ngai teh, keinin engkim kalsanin kan zui ta chia, tiin a han sawi tan a.

source: Cheer up
target: Tihlim ru

source: Yes, and all whose purpose is to be living in the knowledge of God in Christ Jesus, will be cruelly attacked.
target: A ni, tupawh Krista Isuaa Pathian ngaihsaka awm tum apiang chuan tihduhdahnate an tuar bawk ang.

source: Shame on you!
target: Zak hle rawh

source: I tried the hat on.
target: Hat chu ka ha a.

source: When you take your rest you will have no fear, and on your bed sleep will be sweet to you.
target: I mut hunin i hlau lo vang a, A ni, i mu ang a, tui takin i muhil ang.

source: And the Philistines, when they went in flight, did not take their images with them, and David and his men took them away.
target: Tin, chutah chuan an milemte an kalsan a, Davida leh a mite hchuan an la a.

source: I have made myself tired to no purpose: still all the waste which is in her has not come out, it has an evil smell.
target: Ning khawpa bei pawhin a kang khir chu a fai chuang lova, mei pawhin a kang fai hek lo.

source: I outrank you.
target: Ka kal pêl che.

source: I gave him a slap
target: Ka pe a

source: Who did this?
target: Hei hi tu tih nge?

source: Without wood, the fire goes out; and where there is no secret talk, argument is ended.
target: Thing a ral avângin mei chu a thi a, Sesea thu sawitu awm lohnaah chuan inhauna a reh thin.

source: When there is need of food he will keep you from death, and in war from the power of the sword.
target: Tam tlakin thihna ata a tlan ang chia, Indonaah chuan khandaih thiltihtheihna lak ata.

source: And the priest will give the sin-offering, and take away the sin of him who is to be made clean from his unclean condition; and after that he will put the burned offering to death.
target: Tin, puithiam chuan sual thawina chu a hian ang a, a thianghlim lohna avanga inthlan tura chu inremna a siamsak ang a; tin, chu mi zawhah chuan halral thilhlan chu a talh ang;

source: I am all mixed up.
target: Ka mix vek tawh.

source: We have three of them.
target: Pathum kan nei a.

source: I wanted to call you.
target: Ka ko duh a ni.

source: Who has come
target: Tunge lo kal hi

source: Come, you rulers of Israel, you who gave yourselves freely among the people: give praise to the Lord.
target: Ka rilru chu Israel-hote rorêltu, Mipuite hnêna chak taka inpete lamah chuan a awm: LALPA chu fak rawh u.

source: From Zion, most beautiful of places, God has sent out his light.
target: Mawi famkimna, Zion atang chuan, Pathian chu a eng chhuak ta a.

source: It was poison gas.
target: Poison gas a ni.

source: I despise you
target: Ka dêusawh che

source: Does it hurt here
target: Hetah hian a na em

source: I moved.
target: Ka chesawn.

source: They're weak
target: An châu

source: It was fixed to the head-dress by a blue cord, as the Lord had given orders to Moses.
target: Tin, puithiam lukhum chu lama bel turin hrui dum pawlin an thlung a; LALPAN Mosia thu a pêk ang khan.

source: In whose hand is the soul of every living thing, and the breath of all flesh of man.
target: A kutah thil nung tin, nunna leh Mihring chi zawng zawng thlarau a awm.

source: We don't want to talk about it.
target: Kan sawi duh lo.

source: Evil will overtake sinners, but the upright will be rewarded with good.
target: Thil sualin mi sual chu a zui zel thin a, Mifel erawh chu thil thaa thungrulh a ni ang.

source: It wasn't Tom, was it?
target: Tom a ni lo maw?

source: They don't deserve to die.
target: Thih an phu lo.

source: Now Pharaoh's daughter came down to the Nile to take a bath, while her women were walking by the riverside; and she saw the basket among the river-plants, and sent her servant-girl to get it.
target: Tin, Pharaoa fanu chu luia inbual tûrin a zu kal a; tin, a bâwihnute chu lui kamah chuan an kal ve a; tin, phairuang zînga bâwm a han hmuh chuan a bâwihnu a va lâktîr a.

source: Dial rawh Tom
target: Dial it down Tom

source: These rods he put in the rings at the sides of the ark, for lifting it.
target: Tin, bawm chu zawn teih turin a panga khangah chuan zawnfungte chu a rawlh a.

source: Try it.
target: Tichhin rawh.

source: It's your influence
target: I influence a ni

source: Again Again Again
target: Leh Leh Leh

source: For no sin of mine they go quickly and get themselves ready; be awake and come to my help, and see.
target: Ka sual loh pawhin an tlan a, an inbuatsaih a: Mi tanpui tûrin intiharh la, en rawh.

source: So, from Troas we went straight by ship to Samothrace and the day after to Neapolis;
target: Tin, Troas khua ata lawngin kan chhuak a, tluang takin Samathraki khuaah kan kal a, atukah chuan Neapoli khuaah kan kal leh a;

source: I won't come
target: Ka lokal lovang

source: O Lord, keep a watch over my mouth; keep the door of my lips.
target: Aw LALPA, ka ka bulah hian vengtu thuttir la; Ka hmui kawngkhâr hi veng ang che.

source: Did you paint this?
target: Hei hi i paint em?

source: And Laban said to him, Truly, you are my bone and my flesh. And he kept Jacob with him for the space of a month.
target: Labana chuan a hnênah, Ka thisenpui i nih chu le, a ti a. Tin, thla khat a hnênah a awm ta a.

source: They won.
target: An chak.

source: The pains of a woman in childbirth will come on him: he is an unwise son, for at this time it is not right for him to keep his place when children come to birth.
target: Hmeichhe nauvei lungngaihna ang chu a chungah a lo thleng ang: Amah chu fapa fing lo tak a ni e, A hun takah nau lo chhuahna hmunah a awm si lo.

source: To do that which had been fixed before by your hand and your purpose.
target: i kut leh i rilruin lo thleng tura a ruat lawk apiang kha ti turin.

source: You have put your bed on a high mountain: there you went up to make your offering.
target: Tlâng sâng zo tak chungah chuan i khum chu i dah a: Moleka hnênah i kal a.

source: Let's just get on with it.
target: I kal zel ang u.

source: And those who were near said, Do you say such words against God's high priest?
target: Tin, a kianga miten, Pathian Puithiam Lalber i hau vei maw? an ti a.

source: For you put bitter things on record against me, and send punishment on me for the sins of my early years;
target: Ka chungah na takin i ziak a, Ka tileirawl lai khawlohnate mi phurhtir a.

source: So they put overseers of forced work over them, in order to make their strength less by the weight of their work. And they made store-towns for Pharaoh, Pithom and Raamses.
target: Chutichuan an phurrita tiretehi tûrin an chûngah hnathawk vêngtute an ruat ta a. Tichuan Pharaoa tân bungraw dah khâwmna tûr Pithom leh Rameses khuate an siam a.

source: Did you buy tomatoes?
target: Tomato i lei em?

source: I exaggerated
target: Ka sawi uar

source: Is everything okay
target: Engkim a tha em

source: He did not finish the marathon.
target: Marathon a zo lo.

source: Don't wake her up
target: Kaihthawh suh

source: I was too ambitious.
target: Ka tumruh lutuk.

source: Abram went on living in the land of Canaan, and Lot went to the lowland towns, moving his tent as far as Sodom.
target: Abrama chu Kanaan ramah chuan a awm a, Lota chu Phaizâwl khuaahte chuan a awm a, a puan in chu Sodom khaw thlengin a sawn zêl a.

source: We're not involved
target: Kan inrawlh lo

source: But there is forgiveness with you, so that you may be feared.
target: Nimahsela i hnênah ngaihdamna a awm a ni, Tiha i awm theih nân

source: And they have not made prayer to me in their hearts, but they make loud cries on their beds; they are cutting themselves for food and wine, they are turned against me.
target: An thinlung takin mi au lo va An khum laizâwlah an chiau mai mai zâwk a ni: Buh leh uain atân an inkhâwm a, ka chungah chuan an hel si a.

source: You have the eyes of a lynx.
target: Lynx mit i nei a.

source: Their mouth goes up to heaven; their tongues go walking through the earth.
target: An ka chu vanahte khian an dah a, An lei chuan leilung hi a fang tlâng thin a.

source: Life's short
target: Nun hi a tawi

source: And it goes on to the side facing the Arabah to the north, and down to the Arabah;
target: tin, Araba sir hmar lampangah a kal zel a, Araba-ah a chhuk a:

source: Let's drink coffee
target: Coffee i in ang u

source: Eleazar, the son of Aaron the priest, will be head over all the Levites and overseer of those responsible for the care of the holy place.
target: Tin, puithiam Arona fapa Eleazara chu Levi-ho puipate puipa a ni ang a, hmun thianghlim enkawltute chu a ho ang.

source: You have been living delicately on earth and have taken your pleasure; you have made your hearts fat for a day of destruction.
target: Khawvelah hian nuamsa takin in awm a, in inkhawhral mai mai a; inthah niin in thinlung in titlai a.

source: He was twenty-five years old when he became king; and he was ruling in Jerusalem for twenty-nine years; his mother's name was Jehoaddin of Jerusalem.
target: A lal tantirh chuan kum sâwmhnih leh kum nga mi a ni a, Jerusalem-ah kum kum sâwmhnih leh kum kuaa lal a; anu hming chu Jehoadini, Jerusalem mi a ni.

source: Preaching to Jews and to Greeks the need for a turning of the heart to God, and faith in the Lord Jesus Christ.
target: Judate leh Grikte hnenah pawh Pathian lama rilru lamlet thu leh, kan Lalpa Isua Krista lam rin tur thu ka hriattir thin kha.

source: The fate of Moab is near, and trouble is coming on him very quickly.
target: Moab chhiatna chu a lo thleng mek a, A tuarna tûr a tuah tep a ni.

source: You still don't understand.
target: I la hrethiam lo.

source: They never stopped
target: An chawl ngai lo

source: Now at the feast every year he let one prisoner go free at their request.
target: Tin, Pilatan kut niah chuan mi tang pakhat an ngen apianga chu a chhuahsak thin a.

source: In my Father's house are rooms enough; if it was not so, would I have said that I am going to make ready a place for you?
target: Ka Pa inah awmna tam tak a awm a, a awm loh chuan ka hrilh tawh tur che u a ni; intan hmun siaminka kal dawn hi.

source: Give ear to the words of this agreement, and say to the men of Judah and to the people of Jerusalem,
target: He thuthlung thute hi ngaithla ula, Juda mite leh Jerusalema chengte hnênah sawi rawh u:

source: To keep the word untouched by evil, clear from all shame, till the revelation of our Lord Jesus Christ:
target: kan Lal Isua Krista rawn inlar leh hma loh chuan thupek kha thianghlim tak leh sawiselbova pawm turin.

source: Then you will have knowledge of righteousness and right acting, and upright behaviour, even of every good way.
target: Tichuan felna leh rorêlna chu i lo hre thiam ang a, Hleih neih lohna nên, a ni, kawng tha tinreng pawh.

source: Then one of the twelve, who was named Judas Iscariot, went to the chief priests and said,
target: Chu mi hnuah chuan sawm leh pahnihte zinga mi pakhat, Juda Iskariota an tiha chu, puithiam lalte hnenah a kal a.

source: We aren't bluffing
target: Kan bluff lo

source: You are my glory; let the instruments of music be awake; I myself will be awake with the dawn.
target: Ka ropuina, harh rawh; perhkhuang leh tingtangte u, harh rawh u: Kei chu zing takah ka harh ang.

source: They won't allow it
target: An phal dawn lo

source: But some of them said, This man, who made open the eyes of the blind man, was he not able to keep his friend from death?
target: Nimahsela thenkhat chuan, He mi, mit del mit tivartu hian he mi pawh hi a thih lohtir thei lo vem ni? an ti a.

source: His seed will be strong on the earth; blessings will be on the generation of the upright.
target: A thlahte chu leiah hian chak takin an awm ang a; Mi dik takte chhuan chu malsawmin an awm ang.

source: Hi John! How are you?
target: Hi John! I dam em?

source: Do you smell that?
target: Chu chu i rim em?

source: Your seat of power, O God, is for ever and ever; the rod of your kingdom is a rod of honour.
target: Aw Pathian, i lalthuphah chu chatuanin a awm tûr a ni: Thlei bik neih lohna laltiang chu i ram laltiang chu a ni.

source: The desire of the upright man is only for good, but wrath is waiting for the evil-doer.
target: Mi fel duhthusam chu thil tha chauh a ni a, Mi suaksual hmachhuan erawh chu thinurna a ni.

source: And they were angry with him and said, You are his disciple, but we are disciples of Moses.
target: Tin, anni chuan an hau va, Nang hi ama zirtir i ni a, keini zawng Mosia zirtirte kan ni asin.

source: Are you still looking for a job?
target: Hna i la zawng em?

source: In connection with the leper's disease, take care to keep and do every detail of the teaching of the priests, the Levites: as I gave them orders, so you are to do.
target: Phâr hri chungchang thuah chuan, ngun taka dap chhuak a, puithiam, Levi hote zirtir dan ang zela ti turin fimkhur rawh u; anmahni thu ka pêk angin fimkhur takin in ti tur a ni.

source: He had much property in the towns of Judah; he had forces of armed men, great and strong, in Jerusalem.
target: Judai ram khuaahte chuan hna tam tak a nei a; Jerusalem-ah sipai mi chak huaisente a ngah bawk a.

source: The earth of the valley covering his bones is sweet to him, and all men come after him, as there were unnumbered before him.
target: Lei tlâng pawhin a delh na lo. Mi zawng zawngin a hnu an chhui a, A hmaa chhiar sen loh lo awm tawhte ang khan.

source: Are you their mother
target: An nu i ni em

source: Sami too a drink of it.
target: Sami pawh a in a.

source: Let me see
target: Ka lo en

source: If I say, Only let me be covered by the dark, and the light about me be night;
target: Thimin min khuh bo tlat se, Ka vêl eng hi zan thim ni se ti mah ila;

source: Let them be turned to liquid like the ever-flowing waters; let them be cut off like the grass by the way.
target: Anni chu tui chak taka luang angin tuiral sela: A thaltea a tinin, sah chhum angin awm zel rawh se.

source: Will you have respect for God's person in this cause, and put yourselves forward as his supporters?
target: Amah tanin hleih in neih ang maw? Pathian tan in pawng tan dawn êm ni?

source: He gave to destruction all the first sons of Egypt; the first-fruits of their strength in the tents of Ham;
target: Aigupta rama fa tir awm zawng zawng a tihlum a, Hama puan intea an chakna rah hmasa berte chu:

source: You took a vine out of Egypt: driving out the nations, and planting it in their land.
target: Aigupta ram ata grêp hrui i rawn la a: Hnam tin chu i hnawt chhuak a, i phun ta a.

source: But any which have no skin-plates or wings for swimming, you may not take; they are unclean for you.
target: pangparh leh phuhlip nei lo apiangte chu in ei thei lovang, in tan a bawlhhlawh a ni.

source: But the more cruel they were to them, the more their number increased, till all the land was full of them. And the children of Israel were hated by the Egyptians.
target: Nimahsela anmahni chu an tihretheih nasat veleh an pung nasa deuh deuh va, an darh zau ta deuh deuh va. Tin, Israela thlahte avâng chuan an lungngai ta a.

source: What did you talk to him about
target: Eng thu nge i biak

source: I didn't say they deserve it
target: An phu ka ti lo

source: It's broken again
target: A chhe leh ta

source: You didn't make it clear.
target: I sawi chiang lo.

source: Are they servants of Christ? (I am talking foolishly I am more so; I have had more experience of hard work, of prisons, of blows more than measure, of death.
target: Krista rawngbawltute an ni maw? mi a angin han sawi ta ila Ka ni zawk mah; thawh rimnaahte nasa lehzualin, tan ina tannaahte nasa lehzualin, vuaknaahte hleihluak takin, thihnaahte vawi tam tak.

source: Sami was assaulted
target: Sami chu an bei a

source: And a tenth part of the herd and of the flock, whatever goes under the rod of the valuer, will be holy to the Lord.
target: Ran leh beram rual zinga sawma pakhat, tiang hnuaia lut a sawmna zel chu LALPA tana thianghlim a ni ang.

source: And this bread was named manna by Israel: it was white, like a grain seed, and its taste was like cakes made with honey.
target: Tin, Israela chhûngte chuan chu mi hmingah chuan Manna an vuah a: koriender mu ang maia vâr ser a ni a; han ei chuan chhangpêr khawizu nêna siam ang a ni.

source: He gave up
target: A bansan

source: He who has a love for silver never has enough silver, or he who has love for wealth, enough profit. This again is to no purpose.
target: Tangka sum ngainatu chuan tangka sumah duhtawk a hmu lo vang a, hausak ngainatu chuan duhtawk a help hek lo vang: hei pawh hi engmah lo mai a lo ni.

source: You should have eaten more.
target: I ei tam tur a ni.

source: I have not given them anything.
target: Engmah ka pe lo.

source: And the tree became tall and strong, stretching up to heaven, and to be seen from the ends of the earth:
target: Thing chu a țhang a, a țanțha a, a sânlam chuan vân a tawng a, kâwlkil ațangin a lang thei vek a.

source: And on the third day, they let all the sailing apparatus go over the side.
target: Tin, atuk lehah anmahni kut meuhvin lawng bungrua an paih chhuak leh ta a.

source: I'm uncomfortable
target: Ka hahdam lo

source: And the Arvadite and the Zemarite and the Hamathite; after that the families of the Canaanites went far and wide in all directions;
target: Arvat-ho te, Zemar-ho te, Hamath-ho te a thlah a: chu mi hnuah chuan Kanaan-ho hnamte chu an darh zau ta a.

source: And in order to make the house clean, let him take two birds and cedar-wood and red thread and hyssop;
target: Tin, in thenna tur chuan sava pahnih leh sidar thing leh la zai sen leh husop a keng ang a;

source: And Abraham gave to his son, to whom Sarah had given birth, the name Isaac.
target: Tin, Abrahaman a fapa neih, Sarin a hrinsaka chu a hmingah Isaaka a sa a.

source: To Titus, my true child in our common faith: Grace and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Saviour.
target: Tita, kan rin thuhmun vanga ka fa taktak hnenah: Pa, Pathian leh Krista Isua min Chhandamtu hnen ata khawngaihna leh remna awm rawh se.

source: And Solomon made two hundred body-covers of hammered gold, every one having six hundred shekels of gold in it.
target: Tin, lal Solomona chuan rangkachak den phekin pawh lian zahnih a siam a: phaw pakhatah rangkachak sekel zaruk a duh a.

source: Let's go to the zoo.
target: Zoo lam pan ila.

source: Do not go after other gods to be their servants and to give them worship, and do not make me angry with the work of your hands, causing evil to yourselves.
target: Pathian dangte hnêna an rawng bâwl tûr leh chibai bûk tûr leh in kut hnathawha ka thin tiur tûrin kal suh u; tichuan ka tina lo vang che u, an ti țhin a.

source: I'm Sunil
target: Sunil ka nia

source: I'm ticklish
target: Ka za lûtuk

source: He bought a new car
target: Car thar a lei a

source: He coughed.
target: Hepa hi a khuh.

source: For the law was given through Moses; grace and the true way of life are ours through Jesus Christ.
target: Dan thu Mosian a pe, khawngaihna leh thutak Isua Krista avangin a lo awm.

source: Will you not give us life again, so that your people may be glad in you?
target: Nangmahah chuan i mite an hlim theih nân Min tiharh leh dawn lawm ni?

source: How is it?
target: Eng nge a an?

source: And Jehoash went to rest with his fathers, and was put into the earth in Samaria with the kings of Israel; and Jeroboam his son became king in his place.
target: Tin, Jehoasa chu a pi leh pute hnênah a muhil a, Samari khuaan Israel lalte zingah an phûm a; tin, a fapa Jeroboama chu a aiawhin a lal ta a.

source: We're honest
target: Kan rinawm

source: And will not God do right in the cause of his saints, whose cries come day and night to his ears, though he is long in doing it?
target: An chungah zaidawh rih mah sela a mi thlan, achhun azana amah kotute phuba chu Pathianin a laksak lo vang em ni?

source: The Lord did not give you his love or take you for himself because you were more in number than any other people; for you were the smallest of the nations:
target: Hnam dang aia in tam avangin LALPAN in chungah a hmangaihna a fuktir a, a thlang che u a ni lova; hnam zawng zawnga hnam tlem ber in ni asin;

source: Who's free
target: Tunge hman

source: Go out of the ark, you and your wife and your sons and your sons' wives.
target: Lawng ata chhuak rawh, nang leh i nupui leh i fapa leh i fapate nupuite pawh i hnênah chhuak ve rawh se.

source: When your fathers put me to the test, and saw my works for forty years.
target: chutah chuan in thlahtute chuan Mi fiahin mi thlem a, Kum sawmli chhunga Ka thiltihte chu an hmu a;

source: They're ugly
target: An hmelchhia

source: I would see what his answers would be, and have knowledge of what he would say to me.
target: A mi chhanna tûr thute ka hre duh a, ka hnêna a sawi tûr chu hriat thiam ka duh.

source: And he put the male sheep of the burned offering before the Lord, and Aaron and his sons put their hands on its head,
target: Tin, halral thilhlan berampa chu a han hlan a, Arona leh a fapate chuan berampa lu chungah chuan an kut an nghat a.

source: And on the east, your limit will be marked out from Hazar-enan to Shepham,
target: Tin, chhak lama in ramri chu Hazarenan ațangin Sepham thlengin i siam ang a:

source: My hand will be his support; my arm will give him strength.
target: Ka kut hi a hnênah tihnghehin a awm ang a; Ka ban hian ani chu a tichak ang.

source: For a man's ways are before the eyes of the Lord, and he puts all his goings in the scales.
target: Mihring kawngte chu LALPA mithmuhah a awm a, A kawng zawng zawng a tihrualremsak thin.

source: Then these men were watching and saw Daniel making prayers and requesting grace before his God.
target: Tichuan, hêng mite hi an inkhâwm a, Danielan a pathian hnênah dilna leh ngenna a hlân țhin tih a hmu chhuak ta a.

source: And he saw two boats by the edge of the water, but the fishermen had gone out of them and were washing their nets.
target: tin, dil kamah chuan lawng pahnih awm a hmu a, nimahsela sangha mantute chu an chhuak a, an lente an su a.

source: I didn't feel like buying a car.
target: Car lei ka duh lo.

source: The room is sunny.
target: Room chu a ni a.

source: Tom drove.
target: Tom-an a khalh.

source: He owns an iguana.
target: Iguana a nei a.

source: Sami was fooling around.
target: Sami chu a bum a.

source: Oh! She's fussy.
target: Aw, nu khirh a ni.

source: Life is hard
target: Khawsak a harsa

source: She doesn't see the point.
target: A awmzia a hmu lo.

source: Five curtains were joined together to make one group, and six curtains were joined together to make the other group.
target: Tin, puanzar pangate chu athui zawm vek a, tin, puanzar paruk pawh chu a thui zawm vek a.

source: So he made clear to them the way into the town, and they put it to the sword; but they let the man and all his family get away safe.
target: Tin, khawpui chhûng luhna hchu a entir a, tichuan khandaihin chu khua chu an bei a; chu mi leh a chhûngte zawng zawng erawh chu an zuah a.

source: Let the dark and the black night take it for themselves; let it be covered with a cloud; let the dark shades of day send fear on it.
target: Thim leh thihna hlim chuan an ta atân chuhse, Chhumin bawh reng mai sela; Chhun tithmtu zawng zawng khan tihlau rawh se.

source: Aw, has he fallen!
target: Aw, a tlu tawh em!

source: They're home
target: Inah an awm

source: And they sent for them, and gave them orders not to make statements or give teaching in the name of Jesus.
target: Tichuan anni chu an ko va, Isua hminga thu sawi tawp loh tur leh zirtir tawp loh tur an ti tlat a.

source: Let's call it a night.
target: Zan ti ila.

source: You could not choose.
target: I thlang thei lo.

source: I haven't dismissed you yet.
target: Ka la ban lo che.

source: I can come.
target: Ka rawn kal thei.

source: And all Judah were waiting before the Lord, with their little ones, their wives, and their children.
target: Tin, Judate zawng zawng chu an fanau te te, an nupuite an fate nen LALPA hmaa an ding a.

source: And four carts and eight oxen he gave to the sons of Merari for their work, under the direction of Ithamar, the son of Aaron the priest.
target: Tin, tawlailir pali leh bawngpa pariat chu, puithiam Arona fapa Ithamara ho, Meraria fapate chu an hna azir zelin a pe a.

source: I bit Tom
target: Tom ka thlah

source: She made pancakes
target: Pancake a siam a

source: The first words of his mouth are foolish, and the end of his talk is evil crime.
target: A kamchhuak thu bul chu âtna a ni sa a, A kamchhuak tawpna chu âtna pawikhawih chi a ni.

source: You're my sweetie.
target: Ka sweetie i ni.

source: Here's a pen.
target: Hetah pen a awm.

source: They're good
target: An ṭha lutuk

source: You do not understand.
target: I hrethiam lo.

source: She is full of noise and uncontrolled; her feet keep not in her house.
target: A awm hle hle thei lo va, a tum a ruh a, A ke chuan a ina awm a duh lo va;

source: It's the Fairmont bus.
target: Fairmont bus a ni.

source: Come, take your bread with joy, and your wine with a glad heart. God has taken pleasure in your works.
target: Kal la, lawm takin i chaw ei la, thinlung hlimin i uain in rawh; Pathianin i thiltihte chu a pawm tawh si a.

source: He ignored me
target: Mi haider tlat

source: Would they be smaller
target: An te zawk ang em

source: And he who has given a price for goods will not get them, for my wrath is on all of them.
target: Tâwtawrâwt chu an hâm a, engkim a inpeih tawh a; mahse indonaah chuan tumah an kal lo; ka thinurna chu an zavaia chungah a awm si a.

source: On the tenth day Ahiezer; the son of Ammishaddai, chief of the children of Dan:
target: Ni sawm ni chuan Dana thlahte puipa Amisadaia fapa Ahiezera chuan a hlan a:

source: And all the people in Ai came together to go after them; and they went after Joshua, moving away from the town.
target: Tin, khawpuia awm zawng zawngte chu anmahni um turin an ko khawm a: tichuan Josua chu an um a, khawpuia ta chu thui fe thlem chhuahin an awm ta a.

source: Were not the Ethiopians and the Lubim a very great army, with war-carriages and horsemen more than might be numbered? but because your faith was in the Lord, he gave them up into your hands.
target: Ethiopia-ho leh Lub-hoe chu sipa rual lian tak, tawlailir leh sakawr chung chuang mite tam tak an ni lâwm ni kha? Nimahsela LALPA i rin avâng khan i kutah a pe a nih kha.

source: No permit is required.
target: Permit a ngai lo.

source: The Lord will make war for you, you have only to keep quiet.
target: LALPAN a dosak ang che u a, nangni chu in awm hle hle mai ang, a ti a.

source: And as for you, make no prayers for this people, send up no cry or prayer for them: for I will not give ear to their cry in the time of their trouble.
target: Chuvangin hengte hi țawngțaisak suh la, an tan dilna emaw aw emaw chhuah hek suh; an buai huna mi auh chu ka ngaithla dawn si lo va.

source: The mountains were shaking before the Lord, before the Lord, the God of Israel.
target: Tlangte chu LALPA hmaah a lo khur a, Sinai tlâng lam pawh saw - LALPA Israelte Pathian hmaah chuan.

source: And the people, crying out against Moses, said, What are we to have for drink?
target: Tichuan, mipuite chuan, Engnge ni kan in dâwn le? tiin Mosia chungah an phunnawi ta a.

source: He said it sort of gleefully.
target: Hlim takin a ti a.

source: I shrugged
target: Ka ngaihsak lem lo

source: Are you waiting for someone
target: Mi i nghak em

source: I think they're wrong
target: An tisual ka ti

source: I'm inside
target: A chhûngah ka awm

source: Even to the tree which was planted by your right hand, and to the branch which you made strong for yourself.
target: A kung i kut ding lamin a phun leh, A peng i tana i tihkhauh nên hian.

source: Are you expecting someone
target: Mi i beisei em

source: What is your opinion? They made answer and said, It is right for him to be put to death.
target: Engtin nge in ngaih? a ti a. Anni chuan, Thi tlak a ni, tiin an chhang a.

source: The heating-pot is for silver and the oven-fire for gold, but the Lord is the tester of hearts.
target: Tihthianghlimna bel chu tangkaraw tan ani a rawhtuina chu rangkachak tan a ni a, Thinlung erawh chu LALPAN a fiah thin.

source: Because I saw that your heart was hard, and that your neck was an iron cord, and your brow brass;
target: Mi luhlul in nih a, in nghawng chu thir tha a nih a, in chal chu dar a nih ka hriat avângin,

source: Shaking out drops of oil with his right finger before the Lord seven times:
target: tin, puithiam chuan a kut vei lama hriak thenkhat chu a kut ding lamin LALPA hmaah vawi sarih a theh ang a;

source: Have some fun
target: In tihlim rawh u

source: This is magnificent
target: Hei hi a ropui hle

source: Italy ka ngai
target: I miss Italy

source: They followed Tom
target: Tom chu an zui a

source: You're insulting me.
target: Min hmusit a ni.

source: The sons of Mushi: Mahli and Eder and Jeremoth, three.
target: Musia fate chu Mahlia te, Edera te, Jeremotha te, pathuam an ni.

source: Does Mary hate me?
target: Mari hian min huat em?

source: I didn't hesitate
target: Ka hreh lo

source: There is no peace, says the Lord, for the evil-doers.
target: LALPA chuan, Mi suaksualte tna chuan muanna rêng rêng a awm lo, a ti a.

source: Now it came about after this that death came to Nahash, the king of the children of Ammon, and his son became king in his place.
target: Tin, chung hnua chuan heti hi a ni a, Amona thlahte lal Nahasa chu a thi a, a fapa chu a aiawhin a lal a.

source: For he did not make the angels rulers over the world to come, of which I am writing.
target: Khawvel lo la awm tur a chanchin kan sawia chu vantirhkohte hnuaiah zawng a dah lo.

source: For his chiefs are at Zoan, and his representatives have come to Hanes.
target: A mi liante chu Zoan khuaah an awm a, a palaite chuan Janes khua an thleng ta si a.

source: There is no one like you, O Lord; you are great and your name is great in power.
target: Aw LALPA, nang ang tumah an awm lo ve, I ropui a, i hming chaknain a thang lian e.

source: For he will be like the brushwood in the upland, and will not see when good comes; but his living-place will be in the dry places in the waste land, in a salt and unpeopled land.
target: Thlalêra hnimbuk to ire ang an ni a, thil țha chhuak tûr reng a hmu lo vang. Thlalêr ram ro, chi leilung, tuma luah lohvah chuan a cheng zawk ang.

source: I want to go
target: Ka kal duh

source: For our country is in heaven; from where the Saviour for whom we are waiting will come, even the Lord Jesus Christ:
target: Keini zawng van khua leh tui kan ni si a, van atanga min chhandamtu Lal Isua Krista lo kal tur chu nghakhlel takin ka thlir a ni.

source: To the sons of Gershom were given, out of the family of the half-tribe of Manasseh, Golan in Bashan with its outskirts, and Ashtaroth with its outskirts;
target: Manase hnam zatvete chanpuala mi Gersoma fapate an pêk chu Basan rama Golan a daivêlte nên, Astarotha daivêlte nên a ni,

source: Your head is empty.
target: I lu a ruak a.

source: He is the owner of this land.
target: He ram neitu a ni.

source: But if they have not self-control let them get married; for married life is better than the burning of desire.
target: Insum theihna an neih loh erawh chuan innei rawh se; hur aiin inneih chu a tha zawk si.

source: He is respected by them
target: An zah em em a ni

source: I cheated
target: Ka bum

source: I will give thought to your orders, and have respect for your ways.
target: I thununna thute chu ka ngaihtuah ang a, I kawngte chu ka ngaihsak bawk ang.

source: To his worshippers, he will give their desire; their cry comes to his ears, and he gives them salvation.
target: Amah tihtute duh chu a hlawhtlintir ang a; An au thawm a hria ang a, anni chu a chhandam ang.

source: You're too little
target: I tê tham lûtuk

source: Are you waiting for us?
target: Min lo nghak em?

source: Are you more beautiful than any? go down, and take your rest among those without circumcision,
target: Mawinaah tunge i khûm le? Chhuk la, serhtan lohte zîngah chuan zâl rawh.

source: And the Lord had given the people grace in the eyes of the Egyptians so that they gave them whatever was requested. So they took away all their goods from the Egyptians.
target: tin, LALPA chuan mite chu Aigupta mite a khawngaihtîr a, chutichuan an dil apiang an neihtîr zêl a. Tin, Aigupta mite thil chu an rawksak ta a.

source: O Ephraim, what am I to do to you? O Judah, what am I to do to you? For your love is like a morning cloud, and like the dew which goes early away.
target: Aw Ephraim, engtin nge ka tih ang che? Aw Juda engtin nge ka tih ang che? Min hmangaihna chu zîng țiauchhûm leh dai ral ta thuai țhin ang hi a ni si a.

source: I always feel tense.
target: Ka tense fo thin.

source: So he kept them safe from the children of Israel, and did not let them be put to death.
target: Chutichuan an chungah chutiang chuan a ti ta a, Israela thlahte lak ata chu a chhanchhuak a, anmahni chu an that ta lo va.

source: I accused him of cheating
target: Bumtuah ka puh a

source: And death will be desired more than life by the rest of this evil family who are still living in all the places where I have sent them away, says the Lord of armies.
target: He mi chhûngkaw sual tak la awm chhun zawg zawng, ka hnawh darhna hmuna la chambangte chuan nun aiin thih an thlang zawk ang, tih hi sipaihote LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: But in the fifth year you may take the fruit and the increase of it for your food: I am the Lord your God.
target: Tin, a kum nga kum chuan in tan a pun zei theih nan a rah chu in ei tur a ni: Kei hi LALPA in Pathian chu ka ni.

source: I didn't mind
target: Ka pawi ti lo

source: She has returned
target: A rawn kîr leh ta

source: Are you reading the Bible
target: Bible i chhiar em

source: And from Bamoth to the valley in the open country of Moab, and to the top of Pisgah looking over Jeshimon.
target: Bamoth ațang chuan Moab lova ruam leh thlaler zuk chhun en Pisga chhipah

source: I won't yell at you.
target: Ka au lovang che.

source: For we will not have our heritage with them on the other side of Jordan and forward; because our heritage has come to us on this side of Jordan to the east.
target: Kan luah tur chu he lam ral Jordan chhak lam a nih avangi Jordan ral lehlam leh a piah lam chu kan luahpi dawn lo nia, an ti a.

source: Take it easy
target: Insum rawh

source: The town is waste and broken down: every house is shut up, so that no man may come in.
target: Buaina khawpui chu tihchimin a awm ta: tumah rêng rêng an luh loh nân in tin, kharin a awm ta.

source: I mean, did he?
target: Ka sawi tum chu, a ni em?

source: Let us then keep the feast, not with old leaven, and not with the leaven of evil thoughts and acts, but with the unleavened bread of true thoughts and right feelings.
target: chuvangin i kut ang u, dawidim hluia kut lovin, nunchhiat leh sualna dawidima kut hek lovin takna leh dikna chhang, dawidim telh lohvin i kut zawk ang u.

source: It's pretty
target: A mawi alawm

source: Sami was ashamed
target: Sami chu a zak a

source: Things will be fine.
target: Thil a tha ang.

source: I despise you
target: Ka deusawh che

source: I feel lousy
target: Ka thak neuh neuh

source: Tom is ill
target: Tom-a a damlo

source: Be on time
target: Tlai ngai suh

source: The children to whom you gave birth in other lands will say in your ears, The place is not wide enough for me: make room for me to have a resting-place.
target: I fa hloh hnua i fa neih lehte chuan, 'Hmun hi ka tan a te lutuk a: ka awmna tûrin hmun mi pe rawh,' tiin i bengah an la sawi ang.

source: The Avvites made Nibhaz and Tartak, and the Sepharvites gave their children to be burned in the fire to Adrammelech and Anammelech, the gods of Sepharvaim.
target: Ava-ho chuan Nihaz leh Tartak an siam a, tin, Sepharvaim-ho chuan Sepharvaim-ho pathian Adramelek leh Anamelek hmingin an fate an hal thin a.

source: My soul is tired of life; I will let my sad thoughts go free in words; my soul will make a bitter outcry.
target: Ka thalin a ning e, ka nun hi, Ka nawmmakin ka phunnawi dawn e: Rilru na êm êm chungin ak tawng dawn hi.

source: And if I by Beelzebub send evil spirits out of men, by whom do your sons send them out? So let them be your judges.
target: Tin, kei Beelzebula avanga ramhuaite hnawt chhuak thin ka lo nih chuan, in faten tu vangin nge an lo hnawh chhuah thin le? Chuvangin, anni chu nangmahni ngaihtuahtu turte an ni ang.

source: So Jehu got into his carriage and went to Jezreel, for Joram was ill in bed there; and Ahaziah, king of Judah, had come down to see Joram.
target: Chutichuan Jehua chu tawlailirah a chuang a, Jezreel khuaah a kal a; Jorama chu chutah chuan a mu a ni a. Tin, Juda lal Ahazia pawh Jorama kan tûrin a zuk kal a.

source: You must eat
target: I ei tur a ni

source: You're blowing it.
target: I puak darh a ni.

source: But is he happy?
target: Mahse, a hlim em?

source: And these are the kings who were ruling in the land of Edom before there was any king over the children of Israel.
target: Hêng hi lal rêng rêngin Israela thlahte chunga ro an rêl hmaa, Edom rama rorêltu lalte chu an ni.

source: I think they like you
target: An duh che ka ring

source: And that there may not be any evil liver, or any man without respect for God, like Esau, who let his birthright go for a plate of food.
target: inngaih hmang emaw, Esauva anga Pathian zah lo mi emaw an lo awm dah ang e. Ani chuan a fa tir nihna chu chaw vawi khat eiah a hralh a.

source: They help us
target: Min ṭanpui

source: Who does it belong to?
target: Tu ta nge a nih?

source: It's a waste.
target: Engmahlo mai a ni.

source: That's Tom
target: Toma a nia

source: But there is a baptism which I have to undergo; and how am I kept back till it is complete!
target: Nimahsela baptisma chan tur ka nei, chu mi tleitlak hma loh chu ka thaw a va ipik em!

source: Your arrows are sharp in the heart of the king's haters; because of them the peoples are falling under you.
target: I thal chu a zum a: Lalber dotute thinlungah chuan a bur reng a: Mi tin, chu i hnuaiah an tlu thin a.

source: We have wine
target: Zu kan nei

source: I'm stable
target: Ka pangai e

source: And for this purpose Christ went into death and came back again, that he might be the Lord of the dead and of the living.
target: Krista thihna leh a lo nun lehna chhan chu mi nung leh mitthi Lalpa a nih theihna hi a ni si.

source: You are a student
target: Zirlai i ni a

source: That, if I did wrong, you would take note of it, and would not make me clear from sin:
target: Lo sual ila, nangin mi chhinchhiah ang a, Ka khawlohna ata mi tichhuak lo vang.

source: And if she herself puts away her husband and takes another, she is false to her husband.
target: ani pawh chuan a pasal a then a, mi dang a neih chuan a uire a ni bawk, a ti a.

source: Wisdom is a fountain of life to him who has it; but the punishment of the foolish is their foolish behaviour.
target: Hriat thiamna hi a neitu tan chuan nuna tuikhur a i a, Mi âte tan erawh chu thununna chu an âtna a ni.

source: And they had the hands of a man under their wings; the four of them had faces on their four sides.
target: Hmai pali leh thla pali bakah chuan mihring kut ang pali an nei țheuh a, an thla hnuaiah zêl a awm a.

source: And Joshua overcame Amalek and his people with the sword.
target: Tin, Josua chuan Amaleka leh a hote chu khândaih hriamin a tudawl ta a.

source: Be my saviour from violent death, O God, the God of my salvation; and my tongue will give praise to your righteousness.
target: Aw Pathian, nang mi chhandamtu Pathian, thisen chhuahnate lakah mi chhanhim ang che.Tichuan ka lei hian i felna thu hi hlim takin hlaah a sa ang.

source: You've been spotted
target: I hmu ta a ni

source: And every offering lifted up of all the holy things which the children of Israel give to the priest, will be his.
target: Tin, Israela thlahte thil thianghlim hen thilhlan zawng zawng, hlansak tura an pêk puithiam hnena an hlan apiang a hlantu puithiamina nei ang.

source: I needed help
target: anpuitu ka mamawh

source: And with a number of such stories he gave them his teaching, as they were able to take it:
target: Tin, chutiang tehkhin thu tam tak chuan an hriat theih tawk tawkin thu chu an hnenah a sawi thin a.

source: It is of no use for you to get up early, and to go late to your rest, with the bread of sorrow for your food; for the Lord gives to his loved ones in sleep.
target: Zing takah in tho va, tlai takah in chawl a, Thawhrimna chaw in ei thin hi, in tan a thlawn mai a ni: Hetiang hian a mi duh tak chu a muthilhtir thin a ni.

source: You're weird
target: I mak êm mai

source: I talked
target: Ka sawi tawh

source: Goodnight, Mother
target: Mangṭha le ka nu

source: And his servants said even more against the Lord God and against his servant Hezekiah.
target: Tin, a mite chuan chu aia nasa chuan LALPA Pathian le a chhiahlawh Hezekia chunghang thu a tha lo lamin an sawi a.

source: Of the sons of Phinehas, Gershom; of the sons of Ithamar, Daniel; of the sons of David, Hattush;
target: Phinehasa thlahte zingah Gersoma; Ithamara thlahte zingah Daniela; Davida thlahte zingah Hatusa;

source: And on her brow was a name, SECRET, BABYLON THE GREAT, THE MOTHER OF THE EVIL WOMEN AND OF THE UNCLEAN THINGS OF THE EARTH.
target: a chalah chuan thuruk, Babulon Khaw Ropui, Leia Nawhchizuarte leh Thil Tenawmte Nu, tia hming ziak a awm a.

source: It is said that
target: An sawi dan chuan

source: I have made haircloth the clothing of my skin, and my horn is rolled in the dust.
target: Ka vun chungah saiip puan ka bel a, Ka ki chu vaivutah ka tal a.

source: And the sons of Gad were living opposite to them, in the land of Bashan as far as Salecah:
target: Tin, Gada fapate chu an ep Basan raman Saleka thlengin an awm a:

source: See, the ark of the agreement of the Lord of all the earth is going over before you into Jordan.
target: Ngai teh u, leilung pumpui Lalpa thuthlung bâwm chuan in hmaah Jordan lui a kan e.

source: To give him a place among the rulers, even with the rulers of his people.
target: Mi liante hnêna a awmtir theihna tûrin, A mite zinga mi liante hnên ngeiah chuan.

source: I will have no fear, though ten thousand have come round me, putting themselves against me.
target: Mi dova, mi hual veltu, Mi singkhat pawh hi ka hlau lo vang.

source: These things seem to have a sort of wisdom in self-ordered worship and making little of oneself, and being cruel to the body, not honouring it by giving it its natural use.
target: Heng vantirhkoh biak tur tih te, taksa ngaihnep tih te, taksa tihhrehawm tih te hi tha fu awm chuan a lang a, mahse tisa chakna hneh turin a tangkai si lo.

source: Because you have in mind the orders we gave you through the Lord Jesus.
target: Lalpa Isua zarah chuan eng thute nge kan pe che u kha in hre si a.

source: You missed
target: I hmaih

source: They were full of pride and did what was disgusting to me: and so I took them away as you have seen.
target: Tin, mi chapo tak an ni a, ka hmâa thil tenawm ti tawh an ni; tichuan țha la tih angin ka ti bo hlawm tawh a ni.

source: Is not your evil-doing great? and there is no end to your sins.
target: I suahsualna a nasa a ni lo maw? I khawlohnain tawp reng a nei hek lo.

source: But Samson's wife was given to the friend who had been his best man.
target: Nimahsela Samsona nupui chu thian atâna a hman, a thiana kha an lo pe ta mai a.

source: And with more such words he gave his witness, offering them salvation and saying, Come out from this evil generation.
target: Tin, thu dang tam takin a hrilhfiah a; Tun lai thangthar bengtla lote lakah hian intihim rawh u, tiin a fuih a.

source: Dan is still missing
target: Dan a la awm lo

source: With you man and woman will be broken; with you the old man and the boy will be broken; with you the young man and the virgin will be broken;
target: Nangmah hmangin hmeichhia leh pa ka tisawm a, Nangmah hmangin putar leh tleirawl ka tisawm a, nangmah hmangin nula leh tlangvâl ka tisawm a;

source: Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: these are the sons which they had after the great flow of waters
target: Tin, hêng hi Nova fapa Sema te, Hama te, Japhetha teho thlahte an ni: tui lêt hnuah chuan fapate an nei hlawm a.

source: Not one of the Anakim was to be seen in the land of the children of Israel: only in Gaza, in Gath, and in Ashdod, some were still living.
target: Israela thlahte ramah chuan Anakim-ho chu pakhatmah awm an awm tawh lo: Gaza khuaah te, Gath khuaah te, Asdod khuaah te erawh chuan awm chu an la awm.

source: Let's review
target: Ennâwn ang

source: Through you will we overcome our haters; by your name will they be crushed under our feet who are violent against us.
target: Nangmah avângin min dotute chu kan si thlu ang a; I hming avângin min beitute chu kan chil nek ang.

source: King Solomon made himself a bed of the wood of Lebanon.
target: Lal Solomonan zawn bâwm a tan a insiam, Lebanon tlâng thin hmanrua ngeiin;

source: They don't eat meat.
target: Sa an ei ngai lo.

source: Heat it up
target: Tisa rawh

source: I'm smart.
target: Ka nalh.

source: I will get my knowledge from far, and I will give righteousness to my Maker.
target: Ka hriatna ka han fawm khâwm vâk teh ang, Mi siamtu chu felna ka bel dawn a ni.

source: We are certain that God gave his word to Moses: but as for this man, we have no knowledge where he comes from.
target: Pathianin Mosia a bia tih kan hria, he mi teh chai hi khawia lo chhuak nge a nih kan hre hrep lo ve, an ti a.

source: Is anyone looking
target: Tu emaw a en em

source: They're too difficult
target: An harsa lutuk

source: I eat here
target: Hetah ka ei

source: And that he underwent death for all, so that the living might no longer be living to themselves, but to him who underwent death for them and came back from the dead.
target: tin, a nungte chu anmahni tan an nun tawh loh va, an thih aia thia tholeha tan chuan an nun tawh zawkna turin a ni, mi zawng zawng thih aiin a thih ni.

source: And the woman said, We may take of the fruit of the trees in the garden:
target: Tin, hmeichhia chuan rûl hnênah chuan, Ti lo ve, huana thing rahte hi kan ei thei asin:

source: But they saw him when he was a long way off, and before he came near them they made a secret design against him to put him to death;
target: Tin, anni chuan hla tak atangin an lo hmu a, tichuan an kiang hnai a thlen hmain, amah thah thu an phiar ta a.

source: He succeeded
target: Khapa a hlawhtling ta

source: You do not have a fever.
target: Khawsik i nei lo.

source: I haven't yet finished eating.
target: Chaw ka la zo lo.

source: But you will come to death like men, falling like one of the rulers of the earth.
target: Nimahsela mihringte ang maiin in la thi ang a, Mi lian paikhat ang khan in la tlu ang.

source: So Absalom's servants did to Amnon as Absalom had given them orders. Then all the king's sons got up, and every man got on his beast and went in flight.
target: Chutichuan Absaloma chhiahhlawhte chuan Amnona chungah Absaloma thupêk ang chuan a ti a. Chutichuan lal fapate zawng zawng chu an tho va, an sabengtung chungah an chuang theu va, an tlan bo ta a.

source: Are you a student
target: Zirlai i ni em

source: For you are not a God who takes pleasure in wrongdoing; there is no evil with you.
target: Suahsualnaa lawm thin Pathian i ni si lo va: Mi sual chu i hnênah an thleng lo vang.

source: If then you take me to be your friend and brother, take him in as myself.
target: Chutichuan, thiana mi ngaih chuan keimah angin amah hi lo lawm ang che.

source: Put far from me all false and foolish things: do not give me great wealth or let me be in need, but give me only enough food:
target: Thil lawi lo leh dawtte chu mi tihsawnsak daih ang che. Pachhiatna emaw, neihnunna emaw mi pe hek suh. Ka tana mamawh chawin min chawm rawh;

source: He stole the money
target: Pawisa chu a ru a

source: So her young men will be falling in her streets, and all the men of war will be cut off in that day, says the Lord of armies.
target: Tichuan chumi niah chuan a tlangvâl rualte chu kawtlaiah an tlu ang a, A raltu mi zawng zawng an boral ang, Tih hi Sipaihote LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: The hater of work will not do his ploughing because of the winter; so at the time of grain-cutting he will be requesting food and will get nothing.
target: Mi dawngdah chuan thlasik avângin lei a let peih lo va; Chuvang chuan buh seng laiin kut a dawh ang a, engmah a nei lo vang.

source: They make themselves strong in an evil purpose; they make holes for secret nets; they say, Who will see it,
target: Thil sual ti-ah chuan an infuih a; Thang aruka kam thu-ahte an inbe thin a; Tuin nge chung chu hmu ang? an ti a.

source: I haven't finished speaking yet.
target: Ka la sawi zo lo.

source: Don't you get tired of it?
target: I chau lo em ni?

source: But if you are given to fighting with one another, take care that you are not the cause of destruction one to another.
target: Nimahsela, in inseh a, in inei tawn si chuan in intihboral tawn loh nan fimkhur rawh u.

source: As long as I am in the world, I am the light of the world.
target: Khawvela ka awm chhungin khawvel entu ka ni, a ti a, a chhang a.

source: So then you are no longer as those who have no part or place in the kingdom of God, but you are numbered among the saints, and of the family of God,
target: Chutichuan, tunah mikhual leh mi chm mai in ni tawh lo va, mi thianghlimte nen chuan tualkhat leh Pathian chhungte in ni ta zawk a ni;

source: That was too late
target: Chu chu a tlai lutuk

source: Then Jesus said to the Jews who had faith in him, If you keep my word, then you are truly my disciples;
target: Chutichuan Isuan a ringtu Judate hnenah chuan, Ka thua in awm reng chuan ka zirtirte in ni tak tak ang.

source: Let them give glory to the name of the Lord: for his name only is to be praised: his kingdom is over the earth and the heaven.
target: Chungho chuan LALPA hming chu fak rawh se; A hming chauh chu chawisanin a awm si a: A ropuina chuan lei leh van a khum daih a.

source: I classy hle mai.
target: You're a very classy guy.

source: I felt it.
target: Ka hre thei.

source: And he got out, and saw a great mass of people, and he had pity on them, because they were like sheep without a keeper: and he gave them teaching about a number of things.
target: Tichuan ani chu vukama a chhuah chuan mipui tam tak a hmu a, vengtu nei lo beramte ang an nih avangin a khawngaih ta em em a, thu tam tak a zirtir ta a.

source: Don't make eye contact.
target: Mit inhmu suh.

source: We are happy
target: Kan va lâwm êm

source: And when Saul sent men to take David, she said, He is ill.
target: Tin, Davida hruai tûra Saulan mi a rawn tirh chuan, A dam lo, a lo ti a.

source: No foot of man will go through it and no foot of beast, and it will be unpeopled for forty years.
target: Mihring kêin a chîl ngai lo vang a, sate pawh an kal ngai hek lo vang; kum sâwmli chhûng pawhin luahin a awm hek lo vang.

source: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Cephas, and was there with him fifteen days.
target: Tin, kum thum a vei hnuin Kipha kan turin Jerusalem khuaah kan han kal a, a hnenah ni sawm leh ni nga ka cham a,

source: I fired first
target: Ka kap hmasa

source: And they say, Jah will not see it, the God of Jacob will not give thought to it.
target: LALPAN a hmu lo vang a, Jakob-ho Pathianin a ngaihtuah hek lo vang, an ti thin a ni.

source: Are you cheating on me?
target: Min bum em ni?

source: He is the king of the night.
target: Zan lal a ni.

source: I waved
target: Ka vai

source: They were covered by the deep waters: like a stone they went down under the waves.
target: Tui thûk takin a chîm zo ta: Lung angin tui thûk takah an pil ta.

source: If I had need of food, I would not give you word of it; for the earth is mine and all its wealth.
target: Riltam mah ila ka hrilh lo vang che: Leilung leh a chhûnga thil awm zawng zawng hi kqa ta a ni si a.

source: I'm here
target: Hetah ka awm

source: So long
target: A rei lûtuk

source: What can that do
target: Chu chuan eng nge a tih theih

source: But of which of the angels has he said at any time, Take your seat at my right hand till I put all those who are against you under your feet?
target: Nimahsela, vantirhkohte zingah tu chungchang thu-ah nge hei hi a sawi ngai ni? I hmelmate i kephah nghahchhana Ka siam hma loh zawng Ka ding lamah thu rawh, Tih hi.

source: Things aren't easy
target: Thil a awlsam lo

source: Hezekiah became king when he was twenty-five years old; and he was king in Jerusalem for twenty-nine years; and his mother's name was Abijah, the daughter of Zechariah.
target: Hezekia chu kum sâwmhnih leh kum nga mi a niin a lal tan a; Jerusalem-ah kum sâwmhnih leh kum kua a lal a: a n hming chu Abijai, Zekaria fanu a ni a.

source: It's the voice of an old woman.
target: Pitar aw a ni.

source: I have an old car.
target: Car hlui ka nei a.

source: There are survivors
target: Damchhuak an awm

source: You won everything!
target: Engkim i hneh vek!

source: Now is this world to be judged: now will the ruler of this world be sent out.
target: Tunah he khawvel hi ngaihtuah lai a ni; tunah he khawvel lal hi paih chhuah a ni ang.

source: He was playing the piano
target: Piano a tum a

source: I have a rash
target: Bawl ka nei

source: I can't help that.
target: Chu chu ka ti thei lo.

source: You're pushing me
target: Min nawr a ni

source: If he made his spirit come back to him, taking his breath into himself again,
target: Ama thlarau chu ahnea a lak kir a, Ama thaw chu a hnêna a lak khâwm leh chuan,

source: SL Yes it is
target: SL Ni e a ni

source: The waters of Nimrim will become dry: for the grass is burned up, the young grass is coming to an end, every green thing is dead.
target: Nimrim tuite chu tihchhiatin a awm dawn si a: hlobet chu a vuai zo va, hlobet chawrno chu a rawp a, thil hring rêng rêng ch a awm ta si lo.

source: You're too generous
target: I thil phal lûtuk

source: They're very clever
target: An fing hle mai

source: He was put up for adoption.
target: Fa atan dah a ni.

source: And gave them the lands of the nations; and they took the work of the peoples for a heritage;
target: Tin, hnam tin ramte chu a pêksak a; Anni chuan mi tin, thawh chhuak sa chu an luah ta a;

source: Look here
target: Hetah en rawh

source: They are not in trouble as others are; they have no part in the unhappy fate of men.
target: Mi dang anga hreawmin an awm lo va; Mi dang anga sawisakin an awm hek lo.

source: We're free!
target: Kan hman lutuk!

source: Yes, you may take it.
target: Aw, i la thei e.

source: Jump over it
target: Rawn zuangkai rawh

source: I don't negotiate
target: Inremna ka nei lo

source: We'll pay you for it.
target: Kan pe ang che.

source: I looked
target: Ka en tawh

source: And said to them, These are the words of the Lord, the God of Israel, to whom you sent me to put your request before him:
target: an hnênah, LALPA in Pathian, a hmaa in dilna thlen tûra in mi tirhna khan heti hian a ti e;

source: That's not what that was.
target: Chu chu a ni lo.

source: If not, give attention to me, and keep quiet, and I will give you wisdom.
target: Chuti a nih loh chuan, mi ngaithla rawh, Lo ngawi la, finna ka zirtir ang che.

source: We don't hate them anymore.
target: Kan huat tawh lo.

source: Further, I gave my oath to them in the waste land that I would send them wandering among the nations, driving them out among the countries;
target: Chu lo pawh chu, hnamte zingah anmahni ka tidarh ang a, ram tinah ka tițaițam ang, thlalêrah khan kut phar meuhvin ka lo ti a.

source: For the Father has love for the Son and lets him see everything which he does: and he will let him see greater works than these so that you may be full of wonder.
target: Pain Fapa a hmangaih a, a thiltih apiang a hnenah a entir thin; heng aia thiltih ropui zawk hi a hnenah a la entir ang, mak in tih atan.

source: Now it is hard for anyone to give his life even for an upright man, though it might be that for a good man someone would give his life.
target: Mi fel aia thih miin a duh awm lo hle si a, mi tha ai erawh chuan mi tu emaw tal chuan thih a ngam mial mahna.

source: And between the way up to the angle and the sheep door, the gold-workers and the traders made good the wall.
target: Tin, a kil pan chhohan leh a berâm Kawngka inkar chu rangkachak chhertuleh sumdawnghoten an siam tha a.

source: But he who has hate for his brother is in the dark, walking in the dark with no knowledge of where he is going, unable to see because of the dark.
target: Mahni unau hawtu erawh chu thimah a awm a, thimah a vak bawk a ni; thimin a mit a tihdel tawh avangin a kalna pawh a hre thin lo.

source: For the band of the evil-doers gives no fruit, and the tents of those who give wrong decisions for reward are burned with fire.
target: Pathian ngaihsak lo pawlte chu an cha der ang a, Thamna puan inte chu meiin a kang ral ang.

source: He refuses formula.
target: Formula a duh lo.

source: Would you like to sit down?
target: I ṭhu duh em?

source: Are they tall?
target: An sang hlawm em?

source: Those whose resting-place was there, even the poor, were comforted by your good things, O God.
target: I hote chuan chutah chuan awmhmun an khuar a: Aw Pathian, nang chuan i thatnain retheite tan i buatsaih a.

source: If any man is my servant, let him come after me; and where I am, there will my servant be. If any man becomes my servant, my Father will give him honour.
target: Tupawhin ka rawng a bawl chuan mi zui rawh se; ka awmnaah ka rawngbawltu pawh a awm ang: tupawhin ka rawng a bawl chuan ani chu Pain a chawimawi ang.

source: The king made them of liquid metal in the lowland of Jordan, in the soft earth between Succoth and Zeredah.
target: Chungte hu Jordan phai zawla Sukoth le Zereda belei hmuna lal chuan a chhûng a.

source: When Annas and Caiaphas were high priests, the word of the Lord came to John, the son of Zacharias, in the waste land.
target: Ana leh Kaiapha chu Puithiam Lalberte an ni a. thlalerah Zakaria fapa Johana hnenah chuan Pathian thu a lo thleng a.

source: Don't ever come back.
target: Lo haw ngai suh.

source: And the peace of God, which is deeper than all knowledge, will keep your hearts and minds in Christ Jesus.
target: Tichuan, Pathian thlamuanna, rilru reng renga hriat sen loh khan, in thinlung leh in ngaihtuahnate chu Krista Isuaah chuan a vensak ang che u.

source: They saw you
target: An hmu che

source: But the boat was now in the middle of the sea, and was troubled by the waves: for the wind was against them.
target: Lawng erawh chu dil lai takah a awm tawh a; thliin a ni lozawngin a nem avangin tuifawnin a vawrh a vawrh ta a.

source: A store of wealth will be in his house, and his righteousness will be for ever.
target: A inah chuan sum leh hausakna a wm a; A felna chu kumkhuaa awm tûr a ni.

source: And Saul made an attack on the Amalekites from Havilah on the road to Shur, which is before Egypt.
target: Chutichuan Saula chuan Amalek mite chu Havila atanga Aigupta ram dep Sur thlengin a bei a.

source: They questioned him
target: An zawtfiah a

source: And the voice of one talking to me came to my ears from inside the house; and the man was by my side.
target: Tin, mi pakhat ka kianga a din laiin mi tuin emaw mi bia in ka hria a,

source: Their sayings will be full of the memory of all your mercy, and they will make songs of your righteousness.
target: I thatna ropui tak an hriat reng chu an sawi ang a, I felna thu hi hlim takin hlaah an sa ang.

source: Who was put to death for us, so that, awake or sleeping, we may have a part in his life.
target: kan men pawhin kan muthilh pawhin amah nena kan nun tlan theih nan ani chu kan thih aiin a thi a ni.

source: As for those who come round me, let their heads be covered by the evil of their lips.
target: Mi hual veltute lu chu, Anmahni hmuia an thu sual sawi chuan khuh rawh se.

source: This will be good
target: Hei hi a tha ang

source: Is that a no?
target: Aih i tihna em ni?

source: And Og, king of Bashan: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:
target: Oga, Basan ram lalte thata: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: The great beasts have not gone over it, and the cruel lion has not taken that way.
target: Ramsa ngeng ngalhte pawhin an rap ngai lo va, Tah chuan sakeibaknei kawlh a kal ngai hek lo.

source: There is nothing better for a man than taking meat and drink, and having delight in his work. This again I saw was from the hand of God.
target: Mihring tan chuan ei leh inte leh a thawrimnaa a rilru tihnawm aliama tha a lo awm lo. Hei pawh hi Pathian kuta mi â ni tih ka lo hre ta.

source: Be ka duh
target: I like beans

source: And further, in those days the chiefs of Judah sent a number of letters to Tobiah, and his letters came to them.
target: Chu lo rengah pawh, chung lai chuan Juda mi thate chuan Tobia chu lehkha tam tak an thawn thin a, tin, Tobia lehkha pawh an hmu bawk thin a.

source: So let him who seems to himself to be safe go in fear of a fall.
target: Chuvangin, dinga inring chu fimkhur rawh se, chutilochuan a tlu dah ang e.

source: Give praise to him, you sun and moon: give praise to him, all you stars of light.
target: Ni leh thlate u, amah chu fak ula: Arsi engho zawng zawngte u, amah chu fak rawh u.

source: He took them out of the dark and the black night, and all their chains were broken.
target: Thim hnuai ata leh thihna hli ata chu a hruai chhuak a, An phuarnate chu a tichat ta a.

source: It will be fixed for ever like the moon; and the witness in heaven is true. (Selah.
target: Thla angin kumkhua aan tihnghehin a awm ang a, Van duma hretu rinawm ang khian, i ti a. Selah

source: Take of it, all of you, for this is my blood of the testament, which is given for men for the forgiveness of sins.
target: hei hi ka thisen, sualte ngaihdam nana mi tam tak tana chhuak tur, thuthlunna chu a ni.

source: I stood back
target: Ka hnung tawlh

source: The wind has fallen
target: Thli a tla tawh a

source: They were not able to see one another, and no one got up from his place for three days: but where the children of Israel were living it was light.
target: tumah rêng rêng an inhmu thei ta lo va, tumah mahni hmun ata ni thum chhûng zet chu an tawlhsawn thei lo bawk a: Israela thlahte zawng zawng awmna erawh chu a êng vek a.

source: And he said that they were to take nothing for their journey, but a stick only; no bread, no bag, no money in their pockets;
target: Tin, an zinna atan tiang chauh lo chu engmah – chhang pawh, ipte pawh, an kawnghrena tangka pawh – ken loh tur a ti tlat a;

source: Be kind to others.
target: Mi dangte chungah ngilnei rawh.

source: Don't do it again.
target: Ti leh tawh suh.

source: Don't read the comments
target: Comment chhiar suh

source: Because by grace you have salvation through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is given by God:
target: Rinna avanga khawngaihnaa chhandam in ni; nangmahni thawh chhuah a ni lo va, Pathian thilpek a ni;

source: But when her masters saw that their hope of profit was gone, they took Paul and Silas, pulling them into the market-place before the rulers;
target: Tin, a pute chuan an sum hmuhna a bo tih an hriatin, Paula leh Sila chu an man a, hotute hmaah dawr hmunah an hnuk lut a.

source: He blackmailed me.
target: Min blackmail a.

source: Don't get angry, Tom.
target: Thinrim suh, Tom.

source: There is no help for your wound, there is nothing to make you well.
target: Țanpui tûr che an awm lo va, I damna tûr chu damdawi a awm hek lo.

source: Because he had fear and was turned away from all the wrong which he had done, life will certainly be his, death will not be his fate.
target: A in ngaihtuaha, a bawhchhiatna a lo tih tawh zawng zawng chu a hawisan avângin a nung ngei ang, a thi lo vang.

source: Now the Amalekites and the Canaanites are in the valley; tomorrow, turning round, go into the waste land by the way to the Red Sea.
target: Khai le, Amalek-ho leh Kanaan ho chu ruamah chuan an awm a: naktukah let ula, Tuifinriat Sen kawng lam thlalerah lut rawh rawh u, a ti.

source: I'm cheating on you.
target: Ka bum che a ni.

source: Did you choose yet?
target: I la thlang em?

source: Sami is already high
target: Sami a sang tawh

source: You are my sunshine.
target: Ka ni êng i ni.

source: And those who had food were about five thousand men, in addition to women and children.
target: A eitute chu, hmeichhia leh naupang tiam lovin, patling hlir pawh sangnga lai an ni a.

source: Am I on that list?
target: Chu list-ah chuan ka tel em?

source: O Lord, give not the wrongdoer his desire; give him no help in his evil designs, or he may be uplifted in pride. (Selah.
target: Aw LALPA, mi suaksual duhzawngte chu phal suh la; An ngaihtuahna sual chu puitlintir suh ang che; chutilochuan an inchawimawi dah ang e, ka ti a. Selah

source: And he said, O Lord God, how may I be certain that it will be mine?
target: Tin, ani chuan, Aw Lalpa PATHIAN, ka luah ang tih engtin nge ka hriat ang? a ti a.

source: I got to my feet.
target: Ka keah ka ding a.

source: And Abraham came from his dead and said to the children of Heth,
target: Tin, mitthi ruang hma ata chu a tho va, Hetha thlahte hnênah chuan,

source: They arrested him
target: An man ta a

source: You're not going to win.
target: I chak dawn lo.

source: In which I put up with the hardest conditions, even prison chains, like one who has done a crime; but the word of God is not in chains.
target: chu Chanchin Tha avang chuan thil tisualtu angin phuar khawp hialin hrehawmte ka tuar thin a ni; nimahsela Pathian thu chu phuarin a awm si lo.
Kum 19 ka ni.

source: I didn't cut it off.
target: Ka cut chhuak lo.

source: Try to sleep
target: Mut tum rawh

source: We lost sight of each other.
target: Kan inhmeh lo.

source: Take Tom.
target: Tom-a la rawh.

source: I travel frequently.
target: Ka zin fo thin.

source: I said leave it alone.
target: Ka ti a.

source: There's a rumor going around.
target: Thuthang a awm a.

source: Don't be embarrassed
target: Mualpho suh

source: And on its pillar, four cups like almond flowers, every one with its bud and its flower;
target: Tin, khawnvar dahna ngulah chuan no pali, vai umkhal kuhmum anga siam a parfung leh a parte a awm a,

source: For the Writings say, It is not right to keep the ox from taking the grain when he is crushing it. And, The worker has a right to his reward.
target: Pathian Lehkha Thu chuan, Sebawngpain buh a chil laiin a hmui phuar suh ang che, a ti a. Hnathawktu chu a hlawh hmu tlak a ni, a ti bawk a.

source: So the keeper regularly took away their meat and the wine which was to have been their drink, and gave them grain.
target: Tichuan, enkawltu chuan an eitûr leh an uain intûr chu a la bo va, thlai a pe ta zâwk a.

source: We did win
target: Kan chak bawk

source: In the first month, on the fourteenth day of the month, you are to have the Passover, a feast of seven days; unleavened bread is to be your food.
target: Thla khatna, chumi thla ni sâwm leh ni li niah chuan kalhlen kut in serh ang; tin, ni sarih chung chu chhâng dawidim telh loh in ei ang.

source: And sending on before him all his cattle and his property which he had got together in Paddan-aram, he made ready to go to Isaac his father in the land of Canaan.
target: tin, Kanaan rama a pa Isaaka hnêna kal tûrin a ran zawng zawng leh a sum khâwl khâwm zawng zawng, a ran hmuhte, Paddan-aram rama a khâwl khâwmte chu a kalpui ta vek a.

source: And you made answer and said to me, It is good for us to do as you say.
target: Tin, nangin, 'I thil sawi chu kan tan atha hle mai,' tiin mi chhâng a.

source: And the number of persons was sixteen thousand, of which the Lord's part was thirty-two persons.
target: Tin, mihring chu 16,000 an ni a; chu mia LALPA chhiah chu mi 32 an ni.

source: There have been no setbacks.
target: Setback a awm lo.

source: And he went on from there to Naioth in Ramah: and the spirit of God came on him, and he went on, acting like a prophet, till he came to Naioth in Ramah.
target: Chutichuan rama khua aNaioth-ah a kal a; tin, Pathian thlarau a chungah chuan a lo thleng ve ta a, a kal zel a, Rmaa khuaa Naioth a thlen thlengin thu a sawi bual bual zel a.

source: We waited.
target: Kan nghak tawh.

source: You drive
target: Nangman khalh rawh

source: You're lying!
target: Dâwt i sawi!

source: They looked at each other
target: An in en a

source: For they are my servants whom I took out from the land of Egypt; they may not become the property of another.
target: Aigupta ram ata ka hruai chhuah, ka chhiahhlawhte an ni si a, bawih hralh a hralh tur a ni lo.

source: And the servant who had knowledge of his lord's desires and was not ready for him and did not do as he was ordered, will be given a great number of blows;
target: Bawih, a pu duhzawng hre reng chunga lo inring si lo va, a pu duhzawng ang pawha ti lo chu vawi tam tak an vua ang.

source: Go get a drink of water.
target: Tui in la rawh u.

source: Then the beasts go into their holes, and take their rest.
target: Tichuan, ramsaten bik bona an pan a, An bu zawlah an awm reng a.

source: And they say, How will the Lord see this? is there knowledge in the Most High?
target: Pathianin engtin nge a hriat ang? Chungnungberan a hre chhuak ang êm ni? an ti a.

source: Peter says to him, Even if I am put to death with you, I will not be false to you. So said all the disciples.
target: Peteran a hnenah, I thihnaah chuan thi ve dawn mah ila ka phat tawp lo vang, a ti a. Chutiang bawkin zirtirte zawng zawng chuan an ti ta theuh va.

source: I called them
target: Anmahni ka bia

source: But the Lord made Pharaoh's heart hard, and he would not let them go.
target: Nimahsela LALPAN Pharaoa thinlung chu a tihkhauhsak a, tichuan a chhuahtîr phal ta lo va.

source: I will understand
target: Ka hrethiam ang

source: Leaves are falling
target: A hnah a tla a

source: He drives to work.
target: Hnathawh tur chuan a khalh a.

source: Call an ambulance!
target: Ambulance ko rawh!

source: You left the iron on.
target: Thir chu i dah a.

source: It's quite strong
target: A chak khawp mai

source: They're weak
target: An chau

source: And Adoram was overseer of the forced work; and Jehoshaphat, the son of Ahilud, was the recorder;
target: tin, Adorama chu hnathawka rawih luihte hotu a ni a; tin, Ahiluda fapa Jehosaphata chu chanchin ziaktu a ni a;

source: But their bows were broken by a strong one, and the cords of their arms were cut by the Strength of Jacob, by the name of the Stone of Israel:
target: Nimahsela ani thalngul chu khuah takin a awm reng a, A kut thate chu Jakoba Mi Chaka kuta- Chuta tang chuan Berâm vêngtu, Israela lungpui chu a lo awm a;

source: Let's go to eat together.
target: Chaw ei dun ila.

source: And I saw the seven angels who had their place before God; and seven horns were given to them.
target: Tin, Pathian hmaa vantirhkoh pasarih ding thinte chu ka hmu a; tin, an hnenah tawtawrawt pasarih an pe a.

source: I took no note of the time.
target: Hun chu ka hre lo.

source: There is a generation who seem to themselves to be free from sin, but are not washed from their unclean ways.
