target: Mahni ngaiha thianghlim inti chhuan an awm a; Nimahsela an bawlhhlawhna tlen fai an ni si lo.

source: And the sons of Beriah: Heber and Malchiel, who was the father of Birzaith.
target: Tin, Jophleta fapate chu Pasaka te, Bimhala te, Asvatha te an ni. Chungte chu Japhleta thlahte an ni.

source: I think you're good enough.
target: I tha tawk ka ti.

source: Give ear to the argument of my mouth, and take note of the words of my lips.
target: Ka ngaihtuah dan ngaithla ula, ka dilna kam chhuak bengkhawn rawh u.

source: So the Philistines were overcome, and did not come into the country of Israel again: and all the days of Samuel the hand of the Lord was against the Philistines.
target: Chutihuan Philistia mite chu an tlâwm ta a, Israelte ramah chuan an kal leh ta lo va; tin, LALPA kut chan Philistia mite chu Samuela dam chhûng zawng chuan a tai ta reng a,

source: I will take away your troubles, lifting up your shame from off you.
target: Nangmaha mi, inkhâwmpuia tel pha lova lungngaite chu ka hruaikhâwm ang a, nangmah avânga sawichhiatna phurrit phur tute chu.

source: Open up
target: Hawng rawh

source: The meal offering and the drink offering have been cut off from the house of the Lord; the priests, the Lord's servants, are sorrowing.
target: Chhangphut hlan te, in tûr hlante chu LALPA in ata tihbo a ni a; puithiam LALPA rawngbâwltute chu an lungngai a.

source: But it is not possible for you to see my face, for no man may see me and still go on living.
target: Tin, ani chuan, Ka hmel zawng i hmu thei lo vang: mi hmua nung reng thei tumah reng reng an awm si lo va, a ti a.

source: Help me find them
target: Anmahni zawng chhuak turin min pui ang che

source: And God gave him help against the Philistines, and against the Arabians living in Gur-baal, and against the Meunim.
target: Tin, Pathian Philistia hote lakah leh Gur-baal-a awm Arabia-ho leh Meun-ho lakahte a tanpui a.

source: I loved you.
target: Ka hmangaih che.

source: And Saul went in fear of David, because the Lord was with David and had gone away from Saul.
target: Tin, a hnênah LALPA a wm avâng leh Saula chu a kalsan avangin Saula chuan Davida chu a hlau va.

source: And Kibzaim and Beth-horon with their grass-lands, four towns.
target: Kibzaim khua a daivelte nen, Beth-horon khua a daivelte nen;khawpui pali an pe a.

source: And when they went out, they made a request that these words might be said to them again on the Sabbath after.
target: Tin, an chhuahin Chawlhni lehah chung thu chu sawi leh atan an ngen a.

source: How arrogant!
target: A va sual tak!

source: And a great number had come together, so that there was no longer room for them, no, not even about the door: and he gave them teaching.
target: Tichuan kawngka bulah pawh awmna reng awm lo khawp hialin mi tam tak an lo awm khawm ta a; tin, an hnenah thu a hril ta a.

source: We're on vacation.
target: Chawlh kan nei a.

source: He is a bank clerk
target: Bank clerk a ni a

source: Look at me
target: Mi en rawh

source: In whom we have our salvation, the forgiveness of sins:
target: amahah chuan kan tlanna kan hmu a ni – kan sualte ngaihdamna chu.

source: We can look into it.
target: Kan en thei ang.

source: Have you already talked to him?
target: I biak tawh em?

source: I was strong
target: Ka chak lûtuk

source: I tried the coat on
target: Coat chu ka ha a

source: I am ready
target: Ka inpeih e

source: For these are the days of punishment, in which all the things in the Writings will be put into effect.
target: Chung ni chu phuba lak ni a ni e, thu an ziak zawng zawng a lo thlen theihna turin.

source: And the woman came out to him, in the dress of a loose woman, with a designing heart;
target: Ngai teh, nawhchizuar inthuam leh fin vervek rilru pu hmeichhiain a tawk a.

source: This isn't worth it.
target: Hei hi a hlu lo.

source: Don't hate me
target: Mi haw suh

source: And the same holy drink: for they all took of the water from the holy rock which came after them: and the rock was Christ.
target: an zaa thlarau lam in tur hmunkhat pawh an in theuh kha; anmahni zuitu thlarau lam lungpuia mi kha an in theuh si a; chu lungpui chu Krista a ni.

source: Truly they are all nothing, their works are nothing and of no value: their metal images are of no more use than wind.
target: En teh u, an za hian, an hnathawhte chu engmah lo a ni a, thil awm lo rêng rêng a ni: an milem chhunte chu thli leh boruak chauh a ni.

source: I will give you burned offerings of fat beasts, and the smoke of sheep; I will make offerings of oxen and goats. (Selah.
target: Sa thau tak hâlral thilhlante i hnênah ka hlan ang a, berâmpa hal rimtui nên; bâwngpa te, kelte nên ka hlan ang. Selah

source: For at his word comes up the storm-wind, lifting high the waves.
target: Ani chuan thu a pe a, thlipui a tlehtir a, Chu chuan a tuifawnte ch a tisâng thin.

source: And all the nations making war on Ariel, and all those who are fighting against her and shutting her in with their towers, will be like a dream, like a vision of the night.
target: Tichuan Ariel dotu hnam zawng zawng mipuiho, amah leh a kulhbing beiotute zawng zawng leh amah timangangtu zawng zawngte chu, mumang ang lek an i ang, zana inlârna ang lek hi.

source: His food will be the same as theirs, in addition to what has come to him as the price of his property.
target: An puithiam man tiam lovinmi dang pual ang ei tur chu an chang ve tho vang.

source: Move on
target: Kal rawh le

source: The lion has come out of his secret place, for the land has become a waste because of the cruel sword, and because of the heat of his wrath.
target: A tawmna a chhuahsan ta, sakeibaknei ang maiin. An ram chu a chhe zo ta si a, Hnehchiahna rawng tak avâng Leh a thinrimna nasa tak avângin.

source: We haven't yet been told.
target: Kan la hrilh lo.

source: Because no man does things secretly if he has a desire that men may have knowledge of him. If you do these things, let yourself be seen by all men.
target: Tuman arukin thil engmah an ti lo, mahni hmingthan duh siin. Heng thilte hi i tih tak zet chuan khawvel hnenah inentir rawh, an ti a.

source: So because you are not one thing or the other, I will have no more to do with you.
target: Chutichuan, lum si lova, vawt si lova, i lum chang chang avangin ka ka ata ka chhak chhuak dawn a che.

source: They won't believe you
target: An ring lovang che

source: I'll go.
target: Ka kal dawn.

source: There is a generation whose teeth are like swords, their strong teeth like knives, for the destruction of the poor from the earth, and of those who are in need from among men.
target: An ha chu khandaih ang, an ha hnuai lam chemte ang chhuan an awm a, Leilung ata mi rethei leh mihring zing ata mi renchhamte ei zo tûrin.

source: I asked Mr Smith
target: Mr Smith chu ka zawt a

source: Say to Aaron, When you put the lights in their places, the seven lights will give light in front of the support.
target: Arona bia la a hnenah, 'Khawnvarte i halin khawnvar pasarih chuan sathau khawnvar dahna hma lam a en tur a ni,' ti rawh, tiin.

source: So Joshua did as Moses said to him, and went to war with Amalek: and Moses, Aaron, and Hur went up to the top of the hill.
target: Tichuan Mosian a hnêna a sawi ang chuan Josua chuan a ti a, Amalek-ho chu a va bei ta a: tin, Mosia leh Arona leh Hura chu tlâng chhîpah an han lâwn a.

source: I'm dizzy.
target: Ka lu a hai.

source: He is capable of robbery
target: Rawk thei a ni

source: I am a cat person
target: Cat mi ka ni

source: And the family of Joseph went up against Beth-el, and the Lord was with them.
target: Tin, Josefa chhûnget pawh chu Bethel khaw bei tûrin an thawk ve bawk a: tin, an hnênah LALPA a awm a.

source: I have kept back my feet from all evil ways, so that I might be true to your word.
target: I thu ka zawm theihna tûrin Kawng sualah rêng rêng chuan ka kete hi pen ka phal lo.

source: Their blood has been flowing like water round about Jerusalem; there was no one to put them in their last resting-place.
target: An thisen chu Jerusalem vêlah hian tui angin an leihbua a; Anmahni phûmtu tûr lah tumah an awm si lo.

source: Who are we
target: Tunge ka nih

source: The small and the great are there, and the servant is free from his master.
target: Tah chuan mi lian mi te an awm za a. Chhiahhlawh pawh a pu lakah a fihlim.

source: Stay a while
target: Cham rih la

source: And five for the boards on the other side of the House, and five for the west side of the House at the back.
target: tin, biak bûk kawmchâr khawthlang chhawng lam ban rem khâwm atân pawh panga i siam tur a ni.

source: Appreciate it very much.
target: Ngaihlu rawh u.

source: If I would make clear what it is like, I would say, You are false to the generation of your children.
target: Chutiangin ka sawi ang, lo ti ta ila; Ngai teh, i fateho chhuan chungah vervek taka ti ka lo ni ang.

source: Goodbye, she said.
target: Goodbye, a ti a.

source: And so it was at all times: it was covered by the cloud, and by a light as of fire by night.
target: Chutiang chuan a awm reng a: chhum chuan a tuam reng a, zanah chuan mei angin a lang a.

source: The sons of Bilhah, Rachel's servant: Dan and Naphtali;
target: tin, Rakili bâwihnu Bilhaii fapate chu Dana leh Napthalia an ni a:

source: But it was you who took care of me from the day of my birth: you gave me faith even from my mother's breasts.
target: Nang erawh chu chhul ata mi la chhuaktu chu i ni a: Ka nu hnute chunga ka awm lai khan nangin mi rintir a.

source: I'll get around to it.
target: Ka kal kual ang.

source: And it will be our righteousness if we take care to keep all this order before the Lord our God as he has given it to us.
target: A thu min pêk anga LALPA hmaa a thupêk zawng zawng zawm tura kan fimkhur chuan kan tan damna ani dawn a ni,' in ti tur a ni.

source: The wise will have glory for their heritage, but shame will be the reward of the foolish.
target: Mi fing chuan ropuina an rochung ang a, Mi âte kaisanna erawh chu mualphona a ni ang.

source: And Moses certainly kept faith as a servant, in all his house, and as a witness of those things which were to be said later;
target: Tin, chu mi hnua thu la sawi turte hriattir nan Mosia chu Pathian chhungte zawng zawng zinga rawngbawltuah zawng a rinawm ngei a;

source: Where is Tom?
target: Khawnge Tom?

source: Better believe it.
target: Rin a tha zawk.

source: They took their time
target: An hun an hmang a

source: I admitted defeat.
target: Hnehna ka pawm.

source: Make an offering of praise to God; keep the agreements which you have made with the Most High;
target: Pathian hnênah lawm thu sawi inthawina chu hlan zawk la; I thutiam pawh Chungnungera lakah hlen rawh:

source: For this reason it is right for the woman to have a sign of authority on her head, because of the angels.
target: Chu mi avang chuan vantirhkohte avangin hmeichhiain mipa thuneih chhinchhiahna a khum tur a ni.

source: We had fun
target: Nuam kan ti

source: Our oxen are well weighted down; our cows give birth safely; there is no going out, and there is no cry of sorrow in our open places.
target: Kan bâwngpaten phur thur thur sela, Kan ran rualte rawktu leh hruaibotu awm lovin Kan kawtthlêrahte mangang au thawm awm lo sela.

source: I am sneezing
target: Ka hahchhiau

source: You're joshing me.
target: Min josh a ni.

source: The underworld, and the woman without a child; the earth which never has enough water, and the fire which never says, Enough.
target: Thlan leh chhul ching, Tui khawpkham lo leilung leh A tawk e, ti ngai lo, mei.

source: When he made a law for the rain, and a way for the thunder-flames;
target: Ruahtui tan dan a siam lai khan, Khawpi ri, kawlphe tan kawng a siam lai khan,

source: They'll never know
target: An hre ngai lovang

source: I resigned
target: Ka bang

source: And the sons of the wife of Hodiah, the sister of Naham, were the father of Keilah the Garmite, and Eshtemoa the Maacathite.
target: Tin, Nahama farnu Hodia nupuia fapate chu garm-ho thlahtu Keila pa leh Maakat-ho thlahtu Estemoa an ni.

source: The upright man has food to the full measure of his desire, but there will be no food for the stomach of evil-doers.
target: Mi fel chuan a rilru tihtlai nân a ei thin a, Mi suaksual pum erawh chuan a tlachham ang.

source: It's true!
target: A va dik em!

source: For this reason, because we have been made servants of this new order, through the mercy given to us, we are strong:
target: Chu mi avang chuan khawngaihna kan hmuh ang zela he rawngbawlna hi kan neih avangin kan dawl lo va;

source: I am looking at the map.
target: Map chu ka en a.

source: Sit down now
target: Tunah ṭha rawh

source: They have the rota.
target: Rota an nei a.

source: The sons of Jacob's wife Rachel: Joseph and Benjamin.
target: Tin, Jakoba nupui Rakili fapate chu Josefa leh Benjamina an ni a.

source: Who stayed
target: Tunge la awm

source: I didn't steal the money.
target: Pawisa ka ru lo.

source: And selection was made of them for their special work, all having equal chances, small as well as great, the teacher as the learner.
target: Tin, a lian a te, zirtirtu leh zirtuin an chan tûr angkhat vekin thum an vâwr a.

source: But the effect of the order is love coming from a clean heart, and a knowledge of what is right, and true faith:
target: Thinlung thianghlim leh chhia leh tha hriatna thiang leh rinna dik tak atanga lo chhuak hmangaihna neih theih nan chu chu ti ka ni.

source: But he said, Woman, it is not true; I have no knowledge of him.
target: Ani erawh chuan, Hmeichhia, ani chu ka hre lo ve, tiin a pha a.

source: He moved to Canada
target: Canada ramah a insawn a

source: He is a very bad person.
target: Mi sual tak a ni.

source: But the olive-tree said to them, Am I to give up my wealth of oil, by which men give honour to God, and go waving over the trees?
target: Nimahsela olive thing chuan an hnênah, 'Pathian leh mihring chawimawi phah nana an mi hmanna ber ka hriak hi chhuahsanin thing chungah lehlam lehlaman ka peh ka pheh tehlul ang maw?' a ti a.

source: I play piano
target: Piano ka thiam

source: Step forward
target: Lo penchhuak rawh

source: I myself will give food to my flock, and I will give them rest, says the Lord.
target: Keimah ngeiin ka berâmte chu ka châwm ang a, ka bawhtîr hlê hlê ang, tih hi LALPA PATHIAN thu chhuak a ni.

source: They often see us.
target: Min hmu fo thin.

source: O daughter of Babylon, whose fate is destruction; happy is the man who does to you what you have done to us.
target: Aw Babulon fanu, tihborala awm tûr; Kan chunga i tih anga Thungrul tûr che chu lawm takin a awm ang.

source: In addition to the chiefs of the responsible men put by Solomon to oversee the work, three thousand and three hundred in authority over the workmen.
target: chungte chu tiam lovin Solomona chuan a hna chunga hotu bik, hnathawk vengtu sângthum leh zathum anei bawk a.

source: They go quickly on the face of the waters; their heritage is cursed in the earth; the steps of the crusher of grapes are not turned to their vine-garden.
target: Tui chungah chuan chak taka len an ni a, Leiah hian an chanvo chu ânchhedawng a ni, Grêp huap kawng lam a hawi lo ve.

source: Let your hand be near for my help; for I have given my heart to your orders.
target: I kut chu mi tanpui tûrin inpeihsain awm rawh se: I thununa thute chu ka thlang si a.

source: I love chili
target: Hmarcha ka duh

source: They are very far away
target: An hlat hle mai

source: And their children, who came up in their place, now underwent circumcision by the hands of Joshua, not having had it before: for there had been no circumcision on the journey.
target: Tichuan an thlahte anmahni aia a dinate chu Josuan an serh a tansak a: kawnglakah khan an serh tan a nih loh avangin, serhtan loh an lo ni reng si a.

source: Ask that man.
target: Kha pa kha zâwt rawh.

source: And in all your disgusting and false behaviour you had no memory of your early days, when you were uncovered and without clothing, stretched out in your blood.
target: I tenawmna leh i hurna zawng zawngah chuan i naupan laia saruaka i awm leh i thisen i tâl mai mai lai te kha i hre ta lo va.

source: The Lord has said, This town will certainly be given into the hands of the army of the king of Babylon, and he will take it.
target: LALPA chuan heti hian ati: he khawpui hi Babulon lal sipai rualte kutah pêk a ni ngei ang a, a la ang, tia a sawi chu an ngaithla a.

source: And David says, Let their table be made a net for taking them, and a stone in their way, and a punishment:
target: Tin, Davida chuan, An dawhkan chu an tan thang leh fal leh, Tlukna leh thungrulhna lo ni rawh se;

source: I had help
target: Min pui rawh

source: Take note of the month of Abib and keep the Passover to the Lord your God: for in the month of Abib the Lord your God took you out of Egypt by night.
target: Abib thla chu thla serhah nei ula, LALPA in Pathian tana Kalhlen Kût nan hmang rawh u: Abib thla hian a ni, LALPA in Pathian chuan Aigupta ram ata zanah a hruai chuah che u ni.

source: Give ear, my sons, to the teaching of a father; give attention so that you may have knowledge:
target: Ka fapate u, pa zirtirna chu ngaithla ula, Hriat thiamna chu hre tûrin ngaithla rawh u;

source: I'm wearing gloves.
target: Glove ka bun a.

source: She looked excited
target: A phûr hmel hle

source: You hardly ever smile.
target: I nuih ngai lo.

source: And nearest to him will be the tribe of Issachar, with Nethanel, the son of Zuar, as their chief.
target: Tin, a dawta puan inzartu turte chu Isakar chi an ni tur a ni. Isakara thlahte puipa tur chu Zuara fapa Nethanela a ni ang:

source: My feet have gone in his steps; I have kept in his way, without turning to one side or to the other.
target: Ka ke hian hniakhnung tak a dai zel a, A kawng ka zawh a, ka peng lo ve.

source: And keep my Sabbaths holy; and they will be a sign between me and you so that it may be clear to you that I am the Lord your God.
target: Ka chawlhnite serh ula, kei leh nangni inkara chhinchhiahna a ni ang a, LALPA in Pathian chu ka ni tih in hriat theihna a ni dawn nia, ka ti a.

source: Be friendly
target: Nêlawm rawh

source: Tom dozed.
target: Tom-a a bu.

source: Be troubled, with sorrow and weeping; let your laughing be turned to sorrow and your joy to grief.
target: Hrehawm ula, lungngai ula, tap rawh u; in nuih lungngaihah chang sela, in hlim nguiah chang rawh se.

source: I have come, not to get the upright, but sinners, so that they may be turned from their sins.
target: Mi fel takte lam tura lo kal ka ni lo va, mi sualte lama simtir tura lo kal ka ni zawk, a ti a, a chhang a.

source: Write me
target: Mi ziahsak rawh

source: I chelh em ni?
target: Are you holding her?

source: And give worship to the Lord your God, who will send his blessing on your bread and on your water; and I will take all disease away from among you.
target: Tin, LALPA in Pathian rawng chu in bâwl tûr a ni, tichuan I chhang leh I tui chu mal a sâwm ang a; tin, in zîng ata hri ka tikiang daih dâwn nia.

source: So there was a division among the people because of him.
target: Chutichuan amah avangin mipui chu an inthen a, an inkhing ta a.

source: They're on the floor.
target: Chhuatah an awm a.

source: And when Noah was five hundred years old, he became the father of Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
target: Tin, Nova chu kum 500 mi a ni a: Nova chuan fapa Sema te, Hama te, Japhetha te a nei a.

source: He's a 17-year-old.
target: Kum 17 mi a ni a.

source: And the dead man got up, and words came from his lips. And he gave him to his mother.
target: Tin, mitthi chu a thu chhuak a, a lo tawng ta a. Tin, Isua chuan a nu hnenah a pe ta a.

source: With us are men who are grey-haired and full of years, much older than your father.
target: kan hnênah hian lua kelsam to tawhte leh upa takte, I pa aia upa daihte an awm a ni.

source: Give this out among the nations; make ready for war: get the strong men awake; let all the men of war come near, let them come up.
target: Hei hi hnam zingah puang ula; indona buatsaih ula: mi chakte chawk tho ula; indo mi zawng zawngte lo hnai sela, lo chho rawh se.

source: But the Lord of armies is lifted up as judge, and the Holy God is seen to be holy in righteousness.
target: sipaihote LALPA erawh chu rorêlnaa chawisanin a awm ta zâwk a, Pathian, Mi Thianghlim chu, felnaa tihthianghlimin a awm ta a.

source: You're always careful
target: I fimkhur fo thin

source: Who give up the way of righteousness, to go by dark roads;
target: Chungte chuan kawng thima kal tûrin kawng dik chu an kalsan a;

source: Whatever you like.
target: I duh apiang.

source: Two carts and four oxen he gave to the sons of Gershon for their work;
target: Tawlailir pahnih leh bawngpa pali chu Gersona fapate chu an hna azir zelin a pe a.

source: They widened the road.
target: Kawng an tizau a.

source: Are you tired?
target: I hah em?

source: And I will make this town a thing of wonder and a cause of surprise; everyone who goes by will be overcome with wonder and make sounds of surprise, because of all its troubles.
target: Tin, he khawpui hi mak tihah leh chek khuman ka siam ang a, a kal apiangin a chhiat tawhte avâng chuan mak an tia ng a, an chek khum bawk ang.

source: For no faith may be put in their words; their inner part is nothing but evil; their throat is like an open place for the dead; smooth are the words of their tongues.
target: An kaah chuan rinawmna rêng rêng a awm lo va; An kawchhûng chu suahsualna hlir a ni: An hrawk chu thlan inhawng a ni a; An leiin mi an fak der thin.

source: If men say evil things of you because of the name of Christ, happy are you; for the Spirit of glory and of God is resting on you.
target: Krista hming avanga hau in nih chuan in eng a thawl e; Thlarau ropui tak, Pathian Thlarau chu in chungh a awm si a.

source: We've already eaten
target: Chaw kan ei tawh a

source: I checked it twice
target: Vawi hnih ka check a

source: They can't sleep
target: An muhil thei lo

source: You don't have it.
target: I nei lo.

source: Do not disobey the rules
target: Dan bawhchhia suh

source: And Moses at his death was a hundred and twenty years old: his eye had not become clouded, or his natural force become feeble.
target: Mosia chu a thih chuan kum za leh kum sawmhnih mi a ni; a mit a thim lo va, a tha pawh a țhum chuang lo.

source: There's not much time.
target: Hun a tam lo.

source: Let him take away his rod from me and not send his fear on me:
target: Ka lak ata a tiang la bo sela, A tihbaiawmnain mi tihlau suh se.

source: If the horn is sounded in the town will the people not be full of fear? will evil come on a town if the Lord has not done it?
target: Khawpuiah mi hlauh lovin tawtawrâwt an hâm ang em ni? LALPAN a tirh loh chuan khawpuiah chhiatna a lo awm ang em ni?

source: He's buying apples.
target: Apple a lei a ni.

source: But death is to come to me in this land, I may not go over Jordan: but you will go over and take that good land for your heritage.
target: kei chu he rama thi tur ani a, Jordan lui chu ka kai dawn lo a ni; nangni erawh chu in kai ang a, chu ram țha tak chu in luah ang.

source: They're expensive
target: An man to hle mai

source: She has four of them.
target: Pali a nei a ni.

source: Give the men harder work, and see that they do it; let them not give attention to false words.
target: Mite hi hnathawh hautak lehzual tuk rawh u khai, chûng chu thawk sela; dâwt thu mai maite hi ngaisâng suh se, tiin thu a pe a.

source: The horse is made ready for the day of war, but power to overcome is from the Lord.
target: Sakawr chu indo ni atân buatsaih a ni a, Hnehna erawh chu LALPA ta a ni.

source: Send out the blind people who have eyes, and those who have ears, but they are shut.
target: Mit nei si mitdelte leh, beng nei si bengngawngte chu hruai chhuak rawh u.

source: I love math
target: Chhiarkawp ka ngaina

source: What would you advise
target: Eng nge i fuih ang

source: And the people made their way back to the town quietly and secretly, as those who are shamed go secretly when they go in flight from the war.
target: Tin, mipuite chu indonaa mi an tlan bo an za avânga a ruka an kal bo angin chu mi ni chuan a rukin khawpuiah an lût a.

source: We got a flat tire.
target: Tire kan flat a.

source: I did not call you.
target: Ka ko lo che.

source: If only you would put the sinners to death, O God; go far from me, you men of blood.
target: Aw Pathian, mi suaksualte chu i that ngei ang: Chutichuan, nangni thisen chhuah chak mite u, mi kalsan rawh u.

source: They escaped
target: An tlanchhuak

source: It was preventable
target: Inven theih a ni

source: And their words were pleasing to Hamor and his son Shechem.
target: Tin, an thu chuan Hamora leh Hamora fapa Sekema chu a tilâwm a.

source: As for the man of pride, my soul has no pleasure in him; but the upright man will have life through his good faith.
target: En teh, a chapo mang e, a rilru a va ngîl lo êm! Mifel erawh chu a rinna in a nung ang.

source: You got me
target: Mi hria e

source: She is not at home.
target: Inah a awm lo.

source: Be awake to righteousness and keep yourselves from sin; for some have no knowledge of God: I say this to put you to shame.
target: Fel takin harh ula, thil tisual suh u; thenkhat chuan Pathian hriatna reng in neih loh hi; hei hi in lo zahna turin ka sawi a ni.

source: Are any seats still available?
target: Seat a la awm em?

source: Hey what are you laughing at
target: Hei eng nge i nuih

source: You're a very wise person.
target: Mi fing tak i ni.

source: I don't have long to live
target: Dam rei ka nei lo

source: And Jehozadak went as a prisoner when the Lord took away Judah and Jerusalem by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.
target: tin, LALPAN Judai ram leh Jerusalem khua Nebukdanezzara kuta a pêk lai khan Jehozadaka chu salah a tang ve a.

source: Have you not put the question to the travellers, and do you not take note of their experience?
target: Zin vêl mite in zawt ngai lo vem ni? An sawite chu in pawm lo vem ni?

source: Who are you calling stupid?!
target: Tu nge â i tih?!

source: Those in the farthest parts of the earth have fear when they see your signs: the outgoings of the morning and evening are glad because of you.
target: Kawlkil tawpa awmte pawh chuan i hriattirnate chu an hlau thin a: Zing lehtlai chhuahnate chu hlimin i autir thin.

source: Wake up!
target: Tho rawh!

source: He is under constant surveillance.
target: Enkawl reng a ni.

source: They're always wrong
target: An tisual fo thin

source: And Jeroboam was king for twenty-two years, and was put to rest with his fathers, and Nadab his son became king in his place.
target: Tichuan Jeroboama rorêl chhûng chu kum 22 a ni: tin, a pute hnênah a muhil a, a fapa Nadaba chu a aiawhin a lal ta a.

source: Like an archer wounding all who go by, is a foolish man overcome by drink.
target: Mi â leh mi veivak ruai thin chu Thal kah thiam mi hliam thintu ang hi a ni.

source: We're not waiting for the bus.
target: Bus kan nghak lo.

source: Even the dark is not dark to you; the night is as bright as the day: for dark and light are the same to you.
target: Thim pawhin i lakah chuan engmah a hliah lo va, Zan hi chhun angin a eng zawk a ni: I tan chuan thim leh eng hi thuhmun reng a ni.

source: I didn't call an ambulance
target: Ambulance ka ko lo

source: Jehoahaz was twenty-three years old when he became king; he was ruling in Jerusalem for three months.
target: Joahaza chu a lal tantirhin kum sâwmhnih leh kum thum a ni a, Jerusalem-ah thla thum a lal a.

source: Here's a fun fact.
target: Hetah hian thudik hlimawm tak a awm.

source: We've got something
target: Thil kan nei a

source: See, it is the bed of Solomon; sixty men of war are about it, of the army of Israel,
target: Ngai rawh, Solomona zawnna tawlai chu, Râlhrât sawmrukin an din hual e, Israel râlhrât zinga mite chuan.

source: The deceit of Ephraim and the false words of Israel are about me on every side. ...
target: Ephraim chuan dâwt thuin mi hual a, Israel chhûngte chuan bumnain: Juda pawhin Pathian lam angaihsak lo va, Mithianghlim rinawma lakah pawh.

source: For in that day they will all give up their images of silver and of gold, the sin which they made for themselves.
target: Chumi niah chuan mi tinin mahni tangka milemte, mahni rangkachak milemte, sualna atana nangmahni kuta in insiam chawpte chu an la paih bo dawn si a.

source: My haters say evil of me all day; those who are violent against me make use of my name as a curse.
target: Mi dotute chuan nilengin mi sawichhe thin a; Ka chunga kawlhte chuan keimah anga awm tûrin ânchhia na lawh thin.

source: He has a fake tan.
target: Tan lem a nei a.

source: He is stamping with joy in the valley; he makes sport of fear.
target: Phai ruamah a ke a phiat tlut tlut a, A tha a so va, indo hriamhrei hmachhawn tûrin a chhuak a;

source: Get back here.
target: Hetah lo let rawh.

source: Of the sons of Gershom: Joel the chief, and his brothers, a hundred and thirty;
target: Gersoma thlahte zinga mi, puipa ber Joela, a unaute nen za leh sawmthum;

source: I feel fine
target: Ka ṭhain ka hria

source: I have knowledge of your works, that you are not cold or warm: it would be better if you were cold or warm.
target: I thiltihziate ka hria, i vawh hek loh va, i lum hek loh hi; i vawh emaw i lum emaw ka duh a ni.

source: Scoot over
target: Kalsan vat rawh

source: Try hard
target: Bei nasa rawh

source: Come near, O sons of Jacob, and give ear to the words of Israel your father.
target: Nangni Jakoba fapate u, rawn inkhâwm ula, ngaithla rawh u; In pa Israela thu hi ngaithla rawh u.

source: And all her glory has gone from the daughter of Zion: her rulers have become like harts with no place for food, and they have gone in flight without strength before the attacker.
target: Tin, Zion fanu chu a mawina zawngin a bosan ta e, A hotute zukchal tlat hmun neilo ang an chang zo ta; Umtu hmâan an tlân e, tha leh zungzâm rêng nei lovin.

source: Before I was in trouble I went out of the way; but now I keep your word.
target: Tihhreawma ka awm hma khan ka vâk bo thin a; Tunah erawh chuan i thu ka zawm ta.

source: I'm so pissed off.
target: Ka thinrim lutuk.

source: There's no reason
target: Chhan a awm lo

source: This shirt is clean
target: He kawr hi a fai a

source: And going even farther than our hope, they first gave themselves to the Lord and to us after the purpose of God.
target: Chu pawh chu kan rin loh ang takin an ti a, Pathian duhzawngin anmahni ngei Lalpa hnenah leh keini hnenah an inpe hmasa te te a ni;

source: For we all have to come before Christ to be judged; so that every one of us may get his reward for the things done in the body, good or bad.
target: Mi tinin taksaa thil tithe, a chhia a thain, kan tih ang zela kan hmuh theuh theihna turin, Krista rorelna thutphah hmaah chuan tihlanin kan awm vek tur a ni si a.

source: We're closed
target: Kan inkhar

source: This comes about so that the writing in their law may be made true, Their hate for me was without cause.
target: Engpawh ni rawh se, an Dan Lehkhabuah, ‘Annin enga khawlawi lovin mi hua,’ tih thu ziak kha a lo thlenna turin an ti a nih hi.

source: They were acting like loose women in Egypt; when they were young their behaviour was loose: there their breasts were crushed, even the points of their young breasts were crushed.
target: Aigupta ramah an hur bo va, an tleirawl teta hur an ni a, chutah chuan an hnute an dek a, an tleirawl hnute chu an hmehsak hrep a.

source: And he sent for one of the servants, questioning him about what it might be.
target: Tichuan chhiahhlawh pakhat a ko va, ‘Chu engnge ni ta?’ tiin a zawt a.

source: All those who have gone against him will be put to shame; the makers of images will be made low.
target: Mualpho takin an awm ang, a ni, an zain zak takin an awm ang: milem siamtute chu zahnaah chuan an lût tlâng ang.

source: They will be cutting down her woods, for they may not be searched out; because they are like locusts, more than may be numbered.
target: A ram ngawpui fan chhuah zawh loh chu An rawn țhiat ang, Khau puang aiin an tam zawk si a, Chhiarsen rual an ni lo.

source: They were more than happy
target: An hlim zawk a ni

source: Then the disciples saw that he was talking to them of John the Baptist.
target: Chu veleh, zirtirte chuan Baptistu Johana thu an hnenah a sawi a ni tih an lo hre ta a.

source: You won't find them.
target: I hmu lovang.

source: All my desire has been for your salvation, O Lord; and your law is my delight.
target: Aw LALPA, i chhandamna chu ka chak thin a; I dan chu ka lawmna a ni.

source: By experience you will see that the Lord is good; happy is the man who has faith in him.
target: Aw, LALPA thatzia chu tem chhin teh reng u: Amaha rina nghat mi chu a eng a thawl e.

source: And they made two gold frames and two gold rings, the rings being fixed to the ends of the priest's bag;
target: Tin, rangkachak zai phiar pahnih leh rangkachak khang pahnih an siam a; tichuan awmbel tlâng hmawr ve veah chuan khangte chu an vuah a.

source: He makes your mouth full of good things, so that your strength is made new again like the eagle's.
target: I ka chu thil thain a titlai thin a; Chutichuan i tleirawlna chu mupui anga siam tharin a awm leh thin.

source: You don't smile much.
target: I nui vak lo.

source: Got it?
target: Hria em?

source: Aren't you brothers
target: Unau in ni lo maw

source: He was a burning and shining light, and for a time you were ready to be happy in his light.
target: Chu Johana chu khawnvar alh tak leh eng tak chu a ni, a engah chuan hlim rih in duh kha.

source: I let him go
target: Amah ka luh tir

source: Now about virgins I have no orders from the Lord: but I give my opinion as one to whom the Lord has given mercy to be true to him.
target: Tin, nula thianghlim lam thu-ah zawng Lalpa thupek reng ka nei lo va; nimahsela rinawma awm turin Lalpa hnen ata khawngaihna hmu ka nih avangin ka ngaihtuahzia ka sawi ang.

source: And all the chiefs and the men of war and all the sons of King David put themselves under the authority of Solomon the king.
target: Tin, hotu zawng zawng leh mi chak huaisente leh lal Davida fapa dang zawng zawngte chu lal Solomona lakah an intulût a.

source: For there seats for the judges were placed, even the rulers' seats of the line of David.
target: Chutah chuan rorêl nân lalthutphahte hun a ni si a Davida chhûngte lalthutphahte chu,

source: Does your head hurt often?
target: I lu a na fo em?

source: And Noah, with his sons and his wife and his sons' wives, went into the ark because of the flowing of the waters.
target: Tin, tui a lêt dâwn avângin Nova chu lawngah chuan a lût a, a fapate leh a nupui leh a fapate nupuite pawh a hnênah an lût ve a.

source: I forgot
target: Ka theihnghilh

source: A seed will be his servant; the doings of the Lord will be made clear to the generation which comes after.
target: Thangtharten a rawng an bâwl ang a; Thangthar lo awm zelte hnênah chuan LALPA chanchin chu an hril ang.

source: So that the man of God may be complete, trained and made ready for every good work.
target: Pathian mi chu hna tha tinreng thawk tura kim taka inthuamin a famkim theih nan.

source: Then on that day David first made the giving of praise to the Lord the work of Asaph and his brothers.
target: Tichuan chu mi ni chuan Davidan LALPA hnêna lâwm thu hril tûrin Asapha leh a unaute chu a hmang tan ta a.

source: I refused treatment.
target: Enkawl ka duh lo.

source: Ahaziah was twenty-two years old when he became king, and he was ruling in Jerusalem for one year. His mother's name was Athaliah, the daughter of Omri.
target: Ahazia chu a lal tantirhin kum sâwmli leh kum hnih a ni a; Jerusalem-ah kum khat a lal a; a nu hming chu Athali, Omria fanu a ni a.

source: Don't turn around
target: Hawi let suh

source: This is the heritage of the tribe of the children of Naphtali by their families, these towns with their unwalled places.
target: Chung chu a ni Naphtalia thlahte hnam an chhûngkaw zir ang zela an chanpual chu, khawpuite leh a khawper te nen.

source: They kept drinking
target: An in zel a

source: Are you confused yet
target: I la buai em

source: She always smiles
target: A nui reng ṭhin

source: You sent the springs into the valleys; they are flowing between the hills.
target: A ni chuan kawrahte chuan tuihnate a tir chhuak a; Tlâng karahte chuan a luang a:

source: And the Lord, in his wrath, would have put Aaron to death: and I made prayer for Aaron at the same time.
target: Tin, LALPA chu Arona chu tiboral duh hial khawpin a thinur a; nimahsela Arona pawh ka țawngțaisak nghal bawk a.

source: Do you think I'm stupid or something?
target: Ka â i ti em ni?

source: Is Tom crazy?
target: Tom hi a mâwl em?

source: Is it blue?
target: A pâwl a mi?

source: May I go?
target: Ka kal thei em?

source: Before Ephraim and Benjamin and Manasseh, let your strength be awake from sleep, and come as our salvation.
target: Ephraim-ho leh Benjamin-ho leh Manase-ho mithmuhah chuan i chakna kha chawk tho lo, Mi chhandam tûrin lo kal ang che.

source: And hearing the voice of Peter, in her joy she went running, without opening the door, to say that Peter was outside.
target: Tin, Petera aw a hriat veleh a lawm avangin kawng chu hawng lovin a tlan lut leh ta zawk a, Petera kawngkhar bulah a ding tih a va hrilh a.

source: How our fathers went down into Egypt, and we were living in Egypt for a long time; and the Egyptians were cruel to us and to our fathers:
target: kan pi leh pute Aigupta rama an chhuk a, rei tak Aigupta rama kan awm te, Aigupta miten keini leh kan pi leh pute tha lo taka mi tihziate kha.

source: She's a matriarch.
target: Matriarch a ni.

source: I hate losing
target: Chân hi ka hua

source: Only it was their desire that we would give thought to the poor; which very thing I had much in mind to do.
target: Retheite kan hriat reng chauh an duh, chu tak chu tih ka tum tlat reng thina a ni.

source: How do you do?
target: I dam em?

source: Who wrote it?
target: Tu ziak nge?

source: I'm extremely fat
target: Ka thau lûtuk

source: But they said, Not while the feast is going on, for fear there may be trouble among the people.
target: nimahsela, Kut chhung chuan ni suh se, chutilochuan vantlang zingah buaina a lo awmhlauh dah ang e, an ti a.

source: And all the Egyptians made holes round about the Nile to get drinking-water, for they were not able to make use of the Nile water.
target: Tin, Aigupta mi zawng zawngte chuan tui in atân lui kam velte chu an lai chiam a; lui tui chu an in thei si lo va.

source: Be brave.
target: Huai rawh.

source: What fools they are
target: An va â em

source: Don't swear
target: Tiam suh

source: What did it turn out to be?
target: Eng nge a nih ta?

source: The Lord undoes the designs of the nations; he makes the thoughts of the peoples without effect.
target: LALPAN hnam tin remruat chu engmah lovah a chantir a: Mi tin, ngaihtuahte chu engmah sawtna nei lovin a siam thin.

source: Let's eat, grandma!
target: Chaw ei ila, pi!

source: She hasn't done anything.
target: Engmah a la ti lo.

source: This is messed up.
target: Hei hi a buai hle.

source: And when anyone makes a meal offering to the Lord, let his offering be of the best meal, with oil on it and perfume:
target: Tupawhin thilhlan, chhangphut thilhlan LALPA hnena a hlan hunin, a thilhlan chu chhangphut dip tak a ni tura ni; hriak a leih ang a, a chungah beraw a dah bawk ang:

source: The Lord will be his support on his bed of pain: by you will all his grief be turned to strength.
target: LALPAN a chauhna mut hmunah chuan a tichak ang a: Nangin a dam loh laiin a mutna i siamsak vek thin.

source: Do you want a hug
target: Kuah i duh em

source: Then they put their hands on them, and the Holy Spirit came on them.
target: Tin, tirhkohte chuan an chungah an kut an nghat a, Thlarau Thianghlim an hmu ta a.

source: I had jet lag
target: Ka chau lutuk

source: Take the best of the flock, put much wood under it: see that its bits are boiling well; let the bones be cooked inside it.
target: Ran rualte zinga a țha țha la la, a hnuaiah thingfak rawlh țeuh la, so bawrh bawrh se; a ni, a ruhkawlte chu mun ni rawh se.

source: I'm giving it to you.
target: Ka pe a ni.

source: I have made discovery of David my servant; I have put my holy oil on his head.
target: Ka chhiahhlawh Davida chu ka chhar a; Ka hriak thianghlim chuan amah chu ka thih ta a:

source: On the gold altar they are to put a blue cloth, covering it with a leather cover; and they are to put its rods in their places.
target: Tin, rangkachak maicham chu puan dum pâwlin an khuh ang a, a khuhna savun tha miin an khuh leh ang a, a zawnfung an vuah tur a ni;

source: Which one did you use
target: Eng ber nge i hman

source: I'll get a hold of you.
target: Ka hold ang che.

source: He sent a man before them, even Joseph, who was given as a servant for a price:
target: An hmaah mi a tir a; Josefa chu chhiahhlawh atân hralhin a awm a:

source: So they came and took them, in their coats, outside the tent-circle, as Moses had said.
target: Chutichuan an lo hnai a, kawr ha chungin daipawnah an zawn chhuak a, Mosia sawi ang chuan,

source: Help him
target: Amah tanpui rawh

source: Make melody, O daughter of Zion; give a loud cry, O Israel; be glad and let your heart be full of joy, O daughter of Jerusalem.
target: Aw Zion fanu, zai rawh; aw Israel, au vak vak rawh; Aw Jerusalem fanu, i thinlung zawng zawngin lâwm la hlim rawh.

source: Whom are you speaking of
target: Tute nge i sawi

source: Let those who say Aha, aha! be turned back as a reward of their shame.
target: Chei! Chei! Titute chu An mualpho avângin tlânchhiattirin awm rawh se.

source: They'll fail
target: An hlawhchham der

source: His young have blood for their drink, and where the dead bodies are, there is he to be seen.
target: A note pawhin thisen an dawt a, Saruang awmnaah chuan a awm zel a ni.

source: It's pretty early
target: A hma deuh tawh

source: My ear is burning
target: Ka beng a kang a

source: Don't go home
target: Inah haw suh

source: I'm bossy.
target: Ka thuber.

source: She's the manager.
target: Manager a ni.

source: Do you hear anything
target: Eng emaw i hre em

source: He went away
target: A tlanbo

source: Tom isn't looking
target: Tom chu a en lo

source: Let them be overcome and troubled for ever; let them be put to shame and come to destruction;
target: Kumkhuain mualpho leh mangang takin awm sela; A ni, tihzaha awmin boral rawh se:

source: And the house which I am building is to be great, for our God is greater than all gods.
target: Tin, ka in sak tum hi ropui tak tûr a ni a, kan Pathian hi pathian zawng zawng aia ropui a ni si a.

source: It is a book
target: Lehkhabu a ni

source: And the waters overcame everything on the earth; and all the mountains under heaven were covered.
target: Tin, lei chungah hian tui chu nasa takin a lo pung a; vân hnuaia tlâng sâng zawng zawngte a pil zo ta vek a.

source: It's not time to die.
target: Thih hun a ni lo.

source: She cleaned the house
target: In chu a tifai a

source: But Levi and Benjamin were not numbered among them, for Joab was disgusted with the king's order.
target: Levi-ho leh Benjamin-ho eraw chu a chhiar tel velo; lal thu chu Joaba huatzawng tak ani si a.

source: They have taken out all the money which was in the Lord's house and have given it to the overseers and to the workmen.
target: LALPA ina tangka awm chu an bun chuak a, hotute leh hnathawktute chu an pe a, tiin thu a thlen a.

source: Truly, because of you we are put to death every day; we are numbered like sheep for destruction.
target: A ni, nangmah avângin nilengin thahin ka awm thin; Berâm talh tûrte anga ngaih kan ni.

source: Give high honour to the Lord our God, worshipping with your faces turned to his holy hill; for the Lord our God is holy.
target: LALPA kan Pathian chu chawimawi ula, A tlâng thianghlimah chuan chibai bûk rawh u; LALPA kan Pathian chu a thianghlim si a.

source: I, however, am not in search of glory for myself: there is One who is searching for it and he is judge.
target: Nimahsela mahni mawina zawng ka ni lo; a zawngtu leh a ngaihtuahtu mi pakhat a awm a ni.

source: Here I am.
target: Hetah ka awm.

source: I've been extremely busy.
target: Ka buai hle tawh.

source: I felt so ashamed of myself.
target: Ka zak em em a.

source: But keep me in mind when things go well for you, and be good to me and say a good word for me to Pharaoh and get me out of this prison:
target: Amaherawhchu i chan that leh hunah chuan mi han hre reng la, khawngaih takin khawngaihna ka chungah rawn lantîr la, Pharaoa hnênah ka chanchin han sawi la, he in ata hi mi hruai chhuak ang che:

source: And there came together to him the Pharisees and certain of the scribes who had come from Jerusalem,
target: Tin, Pharisaite leh lehkhaziaktute zinga mi tute emaw, Jerusalem khua atanga lo kalte chu a hnenah an rawn inkhawm a.

source: And Jethro, Moses' father-in-law, came with his sons and his wife to where Moses had put up his tent in the waste land, by the mountain of God.
target: tin, Mosia puzawn Jethroa chu Mosia fapate leh a nupui nên Mosia hnênah thlalêra a riahna Pathian tlângah chuan an va kal a:

source: Where there are no wise suggestions, purposes come to nothing; but by a number of wise guides they are made certain.
target: Remruat lawk lova thil tih a hlawhtling eduh lo. Remhria an tam chuan a hlawhtling thin;

source: And when the sixth hour had come, it was dark over all the land till the ninth hour.
target: Tin, chawfak hun a lo nih chuan behliang mun hun thlengin khawvel a lo thim ta vek a.

source: And whoever goes after those who make use of spirits and wonder-workers, doing evil with them, against him will my face be turned, and he will be cut off from among his people.
target: tin, an laka uire tura ramhuai aienthiam zâwlte leh dawithiamte pantu chungah chuan ka hmai ka thuar ang a, a chipuite zing ata ka tiboral ang.

source: Keep going
target: Kal zêl rawh

source: And some of those who were with us went to the place, and saw that it was as the women had said, but him they did not see.
target: Tin, kan awmpui zinga tute emaw thlanah chuan an kal a, hmeichhiate sawi ang ngeiin an hmu a; nimahsela amah chu an hmu si lo va, an ti a.

source: I watched TV.
target: TV ka en.

source: See, they say to me, Where is the word of the Lord? let it come now.
target: Ngai teh, ka hnênah, 'LALPA thu chu khawiah nge? Lo thleng ang hiang,' an ti țhin a.

source: But the Lord was with Joseph, and was good to him, and made the keeper of the prison his friend.
target: Nimahsela LALPA chu Josefa hnênah a awm zêl a, a chungah ngil a nei a, tân in vêngtu pawh a khawngaihtîr a.

source: And most of the brothers in the Lord, taking heart because of my chains, are all the stronger to give the word of God without fear.
target: Lalpaa unau tam zawkte pawh chuan ka kawlbunte avanga lo ring tlatin, hlau lovin Pathian thu hrilh kawngah an huai nasa lehzual a ni.

source: Did he get a receipt?
target: Receipt a hmu em?

source: Be happy and smile!
target: Hlim la, nui rawh!

source: The TV won't turn on.
target: TV a on dawn lo.

source: It is gone
target: A bo tawh

source: The eyes of the Lord keep knowledge, but by him the acts of the false man will be overturned.
target: LALPA mit chuan hriatna nei mi chu a vawng tha thin a, Mi vervek thu erawh chu a paihthlaksak thin.

source: For he whom God has sent says God's words; and God does not give him the Spirit by measure.

source: I doubt it

source: For the Lamb who is on the high seat will be their keeper and their guide to fountains of living water: and God will make glad their eyes for ever.

source: Who sends out the war-carriages and the horses, the army with all its force; they have come down, they will not get up again; like a feebly burning light they are put out.

source: The sailors go up to heaven, and down into the deep; their souls are wasted because of their trouble.
target: Vanah an chho tual tual a, thuk takah an chhuk leh tual tual thin a: Manganna avângin an nunna chu a tuiral thin.

source: So did your fathers, when I sent them from Kadesh-barnea to see the land.
target: Kanes-barnea ațanga ram va thlithlai tura ka tirh khan hetiang bawk hian in pute chuan an ti a.

source: Sami is being followed

source: See, I will make it healthy and well again, I will even make them well; I will let them see peace and good faith in full measure.

target: Tichan zâwlnei Isaia chuan LALPA a han au va; tin, Ahaza darchinhriatnaa hlim hniam tawh chu rahka sawm thlengin a tikir leh ta a.

target: Ti rawh.

target: Kan bo tawh

target: Chu beiseina chu nunna thirchakaiah kannei a, rinawm leh nghet tak a ni, puanzar chhunga mi-ah pawh chuan a lut a;

target: Ka hre thei

target: Tarte ai chuan ka hre thiam zawk a ni, I thununna thute hi ka vawn that avângin.

target: Jeru-baala Gideona chu Israel-hote chunga theihtawpa that chhuah thintu chhûngte chungah pawh chuan that an chhuah ve ta hek lo.

target: Min duh lo ang.

source: Him God has put on high at his right hand, as a Ruler and a Saviour, to give to Israel a change of heart and forgiveness of sins.

source: For it is right for the priest's lips to keep knowledge, and for men to be waiting for the law from his mouth: for he is the servant sent from the Lord of armies.
target: Puithiam hmuite chuan hriatna a vawng tûr a ni si a, a kâ ațangin dân chu an zawng țhîn tûr a ni; A ni chu sipaihote LALPA tirhkoh a ni si a.

source: And the goat will take all their sins into a land cut off from men, and he will send the goat away into the waste land.

source: You, you are to be feared; who may keep his place before you in the time of your wrath?
target: Nang, nangmah ngei chu, tih tûr i ni a: I thinur tawh phawt chuan, tunge i mithmuhah ding thei ang le?

source: I will keep you safe from the hands of the evil-doers, and I will give you salvation from the hands of the cruel ones.
target: Mi suaksualte kut ata ka chhan chhuak ang chia, Mi nunrawngte humbeh ata ka tichhuak ang che.

target: Thlipui a do thin

source: Have no fear of them: for the Lord your God is with you, a great God greatly to be feared.

source: Where is the lions' hole, the place where the young lions got their food, where the lion and the she-lion were walking with their young, without cause for fear?

source: But to be seated at my right hand or at my left is not for me to give: but it is for those for whom it has been made ready.

target: Min tibuai suh

target: I ṭha lutuk tlat

target: Nang chuan Rahab chu ral thah angin i tikeh sawm a; Nangmah dotute chu i ban tha chakin i tidarh ta a.

source: We might have got more than three hundred pence for it, and given the money to the poor. And they said things against her among themselves.

target: I hmu tur a ni.

target: Tho rawh ka tih chu

target: I hate beans

source: If those who have not circumcision keep the rules of the law, will it not be credited to them as circumcision?

source: The second glory of this house will be greater than the first, says the Lord of armies: and in this place I will give peace, says the Lord of armies.

source: By them is your servant made conscious of danger, and in keeping them there is great reward.

source: In wind it came and to the dark it will go, and with the dark will its name be covered.

target: Kar thum vel a ni

target: Tin, chu thu chu Pharaoa leh a chhiahhlawhte zawng zawng chuan tha an tihzâwng tak a ni a.

source: Take my teaching, and not silver; get knowledge in place of the best gold.
target: Ka zirtirnate dawng rawh u, tangkate ni lovin, Tin, finna chu rangkachak duhawm mai ai pawhin.

source: Do you have diabetes
target: Zunthlum i nei em

target: Lei a nem lutuk.

target: Ka melh a.

source: It's already open
target: A inhawng tawh

source: Be tolerant
target: Dawhthei rawh

target: Aih an ti

source: Then the Lord gave them judges, as their saviours from the hands of those who were cruel to them.

source: Weight it now
target: Tunah bûk rawh

source: Do not be glad because of my sorrow, O my hater: after my fall I will be lifted up; when I am seated in the dark, the Lord will be a light to me.
target: Aw ka hmêlma, mi diriam mai suh: ka tlûk hun chuan ka tho leh ang: thima ka țhut pawhin LALPA chu ka tân êng a ni ang.

source: Who is it It's me
target: Who is it It's me

source: But we have a desire to give hearing to your opinion: for as to this form of religion, we have knowledge that in all places it is attacked.
target: Amaherawhchu he pawl hi ram tinah sawichhiat an ni si a, nangin engtin nge i ngaih hriat kan duh e, an ti a.

target: A kawngte chu Mosia a hriattir a, A thiltihte chu Israela thlahte a hriattir bawk a.

source: Are they hiding something?
target: Thil an thup em?

source: And Joseph's master took him and put him in prison, in the place where the king's prisoners were kept in chains, and he was there in the prison-house.
target: Tichuan Josefa pu chuan ani chu a hruai a, tân in, lal mi tâng phuara an awmnaah chuan a khung ta a: tichuan chuta tân inah chuan a awm ta a.

source: I was full
target: Ka puar e

source: Did you say something
target: Eng emaw i sawi em

source: And the old man said, Peace be with you; let all your needs be my care; only do not take your rest in the street.
target: Tin, putar chuan, Thlamuang takin awm rawh khai; i mamawh zawng zawngte chu keimah ka tum vek ang e; khawlaiah zawng riak lul suh ang che, a ti a.

source: And if liquid from the mouth of the unclean man comes on to him who is clean, then he is to have his clothing washed and his body bathed in water and be unclean till evening.
target: Tin, thil puta chuan mi bawlhhlawh lo chil a chhak chuan a puante a su ang a, a inbual tur a ni a, tlai lam thlengin a bawlhhlawh ang.

source: And Laban said, In our country we do not let the younger daughter be married before the older.
target: Tin, Labana chuan, Kan ramah hian chutianga fa u hmaa a naupang zawk kaltîr chu dan a ni lo asin.

source: And he went away and had a discussion with the chief priests and the rulers, about how he might give him up to them.
target: Tichuan ani chu a va kal a, an hnena a mantir theihna turzia puithiam lalte leh hotute chu a va rawn a.

source: It isn't snowing
target: Snow a tla lo

source: Sit here
target: Hetah thu rawh

source: They moved apart from each other
target: An inhlat a

source: The prophet whose words are of peace, when his words come true, will be seen to be a prophet whom the Lord has sent.
target: zâwlnei, muanna thu sawitu thu sawi chu a lo thlen hunah, chu zâwlnei chu LALPA chuan a tir ngei a ni tih a hriat mai ang chu, a ti a.

source: These they took to the Apostles, who, after prayer, put their hands on them.
target: chu mite chu tirhkohte hmaah an dintir a; tin, anni chuan an tawngtai a, an chungah an kut an nghat a.

source: It's dark.
target: A thim.

source: Taxes are too high.
target: Tax a tam lutuk.

source: She waited for a taxi.
target: Taxi a nghak a.

source: Well ka hlau lo.
target: Well I'm afraid not.

source: The sinners in Zion are full of fear; the haters of God are shaking with wonder. Who among us may keep his place before the burning fire? who among us may see the eternal burnings?
target: Zion-a mi sual awmte chuan an hlau va; Pathian zah lo mite chu khurhnain a man ta. Kanralhmang mei, kumkhuaa alh chu, kan zingah tunge tuar thei awm ang? an ti a.

source: The mountains became like wax at the coming of the Lord, at the coming of the Lord of all the earth.
target: Tlangte chu khawihnun ang hian LALPA hmaah a tuiral ta a, Khawvel zawng zawng LALPA hmaah chuan.

source: And when the ark of the Lord's agreement came into the tent-circle, all Israel gave a great cry, so that the earth was sounding with it.
target: Chutichuan LALPA thuthlunna bâwmin an riahhmun a lo thlen chuan Israel mi zawng zawnge chu ring takin an au dur dur mai a, leite lam pawh a nghawr ri dur dur mai a.

source: For if a woman is not veiled, let her hair be cut off; but if it is a shame to a woman to have her hair cut off, let her be veiled.
target: Hmeichhia lukhum khum lova a awm si chuan met law law rawh se; amaherawhchu hmeichhe tan lu meh emaw, ziah kawn emaw a zahthlak si chuan lukhum khum zawk rawh se.

source: And turning from their road they came to the house of the young Levite, the house of Micah, and said to him, Is it well with you?
target: Tin, chuta ta chu an peng a, Levi chi tlangvâl awmna Mika in ngei chu an va thleng a, a chungchnag thu an zawt a.

source: I met him
target: Ka hmu tawh

source: There isn't any soap.
target: Sahbawn a awm lo.

source: Do this, then, which we say to you: We have four men who have taken an oath;
target: Chuvangin i hnena kan sawi ang hian ti ang che: Thutiam nei mipa pali kan hnenah an awm;

source: And give no man the name of father on earth: because one is your Father, who is in heaven.
target: Tin, lei chungah hian tumah ‘Ka pa’ ti suh u; in Pa chu pakhat chauh a ni, vana mi khi.

source: And her spirit came back to her and she got up straight away: and he gave orders that food was to be given to her.
target: Tin, a thlarau chu a lo kir leh a, a tho ta nghal a; tin, englo ei tur pek thu a pe a.

source: Make your steps clear to me, O Lord; give me knowledge of your ways.
target: Aw LALPA, i kawngte chu mi hriattir la; I kalkawng chanchinte mi zirtir ang che.

source: There is a way which seems straight before a man, but its end is the ways of death.
target: Mi ngaiha kawng dik ni awm taka lang, A tawp chu thihna kawng ni si a awm.

source: Tom's ugly
target: Tom a hmelchhia

source: Tom's not in
target: Tom a lût lo

source: Then the servants who were waiting on the king said to him, Let search be made for some fair young virgins for the king:
target: Chutichuan lal chhiahhlawh, a rawngbawltute chuan a hnênah, Lal tan nula hmêl tha zawn ni sela.

source: I'll vouch for you.
target: Ka vouch ang che.

source: Don't do anything
target: Engmah ti suh

source: But this is not what is in his mind, and this is not his design; but his purpose is destruction, and the cutting off of more and more nations.
target: Nimahsela ani chuan chutiang chu a tum ani lo va, chutiang chu arilru pawhin a ngaihtuah hek lo; hnam tam namena tam lo tihchhiat leh tihboral a ni a rilruk zawk ni.

source: And I will make the tree give more fruit and the field fuller produce, and no longer will you be shamed among the nations for need of food.
target: Thing rahte ka tipung ang a, thlawhhma ka tihlâwk ang a, țam avânga hnamte zinga mualphona in tuar twah lo vang.

source: You're moody
target: I muk lûtuk

source: And Shaharaim became the father of children in the country of the Moabites after driving out Hushim and Beerah his wives;
target: Tin, Saharaima chuan anmahni a kaltir hnuin Moab ramah fate a hring a; a nupuite chu Husimi leh Baari an ni.

source: Who is already awake?
target: Tu nge harh tawh?

source: Tom wasn't talking
target: Tom chu a sawi lo

source: He pinched me
target: Khapa khân mi piai a

source: And he gave a blow on the door, and a young girl came to it, named Rhoda.
target: Tin, sumhmun kawngkhar a kik veleh, a hming Rodi nula pakhat, chhang turin a va kal a.

source: And the robes of needlework, the holy robes for Aaron and for his sons, for their use when acting as priests,
target: tin, silhfên mâwi taka tah te, puithiam rawng an bâwl huna hâk tur puithiam Arona silhfên thianghlim leh a fapate silhfên te;

source: But to the married I give orders, though not I but the Lord, that the wife may not go away from her husband
target: Tin, innei sate hnenah chuan thu ka pe keima pek erawh chu ni lovin, Lalpa pek a ni zawk: Nupui chuan a pasal then suh se;

source: They take their rest at night without clothing, and have no cover in the cold.
target: Silhfen lovin zankhuain an mu a, Khaw vatah inkhuhna an nei lo.

source: What does a man get for all his work, and for the weight of care with which he has done his work under the sun?
target: Miin a thawh hahna zawng zawngah leh rilru rim taka ni hnuaia a thawhnaah chuan eng nge a hmuh?

source: And these were his chief men: Azariah, the son of Zadok, was the priest;
target: Hengte hi a mi lianho neihte chu an ni: Zadoka fapa Azaria chu puithiam a ni a;

source: I'm lying.
target: Dawt ka sawi.

source: And they were wandering in every direction because there was no keeper: and they became food for all the beasts of the field.
target: Berâmpute an awm loh avngin tihdarhin an lo awm ta a, an lo darh a, ramsa kawlhte chaw mai an lo ni ta a.

source: But he keeps safe from their sword those who have no father, and the poor from the power of the strong.
target: An kaa khandaih lak ata retheite a chhan chhuak a, Mi chak ut ata tlachhamte pawh.

source: The man of sudden impulses will become wise in heart, and he whose tongue is slow will get the power of talking clearly.
target: Rilrua hmanhmawh chuan hriat thiam a zir ang a, dangawkte pawh nal takin an țawng thei ang.

source: Tom coughed loudly
target: Tom chu a khuh a

source: What then? are we to go on in sin because we are not under law but under grace? Let it not be so.
target: Engtin nge ni ang le? Dan rorela awm kan nih loh va, khawngaihna rorela awm kan nih zawk avang hian kan sual tur em ni ang?Hnai lo ve.

source: If he still has what he had taken, whatever it is, ox or ass or sheep, he is to give twice its value.
target: Rûkruin a thil rûk - sebâwngpa emaw, sabêngtung emaw, berâm emaw - a nungin lo la nei rêng sela, a leh hnih a chawi tûr a ni.

source: And he has given them their heritage, and by his hand it has been measured out to them: it will be theirs for ever, their resting-place from generation to generation.
target: Ani chuan an tan thum a vawrsak a, a kutin hruia tehin ram chu a semsak hlawm a; kumkhuain an nei ang a, chhuan awm chhûng zawng zawngin chutah chuan an awm ang.

source: His buckets are full of milk, and there is no loss of strength in his bones.
target: A taksa chu thauvin a khat a, A ruh thling pawh a hnawng a ni.

source: Go and say to my servant David, The Lord says, Are you to be the builder of a house, a living-place for me?
target: Ka chhiahlawh Davida chu va hrilh rawh, 'LALPA chuan heti hian a ti, Ka awmna tûrin nangin in min saksak dawn em ni?

source: For it has come to our ears that there are some among you whose behaviour is uncontrolled, who do no work at all, but are over-interested in the business of others.
target: In zinga thenkhat dan lo anga awm thinte chanchin kan hre si a, chung chuan hna reng an thawk lo va, an tei mai mai zawk thin a ni.

source: You're ducking the issue.
target: I duck a ni.

source: There is another who gives witness about me and I am certain that the witness he gives about me is true.
target: Ka chanchin hriattirtu chu mi dang a ni; ani chuan ka chanchin a hriattir chu a dik tih ka hria.

source: She's my godmother
target: Ka godmother a ni

source: Are you important?
target: I pawimawh em?

source: And they went, and it was as he had said: and they made the Passover ready.
target: Tin, an kal ta a, an hnena a sawi ang takin an hmu a; tin Kalhlen Kut chaw chu an buatsaih ta a.

source: Water is a liquid.
target: Tui hi tui a ni.

source: But at that time, having no knowledge of God, you were servants to those who by right are no gods:
target: Nimahsela, khang Pathian inhriat loh lai khan, an pianzia reng pawha Pathian ni hlei lote bawih in ni a.

source: Or is it not said in the law, how the Sabbath is broken by the priests in the Temple and they do no wrong?
target: A nih leh, Chawlhniin Pathian biak ina puithiam awmte chuan, Chawlhni an bawrh pawhin an thiam zel tih Dan thuah chuan in chhiar lo vem ni?

source: I get bored
target: A ninawm ka ti

source: Who is she?
target: Khanu kha tunge?

source: For he will be given up to the Gentiles, and will be made sport of and put to shame:
target: Jentailte hnenah an pe ang a, nuihza siam nan an hmang ang a, zahthlak takin an siam ang a, chil an chhak ang;

source: The upright will be glad in the Lord and have hope in him; and all the lovers of righteousness will give him glory.
target: Mi felte chu LALPA-ah an lawm ang a, amahah chuan rinna an nghat ang a; Thinlung dik tak pu zawng zawngte chuan an chhuang ang.

source: We've been tricked
target: Kan bum tawh a ni

source: She will come before the king in robes of needlework; the virgins in her train will come before you.
target: Puan thui mawi sinin lalber hnênah an hruai ang a: Amah zuitu, a thian nulahote chu, I hnênah an hruai ang.

source: I'm not entirely sure.
target: Ka chiang vek lo.

source: Tom has left
target: Tom a haw tawh

source: One witness may not make a statement against a man in relation to any sin or wrongdoing which he has done: on the word of two or three witnesses a question is to be judged.
target: Mi a khawlohna emaw, a sualna reng reng emaw hretu pakhat chu a tawk lovang; hretu pahnih ka emaw, hretu pathum ka emaw thuin tihngheh tur a ni.

source: Then Esther sent them back to Mordecai with this answer:
target: chutichuan Estheri chuan Mordekaia va chhâng leh tûr chuan a tir a,

source: Hit Tom.
target: Tom hnek rawh.

source: They sweated
target: An thlan hluam

source: Whose decision is it?
target: Tu thu nge a nih?

source: Hey, where are we?
target: Hei, khawiah nge kan awm?

source: Aren't you finished
target: I zo lo em ni

source: I'm not arrogant
target: Ka chapo lo

source: And she kept him safe with her in the house of God for six years, while Athaliah was ruling the land.
target: Tin, an hnêna chengin Pathian inah kum ruk a rukin a awm a: tichuan Athali chu an rama chuan a lal ta a.

source: I disagree
target: Ka pawm lo

source: And they came to Ophir, where they got four hundred and twenty talents of gold, and took it back to King Solomon.
target: Chumite chu Ophir-ah an va kal a, chuta mi chu rangkachak talent 420 an rawn hawn a, lal Solomona hnênah an rawn thlen a.

source: I didn't pick anything.
target: Engmah ka pick lo.

source: It is good generally for a country where the land is worked to have a king.
target: Tin, lei hlawkna chu mi zawng anwg tan a ni a, lal pawh thlawhhma ring mi bawk a ni.

source: They may not know about it
target: An hre lo mai thei

source: Let the glory of the Lord be for ever; let the Lord have joy in his works:
target: LALPA ropuina chu kumkhuain awm sela; LALPA ch a thiltihahte chuan hlim rawh se:

source: Moses and Aaron among his priests, and Samuel among those who gave honour to his name; they made prayers to the Lord, and he gave answers to them.
target: A puithiamte zingah chuan Mosia leh Arona, A hming lamtute zingah chuan Samuela; Anni chuan LALPA chu an ko va, ani chuan a chhâng ta a:

source: Be kind
target: Nunnem takin

source: Do you know any kings
target: Lal i hria em

source: For to those who are dear to him the Lord says sharp words, and makes the son in whom he has delight undergo pain.
target: LALPA chuan a hmangaihte chu a zilhhau thin a ni, Pain fa a lawm apiangte a zilhhau thin ang hian.

source: Don't you threaten me.
target: Min vau suh.

source: And the asses of the field on the open hilltops are opening their mouths wide like jackals to get air; their eyes are hollow because there is no grass.
target: Ram sabengtungte chu mual pawng charah an ding a, Lei thlâk hlawiin an thaw hlawp hlawp a: Peh tûr awm loh vangin an mit a thim rum rum.

source: They're expecting you
target: An beisei che a ni

source: It was the doctor's call.
target: Doctor kohna a ni.

source: And I will make war on you like David, and you will be shut in by earthworks, and I will make towers round you.
target: Tin, nangmah bei tumin i vêlah ka ep ang chia, kulh siamin ka hual vêl bawk ang chia, bei tûr chein hual velna kulhbingte ka siam ang.

source: But I was guiding Ephraim's footsteps; I took them up in my arms, but they were not conscious that I was ready to make them well.
target: Kei erawh chuan Ephraim chu ka bâna dawmin kal ka zirtîr a, An mahni ka tihtîr a ni tih erawh chu an hre lo.

source: She looked at me and said Hi
target: Min en a Hi

source: Hold it!
target: Chelh rawh!

source: Say "aah"
target: aah ti rawh

source: There is a river whose streams make glad the resting-place of God, the holy place of the tents of the Most High.
target: Lui pakhat a awm a, chu mi pengte chuan Pathian khawpui chu a tilawm thin. Chungnungbera awmna hmun thianghlim chu.

source: And Moses took the breast, waving it for a wave offering before the Lord; it was Moses' part of the sheep of the priest's offering, as the Lord gave orders to Moses.
target: Tin, Mosian a ir chu a la a, LALPA hmaa then thilhlanah a then a: tihhranna berampaa Mosia chanvo a ni, LALPAN Mosia thu a pêk ang khan.

source: What did she mean
target: Eng nge a sawi tum

source: And orders were given them not to put them to death, but to give them great pain for five months: and their pain was as the pain from the wound of a scorpion.
target: Tin, an hnenah chuan mihringte chu tihlum em lova, thla nga tihrehawm zawk turin thu an pe a; an tihhrehawmzia chu khawmualkaikuangin mi a seha a tihrehawm ang hi a ni.

source: And most of all, using faith as a cover to keep off all the flaming arrows of the Evil One.
target: chung lo pawh chu rinna phaw la ula, chu mi chuan mi sual thal alh thei zawng zawng chu in timit thei ang.

source: Let us go into his tent; let us give worship at his feet.
target: A awmnaah chuan kal ila, A ke nghahchhan bulah chibai i bûk ang u.

source: Don't make light of me.
target: Min ti light suh.

source: You have kept their hearts from wisdom: for this cause you will not give them honour.
target: Hriat thiamna lakah an thinlung i thup a; Chuvangin, anni zawng i chawisâng lo vang.

source: Have them lettered on the pillars of your houses and over the doors of your towns.
target: Tin, in in kawngka bianga te, in kawngkharah te in ziak tur a ni.

source: Sami was not dead
target: Sami chu a thi lo

source: And let that food be kept in store for the land till the seven bad years which are to come in Egypt; so that the land may not come to destruction through need of food.
target: Tichuan, tâm avânga ram hi a boral loh nân buh chu tâm kum, kum sarih Aigupta rama lo thleng tûr atân chuan he ram atân hian inrinlâwkna tûr a ni ang, a ti a.

source: And their brothers, men of war, a hundred and twenty-eight; and their overseer was Zabdiel, the son of Haggedolim.
target: an unau mi chak huaisente nên 128 an ni; an hotu chu Hegedolima fapa Zabdiela a ni a.

source: Get to work!
target: Hnâ thawk rawh!

source: They were afraid of you
target: An hlau che a ni

source: I asked her for a date.
target: Date ka dil a.

source: All is to no purpose, said the Preacher, all the ways of man are to no purpose.
target: Thuhriltu chuan, Engmah lo mai mai, Thil zawng zawng hi engmah lo mai a lo ni, a ti a.

source: But the rest of the grain-plants were undamaged, for they had not come up.
target: Nimahsela buh leh vai buhtun chu a dêng chhe lo, a la to rih loh avângin.

source: And when you make an offering of praise to the Lord, make it in a way which is pleasing to him.
target: Tin, lawmthu sawi inthawia LALPA hnena in inthawi hunin chhan tlak in nih theihna turin in inthawi tur a ni.

source: If I send them away to their houses with no food, they will be overcome by weariness on the way; and some of them have come from far.
target: chaw ngheia an ina ka hawntir chuan kawng lakah an chau dawn si a; thenkhatte phei chu an lo kalna a hla hle si a, a ti a.

source: If I have given back evil to him who did evil to me, or have taken anything from him who was against me without cause;
target: Ka thian chu sualnaa thungrul ka lo nih chuan, A ni, enga khawlai lova mi dotu hi ka chhanhim zawk a ni;

source: I will take my flesh in my teeth, and put my life in my hand.
target: Ka tisa hi ka hain ka pet ang a, Ka nun hi ka kutah ka dah êm ni?

source: He doesn't like to study
target: A zir duh lo va

source: I thoroughly enjoyed myself.
target: Ka hlim hle.

source: And Balak made offerings of oxen and sheep, and sent to Balaam and the chiefs who were with him.
target: Tin, Balala chu bawng leh beramin a inthawi a, Balaama leh a hnena mi lian awmte chu a pe a.

source: I am trying
target: Ka tichhin zel

source: What in the hell is this?
target: Hei hi eng nge ni?

source: Pay no attention to it
target: Ngaihsak suh

source: One of the servants of the high priest, a relation of him whose ear had been cut off by Peter, said, Did I not see you with him in the garden?
target: Tin, Puithiam Lalber bawih pakhat, Petera beng sah thlaka laichin chuan, A hnenah huanah khan ka hmu lo che em ni? a ti a.

source: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the sea is covered by the waters.
target: Tuifinriat chu tuiin a khat vek angin LALPA ropuizia hriatnain lei hi a khat vek dâwn si a,

source: Now Jacob's fountain was there. Jesus, being tired after his journey, was resting by the fountain. It was about the sixth hour.
target: Jakoba tuichhunchhuah pawh kha chutah chuan a awm. Chutichuan Isua chu a kal hah avangin tuichhunchhuah sirah chuan a thu chawt a: chawfak hun lai a ni a.

source: Why do these people of Jerusalem go back, for ever turning away? they will not give up their deceit, they will not come back.
target: Engatinge he Jerusalem mite hi, Kumkhuaa hnungtawlh tûra an tawlh thlûk tâk le? Bumna an vuan tlat, kîr leh an duh lo.

source: And there was one named Barabbas, in prison with those who had gone against the government and in the fight had taken life.
target: Tin, mi pakhat Barabba an tih chu, helte zingah phuarin a lum reng a, chung chuan helnaah chuan tual an that a ni.

source: I can't win.
target: Ka chak thei lo.

source: But the herdmen of Gerar had a fight with Isaac's herdmen, for they said, The spring is ours: so he gave the spring the name of Esek, because there was a fight about it.
target: Tichuan Gerar khuaa ranpute chuan, Tui hi kan ta a ni, tiin Isaaka ranpute nen chuan an inhnial a: tichuan amah nen an inhnial avângin tuichhunchhuah hmingah chuan Esek a vuah ta a.

source: For by his act we were given existence in Christ Jesus to do those good works which God before made ready for us so that we might do them.
target: Thil tha ti atan Krista Isuaah chuan siama awmin ama kut chhuak kan ni si a; chu thil tha tih chu kan awmna turin Pathianin a buatsaih lawk a ni.

source: He put forces in all the walled towns of Judah, and responsible chiefs in the land of Judah and in the towns of Ephraim, which Asa his father had taken.
target: Tin, Judai rama kulh nei khua zawng zawnga sipaite a dah a: Judai ram leh a pa Asan a lo lak Ephraim rama khuaahte chuan ralvengtute a dah a.

source: Now the day after, when they were on their journey and were near the town, Peter went up to the top of the house for prayer, about the sixth hour:
target: Tin, atukah an kal laia khaw kiang an thlen dawnin, Petera chu tawngtai turin chawfak hun laiin, in chungah a lawn chho va;

source: And they will come out; those who have done good, into the new life; and those who have done evil, to be judged.
target: thil tha titute chu nunna changing an tho leh ang a, thil sual titute chu thiam loh changing an tho leh ang.

source: I never called her back
target: Ka ko let ngai lo

source: Were you shopping
target: Shopping i nei em

source: He will not come back to his house, and his place will have no more knowledge of him.
target: A inah chuan a kir ngai tawh lo vang a, A hmunin amah a hre leh tawh hek lo vang.

source: Am I to take my bread and my wine and the meat I have got ready for my wool-cutters and give it to men coming from I have no idea where?
target: Ka chhang te, ka tui te leh ka berâm hmul mettute tana ka talh chu tute nge an ni tih pawh hriat hleih lohte hi ka pe tehlul ang maw? a tia .

source: They went to church
target: Biak inah an kal a

source: Then he said, Get me a sword. So they went and put a sword before the king.
target: Tin, lal chuan, Khandaih mi han lak teh u, a ti a. Tichuan khandaih chu lal hmaah chuan an rawn la a.

source: I also went.
target: Keipawh ka kal.

source: Don't litter
target: Vak kual suh

source: And the simple people living there were uncommonly kind to us, for they made a fire for us, and took us in, because it was raining and cold.
target: Tin, awze miten khawngaih namenin min khawngaih lo va; ruah a lo sur avang leh a vawh avangin mei an chhem a, kan zain min lo lawm a.

source: Jesus said in answer, This voice came not for me but for you.
target: Isuan a chhang a, chu aw chu ka tana lo chhuak a ni lo, nangmahni tan a ni zawk e.

source: I don't sing
target: Ka zai lo

source: And do not make my holy name common; so that it may be kept holy by the children of Israel: I am the Lord who make you holy,
target: Tin, ka hming thianghlim hi in tihliau tur a ni lo va, Israela thlahte zingah chawimawin ka awm tur a ni. Kei hi nangmahni chawimawitu,

source: Tom talked
target: Tom a tawng

source: I understand
target: Ka hrethiam e

source: Do come in!
target: Lo lut rawh!

source: Truly, there is no deceit in my lips, and my tongue does not say what is false.
target: Ka hmuiin fel lohna thu a phuh chuak tawp lo vang, Ka leiin bumna thu a sawi hek lo vang,

source: Money's a little tight.
target: Sum a tight deuh.

source: After these things Jesus and his disciples went into the land of Judaea, and there he was with them for some time, giving baptism.
target: Chung hnuah chuan Isua a zirtirte nen Judai ramah an kal a, chutah chuan Isua an hnenah a awm reng a, a baptis thin a,

source: And from there, going about in a curve, we came to Rhegium: and after one day a south wind came up and on the day after we came to Puteoli:
target: Chuta tangin kan kal kual a, Region khua kan thleng a; tin, ni khat chinah chhim thli a lo tleh a, atuk lehah Puteoli khua kan thleng leh a;

source: Then in the hearing of all the meeting of Israel, Moses said the words of this song, to the end.
target: Tichuan Mosian, Israel pungkhawmho zawng zawng benghriatah chuan he hla thu hi a tawp thlengin a sawi vek a.

source: We watch PBS
target: PBS kan en

source: And they will be full of fear, and will no longer have faith in Ethiopia which was their hope, or in Egypt which was their glory.
target: Tichuan an beisei ber Ethiopia-ho leh an ropuina ber Aigupta-ho avâng chuan mangang tak leh mualpho takin an awm tawh ang.

source: I was absent
target: Ka awm lo

source: I miss him
target: Amah ka ngai

source: Will you be hard on a leaf in flight before the wind? will you make a dry stem go more quickly on its way?
target: Hnahthel leng chu i chaih buai dawn êm ni? Buhpawl ro chu i um dawn êm ni?

source: So that he may give decision for a man in his cause with God, and between a son of man and his neighbour.
target: Pathian hnênah miin mihring hi tan teh sela aw! Mihring fapain a thenawm a tan ang hian.

source: Tom didn't see you.
target: Tom a hmu lo che.

source: We all do it.
target: Kan zavaiin kan tivek.

source: And he put the other sheep before the Lord, the sheep with which they were made priests; and Aaron and his sons put their hands on the head of the sheep,
target: Tin, berampa dang, tihhranna berampa chu a han hlan leh a: Arona leh a fapate chuan berampa lu chungah chuan an kut an nghat a.

source: Take my yoke on you and become like me, for I am gentle and without pride, and you will have rest for your souls;
target: Ka nghawngkawl bat ula, ka hnenah zir rawh u; thuhnuairawlh leh rilrua inngaitlawm tak ka nih hi: tichuan, in thlarau tan chawlhna in hmu ang.

source: And Jesus gave orders to the unclean spirit, and it went out of him: and the boy was made well from that hour.
target: Tin, Isuan ramhuai chu a hau va, a chhung ata a chhuak ta a; chu mi dar achinah chuan naupang chu a lo dam ta a.
