source: And do not keep the rules of the nations which I am driving out before you; for they did all these things, and for that reason my soul was turned against them.
target: In hmaa ka hnawhchhuah tak hnam dante chu in zawh tur a ni lo: heng thil zawng zawng hi an ti thin a, chuvang chuan ka ten a ni.

source: Then I came back, and I saw an example of what is to no purpose under the sun.
target: Tin, ka han thlir leh a, ni hnuaiah chuan engmah lo a ni ka hmuh ni.

source: How is it, that if any one of you has a cause at law against another, he takes it before a Gentile judge and not before the saints?
target: In zingah tupawhin mi dang chungah thupawi nei ula, mi thianghlimte hmaa thlen lovin, mi fel lote hmaah in thlen ngam dawn em ni?

source: As for the form of their faces, they were the faces whose form I saw by the river Chebar; when they went, every one of them went straight forward.
target: Tin, an hmêl lam thu-ah chuan Kebar luia ka hmuh hmêlte ang bawk kha, an landan leh anmahni ngeite pawh an ni a; tin, an hmazâwng zêlin an kal țheuh va.

source: And do not give grief to the Holy Spirit of God, by whom you were marked for the day of salvation.
target: Tin, Pathian Thlarau Thianghlim chu tilungngai suh u, tlanna ni atan chuan amahah chhinchhiaha in awm kha.

source: But let him, being a chief among his people, not make himself unclean in such a way as to put shame on himself.
target: An chipuite zinga a puia ber an nih avangin an intibawlhhlawhin an intibawrhbang tur a ni lo.

source: Look alive
target: Harh rawh

source: Great numbers will make attempts to get the approval of a ruler: and every man is the special friend of him who has something to give.
target: Mi tam takin mi thilphal duhsakna an ngen ang a; Thil pe thintu lakah chuan mi tin, mai hi thian an ni.

source: Are you sitting comfortably?
target: I thut nuam em?

source: Did you get up early?
target: I tho hma em ni?

source: And Saul said, Give your decision between my son Jonathan and me. And Jonathan was taken.
target: Tin, Saula chuan, Kei leh ka fapa Jonathana chungah chuan a tlu a.

source: We've got trouble.
target: Buaina kan nei a.

source: The blower is blowing strongly, the lead is burned away in the fire: they go on heating the metal to no purpose, for the evil-doers are not taken away.
target: Pumin a chhem huau huau va, Meiah chuan suan chu a tuiral a, Tihthianghlim tumna chu a thlawn mai a ni, Mi sualte paih bo an ni si lo.

source: She asked me for money.
target: Pawisa min dil a.

source: He pushed past me.
target: Min rawn tlan pel a.

source: He found it
target: A hmu ta

source: For who is God but the Lord? or who is a Rock but our God?
target: LALPA lo chu tunge Pathian awm ni? Ka Pathian lo chu tunge lungpui awm ni?

source: Do it for Tom.
target: Tom-a tân ti rawh.

source: But when the Jews made protest against it, I had to put my cause into Caesar's hands; not because I have anything to say against my nation.
target: Nimahsela Judaten chu chu an hnial avngin Kaisara hnena thlen lo thei ka ni ta lo va; nimahsela ka chite hekna neia ti ka ni lo ve.

source: He takes the wise in their secret designs, and the purposes of the twisted are cut off suddenly.
target: Mi fingte chu anmahni fin verveknain a awk a, Mi vervek remruat chu theh thlak der a ni.

source: We looked for her.
target: Kan zawng a.

source: She walks
target: A pen mek

source: Let's shake hands.
target: Kut inthleng ila.

source: Don't do that yet.
target: Chutiang chu la ti suh.

source: And the sons of Moses, the man of God, were put into the list of the tribe of Levi.
target: Pathian mi Mosia erawh chu , a fate chu Levi hnam zinga chhiar an ni.

source: Will he make arguments with words in which is no profit, and with sayings which have no value?
target: Tawng tlaktlai lo hmangin emaw Thusawi thatna nei lo hmangin emaw a sawi dawn êm ni?

source: Explain it to us.
target: Min hrilhfiah rawh.

source: He makes safe the man who is free from sin, and if your hands are clean, salvation will be yours.
target: Pawikhawih lo ni lo pawh a chan chhuak ang a, A ni i kut thianghlimna azarah chhanchhuahin a awm ang.

source: Or let him put himself under my power, and make peace with me.
target: Kei min rem duh chuan ka angchhûngah lo tlu lut se, mi rem rawh se.

source: It is not right for a woman to be dressed in man's clothing, or for a man to put on a woman's robe: whoever does such things is disgusting to the Lord your God.
target: Hmeichhiain mipa thuamhnaw an inbel tur ani lo va, mipain hmeiche silhfen an inbel tur ani hek lo; tupawh chutiang ti apiang chu LALPA in Pathian ngaihin mi tenawm an ni.

source: I was on a high.
target: High ah ka awm a.

source: Do not take the property of another.
target: I ru tur a ni lo.

source: And he gave them their request, but sent a wasting disease into their souls.
target: An thil dil chu a pe a; Nimahsela an nunnaah chan cherna aluhtir ta a.

source: With her fair words she overcame him, forcing him with her smooth lips.
target: A tawngkam thiamin a thlem thlu a, A infak mawinain a hruai bo ta a.

source: But of the other Apostles I saw only James, the Lord's brother.
target: Tirhkoh dangte erawh chu Lalpa unau Jakoba chauh lo chu tumah ka hmu lo va.

source: They have nothing to eat.
target: Ei tur an nei lo.

source: His heart was lifted up in the ways of the Lord; and he went so far as to take away the high places and the wood pillars out of Judah.
target: Tin, a rilru chu LALPA lamah a thle a; tin, Judai ram aa hmun sângte leh Aserite a thehthang bo vek bawk a.

source: Then the servants and their children came near, and went down on their faces.
target: Chutichuan bâwihnute chu, anmahni leh an fate nên chuan an lo kal hnai a, an kûn a, chibai an bûk a.

source: Please let me pay
target: Khawngaihin min pek tir rawh

source: And I will make Mount Seir a cause for wonder and a waste, cutting off from it all comings and goings.
target: Hetiang hian Seir tlâng chu rapthlâk taka siamin ka tițiau vang; a chunga mi veivak țhinte chu ka titawp vek ang.

source: I heard that
target: Ka hria e

source: Let us out
target: Kan lo chhuak

source: And Elijah took twelve stones, the number of the tribes of the sons of Jacob, to whom the Lord had said, Israel will be your name:
target: Tin, I hming chu Israela a ni ang, tia LALPA thu lo dawngtu Jakoba fate hnam zat lung sawm le pahnih Elijan a la a.

source: It's a Germanic word.
target: German tawng a ni.

source: In his tent will be seen that which is not his, burning stone is dropped on his house.
target: A mi ni ngai lo a puan inah an cheng ang a. A chennaah kat theh darh a ni ang.

source: We trust him
target: Amah kan ring

source: God has gone up with a glad cry, the Lord with the sound of the horn.
target: Pathian chu au thawm nên a chho va, LALPA chu tawtawrâwt ri nên a chho ta e.

source: The game has finished.
target: Inkhel a zo ta.

source: Let the arm of the sinner and the evil-doer be broken; go on searching for his sin till there is no more.
target: Mi suaksual ban chu titliak la; Mi sual chu, a suahsualna zawng chhuak ang che, i hmuh loh thuai hma loh chuan.

source: Are you mad?
target: I a em?

source: They become exuberant as well
target: An hlim hle bawk

source: He smiled.
target: A nui.

source: Anyone touching anything on the bed or on the thing on which she has been seated, will be unclean till evening.
target: Khuma thil awm emaw, a thutnaa thil awm emaw khawih apiangte chu tlai lam thlengin an bawlhhlawh ang.

source: Mary came in
target: Mary lo lût rawh

source: While you do acts of power for which we are not looking, and which have not come to the ears of men in the past.
target: Kan beisei loh thil rapthlâk i tih lai khan i lo chhuk a, tlangte chu i hmaah an luan thlak dul dul kha.

source: And he put down the silver in the Temple and went out, and put himself to death by hanging.
target: Tin, ani chuan tangka chu hmun thianghlimah chuan a paih lut a, a kal bo va; a va inawkhlum ta a.

source: They're the enemy
target: Hmelma an ni

source: I haven't had time.
target: Hun ka la nei lo.

source: Hey, don't go
target: Hei, kal suh

source: And I will take every care so that you may have a clear memory of these things after my death.
target: A ni, ka kal chhuah hnuin chung thil chu in hriat reng fo theih nan ka bei ang.

source: I am right
target: Ka dik e

source: His armies come on together, they make their road high against me, and put up their tents round mine.
target: A sipai rual an kal khâwm a, Ka lamah kawng an thlak a, Ka puan in vêlah buk an khuar a.

source: They can't get enough of each other
target: An inhmu thei lo

source: For this reason you will no longer take the lives of men and will never again be the cause of loss of children to your nation, says the Lord.
target: mihringte i eiral tawh lo vang a, i mite pawh i chân ngai tawh hek lo vang, tih hi LALPA PATHIAN thu chhuak a ni;

source: All who have knowledge of you among the peoples will be overcome with wonder at you: you have become a thing of fear, and you will never be seen again.
target: Mite zinga a hria apiang che mak tiha'n, =ihkhaiah i lo chang ta, I awm ngai rêng rêng tawh lo vang le, tiin.

source: He may go in flight from the iron spear, but the arrow from the bow of brass will go through him;
target: Thir hriamhrei chu a tlan bosâng ang a, Dar thlangul chuan amah a kap tlâng ang.

source: And on the twenty-fourth day of the first month I was by the side of the great river;
target: Tin, thla khatna, ni sawmhnih leh ni li nîa lui ropui tak Hidekel kama ka awm lai chuan,

source: But my agreement will be with Isaac, to whom Sarah will give birth a year from this time.
target: Ka thuthlung erawh chu Isaaka, Sarin nakkum hetih hun taka a hrinsak tûr che hnênah chuan a ni ka tihngheh zâwk dâwn ni, a ti a.

source: I hesitated
target: Ka ngamlo

source: I didn't stop
target: Ka tawp lo

source: I feel it now.
target: Tunah ka hria e.

source: Whatever the Father gives to me will come to me; and I will not send away anyone who comes to me.
target: Pain mi pek zawng zawng ka hnenah an lo kal vek ang; tupawh ka hnena lo kal chu ka hnawt chhuak tawp lo vang.

source: Your chiefs have made my holy place unclean, so I have made Jacob a curse, and Israel a thing of shame.
target: chuvangin hmun thianghlima mi liante chu ka tibawrhbang ang a, tichuan Jakob-ho chu ânchhedawngah ka siam ang a; Israel-ho chu hauburah ka siam bawk ang.

source: Or the seven cakes of bread of the four thousand, and the number of baskets you took up?
target: Mi sangli chhangper pasariha hriaa in bawm ruh khah zat pawh kha?

source: They're strong enough
target: An chak tawk a ni

source: I was about to go to bed.
target: Ka mu dawn ta a.

source: I'm an astronomer
target: Astronomer ka ni a

source: For sin may not have rule over you: because you are not under law, but under grace.
target: Sualnain in chungah thu a nei dawn tawh si lo, dan rorela awm in ni lo va, khawngaihna rorela awm in ni zawk si a.

source: But the right thing to say would be, If it is the Lord's pleasure and if we are still living, we will do this and that.
target: Chutichuan, Lalpan rem a tih chuan kan dam ang a, chu mi kha mi kan ti ang, in ti tur hi a ni.

source: Tom's safe
target: Tom-a a him

source: For their feet are running after evil, and they are quick to take a man's life.
target: An kete chu thil sual lamah an tlan a, Thisen chuah tûrin an hmanhmawh ruai thin.

source: We need help
target: anpui kan mamawh

source: They were murdered
target: An thah a ni

source: On these two rules all the law and the prophets are based.
target: Chung thupek pahnihah chuan dan thu leh zawlneite thu zawng zawng a inkhaikhawm vek a ni, a ti a.

source: No, don't sit there
target: Aih, sawta ṭhu suh

source: And after him came Jair the Gileadite, who was judge over Israel for twenty-two years.
target: Chu mi hnuah chuan Gilead mi jaira a l chhuak a, kum sâwmhnih leh kum hnih Israelte ro a rêl a.

source: So that is what comes to the man who gets wealth for himself, and has not wealth in the eyes of God.
target: Mahni tana sum khawla Pathian lama ngah si lo chu, chuti chu a ni thin, a ti a.

source: So Aaron put it away in front of the holy chest to be kept, as the Lord gave orders to Moses.
target: LALPAN Mosia thu a pêk ang chuan Arona chuan vawn rêng tûrin Thuhriattîrna hmaah chuan a dah a.

source: And fifty hooks of brass for joining them together to make the tent.
target: Tin, puan in chu pindan pakhat a lo ni theih nan a chilh zawna turin dar chilhbehna sawmnga a siam a.

source: We see your going, O God: even the going of my God, my King, into the holy place.
target: Aw Pathian, i kal laite an hmu a, Ka Pathian ka Lalber hmun thianghlima kal laite chu.

source: He lives in peace
target: Thlamuang takin a nung a ni

source: And Joseph saw Ephraim's children of the third generation: and the children of Machir, the son of Manasseh, came to birth on Joseph's knees.
target: Josefa chuan Ephraima fa, a tute khûp thum a hmu a: Manasea fapa Makira fate pawh Josefa mal chungah an piang a.

source: After him were working their brothers, Bavvai, the son of Henadad, ruler of half the division of Keilah.
target: A dawt chu an unauten an siam tha a, keila bial chanve hotu Henada fapa Bavaia-te hovin,

source: And David made houses for himself in the town of David; and he got ready a place for the ark of God, and put up a tent for it.
target: Tin, Davida chuan Davida khawpiah chuan inte a sa a; tin, pathian bâwm awmna hmun a buatsaih a, puan in a zarsak a.

source: Trust me
target: Min ring rawh

source: Is this information correct
target: He thu hi a dik em

source: So it is no longer I who do it, but the sin living in me.
target: Chutichuan ka thiltih hi keima tih a ni tawh lo va, sual keimaha awm tih chu a ni zawk.

source: For my body is full of burning; all my flesh is unhealthy.
target: Ka kawng hi a sa hluah hluah vek a; ka tisaah pawh hian dam lai reng a awm lo.

source: May he keep all your offerings in mind, and be pleased with the fat of your burned offerings; (Selah.
target: I thilhlan zawng zawng chu hre reng sela, I hâlral thilhlan chu lawm rawh se: Selah

source: Are seats available?
target: Seat a awm em?

source: How then is it possible for man to be upright before God? or how may he be clean who is a son of woman?
target: Engtin nge Pathian hmaah mi a fel theih ang le? Engtin nge hmeichhe hrin a thianghlim theih ang?

source: And nothing unclean may come into it, or anyone whose works are cursed or false; but only those whose names are in the Lamb's book of life.
target: Tin, thil bawlhhlawh reng a lut hauh lo vang a, thil tenawm tite leh dawt hmangte pawh an lut hek lo vang; Beram No Nunna Bua hming an ziakte chauh an lut ang.

source: Ahi, the son of Abdiel, the son of Guni, head of their families.
target: Ahia chu Abdiela fapa a ni a, chu mi chu Gunia fapa a ni a, an chhûng hotu a ni.

source: Let that sink in.
target: Chu chu pil lut rawh se.

source: For if I put up again those things which I gave to destruction, I am seen to be a wrongdoer.
target: Ka thil thiatte kha ka sak leh si chuan bawhchhetu ka nih ka inhriattir mai a ni ang.

source: Let water from your store and not that of others be your drink, and running water from your fountain.
target: Nangma tuibel ata tui in la, Nangma tuichhunchhuaha tui thar lam chu.

source: Now, as to the things in your letter to me: It is good for a man to have nothing to do with a woman.
target: Tin, in thil ziak thute kha chu : Mipa tan hmeichhe khawih loh a tha a ni.

source: And the men were working hard to get back to the land, but they were not able to do so: for the sea got rougher and rougher against them.
target: Nimahsela mite chuan khawmualah kîr tûrin an kar vak vak a; amaherawhchu an thei lo va: tuifinriat lah chu an chungah a fâwn nasa telh telh si a.

source: Who does great things outside our knowledge, wonders without number:
target: Thil ropui tak zawng chhuah rual loh te, Thil mak tak mai chhiar sen lohte titu chu:

source: He's in pain
target: A na mek

source: As for the earth, bread comes out of it; but under its face it is turned up as if by fire.
target: Lei hi chaw lo chhuahna a ni a, A chhûng chu mei kan anga chawh leh a ni a.

source: He didn't pay anything.
target: Engmah a pe lo.

source: Try to be concise
target: Thui taka sawi tum ang che

source: Now for three years there was no war between Aram and Israel.
target: Tin, kum thum chhûng chu Suria ho le Israel-hote chu indo lovin an awm a.

source: They borrow money
target: Pawisa an puk a

source: Just do that
target: Kha kha timai rawh

source: I have a home
target: In ka nei

source: Do you sell shirt
target: Kawr in zuar em

source: It's illegal
target: Dân phalloh a ni

source: And let man and beast be covered with haircloth, and let them make strong prayers to God: and let everyone be turned from his evil way and the violent acts of their hands.
target: Mihring leh rante chuan saiip puan sin zâwk sela, Nasa takin pathian au rawh se: a ni, mitinin mahni kawng țha lo leh an kuta pâwngnêkna chu hawisan rawh se.

source: She was ambitious
target: A tumruh hle a ni

source: For good faith goes out of my mouth, and false lips are disgusting to me.
target: Ka ka chuan thutak a sawi chhuak ang a, Suahsualna chu ka hmui tan thil tenawm a ni.

source: So the order went out that the wise men were to be put to death; and they were looking for Daniel and his friends to put them to death.
target: Chutichuan thupêk chu a chhuak ta a, mi finghote chu tihhlum tûr an ni ta a; tin, Daniela leh a țhian te pawh tihhlum tûrin an zawng a.

source: We're going back home.
target: Kan haw leh ta.

source: To have knowledge of wise teaching; to be clear about the words of reason:
target: Finna leh zirtirna, hriat theihna tur te, Hriat thiamna thu ngaihruat dan thiamna te;

source: We are Arabs
target: Arab mi kan nia

source: Is anybody awake
target: Tu emaw a harh em

source: Tom waved.
target: Tom-an a vai.

source: Excuse me a moment
target: Tlem tal min ngaidam rawh

source: I give praise to God through Jesus Christ our Lord. So with my mind I am a servant to the law of God, but with my flesh to the law of sin.
target: Isua Krista kan Lalpa avangin Pathian hnenah lawmthu ka sawi a ni. Chutichuan keimah tak chuan ka rilru chuanin Pathian dan rawng ka bawl thin, ka tisa erawh chuan sualna dan rawng ka bawl thin.

source: I have asthma
target: Khuhhîp ka nei

source: May we have forgiveness for our sins, as we make free all those who are in debt to us. And let us not be put to the test.
target: Kan sualte min ngaidam ang che, Keini pawhin kan englo bate zawng zawng kan ngaidam thin a ni. Thlemnaah min hruai lut suh ang che,’ a ti a.

source: These are the children of Zilpah, whom Laban gave to his daughter Leah, and Jacob had these sixteen children by her.
target: Chûngho chu Zilpaii Labanan a fanu Leaii hnêna a peka fapate chu an ni, chûngho chu Jakoba a hrinsak a, mi sâwm leh parukte chu.

source: Do you wanna play
target: I khelh duh em

source: I'm so happy
target: Ka lâwm e

source: I am as tall as he
target: Amah ang bawka sang ka ni

source: Then I will send my blessing on you in the sixth year, and the land will give fruit enough for three years.
target: a kum ruk kum chuan ka malsawmna inchungah ka thlentir ang a, kum thum chhûng atan chuan rah a chhuah ang.

source: He's an extremist
target: Extremist a ni

source: SW And the rooster
target: SW Tin vawk chu

source: Through me chiefs have authority, and the noble ones are judging in righteousness.
target: Kei mi hmangin hotuten ro an rel a, Mi lian te, leilunga rorêltute zawng zawng pawhin.

source: Go ahead and laugh
target: Hma la la nui rawh

source: And the right is turned back, and righteousness is far away: for good faith is not to be seen in the public places, and upright behaviour may not come into the town.
target: Tichuan rorêlna chuan hnung lam min hawisan a, felna chuan hla takah min dinsan ta: thutak chu kawtthlêrah a tlu reng si a, dikna chu a lût thei lo a ni.

source: I am your shield
target: I tân phaw ka nih hi

source: And Levi made a great feast for him in his house: and a great number of tax-farmers and others were seated at table with them.
target: Tin, Levia chuan a inah Isua tan ruai ropui tak a theh a; tichuan chhiahkhawntute, mi dangte nen, mi tam takin anmahni an kilpui hlawm a.

source: They cost too much
target: An man a to lutuk

source: You are a fountain of gardens, a spring of living waters, and flowing waters from Lebanon.
target: Nang chu huan tuikhur, tui nung chhunchhuah chu i ni, Luite lo luang Lebanon tlangan.

source: But when the people saw it they were full of fear, and gave glory to God who had given such authority to men.
target: Tin, mipuite chuan chu chu an hmuhin, an hlau va, mihringte hnena chutiang thuneihna petu Pathian chu an fak a.

source: Be as calm in your waiting; let your hearts be strong: because the coming of the Lord is near.
target: Nangni pawh chhel takin awm rawh u; in thinlung tinghet rawh u; Lalpa lo kalna chu a hnai tawh si a.

source: Do you have it yet
target: I la nei em

source: Give your son training while there is hope; let not your heart be purposing his death.
target: Beiseiawm a la nih laiin i fapa chuthunun la, Boral mai tûrah ngai suh.

source: Then, hearing this, a number of his disciples said, This is a hard saying; who is able to take in such teaching?
target: Chutichuan a zirtirte a then tam takin chu chu an hriatin, Hei hi thu khirh tak a ni, tunge dawngsawng thei ang? an ti a.

source: The foolish man, folding his hands, takes the flesh of his body for food.
target: Mi â chuan a kut a kuangkuah a, a intam hlum thin' tih a ni a.

source: Then Solomon went to Ezion-geber and to Eloth by the sea in the land of Edom.
target: Chutichuan Solomona chu Edom rama tuifinriat kama Ezon-geber-ah leh Eloth-ah a kal a.

source: All his best fighting-men will be put to the sword, and the rest will be sent away to every wind: and you will be certain that I the Lord have said it.
target: Tin, a pâwl zawng zawnga tlânchhe ho zawng zawng chu khandaihin an thi ang a, a la bângte chu kawlkil tinah an darh ang: Tin, kei LALPA hian ka sawi tawh tih in hre chhuak ang.

source: Why has the evil-doer a low opinion of God, saying in his heart, You will not make search for it?
target: Eng vangin nge mi suaksual chua Pathian a hmusit a, A rilruin, I phut lo vang a tih thin ni?

source: These are the rules
target: Hengte hi dan a ni

source: He will again have pity on us; he will put our sins under his feet: and you will send all our sins down into the heart of the sea.
target: A hawi kîr leh ang a, kan chungah khawngaihna a nei ang; kan khawlohnate chu a ke hnuaiah a rapbet ang: nangin an sualna zawng zawngte chu tuifinriat mawng thûk takahte chuan i paih lût ang.

source: The twenty-first Hothir, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi sawmhnih leh vawi khatna chu Hothira chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: O God, you see how foolish I am; and my wrongdoing is clear to you.
target: Aw Pathian, nang chuan ka atzia hi i hria a; Ka thiam lohnate pawh hi i lakah thup ani lo.

source: But the Lord will make Israel free with an eternal salvation: you will not be put to shame or made low for ever and ever.
target: Israel-ho erawh chu kumkhaw chhandamnaa LALPA Chhandamin an awm ang: chatuan thleng pawhin in mualphovin in zak hek lo vang.

source: Men will come there with bows and arrows, because all the land will be full of blackberries and thorns.
target: Ram zawng zawng chu buar leh hnimhlingnei hlir a lo nih tak avângin chutah chuan thal leh thal ngul kengin an kal ang.

source: But we give the news of the secret wisdom of God, which he had kept in store before the world came into existence, for our glory;
target: Pathian thu fing thuruk chu kan sawi zawk thin a ni, thu fing inthup, kan ropuina tura Pathianin khawvel awm hmaa a ruat lawk tawh chu.

source: Then you will go safely on your way, and your feet will have no cause for slipping.
target: Tichuan i kawngah him takin i kal ang a, I ke chu a petek lo vang.

source: Then the chiefs went down to the doors; the Lord's people went down among the strong ones.
target: Tichuan mi lian la awm chhûngte leh mipuite chu an lo chhuk a; Mi chak tak mi beihpui tûrin LALPA chu a lo chhuk ta.

source: They feel nauseous
target: An rilru a na hle

source: Will a man take food which has no taste without salt? or is there any taste in the soft substance of purslain?
target: Tuina nei lo chu chi tel lovin a ei theih êm ni? Artui pawnvar pawh hian hanna a nei êm ni?

source: For a short time I gave you up; but with great mercies I will take you back again.
target: Mitkhapkar lek ka ma chia; nimahsela khawngaihna nasa takin ka hruai leh ang che.

source: A time to take stones away and a time to get stones together; a time for kissing and a time to keep from kissing;
target: Lung paih darh hun a awm a, lung lak khâwm hun a awm; Pawm hun a awm a, pawm loh hun a awm;

source: We've already finished
target: Kan zo tawh

source: You can rest
target: I châwl thei ang

source: As a number of attempts have been made to put together in order an account of those events which took place among us,
target: Kha thil kan zinga lo thleng, atir ata a hmutute leh thu rawngbawltuten keimahni min hrilh ang khan, mi tam takin ziak an tum ta a;

source: So Joab had a horn sounded, and all the people came to a stop, and gave up going after Israel and fighting them.
target: Chutichuan Joaba chuan a tawtawrâwt chu a han ham a, mipuite chu an ding ta thup mai a, Israel mite chu an ûm ta lo va, an bei leh ta lo.

source: And those who are on the earth will have pleasure and delight over them; and they will send offerings one to another because these two prophets gave great trouble to all on the earth.
target: Tin, an thih avangin leia awmte chu an lawm ang a, hlimna an siam ang a, lawmnate an inthawn bawk ang; zawlnei pahnihte chuan leia awmte chu an tihhrehawm thin avangin.

source: Hello, Madam.
target: Ka Pi, Chibai.

source: The twelfth Hashabiah, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi sâwm leh vawi hnihna chu Hasabia chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: Did you see the dog
target: Ui chu i hmu em

source: Ignore him
target: Amah kha engmah mah ngai suh

source: He was sixteen years old when he became king, and he was ruling in Jerusalem for fifty-two years; his mother's name was Jecoliah of Jerusalem.
target: A lal tantir chuan kum sâwm leh kum ruk mi a ni a, Jerusalem-ah kum sâwmnga leh kum hnih a lal a; a nu hming chu Jekoli, Jerusalem mi a ni.

source: It's our car
target: I Kar a nia

source: The Lord is the support of all who are crushed, and the lifter up of all who are bent down.
target: LALPA chuan tlute zawng zawng ch a chelh reng thin a, Kun ngawih ngawiha awm zawng zawngte chu a kaitho thin.

source: So that his glory might have praise through us who first had hope in Christ:
target: keini Krista lo beisei hmasa tawhte hi a ropui fakna kan lo nihna turin.

source: It's a dictionary
target: Dictionary a ni a

source: To the feeble, I was as one who is feeble, so that they might have salvation: I have been all things to all men, so that some at least might have salvation.
target: Chak lote ka lak luh theihna turin chak lote hnenah chak lo angin ka awm thin; eng emaw ti tala thenkhatte tal ka chhandam theihna turin mi zawng zawng hnenah engkim ka ni tawh.

source: So Moses got up and went to Dathan and Abiram, and the responsible men of Israel went with him.
target: Tichuan Mosia chu a tho va, Dathana leh Abirama te hnenah chuan an va kal a; Israel ho upate chuan an zui a.

source: I always have fun.
target: Ka hlim fo thin.

source: You'll give me away.
target: Min pe dawn nia.

source: Even today my outcry is bitter; his hand is hard on my sorrow.
target: Vawiin pawh ka vuina hi a nasa e, Ka rum chung pawhin a kut chu a rit a ni.

source: I screamed
target: Ka au vak

source: And the God of peace will be crushing Satan under your feet before long. The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
target: Tin, remna Pathian chuan in kephah hnauaiah Setana chu a rawn rah perhtir thuai ang che u. Kan Lalpa Isua Krista khawngaihna chu in hnenah awm rawh se.

source: He didn't buy bread
target: Chhang a lei lo

source: But still they took no note and would not give ear, but they made their necks stiff, doing worse than their fathers.
target: Mahse mi ngaithla chuang lo va, beng an dawh hek lo: an rilru an tikhau va, an thlahtute ai chuan an sual ta awk a.

source: I asked a question of him.
target: Zawhna ka zawt a.

source: We won't win.
target: Kan chak dâwn lo.

source: And said to the judges, Take care what you do, for you are judging not for man but for the Lord, and he is with you in the decisions you give.
target: rorêltute hnênah chuan, In thiltih chu ngun taka ngaihtuahin ti rawh u; mihring tana rorêl in ni lo va, LALPA tan a ni zâwk si a; rorêlnaa chuan in hnênah a tel zel a ni.

source: They clinked glasses.
target: Glass an vuah a.

source: A blessing on your good sense and on you, who have kept me today from the crime of blood and from taking into my hands the punishment for my wrongs.
target: tin, i remhriatna chu malsawmin awm sela, tin, nang thisen chhuah thiam loh channa laka mi humtu leh keima kuta phuba la lova mi siamtu chu malsawmin awm bawk ang che.

source: You see that his faith was helping his works and was made complete by them;
target: Rinna chuan a thiltih nen a thawk dun a, tin, thiltih avangin a rinna chu a famkim ta tih i hria e.

source: And they made the king a prisoner and took him up to the king of Babylon at Riblah to be judged.
target: Tichuan lal chu an man a, Babulon lal hnênah Ribla khuaah an hruai a; tin, a chungchâng an rêl a.

source: But have nothing to do with unclean and foolish stories. Give yourself training in religion:
target: Amaherawhchu, Pathian zah lohna leh pitarte thawnthu mai mai duh suh. Tin, Pathian ngaihsak turin insawizawi rah:

source: And the Pharisees and the scribes put the question to him, Why do your disciples not keep the rules of the fathers, but take their bread with unwashed hands?
target: Chutichuan Pharisaite leh lehkhaziaktute chuan, Engati nge i zirtirte upa thurochhiah ang zela awm lova, kut bawlhhlawhin chhang an ei thin ni? tiin an zawt a.

source: Did you know that
target: Chu chu i hria em

source: I wore a hat.
target: Lukhum ka khum.

source: And at that time David had taken cover in the strong place, and an armed force of the Philistines was in Beth-lehem.
target: Tin, chutih lai chuan Davida chu kulhbingah a awm a, chutih lai bawk chuan Philistia sipaiho chu Beth-lehem-ah an awm a.

source: A heritage may be got quickly at first, but the end of it will not be a blessing.
target: Sum hi atirah deh chhuah thuai theih mah sela, A tawpah malsawm a ni kher lo vang.

source: How hot is it?
target: Engtia sa nge?

source: We didn't deserve to win.
target: Chak kan phu lo.

source: Jehoiachin was eighteen years old when he became king; he was ruling in Jerusalem for three months and ten days, and he did evil in the eyes of the Lord.
target: Jehoiakina chu a lal tantirhin kum riat a ni a, Jerusalem-ah thla thum leh ni sawm a lal a, LALPA mithmuha thil tha lo a ti thin a.

source: Give me all of it.
target: Min pe vek rawh.

source: I hate exercising
target: Exercise hi ka hua

source: They drank smoothies.
target: Smoothie an in a.

source: And the poor will have their joy in the Lord increased, and those in need will be glad in the Holy One of Israel.
target: Thuhnuairawlhte pawh chuan LALPAah chuan an hlimna chu an tipung tawh ang a, mihring zinga retheite chu Israel-ho Mi Thianghlimah chuan an lawm tawh ang.

source: Do not accept gifts.
target: Thilpek pawm suh.

source: I can take a rest.
target: Chawlh ka la thei.

source: She's very good
target: A thiam lûtuk

source: The bread of God is the bread which comes down out of heaven and gives life to the world.
target: Pathian chhang chu van atanga lo chhuka khawvel hnena nun petu hi a ni, a ti a.

source: I don't know
target: Ka hre lo

source: And he sent two of his disciples, and said to them, Go into the town, and there will come to you a man with a vessel of water: go after him;
target: Tichuan a zirtirte zinga mi pahnih a tir a, an hnenah, Khawpuiah va lut ula, chutah chuan mipa bela tui puin a tawk ang che u a; amah chu zui ang che u.

source: We have won again.
target: Kan chak leh ta.

source: I'll keep it warm.
target: Ka vawt reng ang.

source: And Pilate again put a question, Do you say nothing in answer? see how much evil they say you have done.
target: Tichuan Pilatan a zawt leh a, a hnenah, Engmahin i chhang lo maw? Ngai rawh, an hekna che zozai hi! a ti a.

source: And when Joab had come out from David, he sent men after Abner, and they overtook him at the water-spring of Sirah, and made him come back with them: but David had no knowledge of it.
target: Tin, Davida hnên ata Joaba a lo chhuah chuan Abnera ûm tûrin mi a ti ra, Sira tuichunchhuah atangin an rawn hruai kir a; nimahsela Davida chuan a hre lo.

source: Your new moons and your regular feasts are a grief to my soul: they are a weight in my spirit; I am crushed under them.
target: In thla tharte leh in hun bi nei kutte chu ka rilru chuan a hua a ni: ka tan thil hnawksak tak a ni; tuar ka ning tawh e.

source: For if the operation of the law, producing punishment, had its glory, how much greater will be the operation of the Spirit causing righteousness?
target: Thiam loh chantirna rawngbawlna mah a ropui chuan, felna rawngbawlna chu ropui lamah chuan a nasa zawk em em tur a ni.

source: And he gave the priests their places, making them strong for the work of the house of God.
target: Tin, puithiamte chu an hnathawh a ruatsak a, LALPA ina rawngbawl hna thawk tûrin a fuih a.

source: To him who put to death the first-fruits of Egypt: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:
target: Kut chak leh ban pharin: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: And the Pharisees came out and put questions to him, requesting from him a sign from heaven, testing him.
target: Tin, Pharisaite an lo chhuak a, amah fiah nan, a lakah van ata chhinchhiahna zawngin ani chu an hnial ta a.

source: I speak fast
target: Ka ṭawng rang

source: It was before my time.
target: Ka hun hma a ni.

source: We've been spotted
target: Kan hmu ta a ni

source: I burp a lot
target: Ka insawizawi nasa

source: So all Israel was listed by their families; and, truly, they are recorded in the book of the kings of Israel. And Judah was taken away as prisoners to Babylon because of their sin.
target: Chutichuan Israel zawng zawngte chu thlahte chhiarnaa chhiar an ni a; tichuan ngaiteh, Israel lalte lehkhabuah a chuang a ni; tin, Judate chu an bawhchhiatna avânginbabulon-ah sala hruaiin an awm a.

source: Mary is a disease
target: Mari hi natna a ni

source: To whom God was pleased to give knowledge of the wealth of the glory of this secret among the Gentiles, which is Christ in you, the hope of glory:
target: Chung mite hnenah chuan hnam tin tana a thuruk ropui leh hlu tak chu Pathianin hriattir a duh reng a ni; chu thuruk chu, Krista nangmahnia awm ropuina beisei chhan chu a ni;

source: Are you Tom's mother?
target: Tom-a nu i ni em?

source: The train is late.
target: Rel a tlai tawh.

source: Don't be deceived
target: Bumin awm suh

source: Take it
target: La rawh

source: So the Lord sent disease on Israel, causing the death of seventy thousand men.
target: Chutichan LALPAN Israelte zingah chuan hri alentir ta a; Israel-hote chu singsarih an thi a.

source: And Aaron said, Let not my lord be angry; you have seen how the purposes of this people are evil.
target: tin, Arona chuan, Ka pu thinrim hi ling teh thut mai suh se a: heng mipuiho hi sual lam awn tlat mi an ni tih i hria alawm.

source: You amuse me
target: Mi i ti phu alawm

source: I had no pleasing food, no meat or wine came into my mouth, and I put no oil on my body till three full weeks were ended.
target: Chaw tuihnai rêng rêng ka ei lo va, sa emaw uain emaw pawh ka kâah a lût hek lo, hapta thum pumhlum a kim hmâ chu hriak pawh ka in thih hek lo.

source: And David overcame Hadadezer, the son of Rehob, king of Zobah, when he went to make his power seen by the River.
target: Davida chuan Luia a ram la leh tûra a kal pahin Zoba lal Rehoba fapa Hadadezera pawh a bei a.

source: The porter lets him in; and the sheep give ear to his voice; he says over the names of the sheep, and takes them out.
target: Kawngkhar vengtuin ani chu a lo hawnsak thin a; beramten a aw an hre thin a;ama beramte chu an hmingah a ko theuh va, a hruai chhuak thin a.

source: I didn't see that.
target: Chu chu ka hmu lo.

source: So they went through all the country, covering it between them; Ahab went in one direction by himself, and Obadiah went in another by himself.
target: Chutichuan ram fan chauh tûr an insem a: Ahaba chu amahin kawng danga a kal a, tin, Obadia chu amahin kawng dangah a kal a.

source: If you let any of the poor among my people have the use of your money, do not be a hard creditor to him, and do not take interest.
target: Ka miteho zînga mi in hnêna awm retheite tangka i pûktîr chuan i leibatu angah i ngai tûr a ni lo va; a lakah a pung i phut tûr a ni hek lo.

source: Am I overreacting
target: Ka overreact em ni

source: But you, O God, will send them down into the underworld; the cruel and the false will be cut off before half their days are ended; but I will have faith in you.
target: Nimahsela, aw Pathian, nangin anni chu boralna khuarkhurumah chuan i chhuktir ang: Thisen chhuah hmang mite chu an damchhûng chanve pawh an dam zo lo vang. Kei erawh chuan nang ka ring ang che.

source: I watched the news.
target: Chanchin ka en a.

source: So make and keep yourselves holy, for I am the Lord your God.
target: Chuvangin intithianghlim ula, thianghlim in awm rawh u: Kei LALPA in Pathian chu ka ni si a.

source: Nobody got killed
target: Tumah an that lo

source: And anyone touching her bed will have to have his clothing washed and his body bathed in water and be unclean till evening.
target: Tupawh a khum khawih apiangte chuan an puante an su ang a, an inbual tur a ni a, tlai lam thlengin an bawlhhlawh ang.

source: Wherever you may be when the horn is sounded, come here to us; our God will be fighting for us.
target: tawtawrâwt ri in hratna lam apiangah chuan chutha chuan kan hnênah lo tlan khâwm ula; kan Pathianin min dosak ang, ka ti a.

source: There was not a man in Ai and Beth-el who did not go out after Israel; and the town was open and unwatched while they went after Israel.
target: Tin, Ai khuaah leh Bethel khuaah chuan Israel-hote um lo chu pakhat mah an awm ta lo va: khawpui chu khar lohvin an chhuahsan ta mai a, Israel hote chu an um ta a.

source: There you are to make an altar to the Lord your God, of stones on which no iron instrument has been used.
target: Tin, chutah chuan LALPA in Pathian tan maicham, lung maicham in siam tur ani a, thir hmanrua in hmang turani lo.

source: Now when Jehoram had taken his place over his father's kingdom, and had made his position safe, he put all his brothers to death with the sword, as well as some of the princes of Israel.
target: Chutichuan Jehoraman a pa ram a han luah chuan a lo intichak ta a, a unaute zawng zawng chu Israelte zinga puipa tam takte nen khandaihin a tihlum vek a.

source: Is the wine here?
target: Uain la awm em?

source: I hate liars
target: Dawthei ka hua

source: Do you really know?
target: I hre tak tak em?

source: The name of the Lord is a strong tower: the upright man running into it is safe.
target: LALPA hming chu kulpui a ni a, Mi fel chu a tlan lût thin a, a him thin.

source: He has a car
target: Car a nei

source: It's time for you to go home.
target: I haw a hun tawh.

source: To another faith in the same Spirit; and to another the power of taking away disease, by the one Spirit;
target: tin, mi dang hnenah chu Thlarau vekah chuan rinna pek a ni a; mi dang hnenah Thlarau hmunkhatah chuan tihdam theihna thilpekte pek a ni a;

source: Will a man keep back from God what is right? But you have kept back what is mine. But you say, What have we kept back from you? Tenths and offerings.
target: Mihringin pathian ata chu a rûksak tûr em ni? Mahse nangni chuan min rûksak țhin. Nangni erawh chuan, Engahte hian nge kan rûksak che? In ti a, Sâwma pakhat leh thilhlanahte hian.

source: It happened again
target: A thleng leh ta

source: The people who went in the dark have seen a great light, and for those who were living in the land of the deepest night, the light is shining.
target: Mi thim hnuaia kalte chuan eng nasa tak an hmu ta: thihna hlim rama awmte chungah ngei chuan eng chu a lo eng ta.

source: We're famous
target: Kan lar

source: And when Tamar had news that her father-in-law was going up to Timnah to the wool-cutting,
target: Tin, miin Tamari chu, I pu chu a berâm hmul mêt tûrin Timna khuaah a chho dâwn, tiin an hrilh a.

source: These things came about so that the Writings might be true, No bone of his body will be broken.
target: Pathian Lehkha Thu, A ruh pakhat mah tihtliah a ni lo vang, tih, thlenna turin chung thil chu a lo awm ta.

source: They will take it
target: An la ang

source: I go about in dark clothing, uncomforted; I get up in the public place, crying out for help.
target: Ni êm vang ni lovin ka dum a, Pungkhawmho zinga dingin tanpui ka dil a.

source: You were the teacher
target: Zirtirtu i ni a

source: I'm offended
target: Ka pawi sawi a ni

source: But I will keep you safe on that day, says the Lord: you will not be given into the hands of the men you are fearing.
target: Chumi niah chuan nang erawh chu ka chhan chhuak ang che, tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni, i mi hlauhte kutah pêk i ni lo vang.

source: I hate rules
target: Dân te hi ka hua

source: If a man comes across his hater, will he let him get away safe? so may you be rewarded by the Lord for what you have done for me today.
target: Miin a hmêlma hmu ang sela, tlâng takin a chhuah duh ang em? Chuvangin vawiina ka chunga i thil tihah LALPAN thil thain rul che rawh se.

source: He made request to you for life, and you gave it to him, long life for ever and ever.
target: Ani chuan nunna a dil chia, i lo pe a; Kumkhaw tlaitluana dam rengna chu.

source: They're kids
target: Naupang an nia

source: You have the belief that God is one, and you do well: the evil spirits have the same belief, shaking with fear.
target: Pathian chu pakhat a ni tih i ring a ni maw? I ti tha e; ramhuaite pawhin an ring a, an khur thin asin, a ti ang.

source: You will find her
target: Amah chu i hmu ang

source: Iron is hard
target: Thîr a sak a ni

source: Perfection doesn't exist.
target: Famkimna a awm lo.

source: I came by car
target: Car-in ka rawn kal

source: It's a Hindu name.
target: Hindu hming a ni.

source: And for this reason the Jews were turned against Jesus, because he was doing these things on the Sabbath.
target: Chutichuan Chawlhnia chung thilte chu a tih avangin Judaten Isua an tiduhdah ta a.

source: And when his servant saw that Saul was dead, he did the same, and was united with him in death.
target: Tin, a râlthuam kengtu chuan Saula a thi tih a hriat chuan ani pawh chuan a khandaih chu a bawh ve a, an thi dun ta a.

source: See, I am sending an angel before you, to keep you on your way and to be your guide into the place which I have made ready for you.
target: Ngai the, kawnga vêng zêl tûr che leh hmun ka buatsaihah chuan hruai lût tûr chein I hmaah vântirhkoh ka rawn tîr dâwn e.

source: He doesn't have a hat on.
target: Kawr a ha lo.

source: For you are my Rock and my strong tower; go in front of me and be my guide, because of your name.
target: Nang chu ka lungpui leh ka kulhpui i ni si a; Chuvang chuan i hming avângin mi hruaiin mi kai ang che.

source: And they made an attack on the tents of the owners of the cattle, and took away great numbers of sheep and camels and went back to Jerusalem.
target: Ranpuho puan inte pawh an bei a, berâm leh sanghawngsei tam tak an kawl a, Jerusalem-ah an haw leh ta a.

source: I'm not saying it's easy.
target: A awlsam ka ti lo.

source: I'm so tired!
target: Ka va chau êm!

source: They bathed themselves
target: An inbual a

source: And Moses said, Why are you now acting against the Lord's order, seeing that no good will come of it?
target: Tin, Mosian, Hmuingilna a ni lo vang tih hre reng chungin engah nge Lalpa thupêk in bawhchhiat tehreng?

source: Were you attacked
target: I beih che em ni

source: I'm eating the meat.
target: Sa chu ka ei a.

source: We're disappointed
target: Kan beidawng a ni

source: And whatever you do, in word or in act, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving praise to God the Father through him.
target: Tin, in tih apiang chu thusawiah emaw, thil tihah emaw ama zarah Pa Pathian hnena lawmthu hril chungin Lalpa Isua hmingin ti vek rawh u.

source: Giving the sheep of the peace-offerings, with the basket of unleavened bread; and at the same time, the priest will make his meal offering and his drink offering.
target: tin, berampa chu bawma chang dawidim telh lohte nen chuan remna inthawi thilhlan atante LALPA hnenah a hlan ang a: puithiam chuan chhangphut thilhlan leh in tur thilhlan pawh chu a hlan tel bawk ang.

source: And there will be rivers and streams of water on every tall mountain and on every high hill, in the day when great numbers are put to the sword, when the towers come down.
target: Tin, inthahna nasa tak nia, ralven in sângte chu a chi ni chuan, tlâng sâng tinah leh mual pawng sâng tinah chuan luipuite leh luite tui luangte a lo awm ang.

source: His coming will not be with fighting or loud cries; and his voice will not be lifted up in the streets.
target: A hnial lo vang a, a au hek lo vang a, Kawtthlerahte pawh tuman a aw an hre hek lo vang.

source: And Obed was the father of Jehu, and Jehu was the father of Azariah,
target: tin, Obeda chuan Jehua a hring a, tin, Jehua chuan Azaria ahing a.

source: You have it wrong.
target: I nei sual a ni.

source: And he put up an altar for Baal in the house of Baal which he had made in Samaria.
target: Tin, Samari khuaa Baala in a sakah chuan Baala tan mâicham a siam a.

source: All the day he is ready to have mercy and to give; his children are a blessing.
target: Nilengin mi a khawngaih a, a puktir thin a; A thlahte pawh an eng a thawl thin.

source: For this reason, if food is a cause of trouble to my brother, I will give up taking meat for ever, so that I may not be a cause of trouble to my brother.
target: Chu mi avang chuan ei tur hian ka unau a tihtluk chuan, ka unau ka tihtluk lohna turin kumkhuain sa reng reng ka ei tawh lo vang.

source: I believed in Tom.
target: Tom-a chu ka ring tlat a.

source: He will have a place on high: he will be safely shut in by the high rocks: his bread will be given to him; his waters will be certain.
target: chu mi chu chunglamah a awm ang aL a kulhbing sâng chu lungpui kulhbingte chu a ni ang a; a chaw chu a hnênah pêk a ni ang a, atuite chu a awm ngei ngei ang.

source: We were there waiting.
target: Kan lo nghak a.

source: And taking about five thousand men, he put them in position for a surprise attack on the west side of Ai, between Beth-el and Ai.
target: Tin, mi sangnga lai a hruai a, khawpui thlang lampang Bethel leh Ai khaw inkârah chuan a chan ruktir a.

source: Bring it back
target: Rawn la lêt rawh

source: I demand a refund.
target: Refund ka phut a ni.

source: If his days are ordered, and you have knowledge of the number of his months, having given him a fixed limit past which he may not go;
target: A nite chu ruat sa anih a, a thla zat lah chu i hnêna a awm a, A pelh theih loh tûra ramri chu i ruat ahnuin,

source: They're still looking
target: An la en reng a

source: He dropped it
target: A thlauh a

source: But you have no belief because you are not of my sheep.
target: Nimahsela in awih si lo, ka beram zinga mi in nih loh avangin.

source: And I say to you that you are Peter, and on this rock will my church be based, and the doors of hell will not overcome it.
target: Tin, nang Petera i ni tih ka hrilh bawk a che; he lungpui chungah hian ka kohhranho ka rem chho ang a, Mitthi Khaw kulh kawngkharte chuan chu chu an ngam lo vang.

source: Make your request to me, and I will give you the nations for your heritage, and the farthest limits of the earth will be under your hand.
target: Mi dil rawh, tichuan i rochan atân hnam tin ka pe ang chia, Kawlkil tawp thlengin i ro atân ka pe bawk ang che.

source: It's wrong
target: A diklo

source: Better to give in.
target: Inpek mai a tha zawk.

source: And God said to Balaam, You are not to go with them, or put a curse on this people, for they have my blessing.
target: Tin, Pathianin Balaama hnenah chuan, An hnenah i kal tur ani lo. Chu mite chu anchhia i lawh tur ani lo;: mal ka sawmte an ni e, a ti a.

source: You did well.
target: I tiṭha lutuk e.

source: I tried it over again.
target: Ka lo en leh a.

source: And has been waiting there from that time, till all who are against him are made a foot-rest for his feet.
target: chuta chin chu a hmelmate a kephah nghahchhana siam an nih hma loh zawng a nghak reng a.

source: I'm flabby
target: Ka zawi lutuk

source: We partied together.
target: Kan party dun a.

source: You, O Lord, are seated as King for ever; the seat of your power is eternal.
target: Nang chu LALPA, kumkhuain i lal a; I lalțhutthleng chu chhuan zawng zawng thlengin.

source: They don't pay attention to me.
target: Min ngaihsak lo.

source: Now Eli was ninety-eight years old, and his eyes were fixed so that he was not able to see.
target: Elia chu kum 98 mi a ni a, a mit a thim tawh a, khua a hmu thei tawh lo va.

source: For there is no use or purpose in the help of Egypt: so I have said about her, She is Rahab, who has come to an end.
target: Aigupta chuan sawt lo tak leh țangkai lo takin a țanpui thin si a: chuvangin a ni, ani chu, Rahab thu hle hle-i, ka vuah ni.

source: Sihon, king of the Amorites: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:
target: Sihona, Amor-ho lal leh: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: Do I look like I'm having fun?
target: Ka hlim hmel em?

source: These were ornamented with designs of winged ones and palm-trees and open flowers, plated over with gold.
target: chungahte chuan cherub te, tum thing leh pangpar parh lemte a ker a: cchung ker mawi chu mam takin rangkachak tiin a luan a.

source: I said enough
target: A tâwk ka tih chu

source: Ezri, the son of Chelub, had authority over the field-workers and farmers;
target: tin, lova leleh hnathawk ho enkawltu chu Keluba fapa Ezria a ni a;

source: We are a friend.
target: Inthian ṭha kan nia.

source: Making no division between them and us, but making clean their hearts by faith.
target: tin, keini leh anni thlei bik lovin rinin an rilru a tithianghlim a.

source: You were shy
target: In zak a nih kha

source: Can you sleep?
target: I mu thei ang em?

source: Nothing got ruined.
target: Engmah a chhe lo.

source: It was pretty rough.
target: A rough khawp mai.

source: Those who go down to the sea in ships, who do business in the great waters;
target: Tuifinriatah lawng liana zuk kal a, Tui zau tak chungte hnathawk thinte chuan;

source: I don't get out much.
target: Ka chhuak tam lo.

source: Pull it
target: Pawt rawh

source: And in her was seen the blood of prophets and of saints, and of all who have been put to death on the earth.
target: A chhungah zawlneihote, mi thianghlimhote, leia thah zawng zawngte thisen chu an hmu a, a ti a.

source: She wears glasses.
target: Glasses a vuah a.

source: Its stones are the place of sapphires, and it has dust of gold.
target: Chuta lungte chu saphir hmun a ni a, Rangkachak nawite a awm a.

source: The sons of Reuben, the oldest son of Israel: Hanoch and Pallu, Hezron and Carmi.
target: Israela fa tir Reubena fapate chu Hanoka te, Palua te, Hezrona te, Karmia te an ni.

source: I found your keys.
target: I chabi ka hmu a.

source: Who gave himself as an offering for all; witness of which was to be given at the right time;
target: mi zawng zawng tlan nana inpea chu: chu chu a hun tak zela hriattirin a awm tur a ni;

source: In this year of Jubilee, let every man go back to his heritage.
target: Hemi Jubili kum hian mi tinin mahni ta ngei in ta leh theuh tur a ni.

source: I'm already retired
target: Ka pension tawh a

source: Have true scales, true weights and measures for all things: I am the Lord your God, who took you out of the land of Egypt;
target: rorêl thuah te, tehna hmawlhah te, khinah te, tehnaah te fel lo takin in ti tur a ni lo.

source: The secret of the Lord is with those in whose hearts is the fear of him; he will make his agreement clear to them.
target: LALPA thuruk chu amah tihtute hnênah a awm a, A thuthlun chu anmahni a hriattir ang.

source: O Lord, your name is eternal; and the memory of you will have no end.
target: Aw LALPA, i hming chu kumkhuain a awm ang a; Aw LALPA, nangmah hriatrengna chu chhuan awm zawng zawngin a awm bawk ang.

source: But was marked out as Son of God in power by the Holy Spirit through the coming to life again of the dead; Jesus Christ our Lord,
target: thianghlimna thlarau lam thu-ah erawh chuan mitthi zing ata a thawhlehna chuan Pathian Fapa a nih nasa takin a hriattir a;

source: Leave me
target: Mi kalsan rawh

source: This is a moose
target: Hei hi moose a ni

source: You're asking for trouble.
target: Buaina i dil a ni.

source: Jesus said these things in the Synagogue while he was teaching at Capernaum.
target: Chung thu chu inkhawmna inah a sawi a, Kapernaum khuaa a zirtir lai khan.

source: Who's accusing you?
target: Tuin nge puh che?

source: Let his children have no father, and his wife be made a widow.
target: A fate chu pa lovin awm sela, A nupui chu hmeithaiin awm bawk rawh se.

source: This is the generation of those whose hearts are turned to you, even to your face, O God of Jacob. (Selah.
target: Pathian zawngtute chu chutiang mi chu an ni, Aw Jakoba Pathian, i hmêl zawngtute chu,Selah

source: He's a very energetic person.
target: Mi chak tak a ni.

source: They looked everywhere
target: Hmun tinah an en a

source: Take up the melody, playing on an instrument of music, even on corded instruments.
target: Fakna hla sa ula, khuangte te, tingtang ngaihnawm tak te, perhkhuangte nên rawn keng rawh u.

source: Or may we be the cause of envy to the Lord? are we stronger than he?
target: A nih loh leh, Lalpa chu thik turin chawhthawh kan tum a ni maw? Amah aiin kan chak zawk em ni?

source: And in the most holy place he made images of two winged beings, covering them with gold.
target: Tin, hmun thianghlim berah chuan cherub lem panih a siam a; chung chu rangkachakin a luan a.

source: So the prophet went away, and pulling his head-band over his eyes to keep his face covered, took his place by the road waiting for the king.
target: Chutichuan zâwlnei chu a kal a, kalkawngah lal a lo chang a, a chalhrênnaa a mit khuhin a i bawl danglam a.

source: it did not for me
target: ka tan a ni lo

source: Taste this
target: Hei hi eichhin teh

source: And brother will give up brother to death, and the father his child; and children will go against their fathers and mothers, and put them to death.
target: Tin, tihhlum turin unaupa leh unaupa an inmantir ang a, pa pawhin a fa a mantir bawk ang; fate pawhin an nu leh an pate an do vang a, an tihhlumtir bawk ang.

source: In those times there was no peace for him who went out or for him who came in, but great trouble was on all the people of the lands.
target: Tin, chung lai chuan a chhuaklam leh a lût lamte tan ralmuanga awmna a awm lo va, ram chunga awm zawng zawngte tan manganna nasa tak hlir a ni zâwk a.

source: Those whose hearts were turned away from him will get knowledge, and those who made an outcry against him will give attention to his teaching.
target: Thlarauva vakbote pawh chuan an lo hre thiam tawh ang a, mi phunnawite chuan thu zirtir chu an zir tawh ang, tiin.

source: Give ear, O my son, and let your heart be open to my sayings; and long life will be yours.
target: Aw ka fapa, ka thu ngaithla la, pawm rawh; Tichuan i dam chhûng kum a lo tam ang.

source: So I came out in the hope of meeting you, looking for you with care, and now I have you.
target: Chuvangin nangmah tawh tum chein ka lo kal a ni, Ngun taka zawn tum chein, tin, ka hmu ta chia.

source: And we are giving you the good news of the undertaking made to the fathers,
target: Keini pawhin thlahtute hnena thutiam kha a chanchin lawmawm kan rawn hrilh che u hi,

source: A hill of God is the hill of Bashan; a hill with high tops is the hill of Bashan.
target: Basan tlâng chu Pathian tlâng a ni a; Basan tlâng chu tlâng sâng tak a ni.

source: This has been true of me, that I have kept your orders in my heart.
target: Chung chu ka nei a, I thununa thute chu ka vawn that avângin. CHETH

source: And from now, there will be no need for the House of the Lord, and the vessels used in it, to be moved about by the Levites.
target: Levi-hote pawh hian biak bûk leh a rawngbawl nân bungbêl zawng zawngte hi an zawn a ngai tawh lo ve, a ti a ni.

source: I love golf
target: Bawlvawm ka ngaina

source: Of whom the brothers at Lystra and Iconium had a high opinion.
target: Lustra leh Ikonion khuaa unau awmte chuan ani chu an fak thin a.

source: I slept fine
target: Ka mu ṭha

source: Did you speak?
target: I ṭawng em?

source: I've retired
target: Ka chawl tawh

source: Do I smell cookies
target: Cookies ka rim em

source: They took by force the women in Zion, the virgins in the towns of Judah.
target: Zion-ah hmeichhiate chu an pâwng sual a, nulate chu Juda khawpuiah te.

source: Kings of armies quickly go in flight: and the women in the houses make a division of their goods.
target: Sipaiho lalte chu an tlânchhia a, an tlachhia a: In nghaktunu chuan râllâk sum chu a sem a.

source: Have faith in him at all times, you people; let your hearts go flowing out before him: God is our safe place. (Selah.
target: Nangni mipuite u, englai pawhin amah ch ring ula; In thinlung ch ahmaah chuan leihbaw rawh u; Pathian chu kan tan inhumhimna a ni. Selah

source: But when Jesus saw the reasoning of their hearts, he took a small child and put him by his side,
target: Tichuan Isuan an rilrua an ngaihtuah chu a hria a, naupang te a kai a, a sirah a dintir a,

source: And every man who takes part in the sports has self-control in all things. Now they do it to get a crown which is of this world, but we for an eternal crown.
target: Tin, intihsiaknaahte chuan a bei talh talh apiang chu engkimah an insum thin a ni. Anni zawngin lallukhum chhe thei hmu turin an bei a, keini erawh chuan lallukhum chhe thei lo hmu turin.

source: I'll get used to it
target: Ka thiam tawh ang

source: She's desperately poor.
target: A rethei hle mai.

source: How to explain it?
target: Engtin nge kan hrilhfiah ang?

source: And I said to my master, What if the woman will not come with me?
target: Tin, keiin ka pu hnênah chuan 'Hmeichhia chuan mi zui duh kher lo mahna' ka ti a.

source: I haven't asked them yet.
target: Ka la zawt lo.

source: Did you notice it?
target: I lo hre tawh em?

source: I'm not depressed
target: Ka lungngai lo

source: Do not give her up, and she will keep you; give her your love, and she will make you safe.
target: Hawisan suh la, a humhim ang che; Hmangaih la, a veng ang che.

source: Why have we gone from your memory for ever? why have you been turned away from us for so long?
target: Eng vângin nge kumkhuaa min theihnghilha, Chu leh chen min kalsan le?

source: And has made us to be a kingdom and priests to his God and Father; to him let glory and power be given for ever and ever. So be it.
target: khua leh tuiah leh a Pathian leh a Pa lama puithiama min siamtu hnenah, a ni, ama hnen ngeiah ropuina leh rorelna chu chatuanin awm rawh se. Amen.

source: Acting wisely is the way of life, guiding a man away from the underworld.
target: Mi fing tan chuan nunna kawng hi a chung lamah a kal a, Hnuai lama Seol chu a kalsan theih nân.

source: Am I making sense?
target: Ka awmzia ka nei em?

source: Making their land a thing of wonder, causing sounds of surprise for ever; everyone who goes by will be overcome with wonder, shaking his head.
target: An tițiau zo ta e- a ram chu, Kumkhuaa chek khum tûrin. Veivak apiangin mak tiin an lu an thing.

source: Are they selling their house
target: An in an hralh em

source: It's awful
target: A vanduaithlâk

source: They were playing tennis.
target: Tennis an khel a.

source: I stayed
target: Ka awm tawh

source: We're almost out of time.
target: Hun a tawp tawh.

source: So I have for my heritage months of pain to no purpose, and nights of weariness are given to me.
target: Engmah lo maiin thla tam ka lo hmang ral a, Zan ninawm takte ka tan ruat a ni.

source: Now when the Apostles at Jerusalem had news that the people of Samaria had taken the word of God into their hearts, they sent to them Peter and John;
target: Tin, tirhkoh Jerusalem khuaa awmte khan Samari khuaa mitten Pathian thu an awih tih an hriatin, an hnenah Petera leh Johana chu an tir a;

source: He lost color
target: A rawng a dal

source: Was it not right for you to have mercy on the other servant, even as I had mercy on you?
target: ka khawngaih che ang khan nang pawhin i bawipui chu i khawngaih ve tur a ni lawm ni? a ti a.

source: But they, shaking off the dust of that place from their feet, came to Iconium.
target: Tin, anni chuan an chungah an kephaha vaivut an thing thla a, Ikonion khua an thleng a.

source: In the road of righteousness is life, but the way of the evil-doer goes to death.
target: Felna kawngah chuan nunna a awm a, Chu mi kawngah chuan thihna a awm lo.

source: I'm glad
target: Ka lawm

source: And Jonathan said, Do not have such a thought: for if I saw that my father was designing evil against you, would I not give you word of it?
target: Tin, Jonathana chuan, That suh e a; i chungah thil tha lo tih ka pan a tum tih ka hriat pahwt chuan ka hrilh dawn lo che em ni?'

source: I am a simple man.
target: Mipa pangngai tak ka ni.

source: And the fireplace is twelve cubits long and twelve cubits wide, square on its four sides.
target: maichâm chung zawl chu a dung leh a vang tawng sâwm leh pahnih ve ve a ni a; a in bial a ni.

source: I felt awful
target: Rapthlâk ka inti

source: Go up and see the unending destruction; all the evil which your haters have done in the holy place;
target: Chhe let der tawh chu han fang teh, Dotuten hmun thianghlimah chuan thil sual tinreng an tih tak hi.

source: Are you being funny
target: I hlim em

source: Have you not sent us away from you, O God? and you go not out with our armies.
target: Aw Pathian, nangin min thlauthla a ni lâwm ni? Aw Pathian, kan sipaihote hnênah lah i chhuak ve ta si lo.

source: And the men of Israel, turning again against the children of Benjamin, put to the sword without mercy all the towns and the cattle and everything there was, burning every town which came into their hands.
target: Tin, Israel-hote chu Benjamin-ho chhûnga mi tawhphawt chu ran te, an hmuh apiang te khandaihin an sat hlum zel a: chu lo pawh chu khua an hmuh apiangte pawh chu an hal zel a.

source: They don't know about it
target: An hre lo a ni

source: And fear came on all those who were living round about them: and there was much talk about all these things in all the hill-country of Judaea.
target: Tin, an vela awmte zawng zawng chuan an hlau ta a. Tin, chung thu chu Judai ram thingtlang zawng zawngah a thang vel ta a.

source: Humor Tom
target: Nuihzatthlak Tom-a

source: All this has come to your ears and you have seen it; will you not give witness to it? I am now making clear new things, even secret things, of which you had no knowledge.
target: In hriat kha; heng zawng zawng hi en rawh u; nangmahnin in sawi danw tawh lawm ni? Tun achinah thil țhar ka hriattir dawn a che u, thil inthup in hriat ngai lohte chu.

source: And make straight roads for your feet, so that the feeble may not be turned out of the way, but may be made strong.
target: tin, kebai chu tihpelhsawlh lohva, tihdamin a awm zawk nan, in kete tan kawng ngilte siam rawh u.

source: They won't find you
target: An hmu dawn lo che

source: If I saw one near to death for need of clothing, and that the poor had nothing covering him;
target: Tupawh silhfen lova boral emaw, Rethei intuamhlawmna nei lo emaw hmu ka nih a,

source: Don't sign anything.
target: Engmah sign suh.

source: Are you tough?
target: I chhel em?

source: He made me a suit.
target: Suit min siam sak a.

source: His work is full of honour and glory; and his righteousness is unchanging for ever.
target: A hnathawh chu a zahawmin a ropui a ni; A felna chu kumkhua aawm tûr a ni a.

source: Having eyes full of evil desire, never having enough of sin; turning feeble souls out of the true way; they are children of cursing, whose hearts are well used to bitter envy;
target: mit uirea khat, sual ban thei lote an nei a; mi nghet lote an thlem thlu a; awh hmang thinlung an pu a; anchhe dawng fate an ni a;

source: Look up
target: En chho rawh

source: Burning sweet perfumes on it, as the Lord had given him orders.
target: tin, a chhûngah chuan englo rimtui tak hal tur rimtui a hal a; LALPAN Mosia thu a pêk ang khan.

source: It doesn't take PhD's
target: PhD's a ngai lo

source: Did you lose?
target: I tibo a mi?

source: What beautiful weather
target: Khua a va mawi em

source: Give praise to Jah, for he is good: make melody to his name, for it is pleasing.
target: LALPA chu fak rawh u; LALPA chu a tha si a: A hming faki nzai rawh u; a nuam si a.

source: Send them away, so that they may go into the country and small towns round about, and get some food for themselves.
target: anniho hi kan kiang vel lovah leh khuaahte kalin, an ei tur eng emaw tal an lei theih nan kaltir ta che, an ti a.

source: And when the wall has come down, will they not say to you, Where is the whitewash which you put on it?
target: Tin, ngai rawh u, bang chu a chim hnu chuan,'In hawlrivâp hnawih chu khawiah nge?' an ti dawn lo che u em ni?

source: Did they already know each other
target: An inhre tawh em

source: And from Marah they went on to Elim: and in Elim there were twelve water-springs and seventy palm-trees; and they put up their tents there.
target: Tin, Mara ațang chuan anc hhuak a, Elim an thleng a; Elim-ah chuan tuihna sâwm leh pahnih leh tum kung sawmsarih a awm a; chutah chauh awmhmun an khuar a.

source: Because he had no mercy, but was cruel to the low and the poor, designing the death of the broken-hearted.
target: Ngilneihna lantir nachang a hriat loh va, Mirethei pachhia leh lungchhiate chu Tihhlum tuma a tihduhdah zawk avângin.

source: O Lord God of armies, who is strong like you, O Jah? and your unchanging faith is round about you.
target: Aw LALPA sipaihote Pathian, Aw JAA, nang anga mi chak tunge awm? I rinawmna chu i vêlah a awm si a.

source: But when their cry came to his ears, he had pity on their trouble:
target: Chuti chung pawhin ani chuan, an au thawm a hriat chuan, An mangang chu a ngaihsak a:

source: The lover of pleasure will be a poor man: the lover of wine and oil will not get wealth.
target: Nawmsakna thlahlel chu mi rethei a ni ang a, Uain leh hriak ngaina mi chu an hausa lo vang.

source: And the name of Abishur's wife was Abihail; and she had Ahban and Molid by him.
target: Tin, Abisura nupuia hming chu Abihjaili a ni; tin, ani chuan Abana leh Molida a hrinsak a.

source: When the upright man, turning away from his righteousness, does evil, death will overtake him; in the evil which he has done death will overtake him.
target: Mifel chuan a felnate a hawisana, khawlohnate a tih chuan tah chuan a thi ang a, khawlohna a tihah chuan a thi ang.

source: There's still hope
target: Beiseina a la awm

source: But it's worth it.
target: Mahse a phu a ni.

source: Then he said, See, I have come to do your pleasure. He took away the old order, so that he might put the new order in its place.
target: chu veleh chuan, Ngai teh, i duhzawng ti turin ka lo kal e, a lo ti ta a. A pahnihna hi a tundin theihna turin a hmasa chu a la bo ta a ni.

source: And the law came in addition, to make wrongdoing worse; but where there was much sin, there was much more grace:
target: Tin, sual a lan lehzual theih nan Dan a lo awm leh nghal a. Nimahsela sual a punna apiangah khawngaihna chu a pung lehzual thin;

source: Be not quick to let your spirit be angry; because wrath is in the heart of the foolish.
target: I rilruah thinur hmanhmawh suh, Mi âte tang laiah a cham thin, thinurna hi.

source: But all things are of God, who has made us at peace with himself through Christ, and has given to us the work of making peace;
target: Nimahsela, engkim Pathian hnen ata chhuak a ni a; ani chuan Krista avangin amah nen inremin min siam a, inremna rawngbawl hna min pe a;

source: I'm not helping Tom.
target: Tom ka pui lo.

source: So Samuel made prayer to the Lord; and the Lord sent thunder and rain that day: and all the people were in fear of the Lord and of Samuel.
target: Chutichuan Samuela chuan LALPA chu a au va, LALPA chuan chu mi ni chuan khawpui a riktir a, ruah a sirtir a; tichuan mipui chuan LALPA leh Samuela chu an hlau ta êm êm a.

source: The Lord will make the rain of your land powder and dust, sending it down on you from heaven till your destruction is complete.
target: In ram ruah chu vaivut leh vaivut khuah LALPAN a chantir ang a; in boral hma loh chu van ațangin in chungah a lo tla ang.

source: You should resign
target: I bang tur a ni

source: Deceit is in the heart of those whose designs are evil, but for those purposing peace there is joy.
target: Thil tha lo suangtuahtue thinlungah chuan buymna a wm a, Remna rorêltute pawh chuan lawmna an nei.

source: And Joshua said, Let great stones be rolled against the mouth of the hole, and let men keep watch by it:
target: Tichuan Josuan, Puk kawngkaah chuan lung luan pui pui lum ula, a vengtute pawh lo awmtir rawh u:

source: But he who has the Spirit, though judging all things, is himself judged by no one.
target: Thlarau mi erawh chuan thil engkim a hre fiah thin a, ani lah chu tuman an hre fiah si lo.

source: Sorry, I didn't hear.
target: Sorry, ka hre lo.

source: Is there any wonder which the Lord is not able to do? At the time I said, in the spring, I will come back to you, and Sarah will have a child.
target: LALPA tân thil rêng rêng a harsa lutuk em ni? Hun ruatah, hun a lo thlen tikah chuan i hnênah ka lo kal leh ang a, tin Sari chuan fapa a nei ang, a ti a.

source: And he, having such orders, put them into the inner prison with chains on their feet.
target: chuti kauva thu an pek avangin ani chuan rip chhungnungah a khung a, an keahte chuan thing kawl a buntir tlat a.

source: But Ahaz said, I will not put the Lord to the test by making such a request.
target: Ahazaa erawh chuan, Kal dil lo vang, LALPA pawh ka fiah hek lo vang, a ti a.

source: But straight away Jesus said to them, Take heart; it is I, have no fear.
target: Nimahsela, Isuan anmahni a be ta nghal a, Thlamuang takin awm rawh u; keimah ka ni alawm; hlau suh u, a ti a.

source: Do I frighten you?
target: Ka hlauthawng che em?

source: The wounds of a friend are given in good faith, but the kisses of a hater are false.
target: Thian min hliamna chu a tak a, hmêlma min fawhna erawh chu a der a ni.

source: You're a pig
target: Vawk i ni

source: And his sons did not go in his ways, but moved by the love of money took rewards, and were not upright in judging.
target: Nimahsela a fate chuan a awmdan chu an la ve lo va, sum leh pai lam an ûm a, thamnate an la a, dik lo takin ro an rêl a.

source: And when the time had come, he took his seat, and the Apostles with him.
target: Tin, a ei a lo hun chuan ani chuan chaw a kil a, a tirhkohte chuan an kilpui ve a.

source: Tom is pudgy.
target: Toma hi a thau.

source: Push it.
target: Nem rawh.

source: Sami is going inside
target: Sami chu a lut a

source: He will give them the right reward of their doings, wrath to his attackers, punishment to his haters, and even on the sea-lands he will send punishment.
target: An thiltihte angin, an thiltihte ang ngeiin ani chuan a thungrul ani chuan a thungrula ng, amah dotute chu thinrimnain, a hmêlmate chu thungrulhnain a thungrul ang; thliarkarte chu thungrulhnain a thungrul ang.

source: He caught nothing.
target: Engmah a man lo.

source: I'm not a cat person
target: Cat mi ka ni lo

source: And Jacob put up a pillar on her resting-place; which is named, The Pillar of the resting-place of Rachel, to this day.
target: Tin, a thlân chungah chuan Jakoban lung a phun a: chu chu tûn thlengin Rakili thlân Lungphun a la ni.

source: O make a new song to the Lord; let all the earth make melody to the Lord.
target: Aw LALPA chawimawiin hla thar sa ula: Leilung luah zawng zawngte u, LALPA chawimawiin zai rawh u.

source: And Huram made all the pots and the spades and the basins. So he came to the end of all the work he did for King Solomon in the house of God:
target: Tin, Hurama chuan bel te, vutlawhna te, maihûnte a siam a. Chutichuan Pathian in atâna lal Solomona a siamsak chu Hurama chuan a peih ta a;

source: Wandering in waste places and in mountains and in holes in the rocks; for whom the world was not good enough.
target: chungho tan chuan khawvel hi awmna tlak a ni lo thlalerah te, tlangah te, pukah te, khuarkhurumah te an vak an vak thin a.

source: But they will be servants to the Lord their God and to David their king, whom I will give back to them.
target: LALPA an Pathian leh an lal atâna ka tundin tûr Davida rawng an bâwl zawk ang.

source: And she said, The glory is gone from Israel, for the ark of God has been taken.
target: Ropina chuan Israel-te chu a chhuahsan ta, Pathian bâwm chu a laksak ta si a, a ti a.

source: I sympathize
target: Ka khawngaih

source: I do a radio show.
target: Radio show ka ti thin.

source: They have already proven it
target: An finfiah tawh

source: For I will make wide your limits on the right hand and on the left; and your seed will take the nations for a heritage, and make the waste towns full of people.
target: Ding lam leh vei lamah i darh zau dawn si a; tichuan i chi thlahte chuan hnam tin an rochung ang a, khawpui tiau hnuahte chuan mi an awmtir leh ang.

source: I am studying
target: Lehkha ka zir mêk

source: Now when Jesus saw that the people were about to come and take him by force to make him a king, he went away again up the mountain by himself.
target: Chutichuan amah chu lala siam tura man luih tumin an lo kal dawn tih Isuan a hria a, tlangah amah chauhvin a kal hrang leh ta a.

source: I want everything
target: Engkim ka duh a ni

source: In future the children of Israel are not to come near the Tent of meeting, so that death may not come to them because of sin.
target: Tun achinah chuan Israela thlahte chuan inbiakna puan in chu an rawn hnaih tur ani lo; sual mawhphurin an thi dah ang e.

source: For if we do evil on purpose after we have had the knowledge of what is true, there is no more offering for sins,
target: Thutak hriatna famkim chu kan chan hnua thil kan tihsual luih si chuan sualte tana inthawina a awm tawh hauh lo vang a,

source: I didn't sleep enough.
target: Ka muhil tawk lo.

source: I talk to them all the time.
target: Ka biak fo thin.

source: And my music has been turned to sorrow, and the sound of my pipe into the noise of weeping.
target: Chuvang chuan ka perhkhuang ri chu sunnaah a chang a, Ka phenglawng chu taptu awah.

source: She is very human
target: Mihring tak a ni

source: Twisted is the way of him who is full of crime; but as for him whose heart is clean, his work is upright.
target: Thiam lohna phurtu kawng chu a kawi êm êm mai a, Mi thianghlim erawh chu a thiltih a ngil a ni.

source: But the high places were not taken away; the people went on making offerings and burning them in the high places.
target: Amaherawhchu hmun sângte zawng thehthang bo a ni chuang lo; hmun sângahte chuan mite chu an la inthawiin rimtui an la hal reng thin.

source: Then a hand gave me a touch, awaking me, and putting me on my knees and my hands.
target: Tin, ngai teh, kut hian mi han khawih a, chu chuan mi bawhvah tîr a.

source: I get by
target: Ka kal thin

source: There are some whose uncontrolled talk is like the wounds of a sword, but the tongue of the wise makes one well again.
target: Khandaih chhun anga na taka mi chhun thu sawi an awm a, Mi fing lei erawh chu damna a ni.

source: I've had enough already!
target: Ka ei tawk tawh!

source: He does not watch TV at all.
target: TV a en ngai lo.

source: Want a drink?
target: In tur i duh em?

source: We are not a party!
target: Party kan ni lo!

source: The evil man has gone after my soul; my life is crushed down to the earth: he has put me in the dark, like those who have long been dead.
target: Dotu chuan ka nunna a tiduhdah si a; Ka nun hi leiah a vaw thlu a: Thi tawh daihte angin, hmin thim takahte mi awmtir a.

source: The disciples say to him, If this is the position of a man in relation to his wife, it is better not to be married.
target: Zirtirte chuan a hnenah, Nupui kawngah mipa thu chutiang a nih si chuan inneih hi a tha lo ve, an ti a.

source: Tom sighed
target: Tom'an a signed

source: So let the Lord be judge, and give a decision between me and you, and see and give support to my cause, and keep me from falling into your hands.
target: Chuvangin LALPA chu rorêltu ni sela, nang nena kan chung thu hi titlu sela, mi ngaihtuahsakin mi sawipui sela i kut ata mi chhanchhuak rawh se, a ti a.

source: My car is not running.
target: Ka car a tlan lo.

source: And put the altar of burned offerings before the doorway of the House of the Tent of meeting.
target: Tin, halrala thilhlanna maicham kha inbiakna puan in biak bûk kawngka bulah i chhung tur a ni.

source: You didn't take your medicine.
target: I damdawi i ei lo.

source: It's so hard
target: A sak lutuk

source: Do not have in your bag different weights, a great and a small;
target: In ipah chuan khin chi dang dang, a rit leh a zang in nei tur a ni lo.

source: I jumped back
target: Ka zuang lêt leh

source: But because of David, the Lord gave him a light in Jerusalem, making his sons king after him, so that Jerusalem might be safe;
target: Nimahsela Davida avângin LALPA a Pathianin a hnua a fapa la tundinna tûr leh Jerusalem khua din nghet tûrin Jerusalem khuaah chuan khawnvar a neihtir a;

source: And when he had got out of the boat, straight away there came to him from the place of the dead a man with an unclean spirit.
target: Tin, lawng ata a chhuah hnu chuan mi pakhat, ramhuai bawlhhlawh pai, thlan atanga lo chhuakin a rawn tawk ta nghal a;

source: And the tribes of Israel sent men through all the tribe of Benjamin saying, What is this evil which has been done among you?
target: Tin, Israel hnamte chuan Benjami hnam zawng zawngte hnênah chuan, IN zinga hetiang suahsualhan lo awm ta mai hi eng tizia nge ni?

source: Let me not be shamed, O Lord, for I have made my prayer to you; let the sinners be shamed, and let their mouths be shut in the underworld.
target: Aw LALPA, mualphovin mi awmtir suh ang che; ka ko si chia: Mi suaksualte chu mualphovin awm sela, Seol-ah ngawi rengin awm rawh se.

source: It was consistent.
target: A inmil hle bawk.

source: And those who were with me saw the light, but the voice of him who was talking to me came not to their ears.
target: Tin, ka thiante chuan eng chu an hmu na a, mi betu aw erawh chu an hre lo.
