source: For he who was a servant when he became a Christian is the Lord's free man; and he who was free when he became a Christian is the Lord's servant.
target: Bawiha awm Lalpa kohva chu Lalpa bawih chhuahtir a ni si a; chutiang bawkin bawih lova awm kohva chu Krista bawih a ni.

source: Let them give thought to it, who go on white asses, and those who are walking on the road.
target: Nangni sabengtung vâr chunga chuangte u, Nangni puan phah chhah taka thute u; Nangni mi mirte u, chung thute chu puang rawh u.

source: Let's pace ourselves.
target: Kan pace ang u.

source: And a third are to be stationed at the king's house; and a third at the doorway of the horses: while all the people are waiting in the open spaces round the house of the Lord.
target: Tin, hmun thuma thena hmun khat chu lal inah in awm ang a; tin, hmun thuma thena hmun khat chu kulh kawngkaah; tin, mipui zawng zawng chu LALPA in kawt hung chhûngah an awm ang.

source: He took me up out of a deep waste place, out of the soft and sticky earth; he put my feet on a rock, and made my steps certain.
target: Boralna khuarkhurum ata, chirhdup ban tak ata chu mi khai chhuak ta abawk a; Tin, ka ke chu lungpui chungah a nghat a, ka ke pente chu a tinghet a.

source: Then he took up Elijah's robe, which had been dropped from him, and went back till he came to the edge of Jordan.
target: Elija puan lo tla pawh chu a khai a, a let leh a, Jordan lui kamah chuan a ding a.

source: You'll ask her, won't you?
target: I zawt dawn nia?

source: But I will ever be full of joy, making songs of praise to the God of Jacob.
target: Nimahsela kei chuan kumkhuain ka hriattir ang a, Jakoba Pathian fakin ka zai ang.

source: Don't antagonize us.
target: Min dodal suh.

source: Have you knowledge of the rock-goats? or do you see the roes giving birth to their young?
target: Lung bang sathar no neih hun i hria êm ni? Sazuk no neih hun i chhinchhiah thei êm ni?

source: Am I included?
target: Telh ka ni em?

source: So the nations will give honour to the name of the Lord, and all the kings of the earth will be in fear of his glory:
target: Chutichuan hnam tinin LALPA hming hchu an tih ang a, Leia lal zawng zawng chuan i ropuina chuan tih bawk ang.

source: He goes looking for his grass-lands in the mountains, searching out every green thing.
target: A tlatna tlangpui dung a ni a, Thil hring apiang a zawng chhuak thin.

source: And when you are on the point of attacking, let the priest come forward and say to the people,
target: Tin, in indo dawn hnaih chuan pithiam chuan mipuite chu va pan sela, bia sela,

source: Under the burning sun they are cut off, and come to nothing because of the heat.
target: A lum hun chuan an kang thin a, A lo sat chuan an hmun ata an bo thin.

source: So he said, Let him be; let not his bones be moved. So they let his bones be with the bones of the prophet who came from Samaria.
target: Tin, ani chuan, Engmah tih suh u; tumahin a ruhte chu la sawn suh se, a ti a. Chutichuan a ruhte chu Samari ram atanga zâwlnei lo kala ruhte nen engmah an tih lo.

source: Can it wait?
target: A nghâk thei em?

source: There ll be four of us.
target: Pali ka ni ang.

source: For any person, whoever he may be, who takes his pleasure on that day will be cut off from his people.
target: Tupawh ni sela, chu mi nia an rilru tihreawm lote chu an chipuite zing ata tuithlarin an awm ang.

source: Let's get something to eat.
target: Ei tur i la ang u.

source: Now as for these four young men, God gave them knowledge and made them expert in all book-learning and wisdom: and Daniel was wise in all visions and dreams.
target: Tichuan, hêng tleirâwl palite hi chu thiamna leh finna zawng zawngah hriatna leh bengvârna Pathianin a pe a, Daniela chuan inlârna leh mumang zawng zawng a hrethiam ta a.

source: Where is your loved one gone, O most fair among women? Where is your loved one turned away, that we may go looking for him with you?
target: I duhtak chu khawiah nge a kal tak: Aw hmeichhia alaia mawi ber, Khawi lamah nge i duhtak lam ang a let, Keinin kan zawnpui theih nân che?

source: Further, this is what she has done to me: she has made my holy place unclean and has made my Sabbaths unclean.
target: Chulovah pawh chuan, ka hnênah heihi an ti a ni; anni vekin ka hmun thianghlim chu an tibawlhhlawh a, ka chawlhnîte pawh an bawhchhia a ni.

source: I dried myself off.
target: Ka in vawt a.

source: I see him very rarely.
target: Ka hmu tlem hle.

source: Tom-a'n A a hmu.
target: Tom got an A.

source: There's a slight problem.
target: Buaina tlem a awm.

source: Are you OK I'm fine
target: I OK em Ka tha e

source: I don't often drink wine.
target: Uain ka in fo lo.

source: They were getting married
target: An innei dawn ta a

source: For they say false words to you, so that you may be sent away far from your land, and so that you may be forced out by me and come to destruction.
target: In ram ațanga hla taka hruai bova in awm theih nân, in hnênah dâwt thu an sawi lâwk a ni: ka hnawh chhuah che ua in boral phahna tûrin.

source: I got dressed quickly.
target: Ka inchei vat a.

source: Are you bilingual
target: Bilingual i ni em

source: And the lord of that servant, being moved with pity, let him go, and made him free of the debt.
target: Tichuan chu bawia pu chuan a khawngaih ta em em a, a thlah a, a bat chu a ngaidam ta a.

source: In that day will this song be made in the land of Judah: We have a strong town; he will make salvation our walls and towers.
target: Chumi niah chuan Juda-ho ramah he hla hi an sa ang: Khawpui nghet tak ken nei a; ani chuan chhandamna chu kulh bangte leh kulhpuite tan a ruat ang.

source: O Jerusalem, make your heart clean from evil, so that you may have salvation. How long are evil purposes to have a resting-place in you?
target: Aw Jerusalem, suahsualna ata i thinlung tlengfai la, Chhandama i awm theihna tûrin; Eng chen nge i ngaihtuahna sual chu i pai dan?

source: They should be fine
target: An tha tur a ni

source: Is it possible for his armies to be numbered? and on whom is not his light shining?
target: A sipai ruale chu chhiar rual êm ni? Tu chungah nge a eng a chhuah loh?

source: You should try to see it.
target: Hmuh tum tur a ni.

source: And the glory which you have given to me I have given to them, so that they may be one even as we are one;
target: Tin, nangin ropuina mi pek kha keiin anmahni ka pe ta; anni chu pumkhat an nihna turin, keini pumkhat kan ni ang bawk hian;

source: Which is the best?
target: Eng nge tha ber?

source: She didn't last long.
target: Rei a daih lo.

source: And I will take great payment from them with acts of wrath; and they will be certain that I am the Lord when I send my punishment on them.
target: Tin, thinur taka zilhhauvin an chungah phuba ka la ang a, chutia an chunga ka phuba lakna ka thlen hunah chuan LALPA chu ka ni tih an hre tawh ang, a ti a.

source: Up till then they had been at the king's door to the east. They were door-keepers for the tents of the sons of Levi.
target: ani chu tun hmain lal kulh kawngka chhakta vengtu ani thin a: anni chu Levia thlahte riahhmun kawngkhâr vengtu an ni.

source: And from whom you will be able, by questioning him yourself, to get knowledge of all the things which we say against him.
target: nangmah ngeiin chhuahchhalin kan hekna thil zawng zawng hi ama lakah i hre thei ang, a ti a.

source: And an ox and a male sheep for peace-offerings, to be put to death before the Lord; and a meal offering mixed with oil: for this day you are to see the Lord.
target: leh bawngpa leh berampa LALPA hmaa remna thilhlana hlanah rawn kai ula: tin, hriaka hmeh chhangphut thilhlan nen: vawiinah hian in hnenah LALPA a lo lang dawn e,' tiin hrilh rawh, a ti a.

source: They all screamed
target: An au chhuak vek a

source: Now send men to Joppa, and get one Simon, named Peter,
target: Tunah Joppa khuaah mite tir la mi pakhat Simona, Petera an tiha chu, han hruaitir rawh;

source: Four hundred and thirty-five camels, six thousand, seven hundred and twenty asses.
target: an sanghawngsei chu 435 a ni a, an sabengtung tê chi chu 6720 a ni.

source: Then you will say to your son, We were servants under Pharaoh's yoke in Egypt; and the Lord took us out of Egypt with a strong hand:
target: nangnin in fate hnenah, 'Aigupta ramah Pharoa bawih kan ni a, LALPAN Aigupta ram ata chu kut chak takin min hruai chhuak a;

source: Why did I come from my mother's body to see pain and sorrow, so that my days might be wasted with shame?
target: Engah khe nge chhûl ata ka lo chhuah le, Thawkrim leh lungngaia awm tûra Mualpho rêng rênga ka dam chhûng nîte hmang tûr hian?

source: You should've called.
target: I call tur a ni.

source: It was a lonely time.
target: Lonely hun a ni.

source: He whose purposes are bad will be named a man of evil designs.
target: Thil tha lo ti tûra remruat thin chu Miten pawikhawih hmang an ti ang.

source: I will give you knowledge, teaching you the way to go; my eye will be your guide.
target: Fing taka awmtir chein i kalna tûr kawng chu ka entir ang chia: Ka mita en reng chung chein rem ka ruatsak zel ang che.

source: She took a bite of the apple
target: Apple chu a ei a

source: I have said all these things to you so that in me you may have peace. In the world you have trouble: but take heart! I have overcome the world.
target: Heng thu hi in hnenah ka sawi tawh hi, keimahah hian in thlamuanna turin. Khawvelah hian hrehawmin in awm thin; nimahsela thlamuang takin awm rawh u, keiin khawvel ka ngam ta, a ti a.

source: May you have the blessing of the Lord, who made heaven and earth.
target: LALPA malsawm dawngtu in ni. Ani chu lei leh van siamtu a ni.

source: And like a band of thieves waiting for a man, so are the priests watching secretly the way of those going quickly to Shechem, for they are working with an evil design.
target: Suamhmang rualin mi an châng țhin angin. Puithiam pâwlte chuan Sekem kawng ah mi an that țhin; A ni, thil sual an ti ta a ni.

source: And he said, The Son of man is lord even of the Sabbath.
target: Tin, amah vekin an hnenah chuan, Mihring Fapa hi Chawlhni Lal a ni, a ti a.

source: And the people were waiting for Zacharias and were surprised because he was in the Temple for such a long time.
target: Tin, vantlangho chuan Zakaria chu an lo nghak a, Pathian biak in chhunga a awm rei avang chuan mak an ti hle a.

source: Who do you support
target: Tu nge i thlawp

source: Who's next
target: Tunge a dawt

source: Which one do you take
target: Eng ber nge i lak

source: If that ordering of the grace of God has come to your knowledge, which was given to me for you,
target: nangni tan Pathian khawngaih enkawlna hna mi pek kha in lo hre tawh chawk ang a;

source: I almost fell down.
target: Ka tlu ta mai a.

source: Then she gave him the same story, saying, The Hebrew servant whom you have taken into our house came in to make sport of me;
target: Tin, a hnênah hetiang thu hi a lo sawi a, Hebrai chhiahhlawh kan hnêna i rawn hruai kha, mi tihmualpho tumin ka hnênah a lo lût a:

source: Man goes out to his work, and to his business, till the evening.
target: Mihring chu hna thawkin a chhuak a, Tlai lam thlengin a thawk rim thin.

source: And they said to them the words which Jesus had said; and they let them go.
target: Tin, anni chuan Isua sawi ang tak khan an hnenah an sawi a; tichuan an kal an phal ta a.

source: And he, putting off his coat, got up quickly, and came to Jesus.
target: Tin, ani chuan a puan a paih a, a zuang tho va, Isua hnenah a kal a.

source: I was beginning to lose my cool.
target: Ka cool tan tawh.

source: He was the builder of Eloth, which he got back for Judah after the death of the king.
target: Ani chuan lal chu a pi leh pute hnênah a mithilh hnuah Elot khua chu a siam tha a. Judai ramah a telh leh a.

source: And the house, that is, the Temple, in front of the holy place was forty cubits long.
target: Tin, in, biakna hmun bula biak in chu a dung lam tawng sawmli a ni.

source: Plates of gold were put all through the house till it was covered completely (and the altar in the inmost room was all covered with gold.
target: tin, in chu a zaa a peih thlengin a pumin rangkachak tiin a luan zel a: b iakna hmunamaichâm pum pui pawh chu rangkachak tiin a luan a.

source: All the Jews have knowledge of my way of life from my early years, as it was from the start among my nation, and at Jerusalem;
target: Atira ka naupan lai ata ka chite zingah leh Jerusalem khuaa ka awm dan kha Juda zawng zawngin an hria e;

source: Pork trotter
target: Vawk ke

source: Though my desire was to keep him with me, to be my servant in the chains of the good news, in your place:
target: ani chu Chanchin Thaa kawl ka bunnaah hian nangma aia rawng mi bawlsak theihna turin ka hnenah awmtir reng ka duh hle a ni;

source: Hate is covered up by the lips of the upright man, but he who lets out evil about another is foolish.
target: Huâtna zepte chu hmui dawthei nei mi â ni a, Mi rêlna thu chhak chhuak mi chu mi â a ni.

source: Your people give themselves gladly in the day of your power; like the dew of the morning on the holy mountains is the army of your young men.
target: I mite chu i thiltihtheihna niah chuan mahni duh thuin an inpe thin: Thianghlim mawinaah, zing pum chhûng atangin, I tleirawl daifim chu i nei a.

source: And he had them numbered in Bezek: the children of Israel were three hundred thousand, and the men of Judah thirty thousand.
target: Tin, Bezel hmunah chuan a chhiar a; Israel mite chu nuai thum an ni a, Juda mite chu singthum an ni a.

source: He who takes my flesh for food and my blood for drink is in me and I in him.
target: Tupawh ka tisa eia ka thisen in chu, keimahah a awm reng thin, kei pawh amahah ka awm reng thin.

source: They don't want you to use it.
target: I hman an duh lo.

source: And they were without children, because Elisabeth had never given birth, and they were at that time very old.
target: Nimahsela Elizabeti a chin avangin fa an nei lo, an pahnihin upa tak an ni si a.

source: I stood
target: Ka ding

source: Who has made us free from the power of evil and given us a place in the kingdom of the Son of his love;
target: Ani chuan thim thuneihna laka min chhan chhuakin, a Fapa hmangaih taka ramah chuan min kaitir ta a;

source: By glory and by shame, by an evil name and a good name; as untrue, and still true;
target: ropuina leh chawimawi lohnain, hming sawichhiat leh hming sawithatin; tihdertu angin, mi dik tak ni siin;

source: But he, desiring to put himself in the right, said to Jesus, And who is my neighbour?
target: Ani erawh chuan thiam inchantir a tum a, Isua hnenah, A nih leh, ka vengte chu tunge ni? a ti a.

source: What came into existence in him was life, and the life was the light of men.
target: Amahah chuan nunna a awm; chu mi nunna chu mihringte enna a ni a.

source: Now they of Beth-el had sent Sharezer and Regem-melech to make a request for grace from the Lord,
target: Tin, Bethel mite chuan Sarezera leh regemeleka leh an mite an rawn tîr a, LALPA khawngaihna chu an ngen a,

source: Nebuchadnezzar the king made an image of gold, sixty cubits high and six cubits wide: he put it up in the valley of Dura, in the land of Babylon.
target: Lal Nebuadnezzara chuan rangkachak milim, a sânlam tawng sawmruk, a hlâi lam tawngruk a siam a, Babulon biala Dura phâizâwlah a dintîr a.

source: So then am I no longer your friend, because I give you true words?
target: Chutichuan, thu dik tak ka hrilh che u avangin in hmelma ka lo ni ta em ni?

source: For it is better to have it said to you, Come up here; than for you to be put down in a lower place before the ruler.
target: I hmuh tawh thin mi lian hmaa tihhnuai i nih ai chuan thutphah tha deuhvah lo thu rawh khai, i hnêna han tih chu a tha zawk si a.

source: So they went up from Egypt and came to the land of Canaan, to their father Jacob.
target: Tin, Aigupta ram ata chu an han chho va, Kanaan rama an pa Jakoba hnên chu an han thleng a.

source: They have gained weight
target: An thau tawh hle

source: I shot Tom
target: Tom ka kap

source: I nailed it
target: Ka tidik e

source: For I had made the decision to have knowledge of nothing among you but only of Jesus Christ on the cross.
target: Isua Krista, amah ngei khenbeha a awm thu chauh lo chu in zingah engmah reng hriat ka tum loh kha.

source: Before they are conscious of it, let them be cut down like thorns; let a strong wind take them away like waste growth.
target: In belte chuan hling thing lum a hriat hma pawhin Ani chuan thawngaleivirin a la bo vang, A hring leh a kang lai pawh.

source: Tom isn't drinking
target: Tom a in lo

source: I'm free now
target: Ka zalen ta

source: I'm not tall enough.
target: Ka sang tawk lo.

source: And Jethro said, Praise be to the Lord, who has taken you out of the hand of Pharaoh and out of the hand of the Egyptians; freeing the people from the yoke of the Egyptians.
target: Tin, Jethroa chuan, LALPA, Aigupta-ho lak ata leh Pharaoa lak ata chhanhimtu che u chu fakin awm rawh se; ani chuan Aigupat-ho thu hnuaia awm mipuite chu a chhanhim tâk hi.

source: And David's two wives, Ahinoam of Jezreel and Abigail, the wife of Nabal of Carmel, had been made prisoners.
target: Tin, Davida nupuite pahnih Jezreel mi Ahinoami leh Karmel-a mi Nabala nupui Abigaili te pawh salah an hruai tawh a.

source: And a number of those who had faith came and made a public statement of their sins and all their acts.
target: Tin, ringhote pawh chu a then tam tak an lo kal a, an thiltihte thupha an chawi a, an inpuang ta a.

source: My people get knowledge from their tree, and their rod gives them news; for a false spirit is the cause of their wandering, and they have been false to their God.
target: Ka mite chuan an thing an râwn a, An tiang chuan an hril țhin; Nawchizawrhna rilru chuan a hruai bo va, An pathian lak ata an hnar bo ta si a.

source: And they all made an attack on Sosthenes, the ruler of the Synagogue, and gave him blows before the judge's seat; but Gallio gave no attention to these things.
target: Tin, Grik mi zawng zawngin inkhawmna in hotu Sosthena an man a, rorel thutphah hmaah chuan an vua a, Galliova chuan chung an thiltih chu engah mah a ngai lo va.

source: Tom moaned
target: Tom a rum ri

source: Then David and all Israel went to Jerusalem (which is Jebus; and the Jebusites, the people of the land, were there.
target: Tin, Davida leh Israel-ho zawng zawng chu Jerusalem-ah an kal a chu chu Jebus a ni;tin, chutah chuan chu mi rama mi, Jebus-hote chu an awm a.

source: I cried a lot
target: Ka ṭap nasa

source: Truly, my eye has seen all this, word of it has come to my ear, and I have knowledge of it.
target: En che u, heng zawng zawng hi ka mitin a hmu a, Ka bengin a hria a, a hre thiam a ni.

source: Who will take me into the strong town? who will be my guide into Edom?
target: Khawpui nghet takah chuan tuin nge mi hruai lut ang? Edom ramah chuan tuin nge mi hruai ang?

source: The writings of the prophets say, And they will all have teaching from God. Everyone whose ears have been open to the teaching of the Father comes to me.
target: Zawlneite lehkhabuah, ‘Pathian zirtirin an awm vek ang,’ tih ziak a ni. Mi tin Pa thu hriaa zir apiang chu ka hnenah an lo kal thin.

source: But when you go without food, put oil on your head and make your face clean;
target: Nang erawh chuan chaw i nghei hunin sahriak thih la, i hmai phih rawh;

source: Stay back
target: Tawlh hnung rawh

source: The horns are to be sounded by the sons of Aaron, the priests; this is to be a law for you for ever, from generation to generation.
target: Arona fapa puithiamhote chuan tawtawrâwt chu an ham tur a ni; chu chu in tan inthlahte thlenga kumkhaw dan tur a ni ang.

source: In those days and at that time, I will let a Branch of righteousness come up for David; and he will be a judge in righteousness in the land.
target: Chung niahte leh chumi hunah chuan felna Chawrno Juda hnênah ka chhuahtir ang, chu ramah chuan dik tak leh fel takin ro a rêl ang.

source: And after the voice was gone they saw that Jesus was by himself. And they kept quiet, and said nothing at that time to anyone of the things which they had seen.
target: Tin, aw chu a reh veleh Isua chu amah chauhvin an hmu ta a. Tin, an ngawi reng a, chung lai vel chuan an thil hmuh chu tumah engmah an hrilh lo.

source: While he was still talking, someone came from the house of the ruler of the Synagogue, saying, Your daughter is dead; do not go on troubling the Master.
target: A la tawng lai mekin inkhawmna in hotu in ata chu mi pakhat a lo kal a, I fanu a thi ta, zirtirtu hi tihah duh suh, a ti a.

source: But without your approval I would do nothing; so that your good works might not be forced, but done freely from your heart.
target: Nimahsela, i khawngaihna chu khawngaih luihtir ang ni lovin, i thu thu ang a nih theih zawkna turin, i thu lovin engmah tih ka duh lo.

source: We aren't going to win.
target: Kan chak dawn lo.

source: The fan doesn't work.
target: Fan a thawk lo.

source: Then Herod sent for the wise men privately, and put questions to them about what time the star had been seen.
target: Chu mi hnuah chuan Herodan arukin mi fingte chu a ko va, dilchhut takin arsi lan lai chu a zawt chhuak a.

source: Stop the car
target: Car tiding rawh

source: Did I give you enough time?
target: Hun ka pe tawk em?

source: Cursed are those who get up early in the morning to give themselves up to strong drink; who keep on drinking far into the night till they are heated with wine!
target: Zu um tûra zing tak taka tho va, uainin a tihruih bung hma lohva zan rei tak tak thlenga awm thinte chu an chung a pik e!

source: And the limit on the west is the edge of the Great Sea. This is the line going round the land marked out for the children of Judah, by their families.
target: Tin, thlang lampang ramri chu tuifinriat zau tak leh a kam chin zawng chu a ni. Chung ramri chin zawng chu ani Juda thlahte tana an chhûngkaw zir zela ruat chu.

source: These are the journeys of the children of Israel, when they went out of the land of Egypt in their armies, under the direction of Moses and Aaron.
target: Mosia leh Arona kaihhruaia Aigupta ram ata a pâwl pâwla an chhuah a, an kal zel dan chu hetiang hian a ni,

source: Truly, the upright will give praise to your name: the holy will have a place in your house.
target: Matheilovin mi felte chuan i hming an fak ang a: Mi dikte chu i hmaah an awm ang.

source: It's already 700
target: Dar 700 a ni tawh

source: We're pooped
target: Kan chau zo vek

source: Take heart and be strong; for you will give to this people for their heritage the land which I gave by an oath to their fathers.
target: Chak tak leh huai takin awm rawh: an thlahtute chhechham pêk ka lo tiam tak ram kha, hengho hi i luahtir dawn si a.

source: I'm ticklish
target: Ka za lutuk

source: Does it not seem possible to you that if I make request to my Father he will even now send me an army of angels?
target: Tunah pawh vntirhkoh sangruk hmun sawm leh hmun hnih aia tam zawk mi rawn tirhsak turin ka Pa hnenah ngen thei lovin mi ring em ni le?

source: By these evils a third part of men was put to death, by the fire, and the smoke, and the burning smell which came out of their mouths.
target: Chu mi hremna pathum chuanin mihring hmun thuma thena hmun khat an tihlum ta a – mei leh meikhu leh kat an ka atang chhuak khanin.

source: Even so it is not the pleasure of your Father in heaven for one of these little ones to come to destruction.
target: Chutiang bawkin heng mi tete zinga pakhat boral pawh hi in Pa vana mi duhzawng a ni lo ve.

source: Mary was ashamed of herself.
target: Mari chu a zak a.

source: And they gave the town the name of Dan, after Dan their father, who was the son of Israel: though the town had been named Laish at first.
target: Tin, a khaw hmingah chuan Israela fa, an thlahtu Dana chawiin, Dan an vuah a: amaherawhchu a tirah c huan chu khua chu Lais an ti thin a ni.

source: And righteousness will be the cord of his robe, and good faith the band round his breast.
target: Tin, felna hi a taihren a ni ang a, rinawmna hi a kawnghren a ni ang.

source: I obeyed.
target: Ka thuawi.

source: These words of love to you at the end are in my writing, Paul's writing, and this is the mark of every letter from me.
target: Kei Paulan, keima kut ngeia chibai ka bukna che u a nih hi; hei hi ka lehkha thawn tinrenga chhinchhiahna a ni, hetianga ka ziak hi.

source: There is nobody about.
target: Tumah an awm lo.

source: Where has she gone?
target: Khawnge a kal a?

source: Let me put him on
target: Amah chu ka bun tir mai teh ang

source: The new wine is thin, the vine is feeble, and all the glad-hearted make sounds of grief.
target: Uain thar chu a tap e, grêp hrui chu a chau ve, thinlunga hlim zawng zawngte chu an rum e.

source: Do it quickly
target: Rang takin ti rawh

source: So that having every grace you are living in the hope of the revelation of our Lord Jesus Christ;
target: chutichuan kan Lalpa Isua Krista inlarna nghakin, thilpek reng rengah in hlawhtling lo lo ve;

source: If I made up their number, it would be more than the grains of sand; when I am awake, I am still with you.
target: Chhiar dawn ila, a tam lam chu tiau vaivut aiin a tam zawk ang: Ka han men chuan, i hnênah ka la awm cheu thin a ni.

source: In the fourth, a topaz, a beryl, and a jasper; they were fixed in twisted frames of gold.
target: Tin, tlar lina chu krusolithos te, berullion te, onukion te ani a: rangkachak zai phiara phum fel thet a ni.

source: Can he see us?
target: Khapa khân min hmu thei ang em?

source: My son, keep good sense, and do not let wise purpose go from your eyes.
target: Ka fapa, i mit ata kiantir suh la, Finna leh ngaihruat thiamna dik tak chu vawng tlat rawh;

source: And on it they put four lines of stones: in the first line was a carnelian, a chrysolite, and an emerald;
target: Tin, chutah chuan lunghlute tlar liin an zep a: tlar khatna chu saridon te, topazion te, smarangdon te a ni a.

source: All the nations have come round me; but in the name of the Lord I will have them cut down.
target: Hnam tinrengin mi hual vêl a: Anni chu LALPA hmingin ka tiboral ang.

source: Sami is a lawyer
target: Sami hi ukil a ni

source: Let their way be dark and full of danger; let them be troubled by the angel of the Lord.
target: LALPA vântirhkohvina um zel siin, An kawng hchu thim tak leh nal tak ni rawh se.

source: The water was cold
target: Tui chu a vawt a

source: I checked my bags.
target: Ka bag te chu ka check a.

source: Make glad the soul of your servant; for it is lifted up to you, O Lord.
target: I chhiahhlawh nunna hi tihlim ang che; Aw LALPA, ka rilru hi i hnênah ka dah tlat si thin a.

source: I have said all this to you while I am still with you.
target: In hnena ka la awm chhung hian heng thu hi ka hrilh che u hi.

source: From there he went to Mount Carmel, and came back from there to Samaria.
target: Tin, chuta tang chuan Karmel tlângah a kal a, chuta tang chuan Samari khuaah a haw leh ta a.

source: They don't like you
target: An duh lo che

source: Spotted deer
target: Sakhi vun rang

source: The sword may come near him but is not able to go through him; the spear, or the arrow, or the sharp-pointed iron.
target: Miin khandaihin bei mah sela, a hneh lo vang; Fei emaw, thal emaw, feitam emaw pawhin.

source: Being sad most of all because he had said that they would not see his face again. And so they went with him to the ship.
target: a hmel an hmuh leh tawh loh tur thu a sawi chu an lungngaihna ber a ni. Tin, lawng thleng chuan amah an thlah ta a.

source: And the Lord, in answer to the voice of Israel, gave the Canaanites up to them; and they put them and their towns completely to destruction: and that place was named Hormah.
target: Tichuan LALPAN Israel mite thu chu a pawm a, Kanaan mite chu a pe a, anmahni leh an khuate chu an tiboral hlauh va; a hmun hmingah chuan Horma an vuah a.

source: They will not go after another who is not their keeper, but will go from him in flight, because his voice is strange to them.
target: Mi dang zawng an zui lo vang a, an tlan bosan zawk ang: mi dangte aw zawng an hriat loh avangin, a ti a.

source: Evil-doers are overturned and never seen again, but the house of upright men will keep its place.
target: Mi suaksualte chu paih thlakin an awm a, an bo thin a, Mi fel chhûng erawh chu an awm reng ang,

source: Your doors will be open at all times; they will not be shut day or night; so that men may come into you with the wealth of the nations, with their kings at their head.
target: I kawngkhârte pawh hawnin a awm areng ang a; a chhun azanin an khar lo vang; miten hnam tin sum chu i hnênah an rawn laka, an lalte pawh an rawn hruai ve theih nân.

source: How much less man who is an insect, and the son of man who is a worm!
target: Mihring lek phei chu e, thil lung mai a ni! Mihring fapa chu changpat mai a ni.

source: I quit
target: Ka bang

source: I'm grateful
target: Ka lawm e

source: In whom we have salvation through his blood, the forgiveness of our sins, through the wealth of his grace,
target: a thisen avangin amahah chuan kan tlanna kan nei a ni – a khawngaihna ngahzia ang zela kan bawhchhiatnate ngaihdamna chu.

source: Then David got all the people together and went to Rabbah and made war on it and took it.
target: Chutichuan Davida chuan mi zawng zawngte chu a khâwm a, Raba-ah chuan an kal a, an va rûn a, an la ta a.

source: And let him take from the children of Israel two he-goats for a sin-offering and one male sheep for a burned offering.
target: Tin, Israela thlahte mipuiho ta kelpa pahnih sual thawi nan leh halral thilhlanah berampa pakhat a keng ang a.

source: Ho! Assyrian, the rod of my wrath, the instrument of my punishment!
target: Hawh Assuria mi, ka thinurna talhtum, ka lungnih lohna kengtu tiang!

source: Tom dances
target: Tom a lam mêk

source: And he gives us all our requests, because we keep his laws and do the things which are pleasing in his eyes.
target: tichuan a thupekte kan zawm a, a mithmuha thil lawmawm kan tih thin avangin, kan dil apiang a hnen ata kan hmu zel thin a ni.

source: In the day of your planting you were watching its growth, and in the morning your seed was flowering: but its fruit is wasted away in the day of grief and bitter sorrow.
target: i phun niin i ping vêl țhin a, zingah chuan i thil chi chu i tipar țhin: nimahsela rah lawh chu lungngaihna leh natna nasa tak niah chuan a bo țhin.

source: And Moses was happy to go on living with the man; and he gave his daughter Zipporah to Moses.
target: Tin, Mosia chuan chu mi hnêna awm chu rem a ti a: tin, a fanu Zipori chu Mosia a pe a.

source: O Lord, let my lips be open, so that my mouth may make clear your praise.
target: Aw LALPA, nangin ka hmui hi hawng ang che; Tichuan ka ka hian i fakna chu a hriattir dawn nia.

source: So Moses said all the words of this song in the hearing of the people, he and Hoshea, the son of Nun.
target: Tin, mipuite benghriatah chung hla thu zawng zawng chu Mosian a va sawi a, amah nen Nuna fapa Hosea nen.

source: I got mad
target: Ka a tawh

source: Fear and deep waters have come on us, wasting and destruction.
target: Hlauhna leh khuarkhurumin mi nang a, chhiatna leh boralna nên.

source: Now then, take note; for the Lord has made selection of you to be the builder of a house for the holy place. Be strong and do it.
target: Fimkhur rawh khai; hmun thianghlim atâna in sa tûrin LALPAN a lo ruat tak che hi; hak takin awm la, bei rawh, a ti a.

source: For when they come back from the dead there are no husbands and wives, but they are as the angels in heaven.
target: Thawhlehnaah chuan nupui pasal an innei dawn tawh lova, vana vantirhkohte ang an ni dawn zawk asin.

source: The sun is a star.
target: Ni chu arsi a ni.

source: I can drive a car.
target: Car ka khalh thei.

source: And they will come up like grass in a well-watered field, like water-plants by the streams.
target: tichuan anni chu, tuipuisuthlahte tui luanna kianga to ang hian, hlobet zingah chuan an to vang.

source: Did you pack any snacks?
target: Snack i pack em?

source: He is heroic.
target: Mi huaisen a ni.

source: It's no joke.
target: Fiamthu a ni lo.

source: Step on it!
target: Rap teh!

source: Then Ahimaaz, the son of Zadok, said, Let me go and give the king news of how the Lord has done right in his cause against those who took up arms against him.
target: Chutichuan Zadoka fapa Ahimaaza chuan, Ka va tlan ang a, lalpan a hmêlma phuba a laksak dan chanchin hi lal chu ka va hrilh ang e, a ti a.

source: I chose to resign.
target: Bang ka thlang ta a ni.

source: There is no water.
target: Tui a awm lo.

source: From Kohath come the Amramites and the Izharites and the Hebronites and the Uzzielites; these are the families of the Kohathites.
target: Tin, Kohatha chu Amram-ho te, Uziel-hote thlahtu a ni: hengho hi Kohatha thlahte an ni.

source: Tom's greedy
target: Tom a duham

source: So that now, on the other hand, it is right for him to have forgiveness and comfort from you, for fear that his sorrow may be over-great.
target: Chutichuan, hrem leh tawh ahnekin in ngaidamin in thlamuan zawk tur a ni, chutilochuan eng emaw tiin mi chutiang chu a lungngaih lutuknain a lem zo dah ang e.

source: All the saints send their love to you, specially those who are of Caesar's house.
target: Mi thianghlim zawng zawngten chibai an buk che u a, Kaisara chhungte zinga mi hian an buk deuh ber a che u.

source: Then I would not be put to shame, as long as I have respect for all your teaching.
target: Chu mi hunah chuan ka mualpho lo vang, I thupêkte zawng zawng ka pawisak hunah chuan.

source: For from his holy place the Lord has seen, looking down on the earth from heaven;
target: Ani chuan ahmun thianghlim sâng tak atangin a zuk en a; LALPA chuan van atang khian lei hi a hmu a;

source: Be my judge, O Lord my God, in your righteousness; do not let them be glad over me.
target: Aw LALPA ka Pathian, i felna avângin ro mi rel la; Anni chuan mi diriam suh se.

source: The Lord God, who gets together the wandering ones of Israel, says, I will get together others in addition to those of Israel who have come back.
target: Lalpa PATHIAN, Israel hnawh chhuahhote hruai khawmtu chuan, Hruai khâwm sate bakah mi dang pawh ka la hruai khâwm ang, a ti a.

source: So they went on their way; and the sun went down when they were near Gibeah in the land of Benjamin.
target: Chutichuan an kal leh ta zel a; Benjamin-ho Gibea khaw kiang an thlen chuan ni a tla ta a.

source: I'll throttle him!
target: Ka throttle ang!

source: They were very welcoming
target: An lo lawm hle mai

source: Gym pakhata mi ka ni.
target: I belong to a gym.

source: Let the priests take, every man from his friends and neighbours, to make good what is damaged in the house, wherever it is to be seen.
target: puithiamten an hmêlhriatte hnên atangin lo la theuh sela; tichuan in chia a che lai apiang, siam rawh se, a ti a.

source: For if you will not let my people go, tomorrow I will send locusts into your land:
target: Chutia ka mite i chhuahtîr phal loh zawngin, ngai teh, nak tûkah i ram chhûngah hian khaukhuapte ka rawn lêntîr ang a:

source: Love is never tired of waiting; love is kind; love has no envy; love has no high opinion of itself, love has no pride;
target: Hmangaihnain a dawhthei a, ngil a nei bawk thin; hmangaihnain a itsik lo va; hmangaihna a infak lo va, a uang lo va,

source: Come aboard
target: Lo chuang rawh

source: In the thought of him who is in comfort there is no respect for one who is in trouble; such is the fate of those whose feet are slipping.
target: Mi fel, mi famkim si, nuihzbaur ka ni. Mi nuamsa rilruah chuan vanduai hmusitna a awm; Rahbi tleute a chang reng a ni.

source: You will be proud of me.
target: Min chhuang ang.

source: What then? That which Israel was searching for he did not get, but those of the selection got it and the rest were made hard.
target: Engtin nge ni ta ang le?Israel mite chuan an zawn chu an hmu lo va,Thlante erawh chuan an hmu a, a dang zawng zawngte chu an chawlawl zo tawh a.

source: But let your first care be for his kingdom and his righteousness; and all these other things will be given to you in addition.
target: A ram leh a felna chu zawng hmasa zawk rawh u, tichuan chung zawng zawng chu a pek belhchhah dawn che u nia.

source: Then he went on with his story and said, But who may keep his life when God does this?
target: Tin, thu chu a sawi leh a, Pathianin hetianga a tihin tunge nung thei ang le?

source: The sea was parted in two by your strength; the heads of the great sea-beasts were broken.
target: Nang chuan i chaknain tuifinriat kha i tithen a: Nang chuan tuia drakonho lute chu i tikeh a.

source: They will take up snakes, and if there is poison in their drink, it will do them no evil; they will put their hands on those who are ill, and they will get well.
target: rulte kutin an la ang a; thihna tur engpawh in mah sela engmah an ti lo vang a; damlote chungah an kut an nghat ang a, an dam zel ang, a ti a.

source: They're not here for you.
target: I tan an awm lo.

source: We didn't see you.
target: Kan hmu lo che.

source: For Joshua did not take back his hand with the outstretched spear till the destruction of the people of Ai was complete.
target: Josuan a fei lekna kut chu Ai-ho zawng zawng a tihboral der hma loh chuan a la thla si lo va.

source: I'm not following you.
target: Ka zui lo che.

source: Turn left.
target: Vei lamah.

source: But Jeroboam had put some of his men to make a surprise attack on them from the back, so some were facing Judah and others were stationed secretly at their back.
target: Nimahsela Jeroboama chuan an hnung lamah a chan ruktir a: tichuan Judate hma lamah an awm a, chang ruttue chua n hnung lamah an awm a.

source: And the son of the Israelite woman said evil against the holy Name, with curses; and they took him to Moses. His mother's name was Shelomith, the daughter of Dibri, of the tribe of Dan.
target: Israel hmeichhe fapa chuan anche lawhin pathin hming a sawichhia a; tichuan Mosia hnenah an rawn hruai a. A nu hming chu Selomithi a ni lo, Dan chi Difiria fanu a ni.

source: This poor man's cry came before the Lord, and he gave him salvation from all his troubles.
target: He mi rethei hi a au va, tin, LALPA chuan a hria a, A manganna zawng zawngah chuan a chhan chhuak ta a.

source: It has begun
target: A bul a inṭan ta

source: But Peter said, No, Lord; for I have never taken food which is common or unclean.
target: Nimahsela Petera chuan, Lalpa, ni lo ve; thiang lo leh bawlhhlawh engmah reng ka ei ngai lo ve, a ti a.

source: Before the mountains were put in their places, before the hills was my birth:
target: Tlâng liante an din hma leh Tlâng tete awm hmain ka piang tawh a,

source: Sami is still missing
target: Sami a la bo a ni

source: If the king is angry and says, Why did you go so near the town for the fight? was it not certain that their archers would be on the wall?
target: a thin a ur thut mai mai a, 'Engati nge bei tûra chutianga khaw bul lawka in kal mai:? Kulh atangin an kap mai ang che u tih in hre lâwm ni?:

target: Nu fing ber a ni.

source: Who's Tom

target: Moron min ti suh.

target: Buaina a awm a ni

source: Till I went into God's holy place, and saw the end of the evil-doers.
target: Pathian hmun thianghlimah ka luh a, An tawpna tûr chu ka ngaihtuah hma chuan.

source: And while he was going past Peniel, the sun came up. And he went with unequal steps because of his damaged leg.
target: Tin, Penuel a pelh lai chuan nî a lo chhuak a, amah chu a rawn chhun a, a malpui avâng chuan a lo bai ta a.

source: It was never him.
target: Amah a ni ngai lo.

source: Can we talk to him
target: Amah chu kan biak thei ang em

source: And I made you fair with ornaments and put jewels on your hands and a chain on your neck.
target: Cheimawinain ka chei chia, i kutah banbun te, i nghawngah rangkachak khaidiat te,

source: I lost a bet
target: Inchawina ka chan

source: I knew it
target: Ka hria e

source: He ordered a beer
target: Beer a order a

source: And by the prayer of faith the man who is ill will be made well, and he will be lifted up by the Lord, and for any sin which he has done he will have forgiveness.
target: tin, rinnaa tawngtaina chuan damlo chu a chhandam ang a, Lalpa chuan ani chu a kai tho vang; tin, thil a lo tihsual tawh chuan ngaihdamsak a ni ang.

source: As an expert designer of beautiful things, working in gold and silver and brass;
target: thiltih tur fing taka suangtuah thiamna te, rangkachak leh tangkarua leh dar chher thiamna te,

source: There's no damage.
target: Chhiatna a awm lo.

source: I'm watching the Olympics.
target: Olympics ka en a.

source: The works of the Lord are great, searched out by all those who have delight in them.
target: LALPA thiltihte chu a ropui a, A chnga lawm apiangten zawn chhuah a ni thin.

source: And Jair, the son of Manasseh, went and took the towns of Gilead, naming them Havvoth-Jair.
target: Tin, Manasea fapa Jaira chuan chunga khuate chu a va la a, Havot-jair a vuah a,

source: Then a question came up between John's disciples and a Jew about washing.
target: Tin, Johana zirtirte leh Juda pakhat, silfai thu-ah an lo inhnial a.

source: Everything looks good
target: Engkim a tha vek

source: He's lying
target: Dawt a sawi

source: But Hamor said to them, Shechem, my son, is full of desire for your daughter: will you then give her to him for a wife?
target: Tin, Hamora chuan anmahni a bia a, Ka fapa Sekema rilru chu in fanu chungah a awm tlat a: khawngaih takin nupuiah neihtîr ta che u.

source: Truly men of low birth are nothing, and men of high position are not what they seem; if they are put in the scales together they are less than a breath.
target: Mi chi tete hi engmah lo mai an ni, mi chi liante pawh hi dawt mai an ni: Bûknaah chuan an kang daih ang a; Engmah lo mai mai ai pawhin an zâng zawk a ni.

source: No meal offering which you give to the Lord is to be made with leaven; no leaven or honey is to be burned as an offering made by fire to the Lord.
target: Chhangphut thilhlan reng reng, LALPA hnena in hlan tur chu dawidim tela siam tur a ni lo: LALPA tana meia thilhlanah chuan dawidim emaw khawizu emaw reng reng in hal tur a ni lo.

source: And a shade in the daytime from the heat, and a safe cover from storm and from rain.
target: Chhunah ni sa hliahtu atân leh thlipui leh ruahpui lakah inhumhimna leh bihrukna hmun atân bawkte a ni ang.

source: For this cause that field was named, The field of blood, to this day.
target: Chuvangin a ni, chu mi hmun chu tun thlenga ‘Thisen Hmun’ an tih tak ni.

source: Open the box
target: A bâwm hawng rawh

source: Let it be broken into bits, and put oil on it; it is a meal offering.
target: I phel ang a, hriakin i leih tur a ni: chu chu chhangphut thilhlan a ni e.

source: I am level-headed
target: Level-headed ka ni

source: Tom flinched
target: Tom a tîm

source: For you are a holy people to the Lord your God: marked out by the Lord your God to be his special people out of all the nations on the face of the earth.
target: LALPA in Pathian tan hnam thianghlim in ni si a; leilunga hnam ahluana a pual bik ni tura LALPA in Pathianin a thlan che u in nih hi.

source: Happy are they whose resting-place is in your house: they will still be praising you. (Selah.
target: I inah awmte chu an eng a thawl e: Nang chu an fak fo vang che. Selah

source: Water is good to drink.
target: Tui in tur a tha.

source: Do you want the job or not?
target: Hna chu i duh em?

source: This is the way of the foolish; their silver is for those who come after them, and their children get the pleasure of their gold. (Selah.
target: Chung an awm dan chu an âtna a ni: Nimahsela, an hnu-ah chuan miten an thu sawite chu tha an ti thin.

source: I feel good
target: Nuam ka ti

source: Are you miserable
target: I hrehawm em ni

source: Everyone who is overtaken will have a spear put through him, and everyone who goes in flight will be put to the sword.
target: Tupawh an hmh apiang chhunt langin an awm ang a, tupawh an man apiang khandaiha tihtlukin an awm ang.

source: I didn't put it together.
target: Ka dah khawm lo.

source: I can verify that.
target: Chu chu ka verify thei a ni.

source: After he has given himself he has the right to be made free, for a price, by one of his brothers,
target: a tluk luh hnu pawhin tlab leh theih a ni ang a; a unaute zinga miin an tlan thei ang :

source: You're limiting yourself.
target: I in limit a ni.

source: And when they were getting the young ass, the owners of it said to them, Why are you taking the young ass?
target: Tin, sabengtung no chu an phelh lai chuan a neituten an hnenah, Sabengtung no kha engah nge in phelh? an ti a.

source: I rewrote it.
target: Ka ziak ṭha vek.

source: My feelings are strongly moved, and give me no rest; days of trouble have overtaken me.
target: Ka thin aphu hlawp hlawp a, a reh thei lo va, Tuarna nite chu ka chungaha thleng a.

source: David said to him, If you go on with me, you will be a trouble to me:
target: Tin, Davida chuan ahnênah, Ka hnêna i kal ve chuan ka tan phur rit i ni mai ang a:

source: All the offspring of Jacob were seventy persons: and Joseph had come to Egypt before them.
target: Tin, Jakoba thâlbea chhuak zawng zawngte chu mi sawmsarih an ni: Josefa zawng Aigupta ramah chuan lo awm tawh sa reng a ni a.

source: I can't read
target: Ka chhiar thei lo

source: You captured nothing.
target: Engmah i man lo.

source: For our present trouble, which is only for a short time, is working out for us a much greater weight of glory;
target: Kan hrehawm nep tak, tun mit khap kar chhung chauhva awm tur hian ropuina nasa tak chatuan atan min siamsak nasa tulh tulh a ni;

source: He makes a resting-place for me in the green fields: he is my guide by the quiet waters.
target: Ani chuan hlobet hring dup hmunahte mi bawhtir thin a: Chawlhna tui kamahte mi hruai thin.

source: Get some rest
target: Chawl rih rawh

source: They handcuffed him
target: Kut an bun a

source: Tom's home
target: Tom inah a awm

source: Can he see me
target: Khapa khân mi hmu thei ang em

target: Ka pawm e.

source: You're naive
target: I mawl lûtuk

source: Because the Gentiles go in search of all these things: for your Father in heaven has knowledge that you have need of all these things:
target: Jentailten chung zawng zawng chu an zawng thin a ni. Chung zawng zawng chu in mamawh tih in Pa vana mi’n a hre reng a ni.

source: Just stop it already.
target: Titawp mai rawh.

source: Happy are your wives, happy are these your servants whose place is ever before you, hearing your words of wisdom.
target: I mite, heng i chhiahhlawh, i bula awm fova i finna thu ngaithla fovate hi an nihhlawh e!

source: And Asa went out against him, and they put their forces in position in the valley north of Mareshah.
target: Tichuan Asa chu a bei tûrin a va thawk a, Maresa-ah Zephatha ruamah an va inzar a.

source: I dug a pit.
target: Khur ka lai.

source: Should we do that
target: Chutiang chu kan ti tur em ni

source: And the land itself has become unclean; so that I have sent on it the reward of its wrongdoing, and the land itself puts out those who are living in it.

source: You ain't gonna cut it.
target: I cut dawn lo.

source: What are you doing
target: Engnge ni i tih a

target: Rational a ni lo

source: Then let it be put to death, so that the sides of the altar are marked with its blood.
target: Tin, berâmpa chu lo talhin, a thisen chu lain, maichâm chu chu a vêlin i theh tur a ni.

source: I lost heart
target: Hmangaihnaah ka tuiral

source: Give my love to Apelles, who has the approval of Christ. Say a kind word to those who are of the house of Aristobulus.
target: Kristaa mi tak, Apellia kha chibai mi buksak ang che u. Aristobula chhungte zinga mite kha chibai mi buksak ang che u.

source: And the Chaldaean army went after King Zedekiah and overtook him on the other side of Jericho, and all his army went in flight from him in every direction.
target: Mahse Kaldai sipaite chuan lal chu an um a, Jeriko phaiah Zedekia chu an um phak ta a, a sipai rual zawng zawng chu a hnên ata an darh vek a.

source: They're fast
target: An rang a ni

source: See, he is looking for something against me; in his eyes I am as one of his haters;
target: I e, ka chungah remchâng a dap chhuak a, A hmêlmaah mi chhiar a ni;

source: So that I may have an answer for the man who would put me to shame; for I have faith in your word.
target: Chutichuan, mi sawi chhetu chhanna tûr ka nei ang; I thu ka ring si a.

source: If the fire puts an end to any man's work, it will be his loss: but he will get salvation himself, though as by fire.
target: Tu hnathawh pawh a kan chuan chu mi chuan a chan ang; amah tak erawh chu chhandamin a awm ang, amaherawhchu meia kal tlang ang maiin.

source: But these people who have no knowledge of the law are cursed.
target: Heng Dan hre lo mipuite tehchai hi anchhe dawng an ni asin, an ti a, an chhang a.

source: And Zadok and Abiathar, the son of Ahimelech, the son of Ahitub, were priests; and Seraiah was the scribe;
target: tin, Ahituba fapa Zadoka leh Abiathara fapa Ahimelek chu puithiam an ni a; tin, Seraia chu ziaktu ani a;

source: Come near to my soul, for its salvation: be my saviour, because of those who are against me.
target: Ka nuna hi rawn hnaih in, tlan la: Mi dotute avâng hian mi chhanhim ang che.

target: Ka kal nasa.

target: Tin, chhinchhiahna ka hmu a.

source: Are they going to die
target: An thi dawn em ni

source: He is hated
target: A hua
