target: Kan sawi tawh a.

source: How vigorous you are!
target: I va chak em!

source: I was fat
target: Ka thau thin

source: They are all hungry
target: An riltam vek a ni

source: They all respect him
target: An zah vek a ni

source: Are you stuck?
target: I tâng a mi?

source: And if there is pain in one part of the body, all the parts will be feeling it; or if one part is honoured, all the parts will be glad.
target: Chutichuan, peng khatin a tuar chuan peng zawng zawngin an tuarpui thin, peng khat chawimawiin a awm chuan peng zawng zawngin an lawmpui thin.

source: I am sweaty
target: Ka thlan hluam

source: Tom finished
target: Tom'n a zo

source: I can't call them.
target: Ka ko thei lo.

source: I sent for my lovers, but they were false to me: my priests and my responsible men were breathing their last breath in the town, while they were looking for food to give them new life.
target: Mi ngainatute ka ko va, annni chuan mi bum ta zâwk a; Ka puithiam leh ka upate khawpuiah an boral ta; An nun tihharhna tûr chaw an zawn laiin.

source: But your eyes and your heart are fixed only on profit for yourself, on causing the death of him who has done no wrong, and on violent and cruel acts.
target: Nimahsela i duhamna atân te, Mi thiam thisen chhuah nân te, Hnehchhiah nân leh pâwngnek nân chauh I mit leh i rilru a ni.

source: But Saul got knowledge of their design. And they kept watch day and night on the roads out of the town, so that they might put him to death:
target: nimahsela ani chuan an phiar chu a lo hre ta a. Tin, tihlum turin kulh kawngka tinah chuan achhun azanin an chang thin a.

source: Then he came across another man, and said, Give me a wound. And the man gave him a blow wounding him.
target: Tichuan mi dang a va mu leh a.Mi han vaw teh khai, a ti a. chu mi chuan a han vua a, a vaw sil ta a.

source: I say this so that you may not be turned away by any deceit of words.
target: Tuman tawng kam thiamin an bum loh nan che u, chung chu ka ti a ni,

source: And he was in need of food: but while they were getting it ready, a deep sleep came on him;
target: tin, a ril a lo tam a, chaw ei a duh ta a; nimahsela ei tur an siam lai chuan englovin a zel ta a.

source: To be trained in the ways of wisdom, in righteousness and judging truly and straight behaviour:
target: Felna te, rorêl te, hleih nei lova hmang hre taka zirtirna pawm dan thiamna te;

source: And the disciples went and did as Jesus had given them orders,
target: Tichuan zirtirte chu an va kal a. Isuan an hnena thu a pek ang ngeiin an ti a,

source: They've left
target: An chhuak tawh

source: Everything is delicious
target: Engkim a tui vek

source: You're very intelligent
target: I fing lûtuk

source: And every man's holy things will be his: whatever a man gives to the priest will be his.
target: An thil serh chu anmahnin an nei ang, puithiam hnena an pêk chu puithiamin a nei tur ani, tiin, a ti a.

source: Now the sons of Eli were evil and good-for-nothing men, having no knowledge of the Lord.
target: Tin, Elia fapate chu Beliala fapate an ni a; LALPA chu an hre lo va

source: And the makers of twisted thread will be crushed, and those who ... will be sad in heart.
target: Tin, a lung bante chu tihsawmin a awm ang a, inhlawhfa thin zawng zawngte chu an rilrui an lungngai ang.

source: He gave it to Joseph as a witness, when he went out over the land of Egypt; then the words of a strange tongue were sounding in my ears.
target: Chu chu Josef-ho zinga thuhriattir nân a ruat a ni., Aigupta ram chunga a kal chhuah lai kha: Ka tawng hriat loh benga ka hriatna kha.

source: At which time Moses came to birth, and he was very beautiful; and he was kept for three months in his father's house:
target: Chu mi lai chuan Mosia a lo piang a, a hmel a tha em em mai a; a pa inah thla thum an chawm a;

source: And now you have come to take the place of your fathers, another generation of sinners, increasing the wrath of the Lord against Israel.
target: Tin, ngai teh u, Israelte chunga LALPA thinurna tihbaiawm tak belhchhain nangni chhuan sual hian in pute ai in awh ta a.

source: It was a dream come true.
target: Mumang tak a ni.

source: I've gotten better.
target: Ka dam leh tawh.

source: I'm not bringing it.
target: Ka rawn keng lo.

source: So Aaron came near to the altar and put to death the ox for the sin-offering for himself;
target: Tin, Arona chuan maichâm chu a va hnaih a, ama puala sual thawina bawng no chu a talh a.

source: And they are to be offered by the priest, one for a sin-offering and one for a burned offering, and the priest will take away his sin before the Lord on account of his flow.
target: Tin, puithiam chuan sual thawi nan pakhat, halral thilhlanah pakhat a hlan tur a ni; tin, puithiam chuan a thil pût thuah LALPA hmaah inremna a siamsak ang.

source: So it was beautiful, being so tall and its branches so long, for its root was by great waters.
target: Chutin a mawi, a ropuina, a zâr sei zêlin, A zung tân tui zawng a hnianghnar e.

source: But what does it say in the holy Writings? And Abraham had faith in God, and it was put to his account as righteousness.
target: Pathian Lehkhain engnge a sawi ni? Abrahama chuan Pathian a ring a, tin, chu rinna chu a felnaa ruat a ni, tiin a sawi a ni.

source: I am a sinful man.
target: Mi sual ka ni.

source: But if ever he goes outside the walls of the safe town where he had gone in flight,
target: Amaherawhchu englai pawhin tualthattu chuan a tlanna, a tualtlanna kahw ramri pawn lama a kal a,

source: For in addition to his sin, he is uncontrolled in heart; before our eyes he makes sport of God, increasing his words against him.
target: A sual belhchhahin a hel a, Kan zingah a kut a beng a, Pathian chungah a thu a tui tam mai a nih hi.

source: Hey, don't go away.
target: Hei, kal bo suh.

source: Make search for the Lord while he is there, make prayer to him while he is near:
target: Hmuh awla a awm loa hian LALPA chu zawng ula, a hnaih lai hian ko rawh u:

source: Don't do wicked things.
target: Thil sual ti suh.

source: He is a thief.
target: Khapa kha rukru a nih kha.

source: I'm quiet
target: Ka tawngtam lo

source: So Balak sent more chiefs, greater in number and of higher position than the others.
target: Tin, Balaka chuan mi lian tam lehzual, an aia ropui zawk a tir leh a.

source: I'm sneaky
target: Ka enru ṭhin

source: He began with a joke.
target: Fiamthuin a tan a.

source: I will make you waste for ever, and your towns will be unpeopled: and you will be certain that I am the Lord.
target: Ka tițiau hlen daih ang chia, i khawpuite chu luahin a awm lo vang: tin, kei hi LALPA ka ni tih in hria ang.

source: And take all the fat covering the inside of the ox, and the fat joining the liver and the two kidneys with the fat round them, and let them be burned on the altar;
target: Tin, a kawchu thau zawng zawng nên, a tin tuam tu râng nên, a kal pahnih leh a bawhtu thau te nên lain maichâm ah chuan i hâl tur a ni.

source: Up! O Lord; let not man overcome you: let the nations be judged before you.
target: Aw LALPA, tho teh; mihring maiin ngam che suh se. Hnam tin chu i mithmuhah hian rorêlsakin awm rawh se.

source: And Moses said these words to the children of Israel, but they gave no attention to him, because of the grief of their spirit and the cruel weight of their work.
target: Tin, Mosian Israela thlahte hnênah chuan chûng thu chu a va sawi a: nimahsela rilru nguina avâng leh nasa taka tihretheihna avâng chuan Mosia thu chu an ngaithla duh lova.

source: Don't get excited
target: Phur chhuak suh

source: But God made selection of the foolish things of this world so that he might put the wise to shame; and the feeble things that he might put to shame the strong;
target: nimahsela Pathianin khawvel thil ate chu a thlang zawk a, mi fingte chu a tihmualpho theihna turin; tin, Pathianin khawvel thil chak lote chu a thlang a, thil chakte chu a tihmualpho theihna turin;

source: Tom will be embarrassed
target: Tom chu a zak ang

source: And the eyes of those who see will not be shut, and those who have hearing will give ear to the word.
target: An mit chuan chiang takin a hmu ang a, an beng pawhin fiah takin a hre tawh ang.

source: Did you tell the truth?
target: Thudik i sawi em?

source: I am all ears.
target: Mi thu hriatna ka nia.

source: I didn't want to embarrass you.
target: I mualpho duh lo.

source: I was on my knees.
target: Ka khup a.

source: And there he made an altar, naming the place El-beth-el: because it was there he had the vision of God when he was in flight from his brother.
target: Tin, chutah chuan maichâm a siam a, a u hnên ata a tlân bo lai khân chutah chuan Pathian a hnêna a inlâr avângin a hmun chu El-Bethel a ti ta a.

source: Madmenah has gone; the men of Gebim are putting their goods in a safe place.
target: Madmenah khawho tlan bovin an awm ta; gebim khuaa awmte chu tlan bo tumin an inhawrkhawm luai luai e.

source: Still, at the smell of water, it will make buds, and put out branches like a young plant.
target: Tui rimah a chawr thiam tiam ang a, Thil phun angin a lo buk chhuak ang.

source: The God who made the earth and everything in it, he, being Lord of heaven and earth, is not housed in buildings made with hands;
target: Pathian, khawvel leh a chhunga thil zawng zawng siamtu chu lei leh van lal a nih avangin kuta sak inahte a awm lo va;

source: Give me an answer to this one question, Did the Spirit come to you through the works of the law, or by the hearing of faith?
target: Hei chauh hi in hnen ata lo hriat ka duh. Dan thiltihte avangin nge Thlarau chu inhmuh, in ngaihthlaka in rin avangin?

source: Let me take this one.
target: Hemi hi ka la ang.

source: We like to travel
target: Khualzin kan ngaina hle

source: It's obvious
target: A chiangsa

source: Grey hair
target: Sam tuak

source: He grows rice
target: Buh a ching

source: You are a nice person.
target: Mifel tak i ni.

source: And if it is hard for even the good man to get salvation, what chance has the man without religion or the sinner?
target: Tin, mi fel mah chhandam hram hram a nih chuan Pathian ngaihsak lo leh mi sual chu eng ang tak maw?

source: I am cutting the meat.
target: Sa chu ka cut a.

source: I am homesick
target: Inah ka damlo

source: The Lord will send out the rod of your strength from Zion; be king over your haters.
target: LALPA chuan i chakna tiang chu Zion tlâng atangin a tir chhuak ang: Nangin nangmah dotute zingah ro rel rahw.

source: And by faith Sarah herself had power to give birth, when she was very old, because she had faith in him who gave his word;
target: Rinnain Sari ngei pawhin, a tiamtu chu rinawma a ruat avangin, tar hnu tawhin chi pai theihna a hmu a,

source: My boat sank.
target: Ka lawng a pil.

source: For the purposes of their hearts are destruction, and their lips are talking of trouble.
target: An thinlungin hnehchhiahna an zir a, An hmuiin pawikhawih lam thu mawlh an sawi thin a ni.

source: Did you arrest Tom?
target: Tom kha i man em?

source: Put on a happy face.
target: Hlim hmel pu rawh.

source: By so much is it a better agreement which we have through Jesus.
target: chuti bawka nasa chuan Isua chu thuthlung tha zawk tihnghehpuitu a lo ni ta.

source: And Saul said, The Lord's blessing will be yours, for you have had pity on me.
target: Tin, Saula chuan, LALPA chuan malsawm che u r awh se; nangniho chuan min khawngaih hle a ni.

source: Don't be pigs
target: Vawk ang ni suh

source: She is not afraid of anything.
target: Engmah a hlau lo.

source: So now, my son, do what I say: go quickly to Haran, to my brother Laban;
target: Chutichuan ka fapa tunah ka thu hi awih rawh, tho la, Haran khuaa ka nuta Labana hnênah tlan bo rawh;

source: They have a problem.
target: Harsatna an nei a.

source: This is a robbery
target: Hei hi rukruk a ni

source: He who puts his faith in wealth will come to nothing; but the upright man will be full of growth like the green leaf.
target: A sum ring mi chu a vuai ang a, Mi fel erawh chu hnim angin a duah ang.

source: You're gross!
target: I tenawm tâwp!

source: The engine doesn't work.
target: Engine a thawk lo.

source: Truly God is lifted up in strength; who is a ruler like him?
target: Ngai rawh, Pathian chuan a theihnain zo takin a ti a ni; Tunge amah ang zirtirtu awm?

source: Now when some days had gone by, King Agrippa and Bernice came to Caesarea and went to see Festus.
target: Tin, ni eng zat emaw chinah chuan lal Agrippa leh Berniki chu Kaisari khua an lo thleng a, Festa chibai an buk a.

source: Don't be late for work.
target: Hnathawh tlai suh.

source: And when the sun was high, it was burned; and because it had no root, it became dry and dead.
target: nimahsela ni a lo tlangsan deuhvin em vuaiin a lo awm a, zung a neih loh avangin a rawp ta mai a.

source: Who is the image of the unseen God coming into existence before all living things;
target: Ani chu hmuh theih loh Pathian anpui, thil siam zawng zawnga piang hmasa ber chu a ni a;

source: We are OK Go.
target: Kan OK Go.

source: For you have been my secret place, and my high tower from those who made war on me.
target: Nang chu ka tan humhimna, Dotute lakah ralven in sâng nghet tak i ni si a.

source: And Baruch, the son of Neriah, did as Jeremiah the prophet gave him orders to do, reading from the book the words of the Lord in the Lord's house.
target: Tichuan Neria fapa Baruka chuan zâwlnei Jeremia thupêk zawng zawng ang zêl chuan LALPA inah LALPA thu lehkhabua mi chu a chhiar ta a.

source: It's a free country.
target: Zalen ram a ni.

source: Are you bored
target: I ning em

source: For Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to everyone who has faith.
target: Krista chu a ring apiangte tan felna an hmuh theihna turin Dan tibangtu a ni si a.

source: So Joshua, having come up from Gilgal all night, made a sudden attack on them.
target: Chutichuan Josua chuan a bei ta thut a; zankhua Gilgal atanga lo han kal tawh a ni a.

source: Give ear now, and give witness against the family of Jacob, says the Lord God, the God of armies;
target: An bawhchhiatna avânga Israel ka hrem ni chuan Bethel khuaa maichâm te ka tichim ang a, a kîte a tliak vek ang a, leiah atla ang.

source: Your teaching has made me wiser than my haters: for it is mine for ever.
target: I thupêkte chuan mi dotute aia fing zawkin mi siam a; Kumkhuaa ka hnêna a awm fo thin aangin.

source: Does it get much sun?
target: Ni a hmu tam em?

source: For this reason, my brothers, take all the more care to make your selection and approval certain; for if you do these things you will never have a fall:
target: Chuvangin, unaute u, a kohna leh a thlanna che u chu tinghet turin taihmak chhuah lehzual rawh u; chung chu in tih zawngin engtikah mah in tlu lo vang;

source: Don't get mad
target: Mâwl suh ang che

source: I'm loved.
target: Ka hmangaih.

source: We slept by turns.
target: Turn in kan mu a.

source: He is happy
target: A lawm hle

source: And having been there for some time, he went through the country of Galatia and Phrygia in order, making the disciples strong in the faith.
target: Tin, chutah chuan rei ngial a awm hnuin a kal leh a, zirtirho zawng zawng tinghetin Galatia ram leh Phrugia ram chu a fang chhuak vek a.

source: In their sin they make a king for themselves, and rulers in their deceit.
target: An suahsualnain lalber a titlâwm a, An dâwt thuin mi liante an tilâwm bawk a.

source: When I send up my cry to you, my haters will be turned back; I am certain of this, for God is with me.
target: Ka koh hun che ngei chuan mi dotute chu an tlanchhia ang: Hei hi ka hria Pathianin mi tan hi.

source: But now our soul is wasted away; there is nothing at all: we have nothing but this manna before our eyes.
target: nimahsela tunah chuan kan thling a ro zo ta, engmah reng reng beisei tur a awm lo, mana mai lo hi chu, an ti a.

source: And Jesus, having knowledge of what was in their minds, said, Why are your thoughts evil?
target: Tin, Isuan an ngaihtuahte chu a lo hria a, Engahnge in thinlunga sual in ngaihtuah ni?

source: I didn't plan on staying.
target: Riah ka tum lo.

source: He has put out his hand against those who were at peace with him; he has not kept his agreement.
target: Amah nena inremte chungah chuan a kut a lek a: A thuthlung chu a tibawrhbang ta a.

source: Just be calm
target: Inbeng dai rawh

source: But we were hoping that he would be the Saviour of Israel. In addition to all this he has now let three days go by from the time when these things took place;
target: Keinin Israelte tlantu tur kha a nih kan beisei tehlul nen. Engpawh ni sela, chung thil thlenna chin chu vawiin nen ni thum a ni tawh.

source: For my sword in heaven is full of wrath: see, it is coming down on Edom, in punishment on the people of my curse.
target: Ka khandaih chuan vanah tlai takin a in ta si a; ngai teh, chu chu, rorêl tûrin, Edom-ho chungah leh ka ânchhelawh mite chungah chuan a chhuk ang.

source: It was about time.
target: Hun a ni tawh.

source: Keep that.
target: Kha kha dah rawh.

source: They broke into laughter
target: An nui chhuak ta a

source: Talk to us
target: Kan hnênah sawi ru

source: So he went and got them and took them to his mother: and she made a meal to his father's taste.
target: Tin, a kal a, a va la a, a nu hnênah a rawn kalpui a: tichuan a nu chuan a pa duhzawng takin chawhmeh tui takah a siam a.

source: The nineteenth Mallothi, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi sâwm leh vawi kuana chu Malothia chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: Who in your eyes is my equal? or what comparison will you make with me?
target: Thuhmuna ngaih ka nihna tûrin tûr nên nge mi tehkhina, tu tlukah nge mi siama, tu nên nge mi tehkhin dawn?

source: Who is living with Simon, a leather-worker, whose house is by the sea.
target: savun siamtu Simona hnenah a thleng a ni, a in chu tuifinriat kamah a awm, a ti a.

source: There were enough
target: An awm tawk a ni

source: I wasn't very worried.
target: Ka buai vak lo.

source: Tom moved.
target: Tom-a a kal.

source: Come inside
target: Lo lût rawh

source: For with fire and sword will the Lord come, judging all the earth, and his sword will be on all flesh: and great numbers will be put to death by him.
target: Meiin a ni, LALPAN a ngaihtuah dawn ni, a khandaihin a ni, mi zawng zawng a ngaihtuah dawn ni: tichuan LALPA tihhlumte chu tam tak an ni ang.

source: Let not that which has been joined together by God be parted by man.
target: Chutichuan Pathianin a zawm tawh chu mihringin then suh se, a ti a.

source: For you say, Where is the house of the ruler, and where is the tent of the evil-doer?
target: Khawnge hotu in chu a awm? Mi suaksual chenkualna puan in chu khawnge? in ti a.

source: Then he makes clear to them what they have done, even their evil works in which they have taken pride.
target: An thiltih leh an bawhchhiatnate a entir a, An lo chapo tawhziate nên.

source: But anyone touching them has to be armed with iron and the rod of a spear; and they will be burned with fire, every one of them.
target: A khawihtu tûr chuan thir leh feingul rawih zâwk tûr a ni a; Tichuan an hmunah hâlral vek an ni ang,' tiin mi bia a, a ti a.

source: Am I annoying you?
target: Ka ti thinrim che em ni?

source: You may be needed
target: I mamawh mai thei

source: We weren't doing anything.
target: Engmah kan ti lo.

source: Be not tricked; God is not made sport of: for whatever seed a man puts in, that will he get back as grain.
target: Bumin awm suh u; Pathian chu hmuhsit zia a ni lo ve; miin a theh apiang, chu mi vek chu a seng bawk dawn si a;

source: Though he made their houses full of good things: but the purpose of the evil-doers is far from me!
target: Chuti chungin an inte thil thain a tikhat - Mi suaksualte remruat chu ka lakah a hla a ni.

source: Did they hear correctly
target: An hre dik em

source: Let go of the dog
target: Ui chu thlah rawh

source: Spirit are you there
target: Thlarau i awm em

source: I got beat
target: Hneh ka ni

source: Then Sarah said, I was not laughing; for she was full of fear. And he said, No, but you were laughing.
target: Chutichuan Sari chuan, Ka nui lo tiin a pha a; a hlau si a. Tin ani chuan, Awih loh loh tûr; i nuih ngei kha le, a ti a.

source: When they were unable to make payment, he made the two of them free of their debts. Which of them, now, will have the greater love for him?
target: Tin, rulhna an nei lo va, a ngaihhnathiam ve ve a. Chutichuan chu mite chuan a tuin nge ani chu hmangaih zawk ang? a ti a.

source: But death will come to him in the place where they have taken him away prisoner, and he will never see this land again.
target: Sala an hruaina hmunah, chutah ngei chuan a thi ang a, he ram hi a hmu leh tawh lo vang.

source: And if it is increasing on the skin, the priest will say that he is unclean: it is a disease.
target: tin, vuna a tai darh chuan puithiamin a bawlhhlawh tih a puang tur a ni: hri a ni.

source: You've got problems
target: Buaina i nei e

source: Ahimaaz in Naphtali; he took Basemath, the daughter of Solomon, as his wife;
target: Naphtali ramah Ahimaaza; ani pawh chuan Solomona fanu Basemathi nupuiah anei a:

source: I'll let her know.
target: Ka hrilh ang.

source: And Moses only may come near to the Lord; but the others are not to come near, and the people may not come up with them.
target: tin, Mosia chu amah chauhvin LALPA hnênah lo kal sela; anniho erawh chu lo kal hnai suh se, mipuite pawh a hnênah chuan lo chho suh se, a ti a.

source: I'm reliable
target: Ka rintlâk

source: But Nadab and Abihu came to their end before their father, and had no children; so Eleazar and Ithamar did the work of priests.
target: Nadaba leh Abihau erawh chu an pa aiin an thi hmasa a, fa an nei lo; chuvângin Elazara leh Ithamara chuan puithain hna an thawk a ni.

source: Then Abishai, the son of Zeruiah, said to the king, Is this dead dog to go on cursing my lord the king? let me go over and take off his head.
target: Chutichuan Zeruia fapa Abisaia chuan lal hnênah, Engati nge he ui thisawn hian lalpa ka pu chu ânchhia a lawh mai mai? A lu ka va tan teh mai ang aw? a ti a.

source: They drink coffee.
target: Coffee an in a.

source: He is not the teacher.
target: Zirtirtu a ni lo.

source: And when Jesus had gone over again in the boat to the other side, a great number of people came to him: and he was by the sea.
target: Tin, Isua chu lawnga ral lehlama a lo kai leh chuan mipui tam tak a hnenah an lo kal khawm a; tin, ani chu dil kamah a awm a.

source: Be nice to others.
target: Midangte chungah ngilnei rawh.

source: Have you measured it?
target: I teh tawh em?

source: Are you the prophet
target: Zawlnei i ni em

source: But if it has been damaged by a beast, and he is able to make this clear, he will not have to make payment for what was damaged.
target: Sain seh sela, a them chu hriattîr nân rawn kêng rawh se; chu mi sa seh ai chu a rûl tûr a ni lo.

source: And those men who were not overtaken by death were cruelly diseased: and the cry of the town went up to heaven.
target: Tin, a thi lote chu an ngawt hlawm a, tichuan chu khaw au thawm chuan van khi a han thleng a.

source: Do you have the key
target: Chabi chu i nei em

source: Are you looking for us?
target: Min zawng em?

source: I'll call
target: Ka bia ang

source: May the Lord be good and true to you: and I myself will see that your kind act is rewarded, because you have done this thing.
target: Tichuan LALPA chuan in chungah ngilneihna leh thutak lantir sela: hêng thil in tih avang hian kei pawhin in ngilneih man chu ka rul ang che u.

source: bye bye
target: a nih leh aw

source: She's highly athletic.
target: Athletic tak a ni.

source: He doesn't miss anything.
target: Engmah a tlai lo.

source: And the people of Israel were overcome there by the servants of David, and there was a great destruction that day, and twenty thousand men were put to the sword.
target: Tin, chutah chuan Davida mite hmaah chuan Israel mite chu an tlâwm ta a. tin, chuta chuan chu mi ni chuan mi singhni zet an that a.

source: For they said to me, Make us a god to go before us: as for this Moses, who took us up out of the land of Egypt, we have no idea what has come to him.
target: Ka hnênah, 'Kan hma hruai turin pathiante min siamsak rawh: he Mosia Aigupta ram ata min hruai chhuaktu lah hi a chanchin kan hre ta si lo va,' an rawn ti a.

source: What is she drinking
target: Eng nge a in a

source: Do you have a vacancy
target: Hmun ruak i nei em

source: Tom, wake up.
target: Tom, harh rawh.

source: Are you drunk?
target: I rûi a mi?

source: He who made the arm of his glory go at the right hand of Moses, by whom the waters were parted before them, to make himself an eternal name;
target: A ban ropui tak Mosia ding lama kaltirtu kha khawiah nge? Kumkhaw hming insiam nana an hmaa tui tithentu kha khawiah nge?

source: All the works of your hands give praise to you, O Lord; and your saints give you blessing.
target: Aw LALPA, i thilsiam zawng zawng chuan i hnênah lawm thu an hril ang a; Mi thianghlimte pawhin an fak ang che.

source: I am waiting for the Lord, my soul is waiting for him, and my hope is in his word.
target: LALPA chu ka nghak reng a, ka nunna hian a nghak reng a, A thu pawh ka beisei a ni.

source: You will keep them safe in your house from the designs of man; in the secret of your tent will you keep them from angry tongues.
target: Anni chu mihring phiarna lakah chuan i humhimna mithmuhah i thukru ang a: Lei hnialhratna lakah chuan bukteah i dah ru ang.

source: I'm not a night person.
target: Zan mi ka ni lo.

source: Untie me now
target: Mi phelh rawh le

source: But put on the Lord Jesus Christ, and do not give thought to the flesh to do its desires.
target: Lal Isua Krista chuan inthuam zawk ulang, in tisa chakna puitlin turin engmah insiam suh u.

source: Tom isn't present
target: Tom a awm lo

source: Where am I?
target: Khawnge ka awm?

source: Just shut up.
target: Ngawi mai rawh.

source: He left home.
target: In a chhuahsan.

source: Anyone home?
target: Inah tunge awm?

source: And take from them a small number of hairs, folding them in your skirts.
target: Tin, tlêmte chu i la ang a, i kawrfual hmawrah i bawk tûr a ni.

source: Be lifted up, O judge of the earth; let their reward come to the men of pride.
target: Nang leia rorêltu, thawk la: Chapote chu an sual man rul ang che.

source: Forget it!
target: Theihnghilh rawh!

source: When my father and my mother are turned away from me, then the Lord will be my support.
target: Ka nu leh ka pa chuan mi kalsan ta si a, Nimahsela LALPA chuan mi la pawm ang.

source: A time for search and a time for loss; a time to keep and a time to give away;
target: Zawn hun a awm a, tihbo hun a awm; Vawn that hun a awm a, paih bo hun a awm;

source: She doesn't need money.
target: Sum a mamawh lo.

source: Do you dye your hair?
target: I sam i dye em?

source: Now then take care to have no wine or strong drink and to take no unclean thing for food;
target: Chutichuan fimkhur rawh khai, uain leh zu rêng rêng in suh la, ei thiang lo thil rêng rêng pawh ei hauh suh ang che;

source: I didn't invite you.
target: Ka sawm lo che.

source: And some of them will I take for priests and Levites, says the Lord.
target: Tin, chung zinga mi pawh chu puithiam atânte leh Levia mi atânte ka la ang, LALPAN a ti.

source: You're very sharp
target: Mifing tak i ni

source: Is it hot?
target: A sa em?

source: So that in him you have wealth in all things, in word and in knowledge of every sort;
target: engkimah, thusawi tinrengah leh hriatna tinrengah, amahah chuan tihhausaka in awm thu-ah khan;

source: We have medicine for you
target: Damdawi kan nei a

source: I miss it.
target: Ka ngai a nia.

source: Are you joking
target: Min fiam a mi

source: And for forty days the waters were over all the earth; and the waters were increased so that the ark was lifted up high over the earth.
target: Tin, tui chu leiah hian ni sawmli chhûng zawng a lêt a; tui chu a lo awm ta pûng a, lawng chu a chîm lâng a, lei chung lamah a sêp kâng ta a.

source: The sinners are watching the upright man, desiring to put him to death.
target: Mi suaksual chuan mi fel chu a en thla a, Tihhlum a tum thin.

source: And what did you ask for?
target: Engnge i zawh kha?

source: The worshippers of false gods have given up their only hope.
target: Thil lawilo dâwt mai mai ngaihsak tute chuan Anmahni ngilneihna chu an hawisan a ni.

source: Biting off the highest of its young branches, he took it to the land of Canaan, and put it in a town of traders.
target: a țang zik no ber chu a thliak a, mi veivahna ramah a thlawhpui a, sumdawnna khawpuiah chuan a phun ta a.

source: And truly, I will take pleasure in doing them good, and all my heart and soul will be given to planting them in this land in good faith.
target: Ram țiau, Kaldai te, kuta pêk tawh, mi leh sa awm tawh lo; in tih ramah hian lote an inlei leh dawn a ni.

source: Can you talk to me
target: Min biak theih em

source: Desiring to be teachers of the law, though they have no knowledge of what they say or of the statements which they make so certainly.
target: an thusawi awmzia leh paukhauh taka an thu hrilh chanchin chu hre si lovin, Dan zirtirtute nih an duh thin a ni.

source: And Jesse took five cakes of bread and a skin of wine and a young goat and sent them to Saul by David.
target: Tin, Jesaia chuan sabengtung, chhang leh uain peng khat phur leh kêl no a la a, a fapa Davida chu Saual pekah a kentir a.

source: I will make a song to the Lord, because he has given me my reward.
target: Ka chunga tha taka a tih tak avângin LALPA chawimawiin hla ka sa ang.

source: He who gives teaching to a man of pride gets shame for himself; he who says sharp words to a sinner gets a bad name.
target: Hmusit ching zilhtu chua tihtauh khumna a tawk thin a, Mi suaksual zilhtu chuan kut tuarna a insiam thin.

source: Now on the twenty-fourth day of this month the children of Israel came together, taking no food and putting haircloth and dust on their bodies.
target: Chutichuan chu mi thla ni sawmhnih leh ni li ni chuan Israela thlahte chu chaw nghei a, saiip puan sin a, lei kai luamin an kal khâwm a.

source: One man was there who had been ill for thirty-eight years.
target: Tin, chutah chuan kum sawmthum leh kum riat na mi tu emaw a awm a.

source: Tom felt sad
target: Tom a lungngai

source: They can't believe it
target: An ring thei lo

source: I feel fit
target: Inthazo ka inti

source: It was a really beautiful day.
target: Ni mawi tak a ni.

source: So that it may be pleasing to the Lord, let him give a male, without any mark, from among the oxen or the sheep or the goats.
target: chhan tlak in nih theihna turin bawng emaw, beram emaw, kel emaw, a pa sawiselbo in hlan tur a ni.

source: And if any man gives ear to my words and does not keep them, I am not his judge: I did not come to be judge of the world but to give salvation to the world.
target: Tupawh ka thusawi hriain, awih lo mah sela, keiin thiam loh ka chantir lo: khawvel thiam loh chantir tura lo kal ka ni lo va, khawvel chhanhim tura lo kal ka ni zawk si a.

source: The man from a strange land who is living among you will be lifted up higher and higher over you, while you go down lower and lower.
target: Ram dang mi in zinga awmte chuan an san khalh telh telh ang che u a, nangni chu in hnuai telh telh ang.

source: We are looked down on by our neighbours, we are laughed at and made sport of by those who are round us.
target: Kan vêla mite sawichhiatin kan lo awm a, Kan dep vêla mite hmusit leh nuihsanin kan lo awm ta a.

source: And what sort of land they are living in, if it is good or bad; and what their living-places are, tent-circles or walled towns;
target: an awmna ram chu a țha nge țha lo tih te, an awmna khuate chu eng ang nge ni , puan in mai nge kulh neiin tih te,

source: They accused each other
target: An inpuh tawn a

source: You're a pretty stupid guy.
target: Mipa â tak i ni.

source: Then, turning his face about, the king gave a blessing to all the men of Israel; and they were all on their feet together.
target: Tin, lal chu a lehhawi a, Israelho pungkhawm zawng zawngte chu mal a sawm a: tichuan Israel-ho pungkhawm zawng zawngte chu an ding thuip a.

source: Be sensible
target: Awmzia nei rawh

source: Is it a wolf?
target: Sihal a ni em?

source: And in the same country there were keepers of sheep in the fields, watching over their flock by night.
target: Tin, chu mi ram vekah chuan beram vengtute an awm a, zanah an beramho an veng a, phulah an riah chilh a.

source: I got up late
target: Ka tho tlai

source: Marking out the unclean from the clean, and the living thing which may be used for food from that which may not.
target: thianghlim leh thianghlim lo thleina tur leh nungcha ei theih mi leh nungcha ei theih loh mi theina turin,' ti rawh u, tiin.

source: And Hashabiah, and with him Jeshaiah of the sons of Merari, his brothers and their sons, twenty;
target: Hasabia, Meraria thlahte zingah Jesaia, a unaute leh an fate sawmhnih nên.

source: I will keep the memory of your name living through all generations; and because of this the people will give you praise for ever.
target: I hming hi chhuan zawng anwgah hian hriat reng tûrin ka siam ang: Chuvangin mi tinin kumkhaw tlaitluanin lawm thu an hrilh ang che.

source: And their limit goes up to the west to Maralah, stretching to Dabbesheth, and to the stream in front of Jokneam;
target: tin, an ramri chu thlang lampangah Marala thleng rakin a kal zel a, Debeseth an va thleng a: tin, Jokneam bula luite a va thleng a;

source: I give witness about myself and the Father who sent me gives witness about me.
target: Kei hi mahni thu hriattirtu ka ni, Pa mi tirtu chuan ka thu a hriattir bawk, a ti a, a chhang a.

source: I didn't dislike it.
target: Ka dislike lo.

source: If your brother becomes poor, and has to give up some of his land for money, his nearest relation may come and get back that which his brother has given up.
target: I unau chu lo rethein, a ram thenkhat lo hralh sela, a laichin bul berin a unauvin a lo hralh chu a rawn tlan tur a ni.

source: You weren't wrong.
target: I tisual lo a ni.

source: For the ears of the Lord are open to the poor, and he takes thought for his prisoners.
target: LALPAN pachhiate chu ngaithlain, A mi tangte chu a hmusit si lo va.

source: Pull it in
target: Pawt lût rawh

source: I like spoons
target: Fian ka ngaina

source: And if a woman goes near a beast and has sex relations with it, you will put an end to the woman and the beast: their blood will be on them.
target: Tin, hmeichhiain ran a va hnaiha, a inpawltir chuan hmeichhia chu i tihlum tur a ni, ran pawh chu: tihhlum ngei tur an ni a; an thisen mawh chu an chungah a awm tur a ni.

source: For they are in flight from the sharp sword, and the bent bow, and from the trouble of war.
target: Khandaihte lakah, khandaih phawi sa lakah leh, thal ngun khawih sa lakah leh indona nasa tak lak ata tlan bo an ni si a.

source: And over the heads of the living beings there was the form of an arch, looking like ice, stretched out over their heads on high.
target: Tin, thilnungte lu chung chu thil eng emaw, krustal lung tle mia siam ang hian a khuh kulh mai a.

source: Let them go wandering up and down in search of food, and be there all night if they have not enough.
target: Anni chu ei tûr zawngin an vâk an vâk ang a, An tlai loh chuan an awm zankhua ang.

source: Then I said, I will come to my end with my children round me, my days will be as the sand in number;
target: Tichuan, ka bu zawlah ka thi ang a, Ka nite tiauvut angin ka tipung ang a,

source: Then Joseph came to his end, and all his brothers, and all that generation.
target: Tin, Josefa leh a unautê zawng zawng leh chûng chhuanho zawng zawngte chu an thi ta vek a.

source: Then she said, Did I make a request to my lord for a son? did I not say, Do not give me false words?
target: Tichuan ani chuan, Ka pu hi fapa ka dil che em kha? 'Mi tihder suh ang che,' ka ti lâwm ni kha? a ti a.

source: You are a little late!
target: I tlai deuh tawh!

source: Stand up!
target: Ding rawh!

source: I'm managing
target: Ka timêk e

source: You closed your eyes.
target: I mit i chhing a.

source: I got it
target: Ka hria e

source: I pinched Tom
target: Tom ka hnek

source: The men of Rodan were your traders: a great number of sea-lands did business with you: they gave you horns of ivory and ebony as an offering.
target: Dedan mite i dawrtute an ni a, Tui kam hmun tin i sumdawn hmun a lo ni, Saingho leh eboni an hlan che-dawvankai nân.

source: Please relax
target: Khawngaihin hahdam rawh

source: Stay quiet
target: Ngawi reng rawh

source: The Lord keeps watch over the spirit of man, searching all the deepest parts of the body.
target: Mihring rilru chu LALPA khawnvar a ni a, Pumpui chhungril lam zawng zawng pawh a en chhuak thin.

source: Are you happy in your house?
target: I inah i hlim em?

source: You're tough
target: I chher hlê mai

source: Hey, lay off.
target: Hei, ban tir rawh.

source: Let me go!
target: Mi kaltir rawh!

source: For all the prophets and the law were in force till John.
target: Zawlneite zawng zawng leh Dan thu chuan, Johana a lo awm thleng khan an hril lawk thin a ni.

source: I don't have a home yet.
target: In ka la nei lo.

source: It's entirely my fault.
target: Ka sual vek a ni.

source: I paid a fine.
target: Ka leichawi ka pe tawh.

source: Eat it
target: Ei ang

source: And the sons of Ram, the oldest son of Jerahmeel, were Maaz and Jamin and Eker.
target: Jerameela fapa upa ber Rama fapate chu maaza te, Jamina te, Ekera-te an ni.

source: And the servant did as Joseph said, and took the men into Joseph's house.
target: Tichuan ani chuan Josefa thupêk angin a ti ta a; Josefa inah chuan a hruai lût a.

source: And Solomon's wisdom was greater than the wisdom of all the people of the East and all the wisdom of Egypt.
target: Solomona finna chuan khawchhak fate zawng zawng fina leh Aigupta mite finna zawng zawng chu akhum vek a.

source: We trust him
target: Amah kan ring

source: I didn't eat very much.
target: Ka ei tam vak lo.

source: You no longer let him do anything for his father or his mother;
target: a nu tan emaw, a pa tan emaw engmah tihsak in phal tawh thin lo;

source: But Amaziah gave no attention; and this was the purpose of God, so that he might give them up into the hands of Joash, because they had gone after the gods of Edom.
target: Nimahsela Amazia chuan a lo ngaithla duh lo va; Edom-ho pathiante a zawn avânga Judai ram chu an hmêlmate kuta a pêk theihna tûra Pathian tih a ni a,

source: Is it not trouble for the sinner, and destruction for the evil-doers?
target: Mi fel lo tana vanduaina leh Khawlohna titute tana chhiatna a ni lo vem ni?

source: Where did you do it
target: Khawiah nge i tih

source: dine out
target: hmun danga chaw ei

source: He shooed the cat.
target: Ui chu a kap a.

source: I'm direct
target: Kawhhmuh ka ni

source: We know that
target: Kha kha kan hria

source: They're working on it
target: An thawk mek a ni

source: So every one of us will have to give an account of himself to God.
target: Chutichuan kan zain Pathian hnenah mahni chanchin kan sawi theuh tur a ni.

source: Keep the Sabbath day as a holy day, as you have been ordered by the Lord your God.
target: LALPA i Pathianin thu a pêk che angin chawlhni chu thianghlim reng turin serh rawh.

source: Let it be all joy to you, my brothers, when you undergo tests of every sort;
target: Ka unaute u, in rinna fiahna chuan chhelna a siam tih hriain, thlemna tinreng in tawh hunin lawman hlirah ngai rawh u.

source: I am certain that the Lord will take care of the cause of the poor, and of the rights of those who are troubled.
target: LALPA chuan hrehawm tuarte chu an thu-ah a tan ang tih ka hria, Pachhiate chu an tana awm rengah nên.

source: Are we then without protest to let you do all this great evil, sinning against our God by taking strange women for your wives?
target: Chutichuan ram dang hmeichhiate neia kan Pathian chunga thil tha lo tak mai hi ti tûrinthu kan zawm dawn êm ni? ka ti a.

source: And when all things have been put under him, then will the Son himself be under him who put all things under him, so that God may be all in all.
target: Tin, a hnuaia engkim dahin a awm hun chuan Fapa ngei pawh chu a hnuaia engkim dahtu hnuaiah chuan dahin a awm bawk ang, Pathian chu engkima engkim a nih theihna turin.

source: He is lying
target: A daw

source: But I will make his place in my house and in my kingdom certain for ever; and the seat of his authority will never be overturned.
target: ka inah leh ka ramah ani chu kumkhuain ka din nghet ang a; tin, a lalthutthleng hchu kumkhuaa tihngheh a ni ang,' tiin.

source: He is not sitting on a bench
target: Bench-ah a ṭhu lo

source: The king said to Nathan the prophet, See now, I am living in a house of cedar, but the ark of God is housed inside the curtains of a tent.
target: lal chuan zâwlnei Nathana hnêna, Hei kei chu sidar thing inah ka awm a, nimahsela Pathian bâwm chu puan in maiah a awm a, a ti a.

source: They give birth to snake's eggs, and make spider's threads: whoever takes their eggs for food comes to his death, and the egg which is crushed becomes a poison-snake.
target: Rulmuk tuite an awp keu va, maimawm ril puan an tah țhin: an tui eitute chu an thi țhin a, tihkeha awmah chuan rul a lo chhuak țhin.

source: And he said to himself, What is to be done? for I have no place in which to put all my fruit.
target: tichuan a inngaihtuah a, ‘Engtin nge ka ti ang aw? ka buh leh bal dah khawmna ka nei si lo va,’ a ti a.

source: That'll do
target: Kha khân a tithei ang

source: I'm busy.
target: Ka buai.

source: I will give praise to you with instruments of music, O my God, for you are true; I will make songs to you with music, O Holy One of Israel.
target: Perhkhuangin ka fak bawk ang che, Aw ka Pathian, i thutak ngei chu ka fak ang. Aw nang Israel-ho Mi Thianghlim, Țingtang nên nangmah fakin ka zai ang.

source: So Edom would not let Israel go through his land; and Israel went in another direction.
target: Edoma chuan Israel mite chu a rama kal a phal ta lo va; tichuan Israel mite chuan an kirsan leh ta a.

source: I'm not old fashioned.
target: Mi hlui ka ni lo.

source: He never drinks alcohol.
target: Zu a in ngai lo.

source: Praise be to God who has not taken away his good faith and his mercy from me.
target: Pathian, ka tawngtaina hlawhchhamtir lova, ka laka a ngilneih bang hek lova chu, Fakin awm rawh se.

source: Hi, guys
target: Chibai, thiante u

source: I prefer dogs
target: Uite ka duh zâwk

source: Do you like? Do you want?
target: I duh em?

source: And he gave you his agreement with you, the ten rules which you were to keep, which he put in writing on the two stones of the law.
target: A thuthlung zawm tura thu a pêk che u, thu sawm pêk chu in hnenah a puang a, lungphêk pahnihah a ziak a.

source: They were waiting for her
target: An lo nghak reng a

source: And at the coming of the chief Keeper of the sheep, you will be given the eternal crown of glory.
target: Tin, Beram Vengtu Lalber chu a lo lan hunin, ropuina lallukhum vuai thei lo chu in hmu ang.

source: They were not ruled by God's word, and they would not go in the way of his law;
target: Pathian thuthlung chu an zawm lo va. A danah awm an duh lo bawk a,

source: Don't kick the dog.
target: Ui chu vuak suh.

source: I like tennis
target: Tennis ka ngaina

source: As for God, his way is completely good; the word of the Lord is tested; he is a breastplate for all those who put their faith in him.
target: Pathian zawng, a kawng chu a tha famkim a; LALPA thu chu fiah a ni tawh; Amaha rinna ngaht zawng zawngte tan chuan ani chu phaw a ni.

source: And they all took the food and had enough; and they took up of the broken bits which were over, twelve baskets full.
target: Tin, an ei a, an puar ta vek a; tin, an ei bang nawite chu bawmrang sawm leh pahnih an rut khat a.

source: And the time was fixed by the Lord, and he said, Tomorrow the Lord will do this thing in the land.
target: Tin, LALPA chuan Naktukah LALPAN he ramah hian chutiang chu a ti dâwn e, tiin hun a ruat ta a.

source: Take it back
target: La lêt rawh

source: I am certain that there is nothing better for a man than to be glad, and to do good while life is in him.
target: Hlim taka awm a, an nun chhûnga thil tha an tih aliama an tana tha zawk engmah ka hre lo.

source: The worker of deceit will not come into my house; the false man will have no place before my eyes.
target: Bumhmang mi chu ka in chhûngah a awm lo vang a: Dawt heh mi chu ka mithmuhah tihnghehin a awm lo vang.

source: And Aaron will make selection from the two goats by the decision of the Lord, one goat for the Lord and one for Azazel.
target: Tin, Arona chuan kel pahnih chungchângah chuan thum a vawr ang a, pakhat chu LALPA pual a ni ang a, pakhat chu Azazela pual a ni ang a.

source: She went and gave news of it to those who had been with him, while they were sorrowing and weeping.
target: Tin, ani chu Isua awmpui thinte hnenah a va kal a, mitthi ngaia an tap lai chu a hrilh ta a.

source: But if anyone has love for God, God has knowledge of him.
target: Amaherawhchu tupawhin Pathian a hmangaih chuan chu mi ngei chu ama hriat a ni.

source: In this way, we are certain that we have love for the children of God, when we have love for God and keep his laws.
target: He miah hian Pathian fate kan hmangaih tih kan hria, Pathian kan hmangaih a, a thupekte kan zawm hian.

source: And the Lord made answer to Job out of the storm-wind, and said,
target: Tin, LALPA chuan thawngaleivir atangin Joba chu a chhâng a, heti hian a ti a:

source: For the day of punishment is in my heart, and the year for the payment of the price for my people has come.
target: Phuba lak ni chu ka thinlungah a awm si a, ka mi tlante kum chu a lo thleng ta bawk a ni.

source: Don't exert yourself.
target: Thahnem ngai suh.

source: And every year his father and mother went to Jerusalem at the feast of the Passover.
target: Tin, kum tinin, Kalhlen Kut hunin a nu leh a pa chu Jerusalem khuaah chuan an kal thin a.

source: The heaven is high and the earth is deep, and the hearts of kings may not be searched out.
target: Van hi a sâng êm a, lei hi a thuk êm a, Lalte rilru pawh hi chhui chhuah rual a ni lo.

source: Who built the snowman
target: Tuin nge a siam

source: Where then is that happy condition of yours? because I give you witness, that, if possible, you would have taken out your eyes and given them to me.
target: Vannei in intihna kha khawiah nge ni ta le? Tih theih phei chu ni sela nangnin in mitte kher chhuakin mi pe tawh ang tih ka hriatsak che u asin.

source: Show me
target: Mi hmuh rawh

source: And the words of the Lord came into my mind, how he said, The baptism of John was with water, but you will have baptism with the Holy Spirit.
target: Tin, Lalpa thu, ‘Johanan tuiin mi a baptis thin kha; amaherawhchu nangni zawng Thlarau Thianghlimin baptisma in la chang ang,’ a tihziate kha ka lo hre chhuak leh ta a.

source: With the sound of the pipe I will get them together; for I have given the price to make them free: and they will be increased as they were increased.
target: Ka faifûk ang a, an mahni ka ko khâwm ang; Anni chu ka tlan tawh si a: An lo pun tawh ang ngeiin an pung zêl ang.

source: With joy and rapture will they come; they will go into the king's house.
target: Lawm tak leh hlim takin an hruai ang a: Lalber inah chuan an lût ang.

source: Just relax
target: Hahdam rawh

source: We're trying
target: Kan timêk zêl

source: Even as it is said in the book of Isaiah the prophet, See, I send my servant before your face, who will make ready your way;
target: Zawlnei Isaia lehkhabuah, Ngai teh, ka tirhkoh i hmaah ka tir a, Ani chuan i kawng a siam ang

source: You see that a man's righteousness is judged by his works and not by his faith only.
target: Rinna avang ngawt ni lovin, thiltih avang zawkin miin thiam a chang thin tih in hre ta.

source: Keep cool
target: Dah dai rawh

source: We're mature
target: Kan puitling tawh

source: Have you fully recovered?
target: I dam kim tawh em?

source: Is it not certain that we are to be the judges of angels? how much more then of the things of this life?
target: Tun dam chhung khawsak thute chu sawi loh, vantirhkohte lam pawh kan ngaihtuah dawn tih in hre lo vem ni?

source: Don't be long
target: Rei suh

source: Now there was among the Pharisees a man named Nicodemus, who was one of the rulers of the Jews.
target: Tin, Pharisaite zinga mi, a hming Nikodema, Judate hotu pakhat a awm:

source: Truly, he puts no faith in his servants, and he sees error in his angels;
target: Ngai rawh, a chhiahhlawhte pawh a ring zo lo va, A vântirhkohte pawh a ati a ni:

source: You're belligerent
target: I belligerent a ni

source: Then David said, O Lord, the God of Israel, news has been given to your servant that it is Saul's purpose to come to Keilah and send destruction on the town because of me.
target: Chutichuan Davida chuan, Aw LALPA Israelte pathian, i chhiahhlawh hian, Saula chuan keimah avangin khua chu tichhe tûrin Keila khuaah chuan lo chhum a tum tih ka hre tlat a.

source: Driving him out of the town and stoning him: and the witnesses put their clothing at the feet of a young man named Saul.
target: khua ata chu an hnawt chhuak a, lungin an deng a, a hretute chuan tlangval pakhat a hming Saula ke bulah chuan an puante an dah hlawm a.

source: And the sticks with your writing on them will be in your hand before their eyes.
target: Tiang a chunga i ziaknate ngei kha an mit hmuh ngeiah i kutah a awm ang.

source: I'm full.
target: Ka puar.

source: All go to one place, all are of the dust, and all will be turned to dust again.
target: An zain hmun khatah an kal vek a; an zain vaivuta mi an ni vek a, an zain vaivutah an chang leh vek a ni.

source: Am I right?
target: Ka dik em?

source: And they came quickly, and saw Mary and Joseph, and the child in the place where the cattle had their food.
target: Tichuan an kal thuai thuai a, Mari nen, Josefa nen, ran chaw pekna thlenga nausen mu nen chuan an hmu a.

source: So they went up and got a view of the land, from the waste land of Zin to Rehob, on the way to Hamath.
target: Chutichuan an chhuak chho ta a, mram chu Zin thlaler ațanga Hamath luhna Rehob thlengin an enthla vek a.

source: Didn't you go out
target: I chhuak lo em ni

source: And they took everything off him, and took his head and his war-dress, and sent word into the land of the Philistines round about to give the news to their gods and to the people.
target: Tin, a thuam an hlip a, a lu leh a râlthuam chu an la a, an pathian lemte leh mite hnêna chanchin puan tûrin Philistia ramah chuan an thawn vêl a.

source: But in giving you this order, there is one thing about which I am not pleased: it is that when you come together it is not for the better but for the worse.
target: Amaherawhchu, he thu ka hrilh che uah hian ka fak thei lo a che u, in that lehzualna tur lam ni lovin, in chhiat lehzualna tur lam zawka in inkhawm thin avang hian.

source: You didn't tell me.
target: Min hrilh lo.

source: When my steps were washed with milk, and rivers of oil were flowing out of the rock for me.
target: Ka kalnate hnute khala chulh a nih laia, Lungpuiin ka tan hriak a luang chhuahtir dul dul lai khan!

source: I put it back.
target: Ka dah lêt tawh.

source: But the people, the men of Israel, taking heart again, put their forces in order and took up the same position as on the first day.
target: Tin, mipuiho Israel mite chu an han infuih leh a, an beih tan nia an beihna hmunah vek chuan bei tûrin tan an han siam leh a.

source: I combed my hair
target: Ka sam chu ka comb a

source: And you will take it to him, so that he may have a good meal and give you his blessing before his death.
target: tin, a thih hmaa mal a sawmsakna tur chein, a ei turin i pa hnênah i va kalpui tur a ni, tiin a sawi a.

source: You are not an idiot!
target: Mi â i ni lo!

source: Every good and true thing is given to us from heaven, coming from the Father of lights, with whom there is no change or any shade made by turning.
target: Thilpek tha leh thilpek famkim zawng zawng chu chung lam atangin engte Pa hnen ata, a lo chhuk thin a ni, amahah chuan danglamna leh herna hlim reng reng a awm thei lo.

source: Be supportive
target: Thlâwptu ni rawh

source: He takes the produce of the mountains, where all the beasts of the field are at play.
target: Tlângte chuan chaw an chhuahsak thin a, Chu chu ramsa zawng anwg tualchaina a ni.

source: For you yourselves are used to taking us as your example, because our life among you was ruled by order,
target: Nangmahni ngeiin min zir dan tur in hre si a; in zingah dan lo angin kan chet ngai loh kha;

source: You're the leader
target: Hruaitu i ni

source: They are memorials
target: Hriatrengna an ni

source: Chair pakhat a han sawn a
target: She moved a chair

source: I slept late
target: Ka mu tlai

source: Then Simon Peter came after him and went into the hole in the rock; and he saw the linen bands on the earth,
target: Tin, Simon Petera pawhin a hnungah a rawn um thleng a, thlan chhungah a lut a; puan zai sinte chu awm reng leh,

source: Who was marked out by God before the making of the world, but was caused to be seen in these last times for you,
target: ani chu leilung pian hmain ruat lawkin a awm ngei mai, nimahsela hun hnuhnungahte hian nangmahni avangin inlarin a awm a;

source: A seat of glory, placed on high from the first, is our holy place.
target: Kan hmun thianghlim awmna chu Lalthuphah ropui tak, a tir ata chawisana awm chu a ni.

source: My hip hurts.
target: Ka malpui a nâ.

source: Did you find them
target: Anni chu i hmu em

source: Greater love has no man than this, that a man gives up his life for his friends.
target: Mihringin a thian aia a nun a paih aliama hmangaihna nasa zawk tuman an nei lo.

source: So in the morning Balaam got up and, making his ass ready, went with the chiefs of Moab.
target: Tichuan Balaama chu zingah atho va, a sabengtung a thuam a, Moab mi liante hnenah chuan a kal ta a.

source: These things took place at Bethany on the other side of the Jordan, where John was giving baptism.
target: Chung thil chu Jordan rala Bethani khuaah, Johana baptisnaah khan an ti a ni.

source: So we went on building the wall; and all the wall was joined together half-way up: for the people were working hard.
target: Chutichuan kulh chu kan siam a; a san lam chanvein kulh zawng zawng chu kan zawm chhuak vek a; mipuite chuan thawh chakna rilru an pu hle mai a ni.

source: I've almost finished.
target: Ka zo zo tawh.

source: Don't bother them
target: Tibuai suh

source: Now Elihu had kept quiet while Job was talking, because they were older than he;
target: Anni chu a aia upa an nih avângin Elihua chu Joba hnênah thu sawi ve lovin a inkhek reng a.

source: I have kept your sayings secretly in my heart, so that I might do no sin against you.
target: I chunga thil ka tihsual loh nân I thu chu ka thinlungah ka khawl khâwm a.

source: And if one person does wrong, without being conscious of it, then let him give a she-goat of the first year for a sin-offering.
target: Tin, miin hre lovin thil a tihsual chuan sual thawi nan kelnu pakhat kum khat mi a hlan tur a ni.

source: By whose wisdom are the clouds numbered, or the water-skins of the heavens turned to the earth,
target: Tunge finnaa chhumte hi chiar thei a, Van tuithawl tunge leih baw thei?

source: I must leave
target: Ka kalsan a ngai

source: They're so stupid
target: An â lûtuk

source: Am I wrong?
target: Ka tisual em ni?

source: The moon was full
target: Thla chu a khat a

source: From there they went on to the hill-country of Ephraim and came to the house of Micah.
target: chuta tang chua Ephraim tlâng ram lam an pan a, Mika in chu an han thleng a.

source: And Joseph had Manasseh and Ephraim in the land of Egypt, by Asenath, the daughter of Poti-phera, priest of On.
target: Tin, Josefan Aigupta ramah fapa Manasea leh Ephriama chu a nei a, chu mite chu On khaw puithiam Potiphera fanu Asenathi chuan amah a hrinsak a ni.

source: They aren't farmers
target: Loneitu an ni lo

source: And the towns which you give the Levites are to be the six safe places to which the taker of life may go in flight; and in addition you are to give them forty-two towns.
target: Tin, Lev-ho in pêk tur khuate chu tualthatte tlan nan tual tlanna khaw paruk a ni ang a; chung lo chu khaw sawmli leh khaw hnih in pe bawk tur a ni.

source: Get a doctor
target: Doctor ko rawh

source: We were late
target: Kan tlai tawh

source: So with these words David kept his servants back, and did not let them make an attack on Saul. And Saul got up and went on his way.
target: Chutichuan Davidan chung thu chuan a mite a khapbet a, Saula bei tûra an thawh chu a phal ta lo va. Tin, Saual chu puk ata chu a chhuak a, a kal leh ta a.

source: Don't look up.
target: En chho miah suh.

source: I canceled it
target: Ka ti tawp

source: The children of Israel are to put up their tents, every man in his tent-circle round his flag.
target: Tin, Israela thlahte chuan mahni hmun theihvah, a pâwl pâwlin an tam dan zir zelin an puan inte an zar ang a.

source: NK: You're proud of it?
target: NK: I chhuang em?

source: Let the sinners be taken in the nets which they themselves have put down, while I go free.
target: Keiin ka kal pelh lai takin, Mi suaksualte chu anmahni lenahte chuan tlu lut rawh se.

source: Sign this
target: Hetah sain rawh

source: I'm being harassed
target: Ka tihbuai a ni

source: And there are bodies of heaven and bodies of earth, but the glory of the one is different from that of the other.
target: Van taksate a awm bawk a, lei taksate pawh; nimahsela van taksa ropuina chu a dang a, lei taksa ropuina chu a dang a ni.

source: He made him lord of his house, and ruler over everything he had;
target: A chhûngte chunga hotuah leh, A sum zawng zawng chunga rorêltuah a siam a:

source: Let us overcome them living, like the underworld, and in their strength, as those who go down to death;
target: Seol angin anung chungin i lem teh ang, An puma khuarkhuruma tla angin.

source: Kiss Tom.
target: Tom-a fawp rawh.

source: Is there sufficient light?
target: Eng a awm tawk em?

source: Happy New Year
target: Kumthar chibai

source: Where's Karen?
target: Khawiah nge Karen-i hi a awm?

source: For God is not a God whose ways are without order, but a God of peace; as in all the churches of the saints.
target: Pathian chu buaina Pathian a ni lo va, remna Pathian a ni zawk si a, mi thianghlim kohhranho pawl zawng zawnga a awm ang hian.

source: It's a very comfortable house.
target: In nuam tak a ni.

source: I'm the best
target: A ṭha ber ka nia

source: The rest, even the rest of Jacob, will come back to the Strong God.
target: A la awm chhun, Jakob-ho la awm chhunte chu, Pathian chak tak hnênah chuan an la kir leh ang.

source: It looks fun
target: A nuihzatthlak hmel

source: I am sweaty
target: Ka thlan hluam

source: Then Jeremiah said to King Zedekiah, What has been my sin against you or against your servants or against this people, that you have put me in prison?
target: Tin, Jeremian lal Zedekia hnênah chuan, Nangmah emaw i rawngbawltu emaw heng mite chungah eng thil nge ka tihsuala mi mantîr ni?

source: He let his wrath have its way; he did not keep back their soul from death, but gave their life to disease.
target: A thinurna atân chuan kawng a siamsak a, A nunna chu thihna lakah a hmum lo va, An nun chu hri a pe ta zawk a;

source: Every first son from a month old and over was numbered by name, and the number came to twenty-two thousand, two hundred and seventy-three.
target: An hming indawt ang zela thla khat a chin chung lam fa tir mipa zawng zawng a chhiarte chu 22,273 an ni.

source: Now the planter and the waterer are working for the same end: but they will have their separate rewards in the measure of their work.
target: Tin, a phuntu leh tuia chawmtu chu pumkhat an ni, nimahsela anmahni thawh rim ang zelin mahni lawmman an hmu ve ve ang.

source: But after that he sent his son to them, saying, They will have respect for my son.
target: Chu mi hnuah erawh chuan, ‘Ka fapa hi chu an zah ang,’ tiin a fapa chu an hnenah a tir a.

source: From far away he saw the Lord: my love for you is an eternal love: so with mercy I have made you come with me.
target: Hmanah ka hnêna LALPA lo lang chuan, heti hian a ti: A ni, hmangaih tawp lovin ka hmangaih chia, Chuvangin lainatnain ka hruai haw che.

source: The door to the lowest side rooms was in the right side of the house; and they went up by twisting steps into the middle rooms, and from the middle into the third.
target: Pindan laita berte kawngka chu chu mi in ding lampangah chuan a awm a: a laitaah chuan rahka vialah an lawn chho va, tin, a laita atang chuan a pathumnaah.

source: If you will give ear to my word and do it, the good things of the land will be yours;
target: Tihnuam tak leh thu awih taka in awm chuan, in rama thil thate hi in ei ang:

source: Keeping faith, and being conscious of well-doing; for some, by not doing these things, have gone wrong in relation to the faith:
target: rinna leh chhia leh tha hriatna thiang tak pawm tlatin; mi thenkhatten chung chu paih thlain rinna kawngah chuan lawng keh angin an keh chhe ta.

source: Were they with you?
target: I bulah an awm em?

source: And in the public places of her towns will be sorrow and weeping; and she will be seated on the earth, waste and uncovered.
target: A kulh kawngkhârte chu an awm inchumin an țap ang a; ani chu a ruak ang a, leiah a thu ang.

source: I didn't take a shower.
target: Ka inbual lo.

source: For the Lord had kept all the women of the house of Abimelech from having children, because of Sarah, Abraham's wife.
target: Abrahama nupui Sari avâng chuan LALPA chuan Abimeleka chhûngte zawng zawng chu a tiching ta tlat hlawm si a.

source: He makes winds his angels, and flames of fire his servants.
target: A vântirhkohte chu thliahte a chantir a; A rawngbawltute chu mei alh dur durah a chantir thin:

source: Put these in a basket and take them, with the ox and the two sheep.
target: chûng chu fawng pakhata dahin, a fawng chawpin bâwngpa le berâmpa pahnih nên chuan i rawn keng tur a ni.

source: I serious em ni?
target: Were you being serious?

source: You do not help me.
target: Min pui lo.

source: We're playing cards
target: Card kan khel a

source: I was late
target: Ka tlai a

source: My eyes are turned to the Lord at all times; for he will take my feet out of the net.
target: Ka mitin LALPA lam a en fo thin; Ani chuan ka kete hi len ata a la chhuak dawn si a.

source: I have seen, O Lord, that your decisions are right, and that in unchanging faith you have sent trouble on me.
target: Aw LALPA, i rorêlte chu a fel tih leh, Nang chuan rinawm takin a ni, mi tihhreawm ni tih ka hria.

source: Get started
target: Bul tan rawh

source: I'll be nice
target: Ka hawihhawm ang

source: And I will make Pharaoh's heart hard, and my signs and wonders will be increased in the land of Egypt.
target: Tin, Pharaoa thînlung chu ka tikhauh ang a, tin, ka chhinchhiahna leh ka thilmakte chu Aigupta ramah hian ka tipung ang.

source: You're fussy
target: Mi sawisel i peih

source: Nothing of it is to be kept till the morning, and no bone of it is to be broken: they are to keep it by the rules of the Passover.
target: a tuk atan chuan a engamah a dah tur a ni lo va, a ruh an titliak tur a ni hek lo: kalhlen kuta tih tur ruat ang zawng zawng chu an ti tur a ni.

source: It was bulky
target: A hlawm a nia

source: I am old.
target: Ka upa tawh.

source: I'm groggy
target: Ka dam chiang lo

source: For those who are far away from you will come to destruction: you will put an end to all those who have not kept faith with you.
target: Ngai teh, nangmah hlata awmte chu an boral dawn si a: A uiresantu apiang che chu i tiboral ta a.

source: And they made the image of a young ox in those days, and made an offering to it, and had joy in the work of their hands.
target: Tin, chung lai chuan sebawng no lem an siam a, a lem chu ran talhin an bia a, anmahni kut chhuak chungah chuan an hlim ta a.

source: For I took you up out of the land of Egypt and made you free from the prison-house; I sent before you Moses, Aaron, and Miriam.
target: Aigupta ram ațang chuan ka hruaichhuak che u a,bâwih ata chu katlan chhuak che u a; in hmâah Mosia te, Arona te lem Miriami te ka rawn tirh kha.

source: From Kibroth-hattaavah the people went on to Hazeroth; and there they put up their tents.
target: Tin, Kibrot-hatava ațang chuan mipuite chu Jazeroth-ah an kal a; Hazeroth-ah chuan an awm ta a.

source: The highways are waste, no man is journeying there: the agreement is broken, he has made sport of the towns, he has no thought for man.
target: lamliante chu a thing thiap țhuap a, mi zin veivak chu an awm ta lo va: ani chuan thuthlung chu a bawhchhia a, khuate chu a hmusit a, mihring a ngaihsak tak lo.

source: And Hazor will be a hole for jackals, a waste for ever: no one will be living in it, and no son of man will have a resting-place there.
target: Tin, Hazor chu sihal chen hmun a ni ang a, A ram kumkhua ang; Tah chuan tumah an cheng tawh lo vang a, Mihring fate rêng rêng an khawsa tawh lo vang.

source: Would you like me to order it?
target: Ka order duh em?

source: Shaking fear is coming; and they will be looking for peace, and there will be no peace.
target: Manganna a lo thleng ang a, muanna an zawng a a awm miah si lo.

source: And they took two women of Moab as their wives: the name of the one was Orpah, and the name of the other Ruth; and they went on living there for about ten years.
target: Tin, Moab ram hmeichhia nupuiah an nei a, a pakhata hming chu Orpi a ni a, a pakhata hming chu Ruthi a ni: Chutah chuan kum sâwm emaw lai an awm a.

source: My heart is broken; it has become dry and dead like grass, so that I give no thought to food.
target: Ka thinlung hi hlobet anga êm hlumin a awm a, a vuai zo ta; Chaw ei pawh ka theihnghilh si a.

source: The Lord is near the broken-hearted; he is the saviour of those whose spirits are crushed down.
target: LALPA chuan thinlung lungchhiate chu a hnaih thin a, Rilrua inchhir apiangte chu a chhandam thin.

source: For this reason I said to you that death will overtake you in your sins: for if you have not faith that I am he, death will come to you while you are in your sins.
target: Chuvangin in hnenah,‘In sual nei rengin in thi ang,’ ka tih kha; ani chu ka ni tih in awih loh chuan in sual nei rengin in thi mawlh ang, a ti a.

source: So that he made their hearts weighted down with grief; they were falling, and had no helper.
target: Ani chuan an thinlung chu thawhrimnain ahmin ta a; An tlu a, tanpuitu tûr rêng rêng an awm si lo va,

source: Make me free from all my sins; do not let me be shamed by the man of evil behaviour.
target: Ka bawhchhiatna zawng zawng lakah mi chhanchhuak la: Mi a sawichhiatin mi awmtir suh ang che.

source: He who keeps himself separate for his private purpose goes against all good sense.
target: Mi inkulh hrang mi chuan mahni duhzawng a zawng thin a. Finna dik zawng zawng a tai thin.

source: The king of Tirzah, one; all the kings together were thirty-one.
target: Tirza khaw lal, pakhat; lal zawng zawng chu sawmthum leh pakhat an ni.

source: These towns are to be their living-places, with land round them for their cattle and their food and all their beasts,
target: Kuate chu an awmna tur ani ang a, a velte chu an bawng leh an ran, an thil vulh zawng zawng tan a ni ang.

source: The way of the good man is straight; the road of the upright is made smooth by you.
target: Mi fel kawng chu dikna a ni a: nang thinlung dik tak pu chuan mi fel kawng chu i tirual țhin.

source: Give effect to your word to your servant, in whose heart is the fear of you.
target: I thu chu i chhiahhlawh hnênah hian tinghet ang che, Chu chu nangmah tihtu tan a ni.

source: So will we not be turned back from you; keep us in life, and we will give praise to your name.
target: Chutichuan kan kirsan lo vang che: Min tiharh la, tichuan i hming kan lam dawn nia.

source: An easy job
target: Hna awlsam tak

source: His haters will be clothed with shame; but I will make his crown shining.
target: Amah dotute chu mualphonain ka thuam ang a: Ani chungah erawh chuan a lallukhum chu a tle sur ang, tiin.

source: He makes rulers come to nothing; the judges of the earth are of no value.
target: mi liante engmah lova siam thina chu a ni; ani chuan leia rorêltute chu boruakah a siam țhin.

source: There are two
target: Pahnih an awm a

source: You should pay for it.
target: I pe tur a ni.

source: I wrote it
target: Keima ziah a nih kha

source: It is in my power to do you damage: but the God of your father came to me this night, saying, Take care that you say nothing good or bad to Jacob.
target: Tichhe tehi che ka ni asin: nimahsela i pa Pathian chuan nizânah khân, 'Jakoba hnênah a chhia a tha a engamah sawi lo tûrin fimkhur rawh,' tiin mi bia a ni.

source: And it was evil in my eyes: so I had all Tobiah's things put out of the room.
target: Mi tilungni lo êm êm mai a: chuvangin Tobia in chhûng bungrua zawng zawng, chu mi pindan ata chu ka theh chhuak vek a.

source: I'm crazy about you.
target: Ka â lutuk che.

source: See how short my time is; why have you made all men for no purpose?
target: Aw, ka hun hi a tawi tûrzia hre reng la: Mihring fate zawng zawng hi i va siam engmahlo êm!

source: I said, Let them not be glad over me; when my foot is moved, let them not be lifted up with pride against me.
target: Chutilochuan mi diriam ang a, Ka ke a tleu veleh ka chungah an intilian dah ang e, ka ti a ni.

source: She is drinking tea.
target: Tea a in a ni.

source: For this cause the Lord, the Lord of armies, will make his fat become wasted; and in his inner parts a fire will be lighted like a burning flame.
target: Chuvangin Lalpa, sipaihote LALPA chuan, a mi thaute zingah chuan cherna a tir ang a; a ropuina hnuaiah chuan mei alh lai mek ang hian mei chhemin a awm ang.

source: Again, let us not give way to the desires of the flesh, as some of them did, of whom twenty-three thousand came to their end in one day.
target: An zinga thenkhatin nula an ngai a, ni khatah singhnih leh sangthumin an tlukhlum phah ang khan i inngai hek suh ang u.

source: And Moses said to the people, This is what the Lord has given orders to be done.
target: Tin, Mosian pungkhawmho hnenah chuan, Hei hi a ni LALPAN tih tura thu a pêk chu, a ti a.

source: Go from me, all you workers of evil; for the Lord has given ear to the voice of my weeping.
target: Nangni thil tisualtu zawng zawngte u, mi kalsan vek rawh u; Seol-ah tuin nge lawm thu hrilh dawn che?

source: Jarmuth and En-gannim with their grass-lands, four towns.
target: Jarmuth khua a daivelte nen, En-ganim khua a daivelte nen; khawpui pali.

source: Then every man becomes like a beast without knowledge; every gold-worker is put to shame by the image he has made: for his metal image is deceit, and there is no breath in them.
target: Mi tin an mawl a, hriatna an nei lo. Rangkachak chhertu pawhin a lem chher chu a zahpui a. A milim chhun chu dawt mai a ni si, Anmahniah thaw pawh a awm lo.

source: And he seemed to them to be right: and they sent for the Apostles, and, after having them whipped and giving them orders to give no teaching in the name of Jesus, they let them go.
target: Tin, a sawi chu rem an ti ta a; tichuan tirhkohte chu an ko va, an vel a; an velh zawhin, Isua hminga thu sawi loh tur ti tlatin an thlah ta a.

source: Did you shave your legs?
target: I ke i sam em ni?

source: Don't you laugh at me.
target: Min nuih suh.

source: Don't lose consciousness
target: Hriatna hloh suh

source: Because this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide.
target: He Pathian hi kumkhaw tlaitluana kan Pathian a ni dawn si a: Thih thleng pawha min hruaitu a ni ang.

source: She is your queen.
target: I lalnu a ni.

source: We try
target: Kan tichhin

source: Then Moses went out from Pharaoh and made prayer to the Lord.
target: Tin, Mosia chu Pharaoa hnên ata a chhuak a, tichuan LALPA hnênah a ngên ta a.

source: He put him on the high places of the earth, his food was the increase of the field; honey he gave him out of the rock and oil out of the hard rock;
target: Lei hmun sangah te a chuantir a. Lova thil hawng a eitir thin a; Lungpui ata khawizu a dawttir thin a, Lung chang ata hriak nen;

source: He gives new life to my soul: he is my guide in the ways of righteousness because of his name.
target: Ka nunna hi mi siam that thin a, Ama hming avângin felna kawngahte mi hruai thin.

source: Let's ask for it
target: Dil ila

source: The dead do not give praise to the Lord; or those who go down to the underworld.
target: Mitthite chuan LALPA chu an fak lo va, Hmun reh taka chhukte rêng rêng chuan an fak hek lo;

source: They were Twittering it.
target: An twitter a ni.

source: I'm being foolish
target: Ka â a ni

source: Just swim
target: Hleuh mai rawh

source: And I saw no Temple there; because the Lord God, the Ruler of all, and the Lamb are its Temple.
target: Tin, a chhungah chuan biak in reng ka hmu lo va; Lalpa Pathian Engkimtitheia leh Beram No chu an biak in an ni si a.

source: A king's salvation is not in the power of his army; a strong man does not get free by his great strength.
target: Lal rêng rêng hi sipaiho tam vang ngawta chhandama awm an awm ngai lo: Mi chak hi chak êm êm vang ngawtin chhanhim an ni ngai lo.

source: They overpowered me
target: Min hneh ta a ni

source: The work of the upright gives life: the increase of the evil-doer is a cause of sin.
target: Mi fel thawhrimna chuan nuna a thlen a, Mi suaksual hlawkna chuan sualna.

source: I'm not an officer.
target: Officer ka ni lo.

source: I confirm lo
target: You didn't confirm

source: A foolish man lets his trouble be openly seen, but a sharp man keeps shame secret.
target: Mi â buaina chu a lang nghal a, Mi fing erawh chuan mualphona a thup thin.

source: The road is closed
target: Kawng khar a ni

source: We are in Finland
target: Finland ramah kan awm a

source: Don't lose heart, Tom.
target: Beidawng suh, Tom.

source: He did not make himself low before the Lord, as his father Manasseh had done, but went on sinning more and more.
target: A pa Manasea intihnuai ang khan LALPA hmaah a intihnuai ve lo va. Amona hi chu a sual zual sauh sauh mai a ni.

source: It was risky
target: A hlauhawm lûtuk

source: I'm really embarrassed
target: Ka zak takzet

source: It wasn't part of the plan.
target: Plan-ah a tel lo.

source: You were never around
target: I awm ngai lo

source: Does he have a son?
target: Fapa a nei em?

source: By this I see that you have pleasure in me, because my hater does not overcome me.
target: He mi-ah hian ka chungah i lawm tih ka hria, Mi dotu chuan mi ngam thin loh avâng hian.

source: Beerah his son, whom Tiglath-pileser, king of Assyria, took away as a prisoner: he was chief of the Reubenites.
target: chu mi fapa chu Beera, Assuria lal Tilgathpileseran sala a hruai chu a ni: ani chu Reuben-ho mi lian a ni.

source: Let him be cursed who does the Lord's work half-heartedly; let him be cursed who keeps back his sword from blood.
target: Thlahdah taka LALPA hna thawktu chu ânchhe dawngin awm sela, Thisen chhuah tûra a khandaih hmang duh lotu chu ânchhe dawngin awm rawh se.

source: Pull it.
target: Pawt rawh.

source: Tom has gone to bed
target: Tom chu a mu ta a

source: But they were empty.
target: Mahse, an ruak a.

source: The virgin of Israel has been made low, never again to be lifted up: she is stretched out by herself on her land; there is no one to put her on her feet again.
target: Nula thianghlim, Israel chu, a tlu tawh a; a ding leh tawh lo vang: a ram chungah paih thlâk a ni tawh a ni; amah tungding tûrin tumah an awm lo.

source: He is washing a car
target: Car a sil mek a ni

source: We fell for each other immediately.
target: Kan tlu nghal a.

source: You buried nothing.
target: Engmah i phum lo.

source: I am coming today.
target: Vawiin hian ka lo kal dawn a ni.

source: Give the Levites to Aaron and his sons; so that they may be his without question from among the children of Israel.
target: Tin, levi-ote chu Arona leh a fapate hnenah i hlan ang a: Israela thlate pualah a hnena hlan an ni.

source: And this is the offering you are to take from them: gold and silver and brass;
target: Hêngte hi a ni an hnên atanga hlan tûra in lâk tûrte chu: rangkachak te, tangka te, dâr te,

source: So keep watch on yourselves, and see that you have love for the Lord your God.
target: Chutichuan LALPA in Pathian chu hmangaih turin fimkhur tha hle rawh u.

source: And Cain went away from before the face of the Lord, and made his living-place in the land of Nod on the east of Eden.
target: Tichuan Kaina chu LALPA hnên ata chu a chhuak a, Eden chhak lama Nod ramah chuan a awm ta a.

source: And who has knowledge of how the clouds are stretched out, or of the thunders of his tent?
target: A ni, chhum tai darh dante hi mirhingin a hre thei êm ni? A buk zar ri dur durte hi?

source: The tops of the pillars had a design of flowers; and the work of making the pillars was complete.
target: Tin, a ban chhipah chuan lili lem a chuang a: tichuan ban lam hna chu peih a ni ta a.

source: You never liked us.
target: Min duh ngai lo.

source: Are you doing a special thing?
target: Thil bik i ti em?

source: I didn't break it.
target: Ka tichhia lo.

source: It is about us.
target: Keini chungchang a ni.

source: I'm not against it
target: Ka dodal lo

source: Then Pilate said to him, You say nothing to me? is it not clear to you that I have power to let you go free and power to put you to death on the cross?
target: Tin, Pilatan a hnenah, Nangin kei mi be lo vei maw? Thlah thei che ka ni, kraws-a khengbet thei che ka ni tih i hre lo vem ni? a ti a.

source: After it a voice is sounding, thundering out the word of his power; he does not keep back his thunder-flames; from his mouth his voice is sounding.
target: A hnuah chuan a awrawl a chhuah a, A ropuina aw chu a tiri dur dur a: A aw an hriat pawhin a chawlhtir chuang lo.

source: But still the heat of the Lord's wrath was not turned back from Judah, because of all Manasseh had done in moving him to wrath.
