target: A dik vek a ni

source: But these men have been very good to us; they did us no wrong and nothing of ours was touched while we were with them in the fields:
target: Nimahsela chu mite chu kan chungah an tha hle mai a, kan pawi engmah an khawih lo va, phula kan awm laia kan awmho chhûng zawng zawng khan engmah kan hloh lo vaL

source: We're here
target: Hetah kan awm

source: By this it will be clear to all men that you are my disciples, if you have love one for another.
target: In inhmangaih chuan mi zawng zawngin ka zirtirte in ni tih chu miah chuan an hria ang, a ti a.

source: I say this to put you to shame. Is there not among you one wise man who may be able to give a decision between his brothers?
target: In zahna turin ka sawi a ni. A unaute kara thu titlu thei mi fing pakhat tal in zingah in hmu thei lo a ni ang maw,

source: For what great nation has a god so near to them as the Lord our God is, whenever we are turned to him in prayer?
target: Kan koh apianga LALPA kan Pathianin min hnaih anga anmahni hnaih thin Pathian nei hnam ropui tunge awm ve?

source: You're stupid
target: I mâwl a nih chu

source: Um, he was happy.
target: Um, a lawm hle mai.

source: For the business has been so ordered by us as to have the approval, not only of the Lord, but of men.
target: Lalpa ngaih chauhvah ni lovin mihring ngaih pawha thil mawi kan ngaihtuah lawk thin a ni.

source: And he made up this story for them: A certain man had a fig-tree in his garden, and he came to get fruit from it, and there was no fruit.
target: Tin, he tehkhin thu hi a sawi a:Tuin emaw a grep huanah theipui phun pakhat a nei a; tin, a kungah chuan a rah a rawn zawng a, pakhat mah a hmu lo a.

source: And there was honey on the face of the field, and all the people came to the honey, the bees having gone from it;
target: Tin, mipui zawng zawngte chuan ramhnuai an va thleng a, leiah chuan khawizu te a lo awm a.

source: Am I only a God who is near, says the Lord, and not a God at a distance?
target: Hla taka awm Pathian ni lovin, Hnaitea awm Pathian êm ni ka nih? Tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: For Christ sent me, not to give baptism, but to be a preacher of the good news: not with wise words, for fear that the cross of Christ might be made of no value.
target: Krista chuan baptis turin mi tir si lo, Chanchin Tha hril turin mi tir zawk a ni; thu finga hril lovin, chutilochuan Krista kraws chu engmah lovah an chantir dah ang e.

source: What time do you have
target: Eng hun nge i neih

source: Tom has died
target: Tom a boral tawh

source: Keeping the secret of the faith in a heart free from sin.
target: chhia leh tha hriatna thiangin rinna thuruk chu pawm mi an ni zawk tur a ni.

source: In the daytime he was guiding them in the cloud, and all through the night with a light of fire.
target: Chhunah chuan chhumin a hruai a. Zankhuain mei engin a hruai bawk thin a.

source: It is to be square, folded in two, a hand-stretch long and a hand-stretch wide.
target: Kil li neia siama thuah tur a ni; a dunglam khâpkhat, a vânglam pawh khapkhat bawk tur a ni.

source: He gives its desire to the unresting soul, so that it is full of good things.
target: Ani chuan nuna thil chak êm êm chu a titlain, Nunna riltam chu thatnain a tipuar si thin a.

source: When the doors are shut in the street, and the sound of the crushing is low, and the voice of the bird is soft, and the daughters of music will be made low;
target: Kawtthlêra kawngte a inkhar ni chuan, Rawtsawmna ri a lo chuai a, Sava thawmah mi â thawh a, Zai nu zawng zawngte an lo zuai lai hian;

source: I love books
target: Lehkhabute ka ngaina

source: The word about Edom. A voice comes to me from Seir, Watchman, how far gone is the night? how far gone is the night?
target: Dumah phur tir chu. Miin Seir tlâng ațangin mi au va, Ramvengtu, zan hi engti nge ni tawh? Râlvengtu zan hi engti nge ni tawh? tiin.

source: I have been troubled and in fear of death from the time when I was young; your wrath is hard on me, and I have no strength.
target: Ka naupan tet ata hrehawm tuar leh thi lek lekin ka awm thin a; I thil rapthlak takte ka tuarin ka thauvah mi man thin.

source: And put out the servant who is of no profit into the outer dark: there will be weeping and cries of sorrow.
target: Tin, bawi thahnem lo kha pawn lamah thimah chuan paih chhuak rawh u; chutah chuan tah leh ha thial chu a awm ang,’ a ti a, a chhang a.

source: Are you having dinner?
target: Zanriah i ei em?

source: I've already resigned
target: Ka ban tawh

source: Can you come?
target: I lo kal thei em?

source: Nothing's happening
target: Engmah a thleng lo

source: His heart is resting safely, he will have no fear, till he sees trouble come on his haters.
target: A thinlung chu anghet a, a hlau lo vang. Amah dotute chunga a thu duhsam thleng chu a hmuh hma loh zawng.

source: It hurts.
target: Mi tina.

source: But in Mount Zion some will be kept safe, and it will be holy; and the children of Jacob will take their heritage.
target: Zion tlângah erawh chuan, tlan chhuakte chu an awm ang a, a thianghlim ang; tin, Jakoba chhûngte chuan an rochante chu an chang ang.

source: He's a bureaucrat
target: Bureaucrat a ni a

source: And by his side the men of Jericho were building. And after them, Zaccur, the son of Imri.
target: Tin, a dawt chu Jeriko miten an siam a. Tin, anmahni dawt chu Imria fapa Zakuran a siam a.

source: So take him to your hearts in the Lord with all joy, and give honour to such as he is:
target: Chutichuan,ani hi hlim takin Lalpaah chuan lo lawm ulangin, hetiang mi hi ngaihlu rawh u;

source: I was fair
target: Ka dik alawm

source: Now Isaac's love was for Esau, because Esau's meat was greatly to his taste: but Rebekah had more love for Jacob.
target: Tin, Isaaka chuan a sakhi sa a ei thîn avângin Esauva chu a ngaina a; Rebeki erawh chuan Jakoba chu a ngaina zawk a.

source: Then Hezekiah the king got up early, and got together the great men of the town, and went up to the house of the Lord.
target: Chutichuan lal Hezekia chu zing takah a tho va, khua ami lianhote chu a ko khâwm a, LALPA inah chuan an chho va.

source: Came together with one purpose, to make war against Joshua and Israel.
target: Josua leh Israel-ho chu thu khat vuaa beih rawn tumin an pungkhawm chiam a.

source: I'm armed.
target: Ka inralthuam.

source: Does she have a dog? No.
target: Ui a nei em? Aih.

source: Do you see a star
target: Arsi i hmu em

source: For what is God's reward from on high, or the heritage given by the Ruler of all from heaven?
target: Chunga Pathian laka chanvo leh Chungnung ber Engkimtitheia laka rochan tûr chu eng nge ni?

source: Do you trust me No
target: Min ring em Aih

source: So that it might take a grip of the skirts of the earth, shaking all the evil-doers out of it?
target: I pian achinah, zing hnênah, thu i pein, Khawfingchat hi ahmun tûr i hriat tir ngai êm?

source: It's hailing
target: A indawt zat zel

source: I still can't afford it.
target: Ka la pe thei lo.

source: Let their chains be broken, and their cords taken from off us.
target: An phuarnate hi tichatin An hruihrualte hi kan hnên ata i paih daih ang u, tiin.

source: Now the town was wide and great: but the people in it were only a small number, and the houses had not been put up.
target: Khua chu a zauvin a lian hle a; nimahsela a mi awmte an tlem hle mai a, inte pawh la sak loh a ni si a.

source: But you have quite given us up; you are full of wrath against us.
target: A nih leh, nangin mi paih thla dêr em ni? Kan chungah i thin a ur nasa hle êm ni?

source: I'm not watching TV.
target: TV ka en lo.

source: Well, not necessarily.
target: Awle, a ngai lo.

source: Who gives food to all flesh: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.
target: Ani chuan tisa zawng zawng hnênah ei tûr a pe thin a: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: I am not a morning person.
target: Zing mi ka ni lo.

source: Who is this coming out of the waste places like pillars of smoke, perfumed with sweet spices, with all the spices of the trader?
target: Eng nge ni hei, meikhu ding ang thlalêr ata lo kal hi, Murra leh beraw rimtui nam rum rum Sumdawngtu paudar tinreng rim chenin?

source: For all those who do any of these disgusting things will be cut off from among their people.
target: Tupawh heng thil tenawm hi a engapawh titu apiang chu an chipuite zing ata tuithlarin an awm ang.

source: By whom we come near to God without fear through faith in him.
target: chu Krista Isua kan rin avang chuan amah vekah chuan nelna leh ngam taka luh theihna kan nei.

source: And news of it went all through Joppa, and a number of people had faith in the Lord.
target: Tin, chu chu Joppa khua zawng zawng chuan an hre ta vek a; mi tam takin Lalpa chu an ring ta a.

source: I stammered
target: Ka ṭawng ṭhut thut

source: And Jacob went on to Succoth, where he made a house for himself and put up tents for his cattle: for this reason the place was named Succoth.
target: Tin, Jakoba chu Sukloth hmunah chuan a kal a, ama tân in a sa a, a rante tân bûkte a sa bawk a: chuvângin chu mi hmun hming chu Sukoth an ti ta a.

source: I sit down for so long.
target: Ka thu rei lutuk.

source: I will shit on you.
target: Ka shit ang che.

source: I paid $200 in taxes.
target: Tax $200 ka pe a.

source: I was offering my back to those who gave me blows, and my face to those who were pulling out my hair: I did not keep my face covered from marks of shame.
target: Ka hnungzang hi vawtute hnênah ka dawh a, ka biangte hi hmul pawttute hnênah ka dawh bawk : mualphonaah leh chilah ka hmai ka hup lo.

source: Is she staying at a hotel?
target: Hotel-ah a awm em?

source: Then let my wife give pleasure to another man and let others make use of her body.
target: Ka nupui chuan mi dang sum deng sela, Mi dangte chuan tlâwm rawh se.

source: And the thin cows made a meal of the seven fat cows who came up first;
target: tin, bâwngpui chêr tak tak, pawr tak takte chuan bâwngpui pasarih thau tak tak lo chhuak hmasate chu an ei zo ta mai a:

source: What were they wearing?
target: Eng nge an hak a?

source: Only do not take its blood for food, but let it be drained out on the earth like water.
target: A thisen erawh chu in ei hauh lo tur a ni; tui angin leiah in leihbaw mai tur a ni.

source: For they made the blood of saints and prophets come out like a stream, and blood have you given them for drink; which is their right reward.
target: Anni chuan mi thianghlimte leh zawlneite thisen an chhuah a, tin, nangin i n tura thisen vek i pek thung hi; in tlak an ni reng e, a tih ka hria.

source: And when the seventh stamp was undone there was quiet in heaven for about half an hour.
target: Tin, chhinchhiahna pasarihna chu a han phelh veleh, dar chanve lai van chu a reh thuap a.

source: Stop gawking
target: Zakzum tawh suh

source: I gave your children blows to no purpose; they got no good from training: your sword has been the destruction of your prophets, like a death-giving lion.
target: In fate ka vua a, a sâwt lo, An țhat phah chuang hek lo: Sakeibaknei koham ang maiin, Nangmahni khandaih chuan in zâwlneite a ei ral a.

source: But now I will not be to the rest of this people as I was in the past, says the Lord of armies.
target: Tunah erawh chuan hemi la awm chhunte hnênah hian Tun hma ang hu ka ni tawh lo vang, Tih hi Sipaihote LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: But if the size of the mark on his skin is increased after he has been seen by the priest, let him go to the priest again:
target: Amaherawhchu a thianna tura puithiam a inentir hnua a khir chu a vuna a tai darh zau chuan puithiam a inentir leh tur a ni:

source: Truly, his salvation is near to his worshippers; so that glory may be in our land.
target: A chhandamna chu amah tihtute hnaihah chan a awm ngei ngei thin a ni; Kan ramah hian ropuina a awm theih nân.

source: The evil man is in pain all his days, and the number of the years stored up for the cruel is small.
target: Mi suaksual chuan a dam chhûng zawng nâ a tuar a, Hnehchhiahtu tana kum tuk zatte pawh chu.

source: A voice of one saying, Give a cry! And I said, What is my cry to be? All flesh is grass, and all its strength like the flower of the field.
target: Chu! Aw chuan, Eng thu sawiin nge ka au vang? a ti a. 'Mi zawng zawng hlobet ang an ni a, an ropuina zawng zawng pawh phul pangpâr ang a ni:

source: And Moses, crying out to the Lord, said, What am I to do to this people? they are almost ready to put me to death by stoning.
target: Tin, Mosian, Hêng mipuihote hi engtin nge ka tih ang? Lunga min denhlum hial pawh an duh âwm hi, tiin LALPA a au va.

source: When they were at rest in their place, these were at rest; when they were lifted up, these went up with them: for the spirit of life was in them.
target: An din chuan hêngte hi an ding ve a, An chhoh chuan hêngte hi an chho ve țhîn a, thilnung thlarau chu anmahniah a awm si a.

source: Yours are the heavens, and the earth is yours; you have made the world, and everything which is in it.
target: Vante khi nangma ta ani a, lei pawh hi nangma ta a ni: Khawvel leh a chhûnga thil awm zawng zawng hi nangma din a ni.

source: That interests me
target: Chu chuan ka ngaihven hle

source: And the frogs will be gone from you and from your houses and from your servants and from your people and will be only in the Nile.
target: Tin, chungute chuan nângmah leh i inte leh i chhiahhlawhte leh i mite chu an chhuahsan vek ang che u a; luiah chauh an awm tawh ang, a ti a.

source: You're not dead yet.
target: I la thi lo.

source: Let's begin again
target: I tan leh ang u

source: And which of you by taking thought is able to make himself any taller?
target: Tin, nangni zingh lungkham avangin tuin nge mahni dung lam tawng khata tisang chuang thei?

source: Don't repeat yourself.
target: Repeat tawh suh.

source: The rest of the dead did not come to life again till the thousand years were ended. This is the first coming back from the dead.
target: Mitthi dangte erawh chu kum sangkhat chu a vei hma loh chuan an la nung rih lo va. Chu chu thawhlehna hmasa ber chu a ni.

source: And he put the bread on it in order before the Lord, as the Lord had said.
target: Tin, dawhkanah chuan LALPA hmaah chhang chu a dah fel diam a; LALPAN Mosia thu a pêk ang khan.

source: Talk to him again
target: Amah chu bia leh rawh

source: Do you like to cook
target: Chaw siam i duh em

source: There the workers of evil have come down: they have been made low, and will not be lifted up.
target: Sawtah sawn thil tisualtute chu an tlu reng a: Nam thluk an ni a, an tho thei tawh lo vang.

source: In the day of wealth have joy, but in the day of evil take thought: God has put the one against the other, so that man may not be certain what will be after him.
target: Tha niah chuan lawm langin Chhiat niah chuan ngaihtuah rawh: Pathian chuan pakhata pawh chu A dang ang bawka a siam ani si a, Mihring chuan a hnu lam tûr a hriat chhuah loh nân.

source: On the sixth day Eliasaph, the son of Reuel, chief of the children of Gad:
target: Ni ruk ni huan ngada thlahte puipa Deuela fapa Eliasapha chuan a hlan a:

source: The waters were circling round me, even to the neck; the deep was about me; the sea-grass was twisted round my head.
target: Tuite chuan ka nunna chenin mi hual vêl a; Tui thûk chu ka vêlin a awm a; Hnimte chuan ka lu a tuam vêl a ni.

source: There's been times.
target: Hun a awm tawh.

source: We were gardening
target: Huan kan siam a

source: It was a moving sight.
target: Hmuhnawm tak a ni.

source: She's eating a pear.
target: Pear a ei a ni.

source: I'm horrible
target: Ka rapthlâk a ni

source: They looked down on him
target: An en hniam a

source: My lovers and my friends keep away from my disease; my relations keep far away.
target: Mi hmangaihtute leh ka thiante chu ka thil vei lakah hian an inthiarfihlim thin a; Ka laichinte pawh hla takah an ding thin.

source: What's the holdup
target: Eng nge holdup chu

source: These two things have come on you; who will be weeping for you? wasting and destruction; death from need of food, and from the sword; how may you be comforted?
target: Heng thil pahnih hian a tlak buak tak che hi; tuin nge tahpui dawn che aw? Tiauna leh chhiatna te, tam leh khandaihte hian; engtin nge ka thlamaun ang che aw?

source: Because his hand is stretched out against God, and his heart is lifted up against the Ruler of all,
target: Pathian chunga a kut a lek leh Engkimtitheia chunga chapo taka a chet avângin;

source: Then the man will be free from all wrong, and the woman's sin will be on her.
target: chutichuan mipa chu khawlohnaa chuan a fihlim ang a, hmeichhia chuan a sualna mawh aphur ang,' ti rawh, tiin.

source: The Lord will send disease on the heads of the daughters of Zion, and the Lord will let their secret parts be seen.
target: LALPA chuan Zion fanute chhipah chuan pan khir a awmtir ang a, Lalpa chuan an zahmawhte pawh a tilang ang, a ti a.

source: So these three men gave no more answers to Job, because he seemed to himself to be right.
target: Tin, heng mi pathumte hian Joba chu an chhâng zel ta lo va, fel a intih êm avângin.

source: Because I was in fear of you, for you are a hard man: you take up what you have not put down, and get in grain where you have not put seed.
target: mi vin tak i nih avangin ka hlau che a ni; i dah loh pawh i la thin a, i tuh loh pawh i at thin si a,’ a ti a.

source: A wise son makes a glad father, but a foolish son is a sorrow to his mother.
target: Solomona thufing Fapa fingin pa lawm a siam a, Fapa â erawh chu nu rihna ni.

source: I agree completely
target: Ka pawm tlat a ni

source: Our brother Timothy has been let out of prison; and if he comes here in a short time, he and I will come to you together.
target: Kan unaupa Timothea kha an chhuahtir ta tih lo hre ve rawh u; a lo kal hma deuh chuan amah nen kan rawn hmu ang che u.

source: I failed to persuade her.
target: Ka thlem thei lo.

source: He called me day after day.
target: Nitin min ko a.

source: I'm enjoying myself immensely.
target: Ka hlim hle mai.

source: Let us then, though we still have God's word that we may come into his rest, go in fear that some of you may be unable to do so.
target: Chuvangin, i hlau vang u, chutilochuan a chawlhnaa luhna thutiama la awm reng siin, in zingah tupawh tling lo angin inlo awm mial dah ang e.

source: He was crying
target: Khapa kha a ṭap a

source: His mother said to the servants, Whatever he says to you, do it.
target: Tin, a nuin rawngbawltute hnenah, In hnena a sawi apiang chu ti zel ang che u, a ti a.

source: For he gave the word, and it was done; by his order it was fixed for ever.
target: Ani chuan a sawi a, a lo awm ta a; Thu a pe a, a lo awm nghet ta si a.

source: On that day Jesus went out of the house and was seated by the seaside.
target: Chu mi ni chuan Isua chu in ata a kal chhuak a, dil kamah chuan a thu a.

source: And the servant who was in authority over the cutters said, It is a Moabite girl who came back with Naomi out of the country of Moab;
target: Tin, a buh sengtute chunga hotu a chiahhlawh chuan, Moab nula, Moab ram ata Naomi hnêna lo kal ve a ni:

source: And he was living in Joppa for some time with Simon, a leather-worker.
target: Tin, Petera chu ni tam tak Joppa khuaah Simona, savun siamtu inah a cham reng a.

source: That is dear
target: Kha kha a to a ni

source: Give ear to my cry, for I am made very low: take me out of the hands of my haters, for they are stronger than I.
target: Ka au thawm hi ngaithla ang che; nasa taka tihhniamin ka awm ta si a: Mi tiduhdahtute lakah hian mi chanhim ang che; ka aiin an chak zawk si a.

source: We've lost our way.
target: Kawng kan bo ta.

source: Sami was stealing
target: Sami chuan a ru a

source: I do not work
target: Ka thawk lo

source: Thomas said, Lord, we have no knowledge of where you are going; how may we have knowledge of the way?
target: Thoman a hnenah, Lalpa, i kalna tur chin kan hre lo asin, a kawng engtin nge kan hriat ang? a ti a.

source: Then we will give all our time to prayer and the teaching of the word.
target: keini erawh chu tawngtai leh thu rawngbawlin kan awm leh tlat zel ang, an ti a.

source: The man of pride, lifted up in soul, is named high-hearted; he is acting in an outburst of pride.
target: Mi chapo leh mi intivei chu a hming Hmusittua a ni; Inngaih ropui chaponain thil a ti thin.

source: And there was another man who was a prophet of the Lord, Uriah, the son of Shemaiah of Kiriath-jearim; he said against this town and against this land all the words which Jeremiah had said:
target: Tin, mi dang, LALPA hminga thu sawi Keriath-jearima mi Semeia fapa Uria kha a awm bawk a, Jeremia thu sawi zawng zawng ang bawkin he ram leh khawpui chhiat tûr thu a sawi a.

source: By the power of your hand the earth is shaking and broken; make it strong again, for it is moved.
target: He ram hi i tikhur a; i tikhi ta a: A kakte ch siam tha leh ang che; a nghing a nghing si a.

source: What? was it from you that the word of God went out? or did it only come in to you?
target: Pathian thu hi nangmahni laka chhuak a ni maw? A nih loh leh nangmahni hnen chauhvah a lo thleng a ni maw?

source: And all the people of the land will put them in the earth; and it will be to their honour in the day when I let my glory be seen, says the Lord.
target: A ni, an rama mi zawng zawngin an phûm ang; chawimawia ka awm nîah chuan ka hmingthanna a ni ang, tih hi LALPA PATHIAN thu chhuak a ni.

source: I'm not leaving you.
target: Ka kalsan lo che.

source: Did I win
target: Ka chak em

source: Let it go
target: Kal tir rawh

source: A sound of fear is in his ears; in time of peace destruction will come on him:
target: Hlauhawm thawmte chu a bengin a hria a, A hmuingil laiin rawktuin a rawn bei a.

source: But if I by the Spirit of God send out evil spirits, then is the kingdom of God come on you.
target: Amaherawhchu, kei Pathian Thlarau avanga ramhuaite hnawt chhuak thin ka nih chuan, Pathian ram in hnenah a lo thleng tawh a ni ang.

source: Gods of the peoples round about you, near or far, from one end of the earth to the other;
target: in bul hnaia chengte pathian emaw, ram hla taka chengte pathian emaw emaw be turin an rawn thei che u a.

source: So they sent men to make a search round Beth-el. (Now the name of the town in earlier times was Luz.
target: Tin, Josefa chhûngte chuan Bethel khuaah chuan enthlatute an tir a. A hma chuan chu khaw hming chu Luz a ni.

source: And if his offering to the Lord is a burned offering of birds, then he is to make his offering of doves or of young pigeons.
target: Tin, LALPA tana a thilhlan chu sava lam halral thilhlan a nih huan, a thilhlanah thuro emaw, parva no emaw a hlan tur a ni.

source: They deserved to win
target: Chak an phu a ni

source: Is the person good?
target: Mi chu a tha em?

source: And unleavened bread, and unleavened cakes mixed with oil, and thin unleavened cakes on which oil has been put, made of the best bread-meal;
target: chhang dâwidim telh loh nên, chhangpêr dawidim telh loh hriaka chawhpawih nên i ranla tur a ni: chhangphut dip tak chiin i siam tur a ni.

source: They see the works of the Lord, and his wonders in the deep.
target: Chungte chuan LALPA thiltihte leh, Tui thuk taka a thilmak tihte chu an hmu thin.

source: If only he would marry me.
target: Min nei ta sela.

source: Better is the poor man whose ways are upright, than the man of wealth whose ways are twisted.
target: Mi, a hmuia tihmawh, â bawk si ai chuan Mi rethei, rilru tha tak pua awm chu a tha zawk

source: You who have fear of the Lord, give him praise; all you seed of Jacob, give him glory; go in fear of him, all you seed of Israel.
target: LALPA tihtute u, amah chu fak rawh u; Jakoba thlah zawng zawngte u, amah chu chawimawi rawh u; Israela thlah zawng zawngte u,m amah chu hlau rawh u.

source: Go after love; still desiring to have the things which the Spirit gives, but most of all that you may have the prophet's power.
target: Hmangaihna hi um zel ula, thlarau lam thilpekte pawh chak cheu rawh u, amaherawhchu thu in hrilh theihna tur lek phei chu chak bik rawh u.

source: It's not the Olympics.
target: Olympic a ni lo.

source: Before him went disease, and flames went out at his feet.
target: Hripui chu a hmatawnah ațanga, a hnungah chuan țek a tla rum rum a.

source: My throat is sore.
target: Ka hrawk a na a.

source: Male and female he made them, naming them Man, and giving them his blessing on the day when they were made.
target: thu ngawtin mipa leh hmeichhiaah anmahni chu a siam a ni; thu ngawta siama an awm nî khân mal a sâwmsak a, an hmingah chuan Mihring a vuah a.

source: Cursed be Canaan; let him be a servant of servants to his brothers.
target: Tichuan, Kanaana chu ânchhe dawngin awm rawh se; A unaute chhiahhlawhte chhiahhlawh a ni ang, a ti a.

source: I'm just shy
target: Ka zak a

source: Let us then go out to him outside the circle of the tents, taking his shame on ourselves.
target: Chutichuan, amah an hmuhsitna chu phurin daipawnah a hnen lamah i kal chhuak ang u.

source: Have you got it yet?
target: I la nei tawh em?

source: I was making prayer to your name, O Lord, out of the lowest prison.
target: Khuarkhurum hnuaihnung ber ațang chuan, aw LALPA i hming ka lam a.

source: Let me make a song about my loved one, a song of love for his vine-garden. My loved one had a vine-garden on a fertile hill:
target: Ka tuh taka thu, a grêp huan chungchâng thu chu, ka duh taka tan lain ka sa teh ang. Ka duh taka chuan tlâng lei tha tak maiah grêp huan a nei a:

source: He takes the record of his great men: they go falling on their way; they go quickly to the wall, the cover is made ready.
target: A miliante chu a ko chhuak a: an kal rual chu a petek a; kulhbang lam pan chuan an hmanhmawh a, thil phên tûr an siam a.

source: I just got up.
target: Tunah ka tho chiah.

source: As in the days when you came out from the land of Egypt, let us see things of wonder.
target: Aigupta ram ațanga i kal chhuah lai ang khân a hnênah thil mak takte ka entîr ang.

source: Did Tom purchase it
target: Tom hian a lei em

source: Rivers of water are running down from my eyes, for the destruction of the daughter of my people.
target: Ka mipui fanu, boral avângin ka mit chu lui tui angin a luang ta e.

source: So Solomon went back from the high place at Gibeon, from before the Tent of meeting, to Jerusalem; and he was king over Israel.
target: Chutichuan Solomona chu hmun sâng bula biak bûk awmna Gibeon khuaa a zin chu Jerusalem-ah a haw a, Israel-te chungah ro a rêl ta a.

source: The bricks have come down, but we will put up buildings of cut stone in their place: the sycamores are cut down, but they will be changed to cedars.
target: Lei rawh chante chu chim mah sela lung chang chherin kan rem mai ang: theipui thingte chu sah chhumin awm mah sela, sidar thingten kan thlak mai ang, titute chuan an la hria ang.

source: I'm a hermit.
target: Sakhaw mi ka nia.

source: Were you looking for us?
target: Min zawng em ni?

source: And he put to death the ox and the sheep, which were the peace-offerings for the people; and Aaron's sons gave him the blood and he put some of it on and round the altar;
target: tin, mipuite puala remna thilhlan inthawina bawngpa leh berampa chu a talh bawk a; tin, Arona fapaten a thisen chu an pe a, maichâm chu a theh vel a;

source: To make clear when it is unclean and when it is clean: this is the law about the disease of the leper.
target: a thianghlim loh lai leh a thianghlim lai kawhhmuhna turin hei hi phar chungchânga dan chu a ni, tiin.

source: Of the tribe of Simeon twelve thousand: of the tribe of Levi twelve thousand: of the tribe of Issachar twelve thousand:
target: Simeona hnama mi 12,000 Levia hnama mi 12,000 Isakara hnama mi 12,000 Isakara hnama mi 12000

source: The Lord gave a true oath to David, which he will not take back, saying, I will give your kingdom to the fruit of your body.
target: LALPA chuan Davida hnênah thutakin chhia a chham ta a; Chu chu a hawisan lo vang: I taksa raha mi i lalthutphahah chuan ka thuttir ang.

source: So Samuel went back after Saul, and Saul gave worship to the Lord.
target: Chutichuan Samuela chuan Saula chu a hawpui ta a, Saula chuan LALPA chu a be ta a.

source: Watch me now
target: Min en rawh tunah

source: You were asking for it.
target: I dil a ni.

source: In the mouth of the foolish man is a rod for his back, but the lips of the wise will keep them safe.
target: Mi â kaah chuan chapona tiang a awm a, Mi fingte ka erawh chuan anmahni a hum thin.

source: He keeps himself in a secret place like a lion in his hole, waiting to put his hands on the poor man, and pulling him into his net.
target: Sakeibakneiin apuka a chang ru angin ani chuan fianrialah a chang ru reng thin a: Mi rethei man tûrin a chang thin a: Mi rethei chu aman ngei a, tichuan a lenin ahnuk bo thin.

source: I drank tea.
target: Thingpui ka in tawh.

source: The Lord will not give up his people, or take away his support from his heritage;
target: LALPA chuan amite apaih thlu dawn si lo va. A rochan chu akalsan hek lo vang.

source: I hate school
target: School ka hua

source: And he did not make out who he was, because his hands were covered with hair like his brother Esau's hands: so he gave him a blessing.
target: Tichuan a u Esauva kut angin a kut a hmul avângin amah chu a hre lo va: chutichuan mal a sâwm ta a.

source: Then Saul came up to Samuel in the doorway of the town and said, Give me directions, if you will be so good, to the house of the seer.
target: Chuti chuan Saula chuan kulh kawngkaah Samuela chu a va hnaih a, Hmutheitu in chu khawiah nge a awm min hrilh teh khai, a ti a.

source: The spirit is the life giver; the flesh is of no value: the words which I have said to you are spirit and they are life.
target: Tinungtu chu thlarau a ni, tisa chu engmahah a tlaktlai lo; in hnena thu ka sawite hi thlarau a ni, nunna pawh a ni.

source: And Jeroboam said in his heart, Now the kingdom will go back to the family of David:
target: Tin, Jeroboama chuan a rilruin, ram hi Davida chhûngte ta a lo ni leh nghe nghe ang a:

source: He told her to study.
target: Zir turin a ti a.

source: Take us back again, O God; let us see the shining of your face, and let us be safe.
target: Aw Pathian, min hawi kirtir leh la; I hmêl kha tieng ang che, tichuan chhandamin kan awm dawn nia.

source: Now after a number of years I came to give help and offerings to my nation:
target: Tin, kum tam tak hnuah hian ka chipuite hnenah thilpek tur leh sa talh tur rawn kengin ka lo kal a;

source: They go after our steps so that we may not go in our streets: our end is near, our days are numbered; for our end has come.
target: Miin kan hnu an chhui, khawlai kan lêng thei lo ve; Kan tâwp a hnai, kan nî a kim; kan tâwpna a thleng ta si.

source: I have said once, and even twice, what was in my mind, but I will not do so again.
target: Vawi khat ka sawi tawh a, ka chhâng tawh lo vang che; A ni, vawihnih; ka chhunzawm tawh lo vang,' a ti a.

source: For it seemed good to the Holy Spirit and to us, to put on you nothing more than these necessary things;
target: Thlarau Thianghlim leh keinin, heng thu pawimawh lo hi chu, phurrit zual in chungah nghat lo ila a tha kan ti;

source: Stand back
target: Tawlh kîr rawh

source: Their dead bodies will be thick on the face of the earth, and their smell will come up, and the mountains will be flowing with their blood, and all the hills will come to nothing.
target: An zinga thahate chu paih chhuahin an awm ang a, an ruang rimchhia chu a chho vut vut ang a, tlangte chu an thisena tihtuiin a awm ang.

source: You can talk well!
target: I tawng tha thei!

source: When the memory of you comes to me on my bed, and when I give thought to you in the night-time.
target: Ka khumlaizawla ka hriat reng chia, Zana i chungchang thu ka suangtuah lai chuan.

source: The Lord has sent among them a spirit of error: and by them Egypt is turned out of the right way in all her doings, as a man overcome by wine is uncertain in his steps.
target: LALPA chuan Aigupta-ho zingah luhlulna thlarau a awmtir ta: tichuan zu rui mi chu a luakah a pai thlawk thlawk ang hian Aigupta-ho chu an hnathawh tinrengah a kal kawitir ta.

source: I let it go.
target: Ka kaltir ta mai.

source: And as they were there for some days, Festus gave them Paul's story, saying, There is a certain man here who was put in prison by Felix:
target: Tin, ni tam tak chutah chuan an cham avangin Festa chuan Paula thupawi chu lal hnenah chuan a sawi a, Felika khan mi tang tu emaw a hnutchhiah a;

source: He asked for money.
target: Pawisa a dil a.

source: In no way: because if it is so, how is God able to be the judge of all the world?
target: Hnai lo ve; chuti a nih chuan Pathianin engtin nge khawvel ro a rel ang?

source: You're fools
target: Mi â in ni

source: He's wet
target: A huh

source: Is it true?
target: A dik em?

source: David was king over Israel for forty years: for seven years he was king in Hebron and for thirty-three years in Jerusalem.
target: Israel -hote chuang Davida lal chhûng chu kum sâwmli a ni: Hebron khuaah kum sarih a lal a, Jerusalem khuaah kum sâwmthum leh kum thum a lal a.

source: As for the works of men, by the word of your lips I have kept myself from the ways of the violent.
target: Mihring thiltihah zawng, i hmuia thu chhuak avângin Mi nunrawng kawna kal lo tûrin ka invawng tha a ni.

source: But this man, who was not of their family, took the tenth from Abraham, and gave a blessing to him to whom God had given his undertaking.
target: amaherawhchu an zinga a thlahtute chhui tel ve lohva khan Abrahama lakah sawma pakhat a la a, thutiamte vawngtu chu mal a sawm ta bawk a.

source: Did you walk down?
target: I kal thla em?

source: And these will be waved by the priest, with the bread of the first-fruits, for a wave offering to the Lord, with the two lambs: they will be holy to the Lord for the priest.
target: Tin, puithiamin siam hmasak ber chhang chu beram no pahnih nen chuan LALPA hmaa then thilhlanah at hen ang a: puithiam pual, LALPA tana thianghlim a ni ang.

source: I'll eat anything.
target: Engpawh ka ei ang.

source: We are conscious, O Lord, of our sin and of the wrongdoing of our fathers: we have done evil against you.
target: Aw LALPA, ka suahsualzia kan pha lo ve, Kan pute khawlohna nên, i chungah kan tisual ta si a.

source: And hearing this, the ten became very angry with James and John.
target: Tin, sawmte chuan chu chu an lo hriatin Jakoba leh Johana chungah chuan an lungni ta lo em em a.

source: But a certain woman sent a great stone, such as is used for crushing grain, on to the head of Abimelech, cracking the bone.
target: Tin, hmeichhia tuin emaw buh rawtsawmna chung lam lung hi Abimeleka luah a zuk thlak a, a lu ruh a keh a.

source: And David was full of wrath against that man; and he said to Nathan, By the living Lord, death is the right punishment for the man who has done this:
target: Tichuan Davida chu chu mi chunga chuan a thinur ta viau mai a; Nathana hnênah chuan, LALPA nunna chhalin ka sawi e, chu thil titu tihhlum mai tlâk a nih chu;

source: False witnesses got up: they put questions to me about crimes of which I had no knowledge.
target: Hretu fel lo takte anlo tho va; Ka thil hriat hauh loh thu-ahte mi chhal a.

source: I didn't hear a splash.
target: Splash ka hre lo.

source: Is he a friend of yours?
target: I thian a ni em?

source: Go to work
target: Hnaah kal rawh

source: You have more love for evil than for good, for deceit than for works of righteousness. (Selah.
target: Tha aiin sual i ngaina zawk a; Felna thusawi aiin dawt thu sawi i ngaina zawk bawk a. Selah

source: Tom isn't helpful
target: Tom hian a pui lo

source: Then Judah sent his friend Hirah with the young goat, to get back the things which he had given as a sign to the woman: but she was not there.
target: Tin, a thil hrên chu hmeichhe kut ata la tûrin a thianpa Adullam mi kutah chuan kêl no chu a thawn a: nimahsela ani chuan amah chui a va hmu zo si lo va.

source: Your mother was in comparison like a vine, planted by the waters: she was fertile and full of branches because of the great waters.
target: I chûni-nun grêp huana tui chawm grêp a iang e, Siktui thiang chawm, rah țha chhuak a zar luai e,

source: For up to that time he had not come on any of them; only baptism had been given to them in the name of the Lord Jesus.
target: Chu mi hma chuan an zingah tuma chungah a la thleng lo; Lal Isua hmingin baptisma an chang chauh a la ni.

source: When he sent death on them, then they made search for him; turning to him and looking for him with care;
target: Anmahni a thah apiangin amah chu an zawng thin a. An kir leh a, zing takah Pathian an zawng thin a.

source: They are beautiful
target: An mawi em em a

source: There's a drought
target: Thlipui a awm a

source: I'm alone
target: Ka mal lutuk

source: Who's looking at me?
target: Tu nge min en?

source: And Jesus, when he was teaching in the Temple, said, How do the scribes say that the Christ is the Son of David?
target: Tin, Isuan Pathian biak inah chuan a zirtir laiin anmahni a bia a, Krista chu Davida fapa a ni tih lehkhaziaktuten engtiziaa sawi thin nge an nih?

source: But even as the good news was given to us by the approval of God, so we give it out; not as pleasing men, but God by whom our hearts are tested.
target: Chanchin Tha kawltira awm turin Pathian tha tih mi kan nih ang ngeiin, mihring tilawm tur ang ni lovin; kan thinlung fiahtu Pathian tilawm zawkin thu kan sawi zawk thin a ni.

source: I backed away
target: Ka inhnuk dawk

source: They give nothing.
target: Engmah an pe lo.

source: Baby ginger
target: Sawhthing mothar

source: And all the town came out to Jesus; and seeing him they made request that he would go away from their part of the country.
target: Tin, ngai teh, akhuain Isua hmuak turin an lo chhuak a; tin, amah an hmuh veleh an ram ata chhuak turin an ngen chiam a.

source: But has now been made clear by the revelation of our Saviour Christ Jesus, who put an end to death and made life unending come to light through the good news,
target: nimahsela min chhandamtu Krista Isua inlarna avang hiantunah tihlanin a awm ta. Ani chuan thihna chu a tiboralin Chanchin Thain nunna leh boral theih lohna a tilang ta;

source: And Saul, hearing that David had gone to Gath, went after him no longer.
target: Tin, Davida chu Gat khuaah a tlan tih Saula an hrilh a, tichuan a zawng le ta lo va.

source: Keep your people safe with your rod, the flock of your heritage, living by themselves in the woods in the middle of Carmel: let them get their food in Bashan and Gilead as in the past.
target: Karmel tlâng kâra ramhnuaia khawhar taka awm i rochan berâm rual, i mite chu i talhtum hmangin châwm la: hmasâng ang khân Basan leh Gilead-ah châwm in awm hlawm rawh se.

source: And when the news came to Jabesh-gilead of what the Philistines had done to Saul,
target: Tin, Jabes-gilead mi zawng zawngten Philistia mitean Saula an tih dan zawng zawng thu an lo hriat chuan,

source: Have fun in Italy
target: Italy ramah hian hlim takin awm rawh

source: The wise man, fearing, keeps himself from evil; but the foolish man goes on in his pride, with no thought of danger.
target: Mi fing chuan ahlauthawng a, sual akalsan tin, a; Mi â erawh chu a intihuai a, mahni a inring thin.

source: They wouldn't help us.
target: Min pui lo ang.

source: You have given him his heart's desire, and have not kept back the request of his lips. (Selah.
target: A thinlung duhzawng chu i pe a, A hmuia a thil dil chu i phal lo lo ve. Selah

source: That a boy
target: Kha kha mipa a nia

source: Did you eat much?
target: I ei tam em?

source: It's a little dated.
target: A date deuh a ni.

source: I see.
target: Ka hmu.

source: Eighteen thousand men of Benjamin came to their death, all strong men of war.
target: Benjamin-ho chu mi singkhat leh sângriat an thi a; an vai chuan mi chak huaisen thiau an ni.

source: And Arpachshad became the father of Shelah; and Shelah became the father of Eber.
target: Tin, Arpaksada chuan fapa Sela a nei a; tin, Sela chuan fapa Ebera a nei a.

source: Now he who had been made well had no knowledge who it was, Jesus having gone away because of the number of people who were in that place.
target: Nimahsela a dama chuan tunge a nih a hre lo va, chutah chuan mipui an awm avangin Isua a kal bo ta si a.

source: You recovered quickly.
target: I dam nghal vat a.

source: The pay's not bad.
target: A pay a chhe lo.

source: Tom a tlai mai thei
target: Tom might be late

source: They didn't answer
target: An chhang lo

source: And the children of Machir, the son of Manasseh, went to Gilead and took it, driving out the Amorites who were living there.
target: Tin, Manasea fapa Makira thlahte chu Gilead ramah an kal a, an la a, Amor-ho chuta awmte chu an chhuhsak a.

source: Their flesh may not be used for food, and their dead bodies may not even be touched; they are unclean to you.
target: An sa in ei tur a ni lo va, an ruang pawh in khawih tur a ni 1o va, in tan a bawlhhlawh a ni.

source: What's the occasion
target: Eng hun nge ni ta

source: I was shot
target: Min kap fuh a

source: For in his eyes men are as nothing; he sees evil and takes note of it.
target: Mi lawilo chu a hre si a, Khawlohna pawh a hmu, zawng lo mah sela,

source: You're wrong
target: I diklo

source: But a blessing be on your eyes, because they see; and on your ears, because they are open.
target: Nangni mit erawh chu a vannei a ni, a hmuh thin avangin; in beng pawh a vannei a ni, a hriat thin avangin.

source: For having been put to the test himself, he is able to give help to others when they are tested.
target: Amah ngei chuan thlemna tawkin a lo tuar tawh avangin thlemna tawkte chu a tanpui thei a ni.

source: You're cruel
target: I sual

source: I'm sweating
target: Ka thlan a tla

source: But God's approval of us is not based on the food we take: if we do not take it we are no worse for it; and if we take it we are no better.
target: Nimahsela ei tur hian Pathian mit min tluntir chuang lo vang; ei mah suh ila kan chhe chuang hek lo, ei mah ila kan tha chuang hek lo.

source: But Festus, in answer, said that Paul was being kept in prison at Caesarea, and that in a short time he himself was going there.
target: Nimahsela Festa chuan, Paula chu Kaisari khuaah an veng reng a ni, kei pawh rei lo tean ka haw dawn e.

source: Or are you without the knowledge that all we who had baptism into Christ Jesus, had baptism into his death?
target: Keini zingah Krista Isuaa baptisma chang apiangte chu a thihnaah baptisin kn awm tih in hrelo emaw ni.

source: I say it's worth the risk.
target: Risk a phu ka ti.

source: I'm done fighting
target: Insual ka zo tawh

source: Do I stink?
target: Ka rimchhia em?

source: They were married
target: An innei a

source: And Jehu went to rest with his fathers, and was put into the earth in Samaria. And Jehoahaz his son became king in his place.
target: Tichuan Jehua chu a pi leh pute hnenah chuan a muhil a, Samari khuaah an phûm ta a. Tin, a fapa Jehoahaza chu a aiawhin a lal ta a.

source: I needed hope
target: Beiseina ka mamawh

source: I will send my fear before you, putting to flight all the people to whom you come; all those who are against you will go in flight, turning their backs before you.
target: I hmaah chuan ka tihbaihna ka tîr ang a, I kalna tûr rama mite zawng zawng chu ka timangang ang a, tichuan I hmêlmate zawng zawng chu I hmaah ka tlânchhiattîr ang.

source: So Moses sent them to have a look at the land of Canaan, and said to them, Go up into the South and into the hill-country;
target: Tichuan Mosian Kanaan ram enthla turin anniho chu a tir a, an hnenah, Chhim lam kawngah kal phawt ula, tlângahte lawn chho ula:

source: I don't remember for sure.
target: Ka hre chiang lo.

source: They like to dance
target: Zai an ngaina hle

source: Have you already voted?
target: I vote tawh em?

source: For the man did not come from the woman, but the woman from the man.
target: Mipa hi hmeichhia atanga chhuak a ni lo va; hmeichhia erawh chu mipa atanga chhuak a ni zawk a.

source: It was the Lord's pleasure, because of his righteousness, to make the teaching great and give it honour.
target: Dan chu a felna avânga tihlena tihzahawm chu LALPA chuan a țha a ti a.

source: You have laughed at me.
target: Min nuihzat a ni.

source: We're rich
target: Kan hausa

source: You are a steward of it.
target: A enkawltu i ni.

source: For you are the saviour of those who are in trouble; but your eyes are on men of pride, to make them low.
target: Hreawm tuar mite chu i chhandam ang a: Mi chapote erawh chu i tihtlâwm theih nân an chungah i mit a fu reng a.

source: Wise behaviour gets approval, but the way of the false is their destruction.
target: hriatna tha chuan duhsakna a dawntir a, Mi vervek kawng eawh chu a bumboh.

source: And Hosah, a son of the children of Merari, had sons: Shimri the chief (for though he was not the oldest, his father made him chief;
target: Tin, Meraria thlahte zinga Hosa chuan fapate a nei bawk a; Simria chu puipa ber a ni a, fa tir a ni lo na a, a pain puipa berah a siam a ni;

source: So we your people, and the sheep of your flock, will give you glory for ever: we will go on praising you through all generations.
target: Chutichuan, keini i mite, i ran tlatna hmuna berâmte hian, Kumkhuain lawm thu kan hrilh ang chia: Chhuan zawng zawng thlengin nangmah fakna chu kan hriattir zel ang.

source: They're surprised
target: Mak an ti hle mai

source: Sit here.
target: Hetah thu rawh.

source: Now when Jesus came, he made the discovery that Lazarus had been put into the earth four days before.
target: Chutichuan Isuan a thlenin, ni li thlanah a lo awm tawh tih a hria a.

source: That does it
target: Kha khân a ti

source: Tom threatened them
target: Tom chuan a vau a

source: By your great wisdom and by your trade your power is increased, and your heart is lifted up because of your power:
target: i finna nasa tak leh i sumdawnnain sum i tipunga, i hausak êm avângin i rilru a lo chapo ta a;

source: The evil-doer makes his face hard, but as for the upright, he gives thought to his way.
target: Mi suaksualin a hmêl a tiruh a, Mi fel erawh chuan a kawng a rel fel thin.

source: I don't want an apple.
target: Apple ka duh lo.

source: In that day the fair virgins and the young men will be feeble from need of water.
target: Chumi nîah chuan nula leh tlangvâl thalaite meuh pawh tuihâlin an thi dang ang a.

source: For I have five brothers; and let him give them an account of these things, so that they may not come to this place of pain.
target: pianpui mipa panga ka nei si a; he na awmnaah hian an lo kal ve dah ang e, thahnemngai takin hrilh the se,’ a ti a.

source: I, even I, am the Lord; and there is no saviour but me.
target: Kei, keimah ngei hi, LALPA chu ka ni; keimah lo chu chhandamtu rêng rêng an awm lo.

source: My passion is over: if the thorns were fighting against me, I would make an attack on them, and they would be burned up together.
target: ka thin a rim tawh lo va: buar leh hnimhlingneite lo awm mah se ka thlo veng a, hmun khatah ka hal ral ang.

source: I paid for it.
target: Ka pêk tawh kha.

source: Do me a favor
target: Thil mi lo tih sak

source: It was driving me crazy.
target: Min ti â a ni.

source: The produce of the garden is pomegranates; with all the best fruits, henna and spikenard,
target: Pawmgranet hmun ang a ni, i duhzawmzia, Rah tha ber ber chhuak thin te,

source: And it goes out from Beth-el to Luz, and on as far as the limit of the Archites to Ataroth;
target: tin, Bethel atangin Luz-ah a chhuak a, Ark-ho ramria Ataroth thlengin a kal zel a;

source: Was I not drained out like milk, becoming hard like cheese?
target: Nangin hnute tui angin mi leih chhuakin Hnute khal angin mi hlawm ani lâwm ni?

source: But he let the poorest of the land go on living there, to take care of the vines and the fields.
target: Chu mi rama a rethei theite chuan grêp hrui enkawltu atân leh lo nei mi atân an hnutchhiah a.

source: Which one will you get
target: Eng nge i hmuh ang

source: I think they are happy
target: An hlim ka ti

source: Got it!
target: Ka hria!

source: We're not offended
target: Kan thinrim lo

source: The transfer is complete.
target: Transfer a zo ta.

source: And David said to Saul, Your servant has been keeper of his father's sheep; and if a lion or a bear came and took a lamb from the flock,
target: Tin, Davida chuan Saula hnênah, I chhiahhlawh hian ka pa berâm ka veng thin a; sakeibaknei emaw savawm emaw a lo kala berâm rual zing ata berâm no alakte hian

source: I needed Tom
target: Tom ka mamawh

source: For this reason, from this time forward we have knowledge of no man after the flesh: even if we have had knowledge of Christ after the flesh, we have no longer any such knowledge.
target: Chu mi avang chuan tun achinah hian keini zawngin tisa lamah chuan tumah kan hre tawh lo vang; tisa lamah Krista chu lo hre tawh mah ila, tunah zawng kan hre leh tawh lo ve.

source: Were you talking to me?
target: Min biak em ni?

source: I spoke up.
target: Ka sawi kha.

source: But he said, Things which are not possible with man are possible with God.
target: Ani erawh chuan, Mihring tih rual loh hi Pathian tih theih a ni, a ti a.

source: Do what I say.
target: Ka sawi ang khân ti rawh.

source: They were trapped
target: An tang ta a ni

source: Tom saw me.
target: Toman mi hmu.

source: We'll walk
target: Kan kal ang

source: Don't be late for the train.
target: Rel-ah tlai suh.

source: Sami is not ready
target: Sami a inpeih lo

source: But she was greatly troubled at his words, and said to herself, What may be the purpose of these words?
target: Tin, chu mi thusawi avang chuan a mangang ta em em a, Engtiziaa chibai mi buk nge ni ang? tiin a inngaihtuah a.

source: You are confusing me.
target: Min ti buai a ni.

source: So Omri went to rest with his fathers, and was put into the earth in Samaria; and Ahab his son became king in his place.
target: Chutichuan Omria chu apute hnênah chuan amu hil a, Samari khuaah an phûm ta a: tin, a fapa Ahaba chu a aiawhin a lal a.

source: So that there is still a Sabbath-keeping for the people of God.
target: Chutichuan, Pathian mite tan chuan Chawlhnia chawlhna a la awm ta fo va.

source: The bus hasn't come yet
target: Bus a la lo kal lo

source: But Amnon had a friend whose name was Jonadab, the son of Shimeah, David's brother: and Jonadab was a very wise man.
target: Amaherawhchu Amnona chuan thian a nei a, a hming chu Jonadaba a ni a, Davida unaupa Simea fapa a ni: Jonadaba chu mi ring vervek tak a ni.

source: I added water
target: Tui ka leih

source: I want a lot
target: Ka duh lutuk

source: Now the servant does not go on living in the house for ever, but the son does.
target: Bawih chu kumkhuain inah a awm reng lo; fapa erawh chu kumkhuain a awm reng thin.

source: The Holy Spirit witnessing by this that the way into the holy place had not at that time been made open, while the first Tent was still in being;
target: Thlarau Thianghlimin hei hi a hriattir a: Hmun Thianghlim luhna kawng chu a la lang rih lo ve, biak buk tawntirh chu a la din chhung chuan tih hi;

source: You're not bad looking.
target: I hmel a chhe lo.

source: I felt hungry
target: Ka ril a ṭam e

source: After whom has the king of Israel come out? for whom are you searching? for a dead dog, an insect.
target: Israel lal chu tu zawngin nge a lo chhuah? Tunge i um? Ui thisawn, uihli lek,

source: I was that girl.
target: Chu nula chu ka ni.

source: For you will not go out suddenly, and you will not go in flight: for the Lord will go before you, and the God of Israel will come after you to keep you.
target: Hmanhmawh akin in kal chhuak dawn si lo va, tlan chhiain in kal dawn hek lo: LALPA chuan in hma a hruai dawn si a; Israel-ho Pathian chu in hnudaltu a ni ang.

source: On the table
target: Dawhkân chungah

source: A glad heart makes a shining face, but by the sorrow of the heart the spirit is broken.
target: Thinlung hlimin hmêl hlim a siam a, Thinlung lungngaihna erawh chuan rilru a tilungchhe thin.

source: So now, let me make a suggestion, so that you may keep your life safe and the life of your son Solomon.
target: Chutichuan nangma himna tûr leh i fapa Solomona himna tûr ka lo hrilh teh ang che.

source: Now Joab was fighting against Rabbah, in the land of the children of Ammon, and he took the water-town.
target: Chutichuan Joaba chan Amona thlahte khawpui Raba a rûn a, khawpui chu a la a.

source: So the men of the army came, and the legs of the first were broken and then of the other who was put to death on the cross with Jesus:
target: Tin sipaite chu an lo kal a, a hnena kraws-a an khenbeh mi tawntirh leh mi pakhat chu an kete an titliak a;

source: For such men are false Apostles, workers of deceit, making themselves seem like Apostles of Christ.
target: Mi chutiangte chu Krista tirhkohva insiam chawpa, tirhkoh derte, hnathawktu mi bum hmangte an ni si a.

source: These great beasts are four kings who will be cut off from the earth.
target: Hêng sa ropui tak tak palite hi, lal pali lei ata lo chhuak tûrte chu an ni a.

source: Now at the present time, men over whom death has power take the tenth; but then it was taken by one of whom it is witnessed that he is living.
target: Tin, hetah hian mihring thi thinte hian sawma pakhat an hmu thin a, chutah erawh chuan ‘a nung reng’ tia a thu an hriattira chuan a hmu a ni.

source: So the poor man has hope, and the mouth of the evil-doer is stopped.
target: Chutichuan, retheite chuan beisei an nei a, Khawlohnain a ka a chip a.

source: You're a romantic
target: Romantic tak i ni

source: It is not cold today.
target: Vawiin a vawt lo.

source: I have to win.
target: Ka chak a ngai.

source: They helped me too
target: Min pui bawk a

source: Tom's well
target: Toma a tha

source: He will send from heaven, and take me from the power of him whose desire is for my destruction. God will send out his mercy and his good faith.
target: Mi lem zawh tumtu chuan mi sawichhiat hunah Ani chuan van atangin a rawn tir ang a, mi chhandam ang; Selah Pathianin a ngilneihna leh a thutak chu arawn tir chhuak ang.

source: Now Er, Judah's first son, did evil in the eyes of the Lord, so that he put him to death.
target: Tin, Juda fa tîr Era chu LALPA mithmuhin mi sual a ni a; tichuan LALPAN ani chu a tihlum ta a.

source: Give me five
target: A ṭha tiraw

source: For this cause there will be no mercy for sinners when they are judged, and the evil-doers will have no place among the upright,
target: Chuvangin mi suaksualte chu roręlna hmaah chuan an ding thei lo vang a, Mi suaksualte pawh mi felte inkhawmnaah chuan an ding thei hek lo vang.

source: But of the winged four-footed things, those which have long legs for jumping on the earth you may have for food;
target: Amaherawhchu thla nei, ke palia kal chi pawh lei chunga perh nana an ketang chunglama bawp nei zawng zawngte zinga mi hengte hi in ei thei ang;

source: Tom's shy
target: Tom a zakzum

source: His soul will be full of good things, and his seed will have the earth for its heritage.
target: A nunna chu nuamsak takin a awm ang a; A thlahte chuan ram chu an la luah ang.'

source: And on hearing their outcry and what they said I was very angry.
target: Chung thute leh an au thawkm chu ka hriatin ka thinur hle mai a.

source: Wash the car
target: Car hi sil rawh

source: You beat Tom
target: Toma inhneh

source: What are you going to be
target: Eng nge i nih dawn

source: We had fun
target: Nuam kan ti

source: But the days will come when the husband will be taken away from them, and then they will go without food.
target: Nimahsela a pasal tur chu an hnen ata hruai bo nite a la thleng ang a, chu mi niah erawh chuan an la nghei ang.

source: And now, give thought, looking back from this day to the time before one stone was put on another in the Temple of the Lord:
target: Tûn ațangin nakin hnu thlengin LALPA biak inah lungin chherchhuan hmâ, tûn hma lam kha ngaihtuah ang che u:

source: He who does not put out his money at interest, or for payment give false decisions against men who have done no wrong. He who does these things will never be moved.
target: A pung um tûra a tangka puktir ngai lo va, A thiam zawk thiam loh chantirna tûra thamna pawh la ngai lo mi chu. Chung thil titu chu engtikah mah a nghing lo vang.

source: We'll keep trying.
target: Kan tum zêl ang.

source: Be quiet now
target: Ngawi tawh rawh

source: And Barzillai the Gileadite came down from Rogelim; and he went on as far as Jordan with the king to take him across Jordan.
target: Tin, Gilea mi Barzilaia chu Rogelam atangin a lo chhuk a; lal chu Jordan-a hruai kai tûrin a hnêna Jordan a ai ve a.

source: Don't throw this away.
target: Hei hi paih suh.

source: But as in those days he who had birth after the flesh was cruel to him who had birth after the Spirit, even so it is now.
target: Nimahsela, chu mi lai chuan tisa dana lo piang chuan Thlarau dana lo piang chu a tiduhdah ang khan, tunah pawh chutiang bawk a ni.

source: There is a noise of war from the town, a sound from the Temple, the voice of the Lord giving punishment to his haters.
target: Chu! Khawpuia sa mur mur thawm chu! Biak ina thawm a nih chu! A hmêlmate thungrultu, LALPA thawm anih chu!

source: You look sad
target: I lungngaih hmel

source: And your seed will be a blessing to all the nations of the earth, because you have done what I gave you orders to do.
target: ka thu i âwih tâk avângin i thlahah chuan khawvêla chitin an la thawveng ang tih, mahni leh mahni inchhâlin chhia ka chham ta, LALPAN a ti, a zuk ti a.

source: My ears are ringing.
target: Ka beng a ri a.

source: When my cry came to your ears you gave me an answer, and made me great with strength in my soul.
target: Ka auh ni che khan nangin mi chhâng a, Ka nunna tichakin mi fuih a.

source: I was so excited about it.
target: Ka phur em em a.

source: And they made an agreement to be true to the Lord, the God of their fathers, with all their heart and all their soul;
target: Tin, an rilru leh an thinlung zawng zawngin LALPA an pi leh pute Pathian zawng tûr leh

source: We don't know each other.
target: Kan inhre lo.

source: And their wings were separate at the top; two of the wings of every one were joined one to another, and two were covering their bodies.
target: Thilnung pali ten an thla pahnih țheuh chu a hmawr in tâwk phain an zâr țheuh a, a dangte chu an taksa hrûlah an khupa.

source: I fired first
target: Ka kâp hmasa

source: On the eleventh day Pagiel, the son of Ochran, chief of the children of Asher:
target: Ni sâwm leh ni khat ni chuan Asera thlahte puipa Okrana fapa Pagiela chuan a hlan a:

source: If David then gives him the name of Lord, how is he his son?
target: Davidan ani chu ‘Lalpa’ a tih si chuan, engtin nge a fapa a nih theih? a ti a.

source: Together they made ships to go to Tarshish, building them in Ezion-geber.
target: Tin, Tarsis lama kal tûr lawng an siam tlâng a, Ezion-geber-ah lawngte chu an siam a.

source: Sami was the victim
target: Sami chu a ni a

source: They are too drunk
target: An rui lutuk

source: Then you will again see how the upright man is different from the sinner, and the servant of God from him who is not.
target: Tichuan, in lamlêt ang a, mifel leh mi suaksual, Pathian rawngbawltu leh bawl lo tu chu in thliar thei tawh ang.

source: Take us back, O Lord God of armies; let us see the shining of your face, and let us be safe.
target: Aw LALPA, sipaihote Pathian, min hawi kirtir leh la; I hmêl kha tieng ang che, tichuan chhandamin kan awm dawn nia.

source: Seeing that Abraham will certainly become a great and strong nation, and his name will be used by all the nations of the earth as a blessing?
target: Abrahama hi chi ropui leh thiltithei tak a lo la ni ngei dâwn a, amahah chuan khawvêla chi tin an la thawveng dâwn si a.

source: That's OK
target: A ṭha e

source: I, Nebuchadnezzar, was at rest in my place, and all things were going well for me in my great house:
target: Kei, Nebukadnezzara ka inah nuamsa tak leh ka in ropuiah neinung takin ka awm a.

source: Who has ever taken off his outer skin? who may come inside his inner coat of iron?
target: Tunge a vun pawnlang chu hlip thei ang? A khabe thuah hnih chhûngah tunge lo lut ang?

source: Is there evil in my tongue? is not the cause of my trouble clear to me?
target: Ka leiah dik lohna a awm êm ni? thil tha lo chu a thlei thei lo vem ni?

source: And in the belief that he was with some of their number, they went a day's journey; and after looking for him among their relations and friends,
target: Chutichuan an pawl zingah a awm emaw an ti a, ni khat an kal hman a, an laichinte leh an hmelhriatte zingah an zawng a.

source: And they kept it till the morning as Moses had said: and no smell came from it, and it had no worms.
target: Tin, Mosia hrilh ang chuan atûk lam atân an dah hrang ta a: chu chu a rimchhe lo va, a lung hek lo.

source: And Ahijah took his new robe in his hands, parting it violently into twelve.
target: Tin, Ahija chuan a puan thar sin chu a la a, phel sâwm leh phel hnihah apawtthlêr a,

source: And he said in a loud voice, Jesus, Son of David, have mercy on me.
target: Tichuan ani chu, Isu Davida Fapa, mi khawngaih rawh, tiin a au ta a.

source: And as for me, you are my support in my righteousness, giving me a place before your face for ever.
target: Kei zawng rilru tha tak ka putnaah hian nangin mi chelh reng a, A hmaah chuan kumkhua atân mi dah a.

source: We call each other brother.
target: Unau kan in ti a.

source: I still don't think it's fair.
target: Ka la fair lo.

source: Let the horn be sounded in Zion, and a war-cry in my holy mountain; let all the people of the land be troubled: for the day of the Lord is coming;
target: Zion-ah chuan tawtawrawh ham ula, ka tlang thianghlimah chuan inralrinna puang rawh u; he ram chhûnga mi zawng zawngte chu khur rawh se: LALPA ni chu a lo thleng mek a, a hnai tawh si a;

source: I could help them.
target: Ka pui thei a ni.

source: You did not give me a kiss: but she, from the time when I came in, has gone on kissing my feet.
target: Nangin fawh reng reng mi fawp lo; ani erawh hi chuan ka lo luh tirh ata ka kephah fawh a bang lo.

source: And having given them an account of everything, he sent them to Joppa.
target: tin, thu zawng zawng chu an hnenah a hrilh zawhin Joppa khuaah chuan a tir ta a.

source: So the work of the house of God at Jerusalem came to an end; so it was stopped, till the second year of the rule of Darius, king of Persia.
target: Chutichuan Jerusalem-a Pathian in an bei chu an chawlhsan ta a; Persia lal Daria lal kum hnihna thlengin chawlhsan a ni ta a.

source: And in the eighteenth year of Nebuchadrezzar he took away as prisoners from Jerusalem eight hundred and thirty-two persons:
target: Nebukadnezzara kum sâwm eh kum riatnaah chuan Jerusalem ațangin mi zariat leh sawmthum leh pahnih salah a hruai a;

source: And mercy, O Lord, is yours, for you give to every man the reward of his work.
target: Aw LALPA, ngilneihna hi i ta bawk a ni: Mi tin, an thiltih ang theuhvin i rul si thin a.

source: I do worry
target: Lungngai suh

source: Did you ask for amnesty
target: Ngaihdam i dil em

source: Don't forget
target: Theihnghilh suh

source: Your pride has gone down into the underworld, and the noise of your instruments of music; the worms are under you, and your body is covered with them.
target: I ropui bung bungna chu Seol-a hruai thlak a ni ta, i perhkhuang ri bur burte nên: changpat chu i hnuaiah an phah a, englo lungte chuan an khuh ta che a nih hi,' tiin.

source: It's not against the law.
target: Dan kalh a ni lo.

source: So then, let your hearts be changed and be turned to God, so that your sins may be completely taken away, and times of blessing may come from the Lord;
target: Chuvangin in sualte thai bo a nih theih nan sim ula, hawi kir leh rawh u, chutichuan Lalpa hnen ata harh unte a lo la thleng thei ang a,

source: The bows of the men of war are broken, and the feeble are clothed with strength.
target: Mi chak thalngulte a titliak a, Petekte tai chu chaknaa hrenin a awm a.

source: But if one who has hate for you is in need of food or of drink, give it to him, for in so doing you will put coals of fire on his head.
target: Chuvangin i hmelma a riltam chuan ei tur pe rawh, a tuihal chuan in tur pe rawh: chutiang i tih chuan a lu chungah meiling i chhek khawm a ni ang.

source: He whose spirit is uncontrolled is like an unwalled town which has been broken into.
target: Mahni rilru thunun zo lo mi chu Khawpui chim kulh nei lo ang a ni.

source: Will not your creditors suddenly be moved against you, and your troublers get up from their sleep, and you will be to them like goods taken in war?
target: Nangmah eitutûr che an dingchhuak phutin a tihhreawmtu tûr che an harh ang a, An tan râllâk mai i la ni dâwn lâwm ni?

source: Now sit down
target: Tunah ṭhu rawh

source: And an evil spirit from the Lord came on Saul, when he was seated in his house with his spear in his hand; and David made music for him.
target: Tin, Saula chu a ina fei kenga thut laiin LALPA tirh ramhuai a chungah a lo thleng a; tin, Davida chuan tingtang a tum a.

source: Give a foolish man a foolish answer, or he will seem wise to himself.
target: Mi â chu a ât dan azirin chhâng rawh, Chutilochuan mi fingah a inngai mai dah ang e.

source: They got it wrong
target: An hre sual a ni

source: Jesus, however, was talking of his death: but they had the idea that he was talking about taking rest in sleep.
target: Isuan a thih thu a sawi a ni a; nimahsela anni chuan a chawlh chhunga a muthilh thu a sawi emaw an ti a.

source: The hands of the witnesses will be the first to put him to death, and after them the hands of all the people. So you are to put away the evil from among you.
target: Tihhlumna turah chuan hretute chuan kut an thlak hmasa ang a, chu mi hnuah mipui zawng zawngin. chutaing chuan in zing ata chu thil țha lo chu in tibo tur a ni.

source: You're finished already.
target: I zo tawh a ni.

source: So take care how you give hearing, for to him who has will be given, and from him who has not will be taken even what he seems to have.
target: Chutichuan eng angin nge in hriat fimkhur rawh u; tupawh a nei apiang an pe belhchhah ang a; tupawh a nei lo apiang neia an inruat chhun pawh an laksak ang, a ti a.

source: And Araunah, looking out, saw the king and his servants coming to him: and Araunah went out, and went down on his face to the earth before the king.
target: Tin, Arauna chu a han hawi a, a lam pana lal leh ahote lo kal chu a hmu a: tichuan Arauna chu a chhuak a, a hmaia lei siinlal hmaah chuana bawkkhup a.

source: So that my glory may make songs of praise to you and not be quiet. O Lord my God, I will give you praise for ever.
target: Ka ropuina hi, ngawi reng lova, nangmah faka a zaina tûrin. Aw LALPA ka Pathian, kumkhuain lawm thu ka hrilh fo vang che.

source: For in the fire of my wrath I have said, Truly, in that day there will be a great shaking in the land of Israel;
target: Ka thin a rima, ka thin a ur lai takin,'Chumi nîah chuan Israel ramah Lir nasa takin a nghing ngei ang;

source: They wash their hands
target: An kut an sil thin

source: So Naomi came back out of the country of Moab, and Ruth the Moabitess, her daughter-in-law, with her; and they came to Beth-lehem in the first days of the grain-cutting.
target: Chutichuan Naomi chu a lo kir a, a monu Moab mi Ruthi nen Moab ram atang chuan an lo kir a ni: barli seng tan tirh laiin Bethlehem chu an thleng a ni.

source: Now the Lord said to Abram, Go out from your country and from your family and from your father's house, into the land to which I will be your guide:
target: Tin, LALPAN Abrama hnênah chuan, I khaw lam ata leh i laichînteho zîng ata leh i pa in ata chhuak la, ram ka la entîr tûr che lamah kal rawh:

source: So David gave Ornan six hundred shekels of gold by weight for the place.
target: Chutichuan Davidan chu mi hmun leina chuan Ornana chu rangkachak sekel zaruk a pe a.

source: He's not laughing yet.
target: A la nui lo.

source: We've made mistakes
target: Kan tihsual a ni

source: For at that time they had no knowledge that the Writings said that he would have to come again from the dead.
target: Mitthi zing ata a tho leh tur a ni tih Pathian Lehkha Thu kha an la hre si lo.

source: I'm not taking sides.
target: Ka lam hawi lo.

source: Were you drinking
target: I in em ni

source: Goods of great price will be ours, our houses will be full of wealth;
target: Thil hlu tak takte kan nei ang a, Râllâk sumin kan in kan tikhat dawn nia.

source: Sami was not safe
target: Sami chu a him lo

source: He's an astronaut
target: Astronaut a ni a

source: I have gone from men's minds and memory like a dead man; I am like a broken vessel.
target: Mitthi an theihnghilh ang takin theihnghilhin ka awm a: Bel keh ang mai ka ni ta.

source: And the walls round Jerusalem were broken down by the Chaldaean army which was with the captain.
target: Tin, Kaldai sipai rual zawng zawng, lal vengtu pâwl hotu hnêna awmte chuan Jerusalem kulhte chu a velin an tichim ta vek a.

source: I'm watching golf
target: Golf ka en a

source: I am taller.
target: Ka sang zawk.

source: And their glory was changed into the image of an ox, whose food is grass.
target: Chutiang chuan an ropuina chu Bâwngpa hlobet ei mi ang lekah an chantir ta a.

source: What does it contain
target: Eng nge a keng tel

source: I hate chu berâmpui rual hmul meh hlim, Bual zawh hlim ang chu a ni: An zaa kawppui nei theuhvin, Nei lo reng an awm lo, an zingah.
target: Your teeth are like a flock of sheep whose wool is newly cut, which come up from the washing; every one has two lambs, and there is not one without young.

source: I may testify
target: Ka fiah mai thei

source: The money of the offerings for error and the sin-offerings was not taken into the house of the Lord; it was the priests'.
target: bawhchhiat thawina thilhlan tangka leh, sual thawina thilhlan tangkate chu LALPA inah chuan a la lût lût lo; puithiamte pual a ni.

source: Where are we
target: Khawnge kan awm

source: A false witness will not go without punishment, and the breather out of deceit will not go free.

source: My son, if you have made yourself responsible for your neighbour, or given your word for another,

target: I ti dawn.

source: Say to God, How greatly to be feared are your works! because of your great power your haters are forced to put themselves under your feet.

target: Engkim a hmu vek a

source: But like water overflowing he will take them away; he will put an end to those who come up against him, driving his haters into the dark.

source: That was fun
target: Kha kha a hlimawm

source: And when the thousand years are ended, Satan will be let loose out of his prison,

source: And Saul, pointing his spear at him, made an attempt to give him a wound: from which it was clear to Jonathan that his father's purpose was to put David to death.
target: Tin, Saula chuan khawh tumin a fei chu a han lek a; chu mi avâng chuan Jonathana chuan a pain Davida chu thah a lo tum ngei a ni tih a hre ta a.

source: They aren't putting on shoes.
target: Kekawr an bun lo.

source: In that day Israel will be the third together with Egypt and Assyria, a blessing in the earth:

source: I have a black eye.
target: Mit dum ka nei a.

source: They were so young
target: An naupan em em a

source: The number of burned offerings which the people took in was seventy oxen, a hundred male sheep, and two hundred lambs: all these were for burned offerings to the Lord.
