source: I've lost.
target: Ka chaklo.

source: I do not play the piano.
target: Piano ka tum lo.

source: His war-dress they put in the house of Astarte; and his body was fixed on the wall of Beth-shan.
target: Tin, a râlthuam chu Astorethi inah an dah a; a ruang chu Bethsan kulh bangah an tar a.

source: Let her not be as one dead, whose flesh is half wasted when he comes out from the body of his mother.
target: Mi, a nu chhul ata a lo chhuah tirh ațanga thi sa deuhthaw angin awm lul suh se, a ti a.

source: It is just an act.
target: Thiltih mai a ni.

source: The grass comes up and the young grass is seen, and the mountain plants are got in.
target: Hlobet chu an ât a, hlobet no dep a lo lang a; Tlânga hlobet an la khâwm a.

source: We are not being careful.
target: Kan fimkhur lo.

source: And men from strange countries will be your herdsmen, and those who are not Israelites will be your ploughmen and vine-keepers.
target: Tin, ram dang mite chuan in ran rualte chu dingin an tlattir ang a, hriat ngai loh mite chu in leilettu-ahte leh in grêp hrui enkawltuahte an awm ang.

source: I relaxed a little.
target: Ka relax deuh a.

source: And Shitrai the Sharonite was responsible for the herds in the grass-lands of Sharon, and Shaphat, the son of Adlai, for those in the valleys;
target: tin, Saron-a tla ran rual enklawtu chu Saron mi Straia a ni a; tin, ruama ran rual enkawltu chu laia fapa Saphata a ni a;

source: Tom is over there.
target: Tom chu a awm a.

source: The moon has gone down.
target: Thla a tla ta.

source: Tom is going downstairs
target: Tom chu a chhuk a

source: For, truly, he does not take on the life of angels, but that of the seed of Abraham.
target: A tanpui thinte chu vantirhkohte an ni hauh si lo va, Abrahama thlahte an ni, a tanpui zawk thin chu.

source: Don't fall in love with me.
target: Min hmangaih suh.

source: And when she saw that Ruth was strong in her purpose to go with her she said no more.
target: Chutichuan a hnêna kal a tum tlat tih a lo hriat chuan a ngawihsan ta a.

source: Then you will say, We have taken food and drink with you, and you were teaching in our streets.
target: chutih hunah chuan nangnin, ‘I hmuhah pawh kan eiin kan bar tawh kha, kan kawtthlerahte pawh i zirtir thin kha,’ in la ti ang a;

source: And the servant took them into Joseph's house, and gave them water for washing their feet; and he gave their asses food.
target: Tin, anni chu Josefa in chhûngah a hruai lût a, tui a pe a, an ke an sil ta a; an sabengtungte pawh chu chaw a pe bawk a.

source: And Abraham went down on his face before the people of the land.
target: Tin, Abrahama chu chu mi rama mite hmaah chuan a kûn a, chibai a buk a.

source: And if one has a fall, the other will give him a hand; but unhappy is the man who is by himself, because he has no helper.
target: An tluk pawhin pakhat chuan a thian chu a khaiding dawn si a; mahni chauva awm kha erawh chu a chung a pik e, a tluk chuan khaidingtu tûr a nei si lo.

source: Aren't you enjoying yourself?
target: I hlim lo em ni?

source: Then keep the orders of the Lord your God, fearing him and walking in his ways.
target: Tin, a kawng zawh tur leh amah chu țih turin LALPA in Pathian thupêkte chu in zawm tur a ni.

source: They don't want to talk to me.
target: Min biak duh lo.

source: But I say to you, Take no oaths at all: not by the heaven, because it is the seat of God;
target: Kei erawh chuan ka hrilh a che u, chhia reng reng chham suh u; van chhalin chham suh u, chu chu Pathian lalthutphah a ni si a;

source: You may rise
target: I sawi thei ang

source: And Moses took half the blood and put it in basins; draining out half of the blood over the altar.
target: Tin, Mosia chuan chûng thisen zâtve chu a la a, maihûnahte a dah a; tin, thisen zâtve dang chu maichâmah a theh a.

source: They recognized each other
target: An inhriat chian a

source: Boil some eggs
target: Artui chhum rawh

source: So it is no great thing if his servants make themselves seem to be servants of righteousness; whose end will be the reward of their works.
target: Chuvangin,a rawngbawltute pawh chu felna rawngbawltuah insiam chawp mah sela thil mak a ni lo ve; chungho tawpna chu an thiltih ang zelin a ni ang.

source: The upright man gives attention to the cause of the poor: the evil-doer gives no thought to it.
target: Mi fel chuan mi rethei thu a hriatsak a, Mi suaksual erawh chuan hriatna tûrin ngaihthiamna a nei lo.

source: I'm not quite well.
target: Ka dam vak lo.

source: I didn't sing
target: Ka zai lo

source: Why is life given to the evil-doers? why do they become old and strong in power?
target: Eng tizia nge mi suaksualte chu an nun a, An lo upat a, a ni, an lo hmuingil theih ni?

source: It was an excellent game.
target: Game tha tak a ni.

source: And the priest said to them, Go in peace: your way is guided by the Lord.
target: Tin, puithiam chuan an hnênah, Thlamuang takin kal tawh u: in kalna tûr chu LALPANIN a hriatpui zel a che u, a ti a.

source: He got a D
target: D a hmu

source: And he sent word by Nathan the prophet, who gave him the name Jedidiah, by the word of the Lord.
target: tin, zâwlnei Nathana chu a chahtir a, tin, ani chuan LALPA chawiin a hmingah chuan Jedidia a sa a.

source: I saw you.
target: Nang pawh ka hmu.

source: Buy this
target: Hei hi lei rawh

source: Does your throat hurt?
target: I rilru a na em?

source: Did you sign this?
target: Hei hi i sign em?

source: You are a manly man!
target: Mipa tak i ni!

source: For before the child is old enough to make a decision between evil and good, the land whose two kings you are now fearing will have become waste.
target: Naupang chu t hil țha lo lam duh loh nachang leh thil țha lam duh nachang a hriat hma pawhin lal pahnih i huatate ram chu a tiau dawn a ni, a ti a.

source: The tenth Shimei, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi sâwmna chu Simeia chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: I have often been there.
target: Ka kal fo tawh.

source: Because of your servant David, do not give up your king.
target: I chhiahhlawh Davida avângin I hriak thiha hmêl chu hawi kirtir suh ang che.

source: You're mad
target: I mawl

source: Then Jesus said, I will be with you a little longer and then I go to him who sent me.
target: Tin, Isuan, Rei lo te in hnenah ka awm rih zet ang a, mi tirtu hnenah ka kal ang.

source: Are they Hebrews? so am I. Are they of Israel? so am I. Are they the seed of Abraham? so am I.
target: Hebrai mite an ni maw? Kei pawh ka ni. Israel mite an ni maw? Kei pawh ka ni. Abrahama thlahte an ni maw? Kei pawh ka ni.

source: I have twins
target: A kawp ka nei

source: We'll go get them.
target: Kan va la ang.

source: I am at home
target: Inah ka awm

source: All evil-doing is sin: but death is not the punishment for every sort of sin.
target: Fel lohna zawng zawng hi sual a ni; thihna khawp ni lo sual pawh a awm bawk a ni.

source: For their hearts are full of evil designs; and they are ever making ready causes of war.
target: Anni chuan a n thinlungah thil tihsualte an ngaihtuah thin a; Do tûrin an inkhawm fo thin.

source: It's amusing
target: A phurawm e

source: So Gehazi went after Naaman. And when Naaman saw him running after him, he got down from his carriage and went back to him and said, Is all well?
target: Chutichuan Gehazia chuan Naamana chu a um ta a. Tin, Naamanan tuin emaw a rawn um a han hmuh chuan, lo biak tumin tawlailir ata chu a chhuk a,Tha lam thu alawm maw? a ti a.

source: And they did evil against the God of their fathers, worshipping the gods of the people of the land, whom God had put to destruction before them.
target: Tin, an pi leh pute Pathian chungah thil an tisual a, an hmaa Pathianin a lo tihboral tak, chu rama mi pathian te lakah chuan an uire ta a.

source: But they took no note and did not give ear, but were guided by the thoughts and the pride of their evil hearts, going back and not forward.
target: Mahse an ngaithla lo va, beng an dawh hek lo: an thinlung sual chhuchhetin anmahni thu thuin an awm ta zawk a, hma lam pan aiin an hnungtawlh ta zawk a ni.

source: Their twenty pillars and their twenty bases were brass; and the hooks of the pillars and their bands were of silver.
target: chu mi atan chuan ban sawmhnih leh dar tlâng kerkuak sawmhnih a awm a: bana a bannate leh a zarfungte chu tangkarua a ni.

source: I will give the Lord great praise with my mouth; yes, I will give praise to him among all the people.
target: Ka ka hian LALPA hnênah lawm thu nasa tak ka sawi ang: A ni, mipui zingah amah chu ka fak ang.

source: The secrets of his heart are made clear; and he will go down on his face and give worship to God, saying that God is truly among you.
target: a thinlunga thurukte chu tihlanin a awm tawh ang; chutichuan bawkkhupin Pathian chibai a buk ang a, Pathian in zingah a awm tak zet tih a puang ang.

source: Let me not be covered by the flowing waters; let not the deep waters go over my head, and let me not be shut up in the underworld.
target: Tui lianin mi chim pil suh sela, Tui thuk takin mi lem hek suh se; Khuarkhurum pawhin a ka mi chip hnan suh se.

source: And he will come into the kingdom of the king of the south, but he will go back to his land.
target: Tin, chhim lam lal ramah chuan hmâr lam lal chu a lo lût ang a, mahse ama ramah a kîr leh ang.

source: The delights of your house will be showered on them; you will give them drink from the river of your pleasures.
target: Anni chu i in chhûng htil thain an tlai êm êm ang a; I lawmna luia mi chu i intir bawk ang.

source: They found nothing.
target: Engmah an hmu lo.

source: You've gotten better
target: I dam leh tawh

source: And the ass saw the angel of the Lord, and went near the wall, crushing Balaam's foot against the wall; and he gave her more blows.
target: Tin, sabengtung chuan LALPA vantirhkoh hu a hmu a, pal chu a va ngheng bet a; tichuan a vaw leh a,

source: The two tribes and the half-tribe have been given their heritage on the other side of Jordan at Jericho, on the east looking to the dawn.
target: hnam hnih leh hnam zatvee chuan an ram luah tur chu ni chhuahna lam Jeriko zawn Jordan ral chhak lamah an chang tawh a, tiin.

source: To a man whose way is veiled, and who is shut in by God?
target: Mi a kawng thup bosaka hnênah engati nge eng pêk anih ?: Pathianin huang a hung hnan hnênah chuan?

source: I'm thorough
target: Ka thiam tawh

source: He is a nice person
target: Mi fel tak a ni e

source: As the mountains are round about Jerusalem, so the Lord is round about his people, from this time and for ever.
target: Tlângte chu Jerusalem vêla a awm angin LALPA chu a mite vêlah a awm thin, Tun atanga, kumkhuain.

source: Because you did not do what the Lord said, and did not give effect to his burning wrath against Amalek. So the Lord has done this thing to you today.
target: LALPA thu i awih loh avâng leh Amalek-ho chungah a thinurna nasa tak ang khan i hlen loh avângin tunah hian i chungah he thil hi a ti ta ani hi.

source: I'm confused
target: Ka hamhaih a ni

source: Care in the heart of a man makes it weighted down, but a good word makes it glad.
target: Lungkham neih hian mi â tihreawm a, Thu tha erawh hchuan mi â tilawm thin.

source: Don't interrupt me
target: Min titawp suh

source: Then came a time of great need in the land, like that which had been before in the days of Abraham. And Isaac went to Abimelech, king of the Philistines, at Gerar.
target: Tin, chu mi ramah chuan Abrahama dam laia tam lo tla hmasa zawk tih loh kha, tam a lo tla leh a. Tichuan Isaaka chu Philistin-ho lal Abimeleka hnênah Gerar khuaah aaa zuk kal a.

source: And he gave the people this story: A man made a vine-garden and gave the use of it to some field-workers and went into another country for a long time.
target: Tin, vantlang hnenah he tehkhin thu hi a sawi ta a:Tuin emaw grep huan a siam a, lo enkawltute hnenah thlawhhlawh turin a pe a, rei tak thang turin ram dangah a kal ta a.

source: And it is true that there have been a great number of those priests, because death does not let them go on for ever;
target: Tin, anni zawng thih avnga awm hlen an thulh thin avngin puithiama siam an tam ngei a;

source: That's OK
target: A tha e

source: Don't rub it in, Tom.
target: Rub lut suh, Tom.

source: But they were bitter against the Most High God, testing him, and not keeping his laws;
target: Nimahsela, Pathian Chungnungbera chuu an fiah a, a chungah an hel a, A thuhriattirte chu an zawm si lo va;

source: Stop singing
target: Zai tawh suh

source: And the twelve stones which they took out of Jordan, Joshua put up in Gilgal.
target: Tin, chung lung sâwm leh pahnih, Jordan lui ata an put chhuah chu Josuan Gilgal-ah chuan a phun a.

source: They're staring at you
target: An en reng che a

source: At the time all punishment seems to be pain and not joy: but after, those who have been trained by it get from it the peace-giving fruit of righteousness.
target: Tin, thununna reng reng hi tuar lai chuan lawmawmin a lang lo va, lungchhiatthlakin a lang zawk thin, tuar hnuah erawh chuan chu mia sawizawia awmte tan chuan rah thlamuanawm tak felna chu a chhuahsak thin.

source: I feel happy
target: Ka lâwm hle

source: Be a saviour to your people, and send a blessing on your heritage: be their guide, and let them be lifted up for ever.
target: I mite chhandam la, i rochan chu malsawm ang che: Anniho chu chawm la, kumkhuain pawm ang che.

source: Why is the name of our father to be taken away from among his family, because he had no son? Give us a heritage among our father's brothers.
target: Fapa a neih loh avang maiin engah nge kan pa hming chu a thlahe zing ata a bo vang? Kan pa unaute zingah chanvo min pe ve rawh u, an ti a.

source: But what comparison may I make of this generation? It is like children seated in the market-places, crying out to one another,
target: Nimahsela, tun lai chhuante hi eng nen nge ka tehkhin ang? Naupang dawr hmunahte thua, an thiante auva,

source: She eats a red apple.
target: Apple sen a ei a.

source: Now one day, when the child was older, he went out to his father to where the grain was being cut.
target: Tin, nausen chu a lo sei lian a, ni khat chu a pa hnênah buh latute hnênan a kal ve a.

source: I didn't get a good look.
target: En tha ka hmu lo.

source: And in the middle of them one like a son of man, clothed with a robe down to his feet, and with a band of gold round his breasts.
target: khawnvar dahna zingah chuan mi tu emaw mihring fa ang, ke ler thlenga puan sin, a awma rangkachak kawnghrena inhreng ka hmu bawk a.

source: You're my everything
target: Ka engkim i ni

source: Take the first-fruits of your land as an offering to the house of the Lord your God. Let not the young goat be cooked in its mother's milk
target: i lova thlai thar hmasa ber chu LALPA i Pathian inah i rawn dah tur a ni. Kel no sa, a pui hnutetuiin i chhum tur a ni lo, a ti a.

source: For the Lord will not give his people up, because of the honour of his name; for it was the Lord's pleasure to make of you a people for himself.
target: A hming ropui tak avâng hian LALPA chuan a mite chu a hawisan dawn si lo va: a mite atâna siam che u chu LALPA lawmzawng tak ani si a.

source: And Jacob was living in the land of Goshen for seventeen years; so the years of his life were a hundred and forty-seven.
target: Tin, Jakoba chu Aigupta ramah chuan kum sâwm leh kum sarih a awm a: chutichuan Jakoba damchhûng chu kum 147 a ni ta a.

source: Be cool
target: Hmanhmawh lovin

source: Yes, here it is.
target: Aw, hei ka nei.

source: And Cain said, My punishment is greater than my strength.
target: Tin, Kaina chuan LALPA hnênah, I mi hremna hi a nasa êm a, ka tuar zo lo vang.

source: Call Tom.
target: Tom-a be rawh.

source: A sword is on her waters, drying them up; for it is a land of images, and their minds are fixed on false gods.
target: A tuite kangin a ro zo va, Milimte ram a ni si a, Milimte chu an atchilh a.

source: I couldn't get it done.
target: Ka tifel thei lo.

source: And Leah said, Happy am I! and all women will give witness to my joy: and she gave him the name Asher.
target: Tin, Leaii chuan, Ka va nihlawh êm! Hmeichheho chuan nihlawh mi ti ngawt dâwn a nih hi, a ti a: tichuan a hmingah chuan Asera a sa a.

source: So the children of Benjamin saw that they were overcome: and the men of Israel had given way before Benjamin, putting their faith in the watchers who were to make the surprise attack on Gibeah.
target: Chutichuan Benjamina thlahte chuan an tlâwm ta tih an lo inhre ta a: Israela thlahte chuan Gibea khawbei tûra a ruka changtute an dah kha an rin avângin Benjamin-ho chu an han hnungtawlhsan a ni.

source: We'll look into the matter.
target: Kan en leh ang.

source: What were you saying
target: Eng nge i sawi a

source: But the king of Ai they made prisoner, and took him to Joshua.
target: Tin, Ai khaw lal chu anungin an man a, Josua hnenah an hruai a.

source: And Hathach came back and gave Esther an account of what Mordecai had said.
target: Tin, Hathaka chuan Mordekaia thuchahte chu Estheri a va hrilh a.

source: Who is moving the earth out of its place, so that its pillars are shaking:
target: Lei a hmunah a sawi nghing a, A bante chu a nghing dur dur a.

source: I wasn't wearing anything.
target: Engmah ka ha lo.

source: Did it hurt?
target: A tina che em?

source: See then that he has the honour which is right. But send him on his way in peace, so that he may come to me: for I am looking for him with the brothers.
target: Chuvangin, tuman hmusit suh se; ka hnena a lo kal theih nan thlamuang takin thlah zawk ang che u; unaute rualin amah lo hmuh ka beisei si a.

source: I'm a morning person.
target: Zing mi ka ni.

source: And he made strong prayers to him not to send them away out of the country.
target: Tin, chu mi ram ata chu anmahni tir chhuak lo turin Isua hnenah a ngen ta chiam a.

source: I'm wearing a new coat
target: Coat thar ka ha a

source: You're bossy
target: I thuneih hmel

source: We're even
target: Kan pangai e

source: And in your mercy put an end to my haters, and send destruction on all those who are against my soul; for I am your servant.
target: I ngilneihna avângin mi dotute chu tiboral la, Ka nuna timangangtu zawng zawng chu tiboral ang che; I chhiahhlawh ka ni si a.

source: Keep it up
target: Ti ṭha zêl teh

source: The uncontrolled are hated by the Lord, but those whose ways are without error are his delight
target: Mi rilru kawhmawhte chu Lalpa tana tenawm an ni a, An kawnga mi fel famkimte erawh chu a lawmzawng an ni.

source: We're being hunted
target: Kan man mek a ni

source: But in every nation, the man who has fear of him and does righteousness is pleasing to him.
target: nimahsela hnam tin zingah tupawh amah tiha fel taka ti apiang a lawmzawng mi an ni thin.

source: Were you guys serious?
target: In serious em ni?

source: I send up a cry to the Lord with my voice, and he gives me an answer from his holy hill. (Selah.
target: Ka awin LALPA chu ka au va, A tlâng thianghlim atangin mi chhâng thin a. Selah

source: He carried a cane.
target: Tiang a keng a.

source: I'm feeling drunk
target: Zu ruih ka inhria

source: Start here
target: Hetah tânrawh

source: Are you Tom
target: Toma i ni em

source: I'm watching that TV over there
target: Chu TV chu ka en a

source: And two others, evil-doers, were taken with him to be put to death.
target: Tin, a hnenah mi dang pahnih, mi sual, tihhlum turin an hruai ve a.

source: I've been laid off.
target: Ka ban tawh a ni.

source: He was with David at Pas-dammim, where the Philistines had come together for the fight, near a bit of land full of barley; and the people went in flight before the Philistines.
target: Ani chu barli awmna chuk, Philistia mite indo tûra infawk khawmna hmun Pas-dammim-ah khan Davida hnênah a awm a; tin, mipuite chu Philistia mite hmaah chuan an tlânchhe ta a.

source: I know about it already.
target: Ka hre tawh a ni.

source: You're my friends
target: Ka thiante in ni

source: He whose heart is turned away will have the reward of his ways in full measure; but a good man will have the reward of his doings.
target: Thinlunga hnungtawlh mi chu ama duh danin a khat ang a; Mi tha chu amah leh amah a intilungawi ang.

source: I am conscious that after I am gone, evil wolves will come in among you, doing damage to the flock;
target: Ka kal hnuin chinghne kawlhte in zingah an lo lut ang a, pawlho chu an zuah lo vang tih ka hria e.

source: That is mine
target: Kha kha ka tâ

source: But, if I do that which I have no mind to do, I am in agreement with the law that the law is good.
target: Ka tih duh lohzawng chu ka tih si chuan, Dan chu a tha tia awih ka ni ang asin.

source: Tom obeyed
target: Tom'an thu a awi

source: And to some give salvation, pulling them out of the fire; and on some have mercy with fear, hating even the clothing which is made unclean by the flesh.
target: thenkhat mei ata la chhuak thuai ula, chhandam rawh u; thenkhat an tisa bawlhhlawh kaina silhfen lam pawh chu tenin, hlau chungin khawngaih rawh u.

source: He can come
target: A lo kal thei

source: Don't fire anyone
target: Tumah ban suh

source: Did they find anything
target: Eng emaw an hmu em

source: You're a dream come true.
target: Mumang a ni.

source: Just be cool
target: Uluk rawh

source: And the son of Asa was Jehoshaphat; and the son of Jehoshaphat was Joram; and the son of Joram was Uzziah;
target: Asan Jehosaphata a hring a; Jehosaphatan Jehorama a hring a; Jehoraman Uzia a hring a;

source: Making foolish songs to the sound of corded instruments, and designing for themselves instruments of music, like David;
target: țingțanga dâwng dahna hlate sa a, Davida anga mahni tâna hla thlûk hmanruate siam a;

source: I'm getting thirsty
target: Ka tuihal a ni

source: What were they eating
target: Eng nge an ei a

source: When you go out to war and put your tents in position, keep from every evil thing.
target: In hmêlmate beia in va riahna hmuna chuan thi țha lo tinreng lakah in inthiarfihlim tur a ni.

source: I'm getting worse.
target: Ka na zual zêl a.

source: They are scant of money.
target: Sum an tlem hle.

source: Then Joshua gave them his blessing and sent them away: and they went back to their tents.
target: Chutichuan Josuan anmahni chu mal a sawm a, a kaltir ta a: tichuan an puan in lamahte an haw ta a.

source: What I say to you in the dark, say in the light: and what comes to your ear secretly, say publicly from the house-tops.
target: Thima ka hrilh che u hi engah sawi ang che u; beng bula in hriat hi in chunga chuangin tlangaupui ang che u.

source: And the spirit of God came on Azariah, the son of Oded;
target: Tin, Odeda fapa Azaria chungah Pathian thlarau a lo thleng a;

source: Let my thoughts be sweet to him: I will be glad in the Lord.
target: Ka ngaihtuahna hi a tan thlum ak ni rawh se; Kei chu LALPA-ah chuan ka hlim ang.

source: I should have won.
target: Ka chak tur a ni.

source: We're really busy
target: Kan buai takzet

source: You give me the name of Master and Lord: and you are right; that is what I am.
target: Nangnin Zirtirtu leh Lalpa mi ti thin; in tidik e, ka ni nge reng a.

source: Trust in God
target: Pathianah ring rawh

source: Quit it!
target: Bansan rawh.

source: Let them not say in their hearts, So we will have it: let them not say, We have put an end to him.
target: An rilru chuan, Chei! Chutiang chu alawm kan duh ni, ti suh se: Ani chu kan lem zo ta, ti hek suh se.

source: Then those who came first had the idea that they would get more; and they, like the rest, were given a penny.
target: Tin, a hmasa berte chu an lo kal chuan, hmuh tam deuh an inring a; nimahsela anni pawh chuan duli bawk an hmu theuh va.

source: I went for a walk.
target: Ka va kal a.

source: He gave in.
target: Hepa a rawn lut.

source: She never told me
target: Min hrilh ngai lo

source: In that day will the young growth of the Lord be beautiful in glory, and the fruit of the earth will be the pride of those who are still living in Israel.
target: Chu mi niah chuan LALPA peng chu mawi tak leh ropui takin a awm ang a, Israel-ho la damte tan chuan leia rahte chu tha tak leh mawi takin a awm ang.

source: And Chelub, the brother of Shuhah, was the father of Mehir, who was the father of Eshton.
target: Tin, Suha unaupa Keluban Mehira a hring a, chu mi chu Estona pa a ni.

source: And the priest will put these curses in a book, washing out the writing with the bitter water;
target: Tin, puithiam chuan chung anchhe thute chu lehkhabuah a ziak ang a, tuikhaah chuan a chiah tur ani;

source: Nobody was crying
target: Tumah an ṭap lo

source: As a servant desiring the shades of evening, and a workman looking for his payment:
target: Chhiahhlawh daihlim chak êm êm ang. Leh inhlawhfa a hlawh thlir rengtu ang hian,

source: Don't panic!
target: Chiai suh!

source: I'm not feeling particularly hungry.
target: Ka riltam bik lo.

source: I am a bad sailor.
target: Lawng khalhtu tha lo tak ka ni.

source: You seem sad
target: I lungngaih hmel

source: And the chance came when Herod on his birthday gave a feast to his lords, and the high captains, and the chief men of Galilee;
target: Tin, Herodan a pian champhaphak niah chuan a mi ropuihote, sipai hotu lianhote, Galili rama mi lianhote tana zana ruai a theh laiin hun remchang a lo awm ta a.

source: No man is able to come to me if the Father who sent me does not give him the desire to come: and I will take him up from the dead on the last day.
target: Pa mi tirtuin a hip loh chuan tumah ka hnenah an lo kal thei lo vang; tin, keiin ni kin niah chuan a lo kala chu ka kai tho vang.

source: You, whose clothing is warm, when the earth is quiet because of the south wind,
target: Chhim thli avânga lei a reh thiap a, I silhfen a lo lumzia te hi?

source: But put him to death without question; let your hand be the first stretched out against him to put him to death, and then the hands of all the people.
target: In tihlum ngei ngei tur a ni zawk a; a tihlum turin kut i thlâk hmasa ang a, chu mi hnuah mipui zawng zawngin.

source: I feel safe
target: Ka himin ka hria

source: Keep it warm
target: Lo tilum zêl rawh

source: And he was judge of Israel in the days of the Philistines for twenty years.
target: Tichuan Philistia-ho hun lai chuan Israelte chungah kum sâwmhnih ro a rêl a ni.

source: You are cut off from Christ, you who would have righteousness by the law; you are turned away from grace.
target: Nangni Dana thiam chan tumte u, Krista nen in inthen ta: khawngaihna chu in tluksan ta.

source: You're home early.
target: I haw hma a.

source: You have had no bread, or wine, or strong drink: so that you might see that I am the Lord your God.
target: Kei hi LALPA in Pathian ka ni tih in hriat theih nan chhang in ei lo va, uain pawh, zupui pawh in in lo va.

source: Have not you put us away, O God? and you have not gone out with our armies.
target: Aw Pathian, nangmah ngeiin min thlauhthla a ni lâwm ni? Aw Pathian, ka sipaihote hnênah lah i chhuak ve ta si lo.

source: They will not see the land about which I made an oath to their fathers; not one of these by whom I have not been honoured will see it.
target: an thlahtute hnena chhechhama ka tiam ram chu an hmu tawp lo vang a; an zinga mi ngaineptu reng rengte pawhin an hmu bawk hek lo vang:

target: Coat a ha lo

source: And gave the blood of their sons and their daughters who had done no wrong, offering them to the images of Canaan; and the land was made unclean with blood.
target: Thisen sawiselbo, an fapate leh an fanute thisen ngei chu an chuah ta a. Chungho chu Kanaan ram milemte hnênah an inthawi a; Chu mi ram chu thisenin a lo bawlhhlawh ta a.

source: And they put his war-dress in the house of their gods, and put up his head in the house of Dagon.
target: Tin, a râlthuam chu an pathiante inah an dah a, a lu chu Dagona inah an tar a.

source: You let your people go for nothing; your wealth is not increased by their price.
target: I mite hi engmah lovah i hralh a, An man chu i hausakpui chuang si lo.

source: He was busy
target: A buai

source: For the foolish, when they took their lights, took no oil with them.
target: A ate chuan an khawvarte an kenin, a tui an keng tel si lo va;

source: They're all excited
target: An phur vek tawh

source: We'll capture them.
target: Kan man ang.

source: We should go home
target: Kan haw tur a ni

source: Now Jesus had not at this time come into the town, but was still in the place where Martha had seen him.
target: Isua chu khuaah a la lut lo va, Marthiin a va hmuah laia a awmna ngaiah a la awm a.

source: Do not call him master.
target: Pu ti suh.

source: They will be crying out together like lions, their voices will be like the voices of young lions.
target: Sakeibaknei vanglai angin an huk dum dum ang a, Sakeibaknei no angin an hram tuar tuar ang.

source: Their souls became feeble for need of food and drink.
target: Riltam leh tuihalin An nunna hchu an kawchhûngah a chau ta a.

source: I have time
target: Hun ka nei

source: They were taken prisoner
target: An man ta a ni

source: While your hand is stretched out to do works of mercy; so that signs and wonders may be done through the name of your holy servant Jesus.
target: mite tidam turin nangin i kut phar ang che; i chhiahhlawh thianghlim Isua hming avangin chhinchhiahna leh thilmak takte tihtir bawk ang che, an ti a.

source: But the heart of the people was not turned to him who sent punishment on them, and they made no prayer to the Lord of armies.
target: Nimahsela mite chuan anmahni vawtu lam chu an hawi chuang si lo va, sipaihote LALPA chu an zawng chuang hek lo.

source: Do you want to look into it?
target: I enfiah duh em?

source: And the time of Jehu's rule over Israel in Samaria was twenty-eight years.
target: Tin, Samari rama Israelte chunga Jehua rorêl chhûng chu kum sâwmhnih leh kum riat a ni.

source: And these are the outskirts of the town: on the north side, four thousand five hundred by measure;
target: Tin, hengte hi khawpui ata chhuahna te chu an ni; hmâr lampang tawng sângli leh zangaah chuan kawngka pathum

source: You boiled nothing.
target: Engmah i boil lo.

source: She is cruel to her young ones, as if they were not hers; her work is to no purpose; she has no fear.
target: Ama no ni lo ang hrimin a note lakah a inchhu ngawng a, A thiltih chu a thlawn dawn emaw, a pawisa chuang lo.

source: And he has been our guide to this place, and has given us this land, a land flowing with milk and honey.
target: he hmunah hianminhruai lut a, he ram, bawnghnute leh khawizu luanna ram hi min p a.

source: We saw Tom
target: Tom kan hmu

source: I think they look good
target: An hmel tha ka ti

source: And he will send out his angels with a great sound of a horn, and they will get his saints together from the four winds, from one end of heaven to the other.
target: Tin, a vantirhkohte chu, tawtawrawt ri nasa tak nen a tir chhuak ang. Anni chuan a thlante chu kawl kil li ata – van tawp atanga a tawp lehlam thlengin – a lawr khawm ang.

source: He who has no love has no knowledge of God, because God is love.
target: Hmangaihna nei lo chuan Pathian a hre lo; Pathian chu hmangaihna a ni si a.

source: And I saw a new heaven and a new earth: for the first heaven and the first earth were gone; and there was no more sea.
target: Tin, van thar leh lei thar ka hmu a; van hmasa leh lei hmasa chu an boral tawh a, tuifinriat pawh a awm tawh lo a ni.

source: We're moving
target: Kan kal mêk e

source: And he took a cup, and when he had given praise, he gave it to them: and they all had a drink from it.
target: Tin, no a la a, lawmthu a sawi zawhin an hnenah a pe a; tichuan an zain an in ta theuh va.

source: I relaxed.
target: Ka intiharh.

source: We talked
target: Kan sawi tawh

source: How pathetic!
target: A khawngaihthlâk

source: I'm not fooling around.
target: Ka bum lo a ni.

source: I'm ready.
target: Ka inpeih.

source: I waved.
target: Ka vai.

source: We care
target: Kan ngaihsak

source: But they have been walking in the pride of their hearts, going after the Baals, as their fathers gave them teaching.
target: an thinlung khauh zawm a, an thlahtuten an zirtir Baalate chu an um tak zawk avângin;

source: They haven't beaten us yet.
target: Min la vuak lo.

source: In the same way these dreamers make the flesh unclean, having no respect for authorities, and say evil of rulers.
target: Nimahsela, chung mite pawh chuan chutiang bawkin an mumang avangin an tisa chu an tibawlhhlawh a, Lalpa thuneihna chu an pawisa lo va, ropuinate an sawichhia a.

source: Are you OK with this?
target: Hei hi i OK em?

source: And will be a Father to you; and you will be my sons and daughters, says the Lord, the Ruler of all.
target: In tan Pa ka ni ang a, Nangni pawh ka tan fanu fapa in ni ang,’ Lalpa Engkimtitheia chuan a ti,

source: Do you wish to stay?
target: I awm duh em?

source: You didn't listen.
target: I ngaithla lo.

source: Tom knits.
target: Tom-an a thui.

source: It's almost ready
target: A inpeih tawh

source: Who's free?
target: Tunge hman?

source: Let's lock her up.
target: I lock up ang u.

source: You never responded.
target: I chhang ngai lo.

source: The landmarks are changed by evil men, they violently take away flocks, together with their keepers.
target: Amah hretuten engah nge a nite an hmuh loh? Ri sawn chinge an awm a, Ran rual an man lui a, an vulh a.

source: Let him give me the kisses of his mouth: for his love is better than wine.
target: Min fâwp rawh se, a hmuia fawhnate chuan, Uain hnehin a tha si, i hmangaihna.

source: And the Lord your God will put all these curses on those who are against you, and on your haters who put a cruel yoke on you.
target: Tin, LALPA in Pathianin heng ânchhia zawng zawngte hi a tiduhdahtu che u, in hmêlmate leh a hawtu che u chungah a awmtir ang.

source: And when you give a peace offering to the Lord, do it in the way which is pleasing to the Lord.
target: Tin, LALPA tana remna thilhlana in inthawi hunin pawm tiak ni turin in hlan tur a ni.

source: Then I will send punishment on them for their sin; my rod will be the reward of their evil-doing.
target: An bawhchhiatnate chu tiangin ka rawn kan ang a, An khawlohnate chu vuakin ka rawn kan ang.

source: If the death of a son or of a daughter has been caused, the punishment is to be in agreement with this rule.
target: Mi fapa emaw, mi fanu emaw pawh lo sihlum ni sela, hetiang dân bawk hian rêl tûr a ni.

source: And they took Asahel's body and put it in the last resting-place of his father in Beth-lehem. And Joab and his men, travelling all night, came to Hebron at dawn.
target: Chutichuan Asahela ruang chu an la a, Bethlehem-a a pa thlanah an phûm a. Tin, Joaba leh a mite chu zankhuain an kal a, Hebron an thlenin khua a vâr a.

source: So when the people saw that Jesus was not there, or his disciples, they got into those boats and went over to Capernaum looking for Jesus.
target: Chutichuan,mipui chuan Isua leh a zirtirte chu an awm ta lo tih an hriatin, anni pawh lawng teahte chuan an chuang a, Isua zawngin Kapernaum khua an lo thleng a.

source: This is food
target: Hei hi chaw a ni

source: But if in those lands you are turned again to the Lord your God, searching for him with all your heart and soul, he will not keep himself from you.
target: Nimahsela chutah pawh chuan LALPA in Pathian chu in zawn a, in thinlung zawng zawng leh in rilru zawng zawnga in zawn chuan in hmu leh ang.

source: It is an old disease in the skin of his flesh, and the priest will say that he is unclean; he will not have to be shut up, for he is clearly unclean.
target: phâr benvawn a tisaah a awm a ni a, puithiamin a bawlhhlawh tih a puang ang a, khung hran tur a ni lo va, bawlhhlawh a ni si a.

source: Others said, These are not the words of one who has an evil spirit. Is it possible for an evil spirit to make blind people see?
target: A thenin, Heng thu hi ramhuai zawl thusawi a ni lo ve. Ramhuaiin mitdel mit a tivar thei em ni? an ti a.

source: Do you have money
target: Sum i nei em

source: I didn't cry
target: Ka ṭap miah lo

source: Can you pick it up?
target: I la thei ang em?

source: And Gilead, and the land of the Geshurites and the Maacathites, and all Mount Hermon, and all Bashan to Salecah;
target: tin, Gilead ram leh Gesur-ho leh Maakat-ho ramri chin leh Hermon tlang zawng zawng leh Basan ram zawng zawng, Salka khaw thlengin;

source: I have put off my coat; how may I put it on? My feet are washed; how may I make them unclean?
target: Ka kawr ka hlip ta, engah nge ka hak ang? Ka ke ka sil ta, engah nge ka tihbawlhhlawh ang?

source: You are something
target: Thil pakhat i ni

source: I am who I am.
target: Ka nih ang ang ka ni mai.

source: Let's get a drink
target: In tur i la ang u

source: Then the king's servants who were in the king's house said to Mordecai, Why do you go against the king's order?
target: Tin, lal mite, lal kawt hnung kawngkaa awm zawng zawngte chuan Moedekaia hnênah,Engati nge lal thupêk i bawhchhiat? an ti a.

source: I ain't got nobody
target: Tumah ka nei lo

source: For the arms of the evil-doers will be broken: but the Lord is the support of the good.
target: Mi suaksual bante chu tihtliahin a awm dawn si a: Mi fel erawh chu LALPAN a chelh reng thin.

source: They cheered
target: An lâwm hle

source: And at dawn the men, with their asses, were sent away.
target: Tin, khua a vâr veleh anni chu an sabengtungte nên chuan an kaltîr ta a.

source: Whom then is God like, in your opinion? or what will you put forward as a comparison with him?
target: Pathian chu tu nên nge in tehkhin dawn le? A nih loh leh, eng lem nge amah nên in tehkhin dawn le?

source: But he who is unclean when he takes as food the flesh of the peace-offerings, which are the Lord's, will be cut off from his people.
target: remna thilhlan inthawina sa, LALPA chanpual, thianghlim lo chunga eitu erawh chu, chu mi chu a chipuite zing ata tuithlarin a awm tur a ni.

source: Pharaoh, king of Egypt, and his servants and his princes and all his people;
target: Aigupta lal Pharaoa leh a chhiahhlawh te, a hotute leh ami zawng zawng te;

source: Give ear, you whose ears are shut; and let your eyes be open, you blind, so that you may see.
target: Bengngawngte u, bengin hre rawh u; mitdelte u, in hmuh theih nân en rawh u.

source: May my arm be pulled from my body, and be broken from its base.
target: Ka kovi hi ka dar saipheng nên phawk hlawk sela, Ka ban hi khingkhangruh atangin thlawn hlauh rawh se

source: But still some of you have no faith. For it was clear to Jesus from the first who they were who had no faith, and who it was who would be false to him.
target: Nimahsela in zingah a then ring lo in awm e, a ti a. Isuan a ring lotute leh a mantirtu tur chu a tir ata a hre reng si.

source: He did not say this of himself, but being the high priest that year he said, as a prophet, that Jesus would be put to death for the nation;
target: Chu thu chu ama phuahchawpin a sawi lo, chu mi kum chuan Puithiam Lalber a ni a, an chite aia Isua a thih tur thu a sawi lawk a ni zawk e.

source: Give thought to my grief and my pain; and take away all my sins.
target: Ka hreawmzia leh ka manganzia hi ngaihtuah la, Ka sual zawng zawng ngaidam ang che.

source: You idiot!
target: Nang mimawl.

source: I felt awful
target: Rapthlak ka inti

source: A true witness is the saviour of lives; but he who says false things is a cause of deceit.
target: Hretu dik chuan mite a chhanchhuak a, Dâwt chhak chhuak mi chuan bumna a tichhuak thin.

source: They resumed walking
target: An kal leh ta a

source: And the servant-wife he had in Shechem had a son by him, to whom he gave the name Abimelech.
target: Tin, Sekem khuaa a hmeiin fapa a hrinsak bawk a, a hmingah Abimeleka a sa a.

source: And they all had baptism from Moses in the cloud and in the sea;
target: an zaa chhumah leh tuifinriatah pawh Mosia bel tura baptisa an awm vek a,

source: Against whom the chief priests and the rulers of the Jews made a statement when I was at Jerusalem, requesting me to give a decision against him.
target: Jerusalem khuaa ka awm lai khan puithiam lalte leh Juda upaten a chungchang thu mi hrilh a, thiam loh chantir an ngen a.

source: You are my secret place and my breastplate against danger; my hope is in your word.
target: Nang chu ka bihrûkna hmun leh ka phaw i ni a: I thu ka beisei a ni.

source: And in Gibeon was living the father of Gibeon, Jeiel, whose wife's name was Maacah;
target: Tin, Gibeon-ah chuan Gibeon-ho thlahtu Jeiela a awm a, A nupuia hming chu Maaki a ni

source: And Mary Magdalene was there, and the other Mary, seated by the place of the dead.
target: Tin, chutah chuan Mari Magdalini leh Mari dang chu an awm a, thlan hma zawnah chuan an thu a.

source: O God, let their teeth be broken in their mouths; let the great teeth of the young lions be pulled out, O Lord.
target: Aw Pathian, an kaah chuan an hate chu tibal la: Aw LALPA, Sakeibaknei vanglaite ha lian pui puite chu kher chhuak chhuak ang che.

source: And he took him up and let him see all the kingdoms of the earth in a minute of time.
target: Tin, a hruai chho va, mit khap kar lovah khawvel ram zawng zawng a entir a.

source: Your way, O God, is holy: what god is so great as our God?
target: Aw Pathian, i kawng chu hmun thianghlimah a awm a: Kan Pathian ang hi pathian ropui tunge awm?

source: Dial leh rawh, Tom.
target: Dial it back, Tom.

source: Yes i am fine
target: Aw ka dam ṭha e

source: But come back, now, all of you, come; and I will not see a wise man among you.
target: In zain lo kir ula, lo kal teh u, In zingah mi fing ka hmu chuang lo vang.

source: And let every wise-hearted man among you come and make whatever has been ordered by the Lord;
target: Tin, in zinga mi themthiam apiang chu lo kal sela, LALPAN siam tura thu a pêk apiang chu siam rawh se;

source: He who is kind will have a blessing, for he gives of his bread to the poor.
target: Mi thilphal chu malsawmin a awm ang, A chhâng mi rethei a pêk thin avângin.

source: Don't cancel anything yet.
target: Engmah cancel suh.

source: So let me see.
target: Chuvangin ka en ang.

source: Eye disease
target: Mit natna

source: Has any one of the gods of the nations kept his land from falling into the hands of the king of Assyria?
target: Hnam tinte pathian zawng zawng zinga mi rêng rêngin an ram chu Assuria lal lakah an chhanhim tawh ngai êm ni?

source: And the sons of Onam were Shammai and Jada; and the sons of Shammai: Nadab and Abishur.
target: Tin, Onama fapate chu Samaia leh Jada an ni a; tin, Samaia fapater chu nadaba leh Abisura an ni.

source: Let's get things started.
target: Thil i tan ang u.

source: I can sing.
target: Hla ka sa thei.

source: I don't find a formula.
target: Formula ka hmu lo.

source: And if your offering is of meal cooked in fat over the fire, let it be made of the best meal mixed with oil.
target: Tin, i thillan chu kanbela kan, chhangphut thilhlan a nih chuan changphut dip tak leh hriaka siam a ni tur a ni.

source: And not one of these got the good things of the agreement, though they all had a good record through faith,
target: Tin, chung zawng zawngte chuan rinna avnga fak lo hlawh tawhin, thiltiam chu an chang lo va,

source: Who fell?
target: Tunge tlu?

source: I normal lo a ni
target: You're not normal

source: I'm brave.
target: Ka huaisen.

source: And if a man's seed goes out from him, then all his body will have to be bathed in water and he will be unclean till evening.
target: Tupawh inpâwlna chi amah atanga a chhuah chuan a pumin a inbual vek tur a ni a, tlai lam thlengin a bawlhhlawh ang,

source: I admire them both
target: An pahnih hian ka ngaisang hle

source: For the people of Israel and the people of Judah have been very false to me, says the Lord.
target: Israel chhûngte leh Juda chhûngte chuan, Ka chungah vervek takin an ti si a, Tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: And he is not dependent on the work of men's hands, as if he had need of anything, for he himself gives to all life and breath and all things;
target: thil tlachham angin mihring kuta rawngbawlsakin a awm hek lo, amah ngei chu engkim hnena nunnate, thawknate leh thil zawng zawngte petu a ni zawk e.

source: The second Trouble is past: see, the third Trouble comes quickly.
target: Chungpikna pahnihna chu a reh tawh a, ngai teh, Chungpikna pathumna chu a lo awm lawk dawn e.

source: With what care are your ways ordered when you are looking for love! so ... your ways.
target: Ngaizâwngtu hmuh theihna tûrin i awm dân i va uluk ve! Hmeichhe sual hnênahte pawh i awm dân i zirtir tâk hi.

source: I cry a lot
target: Ka tap nasa

source: I don't eat dark meat.
target: Sa dum ka ei lo.

source: He went home on foot.
target: Kein a haw ta a.

source: We're calm
target: Kan inbengdai tawh

source: Sami is waking up
target: Sami chu a harh a

source: Do you drink
target: Zu i in em

source: I goofed
target: Ka tisual e

source: And they were all surprised and in doubt saying to one another, What is the reason of this?
target: Tin, an za chuan mak an ti hle mai a, a ngaihna an hre lo va, Heng hi engtizia nge ni? an inti a.

source: You let them down
target: Anmahni chu i ti beidawng a ni

source: And a certain ruler put a question to him, saying, Good Master, what have I to do so that I may have eternal life?
target: Tin, hotu tuin emaw a hnenah, Zirtirtu tha, chatuana nunna channa turin engtin nge ka tih ang? tiin a zawt a.

source: He is greatly in fear of the dark day, trouble and pain overcome him:
target: Hreawmna leh thawpikna chuan a tihlau va; Lal inpeihsain indona a hneh angin amah an hneh a;

source: Are you afraid of blood
target: Thisen i hlau em

source: You're unambitious
target: I tumruh lo

source: Put your life in the hands of the Lord; have faith in him and he will do it.
target: I awm dan tûr chu LALPA chungah nghat la; Amah chu ring la, aman a ti vek ang.

source: I drop mai ang u.
target: Let's just drop it.

source: I was watching TV at night.
target: Zanah TV ka en a.

source: Now get in
target: Tunah lût rawh

source: We found one
target: Pakhat kan hmu

source: And the Lord came down to see the town and the tower which the children of men were building.
target: Tin, LALPA chu mihring faten khawpui leh in sâng an siam vêl chu en tûrin a zuk chhuk a.

source: And the child at the breast will be playing by the hole of the snake, and the older child will put his hand on the bright eye of the poison-snake.
target: Tin, nau hnute hne lai chu rulrial kaw kotlângah a tualchai ang a, nau hnute hnêk bâng tawh chuan rûlmuk tawmkûk kotlângah a kut a nghat ang.

source: You're very sweet
target: I thlum hle mai

source: And they took their cattle and all the goods which they had got in the land of Canaan, and came to Egypt, even Jacob and all his seed:
target: Tichuan Jakoba leh a thlahte zawng zawng chuan Kanaan rama an dehchhuah an rante leh an bungruate chu an chhawm a, Aigupta ram chu an thleng ta a:

source: And he gave him no answer, not even a word: so that the ruler was greatly surprised.
target: Tin, kam khat mahin a chhang lo va; chutichuan Ram Awptu chuan mak a ti hle a.

source: And put an end to all the plants of their land, taking all the fruit of the earth for food.
target: Chunge chuan an rama thlai tinrenget chu an ei zova, An lei rahte pawh an ei zo ta bawk a.

source: You have rule over the sea in storm; when its waves are troubled, you make them calm.
target: Nang chuan tuifinriat chapona chungah ro i rel thin a: A tuifawn invawrh laite chu i tireh thin.

source: In the past you put the earth on its base, and the heavens are the work of your hands.
target: Leilung nghahchhan chu hmasânga i phûm tawh ani a; Vante pawh i kut chhuak a ni.

source: They are bent down and made low; but we have been lifted up.
target: Anni zawng an kun a, an tlu ta a: Keini erawh chu kan tho va, kan ding mar ta zawk a.

source: And it will be unbroken day, such as the Lord has knowledge of, without change of day and night, and even at nightfall it will be light.
target: Mahse chumi nî chu LALPA chauhvin a hria. Chhûn ni lo zân ni lo; tlai lamah erawh chuan êng a lo awm ang.

source: I don't cause trouble.
target: Buaina ka siam lo.

source: They are commissioned.
target: Commission an ni.

source: Be pointed to the right, to the left, wherever your edge is ordered.
target: Invilikin che vâk ang che, ding lamah, Invilikin vei lamah pawh vai zel la, I hma zawn apiangah pawh.

source: So they came together at Jerusalem in the third month, in the fifteenth year of the rule of Asa.
target: Chutichuan Asa kum sâwm leh kum nga a lal ku, a thla thumnaah Jerusalem-ah an pung khâwm chiam a.

source: This is insufficient
target: Hei hi a tawk lo

source: Now when Rehoboam's position as king had been made certain, and he was strong, he gave up the law of the Lord, and all Israel with him.
target: Tin, Rehohoma chu a lo lal ngheh tak chinah chuan a lama tang Israel-ho zawng zawng nen, LALPA dan chu an hawisan ta a.

source: Then the tribe of Gad, with Eliasaph, son of Reuel, as their chief.
target: Tin, Gad chite: ngada thlate puipa tur chu Reuela fapa Eliasapha a ni ang:

source: And Pilate put on the cross a statement in writing. The writing was: JESUS THE NAZARENE, THE KING OF THE JEWS.
target: Tin, Pilatan lehkha a ziak a, kraws ler lamah a bel a. ‘Nazareth Isua Judate Lal,’ tiin a ziak a ni.

source: I have never gone against the orders of his lips; the words of his mouth have been stored up in my heart.
target: A kamchhuak thupêk chu ka pensan lo va, A kaa thute chu ka dan aiin ka roh zawk a.

source: He got up in the morning.
target: Zingah a tho va.

source: Then he took the responsible men of the town and had them crushed on a bed of thorns and sharp stems.
target: Tichuan chu mi khaw upate chu a man a, thlaler hling leh hnimhlingneite chuan Sukoth mite chu a zirtir a.

source: I'm in India
target: India ah ka awm

source: I will not allow myself to be fooled
target: Bum ka phal lovang

source: How many people died
target: Mi engzat nge thi

source: As for man, the son of woman, his days are short and full of trouble.
target: Hmeichhe hrin tawh mihring phwt chu Rei lo te dam, buainaa khat a ni.

source: You are right
target: I dik dik e

source: With his peace-offering let him give cakes of leavened bread, as a praise-offering.
target: Lawmthu sawi nana a remna thilhlan inthawinaah chuan chhang dawidim telh a hlan tel tur a ni.

source: We're dating
target: Kan inrim mek

source: It will burn
target: A kâng dawn

source: And Judah said to him, The man said to us with an oath, You are not to come before me again without your brother.
target: Tichuan Juda chuan a hnênah, Chu mi chuan, 'In nau in hnêna a tel loh chuan ka hmêl in hmu lo vang,' tiin min tiam tlat a ni.

source: But your hearts are full of sorrow because I have said these things.
target: Heng thu in hnena ka sawi avangin in thinlung chu lungngaiin a khat thlu hial ta zawk a.

source: And they went on from Zalmonah, and put up their tents in Punon.
target: Tin, Zalmon ațang chuan an chhuak a, Punon-ah awmhmun an khuar a.

source: Of the sons of Kohath: Uriel the chief, and his brothers, a hundred and twenty;
target: Kohatha thlahte zinga mi, puipa ber Uriela, a unaute nen za leh sawm hnih;

source: And here he has authority from the chief priests to make prisoners all who give worship to your name.
target: tin, hetah pawh i hming lam apiang phuarna turin puithiam lalte hnen ata thu a hmu reng asin, a ti a, a chhang a.

source: Don't worry
target: Lungngai suh

source: They are not transgressive
target: Bawhchhia an ni lo

source: Be confident
target: Inringtâwk rawh

source: And Jesse made his seven sons come before Samuel. And Samuel said to Jesse, The Lord has not taken any of these.
target: Tichuan Jesaia chuan a fapate pasarih Samuela hmaah chuan a kaltir a. Tin, Samuela chuan Jesaia hnênah, LALPAN hengho hi a thlang lo a ni, a ti a.

source: There are people out there.
target: Mi an awm pawn.

source: I don't give a shit.
target: Shit ka pe lo.

source: Pain and trouble have overcome me: but your teachings are my delight.
target: Manganna leh thlaphanna chuan mi tlakbuak ta a: Nimahsela i thupêkte hi ka lawmna a ni.

source: One day the trees went out to make a king for themselves; and they said to the olive-tree, Be king over us.
target: Vawikhat chu thing hi an lal atâna hriak thih tûrin an va chhuak a; olive thing hnênah hian, 'Nang kan lalah awm ta che,' an ti a.

source: The memory of the upright is a blessing, but the name of the evil-doer will be turned to dust.
target: Mi fel hriat rengna chu malsawmna ani a, Mi suaksual hming erawh chu a tawih ral ang.

source: So that they might put their hope in God, and not let God's works go out of their minds, but keep his laws;
target: An beiseina chu Pathianah an nghah theih a, Pathian thiltihte chu an theihnghilh loh va, A thupêkte chu an zawm zawk nân:

source: They were burned at the stake.
target: Tiangah an hal a.

source: She was not invited.
target: Sawm a ni lo.

source: Do not keep back your offerings from the wealth of your grain and your vines. The first of your sons you are to give to me.
target: I thlai thar hmasa ber leh i uain tui tla hmasa ber chu i hlân var tûr a ni. I fapa upa ber chu mi pe tûr a ni.

source: I wasn't impressed
target: Ka ngaihsan lo

source: What are you going to buy
target: Eng nge i lei dawn

source: I made it
target: Ka tithei e

source: Your very life will be hanging in doubt before you, and day and night will be dark with fears, and nothing in life will be certain:
target: in nunna chu hlauthawng reng rengin a awm ang a, chhun leh zan hlau reng rengin in awm ang a, in nunnain ngaihngam taka awm a nei lo vang,

source: Because of this my heart is glad, and my glory is full of joy: while my flesh takes its rest in hope.
target: Chu vangin ka thinlung hi a lawm a, ka ropuina hi a hlim a: Ka tisa pawh him takin a awm ang.

source: But you may get servants as property from among the nations round about; from them you may take men-servants and women-servants.
target: Bawihnu leh bawihpaa I neih turte hu in vel hnam zinga mi, bawih nu leh bawihpa atan chuan in lei tur a ni.

source: But she was not scared.
target: Mahse, a hlau lo.

source: And the disciples came and said to him, Why do you say things to them in the form of stories?
target: Tin, zirtirte chu an lo kal a, a hnenah, Engatinge an hnenah tehkhin thuin i sawi? an ti a.

source: But Philip came to Azotus, and went through all the towns, preaching the good news, till he came to Caesarea.
target: Nimahsela Philipa chu miin Azota khuaah an hmu leh ta a; tin, a kal tlang a, Kaisari khaw thlengin khaw tinah Chanchin Tha chu a hril zel a.

source: It's strange
target: A mak lutuk

source: The TV doesn't work.
target: TV a thawk lo.

source: I could help
target: Ka pui thei

source: It's very strange
target: A mak hle mai

source: The upright man is a hater of false words: the evil-doer gets a bad name and is put to shame.
target: Mi fel chuan dawt a hua a, Mi suaksual erawh chu a renawm a, mualphona a thlen thin.

source: And Azariah was the father of Seraiah, and Seraiah was the father of Jehozadak;
target: tin, Azarian Seraia a hring a, tin, Seraian Jehozadaka a hring a;

source: Give me my wives and my children, for whom I have been your servant, and let me go: for you have knowledge of all the work I have done for you.
target: I rawng ka bâwl chhan ka nupuite leh ka fate hi mi pe la, mi kaltîr rawh; i rawng ka bâwlsakzia che chu i hre si a, a ti a.

source: You aren't smiling
target: I nui lo a ni

source: How many people were in attendance
target: Mi engzat nge kal

source: All the people who came out had undergone circumcision; but all the people whose birth had taken place in the waste land on their journey from Egypt had not.
target: Aigupta ram ata chhuakho zawng zawngte kha chu serhtan sa vek an ni a: amaherawhchu Aigupta ram ata an chhuaha thlalera kawng laa piang zawng zawngte kha chu serhtan an ni ve lo.

source: I'm very shy
target: Ka zak lutuk

source: I can feel it.
target: Hriatna ka nei.

source: But you would have nothing to do with the Holy and Upright One, and made request for a man of blood to be given to you,
target: Mi Thianghlim leh Fel tak kha in duh lo va, tualthattu kha in hnena pek in ngen ta zawk a.

source: I can now do that.
target: Tunah chuan chu chu ka ti thei tawh ang.

source: Then the armed men were for putting the prisoners to death, so that no one would get away by swimming.
target: Tin, sipaiten mi tangte chu tihhlum an rawt a, chutilochuan tui hleuh kaite an awm ang a, an tlanbo vang tih an hlau va.

source: They don't want the truth.
target: Thudik an duh lo.

source: But about the things of the spirit, my brothers, it is not right for you to be without teaching.
target: Tin, unaute u, thlarau lam thilpek thute chu in hriat loh ka duh lo ve.

source: So the Lord God sent them away into every part of the earth: and they gave up building their town.
target: Chutichuan LALPAN anniho chu chuta tang chuan lei zawng zawngah chuan a tidarh a: tichuan an khawsiam chu an bânsan ta a.

source: I forgot it
target: Ka theihnghilh tawh

source: What were you there for
target: Eng atan nge i awm

source: Then Gideon came to Jordan and went over it with his three hundred, overcome with weariness and in need of food.
target: Tin, Gideona leh a hnêna mi zathum awmte chuan Jorda lui chu an zuk thleng a, an kan a, chu chung chungin an um zel a.

source: So we said, Let us now make an altar for ourselves, not for burned offerings or for the offerings of beasts:
target: Chuvangin, 'hawh u, maichâm i siam teh ang u, halral thilhlan nan leh inthawi nan erawh chu ni lovin:

source: And if it is not so, now, who will make it clear that my words are false, and that what I say is of no value?
target: Tunah chuti ni suh sela, tunge daw mi ti thei ang a, Ka tawng kha engmah lovah sawi thei ang.

source: And after three days and a half the breath of life from God went into them, and they got up on their feet; and great fear came on those who saw them.
target: Tin, ni thum leh a chanve hnuah chuan Pathian hnen ata nunna thaw chu an chhungah a lo lut a, an kein an ding ta a; tichuan a hmutute chuan an hlau ta em em a.

source: And not be like their fathers, a stiff-necked and uncontrolled generation; a generation whose heart was hard, whose spirit was not true to God.
target: Leh, an thlahtute anga, Chhuan luhlul leh helhmang; Chhuan thinlung siam dik lo, Pathian laka rilru rinawm lo pua an awm loh nân.

source: The property of the man of wealth is his strong town: the poor man's need is his destruction.
target: Mi hausa sum chu a khawpui nghet a ni a; Mi rethei boralna chu an pachhiatna a ni.

source: And Salmon became the father of Boaz, and Boaz became the father of Obed;
target: tin, Salmona chuan Boaza a ring a, tin, Boaza chua Obeda a hring a;

source: It is in my bag.
target: Ka bag-ah a awm.

source: These are the waters of Meribah; because the children of Israel went against the Lord, and they saw that he was holy among them.
target: Hei hi Meriba tuite chu a ni; Israela thlahte chuan LALPA chu an bei vak a, chutah chuan chawimawiin a awm tak avangin.

source: Keep all the laws of men because of the Lord; those of the king, who is over all,
target: Lalpa avang chuan mihring ruat apiangte hnenah intulut rawh u, chungnunga awm lalber hnenah emaw,

source: It's a German name
target: German hming a ni

source: He's not feeling well
target: A dam ṭha vak lova

source: Oh, be quiet
target: Oh, ngawi teh

source: And every open vessel without a cover fixed on it will be unclean.
target: Tin, bungbel inhawng, a chhinaa chhin loh apiang chu a bawlhhlawh a ni.

source: What shirt is pink?
target: Eng kawr nge pink?

source: Is this appropriate
target: Hei hi a inhmeh em

source: Make sounds of grief, son of man; with body bent and a bitter heart make sounds of grief before their eyes.
target: Chuvangin nang mihring fapa, rûm vawng vawng la, lungchhe takin an mithmuhahrûm rawh.

source: For you are great, and do great works of wonder; you only are God.
target: Nang chu i ropui si a, thilmakte i ti bawk thin a: Nangmah chauh hi Pathian i ni.

source: Ten times now you have made sport of me; it gives you no sense of shame to do me wrong.
target: Vawi samw lai mi dem chhe ta a. Tha lo taka ka chunga tih hi in zak hek lo.

source: But they had no fear and gave no signs of grief, not the king or any of his servants, after hearing all these words.
target: Tin, lal leh a rawngbawltu, heng thu zawng zawng ngaithlatu tumahin an hlau lo va, an silhfên an thlêr hek lo.

source: I'm paying
target: Ka infiam mek

source: Don't smile
target: Nui suh

source: Plating it inside and out with the best gold, and putting an edge of gold all round it.
target: tin, a chu leh a pawn chu rangkachak hlir hlak tiin a luan a, tin, rangkachakin a tlâng a kawm a.

source: It is already nine o'clock.
target: Dar kua a ri tawh.

source: And Shaaph, the father of Madmannah, Sheva, the father of Machbena and the father of Gibea; and Caleb's daughter was Achsah. These were the sons of Caleb.
target: Madmana pa Saap leh Makbena leh Gibea pa Seva a hring bawk a; tin, Kaleba fanu chu Aksi a ni.

source: He's out of time.
target: A hun a tawp tawh.

source: And you said, I will be a queen for ever: you did not give attention to these things, and did not keep in mind what would come after.
target: Tin, Kei hi kumkhuain lalnuah ka awm ang, i ti a: chutichuan chung thilte chu i rilruin i ngaihtuah lo va, a tawpna tûr lah chu i hre reng hek lo.

source: And they sent out a number of evil spirits, and put oil on a great number who were ill, and made them well.
target: ramhuai tam tak pawh an hnawt chhuak a, dam lo tam tak pawh hriak an hnawih a, an tidam bawk a.

source: And they came to Beth-saida. And they took a blind man to him, requesting him to put his hands on him.
target: Tin, Bethsaida khua chu an lo thleng a. Tin, a hnenah mitdel an rawn hruai a, amah dek turin an ngen a.

source: They'll wait
target: Min lo nghâk ang

source: Tom called
target: Toman a ko

source: And Jesus, having knowledge in his spirit of their thoughts, said to them, Why are you reasoning about these things in your hearts?
target: Tin, Isuan an rilruin chutiangin an ngaihtuah tih a rilruin a lo hre ta nghal a, an hnenah, Chung thu chu engati nge in thinlunga in ngaihtuah ni?

source: She doesn't talk to me anymore.
target: Min bia tawh lo.

source: So that your ear gives attention to wisdom, and your heart is turned to knowledge;
target: Finna lama i beng i chhit a, I thinlung hriatna lam atân i pêk chuan;

source: Here we are!
target: Hei kan awm!

source: And the son of Solomon was Rehoboam; and the son of Rehoboam was Abijah; and the son of Abijah was Asa;
target: Solomonan Rehoboama a hring a; Rehoboaman Abia a hring a; Abian Asa a hring a;

source: Then Jeremiah said to them, This is what you are to say to Zedekiah:
target: Tin, Jeremia chuan an hnênah, Zedakia hnênah chuan hetiangin va sawi rawh u:

source: Let those who are against him go down before him; and let his haters be low in the dust.
target: Thlalêra awmte chu a hmaah an kun ang a; Amah dotute pawh chuan vaivut an liak ang.

source: But he was not right.
target: Mahse a dik lo.

source: I'm very excited
target: Ka phûr kher mai

source: I'm almost ready to go.
target: Ka kal peih tawh.

source: Keep this.
target: Hei hi dah rawh.

source: Is not your fear of God your support, and your upright way of life your hope?
target: I Pathian tih hi i rinchhan ber, I kawng ngilna hi i beisei chhan a ni lo vem ni?

source: I've tried
target: Ka tichhin tawh

source: My soul will say great things of the Lord: the poor in spirit will have knowledge of it and be glad.
target: Ka nunna hian LALPA chu a chhuang ang a: Thuhnuairawlhte chuan chu chu an hria ang a,a n lawm ang.

source: The law and the rule are to be the same for you and for those from other lands living with you.
target: In tan leh in hnena hnam dang awmte tan dan hmun khat leh tih dan hmun khat chauh a awm ang,' ti rawh, tiin.

source: For a short time they are lifted up; then they are gone; they are made low, they are pulled off like fruit, and like the heads of grain they are cut off.
target: Chawisan an ni a, rei loean an ral a; Mi dang angin an vuai a, an chuai a, Buh vui angah chhumin an awm ta a.

source: They are desperate
target: Beidawng tak an ni

source: Deal me out
target: Min dahchhuak rawh

source: We're not engaged yet.
target: Kan la inhual lo.

source: Take as an example of pain nobly undergone and of strength in trouble, the prophets who gave to men the words of the Lord.
target: Unaute u, Lalpa hming thusawitu zawlneite chu, tuar dan leh chhel dan kawngah chuan entawn atan hmang rawh u.

source: You have a visitor
target: Tlawhtu i nei a

source: You'll be jealous
target: I thik ang

source: Make clear then to them, as representatives of the churches, the quality of your love, and that the things which we have said about you are true.
target: Chu mi avang chuan in hmangaih tih hriatna leh, kan chhuanna che u hriatna chu kohhranho pawlte hmaah chuan an hnenah tilang rawh u.

source: And as for the Jebusites living in Jerusalem, the children of Judah were unable to make them go out; but the Jebusites are living with the children of Judah at Jerusalem, to this day.
target: Jerusalem khua ami Jebus-ho erawh chu Juda thlahten an hnawtchhuak thei l va; chutichuan Jebus-hote chu Juda thlahte nen tun thleng hian Jerusalemah an la cheng za ta reng a ni.

source: You're shy
target: I zakzum

source: Deep in thought
target: Ngaihtuah mûk

source: And when he had news of it from the captain, he let Joseph have the body.
target: Tin, sipai za hotu kaa a hriat chuan, a ruang chu Josefa hnenah a pe a.

source: Who's complaining?
target: Tu nge phunnawi?

source: The line goes out to the west at Michmethath on the north; then turning to the east to Taanath-shiloh, going past it on the east of Janoah;
target: tin, ramri chu Mikmethath hmara thlang lampangah a chhuak a; tin, ramri chu chhak lampangah Taanath-silo thlengin a let leh a, Janoa chhak lamah a kal zel a;

source: O God, let your eyes be on him who is our safe cover, and let your heart be turned to your king.
target: Aw Pathian kan phaw ber, en teh, I hriak thiha hmêl hi en teh.

source: Just wrap them up
target: Anmahni chu wrap mai rawh

source: And they said, What more need have we of witness? we have the very words of his mouth.
target: Tin, anni chuan, Eng hriatna dang nge kan ngaih tawh ang? Keimahni ngeiin ama ka chhuak kan hre tawh alawm, an ti a.

source: In the eleventh year of Zedekiah, in the fourth month, on the ninth day of the month, the town was broken into:
target: Zedekia lal kum sâwm leh pakhatna thla lina, chu mi thla ni kuanaah chuan khawpui kolh chu an su tlâng a.

source: In that day men will put their images of silver and of gold, which they made for worship, in the keeping of the beasts of the dark places;
target: Chu mi niah chuan miten an tangkaraw milemte leh an rangkachak milem te, biak tûra an siamsakte chu, buikelek hnênahte leh bak hnênahte chuan an paih ang a;

source: Wisdom makes a wise man stronger than ten rulers in a town.
target: Khawpuia rorêltu sawm aiin finna chuan mi fing chu a tichak zawk.

source: I've read it.
target: Ka chhiar tawh.

source: Do you have a mother
target: Nu i nei em

source: The wrath of the king is like those who give news of death, but a wise man will put peace in place of it.
target: Lal thinurna chu thihna zualko ang ani a, Mi fing erawh chua a ne dai ang.

source: I'm not very polite.
target: Ka polite vak lo.

source: Is it hard?
target: A hautak em?

source: I asked for money.
target: Pawisa ka dil a.

source: His mouth is most sweet; yes, he is all beautiful. This is my loved one, and this is my friend, O daughters of Jerusalem.
target: A kam a thlum ber mai, a ni, a duhawm famkim; Hei hi ka duhtak chu a ni, hei hi ka thian a ni; Aw Jerusalem fanute u.

source: For the Son of man will come in the glory of his Father with his angels; and then he will give to every man the reward of his works.
target: Mohring Fapa hi a vantirhkohte nen, a Pa ropuinaa inthuamin a lo kal dawn si a; chu mi hunah chuan mi tin an thiltih ang zelin a rul theuh vang.

source: But Saul was burning with hate against the church, going into every house and taking men and women and putting them in prison.
target: Saula erawh chuan kohhranhote a tiduhdah em em a, in tinah a lut a, ahmei apain a hnuk chhuak a, tan inah a khung thin.

source: It made me strong
target: Min tichak a ni

source: I haven't started
target: Ka la tânlo

source: And the free space had doors opening from the side-rooms, one door on the north and one door on the south: and the free space was five cubits wide all round.
target: Sîr pindan kawng khârte chu hmun âwl lama hawn a ni a, pakhat chu hmâelam hawi a ni a, pakhat chu chhimlam hawi a ni: a vêla hmun âwl chu tawng ngaa zau a ni.

source: I wash i ti em?
target: Do you do your wash?

source: He built a new house.
target: In thar a sa a.

source: They love it
target: An duh lûtuk

source: For three things the earth is moved, and there are four which it will not put up with:
target: Thil pathum avângin leilung a khur thin, Thil pali a ni, tuar theih lohte.

source: But the wine-servant did not keep Joseph in mind or give a thought to him.
target: Nimahsela uain pe hotu ber chuan Josefa chu a hre reng ta awzâwng lo va, a theihngilh ta mai a.

source: We ate a potato salad
target: Alu salad kan ei a

source: I complimented Tom.
target: Tom chu ka fak a.

source: I got an A.
target: A ka hmu.

source: Come back to him who has been so deeply sinned against by the children of Israel.
target: Aw Israela thlahte u, nasa taka in helsan taka lam chu hawi leh tawh rawh u.

source: Simon Peter, a servant and Apostle of Jesus Christ, to those who with us have a part in the same holy faith in the righteousness of our God and Saviour Jesus Christ:
target: Simon Petera, Isua Krista bawih leh tirhkoh chuan Isua Krista kan Pathian leh chhandamtu felna avanga rinna hlu tak kan chan ang chang vete hnenah:

source: They had breakfast.
target: Chawhmeh an ei a.

source: Don't kill me
target: Mi that suh

source: I have put a net for you, and you have been taken, O Babylon, without your knowledge: you have been uncovered and taken because you were fighting against the Lord.
target: Aw Babulon, i tan thang ka kam e, Hre lovin i awk ta a nih hi; Hmuh chhuah leh manin i awm ta, LALPA i bei avângin.

source: Hello my beautiful
target: Hello ka hmeltha

source: Edom will be his heritage, and he will put an end to the last of the people of Seir.
target: A hmêlma thin Edom leh Seir te chu a chang ang: Israelte chan a țhat chhûng zawng.

source: It's me!
target: Keimah ka nia.

source: And the other disciples came in the little boat (they were not far from land, only about two hundred cubits off pulling the net full of fish.
target: Nimahsela zirtir dangte chuan lawng te tak te chuan len, sangha chawpa hnuk chungin an rawn pan a, khawmual atangin an hla si lo va, tawng zahnih emaw lek a ni a.

source: They've closed up
target: An khar tawh a

source: But news of him went out all the more, in every direction, and great numbers of people came together to give hearing to his words and to be made well from their diseases.
target: Nimahsela a chanchin thu chu a thang lehzual sauh va; mipui tam tak a thu hriat duh leh an nate tihdam duhin an rawn inkhawm chiam a.

source: It's not unusual
target: Thil mak a ni lo

source: They are extremely competent
target: An thiam hle a ni

source: If only one of them is sounded, then the chiefs, the heads of the thousands of Israel, are to come to you.
target: Tin, pakhat chauh an ham chuan Israel mpuite hotu puipate chauh i hnena an lo kal khawm tur a ni ang a.

source: What man now living will not see death? will he be able to keep back his soul from the underworld? (Selah.
target: Eng mi nge thih ni hmêl hmu lova nung a, Seol kut atanga a nunna chhanhim tûr chu? Selah

source: I'm guilty
target: Ka sual a

source: In those days the opinions of Ahithophel were valued as highly as if through him a man might get direction from God; so were they valued by David as much as by Absalom.
target: Chung laia rem a ruat, Ahithophela remruatte chu, Pathian thu ngaih anga ngaih a ni thin a: chutiang bawk chuan Ahothophelan Davida leh Absaloma rem a ruatpui zawng zawngte chu ngaih a ni thin.

source: I didn't take anything.
target: Engmah ka la lo.

source: For the training of the body is of profit for a little, but religion is of profit in every way, giving hope for the life which now is, and for that which is to come.
target: taksa insawizawi na hi sawt zawng a sawt ve bawk a; Pathian ngaihsakna erawh hi chuanin nunna tuna awm sa leh la awm leh tur pek tiamna a neih avangin kawng tinrengah a sawt a ni.

source: Your legs are ripped.
target: I ke a hrual a.

source: The children of Gad and the children of Reuben came and said to Moses and to Eleazar the priest and to the chiefs of the meeting,
target: tichuan Gada thlahte leh Reubena thlahte chuan Mosia leh puithiam Eleazra leh pungkhawmho puipate chu an va bia a,

source: Are you a criminal
target: Misual i ni em

source: Did you put her up to it?
target: I dah sang em?

source: And the land which was waste will be farmed, in place of being a waste in the eyes of everyone who went by.
target: Tin, ram lo țiau tawhte chu an let ang, tûnhmain mi veivâkte mithmuha țiau tawh hnu ni mah sela.

source: Christ has truly made us free: then keep your free condition and let no man put a yoke on you again.
target: Bawih ni lo turin Krista chuan min chhuahtir kha, chutichuan ding nghet ula, bawih nghawngkawlah chuan tang leh tawh suh u.

source: You have four dogs.
target: Ui pali i nei a.

source: Who resigned?
target: Tunge bang?

source: Whose tea is this?
target: Hei hi tu tea nge?

source: I went straight home.
target: Ka haw nghal a.

source: And the scribes and Pharisees were watching him to see if he would make him well on the Sabbath, so that they might be able to say something against him.
target: Tin, lehkhaziaktute leh Pharisaite chuan a hekna tur an hmuh theih nan, Chawlhniin a tih dam dawn leh dawn loh an mit mei a .

source: You're all invited
target: In sawm vek a ni

source: The hater of work puts his hand deep into the basin: lifting it again to his mouth is a weariness to him.
target: Mi thatchhia chuan a kut thlengah ahnim a; A kaa thlen leh pawh a peih thin lo.

source: He drank a little.
target: Tlem a in a.

source: I buried it
target: Ka phûm tawh

source: You are completely wrong.
target: I dik lo vek a ni.

source: Come here.
target: Hetah lo kal rawh.

source: He who does work on his land will not be short of bread; but he who goes after foolish men is without sense.
target: A lei lettu chuan chhâng a ngah ang a, Mi lelo tih dan zawmtu chu finna nei lo mi a ni.

source: And when all the water in the skin was used up, she put the child down under a tree.
target: Tin, tuithâwla tui chu a lo awm ta lo va, tichuan naupang chu hnimbuk pakhat hnuaiah a dah ta mai a.

source: He loves them
target: Khapa khân anmahni a hmangaih

source: Zechariah, the son of Meshelemiah, was keeper of the door of the Tent of meeting.
target: Meselemia fapa Zekaria chu inbiakna puan in kawngkhâr vengtu a ni a.

source: She did not say anything.
target: Engmah a sawi lo.

source: They were completely surprised.
target: Mak an ti vek a.

source: Tom can't go
target: Tom a kal thei lo

source: It is good to take this in your hand and not to keep your hand from that; he who has the fear of God will be free of the two.
target: Hei hi i chelh tlat a tha a, chu pawh chu thlah hlek suh: Pathian tihtu chuan a chhuahsan vek si thin a.

source: Let all the earth give you worship, and make songs to you; let them make songs to your name. (Selah.
target: Leilung luah zawng zawng hian chibai an bûk ang chia, Nangmah fakin an zai ang a; I hming fakin an zai ang, ti rawh u. Selah

source: Tom stole it.
target: Tom-a'n a ru.

source: I'm not buying it
target: Ka lei lo a ni

source: You could have written.
target: I ziak thei ang.

source: His sneezings give out flames, and his eyes are like the eyes of the dawn.
target: A thaw chhuak chu a var sung sung a, A mitte chu khawfingchat ang ru mai a ni.

source: Which of you is able truly to say that I am a sinner? If I say what is true, why have you no belief in me?
target: In zingah tuin nge sual kawngah thiam loh mi chantir thei awm? Thutak ka sawi pawhin nangnin engati nge mi rin loh?

source: Tom is undressing
target: Tom chu a inbel a

source: Be wise in your behaviour to those who are outside, making good use of the time.
target: Remchanna lei zelin, pawn lama mite lakah chuan fing takin awm rawh u.

source: I'm drinking sage tea.
target: Sage tea ka in a.

source: Truly, for forty years you were their support in the waste land, and they were in need of nothing; their clothing did not get old or their feet become tired.
target: A ni, thlalêrah khan kum sâwmli i chawm a, engmah an tlachham lo va; an silhfente a hlui lo va, an kete chu a vung lo va.

source: I don't go home very often.
target: Ka haw fo vak lo.

source: So they put Jesus there, because it was the Jews' day of getting ready for the Passover, and the place was near.
target: Tin, Judate Inrinni a nih avangin, thlan chu an kiang lawk a ni si a, chutah chuan Isua chu an zalh ta a.

source: And now I am here to be judged because of the hope given by God's word to our fathers;
target: Tin, Pathianin min thlahtute hnena thu a tiam kha beisei kawng thu-ah hetah tunah rorelsaka ka din hi;

source: I meet him at the club
target: Club-ah ka inhmu a

source: Tom is new
target: Tom a thar

source: I am disappointed
target: Ka beidawng a ni

source: The poor man and his creditor come face to face: the Lord gives light to their eyes equally.
target: Mi rethei leh hnechhiahtu an awm dun a, LALPAN an mit a tihvârsak ve ve a.

source: I've been released
target: Ka chhuak tawh

source: For the children of Israel will for a long time be without king and without ruler, without offerings and without pillars, and without ephod or images.
target: Israela thlahte chu ni tam tak lalber leh milian leh lungphun serh leh puithiam kawr emaw, milim te emaw nei lovin an awm dâwn si a:

source: You don't frighten me.
target: Min ti hlau lo.

source: Praise be to God for what he has given, which words have no power to say.
target: A thilpek sawi hleih theih loh avangin Pathian hnenah lawmthu awm rawh se.

source: They are fixed for ever and ever, they are done in faith and righteousness.
target: Chung chu kumkhaw tlaitluan atân tihnghehin a awm a, Thutak leh dik taka tih a ni hlawm a.

source: They heard noises
target: Thawm an hre ta a

source: We're not sure yet
target: Kan la chiang lo

source: But I may be with you for a time, or even for the winter, so that you may see me on my way, wherever I go.
target: Nangni hnenah erawh chuan ka cham reng a ni thei e, thlasik chhung zawng pawh a ni mahna, khawiah pawh ka kalna tur apiangah nangnin mi thlah theihna turin.

source: Only, as the Lord has given to a man, and as is the purpose of God for him, so let him go on living. And these are my orders for all the churches.
target: Engpawh ni sela, Lalpa chuan mi tin hnena a sem pangngai ang theuh leh, Pathianin mi tin a kohna pangngai ang theuhvah awm rawh se. Chutiangin kohhran pawl zawng zawngah ka ruat thin.

source: Do they know it well
target: An hre chiang em

source: I already ate
target: Ka ei tawh
