source: Let not your horn be lifted up: let no more words of pride come from your outstretched necks.
target: In ki chu chung lamah tisâng suh ula; Ring khawng chungin tawng suh u.

source: Clean it up
target: Tifai rawh

source: And the Lord had sorrow because he had made man on the earth, and grief was in his heart.
target: Tichuan leiah hian mihring a lo siam tâk avângin LALPA chu a inchhîr a, rilru nat nân a hman phah ta a.

source: And for the west side of the House, at the back, they made six boards,
target: Tin, biak bûk kawmchar khawthlang chhawng lam atan chaun ban rem khawm paruk a siam a,

source: And turning round I came down from the mountain and put the stones in the ark which I had made; and there they are as the Lord gave me orders.
target: Tin, tlâng ata chu ka let thla a, lungphêk chu ka bawm siamah chuan ka dah a; LALPAN thu mi pêk angin chutah chuan a awm ta reng a.

source: I like trains
target: Rel ka ngaina

source: Is there a message
target: Thuchah a awm em

source: Then Micah said, Now I am certain that the Lord will do me good, seeing that the Levite has become my priest.
target: Chutichuan Mika chuan, Tunah zet chuan Levi chi ka puithiam atân ka nei tawh si a, LALPAN mi tihmuingil ngei ang tih ka hria e, a ti a.

source: He made me go
target: Khapa khân mi kal tir

source: Do you have it with you?
target: I bulah i nei em?

source: They didn't want me to examine it.
target: Ka enfiah duh lo.

source: I felt tired
target: Ka châu hle

source: And whenever you go into a house, first say, Peace be to this house.
target: Tin, in luhna in apiangah a hmasa berin, He inah hian thlamuanna thleng rawh se, ti ang che u.

source: A king's glory is in the number of his people: and for need of people a ruler may come to destruction.
target: Mipui tamnaah chuan lal ropuina a awm a, Mi tlêmnaah erawh chuan lal fapa boralna a awm.

source: He's waiting for a bus
target: Bus a nghak a

source: I got thirsty
target: Ka tuihâl

source: I'll stick with you.
target: Ka stick ang che.

source: What are you doing bro
target: Eng nge i tih bro

source: Will you take your rest among the flocks? like the wings of a dove covered with silver, and its feathers with yellow gold.
target: Țhuro thla tangkaruaa tuam a, A thla hmawr pawh rangkachak eng taka tuamangin Berâm huang karahte i mu dawn êm ni?

source: And he will have to give back four times the value of the lamb, because he has done this and because he had no pity.
target: tin, hetiang thil a tih avâng leh khawngaihna a neih loh avângin a berâm no chu a lehliin a rul tûr a ni ang, a ti a.

source: Mari hian kut a mamawh a ni
target: Mary needs a hand

source: It's your victory.
target: I hnehna a ni.

source: Got up from table, put off his robe and took a cloth and put it round him.
target: a zanriah chaw kil chu a tho va, a puante a dah a, inhrukna puan a la a, a veng a.

source: And Vashti the queen gave a feast for the women in the house of King Ahasuerus.
target: Tin, lalnu Vasti pawhin Ahsasuera lal inah chuan hmeichheho tan ruai a theh a.

source: Go over there
target: Khata kal rawh

source: Be quick about it.
target: Chumi chungchangah chuan rang takin awm rawh.

source: I look down on you!
target: Ka en hniam che!

source: They stood
target: An ding

source: And David took the head of the Philistine to Jerusalem, but the metal war-dress and the arms he put in his tent.
target: Tin, Davida chuan Philistia mi lu chu a la a, Jerusalem-ah a kalpui a, a râlthuam erawh chu a puan inah a dah ta a.

source: For I am full of words, I am unable to keep in my breath any longer:
target: Thu lah ka ngah hle si a, Chhûng lam rilruin mi tûr nasa a ni.

source: Then all Judah came with the tenth part of the grain and wine and oil and put it into the store-houses.
target: Chutichuan Juda mi zawng zawngte chuan buh sawm apakhat te, uain te, hriak te, thawhlawm dah khawmnaahte chuan an rawn la a.

source: For a rod, or for a curse, or for mercy, causing it to come on the mark.
target: Zilh nân emaw, a ram that nân emaw, Zahngaih vang emaw a rawn awm tir a ni.

source: Here you are
target: Hetah i awm ta

source: And he sent down manna like rain for their food, and gave them the grain of heaven.
target: An ei atân manna kha an chungah a zuk surtir a, Van buh chu a pe a ni.

source: Is he looking for something?
target: Thil a zawng em?

source: So now, let my sin have forgiveness, and go back with me to give worship to the Lord.
target: Chutichuan ka sual ngaidam la, LALPA ka biak theih nan min hawpui leh rawh khai, a ti a.

source: Yes, a little bit.
target: Ni e, tlem tal.

source: Have no pity on him, so that Israel may be clear from the crime of putting a man to death without cause, and it will be well for you.
target: In khawngaih tur ani lo va, in tana tha turin Israel ram ata pawi khawih lo thisen chuahna chu in tibo tur a ni.

source: And he will be with him as a servant working for payment year by year; his master is not to be cruel to him before your eyes.
target: Kum khat bi zela rawih inhlawhfa angin a bel tur a ni: I mithmuhah rura takin a tih tur a ni lo.

source: And Manoah said to his wife, Death will certainly be our fate, for it is a god whom we have seen.
target: Tin, Manoa chuan a nupui hnênah, Pathian kan hmuh tak avâng hian kan thi ngei ang, a ti a.

source: Hearing the cry of the prisoner, making free those for whom death is ordered;
target: Mi tang rum chu ngaithla tûr leh, Thi tûra ruatte chu phelh tûrin;

source: And of the things living in the waters, you may take all those who have wings for swimming with and skins formed of thin plates.
target: Tuia cheng zawng zawnga hengte hi in ei thei ang: pangparh leh phuhlip nei tawh phawt chu in ei thei ang a,

source: Now if Timothy comes, see that he is with you without fear; because he is doing the Lord's work, even as I am:
target: Tin, Timothea kha a lo thlen chuan ti lova in hnena a awm nan fimkhur rawh u; keiin ka thawh ang bawk hian Lalpa hna chu a thawk si a.

source: Say not, I will do to him as he has done to me; I will give the man the reward of his work.
target: Ka chunga a tih angin a chungah ka ti ang a, A thawh dan ang zelin ka pe ang, ti suh.

source: I'll be fine
target: Ka ṭha mai ang

source: To him who made a way through the Red Sea: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:
target: Tuifinriat Sen tithen phawk a: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: And the rivers will have an evil smell; the stream of Egypt will become small and dry: all the water-plants will come to nothing.
target: Luite ch a rimchia ang a; Aigupta ram tuiluangte chu a kam telh telh ang a, a kangchat mai ang: phairuangte leh tui hnimte chu a vuai zo vang.

source: May the sin of this people have forgiveness, in the measure of your great mercy, as you have had mercy on them from Egypt up till now.
target: I ngilneihna a nasat ang ngei leh Aigupta ram ata tun thlenga i ngaidam ang hian mipuite khawlohna hi ngaidam teh khai, a ti a.

source: So we are the representatives of Christ, as if God was making a request to you through us: we make our request to you, in the name of Christ, be at peace with God.
target: Chutichuan, Krista aia palai kan ni a, Pathianin keimahni min hmangin a ngen chiam che u tih theih a ni; Pathian nen lo inrem rawh u, tiin Krista aiah kan ngen che u a ni.

source: So the chiefs of the Philistines gave her seven new bow-cords which had never been made dry, and she had them tightly knotted round him.
target: Chutichaun Philistia-ho mi liante chuan thalhrui thar pasarih, la ro hlek lote chu an han pe a, chung chuan an phuar ta a.

source: I needed food
target: Chaw ka mamawh

source: For they all go after what is theirs, not after the things of Christ.
target: An zain Isua Krista tan zawng lovin, mahni tan an zawng si thin.

source: I've seen too much.
target: Ka hmu tam lutuk.

source: I'm pooped
target: Ka e kham tawh

source: So take care that these words of the prophets do not come true for you;
target: Chuvangin fimkhur rawh u, chutilochuan zawlneite lehkhabua an sawi kha in chungah a lo thleng dah ang e,

source: And full of the Spirit he came into the Temple; and when the father and mother came in with the child Jesus, to do with him what was ordered by the law,
target: Tin, Thlarau hriattirin Pathian biak inah chuan a va lut a; nausen Isua chu a nu leh a pain Dan pangngai anga a chunga tihsak tura an rawn hruai luh lai chuan,

source: You should have married me.
target: Min nei tur a ni.

source: And the high places of Isaac will be unpeopled, and the holy places of Israel will be made waste; and I will come up against the family of Jeroboam with the sword.
target: Tin, Isaaka hmun sângte chu an lo ram ang a, Israel hmun thianghlimte chu tihchhiat a ni ang a; tin, Jeroboama chhûngte khandaihin ka do vang a.

source: He jumped on
target: A zuang zel

source: Tom ran home.
target: Tom-a a tlan haw.

source: For the fear of God kept me back, and because of his power I might not do such things.
target: Pathian lak ata vanduaina chu ka tihzâwng tak a ni si a. A ropuina avângi eng ti rual ka ni lo.

source: You will always remember me
target: Min hre reng ang

source: I'll ask him for you.
target: Ka dil ang che.

source: The pillars of heaven are shaking, and are overcome by his sharp words.
target: Van dona bante chu a nghing dur dur a, A zilhhauna chu mak an ti a.

source: Make a request to the Lord your God for a sign, a sign in the deep places of the underworld, or in the high heavens.
target: LALPA i Pathian hnênah chhinchhiahna dil rawh; Seol thuk tak ata emaw van sâng tak ata emaw, a ti a.

source: I bought it
target: Ka lei tawh

source: And so great was David's fear of God that day, that he said, How may I let the ark of God come to me?
target: Tin, Davida chuan chu mi ni chuan Pathian chu a hlau va, Engtin nge Pathian bâwm chu ka hawn theih tak ang? a tia.

source: I was given a medal.
target: Medal min pe a.

source: Aren't you bored yet?
target: I la bo lo em ni?

source: I'm not presentable
target: Ka presentable lo

source: For we are the circumcision, who give worship to God and have glory in Jesus Christ, and have no faith in the flesh:
target: Keini Pathian Thlarau zara Pathian bia leh, Krista Isua chhuang leh, tisa chunga rinna reng nghat lotute hi Serhtanho kan ni zawk si a.

source: I have gone out of the way like a wandering sheep; make search for your servant; for I keep your teachings ever in mind.
target: Berâm bo angin ka vâk bo va; i chhiahhlawh hi zawng ang che; I thupêkte chu ka theihnghilh ngai si lo va.

source: For God had such love for the world that he gave his only Son, so that whoever has faith in him may not come to destruction but have eternal life.
target: Pathianin khawvel a hmangaih em em a, chutichuan a Fapa mal neih chhun a pe a, amah chu tupawh a ring apiang an boral loh va, chatuana nunna an neih zawk nan.

source: I like coffee
target: Coffee ka duh

source: It's shiny
target: A tle thei

source: The lips of the upright man have knowledge of what is pleasing, but twisted are the mouths of evil-doers.
target: Mi fel ka chuan pawm tlak chu a hria a, Mi suaksual ka erawh chu chaltlai takin a tawngchhuak thin.

source: Who does not see by all these that the hand of the Lord has done this?
target: Heng thil zawng zawngah hian tunge hre lo awm, LALPA kut chuan hei hi ati a ni.

source: But flesh with the life-blood in it you may not take for food.
target: Amaherawhchu sa a nunna a thisen chawpin in ei tûr a ni lo.

source: And Laban got together all the men of the place and gave a feast.
target: Tichuan Labana chuan chu mi khuaa mi zawng zawng chu a khâwm vek a, ruai a theh a.

source: And as the toes of the feet were in part of iron and in part of earth, so part of the kingdom will be strong and part of it will readily be broken.
target: Tin, a kezungțang a țhen thîr, a țhen hlum a nih ang bawk khân ram chu ațhen ah chuan achak ang a, ațhenah chuan a chhe awl ang.

source: Or I only and Barnabas, have we no right to take a rest from work?
target: A nih loh leh, hna thawk lo turin kei leh Barnaban thu kan nei lo bik em ni?

source: I'm hesitant
target: Ka huphurh deuh

source: I've heard enough
target: Ka hre tâwk tawh

source: And the altar was broken and the burned waste on it overturned; this was the sign which the man of God had given by the word of the Lord.
target: Pathian miin LALPA thua chhinchhiahna tûra a sawi ang khan maichâm pawh chu a khi bawk a, maichâma meivapte chu a baw ta vek a.

source: Sami started talking
target: Sami chuan a ti a

source: After they had gone three or four miles they saw Jesus walking on the sea and coming near to the boat; and they had great fear.
target: Tin, fing sawmhnih leh fing nga emaw, fing sawmthum emaw an kar chuan Isua chu dil chungah chuankea kala lawng rawn hnaihin an hmu a, an hlau va.

source: You are fairer than the children of men; grace is flowing through your lips; for this cause the blessing of God is with you for ever.
target: Mihring fate ai hian i hmêl a tha zawk a; Khawngaihna hi i hmuiah leih a ni: Chuvangin Pathianin kumkhua atân mal a sawm che a ni.

source: Make a clean heart in me, O God; give me a right spirit again.
target: Aw Pathian, keimahah hian thinlung thianghlim tak siam la; Ka kawchhûngah hian thlarau dik tak siam thar leh ang che.

source: Then take up arms against the people of that town and give it up to the curse, with all its cattle and everything in it.
target: khandaihin chu mi khuaa awmte chu in tihlum ngei ngei tur ani a; a chhûnga awm zawng zawng te, ran rualte nen khandaihin in tiboral vek tur a ni.

source: I anticipated that
target: Chu chu ka lo beisei lawk tawh a

source: No one went near him.
target: Tumah a hnaih lo.

source: Nothing's the same.
target: Engmah a inang lo.

source: Let destruction come on them without their knowledge; let them be taken themselves in their secret nets, falling into the same destruction.
target: A inrin loh hlanin chhiatna achungah thleng sela; A len phah rukah khan amah ngei awk bawk sela; Chu miah chuan tla chhe rawh se.

source: But God has given you a place in Christ Jesus, through whom God has given us wisdom and righteousness and salvation, and made us holy:
target: Nangni erawh chu ama zarah Krista Isuaah chuan in awm a ni; ani chu Pathian hnen ata kan tan finnaah siam a ni, felnaah te, thianghlimnaah te, tlannaah te nen;

source: This is an extra one.
target: Hei hi extra a ni.

source: You'll find out soon enough.
target: I hre thuai ang.

source: A word of the Lord: The Lord has come to the land of Hadrach, and Damascus is his resting-place: for the towns of Aram are the Lord's,
target: Hadrak ram laka LALPA thu phurrit leh Damaska chunga in nghat tûr chu: LALPA mit chu mite chungah leh Israel hnam zawng zawng chungah a fu si a.

source: We were busy
target: Kan buai

source: It's evil
target: A diklo

source: And so great was his need that he would have been glad to take the pigs' food, and no one gave him anything.
target: Tin, englo kawm vawkin an eite chuan intihpuar a duh em em a; tuman engmah an pe si lo.

source: And for the uprights of the House they made boards of hard wood.
target: Tin, biak bûk ban rem khawm turte chu ngil taka dingin thingri thingin a siam a.

source: And he made a great metal water-vessel ten cubits across from edge to edge, five cubits high and thirty cubits round.
target: Tin, dar tuizêm lianpui, tawng sawm tla, a san lam tawng nga a chhûng a: a tlâng chu tawng sawmthum bial vêl a ni.

source: Her rulers are like loud-voiced lions in her; her judges are wolves of the evening, crushing up the bones before the morning.
target: A chhûnga a hotute chu sakeibaknei rûm lai an ni a; A rorêltute chu tlai lam chinghnia an ni a; A tûk thlenga țhial tûr engmah an zuah lo.

source: So she went on getting together the heads of grain till evening; and after crushing out the seed it came to about an ephah of grain.
target: Chutichuan a zawng a; tin, a zawn sa chu a vua a, barli epha khat emaw lai a ni.

source: For I, through the law, have become dead to the law, so that I might be living to God.
target: Pathian lam kawnga ka lo nun theih nan kei zawng Dan avangin Dan lam kawngah ka thi tawh si a.

source: My son, keep my teaching in your memory, and my rules in your heart:
target: Ka fapa, ka dan chu theihnghilh suh la, I thinlungin ka thupêkte chu zawm reng zawk rawh se;

source: Then Abimelech went to Thebez, and put his army in position against Thebez and took it.
target: Tichuan Abimeleka chu Thebez khuaah a kal a, Thebez khua chu a hal a, a la a.

source: This he said, testing him: for he had no doubt what he himself would do.
target: Chung thu chu amah fiah nan a sawi a ni, a tih tur chu amahin a hre reng si a.

source: You sit there, OK.
target: I thu a, OK.

source: And do not go from the right way turning to those false gods in which there is no profit and no salvation, for they are false.
target: engmaha hnemhnang lo tûr leh chhanchhuak thei lo che u zuiin pensan suh u, engmahlo an ni si a.

source: I got hit
target: Mi fuh e

source: We knew that much
target: Chu chu kan hre chiang hle

source: I grunted
target: Ka huk ri

source: You couldn't keep from crying.
target: I tap lo thei lo.

source: And one day Jacob was cooking some soup when Esau came in from the fields in great need of food;
target: Tin, Jakoba chuan englo a chhum kawi a; tin, Esauva chu ram lam atangin a lo hawng a, a chau hle a:

source: All his wealth is stored up for the dark: a fire not made by man sends destruction on him, and on everything in his tent.
target: A ro atân thim chhah mup khawl khawl a ni a, Chhem loh mei chuan a kang ral ang a, A puan in ata hnutchhiah apiang a tiral ang.

source: I'm quitting
target: Ka bansan mek

source: Who'll start?
target: Tunge ṭan dâwn?

source: Is Tom mad?
target: Tom a a em?

source: Now the acts of Asa, first and last, are recorded in the book of the kings of Judah and Israel.
target: Tin, ngai teh u, Asa chanchin chu a bul atanga a tawp thlengin Juda leh Israel lalte chanchin ziakna buah a chuang a ni.

source: Will he be pulling your plough with cords, turning up the valleys after you?
target: Lei lehnaah hrui i bahtir thei ang êm? I hnungah lei ruam a rawn chawk rual ang êm ni?

source: The dog is sleeping
target: Ui chu a muhil a

source: Do you have any cash on you
target: Cash i nei em

source: Let all the nations give praise to the Lord: let all the people give him praise.
target: Aw hnam tinrengte u, LALPA chu fak ula; Mi tinrengte u, amah chu fak rawh u.

source: Aren't they wonderful
target: An ropui lo em ni

source: Take no interest from him, in money or in goods, but have the fear of your God before you, and let your brother make a living among you.
target: A lakah tangka emaw, thil emaw, a pung la suh, Pathian tih zawk rawh: I unau chu i hnena a khawsak theih nan.

source: And the water went all round the altar, till the drain was full.
target: Tin, tui chu mâicham vêlah chuan a luang ta dul dul a; tin, laih khuar chu tuiin a tikhat bawk a.

source: He fooled her
target: A bum a

source: I go to work.
target: Hnathawk turin ka kal.

source: Be prepared
target: Inring sa rawh

source: What were you wearing
target: Eng nge i hak a

source: We're already old.
target: Kan upa tawh.

source: Let the week of the bride-feast come to its end and then we will give you the other in addition, if you will be my servant for another seven years.
target: He mia ni sarih hi thlingtla rih la, tichuan kum sarih dang ka rawng i bâwl leh tûr aiah chuan mi dang pawh chu kan pe ang che, a ti a.

source: He was angry
target: A ṭhin a rim ta a

source: They bumped against each other
target: An inhmachhawn a

source: And you will be free from your oath to me when you come to my people; and if they will not give her to you, you will be free from your oath.
target: ka laichînte hnên ngei i thlen hunah chuan ka hnêna i chhechham lakah hian i thiang ang; nula chu an pêk loh che chuan ka hnêna i chhechham lakah hian i thiang ang, a ti a.

source: Light is shining on the lovers of righteousness, and for the upright in heart there is joy.
target: Mi felte tan khua alo eng a, Thinlung dikte tan lawmna alo thleng.

source: It wasn't me
target: Keimah ka ni lo

source: Study hard
target: Zir nasa rawh

source: From where then does wisdom come, and where is the resting-place of knowledge?
target: A nih, finna chu khawi ata nge? Hriata awmna hmun chu khawiah nge?

source: My flesh is wasted because of your wrath; and there is no peace in my bones because of my sin.
target: I lungnih lohna avnaign ka tisaah hian dam lai reng a awm lo va; Ka sualna avângin ka ruhahte hian hrisel lai rêng rêng a awm hek lo.

source: I made two
target: Pahnih ka siam

source: You've got nothing to be ashamed of.
target: Zak tur i nei lo.

source: These do it from love, conscious that I am responsible for the cause of the good news:
target: chungte chuan Chanchin Tha tan turin Pathianin hna min pe a ni tih hriain hmangaihna avanga hril an ni.

source: Does he not see my ways, and are not my steps all numbered?
target: Ka kawngte chu a hmuin Ka ke pen zawng zawng a chhiar lo vem ni?

source: There is great hate against the watchman of Ephraim, the people of my God; as for the prophet, there is a net in all his ways, and hate in the house of his God.
target: Ephraim râlvêngtu chu ka Pathian hnêna awm a ni a, Zâwlnei lah chu a kawng tluanin thangkamtu thang a awm a, A pathian inah pawh intaina a awm.

source: He who in summer gets together his store is a son who does wisely; but he who takes his rest when the grain is being cut is a son causing shame.
target: Buh seng laia inchhek khawl chu fapa fing a ni a, A seng hun laia muhil erawh chu fapa, mualphona thlen thintu a ni.

source: Pork intestine
target: Vawk ril

source: For the reward of sin is death; but what God freely gives is eternal life in Jesus Christ our Lord.
target: Sual man chu thihna a ni si a; Pathian thilthlawnpek erawh chu, kan Lalpa Krista Isua zarah chuan, chatuana nunna a ni.

source: I loved it
target: Ka ngaina

source: I'm not feeling like joking.
target: Fiamthu ka duh lo.

source: And the sons of Carmi: Achan, the troubler of Israel, who did wrong about the cursed thing.
target: Tin, Karmia fapa chu Akara, Israelte tibuaitu, thilhlan bawhchhetupa kha a ni.

source: Now there were among the people of Jabesh-gilead four hundred young virgins who had never had sex relations with a man; these they took to their tents in Shiloh in the land of Canaan.
target: Tin, Jabes-gilead rama awmte zingah chuan nula zali, mipa la pawl ngai hauh loh an hmu a; tichuan an awmna Silo khuaah chuan an hruai a, chu chu Kanaan ram a ni.

source: The shaking of milk makes butter, and the twisting of the nose makes blood come: so the forcing of wrath is a cause of fighting.
target: Hnute tui chawhin hnute khal a rawn tichhuak ang leh Hnar sawra thi a lo chhuak angin Tihthinur luinain inhauna a hring thin.

source: Did you move this?
target: Hei hi i sawn em?

source: I paid.
target: Ka pe tawh.

source: And there were windows in it and in the covered way all round: it was fifty cubits long and twenty-five cubits wide.
target: Tin, a vêlah chuan sumhmunte a awm a, a dunglam tawng sawmhnih leh panga, a vânglam tawng nga a ni.

source: She wasn't your sister.
target: I farnu a ni lo.

source: But the way of the upright is like the light of early morning, getting brighter and brighter till the full day.
target: Mi felte kawng erawh chu chhun en la tak pawha eng zual deuh deuh, eng fim tak ang a ni.

source: The Lord of armies says, I will give punishment to Amalek for what he did to Israel, fighting against him on the way when Israel came out of Egypt.
target: Sipaihote LALPA chuan 'Amalek miten Israel-hote chunga an thiltih, Aigupta ram ata an lo chhuah laia an lo dal dante kha ka chhinchhiah reng a.

source: I rarely cry
target: Ka ṭap khat

source: Was it not necessary for the Christ to go through these things, and to come into his glory?
target: Kristan chung thil chu tuarin a ropuinaah a lut tur a ni reng lo vem ni? a ti a.

source: And you may not go near a woman or have sex relations with her when she is unclean, at her regular time.
target: Tin, hmeichhia a bawlhhlawh dan pangngaia a bawlhhlawh chhûng chuan a saruakna hlim turin i pan tur a ni lo.

source: The loaf is small.
target: Chhang chu a te a.

source: Are they sleeping together
target: An mu dun em

source: Can he do it?
target: A tithei em?

source: Do you still not see, or keep in mind the five cakes of bread of the five thousand, and the number of baskets you took up?
target: Tunah pawh in rilruin in la hre lo fo maw? Mi sangnga chhangper pangaa hrai leh in bawmrang ruh khah zat kha, in hre reng lawm ni?

source: For a number of nations and great kings will make servants of them, even of them: and I will give them the reward of their acts, even the reward of the work of their hands.
target: Hnam hrang hrangte leh lal ropui tak takte chuan an zinga an mi duh an thing dawn si a; an thiltih ang zel leh an kut hnathawh ang zelin ka thungrul dawn a ni.

source: Let Tom sing
target: Tom zai rawh se

source: And from Beth-gilgal and from the fields of Geba and Azmaveth: for the music-makers had made daughter-towns for themselves round about Jerusalem.
target: Bet-gilgal atang leh Geba leh Azmavet ram ata te pawh hla satute chuan Jerusalem vêlah chuan khua na lo siam ta hlawm si a.

source: So all those who were numbered of the children of Israel, by their families, all those of twenty years old and over who were able to go to war,
target: chutichuan Israela thlah a chhûngkua kuaa kum sawmhnih achin chung lam ralkai chin kawng zawng, Israel rama mi chu an chhiar a:

source: My heart was made bitter, and I was pained by the bite of grief:
target: Ka thinlung hi a lungngai a, Ka rilruah pawh chhun angin ka awm si a:

source: If only he had known!
target: Hre ta sela!

source: Do be careful
target: Fimkhur ve rawh

source: Because you did not give honour to the Lord your God, worshipping him gladly, with joy in your hearts on account of all your wealth of good things;
target: Thil engkima in lo muk pawha LALPA in Pathian chu rilru lawm tak leh hlim taka a rawng in bawl loh avangin,

source: Jesus said to them, Get some of the fish which you have now taken.
target: Tin, Isuan an hnenah, Tunah in sangha man kha a then han la rawh u, a ti a.

source: I just smiled
target: Ka nui chiah

source: If you have done wrong, is he any the worse for it? and if your sins are great in number, what is it to him?
target: Thil i tihsual pawhin, a tan eng nge pawi? I bawhchhiatna a pun pawhin, a tan eng nge pawi ang?

source: I am great
target: Ka tha tawk

source: Examine them
target: Va enchiang rawh

source: Have they talked about it
target: An sawi tawh em

source: He smells the soup.
target: Soup chu a rim a.

source: But he said, Man, who made me a judge or a maker of decisions for you?
target: Nimahsela ani chuan a hnenah, Mihring, nangni chungah tuin nge roreltuah leh sum semtuah mi siam? a ti a.

source: And as for that which was broken, in place of which four came up, four kingdoms will come up from his nation, but not with his power.
target: Tin, an lalna hun hnuhnûng lama bawhchhetuten an vâwrtâwp an thlen hunah chuan, lal hmêl hlauhawm tak, thu khirhkhân thim mi a lo chhuak ang.

source: We smiled
target: Kan nuih a

source: I won't fail
target: Ka hlawhchham lovang

source: She doesn't eat beef.
target: Bawngsa a ei lo.

source: And there, at the memory of your ways and of all the things you did to make yourselves unclean, you will have bitter hate for yourselves because of all the evil things you have done.
target: Tin, tah chuan in awmdante leh in thiltih, in tihbawlhhlawhna zawng zawngte chu in hre tawh ang a, tichuan in thil țha lo tih zawng zawngte avâng khan nangmahni mithmuhngaiah in ten tawh ang.

source: We've been discovered
target: Kan hmuchhuak ta

source: But with loud cries, and stopping their ears, they made an attack on him all together,
target: Chutichuan anni chu aw ring takin an au va, an beng an hup a, rual takin an bei chiam a,

source: Do you send out the thunder-flames, so that they may go, and say to you, Here we are?
target: Kawlphete chu i hnêna lo kal a, Heta hi ka awm,' ti tûrin i tir chhuak thei êm ni?

source: Then the wrath of the Lord was burning against his people, and he was angry with his heritage.
target: Chuvangin LALPA thin chu a mite chungah a thawk a, A rochan chu a ten ta a.

source: And for me to have been as if I had not been; to have been taken from my mother's body straight to my last resting-place.
target: Awm lo ang mai ka lo ni ang a, chhul ata thlana lak ka lo ni mai tûr,

source: Are you wealthy yet?
target: I la hausa em?

source: I like sewing
target: Puanthui ka ngaina

source: He took Agag, king of the Amalekites, prisoner, and put all the people to the sword without mercy.
target: Tin, Amalek mite lal Agaga chu a nungin a man a, mipui zawng zawngte chu khandaihin a sat hlum vek a.

source: I've got it covered.
target: Ka khuh vek tawh.

source: Take it down
target: La thla rawh

source: But Jesus said to him, Let him do it, for he who is not against you is for you.
target: Isua erawh chuan a hnenah, Khap tawh suh u, tupawh nangni dodal lo chu in lama tang an ni si a, a ti a.

source: I am disgusting to them; they keep away from me, and put marks of shame on me.
target: Mi ten a, an inthiar fihlim a, Ka hmaa chil chhak pawh an tim lo.

source: It helps.
target: Mi pui a nia.

source: I'll try
target: Ka tichhin ang

source: And he gave us orders to give news of this to the people, and to give public witness that this is he whom God has made judge of the living and the dead.
target: Ani chu mitthite leh mi nungte chunga Roreltua Pathian ruat chu a ni tih, mi hnena tlangaupui leh hriattir turin Pathianin thu min pe a ni.

source: Solomon was king over Israel in Jerusalem for forty years.
target: Tin, Solomona chu Jerusalem-ah Israel mi zawng zawng chungah kum sâwmli a lal a.

source: Have another drink
target: In leh rawh

source: It is something my mother made.
target: Ka nu siam a ni.

source: Have you seen a man who seems to himself to be wise? There is more hope for the foolish than for him.
target: Mahni ngaiha fing inti i hmu thin êm? Chu mi ai chuan mi âah beiseiawm a awm tam zawk.

source: You don't write a psalm.
target: Sam i ziak lo.

source: Who is watching TV?
target: Tute nge TV en?

source: It was clear then to the father that this was the very time at which Jesus said to him, Your son is living. And he had faith in Jesus, he and all his family.
target: Chutichuan a pain Isuan a hnenah, I fapa chu a dam tawh e, a tih lai tak chu a ni tih a hre ta a; tin, amah leh a chhungten an zain an ring ta a.

source: Your hand is lifted up against those who are against you, and all your haters will be cut off.
target: Chumi nîah chuan heti hi a ni ang, LALPAN a ti, i lak ata i sakawrte ka tiboral ang a, i tawlailîrte ka tichhia ang:

source: He didn't want to play.
target: Inkhelh a duh lo.

source: Is there anything to eat
target: Ei tur a awm em

source: And on the fifteenth day of the seventh month let there be a holy meeting; do no field-work, and keep a feast to the Lord for seven days;
target: Tin, thla sarihna, ni sâwm leh ni nga niin inkhawmpui thianghlim in nei ang a; eng hna mah in thawk lo vang a, LALPA tan ni sarih in kut tur a ni:

source: I wasn't dreaming
target: Ka mumang a ni lo

source: They are turned here and there, rolling like a man who is full of wine; and all their wisdom comes to nothing.
target: Zu rui angin an thle an thle a, an pei thlawk thlawk a, Awm ngaihna rêng rêng an hre thin lo.

source: All these towns with their grass-lands the children of Israel gave by the decision of the Lord to the Levites, as the Lord had given orders by Moses.
target: Tin, Israela thlahte chuan LALPAN Mosia hmanga thu a pêk ang khan Levi mite chu khawpuite leh a daivelte chu thumvawrin an pe a.

source: Now Satan, designing evil against Israel, put into David's mind the impulse to take the number of Israel.
target: Tin, Setanan Israelte chu a bei ta a, Davida chu Israelte chiar duhna a neihtir a.

source: They are wandering like blind men in the streets, they are made unclean with blood, so that their robes may not be touched by men.
target: Mitdelin kawtthlêrahte an vakvai a, thisenin an bawlhhlawh a; Miten an silhfente an khawih theih loh hial khawpin.

source: What will you like to eat?
target: Enge i ei duh ang?

source: I feel pretty safe.
target: Ka him khawp mai.

source: Don't laugh
target: Nui suh

source: And Shebuel, the son of Gershom, the son of Moses, was controller of the stores.
target: Mosia fa Gersoma fapa Sebuela hu Sum dah khawmna in vawngtu a ni.

source: So that you are no longer a servant, but a son; and if a son, then the heritage of God is yours.
target: Chutichuan, bawih i ni tawh lo va, fa i ni zawk e: tin, fa i nih chuan Pathian zara roluahtu tur i ni.

source: I will fight
target: Ka bei zêl dawn

source: They hate me
target: Min hua a ni

source: He has not done these things for any other nation: and as for his laws, they have no knowledge of them. Let the Lord be praised.
target: Ani chuan eng hnam chungah mah chutiang chuan a ti ngai lo: A rorêl lah chu an hre hek lo. LALPA chu fak rawh u.

source: These are the two olive-trees and the two lights, which are before the Lord of the earth.
target: Chung chu oliv thing pahnih leh khawnvar dahna pahnih khawvel Lal hmaa dingte chu an ni.

source: And you will go out through the broken places, every one going straight before her, and you will be sent into Harmon, says the Lord.
target: Tin, bang pawpahte in kal chhuak ang a, mitin ngîl takin an kal ang; Harmon hmunah in paih ang, LALPA thu chuak chuan a ti.

source: The resting-place of Zebulun will be by the sea, and he will be a harbour for ships; the edge of his land will be by Zidon.
target: Zebuluna hian tuifinriat kamah awmhmun a khuar ang: Lawng chawlhna vaukam a ni ang; A ramri chu Zidon-ah a ni ang.

source: And Jesus said to him, Why do you say that I am good? No one is good, but only God.
target: Tin, Isuan a hnenah, Engati nge tha mi tih? mi pakhat chauh lo chu tumah tha an awm lo, chu chu Pathian a ni.

source: I run a lot
target: Ka tlan nasa

source: Hug Tom
target: Tom kuah rawh

source: Who were you protecting
target: Tute nge i humhim

source: He is waiting in the dark places of the towns: in the secret places he puts to death those who have done no wrong: his eyes are secretly turned against the poor.
target: Khaw tina chan rukna hmunahe a thu thin a: Hmun fianrialahte chuan pawikhawih lo mite a that thin: A mitin engmah ti thei lo mi chu a chang ru reng thin a ni.

source: And by the desire of all the people, the feast went on for another seven days, and they kept the seven days with joy.
target: Tin, mipui chuan ni sarih dang kut leh an rawt a; tichuan ni sari dang hlim takin an kut leh a.

source: Be content
target: Insawrbing rawh

source: And Israel went on his journey with all he had, and came to Beer-sheba, where he made offerings to the God of his father Isaac.
target: Tin, Israela chu a neih zawng zawng nên a chhuak a, Beerseba chu a thleng a, a pa Isaaka Pathian hnênah chuan inthawinate a hlân a.

source: And death will overtake you among strange nations, and the land of your haters will be your destruction.
target: Hnam dangte zingah in boral ang a, in hmelmate ram chuan a ei zo vang che u.

source: I haven't gotten dressed yet.
target: Ka la inchei lo.

source: Now Abimelech had not come near her; and he said, Lord, will you put to death an upright nation?
target: Abimeleka erawh chuan a la pâwl rih lo va: tichuan Lalpa, mi fel takte pawh i tihlum dâwn em ni?

source: Was that necessary
target: Chu chu a ṭûl em

source: Your dead bodies will be stretched out in this waste land; and of all your number, all those of twenty years old and over who have been crying out against me,
target: in ruangte chu he thlalerah hian a awm ang a; in zinga mi chhiar tawh zawng zawng, kum sawmhnih achin chung lam mi ka chunga phunnawiho zawng zawngte chu,

source: Do you need a hand
target: Kut i mamawh em

source: It's already 7 o'clock.
target: Dar 7 a ri tawh.

source: Belshazzar the king made a great feast for a thousand of his lords, drinking wine before the thousand.
target: Lal Belsazzara chuan a miropui sângkhatte ruai ropui tak a țhehsak a, sâng hmâah chuan uain a in a.

source: The heater doesn't work.
target: Heater a thawk lo.

source: For there are men who are not ruled by law; foolish talkers, false teachers, specially those of the circumcision,
target: Dan ang lova awm, thu sawi mai maite leh tihdertute mi tam tak an awm si a, serhtanho zinga mi an ni deuh ber;

source: And the town was shut in by their forces till the eleventh year of King Zedekiah.
target: Chutichuan lal Zedekia lal kum sâwm leh kum khatna thlengin khua chu an hual a.

source: They should fight
target: An bei tur a ni

source: I am eating pasta.
target: Pasta ka ei mek a ni.

source: She's getting old
target: A upa tawh hle mai

source: We laughed
target: Kan nui

source: And going away from the people, they took him with them, as he was, in the boat. And other boats were with him.
target: Tichuan, mipuite chu kalsanin, amah chu a awm pangngai ang chuan lawngah chuan an kalpui ta nghal a. Lawng dangte pawh a hnenah a awm a.

source: At the death of an upright man his hope does not come to an end, but the hope of the evil-doer comes to destruction.
target: Mi suaksual chu a thihin a hmachhuan chu a boral ang a, Thil tha lo titute nghahfak chu a boral ang.

source: Who is there still among you who saw this house in its first glory? and how do you see it now? is it not in your eyes as nothing?
target: He in hi a hmâa a ropui lai hmu in zingah tunge la awm? Tûnah hian eng ang in nge in hmuh le? In mit hmuh ah eng tham mah a ni lo lâwm ni?

source: Don't hide your face.
target: I hmel thup suh.

source: And the angel which I saw taking his position on the sea and on the earth, put up his right hand to heaven,
target: Tin, vantirhkoh, tuifinriat leh khawmuala ding ka hmuha chuan a kut ding lam chu van lamah a phar a,

source: Is it possible for a virgin to put out of her memory her ornaments, or a bride her robes? but my people have put me out of their memories for unnumbered days.
target: Nula chuan a incheimâwinate a theihnghilh theiin, Mo thar chuan a inthuamna a theihnghilh thei em ni? Ka mite erawh chuan ni chhiarsên loh chhûngin Mi lo theihnghilh ta.

source: So brother, let me have joy of you in the Lord: give new life to my heart in Christ.
target: A ni, unaupa, nangmah avangin Lalpaah chuan lawmna mi neihtir la; Kristaah chuan ka thinlung tiharh ang che.

source: Was it scary?
target: A hlauhawm em?

source: Don't buy it
target: Lei duh suh

source: I walk fast.
target: Ka kal chak.

source: They don't like to dance
target: An zai duh lo

source: And they saw the God of Israel; and under his feet there was, as it seemed, a jewelled floor, clear as the heavens.
target: Israela Pathian chu an han hmu a; tin, a kephah hnuai chu sapphir lungrem ang mai, a thianzia chu vân thiang vek ang mai hi a ni a.

source: Now Abraham was a hundred years old when the birth of Isaac took place.
target: Tin, Abrahama chu a fapa Isaaka a neih lai chuan kum 100 mi a ni a.

source: And Chenaniah, chief of the Levites, was master of the music: he gave directions about the song, because he was expert.
target: Tin, Levi-hi puipa Kenania chu hla sa hotu a ni a, a thiam avângin hla hruaitu ber a ni.

source: They aren't stupid
target: An â ve lo

source: All the ways of the Lord are mercy and good faith for those who keep his agreement and his witness.
target: A thuthlun leh athuhriattirte zamwtute tan chuan LALPA kalkawng zawng zawngte chu ngilneihna leh thutak vek a ni.

source: I cried, too
target: Keipawh ka ṭap

source: I've got cold feet.
target: Ke vawt ka nei a.

source: They asked me for something to drink.
target: In tur min dil a.

source: O you seed of Israel his servant, you children of Jacob, his loved ones.
target: Aw, a chhiahhlawh Israela thlahho,Jakoba thlah, a thlanate u.

source: My soul is sent far away from peace, I have no more memory of good.
target: Nangin muanna ata ka nunna i sawn daih a, thawvenna chu a eng a nih pawh ka hre ta lo.

source: We could die
target: Kan tithei ang

source: We hugged each other.
target: Kan inkuah a.

source: We were incorrect
target: Kan dik lo a ni

source: I'm not a fan of yours.
target: I fan ka ni lo.

source: For I was looking for good, and evil came; I was waiting for light, and it became dark.
target: thil tha ka zawng a, thil chhia a lo thleng a, Eng ka nghak a, thim alo thleng a.

source: You're not very tidy.
target: I ti fel vak lo.

source: I don't wanna get on.
target: Ka chuang duh lo.

source: We didn't learn anything.
target: Engmah kan zir lo.

source: Has God put away the memory of his pity? are his mercies shut up by his wrath? (Selah.
target: Pathian chuan khawngaih a theih nghilh êm ni aw? Thinurin a lainatnate chu a khar ta êm ni aw? Selah

source: For the material they had was enough and more than enough for all the work which had to be done.
target: An neih sa chu siam tul apiang siamna tur chuan a tawk hle mai a, a tam lutuk mah a ni.

source: One whose father and mother are not married may not come into the meeting of the Lord's people, or any of his family to the tenth generation.
target: Sawn chu LALPA mite pung khawm zingah an tel tur a ni lo; chhuan sawmna thlengin a thlahte chu LALPA mite pungkhawm zingah an tel tur a ni lo.

source: And Judah came together to make prayer for help from the Lord; from every town of Judah they came to give worship to the Lord.
target: Tichuan Judate chu LALPA tanpuina zawng zawngin an pung khâwm a; Juda khaw tin, atangin LALPA zawng tûrin an lo chhuak a.

source: There were too many people.
target: Mi an tam lutuk.

source: Men's strength will go from them in fear and in waiting for the things which are coming on the earth; for the powers of the heavens will be moved.
target: hlabar avang leh khawvela thil lo thleng tur chu ngaihtuah avangin mite an thidang ang; van thiltihtheihnate chu a nghing dawn si a.

source: And those who have been kept safe will come up from Mount Zion to be judges of the mountain of Esau; and the kingdom will be the Lord's.
target: Zion tlângah chuan Esauva tlâng rêlsak tûra chhan chhuaktute an lo chho vang a; tin, ram chu LALPA ta a ni ang.

source: And Hezekiah took the letter from the hands of those who had come with it; and after reading it, Hezekiah went up to the house of the Lord, opening the letter there before the Lord.
target: Tin, Hezekia chuan a mi tirhte kut ata lehkha hu a hmu a, a han chhiar a: tichuan Hezekia chu LALPA inah chuan a han lût a, LALPA hmaah chuan a pharha a.

source: Come back OK
target: Lo lêt rawh aw

source: And the man who takes away the goat for Azazel is to have his clothing washed and his body bathed in water and then he may come back to the tent-circle.
target: Tin, Azazela pual kel chhuahtu apiang chuan an puan an su ang a, an inbual ang a, chu mi zawhah chuan an awm hmun lamah an haw leh tur a ni.

source: I left.
target: Ka kal.

source: They will not eat meat.
target: Sa an ei lo vang.

source: You are a professor
target: Professor i ni a

source: They are extremists
target: Extremist an ni

source: So Saul sent him away, and made him a captain over a thousand; and he went about his business before the people.
target: Chuvang chuan Saula chuan a hnên atangin a insawntir a, sâng chunga a sipai hotuah a siam a; tin, mipui zingah chuan a lûtin a chhuak thin a.

source: This is the disciple who gives witness about these things and who put them in writing: and we have knowledge that his witness is true.
target: Chu zirtir chu heng thu hriattirtu leh ziaktu hi a ni; a thu hriattir hi dik tak a ni tih kan hria e.

source: And gave him the news of how Saul had put to death the Lord's priests.
target: Tin, Abiathara chuan Saulan LALPA puithiamte a thah thu chu Davida a hrilh a.

source: For the head of Aram is Damascus, and the head of Damascus is Rezin (and in sixty-five years from now Ephraim will be broken, and will no longer be a people:
target: Suria lu chu Damaska a ni a, Damaska lu chu Rezina lek a ni si a: kum sâwmruk leh kum nga ral hmain Ephraim chu chi tih tlak lovah aawm tûrin tihchhiat vekin a awm ang:

source: And they gave Hebron to Caleb, as Moses had said; and he took the land of the three sons of Anak, driving them out from there.
target: Tin, Mosian a lo sawi tawh angin Hebron khua chu Kaleba an pe a: chuta mi Anaka fapa te pathum chu a hnawt chhuak a.

source: He has a blue coat on
target: Coat dum a ha a

source: Did Tom laugh?
target: Tom a nui em?

source: I'm still thirsty
target: Ka la tuihal

source: Give us, then, your opinion of this: Is it right to give tax to Caesar, or not?
target: Chutichuan, engtin nge i ngaih? Min hrilh teh khai! Kaisara hnena chhiah chawi hi a thiang nge thiang lo? an ti a.

source: My loved one, you are doing a good work in being kind to those brothers who come from other places;
target: Duh tak, unaute, mikhual ni mahsela, an chunga i tih apiangah rinawm takin i ti thin a;

source: He skipped a year.
target: Kum khat a skip a.

source: I struck out
target: Ka khêng thla

source: No, but with broken talk, and with a strange tongue, he will give his word to this people:
target: A ni, nimahsela hmui danglam pu mi hmangin, tawng hrangin, heng mite hnênah hian thu a sawi tawh zawk ang:

source: Then David got up and went in flight that day for fear of Saul, and went to Achish, the king of Gath.
target: Chutichuan Davida chu a tho va, chu mi ni chuan Saula hlauvin atlan bo va, Gath lal Akisa hnênah akal ta a.

source: Don't split hairs.
target: Sam inthen suh.

source: Wait for me
target: Min lo nghak rawh

source: Then the ruler, when he saw what was done, had faith, being full of wonder at the teaching of the Lord.
target: Tin, lal aiawhtu chuan chu thiltih chu a hmu a, Lalpa zirtir thu chu mak a ti hle a, a ring ta a.

source: In their hands they will keep you up, so that your foot may not be crushed against a stone.
target: An kutin an dawm ang chia, Chutilochuan i kein lung i chhuih dah ang e.

source: Don't be mad
target: A suh

source: Your place or mine?
target: I hmun nge ka ta?

source: It's not for sale.
target: Hralh tur a ni lo.

source: She was wearing a new hat.
target: Kawr thar a ha a.

source: How do I fix that?
target: Chu chu engtin nge ka siam that ang?

source: She didn't know that.
target: Chu chu a hre lo.

source: I can answer that.
target: Chu chu ka chhang thei a ni.

source: Call a taxi
target: Taxi ko rawh

source: Then Moses and Joshua his servant got up; and Moses went up into the mountain of God.
target: Tin, Mosia leh a rawngbâwltu Josua chu an tho va: tin, Mosia chu Pathian tlângah chuan a han kal a.

source: I'll flip you for it.
target: Ka flip ang che.

source: If any man makes use of a tongue, let it not be more than two, or at the most three, and in turn; and let someone give the sense:
target: Tupawhin tawng hriat lohva thu an sawi chuan pahnihin emaw, a tam berin pathumin emaw ni sela, inchhawk zelin ni bawk rawh se; tin, mi pakhatin hrilhfiah rawh se;

source: And they took them into the Sanhedrin, and the high priest said to them,
target: Tin, an rawn hruai thlen chuan roreltuho hmaah chuan an dintir a. Tin, Puithiam Lalber chuan an hnenah.

source: They all sat
target: An vaiin an thu

source: I hate idiots
target: Mi mawlte ka hua

source: Do you mean to go?
target: Kal tihna em ni?

source: Have a taste
target: Tem chhin teh

source: My hate for them is complete; my thoughts of them are as if they were making war on me.
target: Anni chu huat tak tein ka hua a: Mi dotu-ahte ka ruat hlawm a.

source: Every man is to give as he is able, in the measure of the blessing which the Lord your God has given you.
target: LALPA in Pathianin malsawmna a dawntir che u ang zelin mi tinin an theih ang tawk an pe tur a ni.

source: I won't stay
target: Ka cham lovang

source: And the Lord was seen in the Tent in a pillar of cloud resting by the door of the Tent.
target: Tin, LALPA chu Puan Inah chuan chhumdingin a inlâr a; tin, chhumding chu Puan In kawngka lu chungah chuan a din ga.

source: May he have long life, and may gold from Sheba be given to him: may prayers be made for him at all times; may blessings be on him every day.
target: Tin, an nung ang a: Sheba ram rangkachak chu amah pêk ani ang a; Miten ani chu an tawngtaisak fo vang a; Nilengin mal an sawmsak ang.

source: Who is able to say, I have made my heart clean, I am free from my sin?
target: Ka thinlung ka tithianghlim a, Ka sual lakah ka thianghlim, tunge ti thei?

source: We were out together.
target: Kan chhuak dun a.

source: If any part of the dead body of one of these gets on to any seed for planting, it is clean;
target: Tin, chi, chin tur reng reng chu an ruang a englai pawhin lo delh ta ang sela, a bawlhhlawh lo va.

source: How long, you simple ones, will foolish things be dear to you? and pride a delight to the haters of authority? how long will the foolish go on hating knowledge?
target: Nangni mi mawlte u, eng chen nge mawlna in ngainat dawn? Eng chen nge hmusittute hmuhsitnaah in hlim ang a, Mi âten finna in huat dawn?

source: The Lord has more love for the doors of Zion than for all the tents of Jacob.
target: LALPA chuan Zion kulh kawngkhârte chu Jakob-ho awmna zawng zawng aiin a ngaina zakw a ni.

source: To do acts of mercy to our fathers and to keep in mind his holy word,
target: Kan thlahtute khawngaih nan leh A thuthlung thianghlim hriat reng nan;

source: Give attention to yourselves, and to all the flock which the Holy Spirit has given into your care, to give food to the church of God, for which he gave his blood.
target: Pathian kohhranho, ama thisena a leite chu chawm turin nangmahni leh in hote zawng zawng chungah chuan fimkhur rawh u, Thlarau Thianghlimin an chunga hotuah a siam che u hi.

source: And the sons of Pedaiah: Zerubbabel and Shimei; and the sons of Zerubbabel: Meshullam and Hananiah; and Shelomith was their sister;
target: Tin, Pedaia fapate chu Zerubabela leh Simeia an ni; tin, Zerubabela fapate chu Mesulama leh Hanania an ni a; tin, Selomithi chu an farnu a ni;

source: I have seen enough.
target: Ka hmu tawk tawh.

source: O have love for the Lord, all you his saints; for the Lord keeps safe from danger all those who are true to him, and gives the workers of pride their right reward.
target: Aw, a mi thianghlim zawng zawngte u, LALPA chu hmangaih rawh u: LALPA chuan mi rinawm chu a humhim a, Chapo taka titu chu nasa takin a rul thin.

source: And there was no more war till the thirty-fifth year of the rule of Asa.
target: Tin, Asa lal lai kum sâwmthum leh kum nga chhûng chuan indo rêng rêng a awm lo va.

source: Trust no one
target: Tumah ring rawh

source: He does not like us.
target: Min duh lo.

source: Do it
target: Ti rawh

source: In their streets they are covering themselves with haircloth: on the tops of their houses, and in their public places, there is crying and bitter weeping.
target: An kawtthlêrahte chuan saiip puan an veng a: an in chungahte leh an mual zau laiahte chuan mi tin chu nasa taka tapin an chiau vâk vâk a.

source: Now the Pharisees, and all the Jews, do not take food without washing their hands with care, keeping the old rule which has been handed down to them:
target: Pharisaite leh Judaho zawng zawng chuan upate thurochhiah chu an pawm tlat avangin an kut ngun taka an sil loh chuan an ei ngai si lo va.

source: She used a compass.
target: Compass a hmang a.

source: I'd do it.
target: Ka ti ang.

source: And they came down to Ephesus and he left them there: and he himself went into the Synagogue and had a discussion with the Jews.
target: Tin, Ephesi khua chu an thleng a, chutah chuan anni chu a hnutchhiah ta a; ani erawh chu inkhawmna inah a lut a, Judate hnenah khun takin thu a sawi rih a.

source: I was not in the mood.
target: Ka mood a ni lo.

source: Erastus was stopping at Corinth; but Trophimus, when I last saw him was at Miletus, ill.
target: Erasta chu Korinth khuaah chuan a awm ta reng a, Trophima erawh chu Mileti khuaah dam lovin ka kalsan ta a.

source: The clock does not run.
target: Darkar a tlan lo.

source: It's really late
target: A tlai tawh takzet

source: But if he has no desire to get it back, or if he has given it for a price to another man, it may not be got back again.
target: Lo chu a tlan duh lo emaw, mi dang hnenah a hralh emaw a nih chuan tlan leh theih a ni tah lo vang:

source: Tom smiled
target: Toma a nui

source: But still they did not give up the sin of Jeroboam, which he made Israel do, but went on with it; and there was an image of Asherah in Samaria.
target: Amaherawhchu Israelte thil tihsualtira a tih Jeroboama chhûngteho sualnate kha an kalsan lo va, an la ching ta reng zâwk a; tin, Samari khuaah chuan Aseri pawh chu a la awm reng ngeh nghe a.

source: Be glad in the Lord with joy, you upright men; give cries of joy, all you whose hearts are true.
target: Mi felte u, LALPA-ah chuan hlimin lawm ula: Thinlung dik tak pu zawng zawngte u, hlimin au rawh u.

source: Are you watching me
target: Min en reng em

source: The mountains came up and the valleys went down into the place which you had made ready for them.
target: Tlângahte a chho va, kawrahte a chhuk a, A tan hmun i buatsaih lamah chuan.

source: Did Tom fall?
target: Tom a tlu em ni?

source: Let me be
target: Keimah ka lo ni ang

source: I don't feel like getting up.
target: Ka tho duh lo.

source: And Judah went with Simeon, his brother, and overcame the Canaanites living in Zephath, and put it under the curse; and he gave the town the name of Hormah.
target: Tin, Juda chu a unau Simeona nen an thawk a, Zephath kihuaa awm Kanaan-ho chu an that a, an tichimit vek a. Chu khawpui hming chu Horma an ti.

source: By him the waters are shut up in his thick clouds, and the cloud does not give way under them.
target: A chhum chah tak chuan tuite a fun khâwm a, An hnuaia chhum chu a keh lo va.

source: Don't scream in my ear!
target: Ka bengah au suh!

source: There was no end of all the people, of all those whose head he was, but they who come later will have no delight in him. This again is to no purpose and desire for wind.
target: lalin chhiar sen loh chungah ro a rel thei e, mahse a hnuah chuan tumah a chungah an lawm lo. Hei pawh hi engmah lo leh thil lothlawn a lo ni ngei mai!

source: I felt uneasy
target: Nuamlo ka ti

source: It's for charity
target: Charity atan a ni

source: For what is our hope or joy or crown of glory? Are not even you, before our Lord Jesus, at his coming?
target: kan beiseina emaw, kan hlimna emaw, kan lallukhum chhuan emaw engnge ni le? A lo kal hunah kan Lalpa Isua hmaah chuan nangmahni ngei in ni dawn lawm ni?

source: The law of the Lord is good, giving new life to the soul: the witness of the Lord is certain, giving wisdom to the foolish.
target: LALPA dan chu a tha famkim a, nunna suam tha thin: LALPA thuhriattir chu a rinawm a, mi mawl a tifing thin;

source: Who ever went against me, and got the better of me? There is no one under heaven!
target: Tunge ka rulh leh tûra thil mi pe hmasa awm? Van hnuaia thil engkim hi ka ta a ni.

source: You're very helpful
target: I ṭangkai lûtuk

source: I should sing.
target: Ka zai a ngai.

source: Every one from thirty to fifty years old who is able to do the work of the Tent of meeting.
target: kum sawmthun a chin chung lam kum sawmnga mi thlengin inbiakna puan ina thawk tur zat i chhiar vek tur a ni.

source: We're strong
target: Kan chak

source: I'm painting
target: Rawng ka hnawih

source: I need coffee
target: Coffee ka mamawh

source: He whose ways are upright will go safely, but he whose ways are twisted will be made low.
target: Ngil taka kal chu, muanawm takin a kal thin a, A kawng tikhawlotu erawh chu hriat chhuahin a awm ang.

source: We didn't change the rules.
target: Dan kan thlak lo.

source: Then Boaz said to his servant who was in authority over the cutters, Whose girl is this?
target: Chutichuan Boaza chuan a chhiahhlawh, buhsengtute chunga hotu hnênah chuan, Hei khawi lam nula nge ni le? a ti a.

source: Anyone who is in him does no sin; anyone who is a sinner has not seen him and has no knowledge of him.
target: Tupawh amaha awm reng chuan thil a tisual lo; tupawh thil tisual chuan amah chu a hmu lo va, hriat pawh a hre hek lo.

source: The words of the Lord are true words: like silver tested by fire and burned clean seven times.
target: LALPA thute hi thu thianghlim tak a ni; Tangka, lei chunga rawhtuina meia fiah a, Vawi sarih tihthianghlim tawh hnu ang hi a ni.

source: I can already dance.
target: Ka zai thei tawh.

source: And we made rules for ourselves, taxing ourselves a third of a shekel every year for the upkeep of the house of our God;
target: Tin, kan Pathianin in lama rawngbawlna atân sekel hmun thuma thena hmun khat kum tina pêk tûrin dan kan insiam bawk a.

source: You didn't warn me.
target: Min vaukhân lo.

source: To do what is right and true is more pleasing to the Lord than an offering.
target: Inthawina aiin dik tak leh fel taka rorêl chu LALPA tan a pawmawm zawk.

source: In the first war-carriage were red horses; and in the second, black horses;
target: Tawlailir pakhatnaa mi chu sakawr sen an ni a, tawlailir pahnihnaa mi chu sakawr dum an ni a,

source: He who gets in the grain has no use for it; and they do not make bands of it for the grain-stems.
target: Tuman chu chu an at khâwm lova Tuman seng tûrin an tel hek lo.

source: He is nasty.
target: Mi tha a ni lo.

source: And they will put haircloth round them, and deep fear will be covering them; and shame will be on all faces, and the hair gone from all their heads.
target: Saiip puan an fêng ang a, râpnain an mahni a tuam ang a, hmêl zawng zawngah zahna a lang ang a, an lu zawng zawng a kawng fai vek ang.

source: They'll cheer you up
target: An ti lawm ang che

source: As a dream comes from much business, so the voice of a foolish man comes with words in great number.
target: Buaina tam tak chu mangphan a ni nge nge si a, thu tuitam vâk lah chu mi â aw chhuak a ni mai.

source: For I have been troubled all the day; every morning have I undergone punishment.
target: Nilengin sawisakin ka awm a, Tuk tin, zilhhauvin ka awm si a.

source: I did do that.
target: Kha kha ka tih alâwm.

source: And the children of Joseph, Manasseh and Ephraim, took their heritage.
target: Tichuan Josefa thlahte manase leh Ephraim chite chuan chanpualah a nei ta a.

source: I love pizza
target: Pizza ka duh

source: She studies English
target: English a zir a

source: They killed themselves
target: An intihlum a

source: They will go, with their flocks and their herds, in search of the Lord, but they will not see him; he has taken himself out of their view.
target: An berâm rualte leh an sebâwng rualte nên. LALPA zawng tûrin an kal ang a, Nimahsela ani chu an hmu lo vang, An lak ațangin a inla fihlîm tawh a ni.

source: The sixth Bukkiah, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi rukna chu Bukia chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: He has put on high the horn of his people, for the praise of all his saints; even the children of Israel, a people which is near to him. Let the Lord be praised.
target: A mite ki chu a chawimawi bawk a, A mi thianghlim zawng zawng fakna chu; Israel fa, a kianga mite fakna chu, LALPA chu fak rawh u.

source: Dan is a linguist
target: Dan hi linguist a ni a

source: So he took the young child and his mother by night, and went into Egypt;
target: Tichuan, a tho va, a zan a zanin naute leh a nu chu a hruai a, Aigupta ramah a kal ta a;

source: They'll know
target: An hre mai ang

source: I am Chinese.
target: Chinese ka nia.

source: They are drinking water.
target: Tui an in a.

source: And Ahab, the son of Omri, did evil in the eyes of the Lord, even worse than all who went before him.
target: Tin, Omria fapa Ahaba chuan a hmaa mite zawng zawng aiin LALPA mithmuin thil tha lo tak a ti thin a.

source: What I am saying is for wise men, do you be the judges of it.
target: Mi fingte hnena sawi angin ka sawi a ni; ka thusawi hi ngaihtuah rawh u.

source: So I make request to you to take food; for this is for your salvation: not a hair from the head of any of you will come to destruction.
target: Chuvangin chaw ei atan ka tir chiam a che u; in damna tur a nih hi; in zingah tumah a samzai pakhat mah a boral lo vang, a ti a.

source: And those who go by do not say, The blessing of the Lord be on you; we give you blessing in the name of the Lord.
target: LALPA malsawmna in chungah awm rawh se; LALPA hmingin mal kan sawm che u hi, A kal peltuten an ti ngei hek lo.

source: So that the kingdom might be made low with no power of lifting itself up, but might keep his agreement to be his servants.
target: a lalna ram a tlâwma, amaha a din chhuah tawh loh nân, a thuthlung vuan chung chauhva a din theihna tûrin.

source: We looked up
target: Kan ngai sang

source: black market
target: zawrh rukna

source: They've come back
target: An rawn kîr leh ta

source: Are you dying?
target: I thi mêk a mi?

source: And I made a request to your disciples to send it out of him, but they were not able to do it.
target: Tin, i zirtirte hnenah hnawt chhuak turin ka ngen a; an thei si lo va, a ti a.

source: I'm being blackmailed
target: Ka blackmail a ni

source: I caught a head cold.
target: Lu ka vawt a.

source: Give ear to me, O Lord, and have mercy on me: Lord, be my helper.
target: Aw LALPA, ngaithla la, mi khawngaih ang che: LALPA, nang mi tanpuitu ni ang che.

source: I wore a hat
target: Lukhum ka khum

source: He gave them ice for rain, and flaming fire in their land.
target: An hnênah ruah aiah rial a pe a, An ramah chuan mei alh zawk zawk a pe ta bawk a.

source: He makes rivers into waste places, and springs of water into a dry land;
target: Ani chuan luipuite chu thlalêrah a chantir thin a, Tuihnate chu lei rovah a chantir bawk thin.

source: And I will make of you a great nation, blessing you and making your name great; and you will be a blessing:
target: tichuan chi ropui takah ka siam ang chia, mal pawh ka sâwm ang chia, i hming ka tiropui bawk ang; tin, nang malsâwmna ni ang che:

source: If a man is not turned from his evil, he will make his sword sharp; his bow is bent and ready.
target: Mi a hawikir loh zawngin ani chuan a khandaih a tat hriam ang; A thal ngul chu a kuai a, a peih ta.

source: Get lost
target: Kal bo rawh

source: How did you do that
target: Engtin nge i tih a

source: The pain of death is sin; and the power of sin is the law:
target: Thihna tur chu sual a ni a; sual thiltihtheihna chu dan thu chu a ni.

source: For when you take your food, everyone takes his meal before the other; and one has not enough food, and another is the worse for drink.
target: mi tinin in eiin mahni zanriah in ei hmasa si thin a; tichuan mi pakhat ril a tam a, mi pakhat a rui si a.

source: And he said, All these things I have done from the time when I was a boy.
target: Tin, ani chuan, Chung thu zawng zawng chu ka naupan tet ata ka zawm zel thin, a ti a.

source: But the people living in the land are strong, and the towns are walled and very great; further, we saw the children of Anak there.
target: Amaherawhchu a rawn mi awmte chu mi chak pui pui an ni a. khuate pawh kulh nei, ropui tak tak a ni: tin, Ananka thlahte pawh kan hmu bawk a.

source: I'm calling my lawyer.
target: Ka ukil ka ko a.

source: I am a widow.
target: Hmeithai ka nia.

source: And they put them together in masses, and a bad smell went up from the land.
target: Tin, an chhar khâwm a, an dah vum thur mai a: tichuan a ram uihin a lo uih ta a.

source: For this cause the cords of my heart are sounding for Moab, and I am full of sorrow for Kir-heres.
target: chuvangin ka rilte hi Moab khawngaih avângin țingțang angin a ri a, ka kawchhûng chu Kir-heres khawngaih avângin țingțang angin a ribawk a.

source: This is the sense of the words: Mene; your kingdom has been numbered by God and ended.
target: Tin, hei hi a hrilhfiahna chu a ni: MENE: Pathianin i ram chu a chhût zo ta a, a tâwp a thlen ta.

source: And this voice came from heaven even to our ears, when we were with him on the holy mountain.
target: Tin, tlang thianghlimah chuan a hnena kan awm lai khan chu aw chu van atangin a lo chhuak keimahni ngeiin kan hria a ni.

source: He has two houses
target: In pahnih a nei a

source: Urinary retention
target: Zun im

source: I'm perfectly fine
target: Ka ṭha famkim

source: I applied for a visa.
target: Visa ka dil a.

source: For my eyes are on all their ways: there is no cover for them from my face, and their evil-doing is not kept secret from my eyes.
target: An awm dan zawng zawngahte chuan ka mit a fu reng si a; ka lakah thupin an awm lo va, an khawlohnate pawh ka mit lakah thuhrûk a ni hek lo.

source: They were perfect
target: An ṭha famkim a ni

source: Let your lamb be without a mark, a male in its first year: you may take it from among the sheep or the goats:
target: In berâm no chu a pa, kum khat hnuai lam, hmêlhem lo a ni tûr a ni: berâm zînga mi emaw kel zînga mi emaw a ni tûr a ni a:

source: Now these are your servants and your people, whom you have made yours by your great power and by your strong hand.
target: Tin, hengho hi i chhiahhlawhte leh i mite, i thiltihtheihna nasa tak leh i kut chak taka i tlan chhuahte an ni a.

source: We aren't sleeping.
target: Kan muhil lo.

source: I sing tenor.
target: Tenor ka sa.

source: Are your hands clean?
target: I kut a fai em?

source: They were fighting
target: An insual a

source: Am I a sea, or a sea-beast, that you put a watch over me?
target: Tuipui nge maw ka nih a, tuipui rulpui nge maw ka nih a, Nangin mi enthlatu i dah ni?

source: The Lord will keep watch over your going out and your coming in, from this time and for ever.
target: LALPA chuan i chhuak leh i lût chu a veng ang che, Tun atanga, kumkhuain.

source: And said to him, This is the word of Jephthah: Israel did not take away the land of Moab or the land of the children of Ammon;
target: a hnênah, Jephthan heti hian at i e, 'Israel-hote Moab ram an laksak lo va, Amona thlahte ram pawh an laksak hek lo:

source: And Saul's fear of David became all the greater, and he went on hating him, day by day.
target: Tichuan Saula chua nDavida chu a hlau zual ta sauh mai a; Saula chu Davida hmêlma ani ta kumkhua a.

source: Get in here!
target: Hetah lût rawh!

source: They like to stay informed.
target: Hriat reng an duh.

source: No deaths were reported.
target: Thi an awm lo.

source: Give my love to the brothers in Laodicea and to Nymphas and the church in their house.
target: Loadikei khuaa unau awmte kha chibai mi buksak ang che u; Numpha leh a ina kohhranho chu chibai mi buksak bawk ang che u.

source: And the seven angels who had the seven punishments came out from the house of God, clothed with linen, clean and bright and with bands of gold about their breasts.
target: tichuan, pindan chhungnung atang chuan hremna pasarih keng vantirhkoh pasarihte chu, puan thianghlim var tak sinin, an awma rangkachak kawnghrena inhrengin an lo chhuak a.

source: From generation to generation you are to give to the Lord a lifted offering from the first of your rough meal.
target: In thlahte thlengin in chhang hmeh hmasak ber chu LALPA hnena then thilhlan atan in hlan zel tur a ni.

source: Wives, be ruled by your husbands; so that even if some of them give no attention to the word, their hearts may be changed by the behaviour of their wives,
target: Chutiang bawkin nangni nupuite u, mahni pasalte thu thuin awm rawh u; chutichuan an zinga tupawhin thu chu awih lo mah sela, thu lovin an nupuite chetziaa hnehin an awm thei ang,

source: We're strict
target: Kan khauh

source: He's a journalist
target: Journalist a ni a

source: And in that day those whose ears are stopped will be hearing the words of the book; and the eyes of the blind will see through the mist and the dark.
target: Chumi niah chuan bengngawngte chuan lehkhabu thute chu an bengin an hre tawh ang a, mitdel mitte chuan thim hnuai leh thim zing ațangin a hmu tawh ang.

source: Before you were formed in the body of your mother I had knowledge of you, and before your birth I made you holy; I have given you the work of being a prophet to the nations.
target: Pum chhûnga ka siam hmâ chein ka hria che a, Chhûl ata i chuah hmâ pawhin ka serh hrang che a, Hnamte hnêna zâwlneiah ka ruat tawh a che, tiin.

source: She is a prophetic figure.
target: Zâwlnei tak a ni.

source: Can Tom do it?
target: Tom chuan a ti thei ang em?

source: The poor man is hated even by his neighbour, but the man of wealth has numbers of friends.
target: Mi rethei chu a thenawmte ngei pawhin an hua a, Mi hausa erawh chuan thian tam an nei.

source: I hate fish
target: Sangha ka hua

source: You have now been with your brothers for a long time; till this day you have been doing the orders of the Lord your God.
target: hei lehchen hi vawiin thlengin in unauteho chu in thlahthlam lo va, LALPA in Pathianin tih tura thu apêk che u in zawm thin a.

source: I've already tested them.
target: Ka test tawh a.

source: And Judah did evil in the eyes of the Lord, and made him more angry than their fathers had done by their sins.
target: Juda-ho chuan LALPA mithmuhin thil sual an ti a; an pute thiltih zawng zawng khûma an sualnate chuan a thikthu a chawhthawhsak a.

source: For I give you good teaching; do not give up the knowledge you are getting from me.
target: Zirtirna tha tak ka fah si che u a; ka zirtirna hi hawisan suh u.

source: She begged for something to drink.
target: In tur a dil a.

source: The public place of his town has no more knowledge of him, and his name has gone from the memory of men: he is rooted up like a dead tree.
target: Chhulin a theihnghilh a, changpatin tui takin a ei a, Hriat reng a ni tawh lo vang a, Suahsualna chu thing angin a tliang a.

source: Be not slow in your work, but be quick in spirit, as the Lord's servants;
target: taihmak kawngah chuan thatchhe suh ula; thlarau kawngah chuan thahnemngai ula; Lalpa rawng bawl ula;

source: Don't call the police.
target: Police ko suh.

source: You put up your high places at the top of every street, and made the grace of your form a disgusting thing, opening your feet to everyone who went by, increasing your loose ways.
target: Kawtthlêr lu apiangah hmun langsarte chu i sa a, i mawina chu i tenawmnaah i siam a, veivak apiang hnênah i hlim lang a, i hurna chu a zual țhin a ni.

source: But if you take a man's position into account, you do evil, and are judged as evil-doers by the law.
target: amaherawhchu mi thlei bik in neih chuan in tisual a ni, Danin bawhchhetu-ah a chantir si che u a.

source: They were not invited
target: Sawm an ni lo

source: For everything there is a fixed time, and a time for every business under the sun.
target: Engkim tan hian hun ruat a awm a, van hnuaia thiltih zawng zawng tan hun remchâng a awm:

source: I was scared
target: Ka hlau a

source: She wore a red dress.
target: Puan sen a ha a.

source: Unhappy is the land whose king is a boy, and whose rulers are feasting in the morning.
target: I chung a pik e, nang ram, lal naupang leh Hotute zinga ruaitheh thin neitu!

source: I'm reserved
target: Hauh tawh ka nia

source: I'm not sure if I'm right.
target: Keipawh ka ti a.

source: Don't eat it.
target: Kha kha ei suh.

source: Then my wrath will be burning against you, and I will give you punishment, I myself, seven times for your sins.
target: thinrim takin nangmahnikalhzawngin ka awm ang a; in sual avangin vawi sarih ka hrem bawk ang che u.

source: And when they had got their boats to the land, they gave up everything and went after him.
target: Tin, an lawngte chu vaukamah an hruai kai a, engkim kalsanin amah chu an zui ta a.

source: Your hand has been against the men of pride, a curse is on those who go wandering out of your way.
target: Mi chapo, ânchhe dawngte chu, i zilhhau va, I thupêkte vah bosan thinte chu.

source: Who were seen in glory and were talking of his death which was about to take place in Jerusalem.
target: ropuinaa inthuamin an inlar a, Jerusalem khuaa a thih tleitlakna tur thu an sawi a.

source: He is teaching me.
target: Min zirtir a ni.

source: Do not be a lover of sleep, or you will become poor: keep your eyes open, and you will have bread enough.
target: Mut thlahlel suh, i lo pachhe dah ang e; I mit meng la, tichuan chhâng kham khawp i nei dawn nia.

source: I felt it
target: Ka hre thei

source: A hated woman when she is married; and a servant-girl who takes the place of her master's wife.
target: Hmeichhe huatthlala takin pasal a lo neih a, Chhiahhhlawh nulain a pi ro a luahin.

source: It's all connected.
target: A inzawm vek a ni.

source: And when the ship got into the grip of it, and was not able to make headway into the wind, we gave way, and went before it.
target: Tin, lawng chu a rawn nam fuh a, thli lam a hawi theih loh veleh kan thlah ta a, min len min len ta mai a.

source: And because of the wrath of the Lord, this came about in Jerusalem and Judah, till he had sent them all away from before him: and Zedekiah took up arms against the king of Babylon.
target: LALPA thinurna avângin a hmu phak lova a thehthang bo thlengin Jerusalem leh Juda chungah thil a lo thleng zel a ni; Zedekia chu Babulon lal chungah chuan a hel ta a.

source: And at Salamis they were preaching the word of God in the Synagogues of the Jews: and John was with them, helping them.
target: Tin, Salamis khuaa an awm laiin Juda inkhawmna inahte Pathian thu an hril thin a; Johana pawh kha an rawng bawl turin an hruai ve a.

source: You have overcome all those who are wandering from your rules; for all their thoughts are false.
target: I thuruatte vah bosantu zawng zawng chu i hmusit a; An bumna hchu dawt a ni si a.

source: I'm having too much fun.
target: Ka hlim lutuk.

source: And his witness is this, that God has given us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.
target: Hriattirna chu hei hi a ni, Pathianin chatuana nunna min pe a, chu mi nunna chu a Fapaah a awm a ni.

source: They will have no resting-place in the Lord's land, but Ephraim will go back to Egypt, and they will take unclean food in Assyria.
target: LALPA ramah chuan an chêng lo vang a,Ephraim chu Aigupta lamah a kîr zâwk ang a, Assuria ramah chaw thiang lo an ei ang.

source: Let not your hearts be hard, as at Meribah, as in the day of Massah in the waste land;
target: Meriba-a an tih ang khan in thinlung tikahuh suh u, Thlalêra Masa ni ang khan:

source: How much are they?
target: Engzât man te nge?

source: It's what they all say
target: An sawi vek a ni

source: So the wise will say nothing in that time; for it is an evil time.
target: Chuti chuan mifing chu chutiang hunah chuan a ngawi reng a, hun țha lo a nih avângin.

source: Don't let go of me.
target: Min thlah suh.

source: Have a taste
target: Ei rawh

source: On the ninth day Abidan, the son of Gideoni, chief of the children of Benjamin:
target: Ni kua ni chuan Benjamia thlah Gideonia fapa Abidana chuan a hlan a:

source: I can't hear them
target: Anmahni chu ka hre thei lo

source: And no one has ever gone up to heaven but he who came down from heaven, the Son of man.
target: Vanah tumah an lawn ngai lo, van atanga lo chhuka chauh lo hi chu, Mihring Fapa vana awm hi.

source: He loves toys
target: Inkhualtelemna a duh

source: It's so different
target: A danglam lûtuk

source: Take whatever you want.
target: I duh duh la rawh.

source: A man's offering makes room for him, letting him come before great men.
target: Mi â thilpêkin kawng a tihkuaksak a, Mi ropuite hmaah a hruai lut thin.

source: And he took us out from that place, guiding us here to give us this land, as he said in his oath to our fathers.
target: keini erawh chu min pêk tura kan pi leh pute hnena chhia a lo chham ram chu min pêk theih nan chuta ta chu min hruai chhuak a.

source: You're fun
target: I nuihzatthlak

source: For if Joshua had given them rest, he would not have said anything about another day.
target: Josua chuan anniho chu a chawlhtir tawh si zawngin, chu mi hnuah chuan ni dang thu chu a sawi lo vang.

source: A true witness does not say what is false, but a false witness is breathing out deceit.
target: Hretu dik chu a daw lo vang a, Hretu dik lo erawh chuan dawt a phuh chhuak thin.

source: And the land which I gave to Abraham and Isaac, I will give to you; and to your seed after you I will give the land.
target: tin, Abrahama leh Isaaka ram ka pêk hi ka pe ang che, i awm loh hnua i thlahte pawh ram hi ka pe zêl ang, a ti a.

source: There is the sound of crying from Horonaim, wasting and great destruction;
target: Horonaim ațanga au thawm, Rawkral leh tihchhiatna nasa tak mai chu.

source: He's really drunk
target: A rui tak zet a ni

source: I haven't graduated yet
target: Ka la graduate lo

source: You're bossy
target: I thuneih hmêl

source: Then all the meeting of the children of Israel, hearing this, came together at Shiloh to go up against them to war.
target: Tin, chu chu Israela thlahteho chuan an lo hriatin, Israela thalhate mipuiho zawng zawng chu anmahni han do tumin Silo khuaah an inkhawm ta chiam a.

source: He gives them his blessing so that they are increased greatly, and their cattle do not become less.
target: Anni chu mal a samw thin a, chutichuan nasa taka tihpunin an awm a; An rante chu a hmuh a phal thin lo va.

source: It hasn't a clue.
target: Clue a nei lo.

source: Go to sleep
target: Mu turin kal rawh

source: Did you draw this?
target: Hei hi i draw em?

source: I just stayed put
target: Ka awm reng mai

source: But let the right go rolling on like waters, and righteousness like an ever-flowing stream.
target: Nimahsela rorêlna dik chu lui angin luang sela, felna chu luipui kang ngai lo angin luang rawh se.

source: The word about Nineveh. The book of the vision of Nahum the Elkoshite.
target: Ninevi khaw phur rit chu. Elkos mi Nahuma inlârna hmuh bu chu.

source: And Topheth, in the valley of the sons of Hinnom, he made unclean, so that no man might make his son or his daughter go through the fire to Molech.
target: Tin, tumahin an fapa emaw, an fanu emaw Moleka puala meia an luhtir tawh lohna tûrin, Hinoma thlahte ruama Topeth chu a tibawrhbang a.

source: But the cattle and the goods from that town, Israel took for themselves, as the Lord had given orders to Joshua.
target: LALPAN Josua thu a pêk a, tih tur a tih ang ngei khan chu khawpuia rante leh râllâkte chauh chu Israel-hote chuan anmahni pualah an nei a.

source: What are we drinking
target: Eng nge kan in a

source: He can't be bribed
target: Bribe a ni thei lo

source: Now when I came to Troas for the good news of Christ, and there was an open door for me in the Lord,
target: Tin, Krista Chanchin Tha hril tura Troas khua ka thlen lai khan, Lalpaah chuan kawng min lo hawnsak na a,

source: We don't lie
target: Kan daw ngailo

source: O Lord, our Lord, how noble is your name in all the earth!
target: Aw LALPA, kan Lalpa, Lei chung zawng zawngah hian i hming a va tha êm.

source: He is a leper and unclean; the priest is to say that he is most certainly unclean: the disease is in his head.
target: mi phâr a ni a, a bawlhhlawh a ni; puithiamin a bawlhhlawh tih a puang ngei ngei tur a ni, a phârna chu a luah a ni.

source: But still we have wisdom for those who are complete in knowledge, though not the wisdom of this world, and not of the rulers of this world, who are coming to nothing:
