target: Amaherawhchu puitlingte zingah chuan thu fing zawng ka sawi thin, nimahsela he khawvel thu fing hi a ni lo, he khawvel roreltu boral turte thu fing hi a ni hek lo;

source: But they, when they saw him walking on the sea, took him for a spirit, and gave a loud cry:
target: Nimahsela anni chuan amah chu dil chunga kea a kal an han hmuh chuan hmuithla emaw an ti a, an au ta vak mai a,

source: A foolish son is a grief to his father, and bitter pain to her who gave him birth.
target: Fapa â chu a pa tilungngaitu a ni a, A hringtunu tan a kha a ni.

source: Was he in the army?
target: Sipaiah a awm em?

source: That, as sin had power in death, so grace might have power through righteousness to eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
target: sual chuan thihnain ro a rel ang takin, khawngaihna chuan felnain, chatuan nun channa khawp hialin kan Lalpa Isua Krista zara, ro a rel theih nan.

source: Well, acknowledge them.
target: Awle, pawm rawh u.

source: If then I, the Lord and the Master, have made your feet clean, it is right for you to make one another's feet clean.
target: Kei Lalpa leh Zirtirtu mahin in ke ka sil chuan nangni pawhin in ke in insilsak tur a ni.

source: Ask for forgiveness
target: Ngaihdam dil rawh

source: I will give the priests their desired fat things, and my people will have a full measure of my good things, says the Lord.
target: Puithiamte nunna chu thauvin ka titlai ang a, Ka țhatnain ka mite pawh an tlai ang, Tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: These four were of the offspring of the Rephaim in Gath; and they came to their end by the hands of David and his servants.
target: Tin, chung palite chu Gath khuaah milian laka piang an ni a,chung chu Davida leh a mite kutah an thi a.

source: So the distribution of the land and its limits was complete; and the children of Israel gave Joshua, the son of Nun, a heritage among them;
target: Chutichuan an chanpual atana ramri siam ang zelin ram chu an lo sem zo ta a; tichuan Israela thlahten Nuna fapa Josua chu an zingah chanpual an siamsak ve a:

source: I can't skate
target: Ka tleng thei lo

source: I fought back
target: Ka bei let

source: Stay ṭhin
target: Inti cher rawh

source: I baked a pie.
target: Chhangphel ka ur.

source: For be certain that on the day when you go out and go over the stream Kidron, death will overtake you: and your blood will be on your head.
target: I chhuah ni, Kidron lui i kan ni la la chuan i thi ngei ngei ang tih hre rawh khai: i thisen chu nangma lu chungah ngei a awm ang, a ti a.

source: In a very little time he who is coming will come; he will not be slow.
target: Rei lo te achinah Lo kal tura chu a lo kal dawn si a, Rei a ril tawh lo vang.

source: Did you kiss anybody
target: Tu emaw i fawp em

source: I'm silly.
target: Ka nuihzatthlak.

source: And he will take some of it in his hand, burning it on the altar as a sign, and then he will give the woman the bitter water.
target: puithiam chuan chhangphut thilhlan hriat chhuahtirtu chu vei khatin a la ang a, maichamah chuan ahal ang a. chu mi zawhah chuantui ch hmeichhia a intir tur a ni.

source: Then loss will come on you like an outlaw, and your need like an armed man
target: I mut hlanin i rethei hman ang a, Tlakchhamnain sipai angin a rawn nang thut ang che,

source: If the iron has no edge, and he does not make it sharp, then he has to put out more strength; but wisdom makes things go well.
target: Thir a bil a, miin a tah hrima loh chuan Tha rum a ngai lehzual ang; Mahse a sawt ber mai, finna, hlawhtlin nân.

source: And Enoch went on in God's ways: and he was not seen again, for God took him.
target: tin, Enoka chu Pathian nên an lêng dûn thîn a: tin, a awm ta lo va; Pathianin a la bo ta a ni.

source: Because the Lord sees the way of the upright, but the end of the sinner is destruction.
target: LALPA chuan mi felte kawng chu a hre si thin: Mi suaksualte kawng erawh chu a boral ang.

source: The name of his first son was Joel and the name of his second Abijah: they were judges in Beer-sheba.
target: A fa tir hming hu Joela a ni a; tin, a dawttu hming chu Abija ani a; Beer-sea-a rorêltu an ni a.

source: And more than this, a hundred and fifty of the Jews and the rulers were guests at my table, in addition to those who came to us from the nations round about us.
target: Chu chang pawh ni lovin kan vêla hnam dangte zing atanga lo kal tiam lovin Juda-te leh rorêltute zinga ka dawhkan kil mi za leh sawmnga an awm reng a ni.

source: And you went on in your loose ways, even as far as the land of Chaldaea, and still you had not enough.
target: Kanan ramah, Kaldai mite hnêna i hurna i latizual ta cheu va, i la kham chuang lo fo.

source: Marry me
target: Mi nei rawh

source: At his fate those of the west are shocked, and those of the east are overcome with fear.
target: Thlang lama miten ani hi mak an ti ang a, Chhak lama mite an thlabar ang.

source: But there was a division among the people of the town; some were on the side of the Jews and some on the side of the Apostles.
target: Nimahsela khuaa mipuite chu an inkhing ta a; a thenin judate chu an tan a, a thenin tirhkohte chu an tan a.

source: The heads of the great snake were crushed by you; you gave them as food to the fishes of the sea.
target: Nang chuan liviathan lûte chu i tikeh sawm a, Ani chu thlalêra mi awmte hnênah chuan chaw atân i pe a.

source: But if you keep the greatest law of all, as it is given in the holy Writings, Have love for your neighbour as for yourself, you do well:
target: Nimahsela Pathian Lehkha Thu, Nangmah i inhmangaih angin i vengte i hmangaih tur a ni, tih lal dan hi in zawm chuan in ti tha e;

source: That's sweet
target: Kh kha a thlum

source: Whose desire is that all men may have salvation and come to the knowledge of what is true.
target: ani chuan mi zawng zawng chhandama awmah leh thutak hriaah a duh a ni.

source: AB: Thank you very much.
target: AB: Ka lawm e.

source: I have a wife.
target: Nupui ka nei.

source: And after her he took Maacah, the daughter of Absalom; and she had Abijah and Attai and Ziza and Shelomith by him.
target: Ani hnuah chuan Absaloma fanu Maakai a nei a; ani chuan Abija te, Ataia te, Ziza te, Selomitha te a rinsak a.

source: And he said, What have you done? the voice of your brother's blood is crying to me from the earth.
target: Tin, ani chuan, Engnge i tih tak ni? I nau thisen aw chuan lei atangin mi au asin.

source: They're all happy
target: An hlim vek tawh

source: They're very well
target: An ṭha hle mai

source: Tom was safe
target: Tom kha a him e

source: While the king is seated at his table, my spices send out their perfume.
target: thutna hmuna lalber awm laiin Ka nard rimtui chu a lêng chhuak e.

source: By his power the sea was made quiet; and by his wisdom Rahab was wounded.
target: A thiltihtheihnain tuipui a tingwai a A hriatthiamnain Rahab chu a tan chhum a.

source: But the Levites were not numbered among the children of Israel, as the Lord said to Moses.
target: Levi-ho eraw chu Israel thlahte zinga chhiar an ni ve lo, LALPAN Mosia thu a pêk ang khan.

source: There are no gods
target: Pathian an awm lo

source: Don't encourage Tom.
target: Tom chu fuih suh.

source: Teaching the children of Israel all the laws which the Lord has given them by the hand of Moses.
target: LALPAN Mosia hmanga an hnena a sawi, thupêk zawng zawngte chu Israel thlahte chu in zirtir theih nan a ni ang, tiin.

source: For what is the hope of the sinner when he is cut off, when God takes back his soul?
target: Pathian ngaihsak lo tan beiseina eng nge awm, Pathianin a sah chhuma a thlarau a lak si chuan?

source: But the man who was doing wrong to his neighbour, pushing him away, said, Who made you a ruler and a judge over us?
target: Nimahsela a thenawm chunga kawhmawhbawltu zawk chuan Mosia a nam kiang a, ‘Kan chungah hotuah leh roreltuah tuin nge siam che?

source: Get out of the good way, turning from the right road; do not keep the Holy One of Israel before our minds.
target: kawng lovah kal rawh u, kawng sirah peng rawh u, Israel-ho Mi Thainghlim chu kan hma ata hi tibo rawh u, ti thintute chu.

source: Is Tom right?
target: Tom a dik em?

source: You will give the king long life; and make his years go on through the generations.
target: Lal dam chhûng hi i tisei ang a: A kumte chu chhuan tam tak tluk a ni ang.

source: How by revelation the secret was made clear to me, as I said before in a short letter,
target: khatia, thuruk chu hriattirnaa hriattira ka awm kha, hmana tawi tea ka ziak ang thu kha;

source: I am laughed at by all those who see me: pushing out their lips and shaking their heads they say,
target: Mi hmu apiangin mi nuihsan a: An hmui an kum a, an lu an thing a,

source: The honour which was his they gave to strange gods; by their disgusting ways he was moved to wrath.
target: Ram dang pathiantein a thikthu a chawk tho va, Thil tenawmin a chawk thinrim.

source: So you are to make the Levites separate from the children of Israel, and the Levites will be mine.
target: chutiang chuan Israela thlahte zing ata Levi-hote chu i tihrang ang a, tichuan Levi-hote chu ka ta an ni ang.

source: Who saw me?
target: Tunge min hmu?

source: I like soccer
target: Ball pet ka ngaina

source: I ran home
target: Inah ka tlan

source: I envy him
target: Hepa ka thik

source: For then its weight would be more than the sand of the seas: because of this my words have been uncontrolled.
target: Tuipui tiau aiin a ri dawn si: Chuvang chuan ka thu a bung a ni.

source: That's my mother
target: Chu chu ka nu a ni

source: They have black hair.
target: Sam dum an nei a.

source: It's ours.
target: Kan ta.

source: All the best of the oil and the wine and the grain, the first-fruits of them which they give to the Lord, to you have I given them.
target: Hriak țha ber te, grêp țha ber te, buh țha ber te, rah hmasa ber LALPA tana an pêk chu ka pe a che.

source: He keeps watch on the ways which are right, and takes care of those who have the fear of him.
target: Rorêlna kawngte a ven a. A mi thianghlimte kawng a vawn that theih nân.

source: I'm no good for you.
target: I tan ka tha lo.

source: When they put out their young leaves, you take note of it, and it is clear to you that summer is coming.
target: a chawr no veleh chu chu in hmu a, nipui a lo thaw dawn tih mahniin in hre thin.

source: I'm sharp.
target: Ka hriam.

source: What are you learning
target: Eng nge i zir mek

source: No one is certain what is to be, and who is able to say to him when it will be?
target: Thil lo awm tûr chu a hre si lo va, a lo awm dan tûr chu tunge hrilh thei ang le?

source: Give to her as she gave, even an increased reward for her works; in the cup which was mixed by her, let there be mixed as much again for herself.
target: Anin a pek ang ngei khan pe thung ula, a thiltihzia ang zel chu a leh hnihin thungrul ula, a chawhpawlhna novah chuan a tan aleh hnihin chawhpawlhsak rawh u.

source: I'm with him
target: Amah nên ka nia

source: I deserve happiness
target: Hlimna ka phu a ni

source: This was the Lord's doing, and it is a wonder in our eyes?
target: Chu chu Lalpa tih a ni a,Kan mithmuhah a mak a ni,’tih hi, a ti a.

source: So he gave ear to them in this thing and put them to the test for ten days.
target: Tichuan, he thu hi a remtihsak a, anni chu ni sâwm a fiah ta a.

source: Making it my purpose not to take the good news where Christ was named, so that my work might not be resting on that of others;
target: A ni, mi dang lungphum chunga rem chho ka lo nih loh nan, Chanchin Tha chu Krista hming lam tawhna hmunah hril lovin,

source: The Lord has knowledge of the thoughts of man, for they are only a breath.
target: LALPA chuan mihring ngaihtuahte chu Engmah lo mai mai ani tih a hria.

source: The voice of your thunder went rolling on; the world was flaming with the light of the storm; the earth was shaking.
target: I khawpui ri thawm chu thawnga leivirah a awm a; Kawlphete chuan khawvel hi a en zawk zawk a: Lei hi khurin a nghing dur dur a.

source: Now the Lord is the Spirit: and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there the heart is free.
target: Tin, Lalpa chu Thlarau chu a ni a; Lalpa Thlarau awmna apiangah chuan zalenna a awm thin.

source: I don't hate her anymore.
target: Ka huat tawh lo.

source: I have a loose tooth.
target: Ha hring ka nei a.

source: Calm down!
target: Inbengdai rawh!

source: But you, my brothers, are not in the dark, for that day to overtake you like a thief:
target: Nimahsela, unaute u, nangni zawng chu mi Ni chuan rukru ang a nanna tur che uin thimah in awm lo ve;

source: He dumped me
target: Mi duh tawh lo

source: For if your ways and your doings are truly changed for the better; if you truly give right decisions between a man and his neighbour;
target: In awm dan leh in thiltihte chu in siam that tak meuh va, m leh a thenawm kara thu dik taka in relsak a.

source: You will let their hearts be covered over with your curse on them.
target: Thinlung sak i neihtîr ang a, i ânchhia an chungah a tla ang.

source: We know
target: Kan hria

source: Let me have another look.
target: Ka en leh ang.

source: And there were men of Tyre there, who came with fish and all sorts of goods, trading with the children of Judah and in Jerusalem on the Sabbath.
target: tûra rama mi chuta cheng vete pawhin sânghate leh bungraw tinrengte an rawn la a, chawlhniin Juda mite hnênah leh Jerusalem-ah an zuar a.

source: He who is a child of God gives ear to the words of God: your ears are not open to them because you are not from God.
target: Pathian hnena chhuak chuan Pathian thu a pawm thin; he mi avang hian in pawm lo a ni, Pathian hnena chhuak in nih loh avangin, a ti a.

source: I couldn't get warm enough.
target: Ka lum tawk lo.

source: She is a very nice person.
target: Mi fel tak a ni.

source: Because he says in another Psalm, You will not let your Holy One see destruction.
target: Chuvangin Hla dangah, ‘I Mi Thianghlim chu tawihral i phal lo vang,’ a ti bawk a.

source: He has made men like the fishes of the sea, like the worms which have no ruler over them.
target: Mihring hi tuifinriata sânghate leh rannung An chunga rorêltu nei bîk lote anga i siam ni?

source: But their eyes were not open that they might have knowledge of him.
target: Nimahsela amah chu an hriat theih loh nan, an mit chu tihvaihin a awm a.

source: Then we said to the men responsible, who gave you authority for the building of this house and these walls?
target: Chutichuan, 'He in sa tûr leh he kulh tizo tûr hian tuin nge thu pe che u?' tiin an upate kan zâwt a.

source: Because of it I keep straight in all things by your orders; and I am a hater of every false way.
target: Chuvangin kawng tinreng thua i thununna thu zawng zawngte chu dikin ka hria a; Awm dan dik lo tinreng hi ka hua a ni. PE

source: For every house has a builder; but the builder of all things is God.
target: Chhung tin hian puipa tu emaw tal an nei theuh si a; engkim puipa erawh chu Pathian a ni.

source: Let every man give honour to his mother and to his father and keep my Sabbaths: I am the Lord your God.
target: Mi tinin in nu leh in pa in tih tur a ni a, tin, ka chawlhnite in serh tur a ni: Kei hi LALPA in Pathian chu ka ni.

source: Cook the rice
target: Buhfai chhûm rawh

source: They're criminals
target: Misual an ni

source: That would have been another sin to be rewarded with punishment by the judges; for I would have been false to God on high.
target: Chu pawh chu rorêltute hrem ngei tûr khawlohna a ni a, Chugna Pathian hnêna daw ka nih dawn avângin.

source: The topaz of Ethiopia is not equal to it, and it may not be valued with the best gold.
target: Ethiopia topaz pawhin a khan lo va, Rangkachak thianghlim nên khaikhin rual a ni lo.

source: Looking at the mountains, I saw them shaking, and all the hills were moved about.
target: Tlângte ka en a, ngai teh, a nghing a, Mual zawng zawng pawh an phe hlawk hlawk a.

source: Who in the past was of no profit to you, but now is of profit to you and to me:
target: Ani chu hmanah khan i tan a tangkai lo va, tunah erawh chuan kei leh nang atan a tangkai ta e;

source: And Hezekiah and all the people were full of joy, because God had made the people ready: for the thing was done suddenly.
target: Mipite tana Pathian a buatsai thil avâng chuan Hezekia leh mi zawng zawng hchu an lâwm êm êm a; tin, loh taka thil lo awm thut a ni lehnghal si a.

source: Or his signs and wonders which he did in Egypt, to Pharaoh, king of Egypt, and all his land;
target: a chhinchhiahna te, a thiltih, Aigupta ram chhûnga Aigupta lal Pharaoa chung leh a ram chung zawng zawnga a tih te,

source: I waited.
target: Ka nghak tawh.

source: It's no good
target: A ṭha lo

source: She liked it
target: Khanu khân a duh

source: But if it has any mark on it, if it is blind or has damaged legs, or if there is anything wrong with it, it may not be offered to the Lord your God.
target: Sawisel kaina nei, a ke bai emaw a mit del emaw, sawisel kaina nei tawh phawt chu LALPA in Pathian hnena inthawi nan in hmang tur a ni lo.

source: O send out your light and your true word; let them be my guide: let them take me to your holy hill, and to your tents.
target: Aw, i eng leh i thutak chu tir chhuak la, anni chuan mi hruai sela: I tlâng thianghlim leh I awmnate chu mi thlen rawh se.

source: I got dumped
target: Paih ka ni

source: You're late again.
target: I tlai leh ta.

source: May he not let your foot be moved: no need of sleep has he who keeps you.
target: Ani chuan i ke chu tihsawn a phal lo vang a: Nangmah vengtu chu a muttlu lo vang.

source: In order to put Israel to the test, and see if they will keep the way of the Lord, walking in it as their fathers did, or not.
target: an thlahtute zawh ang khan LALPA dan an zawh dawn nge dawn lo tih Israel-hote fiah nan anmahni chu ka hmang ang, a ti a.

source: And they made answer that they had no idea where it came from.
target: Tichuan an chhang a, Khawi lam zawk thu nge ni kan hre lo, an ti a.

source: I ignored him.
target: Khapa kha ka ngaihsak lo.

source: But anything which has a mark you may not give; it will not make you pleasing to the Lord.
target: Sawisel kai reng reng chu in hlan tur a ni lo; pawmsak tlak cheu a ni bawk si lo va.

source: For after his punishment he gives comfort, and after wounding, his hands make you well.
target: Ani chuan a tina a, a atuam leh a, A tihliam a, kutin a tidam leh a ni.

source: As a dream when one is awake, they are ended; they are like an image gone out of mind when sleep is over.
target: Miin men hnua mumang an ngeinep angin, Aw LALPA i harh hunin anmahni lem pawh chu i ngainep ang.

source: Let the voice of my cry come to you, my King and my God; for to you will I make my prayer.
target: Ka Lal leh ka Pathian, ka au thawm hi ngaithla ang che; I hnêna tawngtai ka ni si a.

source: Truly, you have all seen it yourselves; why then have you become completely foolish?
target: Ngai ru, nangni ngeiin in vaiin in hmu a, Eng tiziaa khawlo cheu nge in nih?

source: Did you call me a cheat
target: Cheat min ti em ni

source: For those who say such things make it clear that they are searching for a country for themselves.
target: Chutiang thu sawite chuan anmahni ram tur an zawng tih an tilang si a.

source: But when Herod was dead, an angel of the Lord came in a dream to Joseph in Egypt,
target: Nimahsela, Heroda chu a thih hnuin ngai teh, Lalpa vantirhkoh Aigupta ramah chuan Josefa hnenah a mangah a inlar a,

source: I should've called.
target: Ka call tur a ni.

source: Lord, you will give us peace: for all our works are the outcome of your purpose.
target: LALPA, nangin remna min ruatsak ang: nangin kan hna zawng zawng pawh min thawhsak si a.

source: Just take it
target: La mai rawh

source: She uploaded a video.
target: Video a upload a.

source: It's genuine
target: A diktak a nia

source: I am gone like the shade when it is stretched out: I am forced out of my place like a locust.
target: Hlim ral lam tung tawh ang hian ka ral a: Khaukhuap ang hian len bovin ka awm a.

source: You owe me
target: Mi ba a ni

source: That which is bent may not be made straight, and that which is not there may not be numbered.
target: A kawi tawh kha chu tihngilh theih a ni lo va, A awm lo chu chhiar rual a ni lo.

source: If a child is given circumcision on the Sabbath so that the law of Moses may not be broken, why are you angry with me because I made a man completely well on the Sabbath?
target: Mosia Dan bawhchhiat loh nan Chawlniah pawh mipain a serh a tantir si chuan, keiin Chawlhnia mi ka tihdam tak viah avangin ka chungah in thinur bik maw?

source: We are without fear, desiring to be free from the body, and to be with the Lord.
target: muang takin kan awm, ka ti, taksaa awm lova Lalpa hnena awm kan duh zawk.

source: And on this altar sweet spices are to be burned by Aaron every morning when he sees to the lights.
target: Tin, Aronan chutah chuan englo rimtui tak hâl tur rimtui a hâl tur a ni: tuktin khâwnvârte a chei hun apiangin a hâl thin tur a ni.

source: And he did not let anyone come with him, but Peter and James and John, the brother of James.
target: Tin, Petera te, Jakoba te, Jakoba unau Johana te chauh lo chu tumah amah zui ve a phal ta lo va.

source: Their children are ever with them, and their offspring before their eyes.
target: An chi thlahte chu an henah an mithmuhah a tinghet a, An rila rahte chu an hmai hmaah.

source: So that whoever has faith may have in him eternal life.
target: tupawh a ring apiangin amah avanga chatuana nunna an neihna turin.

source: Then the Jews had an angry discussion among themselves, saying, How is it possible for this man to give us his flesh for food?
target: Chutichuan Judate an inhnial a, He mi hian engtin nge a tisa ei turin min pek theih ang? an ti a.

source: She played the violin.
target: Violin a tum a.

source: So the law which went before is put on one side, because it was feeble and without profit.
target: A chak loh leh a sawt lohna avangin thupek awm hmasa chu paihin,

source: Why are you crushed down, O my soul? and why are you troubled in me? put your hope in God; for I will again give him praise who is my help and my God.
target: Aw ka nunna, engah nge i kun reng? Engah nge ka chhûngah hian i buai ni? Pathian beisei rawh: amah chu ka la fak dawn si a, Ka hmêl tidamtu leh ka Pathian chu.

source: In it the hands and feet of Moses and Aaron and his sons were washed,
target: Tin, Mosia leh Arona leha fapate chuan chutah chuan an kut leh an kete an sil a,

source: He makes the waters of the sea come together in a mass; he keeps the deep seas in store-houses.
target: Ani chuan tuifinriat tuite chu englo dahkhawm thur angin a tikhawm a: Tui thuk takte chu dah khawmna inahte a dah tha thin.

source: It's cheap
target: A tlawm hle

source: And let all your values be based on the shekel of the holy place, that is, twenty gerahs to the shekel.
target: I ruat dan zawng zawng chu hmun thianghlim sekel ang zel ani tur a ni; sekel khat chu gera sawmhnih a ni ang.

source: And the hand-part went in after the blade, and the fat was joined up over the blade; for he did not take the sword out of his stomach. And he went out into the ...
target: a fawng pawh chu a lût pil hmawk a; tin, a khandaih chu a thauvin a hnawh ping ta tlat a, a puma khandaih chu a phawi si lo va; a hnungah a tlang a ni.

source: And I will make Pathros a waste, and put a fire in Zoan, and send my punishments on No.
target: Pathros chu ka tițiau vang a, Zoan-ah chuan, mei ka chhuah ang a, No khua chuan ka hlen ang.

source: How many inhabitants are there
target: Mi engzat nge awm

source: I've done enough already.
target: Ka ti tawk tawh.

source: Don't respond
target: Chhang suh

source: Let the men of pride be shamed; because they have falsely given decision against me; but I will give thought to your orders.
target: Chapote chu mualphovin awm rawh se; dik lo takin mi titlâwm ta si a: Nimahsela i thununna thute chu ka ngaihtuah ang.

source: I want mine
target: Ka tâ ka duh

source: His tongue is an arrow causing death; the words of his mouth are deceit: he says words of peace to his neighbour, but in his heart he is waiting secretly for him.
target: An lei chu thihna thal a ni a, bum thu a sawi țhin, Miin kâin a țhenawm hnênah rem thu sawi mah se, A thinlungah amah chu a châng khiau țhin.

source: In that day, one who has got away safe will come to you to give you news of it.
target: Chumi ni ngeiah chuan a tlan chhuak chu i hnênah a lo kal ang a, a rawn hriattîrdawn lo che êm ni?

source: It was Sami's blood.
target: Sami thisen a ni.

source: Truly, if we had not let the time go by, we might have come back again by now.
target: awm rei suh ila chuan tûnah pawh kan lo thleng leh tawh ngei tûr a ni, a ti a.

source: For whose coming John made ready the way by preaching to all the people of Israel the baptism which goes with a change of heart.
target: a lo kal hmain Johanan simna baptisma thu Israel mi zawng zawng hnenah a lo hrilh te te a.

source: Open fire!
target: Kap darh vek ru!

source: Let Tom live
target: Tom nung rawh se

source: And flight will be impossible for the quick-footed, and the force of the strong will become feeble, and the man of war will not get away safely:
target: Tin, mi tlân chakte chakna a bo vang a, mi chakin tha a so thei hek lo vang: mi chak tak pawh a in hum thei lo vang a,

source: This will be their fate because of their pride, because they have said evil, lifting themselves up against the people of the Lord of armies.
target: Chu chu an chapona aiah an nei dâwn a ni, Sipaihote LALPA mite chungah an intihlen a, an cheksawlh avângin.

source: Come with me
target: Min rawn zui teh

source: But let your words be simply, Yes or No: and whatever is more than these is of the Evil One.
target: In thu sawi chu ‘A ni, a ni,’ ‘Ni lo, ni lo’ ni ngawt rawh se; chung aia chuang aliam chu sual laka chhuak a ni.

source: He has kept in mind his mercy and his unchanging faith to the house of Israel; all the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
target: Israel chhûngte chunga a ngilneihzia leh a rinawmzia chu a hre reng a: Kawlkila mi zawng zawng pawhin kan Pathian chhandamna chu an hmu ta a.

source: The water is warm.
target: Tui chu a lum a.

source: I'm fighting
target: Ka bei mek

source: You're touching me.
target: Min khawih a ni.

source: And I said, My strength is cut off, and my hope from the Lord.
target: Tin, Ka ropuina leh LALPA laka ka beisei chu a bo zo ta ka ti ta a ni.

source: The king has pleasure in a servant who does wisely, but his wrath is against him who is a cause of shame.
target: Lal duhsakna chu fing taka titu chhiahhlawh chungah a awm a, A thinurna erawh chu mualphona thlentu chungah a awm ang.

source: I do hope so
target: Chutiang ka beisei

source: Do you believe us?
target: Min ring em?

source: I contributed
target: Ka thawh ve

source: And he took them in his arms, and gave them a blessing, putting his hands on them.
target: Tin, anmahni chu a kuangkuah a, an chungah a kut nghatin mal a sawmsak ta a.

source: Now in Jerusalem near the sheep-market there is a public bath which in Hebrew is named Beth-zatha. It has five doorways.
target: Tin, Jerusalem-ah chuan beram kawngkhar kiangah dil a awm a, chu chu Hebrai tawngin Bethesda an ti a, hulhliap panga a nei nghe nghe a.

source: For the Father himself gives his love to you, because you have given your love to me and have had faith that I came from God.
target: Pa ngeiin a hmangaih si che u a, nangnin kei mi hmangaih a, Paa chhuak ka ni tih mi rin vangin.

source: When the words of my law came from Ephraim, he was lifted up in Israel; but when he did evil through the Baal, death overtook him.
target: Ephraiman thu a sawi chuan khurhna khawp a tling hial țhin, Israel mite zingah ngaih ropui a ni miau va, Baal hnêna a tluk chinah erawh chuan a thi ta a ni.

source: They switched places with each other.
target: Hmun an inthlak a.

source: And made their lives bitter with hard work, making building-material and bricks, and doing all sorts of work in the fields under the hardest conditions.
target: hnathawh hautak tak, lung chârna leh leirawhchante siamtîr leh lohvah hna tinrêngte, hreawm taka thawhtîrin an chhawr vak vak a, an thawhna zawng zawngah chuan rim takin an chhawr zêl a.

source: I hilarious lutuk
target: You're so hilarious

source: Then let the priest take cedar-wood and hyssop and red thread, and put them into the fire where the cow is burning.
target: tin, puithiamin sidar thing leh husop leh lazai sen ala ang a, bawng la an halah chuan a paih lut tur a ni.
Dar 7:45 a ni.

source: And when the Aramaeans of Damascus came to the help of Hadadezer, king of Zobah, David put to the sword twenty-two thousand of the Aramaeans.
target: Tin, Damasaka-a Suria mite Zoba lal Hadadezera chan tûra kalte chu Davidan Suria mite zinga mi 22,000 a that a.

source: I didn't spend anything.
target: Engmah ka seng lo.

source: And he took six hundred carriages, all the carriages of Egypt, and captains over all of them.
target: tin, tawlailîr zaruk tha thiau leh Aigupta rama tawlailîr zawng zawng, an zaa chunga hotute nen a hruai ta a.

source: A cloud comes to an end and is gone; so he who goes down into the underworld comes not up again.
target: Chhum a kiang a, a boral angin Seola chhuk tawh an chhuak leh ngai lo.

source: This is the law of the leper on the day when he is made clean: he is to be taken to the priest;
target: Hei hi phar inthen nia a tih dan tur chu a ni ang: puithiam hnenah hruai tur a ni a;

source: I agreed with that
target: Chu chu ka pawm ta a ni

source: Keep smiling
target: Nuihhmel zêl rawh

source: You look old
target: I upat hmel

source: And the stars of heaven were falling to the earth, like green fruit from a tree before the force of a great wind.
target: tin, vana arsite chu theipui kung thlipuiin a nuaia a helte a til ang maiin leiah a tla ta.

source: The Lord is their strength, and a strong place of salvation for his king.
target: LALPA chu an chakna ani a, A hriak thiha tan chuan chhandamna kulhbing a ni.

source: A day for building your walls! in that day will your limits be stretched far and wide.
target: I kulh bangte siamna nî tûr chu! chumi niah chuan thuruat chu hlatak thlenga tihzau a ni ang.

source: Don't feel embarrassed
target: Mualphona nei suh

source: Tom, hold up.
target: Tom-a, ding rawh.

source: Let your eyes be turned to the heavens, and lifted up to see the skies; they are higher than you.
target: Van lam dak la, en teh, Chhumte khi en la, nang aia a san zawk khi.

source: I sent a letter to the church, but Diotrephes, whose desire is ever to have the first place among them, will not have us there.
target: Kohhranho hnenah khan thu tlem chu ka ziak tawh; nimahsela Diotrepha, an zinga chungnun duh thin kha min lawm si lo.

source: How is it broken down! how is Moab's back turned in shame! so Moab will be a cause of sport and of fear to everyone round about him.
target: A va chhe tawh êm! An chiau nasatzia chu! Moab chu mualphovin a lehhawi tak chu! Tichuan Moab chu a vêla mite zawng zawng tan uihzabur leh rapthlâk a lo ni ta.

source: My days go quicker than the cloth-worker's thread, and come to an end without hope.
target: Ka nite hi puantahtu khawhthei aiin a liam rang a, Beiseina tel lovin an ral a.

source: And Azariah the priest went in after him, with eighty of the Lord's priests, who were strong men;
target: Tin, puithiam Azaria chuan a zui a, mi huai tak tak LALPA puithiam sawmriat an el ve a;

source: I tried that
target: Ka tichhin tawh

source: When you make it dark, it is night, when all the beasts of the woods come quietly out of their secret places.
target: Nang chuan thim i siam a, zan a lo ni thin a; Chu mi hunah chuan ramhnuaia sa tinrengte chu an tla chuak thin.

source: If only my ways were ordered so that I might keep your rules!
target: Aw, i thuruatte chu zawm tûrin Ka awm dante hi tihnghehin awm teh sela aw!

source: Come, let us make an agreement, you and I; and let it be for a witness between us.
target: Hawh teh, kei leh nang hian thu i thlung teh ang; chu chu kei leh nanga kârah hriatna ni rawh se, a ti a.

source: We looked up
target: Kan en sang

source: We can see each other.
target: Kan inhmu thei.

source: I was away
target: Ka awm loh lai

source: I've got them all.
target: Ka nei vek tawh.

source: Let's use this one.
target: Hemi hi hmang ila.

source: And he sent letters to all the Jews in the hundred and twenty-seven divisions of the kingdom of Ahasuerus, with true words of peace,
target: Tin, Ahasuera ram then za leh sawmhnih leh pasarih Juda-ho zawng zawng hnênah chuan tha takin lehkha an thawn a.

source: Am I safe now?
target: Ka him tawh em?

source: It's my life
target: Ka nun a nia

source: I feel my age.
target: Ka upat zia ka hria.

source: Do you know her at all?
target: I hre chiang em?

source: Truly I say to you, You will not come out from there till you have made payment of the very last farthing.
target: Tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che, Pawisa te pawh i tlak kim hma loh chuan, chuta ta chu i chhuak lo hul hual ang.

source: My soul is wasted with sorrow; give me strength again in keeping with your word
target: Ka nunna hi lungngaih avângin ka tuiral thin. I thu ang zelin mi tichak ang che.

source: Whoever makes a god, makes nothing but a metal image in which there is no profit.
target: Tuin nge pathian din tehlul le? A nih loh leh, tuin nge engmaha tangkai hlei lo milem siam chawp chhûng tehlul le?

source: I'm lazy.
target: Ka thatchhia.

source: Our eyes are still wasting away in looking for our false help: we have been watching for a nation unable to give salvation.
target: Țanpuina thlawn thlirin kan mit a vai zo va; Chhandam theilo hnam chu nghah zawng kan ngak a ni.

source: The Lord came to him again in a vision, as he had done at Gibeon;
target: Gibeon khuaa a hnêna a inlâr ang khan LALPA chu Solomona hnênah a rawn inlâr leh a.

source: The offerings of God are a broken spirit; a broken and sorrowing heart, O God, you will not put from you.
target: Pathian duhzawng inthawinate chu thlarau lungchhia hi a ni. Aw Pathian, thinlung lungchhia leh inchhir ngawih ngawih hi i hmusit lo vang.

source: We're better
target: Kan ṭha zâwk

source: Burning their offerings in all the high places, as those nations did whom the Lord sent away from before them; they did evil things, moving the Lord to wrath;
target: Chung hmun sâng zawng zawngahte chuan LALPAN an hmaa a um bo tak hnamte tih dan ang khan rimtuite an hal thin a: LALPA tihthinrim nân thil sual tak an ti bawk thin a;

source: They're cold
target: An nel awm loh

source: Have you knowledge of God's ordering of his works, how he makes the light of his cloud to be seen?
target: Chung chu Pathianin thu a pêk dan leh A chhuma kawl a phettir dante i hria êm ni?

source: This will be more pleasing to the Lord than an ox, or a young ox of full growth.
target: Chutiang chuan bawngchal emaw ki leh tin, nei bâwngpa emaw ai chuan, LALPA a tilawm zawk ang.

source: For there was an order from the king about them and a regular amount for the music-makers, for their needs day by day.
target: An chungchang thuah lal thupêk a awm a, hla satute chu ni tina an tla tawk tûr thu a awm bawk si a.

source: You made me laugh
target: Min nuih tir a

source: Hey look at that
target: Hei chu chu en teh

source: And if you do good to those who do good to you, what credit is it to you? for even sinners do the same.
target: Tin, in chunga thate chungah chauh in that hian, lawm engnge in hlawh ang? mi sualte pawhin chutiang bawkin an ti thin asin.

source: Ask them anything
target: Engpawh zâwt rawh

source: We don't have any kids yet.
target: Fa kan la nei lo.

source: And the sons of Jada, the brother of Shammai: Jether and Jonathan; and Jether came to his end without sons.
target: Tin, Samaia unaupa Juda fapate chu Jethera leh Jonathana an ni: tin, Jethera chu fa nei lovin a thi a.

source: Hate of work sends deep sleep on a man: and he who has no industry will go without food.
target: Dawngdahnain tui taka mutnaah a tilut a, Mi thatchhia chuan rilram a tuar ang.

source: And hearing this, they had baptism in the name of the Lord Jesus.
target: Tin,chu thu chu an hriat veleh Lalpa Isua hmingin baptisma an chang ta a.

source: Even the Lord, the God of armies; the Lord is his name.
target: LALPA ngei, sipai ho te Pathian chu, LALPA tih chu a chhinchhiahna a ni.

source: No one knows about it
target: Tuman an hre lo

source: You wash the potatoes
target: Alu chu i silfai a

source: The moon and the stars to have rule by night: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.
target: Thla leh arsiho, zana rorêltu atâna siamtu hnênah chuan: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: Hero tak tak a ni.
target: She was a real hero.

source: I need sugar
target: Chini ka mamawh

source: I don't know the way.
target: Kawng ka hre lo.

source: The wind has calmed down.
target: Thli a reh tawh.

source: She sees that her marketing is of profit to her: her light does not go out by night.
target: A sumdawnna a hlawk tih a hria a, Zanah pawh a khawnvar a mit ngai lo.

source: They come from a far country, from the farthest part of heaven, even the Lord and the instruments of his wrath, with destruction for all the land.
target: Anniho, LALPA leh a lungnih lohna hriamhreite chu, ram hla tak ata, kawl kil tawp ret ațangin ram zawng zawng hi tichhe tûrin an lo kal a ni.

source: I was hiding
target: Ka biruk mêk kha

source: Turn it down
target: Tihniam rawh

source: For they have made their hearts ready like an oven, while they are waiting secretly; their wrath is sleeping all night; in the morning it is burning like a flaming fire.
target: Arûka an chân laiin an thinlung chu thuk ang maiin an siam tawh si a: An thinur chu zankhuain a dai a, Zîngah chuan meialh angin a alh a.

source: False to their friends, acting without thought, lifted up in mind, loving pleasure more than God;
target: vervek te, thuhnudawn lo te, inngaihlu te, Pathian hmangaih aia mahni lawmna mai hmangaih zawktu te an ni dawn si;

source: You are my safe and secret place; you will keep me from trouble; you will put songs of salvation on the lips of those who are round me. (Selah.
target: Nang chu ka bihrukna hmun i ni a; nang chuan manganna lakah mi humhim ang a; Chhanhimna hlatein mi hual veltir ang. Selah

source: And the son of Shammai was Maon; and Maon was the father of Beth-zur.
target: Tin, Samaia fapa chu Maona a ni a; tin, Maona chu Beth-zura pa a ni.

source: I'm stuck in the mud.
target: Mualah ka tang a.

source: They were laughing at me.
target: Min nuihzat a.

source: And see, I will put bands on you; and you will be stretched out without turning from one side to the other till the days of your attack are ended.
target: Tin, ngaiteh hruizenin ka hlîng che a, i hual nî i tling tlâk hma loh chuan khawilamah mah i hawi her tûr a ni lo ve.

source: Can that be right
target: Chu chu a dik thei ang em

source: I'm crazy
target: Ka a lutuk

source: Then Samuel went to Ramah; and Saul went up to his house in Gibeah, in the land of Saul.
target: Tin, Samuela chu Rama khuaah a kal a; tin, Saula chu a inah Saula awmna khua Gibea-ah a chho ta a.

source: I said, I will not see the Lord, even the Lord in the land of the living: I will not see man again or those living in the world.
target: LALPA, LALPA ngei chu, mi nung ramah hian ka hmu dawn tawh lo va: Khawvela awmte zingah hian mihring ka hmu leh dawn tawh lo a nih hi.

source: You worshippers of the Lord, have faith in the Lord: he is their help and their breastplate.
target: LALPA tihtute u, LALPA chu ring rawh u: Ani chu anmahni tanpuitu leh an phaw a ni.

source: For the outcome of the law is wrath; but where there is no law it will not be broken.
target: Dan chuan thinurna a siam si thin a; Dan awm lohnaah erawh chuan bawhchhiatna pawh a awm hek lo.

source: To those whose desire is for death, but it comes not; who are searching for it more than for secret wealth;
target: Thih chak êm êm a, hmu si l, Ro phûm zawn aia nasaa zawngtu,

source: True teaching was in his mouth, and no evil was seen on his lips: he was walking with me in peace and righteousness, turning numbers of people away from evil-doing.
target: Thutak dân chu a kâah a awm a, thu sual a hmuiah a awm lo: Thlamuang tak leh ngîl takin ka hmâah a lêng țhîn a, mi tamtak an khawlohna ata a lamlêttîr a ni.

source: And said to him, Go out of your land, and away from your family, and come into the land to which I will be your guide.
target: a hnenah, ‘I khaw lam leh i chiteho zing ata chhuak la, ram ka la entir tur che lamah kal rawh,’ a ti a.

source: Try the cake.
target: Chhang hi ei rawh.

source: I need a coat
target: Kawrchung ka mamawh

source: That's his
target: Khapa tâ a nia

source: Stop reading
target: Chhiar tawh suh

source: And Elam was armed with arrows, and Aram came on horseback; and the breastplate of Kir was uncovered.
target: Tichuan, Elam-ho chuan thal bâwm an keng a, mihring huanna talailirte leh sakawr chung chuang mite nên: Kir-ho chuan phaw tuamna chu an phelh a.

source: If a brother or a sister is without clothing and in need of the day's food,
target: Unaupa emaw, unaunu emaw, saruaka awmin an ni tin chaw tlachham sela,

source: By the king's orders great stones, stones of high price, were cut out, so that the base of the house might be made of squared stone.
target: Tin, lal thupêkin in lungphu chu lung chher saa rem tûrin lung lian pui pui, lung man tam tak takte an rawn la a.

source: They are also too good
target: An tha lutuk bawk

source: Male or female they are to be put outside the tent-circle, so that they may not make unclean my resting-place among them.
target: a hmei apain i tichhuakin daipawnah I dah tur ani; a lai taka ka awmna thin an riahhmun chu an tiblawlhhlawh dah ang e, tiin.

source: And exchanging their goods and property for money, they made division of it among them all, as they had need.
target: an rote, an sumte an hralh a, an chakkhai daih lek theuhvin an zaa hnenah chuan an sem thin a.

source: And a heritage fair, holy and for ever new, waiting in heaven for you,
target: rochan chhe thei lo, bawlhhlawh kai lo, chuai thei lo, vana in tana khek chu hmuhna turin;

source: Is that agreeable
target: Chu chu a remti em

source: No, I didn't help.
target: Ni lo, ka pui lo.

source: And the Jews gave their word to go on as they had been doing and as Mordecai had given them orders in writing;
target: Tichuan an lo tih tan tawh sa ang leh Mordekaian an hnêna a thawn angin Judate chuan tih an tum ta a;

source: Which he gave us in full measure in all wisdom and care;
target: Chu khawngaihna chuan aman fing tak leh remhre takin min vur a ni,

source: And when his stories came to the ears of the chief priests and the Pharisees, they saw that he was talking of them.
target: Tin, puithiam lalte leh Pharisaite chuan a tehkhin thute chu an hriatin anmahni chung thu a sawi tih an hre ta a.

source: And she gave into the hand of Jacob, her son, the meat and the bread which she had made ready.
target: tin, chawhmeh tui tak leh chhang a siamte chu a fapa Jakoba kutah a pe a.

source: But when it is turned to the Lord, the veil will be taken away.
target: Nimahsela, an thinlung chu Lalpa lama a hawi tik apiangin khuhna chu lak bo a ni tawh ang.

source: Don't try me
target: Mi cho suh

source: I'm speaking
target: Ka sawi mêk

source: So he went up from there to Penuel and made the same request to the men of Penuel; but they gave him the same answer as the men of Succoth had given.
target: Tin, chu ta tang chuan Penuel-ah a han kal a,an hnênah chutiang bawk chuan a sawi leh a: tin, Penuel khua amite chuan Sukoth khuaa mite chhan ang bawkin an lo che ve a.

source: It was clean
target: A fai a nia

source: Then Ehud went out into the covered way, shutting the doors of the summer-house on him and locking them.
target: Chutichuan Ehuda chu hulhliapah a chhuak a, pindan kawngkhârte chuan a kharhung a, a kalh ta tlat a.

source: And I went again in search of wisdom and of foolish ways. What may the man do who comes after the king? The thing which he has done before.
target: Tichuan, fin emaw, ât emaw, tlawktlaw emaw eng nge lem chuang tih ka ngaihtuah a; lal pawhin a hmaa lalte tih tawh bak eng nge a tih theih chuan?

source: Beats me
target: Mi vaw rawh

source: And Jesus, being moved with pity, put his fingers on their eyes: and straight away they were able to see, and went after him.
target: Tichuan, Isuan a khawngaih em em a, an mit a dek a; tichuan an hmu thei ta nghal a, amah chu an zui ta a.

source: Bitter talk of men who, being evil in mind and dead to what is true, take the faith to be a way of making profit.
target: hnialhratna te a chhuak thin a; chutiang hnialhrat mite chu rilru chhe nei leh thutak nei lo mi, Pathian ngaihsak hi hlawkna emaw titu an ni.

source: And Jesus, looking at him, said, How hard it is for those who have wealth to get into the kingdom of God!
target: Tichuan Isuan amah chu a en a, Sum ngahte chu Pathian rama luh a va harsa dawn em!

source: They all got laid off
target: An ban vek a ni

source: So then, he who gets married to his virgin does well, and he who keeps her unmarried does better.
target: Chutichuan pasal neihtirtu chuan a titha e, nimahsela a neihtir lotu chuan a titha lehzual a ni.

source: You were no longer angry: you were turned from the heat of your wrath.
target: I thinrimna zawng zawng chu i la bo va; I thinurna nasa tak chu i hawisan ta a.

source: I am praying
target: Ka ṭawngṭai mek

source: And Moses went out and gave the people the words of the Lord: and he took seventy of the responsible men of the people, placing them round the Tent.
target: Tichuan Mosia chu a chhuak a, LALPA thu chu mipuite chu a hrlh a: tin, mipuihote upa sawmsarihte chu a ko khawm a, Puan In velah chuan a dintir a.

source: For though I was free from all men, I made myself a servant to all, so that more might have salvation.
target: Tuma bawih ni mah suh ila, mi tam lehzual ka lak luh theihna turin mi zawng zawng bawihah ka insiam ta.

source: My lord said to his servants, Have you a father or a brother?
target: Ka pu, nangin, 'Pa emaw unau emaw in nei em?' tiin i chhiahhlawhte hi min zâwt a.

source: And from there it goes on east to Gath-hepher, to Eth-kazin; ending at Rimmon which goes as far as Neah;
target: tin, chuta tang chuan chhak lampangah Gath-hepher leh Eth-kazin ah a kal zel a, Nea lam panin Romon-ah a chhuak a;

source: It's an inside joke.
target: Inside joke a ni.

source: He's strong
target: A chak lutuk

source: Truly, such are the sinners; they do well at all times, and their wealth is increased.
target: En teh, hengho hi mi suaksualte an nih hi; Nuamsa aka awm fovin an hausa deuh deuh thin.

source: The rings were fixed under the frame to take the rods with which the table was to be lifted.
target: Dawhkan chu zawn a, a zawnfung chu rawlh theih turin khangte chu a kawm siin a vuah a.

source: To a virgin who was to be married to a man named Joseph, of the family of David; and the name of the virgin was Mary.
target: chu nula chu Davida thlaha mi a hming Josefa nupui hual a ni a; nula hming chu Mari a ni.

source: Who is able to overcome the world but the man who has faith that Jesus is the Son of God?
target: Isua hi Pathian Fapa a ni tih ringtu chauh lo chuan tuin nge khawvel ngam thin le?

source: Those who have no respect for the law give praise to the evil-doer; but such as keep the law are against him.
target: Dan hawisantute chuan mi suaksual an fak thin a, Dan zawmtute erawh chuan an kalh thin.

source: I know about them
target: An chanchin ka hria

source: Now in those days prophets came from Jerusalem to Antioch.
target: Tin, chung lai chuan zawlnei tute emaw Jerusalem khua atangin Antiokei khuaah chuan an zuk kal a.

source: I'm not ugly
target: Ka hmelchhe lo

source: Do it later
target: Nakinah tirawh

source: I'm blind
target: Mitdel ka nia

source: Please do it
target: Khawngaihin ti rawh

source: They were adopted
target: An adopt ta a ni

source: Let it be your care to get the approval of God, as a workman who has no cause for shame, giving the true word in the right way.
target: Hnathawktu, thutak thu fel taka hmang chu zak tur a ni lo angin, Pathian ngaiha thaa inentir turin thahnem ngai rawh.

source: I expected it.
target: Ka beisei reng a.

source: And the unclean spirit, shaking him violently, and crying with a loud voice, came out of him.
target: Tin, ramhuai bawlhhlawh chu, amah sawisaa ring taka auvin a chhung ata a lo chhuak ta a.

source: He bit off the meat.
target: Sa chu a seh a.

source: No man has authority over the wind, to keep the wind; or is ruler over the day of his death. In war no man's time is free, and evil will not keep the sinner safe.
target: Mi thlarau chelh theihna leh thih ni chunga thuneihna nei tumah an awm lo; indo chhûngin chawlh a awm lo va, suahsualnain a neitute a chhan chhuak hek lo vang.

source: Let's not watch TV.
target: TV en lo ila.

source: But in the night an angel of the Lord, opening the doors of the prison, took them out and said,
target: Nimahsela zanah Lalpa vantirhkoh pakhatin kawngkharte chu a rawn hawng a, a hruai chhuak a,

source: And the armies which are in heaven went after him on white horses, clothed in delicate linen, white and clean.
target: Tin, vana sipaihote chuan puan zai sin var tak fai tak sinin, sakawr var chungahte chuangin an zui a.

source: An uncontrolled man is only looking for trouble, so a cruel servant will be sent against him.
target: Mi tha lo chuan helna ngawt a zawng thin a, Chuvangin a chungah zualko nunchhia tirh a ni ang.

source: And upright men will be her judges, judging her as false wives and women who take lives are judged; because she has been untrue to me and blood is on her hands.
target: Mahse mifelte chuan uirenute leh thisen chhuah chîng hmeichhiate ro an rêlsak angin an rêlsak ang, uirenute an niha, an kutahte thisen a kai avângin.

source: Cool down
target: In bengdai rawh

source: Come early.
target: Lo kal hma la.

source: You're very lucky
target: I vannei lutuk

source: For I am not able to give names of honour to any man; and if I did, my Maker would quickly take me away.
target: Fak der ka thiam si lo va, Chutilochu, mi Siamtuin mi la bo thuai mai ang.

source: Even I and my servants have been taking interest for the money and the grain we have let them have. So now, let us give up this thing.
target: Kei leh ka unaute leh ka tlangvâlte pawhin chutianga a pung um chuan kan sum leh buh kan puktir ve bawk asin. A pung uma puktir hi i ban teh daih ang u khai.

source: A good name is better than oil of great price, and the day of death than the day of birth.
target: A tha zawk e hming tha, hriak to aiin, Pian ni aiin thih ni.

source: I still don't want to go.
target: Ka la kal duh lo.

source: The old lion comes to his end for need of food, and the young of the she-lion go wandering in all directions.
target: Sakeibaknei upa chu ei chhamin a boral a, Sakeibakneipui no hruaite ch an darh e.

source: We don't get along with each other.
target: Kan inrem lo.

source: They supplied us with food.
target: Chaw min supply a.

source: So that they may keep you from the strange woman, even from her whose words are smooth.
target: Hmeichhe sual laka veng a, Hmeichhe khawlo thlemna laka veng tûr chein.

source: Give no belief to false words: because there will first be a falling away from the faith, and the revelation of the man of sin, the son of destruction,
target: Tuman engmahin tihder che u suh se; tluksanna chu a lo thlen hmasak zeta Dan Bawhchhepa, boral fapa chu a lo lan loh chuan chu mi Ni chu a thleng dawn si lo va.

source: One who gives false witness against his neighbour is a hammer and a sword and a sharp arrow.
target: Mahni thenawm chungchanga dawt sawi ching chu Tuboh te, khandaih te, thal hriam takte a ni.

source: Tom wasn't stupid
target: Tom chu a â lo va

source: I'm a cop
target: Pulis ka nia

source: It's awesome
target: A va ropui ve

source: For the same reason, make payment of taxes; because the authority is God's servant, to take care of such things at all times.
target: He mi avang hian chhiah pawh in chawi thin alawm; chutiang thil ngei ti fan fan turin Pathian rawngbawltute an ni si a.

source: They put to death the widow and the guest, they take the lives of children who have no father;
target: Hmeithai leh mikhual chu an tihlum a, Pa nei lo chu an that thin.

source: It's a slip of the pen
target: Pen slip a ni

source: The Lord will give them up into your hands, and you are to do to them as I have given you orders.
target: LALPAN anni chu a hlan ang che u a, thu ka pêk che u thupêk ang zawng zawng khan an chungah in ti tur a ni.

source: They weren't afraid
target: An hlau lo va

source: But if any of the flesh of the offering is still unused on the third day, it is to be burned with fire.
target: Amaherawhchu inthawina sa a ni thum ni thlenga la awm cheu chu hal tur a ni.

source: Make them go away
target: An kal bo tir rawh

source: That's your business
target: Chu chu i thu a ni

source: For there was a certain man named Demetrius, a silver-worker, who made silver boxes for the images of Diana, and gave no small profit to the workmen;
target: Mi pakhat, a hming Demetria, tangkarua chhera tangkaruaa Diani lem siamtu chuan, a siam thiamte hnenah inhlawhfakna tam tak a pe thin a;

source: She's an undergrad.
target: Undergrad a ni a.

source: I love nature
target: Ramhring ka ngaina

source: And I will put him like a nail in a safe place; and he will be for a seat of glory to his father's family.
target: Tin, ani chu, klhna hi hmun nghet taka an kilh tlat ngin, ka tinghet tlat ang a; tichuan ani chu a pa chhûngte tan lalțhutphah ropi tak atân a ni ang.

source: Say hello
target: Hello ti rawh

source: And Jehoiada took two wives for him, and he became the father of sons and daughters.
target: Tin, Jehoiada chuan nupui pahnih a neihsak a, fanu leh fapate a hring a.

source: And Saul was still waiting in the farthest part of Geba, under the fruit-tree in Migron: there were about six hundred men with him;
target: Tin, Saula chu Gibea ram hmawr lam daiha Migron-a pomgranet thei kung hnuaiah a awm a: tin, a hnêna mi awmte chu zaruk emaw lai an ni a.

source: See, a king will be ruling in righteousness, and chiefs will give right decisions.
target: Ngai teh, fel taka rorêl tûr lal a lo awm ang a, dik taka tithin hotute an lo chhuak bawk ang.

source: Give me knowledge and good sense; for I have put my faith in your teachings.
target: Ngaihtuah thiamna leh hriatna mi zirtir ang che; I thupêkte chu ka ring si a.

target: Thei a ni

source: I could have drowned
target: Ka pil thei a ni

source: You had your share.
target: I chanvo i nei a.

source: For these orders which I have given you today are not strange and secret, and are not far away.

source: One Kg
target: Kg khat

source: All the work of man is for his mouth, and still he has a desire for food.

source: Take care that no one takes you away by force, through man's wisdom and deceit, going after the beliefs of men and the theories of the world, and not after Christ:
target: Fimkhur rawh u, chutilochuan tupawhin Krista thu ang ni lovin, mihring thu rochhiah leh khawvel A Aw B ang zawkin an thu fing leh bumna mai maiin ral lakin an la dah ang che u.

source: I put the record of my ways before you, and you gave me an answer: O give me knowledge of your rules.
target: Ka awm dante chu ka hriattir chian, nangin mi chhâng a: I thuruatte chu mi zirtir ang che.

source: Such is the fate of everyone who goes in search of profit; it takes away the life of its owners.
target: Chutiang chu a ni, hlawknaa duham apiangte kawng chu; A neitute nun a laksak thin.

source: Have the doors of death been open to you, or have the door-keepers of the dark ever seen you?
target: Thihna kawngkate chu i hnênah tihlan a ni tawh êm? Thihna daihlim kawngka chu i hmu tawh êm ni?

source: Every word of God is tested: he is a breastplate to those who put their faith in him.
target: LALPA thu zawng zawng chu fiah a ni tawh, Amah ringtu zawng zawngte tan ani chu phaw a ni.

source: I've been stabbed
target: Ka vuak tawh

source: Who's your roommate
target: Tu nge i roommate

source: For my haters are waiting secretly for me; and those who are watching for my soul are banded together in their evil designs,
target: Mi dotute chuan ka chungchang thu an sawi si a; Ka nuna changtue an inrawn bawk a,

source: And be ready by the morning, and come up on Mount Sinai, and come before me there in the morning, on the top of the mountain.
target: Naktuk zingah inpeih chhuah tum ang che, tin, zingah chuan Sinai tlângah lo chho la, tlâng chhipah ka hmaan lo ding ang che.

source: Don't deny it
target: Zep suh

source: Then looking, I saw that on the arch which was over the head of the winged ones there was seen over them what seemed like a sapphire stone, having the form of a king's seat.
target: Tichuan ka han en a, ngai teh, cherub-ho lu chunga vân dum awmah khian sapphir lung ni awm tak, lal țhutthleng ang taka lang hi a lo lang a.

source: I giggled.
target: Ka nui nasa.

source: He makes me free from my haters; I am lifted up over those who come up against me: you have made me free from the violent man.
target: Ani chuan mi dotute lakah mi chhanchhuak a: A ni, nangin mi beiotute chung lamah chuan mi chawi kang a: Mi nunrawng lak ata chu mi chhanhim thin a.

source: What are you drawing
target: Eng nge i lem ziah

source: I was eating a sandwich.
target: Sandwich ka ei a.

source: They're all con men
target: Con mipa an ni vek

source: It's awful
target: A vanduaithlak

source: For, turning away from the law of God, you keep the rules of men.
target: Pathian thupekte chu thlahthlamin mihring thurochhiah chu in vuan tlat a nih hi, a ti a.

source: When I was a child, I made use of a child's language, I had a child's feelings and a child's thoughts: now that I am a man, I have put away the things of a child.
target: Ka naupan laiin naupang tawngin ka tawng a, naupang hriatin ka hria a, naupang ngaihtuahin ka ngaihtuah thin; tuna ka lo puitlin hnu hian naupang tih dan chu ka ban tawh.

source: I can't swim
target: Ka hleuh thei lo

source: You are the God who does works of power: you have made your strength clear to the nations.
target: Nang chu thilmak ti thintu Pathian chu i ni a: Mi tin, zingahte chuan i chakzia i hriattir thin.

source: Keep me safe in your righteousness, and come to my help; give ear to my voice, and be my saviour.
target: I felna avânga mi chhanhimin, mi chhan chhuak la: Ka lamah hian i beng rawn dawhin, mi chhandam ang che.

source: And those overseers, every man in his month, saw that food was produced for Solomon and all his guests, they took care that nothing was overlooked.
target: chung hotute chuan mahni chan thla zelah Solomona leh lal Solomona dawhkana rawn kil vetu zawng zawngte ei tûr chu an ngaihtuah thin a; pêk kim loh an nei ngai lo.

source: In this way Abimelech was rewarded by God for the evil he had done to his father in putting his seventy brothers to death;
target: Abimeleka a unaute sawmsarih a thah a, a pa chunga a tih dan kawnga a suahsualna kha Pathianin chutiang chuan a lo thungrul ve ta a ni:

source: And Solomon gave her answers to all her questions; there was no secret which the king did not make clear to her.
target: Tin, Solomona chuan thu zawh zawng chu a chhâng vek a: lal hriat loh, a hrilhfiah theih loh rêng rêng a awm hauh lo mai.

source: For the praise of men was dearer to them than the approval of God.
target: Pathian hnena ropuina ai chuan mihring hnena ropuina an duh zawk si a.

source: All people will give way before you: for the Lord your God will put the fear of you on all the land through which you go, as he has said.
target: Tumah reng rengin an chel lo vang che u; LALPA in Pathianin in hnena a sawi tawh ang khan in va rah tur ram zawng zawngah chuan nangmahni țihna leh hlauhna a awmtir ang.

source: I didn't have to pay.
target: Ka pek a ngai lo.

source: For I did not get it from man, and I was not given teaching in it, but it came to me through revelation of Jesus Christ.
target: Mihring hnen ata hmu ka ni hek lo, mi mi zirtir ka ni hek lo, Isua Krista inlarna avanga hmu ka ni zawk si a.

source: I have an upset stomach.
target: Ka pum a na a.

source: We have not found it
target: Kan la hmu lo

source: I looked away
target: Ka en kan

source: He had heart surgery.
target: Lung zai a nei a.

source: They sent up their cry to you and were made free: they put their faith in you and were not put to shame.
target: An au chia, tichuan chhanhimin an lo awm thin a: An ring chia, tichuan mualphovin an awm ngai lo.

source: It was there
target: Khatah a awm

source: One hand full of rest is better than two hands full of trouble and desire for wind.
target: A dik thei e, hahdama veikhat neih pawh hi buai philia thawka veihnih neih ai chuan a tha.

source: I will eat a soup.
target: Soup ka ei ang.

source: Happy will she be who had faith that the things which the Lord has said to her will be done.
target: A ringnu pawh a eng a thawl a ni, a hnena Lalpain thu a sawi kha a thleng dawn si a, a ti a.

source: And Ephraim is like a foolish dove, without wisdom; they send out their cry to Egypt, they go to Assyria.
target: Ephraim chu țhuro lungmawl, hriatthiamna nei lo ang a lo ni a; Aigupta lam an au thûl a, Assuria lamah an kal thûl a.

source: Then, weeping, he took Benjamin in his arms, and Benjamin himself was weeping on Joseph's neck.
target: Tin, a ir leh a nau Benjamina ir chuktuahin a țap ta a; Berjamina pawh a ir chuktuahin a țap ta bawk a.

source: I called her Cathy
target: Cathy ka ti a

source: You were not controlled by my guiding, and would have nothing to do with my sharp words:
target: Ka remruat zawng zawng chu engmah lovah in ngai zawk a, Ka zilhna rêng rêng in pawm duh lo va.

source: He skins the fish.
target: Nga chu a vun a.

source: God is great
target: Paṭhian a ropui e

source: He left in a rush.
target: Hmanhmawh zet hian a chhuak ta a.

source: Cut it out
target: Zai chhuak rawh

source: Nobody called them
target: Tuman an ko lo

source: The works of his hands are faith and righteousness; all his laws are unchanging.
target: A kut thiltithe chu thutak leh rorêlna fel ani a; A thununna thu zawng zawngte ch a rinawm a ni.

source: Don't go back to sleep!
target: Mut leh tawh suh!

source: And if he gives her to his son, he is to do everything for her as if she was his daughter.
target: Tin, a fapa tâna nupuia hualsak duh a nih chuan, fanute en ang bawkin a en tûr a ni.

source: He came downstairs
target: A rawn chhuk a

source: They closed their eyes
target: An mit an chhing a

source: Are you afraid of the truth?
target: Thutak i hlau em?

source: Yes, of course I do.
target: Aw, duh tehreng e.

source: And all the generations coming after him kept the memory of his righteousness for ever.
target: Chu chu a felnaa ruat a ni, Kumkhuain chhuan zawng zawng thlengin.

source: And if it is a female, the value will be thirty shekels.
target: Hmeichhia a nih chuan I ruat dan tur chu sekel sawmthum a ni ang.

source: Jesus said in answer, Will you give up your life for me? Truly I say to you, Before the cry of the cock you will have said three times that you are not my disciple.
target: Isuan, Keimah avangin i nun i paih ang maw? Tih tak meuhvin, tih tak meuhvin ka hrilh a che, nangin vawi thum mi phat hma loh chuan ar a khuang lo vang.

source: So I made them go out of the land of Egypt and took them into the waste land.
target: Chutichuan Aigupta ram chhuahsan tûrin ka ti ta a, thlalêrah ka rawn hruai lût ta a.

source: He gave me a record
target: Record min pe a

source: I often read
target: Ka chhiar fo a ni

source: The thunder makes clear his passion, and the storm gives news of his wrath.
target: Khawpui ri chuan a chungchang a puang a, Ran rualte pawhin thlipui lo thawkah chuan an puang a.

source: Don't be deceived by Tom.
target: Tom-a bum suh.

source: No one puts forward an upright cause, or gives a true decision: their hope is in deceit, and their words are false; they are with child with sin, and give birth to evil.
target: Tuman dik takin thupawi an sawi lo va, tumah thutak takin thu an sawipui ngai lo: boruak mai mai hi an ring a, dat an sawi țhin a; thiltihsualna an pai a, khawlohna an hring țhin.

source: You're tired
target: I chau a nih kha

source: If her husband, hearing of it, says nothing to her at the time, then the oaths she made and the undertakings she gave will have force.
target: a pasalin a hriat nia a ngawih san mai chuan a thutiam emaw a intiamkamna emaw chu a hlen ngei tur a ni.

source: But he was full of the Holy Spirit, and looking up to heaven, he saw the glory of God and Jesus at the right hand of God.
target: Nimahsela ani chu Thlarau Thianghlima khat a ni a, van lam a en tlat a, Pathian ropuizia leh Pathian ding lama Isua ding a hmu a;

source: Did we win?
target: Kan chak em?

source: Were you surprised
target: Mak i ti em ni

source: O come, let us give worship, falling down on our knees before the Lord our Maker.
target: Aw lo kal ula, chibai bûkin i kun ang u khai; LALPA min Siamtu hmaah i thingthi ang u:

source: If death comes suddenly through disease, he makes sport of the fate of those who have done no wrong.
target: Chhiatnain thihna a thlen thut chuan, Mi nun tlâng tuarna chu a nuihzat ang.

source: Whatever your lips have said, see that you do it; for you gave your word freely to the Lord your God.
target: In kaa chhuak tawh chu in ti ngei tur a ni; duh thua thilhlan inkaa in tiam, LALPA in Pathian hnena in tiam ang zelin.

source: He is eating
target: A ei mek

source: Let's switch
target: Thlakthleng ang

source: Thick clouds are covering him, so that he is unable to see; and he is walking on the arch of heaven.
target: A hmuh loh nân chhum chhah takin a khuh a, Van kual chhûngah chuan a kal vêl a, i ti a,

source: I cannot eat any more.
target: Ka ei tawh lo.

source: She knows everything
target: Engkim a hre vek

source: I was fat
target: Ka thau ṭhin

source: And Samuel kept where he was, not moving till the time came for opening the doors of the house of God in the morning. And fear kept him from giving Eli an account of his vision.
target: Tin, Samuela chu zing tlengin a mu a, tin, LALPA in kawngkhârte chu a hawng a. chutichuan Samuela chuan chu mi inlârna chu Elia hriattir chu a hlauthawng a.

source: No arrest was made.
target: Man an awm lo.

source: Don't go yet.
target: La kal suh.

source: I'm a junior
target: A thar zâwk ka nia

source: She made breakfast
target: Chawhmeh a siam a

source: Were you sleeping?
target: I muhil em ni?

source: Not one town made peace with the children of Israel, but only the Hivites of Gibeon: they took them all in war.
target: Gibeon khuaa awm Hiv-hote tih chauh lo chu Israel-hote nena remna siam khua reng reng an awm lo: dona an lak vek a ni.

source: Now while these things were in existence, the priests went into the first Tent at all times, for prayer and the making of offerings.
target: Tin, chung thilte chu chutianga siam a lo ni a, Puithiamhovin Pathian rawng bawlin biak buk tawntirhah chuan an lut fo thin a;

source: And the brothers straight away sent Paul and Silas away by night to Beroea: and they, when they came there, went to the Synagogue of the Jews.
target: Tin, unaute chuan azan azanin Paula leh Sila chu Beroia khuaah an kaltir ta nghal a; chutah an va thlen chuan Judate inkhawmna inah an lut a.

source: It wasn't your fault.
target: I sual a ni lo.

source: Anyone touching a dead body will be unclean for seven days:
target: Tu ruang pawh a dektu apang chu ni sarih an thianghlim lo vang.

source: What do you think's out there?
target: Eng nge awm i tih?

source: For if it is not possible for the dead to come to life again, then Christ has not come to life again:
target: Mitthite kaihthawhin an awm si loh chuan Krista pawh kha kaihthawhin a awm lo vang;

source: Who do you suspect
target: Tu nge i rinhlelh

source: And I made answer and said to the angel who was talking to me, What are these, my lord?
target: Tah chuan ka chhâng a, vântirhkoh mi betu hnenah chuan Heng hi eng nge ni, ka pu? Ka ti a.

source: Thank you Chris
target: Chris ka lawm e

source: He went round and took the measure of it on the east side with the measuring rod, five hundred, measured with the rod all round.
target: Tehna tiang chuan chhak lam pang chu a teh a, tawng zanga a ni a; a tehna tiang a tehin.

source: They are nothing, a work of error: in the time of their punishment, destruction will overtake them.
target: Engmah lo mai an ni, bumna hna mai, An hremna hunah an bo mai ang.

source: And because the revelations were so very great, in order that I might not be overmuch lifted up, there was given to me a thorn in the flesh, one sent from Satan to give me pain.
target: Tin, hriattirnate chu a nasat em em avanga ka inngaihhlut lutuk loh nan tisaah hling mi pe a ni, Setana tirhkoh kut thak hnawih nana mi hmangtu tur chu; chutilochuan ka inngaihlu lutuk dah ang e.

source: For anyone who keeps all the law, but makes a slip in one point, is judged to have gone against it all.
target: Tupawhin Dan zawm kim mah sela, kawng khata a tihsual si chuan a zaah chuan thiam loh changin a awm tawh a ni.

source: You don't have to try.
target: I tum a ngai lo.

source: I adore Tom
target: Tom ka lawm e

source: And the Amorites who were in the hill-country came out against you and put you to flight, rushing after you like bees, and overcame you in Seir, driving you even as far as Hormah.
target: Tin, chu tlânga awm Amor-ho chuan an lo bei che u a, khuai mi um angin an lo um che u a, Seir ațangin Horma thlangin an that zel che u a.

source: And if a man takes the holy food in error, he will have to give the holy thing back to the priest, with the addition of a fifth part.
target: Miin hre lova thil thianghlim chu a ei chuan a hmun ngaa thena hmun khat chu a dah belh ang a, thil thianghlim chu puithiam a pe tur a ni.

source: And Aaron and his sons did all the things about which the Lord had given orders through Moses.
target: Tichuan LALPAN Mosia hmanga tih tura thu a pêk zawngte chu Arona leh a fapate chuan an ti a.

source: See, I have taken the Levites out of the children of Israel to be mine in place of the first sons of the children of Israel;
target: ngaiteh, Levi-hote hi Israela thlahte zing ata Israela thlahte fa tir chhul keu hmasa ber aiah keimah ngeiin ka lak an ni a; Lei-ho chu ka tan an ni ang:

source: The king of Dor on the hill of Dor, one; the king of Goiim in Gilgal, one;
target: Dor khaw zosânga Dor khaw lal, pakhat; Gilgal-a Goim hnamho lal, pakhat,

source: I drank a lot.
target: Ka in nasa.

source: Let us begin then
target: Chuti a nih chuan i tan ang u

source: They were not pleased
target: An lawm lo hle mai

source: You can't help yourself.
target: I insum thei lo.

source: And the seed of Israel made themselves separate from all the men of other nations, publicly requesting forgiveness for their sins and the wrongdoing of their fathers.
target: Tin, Israel hnam chu hnam dangte lakah an intihrang a, an ding a, an sualnate leh an pi leh pu bawhchhiatnate thupha an chawi a.

source: Has any nation ever made a change in their gods, though they are no gods? but my people have given up their glory in exchange for what is of no profit.
target: Hnam dangte chuan an pathian an thlâk ngai em ni, Pathian tak ni hlei lo pawh? Ka mite erawh chuan an ropuina chu, Thil sâwt lo takin an thlâk ta zâwk a.

source: Let it be to him as a robe which he puts on, let it be like a band which is round him at all times.
target: Chu chu a tan a inbel thinna silhfen angin awm sela, A inhren fona kawnghren ni bawk rawh se.

source: I hate flies
target: Thosi ka hua

source: For I will not give punishment for ever, or be angry without end: for from me breath goes out; and I it was who made the souls.
target: Kumkhuain ka do dawn si lo va, ka thinur fo dawn hek lo: chutichuan mi rilru ka hmaah a chau vang a, nunna ka siamte pawh chu an chau bawk ang.

source: But now, put out your hand against all he has, and he will be cursing you to your face.
target: Tunah hian i kut thawh la, a neih zawng zawng hi han khawihsak teh, i hmaichhan ngeiah a sawichhe mai ang che, a ti a.

source: But the flesh of the ox and its skin and its waste parts are to be burned outside the circle of the tents, for it is a sin-offering.
target: Bâwngpa sa leh a vun leh a êk erawh chu daipâwn lamah i hâl tur a ni: chu chu sual tâna hlan a ni.

source: Be certain that he through whom a sinner has been turned from the error of his way, keeps a soul from death and is the cause of forgiveness for sins without number.
target: mi sual a kawng bona ata hawi kirtirtu chuan thihna ata a thlarau a chhandam ang a, sual tam tak a khuhsak bawk ang tih inhre rawh se.

source: Lord, my hope has been in your salvation; and I have kept your teachings.
target: Aw LALPA, i chhandamna ke beisei reng a, I thupêkte angin ka ti thin.

source: And that which went on the stones, this is he who, hearing the word, straight away takes it with joy;
target: Tin, pialtlep hmuna theh chu, thu chu hriaa lawm taka pawm nghal thin hi a ni;

source: O Lord God, the strength of my salvation, you have been a cover over my head in the day of the fight.
target: Aw PATHIAN, Lalpa, min chhandamna tichaktu, Nang chuan inbei niah chuan ka lu mi khuhsak a.

source: Motel ka siam a.
target: I run a motel.

source: Did you like Boston
target: Boston hi i duh em

source: And the seers will be shamed, and the readers of the future will be at a loss, all of them covering their lips; for there is no answer from God.
target: Nimahsela Jakobho hnênah an bawhchhiatna hriattîr tûr leh Israelho hnênah an sualna hriattîr tûrin LALPA thlarau avânga thiltihtheihna te, rorêlna te leh chakna te chuan ka khat tak meuh a ni.

source: For they went out for love of the Name, taking nothing from the Gentiles.
target: Hming avang hian Jentailte hnen ata engmah la lovin a lo thawk chhuak a ni.

source: Control yourselves
target: In thunun rawh u

source: Weed ka zuk lo.
target: I don't smoke weed.

source: For when we were in the flesh, the evil passions which came into being through the law were working in our bodies to give the fruit of death.
target: Tisaa kan awm lai khan, Dan avanga duhzawng sual lo chhuakte chuan kan taksa pengahte, thihna khawpa rah turin a thawk thin.

source: They're just examples.
target: Entirna mai an ni.

source: They pushed him aside
target: An nawr phei a

source: The grains have become small and dry under the spade; the store-houses are made waste, the grain-stores are broken down; for the grain is dry and dead.
target: Chite chu lei tlang hnuaiahte chuan a țawih a; zêm te chu a ram a, buhin te chu țhiat in a awm a; a buh chu a vuai ta si a.

source: In the third month after the children of Israel went out from Egypt, on the same day, they came into the waste land of Sinai.
target: Israela thlahte Aigupta ram ata an chhuah achin a thla thumna, chu mi ni tak chuan Sinai thlalêr an thleng a.

source: So the near relation said to Boaz, Take it for yourself. And he took off his shoe.
target: Chutichuan an laichin bul chuan Boaza hnênah, Nangman i tan lei zawk rawh, a ti a. Tin, a pheikhawk a hlip a.

source: After this I will not say much to you, because the ruler of this world comes: and he has no power over me;
target: In hnenah thu ka sawi leh tawh mang lo vang, khawvel lal a lo kal dawn si a, ani chuan keimahah engmah reng a nei lo;

source: Give me life, O Lord, because of your name; in your righteousness take my soul out of trouble.
target: Aw LALPA, i hming avângin mi tiharh la: I felna avângin ka nuna hi manganna ata hruai chhuak ang che.

source: Three on the other side of Jordan and three in the land of Canaan, to be safe places for flight.
target: Jordan ralah khaw thum in ruat ang a, Kanaan ramah khaw thum in ruat ang a, tualtlana khuate ani ang.

source: The sinner will be full of trouble; but mercy will be round the man who has faith in the Lord.
target: Chutilochuan i kai thei lo vang. Mi suaksual tan chuan lungngaihna tam tak a awm ang a: LALPA ringtu erah chu ngilneihnain a hual vêl zawk ang.

source: He grew old
target: A lo upa ta

source: She looks confused
target: A buai hmel hle

source: Take the money
target: Pawisa la rawh

source: O, keep in mind that my life is wind: my eye will never again see good.
target: Ka nunna hi thli mai ani tih hre reng la, Ka mitin thil tha a hmuh tawh dawn loh hi.

source: For if we keep the substance of the faith which we had at the start, even till the end, we have a part with Christ;
target: Krista changtute kan lo ni ta si a, kan rin chhan tantirhna kha a tawp thlengin nghet taka kan vawn tlat phawt chuan,

source: Were you blindfolded
target: Mit khalh i ni em

source: He got angry
target: A ṭhin a rim

source: What are you guys drinking
target: Eng nge in in a

source: Who are you trying to kid?
target: Tu nge kid i tum?

source: I yawned.
target: Ka ham.

source: And in Moab there was great fear of the people, because their numbers were so great: and the feeling of Moab was bitter against the children of Israel.
target: Tin, Moab-hote chuan mite chu an hlau hle mai a, an tam si a: Israel thlahte avang chuan Moab-hote chu an mangang a.

source: Life was good again.
target: Nun a tha leh ta.

source: Our mouth is open to you, O Corinthians, our heart is wide.
target: Aw,Korinth-a mite u,kan thinlung pawh phawrh vekin in hnenah thu kan sawi a,

source: Then he gave a cry to the servant who was waiting on him and said, Put this woman out, and let the door be locked after her.
target: Chutichuan a rawngbawltu a chiahhlawh chu a ko va, He hmeichhia hi ka hnên ata chuatir la, kawng kalh hnan tlat rawh, a ti a.

source: They call me a tart.
target: Tart min ti thin.

source: So will the king have a great desire for you, seeing how beautiful you are; because he is your lord, give him honour.
target: Chutichuan lalberin i hmêl tha tak hi a duh dawn nia: Ani chu i Lalpa a ni si a; tichuan amah chu chibai bûk thin ang che.

source: Or your hearer may say evil of you, and your shame will not be turned away.
target: A hretu chuan a hau ang chia, I hmingchhiatna a reh lo dah ang e.

source: Let your gentle mercies come to me, so that I may have life; for your law is my delight.
target: Ka nun theihna tûrin i lainatnate ka hnênah lo kal rawh se: I dan chu ka lawmna a ni si a.

source: You stink.
target: I rimchhia.

source: But Saul went on increasing in power, and the Jews in Damascus were not able to give answers to the arguments by which he made it clear that Jesus was the Christ.
target: Saula erawh chu a lo chak lehzual a, chu mi chu Krista a ni tak zet tih a hrilhfiah a, Damaska khuaa Juda awmte chu a tidang hiau thin a.

source: So David did not let the ark of the Lord come back to him to the town of David: but had it turned away and put into the house of Obed-edom the Gittite.
target: Chutichuan Davida chuan LALPA bâwm chu Davida khuaa ama hnênah chuan a suan du ta lo va; Davida chuan Git mi Obed-edoma in lamah a dah ta zawk a.

source: Is it your opinion that I have come to give peace on earth? I say to you, No, but division:
target: Khawvela rem lentir tura lo kal emaw mi ti elo? Hnai lo ve, ka hrilh a che u, do lentir tura lo kal zawk ka ni;

source: And when Jesus went back, the people were glad to see him, for they were all waiting for him.
target: Tin, Isua a lo kir leh chuan mipuiin amah an lawm a; amah lo nghak reng an ni hlawm si a.
