source: Ephraim is troubled; he is crushed by his judges, because he took pleasure in walking after deceit.
target: Ephraim chuan rah beh a chîng a, Dikna a palzût a, engmah lo a ûm ruai a.

source: Give sounds of joy, make melody together, waste places of Jerusalem: for the Lord has given comfort to his people, he has taken up the cause of Jerusalem.
target: Jerusalem hmun chhe tawhte u, hlim chhuak phut ula, hlim takin zaiho rawh u: LALPA chuan amite chu a thlamuan ta si a, Jerusalem chu a tlan ta a ni.

source: And from Etham, turning back to Pi-hahiroth which is before Baal-zephon, they put up their tents before Migdol.
target: tin, Etham ațang chuan an chhuak a, Baal-zephon bula Pi-hahirot lamah an tawlh kir leh a, Migdal bulah awmhmun an khuar a.

source: They don't pay you enough
target: An pe tawk lo che

source: We want jobs
target: Hnâ te kan duh

source: They have over them as king the angel of the great deep: his name in Hebrew is Abaddon, and in the Greek language Apollyon.
target: Leilawt tirhkoh chu an chunga lalberah an nei a, Hebrai tawngin a hming chu Abaddona a ni a,Grik tawng erawh chuan a hming chu Apolluona Tiboraltua a ni.

source: Happy is the upright man! for he will have joy of the fruit of his ways.
target: Mi fel thu-ah chuan, An la tha dâwn, ti rawh u: an thiltih rahte chu an ei dâwn si a.

source: I married Tom.
target: Tom-a ka nei.

source: And on the east were three doors; and on the north three doors; and on the south three doors; and on the west three doors.
target: chhak lam pangah kawngkhar pathum, hmar lam pangah kawngkhar pathum, chhim lam pangah kawngkhar pathum, thlang lam pangah kawngkhar pathum a awm a.

source: Being conscious that you have done no wrong; so that those who say evil things about your good way of life as Christians may be put to shame.
target: chhia leh tha hriatna thiang tak nei ula, chutichuan an sawichhiatna che u kawngah chuan Kristaa in awm dan tha tak sawihnawmtute chu tihmualphovin an awm thei ang.

source: He drank beer.
target: Zu a in tawh.

source: We tried
target: Kan tichhin tawh

source: And they took grain and dry grass for the horses and the carriage-horses, to the right place, every man as he was ordered.
target: Mi tinin an tih tûra ruat ang zelin a awmna tûr hmunah chuan sakawrte leh ran tlan chak takt tan barli leh buhpawlte an rawn dah bawk thin a.

source: And the sons of Korah: Assir and Elkanah and Abiasaph: these are the families of the Korahites.
target: Tin, Kora fapate chu Asira te, Elkana te, Abiasapha te an ni; hêngte hi Kora ho hnamte chu an ni.

source: Turn that up
target: Tiring rawh

source: A space of land twenty-five thousand long and ten thousand wide is to be for the Levites, the servants of the house, a property for themselves, for towns for their living-places.
target: Hmun dang a dung tawng sînghnih leh sângnga, a vang tawng sîngkhat, Levia chi in puia rawngbawltute pualah, an chenna khawpui atân a awm tûr a ni.

source: The approval of a ruler is desired by great numbers: but the decision in a man's cause comes from the Lord.
target: Mi tam takin rorêltute duhsak hlawhna an zawng a, Mahse mihring chunga rorêlna chu LALPA hnên atanga lo chhuak a ni.

source: When the news comes to Egypt they will be bitterly pained at the fate of Tyre.
target: Thuthang chu Aigupta ram a thlen hun chuan tûra thuthang chu nasa takin an vei ang.

source: For every purpose there is a time and a decision, because the sorrow of man is great in him.
target: Thil tinreng hian ningkhawng a nei si thin a, mihring buaina chu a tan nasa hle mah se.

source: You've been selected
target: I thlan tawh a ni

source: His left hand would be under my head, and his right hand about me.
target: A kut veilam chu ka lukhama'n A kut dinglamin mi pawm teh se!

source: It wasn't for me.
target: Ka tan a ni lo.

source: The hater of authority has no love for teaching: he will not go to the wise.
target: Hmusit ching mi chuan zilhhauva awm a ngaina lo va, Mi fing hnênah chuan a kal duh lo vang.

source: She isn't afraid of snakes.
target: Rul a hlau lo.

source: Don't drink any alcohol.
target: Zu engmah in suh.

source: Tom burped
target: Tom a irhfiak

source: You are to put on one side for the Lord every mother's first male child, the first-fruit of her body, and the first young one of every beast; every male is holy to the Lord.
target: chhûl keu hmasa ber apiang leh in ran piang thla hmasa ber apiang chu LALPA tân in dah hrang zêl tûr a ni; a pate chu LALPA ta tûr a ni ang.

source: He's faking
target: A tilem a ni

source: My haters are ever ready to put an end to me; great numbers are lifting themselves up against me.
target: Ka hmêlmaten nilengin mi lem zawh an tum a: Chapo taka mi beiotute hi an tam si a:

source: Be not evil overmuch, and be not foolish. Why come to your end before your time?
target: Suaksual lutuk suh la, a hek suh: i hun lo takah engah nge i thih ang?

source: I'm still up
target: Ka la awm

source: Be not far from me, for trouble is near; there is no one to give help.
target: Mi hlat lul suh ang che: manganna tûr a hnai si a; Țanpuitu tûr rêng rêng an awm si lo.

source: He is covered by the branches of the trees; the grasses of the stream are round him.
target: Lotus buk chuan a zar hlim a, Luia tuipuisuthlah chuan a hual vêl a.

source: Give the news in Migdol, make it public in Noph: say, Take up your positions and make yourselves ready; for on every side of you the sword has made destruction.
target: Aigupta ramah chuan hril ula, Migdol-ah puang rawh u; Noph-ah leh Tahpanes-ah chuan puang ula; Ding nghetin in ralring rawh u; I vêla mi khandaihin a ei zo tawh si a, tiin sawi rawh u.

source: But how then would the Writings come true, which say that so it has to be?
target: Nimahsela ngen ang ila, engtin nge Pathian Lehkha Thu-hetianga a lo awm tur thu hi-a thlen theih ang le? a ti a.

source: I did that a lot.
target: Chu chu ka ti nasa hle.

source: And from the days of John the Baptist till now, the kingdom of heaven is forcing its way in, and men of force take it.
target: Baptistu Johana awm achin tun thlengin, van ram chuan beih vakna a tawk thin a, a bei vakte chuan an pawng lak thin.

source: Obey the law.
target: Dan zâwm rawh.

source: And in all his undertakings David did wisely; and the Lord was with him.
target: Tin, Davida chu a thiltih apiangah fel takin a che thin a; LALPA chu a hnênah a awm a.

source: The young men were crushing the grain, and the boys were falling under the wood.
target: Tlangvâlte buh her khâwl an hertîr a; Naupangte thingtuah têl hnuaiah an pai chawn chawn a.

source: And numbers of people came together from the towns round about Jerusalem, with those who were ill and those who were troubled with unclean spirits: and they were all made well.
target: Tin, Jerusalem khaw kiang vel khua ata mipuite pawh chu damlote, ramhuai bawlhhlawh sawisakte rawn hruaiin an lo kal khawm a; chungte pawh chu an lo dam ta theuh va.

source: Go on Tom in rawh
target: Go on Tom drink it

source: So now, get up by night, you and your people, and keep watch in the field secretly;
target: Chutichuan i hote nen azan azanin lo thawk ula, phulah lo chang rawh u:

source: You don't pay attention.
target: I ngaihsak lo.

source: But if, because I am untrue, God being seen to be true gets more glory, why am I to be judged as a sinner?
target: Nimahsela ka dawt thusawi avanga Pathian thu dikzia amah tiropui khawp hiala a lan lehzual si chuan, engati nge kei pawh mi sual anga thiam loh chantira ka la awm ni?

source: How are you, Kathy?
target: I dam maw, Kathy?

source: But my mercy will not be taken away from him, as I took it from him who was before you.
target: nimahsela i hmaa ka sawn bo Saula hnên hngaihna chuan ani zawng a kalsan lo vang.

source: Were you intoxicated
target: Zu rui i ni em

source: Is the boss there
target: Boss chu a awm em

source: Did you throw up?
target: I throw up em ni?

source: The sun is on fire!
target: Ni chu a kang ta!

source: I gave you your place with the winged one; I put you on the mountain of God; you went up and down among the stones of fire.
target: Nang chu vengtu cherub hriak thih i ni; Pathian tlâng thianghlimah ka wmtîr chia, Meivam iang lung zingah i leng.

source: I'm so fat
target: Ka thau lutuk

source: He resigned
target: A bâng

source: I feel silly
target: A zahthlâk ka ti

source: They carry firearms
target: Silai an keng a

source: As a father has pity on his children, so the Lord has pity on his worshippers.
target: Pain a fate a khawngaih ang hian, LALPA chuan mah tihtue chu a khawngaih thin.

source: Don't call your father.
target: I pa chu ko suh.

source: Put out the fire
target: Mei ti mit rawh

source: It's a birch tree
target: Birch thing a ni

source: Lung cancer
target: Chuap cancer

source: It's perfect
target: A mawi famkim

source: A word of protest goes deeper into one who has sense than a hundred blows into a foolish man.
target: Mi â chunga vawi za vuak aiin Mi fingah chuan vawi khat zilhhauna pawh a lût thûk zawk.

source: You're all under arrest.
target: In man vek tawh.

source: How nice!
target: A va mawi em!

source: But I have a fear, that in some way, as Eve was tricked by the deceit of the snake, your minds may be turned away from their simple and holy love for Christ.
target: Nimahsela, rul chuan a ngamthlemnain Evi a bum ang khan Krista lama takna leh thianghlimna ata chu eng emaw tiin in rilru chu an tikhawlo dah ang e, tih ka hlauthawng a ni.

source: I started laughing
target: Ka nui tan a

source: Because by the works of the law no man is able to have righteousness in his eyes, for through the law comes the knowledge of sin.
target: Chutichuan Dan thiltih avangin mi tumah a mithmuhin thiam changing an awm lo vang; Dan avangin sual hriat famkimna a lo awm a ni si a.

source: Tom bit me.
target: Tom-an mi seh.

source: I'm a friend
target: Ṭhian ka nia

source: Evil designs are disgusting to the Lord, but the words of the clean-hearted are pleasing.
target: Remruâtna tha lo chu LALPA tana thil tenawm ani a, Mi thianghlim thu erawh chu benglut a ni.

source: Don't blame yourself.
target: Mahni inpuh suh.

source: It was tough
target: A har khawp mai

source: Do you believe Tom
target: Tom hi i ring em

source: They are not sisters
target: Unaunu an ni lo

source: Who'll fight?
target: Tunge sual dâwn?

source: I have a special reason
target: Chhan bik ka nei a

source: Use your key
target: I chabi hmang rawh

source: Mary is a barmaid
target: Mary hi barmaid a ni a

source: They are ignorant of the rules.
target: Dan hre lo an ni.

source: I have found happiness.
target: Hlimna ka hmu ta.

source: She is not a student.
target: Zirlai a ni lo.

source: And the Levite said he would make his living-place with the man, and he became to him as one of his sons.
target: Tin, Levi chi chuan chu mi hnêna awm chu a remti ta a; tichuan chu tlangvâl chu a fapa pakhatah a awm ta a.

source: I had no clothing, and you gave it to me: when I was ill, or in prison, you came to me.
target: saruak ka nihin puan mi sintir a; ka dam lohvin mi kan a; tan ina ka awmin ka hnenah in lo kal si a, a la ti ang.

source: Is everything cool
target: Engkim a cool em

source: So then I am running, not uncertainly; so I am fighting, not as one who gives blows in the air:
target: Chutichuan, tiam chin lam panin ka tlan ngat ngat a ni, boruak mai hnek lovin mahni ka inhnek zawk thin a,

source: But whoever gives ear to me will take his rest safely, living in peace without fear of evil.
target: Ka thu pawm apiangte erawh chu him takin an awm ang a, Thil tha lo hlau lovin an awm hle hle ang.

source: For loving God is keeping his laws: and his laws are not hard.
target: Pathian kan hmangaihna chu hei hi a ni, a thupekte kan zawm hi; a thupekte chu a khirh si lo va.

source: Get together before me all those who are in authority in your tribes, and your overseers, so that I may say these things in their hearing, and make heaven and earth my witnesses against them.
target: An benghriata heng thu hi ka sai a, an chungchang thua hretua lei leh van ka koh theih nan in hnam puipa zawng zawng te, in hotute min koh khawmsak rawh u.

source: Now Dinah, the daughter whom Leah had by Jacob, went out to see the women of that country.
target: Tin, Leaii fanu Dinaii, Jakoba a hrinsak chu, chu mi ram nulate hmu tûrin a va lêng chhuak a.

source: You are boring me!
target: Min boring a ni!

source: Hurry it up
target: Hmanhmawh rawh

source: So the fruit of their way will be their food, and with the designs of their hearts they will be made full.
target: Chuvangin anmahni kawng rah chu an ei ang a, Anmahni suangtuahnain an tlai ang.

source: We'll be home soon
target: Kan haw thuai ang

source: Are they moving me to wrath? says the Lord; are they not moving themselves to their shame?
target: Keimah êm ni mi tihthinrim? Tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni: anmahni zahna tûrin anmahni a ni zawk lawm ni?

source: Sami is sitting down.
target: Sami chu a thu a.

source: They know us
target: Min hria vek

source: And they gave the children of Israel even harder work to do:
target: Tin, Aigupta mite chuan Israela thlahte chu rim takin an thawhtîr a:

source: And having different qualities by reason of the grace given to us, such as the quality of a prophet, let it be made use of in relation to the measure of our faith;
target: Khawngaihna min pek angzia zelin thilthlawnpek hrang hrang kan nei theuh va, thu hrilh tur a nih chuan kan rin tawk ang zelin I hril ang u;

source: Some other boats, however, came from Tiberias near to the place where they had taken the bread after the Lord had given praise.
target: Nimahsela Lalpan lawmthu a sawi hnua chhang an eina hmun kiangah khan, Tiberi khua atangin lawng tete a lo thleng si a.

source: And the grace of our Lord was very great, with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.
target: tin, kan Lalpa khawngaihna chu rinna leh Krista Isua hmangaihnain nasa takin a liam ta.

source: Are you pregnant yet?
target: I la naupai em?

source: My frame was not unseen by you when I was made secretly, and strangely formed in the lowest parts of the earth.
target: A ruka siama ka awm a, Lei hmun hnuaihnung bera mawi taka siama ka awm lai khan Ka ruhrel chu i lakah thupin a awm lo.

source: He's something else
target: Thil dang a ni

source: Give to the Lord your God what is his by right; let all who are round him give offerings to him who is to be feared.
target: Thu tiam ula, LALPA in Pathian lakah hlen rawh u: A vêla mi zawng zawng chuan tih tûra chu lawmmante rawn sinsak rawh se.

source: I see them
target: Anmahni ka hmu

source: You have made us like waste and that for which there is no use, among the peoples.
target: Mipuite zîngah hian bawlhlawh leh hnawmhnawkah min siam ta a.

source: Then the king said, Let Haman come quickly, so that what Esther has said may be done. So the king and Haman came to the feast which Esther had made ready.
target: Tin, lal chuan, Estheri sawi ang chuan Hamana chu han ko thuai rawh u, a ti a. Chutichuan lal leh Hamana chuan Estheri ruai buatsaih chu ei tûrin an kal a.

source: And for his sister, a virgin, for she is his near relation and has had no husband, he may make himself unclean.
target: an farnu, an la awmpui, nula, pasal la nei lote avang chuan an intibawlhhlawh thei ang.

source: Who has no respect for rulers, and who gives no more attention to those who have wealth than to the poor, for they are all the work of his hands.
target: Hotute pawh duhsak bik lo leh Mi rethei aia mi hausak ngaihsak chuang lo ani a, An zain a kutchhuak an ni si a.

source: I didn't see anybody else.
target: Midang ka hmu lo.

source: I am thirsty
target: Ka tui a hal

source: Violent waves of the sea, streaming with their shame, wandering stars for whom the darkest night is kept in store for ever.
target: tuifinriat fawn invawrh, mahni mualphona phuan chhuakte an ni; arsi vak vak, chatuana thim chhah mup kheksakate chu an ni a.

source: I have sent you this short letter by Silvanus, a true brother, in my opinion; comforting you and witnessing that this is the true grace of God; keep to it.
target: Ka unaupa rinawm taka ka ruat Silvana kutah hian nangmahni fuih leh, chu chu Pathian khawngaihna taktak a ni tih hriattirin tawi tein inhnenah ka ziak a ni; chungah chuan ding nghet rawh u.

source: The land of Tappuah was the property of Manasseh; but Tappuah on the edge of Manasseh was the property of the children of Ephraim.
target: Tapua ram chu Manasea ta a ni a: Manasea ramri depa Tapua erawh chu Ephraima thlahte ta a ni.

source: And the dust goes back to the earth as it was, and the spirit goes back to God who gave it.
target: Vaivut chu a awm angin leiah a chang leh a, Thlarau chu a petu Pathian hnênah a kir leh a ni.

source: The bank is closed
target: Bank chu khar a ni

source: You weren't kidding
target: I nuihzat lo a ni

source: The house was empty
target: In chu a ruak a

source: You blind Pharisee, first make clean the inside of the cup and of the plate, so that the outside may become equally clean.
target: Nang Pharisai mitdel, no leh thleng chhung lam chu silfai hmasa rawh, a pawn lam pawh a lo fai theihna turin.

source: And after David had made the burned offerings and the peace-offerings, he gave the people a blessing in the name of the Lord of armies.
target: TinDavidan hâlral thilhlan leh remna thilhlante chu a hlan zawh chuan sipaihote LALPA hmingin mipuite chu mal a sawm a.

source: For they will give you increase of days, years of life, and peace.
target: Dam ni leh kum te, Thlamuannâte a pêk belhchhahsak dawn che nia.

source: Resting on the base of the Apostles and prophets, Christ Jesus himself being the chief keystone,
target: Krista Isua nge chu a kila lung pawimawh ber niin, tirhkohte leh zawlneite lungphum chunga sak in ni a;

source: Sit down and have a drink.
target: Thu la, in rawh.

source: But saying true words in love, may come to full growth in him, who is the head, even Christ;
target: hmangaiha thu dik tak sawiin, engkimah amahah kan thang lian thei zawk ang: amah chu Lu a ni, Krista chu.

source: I am smart
target: Ka felfai e

source: I'll stop
target: Ka bang ang

source: Every one who is named by my name, and whom I have made for my glory, who has been formed and designed by me.
target: ka hming pu apiangte leh ka ropuina tûra ka siam apiangte chu; anmahni chu ka din a, a ni, anmahni chu ka siam a ni.

source: Who resigned?
target: Tunge bâng?

source: She didn't visit anybody.
target: Tumah a tlawh lo.

source: The son of Abraham was Isaac; and the son of Isaac was Jacob; and the sons of Jacob were Judah and his brothers;
target: Abrahaman Isaaka a hring a; Isaakan Jakoba a hring a; Jakoban Juba leh a unaute a hring a;

source: But like a man, they have gone against the agreement; there they were false to me.
target: Nimahsela Adama angin thuthlung chu an bawhchhia a, Chutah chuan vervek takin ka chungah an ti a ni.

source: But the Pharisees went out and made designs against him, how they might put him to death.
target: Chutichuan, Pharisaite chu an chhuak a, amah an tihboral theih dan tur ngaihtuahin an inrawn a.

source: So the Lord gave Hezekiah and the people of Jerusalem salvation from the power of Sennacherib, the king of Assyria, and from all others, giving them rest on every side.
target: Chutiang chuan LALPAN Hezekia leh Jerusalem-a mite chu Asuria lal Senakeriba kut ata leh mi dang zawng zawng kut ata chu a chanhim a, an vela mite laka a veng a.

source: I didn't pass
target: Ka tling lo

source: Let your hope be in the Lord: take heart and be strong; yes, let your hope be in the Lord.
target: LALPA chu nghak reng rawh; Chak takin awm la, i thinlung chu intihuai rawh se; A ni, LALPA chu nghak reng rawh.

source: Don't give them your number.
target: I number pe suh.

source: And David went up, as Gad had said in the name of the Lord.
target: Tin, Gadan LALPA hminga a sawi ang chuan Davida chu a chho ta a.

source: I saw Tom
target: Tom ka hmu

source: Did you guys hook up?
target: In hook up em ni?

source: I laughed
target: Ka nui e

source: And Tyre made for herself a strong place, and got together silver like dust and the best gold like the earth of the streets.
target: Tin, tûra chuan kulhpui a in siama, Tangkaruate chu vaivut ang maiin a chhêk a, Rangkachak țha mi chu kawtthlêra chhirhdiak ang maiin A chhêk a ni.

source: And a voice came out of heaven, You are my dearly loved Son, with whom I am well pleased.
target: Tin, Nang ka Fapa duh tak i ni a, i chungah ka lawm em am a ni, tiin van atangin aw a lo chhuak a.

source: But if we are walking in the light, as he is in the light, we are all united with one another, and the blood of Jesus his Son makes us clean from all sin.
target: amaherawhchu amah chu engah a awm angin keini pawh enga awm kan nih chuan kan inpawl tlang a, tin, a Fapa Isua thisenin kan sual zawng zawng min tlenfaisak thin a ni.

source: So that we say with a good heart, The Lord is my helper; I will have no fear: what is man able to do to me?
target: Chutichuan, huai takin, Lalpa chu mi tanpuitu a ni, Ka hlau lo vang; Mihringin engnge mi tih theih ang? kan ti thin a ni.

source: They made me wait
target: Min nghah tir a

source: Let's swim
target: Tui hleuh ang

source: But he who was given the one went away and put it in a hole in the earth, and kept his lord's money in a secret place.
target: Talent khat dawngtu erawh chu a va kal a, lei a lai a, a pu tangka chu a thukru ta zawk a.

source: The offering you will give to the Lord is to be twenty-five thousand long and twenty-five thousand wide.
target: Ramzuat LALPA hnêna inhlan tûr chu a dung tawng sînghnih leh sângnga, a vang tawng singhnih a ni tûr a ni.

source: I felt great
target: Ropui ka ti

source: And the sons of Eliezer: Rehabiah the first; and Eliezer had no other sons, but Rehabiah had a great number.
target: Tin, Eliezera fatea upa ber chu Rehabia a ni. Tin, Eliezera chua nfapa dang rêng rêng anei lo ; Rehabia erawh chuan fapa tam tak anei.

source: And in the evening let them come back, and make a noise like a dog, and go round the town.
target: Tin, tlai lamah lo kal leh sela, uii angin chiau chul sela, Khawpui chu vêl vêl rawh se.

source: And when a great number of people came together, and men from every town went out to him, he gave them teaching in the form of a story:
target: Tin, mipui tam tak an rawn inkhawm a, khaw tina mi a hnena an lo kalin, tehkhin thuin thu a sawi a:

source: You're being very rude.
target: I rude hle mai.

source: Have a care for these things; give yourself to them with all your heart, so that all may see how you go forward.
target: Mi zawng zawng hnena i sawtna a lan theih nan chung thilahte chuan taima la, chungah chuan inhmang zo rawh.

source: I'm studying Farsi
target: Farsi ka zir a

source: They'll be asleep.
target: An muhil tawh ang.

source: All this land will be a waste and a cause of wonder; and these nations will be the servants of the king of Babylon for seventy years.
target: He ram pum pui hi a chhia ang a, a ram ang; tin, heng hnamte hian Babulon lal rawng kum sâwmsarih an bâwl ang.

source: Just don't have it.
target: nei lo mai rawh.

source: Go away!
target: Kal bo!

source: But they will have to give an account of themselves to him who is ready to be the judge of the living and the dead.
target: anni chuan mi nung leh mitthite ngaihtuah tura inpeih sa hnenah chuan an chanchin in la sawi ang.

source: You let us be put in prison; chains were put on our legs.
target: Nangin lenah min hruia lût a; Kan kawngah hian hur rit tak i nghat a.

source: It is our destiny.
target: Kan chanvo a ni.

source: And when they went in, they saw a young man seated on the right side, dressed in a white robe; and they were full of wonder.
target: Tin, thlan chhungah an lut a, tlangval pakhat puan var sin, ding lam panga thu an hmu a; an mangang ta a.

source: Slip of the tongue.
target: Slip a lei a.

source: Do you take plastic?
target: Plastic i la em?

source: The sharp man sees the evil and takes cover: the simple go straight on and get into trouble.
target: Mi hmanghria chuan thil tha lo chu a hmuhin a biru thin a; Mi mawl erawh chuan a tawn mai thin a, a tuar phah thin.

source: What's the question
target: Eng nge zawhna awm

source: She turned on the TV.
target: TV chu a on a.

source: Unequal weights are disgusting to the Lord, and false scales are not good.
target: Bukna dang dang hi LALPA mithmuhah thil tenawm a ni a, Khin dik lo hi a tha lo a ni.

source: Now it was the day of making ready and the Sabbath was coming on.
target: Tin, chu mi ni chu Inrinni a ni a, Chawlhni a lo ni lek lek tawh si a.

source: Who made the Bear and Orion, and the Pleiades, and the store-houses of the south:
target: Zangkhua te, Chhohreivung te, Siruk te siamtu, Chhim lam pindante siamtu chu.

source: I'm not sure I can share.
target: Ka share thei lo.

source: Do that, will you?
target: Chutiang chuan ti rawh, i ti ang em?

source: Then great fear came on all the church and on all who had knowledge of these things.
target: Tin, kohhranhote zawng zawng leh chung thu hria apiangte chuan an hlau ta em em a.

source: So Solomon let Abiathar be priest no longer, so that he might make the word of the Lord come true which he said about the sons of Eli in Shiloh.
target: Chutichuan Solomona chuan Abiathara chu LALPA puithiam anihna a ban ta a; LALPAN Silo khuaa Elia chhûngte chungchang thu a sawi kha a thlentir theihna tûrin.

source: But day and night they were like a wall round us while we were with them, looking after the sheep.
target: berâm venga an hnêna kan awm chhûng zawng zawngin chhun leh zan kan tan kulh an ni ngawt mai a.

source: All was handed over by number and by weight: and the weight was put on record at that time.
target: chhiar vek leh buk vek ani a; abuk zat chu, chu mi lai la la chuan an ziak vek a.

source: And said to Moses, The people are giving much more than is needed for the work which the Lord has given us orders to do.
target: Mosia hnenah, LALPAN siam tura thu a pêk siam nan mite chuan a chuang aliamin thil an rawn la e, tiin an thlen a.

source: I did the planting, Apollos did the watering, but God gave the increase.
target: Keiin ka phun a,Apollovan tuiin a chawm a,nimahsela Pathianin a thantir a ni.

source: So the Lord gave to Israel all the land which he gave by oath to their fathers; so it became their heritage and their living-place.
target: Chutichuan LALPAN an thlahtute chhechhama pêk a lo tiam tak ram zawng zawng chu Israelte chu a pe a; tichuan ram chu an luah a, awmhmun an khuar ta a.

source: You had been playing.
target: I lo khel tawh a.

source: And Laban gave Zilpah, his servant-girl, to Leah, to be her waiting-woman.
target: Tin, Labana chuan a bâwihnu Zilpaii chu a fanu Leaii hnênah a bâwihnu atân a pe a.

source: Did you call him yet?
target: I la call em?

source: Covering yourself with a cloud, so that prayer may not get through.
target: Chhûmin i in khuh a, chutichuan țawngțaina a kal tlâng thei lo.

source: We have nothing to drink
target: In tur kan nei lo

source: Will you put me to death as you did the Egyptian yesterday?
target: Nimina Aigupta mi i tihhlum ang khan mi tihhlum i tum a ni maw?’ a ti a.

source: I'm so tired!
target: Ka hah lutuk

source: I drove to school.
target: School lam panin ka tlan phei a.

source: I didn't look at Tom
target: Tom chu ka en lo

source: Life is too short
target: Nun a tawi lutuk

source: They're afraid of us.
target: Min hlau a ni.

source: Be very quiet
target: Reh hmak rawh

source: Do it with me.
target: Ka rualin ti rawh.

source: He said, Be you.
target: Ani chuan, Nang ni rawh se.

source: The chief of the families of Merari was Zuriel, the son of Abihail: their tents are to be placed on the north side of the House.
target: Merariat hlah chungkaw puipa chu Abihaila fapa Zuriela a ni a: bia buk hmar lampangah an puan in an zar tur a ni.

source: I didn't order rice
target: Buhfai ka order lo

source: I'm not well
target: Ka dam lo

source: How exciting!
target: A va phurawm ve!

source: He's a liar
target: Dâwt sawitu a ni

source: I didn't keep him waiting.
target: Ka nghak reng lo.

source: You're not dressed
target: I inchei lo

source: For the Lord will give support to their cause, and take the life of those who take their goods.
target: LALPAN an thu a sawipui dâwn si a, Anmahni rawktute nuna chu a rawk dâwn a ni.

source: He broke a window
target: Window pakhat a tichhia a

source: It's mine.
target: Ka ta a nia.

source: With my lips have I made clear all the decisions of your mouth.
target: I kaa i rorêl chhuak zawng zawngte chu Ka hmuiin ka hriattr ta.

source: You have no thought for the Rock, your father, you have no memory of the God who gave you birth.
target: A hringtu che Lungpui I ngaisang lo, A siamtu che Pathian I theihnghilh bawk.

source: Our breath of life, he on whom the holy oil was put, was taken in their holes; of whom we said, Under his shade we will be living among the nations.
target: Kan hnâra thaw, LALPA hriak thih a chu an khurah manin a awm ta; Hnamte zîngah a zâr hnuaiah kan chêngve ang, kan tih țhina kha.

source: Nose hair
target: Hnar hmul

source: So that day the Lord gave Israel salvation from the hands of the Egyptians; and Israel saw the Egyptians dead on the sea's edge.
target: Chutiang chuan a ni, LALPAN Israel-hote chu, chu mi nî chuan Aigupta mite kut ata a chhanchhuah ni; tin, Israel-hote chuan Aigupta mi thite chu tuipui kamah chuan an hmu a.

source: And he put a new song in my mouth, even praise to our God; numbers have seen it with fear, and put their faith in the Lord.
target: Hla thar ka kaah a dah ta bawk a, kan Pathian fakna chu: Mi tam takin chung chu an hmu ang a, an hlau ang a, LALPA chu an ring tawh ang.

source: For if God did not have pity for the angels who did evil, but sent them down into hell, to be kept in chains of eternal night till they were judged;
target: Vantirhkohten thil an tihsual lai khan Pathianin a zuah lo va, hremhmunah a paih a, rorelsaka khek turin khuarkhurum thimah a khung zawk si a;

source: And Jephthah sent again to the king of the children of Ammon,
target: Tichuan Hjephthan Amona thlahte lal hnênah palai a tir leh a:

source: Then, when you take for your food the produce of the land, you are to give an offering lifted up before the Lord.
target: chu mi ram chhang in ei hun chuan LALPA hnenah then thilhlan in hlan tur a ni.

source: But the Pharisees, hearing how the mouths of the Sadducees had been stopped, came together;
target: Pharisaite erawh chuan Isuan Saddukaite chu a hnial dang tih an hriatin an inkhawm ta a.

source: They were so happy
target: An hlim em em a

source: You are the light of my eyes.
target: Ka mit êng i ni.

source: They have mouths, but no voice; they have eyes, but they see not;
target: Kate an nei a, ant awng thei si lo va; Mitte an nei a, an hmu thei si lo va;

source: Who won?
target: Tunge chak?

source: I can't give it up
target: Ka thlahthlam thei lo

source: Say nothing in the hearing of a foolish man, for he will put no value on the wisdom of your words.
target: Mi â benghriatah chuan thu sawi suh, I thu fingte chu a ngainep dawn si a.

source: The Lord will keep me safe from every evil work and will give me salvation in his kingdom in heaven: to whom be glory for ever and ever. So be it.
target: Lalpa chuan sualna zawng zawng lakah mi chhan chhuak ang a, a van ramah chuan him takin mi thlen ang; amah chu chatuana ropuiin awm rawh se. Amen.

source: Stop following me
target: Min zui tawh suh

source: Let the kings of Tarshish and of the islands come back with offerings; let the kings of Sheba and Seba give of their stores.
target: Tarsis ram leh thliarkara lalten lawmman an rawn keng ang a: Sheba leh Seba ram lalten thilpekte an rawn hlan ang.

source: When his cry comes up to me, I will give him an answer: I will be with him in trouble; I will make him free from danger and give him honour.
target: Ani chuan mi ko vang a, tichuan ka chhâng ang; Kei chu a mangan lai chuan a hnênah ka awm ang a: Amah chu ka chhanhimin ka chawimawi ang.

source: He will take of the stream by the way; so his head will be lifted up.
target: Kawng laka luitea mi a in ang a: Chuvang chuan a lu ch a hchaiw sâng ang.

source: But some of the Pharisees said, Why do you do what it is not right to do on the Sabbath?
target: Tin, Pharisai tute emaw chuan, Engati nge Chawlhnia tih thiang lo chu in tih ni? an ti a.

source: The Lord God is our sun and our strength: the Lord will give grace and glory: he will not keep back any good thing from those whose ways are upright.
target: LALPA Pathian chu ni leh phaw a ni si a: LALPA chuan khawngaihna leh ropuina a pe ang a: Dik taka awmte lakah chuan thil tha rêng rêng a ui lo vang.

source: When they went about from one nation to another, and from one kingdom to another people;
target: Hnam hrang hrang hnênah an kal lawr a,Ram hrang hrang atanginmi hrang hrangte hnênah.

source: A man may not take his father's wife or have sex relations with a woman who is his father's.
target: Tuman mahni pate nupui mutpuiin an pate an timualpho tur a ni lo.

source: Let the children of Israel keep the Passover at its regular time.
target: Israela thlahte chuan kalhlen kut chu a hunbi a hunbi zelah nei rawh se.

source: For this reason, the Jews took me in the Temple, and made an attempt to put me to death.
target: Chung avang chuan a ni, Judaten Pathian biak inah mi mana tihhlum mi tum tak ni.

source: I am sure
target: Ka chiang lo

source: Now Joseph had a dream, and he gave his brothers an account of it, which made their hate greater than ever.
target: Tin, Josefa chuan mumang a nei a, a ute hnênah chuan a hrilh a: tichuan ani chu an haw lehzual ta a.

source: He's sick of it.
target: A natna a ni.

source: As well as more money, with which to get food: we have no idea who put our money in our bags.
target: Tin, buh leina tûrin tangka dang pawh kan rawn keng a: kan tangka chu tuin nge kan ipah dah kan hre si lo, an ti a.

source: There were lots of them
target: An tam hle mai

source: Who has the pickles?
target: Tunge pickle nei?

source: But the Pharisees said, By the ruler of evil spirits, he sends evil spirits out of men.
target: Pharisaite erawh chuan, Ramhuai lal avangin a ni, ramhuaite a hnawh chhuah thin ni, an ti a.

source: So the king and Haman came to take wine with Esther the queen.
target: Chutichuan lal leh Hamana chuan lalnu Estheri ruai chu an kilpui a.

source: How he went into the house of God when Abiathar was high priest, and took for food the holy bread, which only the priests may take, and gave it to those who were with him?
target: Khatia Abiathara Puithiam Lalber a nih lai a, Pathian ina a luh a, puithiamte chauh lo chuan ei thian loh chhangdah chu a ei a, a thiante hnena a pek ve thu kha? a ti a.

source: They don't own them.
target: An nei lo.

source: Am I dying?
target: Ka thi mek em?

source: So now make division of this land for a heritage to the nine tribes, and the half-tribe of Manasseh.
target: Chutichuan he ram hi hnam kuate leh Manase hnam zatvete rochanah semsak ang che, a ti a.

source: Give ear to my voice, you women who are living in comfort; give attention to my words, you daughters who have no fear of danger.
target: Hmeichhe nuam tawlte u, tho ula ka thu hi ngaithla teh u; fanu ngaihsamte u, ka thu sawiah hian beng chhi rawh u.

source: Then truly your face will be lifted up, with no mark of sin, and you will be fixed in your place without fear:
target: Tichuan, hmêlhem lovn i dak chhuak ngei ang: A ni, i nghet ang a, i hlau lo vang;

source: This is revolting
target: Hei hi helna a ni

source: I borrowed it
target: Ka hawh a

source: Then say to them, Put your faith in the teaching and the witness. ... If they do not say such things. ... For him there is no dawn. ...
target: Dan Thu leh Hriattirna Thu chu rawn tûr a ni, tiin. Chu mi thu ang zela an sawi loh chuan an tan khua rêng rêng reng a var thuai dawn lo a ni.

source: You abandoned your children.
target: I fate i kalsan a.

source: When he said this, one of the police by his side gave him a blow with his open hand, saying, Do you give such an answer to the high priest?
target: Chu chu a sawi veleh a kianga ding tiangkengtu pakhatin Isua a beng a, Puithiam Lalber heti hian i chhang maw? a ti a.

source: I have found a job.
target: Hna ka hmu ta.

source: I want them all shot.
target: Kah vek ka duh.

source: He is asleep.
target: A muhil mek.

source: They could not help us
target: Min pui thei lo

source: And Simon Peter went after Jesus with another disciple. Now that disciple was a friend of the high priest and he went in with Jesus into the house of the high priest;
target: Tin, Simon Peteran Isua a zui a, a zirtir dang pakhat nen. Chu mi zirtir chu Puithiam Lalber hmelhriat a ni a, Puithiam Lalber in hual chhung kawtlaiah Isua hnenah a lut ve a;

source: I'm not eating this.
target: Hei hi ka ei lo.

source: You'd been playing
target: I khel tawh a

source: I like math
target: Chhiarkawp ka duh

source: We heard coughing
target: Khuh kan hre ta

source: They're not there
target: An awm lo

source: But let it be so, that I was not a trouble to you myself; but (someone may say being false, I took you with deceit.
target: Amaherawhchu, kei chuan ka tihautak lo che u ni ta sela; nimahsela mi vervek reng reng lo niin, ngamthlemin ka man che u a lo ni.

source: Don't deceive yourself.
target: Mahni inbum suh.

source: Don't call him the criminal.
target: Misual ti suh.

source: Let them help you
target: An tanpui che rawh se

source: I'm flabby
target: Ka zawi lûtuk

source: Will you say in God's name what is not right, and put false words into his mouth?
target: Pathian tan khawlo takin in tawng ang maw? A tan dawtin in tawng ang maw?

source: For these nations, whose land you are taking, give attention to readers of signs and to those using secret arts: but the Lord your God will not let you do so.
target: chung in va luah tur rama hname chuan thumvawr leh aien chingte an pawm thin a; nangni zawng LALPA in Pathianin chutiang tih chu a pahl lo a ni.

source: And Abijah and his people put them to death with great destruction: five hundred thousand of the best of Israel were put to the sword.
target: Chutichuan Abija leh ahote chuan an that ta chiam mai a: tichuan Israel mi thlan thiau nuainga an that a.

source: I never swim
target: Ka hleuh ngai lo

source: Chicken small intestine
target: Ar ril

source: Have a nice day
target: Ni hman nuam le

source: But they, going through from Perga, came to Antioch in Pisidia; and they went into the Synagogue on the Sabbath and were seated.
target: Nimahsela anni chu Perga khua ata an kal zel a, Pisidia rama Antiokei khua an thleng a; tin, Chawlhniin inkhawmna inah an lut a, an thu a.

source: And are not like Moses, who put a veil on his face, so that the children of Israel might not see clearly to the end of the present order of things:
target: Mosia tih ang khan kan ti lo ve; ani chuan ral ta riai riai ral tawpna chu Israel fate chuan an en reng lohna turin a hmai chu hmaikhuhnain a khuh a:

source: Do you do any sport?
target: Sport i nei em?

source: I'm going to risk it.
target: Risk ka tum a ni.

source: Don't disrespect me.
target: Min zah lo suh.

source: Did you do something
target: Thil i ti em

source: You didn't leave yet.
target: I la chhuak lo.

source: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, and the sign that the things not seen are true.
target: Tin,rinna hi thil beiseite awm ngeia hriatna,thil hmuh lohte hriatfiahna a ni.

source: He applied for a job.
target: Hna a dil a.

source: They were attacked
target: An bei ta a ni

source: Give their houses to destruction, and let there be no one in their tents.
target: An awmna chu lo ram sela; An puan inahte chuan tumah awm suh se.

source: Then, after forty days, through the open window of the ark which he had made,
target: Tin, ni sawmli hnuah chuan hei hi a ni a, Nova chuan lawng tukverh a siam kha a hawng ta a:

source: Are you afraid of us
target: Min hlau em

source: Tom doesn't smile
target: Tom chu a nui lo

source: I liked them both
target: An pahnih hian ka duh ve ve a

source: You lost.
target: I chaklo.

source: He will keep you safe from the evil tongue; and you will have no fear of wasting when it comes.
target: Tawngkam tha l lakah thup i ni ang a, Chhiatna a lo thlen pawhin i hlau lo vang.

source: And the earth was evil in God's eyes and full of violent ways.
target: Tin, lei hi Pathian mithmuhin a chhe zo tawh a, lei hi inpâwngnêknain a khat zo ta bawk a.

source: Then I will make the seat of your rule over Israel certain for ever, as I gave my word to David your father, saying, You will never be without a man to be king in Israel.
target: Israelte chungah hian i ram lalthutthleng chu kumkhua atân ka tinghet ang; i pa Davida hnênah 'Israelte lalthutthlenga thu tûr i hmai lo vang,' tia ka lo tiam tawh ang khan.

source: We don't talk to each other anymore.
target: Kan inbe tawh lo.

source: I like honey
target: Khawizu ka duh

source: The dog is eating
target: Ui chuan a ei a

source: This is what the king says: Do not be tricked by Hezekiah, for there is no salvation for you in him.
target: Lal chuan heti hian a ti, 'Hezekia bumin awm suh u; ani chuan a kut ata a chanhim thei dâwn si lo che u a:

source: I tried to phone you.
target: Phone ka tum a.

source: And, still fighting the storm with all our strength, the day after they made a start at getting the goods out of the ship;
target: Tin, atukah tuifawnin min vawrh nek avang chuan lawnga bungrua chu tuiah an paih tan ta a.

source: And they saw that it was the man who made requests for money at the door of the Temple, and they were full of wonder and surprise at what had taken place.
target: biak in Kawngkhar Mawi bula kut dawha thu thin kha a ni tih an hria a; a chunga thil thleng chu mak an ti em em a, an buai hle mai a.

source: As silver becomes soft in the oven, so you will become soft in it; and you will be certain that I the Lord have let loose my passion on you.
target: Rawhtuina mei laiah tangkarua a tui angin nangni pawh, chumi laiah chuan in tui zo vang a, kei LALPA hian in chungah ka thinurna ka leih a ni tih in hre tawh ang, a ti a.

source: Who, when they came there, made prayer for them, that the Holy Spirit might be given to them:
target: chu mite chu an zuk thlen chuan Thlarau Thianghlim an hmuh theih nan an tawngtaisak a.

source: Is it you
target: Nangmah i ni em

source: For those who are living in the way of the flesh give their minds to the things of the flesh, but those who go in the way of the Spirit, to the things of the Spirit.
target: pute chu an ta a ni bawk a, tisa lam thu-ah Krista chu anmahni zing ata lo chhuak a ni bawk a; ani chu thil zawng zawng chunga awm, chatuana fak tlak Pathian a ni. Amen.

source: On the twelfth day Ahira, the son of Enan, chief of the children of Naphtali:
target: Ni sâwm leh ni hnih ni chuan Napthtalia thlahte puipa Enana fapa Ahira chuan a hlan a:

source: For her blood is in her; she has put it on the open rock not draining it on to the earth so that it might be covered with dust;
target: A thisen chhuah chu ama chungah a awm si a, vai vuta vûr theih nâna leia leih buak tâk a ruangin lungpui ro chungah a leih ta zawk a.

source: And I will let loose my burning passion on you, breathing out on you the fire of my wrath: and I will give you up into the hands of men like beasts, trained to destruction.
target: I chungah ka thinurna ka leih ang a, ka thinrimna mei i chungah ka chhem ang, mi nun chhe tak, tihboral thiam tak kutah ka mah tîr ang che.

source: My word came to you in the time of your well-being; but you said, I will not give ear. This has been your way from your earliest years, you did not give attention to my voice.
target: I hlawhtlinin i hnênah thu ka sawi a, nang lah chuan ka ngaithla lo vang, i ti a, Ka aw-ka i ngaihthlâk loh hi I tleirawl ațangin hei hi i awm dan a ni.

source: But to every man some form of the Spirit's working is given for the common good.
target: Nimahsela, sawt tlanna turin Thlarau hriattirna chu mi tin hnena pek theuh a ni.

source: And Jesus came back to Galilee in the power of the Spirit, and the news of him went through all the country round about.
target: Tin, Isua chu Thlarau thiltihtheihna puin Galili ramah a haw leh ta a; tin, a chanchin chu, chu mi vel ram tinah chuan a thang ta a.

source: They decorated it
target: An chei a

source: And now, Father, let me have glory with you, even that glory which I had with you before the world was.
target: Aw ka Pa, khawvel awm hmaa i hnena mawina ka neih khan, tunah nangma hnen ngeiah mi chawimawi rawh.

source: You who take pride in the law, are you doing wrong to the honour of God by behaviour which is against the law?
target: Nang, Dan chhuangtu, nangin Dan i bawhchhiat avangin Pathian i tihmingchhe thin a ni maw?

source: Then the Lord was angry with Israel, and he made them wanderers in the waste land for forty years? till all that generation who had done evil in the eyes of the Lord was dead.
target: Tin, Israel-hote chungah LALPA thin chu a alh a, LALPA mithmuha thil țha lo titu chhuan zawng zawng an boral vek hma loh chuan thlalerah kum sawmli a vah a vahtir a.

source: Then King David sent, and had him taken from Lo-debar, from the house of Machir, the son of Ammiel.
target: Chutichuan lal Davida chuan mi a tir a, Lo-debar ata Amiela fapa Makira ina mi chu an va hruai a.

source: They'll suspect me.
target: Min ringhlel ang.

source: So they made him angry by their behaviour; and he sent disease on them.
target: Chutiang chuan an thiltihtein ani chu an tithinur a, Tichuan hri chu an chungah a lo leng ta a.

source: I'm going to your house.
target: I inah ka kal a.

source: It's him isn't it
target: Amah a ni lawm ni

source: Truly God has made me low, even to the earth, and I have become like dust.
target: Chirhdiakah chuan mi paih lut a, Vaivut leh vut ang mai ka ni ta e.

source: They're shooting at us.
target: Min rawn kap a.

source: My loved one is mine, and I am his: he takes his food among the flowers.
target: Ka duhtak chu ka ta a ni, kei pawh a ta ka ni e, A ran rual tlattir thin kha, lili par zingah.

source: And I will be ever among the children of Israel, and will not go away from my people.
target: Tin, Israela thlahte zingah hian ka cheng ang a, ka mi Israel-hote hi ka thlahthlam lo vang, tiin.

source: We will make you chains of gold with ornaments of silver.
target: Rangkachak thirhrui ka siam ang che, Tangkaraw belmawi neiin.

source: But the gentle will have the earth for their heritage; they will take their delight in peace without measure.
target: Thuhnuairawlhte erawh chuan ram hi an luah ang a: Remna chenin an hmuingil ang.

source: God has said in his holy place, I will be glad: I will make a division of Shechem, and the valley of Succoth will be measured out.
target: Pathianin a thianghlimnaah chuan heti hian a sawi a, Ka hlim ang a: Sekem khua chu ka sem ang a, Sukoth ruam chu ka sem darh bawk angê

source: They will do all this to you because of my name--because they have no knowledge of him who sent me.
target: Nimahsela heng thil zawng zawng hi ka hming avangin in chungah an ti ang, mi tirtu an hriat loh avangin.

source: Anyone who is a child of God does no sin, because he still has God's seed in him; he is not able to be a sinner, because God is his Father.
target: Tupawh Pathian hrin chuan Pathian chi amahah a awm reng avangin thil a tisual thin lo; Pathian hrin a nih avangin thil a tisual thei hek lo.

source: Did that hurt
target: Kha kha a nâ em

source: Do you miss me at all?
target: Min ngai em em?

source: In the middle of the night I will get up to give you praise, because of all your right decisions.
target: Zan laiah lawm thu hrilh tûr chein ka hto vang, I rorêl felte avângin.

source: Do you need money
target: Sum i mamawh em

source: And his sister Hammoleketh was the mother of Ishhod and Abiezer and Mahlah.
target: Tin, a farnu Hamoleketin Isoda te, Abiezera te, mala te a hring a.

source: For narrow is the door and hard the road to life, and only a small number make discovery of it.
target: nunnaa kalna kawngka chu a zim a, a kawng pawh a chep bawk a, a hmutute pawh tlemte

source: And of cassia, five hundred shekels' weight measured by the scale of the holy place, and of olive oil a hin:
target: thakthîng chi dang sekel zanga, hmunthianghlima sekel an pêk thin ang, olive hriak hin khat nên rawn lain,

source: Watch the prisoner
target: Tâng chu en rawh

source: But when Ahab was dead, the king of Moab got free from the authority of the king of Israel.
target: Amaherawhchu Ahaba thih hnu chuan heti hi a ni a, Moab lal chu Israel lal chungah a hel ta a.

source: Do you get it?
target: I hrethiam em?

source: They make noises like asses among the brushwood; they get together under the thorns.
target: Hnimbuk zingahte an chiau va,m Taiten hnuaiahte chuan an tawm khâwm a.

source: And Jesus gave another loud cry, and gave up his spirit.
target: Tin, Isua chu aw ring takin a au leh a, a thlarau a thlah ta a.

source: Because it exists
target: A awm avângin

source: You're a very bad person.
target: Mi sual tak i ni.

source: And they were not able to get it, though a number of false witnesses came.
target: hretu der tam tak lo kal mah sela, an hmu si lo. Nakinah erawh chuan mi pahnih an lo kal a,

source: If you are upright, what do you give to him? or what does he take from your hand?
target: I fel pawhin a tan eng nge i hnemhnan? I kut ata eng nge a dawn?

source: Then Pharaoh sent for Abram, and said, What have you done to me? why did you not say that she was your wife?
target: Tichuan Pharaoa chuan Abrama chu a ko va, Ka chunga i thiltih hi eng tizia nge ni le? I nupui a ni tih engati nge mi hrilh loh?

source: And by him the hearts of fathers will be turned to their children, and the hearts of children to their fathers; for fear that I may come and put the earth under a curse.
target: Ani chuan pa leh fate inkârah Inrem lehna a thlentîr ang; Chuti lo chuan ka lo kal ang a, ânchhiain lei hi ka nghaisa dah ang e.

source: And when he made himself low, the wrath of the Lord was turned back from him, and complete destruction did not come on him, for there was still some good in Judah.
target: Tin, a han intihhnuai tak avâng chuan a tihboral hlauh loh nân a chunga LALPA thinurna chu akiang ta a; tin, Judai ram chu a la tha reng bawk a.

source: Be objective
target: Tum nei rawh

source: The traveller did not take his night's rest in the street, and my doors were open to anyone on a journey;
target: Mikhualte kawtthlêrah an riak lo va, Mi zin vakte tan ka kawng ka hawng thin

source: I switched on the TV.
target: TV chu ka on a.

source: Amah hnenah chawimawina zawng zawng
target: All credit to him

source: I'm in fair shape.
target: Ka fair hle mai.

source: From heaven you gave your decision; the earth, in its fear, gave no sound,
target: I rorêl thu chu van atangin i hriattir a; Lei hian ahlau va, a ngawi ta a,

source: Father abandoned us
target: Pain min kalsan a

source: As a loving hind and a gentle doe, let her breasts ever give you rapture; let your passion at all times be moved by her love.
target: Zukpui duhawm tak leh zukchal nalh tak angin Englai pawhin a tang chhûng chuan tilungawi fo che sela, A hmangaihnaah chan lawm fo rawh.

source: Let's go downstairs
target: In chhuk ila

source: So the wall was complete on the twenty-fifth day of the month Elul, in fifty-two days.
target: Chutichuan kulh chu ni samwnga leh ni hnihah, Elul thla, ni sawmhnih leh ni nga nin peih a ni ta a.

source: Do not make false statements to one another; because you have put away the old man with all his doings,
target: Dawt inhrilh tawn suh u; mihring hlui chu a thiltihte chawpin in hlip tawh a,

source: We didn't talk very much.
target: Kan inbe vak lo.

source: Foolish foolish me
target: Mi â mi â

source: Those who had no food he made full of good things; the men of wealth he sent away with nothing in their hands;
target: Riltamte chu thil tha takin a tipuar a, Hausate chu kutruakin a kal botir ta a.

source: Because he had frequently been prisoned in chains and iron bands, and the chains had been parted and the bands broken by him: and no man was strong enough to make him quiet.
target: kawlte leh khaidiatte pawhin an phuar fo tawh si a; nimahsela khaidiatte chu a pawt chat a, kawlte pawh chu a tisawm thin a; tumahin an tidawl zo hek lo.

source: Looking out from the window she gave a cry, the mother of Sisera was crying out through the window, Why is his carriage so long in coming? When will the noise of his wheels be sounding?
target: Sisera nu chu tukverah a han dak a, Zawngdaikalh awngah a au va, 'Engati nge a tawlailir a lo thlen har? Engati nge a tawlailir a muan? A ti.

source: So I took the paper witnessing the business, one copy rolled up and stamped, and one copy open:
target: Tin, inleina lehkha inlei dan leh a awmzia ziakna chu char leh char lohte chu ka la a.

source: You blind ones: which is greater, the offering, or the altar which makes the offering holy?
target: Nangni mitdelte u! A engnge ropui zawk, thilpek nge, maicham, thilpek tithianghlimtu chu?

source: I'm not going to get up.
target: Ka tho dawn lo.

source: The Lord made thunder in the heavens, and the voice of the Highest was sounding out: a rain of ice and fire.
target: LALPA chu vanahte khian a ri dur dur bawk a, Chungnungbera chuan a aw a chhuah a; Rialte leh meilingte a tla ta dur dur a.

source: I think he's looking at me.
target: Min melh ka ring.

source: They don't pay me enough.
target: Min pe tawk lo.

source: Give a loud cry, daughter of Gallim; let Laishah give ear; let Anathoth give answer to her.
target: Aw Galim khaw fanu! I awin ring takin au rawh; aw Laisah khua! Ngaithla rawh; aw Anathoth, i va khawngaihthlâk êm!

source: I know
target: Ka hria

source: We got into a fight.
target: Kan insual ta a.

source: And Ahaz took the silver and gold which were in the house of the Lord and in the king's store-house, and sent them as an offering to the king of Assyria.
target: Tin, Ahaza chua nlalpa ina tangka leh rangkachak awmapiang, lal ina ro dah khawmnaa mi nen a la a, Assuria lal hnênah lawmmanah a thawn a.

source: I pulled myself together.
target: Ka inhnukdawk a.

source: Like asses in the waste land they go out to their work, looking for food with care; from the waste land they get bread for their children.
target: Ngai teh, thlalêra ram sabengtungte angin Taima taka ei tûr zawngin an hna an va thawk a, An fate tan thlalerin chaw a tum a,

source: And all the meeting of the children of Israel, as well as those from other lands living among them, will have forgiveness; for it was an error on the part of the people.
target: Israela thlah pungkhawm zawng zawngte chu ngaihdam an ni ang a, an zinga hnam dang awmte pawh; mipui zawng zawngin an tihpalh a nih a vangin.

source: But these men say evil about such things as they have no knowledge of; and the things of which they have natural knowledge, like beasts without reason, are the cause of their destruction.
target: Chung mite erawh chuan thil an hriat loh apiang an sawichhe thin a; tin, ngaihtuahna nei lo ramsate neih ang pianpui hriatna an neih an zawm thinte chuan anmahni an intichhe thin.

source: And a certain young man went after him, with only a linen cloth about his body; and they put their hands on him;
target: Tin, tlangval tuin emaw, puan zai sin chauh inbelin amah chu a zui a; tin, ani chu an lo man a;

source: He was the maker of three thousand wise sayings, and of songs to the number of a thousand and five.
target: Thufing sângthum a sawi a: tin, a hlate chu sângkhat leh panga a ni.

source: We ate.
target: Kan ei tawh.

source: Though he may get silver together like dust, and make ready great stores of clothing;
target: Tangkaruate vaivut angin a khawl a, Hlum ang maiin a silhfente a tiang khâwm na a;

source: And they gave their word that they would put away their wives; and for their sin, they gave an offering of a male sheep of the flock.
target: Anni chuan an nupuite then tûrin thu an thlung a; tin, an thiam loh avângin an thiam lohna chu berâm rual zinga mi berâmpa pakhatin an thawi a.

source: And with an iron pen and lead be cut into the rock for ever!
target: Ziakna thir leh suanin, Lungpuiah kumkhua atân ziak ni teh sela aw!

source: We try.
target: Kan tichhin.

source: I took your fathers out of Egypt: and you came to the Red Sea; and the Egyptians came after your fathers to the Red Sea, with their war-carriages and their horsemen.
target: Tin, inthlahtute chu Aigupta ram ata ka hruai chhuak a: tin, tuipui in va thleng a; tichuan Aigupta mite chuan in thlahtute chu tawlailirte leh sakawr chung chuang mite nen Tuifinriat Sen thlengin an um a.

source: He doesn't listen
target: A ngaithla lo

source: And Joab came back from fighting Abner: and when he had got all his men together, it was seen that nineteen of David's men, in addition to Asahel, were not with them.
target: Tin, Joaba chu Anera a ûm a kir leh ta a; tin, mipui zawng zawngte a han khawm vek chuan Davida hote sâwm leh pakua leh Asahela an lokim ta lo va.

source: I turned the tap on.
target: Tap chu ka on a.

source: So Lot took for himself all the valley of Jordan, and went to the east, and they were parted from one another.
target: Chutichuan Lota chuan Jordan Phaizâwl zawng zawng chu a thlang ta a; tin, Lota chu chhak lamah chuan a insawn a: tichuan an inthen ta a.

source: I give orders in the name of the Lord that all the brothers are to be present at the reading of this letter.
target: He lehkha hi unau zawng zawng hnenah chuan chhiar turin Lalpa hmingin ka ngen a che u.

source: Give them something to eat.
target: Ei tur pe rawh.

source: Of Hezron, the family of the Hezronites: of Carmi, the family of the Carmites.
target: Heezron-ho chhûngkaw zinga mi Hezrona, Karmi-ho chhûngkaw puipa Karmia.

source: They're fake
target: An lem a ni

source: You ought to be ashamed of yourself.
target: I zak tur a ni.

source: He has given food to his worshippers; he will keep his agreement in mind for ever.
target: Amah tihtute chu ei tûr a pe a: A thuthlun chu kumkhuain a hre reng ang.

source: You didn't have to say yes.
target: I tih a ngai lo.

source: And all his acts, first and last, are recorded in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah.
target: a hmasa ber leh a hnuhnung berte pawh, ngai teh, Israel lal leh Juda lalte chanchin buah a chuang a.

source: Be serious.
target: Ti tak zet rawh.

source: We will not surrender.
target: Kan inpe dawn lo.

source: There is Asshur and all her army, round about her last resting-place: all of them put to death by the sword:
target: Chutah chuan Assur leh a hote zawng zawng an awm a; an thlânte chu ama vêlah aawm a: an zain thah, khandaiha tlu vek an ni.

source: Be at peace in the knowledge that I am God: I will be lifted up among the nations, I will be honoured through all the earth.
target: Ngawi ula, Pathian ka ni tih hi hre rawh u: hnam tin zingah chawimawiin ka awm ang a, leiah hian chawimawiin ka awm ang.

source: For a loose woman is looking for a cake of bread, but another man's wife goes after one's very life.
target: Nawhchizuarnu avângin pa chhâng themah a chang a, Uirenu chuan nunna hlu tak a zawng thin.

source: Tom jumped
target: Tom a zuang

source: So David was king over all Israel, judging and giving right decisions for all his people.
target: Chutichuan Davida chuan Israel mi zawng zawng chungah ro a rêl a; a mi zawng zawng chungah chuan fel takin ro a rêl a.

source: It's what you deserve.
target: I phu tawk a ni.

source: So that you are turning your spirit against God, and letting such words go out of your mouth?
target: Pathian chungah thaw i sâng a, I kaa chutiang thu a chhuah kha.

source: The mandrakes give out a sweet smell, and at our doors are all sorts of good fruits, new and old, which I have kept for my loved one.
target: Zawlaidi hlivin rimtui a chhuah a, Kan kawngka bulah thei tha tinreng A awm rui e, a hlui leh thar. I tan ka khekkhal aw ka duhtak.

source: I'm making lasagna
target: Lasagna ka siam a

source: Do you cry a lot?
target: I tap nasa em?

source: Stay away
target: Awmbo san rawh

source: I don't need to be taken care of.
target: Enkawl a ngai lo.

source: Like men of deceit they put me to shame; the voice of their wrath was loud against me.
target: Ruaithehnatea nuihza fiamthu sawitute mai mai angin An ha mi thial khum a.

source: Do men cry?
target: Mipa an tap em?

source: They agree
target: An pawm

source: And from that day Saul was looking with envy on David.
target: Chutichuan Saula chuan chu mi ni atang chuan Davida a hmumawh ta a.

source: Then for forty years the land had peace, till the death of Othniel, the son of Kenaz.
target: Tin, ram chu kum sâwmli ralmuangin a awm a. Tin, Kenaza fapa Othniela chu a thi ta a.

source: Put your works into the hands of the Lord, and your purposes will be made certain.
target: I hnate chu LALPA kawltir rawh. Tichuan i thil ruahmante chu tihnghehin a awm ang.

source: I bribed them.
target: Ka tham a.

source: He has money
target: Pawisa a nei

source: I get by
target: Ka kal ṭhin

source: She doesn't wear thongs.
target: Thongs a ha lo.

source: Then Abijam went to rest with his fathers, and they put him into the earth in the town of David: and Asa his son became king in his place.
target: Tin, Abijama chu apute hnênah chuan a muhil a; tichuan Davida khawpuiah an phûm ta a: tin, a aiawhin a fapa Asa chu a lal ta a.

source: She went secretly
target: A rukin a kal ta a

source: After that, the people went on from Hazeroth and put up their tents in the waste land of Paran.
target: Chumi zawhah chuan mipuite chu Hazeroth ata an chhuak a, Paran thlalerah awmhmun an khuar a.

source: Tom objected
target: Tom-a'n a dodal

source: There is a glad dawn for the upright man, but the light of the sinner will be put out.
target: Mi fel eng chu a eng tha hle a, Mi suaksual khawnvar erawh chu tihmih a ni ang.

source: Wealth and honour are in my hands, even wealth without equal and righteousness.
target: Sum leh ropuinate ka hnênah a awm a, A ni, sum leh felna tlo tak mai chu.

source: Okay I will do it
target: Aw le ka lo ti dawn nia

source: He who has the Son has the life; he who has not the Son of God has not the life.
target: Fapa chu neitu chuan nunna chu a nei; Pathian Fapa nei lotu chuan nunna chu a nei lo.

source: So Abner, with twenty men, came to Hebron, to David. And David made a feast for Abner and the men who were with him.
target: Chutichuan Abnera chu Hebron-a Davida hnênah mi sawmhnih nen an kal a. Tin, Davida chuan Abnera leh a hnêna mi sawmhnihte tan ruai a theh a.

source: Why will you have more and more punishment? why keep on in your evil ways? Every head is tired and every heart is feeble.
target: Engati nge in hel zual deuh deuh va, vuaka in la awm cheu ni le? Lu chu a pumin a na a, thinlung pawh chu a pumin a chau ta.

source: And Benaiah and Jahaziel the priests, blowing horns all the time before the ark of the agreement of God.
target: tin, puithiam Benaia leh Jahaziela chuan Pathian thuthlunna bâwm hmaah tawtawrâwtte an ham reng a.

source: By him my vine is made waste and my fig-tree broken: he has taken all its fruit and sent it down to the earth; its branches are made white.
target: Ka grêp hrui a tichhia a, ka theipui thing pil a hîk a: a hîk fai vek a, a paih bo va; a țangte chu a filh vâr vek a.

source: This is the work which the sons of Merari are to do in connection with the Tent of meeting, under the direction of Ithamar, the son of Aaron the priest.
target: chung chu an ni, puithiam Arona fapa Ithamara hova inbiakna puan ina Meraria fapate thlahtehovion an ti tur te te chena an rawngbawl dan tur chu, tiin.

source: The righteousness of the good man will make his way straight, but the sin of the evil-doer will be the cause of his fall.
target: Mi tha famkim felna chuan a kawng a kawhhmuh ang a; Mi suaksual erawh chu ama suahsualnain a titlu ang.

source: By these you will be made unclean; anyone touching their dead bodies will be unclean till evening:
target: Tin, heng avangte hian bawlhhlawh in lo kai ang: tupawh, sa ruang khawih apiang chu tlai lam thlengin an bawlhhlawh ang a;

source: Yard ah a awm a.
target: She's in the yard.

source: Let's sit down and talk about it.
target: Thuin sawi ila.

source: Keep the form of those true words which you had from me, in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.
target: Krista Isuaa awm rinna leh hmangaihna neiin, thu dik dan ka kaa i hriatte kha nei tlat rawh.

source: We've already voted.
target: Kan vote tawh a.

source: I burnt my tongue.
target: Ka lei ka hal a.

source: He threw the ball
target: Ball a vawm a

source: Be glad in that day, and be lifted up for joy, for your reward in heaven will be great: for their fathers did these same things to the prophets.
target: Chu mi niah chuan lawm ulang, hlimin zuang rawh u; ngai teh u, vanah in lawman a awm hnem si a; chutiang bawkin an thlahtuten zawlneite chunga an tih thin kha.

source: And they may have righteousness put to their credit, freely, by his grace, through the salvation which is in Christ Jesus:
target: chung ringtute chu, Krista Isuaa tlanna awm avang chuan, a khawngaihnain athlawna thiam chantirin an awm a;

source: I cringed
target: Ka tawlh let

source: I started shivering
target: Ka khur tan ta a

source: Tom met Mary.
target: Tom-a'n Mary a hmu.

source: Now in the seven good years the earth gave fruit in masses.
target: Tin, kum that kum, kum sarih chhûng chuan lei chuan hlâwk takin buh a chhuah thin a.

source: I was waiting for a taxi.
target: Taxi ka nghak a.

source: Tom is awake
target: Tom a harh

source: That was bad
target: Kha kha a ṭha lo

source: If the owner is with it, he will not have to make payment: if he gave money for the use of it, the loss is covered by the payment.
target: A neitupa chu a awm ve rêng erawh chuan a rûl tûr a ni lo: man neia hawh a nih erawh chuan an inhawh dan dana thu a ni ang.

source: Their days come to an end without trouble, and suddenly they go down to the underworld.
target: An nite chu neinung takin an khawhral a, Seolah chuan thlamuang takin an liam a,

source: I'm a pro
target: Mithiam ka nia

source: May the Lord, the God of your fathers, make you a thousand times greater in number than you are, and give you his blessing as he has said!
target: LALPA, in i leh pute Pathian chuan tun aia a lêt sangin tipung che u sela, a tiam che u angin malsawm che u rawh se.

source: I didn't donate blood.
target: Thisen ka pe lo.

source: I got lonely
target: Ka lungleng

source: Shot kan pe ang.
target: We'll give it a shot.

source: He's out now
target: A lo chhuak tawh

source: He took a picture
target: Thlalak a la a

source: And the roof of your mouth like good wine flowing down smoothly for my loved one, moving gently over my lips and my teeth.
target: I kam uain tha mi ang mai chu, Ka duhtak tan luang thla del del se, Muhilte hmuiah luang lut rawh se.

source: And Jehoshaphat, king of Judah, went back to his house in Jerusalem in peace.
target: Tin, Juda lal Jehosaphata chu thlamuang takin Jerusalem-a a inah a haw leh ta a.

source: On hearing the sound of the horn, he did not take note; his blood will be on him; for if he had taken note his life would have been safe.
target: Tawtawrâwt ri a hriata a pawisak loh avângin a thisen mawh chu a phur mai tûr a ni. A lo pawisak erawh chuan a nun a hum him dawn a ni.

source: Now about the giving of money for the saints, as I gave orders to the churches of Galatia, so do you.
target: Tin, mi thianghlimte tana thawhlawm thu kha zawng, Galatia rama kohhranho pawl hnenahte thu ka pek angin nangni pawhin lo ti ve rawh u.

source: I confessed
target: Ka inpuang e

source: You are at it again.
target: I awm leh ta.

source: I will become angry.
target: Ka thinrim ang.

source: But when he was almost forty years old, it came into his heart to go and see his brothers, the children of Israel.
target: Tin, ani chu kum sawmli a tlin dawn laiin a unau, Israela thlahte chu kan a tum a.

source: And they did not get any statement of accounts from the men to whom the money was given for the workmen, for they made use of it with good faith.
target: Tin, hnathawktute pêk atâna tangka an vawntirate pawh kha an en zuipui lem chuang lo; anni chuan rinawm takin an ti si thin a.

source: You complain too much.
target: I phunnawi lutuk.

source: Lessons were learned
target: Zirlai kan nei a

source: We buy CDs
target: CD-te kan lei ṭhin

source: They walked home together
target: An haw dun a

source: After these things I saw another angel coming down out of heaven, having great authority; and the earth was bright with his glory.
target: Chung hnuah chuan vantirhkoh dang, thuneihna nasa tak neiin van ata lo chhuk ka hmu a; a ropuinain lei chu a en ta vek a.

source: And straight away the disease went from him, and he was made clean.
target: Tichuan chawplehchilhin a phar chu a lo reh ta nghal a, a lo thianghlim ta a.

source: And the day came and, turning to his disciples, he made a selection from among them of twelve, to whom he gave the name of Apostles;
target: Tin, khawvar veleh a zirtirte chu a ko va; an zing ata sawm leh pahnih a thlang a, an hmingah pawh tirhkoh a vuah a:

source: And under it was a design of flowers all round it, ten to a cubit, circling the water-vessel in two lines; they were made from liquid metal at the same time as the water-vessel.
target: A tlâng hnuai chu kuhmum lemte hian a vêl chuak a, tawng khatah sawm zel, dar zel vêl chuan a awm a. Kuhmum lem chu tlar hnih a ni a, dar zema chun belhbâwm a ni.

source: I don't cook
target: Ka chhum lo

source: But the Lord is my safe resting-place; my God is the Rock where I am safe.
target: Nimahsela LALPA chu ka kulhbing sâng a lo ni a; Ka Pathian chu ka inhumhimna lungpui a lo ni.

source: For they truly gave us punishment for a short time, as it seemed good to them; but he does it for our profit, so that we may become holy as he is.
target: Anni chuan ni rei lo te, tha an tih ang zelin min thunun ngei tak a, ani erawh chuan a thianghlimna chu kan chan ve theih nan, kan thatna turin min thunun zawk a ni.

source: And he said, What sort of towns are these which you have given me, my brother? So they were named the land of Cabul, to this day.
target: Tin, ani chuan, Ka unaupa, heng i kawh mi pekte hi khaw engnge maw ni ngai le? a ti a. Tichuan tun thleng hian Kabul ram an ti ta a ni.

source: Thorns and waste plants will come up, and the plants of the field will be your food;
target: hlîng leh buarte pawh a chhuaksak ang che; tin, leia thlai chu i ei tawh ang;

source: I wasn't sleeping
target: Ka muhil lo

source: What'll you drink?
target: Eng nge i in dawn?

source: I oppose it
target: Ka dodal a

source: It's hideous
target: Birukna a ni

source: I'm a senior
target: A rei zâwk ka nia

source: And round about the high seat were four and twenty seats: and on them I saw four and twenty rulers seated, clothed in white robes; and on their heads crowns of gold.
target: Tin, lalthutphah velah chuan lalthutphah sawmhnih leh pali a awm a; tin, lalthutphahahte chuan upa sawmhnih leh pali puan var sina thu ka hmu a; rangkachak lallukhumte an khum a.

source: So when I have done this, and have given them this fruit of love, I will go on by you into Spain.
target: Chuvangin chu chu ka tiha rah pawh chu anmahni fel taka ka hmuhtir zawhin, nangmahni tlawhin Spain ramah ka kal zel ang.

source: Are you not hungry
target: I riltam lo em ni

source: I can dance
target: Ka lâm thei

source: But if a revelation is given to another who is seated near, let the first be quiet.
target: Amaherawhchu, a kianga thu mi dang hnenah hriattirna thu pekin a lo awm chuan a hmasa chu ngawi mai rawh se.

source: The Lord has kept us in mind and will give us his blessing; he will send blessings on the house of Israel and on the house of Aaron.
target: LALPA chuan min hre reng a; mal min samw ang: Israela chhûngte ch mal a sawm ang a; Arona chhûngte chu mal a sawm ang.

source: And this went on for two years, so that all those who were living in Asia had knowledge of the word of the Lord, Greeks as well as Jews.
target: Chutiang hlirin kum hnih lai a ti a; chutichuan Asia rama awm zawng zawng Judate leh Grikte pawhin Lalpa thu chu an hre ta hial a.

source: And they have put up the high places of the Baal, burning their sons in the fire; a thing which was not ordered by me, and it was never in my mind:
target: Baala hnêna hâlral thilhlan atâna na fate an hlalna tûr Baala hmun sângte an din avângin; chu chu ka thupêk ani lo va, ka sawi hek lo va, ka rilruah pawh a awm ngai lo.

source: Did this most evil thing of all, and had John shut up in prison.
target: a thil tihsual zawng zawng belhchhahin ani chu tan inah a khung ta a.

source: We agreed among ourselves.
target: Kan inrem ta a.

source: You don't seem to be having fun.
target: I hlim hmel lo.

source: Dogs are forbidden
target: Ui khap a ni

source: Now John was clothed in camel's hair, with a leather band about him; and his food was locusts and honey.
target: Tin, chu mi Johana chuan sanghawngsei hmul puan a sin a, a kawng chu savun kawnghrenin a hreng a; a chaw chu khaukhuap leh khawizu a ni.

source: And the people gave a blessing to all the men who were freely offering to take up their places in Jerusalem.
target: Lungi taka Jerusalem-a awm tûra inpe zawng zawngte chuan mipuite fak an hlawh a.

source: He got back the old limits of Israel from the way into Hamath to the sea of the Arabah, as the Lord had said by his servant Jonah, the son of Amittai, the prophet of Gath-hepher.
target: LALPA, Israelte Pathianin a chhiahhlawh, Gath-hepher mi Amittaia fapa zâwlnei Jona hmnaga a thu sawi ang khan, Hamath luhna atanga Araba tuifinriat thelngin Israel ramah a telh leh a.

source: I want a pair of gloves.
target: Glove ka duh a ni.

source: May he be a judge of your people in righteousness, and make true decisions for the poor.
target: I mite chu felnain ro a relsak ang a, I mi retheite chu rorêlna felin ro a relsak ang.

source: Let my saints come together to me; those who have made an agreement with me by offerings.
target: Ka mi thianghlimte ka hnênah rawn hruai khâwm rawh u, Sa talha kan hnêna thu thlungtue chu, tiin.

source: And he sent another servant, and they gave blows to him in the same way, and put shame on him, and sent him away with nothing.
target: Tin, bawih dang a tir leh a; chu pawh chu an lo vel leh bawk a, zahthlak takin an siam a, kut ruak vekin an kaltir leh ta a.

source: The sinner takes money and does not give it back; but the upright man has mercy, and gives to others.
target: Mi suaksual chuan a puk a, ape leh thin lo va: Mi fel erawh chuan mi a khawngaih a, a pe zawk thin.

source: Here's to you!
target: Hetah i tan!

source: And he took the offering to Eglon, king of Moab, who was a very fat man.
target: Tin, Moab lal Eglona chu lawmman chu a han pe a: Eglona chu mi thau tak a ni a.

source: I often sing
target: Ka zai fo a ni

source: I cannot afford the time.
target: Hun ka pe thei lo.

source: I love that word.
target: Chu thu chu ka ngaina hle.

source: But when the man saw that he was not able to overcome Jacob, he gave him a blow in the hollow part of his leg, so that his leg was damaged.
target: Tin, a hneh lo tih a inhriatin a malpui ruh chuktuahah chuan a khawihsak a, tichuan a buan lai chuan Jakoba malpui ruh chuktuah chu a lo pelhsawlh ta a.

source: She is HIV-infected
target: HIV kai a ni

source: And the Lord their God will be their saviour in that day, giving them food like the flock of his people: for they will be like the jewels of a crown shining over his land.
target: Tin, LALPA An pathian chuan an ran rualte angin chûng nîah chuan anmahni a chhanhim ang; Lallukhuma lungte angin he ram chungah hian a châwisâng dâwn si a.

source: I am like a bird living by itself in the waste places; like the night-bird in a waste of sand.
target: Thlalêr tuivalawng ang ka nia; Khaw ram chhimbuk ang mai ka lo ni ta.

source: I struggled
target: Ka bei nasa

source: And they came into the land of Egypt; for they did not give ear to the voice of the Lord: and they came to Tahpanhes.
target: Tichuan Aigupta ram chu an thleng ta a, LALPA tawngka chu an awih si lo va; tin, Tahpanes khua ngei chu an thleng a.

source: It is my father's house.
target: Ka pa in a ni.

source: And for them I make myself holy, so that they may be made truly holy.
target: Anmahni avangin ka intithianghlim a ni, anni pawh thutaka an thianghlimna turin.

source: All those who come by take away his goods; he is laughed at by his neighbours.
target: Kawngka kal apiangin a thil an laksak thin a: A vêla mite sawi chhiatin a lo awm ta a.

source: She's a six-monther.
target: Thla ruk mi a ni.

source: And the towns of the children of Benjamin, given to them in the order of their families, are Jericho and Beth-hoglah and Emek-kezziz
target: Tichuan Benjamin thlhate an chhûngkaw zir ang zela an khawpuite chu Jeriko te, Beth-hogla te, Emek-keziz te;

source: Is Tom alive?
target: Tom a la nung em?

source: You take the milk and are clothed with the wool, you put the fat beasts to death, but you give the sheep no food.
target: A thaute chu in ei a, a hmulin in in thuam a, a thau thaute chu in talh a, Berâmte chu in châwm si lo.

source: And I will make Jerusalem a mass of broken stones, the living-place of jackals; and I will make the towns of Judah a waste, with no man living there.
target: Tin, Jerusalem chu thil chhe awm khâwm maiah ka siam dawn, Sihalte chenna hmun a ni ang; Juda khawpuite chu chêngtu awm lovin ka tițiau ang.

source: They won't speak to you
target: An bia lovang che

source: When all Israel has come before the Lord your God in the place named by him, let a reading be given of this law in the hearing of all Israel.
target: hmun a la ruat tura Israel mi zawng zawng LALPA in Pathian hmaa an rawn inlan hunah he dan hi Israel mi zawng zawng hriatah in chhiar tur a ni.

source: For he is not a man as I am, that I might give him an answer, that we might come together before a judge.
target: rorêlna hma ading duna ka chhan tûrin, Ani chu kei anga mihring a ni si lo.

source: I gave up
target: Ka tawpsan

source: Put them in fear, O Lord, so that the nations may see that they are only men. (Selah.
target: Aw LALPA, anni chu tihlau la; Hnam tinin mihring mai an ni tih inhre rawh se. Selah

source: Unnumbered women have done well, but you are better than all of them.
target: Hmeichhe tam tak khawsak tha an awm a. Mahse nang chuan i khum vek a ni, tiin.

source: And Abraham took sheep and oxen and gave them to Abimelech, and the two of them made an agreement together.
target: Tichuan Abrahama chuan berâmte leh bâwngpate a hruai a, Abimeleka hnênah a pe a; tin, an pahnih chuan thu an thlung ta a.

source: Sami is faithful.
target: Sami a rinawm.

source: Then the captain and some of the police went and took them, but not violently, for fear that they might be stoned by the people.
target: Tichuan hotu chu tiangkengtute nen chuan an va kal a, vantlang an hlauh avangin tlang takin an rawn hruai a, chutilochuan lunga den an hlau va.

source: What the fuck is it with you
target: Eng thil nge i nih

source: I deserve it.
target: Ka phu ve reng a ni.

source: He is old
target: A tar tawh

source: I didn't move anything.
target: Engmah ka che lo.

source: You didn't protect me.
target: Min humhim lo.

source: And I was acting for the honour of my name, so that it might not be made unclean in the eyes of the nations, before whose eyes I had taken them out.
