target: Mahse ka kut ka sûm a, ka hruai chhuah lai hretute hnam ngei mithmuha tihchhiata a awm loh nân ka hming humhalhin ka bei ta zawk a ni.

source: And while he kept his hands on Peter and John, all the people came running together to the covered way which is named Solomon's, full of wonder.
target: Tin, ani chuan Petera leh Johana chu a chelh reng laiin mi zawng zawngin mak an ti em em a, hulhliap, Solomona ta an tihah chuan an hnenah an lo tlan khawm a.

source: Is his punishment like the punishment of those who overcame him? or are his dead as great in number as those he put to the sword?
target: Amah vawtute a vuak ang takin amah chu a vaw ve êm ni? A nih loh leh, ama thahte thahna ang takin amah chu thahin a awm êm ni?

source: It is already morning.
target: Zing a ni tawh.

source: Seven years are coming in which there will be great wealth of grain in Egypt;
target: Ngai teh, Aigupta ram chhûng zawng zawngah hian hausak tawntaw kum, kum sarih a lo thleng dâwn:

source: He who has pity on the poor gives to the Lord, and the Lord will give him his reward.
target: Mi rethei khawngaih chan LALPA a puktir a ni a, A thiltih that chu a rul ang.

source: And because wrongdoing will be increased, the love of most people will become cold.
target: Tin, sual a la pun dawn avangin mi tam zawk hmangaihna chu a la dai ang.

source: If the Lord of armies had not kept some at least of us safe, we would have been like Sodom, and the fate of Gomorrah would have been ours.
target: Sipaihote LALPA chuan tihboral bang tlemte min lo zuahsak suh sela chuan, Sodom ang khan kan awm daih tawh ang a, Gomorra ang mai khan kan awm tawh ang.

source: He is the chief of the ways of God, made by him for his pleasure.
target: Pathian siam u ber a ni a, A siamtu chuan a tan khandaih a siamsak a.

source: The radio doesn't work.
target: Radio a thawk lo.

source: I cried
target: Ka tap

source: It's not time to fool around
target: Buam hun a ni lo

source: And he who saw it has given witness (and his witness is true; he is certain that what he says is true so that you may have belief.
target: A hmutu chuan a hriattir tawh, a thu hriattir a dik a ni; a sawi dik tih a inhria, nangni pawhin in rinna turin.

source: Make me free from the cruel rule of man; then I will keep your orders.
target: Mihring hnehchhiahna lakah chuan mi chhanhim ang che: Chutichuan i thununna thute chu ka zawm dawn nia.

source: You won't get away.
target: I tlanbo dawn lo.

source: Give my love to Philologus and Julia, Nereus and his sister, and Olympas, and all the saints who are with them.
target: Philologoa leh Juli nen, Nirea leh a farnu nen, Olumpa nen, an hnena mi thianghlim awm zawng zawng nen khan chibai mi buksak ang che u.

source: Do you want these
target: Hengte hi i duh em

source: They bought a new RV.
target: RV thar an lei a.

source: I got sick.
target: Ka damlo a.

source: Then there are those who are haters of the light, who have no knowledge of its ways, and do not go in them.
target: Eng lakah lo helte an awm a, A kawngte lah an hre lo va, A kawng takah pawh an awm lo.

source: She wanted a bicycle
target: Bicycle a duh a

source: And Judah was overcome before Israel, so that they went in flight, every man to his tent.
target: Tin, Juda chu Israelte lakah a lo tlâwm ta a; mi tin, mahni in lamah an tlan haw ta theuh va.

source: Is there any ham left?
target: Ham a la awm em?

source: They were just soldiers.
target: Sipai mai an ni.

source: And when he was by himself, those who were round him with the twelve put questions to him about the purpose of the stories.
target: Tin, fianriala a awm laiin sawm leh pahnihte leh a thuihruai dangte chuan tehkhin thute chu an zawt fiah a.

source: Let your kingdom come. Let your pleasure be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
target: I ram lo thleng rawh se. I duhzawng vana an tih angin leia mi’n ti rawh se.

source: So you are witnesses and give approval to the work of your fathers; for they put them to death and you make their last resting-places.
target: Chutichuan in thlahtute thiltihte chu in hriatpuiin in remtihpui a ni; annin an that a, nangnin an thlan inte in sa si a.

source: And year by year, whenever she went up to the house of the Lord, she kept on attacking her, so that Hannah gave herself up to weeping and would take no food.
target: Tin, chutianga kum tin, a tih avângin LALPA in a han kal apiang chuan a lungngaihna chu a lo chawhthawhsak thin a; chutichuan a tap a tap a, chaw pawh a ei lo va.

source: You shouldn't have been there.
target: I awm tur a ni lo.

source: A man's steps are of the Lord; how then may a man have knowledge of his way?
target: Mihring kawngte chu LALPA ruat a ni a, Engtin nge mihringin a kawng an hriat theih ang?

source: Do you want to eat anything
target: Engmah ei i duh em

source: They make songs to the instruments of music, and are glad at the sound of the pipe.
target: An perhkhuang leh tingtang remin an zai a, An phenglawng thawmah an hlim za a.

source: And some of them had faith, and were joined to Paul and Silas; and a number of the God-fearing Greeks, and some of the chief women.
target: Tichuan an zinga thenkhat chu thlemthlukin an awm a, Paula leh Sila chu an pawl ta a; Pathian ngaihsak Grik mipui tam tak leh hmeichhe puipa tam takte nen.

source: In the morning give us your mercy in full measure; so that we may have joy and delight all our days.
target: Aw, zingah chuan i ngilneihnain mi titlai ang che; Kan dam chhûng zawng zawng hian kan hlima kan lawm theihna tûrin.

source: Don't catch a cold.
target: Khawsik man suh.

source: How far did it go
target: Eng chen nge a kal

source: And Jesus went out of the Temple, and on the way his disciples came to him, pointing out the buildings of the Temple.
target: Tin, Isua Pathian biak in ata a chhuak a, a kal dawn a. Tin, a zirtirte chu Pathian biak inte entir turin a hnenah an lo kal a.

source: I ran outside
target: Pawnah ka tlanchhuak

source: Do you want a water cup?
target: Tui no i duh em?

source: I am a dog person.
target: Ui mi ka ni.

source: I gasped
target: Ka thawhuai

source: She ate tomatoes.
target: Tomato a ei a.

source: Not quite there yet.
target: A la awm chiah lo.

source: Tell Tom.
target: Tom-a hrilh rawh.

source: But every man in his right order: Christ the first-fruits; then those who are Christ's at his coming.
target: Nimahsela mahni hun theuh zelah; Krista chu thawh hmahruaitu a ni a; chu mi hnua a lo kal lehnaah chuan Krista tate chu.

source: And he took him by his right hand, lifting him up; and straight away his feet and the bones of his legs became strong,
target: Tin, a kut ding lam a chelh a, a kai tho ta a; tin, thawklehkhatan a kete leh a kheimit ruhte chu a lo chak ta nghal a.

source: Oh! It's beautiful!
target: Awh! A mawi em!

source: They don't go well together
target: An kal dun tha lo

source: They didn't speak
target: An tawng lo

source: Keep them.
target: Khang kha dah rawh.

source: Are things OK with you?
target: Thil a OK em?

source: Did you drink wine?
target: Uain i in em?

source: I'm not tall
target: Ka sang lo

source: To the woodworkers and the builders and the stone-cutters; and for getting wood and cut stones for the building up of the house.
target: thingrem siamtu te, in satu te, in chhe siamtute huan in he lai siamna thing leh lungchher an lei theih nân, tiin LALPA inah a tir a.

source: Get to class
target: Pawlah kal rawh

source: And their houses will be handed over to others, their fields and their wives together: for my hand will be stretched out against the people of the land, says the Lord.
target: An inte chu mi dang hnênah pêk a ni ang a, An thlawhhmate leh an nupuite nên; chumi rama chengte chungah chuan ka kut ka lek dawn si a, Tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: She called me a taxi.
target: Taxi min ko a.

source: For this cause his net is ever open, and there is no end to his destruction of the nations.
target: Chuvângin alên chu tiruak leh țhînin, Hnamte thah a hnial lo fo dâwn em ni?

source: The true light, which gives light to every man, was then coming into the world.
target: Eng tak mi tin tieng thin kha a awm a, khawvelah a lo kal mek a ni.

source: Or, Get me out of the power of my hater? or, Give money so that I may be free from the power of the cruel ones?
target: hmêlma kut ata mi chhan chhuak teh u' emaw Hnehchhiahtute kut ata mi tlan teh u' emaw ka ti êm ni?

source: Fire goes before him, burning up all those who are against him round about.
target: A hma lamah chuan mei akal a, A vêla mah dotute chu a kangral thin.

source: I lost it.
target: Ka tibo e.

source: For he had made such a great number well that all those who were diseased were falling down before him for the purpose of touching him.
target: Mi tam tak a tidam tawh si a; chutichuan na nei apiangin amah an deh theihna turin an bawh huai huai a.

source: But he kept his place in the middle of the bit of land, and kept back their attack and overcame the Philistines: and the Lord gave a great salvation.
target: Nimahsela ani chu chu mi hmunah chuan a ding a, a veng tlat a, Philistia mite chu a that a: tin, LALPAN nasa takin a ngamsak a.

source: The Lord gives the word; great is the number of the women who make it public.
target: LALPAN thu a pe a, Chanchin hriltu hmeichhe tam takin an hril darh a,

source: So all the people of the land were glad, and the town was quiet; and they had put Athaliah to death with the sword at the king's house.
target: Chutichuan chu mi rama mi zawng zawng chu an lâwm a, tin, khawpui chu buai lovin a awm ta a; tin, Athali chu khandaihin lal inah an that a.

source: No evil power has effect against Jacob, no secret arts against Israel; at the right time it will be said of Jacob and of Israel, See what God has done!
target: Jakob-ho chungah dawi atana a awm lo. Israel-ho chungah dawi vaihna a awm hek lo. Jakob-ho leh Israel-ho hnenah Pathian thiltih chu tihlan zel a ni.

source: If you are in me at all times, and my words are in you, then anything for which you make a request will be done for you.
target: Nangni keimaha in awm reng a, ka thu nangmahnia a awm reng bawk chuan in duh apiang dil rawh u, in tan tihin a awm zel ang.

source: They will be named waste silver, because the Lord has given them up.
target: Mite chuan tangkaraw êk chhia an vuah ang, LALPAN anmahni a hnawl avângin.

source: I have difficulty urinating.
target: Zun harsa ka nei.

source: It's too big
target: A lian lûtuk

source: We were having lunch.
target: Chawhmeh kan ei a.

source: Tom was slow
target: Tom kha a muang

source: He would appreciate it.
target: A lawmpui hle ang.

source: Take from me every false way; and in mercy give me your law.
target: Awm dan dik lo hi ka hnên ata la sawn la: I dan khawngaih takin mi pe ang che.

source: For this cause the Holy One of Israel says, Because you will not give ear to this word, and are looking for help in ways of deceit and evil, and are putting your hope in them:
target: Chumi avâng chuan Israel-ho Mi Thianghlim chuan heti hian a sawi a, He thu hi in hmusit avâng leh hnechhiahna leh luhlulna in rin a, a chunga in innghah avângin,

source: Tom's coming over.
target: Tom a rawn kal a.

source: And if he is not made free in this way, he will go out in the year of Jubilee, he and his children with him.
target: Chung ang zawnga tlan a nih loh pawhin, Jubili kum chuan a chhuak ang a, amah leh a fate nen.

source: It is God who gives salvation to kings; and who kept his servant David from the wounding sword.
target: Amah chu a ni, lalho hnêna chhandamna pe a, Khandaih mi tikhawlo thei laka a chhiahhlawh Davida chhanchhuaktu chu ni.

source: Then taking Ephraim with his right hand, Joseph put him at Israel's left side, and with his left hand he put Manasseh at Israel's right side, placing them near him.
target: Tin, Josefan an pahnih chuan a kai a, Epraima chu a kut ding lamin Israela kut vei lamin Israela kut ding lam pangah a kai a, a rawn hruai hnai a.

source: In addition to all the other things, there is that which comes on me every day, the care of all the churches.
target: Heng pawn lam thil ka sawi bakah hian Kohhranho zawng zawng ka ngaihtuahna, ni tin mi delh rengtu hi a awm bawk a.

source: Her holy ones were cleaner than snow, they were whiter than milk, their bodies were redder than corals, their form was as the sapphire:
target: A miliante chu vur aia thianghlim an ni a, hnute tui aia var an ni; Taksaah chuan rubi aiin an sâr zawk a, an mawizia chu saphir ang a ni.

source: These are to be offered in addition to the morning burned offering, which is a regular burned offering at all times.
target: Heng hi zinga thilhlan, halral thilhlan hlan reng tiam lovin in hlan tur a ni.

source: And Israel was crushed under the power of Hazael, king of Aram, all the days of Jehoahaz.
target: Tin, Suria lal Hazaela chuan Jeoahaza chhanah chan Israelte chu a hnehchiah reng a.

source: From Tappuah the line goes on to the west to the river of Kanah; ending at the sea. This is the heritage of the children of Ephraim by their families;
target: Tapua atangin ramri chu thlang lampangah Kana luite thlengin akal a; chu chu tuifinriatah a chhuak a. Chung chu a ni Ephraima thlahte hnam an chhhungkaw zir zela an chanpual chu.

source: It's green
target: A hring a nia

source: With two boards for the angles of the House at the back.
target: Tin, biak bûk kawmchar kil ve ve atân chuan ban rem khâwm pahnih i siam tur a ni.

source: In the fourth month, on the ninth day of the month, the store of food in the town was almost gone, so that there was no food for the people of the land.
target: Thla lina, chumi thla ni kuanaah chuan khawpuia tam chu anasa ta hle mai a, ram mipuite tan ei tûr rêng rêng a awm ta l va.

source: So he went down and had talk with the woman; and she was pleasing to Samson.
target: Tin, a zuk kal a, hmeichia chu a kawm a; Samsona chuan a duh hle mai a.

source: Then we went back, journeying into the waste land by the way to the Red Sea, as the Lord had said to me: and we were a long time going round Mount Seir.
target: Tin, kan insuan a, LALPAN ka hnena a sawi angin Tuifinriat Sen lamah thlalerah kan lût ta a; Seir tlâng chu rei tak kan vel a.

source: I get it
target: Ka hria e

source: And hope does not put to shame; because our hearts are full of the love of God through the Holy Spirit which is given to us.
target: tin, Thlarau Thianghlim kan hnena min pek khan Pathian hmangaihna chu kan thinlunga a leih tawh avangin beiseina chuan a timualpho lo va.

source: And that day Herod and Pilate became friends with one another, for before they had been against one another.
target: Tin, chu mi ni tak chuan Heroda leh Pilata chu an inngeih ta a; chu mi hma zawng chu an intai thin a ni.

source: He's smart.
target: A felfai.

source: The fruit of righteousness is a tree of life, but violent behaviour takes away souls.
target: Mi fel rah chu nunna thing a ni a, Mi fing chuan mi rilru a hneh thin.

source: You wouldn't enjoy it.
target: I hlim lo ang.

source: Keep digging
target: Lai zel rawh

source: Can we leave?
target: Kan kal thei em?

source: You never asked me.
target: Min zawt ngai lo.

source: And you, son of man, will you be a judge, will you be a judge of the town of blood? then make clear to her all her disgusting ways.
target: Tin, nang mihring fapa, thisen chhuah hmang khawpui chu i khing dawn em? I khing dawn êm? A tenawmna zawng zawng chu hriattîr rawh khai!

source: The flesh is gone from my bones, and they give me no rest; there is no end to my pains.
target: Zanah chuan ka ruhte a kher ngut ngut a, Ka na mi fep sup sup hi a chawl lo.

source: Now the Apostles and the brothers who were in Judaea had news that the word of God had been given to the Gentiles.
target: Tin, Judai rama tirhkoh leh unau awmte chuan Jentailte pawhin Pathian thu an zawm tih an hre ta a.

source: Now King David was old and far on in years; and though they put covers over him, his body was cold.
target: Tin, Davida chu a lo upain, a lo tar ta hle a; tichuan puanin an khuh thin a, nimahsela a lum thei chuang hauh lo va.

source: We're not arguing
target: Kan inhnial lo

source: Wealth and honour come from you, and you are ruler over all, and in your hand is power and strength; it is in your power to make great, and to give strength to all.
target: Hausakna leh chawimawina e hi i hnêna mi a ni a, engkim chungah thu i nei a; tin, thiltihthiehna ikutah a awm a; i kutah hian mi zawng zawng tihropuina leh chaknana pêk theihnaa wm.

source: It's my own fault.
target: Keimah sual a ni.

source: Be in fear before him, all the earth: the world is ordered so that it may not be moved.
target: Leilung zawng zawngte u, a hmaah khur rawh u;Khawvel hi a nghin thieh lohna tûrin tihnghehin a awm a.

source: Eat more vegetables
target: Thlai ei tam rawh

source: I'll go and have another look.
target: Ka va en leh ang.

source: And to the children of Levi I have given as their heritage all the tenths offered in Israel, as payment for the work they do, the work of the Tent of meeting.
target: Tin, levia thlahte chu ngai teh, rawngbawl hnaa an rawngbawl hna, puan in rawngbawl hnaa n rawngbawl manah Israel rama sawma pakhat zawng zawng hi ka pe a ni.

source: Don't get me wrong.
target: Min hre sual suh.

source: What has she done
target: Eng nge a tih tawh

source: This association shall be called the ESS
target: He pawl hi ESS

source: Who are they sending
target: Tute nge an tirh

source: And they were talking in tongues, and giving glory to God. Then Peter said,
target: tawng hriat lohtea thu sawiin Pathian fakin an hre si a. Tin, Peteran a bia a,

source: Give me time.
target: Hun mi pe rawh.

source: In those days there was no king in Israel: every man did what seemed right to him.
target: Chung lai chuan Israelte zingah lal rêng rêng an awm lo va: mi tinn mahni tha tihzâwng zâwngin an ti mai a ni.

source: Yes, it's safe.
target: Aw, a him e.

source: You whose joy is in a thing of no value, who say, Have we not taken for ourselves horns by the strength which is ours?
target: nangni thil thlâwn chunga lâwm a, Keimahni chaknain a a ni lâwm ni kîte kan lâk? tite u.

source: The ornament of a man is his mercy, and a poor man is better than one who is false.
target: Mi â duhthusam chu a ngilneih dan tehna a ni a, Mi dawthei ai chuan mi rethei a duhawm zawk.

source: I will not send them all out in one year, for fear that their land may become waste, and the beasts of the field be increased overmuch against you.
target: Kum khata chhûng mai chuan ka hnawhchhuahsak lo vang che; chutilozawng ram chu a lo tiau mai ang a, ram sate chu I tân a lo tam lutuk dah ang e.

source: Do you dance?
target: I lam em?

source: I kicked Tom.
target: Toma ka pet.

source: I can't shut it down.
target: Ka khar thei lo.

source: Then Hushai said to Zadok and Abiathar, the priests, This is the suggestion made by Ahithophel to Absalom and the responsible men of Israel, and this is what I said to them.
target: Chutichuan Husaia chuan puithiam Zadoka leh Abiathara hnênah, Chutiang khatiang chuan Ahithopela chuan Absaloma leh Israel upate rem a ruatsak a; tin, keiin chutiang khatiang chuan rem ka ruat a.

source: Then I came to the rulers of the lands across the river and gave them the king's letters. Now the king had sent with me captains of the army and horsemen.
target: Chutichuan lui rala rorêltute hnên chu ka han thleng a, lal lehkhate chu ka han pe a. Tin, lal chuan ka hnênah sipai hotute leh sipai sakawr chung chuang mite a kaltir ve a ni.

source: O foolish Galatians, by what strange powers have you been tricked, to whom it was made clear that Jesus Christ was put to death on the cross?
target: Aw Galatia rama mi a te u, tuin nge dawi che u? in mithmuh ngeiah Isua Krista chu khenbehin chiang taka lantir a nih tehlul nen.

source: Drop the gun
target: Silai paih rawh

source: It's very popular
target: A lar hle mai

source: She applied for a visa.
target: Visa a dil a.

source: It's a very slow process.
target: A slow hle a ni.

source: And every Sabbath he had discussions in the Synagogue, turning Jews and Greeks to the faith.
target: Tin, Chawlhni apiangin inkhawmna inah khun takin thu a hril thin a, Judate leh Grikte chu thlem thluk a tum thin a.

source: I'm sober
target: Ka tap

source: As for me, here I am in your hands: do with me whatever seems good and right in your opinion.
target: Kei rawh chu hei, in kuta ka awm hi. Dik leh țha in tih ang angin mi ti rawh u.

source: They're very poor
target: An rethei hle mai

source: You trust people too much.
target: Mi i ring lutuk.

source: He put to death the first-fruits of Egypt, of man and of beast.
target: Ani chuan Aigupta rama fa tirte chu a tihlum a, Mihring leh sate pawh.

source: Let's ski
target: Va tleng ang

source: Don't believe him!
target: Amah chu ring suh!

source: I was out for a walk.
target: Ka kal chhuak a.

source: You have made the north and the south; Tabor and Hermon are sounding with joy at your name.
target: Chhim leh hmâr chu nangma siam ani a: Tabor leh Hermon chu i hming avângin hlimin an zai thin.

source: They cannot stop us.
target: Min dang thei lo.

source: He slapped my ass.
target: Ka hnute chu a rawn beng a.

source: How do we survive?
target: Engtin nge kan dam khawchhuah theih ang?

source: We ate some fried meat.
target: Sa hmin kan ei a.

source: And he sent another; and they put him to death: and a number of others, whipping some, and putting some to death.
target: Tin, bawi dang a tir leh pek a; chu mi chu an lo tihlum a. Bawi dang tam tak pawh – thenkhat an vel a, thenkhat an lo tihlum a.

source: Now my eyes will be open and my ears awake to the prayers made in this place.
target: He hmuna tawngtainaah hian ka mit ke len ang a, ka beng ka chhi ang.

source: We've been warned
target: Kan vaukhân tawh

source: But when he was in Rome, he went in search of me everywhere, and came to me
target: Rom khuaa a lo kal lai khan ngun takin mi zawng chhuak ta zawk a ni.

source: God exists.
target: Pathian a awm.

source: You didn't deserve that.
target: Chu chu i phu lo.

source: Do you believe this
target: Hei hi i ring em

source: I am sick
target: Ka damlo

source: For he was hoping that Paul would give him money: so he sent for him more frequently and had talk with him.
target: Paulan tangka a pek a beisei bawk a, chuvangin a ko zing deuh va, a be thin a ni.

source: And when his son Isaac was eight days old, Abraham made him undergo circumcision, as God had said to him.
target: Tin, Abrahaman Pathianin thu a pêk ang khân, a fapa Isaaka chu ni riat a tlinin a serh a tansak a.

source: You'd totally be surprised.
target: Mak i ti vek ang.

source: Truly, is not their well-being in their power? (The purpose of the evil-doers is far from me.
target: A! an sum leh pai an kuta awm lo ni lo, Mi sualsualte remruatna chu ka lakah a hla a ni.

source: Tom is early
target: Tom chu a hmâ hle

source: I love music
target: Rimawi ka ngaina

source: And such were some of you; but you have been washed, you have been made holy, you have been given righteousness in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ and in the Spirit of our God.
target: Tin, nangni thenkhat chutiang mi in nih thin kha; nimahsela Lalpa Isua Krsta hmingah leh kan Pathian Thlarauvah tlenfai in ni tawh a, tihthianghlim in ni tawh a, thiam chang in ni tawh.

source: A foolish man lets out all his wrath, but a wise man keeps it back quietly.
target: Mi â chuan a thinur thu zawng zawng a sawi chhuak a, Mi fing erawh chuan an thup a, an ngawihpui thin.

source: And the children of Judah did not make the Jebusites who were living in Jerusalem go out; the Jebusites are still living with the children of Benjamin in Jerusalem.
target: Tin, Benjamina thlahte chuan Jebus-ho Jerusalem khuaa awmte chu an hnawt chhuak lo: Jebus-hote chu Benjamina thlahte nen tun thleng hian Jerusalem-ah an la cheng za ta reng a ni.

source: I'll just go.
target: Ka kal mai dawn.

source: The blessing if you give ear to the orders of the Lord your God, which I give you this day:
target: LALPA in Pathian thupêkte tuna ka pêk che u hi in zawm chuan, malsawmna;

source: But you're not there.
target: Mahse, i awm lo.

source: Then the priest will take the basket from your hand and put it down in front of the altar of the Lord your God.
target: Tin, puithiam chuan in kut ata bawm chu a la ang a, LALPA in Pathian maicham bulah a hung ang.

source: For they are saying to you what is false in my name: I have not sent them, says the Lord.
target: Ka hming chhalin dawt thu in hnênah an sawi a ni e: keima tirh an ni lo va, tih hi LALPA thu chuak a ni.

source: And Darius the Mede took the kingdom, being then about sixty-two years old.
target: Tin, Daria, Media mi chuan ram chu an chang ta a, amah chu kum sâwmruk leh kumhnih vêla upa a ni.

source: Then Jesus said, Did I not make a selection of you, the twelve, and one of you is a son of the Evil One?
target: Tin, Isuan an hnenah, Nangni sawm leh pahnihte hi keima thlan inni lawm ni? In zinga mi pakhat diabola a ni leh nghal vei nen, a ti a.

source: Don't pass me over.
target: Min paltlang suh.

source: I'm not dusting anything.
target: Engmah ka dust lo.

source: I hate opera
target: Rimawi in ka hua

source: I have wine
target: Zu ka nei

source: The Lord is looking down from heaven; he sees all the sons of men;
target: LALPA chuan van atang khian a thlir a; Mihring fate zawng zawng hi a hmu thin a;

source: Do you have a life goal?
target: Nun tum i nei em?

source: Baal-hanan the Gederite was responsible for the olive-trees and the sycamore-trees in the lowlands; and Joash for the stores of oil;
target: tin, phai ruama Olive thing leh theipui kiungte enkalwtu c Geder mi baal-hanana a ni a; tin, hriak da khawmna enkawltu chu Joasa a ni a;

source: And the flax and the barley were damaged, for the barley was almost ready to be cut and the flax was in flower.
target: Tin, la leh barli chu a dêng chhia a: barli chu a vuih lai mêk a ni a, tin, la chu a rah lai mêk a ni.

source: There were no resignations
target: Bang tur an awm lo

source: I need glue
target: Thilban ka mamawh

source: I will go back to my place till they are made waste; in their trouble they will go after me early and will make search for me.
target: An thiam lohna an inhriat a, ka hmêl an zawn hmâ chu. Ka kal ang a, ka hmunah ka kîr ang: An tuarnaah chuan mi zawng hmâ dâwn a ni.

source: And the sons of Judah were Perez and Zerah by Tamar; and the son of Perez was Hezron; and the son of Hezron was Ram;
target: Judan Tamari lakah Pharesa leh Zera a hring a; Pharesan Eroma a hring a; Eroman Arama a hring a;

source: Fight or die
target: Dam leh thih

source: The sinners have been waiting for me to give me up to destruction; but I will give all my mind to your unchanging ward.
target: Mi suaksualte chuan mi tihboral tumin mi nghak thin a; Nimahsela i thuhriattirte chu ka ngaihtuah ang.

source: He says sharp words to the sea and makes it dry, drying up all the rivers: Bashan is feeble, and Carmel, and the flower of Lebanon is without strength.
target: Tuifinriat chu a zilhhau va, a tikang chat a, li zawng zawngte pawh a tikang zo va, Lebanon tlâng pangpâr chu a chuai a.

source: The poor man makes requests for grace, but the man of wealth gives a rough answer.
target: Mi rethei chuan a thlemin an them a, Mi hausa erawh chu rura takin an tawng thin.

source: The Lord in her is upright; he will not do evil; every morning he lets his righteousness be seen, he is unchanging; but the evil-doer has no sense of shame.
target: A chhûnga LALPA chu a fel a ni; khawlohna a ti lo vang; Tûktin a rorêlna chu a tilang a, a pelh ngai lo va; Mahse mifello chuan zahna chang reng a hre lo.

source: They have made wise designs against your people, talking together against those whom you keep in a secret place.
target: I mite hi vervek takin an phiar a, I mi thuhrukte chungah hian a chhe lamin an inrawn hlawm a.

source: And the Pharisees and Sadducees came and, testing him, made a request to him to give them a sign from heaven.
target: Tin, Pharisaite leh Saddukaite an lo kal a, amah fiah nan van ata chhinchhiahna anmahni entir turin an dil a.

source: It was a bet
target: Inchawina a ni

source: The Lord is living; praise be to my Rock, and let the God of my salvation be honoured:
target: LALPA chu a nung reng e; ka lungpui chu fakin awm sela; Mi chhandamna lungpui, Pathian chu chawimawiin awm rawh se:

source: He kept staring at me
target: Min en reng a

source: But if any man among you is without wisdom, let him make his request to God, who gives freely to all without an unkind word, and it will be given to him.
target: In zingah tupawhin finna a tlakchham chuan mi zawng zawng hnena hau lo leh ui lova pe thintu Pathian chu dil rawh se, chutichuan a hnenah pek a ni ang.

source: And you put chains on my feet, watching all my ways, and making a limit for my steps;
target: Ka keah kawl mi buntir a, Ka kawng zawng zawng i chhinchhiah a, Ka kephah hualin ramri i kham a,

source: And he made this story for some people who were certain that they were good, and had a low opinion of others:
target: Tin, mi fel tak nih inring a, mi dang zawng zawng hmusit thin tute emaw hnenah chuan he tehkhin thu pawh hi a sawi a:

source: The jackals will be there, and her great ones will be gone; they will say, There is no longer a kingdom there, and all her chiefs will have come to an end.
target: An mi țhate chu ram awp tûrin an ko vang a, nimahsela chutah chuan koh tûr tumah an awm lo vang a; an mi lian zawng zawng chu engmah lo an ni ang.

source: I will make a new song to you, O God; I will make melody to you on an instrument of ten cords.
target: Aw Pathian, nangmah chawimawiin hla thar ka sa ang a: Perhkhuang hrui samw nei mi nên enangmah fakin ka zai ang.

source: Did you say three?
target: Pathum i ti em?

source: Come again.
target: Lo kal leh ru.

source: They gave worship with songs before the House of the Tent of meeting, till Solomon put up the house of the Lord in Jerusalem; and they took their places for their work in their regular order.
target: Tichuan Solomonan Jerusalem-a LALPA in a sak hma loh chu, inbiakna puan inah chuan hlain rawng an bâwl thin a; a pâwl pâwlin rawngbawl hna an inchhawk kual thin a.

source: For he who is strong has done great things for me; and holy is his name.
target: Mi chak khan ka chungah thil ropui tak mi tihsak a, A hming pawh a thiang hlim a ni.

source: And I saw the destruction of his wealth by an evil chance; and when he became the father of a son he had nothing in his hand.
target: a sum khawl chu peipun tum a, a chhe ta hlauh si, a fa hnutchhiah tûr pawh a nei ta lo hi a ni.

source: The bow is sounding against him; he sees the shining point of spear and arrow.
target: A chungah thla bâwm a ri rawk rawk a, Fei leh thal a tle zawr zawr mai a.

source: I saw that on TV.
target: Chu chu TV-ah ka hmu a.

source: I'm broke.
target: Engmah ka nei lo.

source: And Aaron said to them all the words the Lord had said to Moses, and did the signs before all the people.
target: tin, LALPAN Mosia hnêna a sawi zawng zawngte kha Arona chuan a sawi chhâwng leh vek a, tin, mipuite hmuhah chuan thilmakte chu a ti a.

source: This is the reward of the evil man, and the heritage given to him by God.
target: Hei hi Pathian laka mi suaksual chanpual a ni a, Roluah tûr Pathianin a tan a ruat a chu a ni.

source: Then Hazael, king of Aram, went up against Gath and took it; and his purpose was to go up to Jerusalem.
target: Tichuan Suria lal Jazaela chuan gath khua a han bei a, a han la a; tin, Hazaela chu Jerusalem-a kal zel a tum a.

source: Are you seeing a man?
target: Mipa i hmu em?

source: And Moab will come to an end as a people, because he has been lifting himself up against the Lord.
target: Moab a boral ang, hnam a tling tawh lo vang; LALPA a chungtlak zawk avângin.

source: But make a store for yourselves in heaven, where it will not be turned to dust and where thieves do not come in to take it away:
target: vanah, sulrul leh tuiekin a ei chhiat lohnaah, rukruten an reh pawha an ruk hek lohnaah chuan, in tan rote khawl khawm zawk rawh u;

source: But if your hearts are turned against me, I will send destruction on you by the sword; so the Lord has said.
target: nimahsela in duh lova in hel chuan, khandaihin a ei zo vang che u: LALPA ka chuan chu chu a sawi tawh a ni, a ti a.

source: Try it
target: Tichhin rawh

source: Do you trust me or not?
target: Min ring em ni?

source: I'm unafraid
target: Ka hlau lo

source: Who came to destruction at En-dor; their bodies became dust and waste.
target: Chu mite chu Endor khuaah an boral a; Lei atân ekdur ang mai an lo nih tak kha.

source: And while he was living in Jerusalem, David took more wives and became the father of more sons and daughters.
target: Tin, Davida chuan Jerusalem-ah nupuite a nei belhchhah leh a, tin, Davida chuan fanu leh fapate a nei leh a.

source: I give in.
target: Ka rawn lut e.

source: But the sound of his words came to my ears, and on hearing his voice I went into a deep sleep with my face to the earth.
target: Mahse țawng ri chu ka hria a: a țawng ri ka han hriat chuan bawk khupin, hmai lei siin ka mu hîl ta dêr a.

source: I see the rainbow
target: Chhimbal ka hmu

source: Truly, you have a secret God, the God of Israel is a Saviour!
target: Aw Israel-ho Pathian, Chhandamtu, Pathian inthu thina chu i ni ngei mai.

source: Do you have enough time
target: Hun i nei tawk em

source: And straight away he came to Jesus and said, Master! and gave him a kiss.
target: Tichuan Isua chu a va pan ta nghal a, Chibai, Rabbi! tiin a fawp ta ngawih ngawih a.

source: Let not the quick-footed go in flight, or the man of war get away; on the north, by the river Euphrates, they are slipping and falling.
target: Mi zuanzanmg an tlan bo thei lo, Ral tu mi an chhuak chuang hek lo, Saw hmâr Euphrates lui kamah sawn an pai a, an tlu zo ta.

source: I spoke up
target: Ka sawi kha

source: He sent his word and made them well, and kept them safe from the underworld.
target: A thu chu a tir chhuak a, anni chu a tidam thin a, An boralna tûr atate chu a chhandam thin.

source: The sons of Hur, the oldest son of Ephrathah; Shobal, the father of Kiriath-jearim,
target: Hengte hi Kaleba thlahte an ni: Hura fa, Kiriath-jeraim-ho thlahtu, Ephrathi fa tir Sobala,

source: Let them all come
target: An vai hian lo kal rawh se

source: They don't control me.
target: Min thunun lo.

source: And some of the seed went among the stones, where it had not much earth, and straight away it came up because the earth was not deep:
target: Tin, a then pialtlep lei pan hmunah a la a; lei a chhah loh avangin a to ta nghal a;

source: But after a little time, a very violent wind, named Euraquilo, came down from it with great force.
target: Nimahsela rei lo te achinah khawmual lam atang chuan thli na tak a lo tleh chhuk ta a, chu thli chu Eurakuilo an ti thin a.

source: Time flies
target: Hun a kal chak

source: Firm determination
target: Tumna nghet

source: Are we good to go?
target: Kan kal tha em?

source: And there were sloping windows and palm-trees on one side and on the other, on the sides of the covered way: and the side-rooms of the house and the ...
target: Tin, sumhmun bang tuakahte leh thingphel zârahte chuan tukverh hawn theih loh leh tûm thing lem chu a awm bawk a, a in pui sîr pindan leh thing phel zar chu chutiang bawk chu a ni.

source: And the Chaldaeans put the king's house on fire, as well as the houses of the people, and had the walls of Jerusalem broken down.
target: Tin, Kaldai-hote chuan lal in leh mi dang in zawng zawng an hal a, Jerusalem kulh bangte pawh an tichhia a.

source: Count on me
target: Mi ring rawh

source: Your voice isn't bad.
target: I aw a chhe lo.

source: What has been done this day, has been ordered by the Lord to take away your sin.
target: Tuna tih ang hian inremna siamsak tur che uin LALPAN tih tur thu a pe a ni.

source: I'm being watched.
target: Ka en reng a ni.

source: The wise man's eyes are in his head, but the foolish man goes walking in the dark; but still I saw that the same event comes to them all.
target: mi fing chuan a kalna a hria a, mi â chuan a hre lo va, mahse khawrel thuhmun an zaa chungah a thleng tho tih ka hmu.

source: I'm making coffee
target: Coffee ka siam a

source: It's your decision
target: I thutlukna a ni

source: The car is not turning
target: Car chu a inher lo

source: Let's buy it
target: Lei ang

source: You'll get better at it.
target: I thiam zawk ang.

source: Your witness is most certain; it is right for your house to be holy, O Lord, for ever.
target: I thuhriattirte chu a rinawm êm êm a: Aw LALPA, kumkhuain Thianghlimna hi i in nên a inmawi a ni.

source: But those workmen said among themselves, This is he who will one day be the owner of the property; come, let us put him to death, and the heritage will be ours.
target: Nimahsela chung lo enkawltute chuan, ‘He mi hi roluahtu tur a ni; i that ang u khai! tichuan a roluah tur hi kan ta a ni mai ang,’ an inti a.

source: Take care to have knowledge about the condition of your flocks, looking well after your herds;
target: I berâm rualte awm dan chu hriat tumin taihmak chhuah la, I ran rualte chu veng tha rawh:

source: And no one was able to give him an answer, and so great was their fear of him, that from that day no one put any more questions to him.
target: Tin, tuman kam khat mahin an chhang thei lo va, chu mi ni achin chu tuman thu dang reng reng an zawt ngam tawh hek lo.

source: He's stupid
target: A a lutuk

source: You're unenthusiastic
target: I phur lo hle mai

source: Good morning
target: Zing chibai

source: It's an oligarchy
target: Oligarchy a ni

source: For this cause, says the Lord, the God of Israel, I will send such evil on Jerusalem and Judah that the ears of all to whom the news comes will be burning.
target: LALPA, Israelte Pathianin heti hian a ti: 'Ngai teh u, Jerusalem leh Juda chnga hian a hria apiangte beng khing hnih thawng khawp thil tha lo ka rawn thlentir dâwn e.

source: David himself gives him the name of Lord; and how then is he his son? And the common people gave ear to him gladly.
target: Davida ngei chuan ani chu ‘Lalpa,’ a ti si a, khawiah nge a fapa a nih ang? a ti a.Tin, vantlangho chuan lawm takin a thu an ngaithla a.

source: Give your heart to teaching, and your ears to the words of knowledge.
target: Zirtirna lamah i rilru nghat la, I beng chu hriatna thu lamah.

source: And there came to him Sadducees, who say there is no coming back from the dead; and they put a question to him, saying,
target: Tin, Saddukaiho, thawhlehna a awm lo tite chu a hnenah an lo kal a; a hnenah,

source: It's an extreme case.
target: Extreme case a ni.

source: Who has it?
target: Tunge keng a?

source: Sami wasn't done
target: Sami chu a zo lo

source: I'm a doctor
target: Daktawr ka nia

source: Which at the right time he will make clear, who is the eternal and only Ruler, King of kings, and Lord of lords;
target: Chu inlarna chu a hun takah chuan fak tlak Thuneitu tak chauh, lalberte Lalber, lalte Lal chuan a entir ang;

source: I didn't want to put it down.
target: Ka dah duh lo.

source: I caught Tom.
target: Toma ka man.

source: The car broke down
target: Car chu a chhia a

source: Those who were building the wall and those who were moving material did their part, everyone working with one hand, with his spear in the other;
target: Kulh siamna tûr hmanraw phurtute pawhin an kut khing khatin hna an thawk a, khing khatin hriamhrei an keng a;

source: Tom is trembling
target: Tom chu a khur a

source: And the rest put violent hands on his servants, and did evil to them, and put them to death.
target: mi dangte chuan a bawite chu an man a, zahthlak takin an siam a, an tihlum ta mai a.

source: Who has let the ass of the fields go free? or made loose the bands of the loud-voiced beast?
target: Ram sabengtung tuin nge zawl chhuah? Ram sabengtung chak thlunna tu phelh nge?

source: But there were still seven tribes among the children of Israel who had not taken up their heritage.
target: Tin, Israela thlahte zingah chuan an chanpual la sem ve loh hnam sarih an la awm a.

source: It's okay.
target: A tha e.

source: You've risked enough.
target: I risk tawk tawh.

source: I'm not going to take it.
target: Ka la dawn lo.

source: So I took her, cutting her into parts which I sent through all the country of the heritage of Israel: for they have done an act of shame in Israel.
target: Tichuan ka hmei ruang chu ka la a, ka chan a, Israel-ho ram luah zawng zawngah ka thawn darh a: Israel ramah hian thil tenawm tak leh atthlak tak an lo ti ta si a.

source: I will send you out, and your mother who gave you birth, into another country not the land of your birth; and there death will come to you.
target: I pianna ni lo ram dangah nang leh i nu a hringtu che hi ka paih chhuak ang che u a, chutah chuan in thi ang.

source: Is it a son or a daughter?
target: Fapa nge fanu?

source: Now the children of Reuben and the children of Gad had a great number of cattle: and when they saw that the land of Jazer and the land of Gilead was a good place for cattle;
target: Reubena leh Gada thlahte chuan ran an ngah hle ma a: tin, Jazer ram leh Gilead ram an hmuh chuan a hmun chu ran tana hmun tha tak niin an hri aa;

source: They're very tense.
target: An tense hle mai.

source: Then Jehoiada the priest gave to the captains of hundreds the spears and body-covers which had been King David's and which were kept in the house of God.
target: Tin, puithiam Jehoiada chuan sipai za hotute chu LALPA ina awm lal Davida fei leh phawte leh phaw liante chu a pe a.

source: I am such a loser.
target: Chutiang chak lo chu ka ni.

source: I went straight to bed.
target: Ka mu nghal a.

source: The chicken is not
target: Vawk chu a ni lo

source: Things break
target: Thil a keh

source: Anyone hurt?
target: Hliam in awm em?

source: Have them call me.
target: Min rawn call tir rawh.

source: And an angel from heaven came to him, to give him strength.
target: Tin, van atangin vantirhkoh pakhat a tiharh turin a hnenah a rawn inlar a.

source: I responded quickly.
target: Ka chhang vat a.

source: And they came to Capernaum: and when he was in the house, he put the question to them, What were you talking about on the way?
target: Tin, Kapernaum khua chu an lo thleng a; tin, in chhungah chuan a awm laiin an hnenah, Kawngah khan eng thu nge in inhnial le? tiin a zawt a.

source: I said no.
target: Ka duh lo.

source: They will wash dishes.
target: Buhfai an sil ang.

source: I will give the knowledge of your name to my brothers: I will give you praise among the people.
target: Ka unaute hnênah i hming ka hril ang a: Inkhawmho zingahte chuan ka fak ang che.

source: To give an answer before hearing is a foolish thing and a cause of shame.
target: Ngaihthlâka hmaa chhan chu A tan âtthlak nihna leh mualphona a ni.

source: As I have seen a beast whose young have been taken from her, so Ephraim will give birth to children only for them to be put to death.
target: tûra ka hmuh ang bawkin Ephraim chu hmun nuam taka dahin a awm a: Mahse Epraim chuan a fate chu thattu hnênah a la hruai chhuak ang.

source: I do hope so.
target: Chutiang ka beisei.

source: But I will be the judge of that nation whose servants they are, and they will come out from among them with great wealth.
target: tin, an rawng an bâwlsakate chi pawh chu ka la ngaihtuah ang: tin, chu mi hnuah chuan sum tam tak neiin an lo la chhuak ang.

source: Of the sons of Elizaphan: Shemaiah the chief, and his brothers, two hundred;
target: Elizaphana thlahte zinga mi, puipa ber Semaia, a unaute nen zahnih,

source: Make yourselves low in the eyes of the Lord and you will be lifted up by him.
target: Lalpa mithmuhin inngaitlawm rawh u, tichuan a chawimawi ang che u.

source: And the women who had come with him from Galilee went after him and saw the place and how his body had been put to rest;
target: Tin, hmeichhia Galili ram atanga a hnena lo kalte khan an zui zel a, thlan leh a ruang zalhzia chu an hmu a.

source: Then they put the bags of grain on their asses and went away.
target: Tin, an buh chu an sabengtungte chu an phurhtîr a, chuta ta chu an chhuak ta a.

source: And on the same place there is a white growth of a bright mark, red and white, then let the priest see it;
target: a khawihlina hmuna a lo var pawn emaw, var sen deuhva a lo bawl emaw chuan puithiam entir tur a ni.

source: Tell her everything
target: Engkim hrilh rawh

source: It's none of our business.
target: Kan thu a ni lo.

source: Or with your daughter-in-law, for she is your son's wife, and you may not take her.
target: I monu saruakna chu i hlim tur a ni lo, i fapaa nupui a ni a, a saruakna i hlim tur a ni lo.

source: Who sends sudden destruction on the strong, so that destruction comes on the walled town.
target: kulh chungah boralna lo thleng khawpa, michakte chunga boralna thlentu chu.

source: Are you alive?
target: I la dam maw?

source: And from Almon-diblathaim they went on, and put up their tents in the mountains of Abarim, before Nebo.
target: Tin, Almon-diblathamim ațang chuan an chhuak a, Bebo bula Abarim tlângahte chuan awmhmun an khuar a.

source: And he said, What sin have I done, that you would give up your servant into the hand of Ahab, and be the cause of my death?
target: Tin, ani chuan, Thil eng nge ka tihsual a, i chhiahhlawhhi thah tûra Ahaba kuta pek i duh mai le?

source: That their children might be mixed among the nations, and sent away into other lands.
target: An chi thlah tûrte chu hnam tin zinga a tihtluk a, Ram tina a tihdarhna tûrin.

source: Good for you.
target: I tân a ṭha.

source: Now Bethany was near to Jerusalem, about two miles away;
target: Bethani khua chu Jerusalem khaw kiang a ni a, fing sawm leh fing nga laia hla a ni;

source: Tom isn't pleased
target: Tom a lawm lo

source: So be not like them; because your Father has knowledge of your needs even before you make your requests to him.
target: Chutichuan, anmahni angin awm suh u; amah in dil hmain in Pa chuan engte nge in mamawh tih a hre reng si a.

source: Then the Jews said to him, You are not fifty years old; have you seen Abraham?
target: Tin, Judate chuan a hnenah, Nang kum sawmnga pawh la ni lo pui che, Abrahama i hmu em ni? an ti a.

source: And they took him and put him to death, pushing his body out of the garden.
target: Tichuan ani chu an lo man a, an tihlum a, grep huan ata chu an theh chhuak ta a.

source: You are already dead!
target: I thi tawh!

source: The store of meal did not come to an end, and the bottle was never without oil, as the Lord had said by the mouth of Elijah.
target: Elija hmanga a sawi LALPA thu ang khan chhangphut bel chu a ruak chuang lova, sahriak um pawh a kang hek lo.

source: And Zerubbabel had Abiud; and Abiud had Eliakim; and Eliakim had Azor;
target: Zerubabelan Abiuda a hring a; Abiudan Eliakima a hring a; Eliakiman Azora a hring a;

source: I don't eat
target: Ka ei lo

source: The looking-glasses, and the fair linen, and the high head-dresses, and the veils.
target: darthlalang te, puan zai sin te, diar te, intuam mawina puante chu.

source: I used to respect you.
target: Ka zah thin che.

source: May his life go on as long as the sun and moon, through all generations.
target: Ni khi a awm chhûng chuan an hlau vang che, Thla awm chhûng zawng pawhin, chhuan awm chhûng chuan an hlau vang che,

source: Then great was the men's fear of the Lord; and they made an offering to the Lord and took oaths to him.
target: Tichuan, mite chuan LALPA chu nasa takin an hlau ta a; LALPA hnênah chuan inthâwina an hlân a, thute an tiam ta a.

source: So there was great joy in Jerusalem: for nothing like this had been seen in Jerusalem from the time of Solomon, the son of David, king of Israel.
target: Chutichuan hlimna ropui tak Jerusalem-ah chuan a awm a: Israel lal Davida fapa Solomona china chutiang rêng rêng hu Jerusalem-ah a la awm ngai lo.

source: Whose tongue is not false, who does no evil to his friend, and does not take away the good name of his neighbour;
target: A leia mi rel a ngai lo va, A thian chung pawha thil sual ti ngai lo va, A vengte hming pawh sawichhe ngai lo mi chu.

source: Be quick in answering me, O Lord, for the strength of my spirit is gone: let me see your face, so that I may not be like those who go down into the underworld.
target: Aw LALPA, mi chhâng thuai ang che; ka thlarau a chauh dawn hi: Ka lakah hian i hmai thup suh ang che; Chutilochuan khuarkhuruma chhukte ang maiin ka lo awm dah ang e.

source: No it's not so near
target: Aih a hnai vak lo

source: For our breastplate is the Lord; and our king is the Holy One of Israel's.
target: Kan phaw hi LALPA ta ani si a; Kan lal hi Israel-ho Mi Thianghlim ta a ni.

source: Then David overcame Hadadezer, king of Zobah, near Hamath, when he was going to make his power seen by the river Euphrates.
target: Tin, Davida chuan Euphrates luia a ram din nghet tûra a kal pahin Zoba lal Hadarezera pawh Hamat bulah a bei leh a.

source: Where am I
target: Khawnge ka awm

source: That you will take up this bitter song against the king of Babylon, and say, How has the cruel overseer come to an end! He who was lifted up in pride is cut off;
target: he tihelna thu h Babulon lal au khumin i la saiw ang, Eng tizia nge hnehchhiahtu chu a va reh ta êm! Eng tizia nge rangkachak khawpui ch a va reh ta êm!

source: He hit his head.
target: A lu a vuak a.

source: So that Satan may not get the better of us: for we are not without knowledge of his designs.
target: chutilochuan Setanan min dinchan khalh dah ang e; a ngamthlemna chu kan hai si lo va.

source: What! are you any better than Balak, the son of Zippor, king of Moab? Did he ever take up a cause against Israel or make war against them?
target: Moab lal Zipora fapa Balaka aiin i chak zawk em ni/ ani chuan Israel-hote kha a chawk buaiin, a do ngai em ni?

source: Then have no fear; you are of more value than a flock of sparrows.
target: Chuvangin, hlau suh u; chawngzawng tam tak aiin in hlu zawk a ni.

source: By his hand the north is stretched out in space, and the earth is hanging on nothing.
target: Hmun ruakah chuan hmâr a tipharh a, Lei chu engmah lovah a khai kang a.

source: Look closely
target: Hnai teah en rawh

source: He loves me
target: Aman mi hmangaih

source: I think you liked it.
target: I duh ka ti.

source: Stop humming
target: Thûm tawh suh

source: For this reason the children of Israel, even today, never take that muscle in the hollow of the leg as food, because the hollow of Jacob's leg was touched.
target: Chuvângin tûn thlengin Israela thlahte chuan malpui ruh chuktuaha khêl tha awm hi an ei ngai lo: Jakoba malpui ruh chuktuah chu a khel*tha lai taka a khawih avângin.

source: So Solomon made all these vessels, a very great store of them, and the weight of the brass used was not measured.
target: Chutiang chuan Solomonan bungbêl tam tak a siam a; dar chu bûk sen rual a ni lo.

source: He saw a physician
target: Damdawi thiam pakhat a hmu a

source: It would be a fire burning even to destruction, and taking away all my produce.
target: Ral der khawpa kangtu mei a ni bawk a, Ka sum neih zawng zawng pawh a khawrh fai vek dawn a ni.

source: You may not do any sort of work: this is an order for ever through all your generations wherever you may be living.
target: Eng hna mah in thawk tur a ni lo: hei hi in awmna apiangah in thlahte zel thlenga kumkhaw dan tur a ni.

source: How have you given teaching to him who has no wisdom, and fully made clear true knowledge!
target: Finna nei lo chu i han zilh fing a, Hriatna tha tak i sawi hnem teh e!

source: She's Alain's wife
target: Alain-a nupui a ni

source: Don't bother
target: Ngaihven suh

source: And being angry I made an oath, saying, They may not come into my rest.
target: Ka thinura ka chhechham ang khan Ka chawlhnaah chuan an lut lo vang,tiin.

source: I slept for the rest of the day.
target: Nilengin ka mu a.

source: I have a white cat.
target: Ui var ka nei a.

source: We're tidy
target: Kan felfai

source: I can't slow down.
target: Ka zawi thei lo.

source: They closed the shop
target: Dawr chu an khar a

source: Why bother
target: Tu unaupa nge

source: And the third took her; and in the same way, all the seven, without having any children, came to their end.
target: a pathumna chuan a rochung leh a; chutiang theuhvin pasarihte chu fa nei lovin an thi zel a.

source: Those who have no fear of God keep wrath stored up in their hearts; they give no cry for help when they are made prisoners.
target: Thinlunga Pathian zah lo mite chuan thinur an khawl a, Ama phuar an nih pawhin tanpui dilin an au lo.

source: As for the wheels, they were named in my hearing, the circling wheels.
target: A tawlailîr kete kha chu ka beng hriat ngeiah, tawlailîr ke vir' tih a ni.

source: And of this measure, let a space be measured, twenty-five thousand long and ten thousand wide: in it there will be the holy place, even the most holy.
target: Tin, hemi tehsa ațang hian a dung tawng sînghnih leh sângnga leh avâng tawng sîngkhat i teh chhuak ang a, chumiah chuan hmun thianghlim serh ber chu a awm tûr a ni.

source: I've been foolish
target: Ka lo â tawh a ni

source: And he would not: but went and put him into prison till he had made payment of the debt.
target: Nimahsela, a duh lo va; a bat chu a tlak hma loh zawng tan inah a va khung ta a.

source: I drank a lot
target: Ka in nasa

source: I wasn't writing anything.
target: Engmah ka ziak lo.

source: Or of the disease which takes men in the dark, or of the destruction which makes waste when the sun is high.
target: Thim hnuai ahri leng thin chu i hlau lo vang a, Chhun laia thil tichhe thin chhiatna chu i hlau hek lo vang.

source: I will send him against a nation of wrongdoers, and against the people of my wrath I will give him orders, to take their wealth in war, crushing them down like the dust in the streets.
target: Râllâk la tûr leh, thil laksak la tûr leh, kawtthlêr chirhdiak anga rap tûrin ani chu Pathian zah lo hnam do tûrin ka tir ang a, ka thinurna mite beit urin thu ka pe ang.

source: Did you find a partner?
target: Kawppui i hmu em?

source: The good man is gone from the earth, there is no one upright among men: they are all waiting secretly for blood, every man is going after his brother with a net.
target: Pathian ngaihsak mi chu lei ata a boral a, mihring zîngah mi dik tak rêng an awm lo: thisen chhuah tûrin an châng vek a; mitinin mahni unau chu lênin an veh a ni.

source: they don ' t sow
target: buh an tuh lo va

source: How unhappy am I! who will make me free from the body of this death?
target: Mi rethei ka va ni tehlul em! He thihna taksa lakah hian tuin nge mi chhan chhuak ang?

source: They're not standing
target: An ding reng lo

source: For the arrows of the Ruler of all are present with me, and their poison goes deep into my spirit: his army of fears is put in order against me.
target: Engkimtitheia thal ka chungah a awm si a, A tûr chu ka thlarauvin a in zo va; Pathian tihbaiawmna chuan mi ep a.

source: Help me up
target: Mi pui vat rawh

source: You give worship, but without knowledge of what you are worshipping: we give worship to what we have knowledge of: for salvation comes from the Jews.
target: Nangnin in hriat loh chibai in buk thin; keini zawngin kan hriata chu chibai kan buk thin. Chhanhimna Judate hnen ata a lo chhuak dawn si a.

source: For our salvation is by hope: but hope which is seen is not hope: for who is hoping for what he sees?
target: Chu khawngaihna belte chu Judate zing ata chauh ni lovin, Jentailte zing ata pawh kohte kan ni.

source: Before the Lord are the underworld and destruction: how much more, then, the hearts of the children of men!
target: Seol leh Abadon LALPA a hmu tlang a, Mihring thinlung chu a va hmu chiang dawn êm!

source: For you put up with the foolish gladly, being wise yourselves.
target: Nangni zawng le mi fing in nih avangin mi ate chu lungawi takin in dawh sithin a.

source: I'm well.
target: Ka tha.

source: Did you buy anything to eat?
target: Ei tur i lei em?

source: It's cool
target: A dai nuam

source: I got rich quickly.
target: Ka hausa vat a.

source: It was these who, moved by Balaam, were the cause of Israel's sin against the Lord in the question of Peor, because of which disease came on the people of the Lord.
target: Ngai teh u, Balaama remruat chuan Peor chungchang thu-ah Israela thlahte chu LALPA chunga bawhchhiatna tithlengtue chu heng hi an ni, LALPA mi pungkhawmho zingah chuan hri a lo len tak kha.

source: Did you check this?
target: Hei hi i check em?

source: And the twelve said to the Lord, Make our faith greater.
target: Tin, tirhkohte chuan Lalpa hnenah, Kan rin tiphui deuh vang che, an ti a.

source: Put the horn to your mouth. He comes like an eagle against the house of the Lord; because they have gone against my agreement, they have not kept my law.
target: Tawtawrâwt chu i hmuiah chuktuah rawh. Lalpa chhûngte chungah mupui angin a lo kal e, Ka thinlung an bawhchhiata, Ka dân an helsan avângin.

source: I took everything with me.
target: Engkim ka keng a.

source: For the son puts shame on his father, the daughter goes against her mother and the daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law; and a man's haters are those of his family.
target: Fapain pa hming a tichhia a, fanu chuan a nu a do va, movin a pi a do si a; mihring hmêlmate chu ama chhûngte ngei an ni.

source: And they were given baptism by him in the river Jordan, saying openly that they had done wrong.
target: an sualte thupha chawiin Jordan luiah chuan, ama hnenah baptisma an chang ta hlawm a.

source: He takes away his fear of danger and gives him support; and his eyes are on his ways.
target: Hlimna a siamsak a, tah chuan an chawl a, An kawngah chuan a mit a fu reng a.

source: You seem mad
target: I ât hmel

source: And what do you want
target: Tin eng nge i duh

source: It was as thick as a man's open hand, and was curved like the edge of a cup, like the flower of a lily: it would take two thousand baths.
target: tichuan kutphah bawka chhah a ni a; a tlâng chu lili pangpar ang, no tlâng anga siam ani a: bath sânghnih dawng a ni.

source: They lost it
target: An chaklo

source: So give us knowledge of the number of our days, that we may get a heart of wisdom.
target: Kan dam chhûng nite chhiar dan tûr min zirtir ang che, Finna thinlung kan neih phah hialna tûrin.

source: And I saw the holy town, new Jerusalem, coming down out of heaven from God, like a bride made beautiful for her husband.
target: Tin, khaw thianghlim Jerusalem thar chu, mo a pasal ela a inchei anga peih diamin Pathian hnena mi van ata lo chhuk ka hmu bawk a.

source: Let the earth be full of the fear of the Lord; let all the people of the world be in holy fear of him.
target: Leilung luah zawng zawng chuan LALPA chu tih sela: Khawvela awm zawng zawng chu amah hlauvin awm rawh se.

source: Cook the rice
target: Buhfai chhum rawh

source: I have taken your unchanging word as an eternal heritage; for it is the joy of my heart.
target: I thuhriattirte chu kumkhuaa rochunah ka la a; Ka thinlung tihlimtu a ni si a.

source: I couldn't stop myself from yawning.
target: Ka insum thei lo.

source: And the Pathrusim and the Casluhim and the Caphtorim (from whom came the Philistines.
target: Pathrusima te, Kasluhima te, chu mi lakah chuan Philistia-ho hi an lo chhuak a ni Kaphtorima te a hring a.

source: We saw you
target: Nangpawh kan hmu che

source: So get to work building your towns for your little ones, and safe places for your sheep; and do as you have said.
target: In fanaute tan khuate siam ula, in beramte tan pawh huangte siam ula, in sawi ang chuan ti rawh u, a ti a.

source: Give it another try.
target: Tih leh teh.

source: And the spirits of the prophets are controlled by the prophets;
target: Thu hriltute thlaraute chu thu hriltute thu thuin an awm a ni.

source: But it was all given to the workmen who were building up the house.
target: hnathawktute an pe thin a, LALPA in siamna chuan an hmang zâwk thin a ni.

source: Catch Tom.
target: Tom-a man rawh.

source: And when Moses' hand was stretched out, dark night came over all the land of Egypt for three days;
target: Tin, Mosia chuan a kut chu vân lamah an han lek a; tin, Aigupta ram chhûng zawng zawng chu ni thum chhûng zet a thim mup a;

source: Just don't kiss me.
target: Min fawp mai suh.

source: Then he said, May God's punishment come on me if Elisha, the son of Shaphat, keeps his head on his body after this day.
target: Tichuan ani chuan, vawiinah hian Saphata fapa Elisa hian a lu a la put na chuan pathianin a tih tihin mi ti mai sela, chu aia nasa pawhin, a ti a.

source: She is a friend of mine.
target: Ka thianpa a ni.

source: He is the unveiler of deep and secret things: he has knowledge of what is in the dark, and the light has its living-place with him.
target: Thil thûk leh thil inthupte a tilang a: Thima awm pawh a hria a, a hnênah chuan êng a chêng a.

source: John's answer was: I give baptism with water; but there is one among you of whom you have no knowledge;
target: Tin, Johanan an hnenah, Keiin tuiin ka baptis thin, in zingah mi pakhat in hriatloh a ding a ni.

source: It's dead.
target: A thi.

source: The glory of young men is their strength, and the honour of old men is their grey hairs.
target: Tlangvâlte ropuina chu an chakna a ni, Putarte mawina chu an lu tuak a ni,

source: An enormous number.
target: A tam hle mai.

source: Did you undergo such a number of things to no purpose? if it is in fact to no purpose.
target: Thil chuti zozai chu sawtpui lovin in tuar em ni? Sawtpui lo ni tak tak ta ang sela.

source: They're busy
target: An buai lûtuk

source: I'm sneezing all the time.
target: Ka hah reng reng.

source: I'm like Tom.
target: Toma ka duh.

source: Get some rest
target: Châwl rih rawh

source: I compliment her often.
target: Ka fak fo thin.

source: The bomb didn't detonate
target: Bomb chu a puak lo

source: But be glad that you are given a part in the pains of Christ; so that at the revelation of his glory you may have great joy.
target: Krista tuarnaahte tuarpuitute in nihzia ang zelin lawm zawk rawh u; chutichuan a ropuina a lo lan hunah chuan nangni pawh hlim takin in lawm thei ang.

source: And Nebo and Baal-meon, (their names being changed, and Sibmah: and they gave other names to the towns they made.
target: Nebo te, Baal-meon te, a hmingte hi tihdanglam tak a ni Sibma te an din a; an khaw siamte chu hming dang an vuah a.

source: And David said to Solomon, My son, it was my desire to put up a house for the name of the Lord my God.
target: Tin, Davidan a fapa Solomona hnênah chuan, LALPA ka Pathian hming atân hian in sak ka lo rilruk thin a.

source: If any man among you becomes unclean through anything which has taken place in the night, he is to go out from the tent-circle and keep outside it:
target: In zingah tupawh zana amaha thil chuak avanga bawlhhlawh an awm chuan, riahhmun ata a chhuak ang a, riahhmunah chuan a lut leh tur ani lo va;

source: And go nobly on in your power, because you are good and true and without pride; and your right hand will be teaching you things of fear.
target: Thutak leh thuhnuairawlhna leh felna avângin I mawina inbelin hmuingil takin skawr chunga chuangin kal zel ang che. Tichuan i kut ding lamin thil rapthlak takte a zirtir dawn che nia.

source: I feel giddy
target: Luhaithlak ka ti

source: Wake up, Tom.
target: Tom-a, harh rawh.

source: So that I may give my lovers wealth for their heritage, making their store-houses full.
target: Mi hmangaihtute chu sum ka rochuntir theih nân leh An ro bâwmte ka tihkhah theih nân.

source: He needed to rest.
target: Chawlh hahdam a ngai a ni.

source: I didn't exactly say yes.
target: Ka ti chiah lo.

source: I felt tired
target: Ka chau hle

source: I am Chinese
target: Chinese ka nia

source: And from the half given to the children of Israel, which Moses had kept separate from that given to the fighting-men,
target: Tin, Mosian ral kap mite an chanvo a pêk zawh a, Israelho chanvo chu,

source: And he saw a certain poor widow putting in a farthing.
target: Tin, hmeithai rethei te tu emaw dar tangka dere pahnih rawn thlak a hmu bawk a.

source: What do you want them for
target: Eng atan nge i duh

source: Let not him who takes food have a low opinion of him who does not: and let not him who does not take food be a judge of him who does; for he has God's approval.
target: Engkim ei mi chuan a ei lo mi hmusit suh se; ei lo mi pawhin a ei mi chu sawisel suh se; Pathianin ani chu a lawm tawh alawm.

source: I was OK
target: Ka that kha

source: Hey, ease up
target: Hei, hahdam rawh

source: Nobody watches her
target: Tuman an en lo

source: Even the prophets of Israel who say words to Jerusalem, who see visions of peace for her when there is no peace, says the Lord.
target: Chu chu Israel zawl nei Jerusalem chung thu sawia, muanna awm si lova muanna hmuhsaktute ngei kha, an awm ta lo, tih hi LALPA PATHIAN thu chhuak a ni.

source: Don't get left behind.
target: Hnuaiah awm suh.

source: I'm not particular
target: Ka particular lo

source: The sun was shining.
target: Ni chu a êng a.

source: Israel is a branching vine, full of fruit; as his fruit is increased, so the number of his altars is increased; as the land is fair, so they have made fair pillars.
target: Israel chu grêp hrui duah tak, rah ngah tak a ni a: A rah tam hu ang zêlin a maichâm te a tipung a; A ram țhatzia ang zêlin lungserhphun țha tak a siam a.

source: If her father will not give her to him on any account, he will have to give the regular payment for virgins.
target: A pain a neihtîr phal lul loh chuan nula man zah sum chu a pe rêng rêng tûr a ni.

source: They parted company
target: An inthen ta a ni

source: But controlling himself, he went to his house; and he sent for his friends and Zeresh, his wife.
target: amaherawhchu Hamana chu a insum hram hram a, a haw ta a; a thiante leh a nupui Zeresi chu a kohtir a.

source: How curious!
target: A dil chhut!

source: A whip for the horse, a mouth-bit for the ass, and a rod for the back of the foolish.
target: Vuakna hrui chu sakawr tan a ni a, thirbarh chu sabengtung tan a ni a, Tiang chu mi â hnungzang tan a ni.

source: But if punishment does come, it is sent by the Lord, so that we may be safe when the world is judged.
target: Nimahsela, rorelsaka kan awm pawhin, khawvel nena thiam loh changa kan awm ve loh nan, Lalpa thununin kan awm thin a ni.

source: It was clear to Esau that his father had no love for the women of Canaan,
target: tichuan Esauva chuan Kanaan ram nulate chuan a pa Isaaka lung an tiawi lo tih a hre ta a;

source: You were a good mother
target: Nu tha tak i ni a

source: So David made selection of the disease; and the time was the days of the grain-cutting, when the disease came among the people, causing the death of seventy thousand men from Dan as far as Beer-sheba.
target: Chutichuan LALPA chuan Israel mite chungah chuan zing atangin hun ruat ang thleng chuan hri alentir a; tichuan mipui zinga mi chu Dan atangin Beer-seba thlengin mi singsarih an thi a.

source: They did not put an end to the peoples, as the Lord had said;
target: LALPAN an hnêna tihboral thu a pêk angin Mipuihote ch an tiboral lo va.

source: In this we see what love is, because he gave his life for us; and it is right for us to give our lives for the brothers.
target: He miah hian hmangaihna engnge a nih kan hria, amah chuan kan tan a nunna a pek tak avangin; keini pawhin unaute tan kan nunna kan pe ve tur a ni.

source: Kiss me
target: Mi fawp rawh

source: Put forward your cause, says the Lord; let your strong argument come out, says the King of Jacob.
target: In thu chu rawn sawi rawh u, LALPAN a ti; pathian in intihna chhan berte chu lantir rawh u, Jakob-ho Lalin a ti.

source: Sudden is the downfall of Babylon and her destruction: make cries of grief for her; take sweet oil for her pain, if it is possible for her to be made well.
target: Babulon chu a tlu thut a, a boral ta. Amah chu tah vâk vâk rawh u, Tihdam theih awm anih chuan Thinghnai damdawi hnawih mi laksak rawh u.

source: You are threshing wheat.
target: Buhfai i buh a ni.

source: I burned it
target: Ka hal tawh

source: Ask anybody
target: Tupawh zâwt rawh

source: But trouble is man's fate from birth, as the flames go up from the fire.
target: Buai tûrin mihring a lo piang ani zawk, Meisi chung lamah a chho angin.

source: But when one who is stronger makes an attack on him and overcomes him, he takes away his instruments of war, in which he had put his faith, and makes division of his goods.
target: nimahsela a aia chak zawkin a rawn bei a, a hneh hun chuan a inrinna ralthuam famkim chu a chhuhsak a, a sum a laksak chu a sem darh thin.

source: The way of the evil-doer is disgusting to the Lord, but he who goes after righteousness is dear to him.
target: Mi suaksual kawng chu LALPA tnaa tenawm ani a, Felna kawng zawhtu erawh chu a hmangaih thin.

source: The resting-place of the sinner will come to destruction, but the root of upright men is for ever.
target: Mi suaksualte chuan mi tha lote len an duh a, Mi felte bul erawh chuan rah an chhuah thin.

source: When the Most High put the kings to flight, it was as white as snow in Salmon.
target: Engkimtitheian chutah chuan lalte a tihdarh lai chu, Zalmon tlânga vu sur lai ang a ni.

source: Did you request this?
target: Hei hi i dil em?

source: What do I do next
target: Engtin nge ka tih leh ang

source: He has taken my brothers far away from me; they have seen my fate and have become strange to me.
target: Ka unaute ka lakah a tihla a, Ka hmêl hriatte ka lakah an mi hrang zo va.

source: I called you.
target: Ka ko che.

source: Even the young men will become feeble and tired, and the best of them will come to the end of his strength;
target: Tleirawlte meuh pawh an chauvin an hah ang a, tlangvâlte pawh an tlu der ang:

source: Did you smile?
target: I nui em kha?

source: It's white
target: A var a nia

source: After I had said what was in my mind, they were quiet and let my words go deep into their hearts;
target: Ka sawi zawhah an tawng ve tawh ngai lo; Ka thusawi chu an chungah a tla.

source: They can't afford it
target: An phur thei lo

source: So that you may not take them as your example and do all the disgusting things which they do in the worship of their gods, so sinning against the Lord your God.
target: an pathiante chunga an tih thin thil tenawm zawng zawngte chu an zirtir lohna tur che uin, chutilochuan LALPA in Pathian chungah thil in tisual dah ang e.

source: And in this, I do my best at all times to have no reason for shame before God or men.
target: chu mi avang chuan Pathian hnen lamah leh mihring hnenah pawh rilru sual lo mawlh hi vawn fo ka tum thin.

source: It's pretty stiff.
target: A stiff khawp mai.

source: I'll do so immediately.
target: Ka ti nghal ang.

source: And the stone floor was by the side of the doorways, and was as wide as the doorways were long, even the lower floor.
target: Tin, lungrem chu kanwgka in ațanga rem a ni a, kawngka in chen bawk tûra rem a ni a, chu chu lungrem hnuaihnung zâwk a ni.

source: Truly, because they had no faith they were broken off, and you have your place by reason of your faith. Do not be lifted up in pride, but have fear;
target: A ni, an rin lohna avangin tihtliahin an awm a, nang I rinna avangin I ding a ni. Chapo suh la, hlau zawk rawh;

source: I disagreed
target: Ka pawm lo

source: But he who does evil to me, does wrong to his soul: all my haters are in love with death.
target: Amaherawhchu ka chunga sual apiang chuan ama nunna a tikhawlo a ni.

source: Do you plan to rent a car?
target: Car rent i tum em?

source: Making people laugh.
target: Mi nuihzat tir.

source: Tom saw Mary
target: Toma'n Mary a hmu tawh

source: I knew you were there.
target: I awm tih ka hria.

source: I let him go.
target: Amah ka luh tir.

source: Is Tom ill?
target: Tom a damlo a mi?

source: It has a melody.
target: Hla thluk a nei a.

source: And if anyone's name was not in the book of life, he went down into the sea of fire.
target: Tu hming pawh Nunna Bua ziak an hmuh loh chuan mei dilah an paih bawk a.

source: I listened
target: Ka ngaithla e

source: Little by little I will send them away before you, till your numbers are increased and you take up your heritage in the land.
target: I lo puna ram chu I luah khah hma chuan zawi zawiin ka hnawhchhuahsak hret hret zâwk ang che.

source: And the sons of Gomer: Ashkenaz and Riphath and Togarmah.
target: Tin, Gomera fapate chu Askenaza te, Riphatha te, Togarma te an ni a.

source: O you sons of men, how long will you go on turning my glory into shame? how long will you give your love to foolish things, going after what is false? (Selah.
target: Aw mihring fate u, ka ropuina hi eng chen nge mualphonaa in chantir dawn?: Eng chen nge thil engmah lo hi in ngainat ang a, dawt thu in zawn dawn? Selah

source: Was that Tom
target: Toma a ni em

source: They were fearless
target: Hlauh nei lo an ni

source: Let him go
target: Khapa kha kaltir rawh

source: You were saying
target: I ti a

source: My brothers, take care that there is not by chance in any one of you an evil heart without belief, turning away from the living God:
target: Unaute u, fimkhur rawh u, chutilochuan Pathian nung chu bansan turin in zingah tu chhungah pawh rin lohna thinlung sual a lo awm dah ang e.

source: As those who are free, not using your free position as a cover for wrongdoing, but living as the servants of God;
target: zalen in ni a, nimahsela in zalenna chu sual khuh nan hmang lovin, Pathian bawiha awm nan hmang zawk rawh u.

source: And this suggestion seemed good to the king and the captains; and the king did as Memucan said;
target: Chu thu chuan lal leh mi liante chu a tilawm hle a; tichuan lal chuan Memukana thu ang chuan a ti a;

source: See above.
target: A chung en rawh.

source: She's a superstar
target: Superstar a ni a

source: And this again is a great evil, that in all points as he came so will he go; and what profit has he in working for the wind?
target: Hei pawh hi thil tha lo tak mai a ni, a lo kal lam ang chiah bawka a kal leh tûr hi: boruak atân maia a thawhrim hi eng nge a hlawkna?

source: Having then a great high priest, who has made his way through the heavens, even Jesus the Son of God, let us be strong in our faith.
target: Tichuan, vanahte kal tlang tawh Puithiam Lalber ropui tak, Isua, Pathian Fapa chu kan neih avangin kan thurin hi i pawm tlat ang u.

source: She never existed
target: A awm ngai lo

source: And take no thought for your goods, for the best of all the land of Egypt is yours.
target: In bungrua pawh ngaihtuah duh suh u, Aigupta ram zawng zawnga thil țha apiang hi in ta a ni si a, a ti a.

source: Does Mary love me
target: Mari hian min hmangaih em

source: I regret it
target: Ka inchhiar a ni

source: I have enough time.
target: Hun ka nei tawk.

source: They will find them
target: An hmu ngei ang

source: No one is at fault.
target: Tumah an sual lo.

source: I don't want to bore you
target: Bore ka duh lo che

source: For this reason I have said to the children of Israel, No man among you, or any others living with you, may take blood as food.
target: Chuvang chuan Israela thlahte hnenah, tumahin thisen in ei tur a ni lo va, ram dang mi in zinga khawsate pawhin thisen an ei tur a ni hek lo, ka ti a ni.

source: He barli tehkhawng ruk hi min pe a, 'I pi hnênah chuan kutbengin haw hauh suh ang che,' min ti a ni, a ti a.
target: And she said, He gave me these six measures of grain, saying, Do not go back to your mother-in-law with nothing in your hands.

source: And the Egyptians were cruel to us, crushing us under a hard yoke:
target: tin, Aigupta mite chuan min tinawmnah a, min tirethei a, hna hautak tak min thawhtir a;

source: I'm cool
target: Ka inbengdai thei

source: Why does he give light to him who is in trouble, and life to the bitter in soul;
target: Engah nge hreawm tuar hnênah eng pêk a nih a, Engah nge rilrua mangang hnênah nunna pêk a nih?

source: For the Lord is angry with all the nations, and his wrath is burning against all their armies: he has put them to the curse, he has given them to destruction.
target: LALPA chuan hnam tinreng chungah chuan lungnih lohna a neiin, an sipaiho zawng zawng chungah chuan thinrimna a nei si a: anni chu a tiboral vek a, thahah a pe ta a.

source: He wished himself dead.
target: Thih a duhsak a.

source: And so that my hands may be stretched out to you; and I will give thought to your rules.
target: I thupêk, ka ngaihnat lamahte chuan ka kutte ka phar ang a; I thuruatte chu ka ngaihtuah ang. ZAIN

source: I wasn't deceived
target: Bum ka ni lo

source: Tom is taking a look at it
target: Tom chuan a en a

source: And to make clear the wealth of his glory to vessels of mercy, which he had before made ready for glory,
target: a hriat lawkate chu ama Fapa ang taka awm turin a ruat lawk si a, a Fapa chu unau tam takte zinga fa tir a lo nih theih nan.

source: For this cause, brothers, in all our trouble and grief we were comforted about you because of your faith;
target: chu mi avang chuan unaute u, kan manganna leh hrehawmna zawng zawngah, in rinna avangin in chungah thlamuang takin kan awm ta.

source: He will wash dishes.
target: Buhfai a sil ang.

source: I'm very ashamed of it.
target: Ka zak hle mai.

source: Who is Tom?
target: Tom chu tunge?

source: They've never been dived.
target: An dive ngai lo.

source: My stomach is like wine which is unable to get out; like skins full of new wine, it is almost burst.
target: Ngai rawh u, ka thinlung hi uain hu chhuahna nei lo ang a ni a, Uain peng thar angin a puak dawn tep a ni.

source: I still care
target: Ka la ngaina

source: Can I do it today?
target: Vawiin hian ka ti thei ang em?

source: I am disconsolate
target: Ka thlamuanthlak hle mai

source: That has to stop.
target: Chu chu tihtawp a ngai a ni.

source: You're very good
target: I ṭha khawp mai

source: The hope of the upright man will give joy, but the waiting of the evil-doer will have its end in sorrow.
target: Mi fel nghahfak chu lawmna a ni ang a, Mi suaksual hmachhuan erawh chu a boral ang.

source: I have three of them.
target: Pathum ka nei a.

source: And all the townsmen of Shechem and all Beth-millo came together and went and made Abimelech their king, by the oak of the pillar in Shechem.
target: Tin, Sekem khuaa mi zawng zawng leh Beth-milo a mi zawng zawng chu an pung khawm a, tichuan Abimeleka chu Sekem khuaa lungphun bul sasaw kiangah chuan lalah an siam ta a.

source: Says the Lord, who has made these things clear from the earliest times.
target: Khawvel siam tirh ata heng thu hriattir thintu Lalpa chuan a ti e, tih ziak hi.

source: I am divorced
target: Kan inṭhen tawh

source: I don't blame anybody else.
target: Midang ka dem lo.

source: And the men of Beth-shemesh said, Who is able to keep his place before the Lord, this holy God? and to whom may he go from us?
target: Beth-semes khuaa mite chuan, He Pathian thianghlim LALPA maa hian tunge ding thei ang a, kan nen ata hi tu hnêna nge a kal chhoh tak ang le? an ti a.

source: Do you like tea
target: Thingpui i in duh em

source: There was no pain
target: Natna a awm lo

source: And again another verse says, They will see him who was wounded by their spears.
target: Tin, Pathian Lehkha Thu dangin, An chhuna chu an la en ang, a ti bawk a.

source: Crushing the head of the poor, and turning the steps of the gentle out of the way: and a man and his father go in to the same young woman, putting shame on my holy name:
