target: mi retheite lu chunga vaivut takngial pawh an ît a, pachhiate an rûksak a, pa leh a fapa chuan nula pakhat an zen țawm a, ka hming thianghlim an tibawlhhlawh a ni.

source: Are you making something to eat?
target: Ei tur i siam em?

source: I got it free
target: A thlawnin ka dawng

source: Then was the Lord like one awaking from sleep, and like a strong man crying out because of wine.
target: Chutih lai chuan LALPA chu, mi an muhil an harh angin, a harh ta a, Mi chak uain vanga au ang hian.

source: See how those who are against me are increased, for bitter is their hate of me.
target: Mi dotute chu ngaihtuah teh, tam tak an ni a; Nasa takin mi haw si a.

source: You have said, It is no use worshipping God: what profit have we had from keeping his orders, and going in clothing of sorrow before the Lord of armies?
target: Pathian rawngbawl hi a thlâwn a ni: A thuchah kan zawm leh Sipaihote LALPA hmâa intilunghnûr taka kan lêng țhîn hi sawtna eng nge awm?

source: They haven't won yet
target: An la chak lo

source: But in the future the Son of man will be seated at the right hand of the power of God.
target: Nimahsela tun achinah chuan Mihring Fapa hi Pathian thiltihtheihna ding lamah a thu tawh ang, a ti a.

source: You couldn't be reached.
target: I thleng thei lo.

source: Don't try to deceive us.
target: Min bum tum suh.

source: I've already tried.
target: Ka lo tum tawh a.

source: There's no need to panic yet.
target: Panic a ngai lo.

source: You are pushing matters.
target: Thil i nawr a ni.

source: The first store of things was put down in the third month, and in the seventh month the masses were complete.
target: Thla thumnaah an dah khâwm tan a, thla sarihnaa an dah khâwm zo va.

source: And the heaven was taken away like the roll of a book when it is rolled up; and all the mountains and islands were moved out of their places.
target: Tin, van chu lehkhabu zial mi ziala a bo angin a bo ta a; tin, tlang leh thliarkar tinreng chu an awmna ata sawnin an awm ta hlawm a.

source: And it is no wonder; for even Satan himself is able to take the form of an angel of light.
target: Chu chu a mak lo ve;Setana meuh pawh eng tirhkohvah a insiam chawp si thin a.

source: There was not a breath of air.
target: Thâwk a awm lo.

source: Yes, by my hand was the earth placed on its base, and by my right hand the heavens were stretched out; at my word they take up their places.
target: A ni, ka kut hian leilung nghahchhan chu a phûm a, ka kut ding lam hian vante khi a kai pharh a: ka koh veleh an ding ho țhin.

source: Will you do works of wonder for the dead? will the shades come back to give you praise? (Selah.
target: Mitthite tan chuan thilmak i ti dawn êm ni? Thi tawhte chuan thovin an fak dawn che êm ni? Selah

source: But if she is clean she will be free and will have offspring.
target: Amaherawhchu hmeichhia chu a bawlhhlawh loh va, a thianghlim chuan a fihlim ang a, nau pai thei zel a ni ang.

source: They don't compromise.
target: An inrem lo.

source: But they were not able to get the better of him, for his words were full of wisdom and of the Spirit.
target: Nimahsela a finna leh a sawipuitu Thlarau chu an letthla thei ta lo va.

source: They are higher than heaven; what is there for you to do? deeper than the underworld, and outside your knowledge;
target: Van aia sâng a ni a, nangin eng nge i tih theih? Seol aia thuk a ni, nangin eng nge i hriat theih?

source: And the sound of the wings of the winged ones was clear even in the outer square, like the voice of the Ruler of all.
target: Tin, cherub-ho thlazâp ri te chu hung chhûng pawnta zâwkah te pawh chuan Pathian engkimtitheian mi a biak laia a aw ang maiin a hriat a.

source: The thirteenth Shubael, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi sâwm leh vawi thumna chu Subaela chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: I'll go check on them.
target: Ka va check ang.

source: Do you dance?
target: I lam thei em?

source: They're unemployed
target: Hna nei lo an ni

source: Only may the Lord give you wisdom, and knowledge of his orders for Israel, so that you may keep the law of the Lord your God.
target: LALPAN finna leh hriatna te neihtir pahwt che sela, Israelte chunga thuneihna pe che rawh se; tichuan LALPA i Pathian dan chu i zawm thei dâwn nia.

source: And the silver given by those who were numbered of the people was a hundred talents, and a thousand, seven hundred and seventy-five shekels in weight, by the scale of the holy place.
target: Tin, mipui chhiar tawhte zinga tel apiangte tangka pêk chu talent za leh, hmun thianghlima sekel an pêk thin anga chhiar chuan sekel sangkhat leh zasarih leh sawmsarih leh panga a ni:

source: We are just friends.
target: Thian mai kan ni.

source: Are you competitive
target: Inelna i nei em

source: We're not buying it.
target: Kan lei lo a ni.

source: I've kept it
target: Ka dah e

source: Egypt will be a waste and Edom a land of destruction, because of the evil done to the children of Judah, because they have let blood be drained out in their land without cause.
target: Juda fate chunga râwng taka tia an ramah mi thiam thisen an chhuah avângin, Aigupta ram chu a ram ang a, Edom ram chu thlaler ram ro a ni ang.

source: And we have seen and had faith in the love which God has for us. God is love, and everyone who has love is in God, and God is in him.
target: Pathianin keimahnia hmangaihna a neih chu kan hria a, kan ring bawk a ni. Pathian chu hmangaihna a ni; hmangaihnaa awm reng chu Pathianah a awm reng a, Pathian pawh amahah a awm reng a ni.

source: There is no tomorrow
target: Naktuk a awm lo

source: And his love to you is the more increased by his memory of you all, how you gave way to his authority, and how you took him to your hearts with fear and honour.
target: Tin, in zaa a thu in awihzia te, hlau leh khur chunga amah in lawmzia te chu hre rengin, a thinlung chu nangmahni lamah a cheng nasa lehzual ta a ni.

source: Are you embarrassed
target: I zak em

source: Till the evening comes, and the sky slowly becomes dark, I will go to the mountain of myrrh, and to the hill of frankincense.
target: Ni a nem a, hlim a her bo hma loh chuan Ka kal nang e, murr talng leh Beraw mual lamah chuanin.

source: Dodal ka tum a
target: I tried to resist

source: I wasn't wearing a uniform.
target: Uniform ka ha lo.

source: I like music
target: Rimawi ka duh

source: Amah hi man rawh.
target: Catch him.

source: He let me go
target: Mi kaltir alâwm

source: My voice came to you; let not your ear be shut to my breathing, to my cry.
target: Ka aw chu nangin i hria a, ka thawk laa ka au thawmah i beng hup suh ang che.

source: For how may I go back to my father without the boy, and see the evil which will come on my father?
target: Taitea ka hnêna tel lovin ka pa hnênah engtin nge ka chhoh theih ang? Ka pa chunga chhiatna thleng tûr chu ka hmu ang asin, a ti a.

source: And make us free of our debts, as we have made those free who are in debt to us.
target: Kan batte hi min ngaidam ang che. Keini pawhin kan englo bate kan ngaihdam tak ang khan.

source: I smelled it.
target: Ka hnim fuh.

source: The house of the man of pride will be uprooted by the Lord, but he will make safe the heritage of the widow.
target: LALPAN mi chapo in chu a kar phawng ang a, Hmeithai hmun erawh chu a tinghet ang.

source: And again Bilhah, Rachel's servant, was with child, and gave birth to a second son.
target: Tin, Rakili bâwihnu Bilhaii chu a rai leh a, Jakoba chu fapa dang a hrinsak leh a.

source: Don't wish anyone evil!
target: Tumah duhsak suh!

source: Not enough examples.
target: Entirna tling lo.

source: The car caught fire.
target: Car chu a kang a.

source: For as in a thunderstorm the bright light is seen from one end of the sky to the other, so will the Son of man be when his time comes.
target: van hnuai lehlama kawl a pheta van hnuai lehlam thlenga a eng thin ang hian, Mihring Fapa hi a lo kal niin a awm dawn si a.

source: You have made me free from the fightings of the people; you have made me the head of the nations: a people of whom I had no knowledge will be my servants.
target: Nangin mite insualna lakahte chuan mi chhanhim a; Hnam tin lu-ah mi siam a: Ka hriat ngai loh mite chuan ka rawng an bâwl tawh ang.

source: For this cause I Paul, the prisoner of Christ Jesus for you Gentiles,
target: Chuvang chuan kei Paula, nangni Jentailte avanga Krista Isua mi tang hian –

source: I'm not pressed for money.
target: Sum ka press lo.

source: They're late
target: An rawn tlai

source: Go, send up your cry for help to the gods of your selection; let them be your saviours in the time of your trouble.
target: In thlann pathiante chu au ta che u: anni chuan in mangan hunah chuan chhan chhuak che u ang hmiang, a ti a.

source: To Obed-edom, that on the south; and to his sons, the store-house.
target: Chhim lam chu Obed-edoma pualah; tin, thil dahkhawmna in chu a fapate pualah.

source: Is this blessing, then, for the circumcision only, or in the same way for those who have not circumcision? for we say that the faith of Abraham was put to his account as righteousness.
target: A nih leh, chu mi engthawlna chu serhtanho chungah chauh nge a awm, serhtan lohho chungah pawh? Abrahama rinna chu a felnaa ruat a ni, kan ti si a.

source: We all cried
target: Kan ṭap vek

source: He likes me
target: Aman kei mi duh

source: Which train are you catching?
target: Eng rel nge i man?

source: And I will be present among you and will be your God and you will be my people.
target: In zingah ka cheng ang a, in Pathian ka ni ang a, tin, nangni pawh ka mite in ni ang.

source: How long will you go on turning this way and that, O wandering daughter? for the Lord has made a new thing on the earth, a woman changed into a man.
target: Aw, nang fanu lepchhiah, Eng chen nge i vah rawlai dawn le? LALPA chuan leiah hian thil țhar a siam tak hi, hmeichhiain mipa a hum ta zawk.

source: Wealth makes a great number of friends; but the poor man is parted from his friend.
target: Sumin thian tam tak a neih belhtir a, Mi rethei erawh chu thianten an thlauthla ang.

source: He didn't kiss me
target: Min fawp lo

source: So the armed men gave up the prisoners and the goods they had taken to the heads and the meeting of the people.
target: Chutichuan sipaite chuan mi liante leh mipi hmaah chuan salte leh râllâk sumte chu an hnutchhiah ta a.

source: But let them be those of the unseen man of the heart, the ever-shining ornament of a gentle and quiet spirit, which is of great price in the eyes of God.
target: thinlunga mihring thuruk chu, rilru thuhnuairawlh leh nunnem, silhfen chhe thei lova inthuam ni zawk rawh se, chu chu Pathian mithmuhin a hlu em em a ni.

source: He visited Boston
target: Boston a tlawh a

source: I didn't dare to look.
target: Ka en ngam lo.

source: They give drink to every beast of the field; the mountain asses come to them for water.
target: Chungte chuan ram sa tinrengte in tûr a pe thin a; Ram sabengtungte chuan an tuihal an tireh thin.

source: After the death of Ahab, Moab made itself free from the authority of Israel.
target: Tin, Ahaba thih hnuin Moab-ho chu Israel-te chungah an hel a.

source: That was mentioned
target: Chu chu sawi a ni

source: But the fat and the kidneys and the fat on the liver of the sin-offering were burned by him on the altar as the Lord gave orders to Moses.
target: sual thawina thau te, a kal te, a thin tuamtu râng te erawh chu maichâm chungah a hal a, LALPAN Mosia thu a pêk ang kha.

source: I will take away everything from the face of the earth, says the Lord.
target: Lei chung ata thil zawng zawng ka tiral vek ang, tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: I'm no rebel
target: Hel ka ni lo

source: The dog was kicked by me.
target: Ui chu ka kik a.

source: Have no fear of sudden danger, or of the storm which will come on evil-doers:
target: Hlauhna lo awm thutte chu hlau suh la, Mi suaksualte chunga tiauna a lo thlenin hlau hek suh.

source: I want them fired
target: Bawh chhuah ka duh a ni

source: For Moses said, The Lord will give you a prophet from among your people, like me; you will give ear to everything which he will say to you.
target: Mosia ngeiin, ‘Lal Pathianin keimah mi siam ang hian in unaute zingah zawlnei pakhat a siamsak ang che u; ani chuan thu zawng zawng in hnena a sawi apiang chu in ngaihthlaksak ang;

source: And now your purpose is to keep the children of Judah and Jerusalem as men-servants and women-servants under your yoke: but are there no sins against the Lord your God to be seen among yourselves?
target: Tin, Juda le Jerusalem mite chu bawihnu le bawihpaa siam in tum a: nimahsela nangni ngei pawh hian LALPA in Pathian chungah in tisual ve a ni lâwm ni?

source: They all cried out together
target: An au dun vek a

source: Be not a cause of fear to me: you are my safe place in the day of evil.
target: Ka tan țihbaiawm ni suh ang che, Mangan nia ka inhumhimna i ni.

source: Will you drink a wine?
target: Zu i in duh em?

source: You were being threatened.
target: Vau i ni a.

source: She has lost face.
target: Hmel a hloh tawh.

source: But the righteousness which is of faith says these words, Say not in your heart, Who will go up to heaven? (that is, to make Christ come down:
target: Rinnaa felna erawh chuan heti hian a sawi: In rilruin, ‘Tunge vanah lawn ang?’ emaw chu chu chung lam ata Krista hruai chhuk tur tihna a ni;

source: They just woke up
target: An harh mai mai a

source: In the Lord will all the seed of Israel get their rights, and they will give glory to him.
target: Israela thlahte zawng zawng chu LALPA-ah chuan a ni, thiam chantira an awm a, LALPA chu an chhuan dawn ni, tiin.

source: She was depressed
target: A lungngai hle mai

source: And Saul came to the town of Amalek, and took up his position in the valley secretly.
target: Tin, Saula chuan Amalek-ho khua chu a zuk thleng a, ruamah chuan a lo lam bun a.

source: I live alone
target: Keimahin ka awm

source: We can go.
target: Kan kal thei.

source: And they got ready the things for Joseph before he came in the middle of the day: for word was given to them that they were to have a meal there.
target: Tin, an lâwmman ken chu Josefa, chawfâka a lo kal hmain an lo buatsaih lâwk a: chutah chuan chaw an ei dâwn tih an hre si a.

source: Faith comes up from the earth like a plant; righteousness is looking down from heaven.
target: Thutak chu lei atangin a chawr chhuak a; Felna chuan van atangin a rawn en chhuk ta a.

source: In my trouble I was crying to the Lord, and he gave me an answer; out of the deepest underworld I sent up a cry, and you gave ear to my voice.
target: Heti hian a ti a; Ka hreawmna avângin LALPA chu ka ko va, Annin mi chhang a; Seol kawchhûng ațangin ka au va, Nangin ka aw i hria a.

source: Don't blame me, Tom.
target: Min dem suh, Tom.

source: Wrap him up tight
target: Amah chu nghet takin khuh rawh

source: I stayed
target: Ka awm tawh

source: And he had knowledge, through the Holy Spirit, that he would not see death till he had seen the Lord's Christ.
target: Tin, Lalpa Krista chu a hmuh hma loh chuan a thi lo vang tih Thlarau Thianghlimin a lo hriattir tawh reng a.

source: You could help us
target: Min pui thei ang

source: For see, I have made you small among the nations, looked down on by men.
target: Ngai rawh, hnamte zingah ka tite ta si chia, Mihringe hmuhsitin.

source: Yes, she is.
target: Aw, ni e.

source: I tried that
target: Ka tichhin tawh

source: I enjoyed myself very much.
target: Ka hlim em em a.

source: I saw to it.
target: Ka hmu ngei a ni.

source: It happened because of your fault!
target: I sual vang a ni!

source: Where are the gods of Hamath and of Arpad? where are the gods of Sepharvaim? where are the gods of Samaria? and have they kept Samaria out of my hand?
target: Hamath leh Arpad-ho pathiante kha khawiah nge an awm tak? Sepharvaim-ho pathiante kha khawiahnge an awm tak? Samari khua kha ka lakah an chhanhim ta êm ni?

source: Do you want to trade jobs
target: Hna hralh i duh em

source: They gave me a piece of advice.
target: Thurawn min pe a.

source: And Gederoth, Beth-dagon, and Naamah, and Makkedah; sixteen towns with their unwalled places.
target: Gederot te, Beth-dagon te, Naama te, Makeda te; khawpuite chu a khawperte nen khaw sâwm leh khwa ruk a ni.

source: And with him they sent ten chiefs, one for every tribe of the children of Israel, every one of them the head of his house among the families of Israel.
target: a hnenah mi lian sawm, Israel-ho hnam zinga chhûngkaw puipa ber pakhat zel nen; chungte chu Israel-ho hnam zinga an chhûngkaw puipa ber zelte an ni.

source: The Lord makes open the eyes of the blind; the Lord is the lifter up of those who are bent down; the Lord is a lover of the upright;
target: LALPA chuan mitdelte mit a tizvar thin a; LALPA chuan kun ngawih ngawihte chu a kai tho thin a; LALPA chuan mi felte chu a hmangaih thin a;

source: And the man got up to go away, but his father-in-law would not let him go, so he took his rest there again for the night.
target: Tin, chu mi chu chhuah tumin a han tho va, nimahsela a pu chuan a thlem chiam a, tichuan a riak leh ta a.

source: We're not criminals
target: Misual kan ni lo

source: Who's ill?
target: Tunge dam lo?

source: Let's see
target: Va en ang

source: All the people of the sea-lands are overcome with wonder at you, and their kings are full of fear, their faces are troubled.
target: Tuikam mi zawg zawngin râpthlak an ti che, An lalte lah hlauvin an thlabar, A sak-hmêl pawh a dang zo ve.

source: That wasn't smart.
target: Chu chu a fing lo.

source: But you, O mountains of Israel, will put out your branches and give your fruit to my people Israel; for they are ready to come.
target: Nangni erawh chuan, Aw Israel tlangte u, zar in chhuah ang a, ka mi Israelte tan rah in chhuah ang; an lo kal mai dawn si a.

source: But if you have bitter envy in your heart and the desire to get the better of others, have no pride in this, talking falsely against what is true.
target: Nimahsela in thinlungah itsikna nasa tak leh inelna in neih chuan, thu dik uan khum suh ula, thu dik dodalin dawt sawi hek suh u.

source: Who made the rock into a water-spring, and the hard stone into a fountain.
target: Ani chuan lungpui chu dilah a chantir a, Meilung tuihnaah a chantir bawk a.

source: You're very timid
target: I zakzum hle mai

source: Stop pushing
target: Mi nêk tawh suh

source: They are outsiders
target: Pawn lam mi an ni

source: Then he gave a kiss to all his brothers, weeping over them; and after that his brothers had no fear of talking to him.
target: Tin, a unaute zawng zawng chu a fâwp a, a țah khum ta țheuh va: chu mi hnu-ah chuan a unaute chuan thukhawchâng an sawipui ta a.

source: And Ahab made an image of Asherah and did more than all the kings of Israel before him to make the Lord, the God of Israel, angry.
target: Tin, Ahaba chuan Aseri a siam a; a hmaa Israel lalte zawng zawng aiin Ahaba chuan LALPA, Israelte Pathian tihthinrimna thil a ti nasa bik a ni.

source: He who has clean hands and a true heart; whose desire has not gone out to foolish things, who has not taken a false oath.
target: Kut fai leh thinlung thianghlim nei a, A rilru engmah lo mai mai lama dah ngai lo va, Bum tuma chhechham ngai lo mi chu.

source: I got robbed
target: Rawk ka ni

source: And Eleazar, Aaron's son, took as his wife one of the daughters of Putiel; and she gave birth to Phinehas. These are the heads of the families of the Levites, in the order of their families.
target: Tin, Arona fapa Eleazara chuan Putiela fanute zînga mi pakhat chu nupuiah a nei a; tin, Phinehasa a hrinsak a. Tin, hêngte hi an hnam ang zêla Levia thlah bulpui berte chu an ni.

source: I was sitting there.
target: Ka thu a.

source: Then Pilate went back into the Praetorium and sent for Jesus and said to him, Are you the King of the Jews?
target: Chutichuan Pilata chu a inah a lut leh a, Isua a ko va, a hnenah, Judate lal i ni em? a ti a.

source: I'm for it
target: Chumi chu ka tum

source: And of this I became a preacher and an Apostle (what I say is true, not false, and a teacher of the Gentiles in the true faith.
target: chu mi ti turin tlangaupuituah leh tirhkohva ruat ka ni; thu taktak ka sawi a, ka daw lo ve; rinna leh thutaka Jentailte zirtirtua ruat ka ni.

source: And seeing that he was not there, they went back to Jerusalem, to make search for him.
target: Tin, an hmuh loh avangin zawng chung zelin Jerusalem khuaah an kir leh ta a.

source: It's Mt Rushmore
target: Mt Rushmore a ni

source: And when the Pharisee saw it, he was surprised because he came to the meal without first washing himself.
target: Tin, Pharisai chuan a chaw kil chu a hmuhin, chaw ei hmaa kut a sil lo chu kam a ti hle a.

source: We hope so
target: Ka beisei

source: Then after the space of fourteen years I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas, taking Titus with me.
target: Tin, kum sawm leh kum li a vei hnuin Tita pawh chu hruai vein Barnaba rualin Jerusalem khuaah ka han kal leh a.

source: And the waters of the sea will be cut off, and the river will become dry and waste:
target: Tin, tuipui tuite chu a kang ang a, lui chu a luang bovin a lo kangchat tawh ang.

source: The waters went fifteen cubits higher, till all the mountains were covered.
target: Tawng sâwm leh tawng nga zeta sângin a lo awm ta pûng a; tlângte chu a pil ta daih a.

source: It was simply an oversight.
target: Enkawlna mai a ni.

source: And there was a time when I was living without the law: but when the law gave its orders, sin came to life and put me to death;
target: Tin, hmanah khan kei dan lovin ka nung a; nimahsela thupek chu a lo awm veleh sual a lo harh a, kei chu ka thi ta a.

source: So keep these words deep in your heart and in your soul, and have them fixed on your hand for a sign and marked on your brow;
target: chuvangin heng ka thute hi in thinlung leh in rilruah khung ula, chhinchhiahna atan in ban in zem ang a, tin, in mit leh mit inkâra chalhrenna atan a awm bawk tur a ni.

source: And all the workers in linen thread, and those who make cotton cloth, will be put to shame.
target: Chu lo pawh chu ziza zai sin dke mite leh puan ngo tah mite chu an mualpho ang.

source: I love camels
target: Sanghawngsei ka ngaina

source: Now when it was day, the armed men were greatly troubled about what had become of Peter.
target: Tin, ni a chhuah veleh sipaihote chu, Petera khawiahnge a awm tak? tiin buai namenin an buai lova.

source: He is a daydreamer
target: Nilenga mumang neitu a ni

source: Give ear now to their voice: but make a serious protest to them, and give them a picture of the sort of king who will be their ruler.
target: Chuvangin an thu chu ngaithla rawh: amaherawhchu urhsun taka tiamkamin an chungah rorêltu lal chet dan tûr chu kawhhmuh chiah rawh, a ti a.

source: Her children get up and give her honour, and her husband gives her praise, saying,
target: A fate chu an tho va, Engthawli an ti a, A pasal pawhin a fak a.

source: She has a headache
target: Lu na a nei a

source: The earth is sorrowing and wasting away; Lebanon is put to shame and has become waste; Sharon is like the Arabah; and in Bashan and Carmel the leaves are falling.
target: Ram chu a țapin a chau a: Lebanon chu a zakin a vuai a: Saron chu thlalêr ang a ni ta; Baan leh Karmel chuan an hnahte an thing thla a.

source: How beautiful!
target: A va han mawi!

source: Because of the flowing hair of the fighters in Israel, because the people gave themselves freely, give praise to the Lord.
target: Hotute chuan Israel zingah zai an zap a. Mipuite chu chak takin an lo inpek tak hi, LALPA chu fak rawh u.

source: And take Aaron's robes off him and put them on Eleazar, his son: and death will come to Aaron there, and he will be put to rest with his people.
target: Arona chu a silhfente hlhsak la, a fapa Eleazara bel rawh: Arona chu achipuite hnenah hruai ani ang a chutah chuan a thi ang, tiin.

source: They have put on fire your holy place; they have made the place of your name unclean, pulling it down to the earth.
target: I hmun thianghlim chu an hal a; I hming awmna chu leia chim khawp hialin an bawrh ta a.

source: Write them a note
target: An hnenah chuan note ziak rawh

source: I'm strict
target: Ka khauh a

source: So the Lord sent fear on the Ethiopians before Asa and Judah; and the Ethiopians went in flight.
target: Chutichuan LALPAN Asa leh Judate hmaah chuan Ethiopia mite chu a bei a; tichuan Ethiopia mite chu an tlânchhe ta a.

source: We haven't lost yet.
target: Kan la tlawm lo.

source: Let's talk
target: Thu sawi ang

source: I burned them
target: Ka hal vek

source: And the Lord sent them prophets to make them come back to him; and they gave witness against them, but they would not give ear.
target: Nimahsela LALPA hnêna hruai leh tûrin an hnêna zâwlneite a tir a, an thiam lohzia te an hriattir a, nimahsela an beng an chi duh chuang lo.

source: I'm bored.
target: Ka ning a ni.

source: And after the birth of Terah, Nahor went on living for a hundred and nineteen years, and had sons and daughters:
target: Tin, Tera a neih hnu chuan Nahora chu kum 119 a la dam a, fanu leh fapate a nei leh hlawm a.

source: I needed it
target: Ka mamawh takzet

source: Is Israel a servant? has he been a house-servant from birth? why has he been made waste?
target: Israel chu chhiahhlawh em ni? Vânlunga piang êm ni? Engati nge hnehchhiaha a awm tâk ni?

source: Sleeping with no fear of danger; and men will be desiring to have grace in your eyes;
target: I mu ang a, tumah an tihlau lawng che, A ni, tam takin an be tlawn ang che.

source: You've been deceived
target: Bumin i awm a ni

source: So she went down to the grain-floor and did all her mother-in-law had said to her.
target: Tichuan hruiah chuan a zuk kal a, a piin a hrilh ang apiang chuan a ti a,

source: So Joshua went up from Gilgal with all his army and all his men of war.
target: Chutichuan Josua leh a hnena ralkap mi zawng zawngte leh mi chak huaisenho zawng zawngte chu Gilgal atang chuan an han chho va.

source: O God, how long will those who are against us say cruel things? will the hater go on looking down on your name for ever?
target: Aw Pathian, dotu chuan eng chen nge a sawichhiat dawn che? Hmêlma chuan i hming hi kumkhuain a sawichhe dawn êm ni?

source: If, then, you who are evil are able to give good things to your children, how much more will your Father in heaven give the Holy Spirit to those who make request to him?
target: Chutichuan nangni mi sual mahin in fate thil tha pek nachang in hriat chuan, in Pa vana mi chuan a diltute chu Thlarau Thianghlim a va pe dawn em! a ti a.

source: I did OK.
target: Ka titha tawh e.

source: Is that a promise
target: Chu chu thutiam a ni em

source: Then I will give you rain at the right time, and the land will give her increase and the trees of the field will give their fruit;
target: ruah tuite chu a hun teah ka tlaktir ang a, lei chuan thil a hawntir ang a, rama thingte chun rah an chhuah ang a.

source: She doesn't know the truth.
target: Thudik a hre lo.

source: I'm laughing at you.
target: Ka nuih a za a.

source: She made me a star
target: Arsi min siamsak a

source: You will keep them, O Lord, you will keep them safe from this generation for ever.
target: Aw LALPA, nangin anni chu i vawng tha ang a, Heng thangtharte lakah hian kumkhuain i humhim ang.

source: Have you started yet?
target: I la tan tawh em?

source: I don't like
target: Ka duh lo mai

source: The hater of work says, There is a lion outside: I will be put to death in the streets.
target: Mi thatchhia chuan, Pawnah sakeibaknei a awm a, Kawtthlêrah ka tualthi ang, a ti.

source: I deserve a raise.
target: Raise ka phu a ni.

source: But that you will go into my country and to my relations and get a wife there for my son Isaac.
target: kan ram lamah, ka laichînte hnêna kalin ka fapa Isaaka hi nupui i neihsak zâwk tûr ani, a ti a.

source: I respect you, Tom.
target: Ka zah che, Tom.

source: I'm interested in buying it.
target: Ka lei duh a ni.

source: Who may say that God will not be turned, changing his purpose and turning away from his burning wrath, so that destruction may not overtake us?
target: Kan boral loh nân, Pathian chu kîrin, rilru lamlêtin, a thinrimna nasa tak ațang chuan a lamlêt lovang tih tuin nge hria? tiin.

source: They will hide it
target: An thup ang

source: All you beasts of the field, come together for your meat, even all you beasts of the wood.
target: Ram sa zawng zawngte u, a ni, ramhnuaia sa awm zawng zawngte u, ei tûrin lo kal rawh u.

source: Do you want me to take over?
target: Ka luah duh em?

source: And there are different operations, but the same God, who is working all things in all.
target: Hnathawh dan hrang hrang pawh a awm a, Pathian erawh chu hmunkhat a ni – mi zawng zawnga engkim thawktu chu.

source: Because it was right for him, for whom and through whom all things have being, in guiding his sons to glory, to make the captain of their salvation complete through pain.
target: A tan engkim awma a zara engkim awm bawka tan chuan fa tam tak ropuinaa a hruai luh zawngin, an chhandamna siamtu kha tuarnate avanga tihfamkim chu a sawm reng si a.

source: What then will I do when God comes as my judge? and what answer may I give to his questions?
target: Pathian a lo thawh hunah eng nge a rawn zawh chian hunah engtin nge ka chhan ang? A rawn zawh chia hunah engtin nge ka chhan ang?

source: I forgive you.
target: Ka ngaidam che.

source: I don't dance anymore.
target: Ka zai tawh lo.

source: Our fathers had faith in you: they had faith and you were their saviour.
target: Min thlahtute chuan an lo ring chai: An ring a, tichuan nangin i lo chhanhim thin.

source: He's wearing sunglasses.
target: Sunglass a bun a.

source: They wouldn't have me.
target: Min nei lo ang.

source: And Mary said to the angel, How may this be, because I have had no knowledge of a man?
target: Tin, Marin vantirhkoh hnenah chuan, Chung chu engtin nge ni ang? mipa ka nei si lo, a ti a.

source: You are allowed to go.
target: I kal phal a ni.

source: And they took them from the tent and came back with them to Joshua and the children of Israel, and put them before the Lord.
target: tichuan puan in chhûng ata chu an la a, Josua leh Israela thlahteho zawng zawng hnenah chuan an rawn la a; tin, anni chuan LALPA hmaah an dah a.

source: For heaven's sake
target: Vanram tan

source: But at the same time a fountain or a place where water is stored for use will be clean; but anyone touching their dead bodies will be unclean.
target: Amaherawhchu tuikhur emaw, tuizem, tui tling khawm emaw chu a bawlhhlawh lo vang a, an ruang khawih apiang erawh chu a bawlhhlawh ang.

source: Visit a friend
target: Ṭhian tlawh la

source: I'm too slow
target: Ka muang lutuk

source: You've done it very well.
target: I ti tha hle mai.

source: So turning round I came down from the mountain, and the mountain was burning with fire; and the two stones of the agreement were in my hands.
target: chuti chuan tlâng ata chu ka let thla a, tlâng chu a kang ta a; thuthlunna lungphêk pahni chu ka kutkhinghnihin ka keng a.

source: I play tennis
target: Tennis ka khêl

source: O Lord, because of your servant, and from your heart, you have done all these great things and let them be seen.
target: Aw LALPA, i chhiahhlawh avângin nangma rilrua chuak ang zelin heng thil roput ak hi hriattir tûrin thil ropui tak takte i ti ta a.

source: But do not take the measure of the space outside the house; because it has been given to the nations: and the holy town will be under their feet for forty-two months.
target: Biak in pawn lama hung chhung kawtlai erawh chu teh tel suh, chu chu Jentailte hnena pek a ni tawh si a; anni chuan Khaw Thianghlim chu thla sawmli leh thla hnih an rapbet ang:

source: I hate TV
target: TV ka hua

source: The sons of Judah, Er and Onan: and Er and Onan had come to their death in the land of Canaan.
target: Tin, Juda fapate, Era leh OnanaL Era leh Onana chu kanaan ramah an thi a.

source: Isaac made prayer to the Lord for his wife because she had no children; and the Lord gave ear to his prayer, and Rebekah became with child.
target: Tin, a nupui chu a chin avângin Isaaka chuan LALPA hnênah a ngensak chiam a: tin, LALPAN a dilna chu a ngaihthlâksak a, tichuan a nupui Rebeki chu a rai ta a.

source: I noticed.
target: Ka lo hria.

source: And to his father he sent ten asses with good things from Egypt on their backs, and ten she-asses with grain and bread and food for his father on the journey.
target: Tin, a pa hnênah chuan hetiang hi a thawn a; sabengtung sâwm Aigupta rama thil țha phur leh sabengtungnu sâwm kalkawnga a pa tân buh leh chhang leh ei tûr phur a thawn a.

source: Of how much more value is a man than a sheep! For this reason it is right to do good on the Sabbath day.
target: Beram pakhat ai chuan mihring pakhat chu a va hlu zawk em! Chuvangin, Chawlhniah tihthat a thiang e, a ti a.

source: You're too aggressive
target: I hrâng lûtuk

source: Are you the sheriff?
target: Sheriff i ni em?

source: If you are true men, let one of you be kept in prison, while you go and take grain for the needs of your families;
target: mi dik tak in nih chuan in unau zîngah hian pakhat phuarin awm rawh se; nangni erawh chu kal ta ula, in chhûngteho tâm tân chuan buh phur rawh u:

source: I retired
target: Ka bang tawh

source: Who is the King of glory? The Lord of armies, he is the King of glory. (Selah.
target: Chu ropuina Lal chu tunge ni? Sipaihote LALPA chu, Amah ngei hi ropuina Lal chu a ni. Selah

source: The one rock went up on the north in front of Michmash and the other on the south in front of Geba.
target: Lung tohlawt pakhat chu Mikmas zawn hmâr lampanga awm a ni a, a dang pakhat chu Geba zawn chhim lampanga awm a ni.

source: He has a maid
target: Awmpui a nei

source: It's not software.
target: Software a ni lo.

source: The living, the living man, he will give you praise, as I do this day: the father will give the story of your mercy to his children.
target: Mi nungin, mi nungin, anni ngei chuan, vawiina ka tih ang hian an fak ang che: Pa chuan fate hnênah i thutak chu a hriattir ang.

source: It's not this one.
target: Hemi hi a ni lo.

source: What I say is that the things offered by the Gentiles are offered to evil spirits and not to God; and it is not my desire for you to have any part with evil spirits.
target: Jentailte inthawina chu Pathian lakah ni lovin, ramhuaiho lakah an inthawi thin a ni tih ka sawi zawk a ni; nangni zawngin ramhuaiho in tawmpui ka duhsak lo che u asin.

source: Now David went to and from Saul, looking after his father's sheep at Beth-lehem.
target: Davida chu Saula hnên atangin Bethlehem-ah a pa berâm enkawlin a va kal a va kal thin a.

source: You were eating a sandwich.
target: Sandwich i ei a.

source: But take no part in wrong and foolish talk, for those who do so will go farther into evil,
target: Amaherawhchu, Pathian zah lo lam thu sawi mai mai chu hawisan thin ang che; chutiang mite chu Pathianngaihsak lohna lamah an nasa lehzual ang a,

source: You've won
target: I chak e

source: He's cruel.
target: A sual a nia.

source: Is that true
target: Kha kha a dik em

source: If you have honey, take only as much as is enough for you; for fear that, being full of it, you may not be able to keep it down.
target: Khawizu i hmu thin êm? A tawk lekin in rawh, Chutilochuan i la lua ang a, i luak leh dah ang e.

source: I will not put faith in my bow, my sword will not be my salvation.
target: Ka thal ngul hi ka ring dawn si lo va, Ka khandaih hian mi chhandam hek lo vang.

source: Can you still walk?
target: I la kal thei em?

source: And she gave the king a hundred and twenty talents of gold, and a great store of spices and jewels: never had such spices been seen as the queen of Sheba gave to Solomon.
target: Chutichuan lal chu rangkachak talent za leh sawmhnih le englo rimtui tam tak mai leh lunghlute a pe a, Seba lalnun lal Solomona englo rimtui a pêk ang rêng rêng hi a awm lo.

source: The best of the first-fruits of your land are to be taken into the house of the Lord your God. The young goat is not to be cooked in its mother's milk.
target: I lovah thlai thar hmasa ber chu LALPA I Pathian inah I rawn dah tûr a ni. Kêl no sa a pui hnutetuiin I chhûm tûr a ni lo.

source: The Lord in heaven is stronger than the noise of great waters, yes, he is stronger than the great waves of the sea.
target: Tui tam tak awte aiin, Tuifinriat fawn chak takte ai pawhin, Chung lama LALPA chu a chak a ni.

source: It's a TV
target: TV a nia

source: He doesn't have long to live
target: Dam rei a nei lo

source: I will go higher than the clouds; I will be like the Most High.
target: chhum aia sâng zawkahte khain ka chho vang a; Chungnungbera ang maiin ka awm ang, i tih thin vei nên khan.

source: It's a confidential matter.
target: Thuruk thil a ni.

source: I'm tired already.
target: Ka chau tawh.

source: So when he had come back again from the dead, the memory of these words came back to the disciples, and they had faith in the holy Writings and in the word which Jesus had said.
target: Chuvangin, mitthi zing ata a thawhlehin, chu mi thu chu a saiw tawh tih a zirtirten an hre leh ta a; tin, Pathian Lehkha Thu leh Isua thusawi chu an ring ta a.

source: It's an investment
target: Investment a ni

source: Go get a beer.
target: Zu mi pe rawh.

source: I'm always thirsty
target: Ka tuihal fo ṭhin

source: So Joshua made peace with them, and made an agreement with them that they were not to be put to death: and the chiefs of the people took an oath to them.
target: tichuan Josua chuan anmahni nen inremna a siam a, anmahni chu zuah turin an hnenah thu a thlung ta a: tin, pungkhawmho mi liante pawh chuan an hnenah chhia an chham a.

source: The foolish woman is full of noise; she has no sense at all.
target: Hmeichhe â chu a awm hle hle thei lo va, A mâwl a, engmah a hre lo.

source: Cursed is he who says to a father, To what are you giving life? or to a woman, What are you in birth-pains with?
target: A pa hnênah, Eng nge i hrin ni? titu chung emaw, a nu hnênah, Eng nge i hrin dawn ni? titu chung emaw a pik e!

source: And from the time when they make an agreement with him, he will be working falsely: for he will take up arms suddenly with a small force,
target: tin, a hnêna thuthlung siam hnuah chuan hlemhle takin a che ang: a lo ding chhuak ang a, mipui tlêm tête nên pawh a lo chak dâwn a ni.

source: In heaven let them give praise for your wonders, O Lord; and your unchanging faith among the saints.
target: Aw LALPA, vante khian i thilmak tih hi an fak ang a; Mi thianghlimte inkhawmnaah khian i rinawmna hi an fak bawk ang.

source: And they, if they do not go on without faith, will be united to the tree again, because God is able to put them in again.
target: Tin, anni pawh chu ring lova an awm reng loh chuan zawmin an awm ang; Pathianin anmahni a zawm leh thei si a.

source: Who wants it?
target: Tunge duh?

source: I hardly ever get sick.
target: Ka damlo ngai lo.

source: Now am I certain that the Lord gives salvation to his king; he will give him an answer from his holy heaven with the strength of salvation in his right hand.
target: LALPAN a hriak thiha hi a chhandam tih tunah ka hre ta; A kut ding lam chandamna thain A van thianghlim atang khian amah a la chhâng a.

source: I have more knowledge than all my teachers, because I give thought to your unchanging word.
target: Min zirtirtu zawng zawng aiin finna ka nei zawk a ni; I thuhriattirte hi ka ngaihtuah a nih thin avângin.

source: I'll lose
target: Ka hloh ang

source: But first, he will have to undergo much and be put on one side by this generation.
target: Nimahsela chu mi hma chuan thil tam tak a tuar tur a ni a, tun lai chhuante duh lohin a awm bawk tur a ni.

source: See, I have made the iron-worker, blowing on the burning coals, and making the instrument of war by his work; and I have made the waster for destruction.
target: Ngai teh, kei chuan thirdeng pum zapa a hnatahwhna tûr hriam chher thintu chu ka siam a; keimah vekin tichhe tûrin tichhetu ka siam bawk a ni.

source: And do not say evil things against the Lord, as some of them did, and destruction overtook them.
target: An zinga thenkhat an phunnawi a, tiboraltu tihborala an awm phah ang khan phunnawi hek suh u.

source: And the higher rooms were shorter: for the covered ways took up more space from these than from the lower and middle rooms.
target: Pindan chungnung te chu a zîm zâwk a, in chhawng hnuai zawk leh a laitate ai chuan a chhawrvelte chuan a la hek zawk si a.

source: For you, O God, have put us to the test: testing us by fire like silver.
target: Aw Pathian, nangin mi fiah a: Tangkaraw fiah angin min fiah a.

source: The number of asses was thirty thousand, five hundred, of which the Lord's part was sixty-one.
target: Tin, sabengtung chu 3,500 ani a; chu mia LALPA chhiah chu 61 a ni.

source: The start of fighting is like the letting out of water: so give up before it comes to blows.
target: Inhnial hi tuikhuah hnam tir ang a ni a, Chuvangin insualna a awm tan hmain inhnial bâng rawh.

source: Jesus said to him, You have seen him; it is he who is talking to you.
target: Isuan a hnenah, Ani chu i hmu tawh reng alawm, a betu mek che hi a ni alawm, a ti a.

source: You should buy it.
target: I lei tur a ni.

source: I will not let you be without a friend: I am coming to you.
target: Fahrahin ka kalsan lo vang che u; in hnenah ka lo kal leh ang.

source: Tom fell asleep in my arms
target: Tom chu ka kuah a

source: By the power of the Lord, those who take arms against you will be overcome before you: they will come out against you one way, and will go in flight from you seven ways.
target: In hmêlma nangmahn beitute chu LALPAN a tihtlawmsak ang che u a; a bei tur che uin kawng khatah an lo lut ang a, kawng sarihah an tlanchhia a.

source: He's getting away
target: A tlanbo mêk a ni

source: And Nabal gave them his answer and said, Who is David? who is the son of Jesse? there are a number of servants in these days running away from their masters.
target: Tin, Nabala chuan Davida chhiahlawhte chu a chhâng a, Davida chu tunge maw ni le? Jesaia fapa chu tunge maw ni le? Tun lai hian chhiahhlawh tam tak pute tlan bosan hmang an tam mai a.

source: O God, you are to be feared in your holy place: the God of Israel gives strength and power to his people. Praise be to God.
target: Aw Pathian i hmun thianghlim atangte chuan i hlauhawm a ni: Amah Israel-ho Pathian ngei chuan a mite hnênah chakna leh thiltihtheihna a pe thin a ni. Pathian chu fakin awm rawh se.

source: See! this is the blessing of the worshipper of the Lord.
target: Ngai teh, LALPA tih mi chu Chutiang chuan malsawmin an awm ang.

source: So that the cry of the poor might come up to him, and the prayer of those in need come to his ears.
target: A beng thleng khawp khawpion retheite an rumtir a, Ani chuan hnehchhiahte au thawm chu a lo hria a.

source: And Hezekiah said to Isaiah, What is to be the sign that the Lord will make me well, and that I will go up to the house of the Lord on the third day?
target: Tin, Hezekian Isaia hnênah, LALPAN mi tidam ang a, LALPA inah a ni thum niin ka han kal ang tih chhinchhiahna eng nge ni ang? a ti a.

source: So the priests made an agreement to take no more money from the people, and not to make good what was damaged in the house.
target: Tin, puithiamte chuan mite hnên ata tangka lak tawh loh leh, in hhe laite siamtu nih loh chu an remti a.

source: It's in good hands.
target: Kut tha ah a awm.

source: And they went in to her, as men go to a loose woman: so they went in to Oholibah, the loose woman.
target: Tin, nawhchizuar hnêna ka kalin a hnênah an lût ta tho va; tichuan hmeichhe hur Oholahi hnênah chuan an lût ta a ni.

source: It's a bet
target: Kan inchuh kha a nia

source: She heard a noise.
target: Thawm a hre ta a.

source: So the makers of wise sayings say, Come to Heshbon, building up the town of Sihon and making it strong:
target: Chuvangin hlaa phuahtute chuan, Hesbon-ah lo kal ula, Sihona khawpui chu din leh tihngheh ni se;

source: I'll definitely comply.
target: Ka zawm ngei ang.

source: I watch TV all the time.
target: TV ka en fo thin.

source: And there were others who said, We have given up our fields and our vine-gardens to get money for the king's taxes.
target: Lal hnêna chhiah chawi atân sum kan puk a, chu mi atân chuan kan lote leh kan grêp huante kan dahkham a.

source: I think you have it.
target: I ken ka ring a.

source: So the town was shut in by their forces till the eleventh year of King Zedekiah.
target: Chutichuan lal Zedekia kum sâwm leh kum khatna thlengin khawpui chu hualin a awm ta a.

source: I cough a lot
target: Ka khuh nasa

source: The earth is shaking with the noise of their fall; their cry is sounding in the Red Sea.
target: An tluk chhiatna thmawah chuan lei hi a khur a; an țap thawm chu Tuipui Senah pawh hriat a ni ang.

source: They got horses for Solomon from Egypt and from every land.
target: Tin, Solomona tan sakawrte Aigupta atangte leh ram tin, atangtein an rawn la thin a.

source: You did this
target: Hei hi i ti a maw

source: Can we stop?
target: Kan ding thei em?

source: No doubt you have knowledge, and wisdom will come to an end with you.
target: A ni ngei mai, mi fing zawng in lo ni hi, In rualin finna a thi ang.

source: For they will be a crown of grace for your head, and chain-ornaments about your neck.
target: I lu atân parthi mawi tak a ni ang a, I nghawng atân thi ang ani dawn si a.

source: Now all the water-holes, which his father's servants had made in the days of Abraham, had been stopped up with earth by the Philistines.
target: Tin, a pa Abrahama dam laia a pa chhiahhlawhten tuichhunchhuah an laih zawng zawngte chu Philistin-hoten an hnawh a, leiin an lo tikhat ta vek mai a.

source: I took a swig of whiskey.
target: Whisky ka in a.

source: Sami is not sick
target: Sami a damlo lo

source: His skin is wasted by disease, and his body is food for the worst of diseases.
target: A taksa bhung hrangte a ei zo vang a, Thihna fa tirin a bung hrangte a ei zo vang.

source: I gave them your address.
target: I address ka pe a.

source: And again ships, though they are so great and are moved by violent winds, are turned by a very small guiding-blade, at the impulse of the man who is using it.
target: Ngai teh u, lawngte pawh hi a lian hle a, thli na tak chhem Lenin a awm thin na a, nimahsela a tihertu chuan a kaltir duhna lam apiangah tihherna te tak tein a tiher thin.

source: I love fish
target: Sangha ka ngaina

source: Make the nations ready for war against her, the king of the Medes and his rulers and all his captains, and all the land under his rule.
target: Amah do tûr hnamte buatsaih r'u, Media lal te awptu te, leh a puitu te, A thuneihna ram zawng zawng nên.

source: Are you happy?
target: I lâwm em?

source: Who take pleasure in wrongdoing, and have joy in the evil designs of the sinner;
target: Thil tha lo tih chu an lawmzawng a ni a, Thil sual bengtla lo mai maiahte an lawm thin;

source: The dog went away
target: Ui chu a kal ta a

source: I'm grieving
target: Ka sun mek

source: They wrote to each other
target: An inziak tawn a

source: And he got into the boat with his disciples straight away, and came into the country of Dalmanutha.
target: Tin, ani chu a zirtirte hnenah lawngah chuan a chuang ta nghal a, Dalmanutha ram chu a thleng ta a.

source: And even with the fat cows inside them they seemed as bad as before. And so I came out of my sleep.
target: tin, an ei zawh hnu pawh chuan an ei tih an hriat chuang loh: atîr ang bawk khân an la pawr ta reng a. Chutichuan ka han thangharh ta a.

source: He let Tom go.
target: Khapa khân Tom a kal tir.

source: How are the things of Esau searched out! how are his secret stores looked for!
target: Esauva thilte zawnchhuah a nih tâk chu! A ro bâwm thuhrûkte dapchhuah a nih tâk chu!

source: See, he goes past me and I see him not: he goes on before, but I have no knowledge of him.
target: Ngai teh, ka bulah a kal a, ka hmu si lo; A tlâng ta zel a, ka hre si lo.

source: Tom isn't watching
target: Tom hian a en lo

source: Are you planning on having children?
target: Fa neih i tum em?

source: For Jerusalem has become feeble, and destruction has come on Judah, because their words and their acts are against the Lord, moving the eyes of his glory to wrath.
target: A ropuina an hmusit avângin an tawng leh thiltihte chu LALPA do zawng a ni a, Jerusalem chu a chhe zo va, Juda-ho chu an tlu zo ta a ni.

source: Now his brothers went to keep watch over their father's flock in Shechem.
target: Tin, a ute chu Sekem-ah chuan an pa ran rual chu thlahin an kal a.

source: The sun comes up, and they come together, and go back to their secret places to take their rest.
target: Ni a chhuak a, an kal bo va, An awmna puk theuhvahte chuan an mu thin a.

source: Saying, Truly, their substance is cut off, and their wealth is food for the fire.
target: Kan chunga lo dingte tihbovin an awm a, A bang meiin a kang ral a, tiin.

source: Try and get some sleep.
target: Mut tlem tum la.

source: She's intelligent
target: A fing hle mai

source: Don't speak
target: Ṭawng suh

source: The kings came on to the fight, the kings of Canaan were warring; in Taanach by the waters of Megiddo: they took no profit in money.
target: Lalten an rawn bei a, Tichuan Kanaan lalte chuan Megido tui kiang, Taanak khuaha an bei a: Sum lak reng an nei lo

source: For he will be a saviour to the poor in answer to his cry; and to him who is in need, without a helper.
target: Pachhiain a auhvin ani chuan a chhanhim ang a, Mi rethei, tanpuitu nei lo pawh chu, a chhanhim ang a.

source: And the Lord saw that the sin of man was great on the earth, and that all the thoughts of his heart were evil.
target: Tin, LALPA chuan leiah hian mihring sualzia chu nasa tak a ni tih leh, an rilru suangtuahzia rêng rêng chu sual hlîr a ni fo mai tih a lo hria a.

source: How great is your fall from heaven, O shining one, son of the morning! How are you cut down to the earth, low among the dead bodies!
target: Aw 'varparh,' 'zing lam fapa,' engtizia nge van ata i tlak tak chu le! Hnam tin titlâwmtu, engtizia nge lai sah thlaka i awm tak chu le!

source: We walked along side by side.
target: Kan kal dun a.

source: This is a cama
target: Hei hi a cama a ni

source: The keepers of sheep have been the destruction of my vine-garden, crushing my heritage under their feet; they have made my fair heritage an unplanted waste;
target: Berâmpu tam takte chuan ka grêp huan an tichhia a, Ka chan chu an rap bet a, Ka chanvo nuam tak mai chu Thlalêr ram țiau an chantir ta.

source: And when the time for the fruit came near, he sent his servants to the workmen, to get the fruit.
target: Tin, a rah lawh a hun dawn chuan a rah la turin lo enkawltute hnenah a bawite a tir a.

source: So, as the Lord said, I got a band for a price and put it round my body.
target: Tichuan LALPA thu ang zelin hren chu ka lei a, ka hreng ta a.

source: For twelve years they were under the rule of Chedorlaomer, but in the thirteenth year they put off his control.
target: kum sâwm leh kum hnih chhûngin Kedorlaomera hnuaiah an awm a, a kum sâwm leh kum thumnaah erawh chuan an hel ta a.

source: They shot me
target: Min kap a

source: And this is the hope which he gave you, even eternal life.
target: Tin, hei hi a ni amah ngeiin thil min tiama kha – chatuana nunna hi.

source: By his wind the heavens become bright: by his hand the quickly moving snake was cut through.
target: A thawin van chu a tithiang a, A kutin rulpui tlan chak chu a thil tlâng a.

source: Tom's left
target: Tom-a a haw

source: And I will send you out in all directions among the nations, and my sword will be uncovered against you, and your land will be without any living thing, and your towns will be made waste.
target: in hnam dangte zingah ka tidarh ang che u a, a um tur che uin khandaih chu ka phawi ang; tichuan in ram chu a tiau avang a, in khuate chu a ram ang.

source: The child without a father is forced from its mother's breast, and they take the young children of the poor for debt.
target: Pa nei lo hnute hne lai pawhthlaksak chingte an awm a, Retheite hnên aa dahkhamah an la a.

source: Was there a lot of traffic?
target: Traffic a tam em?

source: I got dizzy
target: Ka lu a hai tawh

source: But you are to be guided by my decisions and keep my rules, and be guided by them: I am the Lord your God.
target: Ka rorêlte chu in pawm ang a, ka dante chu zawhin in zawm tur a ni: Kei hi LALPA in Pathian chu ka ni.

source: They will follow you
target: An zui ang che

source: The law is the law
target: Dan chu dan a ni

source: Don't be afraid of that.
target: Chu chu hlau suh.

source: So Pilate came out to them and put the question: What have you to say against this man?
target: Tin, Pilata an hnenah a va chhuak a, an hnenah, He mi chungah hian thupawi engnge in neih? a ti a.

source: I am having motion sickness
target: Motor ka rui

source: The camel-trains go out of their way; they go up into the waste and come to destruction.
target: Sumdawng rualte chuan an kawng an rawn pensan a, Ram rovah an lût a, an boral a.

source: And he saw the heavens opening, and a vessel coming down, like a great cloth let down on the earth,
target: Tin, van inhawngin englo bawm, puan lian tak ang, a kil lia hlina leia uai thlain a hmu a;

source: He seems sick
target: A damloh hmêl

source: He who has love for his brother is in the light, and there is no cause of error in him.
target: Mahni unau hmangaihtu chu engah chuan a awm reng a, amahah chuan tlukna reng a awm lo.

source: Whoever has a desire to keep his life, will have it taken from him; and whoever gives up his life because of me and the good news, will keep it.
target: Tupawh a nun humhim duh apiangin a chan ang a; tupawh keimah avang leh Chanchin Tha avanga nun chan apiangin a humhim ang.

source: Sami was trembling
target: Sami chu a khur a

source: For the nations of the world go in search of all these things: but your Father has knowledge that you have need of them.
target: Khawvela hnam tinin chung thil zawng zawng chu an zawng thin a ni; chung chu in mamawh tih in Pain a hre reng si a.

source: Tom isn't calling
target: Tom hian a ko lo

source: I canceled
target: Ka titawp

source: I am smart
target: Ka felfai e

source: Six things are hated by the Lord; seven things are disgusting to him:
target: Thil paruk LALPAN a huat thin a awm a, A ni, pasarih a tenzâwng tak a awm;

source: And after they had gone through the land of Phrygia and Galatia, the Holy Spirit did not let them take the word into Asia;
target: Tin, Thlarau Thianghlimin Asia rama thu hril a khap avangin Phrugia leh Galatia ram chu an fang chhuak ta a;

source: He did evil in the eyes of the Lord; he did not keep himself from the sin which Jeroboam, the son of Nebat, did and made Israel do.
target: Tin, LALPA mithmuha thil tha lo tak a ti thin a; Israelte thil tihsualtirtu Nebata fapa Jeroboama sualnate khaa dam chungin a kalsan lo.

source: I cheered.
target: Ka nui.

source: Then they gave to Jacob all the strange gods which they had, and the rings which were in their ears; and Jacob put them away under the holy tree at Shechem.
target: Tichuan mi dang pathian an kuta awm zawng zawng leh an benga bengbeh an buh zawng zawng chu Jakoba an pe a; tin, Jakoba chuan Sekem khaw kianga sasaw hnuaiah chuan a thukru ta a.

source: How beautiful you are!
target: I va mawi em!

source: It's midnight already.
target: Zanlai a ni tawh.

source: Did you hand it in?
target: I hlan tawh em?

source: All the limit of the Amorites was theirs, from the Arnon as far as the Jabbok and from the waste land even to Jordan.
target: Tichuan Amor-ho ramri chin zawng zawng Arnon atanga Jabok thleng rakin an nei ta vek a ni.

source: He mocked me
target: Mi chhiat khum

source: There was nothing to see.
target: Hmuh tur a awm lo.

source: I see how you are studying.
target: I zir dan ka hmu.

source: And then the giver of the feast will come to you and say, Give your place to this man; and you, with shame, will have to take the lowest seat.
target: tichuan a sawmtu che chuan, ‘He mi thutna tur hi kian rawh,’ a rawn ti ang chia; tin, nang zak takin thutphah tha lo berah i thu leh si tur a ni.

source: Have faith in the Lord, and do good; be at rest in the land, and go after righteousness.
target: Lalpa chu ring la, thil tha ti rawh; He ramah hian awm la, rinawmna um zel rawh.

source: And, getting up from prayer, he came to the disciples, and saw that they were sleeping for sorrow.
target: Tin, a tawngtai zawha a thawhin, zirtirte hnenah chuan a lo kal a, an lungngaih avangin an lo muhil a hmu a;

source: Does it hurt?
target: I na viau em?

source: But Hezekiah did not do as had been done to him; for his heart was lifted up in pride; and so wrath came on him and on Judah and Jerusalem.
target: Nimahsela Hezekia chuan a tana ta tûra tih ang chuan a ti lo va, a rilrua lo chapo tak avângin: chuvângin a chungah leh Judate leh Jerusalem chunga thinurna a lo thleng ta a.

source: And all the other families by themselves, and their wives by themselves.
target: Chhûngkaw dang zawng zawng pawh, Chhûngkaw tinreng ahrangin, an nupuite a hrang țheuhvin.

source: There are challenges
target: Harsatna a awm

source: If you have anything to say, give me an answer; for it is my desire that you may be judged free from sin.
target: Sawi tûr i neih chuan mi chhâng la, Sawi rawh thiam chantir che ka duh a ni;

source: How about you?
target: I dam zâwk em?

source: I was crowded out
target: Ka crowd chhuak a

source: Truly, I am of no value; what answer may I give to you? I will put my hand on my mouth.
target: Ngai teh, kei mi pawimawh tham lo te hian Engtin nge ka chan ang che? Ka ka ka hup mai a ni.

source: We were hurt
target: Kan nâ e

source: But the eyes of the evil-doers will be wasting away; their way of flight is gone, and their only hope is the taking of their last breath.
target: Mahse, mi suaksual mite chu a thlawn ang a, Tlan chhuahna kawng reng an nei lo vang. An nghahfak b3er pawh thih mai a ni.

source: Do not be tricked by false words: evil company does damage to good behaviour.
target: Bumin awm suh u; Thian sualte chuan nungchang tha an tikhawlo thin.

source: Now when she saw that her hope was made foolish and gone, she took another of her little ones and made him into a young lion.
target: A chûni-nun a nghak thlawn, bei lo dawng e; A siam leh e, a hrai chawi dang, sakeibaknei vanglaia'n.

source: If, then, Satan is at war with himself, how will he keep his kingdom? because you say that I send evil spirits out of men by the help of Beelzebul.
target: Setana pawh mahni a indo chuan, a ram engtin nge a din chhuah ang? – ‘Beelzebula avangin ramhuaite a hnawt chhuak,’ min ti si a.

source: I am full
target: Ka puar

source: But they did not take in the sense of any of these words, and what he said was not clear to them, and their minds were not able to see it.
target: Tin, chung thu reng reng chu a ngaihna an hre lo va; thusawi chu an lakah thupin a awm a, eng sawi nge a nih pawh an hre lo va.

source: Forget me
target: Mi theihnghih rawh

source: Will you be all right?
target: I dam tha ang em?

source: The ground was cold.
target: Lei chu a vawt a.

source: You have seen everything the Lord your God has done to all these nations because of you; for it is the Lord your God who has been fighting for you.
target: LALPA in Pathianin nangmahni avanga heng hnam zawng zawngte chunga a tih dan hi in hmu a; LALPA in Pathianin, amah ngeiin a ni, dosak che u ni.

source: I slept.
target: Ka muhil tawh.

source: He's married
target: Nupui a nei tawh

source: In that day the Lord will take away the glory of their foot-rings, and their sun-jewels, and their moon-ornaments,
target: Chumi niah chuan Lalpan an incheimawinate chu a laksak ang, kebun te, len lukhum te, nghâwngkawl te chu;

source: Give ear, O heavens, to my voice; let the earth take note of the words of my mouth:
target: Beng lo chhi ru vante u, ka hril dawn e; Ka țawngkam chhuak leilungin ngai se.

source: They have ears, but no hearing; they have noses, but no sense of smell;
target: Bengte an nei a, an hre thei si lo va; Hnarte an nei a, rim an hre thei si lo va;

source: And this is the sign to you: you will see a young child folded in linen, in the place where the cattle have their food.
target: Tin, hei hi in tan chhinchhiahna tur a ni; nausen puana tuam, ran chaw pekna thlenga mu in hmu ang, a ti a.

source: Yes, though I go through the valley of deep shade, I will have no fear of evil; for you are with me, your rod and your support are my comfort.
target: A ni, thihna hlim kawr ruam zawh mah ila, thil tha lo rêng rêng ka hlau lo vang; nang ka hnênah i awm si a; I talhtum leh i tiangin mi thlamuan thin a ni.

source: And God made the two great lights: the greater light to be the ruler of the day, and the smaller light to be the ruler of the night: and he made the stars.
target: Tichuan Pathianin êntu ropui zawk chu chhûn rorel tûrin, êntu ropui lo zâwk chu zân rorel tûrin a siam a: arsite pawh khi a siam bawk a.

source: We want more
target: A tam zâwk kan duh

source: Let's get married
target: Innei ang

source: I looked for them
target: Anni chu ka zawng a

source: And the son of Ulam: Bedan. These were the sons of Gilead, the son of Machir the son of Manasseh.
target: Tin, Ulama fapa chu Bedana a ni. Chungte chu Manasea thlah Makira fapa Gileada fapate chu an ni.

source: His bones are full of young strength, but it will go down with him into the dust.
target: A ruhte chu a tleirawl sualnain a khat a, Mahse vaivutah amutpui ang.

source: And Solomon went to rest with his fathers, and was put into the earth in the town of David his father; and Rehoboam his son became king in his place.
target: Tin, Solomona chu a pi leh pute hnênah a muhil a, a pa Davida khuaah an phûm a, a aiah a fapa Rehoboama a lal ta a.

source: We're traveling together.
target: Kan zin dun a ni.

source: At his word their waters were turned to blood, and he sent death on all their fish.
target: An tuite chu thisenah a chantir a, An sânghate chu a tihlum ta a.

source: Don't brag.
target: Uang suh.

source: If one says a word, will it be a weariness to you? but who is able to keep from saying what is in his mind?
target: I hnênah thu kam khat sawi ila, i hua ang êm? Mahse, tawng lovin tunge insum thei ang le?

source: The girl went to sleep.
target: Nula chu a mu a.

source: See, the bows of the evil-doers are bent, they make ready their arrows on the cord, so that they may send them secretly against the upright in heart.
target: En teh u, thinlung dik tak pu thim hnuaia an kah theihna tûrin, Mi suaksualte chuan thal ngul an kuai a, An thal chu a hruiah an vuah diam saw.

source: So man goes down to his last resting-place and comes not again: till the heavens come to an end, they will not be awake or come out of their sleep.
target: Chutiangin mi an mu a, an tho leh lo: Van awm loh hma loh chuan an thangharh lo vang, An muhil kaihthawh an ni hek lo vang,

source: Then this same Sheshbazzar came and put the house of God in Jerusalem on its bases: and from that time till now the building has been going on, but it is still not complete.
target: Chutichuan Sesbazara ngei chu a kal a, Jerusalem-a biak in lungphûm chu a phûma: chuta chin chu tun thleng hian sak a ni ta reng a; nimahsela la peih loh ala ni reng a,' tiin.

source: He will go back to the land of Egypt and the Assyrian will be his king, because they would not come back to me.
target: Mahse an lamlêt duh loh avângin, Aigupta ramah ka tîr leh ang; Assuria chu an la ani ang.

source: And turning to them, he said to them in the form of a story, How is it possible for Satan to put out Satan?
target: Tin, Isua chuan lehkhaziaktute chu a ko va, tehkhin thuin an hnenah, Setanan Setana vek engtin nge a hnawh chhuah theih?

source: And their children were talking half in the language of Ashdod; they had no knowledge of the Jews' language, but made use of the language of the two peoples.
target: an fate chu Asdod tawngin an tawng zawk mah a, chungho tawng dan ang ang chauh lo chuan Juda tawngin an tawng thei lo va.

source: My desire for you, brothers, is that you may be as I am, because I am as you are. You have done me no wrong;
target: Unaute u, ka ngen a che u, keimah angin awm rawh u, kei pawh nangmahni angin ka awm si a. Ka pawi engmah in khawih lo.

source: You will not like it.
target: I duh lo ang.

source: Then the Pharisees said to them, Have you, like the others, been given false ideas?
target: Tin, Pharisaite chuan an hnenah, Nangni pawh bumin in awm ve ta elo?

source: Who was that?
target: Kha kha tunge?

source: The hotel is there.
target: Hotel chu a awm a.

source: I'm very hot
target: Ka sa lutuk

source: I honor that.
target: Kha kha ka zah a ni.

source: I am joking
target: Ka fiamthu mek

source: And they came to the valley of Eshcol, and cutting down a vine-branch with its grapes, two of them took it on a rod between them; and they took some pomegranates and figs.
target: Tin, Eskol ruam an va thleng a: chuta grêp rah bawr khat, a tang chawpin an sat chhum a, tiangin mi pahnihin an zawn a: pawmgranet te leh theipuite pawh an hawn bawk a.

source: He will have no fear of evil news; his heart is fixed, for his hope is in the Lord.
target: Chanchin tha lo takte a hlau lo vang: LALPA ringin a thinlung chu a nghet a ni.

source: I'm expected
target: Ka beisei e

source: And she gave the child the name of Ichabod, saying, The glory has gone from Israel: because the ark of God was taken and because of her father-in-law and her husband.
target: Tin, Ropuina chuan Israel chu a chuahsan ta. tin, naupang hmêlah chuan Ikaboda a sa a. Pathian bâwm chu an laksak ta a, a pu leh a pasal pawh an thi ta si a.

source: Women are to be serious in behaviour, saying no evil of others, controlling themselves, true in all things.
target: Chutiang bawkin hmeichhiate pawh mi zahawm an ni tur a ni, hektute ni lovin, insum thei leh engkima rinawm an ni tur a ni.

source: You're no friend of mine.
target: Ka thian i ni lo.

source: And if, even after these things, you will not give ear to me, then I will send you punishment seven times more for your sins.
target: Tin, chuti chung pawha ka thu in la pawm loh cheu chuan in sualte avangin vawi sarih ka la hrem leh ang che u.

source: Cheer up!
target: Hlim ru!

source: And the first heritage came out for the tribe of Benjamin by their families: and the limit of their heritage went between the children of Judah and the children of Joseph.
target: Tin, thumvawr chu Benjamina thlahte hnam an chhûngkaw zir zelin an chungah a ltu ta a: tin, an ramri chin chu Juda thlahte leh Josefa thlahte inkâr a ni.

source: Now Tobiah the Ammonite was by him, and he said, Such is their building that if a fox goes up it, their stone wall will be broken down.
target: Tin, a kianga Amon mi Tobia chuan, Han din the reng se; sihal pawh han lawn sela an lung kulh chu a tichim mai ang chu, a ti a.

source: You're running late.
target: I tlan tlai a ni.

source: We are compatriots
target: Ram mi kan ni

source: It was impossible
target: A theih loh a ni

source: Even in your law it is said that the witness of two men is true.
target: A ni, in Dan Lehkhabuah pawh, ‘Mi pahnih thu a dik,’ tih ziak a ni bawk alawm.

source: Then Sihon came out against us with all his people, to make an attack on us at Jahaz.
target: Tin, LALPA kan Pathian chuan min pe a; tichuan amah leh a fapate leh amite zawng zawng chu kan that a.

source: And the high priest, Ananias, gave orders to those who were near him to give him a blow on the mouth.
target: Tin, puithiam Lalber Anania chuan Paula kianga dingte hnenah a kaa bensak tur a ti a.

source: I would much rather be safe.
target: Ka him zawk ang.

source: Which they did, sending it to the rulers of the church by the hand of Barnabas and Saul.
target: chu chu an ti ta ngei a, Barnaba leh Saula kutah chuan upate hnenah an thawn ta a.

source: You had no joy in burned offerings or in offerings for sin.
target: Halrala pumpeknaahte leh, Sual tana inthawinaahte chuan Lawmna reng i nei lo.

source: And they are to make clear to my people the division between what is holy and what is common, and to give them the knowledge of what is clean and what is unclean.
target: Ka mite chu thil serh leh serh loh danglam zia an zirtir tûr a ni, thil thiang leh thiang lo an thliar hran tir tûr a ni.

source: I'm nearly finished
target: Ka zo hnai tawh

source: They don't have to wrap it up
target: An wrap a ngai lo

source: I burp a lot.
target: Ka insâwizawi nasa.

source: She heard coughing
target: Khuh ri a hre ta

source: I'll obey.
target: Thu ka awi ang.

source: And death and Hell were put into the sea of fire. This is the second death, even the sea of fire.
target: Tin, Thihna leh Mitthi Khuate chu mei dilah an paih a. Chu chu thih hnihna chu a ni – mei dil chu.

source: And he sent for the priests and the Levites, and got them together in the wide place on the east side,
target: Puithiamte le Levi-hote a hruai lût a, chak lampang hmun zau laiah a hruai kkawm a,

source: They're not going away
target: An kal bo dawn lo

source: Eat something
target: Eng emaw ei suh

source: Became the property of Abraham before the eyes of the children of Heth and of all who came into the town.
target: Hetha thlahte mithmuhah, a khaw kulh kawngkaa lût apiangte mithmuhah chuan, ro atân Abrahama hnênah pêk nghehin a awm ta a.

source: There was applause
target: Kutbeng a awm a

source: What is she dancing to?
target: Eng nge a zai mek?

source: On the fifteenth day of this month there is to be a feast; for seven days let your food be unleavened cakes.
target: Tin, chu mi thla ni sâwm leh ni nga ni chu ruai ni a ni ang: ni sarih chu chhang dawidim telh loh ei tur ani ang.

source: Are you gonna pay for it?
target: I pe dawn em ni?

source: Whatever meat may be had at the public market, take as food without question of right or wrong;
target: Sa dawra an zawrh apiang chu chhia leh tha hriatna avanga engmah zawt kher lovin ei mai rawh u;

source: I became calm
target: Ka zia awm tawh e

source: Their backs will be turned when you make ready the cords of your bow against their faces.
target: Nangin anni chu i hnunghchawntir dawn si a, I thla hruite chu an hmai tinin i kuai peih diam ang.

source: And a great band of people went after him, and of women making signs of grief and weeping for him.
target: Tin, mi naran leh hmeichhia awm chuma tap tap, mipui tam takin an zui a.

source: For the underworld is not able to give you praise, death gives you no honour: for those who go down into the underworld there is no hope in your mercy.
target: Thlan hian a fak thei si lo che a, thihna hian a chawimawi thei hek lo che: Kuarkhuruma chhukte chuan i thu tak chu an beisei t hei lo a ni.

source: Their works will not let them come back to their God, for a false spirit is in them and they have no knowledge of the Lord.
target: An pathian lama hawikîr tûrin An thliltih țhinte chu an bansan lo va, Nawhchizawrh rilru an zîngah a awm si a, LALPA chu an hre lo a ni.

source: You're going crazy
target: I kal â dawn nia

source: And from Mount Hor the line will go in the direction of Hamath; the farthest point of it will be at Zedad:
target: Hor tlâng ațanga Hamat luhna thlengin i siam ang a, ramri chhuahna chu Zedad-ah a ni ang a:

source: And David saw that the Lord had made his position safe as king over Israel, lifting up his kingdom on high because of his people Israel.
target: Tin, Davida chuan LALPAN Israel mite chunga lalah amah chu a tinghetin a mi Israelte avângin a ram chu a chawimawi a ni tih a hre ta a.

source: Who is there among you who will give ear to this? who will give attention to it for the time to come?
target: In zingah hian chungah chuan tunge beng chhi tûr awm che u? Hun lo la thleng tûr atân ngaithlaa hre tûr tunge awm che u?

source: Have no feeling of hate for him, but take him in hand seriously as a brother.
target: Nimahsela, hmelma angah zawng ruat suh ula, unau angin zilh zawk rawh u.

source: All the men of my circle keep away from me; and those dear to me are turned against me.
target: Ka thian tha zawng zawngten mi ten a, Ka hmangaih thinte chu ka lakah an ner ta.

source: Fair words are not to be looked for from a foolish man, much less are false lips in a ruler.
target: Thu sawi ropui leh mi â a inmawi lo va, Hmui dawthei leh lal fa a inmawi lo lehzual.

source: And Obed became the father of Jesse, and Jesse became the father of David.
target: tin, Obeda chuan Jesaia a hring a; tin, Jesaia chuan Davida a hring a ni.

source: Who is more intelligent?
target: Tu nge fing zawk?

source: And their hearts were not right with him, and they did not keep their agreement with him.
target: An thinlung chu a lakah a dik si lo va, An thuthlungah chuan a rinawm hek lo.

source: With you the horse and the horseman will be broken; with you the war-carriage and he who goes in it will be broken;
target: Nangmah hmangin sakawr leh a chung chuang ka tisawm a, Nangmah hmangin tawlailir leh a chunga chuang ka tisawm a;

source: Are we being watched?
target: Kan en reng em?

source: The sun has gone down
target: Ni a tla ta

source: I'm being arrested
target: Min man mek a ni

source: Your seed would have been like the sand, and your offspring like the dust: your name would not be cut off or come to an end before me.
target: i thlahte pawh tiau vaivut mal te te zatin an awm tûr. An hming chu ka hma ata thai bovin a awm lo vang a, tihboralin a awm hek lo vang, tiin.

source: And Jeroboam did not get back his power again in the life-time of Abijah; and the Lord sent death on him.
target: Abija lal lai chhûng chuan Jeroboaman din chauh lehnaa nei ta lo; LALPAN a hrem a, a thi ta a.

source: Don't approach the dog.
target: Ui chu hnaih suh.

source: Sami will be hired
target: Sami lak a ni ang

source: It matters
target: A pawithei

source: They didn't show up
target: An rawn lang lo

source: You have made him old before his time; he is covered with shame. (Selah.
target: A tlangvâl lai nite chu i tihtawisak a; Ani chu mualphonain i khuh ta si a. Selah

source: I was burned
target: Hal ka ni

source: But God is my witness that it was in pity for you that I did not come to Corinth at that time.
target: Nimahsela, ka thlarau chunga hretu atan Pathian ka ko a ni, nangmahni zuah tur che u in a ni, Korinth khuaa ka lo kal tak loh ni.

source: If you have nothing with which to make payment, he will take away your bed from under you.
target: Engmah pêk tûr i neih si loh chuan Engah nge i khum chu a laksak ang che?

source: And for a hundred talents of silver, he got a hundred thousand fighting-men from Israel.
target: Tin, Israel rama mi, mi chak huaisen nuaikhat tangka talent zain a ruai bawk a.

source: You're my beloved
target: Ka hmangaih i ni

source: You needed a coat
target: Coat i mamawh a ni

source: And so loud was his weeping, that it came to the ears of the Egyptians and all Pharaoh's house.
target: Tin, a țap ta râwih a, tichuan Aigupta-hovin an hria a, Pharaoa chhûngte pawhin an hre bawk a.

source: But let this power have its full effect, so that you may be made complete, needing nothing.
target: Tin, engmah tlachham lova in famkim a, in puma in him theih nan chhelna chuan thawk famkim rawh se.

source: I'm not totally stupid.
target: Ka â vek lo.

source: Lean on me.
target: Mi ngheng rawh.

source: We walked
target: Kan kal tawh

source: And we have faith in the Lord about you, that you are doing and will do the things about which we give you orders.
target: Thu kan pek apiang che u kha in zawm thin a, in la zawm leh zel pawh Lalpa-ah chuan kan ring che u a ni.

source: So he went another way, and not by the way he came to Beth-el.
target: chutichuan kawng dangah akal a, Bethel-a a lo kalna kawngah chuan a haw leh ta lo va.

source: But any person for whom the priest has given money, to make him his, may take of it with him; and those who come to birth in his house may take of his bread.
target: Amaherawhchu puithiamin tu emaw ama suma a lei a lei chuan, chu mi chuan a ei thei ang; tin, a ina piangte chuan a ei tur chu an ei ve ang.

source: But he comes so that the world may see that I have love for the Father, and that I am doing as I am ordered by the Father. Get up, and let us go.
target: nimahsela keiin Pa ka hmangaih leh, Pain thu mi pek ang zelin thil ka ti tih khawvelin an hriatna tur a nih hi. Tho rawh u, heta ta i chhuak ang u.

source: Foolish man, it is necessary for the seed which you put into the earth to undergo death in order that it may come to life again:
target: Nang mi a, nangmah ngeiin i tuh thin pawh hi a thih zet loh chuan tihnunin a awm hlei nem;

source: It'll burn
target: A kal zêl ang

source: I promise.
target: Ka tiam e.

source: Tom are you listening
target: Tom i ngaithla em

source: The young lions are in need and have no food; but those who are looking to the Lord will have every good thing.
target: Sakeibaknei vanglaite chu an tlachhamin an ril a tam thin a: LALPA zawngtue erawh chuan thil tha rêng rêng an tlachham lo vang.

source: Do no field-work and give to the Lord an offering made by fire.
target: Hna reng reng in thawk tur a ni lo; LALPA tana meia thilhlan in hlan tur a ni,'ti rawh tiin.

source: I paid in advance
target: Advance ka pe a

source: Who has full knowledge of his errors? make me clean from secret evil.
target: Tuin nge mahni tihsualte hre thei ang? Sual inthupte lakah hian mi tifihlim ang che.

source: They are wasted for need of food, biting the dry earth; their only hope of life is in the waste land.
target: Tlachham leh riltamin an cher a, Ram ro leh kawlh chu an khel a.

source: Where did you scold them
target: Khawiah nge i hau

source: But we will give praise to the Lord now and for ever. Praise be to the Lord.
target: Keini erawh chuan LALPA chu kan fak tawh ang. Tun atanga, kumkhuain. LALPA chu fak rawh u.

source: I started digging
target: Ka laih tan a

source: That you would send new witnesses against me, increasing your wrath against me, and letting loose new armies on me.
target: Ka chungah i thu i tharthawh a. Ka chungah i thinur i tipung a. A hlawp hlawpin mi bei a.

source: But all the silver and gold and the vessels of brass and iron are holy to the Lord: they are to come into the store-house of the Lord.
target: Tangkarua te, rangkachak te, dar leh thir bungbelte erawh chu LALPA pual a ni vek a: LALPA sum ina dah tur a ni ang, a ti a.

source: So make your minds ready, and keep on the watch, hoping with all your power for the grace which is to come to you at the revelation of Jesus Christ;
target: Chuvangin, in rilru puan vengin ngaihven ula, Isua Krista inlar hunah chuan khawngaihna a rawn kensak tur che u chu beidawng lovin beisei zel rawh u;

source: And Beth-lebaoth and Sharuhen; thirteen towns with their unwalled places;
target: Beth-leboath te, Saruhen te; khawpui sâwm leh pathum a khawperte nen:

source: And my God will give you all you have need of from the wealth of his glory in Christ Jesus.
target: Tin, ka Pathian chuan Krista Isuaa a ropuina ngahzia ang zelin in tlakchhamna tinreng pawh a phuhruksak ang che u.

source: I'm with NTT
target: NTT lamah ka ṭang

source: And they went out, preaching everywhere, the Lord working with them, and giving witness to the word by the signs which came after. So be it.
target: Tichuan anni chu an kal chhuak a, ram tinah thu an hril ta a, Lalpan anmahni a thawhpui a, a zuitu chhinchhiahnate chuanin thu chu a tinghet zel a. Amen.

source: And it's also beautiful.
target: Tin, a mawi bawk.
