source: I will not permit it.
target: Ka phal lo vang.

source: Call the cops
target: Sipaite ko rawh

source: And give a burned offering for a sweet smell to the Lord; two oxen, one male sheep, and seven he-lambs of the first year;
target: LALPA tana rimtui halral thilhlan erawh chu in hlan tur a ni; bawngpa tir pahnih, berampa pakhat, beram no a pa kum khat mi pasarih;

source: Examine it
target: Endik rawh

source: My heart was burning in my breast; while I was deep in thought the fire was lighted; then I said with my tongue,
target: Ka kawchhûngah hian ka thinlung a sa huam huam a; Ka ngaihtuah ka ngaihtuah chuan mei chu a alh chhuak a; Tin, ka lei hian thu ka sawi ta a:

source: You may go
target: I kal thei

source: I raised Tom.
target: Toma ka kai tho.

source: These are the laws which the Lord gave Moses in relation to a man and his wife, or a father and a young daughter who is under his authority.
target: Heng hi, mipa leh anupui kar leh pa leh a fanu nulat laia a pa ina la awm reng an kara dan tura LALPAN Mosia thu a pêkte chu a ni.

source: Who gives rain on the earth, and sends water on the fields:
target: Ani chuan lei chungah ruah a rawn surtir a, Lo chungah tui a rawn luantir a:

source: Did anyone miss me?
target: Tuin min ngai em?

source: Go and say to David my servant, The Lord says, You are not to make me a house for my living-place:
target: Ka chiahhlawh Davida chu va hrilh rawh, 'LALPA chuan heti hian a ti, Ka awmna tûrin nangin in mi saksak tûr ani lo;

source: I stopped.
target: Ka tawp.

source: Are you motivated
target: I infuih em

source: And there was war in heaven: Michael and his angels going out to the fight with the dragon; and the dragon and his angels made war,
target: Tin, vanah chuan indona a lo awm a; Mikaela leh a vantirhkohte chuan drakon chu an do va; drakon leh a tirhkohte pawh chuan an do ve a;

source: You demanded a lawyer.
target: Lawyer i phut a.

source: And you may not make any of your children go through the fire as an offering to Molech, and you may not put shame on the name of your God: I am the Lord.
target: Moleka puala meia tihluh turin i rila rahte reng reng i pe tur a ni lo va, i Pathian hming i tichhe tur a ni hek lo: Kei hi LALPA chu ka ni.

source: Take your time with it.
target: I hun hmang la.

source: We should go to sleep.
target: Kan mu tur a ni.

source: You'll be perfectly safe.
target: I him famkim ang.

source: Put me as a sign on your heart, as a sign on your arm; love is strong as death, and wrath bitter as the underworld: its coals are coals of fire; violent are its flames.
target: Min dah ta che, i tangah valthi angin, I bânah banbun iangin; Thihna chu Seol angin a nunrawng. A alh chhuak chu meialh chhuak a lo ni a, Meialh nasa tak mai chu.

source: What did he not buy?
target: Eng nge a lei loh?

source: I made my prayer to the Lord in my trouble: and the Lord gave me an answer, and put me in a wide place.
target: Ka manganna atangin LALPA chu ka ki va: LALPA chuan mi chhâng a, hmun thlawl takah mi rawmtir ta a.

source: You'll like it very much.
target: I duh hle ang.

source: I can't bend over.
target: Ka ben thei lo.

source: Keep walking
target: Kal zel rawh

source: I was celebrating
target: Ka lawm a

source: The upright will have the earth for their heritage, and will go on living there for ever.
target: Mi felte chuan ram hi an luah ang a, A chhûngah hian kumkhuain an awm ang.

source: At the sound of your voice I would give an answer, and you would have a desire for the work of your hands.
target: Mi ko vang a, keiin ka chhâng ang che; I kut hnathawh i ngaina an i.

source: Of the sons of Joab, Obadiah, the son of Jehiel; and with him two hundred and eighteen males.
target: Joaba thlahte zingah Jehiela fa Obadia, mipa zahnih leh sâwm leh pariat nên.

source: So pulling Jeremiah up with the cords they got him out of the water-hole: and Jeremiah was kept in the place of the armed watchmen.
target: Tin, Jeremia chu lei hnuai rip ata chu hruiin an khai chhuak ta a: tin, Jeremia chu vengtu hung chhûngah chuan a awm ta reng a.

source: I eat meat
target: Sa ka nei

source: And in front of the rooms was a walk, ten cubits wide and a hundred cubits long; and their doors were facing north.
target: Pindante inkârah chuan tawng sawma zau, tawng zaa sei kal tlangna a awm a, a kawngkhârte chuan hmâr lam a hawi a.

source: You have gone up on high, taking your prisoners with you; you have taken offerings from men; the Lord God has taken his place on the seat of his power.
target: Nang chu chung lamah i chho va, i mante chu salah i hruai a; Mihringte zingah thilpekte i dawng a, A ni, helhmangte zingah pawh; LALPA Pathianc hu an hnêna a awm theih nân.

source: Let's get together.
target: I inkhawm ang u.

source: Why do your disciples go against the teaching of the fathers? for they take food with unwashed hands.
target: Engatinge i zirtirten upate thuro chhiah chu an bawhchhiat thin? Chhang an eiin an kut an sil ngai si lo va, an ti a.

source: Do they pay you well
target: An hlawh tha em

source: But Jehu did not keep himself from all the sins of Jeroboam, the son of Nebat, and the evil he made Israel do; the gold oxen were still in Beth-el and in Dan.
target: Nimahsela Nebata fapa Jeroboama sualna- Israel-hote thil tihsualtira a tihte chu Jehua chuan a ba chuan lo, chu chu Bethel khua leh Dan khuaa rangkachak bawng no lemte biak a ni.

source: Or while the other is still a great distance away, he sends representatives requesting conditions of peace.
target: Chuti a nih loh vek leh, lal dang chu hla taka a la awm laiin inremna lam thutiam dil turin palai a tir ang.

source: I can't trust him
target: Amah chu ka ring thei lo

source: And they made themselves servants of disgusting things, though the Lord had said, You are not to do this.
target: LALPAN an hnêna, Hetiang hi ti suh u, a tih milemte rawng an bâwl bawk thin.

source: Keep my soul, for I am true to you; O my God, give salvation to your servant, whose hope is in you.
target: Ka nunna hi vawng tha ang che; Pathian ngaihsak mi ka ni si a: Aw, nang ka Pathian, nangmah ringtu, i chhiahhlawh hi chhandam ang che.

source: The sinner is overturned in his evil-doing, but the upright man has hope in his righteousness.
target: Mi suaksual chu a thiltih sualah chuan theh luh a ni a, Mi fel erawh chuan a thihnaah nghahfâk a nei.

source: Lighting the lights before the Lord, as the Lord had given him orders.
target: Tin, khawnvarte chu LALPA hmaah chuan a dah a; LALPAN Mosia thu apêk ang khan.

source: There's plenty of time left.
target: Hun a la tam tawh.

source: You will again get up and have mercy on Zion: for the time has come for her to be comforted.
target: I tho vang a, Zion tlâng chu i khawngaih ang: Ani chu khawngaih a hun tawh si a, a ni, hun ruat chu a tlâng ta.

source: I'm back.
target: Ka rawn kir leh.

source: Do they know?
target: An hria em?

source: And they made designs, all of them together, to come and make an attack on Jerusalem, causing trouble there.
target: tichuan Jerusalem chu rawn beia buaina rawn siam an phiar tlâng ta a.

source: We were confused as well.
target: Kan buai ve bawk.

source: Now where there is forgiveness of these, there is no more offering for sin.
target: Tichuan chutiangte ngaihdamna apiangah chuan sual tan thil hlan a awm tawh lo a ni.

source: Try to smile
target: Nuih tum rawh

source: And the man, looking at her, said nothing, waiting to see if the Lord had given his journey a good outcome.
target: Tin, chhiahhlawh chuan ani chu a en reng a; LALPAN a va zinna chu a hlawhtlintîr leh tîr loh hriat nân a ngawi reng mai a.

source: But Jesus took him by the hand, lifting him up; and he got up.
target: Isua erawh chuan a kut a chelh a, a kaitho va; tin, a lo tho ta mai a.

source: The desire of the evil-doer is fixed on evil: he has no kind feeling for his neighbour.
target: Mi suaksual rilru chuan thi tha lo a duh a, A thenawmten a mitah duhsakna an hmu lo.

source: It works now
target: A dik tawh e

source: She doesn't love me.
target: Min hmangaih lo.

source: Hey, I heard that.
target: Hei, chu chu ka hre ta.

source: We all fell asleep.
target: Kan muhil vek a.

source: And put the oil on Aaron and his sons, making them holy to do the work of priests to me.
target: Tin, ka tân puithiam hnathawh thawka ka rawng an bâwl theih nân Arona leh a fapate chu hriak thihin i tithianghlim tur a ni.

source: Are you looking for something
target: Thil i zawng em

source: At the light of your arrows they went away, at the shining of your polished spear.
target: Tûrni chhawrthlapui an ding reng mahni hmunah, i thal lêng chhuak êngah te leh, i fei tlê zawr zawr êngah chuan.

source: Don't go, Tom
target: Kal suh, Tom

source: I succeeded
target: Ka hlawhtling ta

source: They don't talk about it.
target: An sawi ngai lo.

source: Let those who say this keep in mind that, what we are in word by letters when we are away, so will we be in act when we are present.
target: Chutiang mi chuan hei hi ngaihtuah rawh se, in hnena kan awm loh laia lehkha thawna thua kan awm angin in hnena kan awm hunah pawh thiltihah kan awm bawk ang.

source: I felt frustrated
target: Ka lungawi lo hle

source: Adah had a son Eliphaz; and Basemath was the mother of Reuel;
target: Tin, Adai chuan Eliphaza chu Esauva a hrinsak a; Besemathi chuan Reuela a hring a;

source: How much less may I give an answer to him, using the right words in argument with him?
target: Kei tehlulin engtin nge a ni chu ka chhan ang a, Amah hnial nân thu eng nge in thlan chhuah ang?

source: When evening came the disciples went down to the sea;
target: Tin, khua a lo tlai lam chuan a zirtirte chu dilah chuan an zuk kal a;

source: So then, as we have the chance, let us do good to all men, and specially to those who are of the family of the faith.
target: Chutichuan remchang hun kan neihzia ang zelin mi zawng zawng chungah thil tha i ti ang u, rinna chhungte zinga mi chungah i ti deuh ber ang u.

source: Nobody's laughing
target: Tumah an nui lo

source: Sorrow to her who is uncontrolled and unclean, the cruel town!
target: Hel hmang leh bawlhhlawh , hnehchhiah hmang khawpui chu a chung a pik e!

source: Popliteal fossa
target: Kaihza tha

source: It's a bottle of whiskey.
target: Whiskey bur a ni.

source: Tom got beaten up.
target: Tom chu a vuak a.

source: Not one newly taken into the church, for fear that, through his high opinion of himself, he may come into the same sin as the Evil One.
target: Ring thar mi ni tur a ni lo, chutilochuan chapovin a awm ang a, diabola thiam loh channa chu a chang ve dah ang e.

source: Don't mess with us.
target: Min buaipui suh.

source: Then I will go against you, and I will give you punishment, I myself, seven times for all your sins.
target: kei pawh nangmahni kalhzawngin ka awm ang a, keimah ngeiin in sual avangin vawi sarih ka hrem ang che u.

source: If I let you go out of my thoughts, and if I do not put Jerusalem before my greatest joy, let my tongue be fixed to the roof of my mouth.
target: Ka hriat reng loh che chuan, Ka lei hi ka dangah bet tlat rawh se; Ka hlimna ber aia Jerusalem ka duh zawk loh chuan.

source: But the wise made answer, saying, There may not be enough for us and you; it would be better for you to go to the traders and get oil for yourselves.
target: Nimahsela, a fingte chuan, ‘Keini leh nangni tan a daih lo vang e; a zuartute hnenah kal ula lei ve zawk rawh u,’ tiin an chhang a.

source: And said to them in Shiloh in the land of Canaan, The Lord gave orders by Moses that we were to have towns for living in, with their grass-lands for our cattle.
target: Kanaan rama Silo khuaah chuan, LALPAN Mosia hmangin kan awmna tur khawpuite, kan ran tlatna tur a daivelte nen min pe turin thu a lo pe tawh asin, tiin a an sawi a.

source: I might stay
target: Ka châm maithei

source: I do love you.
target: Ka hmangaih che a lâwm.

source: They're lazy
target: An that chhia

source: And the rest said, Let him be; let us see if Elijah will come to his help.
target: Tin, mi dangte chuan, Awm rawh se; amah la thla turin Elija a lo kal emaw i en ang u, an ti a.

source: My soul is watching for the Lord more than those who are watching for the morning; yes, more than the watchers for the morning.
target: Vengtuten khawvar an thlir aia nasain, A ni, vengtuten khawvar an thlir aia nasa mahin, Ka nuna hian LALPA chu a thlir reng thin a ni.

source: Then the children of Dan went on their way; and when Micah saw that they were stronger than he, he went back to his house.
target: Tichuan Dana thlahteho chu an kal ta a: tin, Mika chuan beih ngam rual niin a hre si lo va, a in lamah a haw leh ta a.

source: He will wait
target: A lo nghâk ang

source: Tom'll go.
target: Tom-a a kal dawn.

source: If a woman, being young and under the authority of her father, takes an oath to the Lord or gives an undertaking;
target: Pate ina awm lai nula pawhin LALPA hnena thu a tiam emaw, chhechhama intiamkamna emaw a neih chuan,

source: He eats a lot.
target: Tam tak a ei.

source: Then David said, This is the house of the Lord God, and this is the altar for Israel's burned offerings.
target: Tichuan Davidan, Hei hi LALPA Pathian in a lo ni a, hei hi Israelte hâlral thilhlanna mâicham a lo nih hi le, a ti a.

source: Then these chief rulers and the captains came to the king and said to him, O King Darius, have life for ever.
target: Tichuan, hotute leh thuneitute chu lal hnênah chuan an inhâwr khâwm a, hetiang hian an sawi a: Lal Daria, kumkhuain dam ang che.

source: He was a mullah.
target: Mullah a ni a.

source: You aren't kidding
target: I fiamthu lo

source: He will work with us.
target: Kan thawhpui ang.

source: But the Lord is in his holy Temple: let all the earth be quiet before him.
target: LALPA erawhchu a in thianghlimah a awm a ni: Leia mi zawng zawngte chu ngawi țhiap rawh se.

source: And with every deceit of wrongdoing among those whose fate is destruction; because they were quite without that love of the true faith by which they might have salvation.
target: boral mekte tan fel lohna bumna tinreng nen a ni ang; chhandama an awm theihna turin thutak hmangaihna chu an pawm loh avang a ni.

source: And those who were present said, Then who may have salvation?
target: Tin, chu thu hriate chuan, A nih leh, tunge chhandam ni thei ang le? an ti a.

source: It's the law
target: Dan a ni

source: Do you want to drink some tea?
target: Tea i in duh em?

source: For if a man comes into your Synagogue in fair clothing and with a gold ring, and a poor man comes in with dirty clothing,
target: In inkhawmna inah mi rangkachak zungbun bun, puan mawi tak sin lo lut sela, tin, mi rethei puan chhe tak sin lo lut bawk sela;

source: A boy spoke to me.
target: Mipa naupang pakhat chuan min rawn bia a.

source: And the field is the world; and the good seed is the sons of the kingdom; and the evil seeds are the sons of the Evil One;
target: lo chu khawvel hi a ni a; chi thate chu ram fate an ni a; buh lemte chu mi sual fate an ni a;

source: And he put it open before me, and it had writing on the front and on the back; words of grief and sorrow and trouble were recorded in it.
target: ka hmâah a han pharh a, a chhûng lam leh a pâwn lama ziak a ni a; țahnate, lusûnna te, chungpikna te ziakin a awm a.

source: Go into a hole in the rock, covering yourselves with dust, in fear of the Lord, before the glory of his power.
target: LALPA hlauhawmna lak ațang leh a mawina ropuina lak ațang chuan lungpuiah chuan lût ula, vaivutah biru rawh u.

source: Don't make a fool of yourself.
target: Mi â siam suh.

source: I can't drink wine
target: Zu ka in thei lo

source: Josiah was eight years old when he became king; he was ruling in Jerusalem for thirty-one years.
target: Josia chu a lal tantirhin kum riat mi a ni a; Jerusalem-ah kum sâwmthum leh kum khat a lal a.

source: He is a prophetic figure.
target: Zawlnei mi a ni.

source: Take this book of the law and put it by the ark of the Lord's agreement, so that it may be a witness against you.
target: He dan bu hi la ula, in chungchang thua hretu atan LALPA in Pathian thuthlung bawk sirah dah rawh u.

source: I left
target: Ka kal

source: I climbed Mt Aso
target: Mt Aso ka lawn a

source: I would make clear the number of my steps, I would put it before him like a prince! The words of Job are ended.
target: Ka pheikhai zat pawh ka hriilh ang a, Mi lain ni ve angin amah ka pan tûr.

source: Tom is hot
target: Toma sa

source: Don't stare
target: Melh suh

source: What for?
target: Eng atan?

source: And Jacob gave Pharaoh his blessing, and went out from before him.
target: Tin, Jakoban Pharaoa chu mal a sâwmsak leh a, Pharaoa hnên ata chu a chhuak ta a.

source: I stopped
target: Ka tawp

source: You will take a nap.
target: Nap i la ang.

source: For if I am a preacher of the good news, I have no cause for pride in this; because I am forced to do so, for a curse is on me if I do not.
target: Chanchin Tha hril mah ila, chhuan tur reng reng ka nei si lo, tih makmawh ka chungah a innghat a ni si a; Chanchin Tha hril suh ila, ka chung a pik dawn si a.

source: You worry too much.
target: I lungkham lutuk.

source: All the brothers send their love to you. Give one another a holy kiss.
target: Unau zawng zawng hian chibai an buk a che u. Fawh thianghlimin chibai inbuk theuh rawh u.

source: The Lord will be King for ever; your God, O Zion, will be King through all generations. Praise be to the Lord.
target: LALPA chu kumkhuain lalah a thu ang, Aw Zion, i Pathian chu chuan zawng zawng thlengin lalah a thu ang.

source: For in a short time the evil-doer will be gone: you will go searching for his place, and it will not be there.
target: Rei lote achinah mi suaksual chu a awm tawh dawn si lo: A ni, a awmna hmun chu en en mah la, a awm tawh lo vang.

source: We're all going home.
target: Kan haw vek tawh.

source: I'll do that
target: Kha kha ka ti ang

source: To see your power and your glory, as I have seen you in the holy place.
target: Chutiang bawkin hmun thianghlimah chuan ka en reng che kha, I thiltihthiehna leh i ropuina hmu tûrin.

source: Much more, if we now have righteousness by his blood, will salvation from the wrath of God come to us through him.
target: Chutichuan a thisena thiam chantira kan awm tawh hnu hian, amah avangin Pathian thinurna lak ata chu chhandamin kan awm ngei ang.

source: Do you see me?
target: Mi lo hmu em?

source: You will be certain that your seed will be great, and your offspring like the plants of the earth.
target: I thlahte chu tam tak an ni ang a, I rila rahte chu leia hlobet zat an ni tih i hria ang.

source: It's the place where you stand.
target: I dinna hmun a ni.

source: I saw with hate those who were untrue to you; for they did not keep your saying.
target: Vervek taka titute chu ka en a, ka lungni lo va; I thu an zamw loh avângin.

source: So long
target: A rei lutuk

source: He puts an end to wars over all the earth; by him the bow is broken, and the spear cut in two, and the carriage burned in the fire.
target: Ani chuan indonate chu kawlkil thlengin a tireh thin a; Thal ngul chu a titliak a, fei chu a sat bung thin a; Tawlailirte chu meiah a rawh ral thin.

source: I will not put any evil thing before my eyes; I am against all turning to one side; I will not have it near me.
target: thil tha lo rêng rêng ka mithmuhah chuan ka dah lo vang: Kal pengte thiltih chu ka hua a ni; Keimahah a bet lo vang.

source: Is anyone thirsty
target: Tuihâl in awm em

source: So if any man is in Christ, he is in a new world: the old things have come to an end; they have truly become new.
target: Chu mi avang chuan tupawh Kristaa a awm chuan thil siam thar a lo ni a; thil hluite chu a ral ta a; ngai teh u, a lo thar ta.

source: I haven't always been shy.
target: Ka zak ngai lo.

source: Truly, O Lord, the kings of Assyria have made waste the nations and their lands,
target: LALPA, Assuria lalten hnamte leh an ramte chu an tichhe thin tak a,

source: I see all the birds of the mountains, and the beasts of the field are mine.
target: Tlânga sava zawng zawng ka hre vek a: Ram sate pawh hi ka ta a ni.

source: I want Mary
target: Mary ka duh

source: I understood that
target: Chu chu ka hrethiam ta

source: There are four things which are little on the earth, but they are very wise:
target: Thil te tam te pali lei chungah hian a awm a; Mahse an fing hle reuh mai.

source: And put your honour on him, so that all the children of Israel may be under his authority.
target: Tin, Israela thlah pungkhawmho zang zanwgin a thu an awih theih nan thuneihna hlan rawh.

source: She is a professor
target: Professor a ni a

source: Me too
target: Kei pawh le

source: Keep back
target: Dah let rawh

source: And the sons of Eshek his brother: Ulam his oldest son, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
target: Tin, a unaupa Eseka fapate chu Ulama a fa tir a ni a, a dawttu chu Jeusa a ni a, a dawtlehtu chu Elipheleta a ni.

source: And further, the Glory of Israel will not say what is false, and his purpose may not be changed: for he is not a man, whose purpose may be changed.
target: Tin, Israelte Thahruia chu a daw lo vang a, a lamlet hek lo vang; mihring anga lamlet leh mai mi ani si lo va, a ti a.

source: She is eight
target: Kum riat a ni

source: And take these ten cheeses to the captain of their thousand, and see how your brothers are and come back with a sign to say how they are.
target: Tin, bawnghnute khal tlang sawmhi an pawla sâng hotu kensak la; tin, i unaute engtin emaw an awm han zawt la, an chanchin i hriatna han hawn ang che.

source: You can't watch the game.
target: Game i en thei lo.

source: But Abraham made a protest to Abimelech because of a water-hole which Abimelech's servants had taken by force.
target: Tin, Abimeleka chhiahhlawhten tuichhunchhuah an chhuhsak a âng chuan Abrahaman Abimeleka chu a zilh a.

source: And Abraham said, Take care that you do not let my son go back to that land.
target: Tin, Abrahama chuan a hnênah, Ka fapa hi chutah chuan hruai kîr leh lo tûrin fîmkhur rawh.

source: He chuckled
target: A nui lui thei

source: So keep the words of this agreement and do them, so that it may be well for you in everything you do.
target: Chutichuan in thiltih zawng zawnga in hmuingil zel theih nan he thuthlung thute hi pawm ula, zawm rawh u.

source: Take not your true word quite out of my mouth; for I have put my hope in your decisions.
target: Tin, thutak thu chu ka ka ata hi la chhuak vek suh ang che; I rorêlnate chu ka beisei si thin a.

source: Don't get involved
target: Inrawlh suh

source: And he had the house of the Lord and the king's house and all the houses of Jerusalem, even every great house, burned with fire;
target: LALPA in leh lal in chu a hal a: Jerusalem in zawng zawng, in ropui tak takte chu a hal a;

source: He's a car salesman
target: Car zuar a ni a

source: See, I am sending against you strange men, feared among the nations: they will let loose their swords against your bright wisdom, they will make your glory a common thing.
target: ngai rawh, awze mi, hnam țihbaiawm tak i hnênah ka rawntîr dawn a ni; i finna rah mawi chungah an khandaih an vilik ang a, i ropuina an tikhawlo vang.

source: And they gave him wine mixed with myrrh; but he did not take it.
target: Tin, uain, murra nena pawlh an pe a, nimahsela a la duh lo va.

source: The hair is cut off from the head of Gaza; Ashkelon has come to nothing; the last of the Anakim are deeply wounding themselves.
target: Gaza mite lu a kawng ta, Askelon chu a chimit ta a, A ram phaia la cheng chhunte chu; Eng chen nge i in zai dawn?

source: And they put Abner's body to rest in Hebron; and the king and all the people were weeping loudly by the resting-place of Abner's body.
target: TinAbnera chu Hebron-ah chuan an phûm a: lal chuan a awm a chhuah a, Abnera thlanah chuan a tap ta a; mipui zawng zawng pawh an tap a.

source: For the Lord saw how bitter was the trouble of Israel, and that everyone was cut off, he who was shut up and he who went free, and that Israel had no helper.
target: Israelte hreawmzia chu a nasa êm êm mai tih a hre si a; khuahkhirh leh khirh lohte pawh an awm si lo va, Israelte tanpuitu tûr tumah an awm hek lo.

source: My wife's pregnant.
target: Ka nupui a rai a.

source: He then, seeing Peter and John going into the Temple, made a request to them.
target: chu mi chuan Petera leh Johana Pathian biak ina lut tur chu a hmu a, kut a dawh a.

source: The sinner gets the payment of deceit; but his reward is certain who puts in the seed of righteousness.
target: Mi suaksual chuan bumna hlawh a danwg thin a, Felna tuhtu erawh chua a taktak hlawh a dawng thin.

source: Fear has overcome them, they have no more answers to give; they have come to an end of words.
target: An inkhap thlu der a, an dan reng hi. Kam khat mah sawi tûr an nei ta lo.

source: Give ear with care to my words, and keep what I say in your minds.
target: Ka sawi hi ngun takin ngai ula, Ka puan chhuah hi in bengah lut rawh se.

source: Take up now a song of grief for the ruler of Israel, and say,
target: Chu lovah pawh chuan Israel hotute chungchângah sûnna hla phuah la,

source: My heart goes out in pain, my strength is wasting away; as for the light of my eyes, it is gone from me.
target: Ka thin hi a phu hlawp hlawp a, thahrui ka nei ta lo va: Ka mit varna lah chuan mi awm lohsan ta bawk a.

source: They were outside
target: Pawnah an awm a

source: Then the Pharisees went and had a meeting to see how they might make use of his words to take him.
target: Chu mi lai chuan Pharisaite chuan a thu sawia an man theihnazia tur an va inrawn a.

source: His feeling will no longer be bitter; he will not keep his wrath for ever.
target: Ani chuan a hau lo fo vang a; A thinur chu a pai kumkhua hek lo vang.

source: It's an expression
target: Expression a ni

source: Would you like to have it?
target: I neih duh em?

source: Shaking with passion, he is biting the earth; he is not able to keep quiet at the sound of the horn;
target: Hlauhawm tak leh thinur takin a khawh puat puat a, awtawrâwt thawmah a ding hle hle thei lo.

source: If you put far away the evil of your hands, and let no wrongdoing have a place in your tent;
target: I kuta khawlohna a awm chuan dah bo daih la, I puan inah fel lohna cheng suh sela;

source: The smooth lips and the tongue of pride will be cut off by the Lord.
target: LALPA chuan fak derna hmui zawng zawng chu a hlep ang a, Thu chapo tak sawine lei nên chuan:

source: They took the ark of God into the house of Dagon and put it by the side of Dagon.
target: Tin, Philistia mite chuan Pathian bâwm chu an la a, Dagona biak inah an la lût a, Dagona kiangah chuan an dah a.

source: They went running together, and the other disciple got in front of Peter and came first to the hole in the rock;
target: Tin, an tlan dun a; zirtir dang chuan Petera a tlan khalh a, thlan chu a thleng hmasa a.

source: And if you have not been true in your care of the property of other people, who will give you that which is yours?
target: Mi dang ta chungah mah in lo rinawm tawh loh chuan nangmahni ta chu tuin nge pe ang che u?

source: I teach here
target: Hetah ka zirtir

source: And while they were attempting to put him to death, news came to the chief captain of the band that all Jerusalem was out of control.
target: Tin, ani chu tihhlum an tum lai chuan Jerusalem khuaa mi zawng zawng an buai tih thu chu sipai pawl hotu lal ber hnen a han thleng a.

source: They greeted us warmly.
target: Min chibai a.

source: I am burning with wrath, because of the sinners who have given up your law.
target: Lungnih lohna nasa tak hian mi tlakbuak ta a, Mi suaksual i dan kalsantute avângin.

source: I blame Tom.
target: Tom-a ka dem.

source: Go get it
target: Va nei rawh

source: If you have knowledge that he is upright, it is clear to you that everyone who does righteousness is his offspring.
target: Amah chu mi fel a ni tih in hriat chuan mi tupawh felna ti chu ama hrin a ni tih in hria e.

source: Do you recall me at all?
target: Min hre reng em?

source: Beat it, kids!
target: Hneh rawh, naupang

source: I am here
target: Hetah ka awm

source: Then he said, Go out to all your neighbours and get vessels, a very great number of them.
target: Tichuan ani chuan, Va kal a la, i thenawmteho zawng zawng bel, bel ruak va hawh khâwm tawh khai: tlemte mai zawng hawh suh.

source: I will make my flock safe, and they will no longer be taken away, and I will be judge between sheep and sheep.
target: chuvangin ka berâmte chu ka chhanhim ang a, saseh mai an ni tawh lo vang a, berâmte kar thu ka relsak ang.

source: Hold on.
target: Lo zel rawh.

source: O my people, what have I done to you? how have I been a weariness to you? give answer against me.
target: Aw kamite u, in chungah eng nge ka tih tâk? Eng kawngin nge ka tihhah che u? Mi han khing teh u.

source: But he kept quiet and said nothing. Again the high priest questioning him said, Are you the Christ, the son of the Holy One?
target: Ani erawh chu a ngawi reng a, engmahin a chhang lo. Puithiam Lalber chuan a hnenah, Krista, Engthawla Fapa chu i ni em? tiin a zawt leh a.

source: But when they saw that he was a Jew, all of them with one voice went on crying out for about two hours, Great is Diana of Ephesus.
target: Nimahsela ani chu Juda mi a ni tih an hriat veleh, darkar hnih lai aw rual takin, Ephesi khuaa mi Diani hi ropui tak a ni! ti hlirin an au an au va.

source: I would give them the best grain for food; you would be full of honey from the rock.
target: Nangni chu buhchangrumin ka chawm ang che u a, Lungpuia khawzuin ka titlai ang che u.

source: Check again
target: Ennawn leh rawh

source: They passed me by.
target: Min paltlang a.

source: The good man will be like a tall tree in his strength; his growth will be as the wide-stretching trees of Lebanon.
target: Mi fel chu tum angin a duah hluah hluah ang a:L Lebanon tlânga sidar thing angin a thang uak uak ang.

source: My spirit is broken, my days are ended, the last resting-place is ready for me.
target: Ka thlarau a rawih ta, ka nite a ral ta, Ka chapual chu thlan a ni ta.

source: By me the great teeth of the evil-doer were broken, and I made him give up what he had violently taken away.
target: Mi fel lo ngho chu ka titliak a, A haa a thil seh chu ka pawt chhuak a.

source: I haven't told her yet
target: Ka la hrilh lo

source: My son, keep the rule of your father, and have in memory the teaching of your mother:
target: Ka fapa, i pa thupêk chu zawm la, I nu zirtirna chu hawisan suh.

source: And most of all be warm in your love for one another; because in love there is forgiveness for sins without number:
target: Eng dang zawng aiin inhmangaih tawn uar rawh u; hmangaihnain sual tam tak a khuh si thin a.

source: I'm tense.
target: Ka pheklek.

source: The sun to have rule by day: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.
target: Ni, chhûnga rorêltu atân: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: Then he quickly took the head-band from his eyes; and the king of Israel saw that he was one of the prophets.
target: Tin, ani chuan a mit ata chalhrenna chu a lim ta thuai a; tin, Israel lal chuan zâwlneite zinga mi a ni tih a hre ta a.

source: I buy a videotape.
target: Videotape ka lei a.

source: Have you been in a fight?
target: Insual tawh em?

source: He undoes the chains of kings, and puts his band on them;
target: Lalte phuarna chu a phelh a, An kawng chu kawnghrenin a hreng a.

source: And the sons of Merari by their families: Mahli and Mushi. These are the families of the Levites in the order of their fathers' houses.
target: An thlahtu Meraria fapate chu Malia leh Misia an ni. Heng hi an chhûngkua ang zela Levi-ho thlahte chu an ni.

source: It's against the rules.
target: Dan kalh a ni.

source: They looked relieved
target: An hahdam hmel hle

source: So you will see the land before you, but you will not go into the land which I am giving to the children of Israel.
target: Ram chu i han hmu ang a; nimahsela Israela thlahte ka pêk ramah chuan i lut lo vang, tiin.

source: Replace it
target: Thlâkthleng rawh

source: So they put up the tent for Absalom on the top of the house, and Absalom went in to his father's women before the eyes of all Israel.
target: Chutichuanin chungah Absaloma tan puan in an zar a; tichuanIsrael mite zawng zawng mithmuhah a pa hmeite hnênah chuan a lût a.

source: It's already 11 o'clock.
target: Dar 11 a ri tawh.

source: By you all the limits of the earth were fixed; you have made summer and winter.
target: Nangin leilung ramrite zawng zawng chu i kham vek a: Nangin nipui leh thlasik hi i siam a.

source: So Mordecai went away and did everything as Esther had said.
target: Chutichuan Mordekaia chu a kal a, Estherin thu a pêk zawng zawng ang chuan a ti a.

source: And Shemaiah his son had sons, rulers over the family of their father, for they were able men.
target: A fapa Semaia lakah chuan fapa an chhûngkaw puipate an piang bawk a; mi chak huaisen an ni hlawm a ni.

source: To him who by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.
target: Finnaa van siamtu hnênah chuan: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: I hear sirens
target: Sirens ri ka hria

source: I'm not counting you.
target: Ka chhiar lo che.

source: And by chance a certain priest was going down that way: and when he saw him, he went by on the other side.
target: Tin, puithiam tu emaw chu mi kawngah chuan a zuk kal kher a, a hmuh veleh kawng sir lehlamah a hel ta mai a.

source: I quit my job.
target: Ka hnâ aṭangin ka bang.

source: For this cause I will put thorns in her road, building up a wall round her so that she may not go on her way.
target: Chuvângin ngai teh, i kawng chu hlîngin ka ping ang a, A mah dâlin dai ka theu vang a, A kawngte a hmu lo vang.

source: The children of Ephraim, armed with bows, were turned back on the day of the fight.
target: Ephraiam thlahte chu râlthuama inthuam a, thal ngul kengin, Inbei niah chuan an tlânchhia a.

source: I am the good keeper of sheep: the good keeper gives his life for the sheep.
target: Kei beram vengtu tha ka ni; beram vengtu thain beramte tan a nun a pe thin.

source: I survived
target: Ka himdam e

source: Putting all your troubles on him, for he takes care of you.
target: anin a ngaihsak thin che u avangin in manganna zawng zawng ama chungah nghat vek rawh u.

source: And the altar of burned offerings with all its vessels, and the washing-vessel with its base,
target: tin, hâlrala thil hlanna maichâm, a bungbêl zawng zawng te nên, maihûn leh a hûn chhan te;

source: They've all been paged
target: An page vek tawh

source: But I will go on ever hoping, and increasing in all your praise.
target: Nimahsela kei zawngin ka beisei fo vang a, Ka la fak zual deuh deuh ang che.

source: But he was right.
target: Mahse a dik a ni.

source: And when his disciples had news of it, they came and took up his body, and put it in its last resting-place.
target: Tin, a zirtirte chuan an hriat veleh a ruang chu an va hlawm a, thlanah an zalh ta a.

source: And a great number will go with them in their evil ways, through whom the true way will have a bad name.
target: Tin, mi tam takin an hurna lam thiltihte chu an ching ve ang a, anmahni avangin kawng dik tak chu sawichhiat a ni ang.

source: Our fathers had the manna in the waste land, as the Writings say, He gave them bread from heaven.
target: Kan thlahtuten thlalerah manna kha an ei thin, ‘Van atang chuan an hnenah chhang ei tur a pe,’ tih ziak angin, an ti a.

source: We're hardworking
target: Taima tak kan ni

source: You're awful
target: I tenawm

source: Any person touching any such unclean thing will be unclean till evening, and may not take of the holy food till his flesh has been bathed in water;
target: chutiang khawihtu chu tlai lam thlengin a bawlhhlawh ang a, tin, a inbual loh chuan thil thianghlimte zinga mi chu a ei tur a ni lo.

source: Have no joy, O Israel, and do not be glad like the nations; for you have been untrue to your God; your desire has been for the loose woman's reward on every grain-floor.
target: Aw Isrsel, hnam dangte angin hlim so bûng bûng khawpin lâwm suh; I pathian chu nawhchi zawrhsan a, Hruih zâwl tina aman chu i ngaina si a.

source: We want to learn
target: Zir kan duh a ni

source: And Jehoiada, chief of the family of Aaron, and with him three thousand, seven hundred men;
target: Tin, Jehoiada chu Arona thlah hruaitu a ni a, a hnênah 3,700 an tel ve a;

source: I built a new house.
target: In thar ka sa a.

source: And about his coming back from the dead, never again to go to destruction, he has said these words, I will give you the holy and certain mercies of David.
target: Tawihna hmuna kal leh lo turin Pathianin ani chu mitthi zing ata a kaihthawh turzia thu chu heti hian a sawi, ‘Davida hnenah khawngaihna ka tiam tlatte kha nangmah ka pe ang che,’ tiin.

source: If then the son makes you free, you will be truly free.
target: Chutichuan Fapain bawih a ban che u chuan in chhuak tak meuh ang.

source: We don't get along very well.
target: Kan inrem vak lo.

source: I'm trying
target: Ka tum mek

source: The Jews said, The building of this Temple took forty-six years; and you will put it up in three days!
target: Tin, Judate chuan, He in hi kum sawmli leh kum ruk sak a ni, nangin ni thum chhungin i tungding ang maw? an ti a.

source: You won't feel me.
target: Min hre lovang.

source: I approve
target: Ka pawm e

source: Give my love to Urbanus, a worker in Christ with us, and to my dear Stachys.
target: Kristaa kan hnathawhpui Urbana leh ka duh tak Stakua kha chibai mi buksak ang che u.

source: And the people were angry with Moses and said, If only death had overtaken us when our brothers came to their death before the Lord!
target: Tin, mipui chuan, LALPA hmaa kan unaute an thih lai khan pathianin min lo tihlum ve ta then zawk sela aw!

source: Just say yes.
target: Aw ti mai rawh.

source: It went OK
target: A ṭha vek e

source: They can't see you
target: An hmu thei lo che

source: I haven't opened it yet.
target: Ka la hawng lo.

source: By his knowledge the deep was parted, and dew came dropping from the skies.
target: A thiamnain tuifinriatte a sah a, Chhumte chuan dai a fartir a.

source: I looked
target: Ka en tawh

source: And we are writing these things to you so that our joy may be made complete.
target: Tichuan, kan lawm a famkim theih nan heng thute hi kan ziak a nih hi.

source: I'll write
target: Ka ziak ang

source: Because it has been my saviour from all my trouble; and my eyes have seen the punishment of my haters.
target: Ka manganna zawng zawngah chuan mi chhanchhuak ta si a; Mi dotute chunga ka thu duhthusam thleng chu ka mitin a hmu ta a ni.

source: I am yours, O be my saviour; for my desire has been for your rules.
target: I ta ka nih hi, mi chhandam ang che; I thununna thute chu ka zawng si a.

source: Do you understand?
target: I hrethiam em?

source: And if the man who has given the field has a desire to get it back, let him give a fifth more than the price at which it was valued and it will be his.
target: A hlantuin a tlan leh dawn tak tak chuan a man i ruat zat hmun ngaa thena hmun khat a belh ang a, a ta ani leh chiah ang.

source: Because you, brothers, were marked out to be free; only do not make use of your free condition to give the flesh its chance, but through love be servants one to another.
target: Nangni unaute u, bawih ni lo turin koh in ni si a; nimahsela in bawih nih lohna chu tisa tana remchangah hmang suh ula, hmangaihnain rawng inbwlsak tawn theuh zawk rawh u.

source: In his time, Edom made themselves free from the rule of Judah, and took a king for themselves.
target: Ama chhanah chuan Edom-ho chu Judate lakah an hel a, an chunga lal tûr an insiam chawp a.

source: Just do it
target: Timai rawh

source: Let me say what is in my mind, so that I may get comfort; let me give answer with open mouth.
target: Thuin ka inhri thla dawn e, Ka ka ka ang ang a, ka chang ang.

source: He blocked my way.
target: Ka kawng a lo dang a.

source: But the captain, desiring to keep Paul safe, kept them from their purpose, and gave orders that those who had knowledge of swimming were to go off the ship and get first to land:
target: Nimahsela sipai za hotu chuan Paula chhanhim a duh a, an thil tum chu a khap a; tui hleuh thiam apiang tuifinriatah zuan thlaka khawmual lo kai hmasa tur leh,

source: Tom isn't speaking
target: Tom a sawi lo

source: And to give you help, take one man from every tribe, the head of his father's house.
target: Tin, i hnenah hnam tin, zinga mi pakhat, chi hrang hrang ata chhûngkaw puipa zel an awm tur a ni.

source: And you will say to your son in that day, It is because of what the Lord did for me when I came out of Egypt.
target: Chu mi niah chuan in fate hnênah, 'Aigupta ram ata kan lo chhuah lai khân LALPAN thil min lo tihsak vâng a ni e,' tiin in hrilh tûr a ni e.

source: That hurts
target: Kha khân mi tina

source: Now I have joy in my pain because of you, and in my flesh I undergo whatever is still needed to make the sorrows of Christ complete, for the salvation of his body, the church;
target: Tuna ka tuarsakna che uah hian ka lawm a, Krista hrehawm tuar bak chu a taksa avangin ka tisaah hian ka chhunzawm zel a ni; a taksa chu kohhranho hi an ni.

source: If in any way I may have the reward of life from the dead.
target: mitthi zing ata thawhlehna chu ka chang thei hram mahna, tiin.

source: I am he replied
target: Ni e tiin a chhâng a

source: All the day the sinner goes after his desire: but the upright man gives freely, keeping nothing back.
target: Nilenga duham taka awh nei an awm a; Mi fel erawh chuan a pe a, engmah a sum lo.

source: Are the bands of the Pleiades fixed by you, or are the cords of Orion made loose?
target: Siruk khi i phuar khâwm theiin Chhohreivung tlar khi i phelh darh thei êm ni?

source: And they gave the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house.
target: Tin, a hnenah leh a ina awm zawng zawngte hnenah chuan Lalpa thu an sawi a.

source: I don't give lessons.
target: Zirna ka pe lo.

source: He's lazy.
target: A thatchhia.

source: Tom's free
target: Tom a hman

source: My soul has no desire for such things, they are as disease in my food.
target: Ka nunna hian khawih pawh a duh lo ve, Ka tan ei tûr tenawm tak ang a ni.

source: We succeeded!
target: Kan hlawhtling!

source: Lips of righteousness are the delight of kings; and he who says what is upright is dear to him.
target: Ka fel chu lal lawmna a nai a, Thu dik sawi chu an ngaina thin.

source: But if I give praise to God for the food which I take, let no man say evil of me for that reason.
target: Lawm taka ka chan chuan a chunga lawmthu ka sawina chungah hian engah nge sawichhiat ka nih ni?

source: Be vigilant
target: Fimkhur rawh

source: So he said, A certain man of high birth went into a far-away country to get a kingdom for himself, and to come back.
target: Chutichuan heng thu hi a sawi a:Mi tha tu emaw ram awpna thu laa lokir leh turin khaw lam hla takah a kal a.

source: Does your head still hurt?
target: I lu a la na em?

source: So she gave him her servant Bilhah as a wife, and Jacob went in to her.
target: Tichuan a bâwihnu Bilhaii chu a nupui atân a pe a: tin, Jakoba chuan ani chu a lo pâwl a.

source: One young ox, one male sheep, one he-lamb of the first year, for a burned offering;
target: halral thilhlan atana bawngpa tuia pakhat, berampa pakhat, beram no a pa kum khat mi pakhat;

source: For the man who comes into his rest has had rest from his works, as God did from his.
target: Tupawh Pathian chawlhnaa luta chawl ve tawh chuan Pathian tih ang khan a hnathawhte chu a chawlhsan ve thin.

source: So say to them that I will make with him an agreement of peace:
target: Chuvangin 'Ngai teh, ka inremna thuthlung chu a chungah ka thlung ang a;

source: In the daytime it becomes dark for them, and in the sunlight they go feeling about as if it was night.
target: Chhun engah thim an tawk a, Chhun laiah zan angin an dap thin.

source: I don't have vodka.
target: Vodka ka nei lo.

source: And Esau said, Truly, I am at the point of death: what profit is the birthright to me?
target: Tin, Esauva chuan, Ngai teh, ka thi lek lek a ni si a: fa tîr nihna mai hi ka tan engnge sawt ang? a ti a.

source: He gives food to every beast, and to the young ravens in answer to their cry.
target: Ani chuan sa hnênah a ei tûr a pe thin, Choak no hram hramte hnênah nên.

source: We heard shooting
target: Kap ri kan hre ta

source: I don't rightly know.
target: Ka hre dik lo.

source: Give attention to the good man, and take note of the upright; because the end of that man is peace.
target: Mi sawiselbo chhinchhiah la, mi dik tak chu en rawh, Chutiang mi tawpna tûr chu thlamuanna a ni dawn si a.

source: You overcome him for ever, and he is gone; his face is changed in death, and you send him away.
target: Ani chu i hneh kumkhua a,a ral ta a. A hmêl i tidanglam a, i tir bo va.

source: Let my steps be guided by your word; and let not sin have control over me.
target: Ka ke pente hi i thu-ah tinghet la; Sualna rêng rêng ka chungah thu neihtir suh ang che.

source: Now when Joab saw that their forces were in position against him in front and at his back, he took the best of the men of Israel and put them in line against the Aramaeans;
target: Chutichuan an hma lam leh an hnung lamah an rawn bei dawn tih Joaban a hriatin Israel mite zinga mi atha tha thlang chhuak a, Suria mite bei tûrin thanhmun a lo siam a:

source: His head is as the most delicate gold; his hair is thick, and black as a raven.
target: A luin a iang e, rangkachak thianghlim, A sam kir chu dum zen e, lianak iangin.

source: Would you like to wait
target: Nghah i duh em

source: You shot Tom.
target: Tom-a i kap.

source: And put on the stones all the words of this law, writing them very clearly.
target: Tin, lung chungahte chuan he dan thu zawng zawng hi fiah takin in ziak tur a ni, tiin thu an pe a.

source: He who, with all his heart, goes after what is good is searching for grace; but he who is looking for trouble will get it.
target: thahnem ngai taka thâtna zawngtu chuan duhsakna a zawng a ni a, Pawikhawi tûr zawngtu erawh chu, ama chungah a thleng ang.

source: Make clear his glory to the nations, and his wonders to all the peoples.
target: Hnam tin, zingah a ropuizia hril ula,Mi tinrengte zingah a thilmak tihte chu hril rawh u.

source: To those who go on with good works in the hope of glory and honour and salvation from death, he will give eternal life:
target: thil tha ti fan fana ropuina leh chawimawina leh boral theih lohna zawngtute hnenah chuan chatuan nunna a pe ang;

source: Can you ask for me?
target: Min dil thei em?

source: If death comes suddenly to a man at his side, so that he becomes unclean, let his hair be cut off on the day when he is made clean, on the seventh day.
target: A kiangah mi lo thi ta thutin a intihhranna lu chu lo tibawlhhlawh ta ang sela, a inthen ni, a nisarih niin a lu a mêt tur a ni.

source: So then, my child, be strong in the grace which is in Christ Jesus.
target: Chutichuan, nang ka fa, Krista Isuaa khawngaihna awmah hian thiltihtheihna neiin awm ang che.

source: What do you look like?
target: Eng ang nge i nih?

source: Where may I go from your spirit? how may I go in flight from you?
target: I thlarau hnên ata hi khawiah nge ka kal ang? I hma ata hi khawiah nge ka tlan bo vang?

source: But they are strong who have hate for me without cause: those who are against me falsely are increased in numbers.
target: Nimahsela mi dotute chu an thothang a thain, an chak a: Dik lo taka mi hawtute chu an pung ta luai a.

source: And you will be hated by all men, because of my name; but he who goes through to the end will have salvation.
target: Keima hming avngin mi zawng zawng huat in ni ang; nimahsela a tawp thlenga tuar peih apiang chu, chu mi ngei chu chhandamin a awm ang.

source: There were six thousand, eight hundred spearmen of the children of Judah, armed for war;
target: Juda thlah, indona râlthuama inthuam, pawh leh fei keng mi chu 6800 an ni.

source: I nailed it
target: Ka tidik e

source: And in the skirts of your robe may be seen the life-blood of those who have done no wrong: ...
target: I puanfênahte pawh mi rethei pawikhawih lote Nunna thisen a lang a: Mi in an rawk lai kut man pawh ni si lo. Chu achhapah nangmah chuan,

source: They were very loud
target: An ri nasa hle mai

source: So Miriam was shut up outside the tent-circle for seven days: and the people did not go forward on their journey till Miriam had come in again.
target: Chutichuan Miriami chu daipawnah ni sarih a bibo va; Miriami an hruai luh leh hma chuan mipuite chu an tawl sawn lo va.

source: You were disappointed
target: I beidawng a ni

source: The Lord is kind and full of pity, not quickly made angry, but ever ready to have mercy.
target: LALPA chu lainatnaa khat, mi khawngaih thei tak, Thinnel tak, ngilneihna ngah tak a ni.

source: He shaved
target: Khapa a inziat fai

source: And now, O Job, give ear to my words, and take note of all I say.
target: Engpawh ni se, Joba, ka tawng hi ngaithla la, Ka thu zawng zawngah hian beng lo chhi teh.

source: I am numbered among those who go down into the earth; I have become like a man for whom there is no help:
target: Khuarkhuruma chhkte zinga chhiar tel ka ni a; Chakna rêng rêng nei lo mi ang ka ni:

source: Do you have heartburn
target: Lungphun i nei em

source: And Abram went through the land till he came to Shechem, to the holy tree of Moreh. At that time, the Canaanites were still living in the land.
target: Tin, Abrama chu, chu mi ramah chuan Sekem hmun thlengin, More sasua thleng chuan a kal zêl a. Chûng lai chuan Kanaanhote chu chu mi ramah chuan an awm a.

source: The rod of authority will not be taken from Judah, and he will not be without a law-giver, till he comes who has the right to it, and the peoples will put themselves under his rule.
target: Lal tiang chu Juda lakah a bo lo vang a, Rorêltu tiang chu a ke kâr ata a bo hek lo vang a, Silova lo kal hma loh chuan; Hnam tinin ama thu an âwih ang.

source: Have you been well?
target: I dam tawh em?

source: Watch Tom.
target: Tom-a en rawh.

source: Let your hearts be open to us: we have done no man wrong, no man has been damaged by us, we have made no profit out of any man,
target: In thinlungah hmun mi kian rawh u; tu chungah mah kan tisual lo va, tumah kan tikhawlo lo va, tumah kan dinchan khalh lo ve.

source: Tom is in.
target: Tom-a a lut.

source: And after him, Elon the Zebulonite was judge of Israel; and he was judge of Israel for ten years.
target: Tin, a hnuah chuan Zebulun mi Elonan Israel-ho chungah ro a rêl a; Israel-ho chungah kum sâwm ro a rêl a.

source: Of this, a square five hundred long and five hundred wide is to be for the holy place, with a space of fifty cubits all round it.
target: Hemiah hian hmun serh atân a dung leh avâng tawng zanga ve ve, in bial a ni ang a, tin, a velin tawng zangaa zau hmun âwl a awm tûr a ni.

source: The mouth of the good man says words of wisdom; the talk of his tongue is of righteousness.
target: Mi fel ka chuan finna thu a sawi thin a, A lei chuan rorêl felna thu a sawi bawk thin.

source: There the fire will make you waste; you will be cut off by the sword: make yourself as great in number as the worms, as great in number as the locusts.
target: Chutah chuan meiin a kângral ang che a, khandaihin a sâthlum ang che a, thingngêt angin a tiboral ang che: thingngêt angin intitam la, khaukhuap angin intitam rawh.

source: Don't eat anything else.
target: Thil dang ei suh.

source: I don't need to buy a car.
target: Car lei a ngai lo.

source: But to the land on which their soul's desire is fixed, they will never come back.
target: An rilrua kir leh an chak êm êmna ramah chuan an kir leh tawh hek lo vang.

source: At that time Jesus went through the fields on the Sabbath day; and his disciples, being in need of food, were taking the heads of grain.
target: Chu mi lai chuan Isua chu Chawlhniah buh hmunah te a kal tlang a; a zirtirte chu an ril a tam a, buh vuite an thliak a, an ei ta a.

source: You will make your prayer to him, and be answered; and you will give effect to your oaths.
target: A hnênah i tawngai ang a, a ngai thla ang che; Tin, i thutiamte chu i hlena ng.

source: And Pilate said to the chief priests and the people, In my opinion this man has done no wrong.
target: Tin, Pilatan puithiam lalte leh mipuite hnenah chuan, He mi chungah hian engmah sual ka hmu lo ve, a ti a.

source: Whoever keeps the law will come to no evil: and a wise man's heart has knowledge of time and of decision.
target: Thupêk pawm apiang chuan engmah a tuar lo vang a, mi fing rilru chuan ningkhawng a hria a ni.

source: This isn't any fun.
target: Hei hi a nuam lo.

source: From my mouth will come words of wisdom; and in the thoughts of my heart will be knowledge.
target: Ka kâ hian finna thu a sawi ang a; Ka thinlung ngaihtuah chu hriat thiamna thu a ni ang.

source: Did they talk to each other
target: An inbia em ni

source: In his burning wrath every horn of Israel has been cut off; his right hand has been turned back before the attacker: he has put a fire in Jacob, causing destruction round about.
target: Israel kî zawng zawng chu thinrim takin a tan chhum a; Hmêlma hmâan a kut dinglam a hnûk kîr e, Meialh a vêl kâng fâitu angin Jakob-ho zîngah a alh chhuak e.

source: Were you feeling resistance?
target: Dodalna i nei em?

source: They say to their mothers, Where is grain and wine? when they are falling like the wounded in the open squares of the town, when their life is drained out on their mother's breast.
target: An nute hnênah chuan, Khawiah nge buh leh uain? tiin, Hliam ang maiin khawpui tualah an thidang a; An nute ângchhûngah an nun a chuai ral e.

source: But the end of all things is near: so be serious in your behaviour and keep on the watch with prayer;
target: Nimahsela, thil zawng zawng tawpna chu a hnai tawh a, chuvangin in tawngtai theih nan rilru fel tak puin fimkhur rawh u.

source: And all Israel, hearing of it, will be full of fear, and no one will again do such evil as this among you.
target: Tichuan Israel mi zawng zawngin an hria ang a, an hlau vang a, in zingah chutiang suahsual reng reng chu an ching taw lo vang.

source: Adam's apple
target: Hrawk bawk

source: And in the first month, on the fourteenth day of the month, is the Lord's Passover.
target: Tin, thla khatna ni sâwm leh ni li ni chu LALPA kalhlen kut a ni.

source: He's doing great
target: A ti ropui hle mai

source: But going against the order of the Lord your God, you would not go up:
target: Nimahsela in chho duh l va, LALPA in Pathian thupêk chu in helsan a;

source: In the morning it is green; in the evening it is cut down, and becomes dry.
target: Zingah chuan a lo duahin a chawr chhuak a; Tlai lamah chuan ah thlukin a awm a, a vuai thin.

source: Who sees it all?
target: Tuin nge hmu vek?

source: Now there was a certain man of Zorah of the family of the Danites, and his name was Manoah; and his wife had never given birth to a child.
target: tin, Zora khuaah Dan hnam mi pakhat a awm a, a hming chu Manoa a ni a; a nupui chu a ching a, nau rêng rêng a pai ngai lo va.

source: I panicked
target: Ka hamhaih a

source: He seems ill
target: Damlo a ang

source: Make strong the feeble hands, give support to the shaking knees.
target: Kut chak lote chu tichak ula, khup zawite chu tinghet rawh u.

source: Do you have a bus pass
target: Bus pass i nei em

source: So all the work on the House of the Tent of meeting was done; as the Lord had given orders to Moses, so the children of Israel did it.
target: Chutichuan ibiakna puan in biak bûk hna zawng zawng chu an zo ta a: tichuan LALPAN Mosia tih tura thu a pêk ang chiah zelin Israela thlahte chuan an ti a.

source: We want to expand
target: Kan tizau duh a ni

source: Did you vote?
target: Vote i thlâk em?

source: They will come and make his righteousness clear to a people of the future because he has done this.
target: LALPAN a mite a chhanhim,' tiin La piang tûrte an hrilh ang.

source: It doesn't have a name.
target: Hming a nei lo.

source: I said thanks
target: Ka lawm e ka ti

source: Because David did what was right in the eyes of the Lord, and never in all his life went against his orders, but only in the question of Uriah the Hittite.
target: Hit mi Uria chungchang tih lovah chuan Davidan LALPA mithmuha thil tha a tih thin avâng leh a dam chhûng zawnga ti tûra thu a pêk tawh phawt chu a hnial ngai hauh loh avnaign.

source: Paul and Silvanus and Timothy, to the church of the Thessalonians in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace to you and peace.
target: Paula leh Silvana leh Timothea chuan Pa Pathian leh Lalpa Isua Kristaa I Thessalonika khuaa mi kohhranhote hnenah: Khawngaihna leh remna in hnenah awm rawh se.

source: Are you afraid of getting hurt?
target: Hliam i hlau em?

source: You, who have sent great and bitter troubles on me, will give me life again, lifting me up from the deep waters of the underworld.
target: Nang, manganna tam tak leh nasa tak min hmuhtirtu chuan Mi tinung leh ang a, Leu thuk tak ata min hruai chhuak leh ang.

source: We were playing rugby.
target: Rugby kan khel a.

source: That was my lunch
target: Chu chu ka chawhmeh a ni

source: They don't use it
target: An hmang ngai lo

source: Ask an expert
target: Mithiam râwn rawh

source: And when Jesus came into the ruler's house and saw the players with their instruments and the people making a noise,
target: Tin, Isua hotu inah chuan a lut a, phenglawng tumte leh mipui bengchheng mur murte a va hmuh chuan,

source: The day after, a great number of people who were there for the feast, when they had the news that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem,
target: A tukah chuan kutnaa lo kal mipui tam takin,Isua Jerusalem khuaah a lo kal dawn tih an hriatin,

source: I don't walk a lot.
target: Ka kal tam lo.

source: But do you like it?
target: Mahse, i duh em?

source: Or anyone touching any unclean thing which goes flat on the earth, or someone by whom he may be made unclean in any way whatever;
target: tupawh amah tibawlhhlawh thei, a bawha bawkvak reng reng emaw, bawlhhlawh kai thei nei mi emaw khawih apiangte;

source: I threw up
target: Ka vawm darh

source: And if the Lord had not made the time short, no flesh would have been kept from destruction; but because of the saints he has made the time short.
target: Tin, Lalpan chung nite chu titawi suh sela mihring reng reng damin an chhuak lo vang; nimahsela mi thlan, a ruatate avang chuan nite chu a titawi a ni.

source: I went twice
target: Vawi hnih ka kal

source: Then in bitter grief they put the bags on the asses again and went back to the town.
target: Chu veleh chuan an silhfênte chu an pawt thlêr a, mahni sabengtung chu an phurhtîr leh țheuh va, khuaah chuan an kîr leh ta a.

source: Is the grain for bread crushed? He does not go on crushing it for ever, but he lets his cart-wheels and his horses go over it without crushing it.
target: Chhang siamna buh chu rawtsawmin a awm țhin a, kumkhuain a vaw reng dawn si lo: a tawlailir ke leh a sakawrte chuan tidarh mah sela, a rawt sawmtir ngai lo.

source: Son of man, I have made you a watchman for the children of Israel: so give ear to the word of my mouth, and give them word from me of their danger.
target: Mihring fapa, Israel chhûngte vengtuah ka ruat che a ni; tichuan ka kâa thu i hria ang a, keima aiah ka vaukhâng tur a ni.

source: It would be well for him if a great stone was put round his neck and he was dropped into the sea, before he made trouble for any of these little ones.
target: Heng mi tete zinga pakhat pawh tihtluk ai chuan, a titlutu tur nghawngah chuan buh rawt sawmna lung awrhtirin, tuifinriatah thlak sela, a tan a tha zawk tur a ni.

source: Now certain men came down from Judaea, teaching the brothers and saying that without circumcision, after the rule of Moses, there is no salvation.
target: Tin, mi tte emaw Judai ram ata an lo chhuk a, Mosia dan anga serh in tantir loh chuan chhandam in ni thei lo vang, tiin unaute chu an zirtir a.

source: If then God gave them, when they had faith in the Lord Jesus Christ, the same as he gave to us, who was I to go against God?
target: Chutichuan, Lalpa Isua Krista an rin veleh, Pathianin thilthlawnpek min pek ang kha an hnena a pek ve ahnuin kei tehlul hi Pathian hnial rual em ka nih? a ti a.

source: Me, too
target: Kei pawh

source: He got away
target: A tlanbo a nia

source: Give him a piece of advice.
target: Thurawn pe rawh.

source: Six of the towns which you give will be such safe places;
target: Tichuan, in tan tualtlanna tur in ruatte chu khaw paruk a ni ang.

source: I'll spread the word.
target: Ka thehdarh ang.

source: We're having a lot of fun.
target: Kan hlim hle mai.

source: Now though Joseph saw that these were his brothers, they had no idea who he was.
target: Tin, Josefa chuan a uteho chu a lo la hria a, anni erawh chuan ani chu an hre si lo.

source: Don't say that
target: Chutiang sawi suh

source: Do that again
target: Kha kha ti nawn rawh

source: They are the slaves.
target: Bawihte an ni.

source: Two are better than one, because they have a good reward for their work.
target: Pahnih chu pakhat ai chuan an tha zawk, an thawh chhuah that avângin.

source: Just stop it
target: Tawp mai rawh

source: From his full measure we have all been given grace on grace.
target: A famkimna kan chang theuh, khawngaih chunga khawngaih leh chhawnna nen.

source: Do not be uplifted in pride over the branches: because it is not you who are the support of the root, but it is by the root that you are supported.
target: zar dangte lakah chuan inchhuang suh. Inchhuang mah la, nang a zung chawmtu i ni lo va, a zung chu a chawmtu che a ni zawk e.

source: The evil of their tongues is the cause of their fall; all those who see them are shaking their heads at them.
target: Chutiang chuan, anmahni leh lei ngei chuan anmahni a do avângin, tihpetekin an awm ang a; Anmahni hmu apiangin an lu an thing ang.

source: The sun will become dark and the moon will be turned to blood, before that great day of the Lord comes in glory:
target: Ni thimah a chang ang a, Thla thisenah a chang ang a, Lalpa ni ropui tak leh hmingthang tak chu A lo thlen hmain;

source: And when Elihu saw that there was no answer in the mouth of the three men, he was very angry.
target: Tin, Elihua chuan heng mi pathumte kaah hian chhanna reng a awm ta lo tih a hriatin a thinur ta hle mai a.

source: And came back with the head on a plate, and gave it to the girl; and the girl gave it to her mother.
target: a lu chu thlengin a rawn la a, hmeichhe naupang hnenah chuan a pe a; tin, hmeichhe naupang chuan a nu hnenah a pe a.

source: His heart is as strong as a stone, hard as the lower crushing-stone.
target: A thinlung chu lung anga sak ani a, A ni, rawtsawmna lung hnuai zawk ang mai a ni.

source: I fixed it
target: Ka siamtha tawh

source: This is huge
target: Hei hi a lian turu

source: But the father said to his servants, Get out the first robe quickly, and put it on him, and put a ring on his hand and shoes on his feet:
target: Nimahsela a pa chuan a bawihte hnenah, ‘Puan tha ber kha han la thuai ula, han sintir rawh u; a kutah zungbun te, a kehphahah pheikhawk te buntir rawh u;

source: And the fear of the Lord was on all the kingdoms of the lands round Judah, so that they made no wars against Jehoshaphat.
target: Tin, Judai ram vêl ram zawng zawnga mite chuan LALPA chu an hlau va, tumah Jehosaphata chu an do ngam lo va.

source: Sami's time is up.
target: Sami hun a zo ta.

source: And they took them and put them in prison till the morning, for it was now evening.
target: Tin, an man a, tlai lam a nih avangin atuk thlengin tan inah an khung ta a.

source: You need to study
target: Zir a ngai a ni

source: I didn't call
target: Ka be lo

source: The Lord is on my side; I will have no fear: what is man able to do to me?
target: LALPA chu ka lama tang a ni; ka hlau lo vang: Mihringin eng nge mi tih theih ang?

source: Say cheese
target: Chis ti rawh

source: And in the lists were all their little ones and their wives and their sons and daughters, through all the people: they made themselves holy in the positions which they were given.
target: Puithiamte chu an nupui te, an fapa te, a fanu te leh an chhûngkuaa mi dangte en rinawm taka an intihthianghlim reng avângin chhinchhiah vek an ni a.

source: Do you eat meat every day?
target: Nitin sa i ei em?

source: Just get out
target: Chhuak mai rawh

source: They kissed each other
target: An infawp a

source: Quit it!
target: Bansan rawh

source: And the disciples of John gave him an account of all these things.
target: Tin, Johana zirtirte chuan chung thu zawng zawng chu Johana an hrilh a.

source: So Joshua gave Ai to the flames, and made it a waste mass of stones for ever, as it is to this day.
