target: Engmah i belh lo.

source: Now these are the kings who were ruling in the land of Edom, before there was any king over Israel: Bela, the son of Beor; his town was named Dinhabah.
target: Israela thlahte chunga lal an la awm hmaa Edom ram lalte chu henge hi an ni: Beora fapa Bela a ni; a khawpui hming chu Dinhaba a ni.

source: He has said in his heart, I will not be moved: through all generations I will never be in trouble.
target: A rilruah chuan, Ka nghing lo vang: Chhuan zawng zawng thlengin mangangin ka awm lo vang, a ti a.

source: I was suspicious
target: Ka ringhlel a

source: But on this condition only will we come to an agreement with you: if every male among you becomes like us and undergoes circumcision;
target: hetianga in tiam chauh hian in thu ang chu kan remti ang: in zînga mipa tawh phawt chuan serh tanin keimahni angin awm ula;

source: And you have made yourselves great against me with your mouths, increasing your words against me; and it has come to my ears.
target: Ka chungah i kâin i intilianin ka chungah thu i tuitam a, ka hre vek mai.

source: He will not ever be moved; the memory of the upright will be living for ever.
target: Engtikah mah a nghing dawn si lo va; Mi fel chu kumkhuaa hriat rengin a awm ang.

source: We'll help
target: Kan ṭanpui ang

source: Let your face be turned from my wrongdoing, and take away all my sins.
target: Ka sualnate lakah hian i hmai thup la, Ka khawlohna zawng zawng thai bo vang che.

source: I'm rich.
target: Ka hausa.

source: They should know it
target: An hriat tur a ni

source: We all knew about it.
target: Kan hre vek a.

source: But I have had faith in your mercy; my heart will be glad in your salvation.
target: Nimahsela kei zawngin i ngilneihna hi ka ring a ni: I mi chhandamnaah hian ka thinlung a lawm ang:

source: Make no addition to the orders which I give you, and take nothing from them, but keep the orders of the Lord your God which I give you.
target: LALPA in Pathian thupêk ka pêk che u hi in pawm theiha turin, thu ka pêk che u hi in belhchhah tur a ni lo va, in tikiam tur a ni hek lo.

source: But if you will not undergo circumcision as we say, then we will take our daughter and go.
target: Nimahsela serh tan kawnga kan thu in zawm dâwn loh chuan kan fanu chu kan hruai ang a, kan kal mai ang, an ti a.

source: Did you lose something?
target: Thil i hloh em?

source: I'm calm.
target: Ka insum thei.

source: I like candy
target: Candy ka duh

source: Much water may not put out love, or the deep waters overcome it: if a man would give all the substance of his house for love, it would be judged a price not great enough.
target: Tui tam takin a tidai thei lo, hmangaihna zawng, Tui lianin a chim pil thei hek lo; Miin a in ro zawng zawng hmangaih aiah a pêk zawh chuanin Hmusitin a awm ngei dawn e.

source: But those who are waiting for the Lord will have new strength; they will get wings like eagles: running, they will not be tired, and walking, they will have no weariness.
target: LALPA nghaktute erawh chuan an chakna chu an siam tha leh ang a; mupuite angin thlain an thlawk chho vang a; hah lovin an tlan ang a; chau lovin kein an kal ang.

source: Did Tom win?
target: Tom a chak ta em?

source: Give an answer to my words, O Lord; for your mercy is good: be turned to me, because of your great pity.
target: Aw LALPA, mi chhâng ang che; i ngilneihna chu a tha si a: I lainatna nasatzia ang zelin ka lam hi lo hawi ang che.

source: My words to you are without fear, I am full of pride on account of you: I have great comfort and joy in all our troubles.
target: Nangni lamah chuan ka tawng ngamzia hi a nasa a, ka chhuanzia che u hi a nasa a ni; thlamuannain ka khat a, kan hrehawmna zawng zawngah chuan hlimin ka khat liam a.

source: So to this day no priest of Dagon, or any who come into Dagon's house, will put his foot on the doorstep of the house of Dagon in Ashdod.
target: Chu mi avâng chuan Dagona puithiam te, Dagona biak ina lo kal thin rêng rêngte pawhin Asdod kua Dagona kawngka bul chu tunthlengin an rap ngam lo a ni.

source: Because of the downfall of all the people of Canaan: all those who were weighted down with silver have been cut off.
target: Maktes mite u, Kanaan mi zawng an boral avângin chiau vak vak rawh u! Tangkaraw phur tute zawng zawng an boral vek tawh a ni.

source: And Ornan, turning back, saw the angel, and his four sons who were with him went to a secret place. Now Ornan was crushing his grain.
target: Tin, Ornana chua han lehhawi a, vântirhkoh chu a hmu a; tin, a fapa pali a hnêna awm vete chu an boru ta a. Ornana chuan buh a lo chil a ni a.

source: I fell asleep soon.
target: Ka muhil thuai a.

source: I seldom sing.
target: Ka zai khât.

source: Get your goods together and go out of the land, O you who are shut up in the walled town.
target: Aw nang, huala awm mek chuan, I puanthuah lei ata la khâwm rawh.

source: She is beautiful!
target: A hmelṭha hle mai!

source: Man, like the animals, does not go on for ever; he comes to an end like the beasts.
target: Mihring, chawimawia awma, hrait thiamna nei si lo chu, Sa boral thinte ang mai hi an ni.

source: I got fat
target: Ka thau

source: His eyes are ever on the upright, and he gives to the crushed their right;
target: Rilru chaknaah chuan a ropui a ni. Mi suaksual chu a zuah lo va, Hnehchhiate erawh chu dik takin a relsak thin.

source: Let Pharaoh do this, and let him put overseers over the land of Egypt to put in store a fifth part of the produce of the land in the good years.
target: Pharaoan chu chu ti sela, tin ram chungah hian hotute ruat sela, hausak kum, kum sarih chhûng chuan Aigupta ram buh hi hmun ngaa thena hmun khat zêl khawm rawh se.

source: For your life on earth is done, and you have a secret life with Christ in God.
target: In thi tawh a, in nunna chu Pathianah chuan Krista hnenah thuhrukin a awm si a.

source: From Gershon come the Libnites and the Shimeites; these are the families of the Gershonites.
target: Gersona chu Libni-ho leh Simeiho thlahtu a ni: heng hi Gersson-hothlahte an ni.

source: The crown has been taken from our head: sorrow is ours, for we are sinners.
target: Kan lû ata lallukhum a tla ta; Kan chung a pik e, kan tisual ta si.

source: Tom hi a active lo.
target: Tom isn't active.

source: And so we have sent Judas and Silas, who will say the same things to you themselves, by word of mouth.
target: Chutichuan Juda leh Sila kan rawn tir a nih hi, anni pawhin heng thu bawk hi tawngkain an hrilh ang che u.

source: For they are life to him who gets them, and strength to all his flesh.
target: A hmutute tan nunna ani a, An tisa zawng zawng atân hriselan ani si a.

source: It's a shot in the arm.
target: A kut a shot a ni.

source: They're stealing your car!
target: I car an ru a ni!

source: Which cat is yours?
target: Eng ui nge i ta?

source: Would you like any wine?
target: Zu i duh ang em?

source: They're still chasing me.
target: Min la um zel a.

source: You won.
target: I chak.

source: But Jesus said, Someone was touching me, for I had the feeling that power had gone out from me.
target: Nimahsela Isuan, Tuin emaw zawng mi dek a ni, thiltihtheihna ka chhung ata a chhuak tih ka hre nghe nghe asin, a ti a.

source: She wants to dance
target: Zai a duh a ni

source: So all the people were in their places, the army on the north side of the town and the secret force on the west; and that night Joshua went down into the valley.
target: Chutichuan mipui, khawpui hmar lampanga sipaihote tanhmun leh khawpui thlang lampanga a changrutute tanhmun chu an han ruat fel a; tin, Josua chu chu mi zan chuan ruam lai takah a kal a.

source: Shot kan la nei.
target: We still have a shot.

source: It's over.
target: A tawp.

source: And when he said these things, those who were against him were shamed, and all the people were full of joy because of the great things which were done by him.
target: Chung thute chu a sawi laiin a hmelmate zawng zawng chu an zak ta a; mipui erawh chu a thil ropui tih zawng zawng avangin an lawm vek a.

source: And sailing again from there, we went on under cover of Cyprus, because the wind was against us.
target: Tin, chuta tangin tuifinriatah kan kal leh a, thliin a ni lo lamah min nem avangin Kupra thliarkar phen thli up lamah kan tlan a.

source: I promised
target: Ka tiam e

source: You don't have to buy it.
target: I lei a ngai lo.

source: Then I went on to the door of the fountain and to the king's pool: but there was no room for my beast to get through.
target: Tin, tuichhunchhuah kawngka leh lal dil thlengin ka kal zel a: nimahsela ka chuanna sa kal tlâng theihna rêng rêng a awm lo va.

source: For your mercy to me is great; you have taken my soul up from the deep places of the underworld.
target: Ka chunga i ngilneihna chu a nasain; Ka nunna hi khuarkhurum hnuaihnung ber ata i chhanhim si a.

source: False lips are hated by the Lord, but those whose acts are true are his delight.
target: Hmui dawthei hi LALPA tenzawng tak ani a, Dik taka titute erawh chu a lawmzawng an ni.

source: And on the second day you are to have a he-goat without any mark on it offered for a sin-offering; and they are to make the altar clean as they did with the young ox.
target: Tin, a nihnihnaah chuan kêlchal, hmêlhem lo, sual vanga inthawina atân a hlan tûr a ni; tichuan maichâm chu bâwngpa tuai a an then ang bawk khan then tûr a ni.

source: Which in other generations was not given to the sons of men, but the revelation of it has now been made to his holy Apostles and prophets in the Spirit;
target: Chu chu tun laia a tirhkoh thianghlimte leh a zawlnei thianghlimte hnenah Thlarau hriattirin a awm ta ang hian, tun hma lam khan mihring fate hnenah hriattirin a awm ngai lo;

source: Come down, O Lord, from your heavens: at your touch let the mountains give out smoke.
target: Aw LALPA, i vante tikunin lo chhuk la: Tlangte chu khawih ang che, tichuan a khu chhuak ang.

source: Have I not been weeping for the crushed? and was not my soul sad for him who was in need?
target: Buaina tawkte tan ka tap thin lawm ni? Chhamdalte tan ka lungngai thin lawm ni?

source: Dogs have come round me: I am shut in by the band of evil-doers; they made wounds in my hands and feet.
target: Ui chuan mi hual vêl si a: Thil tha lo titu awm khawmte chuan mi hual tlat a; Ka kut leh ka kete hi a tipawp a.

source: So when the other servants saw what was done they were very sad, and came and gave word to their lord of what had been done.
target: Chutichuan, a bawipuite chuan a thiltih chu an hmuhin, an lungngai em em a, a thiltih zawng zawng chu an pu an va hrilh ta a.

source: Uncovering deep things out of the dark, and making the deep shade bright;
target: Thim ata thil thukte a dap chhuak a, Thihna hlim chu engah a la chhuak.

source: The Lord of armies is with us; the God of Jacob is our high tower. (Selah.
target: Sipaihote LALPA chu kan hnênah a awm a; Jakoba Pathian chu kan kulhbingsâng a ni. Selah

source: Do you have any animals
target: Rannung i nei em

source: So the word of the Lord was increased very greatly and was full of power.
target: Chuti kauva nasa chuan Lalpa thu chu a darh a, a hneh ta zel a.

source: Aren't you afraid?
target: I hlau lo em ni?

source: They're foreigners
target: Ramdang mi an ni

source: I've requested asylum
target: Asylum ka dil tawh

source: Then Jehoshaphat, in his fear, went to the Lord for directions, and gave orders all through Judah for the people to go without food.
target: Tin, Jehosaphata chuan a hlau va, LALPA zawng tûrin a in pe a; Judai lam zawng zawng ah chaw nghei tûr thu a than vêl a.

source: Hold this.
target: Hei hi chelh rawh.

source: I threw up
target: Ka vawm darh

source: And these are those whom David made responsible for the music in the house of the Lord, after the ark had rest.
target: Chungte chu a ni, bâwm dah hnua LALPA ina hla hruaitu atân Davidan a ruatte chu.

source: I have no help in myself, and wisdom is completely gone from me.
target: Tha han so tûr reng ka nei lo va, Keimahah sawm khâwm tûr reng a awm lo.

source: I never bet
target: Ka dahkham ngai lo

source: No, you are not crazy.
target: Ni lo, i â lo.

source: We're slowing down.
target: Kan slow zel a.

source: Fifty twists on the one curtain and fifty on the edge of the curtain of the other group; the twists being opposite to one another.
target: Puanzar pakhatah chuan beng sawmnga a siam a, tin, zawm khat puan zar tlângah pawh chuan beng sawmnga a siam bawk a: chûng bengte chu a inep thliah a.

source: For everywhere the hair of the head and the hair of the face is cut off: on every hand there are wounds, and haircloth on every body.
target: Lu tinreng ziah kawn a ni a, khabe hmun tinreng meh a ni; kut zawngt zawng zai a ni a, kawngahte saiip puan a awm hlawm a.

source: Hey, Tom, open up.
target: Hei, Tom, hawng rawh.

source: In all your ways give ear to him, and he will make straight your footsteps.
target: I kawng zawng zawngah amah hre reng la, I kawngte chu a kawhhmuh zel ang che.

source: I didn't get a clear look.
target: Ka en chiang lo.

source: This word Jeremiah gave out to all the people of Judah and to those living in Jerusalem, saying,
target: chu thu chu zâwlnei Jeremian Juda mi zawng zawng leh Jerusalema awm zawng zawngte hnêna a sawi chu a ni.

source: I am sure.
target: Ka chiang lo.

source: Who are you voting for?
target: Tute nge i vote?

source: I live too far away.
target: Ka awm hla lutuk.

source: Now, truly, the Lord will send a great destruction on your people and your children and your wives and everything which is yours:
target: ngai teh, LALPAN i mi te, i fa te, i nupuite i rante hripuiin a hrem ang a;

source: Can I join in?
target: Ka rawn zawm ve thei ang em?

source: Speak up!
target: Sawi rawh!

source: Look it up
target: Enchho rawh

source: Eye doctor
target: Mit daktawr

source: You drive me nuts!
target: Min khalh nuts!

source: We'll wait and see.
target: Kan nghak ang e.

source: So Israel had relations with the women of Moab in honour of the Baal of Peor: and the Lord was moved to wrath against Israel.
target: Tin, Israel-ho chuan Peor hmuna Baal chu an pawm ve ta a; tichuan Israelho chungah LALPA thin chu a alh ta a.

source: Now late on the Sabbath, when the dawn of the first day of the week was near, Mary Magdalene and the other Mary came to see the place where his body was.
target: Tin, chawlhni tlai takah, ni sarih ni hmasa ber tura khua a var dawnin Mari Magdalini leh Mari dang chu thlan en turin an kal a.

source: I got stuck
target: Ka tangkhang

source: The word which he sent to the children of Israel, giving the good news of peace through Jesus Christ (who is Lord of all--
target: Ani chuan thlamuanna Chanchin Tha Isua Krista kaa hrilin, Israela thlahte hnenah thu a thawn a, Isua chu mi zawng zawng Lal a ni a

source: There is nothing covered which will not be seen openly, and nothing has been made secret which will not come to light.
target: Puang lo tura zep engmah a awm si lo va, lang lo tura thuhruk engmah a awm hek lo.

source: He took David to be his servant, taking him from the place of the flocks;
target: A chhiahhlawh Davida chu a thlang a, berâm huang atate chu ala chhuak a:

source: For what has been ordered for me by him will be gone through to the end: and his mind is full of such designs.
target: Ka chana ruat chu a ti a, A rilruah chutiang chu a awm teuh a ni.

source: Will you go on being angry with us for ever? will you keep your wrath against us through all the long generations?
target: Kan chungah i thinurn kumkhua dawn êm ni le? I thinur chu chhuan zawng zawng thlengin i lantir zel dawn êm ni?

source: They're awfully nosy
target: An nosy lutuk

source: I've been captured
target: Ka man tawh a ni

source: For it is the love of Christ which is moving us; because we are of the opinion that if one was put to death for all, then all have undergone death;
target: Krista hmangaihna chuan min tir lui a ni; heti hian kan ngaihtuah: Mi zawng zawng thih aiin mi pakhat a thi a, chuvangin mi zawng zawng chu an thi a ni;

source: We're inside
target: A chhûngah kan awm

source: Now when Jesus was in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper,
target: Tin, Isua Bethani khuaah, phar Simona inah chuan a awm laiin,

source: Mari hian inbual a mamawh a ni
target: Mary needs a bath

source: And when he said to them, I am he, they went back, falling to the earth.
target: Tin, Keimah hi ka ni, a tih veleh an hnungtawlh a, leiah an tlu hlawm a.

source: I'm shy
target: Ka zak deuh

source: They greeted each other warmly
target: An in chibai a

source: I baked bread
target: Chhang ka ur

source: But get up, and go into the town, and it will be made clear to you what you have to do.
target: nimahsela tho la, khua-ah lut rawh, tichuan i tihtur an lo hrilh ang che, a ti a.

source: Then the Kohathites went forward with the holy place; the others put up the House ready for their coming.
target: Tin, Kohath-hote chuan thil thianghlim chu an zawn a, an chhuak a; tin, a dangte chuan an thlen veleh biak bûk chu an lo din diam a.

source: And now, make request for the grace of God so that he may have mercy on us: this has been your doing: will he give his approval to any of you? says the Lord of armies.
target: Tûnah hian min khawngaih theih nân pathian tihlungawina zawng rawh u khai - Hetiang hi in kutkawih ngei a ni si a- A lo ngaisâng dawn che u em ni? Sipaihote LALPA chuan a ti.

source: He can't buy a car
target: Car a lei thei lo

source: From the fruit of his mouth will a man have good food in full measure, and the work of a man's hands will be rewarded.
target: Miin a tawngkam chhuak rah chu a seng ang a, Ama kut thiltih ngei chu a hnena hlan a ni ang.

source: Give it a try.
target: Ti ve chhin rawh.

source: He stole my watch.
target: Ka darthlalang chu a ru a.

source: She plays the piano
target: Piano a tum thin

source: And Rehoboam went to Shechem, where all Israel had come together to make him king.
target: Tin, Rehoboama chu Sekem khuaah a kal a; Israel-ho zawng zawng chu Sekem khuaah lala siam tûrin an kal tawh si a.

source: The robes of needlework for the work of the holy place, the holy robes for Aaron the priest, and the robes for his sons when acting as priests.
target: hmun thianghlima rawngbawlna tura silhfen mawi taka tah te, puithiam rawng a bawl huna hak tur puithiam Arona silhfen thianghlim leh a fapate silhfen te,' tiin, a ti a.

source: He makes sport of the men of pride, but he gives grace to the gentle-hearted.
target: Mi hmusittute chu a hmusit thin a, Inngaitlâwmte erawh chu khawngaihna a pe thin.

source: We want meat
target: Sa kan duh

source: A curse on the man who gave the news to my father, saying, You have a male child; making him very glad.
target: Ka pa hnêna, Fapa i nei ta e Tih thu rawn thlena, Rawn tilawmtu chu An chhe dawngin awm rawh se.

source: And it was right for this man to have more honour than Moses, even as the builder of a house has more honour than the house.
target: Chhungkaw puipa chu a chhungte aiin an chawimawi zawk ang ngeiin, ani chu Mosia aiin ropui lehzualna hmu tlaka ruat a ni tawh si a.

source: And he is clothed in a robe washed with blood: and his name is The Word of God.
target: Puan thisen kai a sin a; a hmingah chuan Pathian Thua an ti a.

source: For the punishment of the daughter of my people is greater than the punishment of Sodom, which was overturned suddenly without any hand falling on her.
target: Ka mipui fanu khawlohna chu sodom sualna aiin a nasa a, kut rêng pawha khaih lohva mit khap kar lova tihchhiata kha.

source: Nobody was doing it.
target: Tuman an ti lo.

source: The store was closed.
target: Dawr chu a khar a.

source: Numbering all those from thirty to fifty years old who were able to do the work in the Tent of meeting;
target: inbiakna puan ina thawk tur zat chu kum sawmthum achin chung lam kum sawmnga mi thlengin an chhiar a.

source: And Goshen, and Holon, and Giloh; eleven towns with their unwalled places.
target: Gosen te, Holon te, Gilo te; khawpuite chu akhawperte nen khaw sâwm leh khaw khat a ni.

source: Over him were the winged ones: every one had six wings; two for covering his face, two for covering his feed, and two for flight.
target: A kiangah chuan serafte an ding a: thla paruk an nei țheuh va, an thla pahnihin an hmai an khuh a, pahnihin an kephahte an khuh a, pahnihin an thlawk a.

source: Sami was threatened
target: Sami chu a vau a

source: He likes sleeping
target: Mut a ngaina hle

source: But the men who had gone up with him said, We are not able to go up against the people, for they are stronger than we.
target: Nimahsela a kalpui chuan, Kan han hneh thei hlawm lo vang a, kan aiin an chak si a, an ti a.

source: O Timothy, take good care of that which is given to you, turning away from the wrong and foolish talk and arguments of that knowledge which is falsely so named;
target: Aw Timothe, i hnena kawltira awm chu vawng tha rawh. Pathian zah lo lam thu sawi mai mai leh, dik lo taka Finna an vuah hnialna hi hawisan rawh.

source: Don't kid yourself.
target: Mahni infiam suh.

source: He pinched my arm.
target: Ka kut chu a rawn pinch a.

source: Pilate said to them, You have watchmen; go and make it as safe as you are able.
target: Pilatan an hnenah Vengtu sipaite in nei alawm; kal ula, in theih ang apiangin ven thattir ta che u, a ti a.

source: I'm involved
target: Ka tel a nia

source: Now it is clear to them that whatever you have given to me comes from you:
target: Nangin thil kei mi pek apiang, i hnena chhuak a ni tih tunah an hre ta.

source: He was living in the place of the dead: and no man was able to keep him down, no, not with a chain;
target: chu mi chuan thlanahte chuan awmna a nei thin a, tumahin khaidiat pawhin an phuar thei tawh lo va;

source: And God gave Solomon a great store of wisdom and good sense, and a mind of wide range, as wide as the sand by the seaside.
target: Tin, Pathianin Solomona chu finna leh hriatna nasa tak leh, rilru zauna tuifinriat kama tiau vaivut ang mai a pe a.

source: You were right Sandra
target: Sandra i dik e

source: Is the number of their months fixed by you? or is the time when they give birth ordered by you?
target: An pai chhûng thla zat i chhiarin, An hrin hunte i hria êm ni?

source: Their land is full of images; they give worship to the work of their hands, even to that which their fingers have made.
target: An ram chu milemin a khat a: anmahni kuta thawh chhuah, anmahni zungtangtea siam chu, an be țhin.

source: Come inside
target: Lo lut rawh

source: The cry of the lion is sounding; who will not have fear? The Lord God has said the word; is it possible for the prophet to keep quiet?
target: Sakeibaknei a rûm a, tuin nge hlau lo vang? Lalpa PATHIAN chuan thu a sawi a, tuin nge hril lo thei ang?

source: He built a system
target: System a siam a

source: A man's pride will be the cause of his fall, but he who has a gentle spirit will get honour.
target: Mi a chaponain a tilawm ang a, Mi rilru inngaitlâwm chuan chawimawi a hlawh ang.

source: Let it dry
target: Ro tir rawh

source: Complete destruction will come on any man who makes offerings to any other god but the Lord.
target: Tupawh LALPA hnênah chauh tih loh, pathian dang rêng rêng hnêna inthawi chu tihboral hlauh tûr a ni.

source: He had faith in the Lord, the God of Israel; so that there was no one like him among all the kings of Judah who were before him.
target: Ani chan LALPA Israelte Pathianc hu a ring a; chutichuan a hnua Juda lal zawng zawngte zingah amah ang tumah an awm lo va, ahmaah pawh an awm hek lo.

source: Your heart has knowledge how frequently others have been cursed by you.
target: nang ngei pawhin mi dange ânchhia i lawh thin tih i thinlung ngeiin a hre fo si a.

source: I have had it.
target: Ka nei ngai tawh.

source: You can't trick me.
target: Min bum thei lo.

source: This is good and pleasing in the eyes of God our Saviour;
target: Chu chu min chhandamtu Pathian ngaihin a thain, a lawm tlak a ni;

source: They're with each other
target: An inkawp a

target: Rintuia khat rangkachak fian sâwm leh pahnih chu hmun thianghlima sekel sawm tluka rit țheuh a n: rangkachak fian zawng zawng chu sekel za leh sawmhnih tluka rit a ni;

target: Ui tiin ka ko lo

target: Min aiawh suh.

source: And they were all giving witness, with wonder, to the words of grace which came from his mouth: and they said, Is not this the son of Joseph?
target: Tin, an zain amah an fak a, a kam chhuak kawngaih thute chu mak an ti hle a. Tin, He mi hi Josefa fapa a ni lo vem ni? an ti a.

source: Does your stomach hurt?
target: I pum a na em?

source: And Sarah saw the son of Hagar the Egyptian playing with Isaac.
target: Tin, Aigupta mi Hagari fapa, Abrahama tâna a hrina chuan, a nuihsan lai Sarin a hmu a.

source: The sixteenth Hananiah, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi sâwm leh vawi rukna chu Hanania chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

target: Tin, ani chuan, Sunam mi Abisagi hi i unaupa Adonija nupui atân neihtir rawh, at i a.

source: I woke up
target: Ka harh tawh

source: And Beth-nimrah and Beth-haran: walled towns and shut-in places for sheep.
target: Betnimra te, Betharan te an din a, khawpui kulh nei te, beram huang te nen.

source: Yes, I think so.
target: Aw, ka ring e.

source: Lie down and go to sleep.
target: Mu la, mu rawh.

source: Then the king of Jericho sent to Rahab, saying, Send out the men who have come to you and are in your house; for they have come with the purpose of searching out all the land.
target: Tin, Jeriko kahw lal chuan, I ina lo thleng mikhualte kha han hruai rawh: ram pum pui en thlithlai tura lo kal an ni e, tia hrilh turin Rahabi hnenah mi a tir a.

source: And, covering his eyes, they said to him, Are you prophet enough to say who gave you that blow?
target: Tin, a mit an tuam a, Sawi rawh, tunge vua che? tiin an zawt thin a.

source: Because your mercy is better than life, my lips will give you praise.
target: I ngilneihna hi nunna aiin a that zawk avângin. Ka hmu hian a fak ang che.

source: Turn it on
target: Tinung rawh

source: It is changed like wet earth under a stamp, and is coloured like a robe;
target: Lei hi nemnaa hlum nem angin a tilang dang a, Silhfen ze hrang ang nukin a lang ta a.

source: And he took some of the seed of the land, planting it in fertile earth, placing it by great waters; he put it in like a willow-tree.
target: Chumi ram thlai chi chu a la bawk a, lei țhaah chuan a kui țiak a, tui tam tak kamah chuan a phun ta a, tuipuisuthlah angin a phun a.

source: He shaved
target: A inziat fai

source: I have given him up into the hands of a strong one of the nations; he will certainly give him the reward of his sin, driving him out.
target: hnamte zînga mi chak tak kutah ka mantîr ang: a suahsual zia ang zêlin a hrem ang a, ka hnawtchhuak ang.

source: I'm a father
target: Pa ka nia

source: Then Saul, turning back, went after the Philistines no longer: and the Philistines went back to their place.
target: Chutichuan Saulan Philistia mite a um chu a kirsan ta a; tin, Philistia mite chu anmahni awmhmun lamah an kal ta a.

source: Even if they go deep into the underworld, my hand will take them up from there; if they go up to heaven, I will get them down:
target: Mitthi khaw thlengin lai tlang mah sela, chuta ta chu ka kutin ka la chhuak ang a; vânah lâwn mah sela, chuta ta chu ka hnûk thla ang.

source: Mari chuan a lo sawi lawk a
target: Mary predicted it

source: And shutting their ears to what is true, will be turned away to belief in foolish stories.
target: an bengte chu thutak lamah an chhungawng ang a, thawnthu lam panin an peng tawh ang.

source: The covered way before the Temple of the house was twenty cubits long, as wide as the house, and ten cubits wide in front of the house.
target: Tin, chu mi ina hmung thianghlim hma lama hulhliap chu a in vang lam che, tawng sawmhniha sei a ni a, a hma lama mi vang lam chu tawng sawm a ni.

source: Now Jehoshaphat had great wealth and honour, and his son was married to Ahab's daughter.
target: Tichuan Jehosaphata chu a lo hausain a lo ropui ta hle mai a; tin, Ahaba nena inkungkaihna a siam a.

source: They are relatives
target: Chhungte an ni

source: Again and again he made them free; but their hearts were turned against his purpose, and they were overcome by their sins.
target: Vawi tam tak anni chu a chhanhim a; Nimahsela a remruatnaah chuan an hel thin a, An khawlohnaah chuan tihhniamin an awm ta a.

source: And for a long time Ephraim their father went on weeping for them, and his brothers came to give him comfort.
target: An pa Ephraima chuan ni rei tak a sun a, tin, a unaute chu amah hnem tûrin an va kal a.

source: So keep the orders and the laws and the decisions which I give you today and do them.
target: chuvangin thupêk te, dan te, rorêl te zawm tura vawiina thu ka pêk che u hi in zawm tur a ni.

source: Tom swore.
target: Tom-an a tiam.

source: Let's meet more often.
target: I inhmu fo ang u.

source: Don't kiss me
target: Mi fawp suh

source: It's a curse
target: Chhe chhamna a ni

source: I have seen the foolish taking root, but suddenly the curse came on his house.
target: Mi a tak zung kai ka hmu a, Mahse, a chenna chu ânchhia ka lawh nghal a.

source: So again, if two are sleeping together they are warm, but how may one be warm by himself?
target: Chu lo pawh, pahnih chu an mut dun chuan an inngheng lum thei a, pakhat erawh chu mah maiin engtin nge a lum theih ang?

source: Even now Elisabeth, who is of your family, is to be a mother, though she is old: and this is the sixth month with her who was without children.
target: Tin, ngai teh, i lichinnu Elizabeti pawhin a tar hnuin mipa a pai ta; a ching an tih thin kha, tun thla hi a thla rukna a ni tawh.

source: For Solomon went after Ashtoreth, the goddess of the Zidonians, and Milcom, the disgusting god of the Ammonites.
target: Solomona chuan Zidon-ho pathiannu Astorethi leh Amon-ho pathian tenawm tak Milkoma chu a lo zui ve ta mai a.

source: Or his father's brother, or the son of his father's brother, or any near relation; or if he gets money, he may make himself free.
target: a pamiin emaw, a pami fapain emaw atlan theiang; a chite zinga alaichin hnaiin emaw a tlan thei ang a; tin, amah pawh a lo neihnun leh chuan a intlan thei ng.

source: I broke them.
target: Ka tikeh vek tawh.

source: And if he comes in the second division of the night or in the third, and they are watching for him, happy are those servants.
target: Zan laiah emaw, thawh hunah emaw a lo kal a, chutianga a rawn hmuh chuan chu bawihte chu an eng a thawl ang.

source: I'm mean.
target: Ka zakzum.

source: I need sleep
target: Mut ka mamawh

source: Because out of a prison the young man comes to be king, though by birth he was only a poor man in the kingdom.

target: awmhmun an sawn dawn apiangin Arona chu a fapate nen an lut ang a, hmun thianghlim puan zar an hlip thla ang a, chu chuan thuthlung bawm an khuh ang a:

source: Heshbon is crying out, and Elealeh; their voice is sounding even to Jahaz: for this cause the heart of Moab is shaking; his soul is shaking with fear.
target: Tin, Hesbon-ho pawh an au va. Elealeh-ho nên; an aw chu Jahaz in Moab-ho râlthuama inthuamte chu ring takin an au va; an nuna chu an kaw chhûngah chuan a khur a.

source: She has put her fat beasts to death; her wine is mixed, her table is ready.
target: A rante a talh a; a uainte a chawhpawlh a; A dawhkanah pawh ei tûr a hlui a.

source: I'm not there yet.
target: Ka la awm lo.

source: Kings' daughters are among your noble women: on your right is the queen in gold of Ophir.
target: I hmeichhe thate zingah chuan lalho fanute an tel ve a; I ding lamah chuan Ophir rangkachaka incheiin lalnu chu a ding a.

source: Kiss me.
target: Mi fawp rawh.

source: Do you want to talk about the matter?
target: I sawi duh em?

source: Stay thin
target: Inti cher rawh

source: So that glory may be given to the name of our Lord Jesus through you, and you may have glory in him, by the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.
target: chutichuan kan Pathian leh Lalpa Isua Krista khawngaihna ang zelin kan Lalpa Isua hming chu nangmahniah chawimawiin a awm thei ang a, nangni pawh amahah chawimawiin in awm thei ang.

source: He whose faith is in himself is foolish; but everyone walking wisely will be kept safe.
target: Mahni rilru ring maitu chu mi â a ni a, Fing taka chetla mi erawh chu chhan chhuah a ni ang.

source: Then David and the people who were with him gave themselves up to weeping till they were able to go on weeping no longer.
target: Chutichuan Davida leh a hnêna awmte chuan an aw an chhuah a, tap hlei thei tawh lo khawpin an tap a.

source: I went to bed after eating.
target: Chaw eiin ka mu a.

target: Toman a hmu.

target: Chu chu ka ti a. Keimah!

target: Aw LALPA, nangmah hawtute chu ka haw lo vem ni? Nangmah beitute chungah chuan kalungni lo vem ni?

source: And the police gave an account of these words to the authorities, and they were full of fear on hearing that they were Romans;
target: Chutichuan mi mantute chuan chung thu chu thu reltute hnenah chuan an hrilh a. Tin, Rom mi an ni tih an hriat chuan an hlau ta a;

source: The same field which Abraham got from the children of Heth: there Abraham was put to rest with Sarah, his wife.
target: chu mi lo chu Abrahaman Hetha thlahte laka a lei a ni: chutah chuan Abrahama chu an phum a, a nupui Sari nen khan.

source: Sami was walking home
target: Sami chu a haw a

source: Are you always cold?
target: I vawt reng em?

source: I'm a writer
target: A ziaktu ka nia

source: Judging that God was able to give life even to the dead; and because of this he did get him back as if from death.
target: mitthi pawh Pathian chuan a kai tho thei ang tih a ring a, thi hnu nung leh ang maiin a hmu kir leh ta reng a ni.

source: When pride comes, there comes shame, but wisdom is with the quiet in spirit.
target: Chapona a lo awmin mualphovin a lo awm a, Inngaitlâwmte hnênah chuan finna a awm.

source: Are your days as the days of man, or your years like his,
target: I nite chu mirhing nite ang êm ni? I ikumte pawh mihring kumte ang êm nia,

source: Would you like to help me
target: Min puih duh em

source: They don't need a reason
target: Chhan an mamawh lo

source: I'm a twin
target: A phirpui ka nia

source: Through whom all the body, being rightly formed and united together, by the full working of every part, is increased to the building up of itself in love.
target: Amah azarah taksa pumhlum chuan inzawmna tinreng thawh avanga rem taka inchuktuah leh inzawm khawmin, peng tin thawhzia ang theuhvin hmangaihnaa insiam tha turin taksa chu a lo tipung thin a ni.

source: Who shot you?
target: Tunge kâp che?

source: For trading in it is better than trading in silver, and its profit greater than bright gold.
target: Tangkaraw peipun aiin a peipun chu a tha zawk si a, A help pawh rangkachak tha mi ain.

target: Chhuak nghal rawh!

target: A lungngaihthlak

source: Do you have any rock CDs?
target: Rock CD i nei em?

source: I read books
target: Lehkhabute ka chhiar

source: If a man has the fear of the Lord, the Lord will be his teacher in the way of his pleasure.

source: They had no memory of God their saviour, who had done great things in Egypt;
target: Pathian an chhandamtu an theihnghilh ta a, Aiguta rama thil ropui tak tak

source: My son, do not go with them; keep your feet from their ways:
target: Ka fapa, an zingah chuan tel ve suh la, An kawng ata inthiarfihlim rawh.

source: So then the Lord Jesus, after he had said these words to them, was taken up into heaven and took his seat at the right hand of God.
target: Chutichuan, Lal Isua chu, an hnena thu a sawi zawh chuan vana hruai chhohvin a awm a. Pathian ding lamah a han thu ta a.

source: O Lord, my cry goes up to you: for fire has put an end to the grass-lands of the waste, and all the trees of the field are burned with its flame.
target: Aw, LALPA, ka au va che: mei chuan thlaler ram hlobet hmun chu a kang fai ta a, meiah chuan ram thing zawng zawng chu a kang fai ta si a.

source: And having gone across the sea off Cilicia and Pamphylia we came to Myra, in Lycia.
target: Tin, Kilikia ram leh Pamphulia ram dep tuifinriat kan pelh hnuin, Lukia rama Mura khua kan thleng a.

source: I'll sing
target: Ka zai ang

source: And the love of God was made clear to us when he sent his only Son into the world so that we might have life through him.

source: For he overcame the Jews in public discussion, making clear from the holy Writings that the Christ was Jesus.
target: vantlang hriatin Judate chu nasa takin a tidang a, Pathian Lehkha Thu hmangin Isua kha Krista chu a ni tih a hriattir thin a.

source: Take my hand
target: Ka kut vuan rawh

source: And let them get together all the food in those good years and make a store of grain under Pharaoh's control for the use of the towns, and let them keep it.

source: I'm gonna shoot him.
target: Ka kap dawn nia.

source: And they made fifty hooks of gold, joining the curtains one to another with the hooks; and so the House was made.
target: Tin, rangkachak chilhbehna sawmnga a siam a, a chilhbehnate chuan puanzarte chu a chilh bet a: tichuan biak bûk chu pindan pakhat a lo ni t a.

source: He made answer and said to Arioch, O captain of the king, why is the king's order so cruel? Then Arioch gave Daniel an account of the business.
target: lal vêngtu pâwl hotu Arioka hnênah chuan, Eng tizia nge lal thupêk chu chuti êma a hmanhmawh le?’’ tiin a chhanga. Tin, Arioka chuan Daniela chua a hrilh ta a.

source: There's a day left.
target: Ni khat a la awm.

source: Death overtook Nadab and Abihu when they made an offering of strange fire before the Lord.
target: Tin, Nadaba leh Abihua chu LALPA hmaa hman loh tur chi mei an hman lai khan an thi a.

source: I'll go and have a look.
target: Ka va en ang.

source: Haven't you finished yet?
target: I la zo lo em ni?

source: And all the walls of the house inside and out were ornamented with forms of winged ones and palm-trees and open flowers.
target: Tin, in bang zawng zawngte chu a velin cherub te, tum thing leh pangpar parh lemte ker mawiin chhûng lam leh pawn lamah chuan a siam a.

source: I finally won
target: A tâwpah ka chak

source: And again he came and saw them sleeping, because their eyes were very tired; and they had nothing to say in answer.
target: Tin, a lo let leh chuan anniho chu muhilin a rawn hmu leh a, an mut a chhuak hle si a; chhan ngaihna pawh an hre lo va.

source: I, wisdom, have made wise behaviour my near relation; I am seen to be the special friend of wise purposes.
target: Kei, finna chuan ka chennaa remhriatna ka siam a, Finna leh ngaihruat thiamna ka hre chhuak thin.

source: Are you going to go or not?
target: I kal dawn em ni?

source: The Lord has made clear our righteousness: come, and let us give an account in Zion of the work of the Lord our God.
target: LALPA chuan ka dikna a puang ta; Hawh u, Zionah i puang ang u, LALPA kan Pathian thiltih chu.

source: And they were wondering among themselves which of them it was who would do this thing.
target: Tin, annin, Kan zingah chutiang thil ti tur chu tunge ni ang le? tiin an inzawt ta a.

source: He is about my size.
target: Ka size vel a ni.

source: Is Tom hot?
target: Tom a sa em?

source: We all want you back
target: Kan duh vek a che

source: The ninth captain for the ninth month was Abiezer the Anathothite, of the Benjamites; and in his division were twenty-four thousand.
target: Thla kuanaa sipai hotu chu Benjamina thlah Anathot mi Abiezera a ni a; a pâwlah chuan singhnih leh sângli an awm.

source: So then, my brothers, let it be your chief desire to be prophets; but let no one be stopped from using tongues.
target: Chutichuan, ka unaute u, thu hrilh hi chak hle ula, tawng hriat lohtea thusawi pawh hi khap suh u;

source: You're our neighbor
target: Kan ṭhenawm i ni

source: Now it was time for Elisabeth to give birth, and she had a son.
target: Tin, Elizabeti nau hrin chu a lo hun ta a; tichuan fapa a rawn hring a.

source: I have given you an example, so that you may do what I have done to you.
target: In chunga ka tih ang hian nangni pawhin in tih vena turin ka tihhmuh che u a ni si a.

source: Where are you studying
target: Khawiah nge i zir

source: I am joking
target: Ka fiamthu mêk

source: He was young
target: A la naupang

source: Your shoes will be iron and brass; and as your days, so may your work be.
target: I kalhnate chu thir leh dar ani ang, I dam chhûng ni angin i chakna pawh a awm ang, a ti a.

source: We want meat
target: Sâ kan duh

source: Go and have a look.
target: Kal la, en rawh.

source: When a man's ways are pleasing to the Lord, he makes even his haters be at peace with him.
target: Mi, a awm danin LALPA a tihlawm chuan, A hmêlma nên lam inremin a awmtir thin.

source: Even while they were increasing in number they were sinning against me; I will let their glory be changed into shame.
target: An pun poh leh ka chungah an sual tulh tulh vei a, An ropuina chu mualphonaah ka chantîr ang.

source: And he sent them out to be preachers of the kingdom of God, and to make well those who were ill.
target: Tichuan Pathian ram thu hril tur leh damlote tidamturin a tir chhuak ta a.

source: I'm a lawyer
target: Dân hre mi ka nia

source: We are children without fathers, our mothers are like widows.
target: Fahrahte leh pa neilote kan ni ta a; Kan nute hmeithai ang mai an ni ta.

source: I don't feel like watching TV.
target: TV en ka duh lo.

source: And if you say in your hearts, How are we to be certain that the word does not come from the Lord?
target: Tin, in thinlunga Engtin nge thu chu LALPA sawi a ni lo tih kan hriat ang? In tihch huan,

source: Foolish behaviour is joy to the unwise; but a man of good sense makes his way straight.
target: Finna nei lote chuan âtna hi an hlimna a ni a, Mi thil hre thiam mi erawh chuan a kawng a tingil thin.

source: In that night God came to Solomon in a vision, and said to him, Say what I am to give you.
target: Chu mi zan chuan Solomona hnênah Pathian a inlâr a, a hnênah, Eng nge ka pêk ang che mi dil rawh, a ti a.

source: We must obey
target: Thu i awi tur

source: Keep driving
target: Khalh zêl rawh

source: And he put the body in the resting-place made ready for himself, weeping and sorrowing over it, saying, O my brother!
target: Tin, a ruang chu ama thlanah a zalh a; tichuan, A va pawi tehluul em, ka unaupa! tiin a tah a.

source: Don't hurt me
target: Mi tina suh

source: Contact Tom
target: Tom va be rawh

source: We still don't know.
target: Kan la hre lo.

source: I haven't yet washed my hands.
target: Kut ka la sil lo.

source: Which is his body, the full measure of him in whom all things are made complete.
target: kohhranho chu a taksa a ni, engkim engkima tikhattu famkimna chu.

source: I asked them why.
target: A chhan ka zawt a.

source: Now the day on which the earth was mixed by Jesus and the man's eyes were made open was the Sabbath.
target: Tin, Isuan hlum a siam a, a mit a tihvar ni kha Chawlhni a ni a.

source: I like milk
target: Bawnghnute ka duh

source: The Lord will make all things complete for me: O Lord, your mercy is eternal; do not give up the works of your hands.
target: LALPA chuan ka chungchanga a tih tûr chu a hlen ang: Aw LALPA, i ngilneihna chu kumkhuain a awm ang a; Nangma kut thiltihte hi bansan suh ang che.

source: The stakes are high.
target: Stake a sang hle.

source: Come out from among this people, so that I may send sudden destruction on them. And they went down on their faces.
target: Heng mipui zing ata hi inthiarfihlim rawh u, ka rawn tihboral thut theih nan, tiin. Tin, chu an bawkkhup a.

source: When you come to a town, before attacking it, make an offer of peace.
target: Bei tura khua in va hnaih hun chuan remna thu han sawi phawt ula.

source: The rocks of the waste land were broken by his power, and he gave them drink as out of the deep waters.
target: Thlalerah chuan lungpuite a tiphel a, Tui thuk tak ata ang mai hnianghnara in tûr a pe a.

source: They are coming all of them with force; the direction of their faces is forward, the number of their prisoners is like the sands of the sea.
target: Pâwngnêk tumin an lo kal hlawm a, chak takin hma lam an hawi tlat a ni; țiau vaivut ang maia tam salte an man hlawm țhîn,

source: As I said to Pharaoh before, God has made clear to him what he is about to do.
target: Chu chu a ni Pharaoa hnêna ka sawi kha: Pathianin a thiltih têp tûr chu Pharaoa a hriattîr a nih hi.

source: You should encourage it.
target: I fuih tur a ni.

source: He kept my soul from the underworld, and my life sees the light in full measure.
target: Thlana liam lo tûrin mi chhanhim a, Ka nunin khaw eng a lo hmu ang, a ti a.

source: The year is crowned with the good you give; life-giving rain is dropping from your footsteps,
target: Kum chu i thatna i khumti ra; I kalna kawngte chu thil thain a far thin.

source: Now Laban had two daughters: the name of the older was Leah, and the name of the younger was Rachel.
target: Tin, Labana chuan fanu pahnih a nei a: a upa zâwk hming chu Leaii a ni a, a naupang zâwk hming chu Rakili a ni.

source: How lucky you are!
target: I vannei tak em!

source: And let him take them to the priest, who will first give the sin-offering, twisting off its head from its neck, but not cutting it in two;
target: Puithiam henah a rawn keng ang a, a ni chuan sual thawina tur chu a hlan hmasa ang a, phel lovin a lu chu a nghawngah a thuai bung ang a:

source: We hired Tom
target: Tom kan chhawr

source: This is not fit
target: Hei hi a tâwk lo

source: He was troubled by the archers; they sent out their arrows against him, cruelly wounding him:
target: Thal kapho chuan ani chu nasa takin an tirethei a, An kâp a, an tiduhdah a:

source: I wasn't mad
target: Mi â ka ni lo

source: Now in the law Moses gave directions that such women were to be stoned; what do you say about it?
target: Dan Lehkhabuah, Mosian hetiang mi hi lunga den hlum thu min pe a; nangin engtin nge i ngaih? an ti a.

source: There was carnage
target: Carnage a awm a

source: I am certain about you in the Lord, that you will be of no other mind; but he who is troubling you will have his punishment, whoever he is.
target: Rilru danglam in pu lovang tih Lalpaah chuan ka ring tlat a; tibuaitu che u chu atua pawh ni sela, a chunga rorelna chu a la tuar ang.

source: In the house of the upright man there is a great store of wealth; but in the profits of the sinner there is trouble.
target: Mi fel inah chuan sum tam tak a awm a, Mi suaksual hlawkna erawh chu buaina a ni.

source: Are they coming too
target: An lo kal ve em ni

source: They don't trust each other
target: An inrin tawn lo

source: And Israel went journeying on and put up his tents on the other side of the tower of the flock.
target: Tin, Israela chu a kal zêl a, Migdol Eder piahah chuan a puan in a zar ta a.

source: They helped each other
target: An inṭanpui tawn a

source: And the sons of Josiah were Jechoniah and his brothers, at the time of the taking away to Babylon.
target: Babulon lama sala an hruai lai vel khan Josian Jekonia leh a unaute a hring a.

source: I do want it.
target: Ka duh ve.

source: I accidentally cut myself.
target: Ka in cut palh a.

source: No bird has knowledge of it, and the hawk's eye has never seen it.
target: Chu kawng chu sa hel ei vaten an hre lo va, Mu mit pawhin a hmu bawk hek lo.

source: Just hang on
target: Lo nghâk mai rawh

source: They were ambushed
target: Ambush an ni a

source: I'm all done
target: Ka zo der

source: Do you want to come
target: Lo kal i duh em

source: Once again
target: Vawi khat leh

source: Parking is prohibited
target: Parking khap a ni

source: He has made me a word of shame to the peoples; I have become a mark for their sport.
target: Mite zinga kamram mai atân mi siam a, Tenawm langsar tak ka lo ni ta.

source: Near them was working Rephaiah, the son of Hur, the ruler of half Jerusalem.
target: Tin, anni dawt chu Jerusalem bial chanve hotu Hura fapa Rephaian a siam tha a

source: Let's get it over with.
target: I titawp ang u.

source: And the four hundred apples for the network, two lines of apples for the network covering the two cups of the crowns on the pillars.
target: chu mi tuamna tial chik chek pahnih atâna pawmgranet zali te, ban chhipa bel anga bâwk pahnih tuamna tûr tial chik chek ve ve atâna pawmgranet tlar hnih te.

source: They have not yet heard of it
target: An la hre lo

source: And they were taken over to Shechem, and put to rest in the place which Abraham got for a price in silver from the sons of Hamor in Shechem.
target: Sukem khua an zawn thleng a, Abrahaman Sukem khuaa Hamora fapate laka thlan a tangka suma a leiah khan an zalh ta a.

source: Go on in.
target: Kal la lut rawh.

source: I'll stay away from you.
target: Ka hlat ang che.

source: I am limping along
target: Ka limping along a

source: It worked
target: A thei e

source: I saw to it.
target: Ka hmu ngei a ni.

source: Don't call him an idiot.
target: Idiot ti suh.

source: Come and see the works of God: he is to be feared in all he does to the children of men.
target: Hawh u, pathian thitihte hi en rawh u8; Mihring fate chunga a thiltihah hian ahlauhawm a ni.

source: Let his kingdom be from sea to sea, from the River to the ends of the earth.
target: Ani chuan tuifinriat atanga tuifinriat dang thleng pawhin thu a nei bawk ang, Luipui atanga kawlkil thleng pawhin.

source: The car was totaled.
target: Car chu a total a.

source: And another comes to his end with a bitter soul, without ever tasting good.
target: Tin, mi dang lungngai takin a thi a, Thatna rêng rêng tem ngai lovin.

source: Would you like to sing
target: Hla sak i duh em

source: For the family of Ahab will come to an end; every male of Ahab's family will be cut off, he who is shut up and he who goes free in Israel.
target: Ahaba chhûngte zawng zawng chu a boral vek ang a; Ahaba atang hian mipa fa tawh phawt chu Israel rama mi khuahkhirh leh khirh loh pawh ka tiboral dâwn a ni.

source: Then Jehoshaphat went to rest with his fathers, and his body was put into the earth in the town of David his father; and Jehoram his son became king in his place.
target: Tin, Jeosaphata chu a pute hnêna a muhil a, a pute zingah a pu Davida khawpuiah an phûm ta a; tin, a fapa Jehorama chu a aiawhin a lal ta a.

source: And when the virgins came together in the second house of the women, Mordecai took his seat in the doorway of the king's house.
target: Tin, nulaho an inkhawm leh lai chuan Mordekaia chu lal kawt hung kawngkaah a thu a.

source: Did you hit anyone else?
target: Midang i vuak em?

source: The Lord will send his blessing on your store-houses and on everything to which you put your hand: his blessing will be on you in the land which the Lord your God is giving you.
target: LALPAN in buh in chungah te, in kutkawih zawng zawng chungahte malsawmna chu thu a pe ang a; LALPA in Pathianin ram a pêk che uah chuan mal a sawm ang che u.

source: But let your hearts be turned to the place which will be marked out by the Lord your God, among your tribes, to put his name there;
target: LALPA in Pathianin in hnam zawng zawng zinga a hming awmna tur hmun a la ruat tur chu in zawng zawk ang a, chuta chuan in kal tur a ni,

source: I've been an idiot.
target: Idiot ka ni tawh.

source: And though no cause of death was seen in him, they made a request to Pilate that he might be put to death.
target: A thihna khawp meuh a chungah engmah an hmuh loh pawhin Pilata hnenah tihhlum an ngen a.

source: I'd do it.
target: Ka ti ang.

source: Then Jonathan said, Now we will go over to these men and let them see us.
target: Chutichuan Jonathana chuan, hawh teh, an hneah sawn kan va kal kai ang a, kan va inlan ang a.

source: Let their faces be full of shame; so that they may give honour to your name, O Lord.
target: Aw LALPA, i hming an zawn theih nân An hmêl chu zahnain tikhat ang che.

source: He loves me
target: Aman mi hmangaih

source: Let them be like smoke before the driving wind; as wax turning soft before the fire, so let them come to an end before the power of God.
target: Mei khu hi len bova a awm angin, anni chu len bo vang che: Khawihnun hi mei luma a tuiral angin, Mi suaksualte chu Pathian hmaah boral rawh se.

source: They don't see me anymore.
target: Min hmu tawh lo.

source: You would've liked us.
target: Min duh ngei ang.

source: Spring onion
target: Pawih purun

source: But the eleven disciples went into Galilee, to the mountain where Jesus had given them orders to go.
target: Nimahsela, zirtir sawm leh pakhatte chu Galili ramah, Isuan tlang a ruatsakah chuan an kal a.

source: I hear music
target: Rimawi ka hria

source: Let your heart be changed, and make prayer to God that you may have forgiveness for your evil thoughts.
target: Chuvangin, i sual hi sim la, Lalpa hnenah tawngtai rawh, chutichuan i rilrua i ngaihtuah hi a ngaidam mahna che.

source: Every place where you put your foot will be yours: from the waste land and Lebanon, from the river, the river Euphrates as far as the Great Sea, will be the limits of your land.
target: In kephaha in rah apiang chu in ta ani ang a, thlaler ațang leh Lebanon tlâng ațangin lui, Euphrates lui ațang chuan thlang lam tuifinriat thlengin in ram ani ang.

source: Do it by yourself.
target: Nangmah chauhin ti rawh.

source: I love money
target: Pawisa ka duh

source: We will protect you.
target: Kan veng ang che.

source: Are they all strong
target: An chak vek em

source: Lifting up those who are low, and putting the sad in a safe place;
target: Mi tlâwmte chu a chawisâng a, Lusunte chu himnaah a dah chho va,

source: They can't fire you
target: An ban thei lo che

source: But all the female children who have had no sex relations with men, you may keep for yourselves.
target: Hmeichhe naupang mi la pâwl loh zawng zawng erawh chu in tan zuah rawh u.

source: And the Lord was with Judah; and he took the hill-country for his heritage; but he was unable to make the people of the valley go out, for they had war-carriages of iron.
target: Tin, LALPA chu Juda hnênah a awm a; tichuan tlâng rama chengte ch a hnawt bo vek a; ruama chenghote erawh chu thir tawlailirte an neih avângin an hnawtchhuak thei lo a ni.

source: O God, let the secrets of my heart be uncovered, and let my wandering thoughts be tested:
target: Aw Pathian, ngun takin min en chhuak la, ka thinlung hi hria ang che: Mi fiah la, ka ngaihtuahnate hi hria ang che:

source: And let us not be put to the test, but keep us safe from the Evil One.
target: Sual tura thlemnaah min hruai lut suh la, Mi sual lakah chuan min chhandam zawk ang che,’ tiin.

source: clear out
target: chhuak rawh

source: For the way into the inmost room he made doors of olive-wood, the arch and the door supports forming a five-sided opening.
target: Tin, biakna hmun luhna atân olivthing kawngkhâr a siam a: kawngka lu chung leh kawngka biangte chu a bang hmun ngaa then a hmun khat tiat a ni.

source: And Moses went back to the Lord and said, Lord, why have you done evil to this people? why have you sent me?
target: Tichuan Mosia chuan LALPA lam a hawi a, Lalpa, eng tizia nge he mite hi tha lo taka i tih le? Eng vângin nge mi tîrh ni?

source: And Joram went to rest with his fathers and was put into the earth with his fathers in the town of David: and Ahaziah his son became king in his place.
target: Tin, Jorama chu a pi leh pute hnênah a muhil a, a pi leh pute zingan Davida khawpuiah an phûm ta a; a fapa Ahazia chu a aiawhin a lal ta a.

source: This doesn't help
target: Hei hian a pui lo

source: She writes poems.
target: Hla a ziak thin.

source: I smell bad
target: Ka rim chhia

source: O my God, I have put my faith in you, let me not be shamed; let not my haters be glorying over me.
target: Aw ka Pathian, nang ka ring chia, Mualphovin mi awmtir suh la; Mi dotute mi ngam chu phal suh ang che.

source: But Judah will be peopled for ever, and Jerusalem from generation to generation.
target: Judai ram erawh chu kumkhuain a awm reng ang a, Jerusalem khua chu chhuan ațanga chhuan zel thlengin.

source: Now this is the blessing which Moses, the man of God, gave to the children of Israel before his death.
target: He malsawmna hian a ni, Pathian mi Mosian a thih hmaa Israela thlahte mal a sawm a ni.

source: Stop it
target: Tawp rawh

source: But when the workmen saw the son, they said among themselves, This is he who will one day be the owner of the property; come, let us put him to death and take his heritage.
target: Nimahsela lo enkawltute chuan a fapa chu an lo hmuh veleh, ‘He mi hi roluahtu tur chu a ni; i that ang u khai! a roluah tur hi i neihsak ang u,’ an inti a.

source: When you are not certain what will take place tomorrow. What is your life? It is a mist, which is seen for a little time and then is gone.
target: Naktukah chuan engnge lo awm dawn in hre si lo. In nunna chu engnge ni? Chhum rei lo te lo lang a, ral leh ta mai thin ang hi in ni si a.

source: We never said yes
target: Kan ti ngai lo

source: You didn't do anything.
target: Engmah i ti lo.

source: May you see your children's children. Peace be on Israel.
target: A ni, i tute chu i la hmu ang. Israel-ho chungah chuan thlamuanna awm rawh se.

source: They had no need of water when he was guiding them through the waste lands: he made water come out of the rock for them: the rock was parted and the waters came flowing out.
target: Thlalerahte chua a hruai lai khan an tuihal lo va; lungpui ațang chuan an tan tuite a luan chhuahtir a: lungpui chu a tihpel a, tichuan tuite chu a lo chhuak ta dur dur a.

source: You were in a coma
target: Coma-ah i awm a

source: So Festus, having come into that part of the country which was under his rule, after three days went up to Jerusalem from Caesarea.
target: Chutichuan, Festa chuan ram chu a awp ta a; tin, ni thum chinah Kaisari khua atang chuan Jerusalem khuaah a han kal a.

source: For God's purpose for us is not wrath, but salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ,
target: Pathianin thinurna tuar tur ni lovin, kan Lalpa Isua Krista zara chhandamna hmu tur zawkin min ruat a ni si a;

source: Even so you seem to men to be full of righteousness, but inside you are all false and full of wrongdoing.
target: Nangni pawh chutiang takin pawnlamah chuan mihring mithmuhin fel takin in lang thin a, in chhung lamah erawh chuan vervekna leh sualnain in khat si a.

source: Though I am right, still I am in pain; my wound may not be made well, though I have done no wrong.
target: Ka thiam reng chung hi dawtheiah mi chhiar mai pawh a: Bawhchhiatna ka nei lo chungin Ka hliam chu tihdam rual a ni lo,' a ti si.

source: Don't be annoying
target: Ti thinrim suh

source: And when Samuel was turning round to go away, Saul took the skirt of his robe in his hand, and the cloth came away.
target: Chutichuan Samuela chu kal tûra ahan her chuan Saulan a puan fem chu a han chelh a, a thlêr ta a.

source: How much less one who is disgusting and unclean, a man who takes in evil like water!
target: Mi tenawm leh bawlhhlawh sa, Khawlohna, tui ina in chu a va ni lo lehzual dawn êm!

source: I was in your hands even before my birth; you are my God from the time when I was in my mother's body.
target: Chhul atang rengin nangma chunga nghah ka ni a: Nang chu ka nu pum chung atang rengin Pathian i ni.

source: For it gave me great joy when some of the brothers came and gave witness that you had the true faith and were walking in the true way.
target: Unaute lo kalin i takzia thutaka i awm thinzia chu min rawn hriattir lai khan ka lawm em em si a.

source: But he will have power over the stores of gold and silver, and over all the valued things of the south: and the Libyans and the Ethiopians will be at his steps.
target: Tichuan, rangkachak leh tangkaraw dahkhâwmte chungah leh Aigupta ram thil hlute zawng zawng chungah thu a nei ang: tin, Libua mite leh Ethiopia mite chu a kaiza vêng an ni ang.

source: He who has no respect for his neighbour is a sinner, but he who has pity for the poor is happy.
target: Tupawh thenawmte hmusit chuan thil a tisual a ni; Mi rethei lainattu erawh chu a eng a thawl e.

source: Give praise to God in the great meeting; even the Lord, you who come from the fountain of Israel.
target: Inkhawmnaahte hian Pathian fak ula, Israela tuihnaa chhuakte u, LALPA chu fak rawh u.

source: And make well those in it who are ill and say to them, The kingdom of God is near to you.
target: an khuaa damlo awmte pawh tidam ula, an hnenah, ‘Pathian ram in kiangah a thleng ta,’ ti ang che u.

source: Then the chief wine-servant said to Pharaoh, The memory of my sin comes back to me now;
target: Chu mi lai chuan uain pe hotu ber chuan Pharaoa hnênah, Vawiinah hian ka sualziate ka lo hre chhuak ta.

source: It was all a trick.
target: Trick vek a ni.

source: Like a loud-voiced lion and a wandering bear, is an evil ruler over a poor people.
target: Mi rethei chunga rorêltu suaksual chu Sakeibaknei rum ang leh savawm pawng vâk ruai ruai ang a ni.

source: But Elymas, the wonder-worker (for that is the sense of his name, put himself against them, with the purpose of turning the ruler from the faith.
target: Nimahsela, Eluma, Barisua hming dang awmzia hi Dawithiam a ni a, chu mi chuan lal aiawhtu chu rin lohtir tumin anni chu a lo dodal a.

source: I never said goodbye
target: Ka thlah ngai lo

source: And put oil on the washing-vessel and its base, and make them holy.
target: Tin, maihun leh a hun chhan chu hriak hnawihin i tithianghlim tur a ni.

source: And Jesus, whose other name is Justus; these are of the circumcision: they are my only brother-workers for the kingdom of God, who have been a comfort to me.
target: Isua, Justa an tiha hian chibai a buk bawk a che u. Chung chu serhtan mi an ni a; chung chauh chu Pathian ram thu lamah chuan ka thawhpui, mi thlamuantute an ni.

source: I'm giving my car away.
target: Ka car ka pe a.

source: They whispered to each other
target: An inhmu a

source: Skin doctor
target: Vun lam daktawr

source: Don't talk to them
target: Anmahni chu biak suh

source: And Naomi had a relation of her husband, a man of wealth, of the family of Elimelech; and his name was Boaz.
target: Tin, Naoami chuan a pasala laichin, Elimeleka thlah, mi neinung tak laichin a nei a; a hming chu Boaza a ni.

source: They're gone
target: An bo vek tawh

source: They begin to chant.
target: An zai tan ta a.

source: Let your wrath be turned away from me, so that I may be comforted, before I go away from here, and become nothing.
target: Aw, heta tak ka chhuah a, ka awm loh hlen daih hma hian, Ka harh lehna tûrin mi zuah ang che.

source: She was wearing a mink coat.
target: Mink coat a ha a.

source: I winked
target: Ka mitmei

source: I'm faster
target: Ka chak zawk

source: For it is possible that for this reason he was parted from you for a time, so that you might have him for ever;
target: Rei lo te a then che hi kumkhuaa amah chu i neih hlenna ai a ni mahna,

source: Was Tom lost?
target: Tom a bo em ni?

source: They murdered him
target: An that ta a ni

source: Wine makes men foolish, and strong drink makes men come to blows; and whoever comes into error through these is not wise.
target: Uain hi nuihzatbura mi siamtu a ni a, zupui hi insual bung bungna a ni; Chu mi buma awmte chu an fing lo a ni.

source: I will make sure of it.
target: Ka tichiang ang.

source: I'm not softening them.
target: Ka ti nem lo.

source: For the Lord will make good the vine of Jacob, as well as the vine of Israel: for the wasters have made them waste and sent destruction on the branches of their vine.
target: Israelho ropuina ngin Jakobho ropuina chu LALPA chuan a tungding leh si a: tiruaktute chuan anmahni an tiruak zo tawh a, an grêp pêngte an tichhe tawh si a.

source: I have a flat tire.
target: Tire ka flat a.

source: For your mercy is great, stretching up to the heavens, and your righteousness goes up to the clouds.
target: I ngilneihna hchu van tawng khawpin a nasa si a, I thutak chu van dum tawng khawpin a nasa bawk a.

source: Wisdom is before the face of him who has sense; but the eyes of the foolish are on the ends of the earth.
target: Finna chu hriat thiamna neitu hmaah a awm thin a, Mi â mit erawh chu kawlkilah a awm thin.

source: I ran
target: Ka tlan tawh

source: But now those who are younger than I make sport of me; those whose fathers I would not have put with the dogs of my flocks.
target: Tunah zawng ka aia nauten mi nuihzat a, An pate kan ran rual vengtu ui zinga Telah pawh ka duh lohte khan.

source: You were bad at it.
target: I chhe hle a ni.

source: He helped me move.
target: Ka insawn theih nan min pui a.

source: When blows overtake the man of pride, the simple will get sense; say sharp words to the wise, and knowledge will be made clear to him.
target: Hmusit ching mi chu vua la, Tichuan mi mawlin remhriat a zir ang a; Ngaihthiamna nei chu zilh la, a hre thiam ang.

source: Who may go up into the hill of the Lord? and who may come into his holy place?
target: LALPA tlângah tunge chho vang a, A hmun thianghlimah tunge ding ang?

source: And you saw the trouble of our fathers in Egypt, and their cry came to your ears by the Red Sea;
target: Aigupta rama kan pi leh pute hreawmzia chu i hmu reng a, Tuifinriat Sen kama an au thawmte chu i hria a;

source: See, the Lord God is my helper; who will give a decision against me? truly, all of them will become old like a robe; they will be food for the worm.
target: Ngai teh, Lalpa PATHIAN chuan mi țanpui ang; tuin nge thiam loh mi chantir ang? Ngai teh, chung zawng zawngte chu silhfen angin a la hlui ang a, thimin a ei chhe vek ang.

source: And whatever seems right to you and to your brothers to do with the rest of the silver and gold, that do, as may be pleasing to your God.
target: Tin, tangka leh rangkachak hman bangte chu in Pathian remtihzâwng awmin nang leh i unauten tha in tih ang angin ti ang che u.

source: Too salty
target: A al lutuk

source: When it is still green, without being cut down, it becomes dry and dead before any other plant.
target: A la duah lai reng pawhin sahthluk lohvin. Thlai dangte aiin a uai hma thin.

source: And they were living in Gilead in Bashan, in its small towns and in all the grass-land of Sirion as far as its limits.
target: Tichuan Gilead rama Basan-ah leh a khawpuiahte leh Saron dai vel zawng zawng an ram chin thlengin an luah a.

source: But I will not say anything about my needs, for I am able, wherever I am, to be dependent on myself.
target: Ka tlakchham thu sawi zawng ka ni lo ve; kei zawng eng ang pawhin awm mah ila, lungawi zel ka ching tawh si a.

source: From the coming up of the sun to its going down, the Lord's name is to be praised.
target: Ni chhuahna atanga a tlakna thlengin LALPA hming chu fak tûr a ni.

source: Let me in.
target: Ka lo lut ang.

source: Don't sit up late.
target: Thut tlai suh.

source: If you come back to the Ruler of all, making yourself low before him; if you put evil far away from your tents;
target: Engkimtitheia hnêna i kir chuan tundin i ni ang a, I puan in ata fel lohna i dah bo daih phawt chuanin,

source: Let women keep quiet in the churches: for it is not right for them to be talking; but let them be under control, as it says in the law.
target: Kohhranho inkhawmnaah chuan hmeichheho chu ngawi rengin awm rawh se; anni zawng an thusawi phal a ni si lo; Dan Lehkhabuin a sawi ang bawk khan thu zawmin awm zawk rawh se.

source: I've already made it.
target: Ka siam fel tawh.

source: Sami was singing
target: Sami chu a zai a

source: I'm not done with it yet.
target: Ka la zo lo.

source: I drank juice
target: Thei tui ka in

source: Now there was a long war between Saul's people and David's people; and David became stronger and stronger, but those on Saul's side became more and more feeble.
target: Saula chhûngte leh Davida chhûngte chu rei tak an indo va; Davida chu a lo chak tial tial a, Saula chhûngte erawh chu an chak lo tial tial a.

source: You should wear a coat
target: Coat i ha tur a ni

source: Do you know your size?
target: I size i hria em?

source: Tom let me drive
target: Tom chuan min khalh tir a

source: I approved it
target: Ka lo pawmsak

source: Then you are to make its seven vessels for the lights, putting them in their place so that they give light in front of it.
target: Tin, chu mi atân khânvâr pasarih I siam tûr a ni: tichuan khawnvarte chu an dah ang a, a hma zâwnte chu a ên theih nân.

source: If only my passion might be measured, and put into the scales against my trouble!
target: Aw, ka manganna hi buk ni teh sela, Ka vanduaina h buknaah dah ni teh sela!

source: As for me, I was foolish, and without knowledge; I was like a beast before you.
target: Mi mawl leh engmah hre lo ka ni a, I lakah chuan sa ang mai ka nih hial thin kha.

source: And if any beast which may be used for food comes to a natural death, anyone touching its dead body will be unclean till evening.
target: Ran in ei theih chi reng reng pawh thi sela, a ruang khawih apiang chu tlai lam thlengin a bawlhhlawh ang.

source: He's a bird watcher.
target: Vawk entu a ni.

source: I'll be good
target: Ka ṭha ang

source: For this put on haircloth, with weeping and loud crying: for the burning wrath of the Lord is not turned back from us.
target: Chumi avâng chuan saiip puan feng ula, Țap ula, chiau vawng vawng rawh u; Kan laka LALPA thinurna nasa tak mai chu A la kiang si lo va.

source: He's crying
target: A ṭap mêk

source: From the day when your fathers came out of Egypt till this day, I have sent my servants the prophets to you, getting up early every day and sending them:
target: In thlahtute Aigupta ram ata an chhuah si ațanga vawiin ni thleng hian ka rawngbawltu, zâwlnei zawng zawngte zing tak taka thovin in hnênah ka tir ni tin țhin a.

source: Heshbon and Jazer with their grass-lands, four towns.
target: Hesbon khua a daivelte nen,Jazer khua a daivelte nen; a vaiin khawpui pali.

source: He took a deep breath.
target: Thâwk a la a.

source: Don't mess things up.
target: Thil tibuai suh.

source: You're poisoning me.
target: Min poison a ni.

source: He is nice.
target: A mitha a nia.

source: Strength and self-respect are her clothing; she is facing the future with a smile.
target: A silhfen chu chakna leh ropuina ani a, Hun lo la thleng tûr atân pawh a nui a.

source: You're not welcome
target: I lo lawm lo

source: Tom hasn't gone home yet.
target: Tom a la haw lo.

source: It is warm
target: A lum a ni

source: And Enoch had a son Irad: and Irad became the father of Mehujael: and Mehujael became the father of Methushael: and Methushael became the father of Lamech.
target: Tin, Enok chuan fapa Irada a nei a: Irada chuan fapa Mehujaela a nei a: Mehujaela chuan fapa Methusaela a nei a: Methusaela chuan fapa Lameka a nei a.

source: They're eating apples
target: Apple an ei a ni

source: Their fruit will be cut off from the earth, and their seed from among the children of men.
target: An rahte chu lei ata i tiboral ang a, An thlahte chu mihring fate zing ata i tiboral bawk ang.

source: They send away the ass of him who has no father, they take the widow's ox for debt.
target: Pa nei lote sabengtung an um bosak a, Hmeithai bâwngpa, dahkham atân an laksak a,

source: Now in all Israel there was no one so greatly to be praised for his beautiful form as Absalom: from his feet to the crown of his head he was completely beautiful.
target: Israel zawng zawng zinga Absoloma ang renga hmêl thata fak kai tuma an awm lo va: a ke ler atangin a chip thlengin sawiselna rêng rêng a awm lo va.

source: Nothing was in the ark but the two flat stones which Moses put there at Horeb, where the Lord made an agreement with the children of Israel when they came out of Egypt.
target: Aigupta ram ata an chhuah a, LALPAN Israela thlahte hnana thu a thlun laia Mosian Horeb tlânga lungphêk pahnih a dah chauh lo kha chu chu mi bâwm chungah chuan engmah dang a awm lo.

source: Now after this, the children of Moab and the children of Ammon, and with them some of the Meunim, made war against Jehoshaphat.
target: Tin, chu mi hnua chuan heti hi a ni a, Moaba thlahte leh Amona thlahte chu Meun-ho thenkhatte nen Jehosaphata bei tûrin an lo thawk a.

source: After looking at a field with care, she gets it for a price, planting a vine-garden with the profit of her work.
target: Huan tûr a ngaihtuah a, a lei a, A kutkawih chhuah ngeiin grêp huan a siam thin.

source: I do not feel like doing it.
target: Tih ka duh lo.

source: If we are questioned today about a good work done to a man who was ill, as to how he has been made well,
target: mi chak lo tihthat thu-ah, ‘He mi hi eng vangin nge a lo dam tak?’ tiin vawiinah hian min chhuahchhal chuan,

source: And Laban said, See these stones and this pillar which I have put between you and me;
target: Tin, Labana vêkin Jakoba hnênah, He lung tin khâwm hi en la, keimah leh nangma inkâra he lung ka phun pawh hi en teh.

source: Do not let your ornaments be those of the body such as dressing of the hair, or putting on of jewels of gold or fair clothing;
target: In incheina chu pawn lam incheina – sam phiar te, rangkachak thi awrh te, silhfena inthuam te chu – ni lovin,

source: If you had belief in Moses you would have belief in me; for his writings are about me.
target: Mosia in rin chuan kei pawh mi ring tawh tur in ni; ani chuan keima chanchin asin a ziak ni.

source: With wind instruments and the sound of the horn, make a glad cry before the Lord, the King.
target: Tawtawrâwtte leh tawtawrâwt bi nei ri nên, Lalber, LALPA hmaah chuan, hlim takin au rawh u.

source: I have made you a tester among my people, so that you may have knowledge of their way and put it to the test.
target: Ka mite zingah chhintu-ah leh fiantu-ah ka siam chia, An awm dan i hriat a, i fiah theih nân.

source: How he made an oath to the Lord, and gave his word to the great God of Jacob, saying,
target: LALPA hnêna chhia chham a, Jakoba Mi Chaka henna thu a tiamzia kha:

source: And Barnabas had a desire to take with them John, named Mark.
target: Tin, Barnaban Johana Marka an tih chu an hnenah hruai a tum a,

source: If you say, How cruel we will be to him! because the root of sin is clearly in him:
target: Engtin nge amah chu kan tihduhdah ang, Thil bulte amahah hmu siin, in tih chuan,

source: They will be fighting against you, but they will not overcome you: for I am with you, says the Lord, to give you salvation.
target: An bei ang chia, mahse an hneh lo vang che: chhan chhuak tûr chein i hnênah ka awm si a, tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: Paul and Timothy, servants of Jesus Christ, to all the saints in Christ Jesus at Philippi, with the Bishops and Deacons of the church:
target: Paula leh Timothea, Krista Isua bawihte chuan Krista Isuaa mi thianghlim Philippi khuaa awm zawng zawngte hnenah, kohhran hotute leh rawngbawltute hnenah nen:

source: It's for Tom
target: Tom tâna nia

source: And Saul sent for the people and had them numbered in Telaim, two hundred thousand footmen and ten thousand men of Judah.
target: Chutichuan Saula chuan mipuite a ko khawm a, Telaim khuaah a chhiar a, sipai nuaihnih leh Juda mi singkhat an ni a.

source: However, it is clear to us where this man comes from: but when the Christ comes no one will have knowledge where he comes from.
target: He mi hi a pianna chin lam kan hre si a, Krista erawh chu a lo thlen hunah chuan a pianna chin tuman an hre loving, an ti a.

source: This is the punishment of the evil-doer from God, and the heritage given to the cruel by the Ruler of all.
target: Pathian hnêna mi suaksual chanvo chu hei hi a ni, Hnehchhiahtute rochan, Engkimtitheia hnêna an dawn chu.

source: Do they drink tea?
target: Tea an in em?

source: Give it to me!
target: Ka hnênah mi rawn pe rawh!

source: They are watching
target: An en reng a

source: Your boatmen have taken you into great waters: you have been broken by the east wind in the heart of the seas.
target: I lawng khalhtun tuipui fawnah a khalh lut chia, Khawchhak thlîin a nuai ral che, tuipui laiah.

source: O give not the soul of your dove to the hawk; let not the life of the poor go out of your memory for ever.
target: Aw, i thuro nunna hi ram sakawlh hnênah chuan pe lul suh la: I mi retheite nunna kumkhua chuan theihnghilh suh ang che.

source: And the voice came to me again from heaven, saying, Go, take the book which is open in the hand of the angel who has his place on the sea and on the earth.
target: Tin, van ata aw ka hriat khan mi be leh a, Tuifinriat leh khawmuala ding vantirhkoh kuta lehkhabu hawn sa saw va la rawh, a tih ka hria a.

source: See how the Lord has made great his mercy for me; the Lord will give ear to my cry.
target: LALPA chuan Pathian ngaihsak mi chu ama tan a dah hrang tih hi hre zawk rawh u: LALPA chuan, ka koh apiangin a lo ngaithla ang.

source: We're not healthy
target: Kan hrisel lo

source: On the four edges of your robe, with which your body is covered, put ornaments of twisted threads.
target: In intuamna puan chu a tlâng pali-ah fem in neihtir tur a ni.

source: I don't have the water.
target: Tui ka nei lo.

source: Put these on.
target: Hei hi ha rawh.

source: And get the fat young ox and put it to death, and let us have a feast, and be glad.
target: sebawng no thau tak kha han la ula, talh rawh u, hlim takin i ei ang u;

source: Zion's hands are outstretched; she has no comforter; the Lord has given orders to the attackers of Jacob round about him: Jerusalem has become like an unclean thing among them.
target: Zion a kut a phar vêl, thlamuantu tûr awm lo ve; LALPAN Jakob-ho chungchangah a vêla awm zawng zawng hnehchhiattu ni tûrin a rel ta; Jerusalem chu an zîngah thil thianghlim lo a lo chang e.

source: You should have kept it secret.
target: I thup tur a ni.

source: I baked a pie.
target: Chhangphel ka ur.

source: The sleep of a working man is sweet, if he has little food or much; but to him who is full, sleep will not come.
target: Thawkrimtu chu a ei tlêm êmaw, a ei tam emaw, a mut a tui thin a, mi hausa chuan angahna chu a muthilh loh phah zawk ang.

source: Their priests were put to death by the sword, and their widows made no weeping for them.
target: An puithiamte chu khandaiha tihtlukin an awm a; An hmeithaite chu tah rêng rêng an tap lo.

source: Does it surprise you?
target: Mak a ti che em?

source: I relented
target: Ka zuai

source: And we made request for their names, so that we might send you word, and give you the names of the men at the head of them.
target: An hotu hmingte chu kan ziak a, kan hriat fiahtir theih nân che an hmingte pawh chu kan zâwt a.

source: And their words will be like poisoned wounds in the flesh: such are Hymenaeus and Philetus;
target: an thu pawh chuan pan chhe ei angin a ei zel ang; an zingah chuan Humenaia leh Phileta an tel a ni;

source: I found these
target: Hêngte hi ka hmu

source: And they had hair like the hair of women, and their teeth were as the teeth of lions.
target: Tin, hmeichhe sam ang hi sam an nei a, an hate pawh chu sakeibaknei ha ang a ni.

source: Let's get them to bed
target: An mut tir ang u

source: Their tongues are sharp like the tongue of a snake; the poison of snakes is under their lips. (Selah.
target: An lei chu rul angin an tihriam a; An heh chhûngah chuan rulrial tûr a awm a. Selah

source: But now, if you only put your hand on his bone and his flesh, he will certainly be cursing you to your face.
target: Tunah i kut thawh la, a ruh leh a tisa ngei khawihsak teh, i hmaichhan ngeiah a sawichhe mai ang che, a ti a.

source: I've already been there
target: Ka kal tawh a

source: They followed him
target: An zui a

source: There is to be no strange god among you; you are not to give worship to any other god.
