target: Ram dang pathian rêng rêng chu in zingah an awm tûr ani lo va; Mi dang pathian rêng rêng chu in biak tûr ani hek lo.

source: I dream a lot
target: Ka ngaihtuah nasa

source: See, I am conscious of your thoughts, and of your violent purposes against me;
target: Ngai teh, in ngaihtuahte zawng ka hria alawm, Dik lo taka ka chunga in phiarte chu.

source: And Geshur and Aram took the tent-towns of Jair from them, with Kenath and the small places round it, even sixty towns. All these were the sons of Machir, the father of Gilead.
target: Tin, Gesura leh Arama chuan jaira khawpui te, Kenath khua leh a khawperte nen, khaw sawmruk alaksak a. Chung zawng zawng chu Gileada pa Makira fapate chu an ni.

source: I'm tidy.
target: Ka felfai.

source: Look alert
target: Fimkhur rawh

source: For when God made his oath to Abraham, because there was no greater oath, he made it by himself,
target: Pathianin Abrahama hnena thu a rawn tiam lai khan,amah aia ropui zawk chhala chhia a chham theih loh avangin amah leh amah inchhalin,

source: A man taking false news is a cause of trouble, but he who gives news rightly makes things well.
target: Zualko suaksual chu thil sualah a tlu lut thin a, Palai rinawm chu damna a ni.

source: I made him go.
target: Khapa kha ka haw tir.

source: So he took him into the country of Zophim, to the top of Pisgah, and there they made seven altars, offering an ox and a male sheep on every altar.
target: Tichuan Zophim-ho awmna Pisga chhipah a hruai chho va, maicham pasarih a siam a, maicham tinah chuan bawngpa pakhat leh berampa pakhat a hlan a.

source: Tom sat down
target: Tom a ṭhu

source: Don't light the candle
target: Candle chu hal suh

source: So she sent a letter in Ahab's name, stamped with his stamp, to the responsible men and the chiefs who were in authority with Naboth.
target: Chutichuan Ahaba hmingin lehkha a ziak a, a nemnain a nem a, tin, lehkha chu a awmna khuaa Nabotha thenawm upate leh mi thate hnêna a thawn a.

source: They're all good guys.
target: Mi tha vek an ni.

source: It's extremely lumpy.
target: A lumpy hle mai.

source: This is God's purpose for you: because Jesus himself underwent punishment for you, giving you an example, so that you might go in his footsteps:
target: Krista pawh khan a tuarsak che u avangin hetiang ti turin koh in ni asin; a hniaka in zuina turin entawn tur a hnutchhiah che u kha.

source: If he gives his field from the year of Jubilee, the value will be fixed by your decision.
target: A lo chu Jubili kum atanga hlan a nih chan I ruat ang chu a ni reng ang a.

source: Things got out of hand.
target: Thil a chhuak ta.

source: Don't be mad
target: Â duh suh

source: This is the law I give you: Have love one for another, even as I have love for you.
target: Hei hi ka thupek a ni, keiin ka hmangaih che u ang bawkin nangni inhmangaih ula.

source: You are not to put up stone pillars, for they are hated by the Lord your God.
target: LALPA in Pathianin a huatzawng lung pawh in phun tur a ni hek lo.

source: Everything which goes flat on its body on the earth is disgusting, and is not to be used for food.
target: Tin, rannung lei chunga a bawha bawkvak chi zawng zawng chu thil tenawm an ni a, ei tur an ni lo.

source: Be ready then; for at a time which you have no thought of the Son of man will come.
target: Chuvangin, nangni pawh inring rengin awm rawh u, in rin loh hunah Mihring Fapa a lo kal dawn si a.

source: Calm down
target: Inbeng dai rawh

source: Stop whining
target: Rûm tawh suh

source: I have everything
target: Engkim ka nei vek

source: They started walking
target: An kal tan ta a

source: Now they made a secret design against him in Jerusalem; and he went in flight to Lachish, but they sent after him to Lachish and put him to death there.
target: Tin, Jerusalem khuaah amah an phiar ru a; tihuan Lakis khuaah a tlan a; nimahsela Lakis khuaah chuan mi an umtir a, hutah chuan an that ta a,

source: Knowledge is stored up by the wise, but the mouth of the foolish man is a destruction which is near.
target: Mi fingte chuan hriatna an khawl khâwm a; Mi â ka erawh chu boral hnaih rengna a ni.

source: And Solomon had seventy thousand men numbered for transport, and eighty thousand for cutting stone in the mountains, and three thousand, six hundred as overseers.
target: Solomona chuan thil phur mi singsarih leh, tlânga thing kittu singriat leh anmahni vêngtu sângthum leh zaruk a ruat a.

source: So death overtook Saul and his three sons; all his family came to an end together.
target: chutichuan Saula leh a fapate pathum chu an thi ta a; an pafaza chuan an thi ta a ni.

source: They put the fat on the breasts, and the fat was burned on the altar.
target: a thau chu a ir chungah te chuan an dah a, tin, a ni chuan a thau chu maichâmah a lo hal

source: For in this we are crying in weariness, greatly desiring to be clothed with our house from heaven:
target: Van ata kan awmna tur sin thuah chk em emin he mi inah hian kan rum tak meuh meuh si thin a;

source: I knit.
target: Ka thui.

source: We will not be there.
target: Kan awm dawn lo.

source: I'm poor.
target: Ka rethei.

source: And I will give the rain at the right time, and I will make the shower come down at the right time; there will be showers of blessing.
target: Anmahni leh ka tlângvêl hmunte chu mal ka sawm ang a, a huntein ruah ka surtîr ang a, malsawm ruahte a sur ang.

source: You're brave
target: I huaisen e

source: I love jokes
target: Fiamthu ka duh

source: I'm rested
target: Ka chawl tawh

source: I'll buy one
target: Pakhat ka lei ang

source: I saw it, too.
target: Ka lo hmu ve tawh.

source: So that as it is clear that some have to go in, and that the first hearers of the good news were not able to go in because they went against God's orders,
target: Chutichuan, thenkhat chu mi chawlhnaah chuan an la luh tur thu a la awm avang leh, hmana Chanchin Tha hrilh dawngtute chu awih loh vanga an luh tak loh avangin,

source: Let's attack
target: Bei ang le

source: See, I have put before you today, life and good, and death and evil;
target: Tunah hian in hmaah nunna leh thatna, thihna leh thi țha lo ka dah a;

source: They went with Noah into the ark, two and two of all flesh in which is the breath of life.
target: Tichuan tisa zawng zawng nunna thaw pai rêng rêngte chu a tuak zêlin Nova hnênah chuan lawngah an lût ta a.

source: You may stay
target: I awm thei ang

source: Solomon was thirteen years building a house for himself till it was complete.
target: tin, Solomona chuan ama in chu kum sâwm leh kum thum a sa a, a in chu a peih vek a.

source: So Jephthah went in flight from his brothers and was living in the land of Tob, where a number of good-for-nothing men, joining Jephthah, went out with him on his undertakings.
target: Chutichuan Jephtha chu a unaute ho hnên ata chu atlan bo va, Tob ramah a awm ta a: tin, Jephtha hnênah chuan mi ho tak takte an cheng khawm a, an zui thin a.

source: Do you shave your legs?
target: I ke i sam em?

source: Tom is crazy about you.
target: Tom hi a â a ni.

source: My eyes are full of weariness with searching for your word, saying, When will you give me comfort?
target: I thu thlir nân ka mit a vai zo ta a, Nangin engtikah nge mi thlamuan ang? ka ti, ka ti thin a.

source: Get up now, and go over the stream Zered. So we went over the stream Zered.
target: chutichuan tho ula, Zered lui chu kan rawh u khai,' a ti a. Tichuan Zered lui chu kan kan ta a.

source: You were tired with your long journeys; but you did not say, There is no hope: you got new strength, and so you were not feeble.
target: I kalna kawng sei avâng khan i hah a: nimahsela, Beiseina rêng rêng a awm lo, i ti si lo va: i chakna tihharhna i hmu a; chuvangin i chauh tak loh kha.

source: Why let yourself, my son, go out of the way with a strange woman, and take another woman in your arms?
target: Eng atân nge nang, ka fapa chuan hmeichhe sual i lawm ang a, A tang i pawm ang?

source: And David got together all the fighting-men of Israel to the number of thirty thousand;
target: Tin, Davida chuan Israel mite zinga mi thlan thiau singthum a khawm leh a.

source: I was eating something.
target: Eng emaw ka ei a.

source: Because you have said, I am in the hands of the Lord, the Most High is my safe resting-place;
target: Aw LALPA, nang hchu ka inhumhimna i ni si! Chungnungbera chu i awm nân i hmang a;

source: Because through him the two of us are able to come near in one Spirit to the Father.
target: Ama zaran Thlarau hmunkhata Pa hnena luh theihna kan nei ve ve a ni.

source: She is full of energy
target: Chakna a khat a ni

source: I enjoy what I do.
target: Ka thil tih hi nuam ka ti hle.

source: He sent signs and wonders among you, O Egypt, on Pharaoh, and on all his servants.
target: Aw Aigupta ram, ani chuan chhinchhiahnate leh thilmakte i chhûngah a rawn tir a, Pharaoa chungah leh a chhiahhlawh zawng zawng chungahte chuan.

source: Let this month be to you the first of months, the first month of the year.
target: Tûn thla hi in tân thla chhiar tanna a ni ang a: in tan kum khat chhûnga thla chhiar tanna a ni ang.

source: If your face is veiled, they are troubled; when you take away their breath, they come to an end, and go back to the dust.
target: I hmai i thup a, an mangang thin a; An thaw chu i laksak a, an thi a,

source: So he went and did as the Lord said, living by the stream Cherith, east of Jordan.
target: Chutichuan a kal a, LALPA thu ang chuan a ti ta a: Jordan bula awm Kerith luiah chuan a han awm ta a.

source: The weather is sunny
target: Khua a ni a

source: And if a man does damage to his neighbour, as he has done, so let it be done to him;
target: tin, miin a thenawm a tihhmelhem chuan a tih ang tak chuan a chungah tih ve tur a ni;

source: She's still alive
target: A la dam reng a ni

source: I made them come after me with the cords of a man, with the bands of love; I was to them as one who took the yoke from off their mouths, putting meat before them.
target: Mihring hruihrual, hmangaihna hruite chuan an mahni ka kai a; An tân chuan an khabea kawl hlihsaktute ang chu ka ni a, Duat takin an hmâah eitûr ka hlui a

source: Happy is that servant who, when his lord comes, is doing so.
target: A pu a lo kal hunah bawih chutiang tia a rawn hmuha chu a eng a thawl ang.

source: Don't do it!
target: Ti suh!

source: Does it eat people?
target: Mi a ei em?

source: Don't come in
target: Lo lut suh

source: While this was taking place, the disciples were saying to Jesus, Master, take some food.
target: Chu mi hlanin zirtirte chuan a hnenah, Zirtirtu ei rawh, an ti chiam a.

source: Is it necessary for us to go
target: Kan kal a ngai em

source: Be a good person.
target: Mi tha tak ni rawh.

source: How long am I to put up with this evil people and their outcries against me? The words which they say against me have come to my ears.
target: Heng mipui suaksual pungkhawm ho, ka chunga phunnawi thin hi eng chen nge ka dawh ang? Israela thlahte phunnawina, ka chunga an phunnawinate chu ka hria e.

source: Is that fair?
target: A felfâi em?

source: It's fair.
target: A dik.

source: The rulers of the peoples have come together, with the people of the God of Abraham; because the powers of the earth are God's: he is lifted up on high.
target: Abrahama Pathian mite ni tûrin Mi ti zinga mi liante chu an awm khâwm a: Leilung phawte chu Pathian ta ani si a; Ani chu nasa taka chawimawiin a awm.

source: You're still not well.
target: I la dam lo a ni.

source: They are extremely unpleasant
target: An hlim lo hle

source: Be my guide, O Lord, in the ways of your righteousness, because of those who are against me; make your way straight before my face.
target: Aw LALPA, ka hmêlmate avângin hian i felna avâng chuan mi hruai la; I kawng chu ka hmaah hian titluang ang che.

source: And they said, Not one of your relations has that name.
target: Tin, annin a hnenah, I laichinte zingah he hming pu hi tumah an awm hlei nem, an ti a.

source: You're hardworking
target: Taima tak i ni

source: You can answer it.
target: I chhang thei ang.

source: They said bitter words against God, saying, Is God able to make ready a table in the waste land?
target: A ni, Pathian an sawi hnawm a; Thlalêrah hian Pathianin dawhkan a buatsaih thei emaw chu?

source: We are liable to err.
target: Kan liable a ni.

source: His legs were covered with plates of brass and hanging on his back was a javelin of brass.
target: A ngalah chuan dar ngalphaw a bun a, a hnungzangah chuan dar fei te a pai a.

source: He makes all their hearts; their works are clear to him.
target: An zaa thinlung siam thina, An thiltih zawng zawng ngaihtuah thintu chuan.

source: He's a lumberjack
target: Lumberjack a ni a

source: We said our last words to one another, and got into the ship, and they went back to their houses.
target: Tin, Dam takin, kan inti a, lawngah chuan kan chuang a; anni erawh chu an inah an haw leh ta a.

source: And he went into their Synagogues in every part of Galilee, preaching and driving out evil spirits.
target: Tichuan thu hrila ramhuaite hnawt chhuak zelin Galili ram zawng zawnga an inkhawmna inahte a lut zel a.

source: For his death was a death to sin, but his life now is a life which he is living to God.
target: A thihna chu sual lam kawngah chatuan atan vawi khat chauh a thi a ni, a nunna erawh chu Pathian lam kawngah a nung a ni.

source: They quarreled among themselves
target: An inhnial a

source: My prayer was for this child; and the Lord has given him to me in answer to my request:
target: He naupang dil hian ka tawngtai a ni a; tin, LALPA chuan ka dil chu min pe ta a:

source: You barely ate anything.
target: Engmah i ei zo lo.

source: She gives attention to the ways of her family, she does not take her food without working for it.
target: An chhûng khawsak dan a en tha a, Dawngdahna chhâng a ei lo.

source: Is it all right to go?
target: Kal a tha em?

source: We aren't yet perfect.
target: Kan la famkim lo.

source: And if anyone says a word against the Son of man, he will have forgiveness: but for him who says evil words against the Holy Spirit, there will be no forgiveness.
target: Tin, Mihring Fapa sawisel apiangte chu an sawiselna chu ngaihdamsak a ni ang; Thlarau Thianghlim meuh sawichhia erawh chu a sawichhiatna chu ngaihdamsak a ni lo vang.

source: And they made a decision to get with the silver the potter's field, as a place for the dead of other countries.
target: Tichuan an inrawn a, mikhualte phumna turin Belvawtu hmun chu an lei ta a.

source: They walked around
target: An kal kual vel a

source: My skin is black and dropping off me; and my bones are burning with the heat of my disease.
target: Ka vun chu a lo dum a, a khawk a, Ka ruhte chu a lum vut vut a.

source: Be merciful
target: Khawngaihna ngah rawh

source: May there be no war!
target: Indona awm lo se!

source: We do what we can
target: Kan theihtawp kan ti thin

source: Are you doing all right?
target: I ti tha vek em?

source: Then Ezra got up, and made the chiefs of the priests and the Levites and all Israel take an oath that they would do this. So they took an oath.
target: Chutichuan Ezra chu a tho va, puithiam tupa deuh deuhte leh Levi chite leh Israel mi zawng zawngte chu, chu thu anga ti tûr chuan chhia a chhamtir a. Chutichuan chhia chu an cham ta a.

source: With his arm he has done acts of power; he has put to flight those who have pride in their hearts.
target: A banin a tha chakzia a entir a, Mi chapote chu an inngaihtuahnain a tidarh ta a.

source: But the judge will be seated, and they will put an end to his authority, to overcome it and send complete destruction on it.
target: Mahse rorêlna a lo awm ang a, a thuneihna chu tihrala tihchhiat hlen tûrin an labo vang.

source: We were roommates
target: Roommate kan ni a

source: And take twice as much money with you; that is to say, take back the money which was put in your bags, for it may have been an error;
target: tin, tangka a leh hnihin keng ula, in ip rawng bula tangka a pêk kîr che u pawh khan keng leh rawh u; a tihpalh a ni mahna:

source: Who will win
target: Tunge chak ang

source: I really enjoying breakfast.
target: Kan tuk

source: And as for anyone who takes it for food, his sin will be on him, for he has put shame on the holy thing of the Lord: he will be cut off from his people.
target: a ei apiang chuan LALPA thil thianghlim a tihbawrhban avangin a khawlohna mawh a phur ang a, chu mi chu a chipuite zing ata tuithlarin a awm zawk ang.

source: I shivered slightly.
target: Ka khur deuh a.

source: Don't swim.
target: Hleuh suh.

source: You're all doomed
target: In boral vek tawh

source: And she took her seat on a great bed, with a table put ready before it on which she put my perfume and my oil.
target: khum ropui takah i lo țhu a, a hmâah dawhkan i buatsaih a, ka rimtui leh ka hriakte tah chuan i hlui țhin a ni.

source: Face facts!
target: Hmaichhan thudik!

source: Give praises to God, make songs of praise; give praises to our King, make songs of praise.
target: Pathian fakin zai ula, fakin zai rawh u.: Kan lalber fakin zai ula, fakin zai rawh u.

source: I need a week.
target: Kar khat ka mamawh.

source: But at least you have the credit of hating the works of the Nicolaitans, as I do.
target: Nimahsela, hei hi i thatna chu a ni, Nikola ho thiltihte i huat hi; chu chu kei pawhin ka haw ve a ni.

source: A time for weeping and a time for laughing; a time for sorrow and a time for dancing;
target: Tah hun a awm a, nuih hun a awm; Sun hun a awm a, lam hun a awm.

source: They did not keep in mind the work of his hand, or the day when he took them from the power of their haters;
target: A kut chu an hre reng lo va, Dotu laka a chhanhim ni chu an hre reng thin hek lo.

source: And now, O our God, what are we to say after this? for we have not kept your laws,
target: Aw kan pathian, tunah hian eng nge kan sawi tak ang? I thupêkte chu kan hawisan ta si a.

source: I will listen
target: Ka ngaihthla ang

source: He cracked up
target: A tithiam tawh

source: Stay here
target: Hetah awm rawh

source: The voice of my loved one! See, he comes dancing on the mountains, stepping quickly on the hills.
target: Ka duhtak aw chu, ngai rawh, a lo kal e, Tlângah zuang tumin mualah a tualchai e.

source: Keep going
target: Kal zel rawh

source: And when the brothers had knowledge of it, they took him to Caesarea and sent him to Tarsus.
target: Tin, unaute chuan chu chu an hriatin Kaisari khuaah an hruai chhuk a, Tarsa khuaah an tir ta daih a.

source: They guarantee it
target: An guarantee a ni

source: Sami's dog isn't there.
target: Sami ui a awm lo.

source: And this money, the price of those over the number of the Levites, is to be given to Aaron and his sons.
target: a chuangho tlanna sum chu Arona leh a fapate i pe tur ani, tiin.

source: Have they spotted you
target: An hmu tawh che em

source: Give no attention to them; become servants of the king of Babylon and keep yourselves from death: why let this town become a waste?
target: Anmahni ngaithla hauh suh u; Babulon lal rawngbâwl ula, in nung dawn nia; engah nge he khawpui hi ațiau vang le?

source: For you have said, Mercy will be made strong for ever; my faith will be unchanging in the heavens.
target: Ngilneihna chu kumkhua atân rem chhohvin a awm ang a; I rinawmna chu vanahte ngei khian i tinghet ang, ka ti ta a ni.

source: The Lord will keep you safe from all evil; he will take care of your soul.
target: LALPA chuan sual tinreng lakah a veng ang chia; I nuna chu a veng ang .

source: And the second took her, and at his death there were no offspring; and the third the same:
target: Tichuan a phanihna chuan a rochung a, chi thlah lovin a thi leh bawk a; a pathumna chuan chutiang bawkin.

source: Don't try to help me.
target: Min puih tum suh.

source: And his father, Zacharias, was full of the Holy Spirit, and with the voice of a prophet said these words:
target: Tin, a pa Zakaria chu Thlarau Thianghlimin a lo khat a, a sawi lawk a,

source: It is planted in shame; it comes again in glory: feeble when it is planted, it comes again in power:
target: chawimawi lohva tuhin a awm a, ropui taka kaihthawhin a awm: chak lova tuhin a awm a, thiltihtheihna neia kaihthawhin a awm;

source: We must celebrate
target: Kan lâwm tur a ni

source: For forty years he was ruling as king over Israel, seven years in Hebron and thirty-three years in Jerusalem.
target: Israelho chunga a lal chhung chu kum sâwm li a ni; Hebraon khuaah kum sarih a lal a, Jerusalem-ah kum sâwmthum leh kum thum a lal a.

source: I will let it be overturned, overturned, overturned: this will not be again till he comes whose right it is; and I will give it to him.
target: Ka linglet ang, ka linglet ang; ka linglet ang; hei pawh hi a ngaiin a awm lo vang, a neitu tak tûr a lo kal hma zawng amah chu ka pe ang.

source: You can't take it with you.
target: I hruai thei lo.

source: My love is to me as a branch of the cypress-tree in the vine-gardens of En-gedi.
target: Ka duhtak chu ka tan Henna pâr bâwr ang, Engedi grêp huana mi chu.

source: I'm supposed to go.
target: Ka kal tur a ni.

source: In times past the word of God came to our fathers through the prophets, in different parts and in different ways;
target: Pathian, hmasanga thlahtute hnena bung tam tak leh kawng tinrenga Zawlneitea thu lo sawitu khan,

source: There's no risk involved.
target: Risk a awm lo.

source: They go from strength to strength; every one of them comes before God in Zion.
target: Chakna atangin chak lehzualnaah an kal thin a, Zion-ah Pathian hmaah chuan an inlan theuh thin.

source: And the Pharisees, who had a great love of money, hearing these things, were making sport of him.
target: Tin, Pharisai tangka ngaihlute chuan chung thu zawng zawng chu an hria a, an nuihsan a.

source: Are you getting any sleep?
target: Mut i nei em?

source: I'm chubby
target: Ka bial thau a

source: Is that mine?
target: Ka tâ a ni em?

source: For if the order which was for a time had its glory, much more will the eternal order have its glory.
target: Ral ta riai riaia mah ropuiin a thlen chuan awm reng tura chu ropuia tuamin a awm zawk em em tur a ni.

source: But you are the unchanging One, and your years will have no end.
target: Nang erawh chu i pangngai fo va, I kumte chuan ral ni reng a nei lo vang.

source: But their lips were false to him, and their tongues were untrue to him;
target: Nimahsela amah chu an kain an fak der a, An leiin an hnênah dawt thu an sawi thin.

source: I have taken the way of faith: I have kept your decisions before me.
target: Awm dan rinawm ka thlang a: I rorêlnate ka hmaah ka awmtir a.

source: And Absalom was the father of three sons and of one daughter named Tamar, who was very beautiful.
target: Tin, Absaloma chuan fapa pathum leh fanu pakhat a nei a, a hming chu Tamari a ni a, hmêl tha tak a ni.

source: I'm also an amateur
target: Amateur ka ni bawk

source: Has not this come on you because you have given up the Lord your God, who was your guide by the way?
target: LALPA i Pathian chuan kawnga a hruai lai che a, I tlân bosan avângin, Chu chu i chunga i thlentîr a ni lâwm ni?

source: Why then are you testing God, by putting on the neck of the disciples a yoke so hard that not even our fathers or we were strong enough for it?
target: Chutichuan min thlahtu leh keini zawh tawh loh nghawngkawl kha tunah zirtirhote chunga nghah tumin engati nge Pathian fin in hnial kalh le?

source: Then they went on their journey from Succoth, and put up their tents in Etham at the edge of the waste land.
target: Tin, Sukoth hmun ata chu an chhuak a, thlalêr tawntîrh Etham hmunah an riak a;

source: So Moses did as the Lord said: he took Joshua and put him before Eleazar the priest and the meeting of the people:
target: Tin, Mosia chuan LALPA thupêk ang chuan a ti a: Josua chu a hruai a. Eleazara leh pungkhawmho zawng zawng hmaah chuan a dintir a:

source: You're wrong
target: I dik lo

source: A wrongdoer gives attention to evil lips, and a man of deceit gives ear to a damaging tongue.
target: Thil tha lo titu chuan mi suaksual kamchang a bengkhawn thin a, Mi dawthei chuan pawikhawih hmang lei lamah beng a chhi thin.

source: Now the Philistines, having taken the ark of God, took it with them from Eben-ezer to Ashdod.
target: Chutichuan Philistia mite chuan Pathian bâwm chu an la a, Eben-ezer ata chu Asdod khuaah an kalpui ta a.

source: He's too old
target: A upa tawh lûtuk

source: But the king's word was stronger than Joab's. So Joab went out and went through all Israel and came to Jerusalem.
target: Nimahsela lal thu chuan Joaba chu a hneh ta a. Chutichuan Joaba chu a chhuak a, Israel ram zawng zawngah chuan a kal a, Jerusalem-ah a haw leh a.

source: And will not give to any of them the flesh of his children which will be his food because he has no other; in the cruel grip of your haters on all your towns.
target: engmah an neih tawh loh avangin an fate sa an ei tur chu a tuate mah an pe lovang; an hualna che u leh an dan chepna che u avangin.

source: I wasn't convinced
target: Ka inrintawk lo

source: There was lots of screaming
target: Au thawm a tam hle

source: For by wise guiding you will overcome in war: and in a number of wise guides there is salvation.
target: Bei hmain ngun taka ral rel a tha, Rem i hriat poh leh i chak zawk ang.

source: You clean up
target: Tifai ang che

source: At that time, when David saw that the Lord had given him an answer on the grain-floor of Ornan the Jebusite, he made an offering there.
target: Tin Davidan Jebus mi Ornana hruihah LALPAN a rawn chhang tih a hriatin chutah chuan a inthawi ta a.

source: Tychicus will give you news of all my business: he is a dear brother and true servant and helper in the word;
target: Lalpaa unau duh tak, rawngbawltu rinawm, kan bawihpui Tukika hian ka chanchin zawng zawng a hriattir ang che u.

source: Give honour to the Lord with your wealth, and with the first-fruits of all your increase:
target: I sumin LALPA chawimawi la. I thil lo pung hmasa ber zawng zawngte nên;

source: This is my doing
target: Hei hi ka tih a ni

source: They walk too slow
target: An kal zawi lutuk

source: I'll go get cleaned up.
target: Ka va tifai ang.

source: Be not quick to go from before him. Be not fixed in an evil design, because he does whatever is pleasing to him.
target: A hma ata chhuah hmanhmawh suh la, thil tha lo tilui suh: A duh duha ti thin a ni si a.

source: Life and not death will be my part, and I will give out the story of the works of the Lord.
target: Ka thi lo vang, ka dam ang a, LALPA thiltihte chu ka hrattir zawk ang

source: Certainly the evil-doer will not go free from punishment, but the seed of the upright man will be safe.
target: Inthurual mah sela, mi suaksualte chu hrem lohvin an chhuak lo vang a, Mi fel thlahte erawh chu chhan chhuahin an awm ang.

source: And if it is any unclean beast, of which offerings are not made to the Lord, then let him take the beast before the priest;
target: Tin, ran thianghlim lo, LALPA hnena hlan ngai loh mi a nih chuan, ran chu puithiam hmaah a dah tur a ni;

source: I need a pen
target: Pen ka mamawh

source: Be turned to me, and have mercy on me; for I am troubled and have no helper.
target: Ka lamah hian lo hawi la, mi khawngaih ang che; Khawhar leh hreawm takin ka awm si a.

source: Did you swim?
target: I hleuh em?

source: Wealth quickly got will become less; but he who gets a store by the work of his hands will have it increased.
target: Engmah lo mai maia sum deh chhuah chu tihriral a ni ang a; Thawhrimna khawl erawh chu a pung ang.

source: And through him everyone who has faith is made free from all those things, from which the law of Moses was not able to make you free.
target: tupawh a ring apiang engkimah ama thiam chantirin an awm, chungah chuan Mosia danin thiam chantirin in awm thei lo ve.

source: But not even Titus who was with me, being a Greek, was made to undergo circumcision:
target: Nimahsela, Tita ka hnena awm pawh chu Grik mi ni mah sela, serh tan luihsakin a awm ta lo va;

source: Where there will be bread for you in full measure and you will be in need of nothing; a land where the very stones are iron and from whose hills you may get copper.
target: chham lova chhang in ei thinna tur ram, engmah in tlakchhak lohna tur, a lungte chu thir, a tlâng chu dar laih chhuah theihna ram țha takah chuan a hruai lut dawn si che u a.

source: And they put shame on him, and gave him blows on the head with the rod.
target: Tin, amah chu chil an chhak a, luang chu an laksak a, a luah chuan an vua a.

source: I'm beginning to believe it.
target: Ka ring tan ta.

source: He sent down meat on them like dust, and feathered birds like the sand of the sea,
target: Sa chu vaivut zat laiin an chungah sa surtir a, Sava thla nei chu tuifinriat tiau vaivut zat laiin:

source: I might faint
target: Ka thidang ang

source: Their children who were still in the land, and whom the children of Israel had not been able to put to complete destruction, them did Solomon put to forced work, to this day.
target: an thlah, chung rama la awm Israela thlahten an tihboral zawh vek theih lohvate zingah chuan Solomonan chhiahhlawh, hnathawka rawih luih pâwl a siam a, tun thleng hian.

source: I got caught
target: Min man chhuak

source: You're a murderer
target: Tualthattu i ni

source: I am living among you as one from a strange country: give me some land here as my property, so that I may put my dead to rest.
target: In zingah mikhual leh pêm mai ka ni a: ka mitthi ruang hi ka hmuh lohva ka phûm theihna tûrin in zîngah hian phumna hmun ro mi pe rawh u, tiin a sawi a.

source: FG: I don't know.
target: FG: Ka hre lo.

source: He may take of the bread of God, the holy and the most holy;
target: An Pathian ei tur chhiah, a thianghlim leh a thianghlim ber pawh chu an ei thei ve ve ang.

source: And of Asher, forty thousand who went out with the army, expert in ordering the fight.
target: Aser-ho zinga mi , râl bei tlâk thiau tan khawh thiam 40,000.

source: It failed
target: A hlawhtling lo

source: Judging uprightly in the cause of the widow and of the child who has no father, and giving food and clothing in his mercy to the man from a strange country.
target: Pa nei lote leh hmeithaite chu fel takin ro a relsak thin a, ram dang mite chu ei tur leh silhfente pein a hmangaih thin a.

source: I asked Tom
target: Tom ka zâwt a

source: And she said with a loud voice: May blessing be on you among women, and a blessing on the child of your body.
target: tin, aw ring takin a au va, Nang chu hmeichhia azawnga engthawl i ni, i rila rah pawh a engthawl a ni.

source: And when Paul had put his hands on them, the Holy Spirit came on them; and they had the power of talking in tongues, and acting like prophets.
target: Tin, Paulan an chungah a kut a nghat a, Thlarau Thianghlim chu a chungah a lo thleng ta a; tichuan tawng hriat lohtein thu an sawi a, Pathian thu pawh an hril ta a.

source: Are there many people
target: Mi an tam em

source: I paid 10 dollars for it.
target: Dollar 10 ka pe a.

source: If we have been planting the things of the Spirit for you, does it seem a great thing for you to give us a part in your things of this world?
target: Keinin thlarau lam thilte chu in hnena kan tuh tawh chuan tisa lam thilte chu seng mah ila, thil hlawk tak em ni ang?

source: People are talking.
target: Mite an inbia a.

source: The sun was setting
target: Ni a tla tawh a

source: You've got it wrong.
target: I hre sual a ni.

source: Do it now
target: Tunah tirawh

source: Then the Amalekites came down, and the Canaanites who were living in the hill-country, and overcame them completely, driving them back as far as Hormah.
target: Chutichuan chu mi tlânga awm Amalek-ho leh Kanaan-ho chu lo chhuk a, an bei a, Horma thlengin an vaw thlu rum mai a.

source: And the sons of Javan: Elishah and Tarshish, the Kittim and the Dodanim.
target: Tin, Javana fapate chu Elisa te, Tarsisa te leh Kittama te, Dodanima te an ni a.

source: But the hand of the Lord was hard on the people of Ashdod and he sent disease on them through all the country of Ashdod.
target: Chutichuan LALPA kut chuan Asdod khuaa mite chu a delh ta hle mai a, chhiatna a thlensak ta hlawm a, Asdod khua le a chehvelte chu ngawtin a hrem ta bawk a.

source: And straight away the Spirit sent him out into the waste land.
target: Tin, Thlarau chuan ani chu thlalerah a tir chhuak ta nghal a.

source: When he had been taken off the road, all the people went on after Joab in search of Sheba, the son of Bichri.
target: Tin, lamlian ata dah sawn a nih hnu chuan Bikria fapa Seba um tûrin mi zawng zawgin Joaba chu an zui ta a.

source: Check it now
target: Tunah endik rawh

source: It's funny
target: A nuihzatthlak

source: I give you a book.
target: Lehkhabu ka pe a.

source: Is it possible for the skin of the Ethiopian to be changed, or the markings on the leopard? Then it might be possible for you to do good, who have been trained to do evil.
target: Ethiopia mi hangin a vun a tidanglamin keitein a zia a thup thei êm ni? Chuti a nih chuan nangni thil sual tih ching thinte pawhin Thil țha in tithei ang chu!

source: I do not mince words.
target: Thu ka mince lo.

source: Stay awake
target: Harh reng rawh

source: Burn it
target: Hal rawh

source: You did that
target: Kha kha i tia maw

source: What would she have said
target: Eng nge a sawi ang

source: Then I will keep in mind the agreement which I made with Jacob and with Isaac and with Abraham, and I will keep in mind the land.
target: Jakoba hnena ka thuthlung chu ka hre reng ang a: Isaaka leh Abrahama hnena ka thuthlungte pawh ka hre reng ang a; tin, ram pawh chu ka hre reng bawk ang.

source: Have, then, no fear of them: because nothing is covered which will not come to light, or secret which will not be made clear.
target: Chutichuan, anmahni chu hlau suh ang che u; lang lo tura thuhruk engmah a awm si lo, hriat loh tura zep pawh engmah a awm hek lo.

source: Give ear and let your ears be open; be not lifted up: for these are the words of the Lord.
target: Ngaithla ula, beng dawh rawh u; Chapo suh u, LALPA chuan thu a thlah tawh a ni.

source: For with the heart man has faith to get righteousness, and with the mouth he says that Jesus is Lord to get salvation.
target: Miten thinlungin an ring a, felna an hmu thin a; kain an tan a, chhandamna an hmu bawk thin a ni.

source: Though my hands have done no violent acts, and my prayer is clean.
target: Ka kutah pawngnekna a awm lo va, Ka tawngtaina a thianghlim chung pawhin.

source: They're inseparable
target: An inthen thei lo

source: And, turning to the disciples, he said privately, Happy are the eyes which see the things you see:
target: Tin, zirtirte lam a hawi a, arukin, In thil hmuhte hi a hmuhna mitte chu a vannei e!

source: Have you come into the springs of the sea, walking in the secret places of the deep?
target: Tuipui hnarahte i lut tawh ngai êm? A thukzia te i fang chhuak tawh êm ni?

source: Then let Eleazar the priest take some of her blood on his finger, shaking the blood seven times in the direction of the front of the Tent of meeting:
target: tin, puithiam Eleazara chuan a kut zungtangin a thisen chu ala ang a, inbiakna puan in hma lamah a thisen chu vawi sarih a theh ang a:

source: And the fat of that which comes to a natural death, and the fat of that which is attacked by beasts, may be used for other purposes, but not in any way for food.
target: Amaha thi thau leh sa seh thau chu thil dang engah pawh hman theih a ni ang a: ei erawh chu in ei hauh tur a ni lo.

source: So take Aaron and Eleazar, his son, up into Mount Hor;
target: Arona leh a fapa Eleazara chu Hor tlângah rawn hruai chho rawh:

source: Tom was talking to himself
target: Tom chu a inbia a

source: And on that day the ruler is to give for himself and for all the people of the land an ox for a sin-offering.
target: Chumi niah chuan lalin amah leh a rama mi zawng zawng tan sual vanga inthawi nân bâwngpa tuai a tum ang.

source: You're getting fat
target: I thau chho zel a

source: And when she saw them she was full of desire for them, and sent servants to them in Chaldaea.
target: Tin, anmahni a hmuh veleh a hak hiam a, an hnênah kaldai thlengin mi a tîr a.

source: I'm in enough pain already.
target: Ka na tawk tawh.

source: Inside the ark you are to put the record which I will give you.
target: Tin, bâwm chhûngah chuan thuhriattîrna ka la pêk tûr che chu I dah tûr a ni.

source: And he took a seat by the place where the money was kept, and saw how the people put money into the boxes: and a number who had wealth put in much.
target: Tin, thawhlawm bawm zawnah chuan a thu a, thawhlawm bawma mipuiho tangka thlakzia chu a en a; mi hausa tam takin hnem tak ang thlak a.

source: You're early
target: I va hmâ ve

source: What's not necessary?
target: Eng nge a tul lo?

source: Put up a pillar for Moab, for she will come to a complete end: and her towns will become a waste, without anyone living in them.
target: A thlawh bo theih nân Moab chu thla pe ula, A khuate chu a ram ang a, chengtu awm lovin.

source: Are you breathing
target: I thaw chhuak em

source: He is able to have feeling for those who have no knowledge and for those who are wandering from the true way, because he himself is feeble;
target: chungte chuan engmah hre lote leh kawng bote chungah zai an dawh thei thin a ni, anmahni ngei pawh chak lohna hual velin an awm ve bawk avangin.

source: It's unusual
target: A pangai lo

source: And of Dan he said, Dan is a young lion, springing out from Bashan.
target: Dan-ho chungthu-ah chuan, Dana sakeibaknei no a ni, Basan ațanga lo zuang chhuak chu, a ti a.

source: And when the captain saw what was done, he gave praise to God, saying, Without doubt this was an upright man.
target: Tin, sipai za hotu chuan thil awmzia chu a hmuhin, He mi hi matheilovin mi fel tak a ni phawt mai, tiin Pathian a fak ta a.

source: For every one of them put down his rod on the earth, and they became snakes: but Aaron's rod made a meal of their rods.
target: An tiang chu an han paih theuh va, rûlah a chang theuh a ni: amaherawhchu Arona tiang chuan an tiangte chu a lem zo ta vek a.

source: And his hand will be stretched out on the countries: and the land of the south will not be safe from him.
target: Ramte chungah pawh a kut a lek ang a, Aigupta ram pawhin a pumpelh lo vang.

source: Everything was lost
target: Engkim a bo vek a

source: Then the tribe of Benjamin, with Abidan, the son of Gideoni, as their chief.
target: Tin, a dawt lehah Benjamin chite: Benjamina thlahte puipa tur chu Gideona fapa Abidana a ni ang:

source: No one has called
target: Tuman an la ko lo

source: Broad minded
target: Rilru zau

source: For he says to Moses, I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy, and pity on whom I will have pity.
target: thil siam zawng zawngte ngei pawh chu chhiatna bawih ata tihchhuahin an awm ang a, Pathian fate zalenna ropuiah chuan an lut dawn si a.

source: Blessings are on the head of the upright, but the face of sinners will be covered with sorrow.
target: Mi fel lu-ah chuan malsawmnate a awm a, Mi suaksual ka erawh chu nunrawnnain a tuam.

source: You're a survivor
target: I damchhuak a ni

source: Let your wrath be on the nations who have no knowledge of you, and on the kingdoms who have not made prayer to your name.
target: Nangmah hre lo hnam tin chungah hian i thinur chu leihbua ang che, I hming lam lo ram chungahte pawh.

source: Sami was unconscious
target: Sami chu a hre lo

source: They're very happy
target: An lawm hle mai

source: I don't plan on getting caught.
target: Man ka tum lo.

source: You're dying
target: I thi mek

source: Do you eat salads?
target: Salad i ei em?

source: But a number of those who gave hearing to the word had faith; and they were now about five thousand.
target: Nimahsela thu ngaithlahote zinga tam takin an awih a; an tam lam pawh patling hlir pawh sangnga lai an tling a.

source: Beer is beer
target: Zu chu zu a ni

source: Tom saw us.
target: Toman min hmu.

source: Tom isn't running
target: Tom chu a tlan lo

source: I can't stay
target: Ka awm thei lo

source: I took the weight from his back; his hands were made free from the baskets.
target: An koki chu thil rit atangin ka la sawn a: An kutte chu kho la thlahtir a

source: Keep driving
target: Khalh zel rawh

source: She gave no attention to the voice, she had no use for teaching, she put no faith in the Lord, she did not come near to her God.
target: Aw chu a awih lo va; zilhna a pawm lo va; LALPA chu a ring lo va; a Pathian lam a hnaih duh lo.

source: So Michal let David down through the window, and he went in flight and got away.
target: Chutichuan Mikali chuan Davida chu tukverhah a athlak thla a; tichuan a tlan bo va, a him ta a.

source: And all the small places round these towns, as far as Baalath-beer, the high place of the South. These were their living-places, and they have lists of their generations.
target: tin, chu mi vêla khaw te zawng zawng baal thlengin a ni. Chungte chu an chenna a ni a, an thlahtute thu ziakna an kawl bawk.

source: They're all hungry
target: An riltam vek tawh

source: And to the second he gave the name Ephraim, for he said, God has given me fruit in the land of my sorrow.
target: Tin, a fa pahnihna hmingah chuan Ephraima a sa a: Pathianin ka hreawm tuarna ramah hian chi mi thlahtîr ta si a, a ti a.

source: Which is the way to the resting-place of the light, and where is the store-house of the dark;
target: An ramri i hruai theih a, An in lam kawng chin i hriat theihna tûr chuan,

source: And they let down the lead, and saw that the sea was a hundred and twenty feet deep; and after a little time they did it again and it was ninety feet.
target: chutichuan tui thuk lam an teh a, hlam sawmhnih niin an hria a; tin, rei lo tean an teh leh a, hlam sawm leh hlam ngain an hria a.

source: I don't take anything for granted.
target: Engmah ka ngai lo.

source: I'll quit.
target: Ka bansan ang.

source: Sorrow to you who are looking for the day of the Lord! what is the day of the Lord to you? it is dark and not light.
target: LALPA nî duhte u, in chung a pik e! Engati nge LALPA nî chu in duh? Eng ni lo vin thim a ni zâwk e.

source: He gave his people up to the sword, and was angry with his heritage.
target: A mite chu khandaih hnênah a pe a; A rochan chungah chuan a thin a rim ta a.

source: They approve
target: An pawm e

source: He feels hurt
target: Na a ti

source: Then the king went to his great house, and took no food that night, and no ... were placed before him, and his sleep went from him.
target: Tichuan, a tûk zîng takah chuan lal chu a tho va, hmanhmawh takin sakeibaknei pûk lamah chuan a kal ta a.

source: And Zillah gave birth to Tubal-cain, who is the father of every maker of cutting instruments of brass and iron: and the sister of Tubal-cain was Naamah.
target: Tin, Zillaii pawh chuan Tubal-Kaina dâr leh thîr hriamhrei tinrêng chhertu a hring a: tin, Tubal-Kaina farnu chu Naamaii a ni a

source: I didn't clean it.
target: Ka tifai lo.

source: What was she told?
target: Eng nge an hrilh?

source: Dimnah and Nahalal with their grass-lands, four towns.
target: Dimna khua a daivelte nen,Nahalal khua a daivelte nen, khawpui pali.

source: The designs of the false are evil, purposing the destruction of the poor man by false words, even when he is in the right.
target: Mi duham chu khawlo tak a ni; retheite chu dawt tichhe tûrin thil sual a phiar chhuak a, pachhiate pawh an diknaah pawh a dang tlat țhin.

source: And on the day which had been fixed, Herod, dressed in his robes and seated in his place, made a public statement to them.
target: Tin, a ni tiam niin Heroda chuan lal puan a sin a, lalthutphahah a thu a, an hnenah thu a sawi a.

source: Nobody ran
target: Tumah an tlan lo

source: Hey, are you crazy?
target: Hei, i â em ni?

source: So the men went after them on the road to Jordan as far as the river-crossing: and when they had gone out after them, the door into the town was shut.
target: Tin, mite chuan Jordan lui lamah kai thlengin an um ta a; tin, a umtute chu an chhuah veleh chuan kulh kawngka chu an khar ta a.

source: Then David had discussions with the captains of thousands and the captains of hundreds and with every chief.
target: Tin, Davida chuan htou zawng zawng, sâng hotute leh za hotute chu a rawn hlawm a.

source: I've been grounded.
target: Ka ground tawh.

source: If a price is put on his life, let him make payment of whatever price is fixed.
target: A tlana tlan tûrin lo tuk zâwk sela erawh chuan a nunna aiah chuan an tuk zât apiang chu tlan nân pêk tûr a ni.

source: And Samuel said, What then is this sound of the crying of sheep and the noise of oxen which comes to my ears?
target: Tin, Samuiela chuan, Chung berâm be ka benga lo lut leh bâwngpa bu ka han hriatte chu engtizia nge ni si? a ti a.

source: And the Jews were in agreement with his statement, saying that these things were so.
target: Tin, Judate pawh chuan, Chung thu chu chutiang chu a ni, tiin an tanpui ve a.

source: And said, My Lord, if now I have grace in your eyes, do not go away from your servant:
target: Ka pu, mi khawngaih theih chuan, khawngaih takin i chhiahhlawh hi mi kalpêl lul suh ang che u:

source: They'll look after me.
target: Min enkawl ang.

source: Are you going to watch?
target: I en dawn em ni?

source: I will give ear to the voice of the Lord; for he will say words of peace to his people and to his saints; but let them not go back to their foolish ways.
target: Pathian LALPA thu sawi tûr chu ka ngaithla ang: A mite leh a mi thianghlimte hnênah thlamuanna thu a sawi dawn si a: Nimahsela anni chu atna lamah hawi leh tawh su h se.

source: In God is my salvation, and my glory; the Rock of my strength, and my safe place.
target: Pathian hnênah ka chhandamna leh ka ropuina a wm a: Ka chakna lungpui leh ka inhumhimna chu Pathianah a awm.

source: I intend to quit.
target: Bansan ka tum a ni.

source: Sami hasn't appeared
target: Sami a la lang lo

source: This is what we will do to them: we will not put them to death, for fear that wrath may come on us because of our oath to them.
target: hetiang hian an chungah ti ila, i zuah mai ang u; chuti lo zawng an hnenah chhia kan lo chham tawh si avangin kan chungah hian thinurna a lo thleng mai ang asin, an ti a.

source: I am going the way of all the earth: so be strong and be a man;
target: Leilung zawng zawng dan angin ka kal ve dawn ta a ni: tichuan chak takin awm la, patling takin awm rawh;

source: I bid you welcome.
target: Ka bid a che u.

source: I'm there all the time.
target: Ka awm reng a ni.

source: Let the Lord keep in mind the wrongdoing of his fathers; and may the sin of his mother have no forgiveness.
target: A thlahtute khawlohna chu LALPA hnênah hriat rengin awm sela; A nu sualna chu thai bovin awm suh se.

source: While Peter was saying these words, the Holy Spirit came on all those who were hearing the word.
target: Tin, Peteran chung thu chu a sawi lai tak chuan thu hretute zawng zawng chungah chuan Thlarau Thianghlim a lo thleng ta a.

source: Whose bag is this?
target: Hei hi tu bag nge?

source: The images of the nations are silver and gold, the work of men's hands.
target: Hnam tin, milemte chu tangka leh rangkachak an ni a, Mihring kut chhuak an ni.

source: And of Asher he said, Let Asher have the blessing of children; may he be pleasing to his brothers, and let his foot be wet with oil.
target: Aser-ho chungthuah chuan, Asera chu fanauva malsawmin awm sela, A unaute zingah tlatlum sela; Hirakah a ke chiah rawh se.

source: And Benjamin was the father of Bela his oldest son, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,
target: Tin, Benjaminan a fa tirah Bela a hring a, a dawtah Asbela, a dawt lehah Ahara;

source: We can be a band
target: Band kan ni thei

source: I grunted
target: Ka huk ri

source: O keep in mind that you made me out of earth; and will you send me back again to dust?
target: Nangin hlum angin mi siam tih hre reng teh aw; Vaivutah mi chantir leh dawn êm ni?

source: And Samuel became older, and the Lord was with him and let not one of his words be without effect.
target: Tin, Samuela chu a lo thang lian deuh deuh va, a hnênah LALPA a awm zel a, a thu rêng rêng chu leilungah a luan râltir lo va.

source: Now very early in the morning Jesus was there by the edge of the sea (though the disciples were not conscious that it was Jesus.
target: Tin, khawfing chahin Isua tiauphovah a ding a; nimahsela zirtirte chuan Isua a ni tih an hre si lo.

source: We don't deserve this.
target: Hei hi kan phu lo.

source: My tears have been my food day and night, while they keep saying to me, Where is your God?
target: Ka mittui hi a chhun azanin ka chaw a ni. Khawiah nge i Pathian le? mi lo ti chamchi a.

source: And three bands of men came out from the Philistines to make an attack; one band went by the road which goes to Ophrah, into the land of Shual:
target: Tin, lamththamhote chu Philistia mite tanhmun atangin pawl thumin an lo chhuak a: pawl khatte chu Sual rama Ophra lam pan akwng chu an zawh a:

source: Having eyes, do you not see? and having ears, have you no hearing? and have you no memory?
target: Mit nei siin in hmu lo vem ni? beng nei siin in hre lo vem ni? in hre reng lo vem ni?

source: Then Moses took Israel forward from the Red Sea, and they went out into the waste land of Shur; and for three days they were in the waste land where there was no water.
target: Tichuan Mosian Israel-hote chu Tuifinriat Sen ata a hruai chhuak a, Sûr thlalêr lam panin an chhuak ta a; tin, thlalêrah chuan ni thum zet an kal a, tui an hmu zo ta lo va.

source: He was crying with hunger.
target: Rilṭâmin a ṭap a.

source: He was 80 years old.
target: Kum 80 mi a ni a.

source: The young lions go thundering after their food; searching for their meat from God.
target: Sakeibaknei vanglaite chuan an sa seh tûr chu hahum zuiin, Pathian hnên ata an ei tûr an zawng thin.

source: I want to die soon.
target: Thi thuai ka duh.

source: A translation was demanded.
target: Lehlin an phut a.

source: We overslept
target: Kan hmu tam lûtuk

source: It's OK not to eat it.
target: Ei loh chu a OK.

source: Though I am poor and in need, the Lord has me in mind; you are my help and my saviour; let there be no waiting, O my God.
target: Kei zawng rethei leh pachhe tak ka ni a, Nimahsela LALPAN mi ngaihtuah thin a: Nang chu mi tanpuitu leh mi chhanhimtu i ni a; Aw ka Pathian, rei rial lul suh ang che,

source: But her end is bitter as wormwood, and sharp as a two-edged sword;
target: A tawpna erawh chu sai angin a kha a, Khandaih hriam tawn angin a hriam.

source: I was ill.
target: Ka damlo tawh.

source: But he, having knowledge of their thoughts, said to them, Every kingdom in which there is division is made waste; and a house in which there is division comes to destruction.
target: Ani erawh chuan an ngaihtuahte chu a lo hria a, an hnenah, Khawii ram pawh mahni indo apiang an boral thin; chhungkhat pawh mahni indo chu an boral thin.

source: I dislike people
target: Mi ka duh lo

source: Keep my heart from desiring any evil thing, or from taking part in the sins of the evil-doers with men who do wrong: and let me have no part in their good things.
target: Suahsualna thilte Thil tisual mite tihpui tûr chuan, Ka thinlung hi thi tha lo rêng rêng lamah chuan thlektir suh la: An ei tûr tak takte chu mi eitir suh ang che.

source: But the fig-tree said to them, Am I to give up my sweet taste and my good fruit and go waving over the trees?
target: Nimahsela theipui kung chuan an hnênah, 'Ka thlumna leh ka rah tha tak hi chhuahsanin, thing chungah lehlam lehlaman ka phe ka phe tehlul ang maw?' a ti a.

source: Let my hater go after my soul and take it; let my life be crushed to the earth, and my honour into the dust. (Selah.
target: Dotu hian ka nunna hi umin, umphak mai rawh se; A ni, kan nun hi leiah chil thluin, Ka ropuina hi vaivut zingah dah mai rawh se. Selah

source: The election is over.
target: Inthlan a zo ta.

source: She's got a point.
target: Point a nei a ni.

source: Now Saul, and they, and all the men of Israel were in the valley of Elah, fighting with the Philistines.
target: Saula leh anni leh Israel mi zawng zawngte chu Philistia mite beiin Ela ruamah chuan an awm e, a ti a.

source: Be cheerful
target: Lâwm rawh

source: I have given you glory on the earth, having done all the work which you gave me to do.
target: Nangin thil tihtur mi pek kha ka ti zo va, khawvelah ka chawimawi tawh a che.

source: That was hot
target: Kha kha a sa

source: And they said to Jephthah, Come and be our chief so that we may make war against the children of Ammon.
target: Jephtha hnênah chuan, Amona thlahte kan beih theihna tûrin kan hotu berah lo awm ta che, an ti a.

source: We don't want to get lost.
target: Kan bo duh lo.

source: And the chief men of his house got up and went to his side to make him get up from the earth, but he would not; and he would not take food with them.
target: Tin, a chhûngte zinga upate chu an tho va, lei ta chu kai tho tûrin a kiangah an ding a; nimahsela tho du lo va, an hneh pawh chaw a ei hek lo.

source: I got jealous
target: Ka thik tlat

source: It seems that way
target: Chutiang chuan a lang

source: All the days of the troubled are evil; but he whose heart is glad has an unending feast.
target: Hrehawm tuartu tan ni zawng zawng mai hi a tha lo vek a, Thinlung hlim mie rawh chuan ruai a theh reng mai a ni.

source: They are wet with the rain of the mountains, and get into the cracks of the rock for cover.
target: Tlânga ruahpuiin a nân huh a, Phen tûr nei lovin lungpui an b el a.

source: I said in my heart, The Lord will not give ear to me:
target: Ka thinlunga sualna ka ngaihsak chuan LALPAN mi ngaithla lo vang:

source: In his day, Pul, the king of Assyria, came up against the land; and Menahem gave Pul a thousand talents of silver so that he might let him keep the kingdom.
target: Asuria lal Pulan ram chu a rawn bei a; ram chu a neih nghehpui theih nân Menahema chua Pula chu tangka talent sâng a pe a.

source: Do we seem to be again attempting to put ourselves in the right? or have we need, as some have, of letters of approval to you or from you?
target: Mahni insawimawi kan tan leh dawn ta maw? A nih loh leh, in hnena pek tur emaw, in hnen ata emaw sawimawina lehkha, mi thenkhat tan a ngai angin kan tan a ngai ve dawn maw?

source: Uzzia the Ashterathite, Shama and Jeiel, the sons of Hotham the Aroerite,
target: Asterat mi Uzia te, Aroer mi Hothama fapa Sama leh Jeiela te;

source: Give me back the joy of your salvation; let a free spirit be my support.
target: I mi chhandam hlimna chu mi pe leh la: Thlarau tihnuamin mi chelh reng ang che.

source: You've won
target: I chak ta

source: What are you called
target: Eng nge koh i nih

source: And if any man came near to give him honour, he took him by the hand and gave him a kiss.
target: Hetiang pawh hian a ti a, tupawh amah chibai bûk tûra han hai apiangte chu a lo ban a, a chelh a, a lo fawp thin a.

source: We won't get scared
target: Kan hlau dawn lo

source: I'm looking for work.
target: Hna ka zawng mek.

source: He dozed off
target: A lo kut daih

source: Don't call me an idiot!
target: Idiot min ti suh!

source: See, you are wiser than Daniel; there is no secret which is deeper than your knowledge:
target: Daniela aiin i fing zawk a, i lakak thuruk rêng rêng a awm thei lo va,

source: It's a fad
target: Thil duhawm a nia

source: Heavens, I'm lost!
target: Vanram, ka bo ta!

source: Your bodies will be meat for all the birds of the air and the beasts of the earth; there will be no one to send them away.
target: In ruang chu chungleng sava zawng zawng leh ramsa zawng zawngte chaw a ni ang a, a hnawt botu an awm hauh lo vang.

source: And Judas Iscariot, who was one of the twelve, went away to the chief priests, so that he might give him up to them.
target: Tin, Juda Iskariota, sawm leh pahnihte zinga mi pakhat khan, Isua chu an hnena a mantir theih nan puithiam lalte hnenah a va kal a.

source: I know it works.
target: A thawk tih ka hria.

source: Who do you believe
target: Tu nge i rin

source: The cords of hell were round me: the nets of death came on me.
target: Seol hruihrualte chuan mi phuar vêl a: Thihna thangte chuan mi awk a.

source: The game finished
target: Inkhelh a zo ta

source: Or where were you when the sea came to birth, pushing out from its secret place;
target: Tuipui chu chhula a lo chhuah lai khan Tuin nge kawng lo khar hnan?

source: No, I'll pay for it.
target: Ni lo, ka pe ang.

source: I am in India
target: India-ah ka awm

source: They're tired
target: An hah a ni

source: I will do that.
target: Ka lo ti ngei dawnnia.

source: Be realistic
target: Mitak deuh rawh

source: Don't give them my number.
target: Ka number pe suh.

source: Because if the heritage is by the law, it is no longer dependent on the word of God; but God gave it to Abraham by his word.
target: Roluah tur chu Dan avang a nih chuan thutiam avang a ni tawh si lo vang; nimahsela Pathianin thutiam avangin a ni, Abrahama hnenah a pek ni.

source: I'm not washing my hair.
target: Ka sam ka sil lo.

source: She made mistakes
target: A tisual a ni

source: We're not available
target: Kan awm thei lo

source: I brought it here.
target: Hetah hian ka rawn keng a.

source: As I took up the cause with your fathers in the waste land of the land of Egypt, so will I take up the cause with you says the Lord.
target: Aigupta ram thlalêra in pate ka bei ang takin nangni pawh ka bei ang che u, tih hi LALPA PATHIAN thu chhuak a ni.

source: To him by whom the earth was stretched out over the waters: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.
target: Lei hi tui chunga dah duaitu hnênah chuan: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: And you took your sons and your daughters whom I had by you, offering even these to them to be their food. Was your loose behaviour so small a thing,
target: Chu lovah pawh i fanu, i fapa, mi hrinsakte chu an hnênah in thawi nâna hmanral atân i pe a: i hurna hi thil namên a ni êm ni?

source: What may we say about these things? If God is for us, who is against us?
target: Israel, felna dan umte erawh chuan felna dan chu an phak zo ta lo.

source: I should have said yes.
target: Ka ti tur a ni.

source: Is there water there
target: Tui a awm em

source: Do whatever you want about it.
target: I duh duh ti rawh.

source: And Jehoshaphat was living in Jerusalem; and he went out again among the people, from Beer-sheba to the hill-country of Ephraim, guiding them back to the Lord, the God of their fathers.
target: Tin, Jehosaphata chu Jerusalem-ah a awm a; tin, Beer-seba atanga Ephraim tlâng ram thlengin a mite zingah a kal leh a, LALPA an pi leh pute Pathian lamah a hruai kir leh hlawm a.

source: I'm clever
target: Ka fing vervek

source: We are six people.
target: Mi paruk kan ni.

source: It is sport to the foolish man to do evil, but the man of good sense takes delight in wisdom.
target: Mi â tan chuan thil sual tih hi nuamsip bawlna ang a ni a, Chutiang bawk chuan hriat thiamna nei mi an chuan finna chu a ni.

source: And they gave him an account of everything Joseph had said to them; and when he saw the carts which Joseph had sent for them, his spirit came back to him:
target: Tin, an hnêna Josefa thu sawi zawng zawng chu an hrilh a: tin, a chuanna tûr tawlailîr Josefan a thawnte chu a han hmuh chuan an pa Jakoba thinlung chu a harh ta huai a:

source: Try to guess
target: Ring chhin rawh

source: I took money from other churches as payment for my work, so that I might be your servant;
target: In zinga ka thawh lai khan Kohhran dangten min chhawmdawl a, nangni pui turin anni chu ka tihek a.

source: When my thoughts were turned to see the reason of this, it was a weariness in my eyes;
target: Chu chu ka hriat theihna tûrizia ka ngaihtuahin, Ka tan ahar lutuk a ni;

source: And when we were going to the place of prayer, we came across a girl with a spirit which gave knowledge of the future, whose masters made great profit from her power.
target: Tin, tawngtaina hmunah chuan kan kal laiin, nula tu emaw ramhuai aienthiam zawlin min tawk a, ani chuan a ai en avangin a pute chu sum tam tak a hmuhtir thin a.

source: They're behind schedule
target: An hnungtawlh tawh

source: I haven't gotten used to it yet.
target: Ka la thiam lo.

source: Okay, have a fun.
target: Awle, hlimtakin awm dawnnia.

source: One man has faith to take all things as food: another who is feeble in faith takes only green food.
target: Mi pakhatin thil engkim ei theiin a inring a, mi chak lo erawh chuan thlai chauh a ei thin.

source: You're highly intelligent.
target: I fing hle a ni.

source: In everything give praise: for this is the purpose of God in Christ Jesus for you.
target: engkimah lawmthu hril fo rawh u; chu chu nangmahni lam thuah Krista Isuaah chuan Pathian duhzawng a ni si a.

source: Are the comforts of God not enough for you, and the gentle word which was said to you?
target: I tan Pathian tawng thlamuanna hi a neu lutuk êm ni? Nem taka a tihna thu che hi?

source: The crushed stem will not be broken by him; and the feebly burning light will he not put out, till he has made righteousness overcome all.
target: Hneh tura rorelna a tirh chhuah hma loh zawng Luang sawp a titliak fithla lo vang a, La khu pawh a timit lo vang.

source: I am the door: if any man goes in through me he will have salvation, and will go in and go out, and will get food.
target: Kei kawngkhar chu ka ni; tupawh keimahah a luh chuan humhimin a awm ang a, a lutin a chhuak ang a, a ei tur a hmu bawk ang.

source: He has no sense of humor.
target: Hlimna a nei lo.

source: Don't ask.
target: Zawt suh.

source: Words of pride come from their lips; all the workers of evil say great things of themselves.
target: Anni chu an tawng mai mai a, chaltlai takin thu an sawi a: Thil tisualtute zawng zawng chu an infak chawp thin.

source: So the showers have been kept back, and there has been no spring rain; still your brow is the brow of a loose woman, you will not let yourself be shamed.
target: Chumi avâng chuan ruah chu surtir a ni lo va, Ruah hnuhnung pawh a sur hek lo; Mi hur chal putin i pu a, I zak duh hauh si l va.

source: And his people were greatly increased, and became stronger than those who were against them.
target: A mite chu nasa takin a tipung a, Anmahni dotute aiin a tichak ta zawk a.

source: We smiled
target: Kan nuih a

source: By the reading of which you will be clear about my knowledge of the secret of Christ;
target: kha mi avang khan, in chhiarin Krista thuruk ka hriatzia hi in hre thei ang.

source: But I say, Go on in the Spirit, and you will not come under the rule of the evil desires of the flesh.
target: Chutichuan, hei hi ka ti a ni: Thlarau vah awm rawh u, tichuan tisa chakna chu in zawm dawn lo nia.

source: So I see a law that, though I have a mind to do good, evil is present in me.
target: Chutichuan he dan hi ka lo hre ta: thil tha tih ka duh laiin sualna ka hnenah a lo awm thin a ni.

source: And Cyrus the king got out the vessels of the house of the Lord which Nebuchadnezzar had taken from Jerusalem and put in the house of his gods;
target: Lal Kura pawhin Nebukadnezara LALPA ina bungbêl Jerusalem atanga a lak chhuah a,a pathiante ina a dahte chu a la chhuak leh a;

source: She never broke down.
target: A chhe ngai lo.

source: Then the chief priests and the rulers of the people came together in the house of the high priest, who was named Caiaphas.
target: Chu mi lai chuan Puithiam Lalber Kaiapha an tiha in hual chhung kawtlaiah chuan puithiam lalte leh vantlang upate chu an inkhawm a;

source: They ate together
target: Chaw an ei dun a

source: And getting the twelve together, he gave them power and authority over all evil spirits and over diseases, to make them well.
target: Tin, Isuan sawm leh pahnihte chu a ko khawm a, ramhuai zawng zawng chunga thiltihtheihna leh thuneihna leh nate tihdam theihna a pe a.

source: The children of your servants will have a safe resting-place, and their seed will be ever before you.
target: I chhiahhlawhte fate chu an awm reng ang a, An thlahte chu i hmaah tihnghehin an awm ang.

source: But some of them were angry among themselves, saying, For what purpose has this oil been wasted?
target: Nimhsela, thenkhat chu an tinur ta hlawm a, eng atan nge hriak rimtui hi a tihboral mai mai ni?

source: The hater of authority, searching for wisdom, does not get it; but knowledge comes readily to the open-minded man.
target: Hmusit ching mi chuan finna a zawng a, a hmu thin lo va; Hriat thiamna neitu tan erawh chuan fina hi awlsam tak a ni.

source: We lost it
target: Kan tibo e

source: And after he had said these words to me, I kept my face turned to the earth and was unable to say anything.
target: Tin, heng thute ang zêla ka hnêna a sawi hun chuan, kei chu ka kaikûn a, ka țawng thei lo va.

source: And whatever more is needed for the house of your God, and which you may have to give, take it from the king's store-house.
target: Tin, i Pathian in atâna mamawh danga hman tulna a awm phawt chuan lal sum ina mi hmang ang che.

source: If a wise man goes to law with a foolish man, he may be angry or laughing, but there will be no rest.
target: Mi fingin mi â a hnial chuan, A thinur emaw, a nui emaw pawh ni sela, inremna a awm lo rêng rêng ang.

source: You didn't mention that.
target: Chu chu i sawi lo.

source: And any clothing or skin on which the seed comes is to be washed with water and be unclean till evening.
target: Tin, silhfen te, vunte inpâwlna chi awmna tawh phawt chu sûk faia sil fai vek tur a ni a, tlai lam thlengin a a bawlhhlawh ang.

source: I'm supposed to help them.
target: Ka puih tur a ni.

source: It will be your food, like the gazelle and the roe; the unclean and the clean may take of it.
target: Sangai sa te, sakhi sa te in ei ang maiin in ei ang a, thianghlim lote leh thianghlimte pawhin angkhat rengin in ei ang.

source: Are you still afraid of snakes
target: Rul i la hlau em

source: So now it was not you who sent me here, but God: and he has made me as a father to Pharaoh, and lord of all his house, and ruler over all the land of Egypt.
target: Chutichuan heta mi kaltîrtu hi nangni in ni lo va, Pathian a ni zâwk e: ani chuan Pharaoa paah leh a chhûngte zawng zawng hotuah leh Aigupta ram zawng zawng rorêltuah mi siam ta a.

source: Do you sell fruit
target: Thlai i hralh em

source: And Seth had a son, and he gave him the name of Enosh: at this time men first made use of the name of the Lord in worship.
target: Tin, Setha chuan amah ngei pawh chuan fapa a nei ta a; a hmingah chuan Enosa a sa a; chu mi lai chuan miten LALPA hming an lo lam tan ta a.

source: And the Apostles and the rulers of the church came together and gave thought to the question.
target: Tin, tirhkohte leh upate chu, chu mi thu chu ngaihtuah turin an inkhawm a.

source: I wasn't frightened
target: Ka hlau vak lo

source: It is eleven days' journey from Horeb by the way of Mount Seir to Kadesh-barnea.
target: Horeb tlâng atangin Kodesbarnea chu Seir tlâng lam kawngah ni sâwm leh ni khat kal a ni.

source: Is she hiding something?
target: Thil a thup em?

source: Eat whatever you want.
target: I duh duh ei rawh.

source: For men who are going after me have come out against me, violent men are purposing to take my soul; they have not put God before their eyes. (Selah.
target: Mikhualte chuan mi bei ta si a, Mi nunrawngten ka nunna hi tihbo tumin an zawng bawk a: Pathian chu an hmaah an dah lo. Selah

source: These are the men named out of all the people, chiefs of their fathers' houses, heads of the tribes of Israel.
target: Hengho hi mipuite zing ata thlan, an pi leh pute hnama puipa, Israel chhûngkaw puipate an ni, tiin.

source: Hi, everybody
target: In zavaiin chibai

source: We always triumph.
target: Kan chak fo ṭhin.

source: An upright man has thought for the life of his beast, but the hearts of evil-doers are cruel.
target: Mi fel chuan a ran nuna a engto va, Nimahsela mi suaksual zahngaihna nem ber pawh hi a rawng a ni.

source: They're good
target: An ṭha lûtuk

source: Who, in addition, was attempting to make the Temple unclean: whom we took,
target: Pathian biak in tihbawlhhlawh a tum bawk a; chuvangin kan man a,*

source: They can't hear you
target: An hre thei lo che

source: It is not my name.
target: Ka hming a ni lo.

source: So give me your oath by the Lord, that you will not put an end to my seed after me or let my name be cut off from my father's family.
target: chuvangin ka hnua ka thlahte lo awm tûrte hu tiboral lo tûr leh ka pa chhûngkaw zing ata ka hming tibo lo tûrin LALPA hmingin ka hnênah chia cham rawh khai, a ti a.

source: And I will keep you safe from the people, and from the Gentiles, to whom I send you,
target: mi zawng zawng leh Jentailte kut ata ka chhanhim ang che; an mit tivar turin an hnenah ka tirh che hi,

source: Did you read it at all?
target: I chhiar tawh em?

source: The heart of the man of good sense goes in search of knowledge, but foolish things are the food of the unwise.
target: Hriathiamna thinlung neitu chuan hriatna a zawng a, Mi â ka erawh chu dawtin a inhrai thin.

source: They're at it again
target: An awm leh ta

source: You certainly are smart.
target: I fing ngei ang.

source: Praise be to the Lord, who is our support day by day, even the God of our salvation. (Selah.
target: Lalpa, kan phur ni tina min phurhsaktu, Min chhandamtu Pathian chu fakin awm rawh se. Selah

source: The seed of his servants will have their part in it, and there the lovers of his name will have rest.
target: A chhiahhlawhho thlahte pawh chuan an rochung ang a; A hming ngainatute chu a chhûngah an awm ang.

source: I didn't get a reply.
target: Reply ka hmu lo.

source: There was a trial
target: Trial a awm a

source: We haven't started yet.
target: Kan la tan lo.

source: Give me some water
target: Tui min pe rawh

source: They are to come into my holy place and they are to come near to my table, to do my work and have the care of my house.
target: Ka hmun thianghlimah chuan an lût ang a, rawng mi bawlsak tûrin ka dawhkan an rawn hnaih ang a, mi enkawl tuah an țang ang.

source: I'll pack
target: Ka siam ang

source: Do you wanna try going in?
target: I luh tum em ni?

source: I give you orders, before God and Christ Jesus, who will be the judge of the living and the dead, and by his revelation and his kingdom;
target: Pathian mithmuh leh mi nung leh mitthi ngaihtuahtu tur Krista Isua mithmuhah chuan a inlarna leh a ram chhalin, thahnemngai takin ka hriattir a che:

source: Who is a God like you, offering forgiveness for evil-doing and overlooking the sins of the rest of his heritage? he does not keep his wrath for ever, because his delight is in mercy.
target: Nang anga khawlohna ngaidamtu leh a rochan la awm chhun bawhchhiatna leh pêl tu pathian tu nge awm? A thinrimna chu kumkhuain a vawng reng lo, khawngaihnain a lâwm êm êm țhin avângin.

source: They paid their compliment to me
target: An fakna min pe a

source: We waited for you.
target: Kan nghak che a.

source: And she kept his coat by her, till his master came back.
target: Tin, Josefa pu a lo hâwn hma loh chuan a silhfên chu a kiangah a lo dah reng a.

source: For on this day your sin will be taken away and you will be clean: you will be made free from all your sins before the Lord.
target: he mi ni hian nangmahni tihthianghlim nan in tan inremna siam a ni dawn a ni; tichuan LALPA hmaah in sualna zawng zawng lak ata in thianghlim ang.

source: You're catching on.
target: I man ta a ni.

source: Are they all the same
target: An inang vek em

source: The Lord has let his holy arm be seen by the eyes of all nations; and all the ends of the earth will see the salvation of our God.
target: LALPA chuan hnam tinrengte mithmuhah a ban thianghlim chu a hlim ta; tichuan kawlkila mi zawng anwgin kan Pathian chhandamna chu an hmu ang.

source: I still don't have one.
target: Ka la nei lo.

source: And this is the purpose of all our work and our fighting, because our hope is in the living God, who is the Saviour of all men, and specially of those who have faith.
target: Chutichuan, Pathian nung chu kan rin avangin kan thawk rim a, kan bei hram hram a ni si a; ani chu mi zawng zawng Chhandamtu a ni a, a ringtute Chhandamtu a ni deuh ber mai.

source: You're very lazy
target: I that chhe lûtuk

source: But the Lord will send his mercy in the daytime, and in the night his song will be with me, a prayer to the God of my life.
target: Nimahsela LALPAN a ngilneihna chu chhunah thu a pe ang a, A hla chuan zanah mi awmpui ang, Ka nuna Pathian hnêna tawngtaina chuan.

source: You send man back to his dust; and say, Go back, you children of men.
target: Nang chuan mihring hi boralnaah i kirtir thin a; Mihring fate u, kir leh rawh u,m i ti thin.

source: He is kind.
target: A nunnem.

source: And Herodias was bitter against him, desiring to put him to death; but she was not able;
target: Chuvngin Herodi chuan amah chu a hal riau va, tihhlum a chak a; nimahsela a thei si lo va.

source: They searched the house.
target: In chu an dap a.

source: We felt good
target: Ṭha kan ti

source: Do not put the Lord your God to the test as you did in Massah.
target: Masa-a in fiah ang khan LALPA in Pathian chu in fiah tur a ni lo.

source: It will not be put out day or night; its smoke will go up for ever: it will be waste from generation to generation; no one will go through it for ever.
target: Achhun azanin tihmihin a awm lo vang a; ameikhu chu kumkhuain a chho ngut ngut ang a; chhuan zamw chhûng zawng zawng chuan chiain a awm reng ang a; kumkhua pawhin tuman an pal lo vang.

source: I was cold
target: Ka vâwt vek

source: Let's get up
target: Tho ang

source: And Jotham went to rest with his fathers, and was put into the earth in the town of David his father; and Ahaz his son became king in his place.
target: Tin, Jothama chu api leh pute hnênah a muhil a, a pi leh pute zingah a pu Davida khawpuiah an pum ta a; tin, a fapa Ahaza chu a aiawhin a lal ta a.

source: For if the war-horn gives out an uncertain note, who will get ready for the fight?
target: Tawtawrawt hi mumal nei lova a rik chuan tunge ral kap turin inbuatsaih ang?

source: Giving you salvation from the evil man, from those whose words are false;
target: Sual kawng ata chhan chuak tûr che leh Thil awihawm lo sawi mite laka chhanchhuak tûr chein;

source: And you will be judged by me as women are judged who have been untrue to their husbands and have taken life; and I will let loose against you passion and bitter feeling.
target: Tin, hmeichhia pasal țhena, mahni fa thisen chhuah chungthu an rel angin i chung thu chu ka rel ang che; thinurna leh thîkna chu i chungah ka rawn thlen ang.

source: She cooked the meat.
target: Sa chu a siam a.

source: Hepa hi laksak ru!
target: Seize him!

source: For I was full of fear because of the wrath of the Lord which was burning against you, with your destruction in view. But again the Lord's ear was open to my prayer.
target: Nangmahni tiboral tura LALPA thinurna, a thinrimna leh lungnihlohna nasa tak chu ka hlau si a. Nimahsela chu mi tum pawh chuan LALPAN ka thu chu mi ngaihthlaksak a.

source: They tortured him
target: An tihduhdah a

source: They didn't mistreat me.
target: Min tiduhdah lo.

source: Truly the light is sweet, and it is good for the eyes to see the sun.
target: A nuam ngei mai tak e, eng chu, Mi ttan pawh ni hmuh a tha e,

source: No, I don't think so.
target: Ni lo, ka ti lo.

source: For on this day, in the town of David, a Saviour has come to birth, who is Christ the Lord.
target: Vawiinah hian in tan Davida khuaah Chhandamtu a piang ta, Lal Krista chu.

source: She understood me.
target: Min hrethiam a.

source: She is not in the least surprised.
target: Mak pawh a ti lo.

source: I've got it all sorted.
target: Ka sort vek tawh.

source: And in place of the first sons among the children of Israel, I have taken the Levites.
target: Tichuan Israela thlahte zinga fa tir zang zawng aiah Levi hote hi ka nei tawh a ni.

source: I'm being patient
target: Ka dawhthei a ni

source: And Saul's servants said to him, See now, an evil spirit from God is troubling you.
target: Tin, Saula chhiahhlawhte chuan a hnênah, Ngai teh, Pathian tirh ramhuaiin a tibuai che a ni a.

source: We could not believe it.
target: Kan ring thei lo.

source: But the field, when it becomes free at the year of Jubilee, will be holy to the Lord, as a field given under oath: it will be the property of the priest.
target: Jubili kuma an chhuah leh hun chuan lo chu LALPA tana thianghlim, a puala lo hluihlawn ang a ni ang a, puithiam ta tur a ni ang.

source: We were planting trees.
target: Thing kan phun a.

source: I got the job
target: Hna ka nei

source: But so that it may not go farther among the people, let us put them in fear of punishment if they say anything in future in this name.
target: Nimahsela mi hnena a puan lehzual theih loh nan, tun achinah tu hnenah mah he hminga thu an sawi lohna turin i vau ang u, an ti a.

source: Is your mother still living?
target: I nu a la dam em?

source: Take the Levites out from among the children of Israel and make them clean.
target: Levi-hote chu Israela thlahte zing ata tihrang la, tithianghlim rawh.

source: They turned us down.
target: Min hnawl a.

source: There is no peace for him in his wealth, and no salvation for him in those things in which he took delight.
target: In, a sak loh chu, a chhuhsak a. A duhamna chu a kawchhûngah a awm hle hle thei lo va, A lawmna thilte chu engmah ahum lo vang.

source: But the sons of the kingdom will be put out into the dark, and there will be weeping and cries of pain.
target: ram fate erawh chu pawn thimah chuan hnawh chhuahin an awm ang a; chutah chuan tah leh ha thial chu a awm ang, a ti a.

source: And Terah was seventy years old when he became the father of Abram, Nahor, and Haran.
target: Tin, Tera chuan kum 70 a nihin fapa Abrama te, Nahora te, Harana te a nei a.

source: My soul is among the dead, like those in the underworld, to whom you give no more thought; for they are cut off from your care.
target: Ral thahho thlana mute anga Mitthi zinga paih thlak ka ni; Chungte chu i hriat tawh loh, I kut ata tihboral an ni.

source: I liked that.
target: Khami kha ka duh.

source: I'm tough.
target: Ka khauh.

source: They asked him for advice.
target: Thurawn an dil a.

source: For in a very short time my passion will be over, and my wrath will be turned to their destruction.
target: rei lo te achinah chuan lungnih lohna chu hrikthlakin a awm tawh ang a, ka thinurna pawh anmahni tihborlnain hrikthlakin a awm tawh ang.

source: Don't create dust!
target: Leivut siam suh!

source: Knowledge is dropping from the tongue of the wise; but from the mouth of the foolish comes a stream of foolish words.
target: Mi fing lei chuan fina thu dik a chhakchhuak thin a, Mi â ka erawh chuan thu atthlâk a chhak chhuak thin.

source: We've won!
target: Kan chak e!

source: He is not pleased with anything.
target: Engmah a lawm lo.

source: Come back now
target: Tunah lo kîr rawh

source: And she gave her unclean love to them, all of them the noblest men of Assyria: and she made herself unclean with the images of all who were desired by her.
target: Heng Assuria tlangvâl țhate zawng zawng lakah hian an inphalrai a, tin, a hak hiamate milim zawng zawng chuan a intibawlhhlawh leh nghal a.

source: Who may make discovery of a woman of virtue? For her price is much higher than jewels.
target: Hmeichhe khawsak tha tunge hmu thei ang? A man chu lunghlu sen mi aiin a sâng zawk daih si a.

source: They went to bed late
target: An mu tlai a
