source: Will you be their judge, O son of man, will you be their judge? make clear to them the disgusting ways of their fathers,
target: I chachhuah dawn lawm ni? Mihring fapa, chachhuah ta che, an pate tenawmnate chu hriattîr rawh;

source: Are you observant
target: I enfiah em

source: And he made the ten gold supports for the lights, as directions had been given for them, and he put them in the Temple, five on the right side and five on the left.
target: Tin, a siam dan tûra ruat angin rangkachak khawnvar dahna sawm chu a siam a, biak in chungah chuan ding lamah panga, vei lama panga a dah a.

source: I go in fear of all my pains; I am certain that I will not be free from sin in your eyes.
target: Ka lungngaihna zawng zawng hi ka hlau va, Nangin mi tlângah mi ngai lo vang tih ka hria.

source: Now then, give ear to the word of the Lord: You say, Be no prophet to Israel, and say not a word against the people of Isaac.
target: Chutichuan tûnah LALPA thu chu hre rawh: Nangin Israel kalhin thu hril suh la, Isaaka chhûngte kalhin i thu thlah suh la, i ti a;

source: I'm not sleepy yet.
target: Ka la muhil lo.

source: You have seen what I did to the Egyptians, and how I took you, as on eagles' wings, guiding you to myself.
target: Aigupta-hote chunga ka tiziate leh, mupui thlaa ka put che u a, ka hnêna ka hruai thlenzia che u hi in hmu a.

source: The sun was about to set.
target: Ni a tla dawn ta.

source: And all these blessings will come on you and overtake you, if your ears are open to the voice of the Lord your God.
target: tin, LALPA in Pathian thu in pawm phawt chuan heng malsawmna zawng zawngte hi in chungah a lo awm ang a, a zui zel ang che u.

source: So she took him by his hand, kissing him, and without a sign of shame she said to him:
target: Chutichuan a man a, a fawp a, Tlangnel tak hmêl puin a hnênah,

source: We'll decide
target: Kan la rêl ang

source: I needed you
target: Ka mamawh che

source: And over them were three chief rulers, of whom Daniel was one; and the captains were to be responsible to the chief rulers, so that the king might undergo no loss.
target: tin, an chungah chuan hotu pathum a ruat leh a, an zînga pakhat chu Daniela a ni a; he thuneitute hian an hnêna chanchin an thlen chhawn zêla, Darian chhiatna rêng a neih loh nân.

source: I need it.
target: Ka mamawh a nia.

source: And the fifth heritage came out for the tribe of Asher by their families.
target: Tin, thumvawr vawi ngana chu Asera thlahte hnam chungah an chhûngkaw zir zelin a tlu leh ta a.

source: I got men-servants and women-servants, and they gave birth to sons and daughters in my house. I had great wealth of herds and flocks, more than all who were in Jerusalem before me.
target: Chhiahhlawhpate leh chhiahhlawhnute ka lei a, ka ina piang chhiahhlawhte ka nei bawk a; bawng rualte leh berâm rualte pawh ka nei teuh va, ka hmaa Jerusalema lo awmte zawng zawng aia nasain.

source: I love autumn
target: Ṭhal lai ka ngai

source: Watch me
target: Mi en rawh

source: We didn't travel together.
target: Kan zin dun lo.

source: I see a boy
target: Mipa ka hmu

source: They already know
target: An hre tawh a

source: And by the law almost all things are made clean with blood, and without blood there is no forgiveness.
target: Tin, Dan thu zawngin engkim thaw mai hi thisena tihthianghlimin a awm thin a, thisen chhuah lohvin ngaihdamna reng a awm lo.

source: I'm insane
target: Ka turu a nia

source: The walls of the house were covered inside with cedar-wood boards; from the floor to the roof of the house they were covered inside with wood; and the floor was covered with boards of cypress-wood.
target: In chhûng lam bangah chuan sidar thingphel a hmang a; a chhuat atanga chung lam bang thlengin a chhûng lamah chuan thing a bel vek a: a chhuatah chuan thingphel a phah belh a.

source: Take it back
target: La let rawh

source: And King Ahasuerus put a tax on the land and on the islands of the sea.
target: Chutichuan, lal Ahasuera chuan a ram leh tuifinriat thliarkarte chu chhiah a chawitir a.

source: For the effecting of which our twelve tribes have been working and waiting night and day with all their hearts. And in connection with this hope I am attacked by the Jews, O king!
target: chu thutiam chu kan hnam sawm leh hnam hnihin, achhun azanin Pathian rawng thahnemngai taka bawlin hmuh an beisei thin. Aw lalpa, chu mi beisei thu avang chuan Judaten mi hek a nih hi.

source: Because of this we are turned back by the attacker: those who have hate for us take our goods for themselves.
target: Dotute lakah chuan mi tlanchhittir thin a: Min hawtute chuan sum chu an duh duh an la thin.

source: Let me help you wipe it off.
target: Ka pui ang che.

source: And after he has been made clean, seven days are to be numbered for him.
target: Tin, a in thenfai hnuah a tan ni sarih chhiarsak leh tûr a ni.

source: They aren't all bad
target: An chhe vek lo

source: I don't need to talk to you.
target: I biak a ngai lo.

source: Things aren't moving.
target: Thil a che lo.

source: Because it has come to my knowledge, through those of the house of Chloe, that there are divisions among you, my brothers.
target: Ka unaute u, in chungchang thu chu in zingh inhnialnate a awm tih Kloii chhungte chuan mi hrilh a ni.

source: And for a time he would not: but later, he said to himself, Though I have no fear of God or respect for man,
target: Tin, ani chuan rei fe a duh lo va; nimahsela nakinah chuan a rilruin, ‘Pathian hlau lovin mihring ngaihsak lo mah ila,

source: And Abraham put the wood for the burned offering on his son's back, and he himself took the fire and the knife in his hand, and the two of them went on together.
target: Tin, Abrahama chuan hâlral thilhlanna thing chu a la a, a fapa Isaaka chu a puttîr a; ani chuan mei leh chemtê a keng a; tichuan an pahnihin an kal dûn ta a.

source: He asked for a picture
target: Thlalak a dil a

source: He has taken a bag of money with him; he is coming back at the full moon.
target: Tangka ip a keng a, Thla hlei nga hunah a lo haw dawn a ni, a ti a.

source: I flinched
target: Ka tîm lûtuk

source: The time of the Passover of the Jews was near and Jesus went up to Jerusalem.
target: Tin, Judate Kalhlen Kut a hnai tawh a, Isua Jerusalem khuaah a han kal a.

source: Their hearts are shut up with fat; but my delight is in your law.
target: An thinlung chu rilbawh thau angin a thau va; Kei erawh chu i dan chungah ka lawm thin.

source: Get to sleep
target: Va hmuhil rawh

source: A drunk robbed me.
target: Zu rui pakhat chuan min rawk a.

source: Toast some bread
target: Chhang hem rawh

source: I am diabetic
target: Zunthlum ka nei

source: Tom, I want to go to sleep.
target: Tom, mut ka duh.

source: They're my leaders.
target: Ka hruaitu an ni.

source: Can you cook?
target: I chhum thei em?

source: The stick of the evil-doers, the rod of the rulers, is broken by the Lord;
target: LALPA chuan mi suaksual tiang a titliak ta, rorêltute lal tiang chu;

source: What does she look like
target: Eng ang nge a nih

source: It's funny
target: A nuihzatthlâk

source: An offering of money is like a stone of great price in the eyes of him who has it: wherever he goes, he does well.
target: A dawngtu mitah chuan thilpêk chu lunghlu ang a ni a, A hawina lam apiangah a hlawhtling thin.

source: This they did on the thirteenth day of the month Adar; and on the fourteenth day of the same month they took their rest, and made it a day of feasting and joy.
target: Adar thla ni samw leh ni thu niin chu chu an ti a, tin, ni samw leh ni lo ni chuan an chawl a, ruaitheh ni leh hlimna niah an siam a.

source: All the persons who came with Jacob into Egypt, the offspring of his body, were sixty-six, without taking into account the wives of Jacob's sons.
target: Jakoba fapate nupuiho chhiar lovin Jakoba hnêna Aigupta rama lût ve, a țhalbea chhuak zawng zawngte chu an za chuan sawmruk leh paruk an ni a;

source: I grinned
target: Ka thial sawm

source: The law makes high priests of men who are feeble; but the word of the oath, which was made after the law, gives that position to a Son, in whom all good is for ever complete.
target: Dan thu chuan mihring chak lohna neite chu puithiam lalberah a ruat thin a; chhechham thu, Dan thu hnua lo awm erawh chuan Fapa, chatuan atan tihfamkim tawha chu a ruat zawk a ni.

source: Move it, Tom
target: Tawlh rawh, Tom

source: I don't play the oboe.
target: Oboe ka tum lo.

source: The Lord has done great things for us; because of which we are glad.
target: LALPA chuan thil ropui takte min tihsak a; Kan lawm hle a ni.

source: So Ahab went up to have food and drink, while Elijah went up to the top of Carmel; and he went down on the earth, putting his face between his knees.
target: chutichuan Ahaba chu ei leh in tûrin a han cho ta a. Tin, Elija chu Karmel tlâng chhip lamah a han chho va; tin, lei lama a kun a, a kapkara a hmai a rawlh a.

source: Tom's sad.
target: Tom-a a lungngai.

source: You'll be taking a nap.
target: I muhil dawn nia.

source: He who is ever desiring wealth goes running after money, and does not see that need will come on him.
target: Mi fir chuan sum a um a, A chungah tlâkchhamna a lo thleng dawn tih a hre hek lo.

source: Am I free to leave
target: Ka zalen em

source: I'm slow.
target: Ka muang.

source: Say whatever I give you orders to say: and Aaron your brother will give word to Pharaoh to let the children of Israel go out of his land.
target: Thu ka pêk apiang che chu i sawi chhuak zêl ang a; tin, i unau Aronân Pharaoa a ram ata Israela thlahte chhuahtîr tûrin a hrilh ang.

source: Is that wise?
target: A finthlâk em?

source: I broke that
target: Ka tikeh a

source: Then the door-keepers, crying out, gave the news to those inside the king's house.
target: Tin, kawngkhâr vêngtute chu a ko va; tin, anni chuan lal in chhûnga mite chu an va hrilh a.

source: You could've died
target: I thi thei ang

source: But if you have been with another in place of your husband and have made yourself unclean with a lover:
target: amaherawhchu khaw dang hawia i bawlhhlawh a, i pasal lo mi tuin ema a mutpui che chuan i fihlim lovang, a ti tur a ni.

source: We can't sue
target: Kan hek thei lo

source: I'm escaping
target: Ka chhuak mêk

source: I'm fussy
target: Tihlawm ka har

source: He wants to kiss her.
target: Fawh a duh a ni.

source: The camel-trains of Tema were searching with care, the bands of Sheba were waiting for them:
target: Tema sumdawng rualte chuan an en a. Seba khualzinte chuan an beisei a;

source: How will money in the hand of the foolish get him wisdom, seeing that he has no sense?
target: Hriat thiamna nei si lo mi â kutah chuan Engah nge finna leina tûr man a awm ni?

source: Have you missed me?
target: Min ngai tawh em?

source: I crashed.
target: Ka tisawm.

source: I'm not gambling anymore.
target: Ka khelh tawh lo.

source: Because of your word and from your heart, you have done all this great work, and let your servant see it.
target: I chhhiahhlawh hriat tûrin i thu avâng leh nangma thinlung ang zelin hêng thil ropui tak hi i ti ta a.

source: For as the new heaven and the new earth which I will make will be for ever before me, says the Lord, so will your seed and your name be for ever.
target: Van tharte leh lei thar ka la siam tûr chu ka hmaah a awm reng dawn angin, in thlahte leh in hming chu a awm reng bawk dawn a ni, LALPAN a ti.

source: And they were judges in the causes of the people at all times: the hard questions they put before Moses; but on every small point they gave decisions themselves.
target: Chûngte chuan eng lai pawhin mite ro an rêlsak thîn a: thu lian deuh apiangte chu Mosia hnênah an thlen thin a, thu tê tham erawh chu anmahnihovin an rêl thîn.

source: I canceled.
target: Ka titawp.

source: They are mostly polite
target: An zahawm deuh ber

source: So that even the first agreement was not made without blood.
target: Chutichuan, thuthlung hmasa pawh kha thisen lovin an tinghet lo.

source: You make ready a table for me in front of my haters: you put oil on my head; my cup is overflowing.
target: Mi dotute mit hmuhah ka hmaah hian dawhkan i buatsaih thin a: Ka lu hi hriak i thih tawh a, ka novah hian a liam reng a.

source: Would they drink water?
target: Tui an in ang em?

source: And he was in the waste land for forty days, being tested by Satan; and he was with the beasts; and the angels took care of him.
target: Tichuan Setana thlem chungin thlalerah chuan ni sawmli a awm a, ram sa zingahte a awm a; vantirhkohte chuan a rawng an bawlsak a.

source: I'm so proud
target: Ka inchhuang lutuk

source: I am great
target: Ka ṭha tawk

source: And have knowledge of his desires, and are a judge of the things which are different, having the learning of the law,
target: a duhzawng i hriat a. Dan thua zirtirin i awm avangin thil tha tak chu tha i ti a,

source: It's a brand new day.
target: Ni thar tak a ni.

source: I envy you
target: Nangmah ka thik

source: For this cause will the strong people give glory to you, the town of the cruel ones will be in fear of you.
target: Chuvangin mi chak takte chuan an chawimawi ang chia, hnam hlauhawm takte khawpui chuan an hlau vang che.

source: This is my mother
target: Hei hi ka nu a ni

source: Because he was still in his father's body when Melchizedek came to him.
target: Melkisedekan a lo hmuah lai khan a pa thalbeah a la awm si a.

source: Don't shoot!
target: Kap suh!

source: For this cause my thoughts are troubling me and driving me on.
target: Hei vang hian ka ngaihtuahnate chuan chhanna mi siam a, Ka chhûngah hmanhmawhna a awm avâng hian.

source: For you gave approval to my right and my cause; you were seated in your high place judging in righteousness.
target: Ka tana awm rengah leh ka thu-ah hian nangin mi tan si a; Fel taka rorêlin lalthutphahah chuan i thu a.

source: Give ear to the voice of my prayer, when I am crying to you, when my hands are lifted up to your holy place.
target: Ka auh chea ka kutte hi i biakna hmun thianghlim lama ka phar chuan, Khawngaiha ka dilna awte hi ngaithla ang che.

source: It was a scene of carnage
target: Carnage scene a ni

source: And he took the measure of the opening of the doorway, ten cubits wide; and the way down the doorway was thirteen cubits;
target: Tin, kawngka inluhna vânglam chu a teh a, tawngsawm a ni a; kawngka in kal tlangna vanglam chu tawng sâwm leh pathum a ni.

source: You can follow me.
target: Min zui thei ang.

source: And the Lord made Solomon great in the eyes of all Israel, clothing him with glory and honour such as no other king in Israel had had before him.
target: Tin, LALPAN Solomona chu Israel-hoz awng zang mithmuhah nasa takin a tiropui a, Israel rama a hmaa lalte zinga tuma la chan ngai loh, lal nihna ropi tak a chantir a.

source: Tom tries.
target: Tom-an a tichhin.

source: O Lord my God, if I have done this; if my hands have done any wrong;
target: Aw LALPA ka Pathian, hetiang ti ka lo nih a, Ka kuta sualna lo awm a nih a,

source: I knit
target: Ka thui

source: But these words seemed foolish to them, and they had no belief in them.
target: Nimahsela chung thu chu thu mai maiah an ruat a, an awihsak lo va.

source: Don't question whether or whether not.
target: Zawhna zawt suh.

source: Like snow in summer and rain when the grain is being cut, so honour is not natural for the foolish.
target: Nipuia vûr tla leh buh seng laia ruah sur a inhmeh lo angin Mi â chawimawina hi a inhmeh lo a ni.

source: He took them on safely so that they had no fear; but their haters were covered by the sea.
target: Him takin a hruai a, chutichuan engmah an hlau lo va: Nimahsela tuifinriat chuan an hmêlmate chu a khuh zo ta a.

source: I'll win for sure.
target: Ka chak ngei ang.

source: You won't be sorry
target: I inchhir lovang

source: Whatever number you make ready, so you are to do for every one.
target: An tam dan zir zelin inbuatsiah ang a, an tam dan ang zel chuan in hlan tur a ni.

source: What's your name?
target: Tunge I hming?

source: With the purpose of taking part in the agreement of the Lord your God, and his oath which he makes with you today:
target: LALPA in Pathianin in pawm tura thuthlung a siamah hian vawiinah in lut dawn ta a;

source: They came on me in the day of my trouble; but the Lord was my support.
target: Anni chuan ka vanduai ni chuan mi bei a, Nimahsela LALPA chu ka rinpui ber a ni.

source: It's too big
target: A lian lutuk

source: Now these things were done as an example; and were put down in writing for our teaching, on whom the last days have come.
target: Tin, chung chu entirna turin an chungah a lo thleng a nih kha; keini, hun tawp lo thlennate hi, min zilhna turin an ziak a ni bawk a.

source: Have mercy on us, O Lord, have mercy on us: for all men are looking down on us.
target: Aw LALPA, min khawngaih rawh, min khawngaih rawh: Hmusitnain ka khah nasat hi,

source: Now Balak, the son of Zippor, saw what Israel had done to the Amorites.
target: Tin, Zipori fapa Balaka chuan Israel miten Amor-ho an tih dan zawng zawng chu a hria a.

source: They are swimming
target: An tui chawi a

source: For if they do these things when the tree is green, what will they do when it is dry?
target: Thing hring maha hetiang an tih chuan a rovah chuan eng ti takin ti ang maw? a ti a.

source: And the hearts of numbers of peoples will be troubled, when I send your prisoners among the nations, into a country which is strange to you.
target: I hriat loh rama hnamte zînga i chhiatna ka thlen hunah chuan mi tamtakte thinlung ka ti chî-ai ang.

source: This discussion of the people came to the ears of the Pharisees; and the chief priests and the Pharisees sent servants to take him.
target: Tin, Pharisaiten a chunga mipui phunrukna thute chu an hria a; tichuan puithiam lalte leh Pharisaiten a man turin tiangkengtute an tir ta a.

source: Then Barak sent for Zebulun and Naphtali to come to Kedesh; and ten thousand men went up after him, and Deborah went up with him.
target: Tin, Baraka chuan Zebulun-ho leh Naphtali-ho chu Kedes-ah a chah khawm a; mi singkhat amah nen an han kal a: tin, Debori pawh a hnênah chuan a han kal ve a.

source: And I said, If only I had wings like a dove! for then I would go in flight from here and be at rest.
target: Tichuan, Aw, thuro anga thla neih ka va duh êm! Chutichuan ka thawlk daih ang a, thlamuang takin ka awm ang a.

source: The heart is a twisted thing, not to be searched out by man: who is able to have knowledge of it?
target: Thinlung hi thil zawng zawng aiin Bumhmang ber, chhe lailet der ani a; Tuin nge hre thiam thei ang?

source: What's wrong
target: Eng nge diklo

source: So be ready: for the Son of man is coming at a time when you are not looking for him.
target: Nangni pawh inring rengin awm rawh u, in rin loh hunah Mihring Fapa a lo kal dawn si a, a ti a.

source: But I say, Did not the word come to their ears? Yes, certainly: Their sound has gone out into all the earth, and their words to the ends of the world.
target: A nih leh, an bengin an hre lo vem ni? Hria e le, An thawm chu ram tinah a thang a, An thu chu kawlkil thlengin a thang chhuak ta.

source: Jesus wept
target: Isua a tap ta

source: Is this true
target: Hei hi a dik em

source: Then Omri went up from Gibbethon, with all the army of Israel, and they made an attack on Tirzah, shutting in the town on every side.
target: Tin, Omria chu Israel-ho zawng zawngte nen gibbethon khua atang chuan an han chho va, tirza khua an han hual ta a.

source: Let there be fear in your hearts, and do no sin; have bitter feelings on your bed, but make no sound. (Selah.
target: Hlau ula, thil tisual suh u: In khumlaizawlah chuan in thinlungah inngaithuah ula, ngawi thiap rawh u Selah

source: But true faith, with peace of mind, is of great profit:
target: Pathian ngaihsakna hi lungawina tel zawngin hlawkna nasa tak a ni reng a ni.

source: It's six o'clock already.
target: Dar ruk a ri tawh.

source: We were all thirsty
target: Kan tuihal vek a

source: The upright man will never be moved, but evil-doers will not have a safe resting-place in the land.
target: Mi felte chu tihsawnin an awm lo vang a, Mi suaksualte erawh chu leilungah an awm lo vang.

source: Who in the past let all nations go in the ways which seemed good to them.
target: Chu Pathian chuanhman laiin hnam tin mahni kawng theuh zawh a phal thin a,

source: How feeble is your heart, says the Lord, seeing that you do all these things, the work of a loose and overruling woman;
target: I thinlung chu a khawlo ta mang e-i chetziaah hmeichhe luhlul sual tak mai thil i ti a, tih hi LALPA PATHIAN thu chhuak a ni.

source: And the woman whom you saw is the great town, which is ruling over the kings of the earth.
target: Tin, i hmeichhe hmuh kha khaw ropui, leia lalte chunga roreltu chu a ni, a ti a.

source: I let Tom in.
target: Toma ka luh tir.

source: So that they are no longer two, but one flesh. Then let not that which has been joined by God be parted by man.
target: Chutichuan pahnih an ni tawh lo va, tisa pumkhat an ni tawh zawk a ni. Chuvangin Pathianin a zawm tawh chu mihringin then suh se, a ti a. a chhang a.

source: If, in that very minute, that nation of which I was talking is turned away from its evil, my purpose of doing evil to them will be changed.
target: chu hna chuan a chung thu ka sai avânga a thil țha lo a hawisan chuan a chunga thil țha lo tih ka tum chu ka lamlet ang.

source: And thorns will come up in her fair houses, and waste plants in her strong towers: and foxes will make their holes there, and it will be a meeting-place for ostriches.
target: An lal inahte chuan hnihlingneite a to vang a, an kulhpui chhûngahte chuan taiten leh buarte a to vang: sihalte awmnaah leh sava nghawngseite tan tuallai a ni ang.

source: He is Taro's brother.
target: Taro unaupa a ni.

source: Your daughters he will take to be makers of perfumes and cooks and bread-makers.
target: Tin, in fanute chu rimtui siamtuah te, chaw chhumtuah te, chhang siamtuah a hmang ang.

source: Now this is the offering which you are to make on the altar: two lambs in their first year, every day regularly.
target: Chutichuan maichâm chua i hlan tur chu hei hi a ni; nitin kumkhat tling berâm no pahnih zêl.

source: Will the white snow go away from the top of Sirion? will the cold waters flowing from the mountains become dry?
target: Lebanon vur chuan a tlâng chhip a kiansan ngai êm ni? Kawlvalenchham tui dai a luang kang ngai êm ni?

source: And you have seen how I have done all in my power for your father,
target: Nangni pawhin in pa rawng hi ka tehihtâwpin ka bâwl tih in hria a.

source: You're going too slow.
target: I kal zawi lutuk.

source: Talk it over
target: Sawifel rawh

source: In all this Job did no sin, and did not say that God's acts were foolish.
target: Heng zawng zawngah hian Joba chu a sual lo va, Pathian chu a mawhchhiat hek lo.

source: He's not a criminal
target: Misual a ni lo

source: I totally understand.
target: Ka hrethiam vek.

source: It gets worse every day.
target: Nitin a zual zel.

source: What did we learn?
target: Eng nge kan zir?

source: Dan can't be fired
target: Dan chu ban theih a ni lo

source: I'll ask Tom.
target: Toma ka lo zawt.

source: Then Joseph sent for Jacob his father and all his family, seventy-five persons.
target: Tin, Josefan a pa Jakoba leh a unau zawng zawng a kohtir a; anmahni chu sawmsarih leh panga an ni a.

source: Who is he?
target: Hepa hi tunge?

source: The night is dark.
target: Zan a thim tawh.

source: Yes, I give witness again to every man who undergoes circumcision, that he will have to keep all the law.
target: A ni, Dan thu zawng zawng zawm tura batu an ni tih serh tantir apiang hnenah ka hriattir leh a nih hi.

source: There is a crying in the streets because of the wine; there is an end of all delight, the joy of the land is gone.
target: Uain avângin kawtthlêrahte chuan țap thawm a awm a; hlimna zawng zawng tihthimin a awm a, he ram hlimna hi a bo ta.

source: Don't take him in
target: Amah chu hruai lut suh

source: I have crooked teeth.
target: Ha hrual ka nei a.

source: I've dealt with the matter.
target: Ka buaipui tawh.

source: He relented
target: A rilru a thlâk

source: Now Rehoboam kept in Jerusalem, building walled towns in Judah.
target: Tin, Rehoboama chu Jerusalem khuaah a awm a, Judai ramah inven nân khuate a siam a,

source: It's the tip of the iceberg.
target: Iceberg tip a ni.

source: Don't let them win
target: An chak loh tir suh ang che

source: No other is holy as the Lord, for there is no other God but you: there is no Rock like our God.
target: LALPA anga thianghlim hi an awm lo; Nangma ang reng an awm si lo, Kan Pathian ang lungpui reng a awm hek lo.

source: The son of Abishua, the son of Phinehas, the son of Eleazar, the son of Aaron the chief priest:
target: chu mi chu Abisua fa a ni a, chu mi chu Eleazara fa ani a, chu mi chu puithiam lal Arona fa ani a:

source: O you who are living in Lebanon, making your living-place in the cedars, how greatly to be pitied will you be when pains come on you, as on a woman in childbirth!
target: Aw Lebanon tlânga cheng, Sidar thing zinga bu khuartu, Natna i chunga a lo thlena i han khawngaihthlâk tûrzia mai chu! Hmeichhe nau vei na ang mai hian.

source: I called them
target: Anmahni ka bia

source: But those are preaching Christ in a spirit of competition, not from their hearts, but with the purpose of giving me pain in my prison.
target: Mi thenkhat zawngin an ti tak tak lo, elrelna avang chauhin kawl ka bun chungchangah hian buaina mi belhchhahsak tura ti an ni.

source: And in Shushan the Jews put to death five hundred men.
target: Lal in Susan-ah chuan Judaten mi zanga an that a, an tiboral a.

source: Are you angry?
target: I thinrim em?

source: For through them your sons will be turned from me to the worship of other gods: and the Lord will be moved to wrath against you and send destruction on you quickly.
target: In fapate, mi zui lai hi pathian dangte biakna lamah an hruai kawi mai ang a; tin, LALPA thin pawh chu in chungah a thawk ang a, a tiboral thuai mai ang che u.

source: It's a work of art
target: Art hnathawh a ni

source: I want a car
target: Car ka duh

source: On the second day of the feast give an offering of twelve oxen, two male sheep, fourteen he-lambs of the first year, without any mark on them;
target: Tin, a ni hnih niin bawngpa tir sâwm leh pahnih, berampa pahnih, beram no a pa kum khat mi sawisel bo sâwm leh pali in hlan tur a ni;

source: Be glad in the Lord, you upright men; praising the memory of his holy name.
target: Mi felte u, LALPA-ah lawm takin awm ula; A hming thianghlim chu fak rawh u.

source: Then the servants went back to the chief priests and Pharisees, who said to them, Why have you not got him with you?
target: Tin, tiangkengtute chu puithiam lalte leh Pharisaite hnenah an lo kal leh a; tin, anni chuan an hnenah, Engati nge in rawn hruai loh? an lo ti a.

source: Her rulers in her are like wolves violently taking their food; putting men to death and causing the destruction of souls, so that they may get their profit.
target: A laia hotute chu chinghne koham eitûr zawng ang mai an ni a, thisen chhuaha mi nunnate tiboralin hlemhle taka an hlêp theih nân .

source: Be brief.
target: A tawi zawngin sawi rawh.

source: If any man has not love for the Lord, let him be cursed. Maran atha (our Lord comes.
target: Tupawhin Lalpa a hmangaih loh chuan anchhe dawngin awm rawh se. Kan Lalpa chu a lo kal e.

source: I can't go.
target: Ka kal thei lo.

source: Shallum, the son of Jabesh, became king in the thirty-ninth year of Uzziah, king of Judah; and he was ruling in Samaria for the space of one month.
target: Juda lal Uzzia kum sâwmthum leh kum kua a lal kum chuan Jabesa fapa Saluma chu a lal ta a; Samari khuaah thla khat chhûng a lal a.

source: And the covered way was on the side nearest the outer square; there were palm-trees on the uprights, on this side and on that: and there were eight steps going up to it.
target: A sumhmunte chuan hung chhûng pawnta zawk a hawi a, a bangpêngahte chuan lehlam lehlamah tûm thing lem a awm a; a chhohna chuan rahkâ pariat a nei a.

source: Then the Lord came down on to Mount Sinai, to the top of the mountain, and the Lord sent for Moses to come up to the top of the mountain, and Moses went up.
target: Tichuan LALPA chu Sinai tlâng, tlâng chhîpah chuan a lo chhuk a: tin, LALPA chuan Mosia chu tlâng chhîpah a ko chho va; tichuan Mosia chu a han chho va.

source: And after him was Eleazar, the son of Dodo the Ahohite, who was one of the three great fighters.
target: Tin, a dawttu chu Aho mi Dodova fapa Eleazara, sipai huaisen pathumte zinga pakhat kha.

source: And Barzillai said to the king, How much of my life is still before me, for me to go up to Jerusalem with the king?
target: Tin, Barzilaia chuan lal hnênah, Eng chen la dam tûr nge ka nih a, Jerusalema lal hnêna ka han choh vena tûr chu?

source: I trust Tom
target: Tom ka ring

source: It's at home
target: Inah a awm

source: Don't be late
target: Tlâi suh

source: The breathing out of true words gives knowledge of righteousness; but a false witness gives out deceit.
target: Thu dik sawi chuan felna a entir a, Hretu dik lo erawh chuan bumna.

source: The Lord has made everything for his purpose, even the sinner for the day of evil.
target: LALPAN thil zawng anwg hi chhan nei theuhvin a siam a, A ni tak e, mi suaksulate pawh hi ni tha lo atân.

source: I'll make it
target: Ka tithei ang

source: We're very pleased
target: Kan lawm hle mai

source: Make your way about Zion, and go round it, numbering its towers.
target: Zion chu velin, kal hual ula: A ralven in sângte pawh chhiar rawh u.

source: Did you brush your teeth?
target: I ha i silsak em?

source: And there he gives the poor a resting-place, so that they may make themselves a town;
target: Chutah chuan riltamte chu a awmtir thin, Awmna tûr khua an buatsaih a,

source: What were we doing
target: Eng nge kan tih a

source: So death came to Hananiah the prophet the same year, in the seventh month.
target: Tichuan chumi ku vek, thla sarihnaah chuan zâwlnei Hanania chu a thi ta a.

source: Don't put me down.
target: Min dah thla suh.

source: I have a PhD
target: PhD ka nei

source: But now that faith is come, we are no longer under a servant.
target: Nimahsela, tunah rinna a lo thlen hnu hian, kaihruaitu hnuaiah kan awm tawh lo ve.

source: I made a wish.
target: Duhthu ka sam.

source: And for the same reason I sent you a letter so that I might be certain of your desire to do my orders in all things.
target: He mi avang pawh hian ka ziak a ni, kawng tinrenga thu in awih leh awih loh ka fiah theihna tur che uin.

source: It's not tasty
target: A tuilo

source: Because of this I will give you praise, O Lord, among the nations, and will make a song of praise to your name.
target: Chuvangin, aw LALPA, hnam tin zingah chuan lawm thu ka hrilh ang chia, I hming akin ka zai bawk ang.

source: Where did you give them
target: Khawiah nge i pek

source: No tickets are needed.
target: Ticket a ngai lo.

source: I need a plan
target: Hmathlir ka mamawh

source: I, even I, am he who takes away your sins; and I will no longer keep your evil doings in mind.
target: Kei, keimah ngei hi, keimah leh keimah avâng ngawta in bawhchhiatnate thai bo thintu chu ka ni; in sualnate pawh ka hre reng lo vang.

source: I'll kill all of them.
target: Ka that vek ang.

source: I don't have any free time.
target: Hun awl ka nei lo.

source: I have given news of righteousness in the great meeting; O Lord, you have knowledge that I have not kept back my words.
target: Inkhawmna ropui takah chuan felna chanchin tha ka tlangaupui a; Aw LALPA, ngai teh, Ka ka hi ka ui lo vang tih i hria e.

source: I survived
target: Ka himdam e

source: You probably won't.
target: I ti lo mai thei.

source: It's something you dream about.
target: I mumang a ni.

source: I can't risk that
target: Chu chu ka risk thei lo

source: And his base was at Ramah, where his house was; there he was judge of Israel and there he made an altar to the Lord.
target: Tin, a in awmna a ni avângin Rama khuaa chuan a haw thin a; chutah chuan Israel mite ro a rêl a, chuta chuan LALPA tan maichâm a siam a.

source: I've got you.
target: Ka man che.

source: It made me think
target: Ngaihtuahna min neih tir a ni

source: I didn't buy the car.
target: Car chu ka lei lo.

source: Don't shout at me.
target: Min au suh.

source: The Lord is full of grace and righteousness; truly, he is a God of mercy.
target: LALPA chu mi khawngaih thei tak leh fel tak ani a; A ni, kan Pathian chu mi lainat thei tak a ni.

source: He can read
target: A chhiar thei

source: Put not your faith in rulers, or in the son of man, in whom there is no salvation.
target: Mi liante chu ring suh ula, Mihring fapa, tanpuina rêng rêng awm lohna chu, ring hek suh u.

source: And if you go on in my ways, keeping my laws and my orders as your father David did, I will give you a long life.
target: I pa Davidan a zawh anga ka thuruatte leh ka thupêkte pawm tûra ka kawngte i zawh chuan ka dam reitir bawk ang che, a ti a.

source: How much more those living in houses of earth, whose bases are in the dust! They are crushed more quickly than an insect;
target: Hlum ina chengte chu a va ring lo zual dawn êm, Vaivuta siam mai a ni a, Phengphehlep anga awngrawp maite chu!

source: I didn't register
target: Ka in register lo

source: I understand them
target: Anmahni chu ka hrethiam

source: And be certain that the long waiting of the Lord is for salvation; even as our brother Paul has said in his letters to you, from the wisdom which was given to him;
target: Tin, kan Lalpa dawhtheihzia chu chhandamnaah ruat rawh u; kan unaupa duh tak Paula pawhin a hnena finna pek ang zela in hnena a ziak ang khan;

source: I want to play the guitar.
target: Guitar tum ka duh.

source: Drop it!
target: Paih rawh!

source: But if it is of grace, then it is no longer of works: or grace would not be grace.
target: Khawngaihna avang a nih chuan thiltih avang a ni tawh lo vang; chuti a nih loh chuan khawngaihna hi khawngaihna a ni tawh lo vang.

source: For it seems to me that God has put us the Apostles last of all, as men whose fate is death: for we are put on view to the world, and to angels, and to men.
target: Pathianin keini tirhkohte hi thi tura ruat sa angin a hnuhnung berah min tar chhuakah ka ngai a ni; khawvelte leh vantirhkohte leh mihringte mithmuha ennawma siamin kan awm hi.

source: I'd probably have approved.
target: Ka pawm ngei ang.

source: I had a son.
target: Fapa pakhat ka nei.

source: I have come in my Father's name, and your hearts are not open to me. If another comes with no other authority but himself, you will give him your approval.
target: Ka Pa hmingin ka lo kal a nih hi, nangnin mi lawm si lo: mi dang mahni hmingin lo kal sela, ani chu in lawm ang.

source: On the outer side, to the north, as one goes up to the opening of the doorway, were two tables.
target: Hmârlam kawngkâ in luh chhohna pawnlam sir khatah chuan dawhkân pahnih a awm a; tin, kawngkâ in sumhnun lehlamah pawh chuan dawhkân pahnih a awm bawk a.

source: He will have blessing from the Lord, and righteousness from the God of his salvation.
target: Ani chuan LALPA hnên ata malsawmna a dawng ang a, A chhandamtu Pathian hnên ata felna a dawng bawk ang.

source: We should do more
target: Kan tih belh tur a ni

source: And Joash did what was right in the eyes of the Lord as long as Jehoiada the priest was living.
target: Tin, Joasa chuan puithiam Jehoiada dam chung chuan LALPA mithmuhin thil tha a ti a.

source: Don't defeat yourself.
target: Mahni inhneh suh.

source: And Solomon did evil in the eyes of the Lord, not walking in the Lord's ways with all his heart as David his father did.
target: Tin, Solomona chuan LALPA mithmuhin thil sual alo ti ta a, a pa Davida angin LALPA chu a zui tlat ve ta lo va.

source: I have a debt to Greeks and to the nations outside; to the wise and to those who have no learning.
target: Grik mite leh Awze mite hnenah bat ka nei; mi fing leh mi finglote hnenah pawh.

source: Pharaoh's war-carriages and his army he has sent down into the sea: the best of his captains have gone down into the Red Sea.
target: Pharaoa tawlailîrte leh a sipaihote chu tuipuiah a paih thla ta a: Tin, a sipai hotu thlante pawh Tuifinriat Senah an tlahlum zo ta.

source: For fear that the Lord may see it, and it may be evil in his eyes, and his wrath may be turned away from him.
target: Chutilochuan LALPAN a hmu ang a, a lawm lo vang a, A laka a thinrim a lamlet dah ang e.

source: He's wasted
target: Engmah a ni lo

source: Don't get fat
target: Thau suh ang che

source: Drive faster
target: Khalh chak rawh

source: And Hushai said to Absalom, Not so; I am for that man whom the Lord and this people and all the men of Israel have taken as king, and I will take my place with him.
target: Tin, Husaia chuan Absaloma hnênah, Ka kal lo vang; LALPA leh heng mipuite leh Israel mi zawng zawngin an thlana thu thuin ka awm ang a, a hnênah ka awm zawk ang.

source: Shall we get started?
target: Kan tan ang em?

source: You're bugging me.
target: Min bugging a ni.

source: So Joab and Abishai his brother put Abner to death, because he had put to death their brother Asahel in the fight at Gibeon.
target: Chutichuan an unaupa Asahela chu Gibeon-a indonaah an thah avângin Joaba leha unau Abisaia chuan Abnera chu an that ta a.

source: So then he gave him up to them to be put to death on the cross. And they took Jesus away;
target: Chutichuan Pilatan kraws-a khenbeh turin amah chu an hnenah a pe ta a. Chutichuan Isua chu an hruai ta a.

source: It was they who went over Jordan in the first month, when the river was overflowing, and put to flight all the people of the valleys, to the east and to the west.
target: Chungho chu an ni, thla khatnaa Jrodan luia kuang zawng zawng a liam laia va kal kai a, ruama chengho zawng zawng chhak lam leh thlang lama tlânchhiattirtute kha,

source: You live too far away.
target: I awm hla lutuk.

source: Let's go get wasted.
target: Kan kal bo ang u.

source: We are eating apples.
target: Apple kan ei a ni.

source: And the priest will make her come near and put her before the Lord;
target: Tin, puithiam chuan a rawn hruai ang a, LALPA hmaa a dintir ang a;

source: Why will you put forward your cause against me? You have all done evil against me, says the Lord.
target: Engah nge ka chungah in vui fo le? In zain ka chungah thil in tisual si, Tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: I'll go back
target: Ka lêt leh dawn

source: For seven days you are to make offerings for the altar and make it holy, so that it may become completely holy, and anything touching it will become holy.
target: Ni sarih maichâm atân inremna siamin, i tithianghlim tur a ni a: tichuan maichâm chu thil thianghlim tak a lo ni ang; maichâm dek a piang chu a lo thianghlim zêl ang.

source: Do you write poetry
target: Hla thu i ziak em

source: Would look at it.
target: A en dawn nia.

source: Sami didn't move
target: Sami chu a che lo

source: We agreed
target: Kan pawm e

source: Or in your house different measures, a great and a small.
target: In inah tehna chi dang dang, a lian leh a te in kawl tur a ni lo.

source: But Christ as a son, over his house; whose house are we, if we keep our hearts fixed in the glad and certain hope till the end.
target: Krista erawh chu Pathian chhungte chunga Fapaah a rinawm a ni. A chhungte chu keimahni kan ni, atawp thlengin kan huaina leh kan beisei chhuanna hi nghet taka kan vawn tlat phawt chuan.

source: He will make no cry, his voice will not be loud: his words will not come to men's ears in the streets.
target: A au lo vang a, aw a chhuah hek lo vang a, kawtthlêrah a awm a chhuah hek lo vang a, kawtthlêrah a aw chu ahriattir hek lo vang.

source: For we might have got much money for this and given it to the poor.
target: He hriak hi man tam taka hralh a, mi retheite hnenah pek theih a ni si a, an ti a.

source: But he gave no attention to the opinion of the old men, but went to the young men of his generation who were waiting before him.
target: Nimahsela upaho remruatpui chu a apwm lo va, ama rualpui tlangvâlho, a bula awm thinte chu a rawn ta zâwk a.

source: Make clear that strength is God's: he is lifted up over Israel, and his power is in the clouds.
target: Pathian hnênah chuan chakna pe rawh u: A ropuina chu Israel-ho chungah a awm a, A chakna chu van dumahte khian a awm

source: So we see that they were not able to go in because they had no belief.
target: Chutichuan, rin lohna avangin an lut thei ta lo tih kan hria a ni.

source: I'll find it
target: Ka hmu ang

source: And going into the harbour at Syracuse, we were waiting there for three days.
target: Tin, Surakus khua kan tlawh a, chutah chuan ni thum kan cham a.

source: They're nice guys
target: An va fel êm êm a

source: However, the people of Israel did not send out the Geshurites, or the Maacathites: but Geshur and Maacath are living among Israel to this day.
target: Amaherawhchu Gesur-hote leh Maakat-hote chu Israela thlahte chuan an hnawtchhuak lo: Gesur-ho leh maakat-ho zawng tun thleng hian Israel-hote zingah an la cheng ta reng zawk a ni.

source: Do not take your servant to be a good-for-nothing woman: for my words have come from my stored-up sorrow and pain.
target: I bawihnu hi Beliala fanuah puh lul suh ang che: ka rilrua khat liam ka lungnih lohna leh ka lungngaihna ka sawi a nih hi, tiin a chhâng a.

source: I need water
target: Tui ka mamawh

source: She's a very wise mother.
target: Nu fing tak a ni.

source: And they put twists of blue cord on the edge of the outside curtain of the first group, and in the same way on the outside curtain of the second group.
target: Tin, puanzar zawm khat hmawrtwng ber tlângah chuan a beng a dum pawlin a siam a: chutiang bawkin puanzar zawm lehlam hmawrtawng ber tlângah chuan a siam bawk a.

source: He advises us
target: Mi rawn hrilhfiah

source: Sami looked fine
target: Sami chu a tha

source: Are you comfortable
target: I hahdam em

source: Israel is a wandering sheep; the lions have been driving him away: first he was attacked by the king of Assyria, and now his bones have been broken by Nebuchadrezzar, king of Babylon.
target: Israel chu berâm darhsah a ni a; sakeibakneiten an um bo va; Assuria lal chuan amah a ei zet a, a tawpah Babulon lal Nebukadnezzara chuan a ruhte a thial sawm ta a.

source: We've got nothing
target: Engmah kan nei lo

source: Is it cold outside?
target: Pawnah a vawt em?

source: It's already over
target: A tâwp tawh

source: The grey head is a crown of glory, if it is seen in the way of righteousness.
target: Lu tuak chu ropuina lallukhum a ni a, Felna kawngah hmuh a ni ang.

source: You have red wine.
target: Uain sen i nei a.

source: And I was with you without strength, in fear and in doubt.
target: Tin, chak lo leh hlauvin, nasa taka khur chungin in zingah ka awm a.

source: And so Aaron will have the names of the children of Israel on the priest's bag over his heart whenever he goes into the holy place, to keep the memory of them before the Lord.
target: Tin, Arona chuan hmun thianghlima a kal hunah LALPA hmaah a hriatreng theih na turin a thinlung zâwn taka rorêlna âwmbel ah chuan Israela thlahte hming chu a pu zêl tur a ni .

source: You're back again
target: I rawn kîr leh ta

source: The coat which I did not take from Troas and which is with Carpus, get when you come, and the books, specially the papers.
target: I lo kal hunah Troas khuaah Karpa hnena kawrfual ka hnutchhiah kha, lehkhabute nen khan rawn keng la, savun lehkha mawlh kha rawn keng ang che.

source: Your daughter's tall.
target: I fanu a sang a.

source: He who is true in a little, is true in much; he who is false in small things, is false in great.
target: Tupawh tlemte chunga rinawm chu tam tak chungah pawh a rinawm thin; tupawh tlemte chunga rinawm lo chu tam tak chungah pawh a rinawm lo thin a ni.

source: Let all the earth send out a glad cry to the Lord; sounding with a loud voice, and praising him with songs of joy.
target: Leilung luah zawng zawngte u, LALPA chawimawiin hlim takin au ula: Au chhuak ula hlimin zai rawh u, a ni, fakna hla sa rawh u.

source: After these things, he went away from Athens, and came to Corinth.
target: Chung thil hnuah chuan Paula chu Atheni khua ata chu a chhuak a, Korinth khuaah a kal ta a.

source: I moaned
target: Ka au ruai

source: O Lord, let the voice of my cry come to your ears: have mercy on me, and give me an answer.
target: Aw LALPA, ka awa ka auh che chuan ngaithla ang che: Mi khawngaih la, mi chhâng bawk ang che.

source: Let me try
target: Ka lo tichhin

source: And he made the two crowns to be put on the tops of the pillars, of brass made soft in the fire; the crowns were five cubits high.
target: Ban chhipa dah tûr dar chhun bawk pahnih a siam a: bawk pakhat san lam chu tawng nga ani a, tin, bawk pakhat san lam pawh chu tawng nga a ni.

source: But Jehoiada became old and full of days, and he came to his end; he was a hundred and thirty years old at the time of his death.
target: Nimahsela Jehoiada chu upa tak, tarkuna damin a thi ta a. A thih chuan kum sa leh sawmthum mi a ni.

source: And, seeing that the man who had been made well was there with them, they were not able to say anything against it.
target: Tin, mi an tihdama chu an hnena ding an hmu a, engmah an sawisel thei si lo.

source: They contradict each other
target: An inhnial a ni

source: Yes it's possible
target: Ni e a theih a ni

source: Let's sing and dance.
target: Zai leh zai ila.

source: What comparison am I to make of the men of this generation? what are they like?
target: Chutichuan Isua vekin, Tun lai chhuante hi eng nen nge ka tehkhin ang le? eng ang nge nih pawh an nih?

source: Though you go up on high like an eagle, though your house is placed among the stars, I will make you come down from there, says the Lord.
target: Mu angin sâng takah thlâwkchho mah la, i bu chu arsi zînga chheh pawh ni mah sela, chuta ta chu ka la thla ang che, LALPAN a ti.

source: Though a man comes to nothing like a bit of dead wood, or like a robe which has become food for the worm.
target: Thil mawih tawih ral mai ang leh, Silhfen, thim ei ang lek ka ni chung hian.

source: So that my way may be in a wide place: because my search has been for your orders.
target: Tin, dip dal lovin ka leng ang; I thununna thute chu ka zawng si a.

source: But now he has overcome me with weariness and fear, and I am in the grip of all my trouble.
target: Mahse, Aman mi tichau va, Ka pawlpuite zawng zawng chu i titiau va.

source: I didn't turn around.
target: Ka hawi let lo.

source: You're my kind of people.
target: Ka chi mi in ni.

source: In the same way he who had been given the two got two more.
target: Chutiang bawkin talent hnih dawngtua pawh chuan talent hnih dang a dek chhuak ta a.

source: You've been paroled
target: Parol i ni tawh

source: Further on, past the horse doorway, the priests were at work, every one opposite his house.
target: Sakawr Kawngka chung lam chu puithiamhoten mahni in zawn theuh an siam tha a.

source: And the heaven and the earth and everything in them, will make a song of joy over Babylon: for those who make her waste will come from the north, says the Lord.
target: Chutichuan lei leh van leh a chhûnga awm zawng zawngten, hmâr ata runtute a hnênah an thleng ang. Tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: The east wind takes him up and he is gone; he is forced violently out of his place.
target: Khaw chhak thliin a len bo va, a bo ta a, A hmun ata a nuai bo ta.

source: And when those who were with him saw what was coming, they said, Lord, may we not make use of our swords?
target: Tin, a vela mite chuan thil lo thleng tur chu an hriatin, Lalpa, khandaihin kan sat ang em? an ti a.

source: Like the nations which the Lord is cutting off before you, so you will be cut off; because you would not give ear to the voice of the Lord your God.
target: In hmaa hnam dangte a tihboral angin nangni pawh in boral ang, LALPA in Pathian aw chu ngaithla duh lo in nih dawn avangin.

source: So David went up, as Gad had said and as the Lord had given orders.
target: Tin, Davida chu lalpan thu apek anga Gadan a hrilh ang chuan a chho ta a.

source: We're washing ourselves.
target: Kan inbual a.

source: I hesitated
target: Ka ngamlo

source: But Nineveh is like a pool of water whose waters are flowing away; Keep your place, they say; but no one is turning back.
target: Hmâsâng ata Ninevi chu dîl ang a ni a, a sah ta hum hum a; Ding rawh u. ding rawh u, tiin an au va; mahse tumah an hawikîr lo.

source: In days to come Jacob will take root: Israel will put out buds and flowers; and the face of the world will be full of fruit.
target: Hun lo la thleng tûrah chuan Jakob-ho chuan zung an kai ang a; Israel-ho chu an kuhmumin an par ang: tichuan lei chung hi rahin a tikhat ang.

source: Foolish behaviour is the heritage of the simple, but men of good sense are crowned with knowledge.
target: Mi mawl chuan âtna an rochung a, Mi remhria erawh chuan hriatna khumtirin a awm.

source: So David made prayer to God for the child; and he took no food day after day, and went in and, stretching himself out on the earth, was there all night.
target: Chutichuan Davidan naupang tan chuan Pathian hnênah a ngen chiam a; tin, Davida chuan hawte a nghei a, a lût a, zankhuain leiah a mu a.

source: The good man out of his good store gives good things; and the evil man out of his evil store gives evil things.
target: Mi tha chuan a ro bawk tha ata thil thate a theh chhuak thin a, mi sual chuan a ro bawk chhia ata thil chhiate a theh chhuak thin.

source: Ha! for that day is so great that there is no day like it: it is the time of Jacob's trouble: but he will get salvation from it.
target: Ehei! Chumi ni chu a ropui mang e, A ang reng chu a awm lo. Jakoba manganna ni a ni ngei mai, Mahse chhan chhuahin a awm tho vang.

source: What do you guys want to eat?
target: Eng nge in ei duh?

source: So a very great number of people came together at Jerusalem to keep the feast of unleavened bread in the second month.
target: Tichuan thla hnihnaah chuan chang dawidim telh loh kut nei tûrin mi tam tak Jerusalem-ah chuan an lo pung khâwm chiam a, an tam ngei mai.

source: Let's not go
target: Kal lovang

source: Let sinners be cut off from the earth, and let all evil-doers come to an end. Give praise to the Lord, O my soul. Give praise to the Lord.
target: Mi sualte chu lei atang hian tihboralin awm sela, Mi suaksualte chu awm tawh suh se. Aw ka nuna, LALPA chu fak rawh. LALPA chu fak rawh u.

source: We have a white cat.
target: Ui var kan nei a.

source: Not looking everyone to his private good, but keeping in mind the things of others.
target: mahni ta ta mai en lovin, mi dang ta pawh en theuh zawk rawh u.

source: And a mixed people will be living in Ashdod, and I will have the pride of the Philistines cut off.
target: Tin, Asdod-ah chuan falakho an chêng ang a, Philistia mite chapona chu kati boral ang.

source: Liquor not included
target: Zu pawh a tel lo

source: Are you thirsty, pal?
target: I tuihal em, pal?

source: You're a nice person.
target: Mi fel tak i ni.

source: Are you practical
target: Practical i ni em

source: Fathers, do not be hard on your children, so that their spirit may not be broken.
target: Pate u, in fate tinuar suh u, chutilochuan an bei a dawng dah ang e.

source: Keep calm.
target: Insum rawh.

source: Then let us begin
target: Tichuan i tan ang u

source: We're lazy
target: Kan thatchhia

source: And the queen is uncovered, she is taken away and her servant-girls are weeping like the sound of doves, hammering on their breasts.
target: Tin, Huzzabi chu an hlîp a, an kal bo pui a, a bâwihnute chuan an âwm chûmin țhuro hrâm ang maiin an țah a.

source: So my praise was for the dead who have gone to their death, more than for the living who still have life.
target: Chuvangin mi nung la damte aiin mitthi thi tawhte chu awhawm ka ti zawk;

source: He said it himself
target: Amah ngeiin a sawi a

source: He who overcomes will have these things for his heritage; and I will be his God, and he will be my son.
target: Hnehtu apiang chuan chung chu an luah ang a, kei an Pathian ka ni ang a, anni chu ka fate an ni ang.

source: And God was a witness with them, by signs and wonders, and by more than natural powers, and by his distribution of the Holy Spirit at his pleasure.
target: Pathian pawhin chhinchhiahnate leh thilmakte leh thiltihtheihna tinrengte nen, ama duh ang zela Thlarau Thianghlim thil semte nen chuan anni chu a hriatpui a.

source: And as there was a ship going to Phoenicia, we went in it.
target: tin, Phoiniki rama kai tur lawng pakhat kan hmu a, kan chuang a, kan kal ta zel a.

source: She was making tea.
target: Tea a siam a.

source: I'll definitely look at it.
target: Ka en ngei ang.

source: I'm cutting glass.
target: Glass ka cut a.

source: And with them Heman and Jeduthun, and the rest who were marked out by name to give praise to the Lord, for his mercy is unchanging for ever;
target: an zinga tel a, a khawngaihna chu kumkhua atân a i avângin, LALPA hnêna lâwm thu sawi tûr Hemana leh Jeduthuna leh mi dang an hming lama thlan chhuahte chu ruat an ni a.

source: If your hater is in need of food, give him bread; and if he is in need of drink, give him water:
target: I hmêlma a ril a tam chuan ei tûr pe rawh, A tui a hal chuan in tûr pe rawh,

source: From the first he was the Word, and the Word was in relation with God and was God.
target: Atirin Thu a awm, Thu chu Pathian hnenah a awm, Thu chu Pathian a ni.

source: By which you have salvation; that is to say, the form in which it was given to you, if it is fixed in your minds, and if your faith in it is not without effect.
target: ka thu hrilh che u kha in ring mai mai a nih loh va, in pawm tlat a nih chuan chu miah bawk chuan chhandam mekin in awm a ni.

source: He was held in captivity.
target: Sal tan a ni a.

source: I have asthma
target: Khuhhip ka nei

source: He is gone like a dream, and is not seen again; he goes in flight like a vision of the night.
target: Mumang ang maiin a thlawk bo vang a, Hmuh a ni lo vang: A ni, zan inlârna anga um bo ani ang.

source: See, a people is coming from the north; a great nation and a number of kings will be put in motion from the inmost parts of the earth.
target: Ngai rawh u, hmâr lam ram ata mite an lo kal e. Lei hmun tawp ata hna ropui tak leh lal tam tak an lo thawk e.

source: Get Tom
target: Tom ko rawh

source: Before the sun is up, my cry for help comes to your ear; my hope is in your words.
target: Khawfing chat chu ka khalh a, ka au thin a: I thute chu ka beisei thin.

source: We did great
target: Kan tiṭha e

source: The eighth Jeshaiah, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi riatna chu Jesaia chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: Then the Egyptians went after them into the middle of the sea, all Pharaoh's horses and his war-carriages and his horsemen.
target: Tin, Aigupta mite chuan an ûm a, Pharaoa sakawr zawng zawngte leh a tawlailîrte leh a sakawr chung chuang mite chuan tuipui chhûngah chuan an ûm lût ta a.

source: Let's attack again.
target: I beih leh ang u.

source: And Judas and Silas, who themselves were prophets, gave teaching to the brothers and made them strong in the faith.
target: Tin, Juda leh Sila chu zawlnei an ni bawk a, thu tam takin unaute chu an thlamuan a, an tinghet a.

source: We should get started
target: Kan tan tur a ni

source: His eyes are as the eyes of doves by the water streams, washed with milk, and rightly placed.
target: A mitte chu lui te ui kam thuro ang, Hnutetuia inbuala fel taka thu chu.

source: She wore a white dress.
target: Puan var a ha a.

source: At my table you will have food in full measure, horses and war-carriages, great men and all the men of war, says the Lord.
target: Tichuan sakawrte, tawlailîr hnuk mite, mi ropuite leh râl tu mi zawngtein ka chawhluiah in tlai ang,' tih hi LALPA PATHIAN thu chhuak a ni.

source: No other is like the God of Jeshurun, coming on the heavens to your help, and letting his glory be seen in the skies.
target: Pathian ang tumah reng an awm lo, aw Jesurun, A pui tur chea vana chuang, Ropui taka vana chuang chu.

source: I wasn't intoxicated
target: Zu rui ka ni lo

source: And he said I am
target: Tin ani chuan Ni e a ti a

source: And he saw that rest was good and the land was pleasing; so he let them put weights on his back and became a servant.
target: Chawlh chu thain a hria a, Ram chu nuamin a hre bawk a; Tichuan englo pu tûrin a koki chu a tihniam a, Hnathawka rawih luihin chhiahhlawhah a lo awm ta a.

source: They made answer and said to Nebuchadnezzar the king, O King, have life for ever.
target: Lal Nebukadnezzara hnênah chuan, Aw lalber, kumkhuain dam ang che.

source: As for the man whose ear is turned away from hearing the law, even his prayer is disgusting.
target: Dan ngaithla duh lova hnuchhawntu chu A tawngtaina pawh tenawm a ni.

source: They're under arrest
target: An man mek a ni

source: Give me a few
target: Tlemte mi pe rawh

source: I will make you completely disgusting and full of shame, and will put you up to be looked at by all.
target: Bawlhhlawh tenawm takin ka theh ang che a, zahthlâk takin ka siam ang che a, ennawm atân ka dah ang che.

source: Were you following me?
target: Min zui ve em ni?

source: You are my fighting axe and my instrument of war: with you the nations will be broken; with you kingdoms will be broken;
target: Nang chu ka raldo hreipui leh hriamhrei i ni țhin a, Nangmah hmangin hnamte chu ka tisawm a, Nangmah hmangin lalna ramte chu ka tibo va.

source: Well, do you like it?
target: Awle, i duh em?

source: We know everything
target: Engkim kan hre vek

source: I still don't feel safe.
target: Ka la him lo.

source: It's not bad
target: A chhe lo

source: Every beast, in the horn of whose foot there is not a complete division, and whose food does not come back, is unclean to you: anyone touching one of these will be unclean.
target: Ran a tin kak a, tin kak chhuak lo, thialret pawh thial lo chi zawng zawng chu in tan thil bawlhhlawh a ni a; tupawh chung khawih apiang chu an bawlhhlawh ang.

source: Who keep men from being married and from taking food which God made to be taken with praise by those who have faith and true knowledge.
target: inneih an khap thin a, englo ei turte thutak hriaa ringtuten lawmthu sawia pawm tura Pathianin a siamte chu ei loh tur an ti thin.

source: I wasn't gone long.
target: Ka kal rei lo.

source: Step outside
target: Pawnah chhuak rawh

source: Hello, old friend!
target: Hello, thian hlui!

source: An animal which has its sex parts damaged or crushed or broken or cut, may not be offered to the Lord; such a thing may not be done anywhere in your land.
target: Mahni duh thua thilhlanah chuan bawngpa emaw, beram no emaw fuke sei lua emaw, tawi lua emaw pawh in hlan thei ang a; thutiam nan erawh chu pawmsak a ni lovang, tiin.

source: Where now are your prophets who said to you, The king of Babylon will not come against you and against this land?
target: I hnêna, 'Babulon lal chu nangmah leh he ram do tûrin a lo kal lo vang,' tia thusawitu i zâwlneite chu khawiah nge an awm tak?

source: He is wearing a hat.
target: Kawr a ha a ni.

source: You scare me
target: Mi tihlau alawm

source: To the White House
target: White House-ah

source: And when all these tests were ended the Evil One went away from him for a time.
target: Tin, diabolan a thlemna tur tinrenga a thlem zawh chuan a remchan hun atan a kalsan ta a.

source: Do I get overtime?
target: Overtime ka hmu em?

source: And they made rods of hard wood; five for the boards on one side of the House,
target: Tin, thingri thingin bangrel, biak bung ban nglehlam ban rem khawm atan panga,

source: I scared Tom.
target: Toma ka tihlau.

source: I'm so happy
target: Ka lawm e

source: Who gives their rights to those who are crushed down; and gives food to those who are in need of it: the Lord makes the prisoners free;
target: Ani chuan hnehchhiahna tuarte tan ro a relt hin a; Ani chuan riltamte hnênah chaw a pe thin: LALPA chuan mi tângte a chhuah thin a;

source: For this reason he says, He went up on high, taking his prisoners with him, and gave freely to men.
target: Chuvangin, Chung lama a han chhoh lai khan Mante chu salah a hruai a, Mihringte hnenah pawh Thilpekte a pe a, a tih chu.

source: If you will let our brother go with us, we will go down and get food:
target: Kan nau hi kan hnênah i tîrh chuan buh kan zuk leisak ang che;

source: I have been bitterly moved to wrath by Ephraim; so that his blood will be on him, and the Lord will make his shame come back on him.
target: Ephraima lah chuan a tithinrim nasa êm êm mai a, Chuvangin a thisen chhuah chu ama chungah a tla a; A sawichhiatna chu ama chungah LALPAN a tlaktir ang.

source: If anyone makes the house of God unclean, God will put an end to him; for the house of God is holy, and you are his house.
target: Tupawhin Pathian in chu a tihkhawloh chuan chu mi chu Pathianin a ti khawlo vang; Pathian in chu a thianghlim si a, chu in chu nangmahni in ni e.

source: I haven't got any pen.
target: Pen ka la nei lo.

source: And Solomon made all the vessels used in the house of God, the gold altar and the tables on which the holy bread was placed,
target: Tin, Solomona chuan Pathian ina bungbêl awm zawng zawng chu a siam a, rangkachak mâicham te, chhang chhiahna dawhkan te;

source: Chicken drumstick
target: Ar bawp

source: Thorns are round the way of the hater of work; but the road of the hard worker becomes a highway.
target: Mi thatchhe kawng chu hlingpal ang a ni a, Mi tluang kawng chu lamliana siam a ni.

source: Then Jacob went on his journey till he came to the land of the children of the East.
target: Chu mi hnuah chuan Jakoba chu a kal ta zêl a, khaw chhak fate ram chu a thleng ta a.

source: But he said, By the life of the Lord whose servant I am, I will take nothing from you. And he did his best to make him take it but he would not.
target: Nimahsela ani chuan, A bua ka awm thinna LALPA nunna chhalin ka sawi e, engmah hi ka la lo vang, a ti a. Tichuan la tûrin a thlem chiam a; nimahsela a duh lo tlat a.

source: Then the Jews were surprised and said, How has this man got knowledge of books? He has never been to school.
target: in, Judaten, He mi hian zir ngai lovin engtin nge lehkha a thiam? an ti a, mak an ti hle a.

source: I paid Tom.
target: Tom-a ka pe tawh.

source: It was worth the wait
target: Nghah a phu hle

source: There was at table one of his disciples, the one dear to Jesus, resting his head on Jesus' breast.
target: Tin, a zirtirte zinga mi pakhat Isuan a hmangaiha chu dawhkan sirah Isua angchhungah bawkin a awm a.

source: And while they were giving ear to these words, he made another story for them, because he was near Jerusalem, and because they were of the opinion that the kingdom of God was coming straight away.
target: Tin, chung thute chu an ngaihthlak laiin, Jerusalem khua a hnaih tak avang leh Pathian ram lo lang nghal tur nia an rin avangin tehkhin thu a sawi tel a.

source: They have made waste my roads, with a view to my destruction; his bowmen come round about me;
target: Ka kawng an tichhia a, Ka vanduaina an tizual a, Tuman an dal lo.

source: I'm sociable
target: Ka kawm theih

source: I got them all right.
target: Ka hmu vek a ni.

source: He was judge in the cause of the poor and those in need; then it was well. Was not this to have knowledge of me? says the Lord.
target: Mi rethei leh tlachhamte chu a rêlsak a, Chu chu a țha a ni. Hei hi mi hriat dan tûr chu a ni lo vem ni? Tih hi LALPA thu chhuak a ni.

source: Do not be quick to go to law about what you have seen, for what will you do in the end, when your neighbour has put you to shame?
target: Inbei tûrin hmanhmawh takin kal suh, A tawpah i thenawmten an tihmualpho hu chein, A tihngaihna i hre lo mai dah ang e.

source: There wasn't a soul.
target: Thlarau a awm lo.

source: It's an autopilot.
target: Autopilot a ni.

source: Those used for sex purposes in the worship of the gods he sent out of the country, and he took away all the images which his fathers had made.
target: Tin, mipa inzuarhote chu a ram ata a hnawt chhuak a, a putena milem an lo siam zawng zawngte chu a thehthang bo vek a.

source: Now the son by the servant-woman has his birth after the flesh; but the son by the free woman has his birth through the undertaking of God.
target: Nimahsela, bawihnu laka mi chu tisa dan angin a piang a, bawih lonu laka mi erawh chu thutiam avangin a piang a ni, tih hi.

source: Take care to keep open house: because in this way some have had angels as their guests, without being conscious of it.
target: Mikhualte chungah hmangaih chhuah theihnghilh suh u; chutiang tiin thenkhattenhre lovin vantirhkohte an lo thleng si a.

source: It is as the light of the morning, when the sun comes up, a morning without clouds; making young grass come to life from the earth.
target: Ni a lo chhuah a, chhum awm hauh lo Zing êng ang hi a ni ang a. Ruah sur hnua khaw lo thiang a, Leia hlobet chawr no dep ang hia ni ang.

source: They will punish all of us.
target: Min hrem vek ang.

source: He did not respect the rules
target: Dan a zah lo

source: Maybe it was a cat.
target: Ui a ni mai thei.

source: And do not go up by steps to my altar, for fear that your bodies may be seen uncovered.
target: Ka maicham lâwn chhohna rahkaahte chuan lâwn pawh i lâwn chho tûr a ni lo ve, saruak a i awm a lan lohna tûrin.

source: And he sent men before: and they came to a small town of Samaria to make ready for him.
target: a hmaah zualkote a tlantir a; tin, an kal a, amah lo buatsaihsak turin Samari mite khaw khatah an lut a.

source: And they will get together a meeting against you, stoning you with stones and wounding you with their swords.
target: I chungah tlâng an pun ang a, lungin an deng ang chia, khandaihin an chiu tlâng ang che.

source: I went downstairs
target: Ka chhuk a

source: I don't have shoes on.
target: Kekawr ka ha lo.

source: He gives power to the feeble, increasing the strength of him who has no force.
target: Chau hnênahte chuan thiltihtheihna a pe țhin a; chakna reng nei lote chu a tichak țhin.

source: Dawhthei rawh ka pa
target: Patience my man

source: I winked.
target: Ka mitmei.

source: I do want a drink.
target: In tur ka duh.

source: I'm moving
target: Ka kal zêl ang

source: You will make search for your haters but they will not be there; those who make war against you will be as nothing and will come to destruction.
target: nangmahni hnailtute chu in zawng ang a, in hmu si lo vang: nangmahni dotute chu engmah lo ang an ni ang a, thil awm lo ang mai an ni ang.

source: You're not a woman.
target: Hmeichhia i ni lo.

source: Because it is not you who say the words, but the Spirit of your Father in you.
target: A sawitu chu nangni in ni dawn si lo va, in Pa Thlarauvin nangmahniah a sawi zawk dawn a ni.

source: It's a huge amount of data.
target: Data tam tak a ni.

source: Martha said to him, I am certain that he will come to life again when all come back from the dead at the last day.
target: Marthi chuan a hnenah, Ni kin nia thawhlehnaah chuan a tho leh ang tih ka hria e, a ti a.

source: Better is a little with the fear of the Lord, than great wealth together with trouble.
target: LALPA hlauhna nên tlemte neih chu Tam tak neiha buaina neih ai chuan a tha zawk.

source: The false heart I will send away from me: I will not have an evil-doer for a friend.
target: Thinlung luhlul chuan mi kalsan ang a: Thil sual rêng rêng ka mithmuhah chuan ka dah lo vang:

source: You're very kind
target: I nunnem lûtuk

source: Then keep the feast of weeks to the Lord your God, with an offering freely given to him from the wealth he has given you:
target: LALPA in Pathianin mal a sawm che u ang zelin in deh chhuah zinga mi mahni duh thua thilhlan chu hlanin LALPA in Pathian tan chawlhkar kut in nei tur a ni;

source: You're always singing
target: I zai reng a ni

source: Chutiang chuan ka sawi lo em ni?
target: Didn't I say that?

source: Anathoth and Almon with their grass-lands, four towns.
target: Anathoth khua a daivelte nen, Almon khua a daivelte nen; khawpui pali an pe bawk a.

source: See, I will be waiting at the way across the river, in the waste land, till I get news from you.
target: Ngai teh, kei chu chanchin min rawn hriattir hma loh chu thlalera lui kaiahte hian ka lo awm ang e, a ti a.

source: I was the first to give word of it to Zion, and I gave the good news to Jerusalem.
target: Keiin Zion hnênah chuan, En teh, anni saw en teh, ka ti hmasa ang a; Jerusalem hnênah chuan chanchin tha rawn thelntu pakhat a pe ang.

source: I always lose
target: Ka chaklo ziah

source: Are you doing anything
target: Eng emaw i ti em

source: I exercised
target: Ka insawizâwi

source: We can do it
target: Kan tithei ang

source: That is his house.
target: Chu chu a in a ni.

source: They were wealthy
target: An hausa hle a

source: I'm calm now.
target: Ka dai deuh tawh.

source: She is on the radio.
target: Radio-ah a awm a.

source: You should have called me.
target: Min ko tur a ni.

source: The earth has been made unclean by those living in it; because the laws have not been kept by them, the orders have been changed, and the eternal agreement has been broken.
target: Lei hi a awmnate hnuaiah chuan a bawlhhlawh zo ta; dante chu an bawhchhiat a, thuruat chu an tihdanglam a, kumkhaw thuthlung chu an bawhchhiat avângin.

source: And the field and the hollow rock were handed over to Abraham as his property by the children of Heth.
target: Tichuan lo leh a chhûnga pûk awm chu, phûmna hmun ro atân Abrahama chu Hetha thlahten an pe nghet ta a.

source: You don't eat meat?
target: Sa i ei lo em ni?

source: The desire of the working man is working for him, for his need of food is driving him on.
target: Hnathawk mi chu ei tûr avângin a rim a, A riltam reh nân a thawk rim thin.

source: We're free
target: Kan hman a ni

source: I miss Tom
target: Tom-a ka ngai

source: The spirit of God has made me, and the breath of the Ruler of all gives me life.
target: Pathian thlarau chuan mi siam a, Engkimtitheia thaw chuan nunna mi pe.

source: Who is certain that the spirit of the sons of men goes up to heaven, or that the spirit of the beasts goes down to the earth?
target: Mihring fate thlarau chu chung lamah a chho emaw, ramsa thlarau chu hnuai lamah leiah a chhuk emaw tih tunge hria?

source: Again will your vine-gardens be planted on the hill of Samaria: the planters will be planting and using the fruit.
target: Grêp huante Samari tlâng dung tluanin i siam ang a, Chuta chengten an ching ang a, A rahte chu an chen ang.

source: And if there is division in a house, that house will come to destruction;
target: Chhung khat pawh mahni an indo chuan, chu mite chhung chu an ding chhuak thei lo vang.

source: And they said, We came to the land where you sent us, and truly it is flowing with milk and honey: and here is some of the produce of it.
target: Tin, a hnenah, I mi tirhna ramah chuan kan kal a, hnute leh khawizu luanna a lo ni ngei mai; hei hi a rama thei a ni.

source: Let those who go after my soul have shame and trouble; let those who have evil designs against me be turned back and made foolish.
target: Ka nuna tihbo tuma zawngtute chu, Mualpho tak leh zak takin awm sela; ka chhiatna chunga lawmte chu Tlânchhiattirin tihzahin awm rawh e.

source: Who appointed him
target: Tuin nge a ruat

source: How much did they cost?
target: Engzat nge an sen?

source: Don't wanna regret
target: Inchhir duh suh

source: The Lord is lifted up; his place is on high: he has made Zion full of righteousness and true religion.
target: LALPA chu chawisanin a awm ta; chung lamah khian a awm si a: ani chuan Zion chu rorêl felna leh felnain a tikhat ta.

source: Let me leave!
target: Ka lo chawl ang!

source: They flunked their exams.
target: Exam an flunk a.

source: Did you complain about it?
target: I phunnawi em ni?

source: To give them the punishment which is in the holy writings: this honour is given to all his saints. Praise be to the Lord.
target: rorêl ziak saa an chunga rel tûrin: Chu chawimawina ch a mi thianghlim zawng zawng chuan an nei hlawm a. LALPA chu fak rawh u.

source: For people will come in my name, saying, I am the Christ; and a number will be turned from the true way through them.
target: Mi tam takin, ‘Krista chu ka ni,’ tiin keima hming chhalin an lo kal ang a, mi tam tak an tihder dawn si a.

source: And still the waters went on falling, till on the first day of the tenth month the tops of the mountains were seen.
target: Tin, tui chu thla sâwmna thlêngin a tlêm ta deuh deuh zêl a: tin, thla sâwmna ni khat niah chuan tlâng chhîpte chu a lo lang ta a.

source: Let me show you.
target: Ka entir ang che.

source: This could be us.
target: Hei hi keini pawh kan ni thei.

source: I've got diarrhea
target: Diarrhea ka nei a

source: I don't see a temple.
target: Temple ka hmu lo.

source: No one respects me.
target: Tuman min zah lo.

source: Please go
target: Kal teh khawngaihin

source: You've got plenty of time.
target: Hun tam tak i nei.

source: His hand is stretched out over the sea, the kingdoms are shaking: the Lord has given orders about Canaan, to make waste its strong places.
target: Tuifinriat chungah a kut a phar a, ramte chu a tinghing a: LALPA chuan Kanaan ram chungchang thu-ah thu a pe a, a kulhbingte tichhe tûrin.

source: He was accused of theft.
target: Rukruah puh a ni.

source: And Aaron's holy robes will be used by his sons after him; they will put them on when they are made priests.
target: Tin, Arona silhfên thianghlim te chu a hnua a fapaten an la rochun zêl ang, chûngte chuan an in thuama hriak thih leh tihthianghlim an nih theih nân.

source: And the words came to my ears, but the sense of them was not clear to me: then I said, O my lord, what is the sense of these things?
target: Hriat chu ka hria a, angaihna erawh chu ka hre lo; tichuan kei chuan, Aw ka lalpa, hêng thil tâwpna chu eng nge ni ang? ka ti a.

source: Don't kiss me
target: Mi fâwp suh

source: I can change
target: Ka thlak thei

source: Their feet go quickly to evil, and they take delight in the death of the upright; their thoughts are thoughts of sin; wasting and destruction are in their ways.
target: An kete chu thil țha lo lamah a tlan țhin a, thisen sawiselbo chhuah tûrin an hmanhmawh țhin: an ngaihtuahte chu khawlohna ngaihtuahnate a ni țhin a; tiauna leh chhiatna chu an kawngahte a awm țhin.

source: For it is my desire to give you news of the great fight I am making for you and for those at Laodicea, and for all who have not seen my face in the flesh;
target: Nangmahni leh Laodikei khuaa awmte leh, tisaa ka hmel hmu lo apiangte tan eng tikauva nasain nge ka beihsak talh talh che u hi in hriat ka duh si a;

source: Jesus said in answer, I have said it and you have no belief: the works which I do in my Father's name, these give witness about me.
target: Isuan an hnenah, Ka hrilh tawh che u kha, in awih si lo; ka Pa hminga thil ka tih hi, heng hian ka chanchin a hriattir a nih hi.

source: As cold water to a tired soul, so is good news from a far country.
target: Ram hla taka chanchin chu Mi tuihal tak tana tui vawt ang a ni.

source: I want
target: Ka duh

source: And they did not give ear, but became stiff-necked, like their fathers who had no faith in the Lord their God.
target: chuti chung pawhin an pawm duh lo va, an pi leh pu, LALPA an Pathian ring duh lotute an intiluhlul angin an intiluhlul ve a.

source: I've said I'm sorry.
target: Ka lo ti tawh a.

source: And the sword will go through his towns, wasting his children and causing destruction because of their evil designs.
target: A khawpuiahte chuan khandaih a invilik ang a, A kulhte chu a tiboral ang a, A tiral ang, An mahni thu lo rawn avâng ngeiin.

source: These are the people whom Nebuchadrezzar took away prisoner: in the seventh year, three thousand and twenty-three Jews:
target: Heng hi Nebukadnezzara mipi sala a hruaite ch an ni: Kum sarihnaah chuan Juda sângthum leh sawmhnih leh pathum;

source: Then they went into the open square to the king; but the book they put away in the room of Elishama the scribe; and they gave the king an account of all the words.
target: Tin, hungchhngah lal hnênah an lût a; lehkhabu zial erawh chu ziaktu Elisama pindanah an dah ta a, a thu zawng zawngte chu țawngkain lal an hrilh a.

source: I whistled
target: Ka hamri tuar a

source: And the Lord will put up a king over Israel who will send destruction on the family of Jeroboam in that day;
target: Tin, LALPAN tun la laa Jeroboama chhûngkua rawn tiboraltu tûr Israelte chunga lal a insiam ang; tunah pawh hian engtin nge ni ta ang le?

source: Long life is in her right hand, and in her left are wealth and honour.
target: A kut ding lamah dam reina a awm a, A kut vei lamah sum leh ropuina.

source: Then they saw that it was not the leaven of bread which he had in mind, but the teaching of the Pharisees and Sadducees.
target: Chu veleh chhang dawidim lakah fimkhur turin a tir lo va, Pharisaite leh Saddukaite zirtirna laka fimkhur turin anmahni a tir zawk tih an lo hre ta a.

source: I'm not on fire.
target: Mei ka alh lo.

source: I cry all the time.
target: Ka tap fo thin.

source: Wood burns
target: Thing a kang

source: Tom is the master
target: Tom chu a pu a ni

source: But his people had no love for him, and sent representatives after him, saying, We will not have this man for our ruler.
target: Nimahsela a khuaten an hua a, ‘He mi hi kan lal atan kan duh lo ve,’ ti turin a hnungah palai an tlantir ve a.

source: So Mephibosheth went on living in Jerusalem; for he took all his meals at the king's table; and he had not the use of his feet.
target: Chutichuan Mephibosetha chu Jerusalem-ah a awm ta a; lal dawhkanah chaw a kil ve fo va; a ke khinghnih a bai a ni.

source: He walked ahead of me.
target: Ka hmaah a kal a.

source: I heard a horn honking.
target: Horn ri ka hria.

source: And for fear of him the watchmen were shaking, and became as dead men.
target: amah an hlauh avangin vengtute chu an khur a, mitthi ang maiin an lo awm ta a.

source: And Hezron became the father of Ram, and Ram became the father of Amminadab;
target: Heng hi Pereza thlahte an ni; Pereza chuan Hezrona a hring a;

source: Do to them what you did to the Midianites; what you did to Sisera and Jabin, at the stream of Kishon:
target: Anniho ch Midian-ho chunga i tih ang te, Kison luia Sisera chunga i tih ang te, Jabina chunga i tih angte khan ti ve ang che:

source: Come, see the works of the Lord, the destruction which he has made in the earth.
target: Hawh u, LALPA thiltihte hi en rawh u, Leilunga thil a tihchhiatziate hi.

source: Whoever is simple, let him come in here; and to him who has no sense, she says:
target: Mi mawl apiangte chu he lamah hian lo kal rawh se, tiin. Tin, hriatna nei lote chu,

source: And I made an oath in my wrath, that they might not come into my place of rest.
target: Chuvangin, Ka chawlhnaah chuan an lût lo vang, tiin, Thinurin chhia ka chham ta a.

source: They have been false to the Lord; they have given birth to strange children; now the new moon will make them waste with their fields.
target: LALPA chungah vervêk takin an ti a ni; Hnam dang fate an hring si a: Thlathar chuan an lote nên lama boralna a thlen ang.

source: Slow down!
target: Ti zawi rawh.

source: We're late
target: Kan tlai

source: And they were laughing at him. But he, having sent them all out, took the father of the child and her mother and those who were with him, and went in where the child was.
