target: Tin, anni chuan an nuihsan ta mai a. Ani erawh chuan an zain a hnawt chhuak a, naupang nu leh pa leh a hnena awmte chu a hruai a, naupang awmnaah chuan a va lut a.

source: Doing nothing through envy or through pride, but with low thoughts of self let everyone take others to be better than himself;
target: Elrel leh inngaihhlut avanga engmah ti lovin, mi tinin inngaitlawm takin mahni aiin mi dang tha zawkah ruat theuh rawh se;

source: Let's play together
target: I khel dun ang u

source: And David did as the Lord had said; and they overcame the army of the Philistines, attacking them from Gibeon as far as Gezer.
target: Tin, Pathianin thu apek angin Davida chuan a ti a; Philistia sipaite chu Gibeon atanga Gezer thalngin an bei a.

source: And now, my daughter, have no fear; I will do for you whatever you say: for it is clear to all my townspeople that you are a woman of virtue.
target: Chutichuan ka fanu, hlau suh aw; i sawi ang zelin i chungah ka ti ang: kan khuaa mi zawng zawngte hian hmeichhe fel tak i ni tih an hre vek si a.

source: I did well.
target: Ka titha.

source: You're frank
target: I tlâng hle mai

source: For no man ever had hate for his flesh; but he gives it food and takes care of it, even as Christ does for the church;
target: Tuman mahni tisa an haw ngai si lo va, an chawmin an duat zawk thin a ni. Kristan kohhranho a chawmin a duat ang hian;

source: I grinned
target: Ka thial sawm

source: Do you see a book
target: Lehkhabu i hmu em

source: Such things have frequently come to my ears: you are comforters who only give trouble.
target: Chutiang thil chu tam tak ka hria a ni, In zain thlamuantu tuar hreawm in ni e.

source: Then Nebuchadnezzar in his wrath and passion gave orders for Shadrach, Meshach, and Abed-nego to be sent for. Then they made these men come in before the king.
target: Tichuan, Nebukadnezzara chuan thinur leh thintâwt takin Sadraka te, Mesaka te, Abednagoa te chu rawn hruai tûr thu a pe a.

source: Then the Lord made answer to Job out of the storm-wind, and said,
target: Tin, LALPA chuan Joba chu thawngaleivir atangin heti hian a chhâng a:

source: And they had breastplates like iron, and the sound of their wings was as the sound of carriages, like an army of horses rushing to the fight.
target: Tin, thir awmphaw ang hi awmphaw an nei a; tin, an thla zah ri chu indona tawlailir ri, sakawr tam tak indo tura tlan dur dur ri ang a ni.

source: Layla went inside
target: Layla chu a lût a

source: You're right
target: I ti dik e

source: Fair enough question.
target: Fair tawk zawhna.

source: Everything is tough
target: Engkim a harsa vek

source: I believe it too.
target: Kei pawhin ka ring ve tho.

source: Do you need a hug
target: Kuah i mamawh em

source: They may give curses but you give blessing; when they come up against me, put them to shame; but let your servant be glad.
target: Annin ânchhia lawh rawh se, nang erawh chuan malsawm zawk ang che: An thawh veleh an mualpho vang a, I chhiahhlawh erawh chu a hlim ang.

source: And the disciples did as Jesus had said to them; and they made ready the Passover.
target: Tin, Isuan an hnena a tih angin zirtirte chuan an ti a; Kalhlen Kut chaw chu an buatsaih ta a.

source: Are we too early?
target: Kan hmâ lûtuk?

source: To the children of the east I have given her for a heritage, as well as the children of Ammon, so that there may be no memory of her among the nations:
target: Khawchhak lam fate neih atân Amon fate nên ka pe ang a, Amon fata chu hnamte zingah hriat reng an nih tawh loh nân .

source: You should have waited.
target: I nghak tur a ni.

source: Now there were living at Jerusalem, Jews, God-fearing men, from every nation under heaven.
target: Tin, van hnuaia hnam tin zing ata Pathian ngaihsak Judate Jerusalem khuaah an cham a.

source: I love horses
target: Sakawr ka ngaina

source: I have made search for you with all my heart: O let me not go wandering far from your teaching.
target: Ka thinlung zawng zawng hian ka zawng chia: Aw, i thupêkte ka kal bosan chu phal lul suh ang che.

source: And any other offspring which you have after them, will be yours, and will be named after their brothers in their heritage.
target: Tin, he mite hnua fa i neihte chu i ta an ni ang, an rochanah chuan an ute hming chu an țâwm mai ang.

source: I can run.
target: Ka tlan thei.

source: Then the Lord sent poison-snakes among the people; and their bites were a cause of death to numbers of the people of Israel.
target: Chutichuan LALPAN mipui zingah chuan rûl chuk na mite a tir a, mite a chu a, Israel mite tam tak an thi a.

source: It is visiting hour.
target: Tlawh hun a ni.

source: What's up?
target: Eng nge ni zel?

source: But to every one of us has grace been given in the measure of the giving of Christ.
target: Nimahsela, athlawna Krista thilpek tehna ang zelin khawngaihna chu kan hnenah theuh pek a ni.

source: He was petting the dog.
target: Ui chu a pet a.

source: Don't quibble
target: Zawhna pehhêl suh

source: And he was right
target: Tin a dik a ni

source: I finished it
target: Ka zo tawh e

source: I snore.
target: Ka hnar.

source: He who makes sport of the word will come to destruction, but the respecter of the law will be rewarded.
target: Thu chu ngai nep apiang chuan boralna an inthelna gn a, Thupêk tih apiang erawh chu lawmna pêk a ni ang.

source: And one came to him and said, Master, what good thing have I to do, so that I may have eternal life?
target: Tin, mi pakhat a hnenah a lo kal a, Zirtirtu, chatuana nunna ka neih theih nan thil tha engnge ka tih ang? a ti a.

source: They're wonderful
target: An ropui khawp mai

source: But those to whom is given the reward of the world to come, and to come back from the dead, have no wives, and are not married;
target: nimahsela chung huna tel tlakah leh mitthi zing ata thawhlehnaa tel tlaka ruat apiangte chu, nupui pasal an innei dawn tawh lo ve;

source: Now the beasts taken, in addition to what the fighting-men took for themselves, were six hundred and seventy-five thousand sheep,
target: Sipaiten an man rallak sum tiam lovin an lak chu beram 6,75,000

source: And I have not put myself against him, or let my heart be turned back from him.
target: Lalpa PATHIAN chuan ka beng mi tihawngsak a, kei chu ka hel lo va, ka hawi kir hek lo.

source: I set a trap.
target: Thang ka kam.

source: They have a horse
target: Sakawr an nei a

source: Let my prayer be ordered before you like a sweet smell; and let the lifting up of my hands be like the evening offering.
target: Ka tawngtaina hi englo rimtui tak angin i hmaah tihchhuahin awm sela; Ka kut phar hi tlai lam inthawina angin awm rawh se.

source: Let it dry
target: Ro tir rawh

source: Did you volunteer us?
target: Min volunteer em?

source: This is the work of the family of the Gershonites in the Tent of meeting, and they will be under the direction of Ithamar, the son of Aaron the priest.
target: chung chu inbiakna puan ina Gersona thlahte thawh chu a ni: an tih tur chu puithiam Arona fapa Ithamara ruat tur a ni.

source: I hurried.
target: Ka rawn hmanhmawh.

source: I got upset
target: Ka lungawilo

source: What then? only that in every way, falsely or truly, the preaching of Christ goes on; and in this I am glad, and will be glad.
target: Engnge a pawina? Aderin emaw, atakin emaw Krista Thu hrilh a ni ta reng reng a, chu chuan mi tilawm tho ve. A ni, ka lawm zel ang.

source: A foolish man has no pleasure in good sense, but only to let what is in his heart come to light.
target: Mi â chuan hriatnaah lawmna a nei lo, Ama rilruin a tihlan chauh lo chu.

source: Do you consume liquor?
target: Zu i in thin em?

source: Can you hear?
target: I hre thei em?

source: The Lord keeps the simple; I was made low, and he was my saviour.
target: LALPA chuan mi mawlte chu a humhim thin a: Tihhniamin ka awm a, ani chuan mi chhandam ta a.

source: Jesus gave this answer: You would have no power at all over me if it was not given to you by God; so that he who gave me up to you has the greater sin.
target: Isuan, Chung lam atanga pek i nih loh chuan ka chungah hian ti theih reng reng i nei lo vang; chuvangin i hnena mi petu khan sual a phur zual a ni, a ti a.

source: On the rock is his house, and on the mountain-top his strong place.
target: Kham kovahte an cheng a, Lung tohlawt hmun him takah a riak thin.

source: For even as the Father has life in himself, so he has given to the Son to have life in himself.
target: Pain mahnia nun a nei ang bawkin Fapa pawh mahnia nun neiin a siam:

source: And he made altars for all the stars of heaven in the two outer squares of the house of the Lord.
target: LALPA in hungchung kawtlai pahnihah chuan vâna awm zawng zawng tan maichâmte a siam a.

source: Grab it, Tom
target: La rawh Tom

source: And he sent out his arrows, driving them in all directions; by his flames of fire they were troubled.
target: Tin, thalte chu a kap chhuak a, anniho chu a tidarh a; Kawlte a phettir a, a tibuai ta nuai hlawm a.

source: The way of sinners is dark; they see not the cause of their fall.
target: Mi suaksualte kawng chu a thi8m a, Eng nge an chhuih an hre lo.

source: And made a request for letters from him to the Synagogues of Damascus, so that if there were any of the Way there, men or women, he might take them as prisoners to Jerusalem.
target: Damaska khuaa inkhawmna in zawng zawnga mite hnena pek turin lehkhate a dil a, Kawnga mi chu tupawh a hmuh chuan hmeichhia pawh, mipa pawh, Jerusalem khuaah phuar chunga a rawn hruai theihna turin.

source: I don't obey them
target: An thu ka awih lo

source: Call a doctor
target: Doctor ko rawh

source: Then the lambs will get food as in their grass-lands, and the fat cattle will be feasting in the waste places.
target: Tin, berâm note chu an tlatna hmuna an tla angin an tla dial dial ang a, mi thau pui pui hmun rama thilte chu vakvaihoten an ei ang.

source: I'm high.
target: Ka sang a nia.

source: And in the morning you will see the glory of the Lord; for your angry words against the Lord have come to his ears: and what are we that you are crying out against us?
target: tin, zîngah pawh LALPA ropuina chu in hmu dâwn e; LALPA chunga in phunnawina kha a lo hriat tâk hi: keinite chu engnge kan nih a, kan chunga in phunnawi mai ni; an ti a.

source: They refused to surrender
target: An inpe duh lo

source: And I said, It is a weight on my spirit; but I will keep in mind the years of the right hand of the Most High.
target: Tin, Chu chu ka chak lohna avâng a ni; Nimahsela Chungnungbera kut dinglam kumte kha ka hre reng ang e.

source: For I will keep my eyes on them for good, and I will take them back again to this land, building them up and not pulling them down, planting them and not uprooting them.
target: An that nân an chungah ka mit ka fuktir ang a, he ramah hian ka hruai kir leh ang: anmahni ka din ang a, ka țhiat lo vang; ka phun ang a, ka pawt lo vang.

source: God came from Teman, and the Holy One from Mount Paran. Selah. The heavens were covered with his glory, and the earth was full of his praise.
target: Teman ram ațangin Pathian a lo kal a, Mi Thiannghlima chu Paran tlâng ațangin. Selah A ropuinain vânte khi a tuam a, A faknain lei a khata.

source: Who gives us more knowledge than the beasts of the earth, and makes us wiser than the birds of the heaven?
target: Hnuailengte aia min zirtir hnem zawktu, Chunglente aia finga min siamtu chu?' an ti lo.

source: I'm a grandmother.
target: Pitar ka ni a.

source: I'm not too smart.
target: Ka fing lutuk lo.

source: Then have no care for tomorrow: tomorrow will take care of itself. Take the trouble of the day as it comes.
target: Chutichuan, atuk atan lungkham suh u, atuk chuan ama tan a lungkham chawp dawn si a. Ni khat atan ni khat hrehawm chu a tawk a ni.

source: But the king did not give up Mephibosheth, the son of Saul's son Jonathan, because of the Lord's oath made between David and Jonathan, the son of Saul.
target: Nimahsela lal chuan LALPA hnêna Davida leh Saula fapa Jonathana kar a, anpaniha kara chhechhamna avângin Saula fapa Jonathana fapa Mephiltbosetha chu a hum a.

source: What have you done with her
target: Eng nge i tih tawh

source: I'm giving my house away.
target: Ka in ka pe a.

source: And the bowman will not keep his place; he who is quick-footed will not get away safely: and the horseman will not keep his life.
target: thal ngul hmangtu pawh a ding thei hek lo vang: kal chak mi pawh a inhum thei lo vang a, sakawr chung chuang mi pawh a inhum thei hek lo vang a:

source: I'll go in your place.
target: I aiah ka kal ang.

source: I met them
target: Ka hmu tawh

source: You're standing on my foot.
target: Ka keah i ding a.

source: I need a car
target: Car ka mamawh

source: The man of wealth seems to himself to be wise, but the poor man who has sense has a low opinion of him.
target: Mi hausa chu ama ngaihin a fing a; Nimahsela mi rethei thil ngaih dan thiamte chuan an lai lang ang.

source: Raise your hands.
target: I kut phar rawh.

source: Do you go out often?
target: I chhuak fo em?

source: But I would have talk with the Ruler of all, and my desire is to have an argument with God.
target: Mahse, engkimtitheia hnênah chuan sawi ngei ka duh a, Pathian nena ngaihtuah dun ka chak a ni.

source: Let Tom rest
target: Tom chawl rawh se

source: It's not new
target: A thar a ni lo

source: We want it
target: Kan duh a ni

source: It's an Arabic name.
target: Arabic hming a ni.

source: He wasn't even there
target: Amah pawh a awm lo

source: Did you try rebooting?
target: Reboot i tum em?

source: We started talking.
target: Kan inbe tan a.

source: Merry Christmas
target: Krismas Chibai

source: But God, being full of mercy, through the great love which he had for us,
target: nimahsela Pathian chuan khawngaihna a ngahin a mi hmangaihna nasa tak avang khan,

source: I resumed walking.
target: Ka kal leh ta a.

source: And now, O Lord, you are God, and you have said you will give this good thing to your servant:
target: Aw LALPA, nang hchu Pathian i ni a, he thil tha hi i chhiahhlawh chu i lo tiam tawh a,

source: All a man's ways are clean to himself; but the Lord puts men's spirits into his scales.
target: Mi ama ngaihin a kawng zawng zawng a thianghlim a; Nimahsela LALPAN rilrute a bûk thin.

source: I have kept the memory of your decisions from times past, O Lord; and they have been my comfort.
target: Aw LALPA, hmasânga i rorêlte chu ka hre reng a, Ka inthlamuan thin.

source: For without doubt there is a future, and your hope will not be cut off.
target: Lawmman a awm ngei dawn si a, I beisei chu tihgbovain a awm lovang.

source: But about the times and their order, my brothers, there is no need for me to say anything to you.
target: Amaherawhchu, unaute u, a hun leh a ni kawng thute reng ziaksak che u in ngai lo ve.

source: The man whose heart is unmoved you will keep in peace, because his hope is in you.
target: I chunga rilru nghattu chu, nangmah a rin che avângin, thlamuang tak maia awm tûrin i veng ang.

source: He visited Tehran
target: Tehran a tlawh a

source: The food which you have taken will come up again, and your pleasing words will be wasted.
target: I chaw bar chu i luak chhuak ang a, I thu thlum tak chu i chan ang.

source: Did you buy flowers
target: Pangpar i lei em

source: It's the dead of the night.
target: Zan thi a ni.

source: Now Samson went down to Timnah, and saw a woman in Timnah, of the daughters of the Philistines;
target: Tin, Samsona chu Timna khuaah chuan a zuk kal a, Timna khuaah chuan Philistia-ho fanute zinga mi hmeichhe pakhat hi a zuk hmu a.

source: Thank you very much, Tom.
target: Ka lawm e, Tom.

source: They have no knowledge or wisdom; for he has put a veil over their eyes, so that they may not see; and on their hearts, so that they may not give attention.
target: An hre lo va, an ngaihtuah hek lo: ani chuan an hmuh theih lohna tûrin a maimitchhintir ta si a; an hriat thiam lohna tûrin an thinlung pawh a kharsak ta a ni.

source: I'm not busy
target: Ka buai lo

source: She's a troublemaker
target: Buaina siamtu a ni

source: First the flag of the children of Judah went forward with their armies: and at the head of his army was Nahshon, the son of Amminadab.
target: A hmasa berin Juda pâwlho an chhûngkaw chhinchhiahna kengin an chhuak a: a hotu chu Aminadaba fapa Nasona a ni a.

source: They were standing in a row
target: An ding dun a

source: I'm fine now
target: Ka ha tawh e

source: Then Gideon said to God, If you are going to give Israel salvation by my hand, as you have said,
target: Tin, Gedeonan Pathian hnênah, I sawi anga keima kuta Israelte hi i chhandam dawn chuan,

source: And Moses said, This is what the Lord says: About the middle of the night I will go out through Egypt:
target: Tin, Mosia chuan, LALPAN heti hian a ti, 'Zan lai velah chuan Aigupta ram chhûngah hian ka lo kal tlâng ang a:

source: And as for me, I said in my fear, I am cut off from before your eyes; but you gave ear to the voice of my prayer, when my cry went up to you.
target: Kei lah chuan, ka hamhaihin, I mithmuh ata paih bovin ka awm ta, ka lo ti ta mai a: Nimahsela ka auh che khan khawngaih ka dilna awte kha i lo hre si a.

source: You're my problem
target: Ka buaina i ni

source: I denied that.
target: Kha kha ka pawm lo.

source: Did you beat them all?
target: I hneh vek em ni?

source: So at the king's order they made a chest and put it outside the doorway of the house of the Lord.
target: Chutichuan lalin thu a pe a, bâwm an siam a, LALPA in kawngka pawn lamah chuan an dah a.

source: As for the towns made on hills of earth, not one was burned by Israel but Hazor, which was burned by Joshua.
target: Mualpawnga khawpui lo din sa tawhte erawh kha chu, Hazor khua ngawt lo chu Israel-hote chuan pakhatmah an hal lo; chu khua erawh chu Josuan a hal a ni.

source: So the Lord was with Joshua; and news of him went through all the land.
target: Chutichuan LALPA chu Josua hnenah a awm a; tin, a ram pum puiah chuan a hming a lo thang ta a.

source: Are you there?
target: In awm em?

source: And when Uriah came to him, David put questions to him about how Joab and the people were, and how the war was going.
target: Tin, Urian ahnên a han thlen chuan Joaba leh mite chu engne an an a, indonaahte engne an tih a zâwt a.

source: We'll see.
target: Kan en dawn nia.

source: And went running through all the country round about, and took on their beds those who were ill, to where it was said that he was.
target: chu mi ram vel zawng zawngah an tlan ta sup sup a, a awm tih an hriatna apiangah damlote an awngphaha mu chungin an zawn vel ta ruai a.

source: They're wet
target: An huh vek a ni

source: It's so lame
target: A lo lem lûtuk

source: For those who have done good work as Deacons get for themselves a good position and become free from fear in the faith which is in Christ Jesus.
target: Kohhranho rawngbawl lam hna thawk tha tawhte chuan dinna tha tak leh Krista Isuaa rinna kawngah chuan huaina nasa tak an insiam si thin a.

source: And a breath was moving over my face; the hair of my flesh became stiff:
target: Tichuan, ka hmai hmaah thlarau akal a, Ka hmulthi a ding sung sung.

source: Can you read?
target: I chhiar thei em?

source: But he is to give his first son his birthright, and twice as great a part of his property: for he is the first-fruits of his strength and the right of the first son is his.
target: a huata fa,a fa upa ber, a neih zawng zawnga chan hnih huiah a siam tur a ni; a chakna bul a ni a, fa tir nihna chu a pual a ni.

source: Let me die
target: Thih tir rawh

source: There is little time left.
target: Hun a la tlem hle.

source: My friends have been false like a stream, like streams in the valleys which come to an end:
target: Ka unaute chu kawrte rum anga bumhmang an ni a, Kawrte tui relhtu ang mai hi;

source: You have put your orders into our hearts, so that we might keep them with care.
target: Nangin i thununna thute chu thupêkin min pe a, Thahnemngai taka kan zawm theihna tûrin.

source: I woke up
target: Ka harh tawh

source: But the land on the outskirts of their towns may not be exchanged for money, for it is their property for ever.
target: An khaw dai velahlote erawh chu hralh theih a ni lo vang a, an kumkhaw chanpual a ni si a.

source: Which cup do you see
target: Eng no nge i hmuh

source: I can wait.
target: Ka nghak thei.

source: How hard they work
target: An va thawhrim em

source: The rain's not letting up.
target: Ruah a sur lo va.

source: She doesn't have the ticket.
target: Ticket a nei lo.

source: on any other day.
target: ni dangah pawh.

source: They never married
target: An innei ngai lo

source: That this man is to be handed over to Satan for the destruction of the flesh, so that his spirit may have forgiveness in the day of the Lord Jesus.
target: mi chutiang chu, a thlarau Lalpa niah chuan chhandamin a awm theih nan a tisa tiboral turin, Setana pe ila ka ti a ni.

source: But he and his servants and the people of the land did not give ear to the words of the Lord which he said by Jeremiah the prophet.
target: Mahse amah leh a rawngbawltute leh a rama mite chuan LALPA thu zâwlnei Jeremia kâa sawi chu an ngaithla lo va.

source: And when the time came, he sent a servant to get from the workmen some of the fruit of the garden.
target: Tin, a lawh hun chuan huana rah chu a chanai lo enkawltute hnen ata la turin lo enkawltute hnenah chuan a bawi pakhat a tir a.

source: Then Achish said to his servants, Look! the man is clearly off his head; why have you let him come before me?
target: Chutichuan Akisa chuan a chhiahhlawhte hnênah chuan, En teh u, mi â a nih in hre reng si a, engati nge ka hnênah in rawn hruai ni?

source: Who wants to fight
target: Tu nge insual duh

source: He seems kind
target: A nunnêm hmêl

source: For I am poor and in need, and my heart is wounded in me.
target: Rethei leh pachhe tak ka ni a, Ka thinlung hi ka kawchhûngah hliamin a awm bawk si.

source: It looks like Tom
target: Tom ang deuh a ni

source: Everyone who has faith that Jesus is the Christ is a child of God: and everyone who has love for the Father has love for his child.
target: Tupawh Isua hi Krista a ni tih ring chu Pathian hrin a ni; tupawh a hringtu hmangaih chuan a hrina pawh a hmangaih thin.

source: I'm going for a walk.
target: Ka vak kual a.

source: You're overweight
target: I rit lutuk a ni

source: I need air
target: Boruak ka mamawh

source: So I have made for you a living-place, a house in which you may be for ever present.
target: nimahsela i chenna tûr in, kumkhuaa i awmna tûr chu ka lo saksak ta che a ni hi, tiin.

source: They were kidnapped
target: Kidnap an ni a

source: And he said, Why does my lord go armed against his servant? what have I done? or what evil is there in me?
target: Tin, Eng vangain nge ka pu hian a chiahhlawh hi a um ni? Eng thil nge ka tih? Ka kutah thil sual engnge awm?

source: And Ahitub was the father of Zadok, and Zadok was the father of Shallum,
target: tin, Ahituban Zadoka a hring a, tin, Zadokan Saluma a hring a;

source: I can't stop
target: Ka ding thei lo

source: I'll keep checking.
target: Ka check zel ang.

source: If you have no belief when my words are about the things of earth, how will you have belief if my words are about the things of heaven?
target: Khawvela thil ka hrilh che u mah awih lo che u a, vana thil hrilh che u ila engtin nge in awih ang?

source: You'll be silenced
target: I ngawi reng ang

source: I loved it
target: Ka ngaina

source: You will see a thousand falling by your side, and ten thousand at your right hand; but it will not come near you.
target: I sirah sâng an tlu ang a, I ding lamah sing an tlu bawk a; Nimahsela nang chu a hnaih lo vang che.

source: Why have evil men gone over your holy place, so that it has been crushed under the feet of our haters?
target: I mi thianghlimte chuan rei lo te chauh an nei a; min dotute chuan i hmun thianghlim chu an rap che ta a.

source: I think so
target: Ka ngaihdan chiah

source: These were the divisions of door-keepers, of the sons of the Korahites and of the sons of Merari.
target: Chungte chu an ni, Kora mi fapate leh Merari mi fapate kawngkhâr vêngtu pâwla an thente chu.

source: You have three cats
target: Ui pathum i nei a

source: He who gives a decision for the evil-doer and he who gives a decision against the upright, are equally disgusting to the Lord.
target: Mi suaksual thiamtu leh mi fel thiam lotu chu LALPA tan angkhat rengin an tenawm ve ve.

source: I said I was tired.
target: Ka chau ka ti a.

source: Are you up
target: I tel em

source: And the sons of Merari: Mahli and Mushi: these are the families of the Levites, in the order of their generations.
target: Tin, Meraria fapate chu Mahalia leh Musia an ni. hêngte hi an thlahte ang zêla Levia hnamte chu an ni.

source: And Jeremiah put in a book all the evil which was to come on Babylon.
target: Tin, Jeremia chuan Babulon chunga chhiatna lo thleng tûr zawng zawng, Babulon chungchanga heng thu ziak zawng zawng hi lehkhabuah a ziak a.

source: And in the heat of my wrath I will put you to death with the sword, so that your wives will be widows and your children without fathers.
target: tichuan ka thinur chu a ling phut mai ang a, khandaihin ka rawn tihlum ang che u a; tin, in nupuite chu hmeithai an ni ang a, in fate pawh fahrahin an awm mai ang.

source: They're not prisoners
target: Tâng an ni lo

source: Sweet is the smell of your perfumes; your name is as perfume running out; so the young girls give you their love.
target: I hriak hnawih mi chuan a nei, rim tha tak mai; Rimtui bun chuah ang a ni e, i hming zawng; Chuvang chuan an hmangaih che, nulaten.

source: It's already been checked.
target: A check tawh a ni.

source: And for the drink offering: give half a hin of wine, for an offering made by fire for a sweet smell to the Lord.
target: Tin, in tur thilhlanah uain hin chanve, LALPA tana rimtui meia thilhlan in hlan tur a ni.

source: And David got up in the morning; now the word of the Lord had come to the prophet Gad, David's seer, saying,
target: Tin, zinga Davida a han thawh chuan Davida zâwlnei, zâwlnei Gada hnênah LALPA thu a lo thleng a,

source: The tents of the Kohathites are to be placed on the south side of the House.
target: Kohatha fapate thlahte chu biak bûk chhim lampangah an puan in an zar tur a ni.

source: But let the Lord of armies be holy to you, and go in fear of him, giving honour to him.
target: Sipaihote LALPA, amah ngei chu in tithianghlim tûr a ni; amah chu in tiha ni sela, amah chu in hlauhva ni rawh se.

source: He will let you have his wealth at interest, and will have no need of yours: he will be the head and you the tail.
target: An pûktir ang che u a, nangni chuan in pûktir ve lo vang. Anni chu lu an ni ang a, nangni chu mei in ni ang.

source: Be haters of evil and lovers of good, and let right be done in the public place: it may be that the Lord, the God of armies, will have mercy on the rest of Joseph.
target: Sualna chu hua ula, țhatna ngaina ula, kawng kâah rorêlna chu tungding nghet rawh u: Josefho mi la awm chhunte chungah chuan LALPA, sipaihote pathian chuan khawngaihna a nei dah law maw.

source: And Jesus sent Peter and John, saying, Go and make the Passover ready for us, so that we may take it.
target: Tichuan Isuan, Petera leh Johana chu, Kalhlen Kut chaw kan ei turin min va buatsaihsak rawh u, tiin a tir a.

source: You were jealous of me.
target: Min itsik a ni.

source: Am I early?
target: Ka hma lutuk em?

source: Let's say that you're right.
target: I ti dik ang u.

source: Now while Paul was waiting for them at Athens, his spirit was troubled, for he saw all the town full of images of the gods.
target: Tin, Paulan Atheni khuaah anni chu a lo nghah lai chuan, khua chu Pathian lema khatin a hmu a, a rilruin a helh ta a.

source: Adam’s apple
target: hrawk bawk

source: It has seemed good to me to make clear the signs and wonders which the Most High God has done with me.
target: Chungnungber pathianin ka hnêna thil entîrnate, thilmakte a tih tâk hi tihlan țha ka ti e.

source: Are you watching TV
target: TV i en em

source: Or by the earth, because it is the resting-place for his foot; or by Jerusalem, because it is the town of the great King.
target: lei chhalin chham hek suh u, chu chu a ke nghahchhan a ni si a; Jerusalem chhalin chham hek suh u, chu chu Lal ropui tak khawpui a ni si a.

source: They did their job
target: An hna an thawk a

source: She wanted to dance
target: Zai a duh a

source: And Abimelech had come to him from Gerar, with Ahuzzath his friend and Phicol, the captain of his army.
target: Tin, Gerar khua atangin Abimeleka chu a thian Ahuzzatha nen, a sipai pâwl hotu Phikola nen, a hnênah an kal a.

source: Are you a morning person?
target: Zing mi i ni em?

source: Keep running
target: Tlan zêl rawh

source: And the woman became with child; and she sent word to David that she was with child.
target: Tichuan hmeichhia chu a lo rai ta a; tin, nau a pai ta, tiin Davida chu a hrilhtir a.

source: How may a hater of right be a ruler? and will you say that the upright Ruler of all is evil?
target: Thudik hawtu chuan ro a rel ang êm ni? Mi fel leh thiltitheia chu thiam loh i chantir ang êm ni?

source: You have knowledge of this, dear brothers. But let every man be quick in hearing, slow in words, slow to get angry;
target: Unau duh takte u, chung chu in hria e; nimahsela mi tinin ngaihthlak chuh sela, thusawi chuh lo sela, thin tinel rawh se:

source: Are not the days of my life small in number? Let your eyes be turned away from me, so that I may have a little pleasure,
target: Ka nite hi rei lo te a ni lâwm ni? Chawl se, mi ngawihsan se, thaw han la hlek teh ila.

source: The Lord has sent a word to Jacob, and it has come on Israel;
target: Lalpa chuan Jakob-ho ramah thu a thawn a, Israel-ho chungah a tla ta a.

source: You're cheating on me.
target: Min bum a ni.

source: Or which of you, if his son makes a request for bread, will give him a stone?
target: A nih leh, nangniho hi tupawh in fapain chhangper dil che u sela, tunge lung pe ang che u?

source: I'm already ready
target: Ka inpeih tawh

source: Look away
target: Thlah liam rawh

source: You will not be touched by the sun in the day, or by the moon at night.
target: Chhunah niin a êm lo vang chia, Zanah thlain a êm hek lo vang che.

source: I ground my teeth
target: Ka ha ka ground a

source: The glory, O Israel, is dead on your high places! How have the great ones been made low!
target: Aw Israel, i ropuina chu i hmun sângahte an that a, Mi liante an tluk tak hi!

source: Tom's so old.
target: Tom-a chu a upa.

source: For myself, even because of my name, I will do it; for I will not let my name be shamed; and my glory I will not give to another.
target: Keimah leh keimah avângin, a ni, keimah leh keimah avâng ngawtin a ni, ka tih dan ni; ka hming hi engah nge tihchhiatin a awm ang? Ka ropuina hi mi dang hnênah ka pe lo vang.

source: And if a Levite, moved by a strong desire, comes from any town in all Israel where he is living to the place marked out by the Lord;
target: Tin, Lechi mi tupawh a awmna Israel ram in awmna a khawii pawh chuahsan a, a rilrua chak taka LALPAN a la ruat tur hmunah a lo kal chuan,

source: He was thirty-two years old when he became king; and he was ruling in Jerusalem for eight years.
target: A lal tan lai chuan kum sâwmthum leh kum hnih mi a ni a; Jerusalem khuaah kum riat ro a rêl a.

source: I'm going to go and lie down.
target: Ka va mu a.

source: I got jealous
target: Ka thîk tlat

source: cover girl
target: lehkhabu kawma nula lem

source: For it has been the good pleasure of those of Macedonia and Achaia to send a certain amount of money for the poor among the saints at Jerusalem.
target: Makedonia leh Akaia rama mite chuan lungni takin Jerusalem khuaa mi thianghlimte zinga retheite tan sum an thawhlawm tawh si a.

source: Do you wear glasses?
target: Glasses i vuah em?

source: When, then, the lord of the vine-garden comes, what will he do to those workmen?
target: Chutichuan grep huan neitupa a lo kal hunin chung lo enkawltute chungah chuan engtin nge a rawn tih ang le? a ti a.

source: I'd buy it
target: Ka lei ang

source: But when you give money, let not your left hand see what your right hand does:
target: Nang erawh chuan mi hnena englo i pekin, i kut ding lamin a tih chu i kut vei lamin hre suh se,

source: I'll open it
target: Ka hawng dawn

source: Whoever makes sport of the poor puts shame on his Maker; and he who is glad because of trouble will not go free from punishment.
target: Mi rethei hmusittu chuan a Siamtu a ngai nep a ni a, Mi vanduaina diriamtu chu hrem lohvin a awm lo vang.

source: He still had one, a dearly loved son: he sent him last to them, saying, They will have respect for my son.
target: Tin, pakhat, fapa duh tak a la nei a; ‘Ka fapa hi chu an zah ang,’ tiin ani chu a hnuhnung berah an hnenah a tir a.

source: I cut myself
target: Ka inzai palh

source: I sweated
target: Ka thlan

source: I have no teeth left.
target: Ha ka nei tawh lo.

source: I went down into the garden of nuts to see the green plants of the valley, and to see if the vine was in bud, and the pomegranate-trees were in flower.
target: Thei pil sak hmunah ka zuk kal a, Ruama thil chawrno en tûr leh Grêp a kuhmum emwa, pawmgranet a par emaw en tûrin.

source: He took up with his rulers and men of war the question of stopping up the water-springs outside the town; and they gave him their support.
target: khaw pawn lama tuite chu tihchah tûrin a m liante leh a mi chakte chu a rawn a; tichuan an tanpui a.

source: And the name Laban gave it was Jegar-sahadutha: but Jacob gave it the name of Galeed.
target: Tin, Labana chuan chu lung tian khâwm chu Jegar-sahadutha a vuah a; Jakoba erawh chuan Galeed a vuah a.

source: He was a trouble to Israel all through the days of Solomon. And this is the damage Hadad did: he was cruel to Israel while he was ruler over Edom.
target: Hadada tihhreawmna belhchhahin Solomona dam chhûng zawng, Israelte hmêlma a ni fo thin reng a. Israelte a haw hle mai a, Suria ram chungah ro a rel a.

source: As he took pleasure in cursing, so let it come on him; and as he had no delight in blessing, let it be far from him.
target: A ni, mi ânchhe lawh hi a duhzawng ani a, tichuan ama chungah alo thleng a; Mi malsawm hi alawmzawng a ni lo va, tichuan amah hlat daihah a awm a.

source: The nations will see and be shamed because of all their strength; they will put their hands on their mouths, their ears will be stopped.
target: Hnam tinin chu chu an hmu ang a, an thiltihtheihna zawng zawng chu an zahpui ang: an hmui an hup ang a, an beng te a ngawng ang.

source: Or make discovery of our secret purpose? The design is framed with care; and the inner thought of a man, and his heart, is deep.
target: Khawlohna an zawng chhuak thin a; Thahnemngai takin kan zawng zo ta, an ti a: An chhûng lam ngaihtuahna leh thinlung chu thuk tak ani theuh nghal a.

source: This is what he let me see: and I saw the Lord stationed by a wall made straight by a weighted line, and he had a weighted line in his hand.
target: Hetiangin mi entîr leh a; chutah chuan, LALPA chu bang ngîl taka rem kianga ding ka hmu a, a kutah enremna a awm a.

source: In her room
target: A pindanah a awm

source: I'm all set to start.
target: Ka tan vek tawh.

source: But let your chief care be for his kingdom, and these other things will be given to you in addition.
target: Ama ram zawng zawk rawh u, tichuan chung thil pawh chu a pek belhchhah dawn che u nia.

source: For every man's life and every man's death has a relation to others as well as to himself.
target: Tumah mahni tana nung kan ni lo va, tumah mahni tana thi kan ni hek lo.

source: And Pharaoh gave orders to his men, and they sent him on his way, with his wife and all he had.
target: Tin, Pharaoa chuan a chungchâng thuah chuan mi hnênah thu a pe a, tichuan amah an han thlah ta a, a nupui nên a neih zawng nên.

source: Then Joshua and all Israel with him went on from Makkedah and came to Libnah, and made an attack on it;
target: Tin, Josua chu Israel-ho zawng kawnge nen Makeda khua atangin Libna khua chu an bei a:

source: By their fruits you will get knowledge of them. Do men get grapes from thorns or figs from thistles?
target: Anmahni chu an rahah in hre mai ang. Hruihlingnei kungah grep rah an lo ngai em ni? Lenhlingah pawh theipui an lo ngai em ni?

source: Just a little bit
target: Tlemte chauh a ni

source: They're not a threat.
target: Hlauhawm an ni lo.

source: And the sons of Kohath, by their families: Amram and Izhar and Hebron and Uzziel.
target: An thlatu Kohatha fapate chu Amrama te, Izhara te, Hebrona te, Uziela te an ni.

source: And you gave your good spirit to be their teacher, and did not keep back your manna from their mouths, and gave them water when they had need of it.
target: Anmahni zirtir tûrin i thlarau tha tak chu i pe bawk a, i manna chuan i chawm a, an tuihal tihreh nân tui i pe a.

source: Now, about that time, Herod the king made cruel attacks on the Christians.
target: Tin, chutih lai vel chuan Lal Herodan kohhrante zinga tute emaw tihduhdah tumin a kut a lek ta a.

source: How frequently are they as dry stems before the wind, or as grass taken away by the storm-wind?
target: Vawi engzat nge buhpawl thliin a chhem ang an nih a, Favai thlipui len bo ang an nih?

source: So now, O Lord, give ear to my prayer and take my life from me; for death is better for me than life.
target: Chuvâng chuan, Aw lalpa tûnah ka nunna hi mi lâksak tûrin ka ngên a che; kei atân hian dam aiin thih a țha zâwk si a, a ti a.

source: You're too late
target: I tlâi lûtuk

source: He washed apples.
target: Apple a silfai a.

source: And went to sleep and got up, night and day, and the seed came to growth, though he had no idea how.
target: zanah muhilin chhunah tho thin sela, chi chu, a zia a hriat lohvin, lo tiakin lo thang sela; chutiang chu a ni.

source: You're sweet
target: I ngaihawm

source: Be a blessing
target: Nang malsawmna ni ang che

source: But when you give a feast, send for the poor and the blind and those who are broken in body:
target: Ruai i theh hun chuan pachhiate, piangsualte, kebaite, mitdelte sawm zawk ang che;

source: Then Jonathan said to him, Tomorrow is the new moon: and it will be seen that you are not present, for there will be no one in your seat.
target: Chutichuan Jonathana chuan a hnênah, Naktuk hi thla thar ani dawn a; i thut hmun a r uah dawn avângin i awm loh a lang ngei dawn a.

source: I'm so bored
target: Ka ning lûtuk

source: By him will all the horns of the sinners be cut off; but the horns of the upright will be lifted up.
target: Mi suaksualte ki zawng zawng pawh ka tansak ang a; Mi felte ki erawh chu tihsanin a awm ang.

source: Then Hiram sent to Solomon, saying; The words you sent have been given to me: I will do all your desire in the question of cedar-wood and cypress-wood.
target: Tin, Hiraman Solomona hnênah, I thu mi han chah chu ka lo hria a: sidar thing thu leh far thing thu chu i mamawh apiang ka lo ti ang e.

source: And he overcame Moab, and the Moabites became his servants and gave him offerings.
target: Tin, Moa-ho abei leh a. Moab mite ch Davida chiah khua an lo ni ta a. chhiahte an pe thin a.

source: See that you give praise to his work, about which men make songs.
target: A hnathawh tiropui tûrin hre reng rawh, Miten zaia an chawi thina chu.

source: The sinners are walking on every side, and evil is honoured among the children of men.
target: Mihring fate zingah hian sualna chu chawimawia a awmin, Mi suaksualte chu an vâk vêl ruai thin.

source: Then will his angry words come to their ears, and by his wrath they will be troubled:
target: Chumi hunah chuan thinurin an hnênah thu a sawi ang a, Thinrim takin anmahni a timangang tawh ang:

source: They'll build a house.
target: In an sa ang.

source: I turned myself in
target: Ka in turn in a

source: Is the snake alive
target: Rul chu a nung em

source: I serious lutuk.
target: You're so very serious.

source: They won't eat meat.
target: Sa an ei dawn lo.

source: We were looking for you.
target: Kan zawng a ni.

source: Why are its walls broken down by your hands, so that all who go by may take its fruit?
target: Engati nge a palte chu i tihchhiat ni? Lawmga la; a[oamgom am a[wj tj;al tal jo/

source: For David said of him, I saw the Lord before my face at all times, for he is at my right hand, so that I may not be moved:
target: Tin, Davida chuan a thu a sawi a, ‘Ka hmaah kumkhuain Lalpa chu ka hmu thin a, Ka mangan loh nan ka ding lamah a awm a ni;

source: And he was hoping that his brothers would see that God had sent him to be their saviour; but they did not see.
target: Mosia chuan ama kutin Pathianin anmahni a chhanhim tih a unauten an hria emaw a ti a, nimahsela an hre si lo.

source: He is no friend of mine.
target: Ka thian a ni lo.

source: I'm not counting on it.
target: Ka chhiar tel lo.

source: The hand of the Lord had been on me, and he took me out in the spirit of the Lord and put me down in the middle of the valley; and it was full of bones;
target: Tin, LALPA kut chu ka chungah a awm a, LALPA thlarau chuan mi hruai chhuak a, ruam lai takah mi dah a: chu ruam chu ruh hlîrin a khat a;

source: Did you get a look at it?
target: I en ve em?

source: I'm not messing around.
target: Ka mess lo a ni.

source: You gave me too much.
target: Min pe tam lutuk.

source: My God will give them up because they did not give ear to him; they will be wandering among the nations.
target: Ka pathian chuan anni chu a paih bo vang Amah an bengkhawn loh avângin: Tichuan hnam dangte zînga vakvaiin an awm ang.

source: I kept practicing
target: Ka practice zel a

source: As Sarah was ruled by Abraham, naming him lord; whose children you are if you do well, and are not put in fear by any danger.
target: Sarin Abrahama chu Lalpa tiin a thu a awih ang khan. Engmah hlau lova thil tha in tih tlat chuan Sari fate in ni ang.

source: He doesn't want to die.
target: Thih a duh lo.

source: Do you have much time to spare
target: Hun i nei tam em

source: Stop here
target: Hetah ding rawh

source: Talk less, do more.
target: Thu tlem, ti tam.

source: All the responsible men of Israel came, and the Levites took up the ark.
target: Tin, Israel upaho zawng zawng chu an lo kal a, Levi-hote chuan bâwm chu an zawn a.

source: But Israel overcame him, and took all his land from the Arnon to the Jabbok, as far as the country of the children of Ammon, for the country of the children of Ammon was strongly armed.
target: Tin, Israel mite chuan khandaihin an bei a, a ram chu Arnon ațanga Jakob tlengin, Amona thlahte thleng hialin an neihsak a: Amona thlahte ram chu ven tlat a ni.chu ven tlat a ni.

source: Do not be troubled because of evil-doers, or have envy of sinners:
target: Thil tha lo titute avângin intilungngai duh suh la, Mi suaksual awt hek suh.

source: You sit here.
target: Hetah ṭhu rawh.

source: Every meal offering offered for the priest is to be completely burned: nothing of it is to be taken for food.
target: Puithiam chhangphut thilhlan apiang chu halral vek tur a ni a, ei hauh loh tur a ni, tiin.

source: Ishmael’s Sons
target: Ismaela thlahte

source: And they went up into the hill-country and came to the valley of Eshcol, and saw what was there.
target: tichuan an chhuak ta a, tlângah chuan an lawn chho va, Eskol ruam an han thleng a, an en thlithlai vek a.

source: But about the middle of the night, Paul and Silas were making prayers and songs to God in the hearing of the prisoners;
target: Nimahsela zan laiah Paula leh Sila chuan Pathian hnenah an tawngtai a, hla an sa a, mi tangten an ngaithla a;

source: I'm a genius
target: Mithiam ka nia

source: I have given you baptism with water, but he will give you baptism with the Holy Spirit.
target: Kei zawngin tuiin ka baptis thin che u a; ani erawh chuan Thlarau Thianghlimin a baptis ang che u, tiin a hril a.

source: For the Lord has pleasure in his people: he gives the poor in spirit a crown of salvation.
target: LALPA chu a mite chungah a lawm si thin a: Thuhnuairawlhte chu chhandamnai a timawi ang.

source: They made mistakes
target: Tihsual an nei a

source: But God by his power gives long life to the strong; he gets up again, though he has no hope of life.
target: Pathian chuan a chaknain thiltitheite nun chu a tisei a, Dam an beisei loh hnu pawhin an tho chhuak a.

source: And they had edges all round as wide as a man's hand: and on the tables was the flesh of the offerings.
target: Tin, a chhûnglamah chuan a vêlin thil kawm, kutphah bênga sei an vuah a, dawhkân chungah te chuan thilhlante sa a awm a.

source: He sent from on high, he took me, pulling me out of great waters.
target: A ni chuan chung lam atangin a rawn bana, mi chelh a; Tui tam tak ata mi hnuk chhuak a.

source: The place of the dead is their house for ever, and their resting-place through all generations; those who come after them give their names to their lands.
target: An rilru ngaihtuah dan chu, An inte chu kumkhuaa awm tûr ang leh, An awmnate chu chhuan zawng zawng thlenga awm tûr angin a ni; An ramte chu anmahni hming vek an puttir thin.

source: And took out Israel from among them: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:
target: Aigupta-ho fa tirte tihhlumsak a: A ngilneihna pawh kumkhuain a awm dawn si a.

source: I work
target: Ka thawk

source: Sami hi idiot a ni.
target: Sami is an idiot.

source: I'll kick your head off.
target: I lu ka kick ang.

source: I keep the memory of my debt to you, O God; I will give you the offerings of praise.
target: Aw Pathian, i hneha thutiamte ka nei a: Lawm thu sawi Inthawinatein ka rul ang che.

source: We can't win.
target: Kan chak thei lo.

source: Go then to the cross-roads, and get all those whom you see to come to the bride-feast.
target: Chutichuan, kawng peng thuamahte kal ula, mi in hmuh apiang lawi chaw ei turin sawm rawh u,’ a ti a.

source: We're amused
target: Mak kan ti

source: She doesn't drink
target: A in ngai lo

source: Try it now
target: Tunah ti rawh

source: And on the day after the Passover, they had for their food the produce of the land, unleavened cakes and dry grain on the same day.
target: Tin, Kalhlen Kût zawh tuk ni la la chuan chu mi rama buh chhang dawidim telh loh leh chhangper kan an ei a.

source: He will take his seat, testing and cleaning the sons of Levi, burning away the evil from them as from gold and silver; so that they may make offerings to the Lord in righteousness.
target: Tangkaraw rawhtuina leh tithianghlimtu angin a țhu ang a, Levia fate a tithianghlim ang a, Rangkachak leh tangkarua angin an mahni a tifai ang a; LALPA tan chuan felnaa thilhlantute an ni ang.

source: Who is this coming up like the Nile, whose waters are lifting their heads like the rivers?
target: Nile lui anga lo lian hi tunge ni? Luipui tui fawn vêl ang mai hi?

source: Is that snow
target: Vûr a ni em

source: Is that what it was
target: Chu chu a ni em

source: We stay busy.
target: Ka buai reng.

source: And let your food be barley cakes, cooking it before their eyes with the waste which comes out of a man.
target: Tin, an mit hmuh ngeiah mihring ek roin i ur ang a, barli chhang eiin i ei tûr a ni,''a ti a.

source: They've all gone crazy
target: An â vek tawh

source: I need it now.
target: Tunah ka mamawh.

source: And all the people saw the cloud at the door of the Tent, and they went down on their faces, everyone at the door of his tent.
target: Tin, mipui zawng zawngin chhum ding hcu puan in kawngkaa ding an hmu a: tichuan mipui zawng zawng chu an tho va, mahni puan in kawngka theuhvah chuan chibai an lo bûk thin a.

source: Now David was old and full of days; and he made his son Solomon king over Israel.
target: Tin, Davida chu a dam reiin a lo upa ta hle a; tichuan a fapa Solomona chu Israelte lalah a siam a.

source: Not very well?
target: Ka nuam lo lûtuk

source: Guess again
target: Ring nawn rawh

source: But God has given us the revelation of these things through his Spirit, for the Spirit makes search into all things, even the deep things of God.
target: Keini erawh chu chung chu Pathianin Thlarauvin min hriattir ta a ni; Thlarau chuan engkim a chhui chhuak si thin; a ni. Pathian thu ril pawh.

source: He’ll vouch for me.
target: Min vouch ang.

source: The high looks of man will be put to shame, and the pride of men will be made low, and only the Lord will be lifted up in that day.
target: Mihring induhnate chu tihlawmin a awm ang a, mite chapona chu tihhniamin a awm ang, chu mi niah chuan LALPA chauh chu chawisanin a awm ang.

source: In all the vine-gardens there will be cries of grief: for I will go through among you, says the Lord.
target: Tin, grêp huan zawng zawngah an țap vak vak ang a: in zîngah ka kal tlang dâwn si a, LALPAN a ti a.

source: As Babylon had the dead of Israel put to the sword, so in Babylon the dead of all the land will be stretched out.
target: Babulon chuan Israel mi thahte a tluktir angin Babulon-ah chuan ram tina mi thahte an tlu ang.

source: But I have faith in the Lord that I myself will come before long.
target: Nimahsela, keimah ngei pawh rei lo te china lo kal Lalpaah chuan ka inring tlat a ni.

source: You're silly
target: I nuihzatthlâk

source: For there will come up false Christs, and false prophets, who will do great signs and wonders; so that if possible even the saints might be tricked.
target: Krista derte leh zawlnei derte an lo chhuak dawn si a, chung chuan thei ang sela thlante meuh pawh an tihder theih nan chhinchhiahna leh thilmak ropui takte an ti ang.

source: So they kept there for a long time, taking heart in the Lord, who gave witness to the word of his grace by causing signs and wonders to be done by their hands.
target: Chuvangin Lalpaah huai taka thu sawiin chutah chuan rei fe an awm a, ani chuan chhinchhiahna leh thilmakte an kuta tihtirin, a khawngaih thu a hriattir thin a.

source: Don't cry. It's okay.
target: Tap suh. A tha e.

source: They were looking for Jesus and saying to one another while they were in the Temple, What is your opinion? Will he not come to the feast?
target: Chutichuan Isua an zawng a, Pathian biak inah ding chungin an inbia a, engnge in rin? Kutnaah a lo kal lo vang maw? an inti a.

source: Be watchful
target: Enngun rawh

source: Go back home
target: Inah haw rawh

source: I got soaked
target: Ka huh vek

source: I'm getting sleepy again.
target: Ka muhil leh ta.

source: But truly a mountain falling comes to dust, and a rock is moved from its place;
target: Tlâng chim meuh pawh chu a riral a, Lungpui pawh a hmun ata sawn ani a;

source: It's useless
target: A hmanna awmlo

source: I am baking bread.
target: Chhang ka siam mek a ni.

source: Are they students
target: Zirlai an ni em

source: By his word the Red Sea was made dry: and he took them through the deep waters as through the waste land.
target: Tuifinriat Sen chu a zilhhau va, tichuan a kang ta a: Chutichuan anni chu thlalêrah hruai tlâng ang maiin tui thuk takahte chuan a hruai tlâng ta a.

source: He's my dad
target: Ka pa a ni

source: I still haven't found a job.
target: Hna ka la hmu lo.

source: I do like you.
target: Ka duh che a lawm.

source: After these things Jesus went away to the other side of the sea of Galilee--that is, the sea of Tiberias.
target: Chung thil hnuah chuan, Isua chu Galili dil, Tiberi dil an tih ral lehlamah chuan a kal ta a.

source: The eye which saw him sees him no longer; and his place has no more knowledge of him.
target: Amah hmu thin mit khan a hmu tawh ngai lo vang a, A hmun pawhin a hmungai thaw hek lo vang.

source: And they were overcome, and there was no more place for them in heaven.
target: nimahsela, an hneh ta lo va, an hmun chu vanah a awm ta bawk hek lo.

source: However, some of Asher and Manasseh and Zebulun put away their pride and came to Jerusalem.
target: Amaherawhchu Aser-ho le Manase-ho leh Zebulun-ho thenkhatin an bengkhawn a, Jerusalem-ah chuan an lo kal a.

source: Let it be cursed by those who put a curse on the day; who are ready to make Leviathan awake.
target: Ni ânchhelawh thiamte chuan ânchhia lawh rawh se, Leviathan chawh thawh thiamte chuan.

source: She shrieked
target: A rak vak vak

source: Even my dearest friend, in whom I had faith, who took bread with me, is turned against me.
target: A ni, ka thian kawmngeih, ka rin tak, ka chhâng eipui ngei chuan A ke artui ka chungah a lek ta.

source: I've escaped
target: Ka rawn tlanchhuak

source: Is it cloudy?
target: Chhûm a zing em?

source: The stem of his spear was as long as a cloth-worker's rod, and its head was made of six hundred shekels' weight of iron: and one went before him with his body-cover.
target: A fei ngul chu themkawl ang hi a ni a; tin, a fei lu chu thir sekel zaruka rit a ni a: tin, a phaw kengtu chu ahmaah a kal a.

source: Now, O Lord God, let your word to David my father come true; for you have made me king over a people like the dust of the earth in number.
target: Tichuan aw LALPA Pathian, ka pa Davida hnêna i thutiam kha tipuitling ang che; nangin vaivut zat zet mipuite lalah mi lo siam ta a.

source: He has a black shirt.
target: Kawr dum a nei a.

source: Then fire came out from the Lord, burning up the two hundred and fifty men who were offering the perfume.
target: Tin, LALPA ațangin mei a lo chhuak a, rimtui hlantu mi zahnih leh zawmngate chu a rawn kanghlum ta a.

source: Then take the sheep of the wave offering and let its flesh be cooked in water in a holy place.
target: Tin, tihhranna berâmpa chu rawn lain, a sa chu hmunthianghlimah i chhûm tur a ni.

source: And God, the searcher of hearts, was a witness to them, giving them the Holy Spirit even as he did to us;
target: Tin, rilru hretu Pathianin keini min pek ang bawk khan Thlarau Thianghlim an hnenah pe vein an chungah a lawm tih a hriattir a;

source: Then some of the people of Jerusalem said, Is not this the man whose death is desired?
target: Tin, Jerusalem khuaa mi thenkhatin, He mi hi tihhlum an tuma chu a ni lawm ni?

source: I lied to you.
target: Dâwt ka hrilh che a nih kha.

source: I've paid the bill
target: Bill ka pe tawh a

source: Do you like rice
target: Buhfai hi i duh em

source: Where is Tom?
target: Khawnge Toma?

source: Nothing may be used for food with its blood in it; you may not make use of strange arts, or go in search of signs and wonders.
target: A thisen chawpin engmah in ei tur a ni lo va, dawi te in hmangin aien te in ching tur a ni hek lo.

source: Be friendly
target: Nelawm rawh

source: And God sent back on to the heads of the men of Shechem all the evil they had done, and the curse of Jotham, the son of Jerubbaal, came on them.
target: hsualna zawng zawng kha Pathianin a rawn thungrul ve tha thung a: tin, Jerubaala fapa Jothama ânchhia kha an chungah chuan a lo tla ta a ni.

source: But when evening comes near, let him take a bath: and after sundown he may come back to the tents.
target: amaherawhchu khua a lo tlai lamin a inbual ang a; tin, ni tlaha riahmunah a lût leh tur a ni.

source: Cut that out
target: Kha kha tan rawh

source: While the disease is on him, he will be unclean. He is unclean: let him keep by himself, living outside the tent-circle.
target: Phârin a bawm chhûng chu bawlhhlawh a ni ang a; a bawlhhlawh a ni a, a awm hrang tur a ni; a awmna tur chu daipawn a ni.

source: You have given your blessing to the earth, watering it and making it fertile; the river of God is full of water: and having made it ready, you give men grain.
target: Lei hi i kan a, tuiin i chawm a, Nasa takin i titha thin: Pathian lui chu tuiin a khat a: Lei hi chutianga i buatsaih hnu chuan an tan buh i siamsak thin.

source: Keep in mind this thought, that as a son is trained by his father, so you have been trained by the Lord your God.
target: Tin, miin a fa a thunun țhin angin LALPA in Pathian chuan a thunun țhin che u ani ti hi inrilruin hre ran rawh u.

source: They lost.
target: An bo.

source: And they put cords on him and took him away, and gave him up to Pilate, the ruler.
target: tin, an phuar a, an hruai a, Ram Awptu Pilata hnenah an pe ta a.

source: As the living Father has sent me, and I have life because of the Father, even so he who takes me for his food will have life because of me.
target: Pa nung chuan mi tir a, Pa zara nung ka ni ang bawkin, tupawh mi ei chu keima zarah ani pawh a nung ang.

source: I'm a purist
target: Ka thianghlim ber

source: I'm not going to say no.
target: Ka lo ti dawn lo.

source: I will have those who are against him broken before his face, and his haters will be crushed under my blows.
target: Amah dotute chu ahmaah ka vaw thlu ang a, Amah hawtute chu ka sawisa ang.

source: I'll leave
target: Ka kalsan ang

source: You're very smart
target: I fing hle mai

source: Tom's famous
target: Tom a lar

source: They were excited
target: An phûr hle mai

source: If he says, It is well, your servant will be at peace: but if he is angry, then it will be clear to you that he has an evil purpose in mind against me.
target: Tin, ' A that chu,' a tih chuan i chhiahhlawh chu a thla amuang ang a; amaherawhchu a thin a rim chuan thil tha lo tih a tum ani tih hre mai ang che.

source: Then when its time comes, desire gives birth to sin; and sin, when it is of full growth, gives birth to death.
target: Tin, chakna chuan no a pai a, sual a hring thin a; tin, sual chuan a lo puitlinin thihna a hring thin.

source: Let fifty days be numbered, to the day after the seventh Sabbath; then you are to give a new meal offering to the Lord.
target: tin, chawlhni vawi sarihna tuk atang chuan ni sawmnga in chhiar ang a, LALPA hnenah chhangphut thar thil hlan in hlan tur a ni.

source: Don't break up with me.
target: Min then suh.

source: That's what it's about.
target: Chu chu a ni.

source: It's snowing
target: Vur a sur

source: Tom whistled
target: Tom a faifuk

source: What was your mother? Like a she-lion among lions, stretched out among the young lions she gave food to her little ones.
target: I nu eng nge a nih le? Sakeibakneipui a ni; A no a chawm, a bawk, sakeibaknei vanglaite zingah,

source: And Abraham said, Because it seemed to me that there was no fear of God in this place, and that they might put me to death because of my wife.
target: Tin, Abrahama chuan , He mi khuaah hian Pathian tihna a awm hauh lo ngei ang a, ka nupui avâng hian mi tihlum mai ang tih ka rin avâng a ni.

source: Like one who takes off clothing in cold weather and like acid on a wound, is he who makes melody to a sad heart.
target: Mi lungngai hnêna hla satu chu Khaw vawh nia silhfen hlih ang leh pema chingal leih ang a ni.

source: Lock it
target: Kalh rawh

source: And they came face to face with Moses and Aaron, who were in their way when they came out from Pharaoh:
target: Tin, Pharaoa hnên atanga an lo chhuak chuan, Mosia leh Arona kawnga lo ding an rawn hmu a:

source: She was singing a song.
target: Hla a sa a.

source: Much in every way: first of all because the words of God were given to them.
target: Kawng tinah a sawt hle; Pathian thute an hnenah kawltirin a awm avang a ni ber a.

source: Now the prophets Haggai and Zechariah, the son of Iddo, were preaching to the Jews in Judah and Jerusalem in the name of the God of Israel.
target: Chutih lai chuan zâwlnei pahni Jagaia leh Idova fapa Zekaria-te chuan Judai ram leh Jerusalem-a Juda awmte hnêna Israelte Pathian hmingin thu an sawi a.

source: Do you price match?
target: Price a inmil em?

source: You've already got a job
target: Hna i nei tawh a

source: He gave their vines and their fig-trees to destruction, and the trees of their land were broken down.
target: An grêp hruite leh an theipui kungte a tithi a; An rama thingte chu a titliak ta bawk a.

source: I will give your wealth and your stores to your attackers, without a price, because of all your sins, even in every part of your land.
target: I sualna zawng zawng avâng hian i sum leh pai leh i ro thilte chu man lovin râllâk atân ka pe ang, i ram tluanin.

source: He tells me Danger
target: Ani chuan Hlauhawm

source: But they said nothing: because they had had an argument between themselves on the way, about who was the greatest.
target: Nimahsela kawngah chuan, Kan zingah tunge ropui ber ang? tiin an lo inhnial tawh avangin an ngawi ta reng a.

source: And Shechem said to Hamor, his father, Get me this girl for my wife.
target: Tin, Sekema chuan a pa Hamora chu a bia a, Chu nula chu nupuiah mi neihsak rawh, a ti a.

source: And I had you clothed with needlework, and put leather shoes on your feet, folding fair linen about you and covering you with silk.
target: Puan cheiin ka thuam chia, savun țha mi pheikhawk ka buntîr chia, puan zai sînin ka tuam chia, maimaw puan ka khumtîr che a ni.

source: They invited me back again.
target: Min sawm leh a.

source: Have you ever applied for a job?
target: Hna i dil tawh em?

source: And they came to Elim where there were twelve water-springs and seventy palm-trees: and they put up their tents there by the waters.
target: Tin, Elim hmun an va thlêng a, chutah chuan tuihna nei sâwm leh pahnih leh tum thîng sawmsarih a awm a; tin, chuta tui kamahte chuan an riak ta a.

source: Do you give lessons?
target: Zirlai i pe em?

source: You deserve to be happy dear.
target: Hlim i phu dear.

source: They're nice
target: An fel e

source: Who gives honour to those who have the fear of the Lord, turning away from him who has not the Lord's approval. He who takes an oath against himself, and makes no change.
target: Mi sual tak chu ahmusitin a awm thin a; LALPA thihtute erawh chu a chawimawi thin a; Mahni tana pawi tûr pawh chhechhama tiam tawh chu tidanglam ngai lova,

source: This is what you have to do: take away the kings from their positions, and put captains in their places;
target: Tin, hetiangin ti ang che: lalho hi an zavaiin thlak vek la, an aia rawm awptute dah langin;

source: On what were its pillars based, or who put down its angle-stone,
target: A nghahchhan chu khawiah nge a din ngheh a, Tunge a kil lung phûm ni,

source: And their brothers, in the list of their generations, nine hundred and fifty-six. All these men were heads of families, listed by the names of their fathers.
target: tin, anmahniho chhuanah chuan unau 956 an ni. Chung zawng zawngte chu an hnam zinga an chhûngkaw puipate an ni.

source: Hurry up a little!
target: Tlem han hmanhmawh teh!

source: Keeping the word which came from my lips, and which my mouth said, when I was in trouble.
target: Ka hmuiin a sawi a, Manganga ka awm laia ka kain a sawite chu.

source: Cartoon pakhat a hmu a
target: She saw a cartoon

source: We are young.
target: Kan la naupang.

source: But Peter went on giving blows on the door: and when it was open and they saw him, they were full of wonder.
target: Nimahsela Petera chuan a kik fo va; tin, an han hawn chuan amah chu an hmu a, mak an ti hle a.

source: With God we will do great things; for by him will our haters be crushed underfoot.
target: Pathian zarah huai takin kan ti ang: Ani chu min dotute rap bettu tûr a ni si a.

source: And Remeth and En-gannim and En-haddah and Beth-pazzez;
target: Remeth te, Enganim te, En-hada te, Beth-pazez te thlengin a ni;

source: The hater of work does not get his desires, but the soul of the hard workers will be made fat.
target: Mi thatchhe rilru chuan thil a duh thin a, nimahsela engmah a nei chuang lo va, Mi taima rilru erawh chu tihtlai a ni ang.

source: Let my tongue make songs in praise of your word; for all your teachings are righteousness.
target: Ka lei hi i thu fakin zai rawh se; I thupêk zawng zawng chu felna a ni avângin.

source: My loved ones, if God had such love for us, it is right for us to have love for one another.
target: Duh takte u, Pathianin chuti kauva min hmangaih chuan keini pawh kan inhmangaih tawn theuh tur a ni.

source: Your righteousness, O God, is very high; you have done great things; O God, who is like you?
target: Aw Pathian, i felna pawh a sâng êm êm a ni; Aw Pathian, nang thil ropi takte titu, Nangmah ang hi tunge awm?

source: So I got for a price the property in Anathoth from Hanamel, the son of my father's brother, and gave him the money, seventeen shekels of silver;
target: Tin, ka pami fapa Hanamela Anathoth khuaa mi lo chu ka lei ta a, tangka chu ka han buksak a, tangkarua sekel sâwm leh pasarih zet a ni.

source: I crashed
target: Ka tisawm

source: I see a star
target: Arsi ka hmu

source: They explained it
target: An hrilhfiah a

source: Who hurt you?
target: Tunge tinâ che?

source: And the line goes round it on the north to Hannathon, ending at the valley of Iphtah-el;
target: tin, ramric hu hmar lamah Hanathon-aha kual phei a: tin, a chhuahna chu Iphtah-el ruamah a ni;

source: You will be cursed when you come in and cursed when you go out.
target: In vak chhuakte chu ânchhe dawngin in awm ang a, in lo hawngte pawh ânchhe dawngin in awm ang.

source: Look up
target: En chho rawh

source: Give words of love to every saint in Christ Jesus. The brothers who are with me send you their love.
target: Krista Isuaa mi thianghlim tinreng chibai mi buksak ang che u. Ka hnena unau awmte hian chibai an buk a che u.

source: And Samuel said, Why do you put your questions to me, seeing that God has gone away from you and is on the side of him who is against you?
target: Tin, Samuela chuan, Chutia LALPAN a hawisan chia i hmêlma a lo ni ta tih hre reng chung si chuan engah nge thu mi zawh?

source: He earns a living.
target: Eizawnna a hlawh chhuak thin.

source: I am as old as he
target: Amah ang bawk hian ka upa tawh a ni

source: Who listened?
target: Tunge ngaithla?

source: Watch it and dance!
target: En la, zai rawh!

source: But some of the Pharisees, who were of the faith, got up and said, It is necessary for these to have circumcision and to keep the law of Moses.
target: Nimahsela Pharisai pawla mi ring ve tute emaw an tho va, Jentailte chu an serh tan tur a ni, Mosia dan awih pawh an hnenah tiam kher tur a ni, an ti a.

source: For to you a thousand years are no more than yesterday when it is past, and like a watch in the night.
target: Nang ngaih chuan kum sângkhat hi Nimin ral ta ang lek kha ani si a, Zan ven khat chhûng ang lek bawk a ni.

source: Are you fat?
target: I thau ami?

source: Sami didn't get sick.
target: Sami chu a na lo.

source: My loved one is gone down into his garden, to the beds of spices, to take food in the gardens, and to get lilies.
target: Ka duhtak chu a chhuk ta, a huan hlo rimtui hmunah chuan, Huanah a rna rual tlattir leh A lili par lawr tûrin.

source: Drink taken without right is sweet, and food in secret is pleasing.
target: Rûk tui chu a thlum a, A rûka chhâng ei chu a tui a ni, a ti a.

source: You are always wrong.
target: I dik lo fo thin.

source: They crashed
target: An kehsawm vek

source: Don't panic, yet
target: Hlauthawng suh, la

source: I don't recognize the number.
target: Number ka hre lo.

source: Bury it
target: Phum rawh

source: They are to be burned by the priest on the altar for an offering made by fire to the Lord: it is an offering for wrongdoing.
target: tin, puithiam chuan LALPA tana meia thilhlanah maichâm chungah a hal tur a ni: chu chu bawhchhiat thawina a ni,

source: The Preacher made search for words which were pleasing, but his writing was in words upright and true.
target: Thuhriltu chuan thu pawm tlak hmu tûrin a zawng a, tlâng taka ziak, thutak thute chu.

source: And you will have a blessing, because they will not be able to give you any payment, and you will get your reward when the upright come back from the dead.
target: tichuan chung ang chuan rulhna tur che an neih loh avangin i eng a thawl ang; mi felte thawhleh hunah rulh leh i ni dawn si a, a ti a.

source: Sami hi ka pa a ni
target: Sami is my father

source: I'm the man of the house.
target: In mipa ka ni.

source: I made them unclean in the offerings they gave, causing them to make every first child go through the fire, so that I might put an end to them.
target: an thil dawn, chhûl keutu zawng zawng meia an paihnaah chuan anmahni ka tibawlhhlawh a, ka tikhawhar a, a tawpah LALPA chu ka ni tih an hriatna tûrin.

source: He built a system.
target: System a siam a.

source: Will the fishermen make profit out of him? will they have him cut up for the traders?
target: sângha mantuhoten indawr nân an hmang ang êm ni? Sumdawng mite zingah an sem darh ang êm ni?

source: I'll live
target: Ka nung ang

source: I like onions
target: Purunsen ka duh

source: Give me teaching so that I may do your pleasure; for you are my God: let your good Spirit be my guide into the land of righteousness.
target: I duhzawng tih mi zirtir ang che; ka Pathian i ni si a: I thlarau chu a tha a ni; ram dik takah chuan mi hruai ang che.

source: Urine bag
target: Zun siakna bawm

source: Because it is God's purpose that our way of life may be not unclean but holy.
target: Pathianin bawlhhlawh turin min ko si lo va, thianghlimah min ko zawk a ni.

source: Tell me.
target: Min hrilh rawh.

source: For in those days and in that time, when I let the fate of Judah and Jerusalem be changed,
target: Ngai teh u, chung nîahte leh chumi hunah chuan Juda leh Jerusalem tun din leh hunah chuan,

source: What exactly did you find
target: Eng tak nge i hmuh

source: And Jacob did seven years' work for Rachel; and because of his love for her it seemed to him only a very little time.
target: Tichuan Jakoba chuan Rakili nei tûr chuan kum sarih chu a rawng a bâwl ta a: nimahsela a hmangaih hle avângin ni rei lo tê ang chauhvin a hria a.

source: I sweated.
target: Ka thlan.

source: Though evil-doing is sweet in his mouth, and he keeps it secretly under his tongue;
target: Suahsualna hi a kaah thlum mah se, A lei hnuaiah thukru mah se,

source: Who is blind, but my servant? who has his ears stopped, but he whom I send? who is blind as my true one, or who has his ears shut like the Lord's servant?
target: Ka chhiahhlawh lo chu tu mit nge del:? A nih loh leh, ka tirhkoh tirh angin tu beng nge ngawng? Mi remtu angin tu mit nge dela, LALPA chhiahhlawh angin tu mit nge del?

source: My days are past, my purposes are broken off, even the desires of my heart.
target: Ka nite a liam ta, ka thil tumte a thlawn zo ta, Ka thinlung ngaihtuah thinte ngei chu.

source: Let the word of Christ be in you in all wealth of wisdom; teaching and helping one another with songs of praise and holy words, making melody to God with grace in your hearts.
target: Krista thu chu finna tinrengin nangmahniah awm teuh rawh se; fakna hla te, Pathian hla te, thlarau lam hla tea inzirtirin inzilh taWn ula, thinlunah neiin Pathian chu hla saksak rawh u.

source: And there was a king in Jeshurun, when the heads of the people and the tribes of Israel came together.
target: Jesurun-ah a lal a, Mipuiho puipate an pung khawm a, Israel chi zawng zawng a huhovin

source: I do need you.
target: Ka mamawh che.

source: There's the doctor
target: Doctor chu a awm a

source: And David came to Mahanaim. And Absalom, with all the men of Israel, went over Jordan.
target: Chutichuan Davida chuan Mahanaim a va thleng a. Tin, Absaloma chuan a hnêna Israel mi zawng zawngte nen Jordan lui an kân a.

source: My people are given up to sinning against me; though their voice goes up on high, no one will be lifting them up.
target: Ka mite chuan min hawisan an tum reng a, An nghawngkawl rit tak avângin Chungnungbera an au ang a, Mahse tuman an chawikân sak lo vang.

source: But if he had no evil purpose against him, and God gave him into his hand, I will give you a place to which he may go in flight.
target: Tin, miin tum rêng vâng ni lova, Pathian chaltawhtîr a nih erawh chuan, a tlân luhna tûr hmun ka ruatsak ang che.

source: I should be there
target: Ka awm ve tur a ni

source: These words came to the ears of the Pharisees who were with him and they said to him, Are we, then, blind?
target: Tin, a hnena Pharisai awmte chuan chung chu an hria a, a hnenah, Keini pawh hi mitdel kan ni ve elo? an ti a.

source: All who came before me are thieves and outlaws: but the sheep did not give ear to them.
target: Ka hmaa lo kal zawng zawngte kha ruk hmangte,suam hmangte an ni vek a;nimahsela beramte chuan an thu an awih lo.

source: The water was turned on.
target: Tui chu a on a.

source: I'm a man.
target: Mipa ka ni.

source: For the mouth of the sinner is open against me in deceit: his tongue has said false things against me.
target: Mi suaksual ka leh ka bumhmang chu ka chungah an ang si a: Anni chuan lei dawtheiin ka hnênah thu an sawi a.

source: How are you?
target: I dam alawm maw?

source: Let's chat
target: Ziakin inbia inla

source: I dare not speak to her
target: Ka biak ngam lo

source: You make us a cause of war among our neighbours; our haters are laughing at us among themselves.
target: Nangin kan vêla mite tan inhnialnaah min siam thin a, Min dotute chu an nui tlâng thin.

source: He came.
target: A rawn kal tawh.

source: Don't wait.
target: Nghak suh.

source: Do not lose hope.
target: Beiseina hloh suh.

source: I'm done talking
target: Ka sawi zo tawh

source: So that they may see that it is the work of your hand; that you, Lord, have done it.
target: Chu chu i kut ani tih an hriat theih a, LALPA, nangin i tih a ni tih an hriat theihna tûrin.

source: Then all the trees said to the thorn, You come and be king over us.
target: Chutichuan thin gzawng zawng chuan hling hnênah, 'Hawh teh, nang kan lalah awm ang che,' an ti a.

source: Three times I was whipped with rods, once I was stoned, three times the ship I was in came to destruction at sea, a night and a day I have been in the water;
target: vawi thum tianga vuakin ka awm a, vawi khat lunga denin ka awm a, vawi thum lawng chhiatna ka tawk a, zan khat leh ni khat tuifinriatah ka awm a;

source: Haran and Canneh and Eden, the traders of Asshur and all the Medes:
target: Haran, Kanneh leh Eden, Seba, Assuria leh kilmad sumdawngtute chu A dawrtuche an ni a.

source: air pocket
target: boruak panlai

source: And he gave them into the hands of the nations; and they were ruled by their haters.
target: Tichuan anni chu hnam tin kutah a pe a; Anmahni hawtute chuan an chungah ro an rel ta a.

source: May I cut in?
target: Ka lo inrawlh ang em?

source: Do not the Writings say that the Christ comes of the seed of David and from Beth-lehem, the little town where David was?
target: Krista chu Davida thlahte zingah, Davida awmna khua Bethlehemah chhuak tur a ni tih Pathian Lehkhain a sawi lo vem ni? an ti a.

source: You have betrayed us.
target: Min phatsan a ni.

source: I'm free!
target: Ka hman lutuk!

source: I ate some spinach.
target: Spinach ka ei a.

source: And when you are feasting and drinking, are you not doing it only for yourselves?
target: Tin, in ei a, in in pawhin nangmahni tan in ei a, in in mai a ni lâwm ni?

source: It's Anna's house.
target: Anna te in a ni.

source: Help me
target: Min pui rawh

source: A blessing on the coming kingdom of our father David: Glory in the highest.
target: Ram lo thleng tur, kan Pa Davida ram chu chawimawiin awm rawh se. Chungnung berah khian Hosanna! tiin an au va.

source: For through the voice of the Lord the Assyrian will be broken, and the Lord's rod will be lifted up against him.
target: LALPA aw avâng chuan Assuria mi, talhtuma mi vaw thintu chu, tihkeh sawmin a awm dawn tawh si a.

source: And the children of Dan were forced into the hill-country by the Amorites, who would not let them come down into the valley;
target: Tin, Amor-ho chuan Dana thlahte chu tlâng ramah an hnawt chho va, ruama an chhuk an phal si lo va,

source: For this cause they will take away their wealth, and the stores they have got together, over the stream of the water-plants.
target: Chuvangin an sum la neih chhunte leh an dah thatte chu tuipuisuthlah Lui ralah chuan an kal bopui ang.

source: Don't sing.
target: Zai suh.

source: In the words of his mouth are evil and deceit; he has given up being wise and doing good.
target: A kaa thu chhuakte chu sualna leh bumna thu hlir a ni thin a: Finvar leh thil tha tih a bang ta a.

source: A father to those who have no father, a judge of the widows, is God in his holy place.
target: Pathian a awmna thianghlima awm chu. Pa nei lote pa leh hmeithaite ngaihtuahtu a ni.

source: Stop lying
target: Dâwt sawi suh

source: Servants are ruling over us, and there is no one to make us free from their hands.
target: Bâwihte chu kan chungah an lal a; An kut ata min chhanchhuak tûr tumah an awm lo.

source: As for Canaan, the scales of deceit are in his hands; he takes pleasure in twisted ways.
target: Kanaanho angin Israel chuan bukna diklo a lek a. Bum mawlh a chak țhin a ni.

source: It is unfair
target: A va diklo ve

source: If I made gold my hope, or if I ever said to the best gold, I have put my faith in you;
target: Rangkachak chu ka nghahfaka ka hman a, Rangkachak tha mi chu ka rinchhana ka ngaih a,

source: Though the Lord is high, he sees those who are low; and he has knowledge from far off of those who are lifted up.
target: LALPA chu chungnuung tak a ni na a, mi tlâwmte chu a ngaihsak thin a: Mi chapote erawh chu hla tak atangin a hre thin.

source: Let not your servant come before you to be judged; for no man living is upright in your eyes.
target: I chhiahhlawh chungah hian rorêl suh ang che; I mithmuhah chuan mi nung rêng rêng thiam chang an awm dawn si lo.

source: We're planning to go.
target: Kan kal tum a ni.

source: Men of pride are the cause of violent acts in a town, but by wise men wrath is turned away.
target: Hmusittu chuan khawpui a tialh a, Mi fing erawh chuan thinurna a tikiang thin.

source: Give me now wisdom and knowledge, so that I may go out and come in before this people: for who is able to be the judge of this great people of yours?
target: Tichuan heng mipuiho hmaa lût leh chhuaka ka awm theih nân finna leh hriatna mi han pe ang che; i mi heti zozai hi tunge rorêlsak thei ang le? a ti a.

source: You're very well respected.
target: I zah em em a ni.

source: Take care not to be turned to sin, for you have taken evil for your part in place of sorrow.
target: Fimkhur la, khawlohna lam hawi suh, Hei hi hreawm tuar aia i thlan a ni si.

source: Is it hot outside?
target: Pawnah a lum em?

source: How long will you say these things, and how long will the words of your mouth be like a strong wind?
target: Eng chen nge heng thil hi sawi dawn a, I kamchhuak chu thlipui anga a nih reng dawn?

source: We're not closing
target: Kan khar lo

source: And Noah did everything which the Lord said he was to do.
target: Tichuan Nova chuan LALPAN a hnêna thu a pêk zawng zawng ang zêl chuan a ti ta a.

source: The house got painted.
target: In chu a paint a.

source: And the wonder-workers did the same with their secret arts, making frogs come up over the land of Egypt.
target: Tin, mitlâk dawithiamte pawh chuan an dawi hmangin chutiang bawk chuan an han ti ve a, Aigupta ramah chuan chungute chu an han tichhuak ve a.

source: Of which I was made a preacher, through that grace of God which was given to me in the measure of the working of his power.
target: A thiltihtheihna thawhzia anga athlawna pek Pathian khawngaihna chu mi pek angzia zelin chu Chanchin Tha rawngbawltua siam ka ni.

source: For a voice is sounding from Dan, giving out evil from the hills of Ephraim:
target: Dan ram ata aw a lo chhuak a, Ephraim tlâng ațangin thil țha lo a puang e.

source: Which things have a secret sense; because these women are the two agreements; one from the mountain of Sinai, giving birth to servants, which is Hagar.
target: Chung thu chu tehkhinna a ni; chung hmeichhiate chu thuthlung pahnih an ni; pakhat chu Sinai Tlanga mi, bawih ni tura fa hringtu chu; chu chu Hagari a ni.

source: She decided to go
