target: Kal a tum ta a

source: At that time certain Chaldaeans came near and made a statement against the Jews.
target: Tin, chumi lai chuan Kaldai mi țhenkhatte an lo hnai a, Juda mite chu an rawn hêk a.

source: So Esau, turning back that day, went on his way to Seir.
target: Chutichuan Esauva chu chu mi nî vek chuan Seir tlâng lam panin a kîr leh ta a.

source: I hated Tom.
target: Tom-a ka hua.

source: Follow him
target: Amah zui rawh

source: Who are you afraid of
target: Tu nge i hlauh

source: I'm joking
target: Ka fiamthu

source: Who's he?
target: Amah hi tunge?

source: Tom waited
target: Tom'an a nghâk

source: Who will not be moved by the voice of the wonder-worker, however great are his powers.
target: Chu chuan rul dawi at thiamte aw chu a ngaithla thin lo, Eng anga thiam pawhin dawi mah sela.

source: I'm beginning to get sleepy
target: Ka muhil tan ta

source: She didn't see a thing.
target: Engmah a hmu lo.

source: For these words did not ever come through the impulse of men: but the prophets had them from God, being moved by the Holy Spirit.
target: Thu hrilh lawk reng reng hi mihring thua chhuak a ni ngai si lo a, miten Thlarau Thianghlim tirhin Pathian hnen ata an sawi zawk thin a ni.

source: And Jehoshaphat his son became king in his place, and made himself strong against Israel.
target: Tin, a fapa Jehosaphata a aiah a lal a, Israel mite do tûrin a indin nghet a.

source: Hey, we aren't done yet.
target: Hei, kan la zo lo.

source: Who will make his way clear to his face? and if he has done a thing, who gives him punishment for it?
target: Tunge a hmai hmaah a kawng chu piang ang a, Tunge a thiltih chu thungrul ang?

source: And let us not put the Lord to the test, as some of them did, and came to their death by snakes.
target: An zinga thenkhatin Lalpa an fiah a, rula tihborala an awm phah ang khan Lalpa chu i fiah hek suh ang u.

source: They love it
target: An duh lutuk

source: And four great beasts came up from the sea, different one from another.
target: Tin, tuipuiah chuan sa ropui tak tak pali, in ang lo tak tak hi an lo chhuak a.

source: But I had pity for my holy name which the children of Israel had made unclean wherever they went.
target: Mahse Israel chhûngten an va kalna hnamte zinga an tihbawrhban, ka hming thianghlim chu ka lainat a ni.

source: All of them are waiting for you, to give them their food in its time.
target: Chung zawng zawng chuan an nghâk theuh che a ni, A hun taka an chaw i pêk theih thinna tûrin.

source: Tom is the father
target: Tom chu a pa a ni

source: And have put on the new man, which has become new in knowledge after the image of his maker;
target: mihring thar chuan in inthuam tawh si a, chu mihring thar chu hriat famkimna nei turin, a siamtu anpui anga siam tharin a awm mek a ni;

source: Are there any hidden fees?
target: Fee thup a awm em?

source: So that he might make it holy, having made it clean with the washing of water by the word,
target: anni chu tuia sila thu chuan tifaiin a tihthianghlim theih nan;

source: The bodies of men will be falling like waste on the open fields, and like grain dropped by the grain-cutter, and no one will take them up.
target: LALPA thu chhuak chuan heti hian a ti: Mi ruangte chu tamlakah ekdur angin an tlu ang a, Buh sengtu buh hmaih ang maiin; Tuman an khâwm tawh lo vang, ti rawh.

source: Tom yawned
target: Tom a ham tawh

source: Winter is approaching
target: Thlasik a hnai ta

source: When things go well for the upright man, all the town is glad; at the death of sinners, there are cries of joy.
target: Mi felte chunga thil a tluan laiin khua a hlim a, Mi suaksualte an thihin au dur durna a awm a.

source: I like her an awful lot
target: Ka duh em em a ni

source: Give ear to me, you who have knowledge of righteousness, in whose heart is my law; have no fear of the evil words of men, and give no thought to their curses.
target: Felna hretu, ka dan thu thinlunga pai mite u, ka thu ngaithla rawh u; mihringte sawichhiatna hlau suh ula, an hauna che u avângin mangang hek suh u.

source: I like winter
target: Thlalâk ka ngaina

source: And the sons of Mushi: Mahli and Eder and Jerimoth. These were the sons of the Levites by their families.
target: Tin, Musia thlahte chu Mahlia te, Edera te, Jerimotha te an ni. Chungte chu Levi ho thlahte zinga an chhûngkaw puipate chu an ni.

source: You are my brothers, my bone and my flesh; why are you the last to get the king back again?
target: Ka unaute inni a, ka thisen zawmpui in ni si a, Engati nge ni a zawiawi bera in tan chu ni ngai le? Tiin sawi rawh u.

source: Your anger against her has been made clear by driving her away; he has taken her away with his storm-wind in the day of his east wind.
target: Amah chu i kal botir laiin a tawk lekin amah chu i hnial a; khawchhak thli tleh niah chuan a thaw na tak chuan amah chu a len sawn ta.

source: And I will keep in mind the agreement between me and you and every living thing; and never again will there be a great flow of waters causing destruction to all flesh.
target: kei leh nangni leh tisa zawng zawng zînga mi thil nung tinrêngte kâra ka thuthlung awm hi ka hre reng ang; tichuan tui chu tisa zawng zawng tiboral tûrin a lo lêt leh tawh lo vang.

source: For our evil doings are increased before you, and our sins give witness against us: for our evil doings are with us, and we have knowledge of our sins:
target: Kan bawhchhiatnate hi i hmaah a pung ta si a, kan sualnate hian min hek thin a ni: kan bawhchhiatnate hi kan hnênah a awm reng si a, kan khawlohnate zawng kan hria a ni:

source: For every beast of the woodland is mine, and the cattle on a thousand hills.
target: Ramhnuaia sa tinrenge hi ka ta a ni si a, Tlâng sângkhat lai chunga ran awmte pawh chu.

source: And Ehud put out his left hand, and took the sword from his right side, and sent it into his stomach;
target: Tin, Ehuda chuan a kut vei lamin a malpui dinglama khandaih chu a han phawrh a, a pumah a chiu ta vak mai a:

source: These three were the sons of Noah and from them all the earth was peopled.
target: Chu mite laka chhuakte chuan lei zawng zawng hi an dâp zo ta a ni.

source: The rain is starting to let up
target: Ruah a sur tan ta

source: Tom always speaks French.
target: Engmah ka phu lo.

source: Happy are they who keep his unchanging word, searching after him with all their heart.
target: A thuhriattirte zawmtute chu an eng a thawl e, Thinlung zawng zawnga zawngtute chu.

source: I have cash
target: Pawisa ka nei

source: What's wrong?
target: Eng nge diklo?

source: Because they are only rules of the flesh, of meats and drinks and washings, which have their place till the time comes when things will be put right.
target: chung chu ei tur te, in tur te, sil tur hrang hrangte nen tisa lam dante chauh siamthat hun hma atan ruat chu a ni.

source: It's wrong to steal.
target: Ruk chu a dik lo.

source: They weren't listening
target: An ngaithla lo va

source: Then Jehoram went over with his captains and all his war-carriages ... made an attack by night on the Edomites, whose forces were all round him ... on the captains of the war-carriages.
target: TichuanJehorama chu a sipai hotute leh a tawlailir zawng zawngte nen a va thawk chuak a, zanah a va thawk a, anmahni leh tawlailir chunga hotute hualtu Edom-hote chu a va bei a.

source: They are not good people.
target: Mi tha an ni lo.

source: And again, if the fathers of our flesh gave us punishment and had our respect, how much more will we be under the authority of the Father of spirits, and have life?
target: Chu lo pawh chu min thunun turin kan tisa pate kan neih kha, chungte chu kan zah si a; chu mi aia nasa zawkin, an nunna turin thlaraute Pa thu thuin kan awm dawn lawm ni?

source: Tom, don't interrupt.
target: Tom, titawp suh.

source: He's in pain
target: A nâ mêk

source: I'm thinking
target: Ka ngaihtuah mek

source: We are Australian
target: Australian kan ni

source: You are taken as in a net by the words of your mouth, the sayings of your lips have overcome you.
target: I tawngka chhuakah i awk a, I tawngka chhuakin a man che a ni:

source: I hate dogs
target: Uite ka hua

source: Then they made the king a prisoner and took him up to the king of Babylon to Riblah in the land of Hamath to be judged.
target: Tichuan Zedekia chu an an a, Babulon lal hnênah Hamath rama Riblah khuaah chuan an kalpui ta a; tin, anin a chung thu a rel a.

source: I'm not safe
target: Ka him lo

source: A man of good faith will have great blessing, but one attempting to get wealth quickly will not go free from punishment.
target: Mi rinawm chuan malsawmna a ngah ang a, Hausak thuai tum erawh chu hrem lohvin a chhuak lo vang.

source: I said I'd go.
target: Ka kal ang ka ti.

source: Was it important?
target: A pawimawh em?

source: He said Hi to me
target: Ani chuan Hi min ti a

source: And he sent stones at David and at all the king's servants and at all the people and at all the men of war by his side, on the right hand and on the left.
target: Davida chu lungin a deng a, lal Davida chhiahhlawh zawng zawngte pawh: tinmipui zawng zawng leh sipai huaisen zawng zawngte chu a ding lamah leh a vei lamah an awm a.

source: I don't deserve this.
target: Hei hi ka phu lo.

source: Then Simon Peter gave this answer: Lord, to whom are we to go? you have the words of eternal life;
target: Tin, Simon Peteran a hnenah, Lalpa, tu hnenah nge kan kal ang? Nangin chatuana nunna thu i nei alawm.

source: You never showed up.
target: I inlan ngai lo.

source: And Jehoiada made an agreement between the Lord and the king and the people, that they would be the Lord's people; and in the same way between the king and the people.
target: tin, Jehoiada chuan LALPA leh lal leh mipuite karah chuan LALPA mie an lo nihna tûr thu a thlung ta a; lal leh mipuite karah pawh.

source: You will give them their reward, O Lord, answering to the work of their hands.
target: A w LALPA, an kut hnathawhte ang zêlin nang chuan i thungrûl ang.

source: We have become as those who were never ruled by you, on whom your name was not named.
target: An chunga ro i rêl ngai lohte ang a,i hming pu ngai lote ang chu kan lo ni t.

source: And he went in to Hagar and she became with child, and when she saw that she was with child, she no longer had any respect for her master's wife.
target: Tin, Hagari chu a lo pâwl a; tin, ani chu a rai ta a: tin, a rai tih a inhriat veleh a pi chu a lo hmusit ta mai a.

source: What is the cause of wars and fighting among you? is it not in your desires which are at war in your bodies?
target: In zinga indona leh inhnialnate hi khawi atanga lo chhuak nge ni? In taksa pengahte indona siam thintu, in duhzawng atangte chuan lo chhuak a ni lo vem ni?

source: The chiefs of Zoan have become foolish, the chiefs of Noph are tricked, the heads of her tribes are the cause of Egypt's wandering out of the way.
target: Zoan khua ami liante chu mi â an lo ni ta a, Noph khuaa mi liante chu bumin an awm ta; Aigupta hnamho kila lungte chuan Aigupta-ho chu an vah botir ta.

source: Till I have got a place for the Lord, a resting-place for the great God of Jacob.
target: LALPA tan hmun, Jakoba Pathian chak tan, In ka zawn chhuah hma loh chuan.

source: He is not a bad person.
target: Mi sual a ni lo.

source: Did you send them?
target: I rawn tir em?

source: And answering Saul, Jonathan said, He made a request to me that he might go to Beth-lehem,
target: Tin, Jonathana chuan Saula chu a chhâng a, Davida chuan Bethlehem a kal mi dil ngawih ngawih a,

source: I'm a member
target: Member ka ni

source: I have four children.
target: Fa pali ka nei a.

source: I made it up.
target: Ka siamṭha thei e.

source: So let no one take pride in men. For all things are yours;
target: Chuvangin tuman mihringte chhuang suh se. Engkim hi in ta a ni vek si a;

source: So that I may make clear all your praise in the house of the daughter of Zion: I will be glad because of your salvation.
target: Nangmah fakna zawng zawng chu ka hriattir theihna tûrin; Zion fanu kawngkaahte chuan, I mi chhandamnaah hian ka hlim ang.

source: Their wisdom is a crown to the wise, but their foolish behaviour is round the head of the unwise.
target: Mi fing lallukhum chu a sum ani a, Mi âte âtna chu âtna ngawt a ni.

source: Niue is a country.
target: Niue hi ram a ni.

source: Do not be glad, however, because you have power over spirits, but because your names are recorded in heaven.
target: Nimahsela ramhuaite in thu thuin an awm avang hian lawm suh u; vana in hming ziak a nih avangin lawm zawk rawh u, a ti a.

source: I turned the TV off.
target: TV chu ka off a.

source: Put it there
target: Khatah dah rawh

source: Shot ka la nei.
target: I still have a shot.

source: If then you are making an offering at the altar and there it comes to your mind that your brother has something against you,
target: Chutichuan, maicham bula i thilpek i hlan lai ngeia, i unauvin i chungah lungnih lohna a nei tih i hriat chhuah leh chuan,

source: I am free to do all things; but not all things are wise. I am free to do all things; but I will not let myself come under the power of any.
target: Thil engkim tih ka tan a thiang a, nimahsela thil engkim tih a tha kher lo; thil engkim tih ka tan a thiang a, nimahsela eng bawihah mah ka inphal lo.

source: Tom's thirty
target: Tom chu kum 30 a ni

source: And for this cause my heart was glad and my tongue full of joy, and my flesh will be resting in hope:
target: Chuvangin ka thinlung a hlim a, Ka lei pawh a lawm a; Chuvangin ka tisa pawh beisei takin a awm bawk ang.

source: We aren't disappointed
target: Kan beidawng lo

source: His mouth is full of cursing and deceit and false words: under his tongue are evil purposes and dark thoughts.
target: A ka chu ânchhe lawhnana te, tihderna te, tihduhdahnatein a khar a: A lei hnuaiah chuan thil tihsualna leh khawlohna aw a.

source: We're pretty busy
target: Kan buai hle mai

source: And I will give my decision against them on account of all their evil-doing; because they have given me up, burning perfumes to other gods and worshipping the works of their hands.
target: Mi kalsan a, pathian dangte hnênah rimtui an hâl a, anmahni kut chhuak ngei an bia a; hêng an suahsualna zawng zawng chungchânga ka thu rêlte chu ka puang ang.

source: We obeyed the rules.
target: Dan kan zawm a.

source: For he has said in our hearing that this Jesus of Nazareth will put this place to destruction and make changes in the rules which were handed down to us by Moses.
target: he Nazaret Isua hian he in hi a thiat ang a, Mosia dan min pekte kha a tidanglam dawn tih a sawi kan hria, an ti a.

source: Because by one offering he has made complete for ever those who are made holy.
target: Thil hlan pakhat chauhvin tihthianghlim tawhte chu chatuan atan a tifamkim tawh si a.

source: Wear a blue dress.
target: Kawr dum ha rawh.

source: They are having a chat
target: An inbiak a

source: You'll get the hang of it.
target: I hang a ni ang.

source: Till I come, give attention to the reading of the holy Writings, to comforting the saints, and to teaching.
target: Ka lo kal hma loh zawng chhiar te, thu hrilh te, zirtir te bei uar rawh.

source: I am ashamed.
target: Ka zak e.

source: Or to give attention to stories and long lists of generations, from which come questionings and doubts, in place of God's ordered way of life which is in faith;
target: Thawnthu mai mai leh thlahtute hming chhui sen loh chhui bansan rawh se; chung chuan rinnaa Pathian lama intihsawtna thlen lovin inhnialna mai mai a thlen zawk si a.

source: Then Jacob was by himself; and a man was fighting with him till dawn.
target: Tin, Jakoba chu amah chauhvin a awm ta a; tin, mi pakhatin ani chu khawfîng chah thlengin a buan a buan a.

source: I'm not washing your car.
target: I car ka sil lo.

source: Can we sing?
target: Kan zai thei em?

source: I cannot stop her
target: Ka dang thei lo

source: Give me wisdom, so that I may keep your law; going after it with all my heart.
target: Hriat thiamna mi pe ang hche, tichuan i dan chu ka vawng tha dawn nia; A ni, ka thinlung zawng zawng hian ka zawm ang.

source: When it was full, they took it up on the sands; and seated there they put the good into vessels, but the bad they put away.
target: Chu chu a khah veleh a kamah an hnuk chhuak a; tin, an thu a, a tha zawng chu bawmah an la khawm a, a chhia erawh chu an paih a.

source: Even as the Son of man did not come to have servants, but to be a servant, and to give his life for the salvation of men.
target: Mihring Fapa hi rawngbawlsaka awm turin a lo kal lo va, rawngbawl tur leh mi tam tak tlan nana a nun pe tur zawka a lo kal ang khan, a ti a.

source: Are you afraid of her
target: Amah chu i hlau em

source: She gained weight
target: A thau ta hle mai

source: After him Amasiah, the son of Zichri, who freely gave himself to the Lord, and with him two hundred thousand men of war;
target: tin, a dawt lehtu Zikria fapa Amasia chu inphal taka LALPA tana inpein, mi chak huaisen nuaihnih a ho va;

source: It was black
target: A dum a nia

source: And Judah will be the Lord's heritage in the holy land, and Jerusalem will again be his.
target: Tin, LALPA chuan ram thianghlima a chanvo atân Juda chu a rochung ang a, Jerusalem chu a la thlang ang.

source: But they themselves are not to go in to see the holy place, even for a minute, for fear of death.
target: amaherawhchu thil thianghlim en turin rei lo te pawh lut suh se, an luh chuan an thi ang, tiin.

source: Try it again, Tom.
target: Tih leh teh, Tom.

source: Let's just listen
target: Ngaithla mai ila

source: I'm right
target: Ka dik zâwk

source: You put their feet where there was danger of slipping, so that they go down into destruction.
target: Anni chu hmun nal takahte i dah ngei a: Chhiatnaahte i paihthla thin a.

source: A copy of the writing, to be made public in every part of the kingdom, was sent out to all the peoples, so that they might be ready when that day came.
target: Chu mi atâna lo inpeih diam tûrin chu mi thupêk chu ram then tina pêk hnam tin hnêna puan tûrin chu mi lehkha chu an thawh a.

source: And in those days I saw the Jews who were married to women of Ashdod and Ammon and Moab:
target: Chung lai chuan Juda mi, Asdod hmeichhia te, Amon hmeichhia te, Moab hmeichhiate nupuia neite chu ka hmu a:

source: But when the people were sent out, he went in and took her by the hand; and the girl got up.
target: Nimahsela, mipui chu an hnawh chhuah hnu chuan a lut a, a kutah a chelh a, naupang chu a lo tho ta a.

source: Now this Hagar is the mountain Sinai in Arabia, and is the image of the Jerusalem which now is: which is a servant with her children.
target: Tin, Hagari hi Arabia rama Sinai Tlang chu a ni a, Jerusalem tun laia awm nen hian ang khat an ni, a fate nen bawihah an awm si a.

source: Be on the watch, and make strong the rest of the things which are near to death; because as judged by me your works have not come up to God's measure.
target: Inveng la, i thil la neih thi lek lekte chu tinung leh rawh; i thiltihte reng ka Pathian mit tlung zovin ka hmu si lo.

source: In that day the Egyptians will be like women: and the land will be shaking with fear because of the waving of the Lord's hand stretched out over it.
target: Chu mi niah chuan Aigupta-ho chu hmeichheho ang an ni ang a: sipaihote LALPA kut thin chu an chunga a thin avângin an khurin an hlau vang.

source: Stand up and walk.
target: Ding la, kal rawh.

source: I consented to go.
target: Ka kal chu ka remti a.

source: For my soul is full of evils, and my life has come near to the underworld.
target: Ka nunna hi mangannatein a khat a, Ka nun hi Seol chu a rawn hnaih ta si a.

source: The sons of Merari: of Jaaziah, Shoham and Zaccur and Ibri.
target: Meraria thlahte chu Jaazia lakah Benoa te, Sohama te, Zakura te, Ibria te an ni.

source: And all his friends and the women who came with him from Galilee, were waiting at a distance, watching these things.
target: Tin, a hmelhriatte zawng zawng leh hmeichhia Galili ram atanga rawn zuite chu, chung thil chu thlirin hla takah an ding a.

source: See, the rulers of Israel, every one in his family, have been causing death in you.
target: Ngai rawh, Israel hotute mi tinin an thiltihtheihna ang zela tihsen chuah mai tûrin nangmahah an awm a ni.

source: From Mount Halak, which goes up to Seir, as far as Baal-gad in the valley of Lebanon under Mount Hermon: and all their kings he overcame and put to death.
target: Seir tlang han sutu Halak tlang atanga Hermon tlang hnuaia Lebon ruama Baalgad thlengin; an lal zawng zawngte chu a man a, a that a, a tihlum a.

source: We're not dressed
target: Kan inchei lo

source: Even as it is said, I had love for Jacob, but for Esau I had hate.
target: Thil siam zawng zawngte chuan beisei em emin, Pathian fate lo lanna chu an nghakhlel hle si.

source: I do not pay their wages
target: An hlawh ka pe lo

source: He bought a VIP pass.
target: VIP pass a lei a.

source: The word which the Lord said to Jeremiah the prophet, of how Nebuchadrezzar, king of Babylon, would come and make war on the land of Egypt.
target: Nebukadnezzara, Babulon lal a lo kal a, Aigupta ram a rawn nghaisak tûrzia thu LALPAN zâwlnei Jeremia hnêna a sawi chu:

source: The Passover offering, from your flock or your herd, is to be given to the Lord your God in the place marked out by him as the resting-place of his name.
target: LALPAN a hming awmna a la ruat turah chuan LALPA in Pathian hnenah in beram rual zinga mi leh ran rual zinga miin Kalhlen Kûtah in inthawi tur a ni.

source: These were heads of families of the Levites in their generations, chief men; they were living at Jerusalem.
target: Chungte chu anmahni chhuan zawng zawnga htou, Levi-ho chhûngkaw puipate an ni a, Jerusalem-a awm an ni.

source: Do you want to learn or not?
target: Zir i duh em?

source: For the Lord has taken Jacob for himself, and Israel for his property.
target: LALPA chuan Jakob-ho hi ama tan a thlang si a, Israel-ho hi a ro bik atân a thlang bawk a.

source: For I am not conscious of any wrong in myself; but this does not make me clear, for it is the Lord who is my judge.
target: Engmah indemna ka inhre si lo va; nimahsela chu chuanin thiam mi chantir chuang lo; mi fiahtu chu Lalpa a ni zawk.

source: I don't date
target: Ka chhai lo

source: I've completely recovered.
target: Ka dam vek tawh.

source: Don't be ashamed of yourself.
target: Mahni in zak suh.

source: We know them
target: Anmahni kan hria

source: Whose support is cut off, and whose hope is no stronger than a spider's thread.
target: A innghahna chu achim darh ang a, A rinchhan chu maimaw ril mai a ni.

source: Nothing had moved
target: Engmah a la che lo

source: Like the waste from his body he comes to an end for ever: those who have seen him say, Where is he?
target: Ama zun ek angin a boral vang vang ang: Amah hmu tawhte chuan, Khawiah nge a awm tak? an ti ang.

source: And put his finger in the blood, shaking drops of the blood seven times before the Lord in front of the veil.
target: tin, puithiamin thisenah chuan a kut zungtang a chiah ang a, puanzar bulah LALPA hmaah vawisarih a theh tur a ni.

source: Talk to me!
target: Ka hnênah sawi rawh!

source: Are you afraid of death
target: Thihna i hlau em

source: His tail is curving like a cedar; the muscles of his legs are joined together.
target: Sidar angin a mei a tikhauh va, A malpui thate chu a phiar tlat mai.

source: It's easy.
target: A awlsam.

source: I feel ready
target: Ka inpeih e

source: I'm unharmed
target: Tih nat ka ni lo

source: Stand up!
target: Ding rawh!

source: Then again she became with child and gave birth to Abel, his brother. And Abel was a keeper of sheep, but Cain was a farmer.
target: Tin, a nau Abela a rawn hring leh a. Tin, Abela chu berâm vêngtuah a awm a, Kaina erawh chu lei leituah a awm.

source: If the bases are broken down, what is the upright man to do?
target: Lungphûmte chu tihchhiata a awm chuan, Mi felin eng nge a tih theih ang? in tih ni?

source: Sami was present
target: Sami a tel a ni

source: Don't attach it to your head.
target: I lu-ah dah suh.

source: I was very happy about it.
target: Ka lawm hle mai.

source: And you have not given me into the hand of my hater; you have put my feet in a wide place.
target: Tin, mi dotu kutah nangin mi khung lo va; Ka ke hi hmun thawl takah i nghat ta zawk a.

source: And he did great things, and overcame the Amalekites, and made Israel safe from the hands of their attackers.
target: Huai takin a bei a, Amelek mite chu a hneh a, Israel-ho chu anmahni rawktute kut ata a chhanchhuak a ni.

source: It's so uncomfortable.
target: A nuam lo lutuk.

source: Nearest to him will be the tribe of Asher, with Pagiel, the son of Ochran, as their chief.
target: Tin, a dawta puan in zar tur chu Aser chi an ni ang: Asera thlahte puipa tur chu Okrana fapa Pangiela a ni ang:

source: And the burning sand will become a pool, and the dry earth springs of waters: the fields where the sheep take their food will become wet land, and water-plants will take the place of grass.
target: Tichuan tiau dip sa tak hmun chu dilah a chang ang a, lei tuihal tak chu tuihnaahte a chang ang: sihalte chenna an mutnaah chuan, hlobet, phairuang leh phungladin nên a awm ang.

source: Let's quit
target: Bansan ang

source: For I have not said it on my authority, but the Father who sent me gave me orders what to say and how to say it.
target: Keimaha phuahchawpin ka sawi si lo; Pa mi tirtu chuan ka sawi tur leh ka hrilh tur hi thu mi pe zawk a ni.

source: I approved it
target: Ka lo pawmsak

source: Make your work clear to your servants, and your glory to their children.
target: I hnathawh chu i chhiahhlawhte hnênah lang sela, I ropuina chu an fate hnênah lang rawh se.

source: I want to compete again.
target: Inel leh ka duh.

source: We'll work
target: Kan thawk ang

source: For I will take you out from among the nations, and get you together from all the countries, and take you into your land.
target: Hnamte zing ata ka hruaichhuak ang che u a, ram zawng zawng ata ka khwm ang che u a, in ram ngeiah ka hruai lut dawn si che u a.

source: I fought against sleep.
target: Mut chu ka do a.

source: Those who go to her do not come back again; their feet do not keep in the ways of life:
target: A hnêna kal rêng rêng chu an kir leh tawh ngia lo va, Nunna kawng an pawh ngai hek lo;

source: You'll be OK
target: I ṭha dawn

source: And they all took of the food and had enough: and they took up twelve baskets full of broken bits which were not used.
target: Tin, an vaiin an ei a, an puar ta hlawm a; an ei bang nawi pawh chu bawmrang sawm leh pahnih an rut khat a.

source: For because you did not take it at the first, the Lord our God sent punishment on us, because we did not get directions from him in the right way.
target: Atirah pawh kahn nangnin in zawn loh avângin LALPA kan Pathianc ukan chungah a tuan anih kha, thupêk angin kan lo ti ta lo va ni, a ti a.

source: See, I have made you small among the nations: you are much looked down on.
target: Ngai teh, hnamte zingah ka titê tawh che a ni: nasa taka hmusitin i awm ta.

source: All those who are Israelites by birth are to do these things in this way, when giving an offering made by fire of a sweet smell to the Lord.
target: chumi rama piang zawng zawng chuan hetian gzel hian LALPA tana rimtui meia thihlan an hlan hunin an ti tur a ni.

source: The daisy is white
target: Daisy chu a var a

source: He was shining like the light; he had rays coming out from his hand: there his power was kept secret.
target: A tlêtzia chu êng ang mai a ni a; A kut ațangin êng zâm a lo chhuak a, Chutah chuan a thiltihtheihna inthupin a awm.

source: In those days they will no longer say, The fathers have been tasting bitter grapes and the children's teeth are put on edge.
target: Chung niahte chuan, 'Paten grêp thur an ei a, an fate ha a tim e' an ti tawh ngai lo vang.

source: It was short-lived.
target: A rei lo hle a ni.

source: Tom is odd
target: Tom a danglam

source: Because much talk comes from dreams and things of no purpose. But let the fear of God be in you.
target: Mumang a tam poh leh thu lawilo a tam a ni si a, Pathian chu tih zawk rawh.

source: I think you're strong enough.
target: I chak tawk ka ti.

source: Are you still on a diet?
target: Diet i la nei em?

source: Dress warmly
target: Inthuam lum rawh

source: A light of revelation to the Gentiles, and the glory of your people Israel.
target: Jentailte hnena i eng puang chhuak tur leh I mi Israelte ropuina tur chu, a ti a.

source: Truly, God is great, greater than all our knowledge; the number of his years may not be searched out.
target: Ngai rawh, Pathian chu a ropui e, kan lo hre lo pawh a: A kum zatte chu zawn chhuah rual a ni lo.

source: They left
target: An kal tawh

source: I was most disconcerted.
target: Ka buai ber a ni.

source: For their rock is not like our Rock, even our haters themselves being judges.
target: An lungpui chu kan lungpui ang a ni si lo, Kan hmêlmate ngei ngaih dan pawhin,

source: And Shechem said to her father and her brothers, If you will give ear to my request, whatever you say I will give to you.
target: Tin, Sekema chuan nula pa leh a nutate hnênah, Mi khawngaih rawh u, ka hnêna in sawi apiang ka pe zêl ang che u.

source: When I was in the Temple with you every day, your hands were not stretched out against me: but this is your hour, and the authority of the dark power.
target: Pathian biak ina in hnena ni tin ka awm laite khan mi man tumin mi ban si lo va; nimahsela tun hi in chet hun a ni e, thim thu neihna nen, a ti a.

source: She will be a place for the stretching out of nets in the middle of the sea; for I have said it, says the Lord: and her goods will be given over to the nations.
target: Tuipui laia lên pho rona hmun a ni mai ang, keiman ka sawi tawh si a, tih hi LALPA PATHIAN thu chhuak a ni: tichuan hnamte tan râllâk a ni mai ang.

source: And see that you make them from the design which you saw on the mountain.
target: Tichuan tlânga a lem ka entîr ang chiah che khân engkim I siam tûr a ni tih hre reng rawh khai.

source: And any leather seat on a horse on which the unclean man has been seated will be unclean.
target: Chuanna engpawhah thil pûta chu a chuan chuan a bawlhhlawh ang.

source: We are victorious
target: Hnehtu kan ni

source: I started dancing
target: Ka zai tâna

source: I've been threatened
target: Ka vau tawh a ni

source: And Moses said, Make your meal today of what you have, for this day is a Sabbath to the Lord: today you will not get any in the fields.
target: Tichuan Mosian, Vawiin chuan hei hi ei rawh u; vawiin hi LALPA tân chawlhni a nih hi: vawiinah zawng leia tla in hmu lo vang.

source: You can't
target: I thei lo

source: And the side-rooms, room over room, were three times thirty; there were inlets in the wall of the house for the side-rooms round about, for supports in the wall of the house.
target: A vêla sîr pindante tana bang an siam chu rinchhanin, a in pui chu rinchhan lovin, in pui bang nghêng lovin chu lam chu a nghêng zâwk a.

source: Keep your tongue from evil, and your lips from words of deceit.
target: I lei chu sual lakah veng tha la, I hmui chu tihderna thu sawi lo tûrin veng tha rawh.

source: And not joined to the Head, from whom all the body, being given strength and kept together through its joins and bands, has its growth with the increase of God.
target: Lu atang chuan taksa pum pui bung hrang hrang inzawm khawm chu a chawm a ni a, Pathian duhzawng ang zelin a thang lian thin a ni.

source: See, the things said before have come about, and now I give word of new things: before they come I give you news of them.
target: Ngai teh u, tun hma thilte chu a lo thleng ta, thil țharte ka sawi a nih hi: a țiah hmain a chanchin ka hrilh che u a nih hi.

source: I've been betrayed
target: Ka phatsan tawh

source: There were witnesses
target: Thuhretu an awm a

source: But now, O Lord, you are our father; we are the earth, and you are our maker; and we are all the work of your hand.
target: Tunah erawh chuan, aw LALPA nang chu kan pa i ni a; keini hi bellei kan ni a, nang min vawtu i ni; tichuan kan za hian i kut chhuak kan ni.

source: And put the table inside, placing all the things on it in order; and put in the support for the lights, and let its lights be burning.
target: Tin, dawhkan kha la lutin, a chua thil awmte chu i dah fel tur a ni; khawnvar dahna kha la lutin, a khawnvarte chu i dah tur a ni.

source: Even as the witness of the Christ has been made certain among you:
target: chutiangin Krista thu ka hriattir chu nangmahniah tihngheha a awm kha;

source: I wear a wig.
target: Sam lem ka vuah.

source: See, its blood was not taken into the holy place: certainly it was right for you to have taken it as food in the holy place, as I gave orders.
target: Ngaiteh u, a thisen chu hmun thianghlimah in la lut hlei nem: thu ka pêk ang khan hmun thianghlimah chuan in ei ngei ngei tur a ni asin, tiin.

source: Beryls and stones of value to be put on the ephod and on the priest's bag.
target: puithiam kawr leh kawr âwma zeh tûrin onukion-te leh lunghlute nên.

source: I fell back asleep
target: Ka mu leh ta a

source: And if a son of peace is there, your peace will be with him: but if not, it will come back to you again.
target: Tin, chutah chuan thlamuan fa a awm chuan in thlamuanna thu chu a chungah a awm reng ang; a awm loh erawh chuan in chungah a lo kir leh ang.

source: I wasn't bluffing
target: Ka bluff lo a ni

source: For your information.
target: I hriat duh tan.

source: Have no love for the world or for the things which are in the world. If any man has love for the world, the love of the Father is not in him.
target: Khawvel hi hmangaih su ula, khawvela thil awmte pawh hi hmangaih hek suh u. Mi tupawhin khawvel hi a hmangaih chuan Pa a hmangaihna amahah a awm lo.

source: Why then is death to be our fate? For if the voice of the Lord our God comes to us any more, death will overtake us, and we will be burned up in this great fire.
target: chuvangin engah nge kan thih ang? He mi mei nasa tak hian min kangral mai ang asin; LALPA kan Pathian aw chu kan hriat leh chuan ka thi mai ang.

source: For I have taken this house for myself and made it holy, so that my name may be there for ever; and my eyes and my heart will be there at all times.
target: Chutah chuan ka hming kumkhuaa a awm theih nân he in hi ka ruat a, ka tithianghlim tawh a ni: chutah chuan ka mit leh ka thinlung a awm kumkhua tawh ang.

source: For the man who has not these things is blind, seeing only what is near, having no memory of how he was made clean from his old sins.
target: Tupawh chung thil nei lo chu mitdel a ni a, hnai tea mi chauh a hmu thei a, a hman lai sualte tlenfaisakna chu a theihnghilh ta si a.

source: We're hiding
target: Kan biru

source: Early in the morning he came across his brother and said to him, We have made discovery! It is the Messiah! (which is to say, the Christ.
target: Ani chuan a hmasa berin ama unau Simona a hmu a, a hnenah, Messia kan hmu ta, a ti a chu chu Krista tihna a ni.

source: The man whose words come from himself is looking for glory for himself, but he who is looking for the glory of him who sent him--that man is true and there is no evil in him.
target: Tupawh mahni phuahchawp thu sawi chu, mahni mawina zawng a ni; a tirtu mawina zawng erawh chu, chu mi chu mi tak zet a ni, amahah chuan dik lohna reng a awm lo.

source: Then the men in authority over the thousands of the army, the captains of thousands and captains of hundreds, came to Moses,
target: Tin, sipaite chunga hotu te, za chunga hotu te chuan Mosia an va hnaih a.

source: He's skinny
target: A cher lûtuk

source: He will say I see
target: Ani chuan Ka hmu e

source: It's a dog's life.
target: Ui nun a ni.

source: Who's it for?
target: Tu tân nge?

source: Will a lion give his loud cry in the woodland when no food is there? will the voice of the young lion be sounding from his hole if he has taken nothing?
target: Sakeibakneiin ngawah sa aman lai loh chuan, a rûm ngai em ni? Sakeibaknei vânglaiin engmah a man loh chuan, a pûk ata a rûm ang em ni?

source: A blessing be on him who comes in the name of the Lord; we give you blessing from the house of the Lord.
target: LALPA hminga lo kal chu a eng a thawl e: LALPA in atang hian mal kan sawm che u a ni.

source: I'm not afraid of her anymore.
target: Ka hlau tawh lo.

source: We'll sing
target: Kan sa ang

source: And David took these words to heart, fearing Achish, the king of Gath.
target: Tin, Davida chuan chung thute chu a rilruah apai ta a, Gath lal Akisa chu ahlau ta hle mai a.

source: I quit school.
target: Sikul ka bânsan.

source: I can't ask her.
target: Ka zâwt thei lo.

source: Sami isn't crazy
target: Sami hi a â lo

source: I hate rain
target: Ruah ka hua

source: And because of you I am glad I was not there, so that you may have faith; but let us go to him.
target: Chuta ka awm lo chu ka lawmsak a che u, in rin theih nan; nimahsela a hnenah i kal ang u, a ti a.

source: Let's go.
target: Kal ang.

source: And when everything was gone, there was no food to be had in that country, and he was in need.
target: Tin, a dehral zawh veleh, chu khaw lamah chuan tam nasa tak mai a lo tla a; ei tur a lo tlachham ta a.

source: Yes, madam
target: Awle ka pi

source: When the sinners come up like the grass, and all the workers of evil do well for themselves, it is so that their end may be eternal destruction.
target: Mi suaksualte hlobet anga an lo chawr a, Thil tisualtute zawng zawng an lo duah hluah hluah hian, Kumkhua atâna tihboralin an awm dawn a lo ni thin, tih hi:

source: I'm getting better
target: Ka dam chho zel a

source: You're going to be seen.
target: I hmu dawn nia.

source: I'm grieving
target: Ka sûn mêk

source: It was a cool day
target: Ni lum tak a ni

source: And we said to him, We are true men, we have no evil designs;
target: Tin, keini chuan a hnênah, 'Mi dik tak kan ni; enthlatu kan ni awzâwng lo ve:

source: Take away, then, his talent and give it to him who has the ten talents.
target: Tichuan, a talent khat kha laksak ula, talent sawm neitu hnenah pe rawh u.

source: The deep places of the earth are in his hand; and the tops of the mountains are his.
target: Ama kutah chuan lei hmun thuk takte chu a awm a; Tlâng chhip sâng takte chu a ta a ni b awk a.

source: I'll drive
target: Ka lo khalh ang

source: You don't smile very often.
target: I nui vak vak lo.

source: Is it a cat or a dog?
target: Ui nge ui?

source: You'll win for sure.
target: I chak ngei ang.

source: He who gives a man a death-blow is himself to be put to death.
target: Tupawhin mi lo vua sela, chu mi chu thi ta sela, tihhlum ve ngei ngei tûr a ni.

source: Is the field fertile?
target: Lo chu a tha em?

source: Hang up the phone.
target: Phone chu dah la.

source: Now the husband was a long time in coming, and they all went to sleep.
target: Tin, mo neitu chu a lo kal har avangin an zain an muthlu a, an lo muhil ta a.

source: And you I will take, and you will be king over Israel, ruling over whatever is the desire of your soul.
target: Nang hi ka ruat ang chia, i duh ang angin ro i rel ang a, Israelte lalah i awm ang.

source: And they gave an account of the things which had taken place on the way, and how, when he gave them bread, they had knowledge of him.
target: Tin, anni pawhin kalkawnga thil lo thleng leh, chhang a phel a, a hmel an lo hriat takziate chu an hrilh ve bawk a.

source: Now in the morning when he was coming back to the town, he had a desire for food.
target: Tin, zingah khawpui lama a kir leh laiin a ril a lo tam ta a.

source: You will be washed.
target: I silfai ang.

source: Be certain that the Lord is God; it is he who has made us, and we are his; we are his people, and the sheep to whom he gives food.
target: LALPA chu Pathian ani tih hre rawh u: Min siamtu chu amah chu ani a, ama ta kan ni. A mit leh a ran tlatna hmuna berâmhote chu kan ni.

source: Try to focus
target: Ngaihven rawh

source: It's too low
target: A hniam lûtuk

source: You can't possibly win.
target: I chak thei lo.

source: But Peter said to him, Though the others may be turned away from you, I will not.
target: Petera erawh chuan a hnenah, An zain lungni lovin awm mah sela, kei zawng ka awm lo vang, a ti a.

source: How could that be
target: Engtin nge chu chu a nih theih

source: So Zadok and Abiathar took the ark of God back to Jerusalem, and did not go away from there.
target: Chutichuan Zadoka leh Abiathara chuan Pathian bâwm chu Jerusalemah an kalpui leh a; tin, chutah chuan an awm ta a.

source: Mary is a florist
target: Mary hi pangpar zuar a ni

source: I'm worn out
target: Ka hachhe vek

source: And the vision was so overpowering that even Moses said, I am shaking and full of fear.
target: an thil hmuh pawh chu a hlauhawm em em a, chutichuan Mosian, Ka hlauvin ka khur nasa em em a, a tih hial kha

source: What is plausible
target: Eng nge rintlak

source: Now Isaac's servants made holes in the valley, and came to a spring of flowing water.
target: Tin, Isaaka chhiahhlawhten ruamah chuan an lai a, chutah chuan tuichhunchhuah hna nei an hmu ta hlauh va.

source: Who's buying
target: Tunge lei dâwn

source: But Israel, going after a law of righteousness, did not get it.
target: Then suh e, chung zawng zawngah chuan min hmangaihtu avang chuan, ropui taka ngamtu kan ni.

source: I'm not heating your house.
target: I in ka lum lo.

source: The evil man goes running away when no man is after him, but the upright are without fear, like the lion.
target: Mi suaksualte chu tuma um lohvin an tlânchhia a, Mi felte erawh chu sakeibaknei angin an huai.

source: But when the disciples came round him, he got up and went into the town: and the day after he went away with Barnabas to Derbe.
target: Nimahsela zirtirhote chu a vela an din laiin, a lo tho va, khuaah chuan a lut leh ta a. Tin, atukah chuan Barnaba nen Derbe khuaah an kal ta a.

source: They will kill me.
target: Min that ang.

source: He made me free from my strong hater, from those who were against me, because they were stronger than I.
target: Mi dotu chak tak lakah chuan mi chhanhim a, Mi hawtute lakah pawh; kei atân chuan an chak lutuk si a.

source: I said stop
target: Ding rawh ka ti

source: Abram was eighty-six years old when Hagar gave birth to Ishmael.
target: Tin, Hagarin Abrama tân Ismaela chu a hrin lai chuan Abrama chu kum 86 mi a ni a.

source: Is Tom shy?
target: Tom a zakzum em?

source: Some put their faith in carriages and some in horses; but we will be strong in the name of the Lord our God.
target: Thenkhatin tawlailirte an ring a, thenkhatin sakawrte an ring. Keini erawh chuan LALPA kan Pathian hming chu kan lam zawk ang.

source: We talk about everything.
target: Engkim kan sawi a.

source: I burped
target: Ka irhfiak

source: I always said no.
target: Ka lo ti fo thin.

source: But what answer does God make to him? I have still seven thousand men whose knees have not been bent to Baal.
target: Nimahsela Pathianin engtin nge a chhan? Baala hmaa thingthi ngai lo mi sangsarih keimah atan ka la zuah reng a ni, tiin a chhang a.

source: You are not to take a wife for yourself or have sons or daughters in this place.
target: Nupui i nei tûr a ni lo va, he hmunah hian fanu fapate pawh i nei tûr a ni hek lo, tiin.

source: Of the first of your rough meal you are to give a cake for a lifted offering, lifting it up before the Lord as the offering of the grain-floor is lifted up.
target: In chhang hmeh hmasak ber zinga mi hlawm khat chu then thilhlanah in hlan tur a ni: hruiha mi then thilhlanah in then angin in then tur a ni.

source: And the other wife did everything possible to make her unhappy, because the Lord had not let her have children;
target: Fa a neih theih loh avânga a lungngaihna tizual tûrin amah ertu Penini chuan a lo deuhsawh thin a.

source: I love Mary
target: Mary ka hmangaih

source: He did what was right in the eyes of the Lord, walking in the ways of David his father, without turning to the right hand or to the left.
target: Tin, LALPA mithmuha thil fel tak a ti thin a, a pu Davida kawng zawh zawng zawng chu a zawh ve a, ding lamah emaw vei lamah emaw a pensan lo va.

source: Will anyone take him when he is on the watch, or put metal teeth through his nose?
target: A inralrin laiin miin an man thei êm ni? A hnarah an thil thei ang êm ni.

source: That night the king was unable to get any sleep; and he sent for the books of the records; and while some one was reading them to the king,
target: Chu mi zan chuan lal chu a muhil thei lo va; lal chanchin ziakna bu rawn la tûrin thu a pe a, a hmaah chuan an chhiar a.

source: Tom saw it
target: Tom'an a hmu

source: But Jesus did not have faith in them, because he had knowledge of them all.
target: Nimahsela Isua chu an lakah a ngampa lo, mi zawng zawng a hriata,

source: So in the morning I was teaching the people and in the evening death took my wife; and in the morning I did what I had been ordered to do.
target: Chitichuan zinglamah chuan mipuite hnênah thu ka sawi a, tlai lamah chuan ka nupui a thi ta mai a; tin, zinglamah chuan thu mi pêk ang chuan ka ti a.

source: Does your arm hurt?
target: I kut a na em?

source: Because my desire is for mercy and not offerings; for the knowledge of God more than for burned offerings.
target: Inthawina duh lovin khawngaihna ka duh si a; hâlral thilhlan aite chuan Pathian hriatna ka duh zawk a ni.

source: I made a face
target: Hmainka siam

source: There's nothing the matter.
target: Engmah a awm lo.

source: Do you think she hates me?
target: Min hua i ti em?

source: Shut it down
target: Titawp rawh

source: I'm taking her for a walk.
target: Ka hruai kual a.

source: From earth level up to the windows there were winged ones and palm-trees pictured on the wall.
target: A chhuat ațngin kawngka chung thlengin cherub leh tûm thinga chei vek a ni; in pui bang chu chuti vek chu a ni.

source: And Zerah the Ethiopian, with an army of a million, and three hundred war-carriages, came out against them to Mareshah.
target: Tin, Ethiopia mi Zera, sipai maktaduai leh tawlailir zathum nen anmahni bei tûrin a lo thawk a; Maresa a lo thleng a.

source: Then the chiefs of Israel and the king made themselves low and said, The Lord is upright.
target: Chutichuan Israel-ho puipate leh lal chu an intihnuai a, LALPA chu a fel a ni, an ti a.

source: I can survive
target: Ka damchhuak thei

source: Check around
target: Enkual rawh

source: Because, as numbers of men became sinners through the wrongdoing of one man, even so will great numbers get righteousness through the keeping of the word of God by one man.
target: Mi pakhat tihmawh avang khan mi tam tak chu mi sual an lo ni ta a; chutiang bawkin mi pakhat a tihawih avang khan mi tam tak chu mi fel an lo ni ang.

source: Mary is a psychic
target: Mary hi psychic a ni a

source: I get you.
target: Ka tiam ngam che.

source: Aren't you guys having any fun?
target: In hlim lo em ni?

source: I almost fell
target: Ka tla ṭep

source: My hands are stretched out to you: my soul is turned to you, like a land in need of water. (Selah.
target: Ka kutte hi i lamah ka phar thin a: Ka nunna hi, ram chau tak angin, nangmahah a tuihal thin.

source: I am not yet taking food.
target: Chaw ka la ei lo.

source: I'm not folding their shirts
target: An kawr ka fold lo

source: But the Lord was angry with me because of you and would not give ear to my prayer; and the Lord said to me, Let it be enough, say no more about this thing.
target: Nimahsela nangmahni avangin ka chungah LALPA chu a thinur hle a, ka thu chu a pawm lo va; tichuan LALPA chuan, 'Tawk tawh rawh se, he thuah hian mi be leh tawh suh;

source: My feet hurt
target: Ka ke a na

source: Stay thin
target: Inti cher rawh

source: I think you're old enough.
target: I upa tawh ka ti.

source: You're being used
target: I hman mek a ni

source: In the day of his wrath kings will be wounded by the Lord at your right hand.
target: LALPA, i ding lama awm chuan A thinur niah chuan lalte a sat chhum rem rum ang.

source: I could walk.
target: Ka kal thei.

source: I swim.
target: Ka hleuh.

source: Let's kiss
target: Infawp ila

source: And they made an oath to the Lord, with a loud voice, sounding wind-instruments and horns.
target: Tin, LALPA hnênah aw ring takin, au rawlin tawtawrâwt ri nen, tawtawrâwt bi nei ri nen chhia an chham a.

source: Follow us
target: Min zui ru

source: Tom got shot
target: Tom chu kah a ni

source: For did you not make sport of Israel? was he taken among thieves? for whenever you were talking about him, you were shaking your head over him.
target: Israel chu i tan nuihzabur a ni tawh lawm ni kha? Rukhmang zingahte a tel êm ni? Ama chungchang i sawi apiangin i lu i thing si a.

source: Make clear to me what we are to say to him; we are unable to put our cause before him, because of the dark.
target: A hnêna ka sawi tûr chu min hriattir rawh le. Thimna avângin kan sawi thiam loh hi.

source: The curtains of Cushan were troubled, and the tents of Midian were shaking.
target: Kusan puan inte chu hreawm tuarin ka hmu a, Midian ram puanzârte chu an khûr a.

source: He succeeded
target: A hlawhtling ta

source: So the priests and the Levites took the weight of silver and gold and the vessels, to take them to Jerusalem into the house of our God.
target: Chutichuan puithiamte leh Levi chite chuan Jerusalem-a kan pathian ina ken tûrin tangkarua leh rangkachak leh bungbêl bungbêl bukte chu an la ta a.

source: I'm angry with you.
target: Ka thinrim a ni.

source: But you, my loved ones, keep in memory the words which were said before by the Apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ,
target: Nimahsela,duh takte u, nangni zawngin kan Lalpa Isua Krista tirhkohten thu an hrilh lawkte kha hre reng rawh u.

source: But you have put him away in disgust; you have been angry with the king of your selection.
target: Nimahsela nang chuan i thlauthlain i duh lo va, I hriak thiha chungah chuan i thin a rim ta a.

source: And he made clear to them all the things in the Writings, from Moses and from all the prophets, which had to do with himself.
target: Tin, Mosia leh zawlneite zawng zawng lehkhaah a tan a, Pathian Lehkha zawng zawnga ama chanchin ziak apiang chu anmahni a hrilhfiah zel a.

source: Their children in the third generation may come into the meeting of the Lord's people.
target: An thlahte chu chhuan thumna atnagin LALPA mite pungkhawm zingah chuan an tel tur a ni.

source: If he is taken away from his place, then it will say, I have not seen you.
target: A hmun ata tihbo a nihin, Ka hmu ngai lo che, tiin aphat ang.

source: So the responsible men and the chiefs who were in authority in his town, did as Jezebel had said in the letter she sent them.
target: Tin, a awmna khua ami, a awmna khuaa awm upate leh mi thate chuan Jezebelin an hnêna a thawn lehkhaa a ziak ang chuan an lo ti a.

source: And make the Levites come forward in front of the Tent of meeting, and let all the children of Israel come together:
target: Tin, Levi-hote chu inbiakna puan in bulah chuan hruai la, Israela thlahte mipui zawng zawng chu pun khawmtir vek rawh:

source: I got up late.
target: Ka tho tlai.

source: And the Ziphites came to Saul at Gibeah, and said, Is not David waiting secretly near us in the hill of Hachilah, before the waste land?
target: Tin, Ziph-ho chu Gibea-ah Saula hnênah an kal a, Davida chu thlaler dep Hakila tlângah chuan a biru a ni lâwm ni? tiin an va sawi a.

source: A voice is sounding on the open hilltops, the weeping and the prayers of the children of Israel; because their way is twisted, they have not kept the Lord their God in mind.
target: Tlâng kawlh vul chungah thawm a awm e, Israel fate țap leh thil ngen thawm chu, LALPA Pathian an theihnghilh a, An awm dan an tikhawloh zawh tak avângin.

source: I said, You are gods; all of you are the sons of the Most High:
target: Pathiante in ni a, In zain Chungnungbera fate in ni, ka tih kha.

source: And if I give all my goods to the poor, and if I give my body to be burned, but have not love, it is of no profit to me.
target: Tin, mi retheite chawm nan ka sum zawng zawng pe vek mah ila, ka taksa pawh kang turin inpe mah ila, hmangaihna ka neih si loh chuan ka tan engmah a sawt lo vang.

source: We have the cross
target: Kraws kan nei a

source: May the Lord be judge between me and you, and may the Lord give me my rights against you, but my hand will never be lifted up against you.
target: LALPAN nang nena kan chungthu hi rêl sela, tin, LALPA chuan i lakah phuba mi laksak rawh se; mahse kei chuan i chungah kut ka thlak lo rêng rêng ang.

source: If you were of the world, you would be loved by the world: but because you are not of the world, but I have taken you out of the world, you are hated by the world.
target: Nangni khawvela mi ni ula, khawvelin amaha mi a hmangaih tur; khawvela mi in ni si lo va, khawvela mi ka thlan chhuah zawk che u avang hian khawvelin a hua che u a ni e.

source: We're busy
target: Kan buai

source: But a blessing will be on King Solomon, and the kingdom of David will keep its place before the Lord for ever.
target: Lal Solomona erawh chu malsawmin a awm ang a. Davida lalthutthleng chu LALPA hmaa kumkhuaa tihngheh ani ang, a ti a.

source: She picked up the phone.
target: Phone chu a la a.

source: We have eaten eggs.
target: Egg kan ei tawh a.

source: That good-for-nothing persons have gone out from among you, turning the people of their town from the right way and saying, Let us go and give worship to other gods, of whom you have no knowledge;
target: in zing ata mi dukdak lo țhenkhat lo chhuak a, chu mi khawpuia mite chu in hriat ngai lo pathian dangte be turin an hruai bo tih thusawi in hriat chuan

source: They don't know that.
target: Chu chu an hre lo.

source: Now God is witness that the things which I am writing to you are true.
target: Ngai teh mah u! In hnena thu ka ziakte hi Pathian mithmuhah pawh ka daw lo ve.

source: But if not, they come to their end, and give up their breath without knowledge.
target: An pawisak loh erawh chuan khandaihin an boral ang a, Hriatna lovin an thi a ng

source: And the ark of the Lord was in the house of Obed-edom the Gittite for three months: and the Lord sent a blessing on Obed-edom and all his family.
target: Tin, LALPA bâwm chu Git mi Obed-edoma inah chuan thla thum a a awm a; tichuan Obed-edoma leh a chhûngte zawng zawng chu LALPAN mal a sawm a.

source: He may not go near any dead body or make himself unclean for his father or his mother;
target: mitthi ruang awmnaah chuan a lût tur a ni lo va, a a nu emaw a pa emaw avangin a intibawrhbang tur a ni hek lo;

source: And it came to the minds of the disciples that the Writings say, I am on fire with passion for your house.
target: Tin, I ina ka thahnemngaihin mi ei zo vang, tih ziak a ni tih, a zirtirte chuan an hre leh ta a.

source: So they took up stones to send at him: but Jesus got secretly out of their way and went out of the Temple.
target: Chutichuan a den nan lung an char a; nimahsela Isua a biru a, Pathian biak in ata chu a chhuak ta a.

source: I see them pretty often.
target: Ka hmu fo thin.

source: They didn't choose me.
target: Min thlang lo.

source: My arm hurts.
target: Ka bân ka tina.

source: For you have made your arched room at the top of every street, and your high place in every open place; though you were not like a loose woman in getting together your payment.
target: Kawtthlêr lu apianga chânna bûk i siamah te, kawtthlêr tina hmun langsâr i siamah te hian hlawh i ûm loh avângin nawhchizuar mai pawh i ni lo ve.

source: The chicken was dry
target: Vawk chu a vawt a

source: I leaned back
target: Ka inngheng a

source: I got shot.
target: Kah fuh ka ni.

source: And putting her forward, they said to him, Master, this woman has been taken in the very act of sinning against the married relation.
target: Isua hnenah, Zirtirtu, he hmeichhia hi a uire lai an man a ni, a uire lai takin.

source: How touching!
target: Mi a dek zar mai!

source: We talked all the time.
target: Kan inbia reng a.

source: So that it became clear through all the Praetorium, and to all the rest, that I was a prisoner on account of Christ;
target: chutichuan ka kawlbunnate hi Praitorian sipai pawl zawng zawng zingah leh mi dang zawng zawng hnenah chuan Krista avang a ni tih a lang chhuak ta:

source: Eat up
target: Ei zovang

source: And he gave the money to Aaron and his sons, as the Lord had said.
target: LALPAN Mosia thu a pêk, LALPA thu angin Mosia chuan tlanna sum chu Arona leh a fapate a pe a.

source: Under the earth his roots are dry, and over it his branch is cut off.
target: chhûngrilah a zung a mawih ang a, Chung lamah a zar a vuai bawk ang.

source: We're really happy
target: Kan lawm takzet

source: I may change
target: Ka inthlak maithei

source: Have you tried turning it on?
target: I on tum tawh em?

source: How is life
target: Nun eng nge a an

source: He turned 16
target: Kum 16 a tling ta

source: They call you Tom.
target: Tom an ti che a.

source: And I will have them planted in their land, and never again will they be uprooted from their land which I have given them, says the Lord your God.
target: Tin, an ramah anmahni ka ka phun ang a, an hnêna ka pêk an ram ata chu pawh chhuahin an awm leh tawh lo vang, LALPA Pathian chuan a ti a.

source: He is not a child
target: Naupang a ni lo

source: Keep in mind, O Lord, what has come to us: take note and see our shame.
target: Aw LALPA, kan chunga lo thleng chu hre reng ang che; Ngai la, kan mualphona hi en teh!

source: Blind, Blindness
target: Mitdel, mitdelna

source: I danced
target: Ka lam tawh

source: I'm sure.
target: Ka chiang.

source: Like a bird falling into a net; with no thought that his life is in danger, till an arrow goes into his side.
target: Savain a thihna tûr a ni tih hre lova Thlain a thin a dawh tlâng thlenga thang lam a pan angin.

source: God puts a strong band about me, guiding me in a straight way.
target: Pathian chu ka kulhpui nghet tak a ni a: Mi tha famkimchu a kawngah a hruai thin.

source: I hope we win.
target: Kan chak ka ring.

source: Then he said to them, Today this word has come true in your hearing.
target: Tin, an hnenah, He Pathian Lehkha Thu hi vawiinah hian in hriatah a lo thleng ta, tiin a sawi tan a.

source: So God has taken away your father's cattle and has given them to me.
target: Chutiangin Pathianin in pa rante chu a lâksak a, keimah mi pe ta a nih hi.

source: I'll check into it.
target: Ka check lut ang.

source: He can't swim
target: A hleuh thiam lo

source: Out of Ephraim they came down into the valley; after you, Benjamin, among your tribesmen; from Machir came down the captains, and from Zebulun those in whose hand is the ruler's rod.
target: Ameleka zungzamte chu Ephraim atangin an lo chhuk a; Benjamin, i mite zinga miten an rawn zui che, Makir atangin ram rorêltute an lo chhuk. Tin, Zebulun atangin ziaktu tiang kengtute chu an lo chhuk.

source: It is to be plated with the best gold, the top of it and the sides and the horns, with an edging of gold all round it.
target: Tin, a chute , a pang vêlte leh a kîte chu rangkachak hlîr hlak tîin i luantur a ni; tin, a kotlâng vêlah chuan rangkachak i dah tur a ni.

source: Then the people were glad because their offerings were freely given, for with a true heart they freely gave what they had to the Lord; and David the king was full of joy.
target: Tichuan mipuite chu an hlim êm me mai a, rilru hmun khat pua lâwm taka LALPA an peka vangin; lal Davida pawh hlim namen lo vin a hlim a.

source: See now the Great Beast, whom I made, even as I made you; he takes grass for food, like the ox.
target: En teh, nangmah ang bawka Behemoth ka siam hi, Bawng anga hnim ring mi a ni.

source: Why is my pain unending and my wound without hope of being made well? Sorrow is mine, for you are to me as a stream offering false hope and as waters which are not certain.
target: Engati nge ka na a reh theih lohva, Ka hlia a dam theih loh, tihdam duh lo ang mai hian? Ka lakah kawrte bumhmang tui kang thin ang hi a ni dawn êm ni?

source: I will make you a thing of fear, and you will come to an end: even if you are looked for, you will not be seen again for ever, says the Lord.
target: Ka tiboral daih ang chia, i awm tawh lo vang; miten zawng che mah sela an hmu tawp lo vang che, tih hi LALPA PATHIAN thu chhuak a ni.

source: The purpose of the foolish is sin: and the hater of authority is disgusting to others.
target: Mi â ngaihtuahna chu sual a ni a, Tin, mi hmusit ching mi ch mihring tan tenawm an ni.

source: You'll help, won't you?
target: I pui dawn nia?

source: Still the upright keeps on his way, and he who has clean hands gets new strength.
target: Mi fel chuan a kawng ngai a chelh tlat a, Kut fai nei chu a chak deuh deuh vang.

source: Give thought to him who has undergone so much of the hate of sinners against himself, so that you may not be tired and feeble of purpose.
target: In thlarau lamah in inthlahdah a, in lo hah loh nan, anmahni chung tha lo turin mi sualte chutianga hnialkalhna tuartu chu ngaihtuah teh u khai.

source: We love them
target: Kan hmangaih

source: Tom came.
target: Tom-a a lo kal.

source: For I am certain that you will send me back to death, and to the meeting-place ordered for all living.
target: Nangin thihna mi thlen ang tih ka hria asin, Mi nung zawng zawng tana ruat inah chuan.

source: I will make you come out from inside the town and will give you up into the hands of men from other lands, and will be judge among you.
target: A lai ata ka tichhuak ang che u a, hnamdangte kutah ka mantîr ang che u a, in chung thu an rêl ang.

source: Come, go through all the land from one end to the other for I will give it to you.
target: Tho la, ram hi a dung a vâng fang chhuak rawh; ka pe dâwn che a ni, a ti a.

source: All the rivers go down to the sea, but the sea is not full; to the place where the rivers go, there they go again.
target: Lui zawng zawngte chu tuipuiah an luang lut a, Mahse tuipui chu a khat chuang lo; Luite chu an luanna thin lamah chuan an luang reng a.

source: Do it quietly
target: Ngawi rengin tirawh

source: And he said, Praise to the Lord, the God of Shem; let Canaan be his servant.
target: LALPA, Sema Pathian chu fakin awm rawh se; Kanaana chu a chhiahhlawhah awm rawh se.

source: It's Tom on the phone.
target: Phone-a Tom a ni.

source: He made his burned offering and his meal offering and his drink offering there, draining out the blood of his peace-offerings on the altar.
target: Tin, maichâma chuan ahâlral thilhlante halin a changphut tlhlante a hlân a, a in tûr thilhlan a leih a, a remna thilhlante thisen chu a theh a.

source: Are you stealing from me?
target: Min ru a ni em?

source: It was before your time.
target: I hun hma a ni.

source: And your name will become a curse to my people, and the Lord God will put you to death, and give his servants another name:
target: Tin, in hming chu chhechham nân ka mi thlante hnênah in hnutchhiah ang a, Lalpa PATHIAN chuan a tihlum ang che u; tin, a chiahhlawhte chu hming dangin a ko tawh a:

source: Is any one able to take up the argument against me? If so, I would keep quiet and give up my breath.
target: Tunge mi hnialtu tûr awm? Tichuan, ka ngawi ang a, thlarau ka thlah mai ang.

source: Put on one side a tenth of all the increase of your seed, produced year by year.
target: Kum tin in lova thlai haw zawng zawng sawma pakhat in tihrang ngei ngei tur a ni.

source: You know too much.
target: I hre tam lutuk.

source: The sons of Zilpah, Leah's servant: Gad and Asher; these are the sons whom Jacob had in Paddan-aram.
target: tin, Leaii bâwihnu Zilpaii fapate chu Gada leh Asera an ni a: chûng chu Jakoba fapa, Paddan-aram rama a neihte kha an ni.,

source: Let your search be for the Lord and for his strength; let your hearts ever be turned to him.
target: LALPA leh a chakna chu zawng ula; A hmêl chu zawng fo rawh u.

source: You're a mean person.
target: Mi mean tak i ni.

source: Tom's up.
target: Tom-a a tho tawh.

source: Come quietly before me, O sea-lands, and let the peoples get together their strength: let them come near; then let them say what they have to say: let us put forward our cause against one another.
target: Aw thliarkarte u, ka hmaah chuan ngawi thiap rawh u; mi tin chuan an chakna tithar leh sela: lo hnai hlawm sela; chumi hnuah chuan sawi rawh se: rorêl tûrin i inhnaih tlâng teh ang u.

source: Now some people who were there at that time, gave him an account of how the blood of some Galilaeans had been mixed by Pilate with their offerings.
target: Tin, chutih lai tak chuan tute emaw an lo awm a, chu mite chuan Galili rama mi, Pilatan an thisen an Pathian biakna sa talhte zinga a telh sakate chanchin chu Isua an hrilh a.

source: But it is a small thing to me that I am judged by you or by man's judging; I am not even a judge of myself.
target: Nimahsela nangnin mi fiahna leh mihring ngaihtuahnain mi fiahna chu ka tan thil te tak te a ni; mahni pawh ka infiah ngai hek lo.

source: We were taken care of.
target: Kan enkawl a.

source: By whom has the spirit of the Lord been guided, or who has been his teacher?
target: Tuin nge LALPA thlarau chu thil tih dan tûr kawhhmuh le? A nih loh leh tunge a remruatsaktu nia amah zirtir le?

source: Judah and Israel were as great in number as the sand by the seaside, and they took their food and drink with joy in their hearts.
target: Judate leh Israelte chu tuifinriat kama tiau vaivut zat zetin an tam a, an eiin an in a, hlim takin an awm thin a.

source: We'll handle them
target: Kan buaipui ang

source: You reek of alcohol.
target: Zu i rimchhia.

source: Are you flirting with me?
target: Min flirt em ni?

source: Give him a moment.
target: Hun rei vak lo pe rawh.

source: But we took for ourselves all the cattle and the stored wealth of the towns.
target: Amaherawhchu ran zawng zawng leh khuaa râllâka kan lak thilte chu kan pualah kan la a.

source: I didn't keep them waiting.
target: Ka nghah reng lo.

source: You're flattering me.
target: Min flatter a ni.

source: We'll wait
target: Lan nghak ang

source: I am rather happy.
target: Ka hlim zawk.

source: I've been tricked
target: Ka bum tawh a ni

source: I'm not waiting for you.
target: Ka nghak lo che.

source: Go ahead.
target: Kal zel rawh.

source: Tom swims.
target: Tom-an a hleuh.

source: Then Jonathan said, My father has made trouble come on the land: now see how bright my eyes have become because I have taken a little of this honey.
target: Chutichuan Jonathana chuan, Ka pa hian mite a timangang mai a nih hi maw; en ta che u, khawizu tlemte ka han tem mai avânga ka mit meng a lo fiah takzia hi.

source: He will not be pleased.
target: A lawm lo vang.

source: We're not Bengali
target: Bengali kan ni lo

source: You may take the lizard in your hands, but it is in kings' houses.
target: Daidepte hi an kein an inham tang thin a; Nimahsela lal inah an awm thin.

source: We should go
target: Kan kal a ngai

source: Things went wrong
target: Thil a kal sual a

source: For though he sends grief, still he will have pity in the full measure of his love.
target: Tilungngai mah sela, a zahngaihna nasa tak avângin a la khawngaih dawn a ni.

source: It was a warm night.
target: Zan lum tak a ni.

source: He did not want war.
target: Indona a duh lo.

source: A king, by right rule, makes the land safe; but one full of desires makes it a waste.
target: Dik taka lalin ro a rêl chuan ram a phuisui a, Thamna a lâk chuan ram a chhe thin.

source: Break it down
target: Tikeh sawm rawh

source: And the Father himself who sent me has given witness about me. Not one of you has ever given ear to his voice; his form you have not seen.
target: Pa mi tirtu pawh chuan ka chanchin a hriattir tawh. Nangnin eng tikah mah a aw in hre ngai lo va, a hmel pawh in hmu ngai hek lo.

source: Take away the shame which is my fear; for your decisions are good.
target: Mi sawichhiatna ka hlauh hi la bo vang che, I rorêlte chu a tha si a.

source: Zebulun did not make the people of Kitron or the people of Nahalol go out; but the Canaanites went on living among them and were put to forced work.
target: Zebuluna chuan Kitron khuaa awmte leh Nahalal khuaa awmte chu a hnawt chhuak lo.Kanaan-ho chu an zingah an cheng ve a, hnathawka rawih atân an awm ta zawk a ni.

source: Pull me in
target: Mi pawt lut rawh

source: We like it
target: Kan duh e

source: For wisdom will come into your heart, and knowledge will be pleasing to your soul;
target: I thinlungah finna chu a lût ang a, I nunna atân hriatna chu tui tak a n ang;

source: Keep yourselves in the love of God, looking for life eternal through the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ.
target: chatuan nunna neihtirna khawp kan Lalpa Isua Krista khawngaihna chu nghak chungin, Pathian hmangaihnaah chuan invawng tha rawh u.

source: Is Tom doing okay?
target: Tom hi a tha em?

source: As far as it is possible for you be at peace with all men.
target: A theih phawt chuan nangmahni lam tal, mi zawng zawng nen inremin awm rawh u.

source: Opening my mouth I will give out a story, even the dark sayings of old times;
target: Tehkhin thuin ka ka ka ang ang a; Hmasânga thu ril sawite kha ka sawi chhuak ang:

source: And Rebekah took the fair robes of her oldest son, which were with her in the house, and put them on Jacob, her younger son:
target: Tin, Rebeki chuan a fapa upa zawk Esauva silhfen tha tak, ina a hnêna awm chu a la a, a fapa naupang zawk Jakoba chu a thuam a;

source: I am unstoppable
target: Ka lo dang thei lo

source: Stop the car
target: Kar tiding rawh

source: Are you satisfied?
target: I lungawi em?

source: Not that we have authority over your faith, but we are helpers of your joy: for it is faith which is your support.
target: In rinna chungah lalna kan nei, ka ti lo va, in lawmna tanpuitu kan ni, ka ti zawk a ni; rinnaa ding in ni si a.

source: And when he came into Jerusalem, all the town was moved, saying, Who is this?
target: Tin, Jerusalem khuaa a lo luh chuan, akhuain, He mi hi tunge ni? tiin an phu ta mur mur a.

source: We talk about it all the time.
target: Kan sawi fo thin.

source: And the land by the sea will be grass-land, with houses for keepers of sheep and walled places for flocks.
target: Tin, tuipui kam te chu hnim hring hmun a ni ang a, berâmpute bûk khuarna leh berâmte huang a ni ang.

source: Don't resist
target: Lo hnial suh

source: I've checked
target: Ka endik vek tawh

source: Today's cold
target: Vawiin chu a vawt

source: A violent man puts desire of evil into his neighbour's mind, and makes him go in a way which is not good.
target: Mi nunrawngin thenawmte a hruai sual thin a, Kawng tha lovah a hruai thin.

source: Have you been out at all?
target: I chhuak tawh em?

source: I'm very comfortable
target: Ka hahdam hle mai

source: And the people were moved with pity for Benjamin, because the Lord had let his wrath loose on the tribes of Israel.
target: Tin, Israel hnam zinga LALPAN intihhranna alo siam tak avângin mipuiho chu Benjamin-ho chungchangah chuan an inchhir ta a.

source: Then he put his hand on their eyes, saying, As your faith is, let it be done to you.
target: Tin, ani chuan an mit a dek a, In rin angin in chungah thleng rawh se, a ti a.

source: The wet places and the pools will not be made sweet; they will be given up to salt.
target: Chirhdûp leh dûmte erawh chu an thianghlim ve lo vang a, chi khu atân hnutchhiah a ni ang.

source: Give Mary my love.
target: Mari chu ka hmangaihna pe rawh.

source: He squinted
target: Mi ngil a ni

source: Gold may not be given for it, or a weight of silver in payment for it.
target: Rangkachaka lei theih a i lo va, A man atân tangkarua buk chhuah mi a ni hek lo.

source: And Adam was not taken by deceit, but the woman, being tricked, became a wrongdoer.
target: Tin, Adama chu bumin a awm lo va, hmeichhia erawh chu bumin a awm a, bawhchhiatnaah a tlu ta a.

source: I gave thought to my steps, and my feet were turned into the way of your unchanging word.
target: Ka awm dante ka ngaihtuah a, I thuhriattir lamah chuan ka ke ka pen ta a.

source: They will catch you
target: An man ang che

source: You have been my support from the day of my birth; you took me out of my mother's body; my praise will be ever of you.
target: Ka nu pum atang rengin nangma kaihin ka awm thin a: Ka nu ril ata mi la chhuaktu i ni a; Nangmah a ni, ka fak fo dawn che ni.

source: Have any of the rulers belief in him, or any one of the Pharisees?
target: Hotute leh Pharisaite zinga mi reng reng amah ring an awm tawh em ni?

source: And he sent out a dove, to see if the waters had gone from the face of the earth;
target: Tin, lei chungah tui a tlêm tawh nge tawh lo tih hriat nân thuro a thlawh chhuahtîr leh a;

source: On the fourth day Elizur, the son of Shedeur, chief of the children of Reuben:
target: Ni li ni chuan Reubena thlahte puipa Sedeura fapa Elizura chuan a hlan a:

source: But those who went with Paul took him as far as Athens, and then went away, with orders from him to Silas and Timothy to come to him quickly.
target: Tin, Paula hruaitute chuan Atheni khaw thlengin an hruai a; tin, Sila leh Timothea chu theihtawpa a hnena kal thuaina tur thuchah sinin an haw ta a.

source: He always strikes out
target: A vaw chhuak ziah

source: Between morning and evening they are completely broken; they come to an end for ever, and no one takes note.
target: Zing leh tlai karah an boral a, Tukhaw ngaihsak lohvin an ral zel thin a ni.

source: They had a mission.
target: Mission an nei a.

source: Don't eat fast food!
target: Fast food ei suh!

source: And the inner space was walled with three lines of squared stones and a line of cedar-wood boards.
target: Biak in hung chhûng kawtlai chhûngril zawk chu lung chher chhawng thum leh, sidar thingphel thuah khatin a siam a.

source: Let another man give you praise, and not your mouth; one who is strange to you, and not your lips.
target: Nangma kaa infak lovin mi dangin fak zawk che sela; Nangma hmui ni lo, hmêl hriat loh mi hmuiin.

source: They didn't succeed
target: An hlawhtling lo

source: Let your desire be for peace with all men, and to be made holy, without which no man may see the Lord;
target: Mi zawng zawng nena inremna leh thianghlimna um rawh u, chu mi thianghlimna lovin tuman Lalpa an hmu lo vang:

source: Won't that be fun
target: Chu chu a nuam dawn lo em ni

source: Look it over
target: Va en nawn rawh

source: How much less when you say that you do not see him; that the cause is before him, and you are waiting for him.
target: Nang lek phei chu e! 'Amah ka hmu lo ve, Thu rel tûr chu a hmaah a awm reng a, Amah ka nghak reng e,' i han tih hi:

source: Even now will the taker of your heritage come to you, you who are living in Mareshah: the glory of Israel will come to destruction for ever.
target: Inziat kawlh la, i fa duh takte avâng chuan inmêt kawlh rawh: mulukawlh angin intikawlh nasa zual rawh; i hnên ata sala hruaiin an awm ta si a.

source: He employs a maid.
target: Maid pakhat a thawk a.

source: I want kids
target: Naupangte ka duh

source: Tom will die
target: Tom a thi dâwn

source: We are guinea pigs.
target: Guinea pig kan ni.

source: But the unclean spirit, when he is gone out of a man, goes through dry places looking for rest, and getting it not.
target: Tin, ramhuai bawlhhlawh chu mi kawchhung ata a chhuahin, chawlhna zawngin tui awm lohna hmunahte a vak a vak a, a hmu thin si lo va.

source: You will cooperate
target: In thawhpui ang

source: And my tongue will be talking of your righteousness and of your praise all the day.
target: Tichuan, ka lei hian felna thu a sawi ang a, I fakna thu pawh nilengin a sawi bawk ang.

source: Are they here
target: Hetah an la awm em

source: If the Lord had not been my helper, my soul would quickly have gone down into death.
target: LALPA chu mi tanpuitu ni suh sela chuan, Ka nunna hi rang takin hmun rehah a awm tawh tûr a ni.

source: Are you going to be there?
target: I awm dawn em ni?

source: The fourth Izri, with his sons and his brothers, twelve;
target: vawi lina chu Izria chungah, a fapate leh a unaute chu sâwm leh pahnih;

source: But the things which come out of the mouth come from the heart; and they make a man unclean.
target: Kaa chhuakte erawh chu thinlungah a lo chhuak a ni; chung ngei chuan mihring a tibawlhhlawh thin a ni.

source: I stubbed my toe.
target: Ka ke ruh chu ka stub a.

source: Then take them from their hands, and let them be burned on the burned offering on the altar, a sweet smell before the Lord, an offering made by fire to the Lord.
target: Tin, an kut ata chu lâksakin, LALPA tâna rimtui a tân maichâmah hâlral thilhlan chuah chuan i hâl tur a ni: chu chu LALPA tâna meia thil hlan a ni.

source: Let me pay
target: Ka lo pe ang

source: I already ordered.
target: Ka order tawh a.

source: But we have been living in tents, and have done everything which Jonadab our father gave us orders to do.
target: puaninahte chuan kan cheng zawk a, kan thlahtu Jonadaba thupêk zawng zawng chu awihin kan zawm vek a ni.

source: I won't go
target: Ka kal dâwn lo

source: I didn't stay for long.
target: Ka awm rei lo.

source: Which car is yours?
target: Eng car nge i ta?

source: I like women
target: Nu te ka duh

source: Do you see it?
target: I hmu em?

source: Do you have a brother
target: Unaupa i nei em

source: And there were no women so beautiful as the daughters of Job in all the earth: and their father gave them a heritage among their brothers.
target: Tin, ram zawng zawngah pawh Joba fanute anga hmeichhe hmêl tha an awm lo: an pa chuan anni chu an nutate zingah rochan tûr a pe ve hlawm a.

source: I resent that.
target: Kha kha ka thawn leh.

source: And he made him take his seat in the second of his carriages; and they went before him crying, Make way! So he made him ruler over all the land of Egypt.
target: tin, a tawlailîr neih pahnihnaah chuan a chuantîr a; a hmaah chuan, Țhingthi r'u, tiin an au zêl a: tichuan Aigupta ram zawng zawng chungah chuan hotuah a siam ta a.

source: I'm starting to get old!
target: Ka tar tan tawh!

source: You're always drunk
target: I ruih fo thin

source: Now some are full of pride, as if I was not coming to you.
target: Tin, kei in hnena lo kal tawh lo tur ang maiin thenkhat in uang a ni.

source: To be offered by the priest, one for a sin-offering and one for a burned offering; and the priest will take away her sin before the Lord on account of her unclean condition.
target: Tin, puithiamin sual thawi nan pakhat, halral thilhlanah pakhat a hian tur a ni; tichuan puithiam chuan thi puta a bawlhhlawhna thuah LALPA hmaah inremna a siamsak ang.

source: Is not God as high as heaven? and see the stars, how high they are!
target: Van sângah Pathian a awm lo vem ni? Arsi sâng berte en la, an sanzia mai chu.

source: I gloated
target: Ka sun e

source: Or with rulers who had gold, and whose houses were full of silver;
target: A nih loh leh, hotute rangkachak sum nei a, Tangkaa an in tikhatute nên chuan;

source: Give them the right reward of their acts, and of their evil doings: give them punishment for the works of their hands, let them have their full reward.
target: An thiltih ang zel leh, an thiltihte a sualzia ang zelin rul la; An kuta na thawh ang zelin rul la; An sual man hmuhtir ang che.

source: Saying that they will be free, while they themselves are the servants of destruction; because whatever gets the better of a man makes a servant of him.
target: Anmahni chu chhiatna bawih ni chung rengin mite chu bawih chhuah thu an tiam thin a; mi ngamtu apiangin chu mi ngei chuan bawihah a siam thin a ni.
