source: He is so cruel that no one is ready to go against him. Who then is able to keep his place before me?
target: Amah chawk tho tûrin tumah an rorum ngam lo: Chuti anih chuan tunge ka hmaah ding thei ang?

source: And Moses gave orders to the children of Israel to keep the Passover.
target: Tichuan Mosia Israela thlahte chu kalhlen kut nei tur chuan a hrilh a.

source: And now I will make her shame clear before the eyes of her lovers, and no one will take her out of my hand.
target: Chutichuan a ngaihzawngte mit hmuhah A saruak zahmawh ka ti lang ang, Ka kut ata tumân an chhanchhuak lo vang.

source: He who sent me is with me; he has not gone from me, because at all times I do the things which are pleasing to him.
target: Mi tirtu chu ka hnenah a awm a, mi thlahthlam lo ve; a thil lawmzawng apiang ka tih fo avangin, a ti a.

source: You're a disgrace
target: Mualphona i ni

source: You're first
target: A hmasa ber i ni

source: You can't argue against it.
target: I dodal thei lo.

source: I have given your word to them; and they are hated by the world, because they are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.
target: I thu an hnenah ka pe ta e; tin, khawvelin anni chu an hua a, khawvela mi an nih loh avangin, kei khawvela mi ka ni lo ang bawk hian.

source: But see that you do not take the blood for food; for the blood is the life; and you may not make use of the life as food with the flesh.
target: Thisen eraw chu ei lo turin fimkhur rawh u; thisen chu nunna a ni si a; nunna chawpin sa chu in ei tur a ni lo.

source: Try harder
target: Ti nasa rawh

source: Do you have a hymn book?
target: Hla Bu i nei em?

source: And now we give you news, brothers, about the grace of God which has been given to the churches of Macedonia;
target: Tin, unaute u, Makedonia rama kohhranho pawlte zinga Pathian khawngaihna pek chu kan hriattir dawn a che u;

source: And all the priests of the high places there he put to death on the altars, burning the bones of the dead on them; and then he went back to Jerusalem.
target: Tichuan chuta hmun sâng puithiam awm zawng zawngte chu mâicham chungah a that a, chungah chuan mihring ruhte a hal a, Jerusalem-ah a haw leh ta a.

source: Their images are silver and gold, the work of men's hands.
target: An milemte chu tangka leh rangkachak an ni a, Mihring kut chhuak an ni.

source: You are about my age.
target: Ka kum vel i ni.

source: She has no one among all her children to be her guide; not one of the sons she has taken care of takes her by the hand.
target: A fapa hrin zawng zawng zingah chuan amah hruaitu tûr tumah an awm lo va; a fapa chawm len zawng anwg zingah chuan a kuta chelh tumah an awm hek lo.

source: We were going to try
target: Kan tum dawn a ni

source: There is one body and one Spirit, even as you have been marked out by God in the one hope of his purpose for you;
target: A koh chhan che u beiseina hmunkhata koh in ni ang bawk khan taksa pakhat leh Thlarau pakhat chauh a awm a;

source: And if any man goes to law with you and takes away your coat, do not keep back your robe from him.
target: Tin, tupawhin i lakah thupawi siamin, i kawr lak a tum chuan, i puan pawh laktir nghal rawh.

source: Not one of them will keep his life, for I will send evil on the men of Anathoth in the year of their punishment.
target: thi bang reng an awm lo vang: Anathoth mite chungah chuan thil țha lo ka thlen dawn si a, an hremna kum tûr ngei chu.

source: You laugh too much!
target: I nui lutuk!

source: I'll give her that
target: Chu chu ka pe ang

source: They were approaching
target: An rawn hnaih a

source: I can follow the rules.
target: Dan ka zawm thei.

source: If he has done you any wrong or is in debt to you for anything, put it to my account.
target: Tin, i chungah thil engpawh tisualin emaw, i engilo emaw a bat chuan keima batah ruat ang che;

source: And let our people go on with good works for necessary purposes, so that they may not be without fruit.
target: Kan mite chu tlakchham an neih ngai loh nan hna tangkai thawka inhmang reng turin fuih la, an awm mai mai tur a ni lo.

source: Stay down!
target: Inngai tlawm rawh!

source: And all the brothers who are with me, to the churches of Galatia:
target: ka hnena unau awm zawng zawngte chuan Galatia rama kohhranhote hnenah,

source: You've suffered enough.
target: I tuar tawk tawh.

source: You gave me a fright.
target: Hlauhna min pe a.

source: I got in line.
target: Ka chang ve hram.

source: So Nathan gave David an account of all these words and this vision.
target: Chung thu zawng zawng lehchu inlârna ang chiahin Nathana chuan Davida hnênah a sawi a.

source: Because of the loving mercies of our God, by which the dawn from heaven has come to us,
target: An sualte ngaihdam nan A mite hnenah chhandamna thu hriattir turin. Chu mi avang chuan chung lam atangin ni chhuakin min rawn tlawh ang,

source: For Herod had taken John and put him in prison because of Herodias, his brother Philip's wife.
target: Heroda chuan a unau Philipa nupui Herodi avangin Johana chu a man a, a phuar a, tan inah a lo khung tawh a ni;

source: Am I clear?
target: Ka sawi chiang em?

source: For the number of your gods is as the number of your towns, O Judah; and for every street in Jerusalem you have put up altars to the Baal for burning perfumes to the Baal.
target: Aw Juda, i pathiante chu i khawpui zat an ni si: thil zahthlak tak, Baala hnêna rimtui halna tûr maichâm meuh pawh Jerusalem kawtthlêr zat ngawtin in lo din ta a.

source: And all who were in the Synagogue were very angry when these things were said to them.
target: Tin, inkhawmna ina mi zawng zawng chuan chung thu chu an hriat veleh, an lo thinur em em a,

source: I am afraid not.
target: Ka hre chiang mai ngam lo.

source: We can win.
target: Kan chak thei.

source: And Eleasah was the father of Sismai, and Sismai was the father of Shallum,
target: tin, Eleasa chuan Sismaia a hring a, tin, Sismaia chuan Saluma a hring a;

source: I was shy.
target: Ka zak a.

source: Then the Lord will send these nations in flight before you, and you will take the lands of nations greater and stronger than yourselves.
target: LALPA chuan heng hnam zawng zawng hi ahnawhchhuahsak ang che u a, in aia ropui zawk leh thil tithei zak hnamte ram chu in luah ang.

source: But while men were sleeping, one who had hate for him came and put evil seeds among the grain, and went away.
target: nimahsela mi an muthilh hlanin a hmelma a lo kal a, buh zingah chuan buh lem a theh a, a kal bo leh ta a.

source: And fifty men of the sons of the prophets went out and took their places facing them a long way off, while the two of them were by the edge of Jordan.
target: Tin, zâwlneiho fapate zinga mi sawmnga an va kal a, anmahni eptin hla feah an va ding a; tin, anni pahnih chu Jrodan-ah an lo ding a.

source: See if there is any way of sorrow in me, and be my guide in the eternal way.
target: Tin, keimahah hian suahsualna kawng rêng rêng a awm nge awm lo en la, Chatuan kawngah chuan mi hruai ang che.

source: You called
target: I bia em

source: No longer will the earth give you her fruit as the reward of your work; you will be a wanderer in flight over the earth.
target: lei i leh pawhin a thatna chu a pe phal tawh lo vang che; leiah hian tlân bo leh vâkvai i lo ni tawh ang, a ti a.

source: Now Athaliah, hearing the noise of the people running and praising the king, came to the people in the house of the Lord:
target: Tin, Athaliin mipui lal chawimawia an zi mur mur thâwm chu a hriatin LALPA inah mipui zingah chuan a va kal a;

source: The heads of families, the strong men of war, were two thousand, six hundred.
target: Mi chak huaisen thiau, an chhûngkaw puipa zawng zawng chu 26,000 an ni a.

source: And so, putting away false words, let everyone say what is true to his neighbour: for we are parts one of another.
target: Chutichuan, dawt sawi banin, mahni thenawm hnenah thu dik tak sawi theuh rawh u; inpeng tawn theuh kan ni si a.

source: In whom we have a heritage, being marked out from the first in his purpose who does all things in agreement with his designs;
target: Ama duhzawnga remruat ang zela thil engkim titu tum anga ruat lawk ni tawhin, amahah bawk chuan a ro tura siam kan ni,

source: They did very well
target: An ti tha hle mai

source: Is it just right?
target: A dik mai em ni?

source: This I said to you, but you gave no attention and went against the orders of the Lord, and in your pride went up into the hill-country.
target: chu chu ka hrilh che u a, in pawm lo va, LALPA thupêkm chu in helsan ta zawk a, tlângah chuan in han chho lui ta a.

source: I fell asleep.
target: Ka muhil a.

source: He's jealous
target: A thikthu a chhia

source: They won't fire me.
target: Min ban dawn lo.

source: Today the Lord your God gives you orders to keep all these laws and decisions: so then keep and do them with all your heart and all your soul.
target: Vawiinah hian LALPA in Pathian chuanheng dan leh rorêlte hi zawm turin thu ape che u a ni; chuvangin in thinlung zawng awng leh, in rilru zawng zawngin in pawmin in zawm tur a ni.

source: It's time.
target: A hun tawh.

source: But in this way will you be put to the test: by the life of Pharaoh, you will not go away from this place till your youngest brother comes here.
target: heti hian fiahin in awm ang: in tlum ber chu heta a lo kal loh chuan Pharaoa nunna chhâlin heta ta hi in chhuak lo vang ka ti che u a ni.

source: For my clean and upright ways keep me safe, because my hope is in you.
target: Ka rilru thatna leh ka diknain mi chhanhim rawh se, Ka nghak reng si chia.

source: I won't sing
target: Ka zai lovang

source: And say a kind word to the church which is in their house. Give my love to my dear Epaenetus, who is the first fruit of Asia to Christ.
target: An ina kohhran inkhawmho chu chibai mi buksak bawk ang che u. Ka duh tak Epaineta, Asia rama Krista ring hmasa ber kha, chibai mi buksak ng che u.

source: I left the water on.
target: Tui chu ka dah a.

source: With you the keeper of sheep with his flock will be broken, and with you the farmer and his oxen will be broken, and with you captains and rulers will be broken.
target: Nangmah hmangin berâmpu leh berâm rual ka tisawm a, Nangmah hmangin lo neitu leh bâwngpa tuak ka tisawm a, Nangmah hmangin ram awptute leh puitute ka tisawm thin a nih kha.

source: We saw everything
target: Engkim kan hmu a

source: But the people gave no attention to the voice of Samuel; and they said, No, but we will have a king over us,
target: Nimahsela mipuite chuan Samuela thu chu an pawm duh lo va, A ni lo ve, lal kan nei ngei tûr a ni;

source: For three days they were there with David, feasting at his table, for their brothers had made ready food for them.
target: Tin, Davida hnênah chuan ni thum ei leh barin an awm a; an unauten an buatsaihsak vek a ni.

source: But the things which God had made clear before, by the mouth of all the prophets, that the Christ would have to undergo, he has put into effect in this way.
target: Nimahsela Pathianin zawlnei zawng zawng kaan, a Krista-in hrehawm a tuar tur thu a hriattir lawk kha, khati khan a thlentir ta a ni.

source: I'm escaping
target: Ka chhuak mek

source: For if they who are of the law are the people who get the heritage, then faith is made of no use, and the word of God has no power;
target: Dana mite chu roluahtute an nih si chuan rinna engah mah a tlaktlai lo va, thutiam pawh chu engmah a ni ta lo va;

source: I fought back
target: Ka bei lêt

source: Because of this our hearts are feeble; for these things our eyes are dark;
target: Hemi avâng hian kan thinlung a chau va, Hêng avâng hia kan mit a thim;

source: Salvation is far from evil-doers; for they have made no search for your rules.
target: Chhandamna chu mi suaksualte laka hla a ni; I thuruatte chu an zanw loh avângin.

source: Sit down everyone
target: Ṭhu teh u le

source: Where Jesus has gone before us, as a high priest for ever after the order of Melchizedek.
target: chutah chuan Isua, Melkisedeka awm dan anga chatuana Puithiam Lalber lo ni tawhin, kan tan hmahruaituah a lo lut ta a.

source: She paid no attention to me.
target: Min ngaihven lo.

source: For the name of God is shamed among the Gentiles because of you, as it is said in the holy Writings.
target: An ziak ang ngei khan Pathian hming chu nangmahni avangin Jentailte zingah tihchhiatin a awm ta a nih hi.

source: I'm not your date!
target: I date ka ni lo!

source: Wives, be under the authority of your husbands, as of the Lord.
target: Nupuite u, Lalpa hnena in intulut ang hian mahni pasalte hnenah intulut rawh u.

source: I am almost ready.
target: Ka inpeih hnai tawh.

source: Are you fit?
target: I inthazo em?

source: How short is the life of your servant! when will you give your decision against those who are attacking me?
target: I chhiahhlawh kum chin tûr hi engzat nge ni dawn? Mi tiduhdahtute chungah hian engtikah nge ro i rel dawn?

source: Is it the number of deaths?
target: Thi zat a ni em?

source: You're wrong again.
target: I tisual leh ta.

source: Hold on tight
target: Lo nghak zel

source: For we all go wrong in a number of things. If a man never makes a slip in his talk, then he is a complete man and able to keep all his body in control.
target: Kan zain thil tam tak kan tisual fo thin. A thusawia tisual ngai lo mi chu, mi puitling a ni a, a taksa pum pawh veng thei mi a ni.

source: Can we fix it?
target: Kan siam dik thei ang em?

source: There is an evil which I have seen under the sun, like an error which comes by chance from a ruler:
target: Ni hnuaia ka hmuh thin thil tha lo a awm, Rorêltua lo chhuak thiltih dik lo ang:

source: I adore my clients
target: Ka client te hi ka adore thin

source: One he-goat for a sin-offering; in addition to the offering for taking away your sin, and the regular burned offering and its meal offering, and their drink offerings.
target: sual thawi nan kelpa pakhat nen: inremna tura sual thawina te, halral thilhlan hlan reng te, chu mia chhangphut leh an in tur thilhlante tiam lovin.

source: For the poor you have ever with you, but me you have not for ever.
target: Mi retheite chu kumkhuaa inhnena awm an ni alawm, kei erawh chu kumkhuaa in hnena awm tur ka ni lo.

source: But I don't want to.
target: Mahse, ka duh lo.

source: Privacy doesn't exist.
target: Privacy a awm lo.

source: Organ meats
target: Sa tawphnawk

source: And when Moses put these words before the children of Israel, the people were full of grief.
target: Tin, Mosian chung thute chu Israela thlahte zawng zawng chu a hrilh a: tichuan mipuite chu an lungngai ta hle mai a.

source: And they said much before me of the good he had done, and gave him accounts of my words. And Tobiah sent letters with the purpose of causing me fear.
target: Ka hriatah a thiltih thatte an sawi thin a, ka thu sawite a hnênah an thlen bawk thin. Tichuan Tobia chuan min tihthaih tûrin lehkhate a rawn thawn thin a ni.

source: You need a purpose
target: Tum i mamawh a ni

source: Are you OK?
target: I tha em?

source: I can do it
target: Ka ti thei

source: It was fun anyway
target: Eng pawh nise a nuam khawp mai

source: Let your doors be open, O Lebanon, so that fire may be burning among your cedars.
target: I kawngte hawng rawh, aw Lebanon, I sidarte meiin a kan fai theih nân.

source: You don't need to be there.
target: I awm a ngai lo.

source: We tried to call you.
target: Koh kan tum a.

source: I don't intend to repeat myself.
target: Repeat ka tum lo.

source: But if you do not let men have forgiveness for their sins, you will not have forgiveness from your Father for your sins.
target: Nimahsela, mite in ngaihdam si loh chuan, in Pain in bawhchhiatte a ngaidam bik lovang.

source: I shaved
target: Ka ziat fai

source: A good man has grace in the eyes of the Lord; but the man of evil designs gets punishment from him.
target: Mi tha chuan LALPA duhsakna a hlawh ang a, Suahsualna rilru pu mi erawh chu thiam loh a chantir ang.

source: I think they have it right
target: An nei dik ka ti

source: Truly, all those who are angry with you will be made low and put to shame: those desiring to do you wrong will come to nothing and never again be seen.
target: Ngai teh, in chunga lungni lo zawng zawng chu mualpho tak leh zak takin an awm ang: nangmahni hnialtute chu engmah lo ang an ni ang a, an b oral ang.

source: We lost
target: Kan tibo

source: Dear brothers, do not be surprised, as if it was something strange, if your faith is tested as by fire:
target: Duh takte u, in zinga fiahna nasa tak lo awm, nangmahni fiahna tura in chunga lo thleng hi, thilmak in chunga lo thleng angin mak ti suh u.

source: But he whose life is true comes to the light, so that it may be clearly seen that his acts have been done by the help of God.
target: Amaherawhchu tupawh tidik apiang an thiltihte Pathian avanga ti an ni tih a lan nan, engah an lo kal thin, a ti a.

source: You are of God, my little children, and you have overcome them because he who is in you is greater than he who is in the world.
target: Naute u, Pathian hnen ata in ni a, chung chu in ngam tawh e; nangmahnia awma chu khawvela awma ai chuan a ropui zawk avangin.

source: Don't ramble
target: Leng vak suh

source: Good luck.
target: Vannei rawh.

source: Be ready with the good news of peace as shoes on your feet;
target: remna Chanchin Tha inbuatsaihna chu in keah bunin ding rawh u;

source: Let your gentle behaviour be clear to all men. The Lord is near.
target: In dawhtheihzia mi zawng zawng hriat ni rawh se. Lalpa chu a hnai e.

source: We are lost people.
target: Mi bo kan ni.

source: We're freaks
target: Kan hlau

source: I've got him with me.
target: Ka bulah a awm a.

source: So my mind was turned to grief for all the trouble I had taken and all my wisdom under the sun.
target: Chutichuan, ka han hawi vêl a, ni hnuaia ka thawhrimna zawng zawnga ka thawh takte chungchang chuan ka thinlung bei ka tidawng ta.

source: Take it easy man
target: Hlim takin la rawh mipa

source: And love of the brothers to fear of God, and to love of the brothers, love itself.
target: In Pathian ngaihsaknaah chuan unaute hmangaihna telh ula, in unaute hmangaihnaah chuan hmangaihna telh rawh u.

source: Together, it's 0.3.
target: An vaiin 0.3 a ni.

source: Look at them move.
target: En rawh an che.

source: Or if he becomes unclean through touching unconsciously any unclean thing of man, whatever it may be, when it is made clear to him he will be responsible:
target: tin, mihring pawh a thianghlim lohna eng ang pawh ni sela, a thiang lohna chu hre lo pawha a khawih chuan a hriat chhuah hun chuan thiam loh a chang ang;

source: Up! and come to our help, and give us salvation because of your mercy.
target: Min tanpui tûrin tho la, I ngilneihna avângin min tlan ang che.

source: Do it over lunch.
target: Chawhmeh ei laiin ti rawh.

source: And the tenth part of an ephah of the best meal for a meal offering mixed with the fourth part of a hin of clear oil.
target: chhangphut thilhlan atan chhangphut dip mi epha hmun sawma țhena hmun khat, hriak sawr hin hmun lia țhena hmun khata chawhpâwlh nen.

source: And certain women who had been made free from evil spirits and diseases, Mary named Magdalene, from whom seven evil spirits had gone out,
target: hmeichhia tute emaw ramhuai zawl dam leh te leh na dam lehte nen. Chung hmeichhiate chu Mari, a kaw chhung ata ramhuai pasarih chhuak Magdalini an tih te,

source: And the Tirshatha said that they were not to have the most holy things for their food, till a priest came to give decision by Urim and Thummim.
target: Ram awptu chuan urim leh thumim hmangtu tûr puithiam a awm hma loh chuan chaw thianghlim an ei a khap a.

source: Three times in the year let all your males come before the Lord, the God of Israel.
target: i mipa zawng zawngte chu kum khatah vawi thum, Lalpa Pathian, Israelte Pathian hmaah chuan an rawn inlan thin tur a ni.

source: The room is light
target: Room chu a eng a

source: It's a Roman name.
target: Rom hming a ni.

source: What did you dream
target: Eng nge i mumang a
